<head>om ।</head>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīmacchrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtaṃ</head>
<head>brahmasūtrabhāṣyam ।</head>
<head>śrīmadappayadīkṣitakṛtaśivārkamaṇidīpikāsahitam ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhabhāṣyaprārambhaḥ ।</head>
<lg><l>ūm̐ na1mo'haṃpadārthāya lokānāṃ siddhihetave ।</l>
<l>saccidānandarūpāya śivāya paramātmane ।। 1 ।।</l></lg>
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāprārambhaḥ ।</head>
<p>yasyāhurāgamavidaḥ paripūrṇaśakteraṃśe kiyatyapi niviṣṭamamuṃ prapañcam । tasmai tamālarucibhāsura-
kandharāya nārāyaṇīsahacarāya namaśśivāya ।। 1 ।। ākarṇakṛṣṭadhanurāhitamohanāstramārānni-
rīkṣya madanaṃ kupitasya kiñcit । śambhoḥ samādhisamaye vika2satkṛśānujvālākalāpajaṭilaṃ
niṭi3laṃ smarāmi ।। 2 ।। mahāpāśupatajñānasampradāyapravartakān । aṃśāvatārānīśasya yo4gā-
cāryānupāsmahe ।। 3 ।। āsetubandhataṭamā ca tuṣāraśailādā<pratika>cāryadīkṣita</pratika> iti prathitābhidhā-
nam । advaitacitsukhamahāmbudhimagnabhāvamasmatpitāmahamaśeṣaguruṃ prapadye ।। 4 ।। yaṃ brahma niści-
tadhiyaḥ pravadanti sākṣāttaddarśanādakhiladarśanapārabhājaḥ । taṃ sarvavedasamaśeṣabudhādhirājaṃ
<pratika>śrīraṅgarājamakhinaṃ</pratika> pitaraṃ nato'smi ।। 5 ।। yadyapyadvaita eva śrutiśikharagirāmāgamānāṃ
ca niṣṭhā sākaṃ sarvaiḥ purāṇasmṛtinikaramahābhāratādiprabandhaiḥ । tatraiva brahmasūtrāṇyapi ca vimṛ-
śatāṃ bhānti viśrāntimanti pratnairācāryaratnairapi parijagṛhe śaṅkarādyaistadeva ।। 6 ।। tathāpya-
nugrahādeva taruṇenduśikhāmaṇeḥ । advaitavāsanā puṃsāmāvirbhavati nānyathā ।। 7 ।। anugrahaśca
devasya śakt‍yā cidrūpayā saha । yathāvattaṃ parijñāya dhyāyadbhissamavāpyate ।। 8 । iti bhaga-
vatā <pratika>vedavyāsena</pratika> sūtrayatā paraṃ saguṇamapi tatsāmbaṃ brahma nyarūpi śivābhidham । yadanuka-
raṇādarthānanye'pi sañjagṛhurbahūnpa5ṇinajamukhāḥ sūtrairviṣvaṅmukhatvavibhūṣaṇaiḥ ।। 9 ।। tadidaṃ brahma-
sūtrāṇāṃ tātparyaṃ saguṇe <pratika>śive</pratika> । prakaṭīkartumācāryaḥ praṇinye bhāṣyamuttamam ।। 10 ।। <pratika>śrīka-
ṇṭhācāryakṛtaṃ bhāṣyaṃ</pratika> yadbrahmasūtrāṇām । pratipadamatigambhīraṃ na śakyate māddaśairboddhum ।। 11 ।।
bhāṣyametadanaghaṃ vivṛṇviti svapnajāgaraṇayossamaṃ prabhuḥ । <pratika>cinnabommanṛparūpabhṛtsvayaṃ māṃ nya-
yuṅkta mahilārdhavigrahaḥ</pratika> ।। 12 ।। (<pratika>śrīci6nnabommanṛpatiḥ</pratika> śritapārijātaḥ sarvātmanā paśupatiṃ
<note>(1) <quote>‘namo brahmapadārthāye’</quote>ti pāṭhāntaram ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vilasa’</quote>diti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘nayanaṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<note>(4) yogācāryā iti śrīkaṇṭhācāryāṇāmeva nāmāntaram ।</note> <note>(5) paṇinajaḥ paṇiniḥ । <quote>‘phaṇipatimukhāḥ’</quote> iti pāṭhe
phaṇipatiḥ patañjalirityarthaḥ ।</note> <note>(6) idaṃ padyaṃ keṣucitpustakeṣu nāsti ।</note>
<pb n="002"/>
śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ । yaḥ sārvabhaumapadavīmadhigamya dhīrastatpūjayaiva manute saphalatvamasyāḥ ।। 13 ।।)
a1sya kṣitīśiturapāraguṇāmburāśeraṣṭāsu dikṣu vitatorjitaśāsanasya । antassadaiva vasatā
vibhunā niyukto bhāṣyaṃ yathāmatibalaṃ viśadīkaromi ।। 14 ।। yāvanto niviśante viduṣāṃ
vyākhyānabhāratīgumbhāḥ । sarveṣāmapi teṣāṃ dadāti puṣpakamivaitadavakāśam ।। 15 ।। tasmā-
datra yathāmati kiyadāśayavarṇanaṃ mayā kriyate । tuṣyantu tato vibudhāḥ katipayaratnagrahā-
divāmbunidheḥ ।। 16 ।।</p>
<p>bhagavadbādarāyaṇapraṇītabrahmasūtranikurumbarūpasya vedāntamīmāṃsāśāstrasya lokānujighṛkṣayā
bhāṣyaṃ nirmitsurācāryo nirantaraśivadhyānanirdhūtanikhilāntarāyo'pi śiṣṭācāraparipālanārthaṃ
vyācikhyāsitaśāstrapratipādyāṃ parāṃ devatāṃ namaskaroti—<pratika>oṃ namaiti</pratika> । daharavidyāniṣṭho'yamā-
cāryaḥ । ata eva tasyāṃ rūpasama2rthakaṃ <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahme’</quote>ti mantramiha bhāṣye punaḥ punarāda-
rātiśayāvdyākhyāsyati । kāmādyadhikaraṇe ca svayaṃ daharavidyāpriyatvāt sarvāsu paravidyāsu
daharavidyotkṛṣṭeti vakṣyati । ataḥ svaśākhāmnātadaharavidyāyāṃ viśeṣyanirdeśakena padena svo-
pāsyaṃ namaskāryaṃ nirdiśati—<pratika>paramātmana</pratika> iti । śrūyate hi taittirīyopaniṣadi—<quote>‘tasyāśśikhāyā
madhye paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ’</quote> । iti । kecana sa paramātmā śivādanya iti kathayantaḥ parānbhra-
mayanti tadanuvartanena sādhavo mā bhramiṣurityabhipretya viśinaṣṭi—<pratika>śivāyeti</pratika> । daharavidyo-
pāsyaḥ paramātmā śiva evetyācāryaḥ śārīrādhikaraṇe nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyati । yadyapi taitti-
rīyopaniṣadgatasya paramātmaśabdasya viśeṣopasaṃhārārthaṃ <quote>‘dhātuḥ prasādānmahimānamīśaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘viśvādhiko
rudro maharṣiḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvaraḥ’</quote> iti tadupakramagatānāmīśarudramaheśvaranāmnāmanyatamasya
<quote>‘ūrdhvaretaṃ virūpākṣa’</quote> miti tadupasaṃhāragatasya virūpākṣanāmno vātra saṅkīrtanaṃ yuktaṃ, tathāpi
<quote>‘samedhayati yannityaṃ sarvārthānāmupakramam । śivamicchanmanuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāddevaḥ śivaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।’</quote> iti
mahābhārate śivaśabdasya manuṣyādihitaiṣitvatatprāripsitapuruṣārthopa3yogisakalavyāpārasamedhayi-
tṛtvapravṛttinimittakatvena vyākhyātatayā śiṣyāṇāṃ tatsaṅkīrtanatadarthānusandhānapūrvakametadbhā-
ṣyapāṭhārambhe sati śivaprasādānnirantarāyapāṭhaparisamāptistadābhilaṣitasakalapuruṣārthasiddhiśca
bhavatīti tatsiddhayarthaṃ śivaśabdena viśeṣa4ṇanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । tadudāhṛte mahābhāratavacane <quote>‘hṛdya-
pekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvā’</quote> diti <ref>(bra॰ 1.3.25 sū॰)</ref>sūtra ivamanuṣyagrahaṇaṃ devādīnāmapyupalakṣa-
ṇam । yato mahābhārata eva śivavacanaṃ—<quote>‘samā bhavanti me sarve dānavāścāmarāśca ye । śivo'smi
sarvabhūtānāṃ śivatvaṃ tena me surāḥ ।।’</quote> iti । <quote>‘vaśa kāntā’</quote> viti dhātorvarṇavyatyayena siddhaśśiva-
śabdaḥ pṛṣodarādiḥ । tadāhuḥ—<quote>‘hisidhātossiṃhaśabdo vaśakāntau śivaḥ smṛtaḥ । varṇavyatyayataḥ
siddhau paśyakaḥ kaśyapo yathā ।।’</quote> iti । tena śiva5śabdasya icchāvānityarthalābhe kasminniti
tadviṣayākāṅkṣāyāṃ devāsuramanuṣyādīnāṃ śive viṣaya ityayamarthaḥ <quote>‘śivamicchanmanuṣyāṇā’</quote> mi-
tyā6rṣavacanaprāmāṇyāllabhyate । <quote>‘samedhayatīti’</quote> vyutpattyantaraṃ tu śivaśabdāt śubhavācinastatkaroti-
ṇyantātpacādyacpratyayena labhyate । vyutpattidvayaniṣpannasyāpi śivaśabdadvayasya parameśvaravāca-
kasya tantreṇoccāraṇāduktā7rthasiddhiḥ । api ca śivaśabdassakṛduccāraṇamātreṇa sakaladuritaharaḥ ।
<note>(1) <quote>‘yasya’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘rūpasamarpaka’</quote> miti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘yoga’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(4) viśeṣa-
nirdeśa iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(5) <quote>‘śiva ityasya’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(6) <quote>‘mityādivacana’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(7)
<quote>‘duktārthatvasiddhi’</quote>riti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<quote>‘api vā yaścaṇḍālaśśiva iti vācaṃ vadettena saha saṃvadettena saha saṃvasettena saha bhuñjīta ।’</quote>
<quote>‘yaddvacakṣaraṃ nāma gireritaṃ nṛṇāṃ sakṛtprasaṅgādaghamāśu hanti tat ।’</quote> ityādiśrutipurāṇaprāmā-
ṇyāt । ata eva cāṣṭādaśavidyāsthānamadhye sarvatassārataratvamasya paurāṇikā varṇayanti—<quote>‘vi-
dyāsu śrutirutkṛṣṭā rudraikādaśinī śrutau । tatra pañcākṣarī tasyāṃ śiva ityakṣaradvayam ।।’</quote> iti ।
evaṃ sakaladuritaharasya śivanāmnaḥ prathamaṃ saṅkīrtanena śrotṝṇāṃ śravaṇādipratibandhakasakaladuri-
tanivṛttirbhavatītyetadapi prayojanamiha śivanāmasaṅkīrtanasya । evaṃ paramātmaśabdena taittirīyo-
paniṣadāmnātadaharavidyopāsyatayā śivaśabdena tatratyamaheśvarādiśabdapradarśitaparameśvararūpatayā
cāvagamitasya namaskāryasyopaniṣadantarāmnātadaharavidyāguṇopasaṃhāreṇa kriyamāṇānusandhānasū-
canāya upaniṣadantarāmnātadaharavidyāprakaraṇagatairarthairviśinaṣṭi—omityādibhiścaturbhirviśeṣaṇaiḥ ।
oṃmiti śabdo brahmavācakaḥ । <quote>‘oṃmiti brahme’</quote> tyādiśruteḥ । <quote>‘harassarvasya haraṇādvibhutvādviṣṇurucya-
te । sa1rvajñassarvavijñānādavanādomiti smṛtaḥ ।।’</quote> iti kūrmavacanācca । <quote>‘a2rtistusuhusṛdhṛkṣikṣubhāyā-
vāpadiyakṣinībhyo manni’</quote> ti sūtrānmanpratyayānuvṛttau <quote>‘avateṣṭilopaśce’</quote>ti sūtreṇāvatidhātormanpra-
tyaye pratyayasya ṭilope <quote>‘jvaratvarasravyavimavāmupadhāyāśce’</quote> ti <ref>(pā॰ 6.4.20)</ref> sūtreṇa vakārā-
kārayorūṭhi savarṇadīrghe <quote>‘sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayo’</quote>riti <ref>(pā॰ 7.3.84 sū॰)</ref> guṇe ca sati
niṣpannasya tasya <quote>‘kṛ3nmejanta’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 1.1.39)</ref> iti sūtreṇa4 māntatvenāvyayatvāt <quote>‘avya-
yādāpsupa’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 2.4.82 sū॰)</ref> iti tataścaturthyā lopaḥ । anena <quote>‘yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātre-
ṇomityetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīte’</quote> tyātharvaṇopaniṣadi daharopāsanā parabrahmavāca-
kena trimātreṇa praṇavena tadanusandhānapūrvakaṃ kartavyeti vi5dhānāt tadāmnātaguṇaviśeṣo-
pasaṃhāreṇānusandhānaṃ sūcitam । <quote>‘ahaṃpadārthāye’</quote> tyasya jīve prayujyamānasyāhaṃpadasya anta-
rātmatvenā6paricchinnopāsakāhaṃbhāvaparyavasānāspadatvena vā mukhyārthabhūtāyetyarthaḥ । anena <quote>‘ya
eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śeta’</quote> iti bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadāmnātadaharavidyāprakaraṇagate
<quote>‘ahamevedaṃ sarvo'smīti manyate so'sya paramo loka’</quote> iti vākye śrutasyāhaṃpadasya tathā manyamāna-
jīvāntarātmani tadīyāparicchinnāhaṃbhāvaparyavasānāspade vā śive paryavasānāt tadāmnātagu-
ṇaviśeṣopasaṃhāreṇānusandhānaṃ sūcitam । <quote>‘lokānāṃ siddhihetava’</quote> ityasya daharopāsakābhilaṣi-
tasakalalokaprāptihetava ityarthaḥ । etena <quote>‘atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkā-
mān teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatī’</quote>ti chāndogyopaniṣadi daharopāsakasya sarvalokā-
vāptiphalasaṅkīrtanāttadāmnātaguṇaviśeṣopasaṃhāreṇānusandhānaṃ sūcitam । <quote>‘saccidānandarūpāye’</quote>
tyanena <quote>‘tadādimadhyāntavihīnamekaṃ vibhuṃ cidānandamarūpamadbhuta’</quote> miti kaivalyopaniṣadi
saccidānandarūpatvakīrtanāttadāmnātaguṇaviśeṣopasaṃhāreṇānusandhānaṃ sūcitam । kaivalyo-
paniṣadi <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam । dhyātvā munirgacchati
bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastā’</quote> diti tadanantaramantre bhūtayoniśabdena śivasya
sakalakāryopādānatvamuktam । tathā sati dadhibhāvāpannasya kṣīrasyeva kāryaprapañcabhā-

bhaṭṭojidīkṣitāstu <quote>‘cādipāṭhādavyayatvamiti ujjvaladattaḥ । tanna । teṣāmasatvārthatvāt । vastutastu, svarādipāṭhādavyayatva’</quote>-
mityāhuḥ ।</note> <note>(4) <quote>“sūtrato nipātatvādvāvyayatvenā <quote>‘vyayādāpsupa’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ”</quote> ।</note> <note>(5) <quote>‘bodhanā’</quote> diti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

vāpannasya śivasya cidānandātmakapūrvarūpaparityāgaḥ syādityāśaṅkāvāraṇārthameva <quote>‘ādimadhyānta-
vihīna’</quote>miti viśeṣitam । sa evārtho'trāpi <quote>‘saditi’</quote> viśeṣaṇena pradarśyate । sadaivāyaṃ cidāna-
ndarūpeṇa sanna kadācidapi sadrūpaṃ parityajatīti tadarthaḥ । api ca etairomityādibhiścaturbhi-
rviśeṣaṇairasmin śāstre caturadhyāyīpratipādyairarthaiḥ paramātmā viśeṣyate । tathā hi—oṃmiti pa-
daprayogeṇa tadvācye parabrahmaṇi śive sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya ākṣipyate । kaṭhavallīṣu
<quote>‘sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti । yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti
tatte padaṃ saṅgraheṇa bravīmī’</quote>ti pratijñāya tadanantara<quote>‘momityetat etadhdyevākṣaraṃ brahme’</quote> tyādinā sa-
rvavedapratipādyatvenopakrāntasya parabrahmaṇaḥ pratipādakatayā oṃmiti padamupakṣipya tatpraśaṃsādarśa-
nāt । api cāsya mātrātrayamṛgyajussāmarūpatvenātharvaṇopaniṣadādiṣu prasiddham । prapañcasā-
rādiṣu ca <quote>“agnimīḻe purohita’ mityādyavedādyavarṇasya <quote>‘yonissamudro bandhu’</quote> riti madhyavedamadhyava-
rṇasya <quote>‘samānaṃ varami’</quote> tyantimavedāntimavarṇasya ca samāhṛtiromiti pada”</quote> miti prasiddham । ato'-
pi tatprayogeṇa sarvavedapratipādyatvamākṣipyate । tena sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ śate
pa1ñcāśannyāyena labhyate । yadvā <quote>‘tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadantī’</quote>tyatra tapaśśabdo jñānavācī ।
<quote>‘tapa ālocan’</quote> iti dhātorniṣpatteḥ । tena jñānapradhānā vedāntā lakṣyante । tena sarvavedānta-
pratipādyatvasya sākṣādapyomiti padaprayogeṇākṣepo labhyete । yadyapi vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi sama-
nyavaḥ kenācidviśeṣaṇena sākṣāddarśayituṃ śakyate, tathāpi prathamapādagatābhyā<quote>‘moṃ nama’</quote> iti
padābhyāṃ caturthapādagatena <quote>‘śivāye’</quote>ti padena ca śrīṣaḍakṣaramahāmantrasmaraṇamapi śrotṝṇāṃ labhya-
tāmityabhiprāyeṇādāvomiti padaṃ prayuñjānastenaivākṣepataḥ prathamādhyāyārthalābhamācāryo'numene ।
parabrahmaṇaśśivasyādvitīyatvābhyupagame dvaitaśrutīnāṃ virodhaḥ sadvitīyatvābhyupagame tvadvaitaśru-
tīnāmiti virodhaśaṅkāyāṃ nikhilaprapañcākāraśaktiviśiṣṭasya śivasyādvitīyatvādāntargaṇika-
bhedāpratikṣepācca na ko'pi virodha ityavirodharūpadvitīyādhyāyārtho<quote>‘'haṃpadārthāye’</quote> ti viśeṣaṇena
darśitaḥ । <quote>“aha’miti padaṃ sakalaprapañcākāraśaktiviśiṣṭaśivādvaitavācaka”</quote>mityācārya eva catu-
rthādhyāye vakṣyati । lokayante svātmānamiti lokāśśivasākṣātkāravantaḥ teṣāṃ siddhirmuktiphala-
lābhaḥ tasya hetava iti tṛtīyaviśeṣaṇārthaḥ । tena śravaṇamananopāsanānantaraṃ sākṣātkṛtaśśiva
eva pañcakṛtyakārī muktiṃ prayacchati । atassa eva muktessākṣātsādhanatayā tṛtīyādhyāyena
vivakṣita iti tasyārtho darśitaḥ । <quote>‘saccidānandarūpāye’</quote>tyatrā<quote>‘nandarūpāye’</quote> tyanena niratiśayā-
nandarūpaṃ brahmaivānubhūyamānaṃ muktānāṃ phalatayā phalādhyāyena vivakṣitamiti tadartho darśitaḥ ।
brahmānando yadyanubhūyamānatayā brahmaṇaḥ phalaṃ syāttadā muktānāmapi phalaṃ bhavet । <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ
paramaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote> ti muktiphalasya brahmasāmyarūpatvaśravaṇāditi । brahmaṇo'nubhūyamānatvena tatpha-
latvasidhdyarthaṃ cidrūpatayānando viśeṣitaḥ । ānandavallyāṃ niratiśayānandatayā śrutasya brahmaṇa
eva <quote>‘tadātmānaṃ svayamakurute’</quote>ti rūpāntarāpattiśravaṇāt । kadāciccidānandarūpaparityāgena
muktānāmapi bhogyaṃ phalaṃ kṣayiṣṇu syādityāṅkāparihārāya sadrūpatayā cidānando viśeṣitaḥ ।
jagadupādānatve'pyavikāritvaṃ śivasya prakṛtyadhikaraṇādiṣu vyavasthāpayiṣyate ।। 1 ।।</p>
<note>(1) pañcāśadarthinaḥ puruṣasya śatasya lābhe yathā vā pañcāśato'pi lābhassiddhastadvatsakalavedapratipādyasya brahmaṇassi-
ddhameva sarvopaniṣatpratipādyatvam iti śatepañcāśabhyāyasyātra samanvayo vedyaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="005"/>
<lg><l>nijaśaktibhittinirmitanikhilajagajjālacitranikurumbaḥ ।</l>
<l>sa jayati śivaḥ parātmā nikhilāgamasārasarvasvam ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhavatu sa bhavatāṃ siddhyai paramātmā sarvamaṃgalopetaḥ ।</l>
<l>cidacinmayaḥ prapañcaḥ śeṣo'śeṣo'pi yasyaiṣaḥ ।। 3 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>namaśśvetābhidhānāya nānāgamavidhāyine ।</l>
<l>kaivalyakalpatarave kalyāṇagurave namaḥ ।। 4 ।।</l></lg>
<p>evaṃ namaskārarūpaṃ prabandhamukhamāracayya vastunirdeśarūpaṃ tadāracayati—<pratika>nijaśaktīti</pratika> ।
parātmā saṃsārivyatiriktātmā । śivaḥ nityanirdhūtanikhiladoṣaḥ sakalamaṅgalyaguṇanidhiśca ।
sa ityanena <quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣastvanyaḥ paramātmetyudāhṛtaḥ । anādimalasaṃśleṣaprāgabhāvātsvabhāvataḥ ।
atyantapariśuddhātmā śiva ityabhidhīyate । athavā'nantakalyāṇaguṇaikaghana īśvaraḥ । śiva
ityucyate sadbhiśśivatattvārthavedibhiḥ ।।’</quote> itivacanasiddhāmuktaviśeṣaṇārthaprasiddhiṃ dyotayati ।
jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartate । <quote>‘ji jaya’</quote> iti dhāturakarmaka utkarṣārthaḥ । nityanirdhūtanikhiladoṣasya
sakalamaṅgalyaguṇarat‍nākarasya ca sarvasmāccetanācetanaprapañcādutkarṣo yukta iti bhāvaḥ । tatra lakṣa-
ṇapramāṇe darśayatyavaśiṣṭaviśeṣaṇadvayena । nijā ātmīyā śaktireva bhittiḥ tasyāmāśrayabhū-
tāyāṃ nirmitaṃ nikhilaṃ jagajjālaṃ sakalāvāntarabhedayuktaṃ jagadbṛndameva citranikurumbamālekhya-
bṛndaṃ yena sa tathoktaḥ । anena jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ darśitam । sakalānāmāgamasārāṇā-
mupaniṣadāṃ sarvasvaṃ sarvasvamivādaraṇīyaḥ । tanmahātātparyaviṣaya iti yāvat । anenopaniṣa-
dastatra pramāṇamiti darśitam ।। 2 ।।</p>
<p>athāśīrvacanarūpaṃ prabandhamukhamāracayati—<pratika>bhavatviti</pratika> । sarvamaṅgalayā śrīgauryā sarvaiḥ ka-
lyāṇaguṇaiścopetaḥ । saḥ <quote>‘puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgala’</quote> mityādiśrutiṣu tathā prasiddhaḥ । paramātmā parā utkṛṣṭā
mā lakṣmīryasya tathābhūta ātmā śivaḥ । bhavatāmanugrāhyatvena sannihitānāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ sidhdyai
abhilaṣitasakalaphalāvāptaye bhavatu । sarvotkṛṣṭalakṣmīśālinassarvābhilaṣitaphalapradānasāmarthyaṃ
yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । sarvotkṛṣṭalakṣmīśālitvamupapādayatyuttarārdhena—<pratika>cidacinma</pratika>yaścetanācetana-
rūpaḥ । svarūpārthe mayaṭpratyayaḥ । aśeṣaḥ kṛtsno'pi prapañco yasya śeṣaḥ tadārādhanopayogi-
tayā tadarthaḥ । sa bhavatviti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ । apiśabdo niravaśeṣagrahaṇadārḍhyārthaḥ virodhā-
bhāsārthaśca । śivārādhanopayogitvaṃ cetanavargasya tattadadhikārānusāreṇa śivārādhanarūpajñāna-
karmānuṣṭhātṛtvam acetanavargasya tadārādhanasthānatadupakaraṇādibhāvena tadārādhanopakārakatvam ।
idaṃ paśu1pāśapateśśivasya cetanācetanasarvaśeṣitvaṃ <quote>‘brahmādistambaparyantānpaśūnbaddhvā maheśvaraḥ ।
pāśairetaiḥ patirdevaḥ kāryaṃ kārayati svaka’</quote> mityādipurāṇavacaneṣu prasiddham । evaṃ ca parameśva-
rasya lakṣmīrnānyeṣāmiva gajaturagadhanābharaṇādikatipayacetanācetanarūpeti tasya lakṣmīssarvo-
tkṛṣṭeti bhāvaḥ ।। 3 ।।</p>
<p>athaitadbhāṣyanirmāṇopayuktanikhilopaniṣadarthabodhapradātāramātmīyaṃ vidyāguruṃ namaskaroti—
<pratika>nama iti</pratika> । nānāvidhān nānāprakārān parasparaviruddhārthatvenāvabhāsamānān āgamān vedā-</p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘paśupate’</quote> riti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="006"/>
<lg><l>vyāsasūtramidaṃ netraṃ viduṣāṃ brahmadarśane ।</l>
<l>pūrvācāryaiḥ kaluṣitaṃ śrīkaṇṭhena prasādyate ।। 5 ।।</l></lg>
<p>ntān vidhātuṃ aviruddhārthopadeśena prasādhayituṃ śīlamasyeti nānāgamavidhāyī । <quote>‘supyajātau
ṇinistācchīlya’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 3.2.78)</ref> iti ṇinipratyayaḥ । supītyanuvṛttau punassubgrahaṇena kevalasyai-
vopasargasya vyāvṛttiḥ । evaṃ tācchīlyapratipādanāt sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmavirodhena śive tātparya-
mupadiśya lokānanugrahītumavatīrṇa iti vyajyate । kaivalyasya mukteḥ kalpataruriva kalpataruḥ ।
yathā kalpatarurarthināmamoghābhigamanastathā kaivalyārthināmayamiti tatsāmyam । prasiddhakalpataru-
rbhogyavastvādirūpakṣudraphalārthināmevāmoghābhigamanaḥ । ayaṃ tu kaivalyarūpamahāphalārthināmiti
tata utkarṣaśceti rūpakaviśeṣastadutthāpi1tavyatirekālaṅkāro vā । nanvayaṃ svayaṃ kevalakaivalyapradaḥ
na tu bhogyavastvarthināṃ tatprada iti na prasiddhakalpatarorasyotkarṣa ityāśaṅkya tatpradatvamapi darśaya-
ti—<pratika>kalyāṇagurave iti</pratika> । kalyāṇamarthināmaihikāmuṣmikabhogādirūpamabhyudayaphalaṃ kurvantīti
kalyāṇāḥ । kalyāṇaśabdāt tatkarotiṇyantāt pacādyac । teṣāṃ gurava ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘yaṃ yaṃ lokaṃ
manasā saṃvibhāti viśuddhasatvaḥ kāmayate yāṃśca kāmān । taṃ taṃ lokaṃ jayate tāṃśca kāmān
tasmādātmajñaṃ hyarcayedbhūtikāma’</quote> iti śruterasya śiṣyā api parameśvarasākṣātkāravattayā svapū-
jakebhyaḥ sarvāṇyabhyudayaphalāni prayacchanti । asya tatpradatve kiṃ vaktavyamiti bhāvaḥ । ka-
lyāṇāya gurava iti samānādhikaraṇasamāso vā । yadvā । kaivalyapradatvopayogijñānabhaktivairāgyā-
dikalyāṇaguṇasamṛddhipratipādanārtho vāyaṃ kalyāṇaśabdo matvarthīyācpratyayāntaḥ । athavā । yasya
gurorabhigamanamātreṇa śiṣyāṇāmānandādyupalabdhirjñānodayaśca bhavati sa kalyāṇaguruḥ । tathā
prasiddheḥ । anena ślokena śivaśāstrapracāraṇārthaśivāvatārarūpāṇāmaṣṭāviṃśateryogācāryāṇāmā-
dyasya śvetācāryasyāpi namaskāraḥ kriyate । asminpakṣe <quote>‘nānāgamavidhāyina’</quote> ityasya nānāvi-
dhapāśupatādyāgamanirmātra ityarthaḥ । anyatsamānam । dvitīyo namaśśabda ādarārthaḥ । <quote>‘namo
hiraṇyabāhave senānye diśāṃ ca pataye nama’</quote> ityādivat । athavoṃttarārdhena āśramagurornamaskāraḥ
kriyate ।। 4 ।।</p>
<p>athācāryaḥ svacikīrṣitasya bhāṣyasya bhāṣyāntarebhyo'tiśayamāviṣkurvanneva cikīrṣitaṃ
pratijānīte---<pratika>vyāseti</pratika> । idaṃ vyākhyāsyamānatayā buddhisannihitaṃ vyāsasūtram । jātā-
vekavacanam । vyāsapraṇītaṃ sūtrajātam । viduṣāṃ sāṅgasaśiraskavedādhyayanenāpātato'dhigata-
brahmasvarūpāṇām । brahmadarśane brahmaṇo darśane idami2tthaṃbhūtamiti paricchedātmake nirṇaye । netraṃ
ghaṭādiparicchede netramiva nirapekṣakāraṇamiti pūrvārdhasyārthaḥ । atra netratvāroparūpeṇa rūpakāla-
ṅkāreṇa vyākhyānasādhyātyantāpratītādhyāhāragauṇalakṣaṇā vipariṇāmavyavadhāraṇavikalpanādi-
kleśayuktebhyo jaiminisūtrādibhya utkarṣarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāro vyajyate । tathābhūtāni jaimi-
nyādisūtrāṇi । tatra sthālīpulākanyāyena jaiminisūtreṣu kliṣṭādhyāhārādisthalānyudāhriyante ।
prāśitrabhakṣaṇārthaṃ gṛhītaṃsya haviśśeṣasya daivānnāśe tadarthaṃ punarapi haviśśeṣāt grāhyamiti
prāpte sthitasya śeṣasya iḍābhakṣaṇādipratipattyantarāvaruddhatvātpratipattikarmaṇāṃ yajñopayuktaśeṣai-
<note>(1) <quote>‘tadutthāpitaviśeṣālaṅkāro vā’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘mitthaṃmatamitī’</quote> ti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

rākīrṇasya yajñadeśasya viviktatāpādanarūpaviśiṣṭaprayojanakāraṇatvāttasya ca prayojanasya prati-

nirṇayārthaṃ pravṛttasyādhikaraṇasyedaṃ sūtram—<quote>‘apivā śeṣabhājāṃ syādviśiṣṭakāraṇatvā’</quote> diti <ref>(jai॰ 6.
4.3)</ref>atra śeṣabhājāṃ lopa ityadhyāhāraḥ । ayamatikliṣṭaḥ । na hyayaṃ padāntarasamabhivyāhāravat sū-
tratātparyanirṇayāllabhyate । sūtroktapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthatayādhikaraṇāntareṣu dṛṣṭasyāpi vāśabdasya
darśanena pūrvapakṣasūtrasya cādarśanena <quote>‘viśiṣṭakāraṇatvā’</quote>diti hetoścānabhivyaktārthatvena tatastattā-
tparyasya nirṇetumaśakyatvāt । nāpi pūrvādhikaraṇasūtraparyālocanāttallabhyate । pūrvādhikaraṇe hi
pradhānārthāvattahavirapacāre śeṣādavadeyamiti <quote>‘śeṣādvyavadānanāśe syāttadarthatvā’</quote>diti <ref>(jai॰
6.a.4.pā.1)</ref> sūtreṇa pūrvapakṣaṃ parigṛhya <quote>‘nirdeśādvānyadāgamaye’</quote> diti <ref>(jai॰ 6.4.2)</ref>
sūtreṇa madhyātpūrvārdhādavadeyamiti nirdeśātpradhānārthaṃ madhyapūrvārdhābhyāmavattasya haviṣastasya
naṣṭatvāttadarthaṃ havirantaraṃ sampādanīyamiti siddhāntitam । tatra siddhāntānusaraṇe śeṣabhā-
jāmarthena havirantaramāgamayitavyamiti pūrvapakṣānusaraṇe teṣāmarthena śeṣādavadeyamiti cādhyā-
hāro labhyate । na tu lopa iti । <quote>‘śeṣabhājā’</quote> mityasya sambandhākāṅkṣāyāmapi pūrvādhikaraṇapū-
rvapakṣasiddhāntasādhyayoranyatarasyaivādhyāhāro labhyate । <quote>‘nirdeśāccheṣabhakṣo'nyai’</quote> rityādyuttara-
<ref>(jai॰ 6.4.4)</ref> sūtrāṇāṃ haviśśeṣabhakṣaṇakartṛvicārārthatvena tato'dhyāhāryaviśeṣalābhāsambha-
vāt । tasmāccaturthādhyāye nirṇītaṃ pratipattikarmaṇāmaprayojakatvaṃ vidyamānaśeṣasya prati-
pattyantarāvaruddhatvaṃ cālocyaiva kartavyo'yamadhyāhāro'tikliṣṭaḥ । ādityādīnāmayanādiṣu

gavāmayanavidhyanta iti nirṇayārthaṃ pravṛttasyādhikaraṇasya sūtraṃ <quote>‘gavyasya ca tadādiṣvi’</quote>

ndine savane aṅgaistṛtīyasavana’</quote> iti pratyakṣavacanasiddho na sādhanīyaḥ । puroḍāśānāṃ paśutantra-
madhye vidhānaṃ tu sādhanīyam । na hetutayā nirdeśārham । ataḥ prathamāpañcamyorvyatyāsena vibha-

tsūtravyākhyānāvasare viśiṣya bhāṣyakṛtā noddhāṭayiṣyate । tathā sati keṣāñcidāgrahapravṛttānāṃ

naprayuktā dhavalasya kaṇṭhasya nailyakṛtaparabhāgaśobhā । tayopalakṣitaḥ kaṇṭho'syeti vyutpattyā
śrīkaṇṭhaśabdāḥ śive pravṛttaḥ3 । ihāpi tavdyutpattismāra4ṇena viṣasadṛśasya gṛhītasya paradoṣajā-
lasya kaṇṭhe niyamayitṛtvamātmanaśśailī,yā <quote>“guṇadoṣau budho gṛhṇannindukṣvelāviveśvaraḥ । śirasā
ślāghate pūrvaṃ paraṃ kaṇṭhe niyacchatī”</quote> ti satpuruṣadharmatvena prasiddheti tena nāmnā khyāpyate । evaṃ
paradoṣānuddhāṭayitṛsvabhāvenāpyācāryeṇa <quote>‘pūrvācāryaiḥ kaluṣita’</quote>mityetāvanmātraṃ sāmānyenoddhā-
ṭitaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ tatra tatra svaparabhāṣyakṛtavyākhyānayorviśeṣālocane dṛṣṭinidhānena svabhāṣyasya

viśiṣyānuddhāṭitamapi śrotṝṇāṃ dikpradarśanāya tatratatra vayaṃ kiñcitpradarśayāmaḥ । brahmaṇassarvaśa-
ktimattvapratipādanārthaṃ sūtraṃ <quote>“sarvopetā ca taddarśanā”</quote> diti । <ref>(bra॰2.1.30 sū॰)</ref>tatra bhāṣyāntareṣu
<quote>‘sarvopete’</quote>tyasya sarvaśaktyupetetyarthaṃ parigṛhya strīliṅganirdeśopapādanāya devateti viśeṣyamadhyāhṛ-
tam । tadadhyāhāro na pūrvāparasūtrānusārī । pūrva<quote>‘madhikaṃ tu bhedanirdeśā’</quote> diti <ref>(bra॰2.1.22)</ref>
sūtre brahmaṇo napuṃsakaliṅganirdeśāt kvacidapi sūtre strīliṅgapadena brahmanirdeśābhāvācca । nāpi
viṣayavākyānusārī । <quote>‘parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate’</quote> ityādiṣu bhāṣyāntarodāhṛteṣu prasiddheṣu

lābhaphalakatāṃ ca darśayati tasmāt । brahmajijñāseti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāssamāsaḥ । <pratika>brahmaṇaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘janmādyasya yata’</quote> itivakṣyamāṇalakṣa-
ṇasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya sarvajñasya sarvaśaktimataḥ bhoktṛsvarūpabhūtasya vastunaḥ । <pratika>jijñāsā</pratika>=(jñātumicchā) vicāraḥ
ityarthaḥ । atra prakṛtyā jñādhātunā phalībhūtaṃ brahmāparokṣajñānamajahallakṣaṇayā kathyate । sanpratyayenecchāsādhyo vicāro jahalla-
kṣaṇayocyate ।। evaṃ ca brahmajijñāsāpadasya mokṣasādhanabrahmāparokṣajñānaphalakoṃ vedāntavākyavicāra iti phalito'rthaḥ ।
<pratika>kartavyā</pratika> (itiśeṣaḥ) asyādhikaraṇasya vedāntavākyavicāro viṣayaḥ । sa na kartavyaḥ kartavyo veti viṣayaprayojanasaṃbhavā-
saṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe yaddhi saṃdigdhaṃ saprayojanaṃ tasya vicāraviṣayatvaṃ, brahmaṇastu sphuṭatarāhaṃpratyayālaṃbanatvenāsaṃdigdhatvāt ta-
jjñānānmuktilakṣaṇaprayojanābhāvācca na vicāraviṣayatvam । ato'saṃbhāvitaviṣayādimānvedāntavākyavicāro na kartavya iti
pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, śrutigamyabrahmātmatatvasyāhaṃ pratyayānālaṃbanatvena saṃdigdhatvāttatsākṣātkārādanarthanivṛttilakṣaṇamokṣasaṃbhavā-
tsaṃbhāvitaviṣayādimānvedāntavākyavicārassādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpannenādhikāriṇā mokṣasādhanabrahmāparokṣajñānāya kartavya iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate. atha</pratika>=nikhilapuruṣārtharatnākarasya paramaprabodhasādhanasya bhagavato dharmasya vicārānantaram । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=yato'
dhītavedena dharmo vicārito'tastadanuṣṭhānasaṃpannacittaśuddhinānena brahmāpi niratiśayaniḥ śreyasakaraṃ vicāraṇīyamiti hetoḥ ।
brahmajijñāseti karmaṇiṣaṣṭyāssamāsaḥ । <pratika>brahmaṇaḥ</pratika>=sakalacidacitprapañcākāraparaśaktiviśiṣṭādvitīyavaibhavasya sakalanigamasārarahasya-
nidhānasya bhavaśivaśarvapaśupatiparameśvaramahādevarudraśaṃbhuprabhṛti paryāyavācakaśabdasāraprakāśitaparamamahimavilāsasya svaśeṣabhūta-
nikhilacetanasamupāsanānuguṇasamuditanijaprasādasamarpitapuruṣārthasārthasya parabrahmaṇaḥ । <pratika>jijñāsā</pratika>=pratipādakasyopaniṣacchāstrasya
vicāraḥ । pūrvavadatrāpi lakṣaṇaiva । <pratika>kartavyā</pratika> (ityadhyāhāraḥ) <quote>‘parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena’</quote>
<quote>‘tadvijñānārthaṃ sa gurumevābhigacchetsamitpāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahmaniṣṭham’</quote> ityādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra brahma vicārārhaṃ na veti
viṣayaprayojanasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ sandehe sandigdhasya saprayojanasyaiva vastunaḥ vicārārhatvāt <quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote> tyādiśrutyā
ayamiti pratyayena pratyakṣasiddhasyaivātmanaḥ brahmatvopadeśāt asandigdhatvena viṣayatvāsaṃbhavāt vicāraphalabhūtasya tadviṣayajñānasya
jñeyaparicchedakatvāṅgīkāre brahmaṇo'paricchinnatvabhaṅgāpattyā tadaparicchedakatve brahmaṇaḥ yathāvadaprakāśatāpattyā ca jñānasyaivāsaṃbhavāt
saṃbhave'pi tasya anādisiddhasaṃsārasya durapahnavatvena mukteraprasaktatayā prayojanābhāvācca brahma vicārayogyaṃ na bhavatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
siddhantastu, <quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote> tyādiśrutyā asyaiva ahaṃkārabaddhasya saṃsāriṇo jīvasya brahmatvopadeśāt anvarthasya
brahmaśabdasya niratiśayajñānānandādiśaktimahimātiśayaśālivastuparatvāt parasparavilakṣaṇayoḥ brahmatvajīvatvayorekabhāvabodhinī-
nāmannaprāṇamanovijñānādityādibhinnabhinnārthabrahmatvabodhinīnāṃ ca śrutīnāṃ satvāt, kiṃ vā brahmeti bahudhā sandigdhasya brahmaṇaḥ
viṣayatvasaṃbhavāt, śravaṇamananādiniścitasya paramakāruṇikasya sarvānugrāhakasya mahādeśikasya parabrahmaṇaśśivasya prasādāti-
śayenāsyādhikāriṇaḥ pradhvastapāśapaṭalāyāḥ kaivalyalakṣmyāḥ prāpteḥ prayojanatvena śrutibhirupadiṣṭatvāt brahmaṇaḥ īdṛgidamiti
paricchedāsaṃbhave'pi lakṣaṇamukhenetaravyāvṛttatāmātreṇa paricchedasaṃbhavācca vedāntaśravaṇaṃ saviṣayaṃ saprayojanaṃ ceti kṛtvā brahma
vicārārhaṃ bhavatyeveti samīcīno'yaṃ brahmaviṣayaḥ śāstrāraṃbha iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīrāmānujamate</pratika> prāyaḥ sūtrārthaḥ śrīkaṃṭhamatānusārī । brahmaśabdābhidheyaṃ vastu paraṃ bhidyate । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntāvanyāveva । yathā—
<pratika>atha</pratika>=karmajñānānaṃtaram । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=karmavicārasya vṛttatvāddhetoḥ । brahmajijñāseti karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyāḥ samāsaḥ । <pratika>brahmaṇaḥ</pratika>=svarūpato
guṇaiśca niratiśayabṛhattvaśālitayā anvarthabrahmaśabdābhidheyasya nikhilaheyapratyanīkānantakalyāguṇaratnārakasya sarveśvarasya
puruṣottamatya । <pratika>jijñāsā</pratika> (jñātumicchā) vicāraḥ karttavya ityarthaḥ । icchāyā iṣyamāṇapradhānatvāt iṣyamāṇaṃ jñānamiha vidhīyate ।</p>
<p>atra vṛddhavyavahārādanyatra ādyavyutpattyasaṃbhavāt vyavahāre ca kāryaparatayaiva vyutpatteḥ sarvaśabdānāṃ kāryārthabodhakatayā siddha-
vastubodhanāsaṃbhavāt siddharūpe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāstītyapramāṇikamidaṃ brahmavicārarūpaṃ śāstramanāraṃbhaṇīmiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>ambādiśabdānāmaṃgulinirdeśapūrvakabahuprayogeṇa siddhavyutpattissaṃbhavatīti vṛddhavyavahārādanyatrāpi śabdānāmādyavyutpattisaṃbha-
vāt <quote>‘pitā te sukhamāsta’</quote> ityādivṛddhavyavahāre ca siddhavyutpattisaṃbhavāt śabdānāṃ siddhavastubodhanasāmarthyāt vedāntavākyānāṃ
siddharūpe brahmaṇi prāmāṇyamastīti tadvicārarūpaṃ śāstramāraṃbhaṇīyamiti siddhāntaḥ ।। <pratika>śrīkaṇṭharāmānujayo</pratika>rmate pūrvottaramīmāṃ-
sayoḥ bhinnakarttṛkatve'pi aikaśāstryamabhimatam । <pratika>śrībhagavatpāda</pratika>mate tu bhinnaśāstratvamiti vivekaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīmadānandatīrthamate atha</pratika>=adhyayanaśamadamādirūpādhikārasampattyanantaram । <pratika>ataḥ</pratika>=mokṣākhyaprayojanasya satvāt
viṣṇoḥ pradāsādvā । <pratika>brahmaṇaḥ</pratika> guṇapūrṇasya viṣṇoḥ । <pratika>jijñāsā</pratika> śravaṇādirūpā । <pratika>karttavyetyarthaḥ</pratika> ।। atra nityanirdhūtanikhilaviśeṣasya
svaprakāśajīvacaitanyasvarūpasyaiva sarvairvedāntaiḥ upakramādiliṃgopetaiḥ brahmatvena pratipādanāt tatra vicāraṇīyāṃśasya abhāvena
nirviṣayatvāt idaṃ śāstramanāraṃbhaṇīyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>brahmaśabdena guṇapūrtyabhidhānāt jīvasyālpaguṇatāyā anubhavasiddhatvāt tadva‍yatiriktasya guṇapūrṇasya brahmaṇaḥ vicārārhatvena
saviṣayatvādidaṃ śāstramārambhaṇīyamiti siddhāntaḥ ।। asya <quote>‘tadvijijñāsatve’</quote>ti viṣayavākyam ।</p>
<p>iti <pratika>hālāsyanātha</pratika>kṛtau <pratika>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ</pratika> jijñāsādhikaraṇam ।</p>

prameye’</quote>tyādisūtre pramāṇādīnāmuddiṣṭatvavyavahāro na saṅgacchate । teṣāṃ niḥśreyasahetujñānakarma-

gā iti samūhālambane tasyāpi sattvāt । sambandhatāvacchedakasaṃyogatvādiprakāreṇa sambandha-
viṣayatvaṃ samūhālambane taṃ vinā svarūpeṇa sambandhaviṣayatvaṃ viśiṣṭajñāna iti tasya tato vi-
śeṣa iti cenna । <quote>‘daṇḍasaṃyuktapuruṣaskandhasaṃyuktadaṇḍaścaitra’</quote> iti viśiṣṭajñāne sambandhāvacche-
dakaprakāreṇāpi sambandhaviṣayatvasya sattvāt । svarūpeṇa vaiśiṣṭyaviṣayatvasya <quote>‘daṇḍī puruṣaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘puruṣe daṇḍa’</quote> iti jñānayoraviśeṣeṇa tāvatā tayoḥ parasparavailakṣaṇyāsiddheśca । nanu, jñeyajñāna-
sambandhaviśeṣakṛtaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyavasthayā viśiṣṭajñānasamūhālambanayorudāhṛtaviśiṣṭajñāna-
yośca vailakṣaṇyasiddhāvapi dīrghabāhurbāhudairghyavāniti viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyajñānayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ na si-
ddhyet । jñānadvayasyāpi bāhau dairghye dairghye ca prakāraprakāribhāvasambandhāviśeṣāditi cenna । yena jñā-
nena prakāraprakāribhāvasambandhena viṣayīkriyamāṇe yasminviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhāsate tatra jñāne tattasya
viśeṣaṇamiti vyavasthāṅgīkārāt । viśeṣaṇatvaṃ tu viśeṣyagatavaiśiṣṭyapratiyogitvaṃ sākṣādvi-
śeṣaṇanirūpitasambandhaviśeṣo vetyanyadetat । nanu, viśiṣṭajñāne viśeṣaṇagataviśeṣaṇatvasyāpi
bhānāṅgīkāre tata eva samūhālambanavyāvṛtteḥ kiṃ viśeṣaṇe jñānasambandhaviśeṣakalpanayeti cenna ।

vikāravaśitva’</quote> miti vaiyāsikabhāṣye vyākhyātam । tena sarvaprakṛtikāryavaśitvasya pāpmajarā-
maraṇaśokakṣutpipāsāhetubhūtaprakṛtikāryaviśeṣavaśitvasyāpi siddha‍yā tadvaśyatvāprasakteḥ <quote>‘apaha-
tapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso vipipāsa’</quote>iti parigaṇitānāṃ muktikālabhāvyāvi-
rbhāvavatāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāmapi saṃyamaviśeṣaphalatvaṃ siddha‍yati । viśiṣya ca <quote>‘kaṇṭhakūpe kṣu-
tpipāsānivṛtti’</quote><ref>(pātaṃ॰yo॰pā॰3-29sū॰)</ref>rityādisūtraiḥ kaṇṭhakūpādisaṃyamaphalatvena vijigha-
tsatvādayo darśitāḥ । āgameṣu ca piśācarakṣoyakṣagandharvendracandraprajāpaticaturmukhānāṃ pārthi-
vāpyataijasanābhasamānasāhaṅkārikabauddhaiśvaryāṇi pratyekamaṣṭaguṇānyuttarottareṣāṃ pūrvapūrvaiśvaryāṣṭaka-
sahitāni tattajjanmaprāpakapuṇyaphalāni prapañcitāni । kiṃ bahunā । vyāghrādīnāṃ krodhalobhā-
dinā manuṣyādihanena pāpmānudayo'pyuktarītyā tattajjātiprāpakakarmaviśeṣakṛtāpahatapāpmatvā-
dyāvirbhāvaprayukta eva । tasmātsatyasaṅkalpatvāditirodhānasyāpi parameśvarakāryatvaṃ yuktam । kiṃ
ca sarvametattirodhānaṃ na malākhyenāñjanenānādināpi sadaikarūpeṇa kṛtaṃ, kiṃ tu nayanapaṭalavata
kālakrameṇa pariṇatiṃ prāpnuvatā । tathā ca tattatkālabhavapariṇativiśeṣaviśiṣṭenāñjanena kriyamā-
ṇamāvārakaviśeṣakṛtaviśeṣavadanityameva । api ca tirodhānaṃ nāñjanenaiva kṛtam । kiṃ tu sarga-
kāle dehadvayākārapariṇatayā pralaye sūkṣmāvasthāṃ prāptayā māyayā tattajjātyāyurbhogaprāpakakarma-
bhiśca kṛtam । tatra karmāṇi svarūpata evānityāni । māyāpi sthūlasūkṣmāvasthāviśeṣavaiśi-
ṣṭyena sthūlāvasthāyāmapi tattaddehaviśeṣavaiśiṣṭyena cānityeti tattadāvarakaviśeṣānityatvakṛtaṃ
tadāhitaviśeṣasyāvaraṇasyānityatvamanivāryamiti tasya parameśvarakāryatāyāṃ na kācidanupa-
pattiḥ । ata eva tṛtīyādhyāye <quote>‘parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayā’</quote>viti
<ref>(bra॰3-2-4)</ref> sūtreṇa jīvasya satyasaṅkalpādeḥ saṃsāradaśāyāṃ parameśvarasaṅkalpāttirodhāne prati-
pādite kathamanādestirodhānasya parameśvarādhīnatvamityāśaṅkānivṛttaye <quote>‘dehayogādvā so'pī’</quote>ti
tadanantara<ref>(bra॰3-2-5)</ref>sūtreṇa sargakāle tattaddehākārapariṇatamāyākṛtasya pralayakāle sūkṣmāva-

sthamāyākṛtasya ca tirodhānasya tirodhāyakaviśeṣakṛtaviśeṣaṇanavanavatvāvaśyaṃbhāvo darśitaḥ ।
kecittu malīmaseṣu viṣayeṣu heyatvāvaraṇaṃ tirobhāva ityāhuḥ । tadapi vastrācchāditaghaṭasyeva na

vārakakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt । kiṃ tu viṣayagataheyatvapratītyabhāvanirvāhakaṃ draṣṭrācchādana-

syāgrahaṇāt । apare tu pralaye cetanācetanaprapañcasya sūkṣmāvasthāpattistirobhāva ityāhuḥ ।
tasminpakṣe tirobhāvasyānityatvaṃ tirobhāvaśabdasya prasiddhārthaparatvaṃ ca sūpapādameva । sūtrakārasya
tatrābhiprāyastu durupapādaḥ । sūtrakāro yānprapañcadharmānparameśvarādhīnānagre vyavaharati te janmā-
dītyādiśabdena vivakṣitā ityupapādanīyam । ata eva bhāṣyāntaragṛhītajanmasthitibhaṅgavya-
tirekeṇa tirobhāvānugrahāvapyatra bhāṣye gṛhītau । <quote>‘parābhidhyānāttu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandha-
viparyayā’</quote>viti <ref>(bra॰3-2-4)</ref> sūtre tirobhāvasya tanmūlabandhasahitasya bandhaviparyayarūpamokṣasya

prakāreṇaivopapādanīyam । nanu, sthitiḥ kathaṃ parameśvarakāryeṣu parigaṇyate । sṛṣṭaṃ yāvanna saṃharati
tāvattasya sthiteḥ svata eva siddheḥ । yadi hi saṃhartānyaḥ prasaktaḥ syāttadā saṃhāre pravṛttasya
tasya nivāraṇaṃ kāryamiti rājyasthitau rājña iva prapañcasthitāvīśvarasyāpekṣā syāt । parame-
śvaraḥ svayaṃ yāvanna sañjihīrṣati tāvattasya nānyo nāśakaḥ prasajyate । satyam । ghaṭādisthitau
kulālādikartrapekṣābhāve'pi mṛdādyupādānāpekṣāstyeva । parameśvaraḥ prapañcasyopādānamapīti

miha lakṣyākāraviparītākāśaṅkāvyavacchedaprayojanakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇe niveśyate । ucyate ।

vāraṇaṃ vinā phalāntarābhāvācca । yadi tu, viśeṣaguṇaviśiṣṭapratiyogikābhāvastadaviśiṣṭaprati-

pratiyogitāvacchedakaprakārakapratiyogibhāvastadaviśiṣṭajñānamantareṇābhāvaviśeṣopasthiterasambha-

ttāntaḥ । etena rasāvyañjakatve sati rūpavyañjakatvāditi tasya hetorartha ityapi śaṅkā nirastā ।

tmāpyanīśaḥ sukhaduḥkhaheto’</quote>riti mantreṇa pradarśya svatastannirṇayāśaktānāṃ brahmavidyādhidevatāyāḥ
paraśakterambikāyāḥ prasādādetannirṇayo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyeṇa tāṃ dhyāyatāṃ tatsākṣātkāraṃ <quote>‘te
dhyānayogānugatā apaśyamandevātmaśaktiṃ svaguṇairnigūḍhā’</quote>mityardhenopanyasya <quote>‘yaḥ kāraṇāni ni-
khilāni tāni kālātmayuktānyadhitiṣṭhatyeka’</quote>ityādinā tasyāḥ prasādātkālādisakalāvāntara-
kāraṇādhiṣṭhātāraṃ paramakāraṇaṃ mahādevamapaśyannityetadarthapratipādanāt so'pi sandarbho'trānugrā-
hyapramāṇatayānusandheyaḥ । tatra yadyapi <quote>‘yaḥ kāraṇānī’</quote>tyādimantre <quote>‘tamapaśyanni</quote>ti pūrvākriyānu-
ṣaṅgavati sakalakāraṇādhiṣṭhātāraṃ kāraṇamapaśyannityetāvadeva pratīyate na tu śivaṃ tathābhūtakāra-
ṇamapaśyanniti । tanna śivavācakapadābhāvāt । tatrāpi <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛtākṣaraṃ haraḥ kṣarātmanā
<pb n="132"/>
viśateṃ deva ekaḥ । saṃyuktametatkṣaramakṣaraṃ ca vyaktāvyaktaṃ harate viśvamīśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro
maharṣiḥ,’</quote> <quote>‘tasmātsarvagataḥ śivaḥ,’</quote> <quote>‘māyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ’</quote> <quote>‘tamīśānaṃ varadaṃ devamīḍya’</quote> mityādya-
nantarasandarbho yāvadupaniṣatsamāpti hareśarudraśivamaheśvareśānādiśivāsādhāraṇanāmabhireva jaga-
tkāraṇasya nirdeśadarśanāt <quote>‘yaḥ kāraṇānī’</quote>ti mantrasya śivameva jagatkāraṇamapaśyannityasmi-
nnarthe tātparyamunnīyate । evameva saṅkṣepeṇopabṛṃhitaṃ kūrmapurāṇe <quote>‘sametya te mahātmāno munayo
brahmavādinaḥ । vitenire bahūnvādānātmavijñānasaṃśrayān । kimasya jagato mūlamātmā vā'-
smākameva hi । ko'pi syātsarvabhūtānāṃ heturīśvara eva ca । ityevaṃ manyamānānāṃ dhyānakarmāva-
lambinām । āvirāsīnmahādevī gaurī girivarātmajā । nirīkṣitāste parameśapat‍nyā tada-
ntare devamaśeṣahetum । paśyanti śambhuṃ kavimīśitāraṃ rudraṃ bṛhantaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇa’</quote>miti । atra
<quote>‘kimasya jagato mūla’</quote>mityanena <quote>‘kutassma jātā’</quote> ityetadartho darśitaḥ । <quote>‘ātmāvāsmākameva hī’</quote>-
tyanena <quote>‘jīvāma kene’</quote>tyādisakalasaṃśayārthaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ । ātmaśabdasyādhiṣṭhātṛparatvāt ।
<quote>‘ko'pi syā’</quote>dityardhena <quote>‘kālassvabhāva’</quote> ityādimantrapratipāditakālakāraṇatvādivādanirāsa-
sāmarthyasiddhasarvakāraṇatvasarveśvaratvaviśiṣṭabrahmarūpasaṃśayadharmisampratipattirupanyastā । śivapu-
rāṇo'pyambikāmāhātmyaṃ prastutya prapañcenopabṛṃhitam । <quote>‘mumukṣayā purā kecinmunayo brahmavā-
dinaḥ । saṃśayāviṣṭamanaso vimṛśanti yathātatham । kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kuto jātā jīvāmaḥ kena vā
vayam । kva cāsmākaṃ sampratiṣṭhā kena vādhiṣṭhitā vayam । iha vartāmahe śaśvatsukheṣvanyeṣu vā'-
niśam । avilaṅghyā ca viśvasya vyavasthā kena vā kṛtā । kālassvabhāvo niyatiryadṛcchā
nātra yujyate । bhūtāni yoniḥ puruṣo yogo vaiṣāṃ pare'thavā । acetanatvātkālādeścetanatve'pi
cātmanaḥ । sukhaduḥkhābhibhūtatvādanīśatvādvicāryate । te dhyānayogānugatāḥ prāpaśyaṃcchaktimai-
śvarīm । pāśavicchedikāṃ sākṣānnigūḍhāṃ svaguṇairbhṛśam । tayā vicchinnapāśāste sarvakāraṇa-
kāraṇam । śaktimantaṃ mahādevamapaśyandivyacakṣuṣā । yaḥ kāraṇanyaśeṣāṇi kālātmasahitā-
nyapi । aprameyo'nayā śaktyā sākameko'dhitiṣṭhatī’</quote>ti । evaṃ śvetāśvataropaniṣadāmnātasya
<quote>‘yadātamo’</quote>mantrasya tadupakramasya ca tātparyamasmābhiḥ śivatattvaviveke śaivakarṇāmṛte ca prapañce-
nopapāditaṃ tatraivānusandheyam । etenedaṃ nirastam । jagatkāraṇaṃ vastu <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra ā-
sīt’</quote> <quote>‘brahma vā idamagra āsīt’</quote> <quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsī’</quote>dityādikāraṇavākyeṣu
sadbrahmātmaśabdairuttarottaraṃ viśeṣaparyavasāyibhiḥ sadrūpaṃ bṛhaccetanaṃ cetyetāvatparyantabuddhigṛhītam
<quote>‘eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsī’</quote>dityādiṣvanitarasādhāraṇena nārāyaṇaśabdena nirdeśāt chāgapaśu-
nyāyena nārāyaṇa eveti niścīyata iti sarveṣāṃ kāraṇavākyānāṃ śive paryavasānaṃ sākṣādeva
pratipādayati mantre asmadādīnāmiva pūrvamṛṣīṇāṃ sañjātaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma kiṃdevatātmakamiti
saṃśayaṃ pradarśya svayaṃ nirṇetumaśaknuvantaste dhyānayogaprasāditaparameśvarīkaṭākṣamahimnā śiva
eveti niścayaṃ lebhira iti pratipādayati mantrajāte ca jāgrati kṣudrabuddhikalpitanyāyasañcāre-
ṇānyatra paryavasānāsambhavāt । <quote>‘yadātamo’</quote>mantrādigataśivādiśabdānāṃ vṛttyantareṇa śivānya-
paratve tadavirodhena sarveṣāṃ kāraṇavākyānāṃ tatra paryavasānaṃ sambhavatīti cenna । <quote>‘yadātamo’</quote>
mantragatasya śivaśabdasya nārāyaṇavṛttitve mantravākyavaiyarthyāpatteruktatvāt <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛ-
<pb n="133"/>
tākṣaraṃ haraḥ’</quote> ityādimantreṣu śrutānāṃ harādiśabdānāmapi jagatkāraṇadharmikasvavācyataditarade-
vatāviśeṣakoṭikasaṃśayapradarśanānantaraṃ nirṇayavākye śrutānām <quote>‘ayaṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣo ve’</quote>ti saṃśa-
yānantaram<quote>‘ayaṃ puruṣa eve’</quote>ti nirṇayavākye śrutasya puruṣaśabdasyeva vyavacchedanīyāyāṃ pratikoṭau
vṛttyayogāt । na ca kvacitkvacitkāraṇavākye nārāyaṇaśabdasyābhyāsadarśanena tātparyavattvāva-
gamāt tasyāpi vṛttyantaraṃ na yujyata iti vācyam । kāraṇe bahuśo'bhyastasyāpi tasya tadvi-
ṣayaprāṇākāśaśabdavadvṛttyantarakalpanasahiṣṇutvenānyathāsiddhatvāt । kiṃ ca <quote>‘vedārtho yaḥ svayaṃ-
jātastatrājñānaṃ bhavedapi । ṛṣibhirniścite tasminkā śaṅkā syānmahātmana’</quote> iti bibhetyalpa-
śrutādvedo māmayaṃ pratariṣyati । itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhaye’diti ca smaraṇāt ।
purāṇādiṣu ṛṣibhirniścita eva vedārtho'bhyupagantavyaḥ । tatra śvetāśvataropaniṣadupakramārthani-
rṇāyakāni kūrmapurāṇādivacanāni prāgudāhṛtāni। tadantarasyāpi<quote>‘saṃyuktametatkṣaramakṣaraṃ ce’</quote>tyāde-
rupaniṣatsamāptiparyantasya tatsandarbhasyārthanirṇāyakaḥ śivapurāṇe paśupāśapatinirṇayādhyāye
dṛśyate । evaṃ ca yadyapi viṣṇupurāṇādiśrutasṛṣṭivākyeṣu kāraṇasya nārāyaṇanāmabhirapi ni-
rdeśo dṛśyate । tathāpi śabdato'rthataḥ kramataśca tattadupaniṣatsandarbhasparśīnyupabṛṃhaṇāni praba-
lānīti taireva tattadarthanirṇayo yuktaḥ । na copabṛṃhaṇānusāreṇa śivaviṣayakāraṇavākyānāṃ
tadvirodhikāraṇavākyāntarebhyaḥ prābalyamupabṛṃhaṇānāmupabṛṃhaṇīyaśabdārthakramasparśitvena tadviru-
ddhapurāṇāntarādibhyaḥ prābalyamiti prābalyasiddhau parasparāpekṣaṇādanyonyāśrayaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ ।
vanasiṃhanyāyena prābalyasiddhau parasparāpekṣaṇasyādoṣatvāt । eteneyamapi śaṅkā nirastā । śi-
vaviṣayakāraṇavākyānāṃ sarvajñatvādiṣāṅguṇyāṣṭābhidhānapravṛttinimittarūpanyāyopaskṛtatayā ya-
tprābalyamuktaṃ tanna saṅgacchate । <quote>‘jñānamapratipannasya vairāgyaṃ ca jagatpatteḥ । aiśvaryaṃ caiva dharmaśca
saha siddhaṃ catuṣṭaya’</quote>miti hiraṇyagarbhe <quote>‘jñānaśaktibalaiśvaryavīryatejāṃsyaśeṣataḥ । bhagavacchabdavā-
cyāni vinā heyairguṇai’</quote>riti । nārāyaṇe ca kāraṇatvopapādakasaṃjñā1sārvaiyādeḥ purāṇeṣu prati-
pādānopalambhāt hiraṇyagarbhādīnāmapi jagajjanmādikāraṇatvatadākṣepakadharmapravṛttinimittakanā-
masadbhāvācca । hiraṇyagarbhasya hi sraṣṭā vidhātā viśvasṛḍvidhiḥ vedhā viriñca iti nāmnāṃ jaga-
nnirmātṛtvaṃ pravṛttinimittam । ātmabhūḥ svayaṃbhūritināmnorjaganmūlakāraṇatvopapādakaṃ svayaṃ
janirāhityaṃ viśvātmanāmrorjagadupādānatvopapādakaṃ sārvātmyaṃ lokeśaprajāpatināmnoḥ sthi-
tihetutvopapādakaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ <quote>‘druhidakṣibhyāminaji’</quote>ti druhyati dhātorinajantasya druhiṇanāmnaḥ
sarvasaṃhartṛtvaṃ parameṣṭhināmnaḥ paramapadāvasthāyitvaṃ śambhunāmnaḥ ānandarūpatvaṃ sarvānandayitṛtvaṃ vā ।
kiṃ bahunā । brahmanāmno niratiśayabṛhattvaṃ pravṛttinimittam । viṣṇorapi vāsudevanāmno vasatyasmi-
nsarvamiti vasyati chinatti sarvamiti vāsayati chādayati sarvajīvānityartheṣu <quote>‘vasa nivāse’</quote>-
<quote>‘vasuchedane’</quote> <quote>‘vasa ācchādana’</quote> iti dhātubhyo bahulagrahaṇāduṇpratyaye sati niṣpannasya vāsuśa
bdasya devaśabdasya ca samānādhikaraṇasamāsapadarūpasya sarvabhūtasthitisaṃhṛtitirodhānakartṛtvaṃ
pravṛttinimittam । viṣṇunāmnaḥ sarvatra vyāptatvaṃ svabhūnāmno janirāhityamacyutanāmnaḥ kṣaraṇarā-
hityaṃ pravṛttinimittamityādi dṛśyate। tasmātpurāṇapratipannaṃ sārvajñyādikaṃ bhavādināmapravṛtti-

tadeva śivaśabdavācyamānandādidharmāśrayatayā siddham । ata ānandādīnāṃ vi-
kalpādicintānirarthikā । <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyā’</quote>diti māyāyāḥ prakṛtitvamī

nimittatayā labdhamindranāmapravṛttinimittatulyaṃ liṅgajātaṃ ca na śambhoḥ parabhāvanirṇāyakatvena
śrutyanugrāhakamiti upabṛṃhaṇīyopabṛṃhaṇayoriva mānatarkayorapi parasparamanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena
ca vanasiṃhanyāyaviṣayatayā vanānupraviṣṭasiṃhasya tadananupraviṣṭasiṃhādiva svataḥ prabalamudāhṛtama-
ntropaniṣanmantrajātaṃ pramāṇamanupraviṣṭasya śive śrutasya sārvajñyādestadananupraviṣṭāddevatāntare
śrutātsārvajñyāditaḥ prabalatvena tatsāmyāpādanāyogāt । na ca śivasya sārvajñyādikaṃ purāṇa-
mātraprasiddhaṃ <quote>‘jñaḥ kālakālo guṇī sarvavidyaḥ’</quote> tadādimadhyāntavihīnamekam । vibhuṃ cidānanda-
marūpamadbha‍utaṃ’mityādiśrutiṣvapi viśiṣya śivasya sārvajñyādiprasiddhisattvāt । na cendraśabda
<quote>‘idi paramaiśvarya’</quote> iti dhātorniṣpannaḥ । yena tatsāmyaṃ bhavādināmnāmāpadyeta । nāmapravṛttini-
mittataḥ parabhāvasiddhāvīśvaramaheśvaranāmnaḥ śivādindramahendranāmā śakro'dhikaḥ syāditi vā-
''padyeta । <quote>‘ṛjrendrāgravajre’</quote>tyādisūtreṇa hīndraśabdaḥ <quote>‘ñiindhī dīptā’</quote> viti dhātoridhyate brahma-
tejobhirityarthe tatpūrvānuvṛttaranpratyayānto nipātitaḥ । na tu <quote>‘idi paramaiśvarya’</quote>iti dhātorinda-
tītyarthe । tato ranpratyayavidhānenaiva rūpasiddhisambhave nipātanaprayojanābhāvāt । ata evaitatsū-
travṛttāvindatidhātorindraśabdanipātanamuktvā <quote>‘vṛdhivapibhय़āṃ ra’</quote>nniti pūrvasūtre indatidhātorapi
grahaṇena rūpasiddhisambhave nipātanaprayojanaṃ nāstītyasvārasyādidhyate tejobhiritīndra iti
indhidhātornipātanamāśritam । evaṃ <quote>‘brahma hi devebhyo vijigya’</quote> iti talavakāriṇāmupaniṣadyu-
ktena prakāreṇāsuravijayasamayeṣu brahmatejobhiridhyamānaḥ śakro mahāsurasya vṛtrasya vadhe nitarāṃ
tairiddho jāta iti mahendra ityucyate । ata eva śrūyate। <quote>‘mahānvā ayamabhūdyo vṛtramavadhīditi
tanmahendrasya mahendratva’</quote>miti । tasmāduktanyāyānugṛhīsvataḥprabalamantropaniṣanmantrajātabalā-
cchiva eva jagatkāraṇamityetadupapannamiti । avadhāraṇādibalāt sadānandajñānānāṃ bhedā-
nāpādya teṣāṃ vikalpena samuccayena vā kāraṇatvamanupapannamiti yacchaṅkitaṃ tadapyevaṃ sati
nāvakāśaṃ labhata ityāha—<pratika>tadeveti</pratika> । yatsarvajñatvanityatṛptatvādyāśrayatayā pratipannaṃ tadeva
sāmānyataḥ sakalamaṅgalyaguṇavattvapratipādakasya śivaśabdasyāpi vācyamiti tasya sāmā-
nyato viśeṣataśca jñānānandādidharmāśrayatvasiddhestatra kāraṇavākyaśrutānyavadhāraṇāni na
śākhāntaragatakāraṇavākyaśrutarūpāntaravyāvartanārthāni । kiṃ <quote>‘tvānandāddhyeve’</quote>tyavadhāraṇaṃ sthūlāru-
ndhatinyāyena brahmaṇi krameṇa pūrvapratipannānāmannādivijñānāntarūpāṇāṃ vyāvartakaṃ <quote>‘sadeve’</quote>
tyavadhāraṇamidānīṃ pṛthivyādiṣudṛśyamānasya sthūlarūpasya sargādyasamaye vyāvartakam prajñānaghana-
vākyaṃ tvatyujvalasya ratnasyāntarbahiśca prabhayeva brahmaṇaḥ prajñānaguṇena vyāptipratipādakaṃ na
kasyāpi brahmaṇi vyāvartakam । ato nāvadhāraṇādivirodho'pīti bhāvaḥ । māyaivopādānamiti
śaṅkāṃ nirasyati। <pratika>māyāyā</pratika> iti। satyaṃ māyopādānamiti brahmāpyupādānameva । apṛthaksiddhakāryā-
vasthāśrayatvarūpaṃ hi māyāyā upādānatvaṃ samarthanīyam । tatsamarthyamānameva brahmaparyantamāyāti ।
nityayoge khalu māyinamiti māyāśabdādinipratyayaḥ । tataśca māyāyāḥ brahmāpṛthaksiddha‍yaiva
tadapṛthaksiddhāyāḥ kāryāvasthāyā apibrahmāpṛthaksiddhissiddha‍yati । evaṃ ca yadyapi brahmāśrayā-
<pb n="135"/>
śvarātmikāyā eva <quote>‘māyinaṃ tu maheśvara’</quote>miti vākyaśeṣāt । sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ
brahma kāraṇaṃ sthūlacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ tatkāryaṃ bhavati । ato jagajjanmādilakṣaṇaṃ brahmeti
siddhāntaḥ ।। iti janmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।। ।। ।।

māyā viyadādyacetanarūpeṇa pariṇamati brahmāśrayā tadāśrayajīvāśrayā ca cicchaktijñānādirū-
peṇa । na tu brahma kenāpyākāreṇa pariṇamati । tathāpi tathātathā pariṇamamānānāṃ māyādīnāṃ
brahmaivāyutasiddhāśrayatvaparyavasānabhūmiriti brahmaparyantamupādānatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ । nanu,
yadyevaṃ kāryāvasthāśrayatvarūpamupādānatvamiṣyate tadā yathā mṛdo bhāvighaṭāvasthāśrayabhūtāyāḥ
piṇḍāvasthāviśiṣṭatvena kāraṇatve'pi ghaṭāvasthāviśiṣṭatvena kāryatvamapi । evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sargā-
dyasamaye sūkṣmacetanācetanaviśiṣṭatvena kāraṇatve'pi sthūlacetanācetanaviśiṣṭatvena kāryatvama-
pi syādityāśaṅkyābhyupagamena pariharati—<pratika>sūkṣmeti</pratika> । evaṃ vyaktiviśeṣavyavasthitabrahmatvani-
rdhāraṇarūpaprayojanaparyavasāyitvājjagajjanmādi brahmalakṣaṇamityetadupapannamityadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃha-
rati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । evaṃ taṭasthalakṣaṇavyavasthitau tadupalakṣitasya guṇavigrahaviśeṣarūpaṃ svarūpa-
lakṣaṇamapi vyavatiṣṭhata iti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>iti janmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika>

<l>tadvākyeṣveva kā...... vihatā chāgapaśvādinītiḥ nārthassiddho vikalpaṃ bhajati samudaye kartṛtā nopapannā ।। 4 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sarvajñatvādiṣaṭkaṃ bhavati bhavamukhaṃ yasya nāmāṣṭakaṃ ca spaṣṭaṃ taṃ pārvatīśaṃ gamayati śiva eveti mantro... tāni ।</l>
<l>tadjñānānandasārassa iti taduditaḥ pañcakṛtyopalakṣyaḥ tatra śrautaṃ vihāyetaradavadhṛtayo rūpajātaṃ kṣipeyuḥ ।। 5 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ekaṃ mantraṃ bahūnāṃ kathamiha kathayasyarthabodhe samarthaṃ ko vā brūte sa eva svayamupaharate bādhameṣāmitīdam ।</l>
<l>pratyekaṃ kāraṇoktiprakaraṇamakhilaṃ svārthasātkartukāmāstiṣṭhante'nyonyaruddhā vidhihārigiriśādyāhvayā eva tasmin ।। 6 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti janmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>।। atha janmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। janmādyasya yataḥ ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>śrībhagavatpādamate</pratika>, idamekamadhikaraṇam । janmādi asya yataḥ iti sūtrapadacchedaḥ । pūrvādhikaraṇena vedāntadākyairbrahmaṇo
vicāryatve siddhe tasya brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇamityākāṅkṣāyāmidaṃ sūtramārabdham । pūrvādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ । <pratika>asya</pratika>=pratyakṣā-
dyupasthāpitasya vyavasthitadeśakālanimittakriyāphalāśrayasya vicitraracanārūpasya jagataḥ । <pratika>janmādi</pratika>=janmasthitibhaṅgam । janma
utpattirādiryasya janmasthitibhaṅgasya tajjanmādi । tadga‍uṇasaṃvijñāno bahuvrīhiḥ । anyathā janmādiśabdena sthitilayayoreva grahaṇaṃ
syāt na trayāṇām । atastritayalābhāya tadga‍uṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhyāśrayaṇamiti bhāvaḥ । ādipadenātra sthitipralayayoreva grahaṇam ।
nānyeṣāṃ vṛddhi pariṇāmāpakṣayarūpāṇāṃ vikārāṇām । teṣāṃ vṛddhipariṇāmayorjanmanyapakṣayasya ca nāśo'ntarbhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>yataḥ</pratika>=/?/
sarvajñātsarvaśaktessatyajñānānandarūpāt kāraṇāt । <pratika><quote>‘bhavati tadbrahme’</quote>ti</pratika> vākyaśeṣaḥ । <quote>‘bhṛgarvai vāruṇiḥ । punareva varuṇa pitaramu-
pasasāra । adhīhi bhagavato brahme’</quote>tyupakramya, <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante । yena jātāni jīvanti । yatprayantyabhisaṃviśa-
nti । tadvijijñāsasva । tadbrahmeti’</quote> ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra śrūyamāṇaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ yataśśabdasaṃgṛhītaṃ satyajñānāna-
<pb n="136"/>
ndātmatvaṃ cetyubhayamapi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati vā na veti virodhāvirodhābhyāṃ prasiddha‍yaprasiddhibhyāṃ ca sandehe janmāderjaganniṣṭhatvāt
nirviśeṣasya tasya jagatkāraṇatvasambhavasya viruddhatvāccādyaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati । satyādipadānāṃ dharmaparatvavivakṣāyāṃ nirvi-
śeṣasya tatsaṃbhavasya viruddhatvāt dharmaparatvavivakṣāyāṃ lokaprasiddhabhinnārthakasatyādipadānāṃ sakaladharmavinirbhuktadharmimātrabodhakatvā-
saṃbhavena tādṛśasya dharmiṇo'prasiddhatvācca na dvitīyamapi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, tatrādyaṃ taṭastha-
lakṣaṇamityucyate । yo hi dharmo rājñaśchatracāmarādikamivāsādharaṇaḥ sanneva kadāciddharmiṇā sambadhyate sa taṭasthalakṣaṇamityucyate ।
māyikasya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasyānṛtatayā paramārthato nirdharmasvarūpeṇe virodhānupapatteḥ āropitena rajatena śukterivāropitena
jagatkāraṇatvena brahmaṇo lakṣyatvasaṃbhavāccādyaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ bhavatyeva । dvitīyamapi svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviturmahati । satyādipadānāṃ
lakṣaṇayā akhaṇḍaikabrahmabodhakatvopapattyā tādṛśasya dharmiṇaḥ śrutiprasiddhatvāt । ato jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ satyādyātmatvaṃ cetyu-
bhayamapi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ bhavatyeva । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, janmādi</pratika>=janmasthitipralayatirobhāvānugraharūpaṃ kṛtyapañcakam । <pratika>asya</pratika>=cetanācetanasammelanasamarasībhū-
tasya prapañcavilāsasya <pratika>yataḥ</pratika>=yasmāt sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭādaṣṭābhidhānādhikaraṇācchivatatvāt bhavati । <pratika>tadbrahmeti</pratika> vākyaśeṣaḥ । asya
<quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante । yena jātāni jīvanti । yatprayantyabhisaṃviśanti । tadvijijñāsasva । tadbrahmeti’</quote> । pradhānakṣetra-
jñapatirguṇeśaḥ saṃsāramokṣasthitibandhahetuḥ । <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma’</quote> <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam’</quote> । ūrdhvaretaṃ virū-
pākṣaṃ viś‍varūpāya vai namaḥ’ । ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra jagato janmādikaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇatayā saṃbhavati vā na veti saṃdehe
janmādeḥ prapañcaniṣṭhatvena saṃbandhābhāvāt brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati । kiṃ ca śrutyantareṣu tatra tatra kvacidānandasya kvacitsataḥ
kvacijjñānasya kvacicchivaśabdavācyasya vastunaḥ kvacidacetanāyā māyāyāśca brahmatvajagatkāraṇatvādyabhidhānāt jagajjanmādikam
ānandādisamudāyasya vā teṣāmanyatarasya vā lakṣaṇaṃ paryavasitumarhati atassarvathāpi brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvādi lakṣaṇamabhidhātu-
maśakyameveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>janmāderjaganniṣṭhatvena brahmaṇyasambanddhatve'pi yatsarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭamaṣṭābhidhānādhikaraṇaṃ śivatatvaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇaṃ brahmetyucyata
iti tāṭasthyena brahmalakṣaṇatvamabhidhātuṃ śakyameva । ānandādidharmāṇāmatraiva paryavasānaṃ bhavati । sarvajñatvaṃ nityatṛptatvamanādibodhatvaṃ
svatantratvamaluptaśaktimatvamanantaśaktimatvaṃ cetyetāni sarvajñatādīni। etairanirasādhāraṇairdharmairviśiṣṭaṃ bhavaśarveśānapaśupatirudropra/?/bhī-
mamahādevābhidhānāṣṭakasya vācyaṃ nirastasamastasaṃsārakalaṅgaṃ nikhilamaṅgalādhārabhūtaṃ śivatatvaṃ yadavagamyate taduktasvabhāvatayā sakala-
jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ bhavati । jagadubhayakāraṇe etādṛśamahimabhavati śivaśabdavācya ānandādidharmāśraye brahmaṇi jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ
yujyata eva । sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ brahma kāraṇam । sthūlacidacidviśiṣṭaṃ brahma tatkāryaṃ bhavati । ānandādivikalpacintā nira-
rthikā । <quote>‘māyinaṃ tu maheśvara’</quote>miti vākyaśeṣāt māyāyā īśvarātmikāyā eva kāraṇatvamabhimatam । ato jagajjanmādilakṣaṇaṃ
brahmeti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, janmādi</pratika>=sṛṣṭisthitipralayam । <pratika>asya</pratika>=acintyavividhavicitraracanasya niyatadeśakālaphalabhogabrahmādi-
stambaparyantakṣetrajñamiśrasya jagataḥ । <pratika>yataḥ</pratika>=yasmātsarveśvarānnikhilaheyapratyanīkasvarūpāt satyasaṃkalpāt jñānānandādyanantakalyāṇa-
guṇāt sarvajñātsarvaśakteḥ paramakāruṇikāt parasmātpuṃsaḥ।<quote>‘<pratika>bhavati tadbrahma</pratika>’</quote> iti sūtrārthaḥ । bhṛgurvai vāruṇiḥ punareva varuṇaṃ pitara-
mupasasāra ।<quote>‘adhīhi bhagavo brahme’</quote>tyārabhya śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘yato vā imānī’</quote>tyādikaṃ tadbrahmetyantaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । yadyapi śabdānāṃ pa-
riniṣpannavastubodhanaśaktirasti । tathāpi lakṣaṇataḥ pratipannasyaiva śabdabodhyatvāt viśeṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣyabhedakatvena jagajjanmādīnāṃ
viśeṣaṇatayā brahmalakṣaṇatvāsaṃbhavāt pūrvapratipannākārāntarāsaṃbhavena teṣāmupalakṣaṇatayā vā brahma na vedāntavedyam । iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
aviruddhaviśeṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣyābhedakatvena sārvajñyādeḥ pūrvapratipannākārāntarasya saṃbhavena ca janmādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇatayā upalakṣaṇatayā
ca brahmalakṣaṇatvasaṃbhavena brahma vedāntavedyameveti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānaṃdatīrthamate, asya</pratika>=pramitajīvajaḍātmakaprapaṃñcasya । <pratika>janmādi</pratika>=janmasthitilayaniyatijñānājñānabandhamokṣarūpaṃ dharmāṣṭha-
kam । <pratika>yasmāt</pratika>=viṣṇoḥ। bhavatīti śrutaṃ tadeva brahma nānyadityarthaḥ। asya <quote>‘yato vā imānī’</quote>tyādikaṃ <quote>‘tadbrahme’</quote>tyantaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
atra udāhṛtaśrutisthitaṃ <quote>‘bṛha jātijīvakamalāsanaśabdarāśi’</quote>ṣviti bahvarthakāddhātorniṣpannaṃ yaugikatvānupapattyā jīva rūḍhaṃ guṇapūrṇe
viṣṇau rūḍhyanupapattyā yaugikaṃ brahmapadaṃ rūḍheryogatoba līyastvāt jīvaparameva bhavituṃ yuktam।ato jīvātiriktaṃ brahma vicāryamiti-
pūrvoktaṃ na saṃgacchata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ।<quote>‘yato vā’</quote>ityādipūrvavākyoktajagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatvena śrutismṛtipurāṇā-
dibhyo'vagamāt sati bādhake rūḍhestyājyatvāt jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādyanusāreṇa yogataḥ paripūrṇaguṇaviṣṇupara evāyaṃ brahmaśabda
iti pūrvoktaṃ jīvabhinnasya brahmaṇo vicāryatvamupapadyata eveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ janmādyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="137"/>
atha śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
lakṣaṇapramāṇādhīnā hi vastusiddhiḥ । jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma kiṃpramāṇakamityataāha—
<sutra>sū॰ ।। śāstrayonitvāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
yataḥ śāstraṃ yoniḥ pramāṇam ata eva jagajjanmādilakṣaṇaṃ brahma bhavatīti śeṣaḥ ।
atra jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma śāstraikagamyamuta pramāṇāntareṇāpi gamyamiti sandehaḥ ।
<p>saṅgatiṃ pradarśayannattarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>lakṣaṇeti</pratika> । na kevalaṃ lakṣaṇenedamitthamiti
lakṣyanirdhāraṇasiddhiḥ । kiṃ tu lakṣyasvarūpe tasya lakṣaṇarūpadharmavaiśiṣṭye ca pramāṇe satyeva ।
atastatra pramāṇapradarśanārthamuttarādhikaraṇamityarthaḥ । yadyapi tasmin<quote>‘yato ve’</quote>tyādiśāstraṃ pramāṇa-
miti pūrvādhikaraṇa evodāhṛtaṃ, tathāpyānumānike jagajjanmādikartari tatsiddhārthānuvādakaṃ
tadvākyaṃ na pramāṇamiti tasya pūrvādhikaraṇe tatra pramāṇatayodāharaṇamayuktamiti prāpte śāstra-
prāmāṇyādeva jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahma na tvanumānaprāmāṇyāditi vyavasthāpayitumākṣepasaṅgatye-
damadhikaraṇamārabhyata iti bhāvaḥ ।। sū॰ ।। <pratika>śāstrayonitvāt ।।</pratika> ।। 3 ।। sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>yata iti</pratika> ।
<quote>‘yataśśāstraṃ yoniḥ pramāṇaṃ ata’</quote> ityanena śāstrasya yonitvaṃ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāditi ṣaṣṭhīsa-
māsāśrayaṇena śāstrasya prāmāṇyādityarthe sūtraṃ yojitam । yataścaitraḥ śrutaśīlaśālī atasta-
tputro'yaṃ pūjanīya ityukte hi caitrasya śrutaśīlaśālitvāditi hetvartho labhyate । iha yonī-
tvaśabdasya guṇavācitve'pi <quote>‘pūraṇaguṇe’</quote>tyādi<ref>(pā॰2-2-11)</ref>sūtreṇa ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaniṣedho na bhava-
ti । <quote>‘tadaśiṣyaṃ saṃjñāpramāṇatvā’</quote>diti <ref>(pā॰-1-2-53-)</ref> sautranirdeśadarśanāt । <quote>‘ata eve’</quote>tyeva-
kāreṇa śāstraprāmāṇyādevāyamarthaḥ siddha‍yati na tvanumānapramāṇyāditi sautrahetunirdeśasāmarthya-
labdhārtho darśitaḥ । <pratika>jagajjanmādilakṣaṇaṃ brahma bhavatīti śeṣa iti</pratika> । anena pūrvasūtrā-
rthasya sādhanatvenānvayo darśitaḥ । evamatra sūtradvayasya sādhyahetuparatayaikārthye'pi pratyekaṃ ni-
rākaraṇīyapūrvapakṣasattvenādhikaraṇa1bhedādasya sūtrasya varṇakāntare sādhyāntarādhyāhārācca yoga-
bhedaḥ samāśritaḥ । atra <quote>‘yato ve’</quote>tyādi vākyaṃ brahmaṇi pramāṇaṃ na vetyadhikaraṇāṅgasaṃśayaṃ manasi
nidhāya tadarthasaṃśayamāha---<pratika>atreti</pratika> । yadi brahma śāstraikagamyaṃ tadā tatra tatpramāṇaṃ yadi pramā-
ṇānteraṇādhigamyaṃ tadā na pramāṇa<quote>‘maprāpte śāstramarthava’</quote>diti nyāyāditi saṃśayayoḥ phalaphali-
bhāvaḥ । tadarthasaṃśayakoṭidvayāvalambanena pūrvapakṣasiddhāntapradarśane kṛte satyadhikaraṇāṅgasaṃśaya-
koṭyostau paryavasāsyata iti tu tayoreva tau pradarśayiṣyete । nanu, kathamīśvaraḥ pramāṇāntaragamya
iti pūrvapakṣasyāvakāśaḥ । tatra hi na pratyakṣaṃ pravartate । nāpyanumānam । tadvyāptaliṅgābhāvāt ।
nopamānam । tasya śaktisādṛśyānyataraparicchedaphalatvāt । na laukikaḥ śabdaḥ । tasya pratya-
kṣādimūlapramāṇāpekṣatvāt । kṣitigirisamudrādirūpaṃ jagatsakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāditi sāmānyato-
dṛṣṭānumānaṃ tatra mānamiti cenna । asmadādyanupalabhyamānaprāk‌koṭiṣu kṣityādiṣu kāryatvā-
siddheḥ । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca । khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthvī viśvasya
dhāriṇī । ataḥ samudrā girayaśca sarve’</quote> ityādyaupaniṣadavākyapramāṇakaṃ yadi kāryatvaṃ teṣāṃ sama-
<note>(1) <quote>‘bhedādapyasya’</quote> iti ṅa. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="138"/>
jagadidaṃ sāvayavaṃ kāryameva । tacca vaicitryagarbhitatvena svocitakartṛkamiti kaści-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rthyeta tarhi tata eveśvarasyāpi siddhiriti na tadapekṣamanumānaṃ tatra pramāṇīkartumarhamityāśaṅkya
hetvantareṇa teṣāṃ kāryatvasiddhimāha—<pratika>jagadidamiti</pratika> । nanu, sāvayavatvamavayavārabdhatvaṃ cetta-
syāpya1siddhiḥ syāt । dravyasamavetadravyaṃ cet taddravyasamavetajātyāderivākāryatvenāpyupapannamapra-
yojakam । asyāyamavayava iti vyavahāraprayojakena svarūpasambandhaviśeṣeṇāvayavatvaṃ cettadapya-
prayojakam । kālasyāvayavaḥ kṣaṇalavādirityādivyavahāraprayojakakṣaṇalavādisambandhavati kā-
lādau vyabhicāri ca tat । tasmātsāvayavatvaṃ na kāryatvasādhakamityāśaṅkya tasya tatsādhakatāṃ
sūcayituṃ sāvayavaṃ kāryamevetyavadhāraṇam । yadekadeśāḥ paṭaikadeśāḥ tantava iti parasparaviyoja-
nārhāḥ tadiha sāvayavaṃ vivakṣitam । bhūbhūdharasamudrādyekadeśāḥ mṛcchilāsalilādirūpāḥ khanana-
ṭaṅkanirbhedadharoddharaṇādivyāpāraiḥ parasparaviyojanārhā iti sampratipannametat । tathābhūtaṃ cā-
vaśyaṃ kāryaṃ bhavedeva । viyojanavyāpāreṇa tattadekadeśarūpāṇāmavayavānāṃ vibhāgajananasya vi-
bhajyamānānāṃ prācīnasaṃyoganāśasya naśyatāṃ saṃyogānāṃ sāditvasya sādyavayavasaṃyogānantara-
bhāvitvaniyatasyāsamavāyikāraṇasaṃyoganāśena naśyataśca sāvayavasya sāditāyāścānivāryatvā-
diti bhāvaḥ । nanvevaṃ sati bhūbhūdharādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityanumānato nāsmadādivilakṣaṇaḥ
tatkartā siddha‍yet । bhūgolakādiṣvasmadādikartṛkasya khananapūraṇādirūpasya viyojanasaṃyojana-
vyāpārasya sarvadā sattvāt । avayavaviyojane sati mahāpaṭadhvaṃsajanyakhaṇḍapaṭanyāyena bhūgo-
lakāntarādyutpatteravaśyambhāvāt । avayavāntarasaṃyojane sati pūrvasiddhe'vayavinyāgantukānā-
mavayavānāṃ kāraṇatvāsambhavena pūrvasiddhāvayavināgantukāvayavaiścāvayavyantarotpādanasyāvaśyaṃ-
bhāvā2cca । tataśca pūrvatantuviyojanatantvantarasaṃyojanakartārastadanantarabhāvinaḥ paṭasyeva khanana-
pūraṇādikartārastadanantarabhāvino bhūgolakādeḥ kartāraḥ syuriti taiḥ siddhasādhanena duṣṭamidamanu-
mānaṃ kathamasmadādivilakṣaṇaṃ sarvajñatvādilakṣaṇayuktaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayedityāśaṅkyāha—tacceti ।
ativicitraṃ mahadgopuraprakārasaudhādikamekadeśe kiñcicchilādiviyojanasaṃyojanābhyāṃ kaiści-
nnavīkriyamāṇaṃ paśyantastadgatasakalavicitrasanniveśanirmāṇocitajñānaśaktyādiyuktaṃ tadādika-
rtāramanumimānā dṛśyante । na teṣāmanumānamekadeśe saṃyojanaviyojanakartṛbhiḥ siddhasādhanena

niṣedhaprasaṅga iti । atra cintyate <quote>‘ubhayaprāptā’</quote>viti sūtraṃ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prāptyarthaṃ

rtike ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhameva tasya sūtrasyārthaṃ kṛtvā tasya pratiṣedhasya <quote>‘bhedikā rudrasyajagato bibhitsā

tam । karmaṇīti śabdoccāraṇapūrvakaṃ kartariṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhena yā ṣaṣṭhī pariśeṣitā tasyāssamāsa-
niṣedha iti । ata eva mahābhāṣye karmaṇīti śabdamuccārya yā ṣaṣṭhītyetāvadevoktaṃ na tu vihiteti ।
tasmātsarvathāpi brahmadarśanamiti samāso yuktaḥ ।। 5 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ cikīrṣitapratijñāyāmeva svacikīrṣitasya bhāṣyasya parabhāṣyādibhyo'tiśayassūtrāñja-
syānusāritvapradarśanenāviṣkṛtaḥ । atha guṇāntarapradarśanenāpyāviṣkriyate <pratika>śrīmatāmiti</pratika> ।
śrīstrivedī <quote>‘ṛcassāmāni yajūṃṣi । sā hi śrīramṛtā satā’</quote> miti śruteḥ । tadvatāṃ tatpracurāṇā-
mityarthaḥ । bhūmni matuppratyayaḥ । yadyapi tattadadhikaraṇasūtrāṇyekaikaṃ viṣayavākyamadhikṛtya pravṛ-
ttānīva bhānti, tathāpi vyastasamastavedatayā sakalavedatadarthābhijñena bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena
praṇītāni tāni sūtrāṇi tattatsamānanyāyāni bahūni viṣayavākyānyavagāhanta iti bhāvaḥ ।
evaṃbhūtānāṃ vyāsasūtrāṇāṃ śrīkaṇṭhapraṇīto bhāṣyasandarbhaḥ prakāśate prakarṣeṇa bhāsate । śrīka-
ṇṭhanāmnā hi śrīstrivedī tadalaṅkṛtaḥ kaṇṭho'syeti vyutpattyā sakalavedatadarthābhijñatvamācārya-
sya pratīyate । atassakalavedatadarthābhijñena kṛtānāṃ tathābhūtena kṛtameva bhāṣyaṃ śobhāvahamiti
bhāvaḥ । madhuro rasavadvāgarthayuktaḥ । <quote>‘madhuraṃ rasavadvāci vastunyapi rasaḥ sthitaḥ । yena mādyanti
dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ ।।’</quote> iti hi kāvyalakṣaṇavidaḥ । tatra lalitavarṇaṃpadavinyāsādikṛtaṃ
sandarbharāmaṇīyakaṃ vāco mādhuryam । arthasya tu kāvyeṣu sahṛdayāsvādanīyamahānandapratibimba-
nopayogirītyādivṛttivāsanābhivyañjanakṣamavibhāvānubhāvādirūpatvam । iha tu <quote>‘raso rve/?/ sa’</quote>
ityādi śrutivarṇitaniratiśayānandarūpaparaśaktiviśiṣṭaparabrahmarūpatvameva । na ca tathātve'pi kā-
vyavadyathāsiddhaparabrahmaguṇavarṇanamātraviśrānto'yaṃ sandarbhaḥ । kiṃ tu tannirṇayopayoginyāyasahasra-
bharita ityāha---<pratika>mahārtha iti</pratika> । tathāpyatra bhūyānnāsti śabdaprapañcassābhiprāyaviśeṣaṇavinyā-
senaiva prāyastatratatra darśanīyanyāyānāmāviṣkaraṇā <quote>‘dvyākhyānato viśeṣapratipatti’</quote>riti nyāyena
teṣāṃ vyākhyānatassugamatvādityabhipretyāha---<pratika>nātivistara iti</pratika> । mahāvibhāṣayā nañassamāsā-
bhāvo <quote>‘vṛttānupūrve ca na cātidīrghe’</quote> itivat । nasamāso vā <quote>‘gamikarmīkṛtanaikanīvṛte’</quote> tivat ।।6।।</p>

rakajñānādikamiti cenna । jagatkartari dharmigrāhakamānasiddhaṃ jñānāditrayaṃ dravyatvasāmānyaprāptaṃ
saṅkhyādipañcakaṃ ca vihāya guṇāntaraṃ nāsti । tadanusāreṇānandādiśrutayo'nyathā vyākhyeyā
ityabhimanyamānasyānumānaikaśaraṇasya śuṣkatārkikasya dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭaṃ karmapāravaśyādikamapi sā-
dhye'ntarbhāvya <quote>‘na karmaṇā vardhata’</quote> ityādi śruteranyathāvyākhyāne vicikitsāhetvabhāvāt karma-
tāratamyaprayuktatāratamyavadānandādisadbhāvamātraṃ jagatkartaryaṅgīkṛtya tatra nityaniratiśayānanda-
śrutimātrasyānyathāvyākhyānopapatteśca । na ca jagatkartuḥ karmavaśyatve'smadādisāmyāpattirbādhaḥ ।
vihitānuṣṭhānaniṣiddhaparihāraniyamena tasya viśeṣopapatteḥ yathākathañcitsāmyamātrasya doṣatve
jñānādimattvasāmyasyāpi doṣatvāpatteśca । jñānādīnāṃ nityatvena sarvaviṣayatvena ca viśeṣo-
'stīti cettarhi tata eva karmavaśyatve'pi viśeṣo'sti । kiṃ ca īśvarajñānādernityasarvaviṣaya-
tva eva bhūyānyuktibādhaḥ । kathaṃ hi sadā sarvaviṣayiṇyekaiva tasyecchā kālaviśeṣeṇa sisṛkṣā-
sañjihīrṣātvādirūpaviśeṣaṃ bhajeta । sa hi viśeṣāviṣayaviśeṣopadhānātmaiva klṛptastattatkārya-
sāmagrīviśeṣopadhānarūpatayā samarthayitumayuktaḥ । na ca śivasūryaprabhārūpā cicchaktiriva tārki-
kakalpiteśvaraguṇabhūtecchā samayabhedena vividharūpapariṇāminī । sisṛkṣāsañjihīrṣātvādirūpāṇāṃ
sārvadikatve ca sadaiva sṛṣṭisaṃhārādikaṃ prasajyeta । na ca sisṛkṣādisadbhāve'pi sahakārisamava-
dhānakramātkāryakrama upapādanīyaḥ । tadicchāyāṃ sahakārisamavadhānecchārūpatvasyāpi sadātana-
tvena tatsamavadhānakramasyāpyaśakyasamarthanatvāt । evaṃ satyapi yadi sisṛkṣādiprayuktaṃ kāryaṃ
kālāntare'pi na syāt tadā tārkikeśvaro vitathasaṅkalpatvādanīśvara eva syāt । tathā tārki-
kairyannityamakāraṇamabhyupagataṃ pārimāṇḍalyādi tadapīśvaracikīrṣākṛtyorviṣaya iti vaktavyam ।

<p>evaṃguṇavadapyetadbhāṣyametadabhimatāṃ śāstrārthamaryādāmanaṅgīkurvatāmanādaraṇīyamiti sarvo-

dāntānāṃ yatsārasyaṃ niratiśayāsvādanīyarasarūpe parabrahmaṇi tātparyam । tatsaurabhamiva । yadekade-

bṛndatātparyaṃ tattadvidyopakramagatopākhyānādipradarśitārthadvārā guruśiṣyakramādyanekārthaparyavasā-
yīti tatsāmyam । yadyapi sārasyameva saurabhamiti mayūravyaṃsakādisamāso'pi sambhavati । tathā-
pyāsvādaḥ sārasyaśabdena rasarūpatayādhyavasite tātparya eva prathamānvayadaśāyāṃ mukhyatayānve-
tīti pūrvapadārthaprādhānyasiddhyarthamupamitisamāso'tra grāhyaḥ । evaṃ ca tātparyaṃ saurabhamivetyupamayā
tātparyavato vedāntabṛndasya divyasaurabhavatpārijātastabakopamā vyajyata ityekadeśavivartirū-
pakavadekadeśavivartinyupameyam । prasiddhaṃ hi pārijātastabakasya saṅka1lpitasakalārthapradāyitvaṃ
harivaṃśe pārijātasaṃhitāyām । tathā vedāntabṛndamapi svasevināṃ mokṣaprāpaṇena <quote>‘sa yadi
pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṅkalpādevāsya pitarassamuttiṣṭhantī’</quote> tyādiśrutyuktarītyā saṅkalpitasaka-
lārthapradāyīti tatsāmyam । evaṃ pārijātastavakasaurabhavadvyāpino vedāntabṛndatātparyasyāsvādaḥ
ā samantāt sākalyenānubhavaḥ tena modituṃ śīlameṣāmiti tācchīlyārthe ṇinipratyayaḥ ।
svabhāvasiddhavedāntārthatātparyaśraddhāvatāmityarthaḥ । avaśyaṃ modanta ityarthe vā <quote>‘āvaśyakā
dhamarṇyayorṇini’</quote> riti <ref>(pā॰. 3. 3. 170. sū॰)</ref> sūtreṇa ṇinipratyayaḥ । bhaktipāravaśyāttadā-
karṇanamātreṇāvaśyamākasmikamānandaṃ prāpnuvatāmityarthaḥ । evaṃbhūtānāṃ śivaniṣṭhānāṃ sarvātmanā
śivaṃ prapadya tameva sarvadā dhyāyatāmāryāṇāṃ pūjyānāṃ satpuruṣāṇāmetadbhāṣyaṃ mahānidhiḥ । yathā
mahānidhiratidaridrairakasmāllabdho darśanamātreṇa mahānandakaraḥ tadabhimatasakalārthapradaśca tathe-
damapi bhāṣyamuktarūpaissatpuruṣairdṛṣṭaṃ darśanamātreṇa sadyaḥ paranirvṛtikaraṃ sakalavedāntārthanirṇayena
nirantaraśivadhyānopayuktatadīyanikhilamaṅgalyaguṇavigrahādiyāthārthyabodhasamarpakaṃ ceti tatsā-
myam । evaṃ ca yānuddiśyedaṃ bhāṣyaṃ viracyate tadādaraṇīyatvasyāvaikalye kimanyeṣāmanādareṇa ।
<quote>‘maduktiścedantarmadayati sudhībhūya sudhiyaḥ kimasyā nāma syādalasapuruṣānādarabharai’</quote> riti
nyāyāt । pratyuta dadhīcādiśāpadagdhebhyastebhyastebhyaścorebhyo mahānidhivadyatnāt, gopanīyame-
taditi tadanādaraṇamanuguṇameveti bhāvaḥ ।। 7 ।।</p>

rvedo vāyossāmaveda ādityā’</quote>dityādi śrutyantareṣu ।na caikasmingranthe bahūnāṃ svataṃtrakartṛtvaṃ sa-

'pi caitanyānugatāssade’</quote> ti । tāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ brahmaṇo jātānāmapi samayāntare punaragnyā-
dibhyo'pi jananamupapadyate । brahmaṇo mānasaputrāṇāṃ dakṣanāradavasiṣṭhabhṛgvādīnāmiva samayā-
ntare punaranyato'pi jananam । evamādau brahmaṇā pravartitānāmapi vedānāṃ kālakrameṇa luptānāṃ

gamavadeva teṣāmaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta । na ceśvare sārvajñyādiniścayāduktaśaṅkānavatāraḥ vedādanya-
tastanniścayāsambhavāt buddhādīnāmapi sārvajñyādestadāgamato niścayasambhavasyāviśiṣṭatvācca ।
na ca vedeṣu mahājanaparigraho buddhādyāgamādviśeṣaḥ । mahattvasya pūjyatvarūpatve vedaparigṛhītṛ-

śvarasya paramāptasyāvāptasamastakāmasya śivasya brahmaṇo vacanaṃ tu pramāṇameva bhavati ।

yāstasminsādhye hetutvaṃ ca tadaivopapadyate । ato yathā <quote>‘caturgṛhītānyājyāni bhavanti, na hyatrānū-
yājā ijyante’</quote>ityātithyāprakaraṇagatena vākyenātithyāyāmevaupabhṛtāṣṭagṛhītavyavacchede kriyamā-
ṇe'pyanūyājābhāvarūpahetusādhāraṇyādanyatrāpi yatreṣṭyantare'nūyājānāmabhāvaḥ pramitastatra sarva-
trāpi sa sidhyati । yathā vā kṣitimātraṃ nirdiśya sakartṛkatve sādhyamāne'pi kāryatvahetusādhā-
raṇyādanyatrāpi yatrāṅkurādau kāryatvamanusaṃhitamasti tatra sarvatrāpi tatsidhyati । tathātra <quote>‘dharma-
jijñāse’</quote> ti viśiṣya pratijñāne'pi hetu1sādhāraṇyāddharmaparādanyatrāpi vedabhāge vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ
siddhyati । kiṃ ca dha2rmaśabdaḥ dharmabrahmasādhāraṇyenālaukikaśreyassādhanamātravācīti pratijñāpi
sādhāraṇyeva । tasya kā3ryamātravācitve'pi kṛtasāṅgavedādhyayanasya vedārtha eva jijñāsaucityā-
datratyaṃ dharmapadaṃ vedārthamātropalakṣaṇaṃ paryavasyati । tasya vedā4rthamātraparatve'pi <quote>‘syāccaikasya
brahmaśabdava’</quote>diti nyāyena codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharma iti dvitīyasūtragatadharmaśabdasyālaukikaśre-
yassādhanakāryaparatvopapatteḥ codanāśabdasya liṅādiyuktatadrahitavākyasādhāraṇyena prāptibādha-
rahitārthakave5damātraparatve dvitīyasūtragatasyāpi dharmaśabdasyālaukikaśreyassādhanamātraparatvasya ve-
dā6rthamātraparatvasya vopapatteśca । tasmānnirviṣayamidaṃ śāstraṃ nārambhaṇīyamityāśaṅkāṃ nirākurvanneva
prathamasūtravyāvartanīyaprayojanādyabhāvaprayuktaśāstrānārambhaśaṅkotthāpanāya bhūmikāmāracayati—
<pratika>iheti</pratika> । iha sūtrasandarbharūpe śāstre । <pratika>aupaniṣadī</pratika> upa samīpe parabrahmaṇo niṣīdanti vatarnta
ityupaniṣado vedāntāḥ । te hi sākṣātpare brahmaṇi tātparyeṇa vartante na tu karmabhāgavattadārādha-
narūpayajñādividhānadvārā tatsambandhini । tadviṣayā <pratika>mīmāṃsā</pratika> tada7rthābhidhānopayoginyāyagra-
thanātmikā <pratika>samārabhyate</pratika> bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena prastūyate । upaniṣadīti saptamyantapāṭhe'pye-
vamevārthaḥ । yadvā । iha karmabrahmaparabhāgadvayasamudāyātmake vede ya upaniṣadbhāgastatra mīmāṃsā
tadarthanirṇayopayoginyāyagrathanaparasūtrasandarbhātmikā samārabhyata ityarthaḥ । pūjitavicāravācī
mīmāṃsāśabdo'tra tadupayoginyāyagrathane tadarthasūtrasandarbharūpe śāstre vā lakṣaṇayā vartate ।
kecit upanipūrvāt <quote>‘ṣadlṛ viśaraṇagatyavasādane’</quote>ṣviti dhātoravasādanārthaviṣayāt kvipi niṣpa-
nna upaniṣacchabdaḥ sākṣātsaṃsāramūlasya nitarāmavasādanīṣu brahmavidyāsveva prasiddha iti so'pi
tatsādhaneṣu vedānteṣu lakṣaṇayā vartata iti vadanti । yadāhuḥ—<quote>‘puvṛttihetūnniśśeṣāṃstanmūlo-
cchedakatvataḥ । yato'vasādayodvidyā tasmādupaniṣadbhavet ।। yathoktavidyābodhitvādgrantho'pi
tadabhedataḥ । bhavedupaniṣannā8bhā lāṅgalaṃ jīvanaṃ yathā</quote> ।। iti । tasminpakṣe mokṣasādhanavidyāvā-
cakasyopaniṣacchavdasya tatsādhaneṣu vedānteṣviva tadviṣaye brahmaṇyapi lakṣaṇopapatteḥ ‘śrutopani-
ṣatkagatyabhidhānācceti <ref>(bra॰ 1.2.16)</ref> sūtragatopaniṣatpadasya bhāṣye brahmaparatayā vyākhyāsya-
mānatvāt<quote>‘upaniṣadaṃ bho brūhi ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vede’</quote>tyādiśrutiṣūpadeśye vedye cārtha evo-</p>
<note>(1) <quote>‘kāryatvahetu’</quote> iti. ka. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘dharmapadaṃ’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘karmamātra’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(4)
<quote>‘tanmātraparatve'pi’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(5) <quote>‘vedavākyamātra’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(6) <quote>‘vedārthaparatvasya’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<note>(7) <quote>‘tadarthavidhānopayogi’</quote> iti kha. ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(8) <quote>‘nnāma’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।</note>

tāvadvaiṣamyamiṣyate । nanu, parameśvarasyaiva vedakartṛtvamiti na niyamaḥ । <quote>‘ṣaḍḍhotā vai
bhūtvā prajāpatiridaṃ sarvamasṛjata ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānī’</quote> tyādiśravaṇāddhiraṇyaga-
rbhāderapi tatkartṛtvāvagamādinni cenna। hiraṇyagarbhotpatteḥ prāgapi vedānāṃ sadbhā-
vāt । śrūyate hi <quote>‘yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai’</quote>
iti । yassarvadevānāmādimasya hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi kartā tasmai sarvānvedānupadi-
śati sa eva sarvādhiko vedakartā paramadeśikaḥ । tathā hi śrutyā'bhivyajyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nanvīśvarasya vedaracanāmūlatvena siddhyajjñānaṃ viśiṣya sarvavedārthaviṣayaṃ tadadhīna1varṇapadānupū-
rvyādiviṣayaṃ ca siddhyatu nāma । tathāpi tasya nadīvālukāsaṅkhyādiviṣayatvāsiddherna niraṅku-
śasārvajñyasiddhiriti praśnasya kimuttaraṃ niṣpannam । vedaracanāmūlabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ yāvadvedatadarthaviṣaya-
miti siddhau śivaśaktirdīpaprabhānyāyena vyavasthitaviṣayeti śaṅkāyāṃ nirastāyāṃ nadīvālukā-
saṅkhyādiviṣayatvamapi siddhyatīti cet tathāpyatītānāgatavastuviṣayajñānaṃ na siddhyati । jñā-
nasaṃyogasya vidyamāneṣveva sambhavāt satkāryavādo sarveṣāmarthānāṃ sadā sattve'pi tattadāgantu-
kabhūtabhaviṣyadavasthāviśeṣajñānaṃ na siddhyatīti cet । ucyate । vedakartṛtvena vedaracanāmūla-
bhūtajñānasiddhau tadracanāsamayeṣvasatāṃ bhūtabhaviṣyatāmapi vedārthānāṃ jñānaṃ siddhyatīti tadva-
hirbhūtānāmapi bhūtabhaviṣyatāṃ jñānaṃ siddhyet । śivajñānasya vidyamānaviṣayeṣu vyavasthitaviṣaya-
tvaśaṅkāyā iva bhūtabhaviṣyadviṣayatvāsambhavaśaṅkāyā api nirāse sati saṅkocakābhāvena sarva-
viṣayatvasiddheḥ । yasya prasādādatītānāgataviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ devarṣimanuṣyādīnāṃ jāyate tasya para-
meśvarasyātītānāgatajñātṛtvakalpane kānupapattiḥ । kāraṇādhīnamatītānāgataviṣayatvamanitya-
jñānānāṃ sambhavati । nityasya tu parameśvarajñānasya tattadarthasambandhādhīnameva tattadviṣayatvaṃ
vācyamityatītānāgatāvasthāviśeṣaviśiṣṭaiḥ sambandhābhāve kathaṃ tadviṣayatvaṃ syāditi cenna ।
jīvānāmiveśvarasyāpi cicchaktiḥ <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmātprasṛtā purāṇī’</quote> ti vacanaprāmāṇyena nādṛṣṭā-
dikāraṇādhīnanānāpariṇāmaviśeṣavatītyabhyupagamāt । tadetatsarvamabhipretyoktaṃ bhāṣye <quote>‘parameśvara-
ssarvasākṣī sarvaṃ pratyakṣayatī’</quote>ti। <quote>‘na sarvaṃ mukhyataḥ prakāśayatī’</quote>tyetanna sarvaṃ viśiṣya prakāśayatī-
tyasyāpyupalakṣaṇam । <quote>‘kimapi viśeṣeṇe’</quote>ti dṛṣṭāntatayopanyastam । nanu, brahmaṇo veda-
kartṛtve sati tena maharṣīṇāṃ sārvajñyādviśiṣṭamīśvarasya sārvajñyaṃ siddhyedapi tatraiva na pramāṇam ।
niśvasitādiśrutīnāṃ ṣaḍḍhotṛvākyādīnāmiva tattadabhimānidevatādṛṣṭatvādiviṣayatvādityabhi-
prāyeṇa śaṅkate---<pratika>nanviti</pratika> । prajāpateḥ parameśvarādvedāvāptiśravaṇāttasya vedapraṇetṛtvamanupapannaṃ
dūre tatsṛṣṭānāmagnyādīnāmiti teṣāṃ vedakartṛtvaśruteranyathā netavyatve'pi parameśvarasya vedakartṛ-
tvaśrutayo nānyathā netavyāḥ । bādhakābhāvāt । ataḥ sṛjyamānāya prajāpataye vedapradāna-
śravaṇāt tataḥ prāgeva parabrahmaṇā vedāḥ praṇītā ityabhyupagantavyamityāśayena pariharati---
<pratika>neti</pratika> । <quote>‘sarvadevānāmādimasye’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇamagnyādīnāṃ vedakartṛtvaśravaṇasyānyathā netavyatāyāḥ
kaimutikanyāyena siddhiṃ darśayitum । yadyapyudāhṛtamantre pūrvamityuktyaivopanyastaviśeṣaṇārtha-
ssiddhyati tathāpi tasya spaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ mantrāntaramudāharati---<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । asminmantre
<note>(1) <quote>‘tadadhikavarṇa’</quote> iti gha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
﻿<pb n="161"/>
<quote>‘yo devānāṃ prathamaṃ purastādviśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ । hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāya-
mānaṃ sa no devaśśubhayā smṛtyā saṃyunaktu’</quote> । iti । maharṣirvedakartā yassarvajñatvā-
dinā viśvasmāccidacitprapañcādadhiko rudraḥ parabrahmabhūtassarveṣāṃ devānāmindrādī-
nāṃ prathamamādimaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ svasaṅkalpena prakṛterupādānātmano jāya-
mānaṃ sṛṣṭikāle sarvajñānopāyasakalavedopadeśarūpayā'paśyat paramadeśiko naḥ
asmānapi sakalasaṃsārapāśamahānarthanivṛttihetuśrūtayā paramāmṛtalakṣmīsamāveśa-
parānandaprāptikāriṇyā ata eva paramamaṅgalarūpayā vedāntasārasāmarasyasiddhayā
smṛtyā bodhakalayā svaviṣayayā saṃyojayatviti tātparyam । tatassakalavedakartṛ-
tvamīśvarasya siddham । vāco nityatvaśrutirīśvareṇa pūrvasattānuvṛttyā vihitatvā-

devānāṃ prathamamiti spaṣṭamuktam । purastāt kalpādau । paśyatetyaḍāgamābhāvaḥ ātmanepadaṃ
cetyubhayaṃ chāndasam । <quote>‘jāyamāna’</quote>mityanena jananāvasthāyāmeva carācarasṛṣṭyupayogisakalavedata-
darthasphūrtisamarthayānugrahadṛṣṭyā darśanaṃ vyajyate । ata eva <quote>‘yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhātī’</quote>ti mantre'pi
laḍākhyātābhyāṃ sṛṣṭivredapradānayossamānakālatvamuktam । purāṇeṣu ca <quote>‘jñānamapratimaṃ yasya vai-
rāgyaṃ ca jagatpateḥ । aiśvaryaṃ caiva dharmaśca saha siddhaṃ catuṣṭaya’</quote>miti hiraṇyagarbhasya jñānādīnāṃ
sahajatvamuktam । <quote>‘smṛtye’</quote>tyanena mokṣārthaṃ daharādyupāsanārūpā smṛtisantatirucyate । tajjanya-
sākṣātkāro vā tadvācakena lakṣyate । <quote>‘smṛtilābhe sati sarvagranthīnāṃ vipramokṣa’</quote>iti śrutyanta-
re'pi mokṣajanakajñāne smṛtiśabdaprayogo dṛśyate । mantraṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>maharṣiriti</pratika>। tasmi-
ñjanmani kutaścidadhyayanamanapekṣya svayameva sūktaviśeṣarūpavedaikadeśadraṣṭāro hi vasiṣṭhādaya
ṛṣaya ucyante । ataḥ parameśvaraḥ kadācidapyadhyayanamanapekṣya sakalavedapraṇetṛtvānmaharṣiriti
nirdiṣṭaḥ । idaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasṛṣṭyavasthāyāṃ vedapradānarūpānugrahadṛṣṭyā darśanaṃ samartha-
yitum । tataḥ prāgeva vedapraṇetṛtvapradarśanārthaṃ <pratika>sarvajñatvādineti</pratika> । niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvamatraiva
viśrāntamiti bhāvaḥ । rudraśabdo'tra saṃsārarujāṃ drāvake parabrahmaṇi vartate na tu saṃhārarudrā-
dāviti vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>rudra iti । svasaṅkalpeneti</pratika> । nimittarūpasya svasya saṅkalpena prakṛtyava-
sthāviśeṣātmakopādānarūpāt svātmano jāyamānamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhaṃ janayāmāsa pūrvaṃ sa
no buddhyā śubhayā saṃyunaktu’</quote>iti śvetāśvataropaniṣadyasya mantrasya pāṭhātsvasaṅkalpeneti viśeṣi-
tam । <quote>‘paśyate’</quote>ti darśanamātrokteḥ phalābhāvāt <quote>‘yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti’</quote>iti mantrāntaradarśanācca
viśiṣṭadarśanamiha vivakṣitamityabhipretya viśeṣayati---<pratika>sarvajñāneti । paramāmṛteti</pratika> । parama-
mamṛtaṃ brahma tallakṣmīsamāveśaḥ satyasaṅkalpatvādinā tatsādṛśyaprāptiḥ parānaṃdaprāptiḥ । uktasmṛti-
viśeṣaṇārthassarvo'pi <quote>‘śubhaye’</quote>ti tadviśeṣaṇena labdha <pratika>ityabhipretyāha---ata eveti</pratika> । sāmarasya-
maikakaṇṭhyena brahmaṇi tātparyaṃ tasmānniśvasitādiśrutīnāṃ ṣaḍḍhotṛvākyādivaiṣamyāt tataḥ sakala-
vedakartṛtvamīśvarasya siddhyatītyupasaṃharati---<pratika>tata iti</pratika> । tathāpi vedanityatvaśrutivirodhaḥ syā-
dityāśaṅkya <quote>‘pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭeḥ prā’</quote>gityādigranthena sūcite tatsamādhāne sthita eva samādhānāntaramā-
ha---<pratika>vāca iti</pratika> । pūrvaṃ pralayeṣu ghaṭā1dīnāmiva vedānāmasattve'pi pratikalpaṃ prādurbhāvāt pravā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘dharādīnāmiva’</quote> iti. kha. pāṭha. ।</note>

dvedānāmaviruddhā । tato vedānāmīśvarapraṇītatvaṃ nityatvaṃ cāviruddhameva ।।
iti śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
