hanityatvamastīti tadviṣayatayā vedanityatvaśruteravirodha uktaḥ । idānīṃ tu kramaviśeṣaviśiṣṭa-
varṇarūpāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pralaye'pi kramopādhibhūtaparameśvarabuddhyanuvṛttyā sattānuvṛttirastīti tadvi-
ṣayatayeti bhedaḥ । nanu, vedānāṃ pralaye'pi sattve kathaṃ teṣāṃ sargādāvīśvarapraṇītatvamupapadyata
ityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tata iti</pratika> । pralaye vedānāṃ parameśvarabuddhigocaratayaivānuvṛttiḥ sargādau tu teṣāṃ-
paraśravaṇagocaratayā vaikharīvṛttiviśiṣṭatvena parameśvarapraṇītatvamityubhayamapyavirodhenopapadyate ।
ata eva<quote>‘anādinidhanā divyā vāgutsṛṣṭā svayaṃbhuvā । ādau vedamayī bhūtā yataḥ sarvā pravṛtta-
yaḥ ।।’</quote> iti vedānāṃ nityatve'pi śivapraṇītatvaṃ smaryata iti bhāvaḥ ।। 3 ।।
iti śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। śāstrayonitvāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kartuḥ kāryeṇa siddheranumitiviṣayo naiṣa śāstraikagamyassākṣādvede purāṇādiṣu ca tadanadhaṃ darśitaṃ cānumānam ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ kartraikatādestadaviṣayatayā śāstramevātra mānaṃ śāstrānugrāhaphatvāttadanumatamupanyastamagre vivektum ।। 7 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sarvajñatvadraḍhimne nikhilajanayiturvedakartṛtvamicchannityatvaṃ mānatā cetyubhayamapi galannekṣate vedavācām ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ tatpūrvapūrvakramamanusaratā śaṃbhunā nirmitāstāssākṣādeva pramāṇaṃ sa hi bhavati tato naiva kasyāpi hāniḥ ।। 8 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। śāstrayonitvāt ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvasūtre brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvasamarthanenārthādupakṣiptaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ draḍhayitumidaṃ sūtramārabdham । atra sarvajña-
miti padādhyāhāreṇa brahmapadānuṣaṃgeṇa ca sūtraṃ pūraṇīyam । śāstrasya yoniḥ śāstrayoniḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāditi vigrahaḥ ।
<pratika>śāstrasya</pratika>=mahata ṛgvedādeḥ sarvajñakalpasya śāstrasya । <pratika>yonitvāt</pratika>=<ref>(kartṛtvena)</ref> kāraṇatvāt । <pratika>brahma sarvajñaṃ bhavati</pratika>
iti sūtrārthaḥ । <quote>“asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedassāmavedo'tharvāṃgirasa itihāsaḥ purāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ
ślokāssūtrāṇyanuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānāni”</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra idaṃ vākyaṃ vedahetutvena brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sā-
dhayati uta na sādhayatīti niḥśvasitaśrutinityatvaśrutyorvirodhā'virodhābhyāṃ sandehe <quote>“vācā virūpanityaye”</quote> ti nityatva-
śravaṇāt vyākaraṇādivadvedasya pauruṣeyatve mūlapramāṇasāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyāpātācca nedaṃ vedakartṛtvena brahmaṇassarvajñatvaṃ sādhayatīti
pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, ādikarturīśvarasyābhyupagamāt tasyāpi pūrvapūrvakalpānusāreṇaiva vedaviracanopagamāt nityatvaśrateḥ
pravāhanityatvabodhakatvāt ānāditātparyopagamāt vedasya yogyavākyatvenaiva asati bādhe pramājanakatvopagamāt śrutyoḥ para-
sparavirodhābhāvena īśvarasya vedakartṛtve anitarasāpekṣatvena vedasya niruktapauruṣeyatvāprasaktyā aprāmāṇyāprasaṃgācca śāstrasya ṛgve-
dādessarvajñakalpasya kartṛtvena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇaḥ idaṃ vākyaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sādhayatyeveti । iti prathamavarṇakam । athavā, pūrvasūtre
lakṣaṇanirūpaṇānantaraṃ pramāṇajijñāsāyāmidamārabhyate । śāstram ṛgvedādi pramāṇaṃ yasya <ref>(brahmaṇaḥ)</ref> tat śāstrayoni tasya
bhāvaḥ tattvaṃ tasmāditi vigrahaḥ । atra varṇake brahmapadānuṣaṃgeṇa śāstrapramāṇamiti padādhyāhāreṇa ca sūtrārtho varṇanīyaḥ ।
<pratika>śāstrayonitvāt</pratika>=śāstraikagamyatvāt । <pratika>brahma śāstrapramāṇaṃ</pratika> bhavati iti sūtrārthaḥ । atra <quote>“taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ pṛcchāmi”</quote>
<quote>“navodavinmanute taṃ bṛhantam”</quote> ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tat kiṃ vedaikagamyatvamīśvarasya pratipādayati uta neti sandehe
﻿<pb n="163"/>
brahmaṇassiddhavastutvena mānāntareṇāpyabagamyatvāt jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya anumānena siddhatvāt tenaiva lādhavādyanugṛhī tena sarva-
jñatvāderapi siddhatvācca na śāstreṇā'tra kiñcidapyasti kāryamiti <quote>‘taṃ tvaupaniṣada’</quote> mityādivākyaṃ vedaikagamyatvamīśvarasya na
pratipādayatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । brahmaṇaḥ rūpādyanāvena mānāntaragamyatvāsaṃbhavāt mūlabhūtasya śrutipramāṇasyaiva paramātmasvarūpa-
nirūpaṇopayogitvāt idaṃ vākyaṃ vedaikagamyatvamīśvarasya pratipādayatveveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, vastusiddheḥ lakṣaṇapramāṇādhīnatvāt jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma kiṃpramāṇakamityākāṅkṣāyāmidamārabhyate । <pratika>śāstrayo-
nitvāt</pratika>=śāstrasya pramāṇatvāt । śāstrasya yonitvaṃ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāt iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ । <pratika>jagajjanmādilakṣaṇaṃ brahma
bhavatīti</pratika> śeṣaḥ । asya <quote>‘yato vā imānī’</quote> tyādivākyadvārā śāstraṃ viṣayaḥ । atra jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma śāstraikagamyamuta pra-
māṇantareṇāpi gamyamiti sandehe śāstrasya pramāṇāṃtarāprāptiviṣayatvāt sāvayavasya vicitrasyāsya jagataḥ kartā kaścit
sarvajñatvādimān syāditi anumānagamyatvācceśvarasya, nātra śāstrasya prāmāṇyam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu <quote>‘nāvedavi-
nmanute taṃ bṛhanta’</quote>mityādiṣu vedāntaśāstramantareṇa brahmaṇo boghāsambhavaśravaṇāt anumānataḥ yathākathaṃcit jagato vilakṣaṇaika-
kartṛkatvasiddhāvapi nimittopādānaśaktiyuktaikakartṛkatvāsiddheḥ brahma vedāntaśāstraikagamyaṃ tatpramāṇakaṃ ca bhavatyeveti । kecittu
anyathāpi vyācakṣate yathā---<pratika>śāstrayonitvāt</pratika>=vedānāṃ kāraṇatvāt pūrvādhikaraṇapratipāditajagatkāraṇatvopayogisarvajñatvavi-
śiṣṭaṃ brahma bhavati iti । <quote>“asya mahato bhūtasya”</quote> ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra brahmaṇo vedakartṛtvaṃ yaktaṃ na veti sandehe
<quote>‘vācā virūpanityaye’</quote>tyādervāco nityatvapratipādikāyāḥ śrutervirodhāt vedānāṃ brahmakāryatve ṣauruṣeyatvādaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgācca na
yuktamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘asya mahato bhūtasye’</quote> tyādiśruterniśvasitavadvedarāśeraprayatnena brahmaṇaḥ pādurbhāvāvagamāt <quote>“aṣṭā-
daśānāmetāsāṃ vidyānāṃ bhinnavartmanām । ādikartā kavissākṣācchūlapāṇiriti śrutiḥ ।।”</quote> iti parameśvarasya sarvavidyākartṛtvṛ-
pratipādanāt sṛṣṭeḥ prāksvātmani vilīnānāṃ vedānāṃ pūrvapūrvavarṇānupūrvyanurūparacanayā punaḥkartṛtvasya sarvajñe parameśvare'bhyu-
pagamācca vedānāmapauruṣeyatvamīśvarakāryatvaṃ cāviruddhamevetyatassakalavastvabhāsakasarvavedakartṛtvamīśvarasya yuktameveti siddhāntaḥ ।
ityādinā varṇakāntaramapi bhāṣyāntarasthamupanyastam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, śāstraṃ</pratika> yoniḥ <pratika>pramāṇaṃ</pratika> yasya tat śāstrayoni tasya <pratika>bhāvastattvaṃ tasmāt ।</pratika> brahmajñānakāraṇatvāt śā-
strasya tadyonitvaṃ brahmaṇa iti yāvat । atyantātīndriyatvena pratyakṣādipramāṇāviṣayatayā brahmaṇaśśāstraikapramāṇakatvāt uktasvarūpaṃ
brahma <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtānī’</quote> tyādivākyaṃ bodhayatvevetyarthaḥ । asya <quote>‘yato vā imānī’</quote> tyādivākyadvārā śāstraṃ vi-
ṣayaḥ । atra śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva prāyassūtrārthaḥ pūrvapakṣādikaṃ ceti nātīva prapaṃcyate । atra abbhakṣādivadavadhāraṇāgarbhaḥ śāstra-
yoniśabda iti bhāvaḥ । atra yadyapi brahma lakṣaṇataḥ pratipattuṃ śakyam । tathāpi kāraṇabhūtasya brahmaṇaḥ anumānavedyatvena pramā-
ṇantarāgocarasyaiva śāstravedyatvena brahma na vedāntavedyamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānasya jīvavilakṣaṇaviṣayatvābhā-
vena brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvena brahma vedāntaikavedyamiti siddhāntaḥ । śrīkaṇṭhamate <quote>‘kecidāhu’</quote> riti varṇakāntaramapi
prapañcitam । atra neti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, śāstraṃ</pratika> śrutipurāṇādi <pratika>yoniḥ</pratika> pramāṇaṃ yasya (jagatkāraṇasya viṣṇoḥ) tasya bhāvaḥ <pratika>tattvaṃ tasmāt</pratika>
śāstrapramāṇakatvāt <pratika>jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahma viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ</pratika> । atra <quote>‘yato vā’</quote> ityādivākyoktaṃ jagatkāraṇatvarūpaṃ
lakṣaṇaṃ viṣṇorvā devatāntarasya rudrāderapi veti sandehe <quote>‘jagadanekakartṛkaṃ vicitrakāryatvāt’</quote> haro jagatkāraṇaṃ sarvajñatvāt’ ityā-
dyanumānaiḥ pāśupatādyāgamaiśca jagatkāraṇatvāvadhāraṇāt jijñāsyai brahmaṇi śrūyamāṇajagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇānurodhena viṣṇureva
jagatkāraṇaṃ guṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahmeti nirdhāraṇamayuktamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । jagatkāraṇasya janmādivacchāstrapramāṇakatvāt śāstrasya
śrutipurāṇabhāratamūlarāmāyaṇapāñcarātratadanusārismṛtyādirūpasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhajagatkāraṇatvapratipādakatvāt anumānasya pra-
tyanumānādinā dūṣayituṃ śakyasya svātantryeṇādṛṣṭārthaniścāyakatvāsambhavāt pāśupatādīnāṃ ca mohaśāstratvaprasiddheśca jagatkā-
raṇatvaṃ viṣṇoreva lakṣaṇaṃ nānyasya rudrāderdevatāntarasyeti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
﻿<pb n="164"/>
।। athasamanvayādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
prathamādhikaraṇe jijñāsyatayā pratipāditasya parabrahmaṇaśśivasya parijñāne lakṣa-
ṇāpekṣāyāṃ dvitīyādhikaraṇena lakṣaṇaṃ jagajjanmādirūpamabhihitam । tasmin kiṃ
pramāṇamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tṛtīyādhikaraṇena vedāntaśāstrasya tadviṣaye prāmāṇyaṃ tanmū-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>prathamādhikaraṇe śāstrānārambhahetuśaṅkānirāsena tadārambhamupapādya janmādisūtraprabhṛti śāstraṃ
pravartitam । samanvayādhikaraṇe punaḥ siddharūpe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na sambhavatīti
śaṅkāhetunirāsena tatra teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamupapādyate । ataḥ śāstrārambhopapādakatayā janmādyadhika-
raṇātprāgeva samanvayādhikaraṇaṃ niveśamarhati । vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇye hi tannirṇayaphala-
kavedāntavicāropayoginyāyagrathanātmakaṃ śāstramārambhaṇīyaṃ bhavet । na tu teṣāṃ tasminnaprā-
māṇye । tathā ca samanvayādhikaraṇasya śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇānantaryaṃ na yuktamityāśaṅkya sa-
ṅgativiśeṣaprāptaṃ tadānantaryamiti vṛttasaṅkīrtanenopapādayati---<pratika>prathamādhikaraṇa iti</pratika> । prathamādhi-
karaṇe brahma vicāryaṃ pratijñātam । tenāparicchedyatvāt brahma na vicāryamiti śaṅkānirāsārthaṃm
idamitthamiti paricchettumaśakyatve'pi lakṣaṇamukhenetara vyāvṛttatayā paricchettuṃ śakyaṃ taditi
sūcitam । tatastatkiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yena tattathā paricchettuṃ śakyamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ jagajjanmādi tallakṣa-
ṇamiti pradarśya tasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ tadanupapattiśaṅkānirāsenopapāditam । tato jagajjanmādi-
kāraṇe brahmaṇi kiṃ pramāṇamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ śāstraṃ pramāṇamiti pradarśya anumānagamye brahmaṇi
śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkānirāsena tasya tatra prāmāṇyamupapāditam । tathāpi
śabdānāṃ kārya eva vyutpattessiddhārthabodhakatvāsambhavāttasya tatra prāmāṇyaṃ na sambhavatīti
śaṅkā tadanantaramevāvatarati । na hi tataḥ pūrvaṃ brahmaṇi śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ prasaktam । yenaitaccha-
ṅkānirāsārthaṃ samanvayādhikaraṇaṃ tataḥ pūrvaṃ niveśanīyaṃ bhavet । tasmātsamanvayādhikaraṇanirasa-
nīyaśaṅkotthānahetuparyālocanayā tasya śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇānantaryaṃ prāptamityarthaḥ । nanūkta-
śaṅkānirāsātha samanvayādhikaraṇaṃ cettadevānārambhaṇīyam । sarvavidhaśāstrānārambhahetuśaṅkānirā-
sena tadārambhopapādanārthaṃ pravṛtte prathamādhikaraṇa eva sā'pi nirasanīyā । śāstrānārambhahetuśaṅkā-
tvāviśeṣādityāśaṅkānirāso <quote>‘jijñāsyatayā pratipāditasya brahmaṇa’</quote> ityuktyā sūcitaḥ । tatrāyamā-
śayaḥ । <quote>‘athāto brahmajijñāse’</quote>ti<ref>(bra॰-1-1-1)</ref> sūtrasāmarthyena yāsāmanārambhahetuśaṅkānāṃ nirasanasya
sūcanaṃ labhyate tāvannirasanena śāstrārambhopapādanaṃ prathamādhikaraṇārthaḥ । tathā ca yathā tatrāthātaḥ-
śabdasāmarthyena sambandhādhikāryasambhavaśaṅkānirāsasūcanaṃ labhyate, yathā ca <quote>‘brahmajijñāse’</quote>ti samā-
sāntargataṣaṣṭhīsāmarthyena brahmaṇo viṣayatvaprayojanatvāsammavaśaṅkānirasanasūcanaṃ labhyate na tathā ve-
dāntānāṃ siddharūpe brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkānirasanasūcanaṃ tatratyakiñcitpadasāmarthye-
na labhyate । brahmavicārakartavyatā hi tasya sūtrasyārthaḥ । na tu brahmajñānāya vedāntavicārakartavyatā ।
yena tacchaṅkānirasanasūcanamapi labhyeta । <quote>‘ihaupaniṣadī mīmāṃse’</quote>ti prathamādhikaraṇāvatārikā-
bhāṣyamārabhya prāgbhāṣye tatratatrāsya śāstrasya vedāntavicāraśāstratvavyavahārastu vicāryatvena pra-
tijñāte brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ pramāṇyaṃ śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇena samanvayādhikaraṇena ca samartha-
yiṣyata iti tatsāmarthyasiddhamarthaṃ paryālocya । na ca sūtrasāmarthyalabhyatvābhāve'pi sambhāvita-
﻿<pb n="165"/>
latvaṃ ca nirūpitam । yena yadavyabhicāreṇa siddhyati taddhi tasya pramāṇamucyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sarvavidhānārambhahetuśaṅkānirasanaṃ śāstrārambhasamarthanārthe tadupoddhātādhikaraṇa eva yathākathañci-
nniveśanīyamiti niyamaḥ । pūrvamīmāṃsāyāṃ bahubhiḥ prathamādhyāyādhikaraṇairnivartanīyānāṃ vedā-
prāmāṇyaśaṅkāviśeṣāṇāṃ śāstrānārambhahetutvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi tadārambhasamarthanārthe tadīyapratha-
mādhikaraṇe niveśanāpatteḥ । tasmādyathā tatra dharme codanāyāḥ prāmāṇye pratijñāta eva tadaprāmā-
ṇyaśaṅkāssamuttiṣṭhanti tannirasanārthānāmadhikaraṇānāṃ codanāsūtrānantaramārambhaḥ । evamihāpi
brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇye pratijñāta eva tadaprāmāṇyaśaṅkāssamuttiṣṭhantīti śāstrayonitva-
sūtrānantaraṃ samanvayādhikaraṇārambho yuktaḥ iti । <pratika>tanmūlatvaṃ ceti</pratika> । śāstrasya brahmakartṛkatvaṃ cetya-
rthaḥ । idaṃ tṛtīyādhikaraṇānuṣaktavarṇakāntaraprameyatvena vastutaḥ pūrvavṛttāntargatamiti pūrvavṛttama-
dhye saṅkīrtitaṃ na tu samanvayādhikaraṇasaṅgatyapekṣitatvena । evaṃ samanvayādhikaraṇasya prāṅgiveśyatva-
śaṅkāṃ nirasya tasya śāstrayonitvādhikaraṇānantaryamupapādayituṃ tenākṣepikīṃ saṅgatiṃ <pratika>darśayati---
yenetyādinā</pratika> । nanu <quote>‘yena yadavyabhicāreṇa siddhyati taddhi tasya pramāṇamucyata’</quote> iti bhā-
ṣyeṇa kiṃ pradarśyata iti pūrvādhikaraṇasamarthitavedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ na sambhavatītyākṣe-
popayogitayā tārkikābhimataṃ <quote>‘pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇa’</quote>miti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ pradarśyata iti cetkatha-
manena vākyena tatpradarśyate । atiśayitaṃ kāraṇaṃ hi karaṇam । atiśayastvatrendriyaliṅgaśabdādīnāṃ
pramākaraṇānāṃ pramāvyāptatvarūpo vivakṣita ityavyabhicāraśabdena khyāpanāttatpradarśyata iti
cenna । sakalasahakārisamavadhāne pramāvyāptatvasya sarvapramākaraṇasādhāraṇyenāvyāvartakatvāt
tadasamavadhāne indriyādīnāmapi tadasambhavāt । athocyeta avyabhicāraśabdenendriyādigataḥ
pramitavyabhicāro na vivakṣitaḥ kitu pratyakṣānumityādipramārūpakāryagata indriyaliṅgādyavya-
bhicāraḥ । tataśca pratyakṣānumityādigatendriyaliṅgādinirūpitakāryatāvacchedakānāmanubhavatva-
vyāpyatvena ṛoḍīkārādanubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnakāryatāpratiyogikakāraṇatāśrayatve sati
pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇamiti lakṣaṇamiha vivakṣitaṃ paryavasyatīti cenna । cākṣuṣajñānādivṛttyanubhavatva-
vyāpyadharmaviśeṣāvacchinnakāryatāpratiyogikakāraṇatāśrayeṣu ālokādiṣvativyāpteḥ । <quote>‘anubhava-
tvavyāpyadharme’</quote>tyanena anubhavatvasākṣādvyāpyajātivivakṣāyāmanubhavatvasākṣādvyāpyāyāḥ pratya-
kṣatvajāterniṃtyajñānasādhāraṇyāt nendriyādinirūpitakāryatāvacchedakatvaṃ kiṃtu janyapratyakṣa-
tvasyeti tārkiṃkāṇāmabhyupagamena lakṣaṇasyendriyeṣvavyāpteḥ । nanu, janyatvātiriktaviśeṣaṇaghaṭi-
tānubhavatvasākṣādvyāpyajātyavacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāśrayatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna । īśva-
rajñānavyāvṛttyarthamindriyanirūpitajñānaniṣṭhakāryatāvacchedakaśarīre vināśitvasyāpi niveśayi-
tuṃ śakyatvenendriyeṣu tena viśeṣaṇenāvyāptinirāsālābhāt । nanu, nityamātravyāvṛttiprayojakā-
tiriktaviśeṣaṇāghaṭitatvaṃ vivakṣitam । yadyapi janyatvaṃ vināśitvaṃ vā nityamātravyāvṛttaṃ na
bhavati । anityanityābhyāṃ prāgabhāvadhvaṃsābhyāmapi vyāvṛttatvāt । tathāpi prakṛtakāryatāvacche-
dake tadviśeṣaṇamīśvarajñānavyāvartanakaiprayojanamiti noktadoṣānuvṛttiḥ । mātrapadadānānnityā-
nityobhayavyāvṛttiprayojanakalaukikatvaviśeṣaṇaghaṭitapratyakṣatvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāra-
ṇatāśraye viṣaye nātivyāptiriti cenna । evamapi śābdatvarūpoktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭajātyavicchinna-
﻿<pb n="166"/>
kāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāśrayeṣvākāṅkṣājñānādiṣvativyāpteḥ । nanu, vyāpāravattvamapi viśeṣaṇaṃ viva-
kṣitam । na ca padajñānānāṃ padārthasmṛtivadākāṅkṣājñānādīnāṃ kaścidvyāpāro'stīti cenna । tathā sa-
tyanumānapramāṇatvenābhimatasya liṅgaparāmarśasya vyāpārābhāvena tatrāvyāpteḥ । nanu, <quote>‘yadyayaṃ nirvahni-
ssyānnirdhūmassyā’</quote>diti viṣayapariśodhakastarkaḥ tadvyāpāraḥ tasya dhūmābhāvāpādanarūpasya svārasika-
dhūmavattvajñānāpekṣatvena parāmarśajanyatvāditi cenna । virodhiśaṅkānibarnanadvārānumityupayogina-

nimittamiti 2smaryate । ata upāsanārūpajñānaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ vidhīyate । <quote>‘ātmanyevā-
tmānaṃ paśyet’</quote><quote>‘śambhurākāśamadhye dhyeyaḥ’</quote><quote>‘tajjalāniti śānta upāsīte’</quote>ti ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
karaṇakaṃ śābdaṃ brahmajñānaṃ mokṣajanakaṃ tadā tebhyaḥ svataḥ prāptasyaiva tasya mokṣajanakatvopapatte-
rvyarthaṃ tatra vidhikalpanam । na hi svato'samarthaṃ vidhisaṃsparśena sāmarthyaṃ labhate । na ca vihitaṃ
śamādikamitikartavyatāyogāt mokṣajanane samarthaṃ bhavet nānyaditi vācyam । śamādikaṃ hi
jñānāṅgabhāvaṃ bhajaccittaikāgryasampādanadvārā jñānasvarūpaniṣpādakatayā sannipatyopakārakatāṃ
bhajet । taccejjñānaṃ śamādikaṃ vināpyutpadyate kiṃ tadabhāvena tasya vaikalyamāpadyate । tasmā-
cchābdajñānamūlakaṃ yajjñānamatyantacittaikāgryasampā3danayatnasādhyaṃ tadeva jñānaṃ mokṣārthaṃ vidheyama-
bhyupagantavyam । na tu śābdajñānamiti bhāvaḥ । svayaṃ tathābhūtajñānāntaraṃ vidheyaṃ pradarśayan
samādhatte---<pratika>vākyeneti</pratika> । kiṃ tacchābdajñānādvilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatsākṣātkāraṃ janayituṃ śaknuyādi-
ti pṛcchati---<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । dhyānopāsanādiśabdavācyaṃ nirantarasmṛtisantānarūpaṃ jñānaṃ tadi-
tyāha---<pratika>yaditi</pratika> । upāsanārūpameva jñānaṃ vedānteṣu phalāya vidheyamityupāsanāvācipadaviśeṣagha-
ṭitavākyodāharaṇena darśayati---<pratika>tathā ca śrūyata iti ।</pratika><quote>‘ityādi’</quote>ṣvityanena dhyānopāsanādipada
ghaṭitāni phalayuktavākyāni gṛhyante । evaṃ ca phalayuktavākyeṣu śrutānāṃ jñānasāmānyavāci-
padānāṃ chāgapaśunyāyenopāsanārūpajñāne paryavasānamityabhipretya tathābhūtāni vākyāni pṛthagu-
dāharati---<pratika>jñātveti</pratika> । nanūdāhṛteṣu vākyeṣu vidheyajñānasya mokṣajanakatvameva pratīyate
na tu mokṣajanakasākṣātkārajanakatvamityāśaṅkyodāhṛtaśrutīnāmupabṛṃhaṇānusāreṇa sākṣā-
tkāradvārā mokṣajanakatve tātparyaṃ na tu sākṣāditi darśayitumupabṛṃhaṇamudāharati---<pratika>tathā hīti ।
śravaṇeti ।</pratika> śravaṇena jātamupapattyanucintanarūpeṇa mananena sthirīkṛtaṃ ca jñānaṃ śravaṇamananasa-
mpannajñānaṃ tena kāraṇabhūtenāvinābhūtaṃ nididhyāsaṃna dhyānam । svārthe sanpratyayaḥ । <pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।
mokṣajanakasākṣātkārasādhanatvādeva upāsanārūpaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ vidhīyate na tu sākṣānmokṣa-
sādhanatvāditi bhāvaḥ । pūrvaṃ phalayuktānyupāsanāvākyānyudāhṛtāni । idānīṃ guṇayuktavākyā-
nyudāharati---<pratika>ātmanīti ।</pratika> śarīre hṛdayākāśamadhya ityarthaḥ। tadvivaraṇārthaṃ dvitīyodāharaṇam ।
<quote>‘śānta upāsīte’</quote>ti śamaguṇayuktopāsanāvidhiḥ।<quote>‘iti prācīnayogyopāsve’</quote>ti vyāhṛtiśarīraka-
tvādiguṇayuktopāsanāvidhiḥ । tatra <quote>‘prācīnayogye’</quote>ti śiṣyasambodhanam । itiśabdaḥ prāgukta-
prakāraparāmarśī । cakāraḥ pūrvodāhṛtaśrutibhiḥ samuccayārthaḥ । brahmasvarūpaṃ tadupāsanāprakāraṃ
<note>(1) <quote>‘dhyāna’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘pratīyate’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘sampādanaṃ yatnasādhyaṃ’</quote> iti ṅa. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
﻿<pb n="188"/>
<quote>‘prācīnayogyopāsve’</quote>tyādiṣu ca । tathā <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti para’</quote>mityādiṣu brahmasvarū-
popāsanātatphalādikamupadiśyate । anyathā satyatvādiviśiṣṭabrahmaṇā saha kathaṃ
sakalakāmāvāptiḥ phalaṃ tādṛśabrahmasākṣātkaraṇaṃ ca siddha‍yati । tasmāt <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna-
manantaṃ brahma’</quote><quote>‘ānando brahma’</quote><quote>‘ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma’</quote><quote>‘satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam ।
śāntisamṛddhamamṛtam’</quote><quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam । ūrdhvaretaṃ virūpā-
kṣa’</quote>miti satyajñānānantarūpaṃ svātmārāmamupaśāntasakalopadravakalaṅkaṃ sakalamaṅgalā-
tmakaṃ paramaśaktyavinābhūtatayā śava/?/larūpatvena kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ virūpākṣaṃ trilocanaṃ
brahma upakramāditātparyaliṅgairni1rūpyate । <quote>‘yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām’</quote><quote>‘iti prācīna-
yogyopāsve’</quote>ti jñānāvinābhūtaṃ tadupāsanaṃ ca vidhīyate । <quote>‘sarvānkāmā’</quote>nityādiṣu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tatphalaviśeṣaṃ ca vivecayantīṃ śrutimudāharati---<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti para’</quote>mityupakramya kiṃ
tadbrahma kathaṃ tadvedanīyaṃ tadvedanena prāpyaṃ phalaṃ kīdṛśamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatri/?/tayavivecanārthaṛksa-
dbhāvaṃ <quote>‘tadeṣābhyukte’</quote>ti pratijñāya sā ṛgudāhṛtā । <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma । yo veda nihitaṃ
guhāyāṃ parame vyoman । so'śnute sarvānkāmānsaha । brahmaṇā vipaściteti’</quote> । atra prathamapādena
brahmasvarūpamuktam । dvitīyapādenopāsanāprakāraḥ । tṛtīyapādena niratiśayabrahmānandarūpaṃ phalamu-
ktam । mānuṣādihiraṇyagarbhānteṣu yāvanto bhogāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sahatve yāvānānandastāvānni-
ratiśayabrahmānando hi tena lakṣaṇayā prakāśyate । caturthapādena brahmavi2dyayā tatsāmyaprāptiru-
cyate । tatra <quote>‘brahmaṇā sahe’</quote>tyanena brahma yāvantaṃ svātmānandamanubhavati tāvantaṃ tadīyamānandaṃ
mukto'pyanubhavatīti muktasya brahmaṇā paramasāmyaṃ prakāśyate । nanu, vedānteṣūpāsanāvidhayasta-
tratatra pratīyantā nāma tathāpi teṣāṃ tātparyaliṅgasadbhāvāt brahmaṇyeva prāmāṇyaṃ nopāsanāvidhi-
ṣvityāśaṅkya teṣvapi tātparyaliṅgasadbhāvaṃ darśayati---<pratika>anyatheti</pratika> । yadyupāsanā vidhīyeran tado-
ktaphalāvāptistadupayogibrahmasākṣātkārodayaśca na syāt । tadabhāve sarvairvedāntairmahātātparyeṇa
brahmaṇāḥ pratipādanamapi viphalaṃ syāt । tatprāptyupāyopadeśenaiva tatsāphalyasyopapādanīyatvāt।
tasmātsvādhyāyavidhyāpāditaṃ brahmaparavākyānāṃ puruṣārthaparyavasāyitvaṃ tatprāptyupāyavidhānaṃ vinā
na sambhavatītyupapattirūpaṃ tātparyaliṅgamupāsanāvidhiṣvapyastīti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca vedāntānāṃ
brahmaṇi vidhau ca tātparyasattvādubhayatrāpi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhamityupasaṃharan brahmaparavākyānyupā-
sanāparavākyāni ca vivicyodāharati---<pratika>tasmātsatyaṃ jñānamityādinā</pratika> । udāhṛteṣu brahmapara-
vākyeṣu kaiścitpadaissiddhaṃ rūpaṃ saṅgṛhṇāti---<pratika>satyajñānetyādinā</pratika> । idaṃ padāntaropāttadharmaviśe-
ṣaṇānāmapyupalakṣaṇam । <pratika>upakrameti</pratika> । upakramādīni tātparyaliṅgāni yeṣāṃ tathābhūtairvedāntairve-
dāntavākyairnirūpyate uktarūpaṃ brahma pratipādyata ityarthaḥ । <pratika>jñānāvinābhūtamiti</pratika> । śravaṇama-
nanasampannajñānāvinābhūtamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘sarvānkāmā’</quote>nityādinā vedāntānāmudāhṛteṣūpāsanāvi-
dhiṣu tātparyaliṅgasadbhāvaṃ pūrvoktadṛḍhīkaraṇāya smārayitvā tātparyaliṅgasadbhāvāt brahmapareṣu
vedānteṣu upāsanāvidhirapyupapanna ityupasaṃharan upāsanāvidhau yāvaduktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭamadhi-
<note>(1) <quote>‘niścīyate’</quote> iti kha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘brahmavidyayā muktasya tatsāmya’</quote> iti gha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
﻿<pb n="189"/>
sakalakāmāvāptirbrahmaṇā sahopāsakānāmavagamyate । ato niṣkāmanijadharmopeto
niṣiddhakāmyakarmarahito yathāśrutismṛticoditakarmānuṣṭhānasampannacittaśuddhiśśa-
mādyanugṛhītaparamaśivabhaktibhāvita eva mumukṣuśśrutisārebhyaśśivābhidheyaṃ paraṃ
brahma viditvā tadupāsīteti jñānopāsanāvidhirupapannaḥ । atra śivopapadagrahaṇaṃ
virūpākṣasya brahmaṇaḥ paramaviśuddhimaṅgalabhājanatvānmumukṣūṇāmupāsainakaviṣayatva-
dyotanārtham । tathā'tharvaśikhāyāṃ <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṅkarassarvamanyatparitya-
jye’</quote>ti śrūyate śivaśabdavācyasya vastuna eva dhyeyatvamiti । anyathā kathaṃ saṃsā-
ranivṛttiḥ । nirastasamastadoṣakalaṅkaniratiśayamaṅgalādhāratvaṃ hi śivatvam । yadvi-
1jñānānmokṣarūpaṃ phalamucyate । <quote>‘yadā carmavadākāśaṃ veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ । tadā
śivamavijñāya duḥkhasyānto bhaviṣyati ।’</quote>iti । <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṅkarassarva-
manyatparityajye’</quote>ti śivavyatiriktasya mumukṣūṇāṃ dhyeyatvaṃ parisaṅkhyāyate । ataśśi-
va eva paraṃ brahma mokṣakāmairdhyātavyo jñātavyaśceti । atastātparyaliṅgasamanvayena
brahmaparā vedāntāstadupāsanāparāścetyavirodhaḥ ।। iti samanvayādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।

kāriṇaṃ darśayati---<pratika>ata ityādinā</pratika> । jñānopāsanāvidhirityasya pūrvavajjñānāvinābhūtopāsa-
nāvidhirityarthaḥ । sarvatropasanasya śravaṇamananasampannajñānāvinābhāvoktirupāsanāvidhyapekṣita-
jñānotpattyarthe śravaṇe manane ca svataḥprāptisambhavena tasya vidhyanapekṣāsūcanārthā । <quote>‘śivābhidheyaṃ
paraṃ brahme’</quote>ti bhāṣyakṛtā śivopapadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam । evameva prāyaḥ pūrvottaragrantheṣvapi kriyate ।
tasya tātparyaṃ <quote>‘svapadāni ca varṇyanta’</quote> iti bhāṣyalakṣaṇānusāreṇa svayameva darśayati---<pratika>atreti</pratika> ।
saṃsāramūlamalocchedarūpā paramaviśuddhiḥ satyasaṅkalpatvādimaṅgalyaguṇavattvaṃ ca mumukṣuṇā prepsitaṃ
tadubhayamapi śivaśabdārtha iti prāgvāyusaṃhitāvacanodāharaṇena darśitam । atastatkratunyāyena
mumukṣośśiva evopāsya iti dyotanārthaṃ sarvatra śivopapadagrahaṇaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ । mumukṣossa-
kaletaradevatāparityāgena śiva evopāsya ityatra śrutimudāharati---<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । tathābhūtasya śiva-
syopāsanāṃ vinā muktirna sambhavatītyāha---<pratika>anyatheti</pratika> । atra śrutimudāharati---<pratika>yadeti</pratika> । yadi-
tyarthaḥ । ataḥ śivopāsanāṃ vinā muktyasambhavāt anyatra mumukṣuprepsitasya śivatvasya nitya-
siddhasyābhāvācca sakaletaraparityāgena mumukṣubhiśśiva eva dhyeya iti pratipādayantyatharvaśikhā-
śrutirupapannārthetyāha---<pratika>śiva eka iti</pratika> । ato mokṣakāmaiḥ śiva eva dhyātavyaḥ sākṣātkartavya-
śceti yuktamityāha---<pratika>ataśśiva eveti</pratika> । paramaprakṛtamupasaṃharati---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । ।। ।।</p>

<lg><l>vyutpattiṃ siddhavastuṣvapi kalayasi cedastu vidyāvidhānairāśrāntatvādaśeṣaśrutiśikharagirāṃ laiṅgikaṃ brahma vācyam ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ pañcaprayājakram iva vidhibhiḥ kāṅkṣitatvādavāryaṃ tātparyaṃ tatra...viṣayaphalatadānetṛrūpe śrutīnām ।। 9 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti samanvayādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="018"/>
nāntaraṃ nāpekṣata iti viśeṣaṇayorananvayāttathāmūtaṃ tadbhinnatvamastīti pravṛttinimittasya brahmasā-
dhāraṇyaṃ labhyate । yadyudgātrapacchedavataḥ śyenayāgasyāṅgavikalatayā vairivipattiphalāparyavasāne tatpa-
ryavasānapūrvakabalavadaniṣṭajananārthamapacchedaprāyaścittarūpaprayogāntarāpekṣatvena tadanapekṣabhinnatayā
dharmatvaprasaṅgo doṣaḥ syāt । tadā yasminsāṅge'nuṣṭhita iti viśeṣaṇīyam । yadyevamapi kratvāśri-
to yo guṇo vairivipattiphalakastasya sāṅgatve'pi tadāśrayasyāṅgavaikalye <quote>‘guṇācca na phalaṃ siddha‍ye-
dviguṇaḥ kratvapāśrayā’</quote>diti nyāyataḥ phalaparyavasānābhāvena tatparyavasānapūrvakabalavadaniṣṭajana-
nārthaṃ prayogāntarāpekṣatayā tadanapekṣabhinnatvena dharmatvaprasaṅgo doṣaḥ syāt । tadā sāṅgami-
tyasya phalajananārthamapekṣitena sarveṇa sahitatvamartho'stu । evamapi śyenajanyaduritasya prāya-
ścittādinā kṣapaṇe sati balavadaniṣṭajananārthaṃ prayogāntarāpekṣāsattvāt tasya dharmatvaprasaṅgo
doṣa iti cenna । phalānyatajjanyāpūrvanāśakābhāve satītyapi viśeṣaṇopādānāt । evaṃ ca
phalajananāpekṣitasarvasahite yasminnanuṣṭhite phalānyatajjanyāpūrvanāśakābhāve ca sati
balavadaniṣṭajananārthaṃ prayogāntaraṃ nāpekṣyate tadbalavadaniṣṭānubandhi, na tu phalajananāpekṣita-
sarvasahite yasminnanuṣṭhite phalānyatajjanyāpūrvanāśakābhāve ca satyapi balavadaniṣṭajananārthaṃ prayo-
gāntaramapekṣyate tadbhinnaṃ balavadaniṣṭānubandhi । yena brahmāpi balavadaniṣṭānubandhīti pravṛttini-
mittasya tatsādhāraṇyaṃ na syāt । yadvā balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvaṃ śreyaso viśeṣaṇaṃ na tu tatsādhanasyā
tacca yatphaloddeśo'nuṣṭhāne balavadaniṣṭaprayojako na bhavati tattvaṃ tathābhūtaśreyo'laukikasādhana-
tvam । brahmasādhāraṇamidaṃ dharmaśabdasya siddhasādhyasādhāraṇyaṃ karmamīmāṃsakānāmapi sammatameva । ya-
dāhuḥ---<quote>‘dravyakriyāguṇādīnāṃ dharmatvaṃ sthāpayiṣyate । teṣāmaindriyakatve'pi na tādrūpyeṇa dharmate’</quote>ti ।
tasmādbrahmasādhāraṇo dharmaśabda iti cenmaivam । <quote>‘athāto dharmajijñāse’</quote> ti <ref>(jai॰ 1.1.1.)</ref> dharmavicāra-
pratijñānantaraṃ ko dharma iti vicāryaparadharmaśabdārthajijñāsāyāṃ pravṛtte <quote>‘codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharma’</quote> iti
<ref>(jai॰ 1.1.2)</ref> sūtre ya: <quote>‘cuda preraṇa’</quote>iti dhātuniṣpannacodanāśabdoktapravartakavākyaprameyo'rthaḥ sa dharma
iti tadarthakathanena yasya śreyassādhanatvaṃ vidhyekagamyaṃ tasyaiva dharmaśabdārthatvāvagamāt । na ca śabda-
tadupajīvipramāṇetarapramāṇajanyapramityaviṣayakārthakatvarūpālaukikatvāpekṣayā pravartakatvarūpaśa-
bdaviśeṣaṇādhikasya vidhyekagamyatvasya gurutvādalaukikatvameva laghu dharmaśabdapravṛttinimitte
niveśanīyamiti vācyam । vṛddhavyavahāreṇa hi śabdārtho niśceyo na tamanādṛtya lāghava-
manusaṃrtu yuktam । <quote>‘na hyadhikaṃ ca vivarṇaṃ ca jaiminiḥ stobhaśabdatvā’</quote> dityanādivṛddhavyavahāra-
prasiddhastobhaśabdārthakathane lāghavādṛgakṣarādhikatvameva tatpravṛttinimittaṃ na tu vivarṇatvamapi
niveśyamiti vaktuṃ śakyam । na ca <quote>‘kṛṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ sanātana’</quote>miti vidhyaspṛṣṭe siddharūpe vāsu-
deve'pi dharmaśabdasya vyavahāro dṛṣṭa iti vācyam । <quote>‘praṇamreṣu mahīpeṣu prasādo mūrtimānaya’</quote>mityasya
mūrtimattvarūpaprasiddhaprasādavailakṣaṇyaviśiṣṭaprasādatvāropa iva <quote>‘dharmo vigrahavānrāma’</quote> ityasya vigra-
havattvarūpaprasiddhadharmavailakṣaṇyaviśiṣṭadharmatvāropa iva ca sanātanatvarūpaprasiddhadharmavailakṣaṇyaviśi-
ṣṭadharmatvārope tātparyeṇopapannasyārthavādarūpapaurāṇikavacanasya <quote>‘codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ’</quote> <ref>(jai॰ 1.
1.2.)</ref> iti vicāryaparadharmaśabdārthanirṇayaikaprayojanakasūtravacchabdaśaktiniyāmakatvābhāvāt । a-
stu vā yathākathañciddharmaśabdasyālaukikaśreyaḥsādhanamātravācitvena brahmasādhāraṇyaṃ, tathāpi pratya-
kṣautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ vicāryasya dharmasya pratyakṣādiviṣayatvanirākaraṇapūrvakamupadeśaikagamyatvavya-
﻿<pb n="190"/>
<head>।। sūtrārthacandrikāyāmatha samanvayādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। tattu samanvayāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> pūrvasūtreṇa brahmaṇaḥ śāstraikagamyatvabhyadhāyi । tadasādhu śāstrasya anyaparatvāt । ityākṣipya idaṃ
sūtramavatārayati---<pratika>tattu samanvayāditi</pratika> । tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ vyāvartayati । <pratika>tat</pratika>=sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti jagadutpattisthitilayakā-
raṇaṃ brahma । <pratika>samanvayāt</pratika>=(sarvavedāntavākyānāṃ) tātparyeṇaiva brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakatvena samanugamāt । <pratika>śāstraikagamyameva
bhavati</pratika> iti sūtrārthaḥ ।। atra sarve vedāntā viṣayaḥ । te kiṃ karmaśeṣakartrādiparāḥ uta nityasiddhabrahmamaparā veti sandehe aheyā-
nupādeyasiddhabrahmaparatve niṣprayojanatvasāpekṣatvaprasaṅgāt karmaśeṣakartrādiparā eveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, vedāntavākyā-
nāṃ bhinnaprakaraṇasthānāṃ vidhividhurāṇāṃ <quote>‘tatvamasyā’</quote>dīnāṃ bahulamupalabdheḥ anarthanivṛttirūpaprayojanasya saṃbhavāt rūpādihīnasya
brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntarāgamyatvena tatpratipādakavedāntānāṃ sāpekṣatvāsaṃbhavāt samyak tātparyavattvena vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi sambandhācca
upakramādiṣaḍvivatātparyaliṅgaiḥ sarve vedāntāḥ nityasiddhabrahmaparā eva na kartrādiparā iti । iti prathamavarṇakam ।। athavā pūrvasū-
treṇa brahmaṇo vedāntavedyatvaṃ samarthitam । vidhidvārā aṅgīkurvata ekadeśino mataṃ prasaṃgādākṣipyedaṃ sūtraṃ pravṛttam । tatra ve
dāntā upāsanāvidhiviṣayatā brahma samarpayanti uta sākṣāt iti sandehe pravṛttyādiliṅgābhāvena siddhe vastuni śaktigrahāsa-
mbhavāt pravṛttinivṛttiparasyaiva śāstratvena siddhaparatve tattvāyogācca upāsanāvidhiśeṣatayaiva vedāntāḥ brahma samarpayanti na sā-
kṣāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, pravṛttinivṛttī eva liṅgamiti nirbandhābhāvāt <quote>‘putraste jāta’</quote> ityādilaukikavākyeṣu
harṣādiliṅgenāpi śaktigrahasaṃbhavāt hitaśāsanāt vedāntānāṃ śāstratvopapatteḥ tātparyavattvena brahmaṇi samanvayācca sākṣā-
deva vedāntā brahma samarpayantīti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, prathamādhikaraṇe jijñāsyatayā pratipāditasya dbitīyādhikaraṇena abhihitajagajjanmādirūpalakṣaṇasya tṛtīyā-
dhikaraṇena nirūpitaśāstrapramāṇakatvasya parabrahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇaviṣaye vedāntaśāstrasya kathaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā teṣāṃ brahmasādhakatva-
mityākāṅkṣāyāmidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<pratika>tattu samanvayāditi</pratika> । tat prakṛtaṃ brahma <pratika>samanvayāt</pratika>=upakramādiliṅgāvagamitatātpa-
ryaliṅagasaṃbandhāt । <pratika>vedāntāḥ bodhayantī</pratika>tyadhyāhāraḥ । bodhayantyeva ityarthaḥ । asya sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni viṣayaḥ । vedāḥ
ntavākyānāṃ brahmabodhakatvaṃ yuktaṃ vā na vā iti sandehe sarvaśabdānāṃ kāryārthabodhakatayā siddhavastubodhanāsaṃbhavāt jagata-
kāryaviśeṣatvāt kartṛviśeṣasya brahmaṇo'numānādapi siddheśca aprāptaviṣayāṇāṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyābhāvāt vedā-
ntavākyānāṃ vidhiparatvena brahmaparatvāsaṃbhavāt ubhayaparatve vākyabhedāpatteśca vedāntavākyānāṃ na brahmabodhakatvaṃ yuktamiti
pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>“putraste jāta”</quote> ityādiṣu siddhārtheṣvapi vākyeṣu sambandhagrahaṇadarśanāt siddhārthe'pi vyutpattisaṃbhavāt tatra śa-
bdasya prāmāṇyasattvāt anumānenāsya jagataḥ ekakartṛkatvasādhanāyogāt vyāptibalena karmavaśyatvādīnāṃ kartari prāpteśca brahmaṇaḥ
anumānāgamyatvāt vedāntavākyānāṃ tātparyaliṅgasamanvayena brahmabodhanasamarthatvācca <quote>‘samidho yatī’</quote> tyādivākyānāṃ pañcapra-
yājavidhāyakatvatadanuṣṭhānakamavidhāyakatvarūpobhayaparatvavat vedāntavākyānāmapi upāsanārūpabrahmajñānabodhakatvabrahmapramāpakatvaṃ-
yorabhyupagamasya nyāyyatvācca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmabodhakatvaṃ yuktameveti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, yadyapi pramāṇāntarāgocaraṃ brahma tathāpi brahmaṇaḥ pravṛttinivṛttirūpatvābhāvena prayojanarūpatvābhāvāt śā-
strapramāṇakatvaṃ na sambhavatītyāśaṅkāyāmidamārabhyate---<pratika>tattu samanvayāditi</pratika> । tuśabdaḥ prasaktāmāśaṅkā nivartayati । <pratika>tat</pratika>=
śāstrapramāṇakatvam । <pratika>samanvayāt</pratika>=(paramapuruṣārthatayānvayassamanvayaḥ ।) paramapuruṣārthabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇo'bhidheyatayānvayāt ।
<pratika>brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavatyeva</pratika> । ityadhyāhāraḥ । atra sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni viṣayaḥ । atra vedāntavākyānāṃ pravṛttinivṛttirūpapra-
yojanavidhuratvāt dhyānāvadhiśeṣatve'pi dhyeyaviśeṣasvarūpasamarpaṇamātraparyavasānāt svātantrye'pi bālāturādyupacchandanavākya-
vat jñānamātreṇaiva puruṣārthaparyantatāsiddheśca pariniṣpannavastusatyatāgocaratvābhāvāt brahmaṇaḥ śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti
pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu,adhyāpanādyupapattaye puruṣārthaparyavasānasyāpekṣitatvāt prekṣāvadadhikāryasya śāstrasyārthasadbhāvābhāvaniścaye
sati puruṣārthaparyavasānānupapatteḥ tadupapattyarthaṃ pravartakavākyānāmiva vedāntavākyānāmapyarthasadbhāve prāmāṇyamaṅgīkāryamevetyataḥ <quote>‘yato
vā imāni bhūtāni jāyanta’</quote> ityādi vākyaṃ nikhilajagadekakāraṇaṃ nirastanikhiladoṣagandhaṃ sārvajñasatyasaṃkalpatvādyanantakalyā-
ṇaguṇākaramanavadhikātiśayānandaṃ brahmāstīti bodhayatīti siddham । ataḥ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrapramāṇakatve na kāpyanupapattiriti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, tattu samanvayāt</pratika> । tuśabda evārthe । <pratika>tattu</pratika>=viṣṇvākhyaṃ brahmaiva । <pratika>samanvayāt</pratika>=samīcīnopakra-
māditātparyaliṅgāt । <pratika>śāstrayoni</pratika> । na rudrādiḥ । ityarthaḥ । atra jagatkāraṇatvena śāstraikagamyatvaṃ viṣṇoranyasya veti saṃdehe
śāstrato'pi kvacitkvacitpaśupatihiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatvapratīteḥ rudrāderapi kāraṇatvena śāstrakaigamyatvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
samyagvicāritādupakramāditātparyaliṅgarūpādanvayāt tato'nyathā pratīterajñānamūlatvācca viṣṇvākhyaṃ brahmaiva kāraṇatayā śāstra-
gamyamiti siddhāntaḥ ।। iti <pratika>hālāsyanāthakṛtau</pratika> sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ samanvayādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</p>
<head>।। catussūtrī samāptā ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="191"/>
atha īkṣatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
uktasya brahmalakṣaṇasya pradhāne'tivyāptimāśaṅkayāha---
।। sū ।। īkṣaternāśabdam ।। 5 ।।
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ । <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyaṃ tadaikṣata
bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote> tyādi ।iha pūrvabhāvitayā sakalasya prapañcasya kāraṇatvena śrūyamāṇaṃ
saditi vastu brahma pradhānaṃ veti sandehaḥ। pradhānasyaiva jagatkāraṇatvaṃ yuktam । <quote>‘ajā-
mekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpā’</quote>miti śrutyantare śravaṇāt ।
atra hi bahuprajājanakatvaṃ lohitādivarṇānumitarajassattvatamorūpāyāssāṅkhyaprakṛ-
teravagamyate । tadānuguṇyenātā/?/pi sacchabdavācyaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ pradhānameva । rajassatva-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇe sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ tātparyaliṅgavattvena brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhavadupanyastam ।
tadanupapannam । sadvidyāyāḥ pradhānaparatvādityevaṃrūpā samanvayādhikaraṇenākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ pratha-
mādhyāyagatasarvādhikaraṇasādhāraṇāgrimādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣopanyāsena sphuṭobhaviṣyatīti tāmapa-
hāya tatphalabhūtāṃ pramāṇamukhena lakṣaṇapradarśanānantaraṃ tatparīkṣā kartavyetyavasaralakṣaṇāmativyā-
ptamidaṃ lakṣaṇamanupapannamityākṣepikīṃ vā lakṣaṇanirūpaṇena saṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatāra-
<pratika>yati---uktasyeti ।। sū ।। īkṣaternāśabdam ।। 5 ।।</pratika> sadvidyaivāsyādhikaraṇasya viṣayaḥ । na
sarvāṇi kāraṇavākyāni । ātmapuruṣaśivaśambhvādipadayuktakāraṇavākyānāṃ sattāsāmānyavā-
cisatpadayuktāyāḥ sadvidyāyā iva pūrvapakṣe pradhānaparatvakalpakābhāvāt । na ca sadvidyāyāḥ
pradhānaparatvameva tatkalpakam । kalpabhedena pradhānaparameśvarayorubhayorapi jagatkāraṇatvasambhavena
kāraṇaparātmapuruṣaśivaśambhvādi śrutyanyathābhāvakalpanāyāṃ bījābhāvādityabhipretya viśeṣaya-
ti---<pratika>chāndogya iti</pratika> । īkṣaṇasya mukhyātvāsambhavasambhavau saṃśayabījamityabhipretya saṃśayaṃ
darśayati---<pratika>iheti । lohitādivarṇānumiteti</pratika> । anumitaśabdo'tra lakṣitavacanaḥ । sukhaduḥ-
khamohātmakatvonneyasattvarajastamorūpasya jagatastathābhūtenaiva kāraṇena bhāvyamityudāhṛtaśruteḥ
prakṛtiparatvasiddhyanukūlanyāyo'pyanena viśeṣaṇena sūcitaḥ । <pratika>sāṅkhyaprakṛteriti</pratika> । sāṅkhyo-
ktayuktikalpitaprakārāyāḥ prakṛterityarthaḥ । <pratika>tadānuguṇyeneti</pratika> । sāṅkhyāḥ khalvacetanā prakṛti-
ścetanādhiṣṭhitā jagatsṛṣṭyādivyāpāre svayameva pravartate saiva ca bandhamokṣayorheturiti vadantaḥ svā-
numānasiddhāṃ prakṛtiṃ kāraṇavākyānyanuvadantīti kalpayanti । tadānuguṇyaṃ sadvidyāyāṃ dṛśya-
te । tatra mṛtpiṇḍādyacetanadṛṣṭāntāstāvadacetanakāraṇatvakalpanānuguṇāḥ । <quote>‘tattejau'sṛjate’</quote>ti
sṛṣṭau svātantryapratipādanaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ tadacetanaṃ kāraṇamiti kalpanānuguṇam । cetanācetanaśa-
kunibandhanadṛṣṭāntoktipūrvakaṃ <quote>‘prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya mana’</quote> ityetat <quote>‘tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vi-
mokṣya’</quote> ityetacca tadevācetanaṃ puruṣasya bandhamokṣayorheturiti kalpanānuguṇam । <quote>‘annena somya
śuṅgene’</quote> tyādikamanumānasiddhakāraṇānuvādakatvakalpanānuguṇam । nanu, cetanānadhiṣṭhitasyācetana-
sya svayameva kvacidapi pravṛttirna sambhavati । acetanasya pañcakṛtyānuguṇasaṅkalpavattvarūpaṃ tatkartṛ-
tvamapi na sambhavati । tathā ca kuto lakṣaṇasyātivyāptirityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>rajassatveti</pratika> । ayaṃ
bhāvaḥ। laghussatvaguṇaḥ prakāśakāryaḥ। calo <pratika>rajoguṇaḥ</pratika> pravartanakāryaḥ। gurustamoguṇaḥ niyamanakāryaḥ।
﻿<pb n="192"/>
yogādasya kriyājñānaśaktisambandho'pi yujyate । yena jagatkāraṇatvasiddhiḥ । a-
cetanasya pradhānasya jagadākārapariṇāmo yukto na cetanasya parameśvarasya kūṭasthasya ।
kāraṇavikṛtirūpatvātpariṇāmasya । tato nyāyataḥ śrutitaśca pradhānameva jagatkāraṇaṃ
satpadavācyamiti prāpte brūmaḥ । aśabdamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ na jagatkāraṇaṃ sacchabda-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tatra sattvamakriyatvātprakāśākhyajñānavṛttirūpakāryajanane svayamevāpravartamānaṃ calo rajoguṇastatra
pravartayati । tacca guruṇā tamasā niyamyamānaṃ bhojakādṛṣṭānusāreṇa kasyacidevārthasya prakāśe
pravartayati।na sarvatra । svayaṃ ca rajoguṇaścalasvabhāvo'pi tamasā niyamyamānaḥ kvacideva vyāpri-
yate । evaṃ satvarajovṛttitayā triguṇātmakaprakṛtidharmayoreva jñātṛtvakartṛtvayorvivekāgraheṇa cetana-
dharmatvavyavahāraḥ । tathā ca svābhāvikajñātṛtvakartṛtvayuktāyāḥ prakṛteḥ pañcakṛtyānukūlasaṅkalpa-
vattvarūpaṃ nimittatvaṃ jagadākārapariṇāmakriyāvattvarūpamupādānatvaṃ copapadyata ityastyeva tatra
lakṣaṇasyātivyāptiḥ । na cācetanaṃ svayaṃ kriyāśaktimadapi cetanādhiṣṭhitameva pravartata iti
niyamaḥ । vatsavivṛddhyarthamūdhassthapayasaḥ svayameva kṣaraṇadarśanena tadvatprakṛterapi puruṣasya bhogā-
pavargārthaṃ tatra kārye pravṛttyupapatteḥ। yadyapi guṇasāmyāvasthārūpāyāṃ prakṛtāvantaḥkāraṇarūpe tadvi-
kāra iva vyakteṃ jñānakriye na staḥ । tathāpyavyaktena śaktyātmanā rūpeṇa tasyāmapi te sta e-
veti । acetanasyeti । prakṛtiviśiṣṭasya parameśvarasyopādānatvasamarthane ca svataḥpariṇāminyāḥ
prakṛterupādānatvaṃ dvārāntarāpekṣatayā śīghraṃ buddhimārohatīti jagadupādānatayā pratipādyamānaṃ
satpadavācyaṃ vastu prakṛtirevetyaṅgīkartuṃ yuktamiti । bhāvaḥ । <pratika>tato nyāyataḥ śrutitaśceti</pratika> । su-
khaduḥkhamohātmakatvena prakṛteḥ kāryānurūpyaṃ mṛtpiṇḍādyacetanadṛṣṭāntānuguṇyaṃ kāryaliṅgakānu-
mānapradarśanānuguṇyaṃ parameśvarasya pariṇāmitvāsambhavaśca nyāyaḥ । śruti<quote>‘rajāmekā’</quote> mityādiḥ ।
nanu, <quote>‘camasavadaviśeṣāt’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1.4.8 sū॰)</ref> racanānupapatteśca nānumānam । <ref>(bra॰2.2.
1sū॰)</ref> na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt । <ref>(bra॰2.1.4sū॰)</ref> adṛśyatvādi-
guṇako dharmokteḥ <ref>(bra॰1.2.21 sū॰)</ref> prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt । <ref>(bra॰ 1.
4. 24 sū॰)</ref> ityadhikaraṇeṣūdāhṛtaśrutinyāyāvalambapūrvapakṣāḥ parihariṣyante । śrutāvanumā-
nopanyāsasya gatiḥ samanvayādhikaraṇe pradarśitaiva । kimālambano'tra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । ucyate ।
<quote>‘phalamata upapatteḥ । <ref>(bra॰ 3.2.38 sū॰)</ref> puruṣārtho'taśśabdāditi bādarāyaṇa’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3.
4. 1 sū॰)</ref> ityādyadhikaraṇavatsiddhāntopakramaṃ pūrvapakṣamadhyamidamadhikaraṇaṃ na tu samanvayā-
dhikaraṇavat unnītapūrvapakṣam । ato'sminnadhikaraṇe siddhāntayuktivyākhyānārambha eva
kartavye śiṣyabuddhyanugrahārthamadhikaraṇāntarapūrvapakṣaśrutinyāyaviśeṣān kaṃcitprakṛtyadhikaraṇa-
nyāyopamardakaśaṅkāviśeṣaṃ cāvalambya pūrvapakṣo'pi kaścitpradarśitaḥ । etadadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣastu
dvitīyasūtrāvatārikāyāṃ pradarśayiṣyate । sautramaśabdapadaṃ pakṣabhūtapradhānanirdeśakaṃ kurvan sadvi-
dyāyāḥ tadviṣayatvaṃ vadataḥ pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ kathaṃ tadaśabdamityāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>aśabdamānumā-
nikamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘aśabda’</quote>mityanena śabdarahitatvaṃ nocyate । kiṃ tu śabdetarānumānapramāṇavattva-
m । tatra nañaḥ paryudāsārthatvasya matvarthīyācpratyayāntatvasya cāṅgīkārāditi bhāvaḥ । sautrasya
naño niṣedhyamadhyāhṛtya sādhyaṃ darśayati---<pratika>na jagatkāraṇaṃ satpadavācyaṃ vastviti । ‘api tu</pratika>
﻿<pb n="193"/>
vācyaṃ vastu । api tu brahmaiva cetanam । rikṣatiśravaṇāt<quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāye-
ye’</quote>ti । na hyacetane pradhāne cetanadharma rikṣatismambhavati । yaduktaṃ<quote>‘bahvīṃ prajāṃ janaya-
ntī’</quote>miti śravaṇāt sāṅkhyaprakṛteratra jagatkāraṇatva’miti tadasaṅgatam । <quote>‘camasava-
daviśeṣā’</quote>diti (bra॰. 1. 4. 8) sūtre hi parameśvarakāraṇikāyā eva prakṛterbahu-
prajājanakatvamityupapādayiṣyāmaḥ । <quote>‘rajassatvarūpatayā kriyājñānaśaktisambandhaḥ
pradhānasye’</quote>ti yaduktaṃ tadayuktam।triguṇātmikāyāḥ prakṛtestamaḥpārthakyena rajassatva
yogābhāvāt । na ca ta1masyabhibhūte rajassattvayorudreke jñānakriyāsambandhaḥ
pradhānasyeti vācyam । satvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā prakṛtirityaṅgīkārāt ।<quote>‘kūṭa-

satpadavācyatattvaniṣṭhasya mokṣa upadiśyate<quote>‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye'tha
sampatsya’</quote> iti । tasmātpradhānaṃ jīvaśca nātra satpadaviṣayaḥ । pradhānakāraṇavādināṃ sā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vapi devatāpadaviṣayasyācetanaparadevatāpadaprāyapāṭhasya nāsiddhiḥ । tathāpi śrutiliṅgavi-
rodhiprāyapāṭhamātramasādhakamiti na doṣaḥ । uttarasūtramavatārayitumāśaṅkate---<pratika>nanviti ।
ātmaśabdavācyatvamiti</pratika> । ātmaśabdapratipādyatvaṃ jīvasya mukhyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ tathāpi
prākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ pratyātmatvaṃ jīvasya na sambhavatīti cenmā sambhavāt । na hi tadatra pratipādyate । tathā
hi---na tāva <quote>‘daitadātmyamidaṃ sarva’</quote>mityanena tatpratipādyate । tasya taddhitayatpratyayārthavattvāya sa-
rvamidaṃ prakṛtasadrūpātmasambandhītyetadarthaparatvāt । nāpi sa ātmetyanena tatpratipādyate । tatra
<quote>‘sarvasye’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇāśravaṇāt prācīnavākyagatasya sarvapadasyānvayitvāt । anyānvayino'pya-
pekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ kathañcidanvayassyāt । <quote>‘sahastraṃ deyamaparimitaṃ deya’</quote>mityatra sahastrasyevāparimi-
tavākyena cāparimitaśabdoktabahutvavadātmaśabdokteḥ । cetanaḥ pratiyogyapekṣaḥ cetanācetana-
sādhāraṇena sacchabdenopaktamasya viśeṣaparyavasānākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘sa ātme’</quote>tyuktyaiva cetanarūpaviśe-
ṣaparyavasānalābhāt । nanvevaṃ <quote>‘sa ātme’</quote>tyukte sa jagatkāraṇabhūta ātmā ka ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘ta-
ttvamasī’</quote>tyupasaṃhārāt saṃbodhyaśvetaketureva sa ātmeti paryavasyet । tathā ca bahubhavanasaṅkalpa-
rūpamīkṣaṇaṃ tejasstraṣṭṭatvādikaṃ ca tadanubhavabādhitaṃ tena boddha‍umaśakyamiti cenna । sargādyakāla-
vṛttāntasyānekajanmavyavahitasya vismaraṇayogyatayā bādhāvatārābhāvāt । <quote>‘bahūni me vyatī-
tāni janmāni tava cārjuna । tānyahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha paraṃtape’</quote>ti gītokta-
rītyā śiṣyasmṛtyagocarasyāpi tadva‍ṛttāntasya sarvajñena guruṇā buddhyopadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt ।। sū ।।
<pratika>tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt</pratika> ।। 7 ।। tasmānna pradhānaṃ jīvaśceti pradhānaparatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇārtha-
yuktyantarapareṇaivānena sūtreṇa ātmaśrutyādyavirodhamūlajīvaparatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamapi labhyata
ityabhipretya jīvaparatvaśaṅkāsūtrāvatārikāyāṃ darśitā । na tu sūtrasya tādarthyamabhipretyeti sūca-
yituṃ jīvaparatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇasyānvācayasiddhatvaṃ cakāreṇa pradarśitam । etatsūtranivartyā pra-
dhānaparatvaśaṅkā tvevaṃ draṣṭavyā । īkṣativadātmaśabdo'pi gauṇo'stu । ‘mamātmā bhadraseno'yaṃ
<quote>‘mama prāṇa idaṃ dhanaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘mama cakṣurayaṃ putra’</quote>ityādiṣvātmādiśabdānāṃ gauṇaprayogadarśanāt । jī-
vānāṃ sakalapuruṣārthanirvāhakasya pradhānasya tānprati tathā vyapadeśayogyatvā<quote>‘tsanmūlāssomye-
māḥ sarvāḥ prajā’</quote> iti tatratyavākyānusāre<quote>‘ṇaitadātmyamidaṃ sarva’</quote>mityatra sarvaśabdasya jīvasā-
mastyaparatvopapatteriti । nanu prakṛtijñānānmokṣaṃ sāṅkhyā manyante । yadāhuḥ---<quote>‘raṅgasya darśa-
yitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nuttāt । puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ ।। pra-
kṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati । yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puru-
ṣasya ।’</quote> iti । ata āha---<pratika>sāṅkhyānāmapīti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । sūtre<quote>‘tanniṣṭhasye’</quote>tyanena tadve-
danamātraṃ nocyate kiṃtu svātmatayā tadupāsanam । kutaḥ । śrutau<quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>ti śvetaketuṃ prati
﻿<pb n="198"/>
ṅkhyānāmapi tanniṣṭhasya mokṣo nābhimataḥ tyājyatvāt । na ca jīvaniṣṭhasya । niṣedhāt
<quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṃkarassarvamanyatparityajye’</quote>ti ।।
punarapi spaṣṭayati hetuṃ pradhānanirākaraṇe---
sū. ।। heyatvāvacanācca ।। 8 ।।
yadi pradhānamevātra vivakṣitaṃ tadā'sya heyatvamevocyeta <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>ti
mokṣahetutayā dhyayatvamucyate । tato na pradhānamiti yuktam ।

sata ātmatāmupadiśya<quote>‘ācāryavānpuruṣo vede’</quote>ti tadvedanopāyamuktvā <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva cira’</quote>
mityādinā tadvedanavataḥ puruṣasya tāvāneva vilambaḥ yāvatprārabdhakarmādhīnaśarīrānna vimokṣya-
te । atha tadvimokṣānantaraṃ brahma sampadyata i<quote>‘tyasmāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasampadye’</quote>
ti vākyāntarāvagataśarīravimokṣapūrvakabrahmasampattirūpaphalaśravaṇāt tasya ca vedanasya <quote>‘yenā-
śrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātaṃ taddhāsya vijajñā’</quote>vityupakramopasaṃhārānusāreṇa vi-
jñātarūpatvāvagamāt śravaṇamananānantaraṃ paṭhitasya vijñānasya <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo
mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ
vidita’</quote> mityādiśrutyantarānusāreṇopāsanarūpatvāvagamāt । yadyapi sāṅkhyamate saṃsāridaśāyāṃ
buddha‍yākāramāpadya saṃsarantyāṃ prakṛtāvasaṅgodāsīnasākṣirūpasya puruṣasya svātmatayā vedanaṃ bhrā-
ntirūpamasti । <quote>‘pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhantyavyaktacintakā’</quote> iti vacanoktaṃ sāvadhiphalaṃ tadu-
pāsanamapyasti । tathāpi mokṣaphalaṃ svātmatayā tadupāsanaṃ nāsti pratyuta saṃsārātprakṛtivivikta-
tvenāsaṃsārisvabhāvasvātmadarśanameva tanmate mokṣajanakam । yadāhuḥ---tasmānna badhyate nāpi
mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit । saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ ।। rūpaissapta-
bhireva tu badhnātyātmānamātmanā prakṛtiḥ । saiva ca puruṣārthaṃ prati vimocayatyekarūpeṇa ।। evaṃ
tatvābhyāsānnāsmi na me nāhamityapariśeṣam । aviparyayādviśuddhaṃ kevalamutpadyate jñānam ।।
tena nivṛttaprasavāmarthavaśātsaptarūpavinivṛttām । prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ sva-
sthaḥ ।।’ iti । tasmātsāṅkhyamate'pi nāsti prakṛtiniṣṭhasya mokṣa iti । etena<quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>tyā-
di<quote>‘rmamātmā bhadrasena’</quote>ityādivadupacārāvalambano'rthavādassāṃsārikaphalaviśeṣāya tādātmyadṛ-
ṣṭividhirveti śaṅkāpi nirastā । tadvedanasya mokṣarūpaphalasaṅkīrtanāt । nanu tarhi <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>
ti jagatkāraṇasya jī1vasyopāsanaṃ mokṣahetutvenopadiśyatāmityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>na ceti</pratika> । niṣedhā-
t muktyarthaṃ śivātiriktasyopātvaniṣedhādityarthaḥ । tanniṣedhaparamatharvaśikhāvākyamudāhara-
ti---<pratika>śiva eka iti</pratika> । uttarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>punarapīti</pratika> । <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>ti na tattvadṛṣṭyā
sata ātmatvopadeśaḥ । kiṃ tu sthūlārundhatīnyāyena । tataśca pradhānasya satpadavācyatve'pi
sata ātmatvopadeśo na virudhyata ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇena pūrvahetuspaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ hetumāhetyarthaḥ ।
<pratika>spaṣṭayatīti</pratika> । spaṣṭaṃ tatkarotiṇyantātpacādyacpratyayaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। heyatvāvacanācca ।। 8 ।।
yadīti</pratika> । yadīha guruḥ sthūlārundhatīnyāyamanvasariṣyattadā mokṣayitavyaḥ śvetaketustanni-

kiṃ ca pradhānapakṣe virodha ityāha---
sū. ।। 1pratijñāvirodhāt ।। 9 ।।
itaśca na pradhānaṃ satpadavācyam । ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāvirodhāt ।
satpadavācyatattvajñānena tatkāryatayā sakalacetanācetanavastuvijñānaṃ bhavatīti
<quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyādinā pratijñāyate । pradhānakāraṇatve viruddhametat । cetanasya
pradhānakāraṇatvāyogāt । pradhāne kāraṇe jñāte jāṅya/?/vikārāspadaṃ tatkāryamidaṃ sarvaṃ
jñāyate । yathā mṛdi jñātāyāṃ tatkāryaṃ ghaṭādikam ।।

dvacanamasti । tadātmatva evopadeśaparisamāptidarśanāt । tasmānnātra sthūlārundhatīnyāyānusara-
ṇamastīti bhāvaḥ । pūrvasūtre tacchabdaḥ samasto'pyapekṣāvaśādihānuṣaktaṣṣaṣṭhyanto vipariṇamya-
te । tataśca tasya sadātmatvasya heyatvāvacanāditi sūtrārthaḥ । cakāraḥ pūrvasūtreṇaikīkaraṇārthaḥ ।
na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśātpradhānaṃ na satpadavācyam । kiṃ tu taddheyatvāvacanasamuccitādi-
ti tadarthaḥ । uttarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>kiṃceti</pratika> । pūrvasūtroktahetuvatsūtrāntaroktahetuspaṣṭīkaraṇārtho
na bhavatyayaṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ । kiṃ tu pradhānapakṣanirākaraṇe svatantraheturityabhiprāyaḥ ।। sū ।।
<pratika>pratijñāvirodhāt ।। 9 ।। sarvavijñāneti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyādipratijñā tāvatsa-
rvavijñānaviṣayā । śrutādipadānāmarthasaṅkoce kāraṇābhāvāt । <quote>‘kasminnu bhagavo vijñāne sarva-
midaṃ vijñāta’</quote>mityādiśrutyantaraikārthyācceti bhāvaḥ । nanu, brahmapakṣa iva pradhānapakṣe'pi kāryakā-
raṇābhedāt pradhānavijñānena tatkāryamahadahaṅkārādisarvavijñānapratijñopapadyate । mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭā-
ntānurodhena tasyāssatkāryaviṣayatvādityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>satpadavācyeti । sakaleti ।</pratika> nanu,
pratijñāyāḥ sakalacetanācetanavastuvijñānaviṣayatvaṃ kuto'vasīyate । satkāryasarvavastuvijñānavi-
ṣayatvaṃ khalu mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭāntānurodhāt avasīyate । na ca <quote>‘sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ prajā’</quote>iti-
tatratyavākye prajāśabdoditānāṃ cetanānāmapi satkāryatvamuktamiti satkāryasarvavijñānaviṣayaiva
pratijñā sakalacetanācetanavastuvijñānaviṣayā paryavasyediti vācyam । tatra prajāśabdasya sā-
ṅkhyamate cetanādhiṣṭhitadehādikāryaviṣayatvopapatteḥ । anyathā sanmūlavākyoktasya jīvakāraṇa-
tvasyaiva hetūkaraṇasambhave tattadavagamādhīnādhigamasya pratijñāvirodhasya hetūkaraṇāyogāditi
cet । ucyate । sarvavijñānapratijñā tāvadasaṅkocanyāyānurodhena sakalavastuvijñānaviṣayā
pratīyate । sā dṛṣṭāntabalāttatkāryasarvavijñānaviṣayā bhavantyapi sūkṣmasakalacidacidvastuviśiṣṭa-
brahmarūpe śrutyantarapratipanne kāraṇe satpadavācye'ṅgīkriyamāṇe sarvamapi cidacidātmakaṃ vastu
sthūlarūpaviśiṣṭatayā satkāryakoṭāvantarbhavatīti asaṅkocena yathā pratītā tathaivopapadyate ।
sāṅkṣyābhimate svatantrapradhānarūpe kāraṇe tadvācye'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tu cetanavargasya tatkāryatvābhā-
vādasaṅkucitasarvavastuviṣayatvena pratītā sā virudhyata iti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । sūtrāntaramavatā-
rayitumāśaṅkate---<pratika>pradhāne kāraṇa iti</pratika> । yadyapi jaḍamātraviṣayatvena pratijñā saṅkocyata iti

pṛthaksūtratvena lekha/?/naṃ dṛśyate ।</note>

tadārambho hyatra kiṃpuruṣārthaḥ । puruṣārtho hi nirupādhikapremadveṣāspadayoḥ sukha-
duḥkhayoḥ prāptiratyantanivṛttirvā । kaścehādhikārī । yasyārthitvādayo dharmāḥ ।

vasthāpanāt । <quote>‘dadhnā juhotyaruṇayā krīṇātī’</quote>tyādibhirvidhibhirhomakaraṇādibhāvena vihitānāṃ
dadhyāruṇyādīnāṃ vidhigamyadharmatvenaiva rūpeṇa yathā vicāryatā na lokasiddhena dadhitvādinā
rūpeṇa, nāpi vaiśeṣikādivicāritenāvayavyārabdhatvatatsaṅghātatvadharmibhinnatvatadabhinnatvādinā,
tathā brahmaṇo'pi <quote>‘brahmaṇe'bhijite caru’</quote> mityādaudevatābhāvena vidhisparśo'stīti vidhigamyena vā
<quote>‘eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣata’</quote> ityādyupaniṣadgamyena vā alaukika-
śreyassādhanatvātmanā dharmatvenaiva rūpeṇa dharmavicāraśāstre vicāryatā siddha‍yet । na tu <quote>‘athāto brahma-
jijñāse’</quote>ti pratijñāpūrvakametacchāstravicāryeṇopaniṣannikurumbagamyena trividhaparicchedarāhityāna-
ntamaṅgalyaguṇākaratvaniratiśayānandātmakaśreyorūpatvādinā । tasmātpratijñāsādhāraṇyādbrahmavi-
cāro vṛtto'vagamyata ityetanna saṅgacchate । syādetat । dharmatvena dharme vicāryatvapratijñā na bhava-
ti kiṃ tu vedārthatvena । athātaḥśabdoktayoḥ vedādhyayanānantaryatadarthavivakṣāhetvorvedārtha evā-
nvayasāmañjasyāt । vedārthatvaṃ ca dadhyādigate homakaraṇatvādāviva brahmagate devatātva iva ca
tadgate trividhaparicchedarāhityādāvapyaviśiṣṭam । evaṃ copakramānusāreṇa dvitīyasūtragataṃ coda-
nāpadaṃ mānāntaraprāptibādharahitārthakavākyaparaṃ syāditi cenmaivam । dharmaśabdasya vedārthamātrapa-
ratve śyenayāgāderapi vedārthatayā lakṣyatvena saṅgrāhyatvamastīti tadvyāvṛttyarthasya balavadaniṣṭānanu-
bandhitvaparasyārthapadasya vaiyarthyāpatteḥ । vastuto dharmasya vedārthatvena tadvicāre vedādhyayanānantarya-
tadarthavivakṣāhetvoranvayānupapattyabhāvācceti dik । tasmāddharmavicāraśāstreṇa brahmavicārasya si-
ddha‍yabhāvāt tadarthamidaṃ śāstramārambhaṇīyamiti । nanu,tarhi brahmaṇaḥ svarūpapramāṇasādhanaphalairvicā-
rārthaṃ<quote>‘janmādyasya yata’</quote>ityādyeva śāstramārabhyatāṃ kimādyasūtreṇetyāśaṅkya tadvyāvartyaṃ śaṅkācatuṣṭayaṃ
pradarśayati---<pratika>tadārambha ityādinā</pratika> । śāstrasyaivānubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ tadārambhasyopakramāparaparyāya-
sya prathamaṃpravṛttirūpasyopacāreṇa vyapadiśya <quote>‘tadārambha’</quote> iti viśeṣyanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । <pratika>kiṃpuruṣā-
rtha iti</pratika> । kiṃprayojanaka ityarthaḥ । nanu, vicāraśāstrasya vicāryanirṇayaḥ prayojanamiti prasiddhame-
va । kimatra praṣṭavyamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>puruṣārtho hīti</pratika> । mukhyapuruṣārthabhūtasukhaduḥkhanivṛttyanya-
taraparyavasāyitvenaiva vicāryanirṇayasya prayojanatvamupapādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ । samāsopāttayora-
pi sukhaduḥkhayorbuddha‍yā niṣkṛṣṭayoryathāsaṅkyaṃ prāpteratyantanivṛtteścānvayaḥ । duḥkhanivṛtterātyanti-
katvamiha svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakālatvarūpaṃ na vivakṣitam । bheṣajādinā vyādhyā-
diduḥkhanivṛtteḥ kālāntare duḥkhāsamānakālatvāt । kiṃtu kiñcijjātīyaduḥkhanivṛtteḥ katipaya-
kālāvacchedena yattajjātīyaduḥkhāsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tātkālikopaśamarūpaṃ tatsādhāraṇyaṃ vivakṣi-
tam । tataśca sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaduḥkhanivṛttyoranyataradasya prayojanamuta saṃsāranivṛttirūpāpavargakā-
labhāvitvenābhimatam । nādyaḥ । tatra pramāṇābhāvāt । na dvitīyaḥ । anādeḥ saṃsārasya nivarta-
yitumaśakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>kaśceti</pratika> । <quote>‘arthī samartho vidvān śāstrairaparyudasto vaidikakarmaṇya-
dhikārī’</quote>tyarthitvādayo guṇāstāvadvācyāḥ । na tāvadevātrādhikāriviśeṣaṇaṃ kiṃtu nityānityavastu-
vivekādikamapītyabhimatam । tanna saṅgacchate । akṣayyādivākyaiḥ karmaphalānāmapi nityatvāvagatyā

ataḥ ko'tra virodha ityāśaṅkyāha---
<sutra>*sū. ।। svāpyayāt ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
itaśca na pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyam । <quote>‘svapnāntaṃ me somya vijānīhi yatrai-
tatpuruṣassvapitināma satā somya tadā sampanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati tasmādenaṃ
svapitītyācakṣate’</quote>iti jīvasya cetanasya satā sampannasya svāpyayavacanāt । apyayaḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śaṅkāsamakālameva nirnimittaḥ saṅkoco na yukta iti doṣaḥ sphurati tathāpi sa eva doṣaḥ
sūtrāntarāvatārikāvyājena sphoritaḥ । ata eva naitasyāśśaṅkāyā nivartanamagre kriyate ।
<quote>‘itaśca na pradhāna’</quote>miti pūrvahetudārḍhyaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā svāpyayo hetvantaratvena vyākhyāyate---।। <pratika>sū
।। svāpyayāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> sadvidyāprakaraṇe svapitināmanirvacanaṃ śrūyate । tasyārthaḥ । ‘svapnā-
ntaṃ suṣuptaṃ me mattaḥ pratipādayato vijānīhīti śabdasya ityuvāceti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ । idaṃ
śiṣyāvadhānārthamuddālakasya vacanam । tadīyasuṣuptipratipādanaprakāro <quote>‘yatraita’</quote>dityādiḥ । yatra
yadā puruṣaḥ puruṣasya etatsvapitināma svapitītyeva tannāma bhavati । yadavasthāpannaṃ lokaḥ svapi-
tītyācakṣata iti yāvat । tadā satā <quote>‘sadeva somye’</quote>ti prakṛtena sampannassaṅgato bhavati ।
tasyā eva sampatteḥ sati layarūpatvabodhanārthaṃ svapitināmanirvacanānuguṇaṃ vivaraṇaṃ <quote>‘svamapīto
bhavati । apipūrva itirlayārthaḥ । puruṣaḥ svaśarīrake brahmaṇi līno bhavatītyarthaḥ । apītessaka-
rmakatvāddvitīyā । tasmādeva svāpyayarūpapravṛttinimittādenaṃ svapitītyācakṣate laukikā iti ।
yadyapi svapidhātorniṣpannaḥ svapiti śabdo na tu svaśabdopapadādapīteḥ tathāpyaśanāyādinirva-
canavadarthavādarūpamidaṃ nirvacanam । atra‘svamapīto bhavatī’</quote>ti svāpyayavacanātpradhānaṃ satpada-
vācyaṃ na bhavatīti hetusādhyayojanāṃ darśayati---<pratika>itaścetyādinā । svāpyayavacanādityante
na</pratika> । nanu<quote>‘iṇ gatā’</quote>viti dhātorutpanno'pyetiśabdaḥ prāptimātramācaṣṭe । na tu layamityāśa-
ṅkyāha---<pratika>apyaya iti</pratika> । apipūrva itirlayārthaḥ । <quote>‘prabhavāpyayā’</quote>vityutpattilayayoḥ prayogadarśa-
nāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu, pradhāne satpadavācye'pi svāpyayavacanamupapadyate । na ca tasya svaśabda-
vācyatvāyogaḥ । svaśabdasyātmīyaparatvopapatteḥ । na cākāraṇe pradhāne jīvasya layo na sa-
mbhavatīti vācyam । brahmaṇyapi tadasambhavataulyāt । na hyanāderjīvasya brahma kāraṇaṃ na vā
jīvasya ghaṭādivallayassambhavati । tasya hi laya ucyamāno jīvatvāvasthāprahāṇena kāraṇā-
vasthāpattirūpo vācyaḥ । na ca jīvassuṣuptau jīvatvamapahāya brahmabhāvamāpadyata iti yujyate ।
prabodhe jīvāntarotpattervaktavyatvena sa eva tu <quote>‘karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhya’</quote>ityadhikaraṇavirodha-
prasaṅgāt । syādetat । jñānādivṛttiprasarānukūlacicchaktivikāsāvasthā jīvasya kāryāvasthā ।
tadavasthāprahāṇena cicchaktisaṅkocāvasthāpanne svasvarūpe'vasthānaṃ tasya layaḥ । sa tu suṣuptau
sambhavatīti। evaṃ <quote>‘tarhi svamapīto bhavatī’</quote>tyatra svaśabdaḥ cicchaktisaṅkocarūpasūkṣmāvasthāpannajī-
vasvarūpamātrapara iti svaśabdasacchabdayoraikārthyatyāgātsvaśabdasya brahmaparatvamiva pradhānaparatvama-
pinānupapannam । athocyeta svapadasyāvaśyaṃ satpadenaikārthyaṃ vaktavyam । <quote>‘satā somya tadā sampanno
bhavati sati sampadya na vidu’</quote>rityupakramopasaṃhāramadhyagatasya svāpyayavākyasya tadanapekṣitārthā-<pb n="020"/>
kimasya viṣayaḥ, yatprasiddhamanatiprasiddhaṃ ca sandehajālasamārūḍhaṃ vartate ।
kasyānantaramasyārambhaḥ, yasya niyataprayojakatayā pūrvabhāvitvamavagamyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tadvivekāsambhavāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>kimasyeti</pratika> । yatsāmānyataḥ prasiddhaṃ viśiṣyāprasiddhaṃ ca sa-
ndehayogyaṃ bhavati sa eva viṣayaḥ । tataśca yadi<quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote>tyādiśrutyanusāreṇāhamityanubhūya-
māno jīva eva brahmeti mataṃ tadātiprasiddhatvānna tasya viṣayatvam । yadi <quote>‘yanmanasā na ma-
nuta’</quote> ityādiśrutyanusāreṇa vāṅganasātītaṃbrahmeti mataṃ tadā atyantāprasiddhatvānna tasya viṣaya-
tvamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>kasyānantaramiti</pratika> । na vedādhyayanānantaramasyaitacchāstrakartavyavicārasyā-
rambhaḥ । tadanantarakālasya karmavicārāvaruddhatvāt । nāpi karmavicārasyānantaraṃ, tasyātropayogā-
nirūpaṇāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu, anubandhacatuṣṭayākṣepaprastāve prayojanādhikāriviṣayeṣvanupapannatvā-
bhiprāyagarbhatayā pṛṣṭeṣvanena prayojanena viṣayeṇa vāsya śāstrasya kassambandha iti sambandhe
praṣṭavye pūrvavṛttaviśeṣapraśno'tra na saṅgacchate । kiṃ ca pūrvavṛttamadhikāriviśeṣaṇamityagre bhāṣya-
kāra eva vakṣyati <quote>‘yasya sampattirihādhikāriviśeṣaṇatayā brahmavicārasya sādhanaṃ tatpūrvabhā-
vīti vijñāyata’</quote>iti । ihāpi sa evārthaḥ saṅgṛhya darśitaḥ <quote>‘yasya niyataprayojakatayā pūrvabhā-
vitvamavagamyata’</quote> iti । tataścādhikāriviśeṣaṇaviśeṣapraśno'yamadhikāripraśna evāntargata iti na
pṛthakkartavyaḥ । api ca viṣayaprayojanādimacchāstrārambhe pūrvavṛttaviśeṣo nāpekṣitaḥ । ata
eva <quote>‘atha yogānuśāsanam’</quote> <quote>‘atha śabdānuśāsanaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘pramāṇaprameye’</quote> tyādiśāstrārambheṣu pūrvavṛttapra-
darśanaṃ na dṛśyate । yatrāpi<quote>‘athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāma’</quote> iti kaṇādasūtre śiṣyapraśnaḥ pūrva-
vṛtto'thaśabdena pradarśyata iti vyākhyātaṃ tatrāpi tannirarthakameva । śiṣyapraśnena pravṛtte'pi
śāstre viṣayaprayojanādyabhāve śrotṝṇāṃ pravṛttyasambhavāt । tatsadbhāve tamantareṇa pravṛtte'pi śā-
stre teṣāṃ pravṛttisambhavācca । dharmavicāraśāstre vedādhyayanaṃ pūrvavṛttaṃ pradarśitamapekṣitaṃ dṛṣṭamiti ce-
tkiṃ tataḥ । na hi kvacitpūrvavṛttamapekṣitaṃ dṛṣṭamityetāvanmātreṇa sārvatrikaniyatāpekṣārahitasya
tasyābhāvenātra śāstrānārambhaśaṅkā pravartate । tasmātpūrvavṛttapraśno'yamasaṅgata iti cet । ucyate ।
śāstrasya viṣayaprayojanābhyāṃ sambandho na pṛthagvyutpādyaḥ । asyāyaṃ viṣaya ityukte tena pratipā-
dyapratipādakabhāvassambandha iti, asyedaṃ prayojanamityukte tena kāryakāraṇabhāvassambandha iti ca
tata evāvagantuṃ śakyatvāt । tattatsambandhānupapattiśaṅkā tu viṣayatvaprayojanatvānupapattiśaṅkārū-
paiva paryavasyati । na ca viṣaya evānanyalabhyatvākāro viṣayatvarūpa āripsitaśāstreṇa śakya-
pratipādanatvaṃ sambandha ityavāntarabhedaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । śakyapratipādanatvaviśiṣṭasyaivānanyalabhyatva-
sya viṣayatvarūpatvāt । ata eva<quote>‘yatprasiddhamanatiprasiddhaṃ ca sandehayogyaṃ tadviṣaya’</quote>iti prāguktam ।
atra hi sāmānyataḥ prasiddha‍yā śakyapratipādanatvaṃ viśiṣyāprasiddha‍yānanyalabhyatvaṃ copa-
nīyate । ata eva ca<quote>‘ananyatrabhāvo viṣayaśabdārtha’</quote>iti vadanto <quote>‘yathā matsyānāmudakaṃ
viṣaya’</quote>iti ca tatrodāharantaśśābdikā a1pi<quote>‘chandobrāhmaṇāni ca tadviṣayāṇī’</quote> tyādi
<ref>(pā॰ 3.2.66.)</ref> sūtragataviṣayaśabdasya<quote>‘gurau vasatī’</quote>tyādiviṣayasaptamyāśca tamevārthaṃ manyante ।
vyupasargāt <quote>‘ṣiñ bandhana’</quote> iti dhātoḥ <quote>‘erac’</quote> <ref>(pā॰. 3.3.58. sū.)</ref> ityajanto viṣaya-
śabdaḥ । sāmānyataḥ prasiddho'rtho viśeṣeṇāvasīyate pratipādyatayā badhyata iti karmaṇi
<note>(1) <quote>‘api yastatra bhavati anyatra ca na bhavati tameva chandobrāhmaṇāni’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘saptamyāścārthaṃ
manyante’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<sutra>।। * ।। athāto brahmajijñāsā ।। 1 ।। iti ।</sutra>
idamekamadhikaraṇam । viṣayasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntanirṇayasaṅgatīnāmādhāratvamihā-

vyutpattyā yastatra bhavatyanyatra na bhavati tathābhūte śāstrapratipādye niviśate udakādiṣu tu
viśeṣeṇāvasīyate svayamevānyena vā badhyate tasminnityadhikaraṇavyutpattyā yatra kiñcidbhavatyanyatra
na bhavati tathābhūta'dhikaraṇe niviśata iti viśeṣaḥ । sopasargasya dhātorananyatrabhāvo'rtha ityu-
bhayatrāpi samānameva । tathā ca pūrvavṛttena kāraṇena saha śāstrasampādanīyasya vicārasya yaḥ
kāryatayā sambandhaḥ sa evānubandhacatuṣṭayāntargataḥ saṃbandhaḥ । pūrvavṛttasyādhikāriviśeṣaṇatve'pi
yattadānīṃtanānuṣṭhānasampādyamadhikāriviśeṣaṇaṃ tasya gobalīvardanyāyena pṛthakkaraṇaṃ yuktam । ya-
dyapi tatpūrvavṛttaṃ sārvatrikaṃ na bhavati । tathāpi yatrāsti tatraiva śāstre'nubandhacatuṣṭayamanyatrānuba-
ndhatrayamastu, kiṃ hīyate । tarhi pūrvavṛttābhāvena śāstrārambhākṣepaḥ kathamiti cet ittham—karmavi-
cāraṃ pūrvavṛttamapekṣyāsya śāstrasyārambha iti siddhāntino'bhimatam । tannopapadyate । karmavicārasyā-
tropayogānirūpaṇāt । na tāvaccittaśuddhāvupayogaḥ । janmāntarānuṣṭhitakarmabhirapi tatsambhavena ta-
darthamaihikakarmavicārānapekṣaṇāt । nāpi nityānityavastuviveke । tannityatvapratipādakavākye-
bhyaḥ tadanityatvapratipādakavākyānāṃ balavattvanirṇayopayoginyāyasya tatrānirūpaṇāt । ata-
ssiddhāntyabhimatabrahmaviṣayatvādyākṣepavattadabhimatapūrvavṛttasambandhākṣepa iti na kācidasaṅgatiḥ ।
etacchaṅkācatuṣṭayaparihārārthamādyasūtraṃ pravṛttamityavatārayati—<pratika>śrotṛjanetyādinā</pratika> । yadyapi jai-
minīyena dharmavicāreṇa gatārthaśaṅkāpyavyavahitaviṣayāsambhavaśaṅkaiva tathāpisā sūtrakṛtā na nirā-
kartavyeti prāgeva bhāṣyakṛtā nirākṛtā ।।*।। <pratika>athāto brahmajijñāsā</pratika> ।। 1 ।। atraikaikaśaṅkāva-
lambanapūvarpakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ kimadhikaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ vivakṣitamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha—<pratika>idamekamiti</pratika> ।
idaṃ śāstraṃ nārambhaṇīyamityanārambhapūrvapakṣasyaikārthāvalambanatvādanārambhahetūnāṃ bāhulye'pyaikā-
dhikaraṇyaṃ yuktam । yathā śākhāntarāmnātakarmabhedapūrvapakṣasyaikārthāvalambanatvāt pūrvapakṣahetūnāṃ
<quote>‘nāmarūpadharmaviśeṣapunaruktinindāśaktisamāptivacanaprāyaścittānyārthadarśanāt śākhāntare karma-
bhedaḥsyā’</quote> diti(jai॰) sūtradarśitānāṃ nāmarūpādīnāṃ bhinnatve'pyaikādhikaraṇyamiti bhāvaḥ । yadyapi
viṣayaprayojanābhāvahetubhyāmevātrādhikaraṇaṃ bhāṣye pradarśayiṣyate । tathāpyathaśabdasūcitasya pūrvavṛ-
ttaviśeṣasyātaḥśabdasūcitasya nityānityavivekādisambhavasya ca tadubhayavyākhyānenopapādita-
tvāt <quote>‘brahmajijñāse’</quote>tyatra karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyā saṅgṛhītayorbrahmaṇo viṣayatvaprayojanatvayorbahūpapāda-
nīyasadbhāvācca tayoreva hetvostatra pūrvapakṣadaśāyāmupanyāse'pi sambandhādhikāryasambhavahetvorapi
pūrvapakṣe niveśanena pūrṇamadhikaraṇaśarīramūhanīyam । nanu <quote>‘ādhāro'dhikaraṇa’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 1.4.45. sū॰)</ref>
miti prasiddham । idaṃ keṣāmādhāra ityadhikaraṇaśabdenocyata ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatpravṛttinimitto-
panyāsenādhikaraṇāpekṣitānavayavān darśayati—<pratika>viṣayeti</pratika> । anavadhāraṇenāpi kvacitpūrvapakṣa-
ssambhavati । siddhāntastu nirṇayāvasāna eveti viśeṣamabhipretya <quote>‘siddhāntanirṇaye’</quote>tyuktam ।
kecitprayojanena sahādhikaraṇasya pañcāvayavānvadanti । kecitsaṅgatyā saha । tadubha-

dhikaraṇatvam । atrāthaśabdo'yamānantaryārthaḥ । na tu <quote>‘atha yogānuśāsana’</quote>mityādā-

yasaṅgrahārthaṃ vā nirṇīyate nitarāṃ prāpyata iti vyutpattyā nirṇayaśabdena prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam ।

paśyatāmatrāpi tatheti śaṅkā syāditi tadvāraṇā3ya cāthaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । prasiddhatarārtha-
grahaṇe sambhavatyaprasiddhārthagrahaṇaṃ na kāryamiti nyāyataḥ siddhamarthāntaragrahaṇāyogaṃ tatra tatrānupapa-
ttyupanyāsena dṛḍhīkaroti—<pratika>na tvityādinā</pratika> । nanu, jijñāsāśabdasya <quote>‘dharmaṃ jñātumicchet’</quote> <quote>‘tadvi-
jijñāsasva so'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavya’</quote> ityādilaukikavaidikaprayogaprācuryāt śaktyā

ntareṇāpyucyata ityaṃvagantuṃ śakyaṃ <quote>‘bravīmī’/?/</quote>ti śabdenāpi pratipādayantīti । pratipādayantyeva ।

tyādayo hi ślokāḥ paṭhyante । tathā ca tādṛśeṣuślekeṣu<quote>‘vacmī’</quote>tyevamādivākyamānarthakyaparihārā-

yanāṅgaṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ । kiṃ cāṣṭavarṣatvādītyādiśabdena traivarṇikānāṃ nityakalparūpāṇyaṣṭa-
tvaikādaśavarṣatvadvādaśavarṣatvāni gṛhyante । tatkīrtanamupanayanasya nityatvakhyāpanena tatpradhāna-

tyasaṃyogavirodhasyāgrimaviśeṣaṇena sphorayiṣyamāṇasyopapādanāya । evamupanayanasyādhyayanāṅga-
tve sati vihitādhyayanasyādhyāpanavidhiprayuktatvāsambhavātsvavidhiprayuktamevādhyavanamiti siddha-

yanasya nityatvāt । <quote>‘ata ūrdhvaṃ trayo'pyete yathākālamasaṃskṛtāḥ । sāvitrīpatitā vrātyā
bhavantyāryavigarhitāḥ ।। yo'nadhītya dvijo vedānanyatra kurute śramam । sa jīvanneva śūdratva-
māśu gacchati sānvayaḥ ।।’</quote> iti tadabhāve doṣavarṇanāt । adhyāpanavidhistu kāmya ityaṅgīkriyate ।

rūpa’</quote> mityādyarthavicāreṣūpayogaḥ । kramapramāṇānāṃ viyadādisṛṣṭikramavicāre arcirādiparvakrama-
vicāre copayogaḥ । śrutiliṅgādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyavyavasthāpane
prathamādhyāyakartavye'dhyāyāntarakartavyeṣvapi śrutyarthavicāreṣu sarveṣūpayogaḥ । nanu, samanvaya-
sūtre vedāntānāmupakramopasaṃhārāditātparyaliṅgairbrahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñāsyate । tataśca tadananta-

anyathopakramādibhiḥ prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñāya śrutiliṅgādibhistatpratiṣṭhāpane pūrvāparavirodhāpatteḥ ।
ato'smiñśāstre upakramādīni tātparyaliṅgānyeva jñātavyāni na śrutiliṅgānīti cenna । upakra-

kramo brahmaviṣaya ityādyavadhārayituṃ śakyate । evaṃ tarhyavaśyāpekṣitaiḥ śrutiliṅgādibhireva vedā-
ntānāṃ vrahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñātavyaṃ syāditi cenna । śrutyādiṣvapi prakaraṇasyopakramādi-
tātparyaliṅgādhīnātmalābhatvāt । sākāṅkṣapradhānavacanaṃ hi prakaraṇam । bahūnāmekasandarbhaprati-
pannānāmarthānāṃ madhye kasyacitprādhānyamanyasyāprādhānyaṃ ca tātparyaliṅgasadasadbhāvādavaseyam । kiṃ
ca yeṣu vedāntavākyeṣu brahmatadanyaśrutiliṅgādisamāveśaḥ teṣāṃ khalvanyaparatvāśaṅkānirākaraṇa-
pūrvakaṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyamupapādanīyam । taccānyaviṣaya śrutiliṅgādijātāt vrahmaviṣaya śrutili-
ṅgādikasya balavattvenopapādanīyam । balavattvaṃ ca prāyaḥ tātparyaliṅgairevopapādayiṣyate । atastā-
tparyaliṅgānyatrāpekṣitānyeva । na caivamupakramādīnāṃ śrutiliṅgādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣaṇādanyonyā-
śrayaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ । upakramādīnāṃ svarūpalābhārthaṃ śrutiliṅgādyapekṣā śrutiliṅgādīnāmanyaviṣaya-
śrutiliṅgādibhyo balāvadhāraṇārthamupakramādyapekṣeti viṣayabhedena parasparāpekṣāyāṃ dhūmavahnyorutpa-
ttijñaptiviṣayaparasparāpekṣāyāmivānyonyāśrayāprasakteḥ । prakaraṇasya svarūpalābhārthamupakramādyape-
kṣāyāmapyupakramādīnāṃ svarūpalābhārthaṃ prakaraṇāpekṣatvābhāvena tatrāpi parasparāśrayāprasakteśca ।
yadyupakramādayaḥ śrutiliṅgādayaśca parasparāpekṣā eva brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyapratiṣṭhāyāṃ he-
tavaḥ kathaṃ tarhi samanvayasūtre tātparyaliṅgānyeva taddhetutvena pradarśayiṣyante । ucyate । a1dhīta-
vedānāmadhi2gatadharmāṇā brahmamīmāṃsāyāmadhikāra ityathaśabdenātra pradarśyate । tataścādhyayanaba-
lānmanasi parivartamāneṣu vedānteṣu dharmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditaiḥ śrutiliṅgādibhirbrahmapara-
tvasphuraṇaṃ svata eva bhavatīti na tadarthamatra vyutpādanīyamasti kiṃtu brahmānyaviṣayaśrutiliṅgā-
dibhistatparatvasphuraṇamapi koṭyantaratvena bhavat śrutyādīnāṃ paradaurbalyanyāyenāpi nivartayituma-
śakyam । brahmaviṣaya śrutiliṅgādīnāmanyaviṣaya śrutiliṅgādibhyastātparyaliṅgavattayā balavattvapra-
darśanena nivartanīyamiti tatpradarśanārthamidaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttam । na ca tātparyaliṅgakṛtaṃ śrutili-
ṅgādīnāṃ viparītaṃ balābalaṃ dharmamīmāṃsāśāstre cintitam । kiṃtu śrutiliṅgādibhistattadarthanirṇa-
yānantaraṃ teṣāṃ virodhe sati paradaurbalyaṃ balābalādhikaraṇe vyutpādya tadanantaraṃ dvādaśopasattā-

gateḥ yāvadjñānodayamanuṣṭheyāni tadarthāni karmāṇi । na tu vividiṣodayarūpapratyakprāvaṇyena
cittaśuddhyavagame sati tyaktavyānītyāśayenāha—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।

siddhyupayogitvāt vidyānuṣṭhānakālānuṣṭheyakarmasamuccaye pramāṇapradarśanaṃ kṛtākṣepasamādhānāya ka-
lpata eveti । nanu, na tena vicārayoḥ kartraikyasiddhirasti tataḥprayogaikyāsiddhiriti cenmābhūt ।

tumaśakyatvena kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ kramaviśeṣaniyāmakāni pravartante।nāyaṃ niyamaḥ।prayogabhedena kartṛtvā-
kārabhede'pi kartṛtvādhiṣṭhānapuruṣaikye satyekasminpuruṣe bhinnaprayogatayāpi yugapadupanipatitayoḥ
karmaṇoḥ kramāpekṣā bhavatyeva । kartṛtvākāraikye'pi hi kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānapuruṣaikyameva prayo-

bdasyārtho darśita’</quote> ityantena</pratika> । brahmapratipādakasyopaniṣacchāstrasya vicāraḥ kartavya ityayaṃ
<quote>‘brahmajijñāse’</quote> tisūtraśeṣalabhyo'rthaḥ । tadetadagre spaṣṭayiṣyate । tatra vicāraṃ prati vyavahitaviṣaya-
samarpakeṇa sautreṇa brahmapadena śivo'bhidhīyata ityetadupapādayituṃ viśeṣaṇacatuṣṭayena viśinaṣṭi
<pratika>sakaletyādinā</pratika> । bṛṃhaterdhātormanpratyayāntasya brahmaśabdasyātra trividhaparicchedarahitaṃ vastvartha
ityabhyupagantavyam । dhātvarthānugamāt prakaraṇopapadādisaṅkocakābhāvācca । taddeśakālaparicche-
darahitasyāpi śivasya na sambhavati । tasya cetanācetanaprapañcavilakṣaṇatvābhyupagamena vastupari-
cchinnatvādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasitumādyaviśeṣaṇam । sakalacetanācetanaprapañcākārayā tadrūpapariṇāmi-
nyā paramaśakt‍yā jaḍaśaktermāyāyā niyāmakatvena tata utkṛṣṭayā cicchaktyā viśiṣṭasya ata evā-

syāpi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavivakṣayā samāsaḥ । vṛkṣe patrapuṣpādyāntargaṇikabhedasattve'pyeka evātra

bhāvaḥ । nanu, svarūpato bṛhattvamātraṃ na brahmaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ kiṃ tu guṇato bṛhattvamapi ।

bdasyāprayujyamānatvācca । mā bhūdvā guṇato buhattvaṃ bahmaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ tathāpi pravṛttini-
mittopapādakatvena tadavaśyaṃ brahmaśabdārthe vaktavyam । na hi tasya bṛhattvamātraṃ pravṛttinimi-
ttam । kiṃ tu bṛṃhaṇaviśeṣitaṃ bṛhattvam । <quote>‘bṛhattvādba‍ṛṃhaṇatvācca tadbrahmetyabhidhīyata’</quote> iti smṛteḥ ।
bṛṃhaṇatvaṃ ca sargakālonmiṣatsakalaprapañcavistārayitṛtvamuktikālavikasanmucyamānajīvagatadharma-

sṛṣṭyādikāraṇaṃ tadbrahmaśabdārtha ityabhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyanta’</quote>ityā-
ditallakṣaṇānusārāt । jagatkāraṇasya vastunaḥ sarvaniyantṛtvamabhyupantavyam । <quote>‘tatsṛṣṭvā tadevā-
nuprāviśat’</quote> <quote>‘antaḥ praviṣṭaśśāstā janānā’</quote>mityādiśrutyantarānusārāt । tasyānandātmakatvama-
bhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘ānandāddha‍yeva khalvimāni’</quote> iti svarūpalakṣaṇavākyānusārāt । tadānandasya
niratiśayatvamabhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote>ityādiśravaṇāt । tatsarvaṃ śive na sambha-
vati । yenāyamatra brahmaśabdabhidheyassyāt ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇāya tatsarvaṃ sakalalokavedaprasiddha-
tannāmapravṛttinimittatayaiva tasminsambhāvayituṃ <quote>‘bhavaśive’</quote>tyādiviśeṣaṇam । bhavatyasmājjagaditi
bhavaḥ । śivaṃ jagataḥ kṣemaṃ karotīti śivāḥ sarve kalyāṇaguṇā asya santīti ca śivaḥ । śṛṇāti
hinasti jagaditi śarvaḥ । paśūn jīvān gavāśvādivatpāśairbadhvā svakāryaṃ kārayatīti paśupa-
tiḥ । sakalajagadīśanaśīla īśvaraḥ । tatra pūjārthasya paramapadasya samāsaḥ । mahati sarvavaiṣa-
yikānandātiśāyini svātmānande dīvyati ramata iti mahādevaḥ । bhaktānāṃ saṃsārarujaṃ
drāvayatīti rudraḥ । śaṃ sukhaṃ bhavatīti śambhuḥ । atra śivanāmnā guṇato bṛhattvaṃ bhavaśivaśa-
rvapaśupatirudranāmabhirbrahmaṇastaṭasthalakṣaṇaṃ pañcakṛtyakāraṇatvaṃ parameśvaranāmnā tadākṣepakamantaryā-
mitvaṃ śambhunāmnā tasya svarūpalakṣaṇamānandātmakatvaṃ mahādevanāmnā tadānandasya niratiśayatvaṃ
ca pravṛttinimittatayopanīyate । idaṃ ca tatratatropapāditairupapādayiṣyamāṇaiśca nāmanirvacanai-
sspaṣṭam । nanu, <quote>‘brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakamupaniṣacchāstraṃ vicāraṇīsa/?/’</quote>miti pratijñāyāṃ sa eva brahmaśa-
bdārthaḥ svīkaraṇīyaḥ yasyopaniṣacchāstraṃ pratipādakam । na ca śivasya tat pratipādakam । <quote>‘sarve
vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti । yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ
saṅgraheṇa bravīmī’</quote>tyupakramya pravṛttayā <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>miti kaṭha-
vallīśrutyā <quote>‘yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tatvato brahmavidyā’</quote>miti muṇḍakaśrutyā ca
viṣṇupuruṣādiśabdābhidheyasya nārāyaṇasya tatpratipādakamityavagamādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasituṃ <pratika>saka-
lanigameti</pratika>viśeṣaṇam । <quote>‘viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>mityatra padaśabdo na sthānavācī । pūrva<quote>‘mavya-

tedatadānumānikādhikaraṇe vyaktībhaviṣyati । evaṃ ca padyate prāpyata iti vyutpattyā tatra paḍha-

śabdaḥ prāpyapuruṣapara iti sthite prāpyapuruṣo na viṣṇuḥ । viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ prāpyamiti
tatprāpyatvaśravaṇāt । kiṃ tu śaktyavasthāviśeṣonmeṣarūpasya viṣṇoḥ puruṣāvasthāvilaye sākṣā-

brahmaśabdapravṛttinimittapauṣkalyābhāvāt । śivastu paraṃ brahma tatpauṣkalyasya tatraiva viśrānteḥ ।
ata eva śrūyate—<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahme’</quote>ti । atharvaśirasi ca śrūyate—<quote>‘atha kasmāducyate paraṃ

praṇavaviṣayameva na tu śivaviṣayamiti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘ya oṃ/?/ṅkāraḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa

petyādibhiḥ śaptabhirviśeṣaṇaiḥ</pratika> । tathāhi-karmamīmāṃsāyā<quote>‘mathāto dharmajijñāse’</quote>ti sūtreṇa pramā-
ṇasvarūpasādhanaphalairdharmasya vicāraṃ pratijñāya prathamādhyāye tasminpramāṇaṃ nirūpitam । tatra
prathamapāde sākṣāddharme pramāṇabhūtāyāścodanāyāḥ pauruṣeyatvādyaprāmāṇyahetuśaṅkānirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ
tatra prāmāṇyamupapāditam । dvitīyapāde arthavādamantrayoḥ vidhyapekṣitadravyadevatādistutyanu-
ṣṭheyārthasmṛtisamarpakatayā tṛtīyapāde manvādyāptapraṇītavedāviruddhasmṛtyādīnāṃ mūlavedānumāpa-
katayā caturthapāde <quote>‘tvagnihotraṃ juhoti’</quote> <quote>‘śyenenābhicaranyajete’</quote>tyādividhivākyagatānāmagniho-
trādipadānāṃ nāmnā karmabhedaḥ nāmnā dharmātideśaḥ nāmnā dūrasthasyānuvāda ityādiprayojana-
vatyā karmanāmatayā ca tatra prāmāṇyamupapāditam । *evaṃ pramāṇasiddhasya dharmasya parasparabhinnaṃ
svarūpaṃ dvitīyādhyāye nirūpitam । tatra <quote>‘yajati dadāti juhotī’</quote>ti codanāsu yajyādidhātu-
bhedarūpeṇa śabdāntareṇa yāgadānahomānāṃ bhedaḥ <quote>‘samidho yajati’</quote> <quote>‘tanūnapātaṃ yajatī’</quote>tyādivi-
dhiṣu <quote>‘yajatī’</quote>ti pañcakṛtvo'bhyāsenāviśeṣapunaśśrutirūpeṇa prayājānāṃbhedaḥ<quote>‘saptadaśa prājāpatyā-
npaśūnālabhete’</quote>tyatra dravyadevatāsambandhabhedinyā saptadaśasaṅkhyayā tadnumeyayāgānāṃ bhedaḥ
<quote>‘athaiṣa jyoti’</quote>rityādivākyeṣu jyotirādināmadheyaistannāmakayāgānāṃ prakṛtajyotiṣṭomādbhedaḥ

rāvaruddhe yāge niveśamalabhamānena vājinaguṇena vājinayāgasyāmikṣāyāgādbhedaḥ prakaraṇānta-

prayoge guṇaviśeṣavyavasthetyupapatteśca । na ca mantrārthavādavarṇitānāṃ phalatvābhāvaniyamaḥ । sū-
ktavākamantrāmnātānāmāyurādīnāṃ rātrisatrārthavādāmnātāyāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāśca phalatvadarśanāt ।
na ca somayāgasya viddhyuddeśe phalaśravaṇāt mantroktaṃ phalaṃ na grāhyamiti vācyam । vidhyudde-
śaśruta eva svarge nityatvarūpaviśeṣasya <quote>‘saptaṛṣīṇāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokastatremaṃ yajñaṃ yajamā-
naṃ ca dhehī’</quote>ti mantreṇa lokaviśeṣabhogyatvarūpasyaiva samarpaṇopapatteḥ । na <quote>‘cendrasya sakhyamamṛ-
tatvamaśyā’</quote> mityaiṣṭikamantreṇa karmaprāpyamamṛtatvaṃ kṣudramavagatamiti śaṅkanīyam । kuberakucelādi-
padavadindrapadasya kṣudratve'pi śivavaikuṇṭhapadavanmuktapadasyākṣudratvopapatteḥ <quote>‘divi jyotirajaramā-
rabhetā’</quote> mityaiṣṭikamantrāntare patnīyajamānābhyāṃ prāpyasya phalasya nityatvokteśca । <quote>‘phalavattāṃ ca-
darśayatī’</quote>ti patnyadhikaraṇa<ref>(jai॰-6-1-21)</ref>sūtreṇa viśiṣyāsya mantrasya phalasamarpakatayā pradarśi-
tatvācca । ataḥ pūrvavṛttāddharmavicārato'pi nityānityaviveko na sambhavatīti । tathāpi dharmavicā-
rānantaraṃ parameśvarārādhanāyānuṣṭhitaiḥ karmabhiścittaśuddhissasambhavatī’tyabhipretya tatkālasampanneti
viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam । ayamāśayaḥ । janmaprabhṛti <quote>‘hiṃsrāhiṃsre mṛdukrūre dharmādharmāvṛtānṛte । tadbhā-
vitāḥ prapadyante tasmāttattasya rocate ।।’</quote> itismṛtyuktarītyā pūrvajanmavāsanānuvṛttyā ye saha-
jaśivabhaktibhāvitāsta evāsmin śāstre vastuto'dhikāriṇaḥ । te ca dharmavicāreṇa dharmanirṇa-
yānantaraṃ śivārādhanadhiyaiva karmāṇyanutiṣṭhantaścittaśuddhiṃ labhante । śuddhacittāśca parabrahmaṇa-
