<quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote>ti śrutyā jīva eva brahmetyavagamāt tasya cāhamanubhavasiddhatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।
nanu, sā śrutirjīvasyāhamanubhavasiddhena kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādyanekānarthavrātakaluṣitena rūpeṇa brahmabhāvaṃ
na pratipādayati । nityaśuddhatvādirūpabrahmaśabdārthānugamavirodhāt । kiṃtu kartṛtvādikalpitākāra-
rahitena nirviśeṣacaitanyarūpeṇa । tattu saṃsāradaśāyāmāvṛtaṃ na prakāśata iti tatra sandeho ghaṭata
ityāśayena pṛcchati—<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । uttaramāha—<pratika>ayamātmeti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ। <quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote>ti
śrutiḥjīvasya yāvadrūpamahamanubhave prakāśate tāvadyuktameva tamidaṃśabdena parigṛhya brahmetyupadiśati ।
tasminbrahmaśabdasyārthassākalyena na sambhavati ceti yāvānsambhavati tāvantameva dehe
brāhmaṇatvādirūpamarthamabhidadhattatra vartiṣyate paramaiśvaryavācīndraśabda iva saṅkucitamaiśvaryama
bhidadhadākhaṇḍale । na ca brahmaśabdasyārasyānurodhādidaṃśabdasya prasiddhārthaparatvaṃ hātavyam ।
prathamacarama śrutayoḥ prathamaśrutasyaivānurodhyatvāt । ata eva <quote>‘muṣṭilopāttu saṅkhyālopastadgu-
ṇatvātsyā’</quote>diti <ref>(jai॰-10-2-63)</ref>dāśamikādhikaraṇe <quote>‘bārhaspatyo naivārassaptadaśaśarāvaścaru’</quote>ri-
ti vihitāyāmiṣṭau <quote>‘caturo muṣṭīnnirvapatī’</quote>ti prakṛtau nirvāpāṅgatvena vihitayoḥ catussaṅkhyāmu-
ṣṭidravyayoratideśaprāptayoścaturmuṣṭibhiḥ saptadaśaśarāvaparimāṇasya caroḥ sampādayitumaśakyatve-
nāvaśyamanyatarasminbādhitavye prathama śrutasaṅkhyānugrahāya muṣṭibādho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ । na ca <quote>‘dhyā-
yatīva lelāyatīve’</quote>tyādiśrutibhirjīve kartṛtvāderapāramārthikatvapratipādanādvastuto nirviśeṣa-
meva jīvasvarūpaṃ tadeva ca brahma pratipādyata iti vācyam । <quote>‘karomi bhuñja’</quote>ityādipratyakṣavi-
ruddhānāṃ tāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ jīvasya karmādyadhīnakartṛtvādimattayā tatpāratantryamātraparatvāditi ।
nirviśeṣaṃ brahma svarūpaṃ jīva iti pakṣamabhyupetyāpi tasya viṣayatvāsambhavamāha—<pratika>kiṃ ceti ।
paricchinatti na veti</pratika> । idamitthamiti prakāraviśeṣaviśiṣṭatayā viṣayīkaroti na vetyarthaḥ ।
<pratika>paricchedeti</pratika> । paricchidyate'neneti paricchedo viśeṣaṇarūpo viśeṣaḥ । tathā ta nirviśeṣatvabha
ṅgaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ । <pratika>yathāvaditi</pratika> । <quote>‘ākāśastalliṅgā’</quote> dityādya <ref>(bra॰-1-1-22)</ref> dhikaraṇeṣvākāśo
brahma jagatkāraṇatvādityādyanumānaprabhavanirṇaye brahmaṇa ākāśādipadoktasya brahmatvarūpasādhya-
viśiṣṭatayā jagatkāraṇatvādirūpahetuviśiṣṭatayā ca viṣayatā na syādityarthaḥ । kiṃ bahunā śabde
nāpi brahmaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt । ghaṭādijñānasya saprakārakatvaniyamadarśanādityāha—<pratika>ayamiti
hīti</pratika> । tvatpakṣe'pi tasya viṣayatvāsambhavaparo'yaṃ kiṃcetyādi । tasmājjīvasya nirviśeṣatve
tasya śabdenāpi pratipādanāsambhavāt <quote>‘ayamātmā brahme’</quote>ti śrutyā saviśeṣameva jīvasvarūpaṃ
<pb n="088"/>
te । tato brahmaviṣayaṃ jñānamapi na sambhavati । tathāpi prayojanaṃ ca na kiñcitpaśyā-
maḥ । na muktiḥ prayojanam । anādisiddhasaṃsārasya durapahnavatvādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ ।

brahmatayā, pratipādyata iti tasyāhamanubhavasiddhasya na vicāraśāstraviṣayateti prāguktameva sthi-

sandeha eva syānna niścayaḥ । <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahma tato'nnamabhijāyata’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu brahma-
ṇo'nnādibhyo bhedaśravaṇādannādikaṃ brahma na bhavatīti cet <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādiśrutiṣu
tasya jīvādapi bhedaśravaṇāt so'pi brahma na syāditi vācyam । prativedāntaṃ <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote>
<quote>‘ahaṃ brahmāsmi’</quote> <quote>‘ayamātmā brahma’</quote> <quote>‘prajñānaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādijīvabrahmābhedavākyānāṃ ṣaḍvidhatātparya-
liṅgopetatayā annādiśrutibhyo jīvabrahmabhedaśrutibhyaśca balavattvāvadhāraṇena jīva eva brahmeti
tato niścayasambhavāditi bhāvaḥ । bhedaśravaṇāviśeṣādannādibhya iva jīvādapi bhinnaṃ brahmā-
bhyupagamyate cettasya viṣayatvāsambhavo'pi kiṃcetyādigranthena darśanīyaḥ । tasminpakṣe tvittha-
marthaḥ । yadi bhedaśravaṇāt brahmajīvavargādanyattatkāraṇatvatanniyantṛtvādiguṇakamabhyupaganta-
vyam । tadā tadaparicchedyamityapyabhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘ko addhā veda ka iha pravocatkuta ā-
jātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭi’</quote>rityupakramya <quote>‘asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅgaṃ veda yadi vā na
vede’</quote>ti śravaṇāt <quote>‘yato vāco nivartante । aprāpya manasā saha’</quote> <quote>‘yadvācā'nabhyuditaṃ yena vāga-
bhyudyate yanmanasā na manute yenāhurmano mataṃ tadevaṃ brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsata’</quote>ityā-
diśravaṇācca । evaṃ ca vicārajanyaṃ jñānaṃ brahma yathāvatparicchidya gṛhṇāti cettasyāparicchedyatva-
bhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ । na cedayamiti gṛhyamāṇaḥ svata ālokamadhyavartighaṭavadyathāvanna prakāśeteti mokṣa-
janakatvābhimataṃ brahmajñānaṃ na samarthitaṃ syāt । <quote>‘bhaktyā māmabhijānāti yāvānyaścāsmi tatva-
taḥ । tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantara’</quote>miti yāvadbrahmajñānasyaiva mokṣajanakatvābhyu-
pagamāditi । evaṃ nirviśeṣajīvabrahmapakṣe jīvānyabrahmapakṣe ca tadjñānāsambhavo doṣa uktaḥ ।
tatsambhavamabhyupetyāpi pakṣatraye'pi prayojanāsambhavamāha—<pratika>tathāpīti</pratika> । yadi brahmajñānātki-
ñcitprayojanamabhaviṣyat tadāhamanubhavarūpādvedāntajanyādvā tadjñānājjāyamānaṃ tad‌drakṣyāmaḥ
na tadidānīṃ paśyāmaḥ । ato jñāyate na prasiddhajīvarūpasya nirviśeṣajīvarūpasya vā tadanya-
sya vā brahmaṇaḥ parijñānātkiñcitprayojanamastīti । tadetadāpastambenāpyuktaṃ <quote>‘buddhe cetkṣema-
prāpaṇamihaiva na duḥkhamupalabhete’</quote>ti <ref>(āpa॰ pra. 2pa.kha.21sū.16)</ref> idānīntanabrahmajñānamā-
trānna prayojanaṃ kiṃ tu śravaṇamananāntaramupāsanājanyatatsākṣātkārādityabhyupagame'pi prayo-
janāsambhavamāha—<pratika>anādisiddheti</pratika> । saṃsāranivṛttipūrvikā hi niratiśayānandāndāvāptiḥ prayo-
janamihābhyupagamyate । saṃsāranivṛttiśca sakalānarthavrātamūlasarvajīvāvārakaikadravyarūpamalākhyā-
nādisiddhapāśanivṛttirityabhyupagamyate । na cā1nādernivṛttiḥ dravyasya jñānāmātrānnivṛttiḥ
sarvajīvagatānarthanidānasyaikapuruṣamokṣakāraṇānnivṛ़ttiśca sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>dūrapahnavatvā-
diti</pratika> । duśśīlādivadbahuvrīhiḥ । tatra duṣṭavācinā dirupasargeṇāśakyatvapahnavaśabdena nivarta-

hiraṇyagarbhādhikaraṇanivartanīyasandehaprayojakasya <quote>‘tadeva brahma paramaṃkavīnā’</quote> miti vākyasya ca
tatrānukramaṇāt । tasmādviṣayabhāṣyaṃ brahmaṇo viṣayatvavyavasthāpanamātraparamiti । tena saṃśayeṣu
tattatsūtranivartanīyatvānādareṇa brahmaṇi saṃśayasadbhāvamātraṃ pradarśitam । tāvatā'pi prayojana-
bhāṣye jīvādyanyasya brahmaṇassiddhavadanuvādādviṣayabhāṣye brahmatvajīvatvayornirvacanamukhena pratha-
masūtragatabrahmapadasūcitasya tayorvirodhasyāviṣkaraṇācca jīvānnādirūpatvasandehaḥ prathamasūtrani-
vartanīya iti । śārīrādhikaraṇe nārāyaṇasya hiraṇyagarbhādhikaraṇena hiraṇyagarbhasya ca svatantra-
parabrahmabhāvanirasanadarśanāt brahmaṇi nārāyaṇatvādisandehaḥ tadadhikaraṇadvayanivartanīya iti
cāvagantuṃ śakyamiti sa viśeṣo'tra bhāṣye na spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ । yadvā <quote>‘apice’</quote>tyādigrantho'pyuttaratra
nivartanīyasyaiva <quote>‘annaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādivākyānāṃ kā gatiriti sandehajātasya phalasandehadvārā prada-
rśaka iti na kiñcidasāmañjasyam । nanu, yadi nārāyaṇahiraṇyagarbhayoḥ parabrahmabhāvasaṃśayo'gre
nirasanīyaḥ kathaṃ tarhyatra prayojanabhāṣye <quote>‘parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya prasādātiśayene’</quote> ti vākyena <quote>‘paraṃ
brahma śiva’</quote> iti siddhavadanūditam । ucyate । mantrārthavādādiprasiddheṣu devatāviśeṣeṣvayamayaṃ vā
brahmeti saṃśayo nānākāraṇakaḥ । ekastāvanmantrārthavādagatotkarṣapratipādanadarśanamātrasambhavaḥ śa-
krasūryāgnyādisādhāraṇaḥ ‘na kirindratvaduttaraḥ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ । indro yāto'vasitasya
rājā <quote>‘sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca ।’</quote> <quote>‘agniragre prathamo devatānām’</quote> <quote>‘agnirmukhaṃ prathamo devatānāṃ’</quote>
<quote>‘rājānau vā etau devatānāṃ yadagnīṣomau’</quote> ityādi mantrārthavādeṣūtkarṣavarṇanaṃ hi śakrādīnāmapi
dṛśyate । ayaṃ prathamasūtragatabrahmaśabdasmāritasya tatpravṛttinimittasya śive pauṣkalyādathaśabdavyā-
khyānopasaṃhārabhāṣyaprapañcitātsa eva paraṃ brahmeti nirṇayena nivartanīyaḥ sadjñānānandanārāyaṇā-
diṣu bahuṣu jagatkāraṇatvarūpabrahmalakṣaṇaśravaṇakṛto'nyaḥ sa jagatkāraṇatvopayogiguṇaṣaṭkā-
deḥ śive prasiddhataratvena tatra kāraṇavākyānāṃ paryavasānāt sa eva jagatkāraṇaṃ brahmeti nirṇayena
janmādyadhikaraṇe pradarśayiṣyamāṇena nivartanīyaḥ । anekatra brahmaśabdādiśravaṇakṛto'paraḥ sa
śārīrādyadhikaraṇe nivartanīyaḥ । tatra prathamasūtre dvitīyādisaṃśayānivartane'pi prathamasaṃśaya-
nivartanādevameva saṃśayāntaranivartanamapi bhaviṣyatīti śrotṝṇāṃ visrambhotpādanena śiva eva brahme-
ti siddhavadanuvādaḥ । yathā pūrvatantre prathamādhyāye keṣāñcidaprāmāṇyahetūnāṃ nivartanamātreṇa viśva-
jidadhikaraṇādinivartanīyatatsaṃśayānuvṛttāvapi vṛttaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇamiti kārts‍nyena vedaprāmā-
ṇyasya siddhavadanuvāda iti na kācidanupapattiḥ । nanvevaṃ brahmaṇo jīvānyatvaniścayena prayo-
janopapādane tasyāparicchedyatvamāpatati so'yaṃ mayūranṛttanyāyaḥ । yathā mayūrasya nṛtyataḥ eka
eva pādo bhūmau pratiṣṭhito bhavati evamihāpi yadi jīva eva brahmābhyupagamyeta śakyastasya pa-
ricchedaḥ । tadaparicchedyatvaśrutīnāmarthavādamātratvaprāpteḥ । prayojanaṃ tu nopapadyate । yadi brahma
jīvādanyat anantamaṅgalyaguṇaśaktiyuktamiha prasādhyeta tadā prayojanamupapadyate । aparicchedyaṃ tu
brahma syāt । tadaparicchedyatvaśrutīnāṃ tasminnarthe bā1dhābhāvādityamuṃ doṣaṃ parihartuṃ pūrvapakṣadarśi-
tāmaparicchedyatvaśaṅkāmanuvadati— <pratika>yaduktamiti</pratika> । dvividhaḥ paricchedaḥ karatalāmalakavadīdṛgi-
<note>(1) <quote>‘arthabādhābhāvāt’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram. ।</note>

<quote>‘jñeyaparicchedarūpatvājjñānisya tadaparicchinnabrahmaviṣayaṃ na sambhavatī’</quote>ti tada-
jñānavilasitam । īdṛgidamiti brahmaṇaḥ paricchedāsambhave'pi lakṣaṇamukheneta-
ravyāvṛttatāmātreṇa paricchedasambhavāt । lakṣaṇena paricchedo hi sarvatra lakṣyavi-
ṣayamitaravyāvṛttatayā jñānam । uddiṣṭasya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇe vedāntavākyairnirūpite
parīkṣite ca tallakṣaṇaśūnyebhyassajātīyavijātīyebhyastaditarasakalapadārthebhyo
vyāvṛttarūpaṃ yat tadbrahmeti vijñāyate । atassamīcīno'yaṃ brahmaviṣayaśśāstrārambhaḥ ।

damiti pariccheda ekaḥ । tadabhāve'pi lakṣaṇamukhenetaravyāvṛttatāmātreṇa paricchedo dvitīyaḥ ।
tatrādyasya brahmaṇyasambhave'pi dvitīyassambhavati । yathā hi mahāsenāmadhye rathagajaturagabhaṭavara-
vibhūṣaṇādiyukteṣu bahuṣu prabhuṣu dṛśyamāneṣu sarvatrānirdhāraṇena rājabuddhiprasaktau <quote>‘śvetacchatraṃ rā-
jalakṣaṇa’</quote>mityupadiṣṭe yasya śvetacchatraṃ paśyati tadākāraviśeṣādīnāṃ dūratvādidoṣādaniścaye'pi
ayaṃ rājeti viśiṣya nirdhārayati evaṃ vedarāśimadhye tattanmantrārthavādādiprasiddhamahimātiśa-
yeṣu bahuṣu vibudheṣu śrūyamāṇeṣu sarvatrānirdhāraṇena parabrahmabuddhiprasaktau yat jagatkāraṇaṃ tat bra-
hmetyupadiṣṭe yatra jagatkāraṇatvaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva brahmeti nirdhārayati । ato nāparicchedyatvenā-
viṣayatvaprasaṅgaḥ । lakṣaṇakṛtyānabhijñasya tviyaṃ śaṅketi samādhatte— <pratika>tadajñānavilasitamiti</pratika> ।
nanu, brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā paricchedyatvābhāve <quote>‘vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘bhaktyā māmabhijā-
nātī’</quote>tiśrutismṛtibhyāṃ sarvātmanā paricchedarūpeṇa jñānena prāpyatayā varṇitaṃ prayojanaṃ na si-
ddhyediti sa doṣastadavastha iti cenna । itaravyāvṛttatvaparicchedamātrāvalambanena śravaṇamananayore-
kaikavidyopasaṃhāryaguṇamātrāvagatyā nididhyāsanasya ca nivṛttau sākṣātkārakāle sarvātmanā pari-
cchedasambhavāt । na ca tathā satyaparicchedyatvabhaṅgaprasaṅgo doṣaḥ । aparicchedyatvaśrutīnāṃ <quote>‘yato
vāco nivartanta’</quote>ityādi śrutyantarānusāreṇa manovāgatītatvaviṣayatvāt । na hi sākṣātkārakāle
brahma ma1/?/nasā tadguṇeyattādipratipādakaśabdena vā paricchidyate । kiṃ tu nivṛttāvaraṇena sarvataḥ pra-
sṛtena svābhāvikajñānenaiva । yadāhuḥ—<quote>‘śivārkaśāktidīdhityā samarthīkṛtaciddṛ/?/śā । śivaṃ śaktyā-
dibhissārdhaṃ paśyatyātmagatāvṛti’</quote>riti । tasmādviṣayaprayojanayoravirodhena siddherupapannaḥ śā-
strārambha ityabhipretyopasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । evamiha sūtragatabrahmaśabdaśaktiparyālocanālabhyena
brahmaṇo jīvānyatvaniścayena śāstrasya prayojanavattāyāḥ vidhāntareṇa brahmaṇaḥ sandigdhatayā
tena saviṣayatāyāścopapādane siddhāntabhāṣyasya tātparyaṃ darśitam । brahmaṇo jīvatadanyatvasa-
ndehenaiva śāstrasya viṣayaprayojanavattvopapādane vākyasya tātparyaṃ draṣṭavyam । tathā hi—yadyapi
brahmaṇaścetanatvādipratipādakavedāntavākyabāhulyāt <quote>‘annaṃ brahme’</quote> tyādivākyānyupāsanārthā-
nīti niścayenānnādirūpatayā tatsandeho nivartate । tasya viśuddhatvapratipādakavākyabāhulyāt
aviśuddhasaṃsārijīvarūpatvasaṃdeho'pi nivartate । tathāpi saṃsāradaśānabhivyaktaviśuddhajīvarūpa-
tvasandeho na nivartate । śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇāgameṣu jīvānyatvapratipādakavākyānāṃ tadana-
nyatvapratipādakavākyānāṃ ca bāhulyāviśeṣādvividhavākyabalābalānavadhāraṇena brahmaśabdapravṛtti-
nimitte vastvaparicchede sajātīyavijātīyasakalavasturāhityarūpatvasajātīyavastumātrarāhitya-
rūpatvasandehasattvācca । tataśca brahmaṇo nārāyaṇādirūpatvasandehādivat jīvatvasandehādapi vi-

yadasandigdhamaprayojanaṃ ca tatkhalu na prekṣāvatāṃ vicārakakṣyāmārohati । asya
tu vedāntaśāstravicārasya pramāṇayuktyābhāsapratibhāsavaśāt sandehāspadaṃ brahma
viṣayo bhavati । <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti paraṃ’</quote> <quote>‘jñātvā śivaṃ śāntimatyantameti’</quote> <quote>‘īśaṃ taṃ
jñātvā amṛtā bhavanti’</quote> ‘tamakratuṃ paśyati vītaśoko dhātuḥ prasādānmahimānamī-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣayatvamupapadyate । tasya nirviśeṣajīvarūpatve'pe saṃsāradaśāyāmāvṛtasya niratiśayānandarūpatva-
sya muktāvabhivyaktyā śāstrasya prayojanavattvamapyupapadyate । asminpakṣe<quote>‘kathamekabhāvamāhuḥ
śrutayaḥ’</quote> iti bhāṣyavākyaṃ kiṃ viruddhadharmavattvapratītāvapi viruddhāṃśaprahāṇyā śuddhasvarūpābhedā-
bhiprāyeṇa śrutiṣu jīvabrahmaṇossāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa upapādanīyaḥ, uta tadaprahāṇyaiva
apṛthaksiddhaprakāraprakāribhāvādyabhiprāyeṇeti brahmaṇi jīvatadanyatvasandehāpāditaśrutigati-
vicāraparatvena yojanīyam । <quote>‘api caivamapi sandihyata’</quote>ityādibhāṣyaṃ kvacitkvacidvākye śruta-
mannādirūpatvamapi sandihyeta kimuta bahuśrutismṛtipurāṇādivākyajātapratītaṃ jīvarūpatvamiti
kaimutikanyāyaparatvena yojanīyam । tatra nārāyaṇatvādisandehopanyāso dṛṣṭāntārthatayā sama-
rthanīyaḥ । tasmāt<quote>‘bahudhā sandigdha’</quote>miti bhāṣyaṃ tu śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu bahubhirjīvabrahmābheda-
siddhyanukūlaprakārairjīvatadanyarūpatayā sandigdhamityarthatayā yojanīyam । prayojanabhāṣyaṃ prathama-
koṭau prayojanavattvasya advaitavyavasthāpake tantrāntare prasiddhatvāt tāmapahāya siddhāntakoṭi
mātre prayojanavattvasya pūrvapakṣe'nupapannatayā śaṅkitasyopapādanārthatayā yojanīyam । <quote>‘yadukta’</quote>mi-
tyādibhāṣyaṃ koṭidvaye'pi paricchedātītasya paricchedāsambhavaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthatayā yojanī-
yam । tatra prathamakoṭau lakṣaṇaṃ vyāvahārikadharmarūpaṃ vivakṣitamiti tenāgrimādhikaraṇajātasā-
dhyanirṇayapayogihetujālasyāpi vyāvahārikatayopapattissiddha‍yati । yadvā prathamakoṭau lakṣaṇā-
disakalavicārāṇāṃ vyāvahārikadharmāvalambanatvasya tantrāntare prasiddhatvāt siddhāntakoṭāve-
voktaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthatayā pūrvavadeva yojanīyamiti sarvamanavadyam । śrotṛbuddhasaukaryārthama-
dhikaraṇārthaṃ saṅkalayya darśayati—<pratika>yadasandigdhamityādinā । pramāṇayuktyābhāsapratibhā-
savaśāditi</pratika> । pramāṇābhāsāḥ naiyāyikādyunnītānyaṣṭaguṇatvādineśvarādisādhakānyanumānā-
dīni । yuktyābhāsāḥ tattadanugrāhakalāghavatarkādayaḥ । pūrvaṃ śrutivipratipattyā brahmaṇi sandeho
darśitaḥ । idānīṃ vādivipratipattyeti viśeṣaḥ । prayojanasyārthaprāptyanarthanivṛttirūpatayā dvaivi-
dhyasya prayojanopayuktānāṃ dhyānasākṣātkāraparameśvaraprasādānāṃ dvāradvāribhāvasya ca prāpakāṇi
śrutivākyānyudāharati—<pratika>brahmavidityādinā</pratika> । brahmavit hṛdayaguhāyā brahmopāsakaḥ । paraṃ
niratiśayabrahmānandarūpaṃ prayojanaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ । <quote>‘tadeṣābhyukte’</quote>tyudāhṛtayā ṛcā tathā vivṛta-
tvāt । anenārthaprāptirūpaṃ prayojanamuktam । <quote>‘jñātvā śiva’</quote>mityanenātyantaṃ śāntimātyantikīṃ
duḥkhanivṛttiṃ prāpnotityanarthanivṛttirūpaṃ prayojanamuktam । <quote>‘īśaṃ taṃ jñātve’</quote>tyanena amṛtāḥ amara-
ṇadharmāṇa iti punarāvṛttirāhityoktyā brahmānandānubhavarūpasya prayojanasya sthāyitvamuktam ।
<quote>‘tamakratuṃ paśyatī’</quote>tyanena <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyānmahato mahīyā’</quote>nityalpādhikaśarīratattatprāṇīhṛdayaguho-
pādhyanusāreṇāṇumahattayā aprākṛtamahimavantamīśaṃ dhāturjagaddhārakasya tasyaiva prasādādvītaśo-
kassan paśyatīti brahmalokaprāptyanantarabhāvinī sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣa-

śam’ । <quote>‘ātmānamaraṇiṃ kṛtvā praṇavaṃ cottarāraṇim । dhyānanirmathanādeva pāśaṃ da-

mīkṣata’itiśrutyantaraprasiddhe niratiśayānandātmakabrahmadarśanarūpe sakaladuḥkhanivṛttipūrvake para-

tyanena paṇḍitaḥ śravaṇamananasañjātaparamātmaniścayaḥ paramātmānaṃ hṛdayaguhāyāmadharāraṇīsthāne
nidhāya tasya vācakatayā tadapari nidheyatvena yāvadupāsanamāvartanīyatvena cottarāraṇisthāne
praṇavaṃ niveśya dhyānarūpanimarthanāddhetoḥ pāśaṃ malamāyākarmarūpaṃ dahatīti <quote>‘brahmavidāpnotī’</quote>tyā-
diśrutyantaroktasya vedanasya dhyānarūpatvaṃ nimarthanatvenādhyavasitasya dhyānasya dagdhṛtve vahnisthā-
nīyasākṣātkārarūpadvārasāpekṣatvaṃ ca darśitam । <quote>‘jñātvā deva’</quote>mityanena malamāyākarmarūpatayā
pāśabahutvaṃ darśitam । ādiśabdena <quote>‘bhidyate hṛdayagranthi’</quote>rityādīni śrutyantarāṇi saṅgṛhītā-
ni । <quote>‘parīkṣya lokā’</quote>nityādeḥ pūrvapakṣyutprekṣitārthaparatvakalpanamapyayuktam । tataḥ<quote>‘tadyatheha karma-
ciko lokaḥ kṣīyata’</quote> ityādi śrutipradarśitakarmaprāpyasvargādisakalalokānityatvapratipādanapara-
tāyā eva tadarthapratyabhijñayā avadhāryamāṇatvāditi draṣṭavyam । atrāyamadhikaraṇārthasaṅgrahaḥ ।
<quote>‘‘ātmā brahmetyadhītaḥ sphurati sa tu sadā nirviśeṣaḥ sa cetsyāttasyātītasya buddhessaraṇimiha nayaiḥ
kā paricchedavārtā । tajjñānātsarvajīvāvaraṇaniravadhidravyapāśānivṛtteḥ ko vā mukteḥ prasaṅgastada-
viṣayaphalaṃ grāhyametanna śāstram ।। 1 ।। brahma hyarthānugatyā niratiśayaguṇaṃ tatkathaṃ jīva eve-
tyuktaṃ śrutyā tadannaṃ mana iti ca kathaṃ coktamityādi cintyam । dhyātasyāsya prasādātpratipaśuni-
yatānantaśaktermalasya kṣīyetaikaikaśaktistadiha na viṣaye naiva sādhye'pyayuktiḥ ।। 2 ।।’’</quote> evamu-
ttarādhikaraṇeṣvapi pūrvottarapakṣasaṅgrahaślokāścaturmatasāre'smābhirnibaddhā draṣṭavyāḥ ।। ।। iti

<l>eṣā matkṛtiredhatāmanukalaṃ brahmapratiṣṭhāpinī rājyaśrīriva cinnabommanṛpaterācandrasūryaṃ kṣitau ।। 1 ।।</l></lg>

<l>yasya prekṣaiva dehadvayatadanugatapratyagarthau viviṅkte sūtrātmā pārijātassakalamabhimataṃ mahyamarthaṃ sa dadyāt ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>

<p>ādāvānandatīrthīyāmanusṛtya matasthitim । nyāyamuktāvalī ramyā viśadārthā viracyate ।।’’ ityārabhya prathamaparicchede śrīma-
dānandatīrthamatānusāreṇa brahmasūtrāṇi saṃkṣepeṇa vyācakhyu/?/ pratyadhikaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣasiddhāntasaṃgrāhakaślokaviracanapūrvakam ।</p>
<p>atha dvitīye paricchede <quote>‘‘lakṣmaṇāryahṛdayānusāriṇī tanyate nayamayūkhamālikā ।।’’</quote> ityupakramya tathaiva śrīmadrāmānujamatapra-
kriyāṃ nyarūpayan ।</p>
<p>atha tṛtīye paricchede nayamaṇimālābhikhye śrīkaṇṭhamatānusāreṇa padā/?/rūpeṇa pratyadhikaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau saṃjagṛhuḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="099"/>
<p>atha turīye nayamañjaryākhye paricchede chandaśśāstrasthasakalavṛttodāharaṇarūpaiḥ padyaiḥ śrīmadbhagavatpādīyamatānusāreṇa adhika-
raṇārthān saṃjagṛhire ।।</p>
<p>paricchedacatuṣṭayaparimitaṃ caturmataleśasaṃgrahākhyaṃ mahāntamakhilādaraṇīyaṃ prabandhamasyāṃ granthāvalau yathākramaṃ saṃmudraya prakaṭī-
cikīrṣuradhunā tamapi pariśodhayanvarte । turīyaparicchedamātrametāvatāpi kālena sarvatra samanviṣyato mama na nayanapadavīmupagatam ।</p>
<p>nayamaṇimālākhyasya tṛtīyaparicchedasya prakṛtabhāṣyārthasaṃgraharūpatayā tatratatra pratyadhikaraṇaparisamāpti tattatpadyavinyasanami-
daṃbhāṣyapaṭhitṝṇāṃ pramodamāvahediti dhiyā yathākramaṃ prakaṭīkriyate ।</p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāprārambhaḥ</head>
<p>sopānapaṅktikalpā somābharaṇapadamārurukṣūṇām । kriyate nayamaṇimālā śrīkaṇṭhācāryadṛṣṭamārgeṇa ।।</p>
<head>।। atha jijñāsādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<head>athāto brahmājijñāsā ।। 1 ।।</head>
<lg><l>ātmā brahmetyadhītaḥ sphurati sa tu tadā nirviśeṣassa cetsyāt tasyātītasya buddhessaraṇimiha nayaiḥ kā paricchedavārtā ।</l>
<l>tajjñānātsarvajīvāvaraṇaniravadhidravyapāśānivṛtteḥ ko vā mukteḥ prasaṅgastadaviṣayaphalaṃ grāhyametanna śāstram ।। 1 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>brahma hyarthānugatyā niratiśayaguṇaṃ tatkathaṃ jīva evetyuktaṃ śrutyā tadannaṃ mana iti ca kathaṃ coktamityādi cintyam ।</l>
<l>dhyātasyāsya prasādātpratipaśuniyatānantaśaktermalasya kṣīyetaikaikaśaktistadiha na viṣaye naiva sādhye'pyayuktiḥ ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>

yathāsyāmupaniṣadi satpadasya parameśvaravācitvena gatiḥ tathā śrutyantare'pi samā-
nā <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudrassanmaho namo nama’</quote>ityādau । ataḥ satpadavācyaḥ parameśvara eva ।।

nīhī’ti suṣuptivṛttāntasya sarvasyāpi vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt taddaśāyāṃ sati satsampattira-
pyukteti cenna । svāpyayaviṣayopakramopasaṃhāramadhye tadukteranupayogāt । anantarameva ‘sa yathā
śakuni’rityādinā tadukteśca । tasmātsatsampattivākyasya svāpyayaviṣayopakramopasaṃhāramadhyani-
veśanasāmarthyena svapadasatpadayoraikārthyāvaśyambhāve sati jīvasyākāraṇe pradhāne layānupapattesta-
sya satpadavācyatve svāpyayavacanamanupapannamiti yuktameva । na caivaṃ tasya brahmaṇyapi layo'nupa-
pannaḥ । tadakāraṇatvāviśeṣāt । atassūkṣmāvasthe svasminneva tasya layo vaktavyassyāditi
vācyam । jīvaśarīrakasya brahmaṇaḥ taddvāreṇāpṛthaksiddhatadāśrayatayā sthūlāvasthajīvaṃ prati sū-
kṣmāvasthajīvasyeva brahmaṇo'pi tadupādānakāraṇatvena tatra tasya layopapatteḥ । na caivamatyanta-
bhinnayoḥ jīvabrahmaṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryakāraṇānanyatvasiddhāntabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ । na hyananyatvaṃ
bhedābhāvaḥ । kiṃtu daṇḍadevadattavatkadācidapi pṛthagavasthiterabhāvaḥ । sa tu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedasa-
ttve'pi nīlaghaṭavadayutasiddhatvānna hīyate । nīlaghaṭayorayutasiddhirguṇaguṇibhāvena । iha śarīraśa-
rīribhāveneti viśeṣaḥ । ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe'pyevameva kāryakāraṇānanyatvaṃ bhāṣyakṛdupapādayi-
ṣyatīti tatraivāyamarthaḥ prapañcayiṣyate । evaṃ jīvamātrasya brahmaṇi layasamarthana eva <quote>‘satā sampannaḥ
svamapītaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sati sampadya sata āgamye’</quote>tyatrāpyayasthānayoḥ bheda-
vyapadeśāḥ saṅgacchante । <quote>‘prājñenātmanā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntara’</quote>mityādiśru-
tyantaraikārthyamapyupapadyate । na hi tatrāpi sampariṣvaktaśabdasya brahmaparyantatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ।

yiṣyamāṇatvāt । nanu, yadi bhinne'pi brahmaṇi jīvasya layaḥ tarhi pradhāne'pyastu । tasyāpi
brahmaṇa iva jīvadvārā tadavasthāśrayatvakalpanena tadupādānatvopapādanasambhavāditi cenna । ce-
tanasya brahmaṇaḥ śrutisiddhena jīvaṃ prati śarīritvena tadayutasiddhāśrayatayā <quote>‘yathā sudīptā-
tpāvakādvisphuliṅgāssahasraśaḥ prabhavante sarūpāḥ । tathākṣarādvividhāssomya bhāvāḥ prajāyante
tatra caivāpiyanti’</quote>ityādiśrutisiddhaṃ tadupādānatvamupapādayituṃ śakyam । na tvacetanasya pra-
dhānasyeti viśeṣāt । tasmādyuktassvāpyayāditi heturiti । uttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>sacchabde-
neti</pratika> ।। satpadasyāsya tatprakaraṇapaṭhitairīkṣatyādihetubhiriva śrutyantaragatena vyākhyānenāpi sa

<sutra>।। sū. ।। śrutatvācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
atrāpi <quote>‘ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata ākāśa’</quote>ityārabhya1<quote>‘ātmata evedaṃ sarva’</quote>miti

syāmapyupaniṣadi prakaraṇāntare brahmakāraṇatvaśravaṇāt na kaścitparihāro labhyate । ucyate ।
chāndogye sadvidyānantaraṃ bhūmavidyā pravṛttā । sā sadvidyoktasyaiva sacchabdoktakāraṇavastuno
viśeṣāntaropadeśāya pravṛttā । kuta etadavasīyate । sadvidyāprakaraṇe <quote>‘tatsatyaṃ sa ātme’</quote> ti nava-
kṛtvo'bhyastasya satyaśabdasya <quote>‘tasyāmeṣa tu vā ativadati yassattyenātivadatī’</quote>ti prastutā-
tmani prayogāt । tataśca vidyādvayasyaikārthyātpūrvapakṣaśaṅkāyāḥ parihāro labhyata ityabhiprāyaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū. ।। śrutatvācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra> bhūmavidyāyāṃ<quote>‘tarati śokamātmavi’</quote>dityātmanirūpaṇamupakramya tadu-
pasaṃhāre <quote>‘ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata āśā ātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa’</quote>ityādinā prāgupā-
syatvenānukrāntasya nāmādiprāṇaparyantasya vastujātasya prakṛtādātmana utpattimuktvā sarva-
syāpi prapañcasya tata u2tpattyuktyopasaṃhṛtam । <pratika>ātmata evedaṃ sarvamiti</pratika> । atastadekārthāyāṃ

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athekṣatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। īkṣaternāśabdam ।। 5 ।। gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt ।। 6 ।। tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt ।। 7 ।। he-
yatvāvacanācca ।। 8 ।। pra3tijñāvirodhāt ।। 9 ।। svāpyayāt ।। 10 ।। gatisāmānyāt ।। 11 ।। śruta-
tvācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>sacchabdaṃ kāraṇaṃ syātpariṇatiguṇakaṃ sāṃkhyaklṛptaṃ pradhānaṃ maivaṃ tatrekṣaṇātmaśrutimukhavihatestarhi jīvo'stu tanna ।</l>
<l>tanniṣṭhasyāmṛtokterna hi śivamapahāyānyaniṣṭhā vimuktyai tasmāttadbrahma sūkṣmāvibhajanacidrūpaśaktyā viśiṣṭaḥ ।। 10 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti īkṣatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athekṣatyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। īkṣaternāśabdam ।। 5 ।। gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt ।। 6 ।। tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt ।। 7 ।। heya-
tvāvacanācca ।। 8 ।। (pratijñā1virodhāt ।। 9 ।।) svāpyayāt ।। 10 ।। gatisāmānyāt ।। 11 ।।
śrutatvācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, itthaṃ caturbhissūtraissarvajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvavedāntapratipādyaṃ brahmaiveti pratyapādi । tatra sattvarajasta-
moguṇātmakaṃ pradhānameva jagatkāraṇaṃ na kaścidadhiṣṭhātāpekṣita iti vadantassāṃkhyāḥ kūtasthatvena kriyāśaktyayogāt brahma na
jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati । api tarhi triguṇātmakatvātkriyāśaktimatpradhānameva jagatkāraṇamiti vadanti । chāndogyagatāṃ sadvi-
dyāmavalambya pravṛttaṃ teṣāṃ mataṃ nirākartumidamadhikaraṇamavatāryate—<pratika>īkṣateḥ</pratika>=īkṣitṛtvaśravaṇāt । jaiminisūtre yathā yajatipadena
<note>(1) <quote>‘ityādinā ātmā satpadavācyaṃ brahmaiva na pradhānamiti siddham’</quote> iti iti sva. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<note>(2) <quote>‘tata ityuktimuktvopasaṃhṛtam ।’</quote> iti gha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<note>(3) idaṃ sūtraṃ śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoreva paṭhyate । nānyayoriti veditavyam ।</note>
<pb n="204"/>
lakṣaṇayā dhātvartho yāga ucyate tadvadihāpi dhātuvācakekṣatiśabdastadarthalakṣaka iti bodhyam । <pratika>aśabdam</pratika>=avedapramāṇakaṃ
pradhānam । hetugarbhaviśeṣaṇametat । <pratika>na</pratika>=jagatkāraṇaṃ na bhavati iti sūtrārthaḥ । asya chāndogye śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīt ।
ekamevādvitīya’</quote> mityupakrāntaṃ <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tattejo'sṛjate’</quote> tyādikaṃ sadvidyāvākyaṃ tathānyatra śrutaṃ <quote>‘ātmā
vā idameka evāgra āsīt । nānyatkiṃcana miṣat । sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā’</quote> iti । sa <quote>‘imām̐llokānasṛjate’</quote> tyādikaṃ vākyaṃ ca
viṣayaḥ । atra sacchabditaṃ jagadupādānaṃ kiṃ pradhānamuta brahmeti saṃśaye kūṭasthasya brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyabhāvāt triguṇātmakasya
pradhānasya tatsaṃbhavopapatteśca ānumānikamacetanaṃ pradhānameva jagadupādānamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tatra <quote>‘tadaikṣate’</quote>ti īkṣitṛtvaśravaṇāt
acetanasya pradhānasya cetanadharmabhūtekṣitṛtvāsaṃbhavātkūṭasthasyāpi brahmaṇo māyāmahimnā sarvasyāpyupapatteśca na vedānteṣu sāṃkhya-
kalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamāśrayituṃ yuktam । kiṃ tu sadīkṣitṛ cetanaṃ māyāmahimnā sarvaśaktimadbrahmaiva jagadupādānaṃ
bhavatītyevāśrayaṇīyamiti siddhāntaḥ ।। 5 ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘tatteja aikṣata tā āpa aikṣante’</quote> tyādāvacetane'pīkṣitṛtvaśravaṇāttatpradhāne'pi gauṇamastvityāśaṅkāyāmidamāha—<pratika>gauṇa-
ścet</pratika>=aptejasoriva pradhāne'pīkṣatiśabdo gauṇo'stviti cet । <pratika>ātmaśabdāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sadeva’</quote> <quote>‘tadaikṣata’</quote> iti prakṛtaṃ sadīkṣitṛ
<quote>‘seyaṃ devataikṣate’</quote>ti devatāśabdena parāmṛśya <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanānupraviśye’</quote>ti cetanavācakātmaśabdaśravaṇāt । <pratika>na</pratika>=īkṣaṇaśabdo na
gauṇo bhavati । iti ।। 6 ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi ātmaśabdaḥ nānārthakatvātpradhānaparo'pyastu ityāśaṅkāyāmāha—<pratika>tanniṣṭhasya</pratika>=tasminnātmaśabdavācye <quote>‘tattvamasī’</quote>
tyupadiṣṭe prakṛte vastuni niṣṭhā yasya tasya cetanasya ś‍vetaketoḥ । <pratika>mokṣopadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘atha saṃpatsya’</quote> iti । prārabdhakṣayānantaraṃ
mokṣasya upadiṣṭatvāt । na pradhānamātmaśabdavācyaṃ bhavatīti । ataścetane'cetananiṣṭhatvānupapatteḥ śraddhayā taddhyāyato mokṣāsaṃ-
bhavādanarthaprāpteścātmaśabdaścetanavastupara eveti siddham ।। 7 ।।</p>
<p>nanu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prasajati । yadyapyātmaniṣṭhaiva sākṣānmokṣasādhanaṃ na pradhānaniṣṭhā । tathāpi sthūlārundhatīnyāyena pradhāno-
padeśadvārāyamātmopadeśo'stvityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>heyatvāvacanāt</pratika>=heyatvasyānabhidhānāt । yadyanātmaiva pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ
<quote>‘sa ātmā tattvamasī’</quote> tīhopadiṣṭaṃ syāt saḥ tadupadeśaśravaṇādanātmajñatayā tanniṣṭho mābhūditi mukhyamātmānamupadidikṣu śāstraṃ
tasya heyatvaṃ brūyātkila । na tathā brūte । cakāro hetvantarasamuccayārthaḥ । heyatvasyānabhidhānāt ekavijñānena sarvavijñānopakrama-
virodhāccetyarthaḥ ।। 8 ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ pradhānasyātmopadeśadvāratvātmatvagauṇekṣitṛtvanirāsena jagatkāraṇatvaṃ nirasya adhunā svatantrairhetubhistadeva nirasituṃ
sūtrata/?/yamāha=<pratika>svāpyayāt—svasmi</pratika>nprakṛte sacchabdite cidātmani <pratika>apyayāt</pratika> <quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavatī’</quote>ti layaśrava-
ṇāt । sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ suṣuptāvupādhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvātsarvajīvalayādhiṣṭānaṃ cetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ brahmaiva jagatkāraṇaṃ na pradhānami-
tyarthaḥ । apipūrvaka itarlayārthaḥ ।। 9 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>gatisāmānyāt=gateḥ</pratika> <quote>‘ātmana ākāśaḥsaṃbhūta’</quote> ityādiṣu sarveṣu vedānteṣu cetanakāraṇatvāvagateḥ । <pratika>sāmānyāt</pratika>
samānatvāt । nācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇamityarthaḥ ।। 10 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrutatvācca</pratika>=śrūyate hi ś‍vetāś‍vataropaniṣadi sarvajñamīś‍varaṃ prakṛtya <quote>‘sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā
na cādhipaḥ’</quote> । iti । tasmācca sarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ nācetanaṃ pradhānamanyadveti siddham । iti ।। 11 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, sūtrākṣarārthaḥ pūrvavadeva । yadyapi nāsti pūrvapakṣe'pi pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥ । tathāpi siddhānte paramasti kiyā-
nbhedaḥ । viṣayavākyamapi samānameva । sakalasyāsya prapañcasya kāraṇatayā śruyamāṇaṃ saditi vastu brahma vā pradhānaṃ veti sandehaḥ ।
<quote>‘ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpām’</quote> iti tyantare lohitādivarṇānumitarajassattvatamorūpāyāḥ sāṃkhya-
prakṛterbahuprajājanakatvasya śravaṇāt । rajassattvayogātpradhānasyaiva jagatkāraṇatvasiddha‍yupayogikriyājñānaśaktisaṃbandhopapatteḥ ace-
tanasyāsya jagadākārapariṇāmasya yuktatvāt cetanasya kūṭasthasya kāraṇavikṛtirūpapariṇāmāsambhavācca śrutinyāyābhyāṃ satpada-
vācyaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ vastu pradhānameveti pratipattuṃ yuktamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti’</quote> īkṣatiśravaṇāt cetanadharmasye-
kṣaṇasyācetane'saṃbhavāccāśabdamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ na satpadavācyaṃ vastu api tu cetanaṃ brahmaiva । <quote>‘camasavadaviśeṣāditi’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1-
4-8)</ref> sūtre parameś‍varakāraṇikāyā eva prakṛterbahuprajājanakatvamityupapādayiṣyamāṇatvāt sattvarajastamassāmyāvasthārūpāyāstri-
guṇātmikāyāḥ prakṛtestamaḥpārthakyena rajassattvayogābhāvena kriyājñānaśaktisaṃbandhāprasakteḥ nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmacidaciccha-
ktiviśiṣṭasya kāryatvamiti vadatāmasmākaṃ mate kūṭasthasya parameś‍varasya jagadākāreṇa pariṇāmo vikāraheturiti bhavadudāhṛta-
doṣaprasaktigandhasyāpyabhāvācca sthūlasūkṣmacidacitprapañcarūpaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara eva kāryakāraṇarūpassatpadavācya iti nirṇayaḥ ।
nanu <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīya’</quote> mityādāvavadhāraṇena sadrūpaṃ vastu nirviśeṣamavagamyate । kāraṇāvasthametatkathaṃ sū-
kṣmaprapañcaviśiṣṭamityucyate, iti cet ucyate <quote>‘sadeve’</quote> tyavadhāraṇaṃ tu na viśeṣaniṣedhakaṃ kiṃtu <quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsīt’</quote> ।, tatī
<pb n="205"/>
vai sadajāyate’ti śravaṇajanyabhrāntiprasaktasyāsatkāraṇatvasya niṣedhakam । kiṃca <quote>‘āsī’</quote> diti kriyāviśeṣasya <quote>‘agre’</quote> iti kāla-
viśeṣasya ca nirdiṣṭatvāt avadhāraṇasyādhiṣṭhātrantaraniṣedhaparatvāt <quote>‘advitīya’</quote> mityasya jagadupādānatvabodhanaparatvācca nātra sa-
drūpasya vastuno nirviśeṣatvaṃ pratipattuṃ yuktam । athavā <quote>“śaktiśśivaśca sacchabdaprakṛtipratyayoditau । tau brahmasāmarasyena samastaja-
gadātmakā”</quote> vityabhiyuktoktarītyā prakṛtyā pratyayena ca satpadasya vastudvaya/?/pratipādanaparatvātprakṛtipratyayātmakasya satpadasya naika-
vastuparatvaṃ yuktam । ata eva sarvajñamanantaśaktiviśeṣaṃ ca sadrūpaṃ taditi siddham । sarvajñatvasarvaśaktitvaviśeṣamantareṇa brahmaṇo
jagadubhayakāraṇatvaṃ na siddhyet । ato'smadunnīta eva siddhānto nirbādha iti siddhāntaḥ ।। 5 ।।</p>
<p><quote>‘gauṇeścannātmaśabdāt’</quote> iti sūtrasyārthaḥ pūrvavadeva prāyaśaḥ । ātmaśabdādityasya <quote>‘sadeve’</quote> tyupakramya upasaṃhāre <quote>‘sa ātmā’</quote>
<quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityātmaśabdaśravaṇādityarthaḥ । tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvapi nekṣaṇasya gauṇatvamabhyupagatam । tattadātmatayā certaṃ/?/nasya parame-
śvarasyānuvṛtteḥ iti ।। 6 ।।</p>
<p>nanu māstvacetanaṃ pradhānamātmaśabdasyārthaḥ । cetanasya jīvasyātmaśabdavācyatve nāsti vivādaḥ । tarhi cetano jīva eva ja-
gatkāraṇaṃ sadrūpamastvityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tanniṣṭhasyeti</pratika> । satpadavācyatattvaniṣṭhasya <quote>‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye’</quote>
iti mokṣasyopadiśyamānatvātpradhānaniṣṭhasya tanmate'pi mokṣānabhyupagamāt । <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṃkarassarvamanyatparityajye’</quote>ti
jīvaniṣṭhasya ca tanniṣedhācca nātra pradhānaṃ jīvo vā satpadaviṣayaḥ iti ।। 7 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>heyatvāvacanācca</pratika> । pūrvasūtre tacchabdassamasto'pyapekṣāvaśādihānuṣaktaṣṣaṣṭhyantatayā vipariṇamyate । tataśca <pratika>tasya</pratika>=sadātma-
tattvasya heyatvāvacanāt nātra sthūlārundhatīnyāyānusaraṇena pradhānadvārātmopadeśa iti vaktuṃ śakyamiti bhāvaḥ । cakāraḥ
pūrvasūtreṇaikīkaraṇārthaḥ । na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśātpradhānaṃ na satpadavācyaṃ kiṃ tu taddheyatvāvacanādapīti tattātparyam ।। 8 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>pratijñāvirodhāt</pratika> ।। bhagavatpādamate nedaṃ sūtramasti । asyārthaḥ paraṃ pūrvasūtrasthacakāreṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ । śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣya-
yostu pṛthaksūtratayā pāṭho'sti । <quote>‘yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatī’</quote> tyādinā satpadavācyatattvajñānena sakalacetanācetanavastuvijñānaṃ
bhavatīti pratijñāyamānatvāt cetanasya pradhānakāraṇatvāyogācca nātra satpadavācyaṃ pradhānamiti tadarthaḥ ।। 9 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>svāpyayāt</pratika> । <quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavatī’</quote>ti satā saṃpannasya cetanasya jīvasya svāpyayasya layasya śravaṇāt ace-
tane pradhāne cetanajīvalayasyāyuktatvācca na pradhānaṃ satpadavācyamityarthaḥ ।। 10 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>gatisāmānyāt</pratika> ।। yathāsyāmupaniṣadi satpadasya parameśvaravācitvena gatiḥ tathā <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudrassanmaho namo nama’</quote>
ityādāvapi satpadasya gatiḥ samānā vartate । atassatpadavācyaḥ parameśvara eva na pradhānamityarthaḥ ।। 11 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrutatvācca</pratika> ।। <quote>‘ātmataḥ prāṇaḥ ātmata ākāśaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘ātmata evedaṃ sarvamiti’</quote> satpadavācyādātmanaḥ sarvotpatteḥ
śrutatvācca jagatkāraṇatvena satpadavācyaṃ brahmaiva na pradhānamiti siddham ।। 12 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, etadadhikaraṇasūtrāṇāṃ sarveṣāmarthavarṇanaprakriyā śrīkaṇṭhamatānusāriṇī । viṣayavākyamapi tathaiva । pūrvapakṣasiddhāṃ-
tādinirūpaṇamapi pūrvavadeva । <quote>‘gauṇaśce’</quote> diti sūtre ātmaśabdādityasya <quote>‘aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātme’</quote>ti sacchabdapratipādi-
tasya ātmaśabdena vyapadeśāt ityarthaḥ । tejo'bannānāmapi paramātmaiva ātmeti tejaādīnāmapi paramātmavācakatvāt gauṇekṣaṇa-
sāhacaryābhāvāt tatrāpi mukhyameva īkṣaṇamiti tātparyam । nānyeṣu guṇasūtreṣu vailakṣaṇyamiti vistarabhayādviramyate ।</p>
<p><pratika>śrutatvācca</pratika> ।। 12 ।। asyāmupaniṣadi sacchabdavācyasya ātmatvena nāmarūpavyākartṛtvasarvajñatvasarvaśaktitvasarvādhāratvā-
pahatapāpmatvasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi’</quote> <quote>‘tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā’</quote>
<quote>‘yaccāsyehāsti yacca nāsti sarvaṃ tadasmin samāhitaṃ’</quote> tasmin kāmāssamāhitāḥ’ eṣa ātmā apahatapāpmā’ ......<quote>‘satyakāmassatya-
saṃkalpa’</quote> ityādiśrutibhiḥ <quote>‘na tasya kaścit’</quote> <quote>‘sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya’</quote> <quote>‘antaḥpraviṣṭaśśāstā
janānām’</quote> <quote>‘viś‍vātmānaṃ parāyaṇam’</quote> <quote>‘patiṃ viś‍vasyātmeśvaraṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yacca kiṃcijjagatsarvaṃ’</quote>......<quote>‘vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘eko nārā-
yaṇaḥ’</quote> ityādiśrutyantaravacanaiśca pratipādyamānatvāt jagatkāraṇādivākyaṃ na pradhānādipratipādanayogyam । ataḥ sarvajñassarvaṃśaktiḥ
sarveś‍vareś‍varo nirastanikhiladoṣagandho'navadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaughamahārṇavaḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇa eva nikhila-
jagadekakāraṇaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ jijñāsyaṃ brahmeti siddham iti । saguṇeś‍varasvarūpanirṇaye paraṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatāt sarvatrāsti kiyatī
bhidā । anyacca । īśvarasya īkṣaṇavattvādiguṇopanyāsena idaṃprakaraṇasya saviśeṣaparatvaṃ yuktamiti nirviśeṣaparatāprakriyāyāṃ
doṣopanyāsapurassaraṃ saviśeṣaparatvamapi rāddhāntitam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśāstrasthaśabdapravṛttinimittasakalaguṇapūrttisiddha‍yarthaṃ vācyavṛttyā kṛts‍naśāstraviṣayatvaṃ pūrvasūtre
samanvayādityasyārthāntaratayā darśitam । tatra śabdārthabhūtaṃ vācyatvaṃ kārts‍nyaṃ cehākṣipya samarthayati---<pratika>īkṣaterityādinā</pratika> । tat=brahma
aśabdaṃ aśabdavācyaṃ na bhavati । kutaḥ īkṣateḥ=jñānaviṣayatvāt । ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘sa etasmāt jīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamī-
kṣate’</quote> iti śrutau brahmaṇaḥ īkṣyatvaśravaṇāt tat brahma śabdavācyameva bhavatīti tātparyam । <pratika>gauṇaścet</pratika>—<quote>‘sa etasmā’</quote> diti īkṣati-

atha ānandamayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
iha brahmalakṣaṇasya jagatkāraṇatvasya śāstraikasamadhigamyasya tāntrike pradhāne'-
tivyāptimāśaṅkya cetanatvādihetunā yathā tasminnativyāptirna bhavati tathā nirū-

ntaramārabhyate---</p>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। ānandamayo'bhyāsāt ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p><quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassaṃśūtaḥ’</quote> <ref>(tai॰ 2—1, 5.)</ref> ityārabhya <quote>‘tasmādvā
etasmādvijñānamayāt, anyo'ntara ātmā''nandamayaḥ’</quote> <ref>(2—1, 5.)</ref> iti kaścidākā-
śādisakalabhūtakāraṇatvena annamayādikośakañca‍ukāntaranigūḍha ātmā ānandamaya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pūrvādhikaraṇe sadvidyāvalambanapradhānakāraṇatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇena pradhāne brahmalakṣaṇasyāti-
vyāptirnirastā । tathaivānandavallyavalambanajīvakāraṇatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇena jīve tasyātivyā-
ptiriha nirasyata iti dṛṣṭāntasaṅgatyottarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>iheti ।। sū ।। ānandamayo-
bhyāsāt</pratika> ।। 13 ।। <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādvijñānamayādanyo'ntara ātmānandamaya’</quote> ityānandamaya
āmnāyate । tasya jīvatve'pi na tatra brahmalakṣaṇasyātivyāptiḥ । tasminkāraṇatvāśrayaṇāt
<quote>‘ātmana ākāśa’</quote> ityādinā prāgvarṇitasya kāraṇatvasyānnamayādiṣu paryavasānāsambhavādutta-
rottaramātmāntarapratipādanāt tatra tatra tadaparyavasāne ānandamayapratipādanānantaramapi ‘brahma
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śrutyuktaḥ gauṇaḥ sattvādiguṇabaddho jīva eveti cet । na—tathā na bhavati । kutaḥ । ātmaśabdāt īkṣaṇīyavastuni <quote>‘ātmanyevā-
tmānaṃ paśye’</quote>diti ātmaśabdaśravaṇāt ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>tanniṣṭhasya</pratika>—<quote>‘yasyānuvittaḥ pratibaddha ātme’</quote>ti ātmaniṣṭhasya puruṣasya mokṣopadeśāt ātmaśabdaḥ jīve mukhyo na
bhavati guṇabaddhātmajñānāt guṇanivṛttirūpamokṣānupapatteḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>heyatvāvacanāt</pratika>—brahmaṇaḥ mokṣārthaṃ prādhānyena ajñeyatvarūpahetvasyāpratipādanāt pratyuta <quote>‘tamaivekaṃ jānathe’</quote>ti jñeyatvava-
canācca na gauṇo jīva ātmaśabdavācyo bhavati kiṃ tu nirguṇo viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>svasya <pratika>svasmin apyayāt</pratika> layavacanāt <quote>‘ātmānaṃ vilāpayatī’</quote> ti śrutyuktaḥ nirguṇa eva ātmaśabdavācyabhūtaḥ na
tu gauṇo jīva ityarthaḥ । ata eva cāsau nirguṇo viṣṇureva śabdavācya ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>gateḥ</pratika>—nānāśākhājanyajñānasya <pratika>sāmānyāt</pratika> ekatvarūpaśravaṇāt na viṣṇoranyaḥ kāraṇatvena śākhāntarapratipādya ityarthaḥ ।
<quote>‘eko deva’</quote> itiśrutāvuktatvācca na aśabdavācyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>asminmate paraṃ brahma mukhyatayā sakalaśāstrapratipādyamiti samanvayasūtroktaṃ yuktaṃ vā na veti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘aśabdamasparśaṃ’</quote>
<quote>‘yato vāco nivartante’</quote> ityādiṣu vacaneṣu avācyatvaśravaṇāt brahma sakalaśāstravācyaṃ na bhavatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p><quote>‘sa etasmā’</quote> diti īkṣatiśruteḥ īkṣaṇīye tasmin ātmaśabdaśravaṇāt pūrṇatvābhidhāyinaścātmaśabdasya paricchinnatvenābhyupagate
saguṇe vṛttyayogāt saguṇaniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśānupapatteḥ pratyuta saguṇasya mumukṣubhirheyatvāt saguṇe pūrvatvasvāpyayayorasaṃbhavāt
<quote>‘kevalo nirguṇa’</quote>śceti nirguṇasyaiva ca śrutatvāt sarvavedotpādyajñānaikarūpyeṇa gatisāmānyena śrutītihāsādīnāṃ virodhābhāvasya paiṅgi-
śrutyā pratipāditatvāt kāsucicchākhāsvanyathocyata iti śaṅkānudayācca paraṃ brahma mukhyatayā sakalaśāstrapratipādyamiti samanvayasū-
troktaṃ yuktameveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>

anyo'ntara ātme’ti bhedavyapadeśāt brahmānekatvābhāvādannamayādayaḥ śarīrādikośā eva ।
‘eteṣu brahmaśabdastvannasamṛddhyādiphalakabrahmadṛṣṭividhānārthaḥ । vidhyupāstikriyānvayāditi bhāvaḥ ।
nanvannamayādyupāsanānāmannasamṛddhyādiḥ phalamuktaṃ nānandamayopāsanasya । atastadupāsanasya <quote>‘bra-
hmavidāpnoti para’</quote>mityanenaiva phalamuktamiti śrutyabhiprāyāvagamāt vedyatvenopakrāntaṃ brahma āna-
ndamaya eveti avasīyate । na ca brahmaṇyannamayādiśabdoktaśarīrādisambandhānupapattiḥ । na
hyatra śarīrādīnāmānandamayenopakaraṇopakaraṇibhāvasambandha uktaḥ । kiṃ tu bāhyābhyantarabhāva-
sambandhaḥ । sa tu jīveneva hṛdayasthitena brahmaṇāpi sambhavati । ata eva sthūlārundhatīnyāyā-
dannamayādikrameṇa buddhyavatāraṇamapi brahmaṇi sambhavati । anyathā bhṛguvallyāṃ kā gatiḥ ।
tatra hi <quote>‘yato vā ivāmāni bhūtāni jāyanta’</quote> iti jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahma prastutya ‘annaṃ

brahmatvaprasādhanītyata āha—<pratika>niratiśayatveneti</pratika> ।<quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote>ityādyanantaraṃ <quote>‘tada-

śeṣaparo na bhavatīti kiṃ tvānantyapara iti bhāvaḥ। sūtre niratiśayatvaviśeṣaṇādyabhāve'pyabhyāsa-
syānandaviṣayatvaṃ tanniratiśayatvavaiśiṣṭyamapi tasya hetūkaraṇasāmarthāllabhyate । nanvānandamaya-
pratiṣṭhātvena nirdiṣṭasya brahmaṇo'yamānandābhyāsaḥ na tvānandamayasyetyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>asyeti</pratika> ।

tāvadavasīyate । <quote>‘prajāpatiścaratī’</quote>ti mantrasyāyamarthaḥ । prajāpatirjīvasamaṣṭirūpo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ

ropādhibhirbahudhā suranaratiryagādibahuprakāreṇa jāyate । tasya yoniṃ sthānaṃ dhīrāḥ dhīmanto
jānanti । kiṃ tat । marīcīnāṃ padamādityamaṇḍalaṃ tasya vedhasaḥsthānamicchantīti । asyāpi
mantrasya prajāpatiśrutyā sakalajīvasamaṣṭyabhimānino hiraṇyagarbhasya tadahaṃbhāvaviṣayavyaṣṭijī-
<note>(1) <quote>‘manyathā neyam’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="233"/>
vātmanā garbhāvasthānajananavarṇanaucityāt । tasyādityamaṇḍalasthānatvācca sa eva hiraṇyagarbhaḥ
pratipādyo'vasīyate । hiraṇyagarbhasya ādityamaṇḍalaṃ sthānamiti kutra pratipannamiti cet cha-
ndogopaniṣadi । tatra hyevaṃ śrūyate---<quote>‘asadevedamagra āsīttatsadāsīttatsamabhavat tadāṇḍaṃ nira-
vartata tatsaṃvatsarasya mātrāmaśayata tannirabhidyata te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatāṃ
tadrajataṃ yeyaṃ pṛthivī yatsuvarṇaṃ sā dyauḥ yajjarāyuḥ te parvatāḥ yadulbaṃ sa megho nīhāro yā
dhamanayaḥ tā nadyo yadvāsteyamudakaṃ sa samudro'tha yattadajāyata so'sāvādityaḥ taṃ jāyamānaṃ
ghoṣāulūlavo'nūdatiṣṭhan sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāstasyodayaṃ pratipattyāyaṃghoṣā-
ulūlavo'nūttiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarve caiva kāmā’</quote>iti । atra hi pralaye prapañcasyāsacchabdo-
ktāvyaktanāmarūpatayāvasthānaṃ tataḥ sargādāvākāśādimahābhūtasṛṣṭyā sacchabdavācyavyaktanāma-
rūpatāṃ tato mahābhūtānāṃ brahmāṇḍādyutpādanasāmarthyasiddhaye pañjīkaraṇena trivṛtkaraṇena vānyo-
nyasaṅgatatvarūpaṃ sambhūtatvamaṇḍotpattimaṇḍasya dvidhābhāvādikaṃ ca purāṇaprakriyayaiva nirūpya
tasya brahmāṇḍasya madhye yaddhiraṇyagarbhasya jananaṃ smṛtipurāṇeṣu pratipāditam । śatapathabrāhmaṇe
coddhārakāṇḍe <quote>‘āpo vā idamagra āsītsalilameve’</quote>tyupakrasya<quote>‘tāsvantarhiraṇmayamaṇḍaṃ sambabhūve’</quote>
tyādinā tāsvapsu brahmāṇḍasyotpattimabhidhāya<quote>‘tadantaḥ puruṣassambabhūve’</quote>ti tanmadhye puruṣasyo-
tpattimuktvā <quote>‘sa prajāpati’</quote>riti tatra prajāpatināmakīrtanena <quote>‘sa bhūriti vyāharat tadimaṃ lokama-
janaya’</quote>dityādinā bhūlokādisraṣṭṛtvakīrtanena ca tathaiva ca spaṣṭīkṛtam । tatsthāne ādityasya
jananamuktvā<quote>‘tasyodayaṃ pratī’</quote>tyādinā pratidivasamudayan dvīpāntarādāgacchanprasiddhāditya evā-
trādityaśabdenokta iti vibhāvitam। tena jñāyate hiraṇyagarbha evādityamaṇḍalasthatvāttatrādityaśa-
bdenokta iti । bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadi ca <quote>‘yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvami’</quote>ti <quote>‘sa vai śarīrī prathama’</quote>
iti ca śrutismṛtyoḥ prathamajatvena prasiddhaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaṃ <quote>‘sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ
brahme’</quote>ti prastutya <quote>‘āpa evedamagra āsustā āpassatyamasṛjata ityadbha‍yassambhūta’</quote> ityuktaprakāreṇa
tasya sṛṣṭimuktvā <quote>‘tadyatsatyaṃ asau sa ādityo ya etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo ya-
ścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe'kṣa’</quote>nniti tasyādityamaṇḍalasthatvaṃ spaṣṭamevoktam । maṇḍalābhimāninā-
madheyena mārtāṇḍaśabdena ca mṛte dvidhākaraṇādārte'ṇḍe jāta ityarthe vṛddhairvyutpādi-
ditena brahmāṇḍodarajāto hiraṇyagarbha eva maṇḍalastha iti vibhāvitam । tataśca ādi-
tyamaṇḍalasthānatvāt liṅgāddhiraṇyagarbhaḥ pratipādyo'vasīyata iti yuktameva । <quote>‘vedhasa’</quote> iti ṣa-
ṣṭhyantayā vedhaḥśrutyāpi tathā'vasīyate । <quote>‘yo devebhya’</quote> iti mantrasyārthaḥ । yo dyutimadbhya indrā-
didevebhyo'dhikaṃ tapati yasteṣāmagre śraiṣṭhye nihitaḥ parameśvareṇa yastebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ jātastasmai ro-
camānāya brahmaṇo'patyāya nama iti । yadvā devagrahaṇaṃ manuṣyādīnāmapyupalakṣaṇam । tataścā-
yamarthaḥ । yo devādibhyasteṣāṃ vyavahārasiddhaye ātapati prakāśaṃ karoti । yaśca teṣāṃ purohitaḥ
udayan pratipuruṣamagre nihitaḥ । yaśca tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ jātaḥ tasmai nama iti । atrāpyādityātmaka-
ssurajyeṣṭha iti prasiddho <quote>‘yo devānāṃ prathamaṃ purastā’</quote>diti <quote>‘yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrva’</quote>miti ca
prathamasiddhaśarīratvena pratipanno hiraṇyagarbhaḥ pratipādya iti spaṣṭam । <quote>‘rucaṃ brāhma’</quote>mityasyārthaḥ।
rocamānaṃ brahmaṇo'patyaṃ prakṛtaṃ hiraṇyagarbhamaṇḍakaṭāhanivartanadvāreṇotpādayantaḥ sadāśivādyāḥ
<pb n="234"/>
śravaṇāt । tato hiraṇyagarbha eva jagatprasūtihetutvādinā'tra pratipādyata iti
prāpte brūmaḥ । parameśvarāditaro bhinno hiraṇyagarbho'tra na pratipādyaḥ । jagatprasūti-
hetutvādīnāṃ parameśvaradharmāṇāṃ tasminnanupapatteḥ । <quote>‘yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī’</quote> tyā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ākāśādyabhimānidevatāḥ tadbrahmaṇopatyamuddiśyābruvan yastvāṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ vetti tasya devā-
ssarve vaśyā bhavantīti । nanu, pūrvānuvākarūpapuruṣasūktaikavākyatvādasyānuvākasya puruṣasūktasya
ca nārāyaṇaparatvātkathamasya hiraṇyagarbhaparatvamupapadyate । ucyate । puruṣasūkte <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣā
puruṣa’</quote>ityādibhiḥ śvetāśvataropaniṣadi śivaparatvena nirjñātairmantraiḥ śivaṃ prastutya <quote>‘tasmādvirā-
ḍajāyata virājo adhi puruṣa’</quote> iti śivāddhiraṇmayatayā vividhaṃ rājamānasyāṇḍasya tadanantaraṃ
tatra hiraṇyagarbhasya cotpattimabhidhāya tasyaiva mukhādyavayavebhyo'gnyādidevānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ
cotpattirabhihitā । na tu nārāyaṇasyāvayavebhyaḥ । pūrvaṃ tatprasaṅgābhāvāt । aitareyopaniṣadi
<quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsī’</quote>dityādinā parameśvaraṃ prastutya <quote>‘so'dbha‍ya eva puruṣaṃ samuddha‍ṛ-
tyāmūrchayattamabhyatapa’</quote>diti tatkṛtāṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya sṛṣṭiṃ tasya sṛṣṭyunmukhatāpattiṃ coktvā <quote>‘ta-
syābhitaptasya mukhaṃ nirabhidyata yathāṇḍamukhādvāgvāco'gnirnāsike nirabhidyetāṃ nāsikābhyāṃ
prāṇaḥ prāṇādvāyuḥ akṣiṇī nirabhidyetāṃ akṣībhyāṃ cakṣuścakṣuṣa ādityaḥ karṇau nirabhidyetāṃ
karṇābhyāṃ śrotraṃ śrotrāddiśa’</quote> ityādināgnyādīnāṃ hiraṇyagarbhāvayavebhyaḥ pūrvamutpattivarṇanāt ।
mānave dharmaśāstre parameśvarasṛṣṭabrahmāṇḍodarajātaṃ hiraṇyagarbhameva prastutya <quote>‘lokānāṃ tu vivṛ-
ddha‍yarthaṃ mukhabāhūrupādanaḥ । brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ ca niravartaya’</quote>diti smaraṇācca । yājña-
valkye dharmaśāstre parameśvaraṃ prastutya <quote>‘mukhabāhūrupajjāssyustasya varṇā yathākrama’</quote>miti smaryata
iti cenna । tasyodāhṛtaśrutismṛtyanusāreṇa hiraṇyagarbhaśarīrānupraviṣṭatadātmabhūtaparameśvaravi-
ṣayatvopapatteḥ । tasmātpuruṣasūktamārabhya prakṛtameva hiraṇyagarbhamuddiśya pravartamānasya <quote>‘hrīśca ta’</quote>
ityāderetadanuvākavākyaikavākyatāṃ prāpitānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamantrāṇāṃ ca kathamapyanyaparatvāśaṅkā
nāvakāśaṃ labhate । evaṃ coktamahimā sa eva hiraṇyagarbhaḥ pūrvakalpānuṣṭhitopāsanālabdhasatya-
saṅkalpatvādimahimā jagatprasūtyādisakalaprapañcahetutvena pratipādyata ityatastatrātivyāptaṃ brahma-
lakṣaṇamiti pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tata iti । tasminnanupapatteriti</pratika> । jagatprasavadharmiṇī pa-
rā śaktirhi jagatprasūtiḥ sā parameśvarasya nityānapāyinī prabheti tasyāḥ prapañcamahāvṛkṣāṅkurata-
yonmeṣarūpā prasūtiḥ <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmātprasṛtā purāṇī’</quote> tyuktaprakārā parameśvarādeva sambhavatīti ।
<quote>‘tadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnā’</quote>mityasādhāraṇabrahmaśabdārthatvoktyā vyajyamānaṃ trividhaparicchedarā-
hityarūpatadarthapauṣkalyaṃ tatraiva sambhavati । <quote>‘tadeva bhūtaṃ tadu bhavyamāhurida’</quote>miti sāmānyena
bhūtabhāvivartamānasakalakalpānuyāyisarvaprapañcātmakatvamucyamānamapi tatraiva sambhavati । <quote>‘tadeva
śukramamṛtaṃ tadbrahma sa āpassa prajāpati’</quote>rityatra <quote>‘śukramamṛta’</quote>mityucyamānaṃ nityamuktavibhūti-
katvaṃ <quote>‘sa prajāpati’</quote>riti prajāpatiśabdoktahiraṇyagarbhavibhūtikatvaṃ ca tasminneva sambhavati ।
ekavacanānto hi prajāpatiśabdo hiraṇyagarbhaparaḥ । na tu dakṣakāśyapādiparaḥ । tadbrahme’ti ‘tu
vedādivibhūtikatvaparaṃ tasminnupapadyate । etānyuktāni sarvāṇi jagatprasūtihetutvādīni hira-
ṇyagarbhe nopapadyanta ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘parātpara’</quote>mityādikamapyāpekṣikatvādinā yojayitumihāśakya-
mityāśayenāha—<pratika>yataḥ prasūteti</pratika> । yasya jagatprasūtihetutvādikamuktaṃ yataḥ paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ ca ya-
<pb n="235"/>
rabhya jagatprasūtihetostasya <quote>‘ataḥ paraṃ nānyadaṇīyasaṃ hi parātparaṃ yanmahato mahā-
ntam । yadekamevyaktamanantarūpaṃ viśvaṃ purāṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt ।’</quote> ityādinā sarvo-
tkṛṣṭatvaṃ tamasaḥ prakṛtimaṇḍalātparatvaṃ cāvagamyate । tadaṇḍāntarvartino hiraṇyaga-
rbhasya na sambhavati । kiṃca <quote>‘ya enaṃ viduramṛtāste bhavantī’</quote> tyasya jñānādamṛtatvaṃ
muktirabhidhīyate । tanna hiraṇyagarbhe sambhavati । parameśvarasya hi muktihetutvama-
sādhāraṇaṃ liṅgam । <quote>‘yadā carmavadākāśaṃ veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ । tadā śivama-
vijñāya duḥkhasyānto bhaviṣyatī’</quote> ti śravaṇāt । yaduktamupakramopasaṃhārasiddha iti

to'nyatpṛthagbhūtaṃ yato'ṇīyaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ ca vastu nāstītyuktam । tasmātparaṃ kimadhikaṃ bhaviṣyati
yeneha parātparatvamāpekṣikaṃ nīyeta । <quote>‘parātparataro brahme’</quote>tyatra tu tato'pi parasyānupadameva varṇya-
mānatvāttadāpekṣikamiti yuktam । <quote>‘tamasaḥ parastā’</quote>dityetadapi na stutyarthaṃ kālpanikam ।

tvavarṇanāditi bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘yadā carmava’</quote>diti mantre yadetyasya yadītyarthaḥ । upakramopasaṃhārasiddho
hiraṇyagarbha iti śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati—<pratika>yaduktamiti । tadaprayojakamiti</pratika> । madhyagatairapi
bahupramāṇairvirodhe sati upakramopasaṃhāraikarūpyamaprayojakamityarthaḥ । sūtre bahupramāṇavirodhaṃ dyo-
tayitumeva liṅgaviśeṣamanupanyasya sāmānyenānupapattorityuktam । evaṃ copakramopasaṃhāragataśabdau
yogena parameśvare yojanīyāvityāha—<pratika>anupapattyeti</pratika> । muṇḍake <quote>‘tasmādetadbrahma nāmarūpamannaṃ
ca jāyate । tapasā cīyate brahma tato'nnamabhijāyata’</quote> iti kāryakāraṇayoḥ prayuktasya brahmaśa-
bdasyevātra vibhūtivibhūtimatoḥ prayuktasya prajāpatiśabdasyārthabhedāvaśyambhāvena kasya cidavaśya-
kalpanīyo yogaḥ prākaraṇikaliṅgānusārāt vibhūtimati prayuktasya kalpyate । dhātṛśabda<quote>‘stva-
mbhasyapāra’</quote> iti sūktopasaṃhāragato na bhavati । <quote>‘puruṣasya vidmahe sahasrākṣasya mahādevasya dhī-
mahi । tanno rudraḥ pracodayāt’</quote> । <quote>‘tatpuruṣāya vidmahe mahādevāya dhīmahi । tanno rudraḥ praco-

gāyatryādīnāṃ snānārthadūrvādhāraṇādimantrāṇāṃ ca paramātmasūktāntarbhāvābhāvāt । tathaiva ca
bhaṭṭabhāskareṇa sūktamaryādāyāḥ pradarśitatvāt । evaṃ copakramopasaṃhāraparyālocanāyāṃ prajāpa-
tiśruterupakramasthatve'pi tata ekasyāḥ pratyekamabhyastayoraupasaṃhārikarudramahādevaśrutyoḥ prabala-
tvāt sūktasya parameśvaraparatvameva siddha‍yati । athāpi yadi dhātṛśruterupasaṃhāragatatvamabhyupagamyate
tathāpi tasyāḥ parameśvare yaugikatvamabhyupagantuṃ yuktam । madhyagatabahuśrutiliṅgānusārāditi
bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘yamantassamudra’</quote> iti tvevaṃ netavyam । samudraḥ puruṣaḥ । <quote>‘nāgnistṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ nāpa-

nāṃ patiṃ jagaddhārakaṃ parameśvarameva’</quote> pratipādayataḥ । adbhyassambhūto hiraṇyagarbha-

<!-- APPAYYA !-->
matti । yaddha kiṃcāśnute attyenaṃ manyete’tyādyaitareyopaniṣadi śrūyate । evaṃ ca yamantaḥpuruṣe
hṛdayādipradeśeṣu kavayaścintāsantānena tantujālena paṭamiva svasvābhimatarūpaviśiṣṭaṃ vayantī-
tyarthaḥ । evaṃ sati <quote>‘vayantī’</quote>tyetadapi svārasyaṃ labhate । uttaranārāyaṇādyekavākyatāpādanenāpi
nāsya hiraṇyagarbhaparatvasiddhirityāha—<pratika>adbha‍ya iti</pratika> । uttaranārāyaṇe hi <quote>‘vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahā-
nta’</quote>miti dvitīyamantraḥ । tatra śrūyamāṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt vartamānatvamananyopāyamuktihetuveda-
naviṣayatvaṃ ca hiraṇyagarbhe na sambhavatīti tasya śivaparatvamavaśyaṃ vaktavyam । tannirvāhāya ca
<quote>‘tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhadrūpametī’</quote>ti pūrvamantre hiraṇyagarbhasyāntaryāmitayā prastutaḥ parameśvara eva
<quote>‘etaṃ puruṣa’</quote>mityanena parāmṛśyate । na tu hiraṇyagarbha ityupapādanīyam । evaṃ ca hiraṇyagarbhavi-
ṣayatve'pi tadantaryāmimahimaparyavasāyyeva so'nuvākaḥ । tathā hiraṇyagarbhamantrāṣṭakamadhye <quote>‘ya
īśe asya dvipadaścatuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidheme’</quote>ti paṭhyate । tena śivāsādhāraṇaṃ paśu-
patitvaṃ varṇyate । <quote>‘etāvanto vai paśavo dvipādaścatuṣpādaśce’</quote>ti śrutyantaradarśanāt । ata eva
śvetāśvataropaniṣadi <quote>‘yo devānāṃ prabhavaścodbhavaśca viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ । hiraṇyagarbhaṃ pa-
śyata jāyamānaṃ sa no devaḥ śubhayā smṛtyā saṃyunaktu’</quote> iti mantrānantaraṃ <quote>‘yo devānāmadhipo
yasmim̐llokā adhiśritā’</quote> iti mantrasyedamevottarārdhaṃ paṭhyate । atastatra śruto hiraṇyagarbhaśabdaḥ
parameśvaraparo vyākhyeyaḥ । hiraṇyarūpaṃ vīryamasya garbha iti vyutpatteḥ । na ca <quote>‘prajāpatirvai hira-
ṇyagarbha’</quote> iti tadvyākhyānarūpārthavādadarśanāt tasya kamalāsanaparatvaṃ vaktavyamiti vācyam ।
<quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhassamavartatāgra’</quote> ityādi <quote>‘āghāramāghārayati’</quote> iti vāyavyapaśāvāghāre mantravidheḥ
khalvayamarthavādaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘prajāpatirvai hiraṇyagarbhaḥ prajāpateranurūpatvāye’</quote>ti । sa tvamantrake prā-
jāpatye pūrvāghāre na bhavati । kiṃtvaindre mantravatyuttarāghāre । tasminprakṛtau mantrakāryasya niyamā-
dṛṣṭasya klṛptatvena tadapekṣitamantramātravidhau lāghavādamantrake pūrvāghāre prakṛtāvaklṛptasya tasyā-
pyatraiva kalpanīyatayā gauravāditi sthāpitaṃ daśame'dhyāye <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhe pūrvasya mantraliṅgāduttara-
sya vā mantrārthatvā’</quote>diti pūrvottarapakṣa<ref>(jai॰ 10.3.13,15.)</ref> sūtrābhyām । tathā cānena mantreṇa
viniyojakaśrutibalāt dvitīyāghāradevatāyāḥ indrasya prakāśanaṃ kartavyamiti tannirvāhāya
mantrasthahiraṇyagarbhapadasyeva tadvyākhyānarūpaprajāpatipadasyāpi indraparatvasya vaktavyatvāt na
tadbalānmantragatahiraṇyagarbhapadasya kamalāsanaparatvaprasaktiḥ । ataśśvetāśvataropaniṣatpratyabhi-
jñānagṛhītapāśupatyaliṅgāddhiraṇyagarbhamantrā api parameśvaraparā eva । kiṃ tu <quote>‘vacanāttvayathārtha-
maindrī syā’</quote>diti <ref>(jai॰ 3.2.3.)</ref> nyāyādaindryāghāre viniyogavidhyanusāreṇa tadanuṣṭhānakāle
yathākathañcidindre mantrā/?/rtho yojanīyaḥ । tasmānna tadubhayaikavākyatayāpyasya sūktasya hiraṇya-
garbhaparatvaprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ । tathāpyuttaranārāyaṇapaṭhitaḥ <quote>‘prajāpatiścarati garbhe antaḥ’</quote> iti
mantrabhāga iha <quote>‘ambhasyapāra’</quote> iti mantrapaṭhitaḥ parameśvare na saṅghaṭate । tatra hiraṇyagarbhaparatvenā-
vadhṛtatvādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>tata iti</pratika> । iha jagatprasūtihetutvādipārameśvaraliṅgasattvā <quote>‘nnaita-

tvādinā prajāpatiśabdavācyaḥ parameśvaro na hiraṇyagarbhaḥ ।।

<sutra>।। sū ।। bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
asyāṃ mahopaniṣadi parameśvarahiraṇyagarbhayoḥ bhedo vyapadiśyate kāraṇatvena-

mūrdhvaṃ na tiryañca’</quote>mityādiśvetāśvataropaniṣadgatānekamantratadaṃśapratyabhijñānasattvācca tadvirodhe'nya-
parakiṃcinmaṃtrāṃśe pratyabhijñānamakiñcitkaramiti bhāvaḥ । nanu, tathāpi <quote>‘abhimantā jīvo niyaṃ-
teśvarassarvābhimānī hiraṇyagarbha’</quote> iti tāpanīyaśruteḥ samaṣṭijīve hiraṇyagarbha iva parameśvare
vyaṣṭijīvātmanā garbha sañcāro na ghaṭata iti cenna । hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi sarvābhimānitvaṃ sarva-

māṇaḥ pratyaṅjanāstiṣṭhati sarvatomukha’</quote> iti । bho janā antaryāmitayā parameśvarassarveṣāṃ pratyagrūpa-
stiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ । ayaṃ mantraḥ/?/ kiñcitpāṭhabhedenātrāpi sūkte śrūyate । tasmādyuktamuktaṃ <quote>‘netaro'nu-
papatteḥ’</quote> iti । tatra na hiraṇyagarbha iti nirdeṣṭavye <quote>‘netara’</quote> iti nirdeśo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ parameśva-
rānna bhidyate atastatra lakṣaṇasattvaṃ na doṣāyeti keṣāñcinmataṃ nirasituṃ kṛtaḥ । tannirāsahetupra-
darśanārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>parameśvareṇeti</pratika> । atredaṃ śaṅkābījam । prapañcasṛṣṭihetukā-

kasāmānādhikaraṇyācca hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śivābhinnaḥ । ata eva kūrmapurāṇe vasumanaso rājño ja-

sūryamaṇḍalāddhiraṇyagarbharūpeṇa prādurbhūtasyaiva devasya kṣaṇāntare parameśvararūpeṇa darśanamuktam ।
<quote>“pūrṇe varṣaśate tasya bhagavānugradīdhitiḥ । prādurāsīnmahāyogī bhānormaṇḍalamadhyataḥ । sa dṛṣṭvā
devavapuṣaṃ maṇḍalasthaṃ sanātanam । svayambhuvamanādyantaṃ brahmāṇaṃ vismayaṃ gataḥ । tuṣṭāva vaidikai-
rmantraiḥ/?/ sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ । kṣaṇādapaśyatpuruṣaṃ tameva parameśvaram । caturmukhaṃ jaṭāmaulimaṣṭa-
hastaṃ trilocanam । candrāvayavalakṣmāṇaṃ naranārītanuṃ haram । bhāsayantaṃ jagatkṛtsnaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ
svaraśmibhiḥ ।।”</quote> ityādinā । tasmāddhiraṇyagarbhasya śivābhinnatvāttatra lakṣaṇasattvaṃ na doṣaḥ ।
atastadvyāvartanāya yatno na kārya ityetacchaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram ।। sū ।। <pratika>bhedavyapadeśācca

ūrdhvaretāḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇuryāvadābhūtasamplava’</quote>miti śivapurāṇe, <quote>‘tataḥ prabhṛti viśvātmā na pra-

punarāśaṅkyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prajāpatirakāmayata prajāssṛjeyeti’</quote> <ref>(tai. saṃ. 3-1-1.)</ref> iti sarvatra śrutiṣu
saṃkalpo hiraṇyagarbhasya jagatsṛṣṭau śrūyate । tathā'pi tasya jagatkāraṇatve anu-
mānāpekṣā yuktyapekṣā nāsti, tasya kāmasyāvāntarasṛṣṭiviṣayatvāt । parameśvara-
syaiva hiraṇyagarbhātmanā avāntarasṛṣṭiśceti vakṣyati---<quote>‘saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptistu trivṛ-
tkurvata upadeśāt’</quote> <ref>(bra. sū. 2—4—20.)</ref> iti ।।

hiraṇyagarbharūpeṇātmanā prapañcānupraviṣṭasya parameśvarasya nāmarūpakartṛtvaśravaṇāt
anayorabheda evābhyupeya ityata āha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
asmin upaniṣattantra eva asya hiraṇyagarbhasya tadyogaṃ tasya parameśvarasya
