vibhoḥ । lalāṭaṃ tasya nirbhidya prādurāsītprabhormukhāt । nirdiṣṭaḥ parameśena maheśo nīlalohi-
taḥ । putro bhūtvānugṛhṇāti brahmāṇaṃ brahmaṇo'nuja’</quote>ityādimahābhārataskāndalaiṅgaśaivapurāṇādivaca-
nāni cātra draṣṭavyāni । tasmātrimūrtīnāṃ parasparasmādutpattisattve'pi brahmaviṣṇurudrādikramika-
sarvaprapañcakāraṇaṃ saṃsārarujāṃ drāvakaḥ paramaśiva eveti tadviṣayasya <quote>‘yo devānā’</quote>miti mantrasya
nārthāntarakalpanaśaṅkāvakāśa iti । athottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>punarāśaṅkyeti</pratika> । āśaṅkābhi-
prāyaḥ pūrvasūtrāvatārikāyāṃ darśitaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā</pratika> ।। 19 ।। <pratika>jagatkā-
raṇatva iti</pratika> । jagatkāraṇaśivābhinnatve yadanumānaṃ tatrādaro na kārya ityarthaḥ । avāntara-
sṛṣṭiḥ devamanuṣyādivyaṣṭisṛṣṭiḥ । tatrāpi na hiraṇyagarbhasya svātantryam । kiṃ tu tadantaryā-
miṇaśśivasyaiveti vakṣyamāṇārthaṃ smārayati—<pratika>parameśvarasyaiveti</pratika> । tathāca yadi sargādyakālasṛ-
ṣṭihetuḥ yadi vārvācīnakatipayasṛṣṭihetukāmanāvattvam ubhayathā heturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ । sautreṇa
cakāreṇa śrautaṃ brahmaśivaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ paurāṇikaṃ prathamaṃ brahmatvena dṛṣṭasya punaśśi-
vatvena darśanaṃ cetyetadapi brahmaśivābhedasādhakatvena nādaraṇīyam । śarīraśarīribhāvādinā
sarvātmakatvena tadubhayopapatteriti samuccīyate । yatrādityarūpasya hiraṇyagarbhasya śivarūpeṇāpi
darśanamuktaṃ tatraiva hi kūrmapurāṇe tayorbhedo'pi pratipādyate । <quote>‘vidyāsahāyo bhagavānyasyā-
sau maṇḍalāntare । hiraṇyagarbha putro'sāvīśvaro dṛśyate para’</quote>iti । vidyāsahāyo bhagavānasau
maṇḍalāntare sthito hiraṇyagarbho yasya putraḥ asau parameśvaro dṛśyata ityanvayaḥ ।। uttarasūtra-
mavatārayitumāśaṅkate—<pratika>aneneti</pratika> । nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ tāvaccaturmukhakartṛkamiti sakalapurāṇā-
dyaikakaṇṭhyena prasiddham । tatra pārameśvarottamapuruṣaprayogena parameśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ vadantī śrutiḥ
parameśvarasya taccharīratvena tadabhedena vopapādanīyā । taccharīrakatvapakṣe <quote>‘jīvenātmane’</quote>ti sā-
mānādhikaraṇyānupapatterabhedapakṣa eva pariśiṣyata iti bhāvaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>asminnasya ca tadyo-
<pb n="241"/>
śeṣatvasaṃbandhaṃ śāsti mantrabhāgaḥ—<quote>‘brahmādhipatirbrahmaṇo'dhipatiḥ’</quote> (mahānā. 12.)
। iti । ataḥ parameśvara eva jagatkāraṇaṃ, taccheṣabhūto hiraṇyagarbha iti siddham ।।
।। iti itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
gaṃ śāsti ।। 20 ।। brahmādhipatiriti</pratika> । <quote>‘īśānassarvavidyānāmi’</quote>tyanena vedādhipatyasya
<quote>‘īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānā’</quote>mityanena brāhmaṇādhipatyasya ca siddhatvādihābhyāsena hiraṇyagarbhādhipatyameva
vidhīyate । śrutyantarāpātapratipannatadutkarṣatadabhedabhrāntivāraṇāyeti bhāvaḥ । jīvaviṣayātmaśa-
bdaprayogopapattistu saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇe <ref>(bra0 2।8।17 sū)</ref>pradarśayiṣyate ।।
<head>।। iti itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū0 ।। netaro'nupapatteḥ ।। 17 ।। bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 18 ।। kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 19 ।। asminna
sya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>brahmā yataḥ prasūtetyādau kāraṇatayā samāmnātāḥ । tadupakramopasaṃhṛtimadhyaśrutibhissaliṅgābhiḥ ।। 19 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ mokṣapradatvādyanitarasurasādhāraṇaṃ śambhuliṅgaṃ liṅge tvantassamudraśrutisamadhigate nāstyasādhāraṇatvam ।</l>
<l>dṛṣṭāstāśśaṃkare'pi śrutaya iti tato yogavṛttyaiva yojyā nābhedenopapādyāḥ śivajanitatayā tasya bhedopadeśāt ।। 20 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dhātussṛṣṭyarthakāmaśrutibhiranumitistadvadīśāvibhede nāpekṣāvāṃtareṣu prabhavati hi jagatsṛṣṭibhedeṣu so'pi ।</l>
<l>yajjīvenātmaneti śrutivacanamanenāpi nābhedasiddhiḥ tasyātra brahmaṇo'sāvadhipatiriti yacchāsti śeṣatvayogam ।। 21 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athānandamayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū. । ānandamayo'bhyāsāt ।। 12 ।। vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāt ।। 13 ।। taddhetuvyapadeśācca
।। 14 ।। māntravarṇikameva ca gīyate ।। 15 ।। netaro'nupapatteḥ ।। 16 ।। bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 17 ।। kāmācca
nānumānāpekṣā ।। 18 ।। asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamekamadhikaraṇam । itthaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntavākyānāmupāstividhidvārā sākṣācca nirviśeṣa-
brahmaparatve siddhe'pyadhunā nirviśeṣavākyavicārātmakamidamadhikaraṇamārabhate---<pratika>ānandamayo'bhyāsāditi</pratika> । asyādhikara-
ṇasya ekadeśīyamatarītyā svamatarītyā ca varṇakadvayamupanyastaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣye । ekadeśīyamate varṇakaṃ yathā---<pratika>ānandamayaḥ</pratika>=
taittirīye <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmānandamaya’</quote> ityatra śrutānandamayaśabdavācyaḥ paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=ānandamaya-
śabdasya brahmaṇyeva bahukṛtvo'bhyāsāditi sūtrārthaḥ । asya taittirīye śrutam <quote>‘annamaya’</quote> ityādyupakrāntam <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmā-
nandamaya’</quote> ityantaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra ānandamayaśabdena kiṃ <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote> miti prakṛtaṃ paraṃ brahmocyate kiṃ vānnamayādivadbra/?/-
hmaṇo'rthāntaraṃ jīva iti saṃśayaḥ । annamayādyamukhyātmapravāhapaṭhitatvāt priyādyavayavayogāt śārīratvaśravaṇācca ānandamaya-
śabdavācyo brahmaṇo'rthāntaraṃ jīva eveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p>ānandamayaṃ prakṛtya <quote>‘raso vai saḥ । rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati । ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt । yadeṣa ākāśa ānando
na syāt । eṣa hyevānandayāti । saiṣānandasya mīmāṃsā bhavati’</quote> । <quote>‘etamannamayamātmānamupasaṃkrāmati’</quote> <quote>‘ānandaṃ brahmaṇo
vidvānna bibheti kutaścaneti । ānando brahmeti vyajānā’</quote>dityādinā ānandaśabdasya brahmaṇyeva bahukṛtvo'bhyāsādānandamaya-
syānnamayādyamukhyātmapravāhapāṭhe'pi sthūlārundhatīnyāyena sarvāntaratvenāntato mukhyātmopadeśasyaiva suśliṣṭatvātpriyādyavayavayo-
<pb n="242"/>
gasyātītānantaropādhijatvena svābhāvikatvānaṅgīkārācchārīratvasya cānnamayādiśarīraparaṃparāpradarśyamānatvenaupacārikatvābhyupaga-
mācca ānandamayaśabdavācyaḥ paramātmaiveti siddhāntaḥ ।। 12 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāt ।। 13 ।। vikāraśabdānneti cet</pratika>=vikārārthakamayaḍantānnamayādiprāyapāṭhā-
dānandamayaśabde'pi mayaṭo vikārārthatvena brahmaṇaścānandavikāratvānupapatteḥ ānandamayasya na brahmatvamiti cet । <pratika>na</pratika>=tathā na
bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>prācuryāt</pratika>=ānandamayaśabde mayaṭaḥ prācuryārthakatvāt । smaryate hi <quote>‘tatprakṛtavacane maya’</quote>ḍiti prācuryārthe'pi
mayaṭpratyayaḥ । yathā annamayo yajña ityannapracura upacaryate evamānandapracuraṃ brahmānandamayaśabdenocyate । brahmaṇa ānandapracuratvaṃ
tāvat manuṣyatvādārabhyottarottarasminsthāne śataguṇa ānanda ityuktyā brahmānandasya niratiśayatvāvadhāraṇātsiddhyati ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>taddhetuvyapadeśācca</pratika> ।। 14 ।। itaśca prācuryārthe mayaṭ । cakāro'nuktasamuccayārthaḥ । taccānuktaṃ brahmānandasya nirati-
śayatvāvadhāraṇameva । tacca nirūpitaṃ pūrvasūtrārthavarṇanāvasāne । <quote>‘eṣa hyevānandayāti’</quote> iti brahmaṇa ānandahetutvasya śrutyā vyapa-
diśyamānatvāccānandamayaśabde mayaṭprācuryārthakaḥ । tasmādānandamayaḥ paramātmā ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p>itaścānandamayaḥ para evetyāha---<pratika>māntravarṇikameva ca gīyate ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti para’</quote> mityupakramya <quote>‘satyaṃ
jñānamanantaṃ brahme’</quote> tyasminmantre yatsatyādyātmakaṃ sarvāntaraṃ jñeyatvenoktaṃ tanmāntravarṇikaṃ brahmaivānandamaya iti brāhmaṇe gīyate ।
mantrabrāhmaṇayoraikārthyādityarthaḥ ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p>itaścānandamayaḥ paro na jīva ityāha---<pratika>netaro'nupapatteḥ</pratika> ।। 16 ।। <pratika>itaraḥ</pratika>=īśvarādanyaḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>=ānandamayo na
bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>anupapatteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘so'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote> tyādiśrūyamāṇasya sṛṣṭeḥ prākkāmayitṛtvasraṣṭaṃvyātmakatvāderanu-
papatteḥ । ityarthaḥ ।। 16 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca nānandamayo jīva ityāha---<pratika>bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘raso vai saḥ । rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati’</quote> iti
jīvānandamayayorlabdhṛlabdhavyatvarūpeṇa bhedena vyapadiśyamānatvādityarthaḥ ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhyānandamayaśabdena pradhānamucyatāṃ tatrāha---<pratika>kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 18 ।।</pratika> anumīyata ityanumānamanu-
mānaikagamyaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya <pratika>nāpekṣā=</pratika>ānandamayatvenātra na svīkāraḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>kāmāt</pratika>=tadadhikāre <quote>‘so'kāmayate’</quote>ti
kāmayitṛtvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ । atra pradhānanirākaraṇaṃ gatisāmānyapradarśanāya prāsaṅgikamiti bodhyam ।। 18 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca nānandamayaḥ pradhānaṃ jīvo vā ityāha---<pratika>asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 19 ।।</pratika> asmin=ānandamaye
prakṛta ātmani । <pratika>asya</pratika>=prabuddhasyāsya jīvasyā<pratika>tadyogaṃ</pratika>=tadātmanā yogaṃ tadbhāvāpattirūpāṃ muktim । <quote>‘yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnadṛśye
'nātmye’</quote>ityādi śāstraṃ <pratika>śāsti</pratika> । tasmānnānandamayo jīvaḥ pradhānaṃ vā kiṃ tu paramātmaivetyarthaḥ ।। idaṃ tu ekadeśīyamatam ।। 19 ।।</p>
<p>bhagavatpādīyamate tvitthaṃ sūtrayojanā । atra sautreṇānandamayapadena tadvākyasthaṃ brahmapadaṃ lakṣyate । ataḥ <pratika>ānandamayaḥ</pratika>=
ānandamayavākye <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote>tyatra śruto brahmaśabdaḥ svapradhānabrahmaparaḥ nānandamayāvayavaparaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=
<quote>‘asanneva sa bhavati’</quote> iti śloke brahmaṇa eva kevalasyābhyasyamānatvādityarthaḥ । atrānandamayavākyagate <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote>
tyatra kimānandamayāvayavatvena brahmocyate uta svapradhānatveneti saṃdehaḥ । brahmaṇaḥ <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote>ti ānandamayasya
puccharūpāvayavatvena nirdeśāt brahmapadaṃ tadavayavabhūtabrahmaparamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘asanneva sa bhavatī’</quote> tyasminnigamanaśloke brahmaṇa
eva kevalasyābhyasyamānatvādānandamayasya brahmatve priyādyavayavavattvena brahmaṇassaviśeṣatāpattyā vākyaśeṣe vāṅmanasayoragocara-
tvābhidhānānnirviśeṣatvasya śravaṇāt pucchaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā pucchavatpucchamityādhāraparatvābhyupagamācca pucchavākyasthaṃ brahmapadaṃ
svapradhānabrahmaparameva nānandamayāvayavaparamiti siddhāntaḥ ।। tasmādannamayādiṣvivānandamaye'pi mayaḍvikārārtha eva vijñeyo na
prācuryārthaḥ । sūtrāṇyanyānyapyevaṃ vyākhyeyāni ।। 12 ।।</p>
<p>yattu pucchaśabdasyāvayavaparatvamiti tatrāha---<pratika>vikāraśabdāditi । vikāraśabdāt</pratika>=avayavaparapucchaśabdāt tatsa-
mānādhikaraṇabrahmaśabdo na svapradhānabrahmapara iti cenna । <pratika>prācuryāt</pratika>=avayavaprāye vacanāt pucchamityucyate nāvayavavivakṣayā ।
ataḥ pratiṣṭhāsamabhivyāhārāt pucchaśabdasyādhāraparatayā svapradhānatvena brahmocyata ityarthaḥ ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca pucchaśabdasyādhāraparatvamityāha---<pratika>taddhetviti</pratika> । tasya brahmaṇaḥ svavikārajātaṃ prati hetutvena <quote>‘idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ
kiṃce’</quote>ti vākye vyapadeśādityarthaḥ । na hi kāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ svavikārasyānandamayasyāvayavatvaṃ mukhyayā vṛttyopapadyate । ataḥ
pucchapadamādhāraparameva ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca pucchavākye brahma svapradhānamityāha---<pratika>māntravarṇikamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘yatsatyaṃ jñānamananta’</quote> mityādimantravarṇapratipādyaṃ
brahma tadeva <quote>‘brahma puccha’</quote> miti brāhmaṇavākye svaprādhānyena gīyate । mantrabrāhmaṇayoraikārthyādityarthaḥ ।। 15 ।।</p>
<pb n="243"/>
<p>nanu pucchavākye ānandamayaḥ svapradhānatvena pratipādyaḥ kiṃ na syādityāha---<pratika>netara iti</pratika> । itaraḥ ānandamayo'tra na
pratipādyaḥ । priyādimattvenāgrimavākyoktasraṣṭṛtvādyanupapatterityarthaḥ ।। 16 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca nānandamayo'tra pratipādya ityāha---<pratika>bhedavyapadeśācceti</pratika> । <quote>‘rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati’</quote> iti ānandama-
yabrahmaṇorlabdhṛlabdhavyatvena rūpeṇa bhedavyapadeśādityarthaḥ ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p>nanvānando brahmetyatrānandasya brahmatvādānandamayasyāpi brahmatvamanumīyata ityata āha---<pratika>kāmācceti</pratika> । kāmyata iti
kāma ānandaḥ tasya brahmatvadarśanānnānumānenānandamayasyāpi brahmatvamapekṣitavyaṃ vikārārthakamayaḍvirodhādityarthaḥ ।। 18 ।।</p>
<p>ito'pi nānandamayo'tra pratipādya ityāha---<pratika>asminnasyeti</pratika> । asmin=pucchavākyokte brahmaṇi । asya=prabuddhasyā
syānandamayasya । <quote>‘yadā hyeveti’</quote> śāstraṃ tadyogaṃ tadbhāvāpattiṃ śāsti । ato'trānandamayasyāpratipādyatvāt pucchabrahmaiva nirviśeṣaṃ
svapradhānatvena jñeyatayā pratipādyamityarthaḥ ।। 19 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idamānandamayādhikaraṇaṃ sūtracatuṣṭyātmakamanyannetara ityādisūtracatuṣṭayamadhikaraṇāntaramiti bodhyam ।
iha śāstraikasamadhigamyasya brahmalakṣaṇasya jagatkāraṇatvasya tāntrike pradhāne'tivyāptimāśaṅkya cetanatvādihetunā parihṛtā ।
acetane pradhāna iva cetane'pi jīve tannātivyāptamiti vaktumadhikaraṇāntaramārabhate---<pratika>ānandamayo'bhyāsāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika>
asya, taittirīye ānandavallayāṃ śrutaṃ <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādvijñānamayāt anyo'-
ntara ātmānandamaya’</quote> ityantaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atrānandamaya ātmā jīvo vā parameśvaro vā iti sandehaḥ। <quote>‘pṛthivyā aoṣadhayaḥ’</quote>
ityādinā pañcāvayavaśarīrādinirūpaṇāt annamayaprāṇamayamanomayavijñānamayaśabdavācyānāmannaprāṇamanobuddhīnāmāśrayatvopapatteḥ
mayaṭchabdasya vikārārthatvena <quote>‘ānando brahmeti’</quote> ānandaśabdavācyatayā śrutasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryatayā ānandavikāratvopapatteḥ
parameśvaratvāṅgīkāre śuddhiprārthanāvaiyarthyāpatteśca ayamānandamaya ātmā jīva eva na parameśvara iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>siddhāntastu, <pratika>ānandamayo'</pratika>yamātmā parameśvara eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=<quote>‘saiṣānandasye’</quote> tyādinā <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa
ānanda’</quote> ityantenāsyānandasya niratiśayatvenābhyasyamānatvāt । na hi tadetanniratiśayānandabhājanatvaṃ saṃsāriṇo jīvasya saṃbha-
vati । yathā prakṛṣṭaprakāśasya candrasya tirodhāyakameghāpagama eva prasādastathā nityaśuddhasyānandamayavācyasya brahmaṇaḥ tirodhānamalā-
panayanameva śuddhirityaṅgīkārānnānandamayasya parameśvaratve tacchuddhiprārthanāvaiyarthyam ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p>nanu ānandasyaiva brahmatvaśravaṇāt vikārārthakamayaḍantānandamayavācyaḥ parameśvara ityabhyupagame parameśvarasya brahmabhinnatvāpa-
ttirvikārarūpatvādanityatvaṃ ca prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika> annamayādīnāmannādivikā-
ratvavadānandamayasyāpi ānandavikāratvena parameśvarasya vikāratvāsaṃbhavānnāyaṃ parameśvaraḥ kiṃ tu jīva eveti cet । na । mayaṭ-
śabdasyātra prācuryārthakatvāt । yatastatra annamayaprāṇamayamanomayeṣveva mayaḍvikārārthaḥ । vijñānamayānandamayayormayaṭaḥ prācuryā-
rthatvena tābhyāṃ tattatpracurau jīvaparameśvarau pratipādyete ।।</p>
<p>sarvathā vikāraprakaraṇapāṭhāttayorapi vikarārthatvameva nyāyyamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>taddhetuvyapadeśācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘eṣa
hyevānandayāti’</quote> iti jīvānpratyānandahetutvamānandamayasya śrūyate । svayaṃ pracurānandatāyāṃ hi tasya parānandayitṛtvaṃ yujyeta ।
ataḥ ānandamayaḥ parameśvara eva ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p>ānandamayasyānandaprucuraparameśvarārthakatve'pi <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote> tyasya brahmādhāratvaśravaṇāt brahmaṇo'nyatvamevāvaga-
myate । brahmaṇastadanyatvāṅgīkāre asvātantryājjagatkāraṇatvāsaṃbhavāpattyā jīvapakṣa eva yukta ityata āha---<pratika>māntravarṇikameva
ca gīyate ।। 16 ।।</pratika> ya<quote>‘tsatyaṃ jñānamananta’</quote> miti mantravarṇoditaṃ brahma tadeva brāhmaṇavākye'pi ānandapracuratayā ānandamaya iti
gīyate । pucchavākyasthabrahmapadasya praṇavavācakatvena tasya parameśvaravācakatvādādhāratvaṃ yujyate । atra kecit <quote>‘satyaṃjñāna’</quote>mityādi
śrutaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ viśvādhikaṃ paraṃ brahma nānandamayaśabdavācyam । kiṃtu । <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśassambhūtaḥ’</quote>ityādinā
ākāśādiprapañcaprakṛtitvena śrutaḥ paramākāśaḥ ānandamayaśabdavācyaḥ । asyaiva <quote>‘brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhe’</quote>ti brahma ādhāratvenāvagamyate ।
ayameva <quote>‘sa eko brahmaṇa ānanda’</quote> iti brahmadharmatvena <quote>‘ānandāddhyeva khalvimāni bhūtānī’</quote>tyādinā sakalabhūtaprakṛtitvena cābhi-
dhīyate । ānandasya brahmatvavyapadeśastu dharmadharmiṇorabhedābhiprāyeṇa । ataḥ brahmadharmasvabhāvaḥ prakṛtyātmā paramākāśarūpā paramaśakti-
rānandamayaḥ । vijñānamayaśca tadupāsako jīvaḥ । ādhārādheyayordharmadharmiṇoḥ bhedādarśanādānandamaya ātmā brahmetyabhiprāyeṇa
<quote>‘ānandamayo'bhyāsā’</quote> ditisūtrakāra ssūtramasūtrayaditi ca varṇayanti । anye punaḥ annamayādīnāmātmatvaśravaṇāt muktasya kramaprāpya-
tvāvagamācca annamayādaya ātmānaḥ pañcabhūtādhiṣṭhātāraḥ brahmaviṣṇurudreśvarasadāśivasaṃjñāḥ pañca kāraṇapuruṣāḥ । teṣu annamayādīnāṃ
caturṇāmādhārasya sadāśivasyānandamayasyāpi kāraṇabhūtasya paramaśivākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ tatpratiṣṭhātvopapattiḥ । tadabhedādānandamayasya
brahmatvopadeśa iti ca nirūpayanti । ataḥ sarvathā ānandamayaḥ parameśvara iti siddham ।। ।। <pratika>ityānandamayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="244"/>
<head>atha itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>brahmalakṣaṇasya jagatkāraṇatvasya pradhānajīvayorativyāptiṃ pūrvādhikaraṇābhyāṃ nirākṛtya adhunā jīvasamaṣṭirūpe hiraṇyagarbhe
tāmāśaṅkya pariharati---<pratika>sū. । netaro'nupapatteḥ ।। 17 ।।</pratika> ‘yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī toyena jīvānvyasasarja bhūmyām ।
<quote>‘yadoṣadhībhiḥ puruṣānpaśūṃśca viveśa bhūtāni carācarāṇi ।’</quote> iti mahopaniṣadvākyamasya viṣayaḥ । atra sakalajagatprasūtyādihetu-
tvena śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaro vā anyo veti saṃśayaḥ । upakramopasaṃhārānuguṇyena avāntaravākyasiddhasarvadharmāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhe
upapadyamānatayā samudraśāyitvasarvāntaryāmitvacandrasūryādisraṣṭṛtvādibodhakaprajāpatidhātrādiśabdaghaṭitavākyabalāt hiraṇyagarbha
idaṃvākyapratipādya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । itaraḥ parameśvarādanyo hiraṇyagarbho'tra na pratipādyaḥ । jagatpras‌tihetutvādīnāṃ
parameśvaradharmāṇāṃ tasminnanupapatteḥ । iti sūtrārthaḥ । jagatprasūtihetostasya sarvotkṛṣṭatvasya tamasaḥ parastāditi prakṛtimaṇḍalātpa-
ratvasyaca śrūyamāṇatayā tayoḥ aṇḍāntarvartini hiraṇyagarbhe asambhavāt muktihetutvarūpāsādhāraṇaparameśvaraliṅgāt prajāpatyādi-
śabdānāmanupapattyā parameśvarapratipādakatvāt viśveśvaratvaviśvātītatvaliṅgāt upakramopasaṃhāravākyayorapi parameśvaraparatvāvagamācca
jagatkāraṇatvādinā atra pratipādyaḥ prajāpatiśabdavācyaḥ parameśvaraḥ na hiraṇyagarbha iti siddhāntaḥ ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p>nanu parameśvarahiraṇyagarbhayorabhedāt tasyaivāstu jagatkāraṇatvamityata āha---<pratika>sū. । bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 18 ।।</pratika>
asyāmevopaniṣadi <quote>‘yo devānāṃ prathamaṃ purastādviśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ । hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote> ityādinā kā-
raṇatvena kāryatvena ca parameśvarahiraṇyagarbhayoḥ bhedo vyapadiśyate । ataḥ hiraṇyagarbhādeḥ sarvaprapañcasya kāraṇatvamīśvarasyeti
siddham ।। 18 ।।</p>
<p>punarāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>sū. । kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 19 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prajāpatirakāmayata prajāssṛjeyeti’</quote> ityādinā hira-
ṇyagarbhasya sṛṣṭisaṅkalpaśravaṇe'pi tasya jagatkāraṇatve <pratika>anumānāpekṣā</pratika>=yuktyapekṣā nāsti । tasya kāmasyāvāntarasṛṣṭivi-
ṣayatvāt । parameśvarasyaiva tadātmanā avāntarasṛṣṭiśca iti vakṣyamāṇatvācca ।। 19 ।।</p>
<p><quote>‘anena jīvenātmane’</quote> tyādinā hiraṇyagarbharūpeṇa prapañcānupraviṣṭasya parameśvarasya nāmarūpavyākartṛtvaśravaṇāt anayorabheda
evetyata āha---<pratika>sū. । asminnasya ca tadyogaṃśāsti ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <pratika>asmin</pratika>=upaniṣattantre <pratika>asya</pratika>=hiraṇyagarbhasya <pratika>tadyogaṃ</pratika>=
tasya parameśvarasya śeṣatvasambandhaṃ mantrabhāgaḥ cāsti <quote>‘brahmādhipatirbrahmaṇo'dhipati’</quote>riti । tataḥ parameśvara eva jagatprasūti-
hetuḥ hiraṇyagarbhastu taccheṣabhūta iti siddham ।। 20 ।। <pratika>itarānupapattyadhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 7 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ brahmalakṣaṇasya acetanātpradhānāt vyāvṛttiruktā । idānīmahaṃpratyayasiddhe jīvātmani avatarantī
buddhirvyāvartyate---<pratika>sū. । ānandamayo'bhyāsāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atra ānandamayaḥ paramātmā vā
jīvo vā iti sandehaḥ । śārīratvaśravaṇāt avidyāparikalpitavividhavicitradevābhedabhinnajīvātmasvābhāvikarūpasya akha
ṇḍaikarasasukhaikatānatvāt ānandamayaḥ jīva eva । iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu <quote>‘saiṣānandasye’</quote>tyādinā <quote>‘yato vāco nivartanta’</quote>
ityantena niratiśayatvenābhyasyamānasya ānandasya anantaduḥkhamiśraparimitasukhalavabhāji jīvātmanyasambhavāt nikhilaheyapratyanī-
kānantakalyāṇaguṇarat‍nākarāyamāṇaḥ vijñānamayaśabdābhidheyāt jīvātmano vilakṣaṇaḥ akhaṇḍānandarasabhājanaṃ puruṣottamaḥ para-
mātmaivānandayama iti । <pratika>ānandamayaḥ</pratika> paramātmā । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=tadānandasyaiva niratiśayatvenābhyasyamānatvāt । iti
sūtrārthaḥ ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p>prakārāntareṇānandamayasya paramātmaparatāmākṣipya samādhatte---<pratika>sū. । vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāt ।। 14 ।।</pratika>
vikārarthamayaḍantānnamayādisāhacaryāt atrāpi vikārārthatvasyaucityāt mayaṭastasminnevārthe prayogabāhulyācca ānandavikāra-
tvasya paramātmanyanupapatteśca nānandamayaḥ paramātmeti cet na । <pratika>prācuryāt</pratika>=prācuryārthe'pi yamaṭassambhavāt । niratiśayatvenā-
bhyasyamānānandasya jīvāśrayatvāsambhavāt brahmāśrayatvaniścaye sati brahmaṇi vikārāsambhavāt prācurye'pi mayaḍvidhisambhavācca ā-
nandamayaḥ paramātmaiveti ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca jīvādanya ānandamayaḥ । <pratika>sū. । taddhetuvyapadeśācca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘eṣa hyevānandayātī’</quote>ti jīvānāmānandaheturayaṃ
vyapadiśyate । ataśca ānandayitavyājjīvāt ānandayitā ayamanya ānandamayaḥ paramātmā iti siddham ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca jīvādanya ānandamayaḥ । <pratika>sū. । māntravarṇikameva ca gīyate ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote> miti mantravarṇoditaṃ bra-
hmaiva ānandamaya iti gīyate । tatparaṃ brahma jīvasvarūpādanyadeva ।। 16 ।।</p>
<pb n="245"/>
<p>nanu yadyapi upāsakātprāpyasya bhedena bhavitavyam । brahmaṇaḥ jīvasambandhicinmātraśuddhasvarūpānanyatvāt tasyaiva māntravarṇi-
katvācca jīvādanatirikta evānandamaya iti cet tatrāha---<pratika>sū. । netaro'nupapatteḥ ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <pratika>itaraḥ</pratika>=paramātmano'nyaḥ
jīvaśabdābhidheyaḥ muktāvastho'pi । <pratika>na</pratika>=māntravarṇiko na bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>anupapatteḥ</pratika>=satyasaṅkalpatvādikasya nirupādhikasya
vipaścittvasya muktāvasthe'pi tasminnanupapatteḥ ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca ubhayāvasthājjīvādanya ānandamayaḥ <pratika>।। sū. bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana’</quote>ityāra-
bhya māntravarṇikaṃ brahma vyañjayat vākyaṃ annaprāṇamanobhya iva vijñānamayājjīvādapi <quote>‘anyo'ntara ātmā''nandamaya’</quote>iti bhedaṃ
vyapadiśati । ataḥ māntravarṇika ānandamayaḥ jīvādanya eva ।। 18 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca jīvādanya ānandamayaḥ । <pratika>sū. । kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 19 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘so'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote> ti
acitsaṃsargarahitasya svakāmādeva vicitracidacidvastusṛṣṭisāmarthyasambhavāt jagatsṛjataḥ asthānandamayasya ānumānikācidva-
stusaṃsargāpekṣā na pratīyate । avidyāparavaśasya jīvasya jagatkāraṇatve tu avarjanīyā khalu sā । ataḥ jīvādanya evā-
yamānandamayaḥ ।। 19 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca jīvādanya ānandamayaḥ । <pratika>sū. asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <pratika>asmin</pratika>=ānandamaye । <pratika>a-
sya</pratika>=jīvasya । <pratika>tadyogam</pratika>=ānandayogaṃ śāsti । <quote>‘raso vai saḥ rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatī’</quote>ti rasaśabdābhidheyānandamayalā-
bhāt asya jīvasya ānanditvapratipādanāt pradhānārthāntarabhūtasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ jīvādapi arthāntaratvaṃ siddham ।। 20 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ samanvayādhikaraṇe viṣṇoḥ śāstragamyatve hetutvena siddhavadupanyastasya sarvavedāntasamanvayasya tatta-
dvākyaviśeṣodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvottarapakṣagrathanādinā sthirīkaraṇārthamadhyāyaśeṣasyārambhaḥ । tatra taittirīye śrutamānandamayavākya-
mudāhṛtya vicāryate—<pratika>sū. । ānandamayo'bhyāsāt ।। 12 ।।</pratika> <pratika>ānandamayaḥ</pratika>=ānandamayādiśabdavācyaḥ viṣṇureva । na prakṛ-
tyādiḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>abhyāsāt</pratika>=pratiprakaraṇamānandamayādau brahmaśabdaśravaṇādityarthaḥ । ānandamayapadaṃ annamayādīnāmapyupalakṣaṇam ।
viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atra ānandamayādiśabdavācyaḥ hiraṇyagarbho vā rudro vā citprakṛtirvā acitprakṛtirvā jīvo vā bhavi-
tumarhati । vikārārthakamayaṭpratyayādivirodhāt sarvathā nānandamayo viṣṇuḥ । ataḥ samanvayādhikaraṇoktaḥ viṣṇau gatisāmānyo-
panyāso'yukta iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu śrutiṣu bahuśaḥ guṇapūrṇatvābhidhāyakabrahmaśabdaśravaṇāt hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu guṇapūrṇa-
tvasya anupapatteḥ annamayādiṣvapi mayaṭpratyayasya prācuryārthatvābhyupagamāt teṣvapi brahmaśrutyaviśeṣāt teṣāmapi viṣṇurūpatvāṅgī-
kārācca ānandamayaḥ viṣṇureveti ।। 12 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । vikāraśabdānneti cenna prācuryāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> <pratika>vikāraśabdāt</pratika>=vikārārthakamayaṭśabdāt <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=ānanda-
mayādirviṣṇurna bhavatīti cet na । kutaḥ <pratika>prācuryāt</pratika>=mayaṭśabdasya prācuryapadoktapūrṇatvābhidhāyakatvādityarthaḥ ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । taddhetuvyapadeśācca ।। 14 ।।</pratika> cakāraḥ samuccayārthaḥ । tasya ānandamayasya viṣṇutve lokaceṣṭakatvākhyahetoḥ <quote>‘ko-
hyevānyā’</quote> dityādiśrutyā pratipāditvāccānandamayo viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । māntravarṇikameva ca gīyate ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘satyaṃ jñāna’</quote>miti mantravarṇoktaṃ brahmaiva ānandamayādiśabdaiḥ pratipā-
dyate । ataḥ ānandamayādiśabdavācyaṃ brahmaivetyarthaḥ ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । netaro'nupapatteḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <pratika>itaraḥ</pratika>=caturmukhādiḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>=ānandamayādiśabdapratipādyo na bhavati । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>anupapatteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘brahmavidāpnoti para’</quote>mityādinā śrutasya mokṣajanakajñānaviṣayatvasya itareṣu asambhavādityarthaḥ ।। 16 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 17 ।।</pratika> caturmukhāderānandamayāt bhedadharmokteśca nānandamayaścaturmukhādirityarthaḥ ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <pratika>kāmācca</pratika>=advaitaśrutyanukūlānumānasyābhāvāt kevalānumānasya icchāmanu-
sṛtya pravṛttatvāt । <pratika>nānumānāpekṣā</pratika> । atīndriyārthaviṣaye śuṣkānumānāpekṣā na kāryetyarthaḥ ।। 18 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti ।। 19 ।।</pratika> caśabdo yuktisamuccayārthakaḥ । yataḥ <pratika>asmin</pratika> ānandamayaprakaraṇe
mokṣe'pi <pratika>asya</pratika>=jīvasya <pratika>tadyogaṃ</pratika>=ānandamayādinā sambandham । <pratika>śāsti</pratika>=śrutiḥ pratipādayati । ato'pi ānandamayādi-
rbrahmaiva । na dehādiḥ iti ।। 19 ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmānandamayādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="246"/>
<head>athāntaradhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
taditaḥ pūrveradhikaraṇanyāyaiḥ sarvajñaṃ nityatṛptamanādibodhaṃ svatantramalupta-
śaktikamanantaśaktikaṃ sakalajagadubhayakāraṇaṃ samastopaniṣattantrasamanvayaikapra-
tipādyaṃ svaprakāśanikhilaprapañcaviśiṣṭādvitīyasvabhāvaṃ saccidānandasvarūpaṃ saṃsā-
rapāśavicchedakāraṇaṃ cidacidarthāntaraṃ śivatatvaṃ paraṃ brahmeti siddham । tasya
sādhakānāṃ saṃsārabheṣajaṃ manassamādhānayogyaṃ kimapi rūpaṃ pradarśayitumidamadhika-
raṇamārabhyate—
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>uttarādhikaraṇamavatārayituṃ prāksiddhamarthajātamanuvadati—<pratika>taditaḥ pūrvairiti</pratika> । ubhaya-
kāraṇamityantena sopapattikajanmādyadhikaraṇārtho'nūditaḥ । tadanantaraviśeṣaṇenānantarādhika-
raṇadvayārthaḥ । svaprakāśetyādiviśeṣaṇena īkṣatyadhikaraṇaviṣayavākyagatasacchabdārtho'nūditaḥ ।
<quote>‘saccidānandasvarūpa’</quote>mityanenānaṃdamayādhikaraṇaviṣayavākyāṃtargatasatyajñānādivākyārthaḥ <quote>‘saṃsā-
rapāśacchedakāraṇa’</quote>mityanena hiraṇyagarbhādhikaraṇaviṣayavākyāntargatasya <quote>‘ya enaṃ viduramṛtā’</quote>
ityādivākyasyārthaḥ <quote>‘cidacidarthāntara’</quote>mityanena cidacidvilakṣaṇamityarthakena acetane pra-
dhāne cetane mukte hiraṇyagarbhe cānatiprasaktaṃ jagatkāraṇatvamasyetaravailakṣaṇyamityevamīkṣatyā-
dyadhikaraṇatrayavyutpādyārthaḥ saṅgṛhyānūditaḥ । athottarādhikaraṇe pratipādayiṣyamāṇamarthaṃ darśayati
—<pratika>tasyeti</pratika> । saṃsārabheṣajaṃ muktipradam । <pratika>manassamādhāneti</pratika> । daharavidyādyupāsyaṃ hi rūpaṃ <pratika>sthā-
nasya</pratika> hṛdayapuṇḍarīkāderaprasiddhatvāt śāstrāvagatatattatsvarūpānusandhānapūrvakamanusandheyamiti
tāvatparyantamavikṣepeṇa manassamādhānaṃ dussampādam । vakṣyamāṇarūpasya tu sthānamādityamaṇḍala-
māgopālāṅganamatiprasiddhamiti tatsthānake vakṣyamāṇarūpe manassamādhānaṃ susampādamiti bhāvaḥ ।
kimapyaprākṛtaṃ rūpamityarthaḥ । nanu kimartho'tra janmādisūtrārthaprabhṛti prācīnasakalārthānuvādaḥ ।
kathaṃ ca prāṇākāśādyativyāptinirāse'gre kariṣyamāṇe madhye cidacidarthāntaramiti viśe-
ṣaṇena cetanācetaneṣvativyāptinirāsāt siddhyato'rthasya siddhatvenopanyāsaḥ । kathaṃ cātivyā-
ptinirāsārthapeṭikāmadhye dhyānopayuktarūpaviśeṣaṇanirūpaṇārthādhikaraṇasya prastāvaḥ । tasya ca
sādhanādhyāyasaṅgatasya samanvayādhyāye kā saṅgatiḥkā ca pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatiḥ । ucyate । lakṣaṇa-
pariṣkārapeṭikāsamāptipradarśanārtho lakṣaṇasūtrārthamārabhyānuvādaḥ । ata evātivyāptinirāsasi-
ddhārthopanyāsaḥ । ākāśaprāṇādhikaraṇadvayamākāśaprāṇayorativyāptinirāsārthaṃ na bhavati ।
tayoradhikaraṇanirasanīyātivyāptiśaṅkāhetoradarśanāt । kiṃtvākāśaprāṇavākyayorbrahmaṇi tātpa-
ryanirūpaṇārthaṃ tadarthena tena vākyaśeṣagatakāraṇatvānuvādaprabhavamandaśaṅkāviṣayātivyāptinirā-
so'pi labhyata ityānuṣaṅgikaprayojanasūcanārthaṃ tadavatārikābhāṣyam । idamapyadhikaraṇamantarā-
dityavidyāvākyasya brahmaṇi tātparyanirūpaṇārthameva । dhyānārtharūpaviśeṣasiddhirapyanenādhikaraṇena

dviṣayopakramopasaṃhāraikarūpyasya tathā virodho nāstīti pratyavasthānāt pratyudāharaṇarūpā samana-

<sutra>।। sū ।। antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa āpraṇa-
khāt sarva eva suvarṇastasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī’</quote> <ref>(chā. 1-6.)</ref>
iti chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ ।। ayamādityāntarvartī hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ para-
meśvaro devatāviśeṣo veti saṃśayaḥ ।। evaṃ sati sarvādhārasya sarvagatasya parame-
śvarasyādityāntarvartitvaṃ hiraṇmayarūpatvaṃ ca na saṃbhavati, svecchayā rūpāṅgīkāre
trilocanatvaṃ niyataṃ tadiha na vidyate । <quote>‘puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī’</quote> <ref>(chā. 1—6.)</ref> iti
locanadvayameva śrūyate । atha vā—svecchāgṛhītopi dehaḥ saṃsāriṇāmiva parame-
śvarasyāpi duḥkhamutpādayedeva । svecchāsaṃbandhe'pi pāvakasya dāhakatvaṃ hi svabhāvaḥ ।
ataḥ parameśvarasya śarīrasaṃbandho na yuktaḥ । tasmādayaṃ kaściddevatāviśeṣa eva, na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ntarādhikaraṇasaṅgatiḥ । sā pūrvapakṣāvasāne spaṣṭīkariṣyate । bhāṣye'pi sā <quote>‘devatāviśeṣo ve’</quote>ti
saṃśayavākyena sūcayiṣyate । maṇḍalāntarvartitvena prasiddho hi devatāviśeṣaḥ tatra grāhyaḥ । hira-
ṇyagarbhaśca tathā prasiddha iti pūrvādhikaraṇe darśitam । nanvāditya ityapi kaścidādhikāriko
devatāviśeṣo'sti । astu so'pi pākṣikatayā pūrvapakṣāvalambanaṃ bhaviṣyati । ata eva bhā-
ṣye sāmānyena <quote>‘devatāviśeṣo ve’</quote>ti pūrvapakṣakoṭiḥ pradarśitā । na tu hiraṇyagarbha ityāditya iti
vā । tasmātsarvamupapannam <pratika>।। sū ।। antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> parameśvarasya sādhāratvokti-
viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaśarīrasambhavāsambhavābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha—<pratika>ayamiti</pratika> । pūrvapakṣamāha—<pratika>evaṃ satīti</pratika> ।
uktaprakāreṇa saṃśaye satītyarthaḥ । sarvādhāratvamādhārāsambhave sarvagatatvaṃ hiraṇmayarūpāsambhave ca
hetuḥ । na hi vyāpako hiraṇyavikāratayā paricchinne vigrahe mātīti bhāvaḥ। nanu śarīravatassa-
rvātmanā tasmin śarīre'ntargatatayā bhāvyamiti na niyamaḥ । kiṃ tu tadadhiṣṭhānamātreṇa bhāvya-
miti । anyathā cicchaktivyāptyā jīvānāṃ kāyavyūhaparigrahāsambhavaprasaṅgāt । pramāṇabalā-
tteṣāṃ tadaṅgīkāre tata eveśvarasyāpi śarīravattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । asti hi <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ
prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśānta’</quote>miti tasyāpi śarīravattve pramāṇam । na ca śarīrasya karmaja1-
nyatvaniyamena karmarahitasya tadasambhavāt upāsanārthamumāsahāyatvādiviśiṣṭaśarīrakalpanā-
mātraparaṃ taditi vācyam । karmābhāve'pyupāsakānugrahārthaṃ śarīraparigrahasambhavāt । anyathā
saṃsāriṇāṃ yatkiñcinnirmātṛtvaṃ karmādhīnaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasya prapañcanirmātṛtvasyāpyasiddhiprasaṅgādi-
tyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>svecchayeti</pratika> । trilocanatvaṃ niyatamiti tvadabhimatapramāṇānusāreṇaiveti bhāvaḥ ।
svecchayā prapañcasṛṣṭivaccharīraparigraho'pi sambhavati । <pratika>athaveti । utpādayedeveti</pratika> । pāvakasya
dāhakatvamiva vastusvabhāvaprayuktaṃ śarīrasya duḥkhajanakatvamaicchikatve'pi parihartumaśakyamityarthaḥ ।
tasmā<quote>‘dumāsahāya’</quote>mityādikamupāsanārthakalpanāparaṃ yojanīyam।<quote>‘dhyātvā munirgacchatī’</quote>ti vākya-
śeṣāt । na ceha tathā yojanaṃ sambhavati । <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyata’</quote> iti
dṛśyamānatoktyā svābhāvikatvāvasāyāditi bhāvaḥ । tathāpi sarvalokakāmeśvaratvasarvapāparāhi-
tyādidharmairayaṃ parameśvaro'vasīyata ityāśaṅkāmupasaṃhāravyājena nirākaroti—<pratika>tasmāditi । ayaṃ</pratika>

bhāvaḥ । nāsyādityamaṇḍalāntargatasya puruṣasya sarvalokakāmeśvaratvaṃ śrūyate । kiṃ tu <quote>‘ye cāsmā-
tparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ce’</quote>tyādityamaṇḍalādūrdhvaṃ ye svarlokādayo lokā ye ca
tatratyānāṃ devānāṃ kāmabhogāstadubhayaiśvaryaṃ śrūyate । tatparicchinnaiśvaryaśravaṇaṃ jīva eva karmā-
dhīnaṃ saṅkucitaiśvaryaṃ saṅgacchate na tu svābhāvikaniratiśayaiśvarye parameśvare । na ca devalokakāmai-

ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata’</quote> ityādinā pratipādyasyākṣipuruṣasya <quote>‘ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ
ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ce’</quote>ti vibhajyādityaṇḍalādhastanamanuṣyādilokakāmeśvaratvaṃ śrūyate । tatkathaṃ
tena vākyenādityapuruṣasya sarvaiśvaryaṃ sidhdyet । na khalu rājakīyayoranayorayaṃ durgādhipatirayaṃ
tatsīmādhipatiriti vibhajya kathane kasyacidda‍urgādhipatyavacanena tasyaiva tatsīmādhipatyamapi si-
ddhyati । nanu tathāpi sarvapāparāhityaṃ śrūyata eva <quote>‘tasyoditi nāma sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyaḥ
udita’</quote>iti । na ca sarvapāparāhityaṃ deveṣu saṃbhavati । <quote>‘naha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati puṇyamevā-
mūngacchatī’</quote>ti śruteḥ । yadi deveṣvapyanādibhavasañcitāni prasuptāni pāpāni santyeva teṣāṃ
devatvadaśāyāṃ teṣu phalānārabhyakatvamātraṃ <quote>‘na ha vai devā’</quote>niti śrutyartha ucyeta tadā sarvapāpodaya-
vākyasyāpi sa evārtho'stviti vācyam । yato mokṣaśāstre pāpmaśabdaḥ puṇyasyāpi grāhakaḥ ।
mumukṣuṃ prati tasyāpyaniṣṭaphalatvāt <quote>‘na sukṛtaṃ na duṣkṛta’</quote> mityupakramya <quote>‘sarve pāpmāno'to niva-
rtanta’</quote> ityubhayatrāpi tatprayogācca puṇyapāpodayarāhityādikaṃ tu deveṣvapi na sambhavatīti ce-
nna । pāpmaśabdasyāniṣṭaphalatvena rūpeṇa kvacidajahallakṣaṇayā puṇyasādhāraṇye'pi pāpamātre gṛ-
hītaśaktikasya tasya mokṣaśāstre'pi tatsādhāraṇyaniyamābhāvāt । anyathā <quote>‘naitaṃ setumahorātre
tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukutaṃ na duṣkṛtaṃ sarve pāpmāno'to nivartanta’</quote> iti prakṛte-
ṣvahorātrajarāmṛtyuśokasukṛtaduṣkṛteṣvaviśeṣeṇa pāpmaśabdasya prayuktatayānya1trāpi tāvatsā-
dhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt । na ceṣṭāpattiḥ । tasminneva prakaraṇe <quote>‘eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyu-
rviśoka’</quote>iti satyapi pāpmaśabde jarāmṛtyuśokānāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇāt । astu vā mokṣaśāstre sarvatra
pāpmaśabdaḥ puṇyasādhāraṇaḥ । tathāpyatra nāsaṅgatiḥ । kalpānte muktiṃ prāpsyatāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ

bhedaśaṅkyā cātideśopapatteḥ । dṛśyate hi <quote>‘tadyattatsatyamasau sa āditya’</quote> ityupakrāntasya hiraṇya-

ha na kācidanupapatiḥ । <pratika>sarvebhyaḥpāpmabhya iti</pratika> । asya vākyasya mukhyārthaḥ sarvasmātpāpādu-

tanī’</quote> tyādismṛtivacanairādityāntarvarti paraṃ brahma gāyatrīpratipādyamiti tāvadavasīyate । tacca

reyopaniṣadarthānurodhācca । tatra hya <quote>‘śarīraḥ prajñātme’</quote>ti jīvānāmantaryāmyuktaḥ । <quote>‘tasmātpuruṣaṃ
puruṣaṃ pratī’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣāt । śarīre puruṣa iti yamavocāma sa evāyaṃ daihika ātmā tasya yo'-
yamaśarīraḥ prajñātmā sa rasa iti prāgjīvāntaryāmitayā tadrasatvena tasya kīrtanācca । na ca
nyāyavirodhamupanyasya smṛtivacanaṃ kathamupekṣyata iti vācyam । vidhāntareṇāpi mantrayojanā-
pradarśakānāṃ smṛtivacanānāṃ darśanena parasparaparāhateṣu teṣu nyāyasyānurodhyatvāt । dṛśyante hi—
<quote>‘devasya saviturmadhye yo bhargo no dhiyaḥ kramāt । pracodayāttaṃ vareṇyaṃ dhīmahītyanvayakramaḥ ।।’</quote> ityādī-
nyapi smṛtivacanāni । śrutivirodhācca tadupekṣaṇīyam । udāhṛtāni hi bhargaśabdasyākārā-
ntatve savitṛvareṇyaśabdayoḥ parasparānvaye ca gamakāni śrutivacanāni । tasmādgāyatrīmantraga-
tabhargaśrutitaddevatāpratipādakasmṛtipurāṇavacanānurodhācchivasyādityāntarvartitvapratipādakaśruti-
<pb n="262"/>
smṛtipurāṇavacanānurodhācca gāyatrīpratipādyaḥ śiva eva । uktaṃ cādityapurāṇe <quote>‘tato darbhāsane
sthitvā gāyatrīṃ prajapeddvijaḥ । yadgāyatryāḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ devadevo maheśvaraḥ । iti jñātvā japedvi-
dvān gāyatryā phalamaśnute ।’</quote> iti । nanvāśvamedhike parvaṇi <quote>‘tanmaṇḍalasthaṃ māṃ dhyāyettejo-
mūrtiṃ caturbhujam । udutyaṃ ca japenmantraṃ citraṃ taccakṣurityapi । gāyatrīṃ ca yathāśakti japtvā
sūktaṃ ca māmaka’</quote>miti kṛṣṇavacanena viṣṇorādityāntarvartitvaṃ gāyatryupāsyatvaṃ ca pratipāditam ।
maivam । sandhyāsu viṣṇubhaktairādityamaṇḍale tanmūrtirdhyātavyetyetāvatparaṃ tadvacanajātam । na tu
viṣṇorādityāntaryāmitvagāyatrīpratipādyatvaparyantasthāpanakṣamam । śrutiviruddhe'rthe tasya tātpa-
ryāyogāt । <quote>‘tataḥ ṣaḍakṣaraṃ mantraṃ ṣaṭkṛtvaḥ parivartaye’</quote>diti pūrvaśloke ṣaḍakṣaramantrajapavidhāna-
darśanena tadanantaramādityamaṇḍale tadarthadhyānavidheraucityācca tattaddevatāmantrajapaniṣṭhānāṃ sarve-
ṣāmapi hi taddevatāmantrajapānantaraṃ taddevatāpūjānantaraṃ ca ādityamaṇḍale taddevatādhyānavidhi-
rupalabhyate । ata evāgneyapurāṇe viṣṇupūjāṃ vidhāya tadavasāne <quote>‘dhyeyaḥ sade’</quote>tyādiślokaḥ
paṭhitaḥ । kiṃ cāśvamedhike vaiṣṇavadharmaśāstrātmakaḥ kṛṣṇayudhiṣṭhirasaṃvādo vaiṣṇavāgamadharmavidhā-
nārthaṃ pravṛttaḥ na tu vaidikadharmavidhānārtham । <quote>‘bhagavan vaiṣṇavā dharmāḥ kiṃphalāḥ kiṃparāyaṇāḥ ।
kathaṃ tvamarcanīyo'si mūrtayaḥ kīdṛśaśca te । kathaṃ vaikhānasā brūyuḥ kathaṃ vai pāñcarātrikāḥ ।
evametatpurāvṛttaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dharmaśāsana’</quote>miti tatrādimadhyāntavacanopalambhāt । upakrame ca <quote>‘śrutā
me mānavā dharmāḥ’</quote> iti vaidikadharmebhyaḥ śrutebhyo vyāvartya <quote>‘yuṣmadīyānparāndharmānpuṇyānkathaya
me'cyute’</quote>ti tāntrikadharmāṇaṃ praśnaviṣayenopakṣiptatvāt । mānavā dharmā iti hi vaidikadharmā
evocyante । <quote>‘yadvai kiṃ ca manuravadattadbheṣaja’</quote>miti śruteḥ kūrmapurāṇe vyāsagītāyāṃ varṇāśramā-
cāropadeśānantara <quote>‘mityeṣa mānavo dharmo yuṣmākaṃ kathitaṃ maye’</quote>tyupasaṃhṛtatvācca । evaṃ ca tantra-
niṣṭena gāyatryā viṣṇucintane kartavye'pi na tadvaidikaiḥ kāryam । <quote>‘kvacittaṃtrānurodhena dharmaṃ
paurāṇikā api । vadanti tādṛśoṃ'śastu grāhyastantrāvalambinā । yattu tantrānusāreṇa kathitaṃ
tatparityajet । dharmaśāstre purāṇe ca yatnato vaidiko janaḥ ।’</quote> iti paurāṇikaireva tathāvyavasthāyāḥ
pradarśitatvāt । tasmādgāyatrīpratipādyaśśivo'vasīyata iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sarveṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ
dhyeya iti</pratika> । <quote>‘udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ vede’</quote>ti sarvapāparāhityaphalaśravaṇāt
brahmasākṣātkāraṃ vinā tadasambhavāt brahmasākṣātkāradvārā muktiphalakatvamasyopāsanasyāvasī-
yata iti bhāvaḥ । yadvā । gāyatryadhikṛtānāṃ sarveṣāmādityāntarvartinaḥ parameśvarasya gāyatryo-
pāsanaṃ muktiphalakamityanena vākyenocyate । ata eva kūrmapurāṇe vasumanaso rājñaḥ śivaṃ ravi-
maṇḍale gāyatryā ciramupāsitavato dehānte muktirupavarṇitā । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>iti
siddhamiti</pratika> ।। ।। ityantaradhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athāntaradhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 21 ।। bhedavyapadeśāccānyaḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>karmaspṛṅmaṇḍale sanbhavatu paraśivo nāyamādityabhinnastaṃ hi brahmeti vedaḥ prathayati viditaṃ tasya rūpaṃ ca śaivam ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ bhinnaśśivastadyamayitṛvacasā bhāvyate maṇḍalārcistadva‍ṛtyādityajīvāntaraśivavacasāpyeṣa tannācyuto'pi ।। 20 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na hi kamalalocana iti stutiranyatrācyutānna dṛṣṭāsti । vikasitasarasijasāmyaṃ śaṃbhorapi netrayordvayoreva ।। 21 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityantaradhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="263"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athāntaradhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate tu ।। 8 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū. । antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 20।।</pratika> <pratika>bhedavyapadeśāccānyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘atha ya eṣontarāditya
hiraṇyamaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ hiraṇyakeśaḥ āpraṇakhātsarvaṃ eva suvarṇaḥ tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī tasyo-
diti nāma sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ vedetyadhidaivatam । athādhyātmamapi । ya
eṣo'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate’</quote> ityādikaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra sūryamaṇḍale cakṣuṣi ca upāsyatvena śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ
vidyākarmādivaśāt prāptotkarṣaḥ kaścitsaṃsārī uta nityasiddhaḥ parameśvara iti saṃśayaḥ । rūpavattvādiśravaṇāt akṣyādityayorādhā-
ratvaśravaṇāt maryādāvadaiśvaryaśravaṇācca niratiśayaiśvarye nirādhāre nīrūpe brahmaṇyeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanupapatteśca vidyādivaśāt prāptotkarṣa-
kaścitsaṃsārī akṣyādityayorantaḥ śrūyate na parameśvara iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, apahatapāpmatvādyasādhāraṇabrahmaliṅgaḥ
śravaṇāt ṛk‌sāmādyātmakatayā sarvātmakatvopadeśasya brahmaṇyevopapatteḥ nīrūpasyāpi parameśvarasya lokānugrahārthaṃ hiraṇyaśmaśru-
tvādiviśiṣṭamāyikarūpaparigrahopapatteḥ nirādhārasyāpi tasya parameśvasya akṣyādhāratvopanyāsasya maryādāvadaiśvaryaśravaṇasya ca
upāsanārthatvācca parameśvara eva akṣyādityayorantarupadiśyata iti । <pratika>antaḥ</pratika>=akṣyādityayorantaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>taddharmopadeśāt</pratika>=tasya parameśvarasya dharmāṇāṃ apahatapāpmatvādīnāmatropadeśāt । iti sūtrārthaḥ <pratika>।। sū. । bhedavyapadeśāccā-
nyaḥ ।। 21 ।। bhedavyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityādantaro yamādityo na vede’</quote> tyādinā śrutyantare vediturādityāt
asyāntaryāmiṇaḥ bhedavyapadeśācca । <pratika>anyaḥ</pratika>=ādityābhimānino jīvān anyaḥ ayamantaryāmī parameśvara ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvādhikaraṇe pratipāditasya parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasya upāsakānāṃ saṃsārabheṣajaṃ manassamādhānayogyaṃ kimapi
rūpaṃ prakāśayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate । <pratika>sū. । antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । ayamādityā-
ntarvartī hiraṇyamaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaro vā utānyo devatāviśeṣo veti saṃśayaḥ । sarvādhārasya parameśvarasya ādityāntarvartitvādi-
dharmāṇāmasambhavāt akṣidvayopanyāsācca ayaṃ kaściddevatāviśeṣa eva na parameśvara iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvalokakāmeśvaratvasarvapā-
parāhityādīnāṃ pārameśvaradharmāṇām atra upadeśāt hiraṇmayatvādityāntarvartitvādyupadeśasya sādhakānugrahārthatvopapatteḥ <quote>‘kapyāsaṃ
puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī’</quote> ityatra kaṃ udakaṃ raśmibhiḥ pibatīti kapiḥ ādityaḥ tena āsitaṃ vikāsitaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sphurati
tathā parameśvarasya locanadvayam । tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ tu mukulitapuṇḍarīkasadṛśam ityarthavarṇanasya nyāyyatvāt atra akṣigatadvitva-
saṅkhyāyāḥ tṛtīyalocanābhāvadyotanaparatvābhāvācca ayaṃ parameśvara eveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat ।। 21 ।।</p>
<p><quote>‘asau yo'vasarpati nīlagrīvo vilohitaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘svarucāhitamaṇḍalastri/?/netraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘asāvādityo brahma’</quote>ityādibhiḥ ādityasyaiva nīla-
grīvatvatrilocanatva brahmatvādīnāmupadeśāt ādityamaṇḍalābhimānī sūrya eva hiraṇyamayaḥ puruṣo'stu ityata āha---<pratika>sū. । bhedavya-
padeśāccānyaḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityādantaroyamādityo na veda’</quote>ityādau maṇḍalābhimānijīvāt antaryāmiṇaḥ para-
meśvarasya bhedavyapadeśāt ayamakṣyādityāntarvartī puruṣaḥ maṇḍalābhimānijīvādanya evetyarthaḥ ।। 22 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, ānandamayādhikaraṇe niratiśayānandabhājanatvasakalaprapañcasraṣṭṛtvādidharmāṇāṃ jīvasāmānye asambhave'pi <quote>‘sa-
yaścāyaṃ puruṣe yaścāsāvāditye sa ekaḥ’</quote> iti ānandamayasyaiva ādityāntarvartitvābhidhānāt ānandamaya ādityādiḥ syāditi
imāmāśaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā idamadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate—<pratika>sū. । antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 21 ।। bhedavya-
padeśāccānyaḥ।। 22 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyasūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ ca prāyaḥ na bhidyate bhagavatpādīyamatāt । sandeho'pi samāna eva ।
puṇyopacayaprāptaiśvaryaḥ ādityādiśabdābhidheyaḥ jīva epa akṣyādityamaṇḍalāntarvartī puruṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । antarādityavi-
dyāyāmeva apahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ jīveṣvasambhāvitadharmāṇāṃ śravaṇāt paramātmano'pi karacaraṇādiyuktāprākṛtanityavigrahasadbhāvācca
ādityamaṇḍalāntarvatī paramātvaiveti ānandamayo'pi tadabhinnaḥ paramātmaiveti siddhāntaḥ ।। 21 ।। 22 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ । antastaddharmopadeśāt ।। 20 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘antaḥ praviṣṭaṃ kartārametaṃ antaścandramasi manasā
carantam । sahaiva santaṃ na vijānanti devāḥ । indrasyātmānaṃ śatadhā carantam’</quote> । ityādi taittirīyagataṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । antaḥ-
praviṣṭatvena śrutaḥ indrādirvā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । indrādiśabdaśruteḥ indra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । samudraśāyitvādikānniravakāśālliṅgāt
indrādiśabdānāmapi yogataḥ viṣṇuparatvasambhavācca viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>antaḥ</pratika>=antaḥpraviṣṭamiti hṛdayāntaḥ śrutaṃ brahmaiva । ne
ndrādiḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddharmopadeśāt</pratika>=tasmin vākye kṣīrābdhimadhyavartitvapralayodadhisthitatvabrahmāṇḍavīryatvādirūpaviṣṇudharmāṇāṃ
<quote>‘antassamudra’</quote> ityādau śrutatvāt ityarthaḥ ।। 20 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । bhedavyapadeśāccānyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> na kevalamantasstho viṣṇuḥ । kiṃ tu indrādibhyo'nyaśca । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>bhedavyapadeśāt ।</pratika> tasya tadantaryāmitvatatprerakatvādirūpabhedakadharmaśravaṇādityarthaḥ ।। 21 ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmantaradhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="264"/>
athākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।। 9—10 ।।
<p>sarvajñatvādidharmakasya parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya paramamaṅgalāspadamupāsyaṃ rūpamabhidhāya
tallakṣaṇasya nāmarūḍhivaśādanyatrātivyāptiśaṅkāyāmadhikaraṇamārabhyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। ākāśastalliṅgāt ।। 23 ।। ata eva prāṇaḥ ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samu-
tpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti’</quote> <quote>‘sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃ-
viśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate’</quote> iti ।। atra sakalabhūtotpattipralayakāraṇapratipādakau
prāṇākāśaśabdau parameśvarapratipādanaparau kiṃ vā bhūtākāśaprāṇavāyupratipādanapa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṅgatiṃ sūcayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>sarvajñatvādīti ।</pratika> yadvākyamavalambya parabrahmaṇa-
śśivasya yogyaṃ rūpamupāsyaṃ pradarśitaṃ tatra tasya tātparye vyavasthāpite tadvākyānantaraṃ paṭhita-
yorākāśaprāṇavākyayorbuddhisthayostatra tātparyanirūpaṇaṃ kriyata iti prasaṅgalakṣaṇasaṅgatiriha
viṣayavākyakramamūlā vivakṣitā । tayorbrahmaṇi tātparyanirūpaṇe kṛte mandānāmākāśaprāṇayo-
rbrahmalakṣaṇātivyāptiśaṅkāpi nirastā bhavatītyetāvatā'tivyāptiśaṅkāyāmityuktam । śi-
vasya yogyaṃ rūpamityetatsūcayituṃ <quote>‘sarvajñatvādidharmakasye’</quote>ti <quote>‘paramamaṅgalāspada’</quote>miti ca viśe-
ṣaṇe । sarvottaraguṇaśālinaḥ sarvottarasaundaryaśāli rūpaṃ yogyam । <quote>‘prāyo virūpeṣu bhavanti
doṣā yatrākṛtistatra guṇā vasantī’</quote>ti sāmudrikaśāstravacanāditi bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū. ।। ākāśa-
stalliṅgāt ।। 23 ।। ata eva prāṇaḥ ।। 24 ।।</pratika> idaṃ sūtradvayamadhikaraṇadvayārtham । tatro-
ttarādhikaraṇaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyātideśārtham । ataḥpūrvapakṣasiddhāntaikarūpyādyugapadadhikaraṇadva-
yopanyāsārthaṃ sūtradvayaṃ yugapallikhitam । tathaiva viṣayavākyadvayamapyudāharati—<pratika>chāndogya iti</pratika> ।
śrutyananyathāsiddhaliṅgābhyāṃ liṅgānyathāsiddha‍yananyathāsiddhibhyāṃ vā pūrvottarapakṣakoṭidvayami-
tyabhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । iyamiha viṣayaśuddhiḥ । dālbhyaśālāvatyajaivalibhistri-
bhirārabdhāyāṃ vādakathāyāṃ prathamaṃ śālāvatyadālbhyayoḥ praśnottaraparamparā prasṛtā <quote>‘kā sāmno gati-
riti svaraiti hovācca svarasya kā gatiriti prāṇa iti hovācca prāṇasya kā gatiriti annami-
ti hovācca annasya kā gatiriti āpa iti hovācca apāṃ kā gatiriti asau loka iti ho-
bāca amuṣya lokasya kā gatiriti na svargaṃ lokamatinayediti hovāce’</quote>ti । evaṃ dālbhyena svarga-
loke sāmagatiparamparāviśrāntibhūmitvena sthāpite tasya pakṣaḥ śālāvatyena dūṣitaḥ <quote>‘aprati-
ṣṭhitaṃ vai kila te dālbhya sāme’</quote>ti । svargasya manuṣyakṛtayajñādyadhīnasthitikatvāt sāmagatipara-
mparā pratiṣṭhārūpe vastuni na samāpitetyapratiṣṭhitaṃ sāma syādityarthaḥ । evaṃ dūṣitasvapakṣatayā
śiṣyabhāvaṃ prāptasya dālbhyasya śālāvatyasya ca praśnadvayamuttaradvayaṃ ca prakṛta <quote>‘mamuṣya lokasya
kā gatiriti ayaṃ loka iti hovāca asya lokasya kā gatiriti na pratiṣṭhāṃ lokamatinaye-
diti hovāce’</quote>ti । tataśśālāvatyasya pakṣo jaivalinā dūṣitaḥ <quote>‘antavatkila te śālāvatya

sambhavena tatkiṃ sarvakāraṇamanantaṃ vastviti tatpraśnassarvakāraṇavastuviṣaya ityupapadyate । evamupapattau
ca nānyasannidhānamātreṇā<quote>‘sya lokasye’</quote>ti śrutyossaṅkucitaviṣayatvakalpanopapadyate । evamaneka-
liṅgasadbhāve'pyanyāni sarvāṇi liṅgānyanantatvaliṅgādhīnonmeṣāṇīti tenaikenaiva liṅgena liṅgā-
ntarairupabṛṃhitena sādhyasiddhimabhipretya sūtre <quote>‘talliṅgā’</quote>dityekavacanaṃ kṛtam । tasmādihākāśaḥ paraṃ
brahma । nanvākāśaśabdanirūḍhisadbhāvādayaṃ cidākāśa ityastu । tatrāpi brahmaṇīvānantatvādili-
ṅgānāṃ sāmañjasyāditi cedastu । na bhūtākāśa iti hi bhūtākāśatvameva vyavacchidyate । brahme-
tyanuvṛttassādhyanirdeśastvabhedopacārādupapadyata iti । prāṇādhikaraṇe'pyākāśādhikaraṇavatpūrvapa-
kṣasiddhāntau । prāṇaḥ pañcavṛttirvāyuḥ na brahma । upakramagatapradhānaprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇa caramaśrutata-
dga‍uṇasarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanādīnāṃ varṇanīyatvāditi prāpte <quote>‘katamā sā devate’</quote>ti <quote>‘saiṣā devate’</quote>
tyupakramopasaṃhāragatapratipipādayiṣitacetanatvaliṅgenāsaṅkucitasarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanāvadhāraṇo-
pabṛṃhitena prāṇaśrutibādhāt brahmaveti nirṇaya ityatidaśasya prayojanamadhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇam ।
evamatrādhikāśaṅkā—anantatvavaddevatātvaṃ na brahmaikāntikaṃ liṅgam । ādityādisādhāraṇyāt । nā-
pyacetanavyāvṛttam । sūktapratipādyeṣu somalatādiṣu haviruddeśyeṣvaśvamedhāśvāvayavādiṣu<quote>‘hantāha-
mimāstisro devatā’</quote>iti śrutinirdiṣṭeṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣu ca tadvyavahāradarśanāt । ihāpi pratihārade-
vatāyāmanne tacchravaṇāt । na ca tatrānnaśabdastadabhimānidevatāparaḥ । ‘annameva pratiharamāṇāni
<pb n="269"/>
rābiti saṃdehaḥ ।। <quote>‘prāṇāddha‍yeva khalvimāni bhūtāni jāyante, prāṇena jātāni
jīvanti, prāṇaṃ prayantyabhisaṃviśanti’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ, <quote>‘ākāśādvāyuḥ’</quote> ityādi-
śruteśca, prāṇākāśayorapi sakalabhūtakāraṇatvāvagamāt tāvevātra pratipādyau ।। iti
prāpte brūmaḥ---prāṇākāśaśabdavācyaḥ parameśvara eva, sarvakāraṇatvāditalliṅgāt ।
na hyanayoḥ sarvakāraṇatvādikaṃ saṃbhavati । tatrānandarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvavāde
tātparyaṃ <quote>‘prāṇāddha‍yeva khalu’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ, na prāṇasya kāraṇatvavāde, kiṃtvanuvāda-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
jīvantī’ti vākyaśeṣavirodhāt । tadvatprāṇaśabdo'pi prāṇābhimānidevatāpara iti tatra deva-
tātvaliṅgasamarthanopapatteśca । na cākāśavākya iva prāṇavākye <quote>‘sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānī’</quote>
tyetatsaṅkocāsahiṣṇvavagamyate । tatrānantatvaliṅgopapādanārthasyevātra kasyacidasaṅkocahetorabhā-
vāt । tadabhāve copakramagatapradhānaprāṇaśrutyanurodhena yathāyogyaṃ saṅkocasyocitatvāt ।
annādityavākyayo<quote>‘ssarvāṇibhūtānī’</quote>tyasyāvaśyaṃ saṅkocanīyatvena tatprāyapāṭhādatrāpi saṅko-
casya prāpteśca । na hi sarve prāṇinaḥ ādityaṃ gāyanti annaṃ bhakṣayanta eva vā jīvanti kiṃ
tu tatra yogyā eva jīvanti । annaśabdo hyodanavācī natvadanīyamātravācī । <quote>‘bhissā strī
bhaktamandho'nnamodano'strī’</quote>ti naighaṇṭukaprasiddheḥ । <quote>‘annena vyañjana’</quote>miti pāṇini <ref>(pā॰ 2-
1-34.)</ref> sūtradarśanācca । na ca <quote>‘prāṇamevābhisaṃviśantī’</quote> tyavadhāraṇamākāśavākyagatāvadhāraṇa-
manantatvaliṅgopapādanārthatveneva kenaciddhetunānyathāsiddhamavagamyate । pratyutā<quote>‘nnameva pratiharamā-
ṇānī’</quote>tyavadhāraṇaprāyapāṭhena tadvadyāthākathācamityeva pratīyate । vastutastu <quote>‘sarvāṇi bhūtānī’</quote>-
tyādivākyaśeṣasya na kācidanupapattiḥ । bhūtaśabdo hyatra prāṇinikāyaparaḥ । tathā ca teṣāṃ saṃveśano-
dgamane sthitipravṛttī indriyavṛttivilayatadudbhavarūpau svāpaprabodhau vā । teṣāṃ ca prāṇaikāyattatvaṃ
<quote>‘mā mohamāpadyatha ahamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya dhārayāmī’</quote>tyādiprāṇasaṃvāda-
gatavākyajātena <quote>‘yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥprāṇaṃ śrotraṃ prāṇaṃ manassa-
yadā prabudhyate prāṇādevādhi punarjāyanta’</quote> ityādisvāpaprabodhaviṣayavākyajātena sthitipravṛttyoḥ
prāṇādhīnatvagrāhakapratyakṣeṇa svāpadaśāyāṃ prāṇavṛttimātrānuvṛttyanubhavena cāvagamyata iti kima-
trānupapannam । athavā । astvatra saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvityarthaparigrahaḥ । so'pi prāṇa-
viṣaya upapadyata eva । <quote>‘prāṇāddha‍yeva khalvimāni bhūtāni jāyanta’</quote>ityādiśruteḥ । nanu bhṛguvallyāma-
nnaprāṇamanovijñāneṣu caturṣvapi sthūlārundhatīnyāyamavalambya jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇatva-
varṇane dṛśyamāne kena viśeṣeṇa viśiṣya prāṇe tadāśaṅkyate । śrutyantarasaṃvādena viśeṣeṇeti
brūmaḥ । <quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsīt । tadāhuḥ । kiṃ tadāsīditi । ṛṣayo vāva te'gre asadāsīt ।
tadāhuḥ । ke te ṛṣaya iti । prāṇā vāvarṣaya’</quote> iti śrutau hi śrutyantareṣu brahmaṇa iva prāṇasya
prāgjagadutpattessadbhāvaśśrūyate । tenānandarūpe brahmaṇīva prāṇe'pi jagadutpattyādiśravaṇaṃ tātvika-
viṣayamityasti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ । na ca brahmakāraṇatvapratipādakaśrutyanurodhāt tatratyaprāṇaśabdo'pi
brahmapara iti vācyam । kalpabhedenobhayorapi kāraṇatvopapattau prāṇaśrutibādhāyogāt । na ca
bahuvacanaṃ mukhyaprāṇe'nupapannamiti vācyam । brahmaṇīva tadupapatteḥ । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇa’</quote> iti
<pb n="270"/>
mātram । ākāśasya bhūtāntarvartitayā sarvaśabdena grahaṇāt, sarvabhūtotpattiḥ
<quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> iti śrutyā parameśvarādeva । tasmāt sarvabhūtakāraṇatvaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prāṇotpattiśruteḥ jīvotpattiśrutivadupapatteḥ । prathamaṃ brahmaṇa utpannasya prāṇasya bhūtendriyādisa-
rvakāraṇatvopapatteśca । tasmātprāṇaśruterannādityarūpābrahmaprāyapāṭhādānandavallayāmannamayādyabrahma-
prāyapāṭhavadākāśavākyasāmagatirūpasvaraprāṇādyabrahmaprāyapāṭhavat bhūmavidyāyāṃ nāmādyabrahmaprāya-
pāṭhavaccātra prāṇaśrutyanugrāhake prāyapāṭhe bādhakasya balavato liṅgāderabhāvācca atra prāṇo na
brahmeti । evamadhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthamidamatideśādhikaraṇam । tannirākaraṇaprakārastvayam ।
devaśabdātsuravācino <quote>‘devāttali’</quote>ti svārthavihitataddhitānto devatāśabdaḥ kvacitkvacidacetane
pūjyatvavivakṣayā prayukto'pi surarūpacetanaviśeṣavācīti prayogaprācuryābhidhānakośādibhirava-
gatam । sa cātra prastāvabhaktāvupāsanīye prāṇe praśnopadeśarūpayorupakramopasaṃhārayoḥ śravaṇena
vivakṣitārthayāvasīyata iti tena prāṇaśabdaḥ cetanaviśeṣavācī tāvannirdhāryate । annaśabdo'pi
tena tathā nirdhāryate cedannābhimānidevatāparo'stu । tathaiva prāṇaśabdo'pi yadyapi prāṇābhimāni-
devatāparo vaktuṃ śakyate । <quote>‘prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa’</quote>mityādiśrutiṣu parame-
śvara iva prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu prāṇābhimānini prayuktaśca । tathā yatra parameśvaraparatvameva tasya
yuktam । vākyaśeṣasya svarasato'saṅkucitasarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamananirapekṣādhāraparasya svatastatra
sambhavāt । prāṇābhimānidevatāyāṃ saṅkucitārthasya tasya prāṇavāyugatatadarthāropeṇa sama1rthanīya-
tvāt । na hyannavākyaśeṣaḥ tadabhimānidevatāṃ vinā cetanāntare kathamapyanvayamalabhamānastasyā-
mannagatatadarthāropeṇa samarthita ityatra gatyantarasambhave'pyanyadīyāropassamāśrayaṇīyaḥ । na vā
gatyantararahitayorannādityavākyaśeṣayossarvaśabdasya saṃkocaḥ kṛta ityasaṃkocasaṃbhave'pyatra
saṅkocaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । nāpyannavākyaśeṣe'vadhāraṇasya svārasikamanyayogavyavacchedakatvaṃ tyaktvā
bhinnakramatvenāyogavyavacchedakatvamāśritamityatrāpi tathāśrayaṇīyam । prāyapāṭhastu sthānapramā-
ṇarūpo liṅgabādhyo'tra na niyāmakaḥ । yattu saṃveśanodgamanayoḥ sthitipravṛttirūpatve svāpaprabo-
dharūpatve vā sarvaśabdasaṅkoco nāśrayaṇīya iti tanna । sthitipravṛttyādīnāṃ pratidehavyavasthitaprā-
ṇāviśeṣādhīnatvenaikatra tatassarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanahetutvālābhāt । sarvabhūtalayotpattikāraṇatva-
mekatra samaṣṭiprāṇe sambhavatīti cenna । asaṅkucitasakalacetanācetanarūpasarvabhūtakāraṇatvasya
prāṇe sarvaśarīrake parameśva2ra eva sambhavāt । <quote>‘prāṇā vā ṛṣaya’</quote> iti śruterjñātṛtvapratipādakaṛṣi-
śabdānurodhena <quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsī’</quote>dityādi śrutyantarānurodhena ca <quote>‘tathā prāṇa’</quote>
ityadhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇayā rītyā parameśvaraparatvāt । <quote>‘prāṇāddha‍yeva khalvi’</quote>tyādiśruterapyannādi-
paryāyagatavākyānāmivānandarūpasya parabrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatva eva tātparyāt । tasmātsarvajagatprakṛ-
titvāvadhāraṇopabṛṃhitapratipipādayiṣitacetanatvaliṅgena prāṇaśrutibādhāt prāṇaḥ parameśvara iti
siddham । <quote>‘ākāśasya bhūtāntarvartitaye’</quote>tyādibhāṣyasyāyamarthaḥ । śuddhamiśramalinaprapañcāntargatasya
trividhasyāpyākāśasya bhūtāntarbhūtatayā sarvaśabdena grahaṇāt tadantarbhāvena sarvabhūtotpattiḥ
kutaścidapyekasmādākāśānna sambhavati । kiṃtvā<quote>‘tmana ākāśa’</quote> iti śruteḥ parameśvarādevetya-
<note>(1) <quote>‘ropāśrayaṇāyogāt’</quote> iti gha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘parameśvara ivāsaṃbhavāt’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="271"/>
na bhūtākāśaprāṇayoriti siddhāntaḥ ।। nanu bhūtākāśa ityupapadagrahaṇena kimiti ce-
t—paramākāśasya paraprakṛtirūpasya sarvabhūtakāraṇatvasadbhāvāt saprayojanam । tarhi
parameśvara iti kathaṃ nirṇayaḥ ? tadabhedāt, iti siddham ।।</p>
ityākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।। 9 ।। 10।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti । ākāśagrahaṇamatra vāyvādikasyāpyulakṣaṇam । ākāśavatrividhaṃ pṛthi-
vyādikaṃ pratyapi kasyacidākāśasya kāraṇatvaṃ na sambhavatītyasya hetoraviśiṣṭatvātprathamasṛjya-
vācitvādākāśapadaṃ sarvopalakṣaṇatvenopāttam । bhāṣyāntarāṇi nigadavyākhyānāni ।।
<head>।। ityākāśādhikaraṇaṃ prāṇādhikaraṇaṃ ca ।।9।।10।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।।9।।10।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। ākāśastalliṅgāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ākāśasyāmnātā chāndogye sarvabhūtakāraṇatā । āmnāyabodhite'rthe na ca vimatiḥ kartumucitā naḥ ।। 22 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>astu sa paramākāśastadabhedādīśvaro'pi taddharmā । na hi bhūtākāśe sā ghaṭate janimattayā vidite ।। 23 ।।</l></lg>
<sutra>sū ।। ata eva prāṇaḥ ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇe tu kā gatiriti prāṇāddhyevetyapi śrute'nyatra । śiva eva so'pi liṅgātsā śrutirānandaviśrāntā ।। 24 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।। 9 ।। 10 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha ākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।। 8 ।। 9 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate tu ।। 9 ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate, sū. । ākāśastalliṅgāt</pratika> ।। 22 ।। asya <quote>‘asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi
ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam ।’</quote> iti chāndo-
gyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyate uta bhūtākāśamiti saṃśayaḥ । lokavedayorākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe
prasiddhataraprayogadarśanena brahmaṇi gauṇatvasyāśrayaṇīyatvena mukhyārthasambhave gauṇārthagrahaṇasyānyāyyatayā bhūtākāśasyāpi vāyvādi-
krameṇa kāraṇatvopapattyā jyāyastvaparāyaṇatvayorapi bhūtāntarāpekṣayā asminbhūtākāśe upapadyamānatayā ca ākāśaśabdena bhūtākā-
śamevābhidhīyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu <quote>‘ākāśādeve’</quote>tyavadhāraṇabalāt <quote>‘sarvāṇī’</quote>ti bhūtaviśeṣaṇasvārasyācca sarvabhūtotpatti-
layakāraṇatvasya mūlakāraṇe brahmaṇyevopapatteḥ anāpekṣikayorjyāyastvaparāyaṇatvayori paramātmanyekasminnevopapannataratvāt bhūyasīnāṃ
brahmaliṅgaśrutīnāmanugrahāya ekasyā ākāśaśruterbādhasya yuktatvācca ākāśaśabdena brahmaiva atra udgīthe upāstatayābhidhīyata iti ।
<pratika>ākāśaḥ</pratika>=ākāśaśabdavācyaḥ paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>talliṅgāt</pratika>=tasya brahmaṇaḥ samastamahābhūtasṛṣṭyādikasya liṅgasya asmi-
nvākye dṛṣṭatvādityarthaḥ ।। 22।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । ata evaprāṇaḥ</pratika> ।। 23 ।। udgīthe <quote>‘prastotaryā devate’</quote>tyupakramya <quote>‘katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca । sarvāṇi
ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate saiṣā devatā prastāvamanvāyatte’</quote>ti chāndogye śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyaṃ
viṣayaḥ । saṃśayanirṇayau pūrvādhikaraṇavadeva । atra prāṇaśabdena kiṃ prañcavṛttiḥ prāṇo'bhidhīyate uta paraṃ brahmeti saṃśaye pañcavṛttiḥ
prāṇa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanādeḥ ananyathāsiddhabrahmaliṅgāt pūrvādhikaraṇoktanyāyācca atrāpi prāṇaśabdābhidheyaṃ
paraṃ brahmaiva upāsyatayā abhidhīyata iti siddhāntaḥ ।। 24 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate,</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇaiḥ paramaśivasya paramamaṅgalāspadamupāsyarūpamabhidhāya tallakṣaṇānāṃ nāmarūḍhivaśāt anyatrātivyāpti-
śaṅkāyāṃ tannirākaraṇāya ime adhikaraṇe ārabhate । sū. ।। <pratika>ākāśastalliṅgāt ।। 23 ।। ata eva prāṇaḥ</pratika> ।। 24 ।।
viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasiddhāntadikaṃ pūrvavat ।। prāṇakāśaśabdābhyāṃ parameśvara eva pratipādyata iti niṣkarṣaḥ ।। 23 ।। 24 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, sū. । ākāśastalliṅgāt ।। 23 ।। ata eva prāṇaḥ</pratika> ।। 24 ।। viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ
prāyaḥ pūrvavadeva । nāsti vailakṣaṇyamiti na pṛthakprapañcyate ।। 23 ।। 24 ।।</p>
<pb n="272"/>
<head>atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvaṃ nikhilabhuvananākasya nirastasamastadoṣavāsanākalaṅkasya niratiśayamāṅga-
lyarat‍nākarasya umāpateḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ ādityamaṇḍalamāspadamiti nirūpitam ।
tadiha tasya sthānāntaramucyate---</p>
<head>jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt ।। 25 ।।</head>
<p>chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ
pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokoṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ’</quote> ityādi ।।
atra sakalalokavyāpitayā divi śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvaro vā tadanyo
veti saṃśayaḥ ।। dyuśabdasyākāśavācitvāt <quote>‘paro divaḥ’</quote> ityākāśavartī sūrya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>।।sū।। jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt</pratika> ।।26।। saṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇasya viṣayamāha—<pratika>pūrva-
miti</pratika> । pūrva <quote>‘mantastaddharmopadeśā’</quote> dityadhikaraṇe nikhilabhuvananāyakasya sarvalokakāmeśvarasya ni-
rastasamastadoṣavāsanākalaṅkasya sarvapāpoditasya niratiśayamaṅgalyaratnākarasya sādhakānujighṛkṣa-
yā tadanugrahārthaṃ parigṛhītadivyavigrahakāntisaundaryādisarvottaramaṅgalyaguṇagaṇamaṇigaṇamahāsa-
mudrasya umāpatestaittirīyopaniṣa<quote>‘dyumāpataya’</quote> iti viśeṣyapadena nirdiṣṭasya parabrahmaṇaḥ ādityā-
ntarvartinaḥ parameśvarasyādityamaṇḍalaṃ paryaṅkasthasya rājñaḥ prāsādavadāspadamiti nirūpitam । i-
hādhikaraṇe tasya parameśvarasya sthānokteḥ prasaṅgātsthānāntaramucyata ityarthaḥ । yasya vākyasya
brahmaṇi tātparyanirṇaye sati tadupāsanasthānāntarāvagatirapi labhय़te tasya brahmaṇi tātparya-
nirṇayo'tra kriyata iti yāvat । anena pūrvādhikaraṇadvayasya prasaktānuprasaktarūpatvātpūrvādhi-
karaṇenaivāsyāpi prasaṅgasaṅgatiriti darśitaṃ bhavati । tatpradarśanārthameva tadadhikaraṇanirṇītatā-
tparyakavākyalabdhāni parameśvarasya viśeṣaṇāni <quote>‘nikhilebhuvane’</quote> tyādinā varṇitāni । <quote>‘atha yadataḥ
para’</quote> iti liṅgavyatyayaḥ chāndasaḥ । atodivaḥ paramūdhvarvartitayā bahirbhūtaṃ yat jyotirdīpyate ।
keṣu viśvataḥ viśvasya pṛthivyāderuparisthānarūpeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu ca lokeṣu । lokasāmastyaspaṣṭī-
karaṇārthaṃ viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣviti dvirvacanam ।tajjyotiridameva । yadantaḥ puruṣe jāṭharākhyaṃ
jyota/?/rityarthaḥ । divaḥ paramiti kvacitsthitatvenoktasyāpi dīptyā sarvalokavyāptirupapadyate ।
atra dyuśabdasya parāparāntarikṣalokaparākāśasādhāraṇyaṃ saṃśayabījamiti dharmaviśeṣaṇena darśayan
saṃśayamāha—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । <quote>‘divī’</quote>ti sāmīpye saptamī । udumbare vasatītivaddivaḥ paraṃ śrūyamāṇamitya-
rthaḥ । <pratika>tadanyo ve ti</pratika> । ādityajāṭharapūrvapakṣadvayasaṅgrahārthaṃ sādhāraṇyena nirdeśaḥ । <pratika>dyūśabdasyeti</pratika> ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū. ।। ākāśastalliṅgāt</pratika> ।। 22 ।। asminnadhikaraṇe viṣayavākyasaṃśayādikaṃ samānameva ।
<pratika>ākāśaḥ</pratika>=ākāśaśabdavācyo viṣṇureva । na prasiddhakāśaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>talliṅgāt</pratika>=chāndogaśrutyuktākāśe parovarīyastvādirūpa-
viṣṇuliṅgasya śravaṇādityarthaḥ ।। 22 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū. । ata eva prāṇaḥ</pratika> ।। 23 ।। <quote>‘tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo abhavaḥ । mahānbhogaḥ prajāpateḥ । bhujaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ । yaddevānprāṇayo
nava ।’</quote> iti taittirīyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । saṃśayapūrvapakṣādikaṃ samānameva । <quote>‘hrīśca te lakṣmīśca pat‍nyā’</quote>viti uttaratra śrūyamāṇāt śrīpati-
tvarūpānniravakāśādviṣṇuliṅgāt atratyaprāṇaśabdena viṣṇurevābhidhīyate na mukhyaprāṇa iti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>prāṇaḥ=</pratika><quote>‘tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo-
abhavaḥ’</quote> ityuktaḥ prāṇo viṣṇureva nānyaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>ata eva=</pratika><quote>‘hīścata’</quote> iti śrīpatitvaliṅgādevetyarthaḥ ।। 23 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmākāśādhikaraṇaprāṇādhikaraṇe ।। 8 ।। 9 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 9 ।। 10 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="273"/>
ādityapūrvapakṣe ākāśo bhūmisūryamadhyavartyaparo'ntarikṣalokaḥ । <quote>‘yāvatpramāṇā pṛthivī vi-
stāraparimaṇḍalā । nabhastāvatpramāṇaṃ syāvdyāsamaṇḍalato dvije’</quote>ti tatrākāśaparyāyaprayogada-
rśanāt । jāṭharapūrvapakṣe dehabāhyo bhūtākāśaḥ । ayamantarikṣalokarūpo dehabāhyabhūtākāśarūpo
vā ākāśo'tra viṣayavākye dyuśabdenocyate । tataḥparatvaṃ sūryasya tata upari vartamānatvam ।
jāṭharasya jyotiḥprakaraṇātpūrvaṃ gāyatrīprakaraṇe yo'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśa ityuktatvāt deha-
bāhyākāśāt pṛthagyo'yamantaḥpuruṣe ākāśa iti nirdiṣṭe dehāntarākāśe vartamānatvaṃ vivakṣi-
tamityabhipretyāha—<pratika>paro diva ityākāśavartīti</pratika> । antarikṣalokavācino dehabāhyākāśavā-
cinaścākāśaśabdasya sāmīpyasaptamīsamāsaḥ । evaṃ caitatparyantaṃ sūryaviśeṣaṇaṃ jāṭharāgnāvapyanuṣañja-
nīyam । sūrya evetyevakāreṇa parameśvarapakṣavyavacchedaḥ । tatrāyamāśayaḥ । dyuśabdo'tra svargavā-
cī vaktavyaḥ । ākāśavācī vā tatparyāyatayāntarikṣalokavācī vā । ādye'pi parameśvarani-
tyasthānabhūtasarvottaraparasvargavācī śakrāditridaśālayarūpasūryalokādidhruvalokāvadhyaparasvarga-
vācī vā । prathame <quote>‘divaḥ para’</quote>ityetadanupapannam । tasyopari tadbahirbhūtatayā vartamāne hi tataḥ para
ityucyate । na hi vṛkṣasyopari bhrāmyanniva vṛkṣakoṭare sthito'pi pakṣī vṛkṣātpara ityucyate ।
na ca parameśvaraḥ parasvargasyopari tato bahirbhūto vartate kiṃ tu tanmadhyagate divyamandire । parasvarga-
vācitve <quote>‘cāta’</quote> iti viśeṣaṇamanupapannam । aparasvargavācitvapakṣo'pi na saṅgataḥ । na hyaparasva-
rgādapyūrdhvammaharādyanekalokaghaṭitasya parapṛthivīlokarūpasya pārthivasya prakṛtikāryasya brahmāṇḍa-
sya tadūrdhvavartinaḥ parasvargādhastanasya parāntarikṣalokarūpasya māyākāryasya guhyāṣṭakādyunmanānta-
lokanivahasya copari paramākāśamaye parasvarge vartamānasya parameśvarasyāparasvargātparatvoktyā ka-
ścidatiśayo labhyate । ata eva dvitīyavikalpo'pyanupapannaḥ । na hi tasyāta iti nirdiṣṭaprā-
kṛtākāśātparatvoktyāpi kaścidatiśayo labhyate । tṛtīye tu parāntarikṣavivakṣāyāṃ tataḥ paratvo-
ktyā labhyata evātiśayaḥ । kiṃ tu tatparatāyāmata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate । tasmādihāparānta-
rikṣātparatvaṃ vivakṣaṇīyam । tadāditya eva saṅgacchate na brahmaṇi । jyotiṣṭvena dīptimattvena
ca lokaprasiddhe tasminneva ca yacchabdayogena prasiddhavadanūdyamānaṃ tadubhayaṃ saṅgacchate । jyotiḥśśru-
tirapi prasiddhyatiśayāttatraiva saṅgacchate । na ca bhūrādilokatrayavyatirikteṣu maharādilokeṣu sū-
ryakiraṇapracārābhāvādviśvataḥpṛṣṭhetyādikaṃ tasminna saṅgacchata iti vācyam । tadupakramārthatvenā-
ditye niścite tadanusāreṇa tasya trailokyāntargatalokasāmastyaparatvopapatteḥ । syādetat । atha
yadataḥ prāk <quote>‘tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divī’</quote>ti brahma prakṛtam । tadeva prakṛtaparāmarśinā yatpadenābhidhā-
tavyam । tataścopakramagatayatpadānusāreṇa tatsamānādhikaraṇajyotirādipadānāṃ tatraiva kathaṃcana
vṛttirabhyupagantavyeti cenna । yatpadādapi prāthamikenādhikārārthenāthaśabdena jyotiśśabdasvā-
rasyena ca prakṛtādbhedasyaiva saṃjñādhikaraṇanyāyataḥ pratīteḥ । <quote>‘saṃjñā cotpattisaṃyogā’</quote>dityadhikara-
ṇe hi<quote>‘athaiṣa jyotiretena sahastradakṣiṇena yajete’</quote>tyatra kiṃ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomamanūdya tatra sahastradakṣi-
ṇāvidhānamuta jyotirnāmakasahastradakṣiṇāviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānamiti ‘eṣa iti sarvanāmnaḥ
prakṛtaparāmarśitvāt jyotiriti nāmaikadeśasya <quote>‘vasantevasante jyotiṣā yajete’</quote> tyatreva jyo-
tiṣṭome kathañcidva‍ṛttisambhavāt tatra sahastradakṣiṇāvidhānamiti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvādhikārārthenāthaśabdena
<pb n="274"/>
evātra pratipādyate jyotiriti । athavā <quote>‘antaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ’</quote> iti puruṣāntarva-
rtitayā jāṭharo'gniriti pūrvapakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu <quote>‘paro divo jyotiḥ’</quote> iti sarvo-
ttaraṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvara eva । pūrvatra <quote>‘pādo'sya sarvā bhutāni’</quote> iti jyotiṣo'-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prakaraṇavicchedāvagamāt jyotiriti saṃjñāntarasya svato'rthāntaraparatvasvārasyācca tadbalā<quote>‘deṣa’</quote>
ityasya prakriyamāṇaparatvamaṅgīkṛtya nāmaguṇaviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānamiti siddhāntitam ।
tadvadihāpyathaśabdena prakaraṇavicchedāvagamāt prāk brahmaṇyaprayuktasya jyotiśśabdasya prasiddha-
taralaukikārthasvārasyācca । yadityasya prakriyamāṇādityaparatvamabhyupagamya tadupāsanavidhānama-
ṅgīkartuṃ yuktamiti । <pratika>athaveti</pratika> । atrāyamāśayaḥ । satyaṃ jyotiriha prakṛtaṃ brahma na bhavatīti
kiṃtvāditya iti na yuktam । jāṭharāgnirityeva yuktam । <quote>‘idaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe
jyoti’</quote>riti śrutyā tasya jyotiḥpadasya jāṭharāgniparatvena vyākhyātatvāt। udāhṛtavākyaśeṣa śruteḥ
‘tasyaiṣā dṛṣṭiryatraitadasmina‍śarīre saṃsparśenoṣṇimānaṃ vijānāti tasyaiṣā śrutiryatraitatkarṇāvapigṛhya
ninadamiva nadadhurivāgneriva jvalata upaśṛṇotīti tadanantaravākyena jāṭharāgniviṣayaspaṣṭīka-
raṇācca । na ca jāṭharāgnau diva ūrdhvavṛttitvaṃ sarvalokavyāpidīptimattvaṃ ca nānvetīti śaṅkanī-
yam । <quote>“gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā vāpi vākyabhedena vā punaḥ । vedo yamāśrayatyarthaṃ ko nu taṃ pratikūla-
yet”</quote> ।। iti vārtikoktarītyā vaidikavyākhyānadarśane vyākhyeyabhāge tadanukūlārthaparatvakalpanā-
vaśyambhāvāt । tathā ca divaḥ paratvaṃ bāhyākāśādanyatra śarīrākāśe vartamānatvaṃ sakalaloka-
vyāpidīptimattvaṃ brahmāṇḍarītyā piṇḍāṇḍarūpe dehe dhyānārthaṃ tattallokatayā kalpiteṣu bhāgeṣu
vyāptayā <quote>‘santāpayati svaṃ dehamāpādatalamastaka’</quote> iti śrutisiddhayā dīptyā yuktatvamiti
vyākhyeyam । na ca <quote>‘sa eṣa parovarīyānudgītha’</quote> iti sarvalokagatākāśasyodgīthasāmānādhi-
karaṇyaśravaṇamiva divaḥ parasya jyotiṣo jāṭharāgnisāmānādhikaraṇyaśravaṇaṃ tathātvenopāsanārtha-
mastu mābhūtavdyākhyānarūpamiti vācyam । vyākhyānatayā tatvārthopadeśarūpatvopapattau spaṣṭabhe-
dayossāmānādhikaraṇyaśravaṇasyaiva kalpitārthaviṣayatvakalpanāyogāt । anyathātiprasaṅgāt ।
evamādityo jāṭharo vā paraṃ jyoti rna parameśvara iti prāpte siddhāntayati—<pratika>siddhāntastviti</pratika>
sarvottaramiti hetugarbhaṃ viśeṣaṇam । sakalasaṃsāramaṇḍalātītasthānavṛttitvā<quote>‘ddivaḥpara’</quote> ityanena
pratipāditaṃ jyotiḥ parameśvaraḥ । ādityajāṭharayo/?/stadasambhavāditi bhāvaḥ । kathaṃ <quote>‘divaḥ para’</quote>
ityasya sarvottaratvaparatā'vasīyata iti cet । ittham । idaṃ jyotistāvadda‍yusambandhapratyabhijñā-
nāt prāksarvāṇi bhūtāni ekaṃ pādaṃ kṛtvā pādatrayātmanā nirūpitaḥ puruṣa ityavasīyate । tasya
ca puruṣasūkte <quote>‘tripādūrdhva udaitpuruṣaḥ । pādo'syehābhavātpuna’</quote>riti sarvaprāṇinikāyāpekṣayordhva-
vartitvamavagatam । tathābhūte tasmi <quote>‘ndivaḥ para’</quote> ityānenātra prākṛtāntarikṣamātrāt prākṛtākāśa-
mātrādvā paratvamucyate cenna tatsvārasyaṃ labhate । ato'tra dyuṃśabdasya prakṛtamāyākāryarūpalau-
kikākāśasāmānyaparatvamabhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘ata’</quote>ityasva ca sannihitaprākṛtākāśagrahaṇārthatvaṃ
parityajya paramākāśavyāvartanārthatvamaṅgīkaraṇīyam । tato <quote>‘divaḥ para’</quote> ityasya sarvottaratvaparatā
labhyate । ayaṃ sarvottaratvahetu <quote>‘ścaraṇābhidhānā’</quote>diti sūtrāṃśena caraṇatrayarūpasya prakṛtasya puruṣasya
jyotiḥpadenābhidhānādityarthasya vivakṣitatvāllabhyate । <quote>‘paraṃ jyoti’</quote>riti paraviśeṣaṇaṃ <quote>‘paraṃ
<pb n="275"/>
jyotirupasampadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> iti śrutau parameśvare'pi jyotiḥpadaprayogo'stīti
jñāpanārthaṃ parāparajyotiṣoḥ parajyotiṣa evātra grahaṇamucitamiti jñāpanārthaṃ ca । jyotiśśabdo
hi nādityādīnāmeva vācakaḥ । kiṃ tu yadeva kiñcidavabhāsakaṃ cetanavyavahāropayogi tasya
sarvasyāpi vācakaḥ । bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘kiṃ jyotirayaṃ puruṣa’</quote> iti praśne ādityacandrāgnivacanā-
tmanāṃ pūrvapūrvābhāve uttarottarasya puruṣaṃ prati jyotiṣṭvamuktavatā yājñavalkyena teṣu jyotiśśabda-
pravṛttyupapādanāyādityenaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kuruta ityevamādibhirādityādīnāṃ
puruṣavyavahāropayogasya pratipāditatvādanyatrāpi <quote>‘mano jyotirjuṣatāmājya’</quote>mityādidarśanācca ।
evaṃ ca ādityādīnyaparajyotīṃṣi katipayabhāsanena tāvanmātravyavahāropayogitvāt । parame-
śvarastu paraṃ jyotiḥ <quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhātī’</quote>tiśruteḥ saṃvārvabhāsanena sarvavyavahāropayo-
gitvāt । tataścātra prakaraṇopapadādisaṅkocakarahitena jyotiḥpadena parameva jyotirabhidhātumuci-
tamiti । ayamapi hetuścaraṇavyapadeśādityādikamanuktvā <quote>‘caraṇābhidhānā’</quote>diti jyotiḥpada-
syābhidhāvṛttipratipādakaśabdopādānena vivakṣitaḥ । evaṃ divaḥ paratvaṃ jyotiśśrutiśceti yadu-
bhayaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhakatvenābhimataṃ tadeva siddhāntasādhakamiti viśeṣaṇamukhena darśitam । atha ca-
raṇābhidhānāditi sūtrāṃśaṃ hetvantaraparatvena vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>pūrvatreti । ekāṃśatayeti</pratika> । sautraca-
raṇaśabdasya bhāvapradhānatayā vyākhyānam । tathātra sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ jyotirekāṃśatvena pratipā-
danāt jyotiḥ parameśvara ityarthaḥ । nanu nāsti bhūtānāṃ jyotirekāṃśatvena pratipādanaṃ kiṃ tu
tripātpuruṣaikāṃśatvena । ato'yaṃ heturasiddhaḥ । evaṃ ca sarvottaratvaheturapyasiddhaḥ । na ca dyusa-
mbandhena jyotistripātpuruṣatayā pratyabhijñāpitamiti vācyam । <quote>‘divaḥ para’</quote> ityataḥ prāthamike-
nāthaśabdenādhikārārthatayā prakaraṇavicchedakena jyotiṣaḥ prakṛtatripātpuruṣānyatayaiva jñāpita-
tvāt । tathā ca prakṛtasya tripātpuruṣasya nijaikāṃśasakalaprapañcahetunā parameśvaratvasiddhau tadanya-
parasya jyotiḥpadasyādityādiparajyotiḥparatvamevāgatyāṅgīkaraṇīyamiti jyotiśśrutirapi na
siddhāntasādhikā । etena yatpadarūpasarvanāmaśrutiḥ prakṛtaparāmarśitvasvābhāvyāt prakṛtatripātpu-
ruṣaparā satī samānādhikaraṇaṃ jyotiḥpadamapi tatra paryavasāyayedityapi śaṅkā nirastā । prātha-
mikenāthaśabdena prakaraṇavicchedāvagame sati yatpadasyā<quote>‘thaiṣa jyoti’</quote>rityatraitatpadasyaiva prakriya-
māṇaparatvopapatteriti cet । ucyate । sarvanāmnāṃ samānadhikṛtaśabdasvārasyaprāptamapi prakari-
ṣyamāṇaparatvamatilaṅghya prakṛtaparamārśitvaṃ vyutpattisiddham । ata eva prayuktilakṣaṇe <quote>‘tapte
payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣe’</quote>tyatrāmikṣāpadavācyaṃ payaso'rthāntaraṃ dadhisaṃsargajanyaṃ
dravyāntaramabhyupeyam । paya āmikṣeti vyapadeśabhedāttasyaiva dravyāntarasya kaṭhināmlamadhurasya
vaiśvadevayāgadravyatvamāmikṣāpadasamānādhikṛtatatpadasya taddravyaparatvaṃ cābhyupeyamiti prāpte sarva-
nāmnaḥ prakṛtaparāmarśitvasvābhāvyāt tatpadamānayanakriyāṃ prati pradhānakarmatayā dadhyānayanā-
dhikaraṇatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ payaḥ parāmṛśatīti paya eva yāgadravyam । tatpade strīliṅgamāmikṣāpadasāmā-
nādhikaraṇyakṛtam । āmikṣāpadaṃ tu na dravyāntaravidhāyakaṃ kiṃ tu tatpadena kevale payasi
yāgadravye vihite tatra dadhyānayanasaṃskāravidhiprāptadadhisaṃsargānuvādakam । taccāsmādeva vaidi-
kavyavahārāt āmladravyasaṃsargaghanībhūtapayomātravācakaṃ na tajjanyadravyāntaravācakam । āmla-
raso na yāgadravyagataḥ kiṃ tu tatsaṃskārakadravyagata iti nirṇītam। <quote>‘dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ dhānā udakaṃ
<pb n="276"/>
taṇḍulāstatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatya’</quote>miti citrāyāgavidhau dadhyādyanekadravyamelanarūpasaṃsṛṣṭaikadravyaka
eko yāgaḥ । tatpadaṃ ca saṃsṛṣṭadravyaparamiti prāpte tatpadaṃ prakṛtaparāmarśitvasvābhāvyādasaṃsṛ-
ṣṭadadhyādisaptadravyaparaṃ na tu saṃsṛṣṭaikadravyaparamiti । dadhyādi saptadravyakāḥ sapta yāgāḥ । saptasvapi
dravyeṣu taditi napuṃsakaikavacanaṃ <quote>‘napuṃsakamanapuṃsakene’</quote>tyādivyākaraṇasmṛtyanusāreṇa । saṃsṛṣṭapadaṃ tu
yāgabhede'pi ekadaivatyatayā sānnāyyavaddadhyādīnāṃ sahaprekṣepe saṃsargasattvāttadanuvādakaṃ yojyamiti
nirṇītaṃ ṭupūṭīkāyāmaṣṭamadvādaśādhyāyayoḥ । <quote>‘athaiṣa jyoti’</quote>rityatra tu jyotiśśabdasya
jyotiṣṭomasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃjñāntaratvena svato'rthāntaraparatvasvārasyāt nāmaikadeśatvena jyotiṣṭomā-
nuvādakatvakalpanāyāḥ kliṣṭatvāt । etena <quote>‘sahastradakṣiṇena yajete’</quote>tyetāvatāpi prakṛte jyoti-
ṣṭome guṇavidhānopapattyā <quote>‘athaiṣa jyoti’</quote>riti tadanuvādavaiyarthyāt jyautiṣṭomikadvādaśaśata-
dakṣiṇāyāḥ sahastradakṣiṇāyā vikalpaprasaṅgācca । tatraiva iti sarvanāmraḥ prastoṣyamāṇaparatvamagatyā
kalpitam । iha tu viparītam । jyotiśśabdasya hi sarvāvabhāsake paraśvara eva svārasyaṃ na
tvādityādiṣu । sakalalokavyāpidīptiyuktajyotiṣṭvenānuvādaśca upāsanāviśeṣārtha iti na
vaiyarthyam । nāpyatra vidhīyamānasya kasya cidga‍uṇasya kenacidvirodhiguṇena vikalpaḥ prasajyate ।
tathāpyaśabdenādhikārārthena prakaraṇavicchedāt sarvanāmnaḥ prakṛtaparatvaṃ na sambhavatīti cenna ।
tasya kāṃsyabhojinyāyena pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārthatvopapatteḥ tasya pūrvopāsanānvitabrahmaguṇānāṃ jyoti-
rupāsanāyāmapyanvayasamarpakatayā sāphalyācca । idamārabhyata ityanuktvāpyārambhasambhavena āra-
mbhāparaparyāyādhikārapratipādanasya śrotṛcittasamādhānamātraphalasya niṣphalaprāyatvāt । <quote>‘athaiṣa
jyoti’</quote>rityatra tu saṃjñābhedādibhiḥ karmabhedaniścayāt pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārthatvaṃ pūrvapakṣitaṃ na sambha-
vatītyagatyā tatrādhikārārthatvamāśritam । na cehādhikārārthatvasya sarvathaivāsambhavo'pi । prakṛtaṃ
brahma avihāyaiva tatropāsanāntarādhikārārthatvasambhavāt । tasmātsarvanāmnastatsamānādhikaraṇa-
jyotiḥpadasya ca prakṛtatripātpuruṣaparatvāt jyotiṣi nijaikāṃśasamāptasakalaprapañcahetossarvo-
ttaratvahetośca nāsiddhiḥ । athaśabdasya pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣitvācca na jyotiḥśrutisvārasyahāniḥ ।
tathāpi yacchabdayogene prasiddhavadanūdyamānasakalalokavyāpidīptiśālijyotiḥṣṭvamādityaparigraha-
iva pūrvaprakṛtārthaparigrahe na sambhavati । pūrvaṃ tatra tasyāvarṇitatvāditi cet । ucyate । nijaikāṃśa-
samāptasakalabhūtatvahetunā tripātpuruṣe varṇitena jyotiṣaḥ parameśvaratvaṃ tripātpuruṣeṇa sahaiva
siddhyati । tasya parameśvaratvābhāve tadabhinnatayā pratyabhijñāyamānasya jyotiṣastadasambhavāt ।
api ca <quote>‘tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divī’</quote>tyetadanantaraṃ <quote>‘yadvaitadbrahme’</quote>ti vākye prakṛtaṃ tripātpuruṣaṃ tatpadena
nirdiśya tadviṣayatayā prayuktāttadanantaraṃ prāgādihṛdayasuṣiravartiprāṇādyupāsanānāṃ prakṛtatripā-
tpuruṣopāsanāṅgānāṃ vidhānānantaraṃ <quote>‘te vā ete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ svargasya lokasya dvārapā’</quote>
iti teṣāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ hṛdayakamalāntardhyātavyaparamākāśākhyasvargalokarūpaprakṛtatripātpuruṣarāja-
dhānīdvārapālakatvakīrtane tadviṣayakatayā prayuktāśca brahmeti parameśvarābhidhānādapi tripātpuruṣasya
parameśvaratvaṃ siddhyati । idamapi <quote>‘caraṇābhidhānā’</quote>diti sūtrāṃśena vivakṣitam । caraṇatrayarūpasya
puruṣasya brahmeti parameśvaravācinā śabdenābhidhānādityarthaḥ । evaṃ tripātpuruṣasya parameśvaratvasi-

syaikāṃśatayā viśvabhūtānāmabhidhānāt । naitat saṃbhavati jāṭharāgnisūryayoḥ, pari-
cchinnatvāt ।।
