vyākhyāne yaugikārthapradarśanamapyupapadyata iti tadupapattirbhāṣye na pradarśitā।<quote>‘tathāhidarśana’</quote>miti
sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । <quote>‘vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ prāṇovā va saṃvarga’</quote> iti saṃvargavidyāyāṃ <quote>‘vāyustasmi-
nnapyayavanto'gnissūryaścandra āpaścetyadhidaivataṃ pañca । prāṇastasminnapyayavanti vāṅmanaścakṣuśśrotraṃ
cetyadhyātmaṃ paṃca । eteṣu daśasu saṃkhyāsāmyarūpadaśākṣarachandassādṛśyānusandhānārthaṃ tadvācino
virāṭchabdasya prayogo dṛśyate । evamihāpi brahmaṇi gāyatrīśabdasya prayoga ityarthaḥ । idamatra
vaktuṃ śakyam । gāyatrīśabdo'tra prakaraṇe gāyatryavacchinnaparameśvarapara iti tatrāvacchinnarūpe'na-
nvayyapi svarvātmyamanavacchinnasvarūpe tasminvastugatyānvetyeva । yathā daharavidyāyāṃdaharo'smi-
nnantarākāśa’</quote> iti hṛdayāvacchedrādalpatvenokte tasmi<quote>‘nyāvānvā ayamākāśa’</quote>ityucyamānaṃ bhūtā-
kāśasāmyaṃ yathā vā śāṇḍilyavidyāyām <quote>‘eṣa ātmāntarhṛdaye'ṇīyā’</quote>niti hṛdayāvacchedādaṇī-
yastvenokte tasmi<quote>‘nneṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye jyāyāndiva’</quote> ityādinocyamānaṃ jyāyastvam । avaśyaṃ
cātrāpyevameva sārvātmyamupapādanīyam । atrāpi hi gāyatryākhyaḥ parameśvaro hṛdaya evopāsa-
nīya iti hṛdayasuṣireṣūpāsanīyānāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ taddvārapālakatvakīrtanādavasīyate । sūtramapyasmi-
nnarthe mahādbhiryojitam । tathā tena gāyatryavacchinnaprakāreṇa dhyānopadeśāt । tathānyatrā<quote>‘pyetaṃ hyeva
bahvṛcāḥ mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta’</quote>ityādaukāryaviśeṣāvacchinnaparameśvaropāsanadarśanamastīti । pūrva-
yojanāyāṃ ca naivaṃ viṣayavākyasvārasyānuguṇyamasti । tathāhi—gāyatrīśabdasya parameśvare gauṇa-
<note>(1) etadrekhāṅkitaṃ vākyaṃ ca pustake na dṛśyate ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vṛṣā su sāsahi’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="280"/>
chando'bhidhāyī śabdaḥ sādṛśyādarthāntare prayujyamāno dṛśyate, yathā saṃvargavidyā-
yāṃ <quote>‘te vā ete pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘saiṣā virāṭ’</quote>
ityuktam । tathā ca sarvātmakatayā parameśvarasya liṅgena gāyatrīprakaraṇabādhaḥ। ataḥ
parameśvara eva jyotiriti ।।
bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteścaivam ।। 27 ।।

tāyāṃ gāyatrīgataṃ pādacatuṣṭayavattvarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nimittamiti kuto'vagantavyam । na tāvacca-
tuṣpadetyasya gāyatrīchandorūpasādṛśyapratiyogiviśeṣaṇatvabalāt tasya bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayā-
tmakapādacatuṣṭayavattvārthakatvasya chandorūpagāyatryāścāgrimasūtre sūtrakṛtaiva vakṣyamāṇatvāt ।
nāpi svataḥprasiddhibalāt gāyatrīṣu tripādatvasyaiva । prasiddheḥ । na ca kavisamayaprasiddhibalāt ।
kīrtidhāvalyādiṣviva gāyatrīcatuṣpādatve tadasampratipatteḥ । na ca kvaciddarśanabalāt । prāyi-
kasya prasiddhasādṛśyasyaiva sādṛśyoktiṣu grāhyatvāt । anyathā <quote>‘varāhaṃ gāvo'nudhāvantī’</quote>tyatra
vāyasasyāpi varāhaśabdārthatvāpattyā yavavarāhādhikaraṇavirodhaprasaṅgāt । aupādhikyāḥ kasyā-
ścidgordvipāttvasambhavena vāyase tatsādṛśyopapatteḥ । etena prasiddhagāyatryā gāyatryāṃ catuṣpāda-
tvakalpanāpakṣo'pyapāstaḥ। prasiddhāyāṃ gavi vāmadakṣiṇabhāgasthayoḥ dvayordvayoḥ pādayoḥ aikyā-
ropeṇa dvipāttvakalpanayā vāyase tatsādṛśyasyāpyupapādanasambhavena pūrvoktavirodhaprasaṅgāt ।
tasmādiha gāyatrīśabdasya gāyatrīśarīrakaparameśvaraparatvasyopapannatvāttadviṣayatayā sūtravyā-
khyānasyāpi bhāṣyāntaradṛṣṭasyopalakṣaṇamidaṃ bhāṣyakārakṛtaṃ sūtravyākhyānamiti draṣṭavyam ।
gāyatrīśabdasya sādṛśyaparatvena vyākhyāne'pi hi pādacatuṣṭayavattvena sādṛśyavarṇanaṃ ṣāḍvidhyena
sādṛśyāsyāpyupalakṣaṇamityanyopalakṣaṇatvamāśrayaṇīyam । sahopāttayoścatuṣpadatvaṣāḍvidhyayo-
ranyatareṇaiva sādṛśyaṃ vivakṣaṇīyamityatra vinigamanāvirahāt ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsvakṣareṣu kalpitaiḥ pādai-
ścatuṣpādatvasyeva kalpiteṣu caturṣu pādeṣu pratipādaṃ ṣaḍa‍bhiṣṣaḍa‍bhirakṣaraiḥ prasiddheṣu triṣu pādeṣu
ṣaḍa‍bhirardhairvā ṣāḍvidhyasyāpi sambhavācca । <pratika>liṅgeneti</pratika> । brahma śrutyorapyupalakṣaṇam । prāthamika-
tvādananyathāsiddhatvācca liṅgasya viśiṣya grahaṇam । <pratika>gāyatrīprakaraṇabādha iti</pratika> । gāyatrī-
śabdasya parameśvaraparatayopapāditatvā <quote>‘dgāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūta’</quote>mityādisandarbhasya gāyatrī-
prakaraṇatvabādha ityarthaḥ ।। evaṃ gāyatrīviṣayasandarbhekavākyatayā śrutisaṅghaṭite taduparitanasa-
ndarbhe dṛṣṭaiḥ śrutiliṅgairgāyatrī na chandaḥ parameśvara iti prasādhitam । tatsandarbhagataliṅgabalenāpi
tathā'vasīyata ityetadarthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati ।। sū ।। <pratika>bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatte-
ścaivam</pratika> ।।27।। saiṣā catuṣpade’ti vyapadeśaḥ teṣāmṛcyatrārthavaśena pādavyavasthetyuktarūpapādaca-
tuṣṭayavattvena na bhavati । kiṃ tu prāgvarṇitabhūtādirūpāṃśacatuṣṭayavattvena । tathā hi—prathamavā-
kyena tāvadgāyatryāssarvabhūtātmatvamuktam । tadanantaraṃ yā vai sā gāyatrī’tyādivākyatrayeṇa
tasyāḥ pṛthivīśarīrahṛdayātmatvaṃ krameṇa darśitam । ato bhūtādiśabdoktāścatvāroṃśā labdhā
iti tathābhūtāṃśacatuṣṭayavattvena catuṣpadatvavyapadeśa iti yuktam । nanu vāgvai gāyatrī’ti vā-
kyena gāyatryā vāgātmatvamapyuktam । tathā ca pūrvaṃ vācā saha pañcāṃśā labdhā iti tadviṣayatve
pañcapadeti syāt । na catuṣpadeti । ucyate । tasminvākye prasiddhagāyatryāmeva vāgrūpatvānvaye
sati tathābhūtagāyatrīsādṛśyena taccharīrakatvena vā tatratyagāyatrīśabdaḥ parameśvaraparaḥ। yathā

bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayaiścatuṣpadeti vyapadeśo na gāyatryākhye chandasyupapadyate,
parameśvara evopapadyate ।।

<quote>‘nadyāṃ’</quote> ghoṣa ityuktyanantaraṃ viśiṣya <quote>‘gambhīrāyāṃ nadyāṃ ghoṣa’</quote> iti vākye nadyāṃ gambhīratvā-
nvaye sati tathābhūtanadīsambandhitvena nadīśabdaḥ tīraparaḥ । ato vāgātmatvasya pūrvamanukta-
tvāt na catuṣpadatvavyapadeśānupapattiḥ । nanu, tathāsati gāyatrīśabdokte parameśvare ṣāḍvidhyā-
nvayo na siddha‍yet । vāci gānakartṛtvaṃ trāṇakartṛtvaṃ ceti dve vidhe pṛthivyāṃ sarvabhūtapratiṣṭhātva-
<quote>‘metāmeva nātiśīyata’</quote> iti vākyenaitāṃ pṛthivīṃ karmabhūmiṃ sarvabhūtaṃ saṃsārijātaṃ nātiśeta
ityarthakenoktaṃ sarvabhūtānativartanīyatvaṃ ceti dve vidhe śarīrahṛdayayoḥ prāṇapatiṣṭhātvaṃ tadanativarta-
nīyatvaṃ ceti dve vidhe iti hi ṣāḍvidhyamupapādānīyam । tatra pṛthivyādyātmatvamiva vāgātmatvamapi
yadi parameśvarasya prāgvarṇitaṃ syāt tadā pṛthivyādidharmāṇāmiva vāgdharmayorapi parameśvaradharma-
tvalābhāt tatra ṣāḍvidhyānvayassiddha‍yet nānyatheti cenmaivaṃ śarīrahṛdayayorye prāṇapratiṣṭhātvatada-
nativartanīyatve tayorāśrayabhedāccatuṣṭvena parigaṇanayā ṣāḍvidhyānvayopapatteḥ vāgdharmatvenoktayo-
ssarvabhūtagānatrāṇayorvāgrūpatvenoktāyāṃ gāyatryāmanvaye sati pṛthivyādidharmāṇāṃ sarvabhūtaprati-
ṣṭhātvādīnāṃ tadātmabhūte parameśvara iva gāyatrīdharmayostayorapi tadātmabhūte tasminparyavasānena
tadupapatteśca । gāyatrīsādṛśyānusandhānapakṣe'pi vāgrūpagāyatrīparyavasitayostayostatsādṛśyarūpa-
tayā parameśvare'pi prāpteḥ । yadvā । <quote>‘vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūta’</quote> mityetatparyantaṃ yatsa-
dṛśatvena yaccharīrakatvena vā śivasyepādānaṃ kāryaṃ tasyā gāyatryāssarvabhūtātmatvena vā praśastata-
ratvapratipādanārtham । paraśaktirūpeṇa sarvabhūtātmikā hi vāk । tatsārakāryatayā tadrūpā gāyatrī
praśastaterati tātparyam । <quote>‘gāyati ca trāyate ce’</quote>tyetattu sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya gāyatryātmabhūtasya
ca parameśvarasyaiva taccharīradvārakadharmayoḥ pratipādakam । ayaṃ parameśvaraḥ svaśarīrabhūtasarvabhūtā-
ntargatatraivarṇikātmanā gāyati gāyatrīmantraṃ japati gāyatrīmantrātmanā ca japatastānra/?/kṣatīti ।
<quote>‘āgaccha varade devi japye me sannidhībhava । gāyantaṃ trāyase yasmādgāyatrī tvamudāhṛte’</quote>ti smṛ-
tiḥ । tasmā<quote>‘ccatuṣpade’</quote>ti vyapadeśo bhūtādirūpāṃśacatuṣṭayavattvenaiveti nāyaṃ chandasyupapadyate ।
tadetatsarvamabhipretyāha—<pratika>bhūtapṛthivīti</pratika> । nanvayaṃ bhūtādipādavyapadeśaḥ kṣodīyasi chandasī-
vātimahīyasi parameśvare'pi nopapadyate । na hi parameśvarasvarūpaṃ caturṣveva bhūtādiṣu paryavasita-
mityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>parameśvara eveti</pratika> । parameśvara upapadyata evetyevakāro bhinnakramaḥ । na hyaṃśaca-
tuṣṭayaparicchinnaḥ parameśvaraḥ iti sāvadhāraṇamucyate । kiṃ tvaṃśacatuṣṭayavānityetāvadupāsa-
nārthaṃ kīrtyate । ata eva tāvanmātrarūpatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ prakṛtaparameśvaraviṣayatayā <quote>‘tāvā-
nasye’</quote>ti mantro'vatāritaḥ । tena hyasya parameśvarasya mahimā tāvānpūrvāktāṃśacatuṣṭayaparimāṇaḥ ।
na caivaṃ tāvanmātraparicchinna iti śaṅkanīyam । yato'yaṃ puruṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ tato jyāyāṃśca bha-
vatītyuktvā tajjyāyastvamuttarārdhenāviṣkṛtam । aṃśacatuṣṭayātmanā vibhaktāni yā/?/ni sarvāṇi
bhūtāni pṛthivīśarīrahṛdayayuktāni tānyasyaikaḥ pādaḥ । tripādayaṃ tu tāni sarvāṇi atikramya
vartata iti । nanu, puruṣasūkte prakṛtena mahimavarṇanena prasaktā tatparicchedaśaṅkāmapākartuṃ pravṛttaḥ
<quote>‘tāvānasye’</quote>ti mantraḥ kathametatprakaraṇakṛtamahimavarṇanaprasaktatatparicchedaśaṅkāpākaraṇārthaḥ syāt ।

punarāśaṅkya pariharati—
upadeśabhedānneti cetrobhayasminnapyavirodhāt ।। 28 ।।
nanu <quote>‘pādo'sya sarvā bhūtāni । tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi’</quote> ityatra dyusaṃbandhapratyabhijñā-
nājjyotirvākye parameśvaraḥ pratipādyata iti na sāram—upadeśabhedena virodhāt
pratyabhijñānāsiddheḥ । <quote>‘tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi’</quote> iti, <quote>‘paro divo jyotiḥ’</quote> iti vi-
bhaktibhedenopadeśabhedaḥ । ato virodha iti cet—na, ubhayatrāpi virodhābhāvāt,
yathā vṛkṣāgre śyenaḥ, vṛkṣāgrāt parataḥ śyena iti vyapadeśe । ubhayatrāpi vṛkṣātpa-

naiṣa doṣaḥ । ubhayatrāpi prācīnamahimavarṇanasyārthata ekatvā/?/tpuruṣasūkte <quote>‘sa bhūmiṃ sarvato vṛtve’</quote>
tyuktyā bhūmyanativarttibhūtaśarīrahṛdayākramaṇasyārthatassiddhatvāt tadākramaṇasya <quote>‘puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ
yadbha‍ūtaṃ yacca bhavya’</quote>miti mantrataḥ śarīraśarīribhāvenādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhātṛtvarūpatāparyavasānācceti
bhāvaḥ । tasmādbha‍ūtādicaturaṃśatvaṃ parameśvara upapadyata eva ।। evaṃ <quote>‘tāvānasye’</quote>ti mantrasya cha-
ndaḥparatvena prāk brahma na prakṛtamiti śaṅkā pūrvasūtrābhyāṃ nirākṛtā । idīnāṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛ-
tattve'pi nirdeśabhedājjyotirvākyaṃ na brahmaviṣayamiti śaṅkā nirākriyata ityevaṃ śaṅkāntarani-
rākaraṇārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>punarāśaṅkyeti ।। sū ।। upadeśabhedānneti cennobhaya-
sminnapyavirodhāt</pratika> ।। 28 ।। prāgvyavasthāpitārthānuvādapūrvakaṃ tatra sūtrodbhāvitāṃ śaṅkāṃ darśa-
yati—<pratika>nanvityādinā</pratika> । vṛkṣasyopari bhrāmyati pakṣiṇi vṛkṣāgra iti vyapadeśa iva parāntarikṣa-
rūpāyāḥ laukikākāśarūpāyā vā diva upari sūryādyāsthāne vartamāne parameśvare divītyapi nirdeśa
upapadyate । saptamyāssāmīpikādhikaraṇaviṣayatvasambhavāt pradhānaprakṛtyarthapratyabhijñānirvāhāya
tadanusāreṇa pratyayārthavarṇanaucityācceti sautraparihārāṃśābhiprāyaṃ darśayati—<pratika>ubhayatrāpīti</pratika> ।
nanu dyuśabdasyādyasthānaparatvamaṅgīkṛtya saptamyaupaśleṣikādhikaraṇaviṣayetyapi samarthayituṃ
śakyata iti cet satyam । tathā sati <quote>‘divaḥ para’</quote>iti nirdeśo'nupapannassyāditi darśitaṃ
prāk । tasmādiha <quote>‘divi diva’</quote> iti śabdau parāntarikṣaparākāśānyataraparāvityeva yuktam ।
ata eva <quote>‘ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhva’</quote>diti hi parameśvarasūkte <quote>‘paro divā para enā pṛthi-
vye’</quote>ti mantragatasya dyuśabdasya parāntarikṣaparatvajñāpakaḥ pṛthivīsamabhivyāhāro dṛśyate । tatra
<quote>‘dive’</quote>ti <quote>‘pṛthivye’</quote>ti ca tṛtīyā pañcamyarthe । enā enayā anayetyarthaḥ । anvādeśaviṣaya
enādeśastṛtīyāyā ākārādeśaśca chāndasaḥ । tathā cāsmātparapṛthivīlokarūpāt brahmāṇḍā-
tparāntarikṣarūpāttaduparitanamāyākāryalokanikāyācca parasvargarūpaparamākāśavartī parameśvaraḥ
para ityarthaḥ । ata eva ca<quote>‘āditprat‍nasya retaso jyotiḥ paśyanti vāsaram । paro yadi dyute
divī’</quote>ti saptamyā nirdiṣṭasyāpi para ityuktam । tena saptamyā nirdeśyasya sāmīpikādhikaraṇa-
viṣayatvaṃ dyuśabdasyādyasthānātiriktaparāntarikṣaparākāśānyataraparatvaṃ cāviṣkṛtam । nanu de-
vatāviśeṣaparatvena niścite puruṣasūkte paṭhita<quote>‘syaitāvānasye’</quote>ti mantrasya chandastāvakatvenāvadhāra-
ṇāyogāt tadekaviṣayasya gāyatrīprakaraṇasyāsya chandaḥparatvaṃ na sambhavatītyuktaṃ <quote>‘chando'bhi-
dhānā’</quote>diti sūtre । tanna sambhavati cenmāsambhūttāvatā tasya parameśvaraparatvaṃ na sambhavati । puruṣasū-
ktasya hiraṇyagarbhaparatayā tadgata<quote>‘syaitāvāni’</quote>ti mantrasya tadviṣayatvāvaśyambhāvena tadanurodhādasyā-
<pb n="283"/>
ratvameva vivakṣitam । evamatrobhayatrāpi divaḥ paratvameva vivakṣitam । anena

tāni’</quote> ityatrāpi śravaṇāt । ato nijaikāṃśasamāptasakalaprapañcaṃ divi dīvyamānaṃ
paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvara iti nirṇayaḥ ।। iti jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।

pi tatparatvasyeva siddheḥ । tathā ca dyusambandhapratyabhijñānāt jyotirapyādityamaṇḍalasthito hi-

sahasraśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭasya puruṣasūktapratipādyapuruṣasyāpi parameśvaratvaṃ siddha‍yati । <quote>‘tasmādvi-
rāḍajāyate’</quote>tyādeḥ <quote>‘tathā lokām̐/?/akalpaya’</quote>nnityantasya puruṣasūktāntargatasandarbhasya parameśvara-
sṛṣṭabrahmāṇḍodarajātahiraṇyagarbhaviṣayatve'pi tatpūrvottarasandarbhayossūktaviṣayatayā prādhānyena
parameśvaratvapratipādakatvopapatteḥ । vistareṇa caitadadhyāntyādhikaraṇe samarthayiṣyate । <quote>‘viśvā-
bhūtānī’</quote>ti taittirīyapāṭhaḥ । adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ataiti । divīti</pratika>। śrutyanusāreṇa sā-
mīpyasaptamī । dyuśabdo vātra parasvargarūpādyasthānarūpaḥ ।। <pratika>iti jyotiradhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 11 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt ।। 25 ।। chando'bhidhānānneti cenna tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāttathā hi da-
rśanam ।।26।। bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteścaivam ।।27।। upadeśabhedānneti cennobhayasminnapyavirodhāt । 28</sutra>
<p>jyotiḥ pūṣā divo'bhrātsa hi bhavati paro jāṭharaikyopadeśādvahnirvā tanna śambhūścaraṇakathanatastatra hetorasiddheḥ ।</p>
<lg><l>gāyatrī tena siddha‍yetsa iti na caraṇācchandaso'stu śrutatvāssa jyotiryadyapi syāddivi diva iti cādeśabhedānna sa syāt ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ sārvātmyabhūtapramukhacaraṇatā sarvabhūtāṃghritodyatpuṃsūktapratyabhijñāvacanavihitataddvārapālābhidhānaiḥ ।। 25 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gāyatrī tāvadīśo diva iti vacasā pratyabhijñāptibādhājjyotiśca dyaustadādyaṃ paramaśivapadaṃ nāntarikṣaṃ na nākaḥ ।। 26 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt ।। 24 ।। chando'bhidhānānneti cenna tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśa-
nam ।।25।। bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteścaivam ।।26।। upadeśabhedānneti cennobhayasminnapyavirodhāt ।।27।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika> asyādhikaraṇsya <quote>‘atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu loke-
ṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyoti’</quote>riti chāndogyagataṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । kimiha jyotiśśabdena ādityādikaṃ jyo-
tirabhidhīyate kiṃ vā paramātmeti । prasiddhibalāt dyumaryādatvaśruteḥ kaukṣeyajyotiradhyāsāt brahmāliṅgādarśanācca ādityādikameva
jyotiśśabdena parigṛhyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । pūrvavākye parabrahmaṇo dyusaṃbandhitvanirdeśena <quote>‘pādo'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyamṛtaṃ
divī’</quote>tyanena matreṇa brahmaṇaḥ catuṣpāttvābhidhānena sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ upāsanārthaṃ pradeśaviśeṣādīnāmupādhisambandhātparika-
lpane virodhābhāvena ca jyotiśśrutiḥ brahmaparaiveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>jyotiḥ</pratika>=atratyaṃ jyotiḥpadaṃ brahmaparam । kutaḥ । caraṇābhidhā-
nāt catuṣpāttvābhidhānādityarthaḥ ।। 24 ।। nanu <quote>‘gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarva’</quote>miti gāyatryākhyachandasaḥ prakṛtatvāt tasyaivopāsyatvaṃ
nānyasyetyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>sū॰ । chando'bhidhānāditi ।। chando'bhidhānāt</pratika>=gāyatryākhyachandasya evābhidhānāt । <pratika>neti-
cet</pratika>=pūrvavākye brahmaṇaḥ na prakṛtatvamiti cet । na । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>—gāyatryākhyachandodvāreṇa tadgate brahmaṇi । <pratika>ceto'rpaṇani-
gadāt</pratika>=cittasamādhānasyābhidhānāt । <pratika>tathāhi darśanam</pratika>=vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇaḥ upāsanamanyatrāpi <quote>‘etaṃ hyevaṃ bahvṛcā mahatyukthe
mīmāṃsante’</quote>ityādau dṛśyata ityarthaḥ । ataḥ brahmaiva pūrvavākye nirdiṣṭam । na chanda iti siddham ।। 25 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca gāyatrīvākye brahmaiva pratipādyamityāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteścaivam</pratika> ।। bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayaiḥ
catuṣpadā gāyatrīti vyapadeśasya brahmaṇyevopapatteḥ । na hyakṣarasanniveśarūpagāyatryāṃ bhūtādipādavyapadeśassambhavati । ato gāyatrī-
vākye brahmaiva pratipādyamiti jyotirvākye dyusambandhāt tadeva pratyabhijñāyata iti siddham ।। 26 ।।</p>
<pb n="284"/>
<p>nanu pūrvaṃ divīti saptamyā iha diva iti pañcamyā ca divaḥ ādhāratvāvadhitvayornidiśyamānatayā vibhaktibhedāt dyusamba-
ndhāt brahmaṇaḥ pratyabhijñānaṃ na sambhavatītyata āha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। upadeśabhedānneti cediti</pratika> ।। <pratika>upadeśabhedānneti cet</pratika>=
divi diva iti vibhaktibhedena upadeśāt jyotirvākye pratyabhijñānaṃ na sambhavatīti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>ubhayasminnapi</pratika>—vi-
bhaktibhedena upadeśadvaye'pi । <pratika>avirodhāt</pratika>—pradhānaprātipadikārthena pratyabhijñāyā avirodhādityarthaḥ । ataḥ prakṛtatripādbrahmaparāma-
rśiyacchabdānubandhāt paraṃ brahmaiva jyotiśśabditamupāsyamiti siddham ।। 27 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ nikhilabhuvananāyakasya umāpateḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ ādityamaṇḍalamāspadamityuktama । tasyaivehādhikaraṇe sthā-
nāntaramucyate—sū॰ ।। <pratika>jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt</pratika> ।। 25 ।। viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atra sakalalokavyāptatayā divi
śrūyamāṇaṃ para jyotiḥ parameśvaro vā anyo veti saṃśaye dyuśabdasyākāśavācitvāt ākāśavartī sūrya eva jyotiśśabditaḥ i-
tyekaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘antaḥpuruṣe jyoti’</quote>riti puruṣāntarvartitvābhidhānāt jāṭharāgnirjyotiśśabdita ityaparaḥ । ityevaṃ dvidhā pūrvapakṣo-
tthitiriti viśeṣaḥ । siddhāntastu pūrvatra <quote>‘pādo'sya sarvā bhūtānī’</quote>ti viśvabhūtānāmasya jyotiṣaḥ ekāṃśatvābhidhānāt pari-
cchinnayorjāṭharāgnisūryayoḥ tadasambhavācca jyotiśśabdapratipādyaḥ parameśvara eveti ।। 25 ।।</p>
<p>itareṣu guṇasūtreṣu nāsti vailakṣaṇyamiti viramāmastatprapañcanāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, idamadhikaraṇasya viṣayavākyasandehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ bhagavatpādīyānmatānna bhidyate ityato na
pṛthakprapañcyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, sū॰ । <pratika>jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt</pratika> ।। 24 ।। idamekasūtrakamevedamadhikaraṇaṃ <quote>‘chando'bhidhānā’</quote>dityādi
sūtratrikamadhikaraṇāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ । asya <quote>‘vi me karṇā patato'pi cakṣurvīdaṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat । vi me manaśvarati
dūra ādhīḥ kiṃ svidvakṣyāmi kimu na maniṣye’</quote>iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra hṛdayāhitatvena śrūyamāṇa jyotiḥ jāṭharāgnirvā viṣṇu-
rveti saṃdehaḥ । hṛdayāhitatvaliṅgāt asya vākyasyāgnisūktāntargatatvācca jāṭharāgniriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । iyaditi paricchedānarhavaibha-
vatvarūpasya karṇādividūratvasyātrābhidhīyamānasya viṣṇoranyatrāsaṃbhavānniravakāśaliṅgena sāvakāśaśrutiprakaraṇabādhasya nyāyyatvācca
jyotiśśabdavācyo viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>jyotiḥ</pratika>—jyotiśśabdavācyaḥ viṣṇureva । kutaḥ । <pratika>caraṇābhidhānāt</pratika>—karṇādīnāṃ
vicaraṇābhidhānāt । jyotiṣaḥ sākalyena karṇādividūratvaśravaṇāditi sūtrārthaḥ ।। 24 ।।</p>
<head>iti jyotiradhikaraṇam</head>
<head>atha gāyatryadhikaraṇam ।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। chandobhidhānānneticettathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāttathā hi darśanam ।। 25 ।। bhūtādipādavyapade-
śopapatteścaivam ।। 26 ।। upadeśabhedānneti cennobhayasminnapyavirodhāt ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtratrayaṃ jyotiradhikaraṇāt bhinnamadhikaraṇāntaraṃ bodhyam । asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ
bhūtaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘vāgvai gāyatrī’</quote> vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ’ <quote>‘gāyati ca trāyate ca’</quote> ityādi chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra gāyatrīśabdavācyaḥ chando-
viśeṣo vā viṣṇurveti sandehaḥ । gāyatryā vedatayā nityatvāt viṣvadhīnatvāsambhavāt yogādrūḍheḥ prabalatvācca chandoviśeṣapara
eveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । gānatrāṇakartṛtvaṃ bhūtādipādatvaṃ <quote>‘etāmeva nātiśeta’</quote> iti sarvottamatvamityādiliṅgānāṃ chandasyasambhavena <quote>‘ato
jyāyāṃm̐/?/śca puruṣaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yadvai tadbrahma’</quote> <quote>‘etāmeva brahmopaniṣada’</quote> mityādiśrutīnāṃ niravakāśānāṃ sattvācca nityanāmapi sadā bhagavannitya-
śaktyadhīnatayā tadadhīnatvanyāyaviṣayatvasambhavācca gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ।। <pratika>chando'bhidhānāt</pratika>=caturvi-
śatyakṣarātmakachandasaḥ pratipādanāt । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇurna bhavatīti cet । na । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathā hi darśanam</pratika>=
yasmāt tathā gānatrāṇakartṛtvanimittena <pratika>darśanaṃ</pratika> viṣṇoḥ gāyatrīśabdavācyatvapratipādikā śrutiḥ asti । tasmāt । <pratika>tathāce
to'rpaṇanigadāt</pratika>=viṣṇoḥ tathā gāyatryādiśabdapravṛttinimittavattvena cetasi arpaṇāya upāsanāya nigadāt śrutau pratipādanā-
dityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। bhūdātipādavyapadeśopapatteścaivam</pratika> ।। 26 ।। evamiti padamāvartyate । evaṃ gāyatrīśabdavācyaṃ brahmetyeva-
meva yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>evaṃ bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘pādo'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divī’</quote>ti evaṃrūpabhūtāmṛtāṃ-
śavattvokteśca tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatteranyatrānupapatteścetyarthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। upadeśabhedānneti cennobhayasminnapyavirodhāt</pratika>
<pratika>।। 27 ।। upadeśabhedāt</pratika>=gāyatrījyotiṣoḥ dyusthatvadivaḥparatvarūpaviruddhadharmabodhakaśrutibhedāt । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>—taddvayaṃ viṣṇvākhyamekaṃ
vastu na bhavati kiṃ tu bhinnameveti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>ubhayasmin</pratika> śrutivākye'pi ekasya pratipādyatve'pi । <pratika>avirodhāt</pratika>=
trisaptalokavivakṣayā virodhābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ ānandatīrthamate gāyatryadhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="285"/>
atha indraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
bhagavatsavitṛmaṇḍale sākṣādupāsyatayā nirdiṣṭasya parameśvarasya tasminnadhikaraṇe
viśvātmakatvamuktaṃ, tadātmakatayā tadanyeṣāmupāsyatvaṃ nānyatheti pratipādayitu-
midamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---
prāṇastathā'nugamāt ।। 29 ।।
asya kauṣītakopaniṣadi viṣayaḥ śrūyate—<quote>‘prāṇo'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛ-
tamityupāsva’</quote> itīndravacanaṃ viṣayaḥ ।। atropāsanāviṣayatvena prāṇaśabdasāmā-
nādhikaraṇyena nirdiṣṭa indro vā parameśvaro veti saṃśayaḥ ।। iha <quote>‘prāṇo'smi prajñā-
tmā taṃ mām’</quote> iti prāṇaśabdasya sākṣādindreṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyamavagamyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prāsaṅgikādhikaraṇāni parityajya <quote>‘antastaddharmopadeśā’</quote>dityadhikaraṇena saṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarā-
dhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>bhagavatsavitṛmaṇḍala iti</pratika> । <quote>‘tasmādudgīthastasmāttvevodgātaitasya hi gā-
te’</quote> tyantarādityavidyāprakaraṇagatavākyedgātṛkartṛkāṇāmindrādiviṣayastotrāṇāṃ parameśvaraviṣa-
yatvoktyā parameśvarasyendrādyātmatvamupavarṇitam । tatsiddhena parameśvarātmakatvahetunā indrādīnāṃ
svato muktyarthamanupāsyānāṃ tadarthamupāsyatvaśravaṇamupapadyata iti hetuhetumadbhāvasaṅgatiḥ । yathā
stotrīyāṇāmindrādimahimapratipādinīnāmṛcāṃ tadātmabhūtaparameśvaraparyantatvaṃ tathendrādyupāsanā-
viṣayaśrutīnāmapyupapādyata iti dṛṣṭāntasaṅgatirvātra vivakṣitā । pratardanākhyāyikādīnāṃ parame-
śvare tātparyasamarthanārthenāpyanenādhikaraṇenoktaprayojanamānuṣaṅgikaṃ siddha‍yatīti tāvatā prati-
pādayitumiti tumunpratyayaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>prāṇastathānugamāt</pratika> ।। 29 ।। <quote>‘pratardano ha daivodāsiri-
ndrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāme’</quote>tyārabhya <quote>‘varaṃ vṛṇīṣve’</quote>tyuktavataḥ <quote>‘tvameva varaṃ vṛṇīṣva yaṃ tvaṃ manu-
ṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyasa’</quote>iti pratardanenoktasyendrasya vacanamidaṃ śrūyate <quote>‘prāṇo'smi’</quote>tyādi । tatra
tvāṣṭravadhādīnāmindraliṅgānāmānandādīnāṃ parameśvaraliṅgānāṃ ca balābalānavadhāraṇātsaṃśaya-
māha---<pratika>atreti</pratika> । nanu prāṇaśabdaśravaṇānmukhyaprāṇo veti sandehakoṭiḥ pradarśanīyetyāśa-
ṅkyāha—<pratika>prāṇaśabdeti</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇo'smī’</quote>ti sāmānādhikaraṇyena prāṇasyānyaviśeṣaṇatvapratīteḥ
prāṇaḥ prādhānyenopāsyatayā pratipādyata iti sandeho nāvatarati । kiṃ tu <quote>‘prāṇo'smī’</quote>ti vacanaṃ
yadīndraliṅgānurodhena vaktari paryavasyati tadendraḥ yadi parameśvaraliṅgānurodhena tadantaryāmi-
paryantaṃ dhāvati tadā parameśvara itīndraparameśvarakoṭika evātra sandeho'vataratīti bhāvaḥ ।
indreṇeti । <quote>‘triśīrṣāṇaṃ tvāṣṭramahanamarunmukhānyatīnsālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchaṃ bahvīssandhā
atikramya divi prahlādinamatṛṇamahamantarikṣe paulomān pṛthivyāṃ kālakakṣyān tasya me tatra
na loma ca mīyate’</quote> iti śrutaistvāṣṭravadhādiliṅgaiḥ prasiddha evendro'tra vaktāvasīyate । atasta-
tsāmānādhikaraṇyātprāṇaśabdasya tadviṣayatvamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । nanu prāṇaśabdasāmānādhi-
karaṇyenaiva <quote>‘ānando'jaro'mṛta’</quote>iti parameśvaraliṅgānyapi śrūyante । na ca teṣāmaupasaṃhārika-
tvena durbalatvādbādhyatvamapi । virodhābhāvāt । <quote>‘gauro vidvāndevadatta upāsanīya’</quote> ityatra gaura-
tvavaidaṣyayordevadattātmanīvendraparameśvaraliṅgajātayorindrātmani tasminsadvārakādvārakānvayopa-
<pb n="286"/>
<quote>‘māmupāsva’</quote> iti tadviṣaya evopāsanāvidhiḥ śrūyate । tasya prāṇatvaṃ vṛṣṭidvārā
sakalarakṣakatvādupapadyate । sakalopāsyatvaṃ ca paramaiśvaryavattvādupapannam । tathā hi
śrutiḥ—<quote>‘indro rājā jagato ya īśe’</quote>ityādiḥ । tasmādindra evopāsyatayā nirdi-
śyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntaḥ parameśvara iti । kutaḥ ? ānandājarāmṛtapra-
jñātmādīnāṃ tadasādhāraṇadharmāṇāmasmin prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭe'nugamāt <quote>‘eṣa prāṇa
eva prajñātmā''nando'jaro'mṛtaḥ’</quote> iti । <quote>‘indro rājā’</quote> iti śrutau indraśabdaḥ īśva-
raviṣayaḥ prakaraṇādavagamyate ।।
āśaṅkya pariharati—
na vakturātmopadeśāditi cedadhyātmasaṃbadhabhūmā hyasmin ।। 30 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
patterityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>tadviṣaya eveti</pratika> । tatra <quote>‘hi māmeva vijānīhi etadevāhaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ
manye yanmāṃ vijānīyā’</quote>mityavadhāraṇena svāntaryāmiparyantatvavyāvartanapūrvakaṃ svasyaivopāsyatvaṃ
pratipādyate । atastadvirodhānandājarāmṛtatvānīndra evāpekṣikāṇi yojanīyānīti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>tasya prāṇatvamiti</pratika> । prāṇayatīti vyutpattyātra prāṇaśabda iti bhāvaḥ । nanu <quote>‘yaṃ tvaṃ manu-
ṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyase’</quote> <quote>‘etadevāhaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manya’</quote> iti praśnottarayormanuṣyasāmānye
hitatamatvoktyā sakalopāsyatvaṃ pratīyate । tatkathaṃ vṛṣṭikāmādimātropāsyasyendrasyetyāśaṅkyāha—
<pratika>sakalopāsyatvaṃ ceti</pratika> । indreṇa hi <quote>‘triśīrṣāṇa’</quote> mityādinā <quote>‘na loma ca mīyata’</quote> itya-
ntena svasya sakalapāpāspṛṣṭatvamuktvā <quote>‘sa yo māṃ vijānīyānnāsya kena cana karmaṇā loko
mīyate na mātṛvadhena pitṛvadhena na steyena na bhrūṇahatyaye’</quote>tyupāsyaguṇānusārisakalapāsaṃsparśa-
rūpaṃ phalaṃ svopāsakasyoktam । tacca phalaṃ sarveṣāmīpsitamiti sarvopāsyatvaṃ yujyate । na caitā-
dṛśaphalapradānasāmarthyaṃ kathamindrasyeti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘indro rājā jagato ya īśe’</quote> <quote>‘īśānamasya
jagatassuvardṛśam’</quote> <quote>‘indro yāto'vasitasya rāje’</quote> tyādiśrutibhistasya jagadīśvaratvāvagamena tatra
tatsāmarthyasambhavāditi bhāvaḥ । ‘prāṇo'smīti nirdiṣṭaḥ prāṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ । tathā <quote>‘hitatamaṃ
manyasa’</quote> ityupakrama ivānu paścādupasaṃhāre'pyānando'jaro'mṛta iti parameśvaradharmāvagamāditi
sūtrārthaḥ। tatrānugamādityanenoktaḥ aupasaṃhāriko hetu<quote>‘rānandājarāmṛtaprajñātmādīnā’</quote>mityādibhā-
ṣyeṇa pradarśitaḥ । upakramahetu<quote>‘stvindro rājetiśrutau’</quote> iti bhāṣyeṇa tadanyathāsiddhiparihāraprada-
rśanamukhena paścāddarśitaḥ । hitatamatvaṃ hyupāsanasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tadvākyaśeṣāvagataṃ sarvapāpā-
sparśasādhanatvaṃ cettadapi phalato mokṣaparyyavasāyyeva । idamindropāsanasyāpi sambhavati ।

daśadhā carantaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘indrasyātmānaṃ śatadhā caranta’</quote> <quote>‘mindrasyātmā nihitaḥ pañcahote’</quote>ti pūrvāpara-

nāyamupāsyaḥ parameśvaraḥ, upakrame <quote>‘māmeva vijānīhi triśīrṣāṇaṃ tvāṣṭramahanam’</quote>

śvaraviṣayayogavattvasya pratipāditatvena <quote>‘paraṃ hi brahma kathitaṃ yogayuktena tanmaye’</quote>tyanugītārambhe
kṛṣṇenaiva śivayogamāsthāya mayā gītopadeśaḥ kṛta ityuktatvena vibhūtyadhyāye kṛṣṇenā<quote>‘dityā-
nāmahaṃ viṣṇu’</quote>riti svapūrvāvatārarūpasyopendrasya <quote>‘vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo'smī’</quote>ti svasya ca svavibhū-
tiṣu parigaṇanapūrvakaṃ viśvarūpādhyāye <quote>‘mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvameva nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasāci’</quote>
nniti vipakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣahananātprāgeva svavīryaprabhāvanihatatvamupavarṇya samayāntare svarūpamā-
sthitena tena mokṣadharmeṣu pārthaṃ pratyeva <quote>‘nihatāṃstveva pūrvaṃ tvaṃ hatavānasi vai ripūn । aprameya-
prabhāvaṃ tvaṃ devadevamumāpatim । bhajasva nityaṃ prayato viśveśaṃ haramavyaya’</quote>miti teṣāṃ śivavīrya-
prabhāvanihatatvopadeśena gītāsvaprākṛtaguṇacaritopadeśasya sarvasyāpi parāhaṃbhāvagṛhītaśiva-
viṣayatvasya vyaktīkṛtatvena ca gītāyāḥ kārts‍nyena śivaviṣayatvasyāvaśyābhyupagantavyatvācca ।
tasmātkṛṣṇasya <quote>‘manmanā bhave’</quote>tyādivacanaṃ śivadṛṣṭyaiva । tadvadindravacanamapi । sūtragatavāmade-
vagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇīkṛtya dṛṣṭāntāntaropanyāso'yam । adiśabdenoktavākyāntaradṛṣṭānāmevaṃbhū-
topadeśānāṃ saṅgrahaḥ । evaṃ <quote>‘māmeva vijānī hī’</quote> ti vakturātmopadeśasya nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ । tvāṣṭraḥ
vadhādiliṅgānāmanirvāhe kṛtanirvāho'pi na pratiṣṭhitaḥ syāditi tadāśaṅkodbhāvanapūrvakaṃ tanni-
rvāhārthetvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>punariti ।। sū ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti cennopā-
sātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt ।। 32 ।। yukta iti</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣa’</quote>i
ti śrutyantara iti śeṣaḥ । yadvā । upāsyatvaṃ sārvātmyaṃ cetīndravāmadevasambandhinoḥ prakṛtāpra-
kṛtayorupādānam । tathā ca brahmādṛṣṭyā vāmadevasārvātmyopadeśavadindropāsyatvopadeśo yukta
ityarthaḥ । yadyatra tvāṣṭravadhādijīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ na syāditi śeṣaḥ । asti tvatra tadityāha—
<pratika>atra tviti</pratika> । ityādāvityādiśabdena <quote>‘na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyā’</quote>dityādikami-
ndraliṅgasahapāṭhādviśeṣaparyavasāyi jīvasāmānyaliṅgaṃ <quote>‘midaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayatī’</quote>tyādi
mukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ ca gṛhyate । mukhyaprāṇaliṅgamapi mukhyaprāṇasambandharūpajīvasāmānyaliṅgotthā-
panadvārā jīvaviśeṣaparyavasāyi । nanu prāṇaśrutau satyāṃ kimiti mukhyaprāṇaviṣaye liṅgānve-
ṣaṇam । ucyate । aitareyopaniṣadi <quote>‘tvāmeva vijānīyā’</quote>miti pṛṣṭavantaṃ viśvāmitraṃ prati <quote>‘prā-
ṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣa’</quote>itīndravākye prāṇaśabdasya <quote>‘prāṇastva’</quote>mityādivākyaśeṣe sarvātmatvaprapañca-
nānusāreṇa brahmaviṣayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam । tatsāmānyādiyamapi prāṇaśrutirbrahmaviṣayeti śaṅkā syāt ।
ato yathā <quote>‘yanmāṃ vijānīyā’</quote> dityantavākye <quote>‘mā’</quote>mitīndraviṣayaśrutau satyāmapi brahmadharma-
bhūmānamavalambya vāmadevasārvātmyopadeśavat brahmadṛṣṭyā māmityupadeśa iti śaṅkāvāraṇāya
māmityasyendraviṣayatvamupapādayituṃ tadvākyaśeṣatvāṣṭravadhādiliṅgopanyāsaḥ । evaṃ tadbha‍ūmānama-
<pb n="291"/>
dṛśyate । tato'yamupadeśo na yukte iti cet---naivaṃ vācyam । yato jīvaprāṇaśabda-
vācyatvaṃ parameśvarasya samucitam, upāsanātraividhyāddhetoḥ । atra parameśvarasya svarū-
peṇa bhoktṛśarīreṇa bhogyarūpeṇa copāsanaṃ trividhamiha vivakṣitaṃ, ātmatayā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
valambya <quote>‘prāṇo vā ahamasmyuṣa’</quote> ityatra prāṇaśabdavat <quote>‘prāṇo'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛta-
mupāsve’</quote> tyatrāpi brahmaparaḥ prāṇaśabda iti śaṅkāvāraṇāya tatra prāṇaśrutermukhyaprāṇaviṣayatvamu-
papādayitumeva tadvākyaśeṣagataprāṇaliṅgopanyāsaḥ । tenāyamarthaḥ sampannaḥ । prakaraṇopakramopa-
saṃhāragatatvena dūravartibhyo brahmaliṅgebhyo māmityasyendraparatvaspaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ pravṛttānāṃ tadvā-
kyaśeṣagatatvāṣṭravadhādiliṅgānāṃ prāṇaśabdasya mukhyaprāṇaparatvaspaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ pravṛttānāmāyurhe-
tutvādiliṅgānāṃ ca prabalatvena tadviruddhānāṃ brahmaliṅgānāmanyathā neyatvānmāmityasya prāṇaśa-
bdasya ca brahmaviṣayatvamabhyupagamya tadupāsanopadeśa ityuktamayuktamiti । evaṃ sautraśaṅkābhāgaṃ
vyākhyāya parihārabhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>naivaṃ vācyamityādinā ।</pratika> brahmajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānāṃ
virodhe hi prabalajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgavirodhāt brahmaliṅgāvagamitaṃ māmiti jīvaśabdasya prā-
ṇaśabdasya ca parameśvaraparatvaṃ tyaktavyam । nāsti teṣāṃ virodhaḥ । vedānteṣu vidhīyamānā bra-
hmaṇa upāsanā kvacitsvadharmaviśiṣṭatvena yathā ‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahme ‘tyatra kvaciccetanadharmavi-
śiṣṭatvena yathā <quote>‘tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti’</quote> ityatra kvacidacetanadharmaviśiṣṭatvena
yathā <quote>‘puruṣe'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ vede’</quote>tyatretyevamupāsanātraividhyasadbhāvādityetadarthaparatvenopāsātraivi-
dhyāditi sūtrapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>yato jīveti ।</pratika> astvanyatra trividhopāsanadarśanaṃ prakṛte kimā-
yātamityākāṅkṣāyāmatrāpi trividhopāsanasya vivakṣitatvādityetadarthatvena <quote>‘āśritatvādihe’</quote>ti
sūtrapadadvayaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>atra parameśvarasyeti ।</pratika> nanu brahmajīvamukhyaprāṇadharmaviśiṣṭaviṣayameka-
mupāsanamiha vivakṣitaṃ tattadviśiṣṭaviṣayāṇi trīṇyupāsanāni vā । nādyaḥ । <quote>‘sa yo māṃ vi-
jānīyānnāsya kena ca karmaṇā loko mīyate tasmāttadevokthamupāsīte’</quote>ti jīvamukhyaprāṇayo-
rapi pratyekamupāsanāvidhiśravaṇāt । na dvitīyaḥ । <quote>‘prāṇo'smi prajñātmā sa eṣa prāṇa eva
prajñātme’</quote>tyupakramopasaṃhārāvagataikavākyatvabhaṅgaprasaṅgāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ <quote>‘tadyogā’</quote>diti
sūtrapadamubhayathāpi yujyata ityetadarthaparamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>ātmatayeti ।</pratika> yadi <quote>‘prāṇo'smi
prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamupāsve’</quote>tyetasminvākye <quote>‘āyuḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇo vā āyuḥ prāṇa evāmṛtaṃ
yāvaddha‍yasmin śarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ prāṇena hyevāmuṣminloke amṛtatvamāpnotī’</quote>ti
tadanantaravākyaśeṣe prāṇadharmatvenāvagatābhyāmāyuṣṭvāmṛtatvābhyāṃ viśiṣṭena prāṇena <quote>‘triśīrṣāṇaṃ
tvāṣṭramahana’</quote>mityādipūrvavākye indradharmatvenāvagataistvāṣṭrahantṛtvādibhirviśiṣṭenendreṇopasaṃhāre
<quote>‘prāṇa eva prajñātme’</quote>tyetadvākyopāttamupāsyaṃ brahma pratyabhijñāpya taddharmatvenāmnātairānandādibhi-
śca viśiṣṭasya brahmaṇa ekamevopāsanaṃ vidhīyate । tathā <quote>‘sa yo māṃ vijānīyā’</quote>diti vākyaṃ
prāṇaviśeṣaṇaśarīrotthāpakatvaguṇopāsanāvidhiparamiti upapadyate । yadā te vākye jīvamukhya-
prāṇadharmaviśiṣṭabrahmopāsanāvidhipare tadā prāṇo'smītyādivākyamāyuṣṭvādisvadharmaviśiṣṭa-
prāṇaśabdoditasarvaprāṇayitṛbrahmopāsanāvidhiparam । <quote>‘āyuḥ prāṇa’</quote>ityādivākyaśeṣo'pi brahma-
<pb n="292"/>
bhok‍tṛbhogyāśritatvena ca tadupapatteḥ । parameśvarasya svarūpopāsanamavilambena mu-
ktihetuḥ, anyadapi dvayaṃ kālena । tasmādiha parameśvarātmakatayendrasyopāsanasiddhi-
riti nirṇayaḥ ।। iti indraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamasyādhyāyasya
prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
para eva । na <quote>‘prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana । itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupā-
śritā’</quote>viti śruteḥ । prāṇasyāpi prāṇabhūtasya brahmaṇa evāyuṣi mukhyahetutvāt tatraiva mukhyāmṛta-
tvaviśrānteśca prāṇadharmaviśiṣṭabrahmopāsanāprasaṅgaḥ । <quote>‘taddhaika āhurekabhūyaṃ vai prāṇā gacchantī’</quote>tyā-
dyuttarasandarbheṇa ca jīvamukhyaprāṇopāsanayoḥ pratyekavidhisvīkāre tayorbrahmaparyantatvāsiddhipra-
saṅgaḥ । <quote>‘sa yo māṃ vijānīyā’</quote>diti vidhermuktiparyāyasakalapāpāsaṃsparśaphalatvoktyā brahmaparyanta-
tvasiddheḥ ata evo<quote>‘kthamupāsīte’</quote>ti prakṛtaprāṇopāsanāvidhānānantaraṃ <quote>‘etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā
yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokā’</quote> iti prakṛtaprāṇaviṣayātmaśrutyendriyādi-
nissaraṇāpādānatvaliṅgena ca tasyāpi brahmaparyantatvasiddheḥ । tasmādubhayathāpi trividhopāsanā-
vidhānaṃ yujyata iti bhāvaḥ । upāsanābhedapakṣe svadharmaviśiṣṭabrahmopāsanāditaropāsanayoḥ
phalato vailakṣaṇyaṃ caturthādhyāye vakṣyamāṇaṃ smārayati---<pratika>parameśvarasyeti</pratika> ।। ।।
<head>iti indraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p>/?/iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyājiśrīraṅgarājādhvari-
varasūnorapyayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahmamī-
māṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivādityamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ
prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athendraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। prāṇastathānugamāt ।। 29 ।। navakturātmopadeśāditi cedadhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hyasmin ।। 30 ।।
śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavat ।। 31 ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti cennopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha
tadyogāt ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇo'smītyukta indraḥ sa hi jagadakhilaṃ prāṇayatyaṃbuvarṣairindro rājetyanekaśrutimitamahimā syādupāsyaśca muktyau ।</l>
<l>maivaṃ kṣuṇṇasya sṛjjyastamajaramamṛtaṃ śak‍numo naiva vaktuṃ tasmāttaṃ māmupāssvetyakhilaparivṛḍhe yujyatāṃ śāstradṛṣṭyā ।। 27 ।।</l></lg>
<head>itīndraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīmadapyayadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālikākhye tṛtīyaparicchede prathamasyādhyā-
yasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।</p>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha indraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰।। prāṇastathānugamāt ।। 28 ।। na vakturātmopadeśāditi cedadhyātmasambandhabhūmā hyasmin ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavat ।। 30 ।। jīvamukhyuprāṇaliṅgānneti cennopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha
tadyogāt ।। 31 ।।
<pb n="293"/>
<p><pratika>prāṇastathānugamāt ।।</pratika> kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadi indrapratardanākhyāyikāyāṃ pratardanaṃ pratīndravākyaṃ śrūyate <quote>‘prāṇo'smi
prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamupāssva’</quote> iti tathottaratrāpi <quote>‘atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati’</quote> iti tathā <quote>‘na vācaṃ
vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyā’</quote>diti ca ‘ante ca <quote>‘sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmā''nando'jaro'mṛta’</quote> ityādi । tatra kiṃ prāṇaśabdena
vāyumātramabhidhīyate uta indradevatā uta jīvaḥ athavā paraṃ brahmeti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘atha khalvi’</quote>tyādiśarīraparigrahotthāpanaliṅgāt
vāyumātramiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyasa’</quote>ityādi pūrvāparavākyaparyālocanayā ānandatvājaratvāmṛtatvādyasādhāraṇa-
brahmaliṅgānāmanugamāt atra prāṇaśabdena paraṃ brahmaivābhidhīyata iti siddhāntaḥ ।। <pratika>prāṇaḥ</pratika>=prāṇaśabdavācyaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>tathā</pratika> parabrahmaparatvena । <pratika>anugamāt</pratika>—pūrvāparavākyaparyālocanayā'vagamyamānatvādityarthaḥ ।। nanu asmītyahaṅkāravādaliṅgādindra-
devataivābhidhīyata ityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>na vakturityādi । vaktuḥ</pratika>=indrasya devatāviśeṣasya । <pratika>ātmopadeśāt</pratika>—‘māmeva vijānīhī-
tyātmatvenopadiśyamānatvāt prāṇo na brahmeti cet । atrocyate । <pratika>adhyātmasambandhabhūmā hyasminniti । hi</pratika>=yasmāt ।
asminnadhyāye<quote>‘yāvadasmin śarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmā''nando'jaro'mṛta’</quote>ityādyadhyātmasambandhasya
pratyāgātmasaṃbandhasya <pratika>bhūmā</pratika> bāhulyamupalabhyate । tasmātprāṇātmakabrahmopadeśa evāya na devatāviśeṣopadeśa iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>kathaṃ tarhi vakturātmopadeśastatrāha—<pratika>śāstradṛṣṭyetyādi ।।</pratika> indrasya vakturmāmeva vijānīhītyupadeśaḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā jñātavyaḥ ।
ahameva paraṃ brahmeti śāstradṛṣṭyā paśyannevamuktavānityarthaḥ । tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ <pratika>vāmadevavat</pratika> yathā vāmadevaḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā <quote>‘ahaṃ manura-
bhava’</quote>mityāha tadvaditi । ato brahmaparametadvākyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanvevamapi na brahmaparamidam । api tvanyaparamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>jīvamukhyaprāṇetyādi ।।</pratika> ‘vaktāraṃ vidyā‘diti jīvaliṅgāt
<quote>‘idaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayetī’</quote>ti mukhyaprāṇaliṅgāca tadubhayaparaṃ na brahmaparameveti cenna । kutaḥ <pratika>upāsātraividhyāt</pratika>—jīvamukhya-
prāṇabrahmopāsanāni trīṇi prasajyeran । na ca tadiṣṭam । <quote>‘māmeve’</quote>tyupakramya prāṇo'smītyuktvānta upasaṃharati <quote>‘sa eṣa prāṇa eva
prajñātme’</quote>tyevamupakramopasaṃhārābhyāṃ vākyaikavākyatvāvagamāt । kiṃcānyatra brahmaliṅgavaśāt prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛtterāśritatvādihāpi
tadyogāt hitatamatvādyasādhāraṇabrahmaliṅgayogāt brahmaṇa evāyamupadeśa iti siddham ।। asminpāde ekādaśādhikaraṇāni ।
sūtrāṇyekatriṃśat ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate,</pratika> savitṛmaṇḍale sākṣādupāsyatvena nirdiṣṭasya parameśvarasya tasminnadhikaraṇe viśvātmakatvamuktam । tadātmaka-
tayā tadanyeṣāmupāsyatvaṃ nānyatheti pratipādayitumasyādhikaraṇasyārambhaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ । prāṇastathānugamāt ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavadeva ।
atra upāsanāviṣayatvena prāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiṣṭaḥ indro vā parameśvaro veti sandehaḥ । prāṇaśabdasya <quote>‘prāṇo'smi
prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamupāsve’</quote>ti sākṣādindreṇa sāmānādhikaraṇasya tasyaiva upāsanāvidhiviṣayatvasya ca śrūyamāṇatvāt prāṇatva-
sakalopāsyatvayoḥ rakṣakatvapāramaiśvaryābhyāmupapannatvācca indra evopāsyatayā nirdiṣṭa iti pūrva pakṣaḥ । ānandājarāmṛtaprajñātmatvā-
dīnāṃ brahmāsādhāraṇadharmāṇāṃ asminprāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭe anugamāt parameśvara eveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika><quote>‘navakturātmopadeśā’</quote>diti</pratika> sūtrārthastu bhagavatpādīyamatānna bhidyate ।</p>
<p>kathamindro jīvatvādanupāsyo'pi svaviṣayamupāsanamupadiśatītyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>sū॰ । śāstradṛṣṭyā tviti ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anena jīve-
ne’</quote>tyādināmarūpavyākaraṇapratipādakaśāstradṛṣṭyā sarvaśabdavācyatvātparameśvarasya svaśarīrakatayā svaśabdavācyaṃ parameśvarameva upāsyatvena
indra upadideśa । atra dṛṣṭāntamāha <pratika>vāmadevavaditi ।</pratika> vāmadevo hi svasya parameśvarātmatvadṛṣṭyā <quote>‘ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśca’</quote> ityupa-
dideśa tadvadayamindropadeśa ityarthaḥ । athavā vedāntavijñānopalabdhayā brahmātmasāmarasyabhāvanayā brahmabhāvamupagatastha vāmadevasya
svātmanassarvagatatvāvagamānmanusūryādiprapañcabhāvoktiḥ । evamindrasyāpi ityataḥ prāṇaśabdena ānandarūpatvena sakalaprāṇanahetubhūtaṃ
paraṃ brahmaivocyate ।।</p>
<p>punarāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>sū॰ । jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgāditi ।।</pratika> brahmabhāvamupagatasya vigalitajīva bhāvasya vāmadevasya tadrūpa-
dṛṣṭyā svasminnupāsyatvādyupadeśo yuktaḥ । atra tu tvāṣṭrahananaśarīravāsādijīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgayoḥ śrūyamāṇatvāt nāyamupadeśo yukta
iti cet । na । kutaḥ । parameśvarasya svaśarīreṇa bhoktṛśarīreṇa bhogyarūpeṇa ca upāsanātraividhyasya vivakṣitatvāt ātmatayā
bhoktṛbhogyāśritatvena ca tadupapatteśca iha parameśvarātmatayā indrasyopāsyatvasiddherityarthaḥ ।। asminpāde dvādaśādhikaraṇāni ।
sūtrāṇi dvātriṃśat ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate,</pratika> viṣayavākyasūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatānna bhidyate iti na pṛthak prapañcyate । ayamatra śrībhāṣyakāro
ditaḥ pādārthasaṅgrahaḥ । yathā vedāntasāre---<quote>‘janmādyasyayata’</quote>ityādiṣu sadbrahmātmādisāmānyaśabdaiḥ jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtipuruṣābhyā-
marthāntaramiti sādhitam । <quote>‘jyotiścaraṇābhidhānā’</quote>diti sūtre puruṣasūktodito mahāpuruṣo jagatkāraṇamiti viśeṣato nirṇītam ।
sa eva prajñātajīvavācibhirindrādiśabdairapi kvacit śāstradṛṣṭyā tattaccharīrakatayā upāsyatvāyopadiśyata iti <quote>‘śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpa-
deśo vāmadevavat’</quote> <quote>‘upāsātraividhyādi’</quote>ti sādhitam ।। asminmate ekādaśādhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi dvātriṃśat ।।</p>
<pb n="294"/>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ । prāṇastathānugamāt ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘tā vā etāḥ śīrṣan śriyaḥ śritāḥ cakṣuśśrotraṃ mano vāk
prāṇastattvaṃ brahma girirityācakṣate । girati ha vai dviṣantaṃ pāpmāna’</quote>mityādyaitareyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra prāṇaśabdavācyaḥ mukhyaprāṇo
vā indro vā jīvo vā viṣṇurvā iti sandehaḥ । indriyaissaha paṭhitatvāt taissaha kalahābhidhānācca mukhyaprāṇo vā <quote>‘prāṇo vā
ahamasmī’</quote>tyaindravacanādindro vā śatavatsarajīvitvādiliṅgāt jīvo vā prāṇaśabdavācyo bhavitumarhatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । indrajīvamukhya-
prāṇaliṅgānāmantaryāmiviṣayatayopapatteḥ devopāsyatvādīnāmasādhāraṇabrahmaliṅgānāṃ śrūyamāṇatvāt viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>tathā</pratika>=
<quote>‘tadvai tvami’</quote>ti taittirīyoktaprāṇavat । <pratika>prāṇaḥ</pratika>=tā vā ityaitareyoktaprāṇo'pi viṣṇureva । kutaḥ । <pratika>anugamāt</pratika>—devatopāsyatvādi-
viṣṇuliṅgabrahmaśabdānāmasakṛcchravaṇādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । navakturātmopadeśāditi</pratika> ।। vakturiti dvitīyārthe ṣaṣṭhī । bṛhatīsahasravaktāraṃ viśvāmitraṃ prati indreṇa ātmopa-
deśāt ātmanaḥ svasya prāṇatayopadeśāt indra evāyaṃ prāṇaḥ na viṣṇuriti cet । na ityadhyāhāraḥ tasyāvṛttiśca । anugamāditya-
nuvartate । tathā ca prāguktānugamahetoḥ nendraḥ prāṇaḥ । tathā sati upadeśavirodha ityapi na । kutaḥ । yasmāt <pratika>asmi</pratika>nprakaraṇe
bhagavataḥ <pratika>adhyātmasambandhabhūmā</pratika> indraviśvāmitrādirūpabahudehasambandhaḥ ukto'sti tasmādityarthaḥ । yadvā । <pratika>hi</pratika> yasmāt <pratika>a-
smin</pratika> indre <pratika>adhyātmasambandhabhūmā</pratika> adhi adhikasyātmanaḥ sambandhasya āveśasya bhūmā bāhulyaṃ vidyate tasmādityarthaḥ ।। 29</p>
<p>sū॰ । <pratika>śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavat</pratika> ।। tuśabda evārthe । <pratika>vāmadevavat ।</pratika> yathā antaryāmivivakṣayā vāmadeva-
ṛṣiḥ <quote>‘ahaṃ manurabhava’</quote>’miti svasya manusūryādyaiṃkyamāha । tadvat । <pratika>śāstradṛṣṭyā</pratika>=śāsti sarvamiti śāstramantaryāmi tadda‍ṛṣṭyā tadvi-
vakṣayaivopadeśaḥ prāṇo'hamiti vyapadeśaḥ । na tvaikyenetyarthaḥ ।। 30 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgāditi ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgāt</pratika>=śatāyuṣṭvādijīvaliṅgānāṃ indriyadevaiḥ saṃvādādi-
rūpamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānāṃ ca śravaṇāt prāṇo'nya eva na viṣṇuriti cet । <pratika>na ।</pratika> kutaḥ । anugamāt । na ca liṅgavirodhaḥ । talliṅgā-
nāmantaryāmiviṣayatvopapatterityādikamadhyāhāryam । kimarthamantaryāmikathanamityata uktam <pratika>upāsātraividhyāditi ।</pratika> antarbahi-
ssarvagatabhedena brahmopāsanasya trividhatvāt iha prakaraṇe tatrai/?/vidhyasyāśritatvāt uktatvāttadyogātteṣāmadhikāriṇāṃ trividhopāsanā-
yogyatvādityarthaḥ । tathā ca tattacchabdaistattadadhikāribhedenopāsanārthamantaryāmikathanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।। 31 ।। asminmate dvā-
daśādhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi ekatriṃśat ।।</p>
<head>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāmindraprāṇādhikaraṇam ।</head>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanaghaṃ vṛddhāṃdhikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmādye'dhyāye samanvayābhikhye ।</l>
<l>suspaṣṭaliṅgavākyaka ādyaḥ pādo'yamabhyagātpūrtim ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaśca ।।</head>
<pb n="295"/>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>prathamasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>atha dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<p>brahmabodhakānāṃ vedāntavākyānāmānantyāt prativākyaṃ vicārānupapatteḥ sandi-
gdhānāṃ keṣāṃcidvicāreṇa tannyāyaistādṛśānāmapi nirṇayo bhavatīti katicideva
vākyāni tātparyaliṅgasamanvayena brahmabodhakāni sūtritāni । teṣu katicit spa-
ṣṭaliṅgāni prathamapāde vicāritāni, katicit anatispaṣṭaliṅgāni dvitīyapāde
vicāryante—</p>
<sutra>।। sū ।। sarvatra prasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<p>chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpa ā-
kāśātmā sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ’</quote> ityādi ।।</p>
<p>atra manomayatvādidharmakaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaro vā jīvo veti saṃśayaḥ ।।</p>
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha prathamasyāpyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<p>pūrvottarapādayorarthabhedapradarśanapūrvakaṃ saṅgatiṃ darśayati—<pratika>brahmabodhakavākyānāmiti ।</pratika> spaṣṭāna-
tispaṣṭabrahmaliṅgavākyaviṣayatvoktyā pādayorarthabhedaścāvasarasaṅgatiścetyubhayaṃ darśitam । spaṣṭabra-
hmaliṅgavākyeṣvavicāriteṣvapi bahuṣu satsu kathaṃ tadvicāraṃ parisamāpya vākyāntaravicāraḥ prastūyata
ityāśaṅkya nyāyasāmyena śakyārthanirṇayatayā teṣāṃ vicāritaprāyatvamuktam <pratika>।। sū ।। sarvatra
prasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta ।’</quote> <quote>‘atha khalu
kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturas‍m̐mī/?/lloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>
ti prakṛtya śrūyate <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra’</quote> ityādi । tatra manomayādiśabdānāṃ pūrvaprastutabrahmapu-
ruṣānyataraparatvānirdhāraṇāt brahmaparatve'pi brahmaśabdasya śivajīvānyataraparatvānirdhāraṇāt
śivaparatve<quote>‘'pyupāsit’</quote> <quote>‘kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>ti vākyadvaya śrutopāsanaikyabhedānavadhāraṇācca saṃśayamāha—
atreti ।<quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>ti tatpadena jīvaparāmarśinā samānādhikaraṇānāṃ tatsamānaliṅgānāṃ
manomayādipadānāṃ tadanvaye sambhavati viprakṛṣṭavākyāntaraśrutabhinnaliṅgabrahmānvayakalpanamayu-
ktam । na ca tathā sati teṣāmupāsakaviśeṣaṇatvāpattyā <quote>‘sa ātmānaṃ manomayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpamā-
kāśātmānaṃ kāmarūpiṇaṃ manojavasaṃ satyasaṅkalpaṃ satyadhṛtiṃ sarvagandhaṃ sarvarasaṃ sarvā anudiśaḥ prabhūtaṃ
sarvamidamabhyāttamavākamanādara’</quote>mityagnirahasyagatasamānaprakaraṇavākyavirodhaḥ । kasya kratumiti
<pb n="296"/>
jīva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kutaḥ ? tasya pratyāsannatvāt । <quote>‘atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo
yathākraturasmin loke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta’</quote> iti
karmavaśādiha paratra ca paribhraman jīvaḥ prastutaḥ pūrvam । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘manomayaḥ’</quote>
iti śrūyate । ata eva manomayatvādidharmako jīvaḥ । manomayatvaprāṇaśarīratvā-
dekaṃ ca saṃsārilakṣaṇaṃ na parameśvaraliṅgam । sati yathārthe asaṃkalpaḥ iti satyasaṃ-
kalpatvamapi saṃsāridharmatvena yojanīyam । ataḥ sarvathā manomayatvādidharmako
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratisambandhyākāṅkṣāyā<quote>‘mantardhau yenādarśanamicchati’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 1-4-28-sū.)</ref> ityatrevāntaraṅgatvāta
svātmana iti labhyate । svātmā coktamanomayatvādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo buddhisannihita iti te-
ṣāmihopāsakaviśeṣaṇatve'pyarthādupāsyaviśeṣaṇatvaparyavasānādityāśayena pūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>jīva
iti</pratika> । syādetat । <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīte’</quote>tyatra vihitāṃ brahmopā-
sanāmanūdya tatra guṇamātravidhāyakaṃ <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>tyādivākyaṃ na tu guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāya-
kam । agnihotravidhisannihitadadhyādivākyavattatra guṇamātravidhisambhave viśiṣṭavidhigauravā-
ṅgīkārāyogāt । tathā cotpattiśiṣṭabrahmāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāṃ jīvasyopāsyatvenānvayāyo-
gāt na tadanvayo manomayatvādīnāmupāsyaguṇānāṃ kiṃ tu teṣāṃ brahmānvaya eva yuktaḥ । nanu
tatrāpyutpattiśiṣṭasārvātmyāvarodhānmanomayatvādyanvayo na sambhavati । na ca sārvātmyamupāsa-
nāvidhivākyasthaṃ na sambhavati । sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjatvādihetuneti khaluśabdakṛtena prasi-
ddhavannirdeśena <quote>‘tajjalā’</quote>nityantasyopāsanavidhyekavākyatvānivāraṇāt kiṃ tu śāntyupāyapradarśa-
kavākyāntaragatamanassārbātmyaṃ tatra nopāsyaguṇa iti śaṅkyam । upāsanavidhyākāṅkṣyā brahma-
ṇa iva tadga‍uṇasyāpyanyārthasannidhānata eva grahaṇopapatteriti cet । maivam । ekasyāmupāsanāyāṃ
svatantropāsyadvayābhāvādekopāsyāvaruddhāyāmupāsyāntarānvayāsambhave'pyekasminnupāsye ba1hugu-
ṇavaiśiṣṭyopāsanasadbhāvādekaguṇāvaruddhe'pyupāsye tadaviruddhaguṇāntarānvayopapatteḥ । nanvastvevaṃ
tathāpyatra notpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhaḥ । upakrame jīvopāsanāyā eva vidhānāt । heyapaśupakṣi-
sarīsṛpādisarvātmatvasyānādisaṃsārabhāji jīva iti nirdoṣe brahmaṇyasambhavena <quote>‘idaṃ brahmāgaccha-
tī’</quote>tyādiśrutyantareṣu jīve'pi brahmaśabdaprayogadarśanena cātra brahmaśabdasya jīvaparatvāditi
cenna । tasya prasiddhiprācuryeṇa yaugikārthapauṣkalyena <quote>‘gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarva’</quote>mityārabhya ‘brahmapraka-
raṇānuvṛttyā cātra brahmaparatvasyaivocitatvāt । brahmaṇassārvātmyaṃ sarvaśarīratvaṃ na tu tattādā-
tmyamiti heyatādātmyena na tasya doṣavattvaprasaṅgaḥ । śarīragatadoṣāṇāṃ śarīriṇyaprasaṅgāditi
dvitīyādhyāye samarthayiṣyamāṇatvenātra brahmaṇi sārvātmyānupapattiśaṅkānavakāśācca । pratyuta
yasya jīvasya yāvanti śarīrāṇi tāvadātmatvameva tasya na tvasaṅkucitaṃ sarvātmatvamiti jīva
eva sārvātmyānupapatteḥ spaṣṭatvācca tathābhūtasya saṅkucitasārvātmyasyānyatra dveṣādivarjanarūpa-
śāntāvanupayogenātra tadgrahaṇānupapatteśca । tasmādutpattiśiṣṭabrahmāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāmupā-
syatvenānanvite jīve manomayatvādīnāmupāsyaguṇānāmanvayāsambhavātteṣāmupāsyabrahmānvaya
eva yukta ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthamāha—<pratika>manomayatveti ।</pratika> ayamāśayaḥ । yadyapi mayaṭo vikāra-
<note>(1) <quote>‘brahmaguṇa’</quote> iti. ṅa. ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="297"/>
prācuryādyanekārthasādhāraṇyāt <quote>‘prāṇaśśarīramasye’</quote>ti vacanasya yena kena citsambandhena nirvoḍhuṃ
śakyatvācca niyantṛtvādirūpamanaḥprāṇasambandhavati brahmaṇyapi <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra’</quote>ityeta-
dyojayituṃ śakyam । tathāpi manaḥprāṇasambandhapratipādane tadabhāvapratipādana iva tayorjīvena
sahopakaraṇopakaraṇībhāvalakṣaṇasambandha eva lokavedayoḥ prasiddhataro grāhyaḥ । na tu brahmaṇa
saha tayoraprasiddhasambandhaḥ । prasiddhasambandhe prathamaṃ buddha‍yavatārāt । ata eva kha<quote>‘lvaprāṇo
hyamanā’</quote>iti brahmaṇi manaḥprāṇaniṣedho jhaṭiti svārasyenaiva buddhimārohati na tu ghaṭavati bhūtale
ghaṭābhāvavadbha‍ūtalamityāptavākyamanupapannatayā śaṅkitaṃ satsamavāyasambandhena ghaṭābhāvavattvapara-
mityupapādanamivā<quote>‘prāṇo hyamanā’</quote>iti śrutivākyaṃ niyantṛtvādisambandhena manaḥprāṇavati brahma-
ṇi kathamaprāṇatvamamanastvaṃ cetyanupapannārthaṃtayā śaṅkitaṃ sadbhogopakaraṇopakaraṇībhāvena manaḥ-
prāṇābhāvavattvaparamityupapādanamapekṣate । na ca vācyaṃ manaḥprāṇayorjīvasambandhaprasiddhāvapi ma-
nomayaprāṇaśarīraśabdau <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīranetā’</quote> <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasminnayaṃ pu-
ruṣo manomaya’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu brahmaṇyeva prasiddhau, ato'rthānusandhānātpūrvameva buddhisthayā
śabdaprasiddha‍yā tayorbrahmaparatvasiddhau tatra sambhavati manaḥprāṇasambandhe paryavasānaṃ syāditi ।
śrutyantareṣvapi prasiddhasambandhānusāreṇa tayorjīvaparatvamapekṣyaiva taddvārā brahmaṇi paryavasānāt
iha prathamaṃ buddhisthasya jīvasya grahaṇe sambhavati tamatilaṅghya taddvārā brahmaṇi paryavasānakalpanāyāḥ
<quote>‘triḥ prathamāmanvāha triruttamā’</quote>miti vihitasya sāmidhenyabhyāsasya prathamapratītasthānadharmatva-
matilaṅghya taddvārā pravovājīyādiṛgdharmakalpanāvadayuktatvāt । na cātroparitanasatyasaṅkalpatvā-
dibrahmaliṅgānusāreṇa tathākalpanaṃ yuktamiti śaṅkyam । <quote>‘satyasaṅkalpa’</quote>ityasya sati brahmaṇyasa-

svātantryasya ca darśanāt । na cāpṛthaksiddhadharmavācinā tathā niyamaḥ । hastādiśabdānāṃ śarīrapa-

paryantatvādarśanāccetyāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । nīlādiśabdāstāvadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭa-

bhāvasya śabdakāryakāritvābhāvāt । nāpi luptena smṛtena matupā tadabhidhānamiti tadabhi-
prāyaḥ । matublopasya siddhaśabdānvākhyānārthaṃ vaiyākaraṇakalpitatvena vastutastatra luptasya matu-
po'bhāvāt । tasmānmatublopānuśāsanenāpi nīlādiśabdānāṃ guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavācakatvameva
sidhdyati । matubaśravaṇe tallopānuśāsanabalāt tadarthapratyayāvaśyaṃbhāveca sati nīlādiśabdānā-
miva tajjanakatvaparyavasānāt kamarthaṃ tarhi matublopānuśāsanam । samānādhikaraṇavyavahārādeva
hi nīlādiśabdānāṃ guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavācakatvaṃ siddhyati । ucyate । santi nīlādiśabdāḥ
kevalaguṇavācakā api । <quote>‘ghaṭasya nīlo guṇa’</quote> ityādivyadhikaraṇavyavahārāṇāmapi darśanāt ।
tathā ca yathā guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavācināṃ nīlādiśabdānāṃ niṣkṛṣṭaguṇaparatvavivakṣāyāṃ nailyaṃ
nīlatvaṃ nīlimeti bhāvapratyayaḥ tathā teṣāṃ niṣkṛṣṭaguṇavācināṃ dravyaparatvavivakṣāyāṃ matuppratya-
yo'pi bhavet । dṛśyate hi puṇyapāpādiśabdānā <quote>‘mayaṃ puruṣaḥ puṇyaḥ ayaṃ pāpaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘asya puṇya-
masya pāpa’</quote> mityādidvividhavyavahāradarśanāt dharmādharmādimātravācakatvena taddharmiparyantatvena
ca dvividhānāṃ dharmādharmamātravāca kānāṃ dharmiparyantatvavivakṣāyāṃ puṇyavānpāpavānityādirmatu-
bantavyavahāraḥ। tathātrāpi tatprāptau tadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ matublopānuśāsanam । tena dravyaparyantā eva

dravyaparyantatvavivakṣāyāṃ matubantaprayogo nāstīti siddhyati । vārtikakṛtā'pi <quote>‘guṇavacanebhyo

guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavācināṃ nīlādiśabdānāṃ bhāve guṇavācināṃ nīlimādiśabdānāmaniṣpattipra-

tadviśiṣṭeṣu dravyeṣu lakṣaṇayā samānādhikaraṇavyavahāraḥ sambhavati । tatsambhave ca na teṣvapi
śaktyantaraṃ kalpanīyam । gauravāt । evaṃ ca lakṣaṇāniyamārthaṃ matublopānuśāsanam । lakṣaṇī-

nīśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyasvārasyena dharmiparatvaśaṅkā prasajyate । ucyate । syādetadevaṃ yadi
nīlādiśabdānāṃ viṣayaśaktyaṅgīkāre gauravaṃ syāt । na tvevaṃ tadanaṅgīkāra eva gauravam ।
tathā hi—teṣāṃ guṇaguṇyubhayaśaktipakṣe guṇamātraśaktipakṣe ca guṇagato nīlatvādireva

rigrahe vibhakteḥ śabdasādhutvamātrārthatayā vaiyarthyaṃ syāt । guṇigatakaraṇakārakatvasya samā-
nādhikaraṇapadāntaragatatṛtīyāvibhaktilabdhatvāt । na ca guṇaparigraheṇa tadgatakaraṇakārakatvā-
rthatayā sārthakatve sambhavati vaiyarthyāṅgīkāro yuktaḥ । na ca dravyaikaparapiṅgākṣyekahāyanīpadaga-
tavibhaktidvayavadaruṇāpadagatavibhaktāvananyagatikatvamasti । aruṇāpadasya guṇārthaparigraheṇa ta-
tsārthakatvasamarthanasambhavāditi nyāyamālocya tasya guṇārthaparigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ । tathā ca yatra guṇa-

ntarasāmānādhikaraṇyamanādṛtya guṇārthaparigrahaḥ । yatra tannāsti <quote>‘piśaṅgī paṣṭhauhī dakṣiṇā’</quote> yasyo-
bhāvagnī anugatā’ vityādau tatra śrutasāmānādhikaraṇyānādarahetvabhāvāt guṇyarthaparigraha iti
sarvamupapadyate । anayā diśā śarīravācino devamanuṣyabrāhmaṇādiśabdā api ātmaparyantāḥ ।

16) ityādaya upapādayanti । tataḥ <quote>‘sarva khalvidaṃ brahma’</quote> <ref>(chā॰3.4.)</ref> iti sarvacidaci-
tprapañcaśarīraṃ brahmābhidhīyate । tato brahmasvarūpatvāt prapañcasya dveṣādyaviṣayatvācchā-

na ca tathā sati śarīrādiśabdānāmapyātmapara1tā syāditi vācyam । tatpravṛttinimittasya śa-
rīratvasya sākṣātsvāpṛthaksiddhāśraya eva pravṛtinimittatvāt । devamanuṣyādiśabdānāmiva teṣāmā-
tmaparyaṃtaprayogābhāvenātiprasaṃgavāraṇārthaṃ sākṣāttvaviśeṣaṇasyāpekṣitatvāt । ata eva rūparasā-
diśabdānāṃ dravyaparyantatvaṃ hastādiśabdānāṃ śarīraparyantatvaṃ vā nāsti । tatrāpi vyavahārānu-
sāreṇa sākṣāttvaviśeṣaṇāpekṣaṇāt । na ca kvacittadanapekṣaṇamātreṇa sarvatra tadanapekṣaṇaṃ bhavati ।
apatyaśabdasya sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇyena janyacetanavṛttitve'pi putraśabdasya sākṣājjanyacetana
eva vṛttidarśanāt । tasmānnīlādiśabdānāṃ dravyaparyantatvadarśanāt tadrītyā prapañcaśabdānāmapi
brahmaparyantatvaṃ yuktam । <quote>‘nīlo ghaṭa’</quote> ityādivat <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityādiprayogadarśanena teṣāṃ
nīlādiśabdasamānatvāt । nanvanupadamevoktaṃ <quote>‘rūparasādiśabdāḥ śarīrādiśabdāḥ hastā-
diśabdāśca sākṣātsvapravṛttinimittāśrayasyaiva vācakā’</quote> iti । tathā ca sarve śabdā nīlāruṇa-
devamanuṣyādiśabdasamānā na bhavantīti kathaṃ nīlādiśabdarītyā sarve śabdā brahmavācakāḥ si-
ddhyeyuḥ । satyam । yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ svapravṛttinimittāśrayamātre śaktiḥ sambhavati teṣu nīlādi-
śabdanyāyopanyāsaḥ yeṣāṃ śaktau tadāśraye sākṣāttvaviśeṣaṇamapekṣitaṃ teṣāṃ brahmavācakatvaṃ na
nīlādiśabdanyāyena siddhyati । kiṃtu <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bahubhavanasaṅkalpo
nāmarūpavyākaraṇamiti pramāṇaiḥ siddhyati । ata eva bhāṣye <quote>‘tasmātsarvaśabdavācyatvaṃ brahma-
ṇa’</quote> iti nīlāruṇādevamanuṣyādiśabdānāmapṛthaksiddhasvāśrayasāmānyavācitvāt brahmaṇaḥ sarva-
śabdavācyatvaṃ prasādhyāpi nirṇītasya hetoravyāpitvamālocya <quote>‘‘sarvo vai rudra’ ityādaya upapā-
dayantī’’</quote>ti vyāpakāni hetvantarāṇyupanyastāni । evaṃ ca rūpādiśabdānāṃ sākṣātsvāśraya eva
śaktiriti vyavasthā nīlādiśabdaśaktivat tasyāḥ ghaṭādiparyantatvaṃ mābhūditi tanmātravyāva-
rtanārtheti na tathā nāmarūpavyākaraṇa śrutyādisiddhā brahmaṇaśśaktirvyāvartyata iti sarvaṃ sama-
ñjasam । evamupapāditaṃ <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahme’</quote>ti vākyasya vivakṣitamarthamupasaṃharati---<pratika>tata
iti</pratika> । tadvākyārthasya śāntāvupayogamāha—<pratika>tato brahmasvarūpatvāditi</pratika> । yataḥ prapañco brahma-
śarīramataḥ prasiddhatadīyadivyavigrahavattasya pūjyatvena dveṣatatprayukta nigrahādyanarhatvāttato nivṛtta-
ssan brahmopāsīteti । yadyapyupāsanākarmatvena brahma na śrūyate, tathāpyupāsanasya karmākāṅkṣā-
yāṃ śāntihetūpadeśavākye sannihitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ brahmaiva tatkarmatvenānveti । ata eva samāna-
prakaraṇe vājasaneyake <quote>‘satyaṃ brahmetyupāsīte’</quote>ti śrūyata iti bhāvaḥ । nanu nāmarūpavyā-
karaṇaśrutyādyanusāreṇa nīlādiśabdaśaktyanusāreṇa ca sarvaśabdavācyaṃ brahma, tataḥ <quote>‘sarvaṃ kha-
lvidaṃ brahme’</quote>ti nirdeśaścopapadyatāṃ nāma, na tu brahma sarvaśarīrakam । sarvasya dravyaguṇaka-
rmādirūpasya prapañcasya śarīratvāsambhavāt । dravyaikarūpaṃ hi śarīram । nāpi sarvadravyaśarīrakaṃ
brahmeti yuktam । hastapādādisaṃsthānaviśeṣarahitānāṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāṃ śarīratvāsambhavāt ।
nanu, manuṣyapaśupakṣisarīsṛpatarugulmalatādisakalaśarīrasādhāraṇasyaikasyānugatasya saṃsthānavi-

parameṣṭhinaḥ ।। vṛkṣasya mūlasekena śākhāḥ puṣyanti vai yathā । śivasya pūjayā tadvat puṣya-

iti ।। svāmī bhṛtyāsaṃspṛṣṭastaṃ niyacchati nāviko nāvamāruhya niyacchannapi tadekadeśe vartate ।
kṛtrimavyāghraḥ pumān vyāghrākṛtidārucarmādiyantramanupraviśya niyacchannapi na tadvyāpyādhiti-

ti na teṣvativyāptiḥ । parasparasaṃyogaviśeṣarūpāvasthāviśeṣāpannaṃ tu hastapādādikaṃ śarīrame-
veti tasya lakṣyatvāt tatra nātivyāptiḥ । prāṇendriyavargasyāpi liṅgaśarīrāntargatatvena lakṣyatvā-
ttatrāpi nātivyāptiḥ । saṃsāriṇaścicchaktivyāptyā svaśarīre niyamyapradeśānadhiṣṭhāyaiva
niyacchanti । muktāścicchaktivyāptyaiva viśvamadhiṣṭhāya niyacchantīti na kvāpyavyāptiḥ । idaṃ
ca jagajjanmādibrahmalakṣaṇavat kādācitkamupalakṣaṇatayā lakṣaṇaṃ, na viśeṣaṇatayā । atassuṣuptaśa-
rīrasya śarīratvāpattiriti doṣasya nāvakāśaḥ।na caivaṃ sati muktau yāvadadhiṣṭhāsyati caitrastāvatastaṃ
prati saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi śarīratvāpattirdoṣaḥ । iṣṭāpatteḥ । ata eva manuṣyādiśarīramātraviṣaya-
paricchinnāhaṃbhāvasya bhrāntirūpatvaṃ bhāṣye tatratatrāviṣkṛtam । idameva śarīralakṣaṇaṃ sūcayituṃ <quote>‘yaḥ
pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādyantaryāmibrāhmaṇe parameśvarasya pṛthivyādiṣu bahirantaśca vyāptidarśanapū-
rvakaṃ pṛthivyādestanniyamyatvamuktam । evaṃ parameśvarasya sarvaprapañcaśarīrakatve lakṣaṇamukhena siddhe
sādhuṣvivāsādhuṣvapakāriṣvapi parameśvaraśarīratvabhāvanā dveṣanigrahabuddhyādityāgopayoginī kā-
ryeti <quote>‘satye sādhau ce’</quote>ti gādhārūpeṇa ślokena darśitam । evaṃ prapañcaparameśvarayoḥ śarīraśarīribhāve
sati yathā parameśvaraḥ pūjayā tuṣyati evaṃ prapañcānugraheṇa parameśvarastuṣyatīti sūcayituṃ <quote>‘vṛkṣasya
mūlasekene’</quote>ti ślokena dṛṣṭāntāṃśa upanyastaḥ । liṅgapurāṇādiṣu parameśvaramūrtyaṣṭakaparigaṇanaprakara-
ṇe <quote>‘bhūmyambho'gnimarudvyomabhāskarā dīkṣitaśśaśī’</quote>ti viśiṣya yajvanāṃ parigaṇanāt tadvyatirikta-
cetanānāṃ parameśvaraśarīratvaṃ nāstīti yajvasveva parameśvaraśarīratvabhāvanayā dveṣanigrahādibuddhistya-
ktavyeti śaṅkāvāraṇārtha <quote>‘mātmā tasyāṣṭamī mūrti’</quote>riti ślokena sarvacetanānāṃ taccharīratvaṃ viśi-
ṣya darśitam’ । anenaiva ślokena mūrtyaṣṭakamadhye viśiṣya bhūtānāṃ parigaṇanāt anyeṣāma cetanānāṃ
taccharīratvaṃ nāstīti śaṅkāpi <quote>‘viśvaṃ tasmācchivātmaka’</quote> mityuktyā nirākṛtā । sarveṣāmātmanāṃ
parameśvaraśarīratve hi bhūtavyatiriktamāyākālaniyatyādyabhimānicetanānāmapi taccharīratva-
siddhau tanniyamyānāṃ māyākālādyacetanānāmapi kaimutikanyāyena parameśvaraniyamyatvaṃ siddhya-
ti । kimarthaṃ tarhi parameśvarasya mūrtyaṣṭakaparigaṇane keṣucitpurāṇeṣu cetanasthāne yajvanāṃ pari-
gaṇanaṃ sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣvacetanasthāne bhūtānāṃ parigaṇanam । ucyate । nedaṃ parisaṅkhyārthaṃ pari-
gaṇanaṃ, kiṃtvarcanopayogibhavaśarvarudrādināmabhedavidhānārtham । yathā saptarātrādīnāmahargaṇānāṃ

yaduktaṃ kratumayasya jīvasya prastutatvānmanomayo jīva iti, tadayuktam, utpa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
karaṇakatvaṃ heyamupāsyākāro bhavitumarhati । avyavahitavākyoktatatkratunyāyavirodhāt । ataḥ
<quote>‘prāṇārāmaṃ manaānanda’</quote> miti śrutisiddhaṃ brahmaṇo yanniratiśayānandānubhavasādhanamanaśśāli-
tvaṃ yacca prāṇantīti vyutpattyā prāṇaśabdoktānāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamane sāmarthyaṃ tadubhayaṃ mano-
mayatvaṃ prāṇaśarīratvaṃ ceti tata eva liṅagāt saṃsārivyāvṛttamanomayatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ brahmeti pari-
cchedassambhavatītyarthaḥ । nanu manomayatvādiśabdānāṃ tacchabdanirdiṣṭopāsakaviśeṣaṇatvameva
yuktam । liṃgavibhaktyaikarūpyeṇa tatsamabhivyāhṛtatvāt । tathātve'pyupāsyākāratvamaviruddham ।
tasyaivopāsyatvaparyavasānādityuktāmanūdya nirākaroti---<pratika>yaduktamiti</pratika> । upāsake saṃsāradaśā-
yāmasambhavadapyuktarūpamupādeyaṃ manomayatvaṃ prāṇaśarīratvaṃ ca muktau sambhavati । <quote>‘manasaitānkā-
mānpaśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloka’</quote> iti śruteḥ sārvātmyaphalaśruteśceti śaṅkiturhṛdayam ।
<pratika>utpattiśiṣṭeti</pratika> । yathā <quote>‘tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājina’</quote>
mityatrāmikṣāvaruddhe vaiśvadevayāge vājinarūpadravyāntarapraveśo na sambhavati । utpattivākyasaṃ-
siddhaṃ karma sarvamanūdyate । <quote>‘na cāśritaguṇe śakyaṃ tadvirodhi guṇāntara’</quote> miti guṇādhikara-
ṇoktanyāyāt । evamihāpi brahmarūpopāsyāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāṃ jīvarūpopāsyāntarapraveśo na
sambhavatītyarthaḥ । ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra’</quote> ityādīnāṃ prathamāntānāṃ na tatpado-
pāttajīvaviśeṣaṇasamarpakatayānvayaḥ । kiṃ tu <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote> tyanūditasārvātmyabrahmopāsa-
nāṃ prati prakārasamarpakatayā । <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitāsmī’</quote> tyetadanantaramitikaraṇabalāda-
nena prakāreṇa <quote>‘kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote> tyanvayapratīteḥ tathānvaye satyeva <quote>‘eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaya’</quote>
iti vākyasāmañjasyācca । tasyopāsanāprakārābhinayaparatvaṃ vinā svatantraśrutivākyatve ma itya-
syānvayasāñjasyābhāvāt । tathā satyeva ca <quote>‘eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaya’</quote> iti vākyānāṃ triḥ
pāṭhasya <quote>‘sarvakarmā sarvakāma’</quote> ityādivākyānāṃ dviḥpāṭhasya ca <quote>‘prāyaṇīyaṃ prathamamahaḥ caturviṃśaṃ dvi-
tīyaṃ catvāro'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā ekaḥ praṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahasa़sa māsassa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyassa caturthassa
pañcamastrayo'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā ekaḥ praṣṭhyaṣṣaḍaha’</quote> ityādau gāvāmayanikāhaḥklṛptivākye abhiplava-
ṣaḍahādiśabdānāmasakṛtpāṭhasya ta1tratatra sthāne ṣaḍāhādyanuṣṭhānābhyāsārthatveneva tatratatra sthāne hṛda-
yāntarvartitvādyanusandhānābhyāsārthatvena sārthakyāt teṣāṃ vākyanāmupāsye tattaddharmasadbhāvamātra-
bodhakaśrutivākyatve tadvaiyarthyāt । na ca vihitopāsanānuvādena manomayatvādyanekaguṇavidhāne
vākya bhedaḥ। teṣāmitikaraṇoktena prakārabhāvenaikarūpeṇa vidheyatvāt।nacavidheyatāvacchedakarūpaikye
vidheyapadārthaśrutarūpāntarabhedo vākyabhedāvahaḥ । ata eva <quote>‘yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhotī’</quote>
tivākyasyāgnihotradevatātvenāgniprajāpatividhāyakatvapakṣe caturthīdvayenaprātipadikārthagatadevatā-
tvakalpakena lāghavādubhayānugatakadevatātvakalpanādagniprajāpatyorvidheyatācchedakaikyena vākya-
bhedaḥ parihṛtaḥ । <quote>‘gauścāśvaścāśvataraśca gardabhāścājāścāvayaśca vrīhayaśca yavāśca tilāśca māṣā-
śca tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇe’</quote>tijyotiṣṭomadakṣiṇāvidhivākye gavādīnāṃ dakṣiṇātvenaikena rūpeṇa
<note>(1) <quote>‘tatratatra sthāne ṣaḍahādyanuṣṭhānābhyāsārthatve tatratatra sthāne ṣaḍahādyanuṣṭhānābhyāsārthatvena sārthakyavat tatratatra
syāne hṛdayārntarvarti’</quote>iti—ca—pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="314"/>
ttiśiṣṭabrahmāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāmavāntaraprāptasya jīvasya praveśayitumaśakya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vidheyatvāttathaiva vākyabhedaḥ parihṛtaḥ । gavādyātmikaikaiva dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭomasya na tu gavādayaḥ
pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇā iti ca siddhaṃ kṛtvā <quote>‘athaiṣa bhūrvaiśvadevaḥ tasya dhenurdakṣiṇe’</quote>tibhūnāmakatadvikṛtivi-
śeṣavihitayā dhenudakṣiṇayā sarveṣāṃ gavādīnāṃ prākṛtadakṣiṇādravyāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ na tu gotvaliṅgena
gomātrasyeti tasya dhenuriti <quote>‘gavāṃ prakṛtau vibhaktacoditatvā’</quote>dityadhikaraṇe nirūpitam । yadvā
śrutāvitiśabdaḥ kramarūpaṃ manomayatvādīnāṃ prakāramācaṣṭe iti anena manomayatvādyanusandhā-
nakrameṇa kratuṃ kurvīteti । tathā ca vitatirūpa ekaḥ krama evātra vidheyaḥ । manomayatvādī-
nāmupāsyaguṇānāṃ vidhānaṃ tu tatkramavidhānādākṣepato lakṣyate praṣṭhagatasarvatāvidhānādivatpraṣṭhā-
nām । athavā manomayatvādyanekaguṇaviśiṣṭa upāsanāprayogo'tra vidhīyate । upāsanāyā
vihitatve'pi sambhavati tatprayogasyāvihitasya vidhānan । yadyapi prayogamantareṇopāsanasyāni-
ṣpatteḥ prayogavidhirarthāllabhyate, tathāpyekena vākyenānekaguṇavidhinirvāhāya prāgevākṣepapravṛttera-
nekaguṇaviśiṣṭasya prayogasya vidhānamupapadyate । evaṃ prayogavidhimāśrityaivābhyudayeṣṭigatamadhya-
mādivākyeṣu vākyabhedaṃ kecana pariharanti । tathā hi---<quote>‘vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati
vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhātaṇḍulānvibhajedye ma-
dhyamāssyustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ
ye'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caru’</quote>miti śruyate । caturdaśyāmamāvāsyābhrāntyā da-
rśopakramaṃ kṛtavataḥ tatprāyaścittavidhānamidam । atra tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ
madhyamādibhāvena tredhāvibhāgo na vidhīyate madhyamādivākyaistatsiddheḥ । kiṃ tu sarveṣāṃ dārśi-
kahaviṣāṃ pūrvadevatābhyo'panayo vidhīyate । vibhajedityukte hyayamartho'vagamyate । yāni saṃyu-
ktāni tāni vibhajediti। taṇḍulādīni ca havīṃṣi devatābhissaṃyuktāni । atastaṇḍulaśabdo
vibhāgakarmatvenārthataḥ prāptānāṃ dārśikahaviṣāmupalakṣaka iti teṣāṃ pūrvadevatāpanayo vidhīyata
iti yuktam । apanītapūrvadevatānāṃ teṣāṃ haviṣāṃ madhyamādivākyairdevatāntarasaṃyojanaṃ kriyate na
tu dravyadevatāviśiṣṭaṃ karmāntaraṃ vidhīyata ityabhyudayapeṭikāyāṃ nirūpitam । tatra madhyamādi-
vākyānāṃ prakṛte darśakarmaṇi devatāntarasaṃyojanaparatve vākyabhedaḥ prasajyate । kathaṃ darśadravyeṣva-
gnyādidevatānāṃ vidhānaṃ devatāsu dātṛtvādiguṇavidhānaṃ ceti triṣvapi vākyeṣu tāvadeko
vākyabhedaḥ । dadhiśṛtavākyayoḥ sthaviṣṭhānāṃ dadhyaṇiṣṭhānāṃ śṛtaṃ cādhikaraṇavidheyamityaparo vā-
kyabhedaḥ । tayoḥ sthaviṣṭhānāmaṇiṣṭhānāṃ ca carubhāvo'pi vidheya ityanyo vākyabhedaḥ । yadyu-
cyeta naite vākyabhedāḥ prasaranti। katham । dātṛpradātṛśipiviṣṭaśabdānāmagnyādipadasāmānādhi-
karaṇyāt।padadvayapratipāditaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ devatākārakamekameva vidheyaṃ na tu devatāstadga‍uṇāśca pratyekaṃ
vidheyāḥ । abhyudayeṣṭiprakaraṇe <quote>‘saha śrapayatī’</quote>ti vacanamasti । taddevataikyāt taddhi sthaviṣṭhayoḥ
śṛtāṇiṣṭhayośca sahapākaviṣayam । tataśca sthaviṣṭhānāmaṇiṣṭhānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāmalpatvāddadhiśṛta-
yorbhūyastvācca taṇḍulānāṃ carutvaṃ dadhiśṛtayoradhikaraṇatvaṃ cārthātprāpnoti । arthaprāptaṃ ca tatsa-
rvamanūdyate । tattadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭaṃ devatākārakameva vidhīyate madhyamānāṃ taṇḍulānāmagnirdevatā sthavi-
ṣṭhānāṃ dadhnaḥ candraḥ pradātā aṇiṣṭhānāṃ śṛtasya ca viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭa iti । ato naivaṃ vākya-
<pb n="315"/>
bheda āpnoti । tathāpi prakārāntareṇa vākyabhedaḥ syādeva । dadhivākye dadhni sthaviṣṭheṣu ca
pratyekaṃ devatāsaṃyojanāt । iyāṃstu bhedaḥ । pūrvasminpakṣe sthaviṣṭheṣu devatā praṇītā kārye
dadhi ca vidheyaṃ kṣodiṣṭheṣu devatā praṇītā kārye śṛtaṃ ca vidheyamiti vidheyabhedādvākya-
bhedaḥ । <quote>‘saha śrapayatī’</quote>ti vākyasattvamabhyupagamya pravṛtte dvitīyapakṣe sthaviṣṭheṣu śṛteṣu ca
dadhni ca kṣodiṣṭheṣu devatā vidheyetyuddeśabhedādvākyabheda iti । evaṃ prasaktaṃ vākyabhedama-
nekaguṇaviśiṣṭaprayogavidhyāśrayaṇena pariharanti । tatra prayogavidhyāśrayaṇapakṣe dūṣa-
ṇānyasmābhirvidhirasāyane darśitāni । tathāpi yatrānekaguṇaśravaṇe'pi prakṛtahānāprakṛta-
kalpanāpūrvakakarmāntarakalpanāgauravaparihārārthaṃ prakṛtakarmaviṣayatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tatra vākya-
bhedaparihārārthaṃ prayogavidhyāśrayaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamityetāvati dṛṣṭānto'yamupanyastaḥ । athavā । a-
sminvākye viśiṣya kā vākyabhedaśaṅkā । daharavidyādiṣvapi hyutpattivākyabahirbhūtānyapahata-
pāpmatvādyanekaguṇaśravaṇāni dṛśyante । teṣu yadi vākyabhedaḥ soḍhaḥ ihāpi sa soḍhavyaḥ । yadi tu-
varṇitānāṃ vākyabhedaparihāropāyānāmanyatamaḥ kaścidanyo vā upāyo'nviṣyate ihāpi sa e-
vānviṣyatāmityalaṃ prapañcena । evaṃ prāgvihitāyāmevopāsanāyāṃ manomayatvādiguṇavāda iti
sthite brahmāvaruddhāyāṃ tasyāṃ jīvānvayo na sambhavatīti manomayatvādīnāmupāsyaguṇānāṃ na
jīvaviśeṣaṇatayānvayaḥ kiṃ tu brahmaviśeṣaṇatayeti yuktam । nanu brahmarūpopāsyānvitatvenāvagatā-
yāmupāsanāyāṃ manomayatvādyanvayaḥ kena pramāṇenāvasīyate । <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote> tyādinā-
<quote>‘abhisaṃbhavitāsmī’</quote>tyantena prakṛtopāsanamanūdya manomayatvādigatatatprakārasamarpaṇārthetikāraṇa-
nvitena vākyapramāṇeneti cettarhi vākyādanyārthasannidhānasyātidurbalatvāttena brahmaṇa upāsya-
tayānvayo na siddha‍yet । durbalamapi sannidhānaṃ vākyasyopajīvyatvamātre prabalamiti cenna ।
upāsanānuvāde tadvidhānamātrasyopajīvyatvāt । na ca viṣayarahitamupāsanaṃ vidhātuṃ śakyam।
yenopāsanavidhānopa1yuktaṃ viṣayasamarpaṇamiti tadarthamasyārthasya sannidhānamupajīvyaṃ syāt ।
sambhavati <quote>‘hyagnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote>ti homamātravidhānavadupāsanāmātravidhānaṃ vihitahomānuvādena
dravyavidhānavadvihitopāsanānuvādenopāsyavidhānaṃ ca । tathāpi sannidhānenopāsyasamarpaṇaṃ pratha-
mapravṛttatvādbalavaditi cet na, viṣayasamarpaṇārthapramāṇābhāvaṃ niścitya hyanyārthasannidhānato
viṣayagrahaṇamapekṣaṇīyam । paścādapi tādarthyena pramāṇāvatārasadbhāve tu tannāpekṣaṇīyam । ata-
stasya prathamapravṛttyuktirbhrāntikṛtaiva । tasmādiha nāstyutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodha iti cenmaivam ।
manomayādivākyena prakṛtopāsanāyāmupāsyagataprakāramātrasya hi samarpaṇaṃ kriyate na tu sā-
kṣādupāsyasya viśeṣyasyāpi । manomaya ityārabhyānvayinetikaraṇena manomayatvādeḥ <quote>‘etaṃ mano-
mayatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ prāptāsmī’</quote>tyetadantasya sarvasyāpyarthajātasya prakāratāpādanāt । tathā ca
manomayatvādiprakāreṇa kimupāsīteti tadviśeṣyākāṅkṣāyāmākāṅkṣitaviśeṣyasamarpakamanyārthasa-
nnidhānaṃ vākyānukūlatvāt na vākyena bādhyam । yadyapyupāsanotpattivākye brahmaṇa iva tada-
nuvādavākye jīvasyāpyanyārthasannidhānamasti । tathāpi prathamaśrutatvādutpattivākyagatatvācca
prathamaṃ brahmānvaye sati paścānna jīvānvaya iti yuktamutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhavacanam । yadyapyutpatti-
<note>।। 1 ।। <quote>‘payuktamanyārthasannidhānamapyupajīvyaṃ syāt’</quote> iti—ca—pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
