tvāt; yathā viśvedevāvaruddhāyāmāmikṣāyāṃ vājināṃ na praveśaḥ । ato brahmaiva
manomayatvādidharmavattvenopāsyamiti ।। upakramagataṃ brahmaiva manomayatvādiviśiṣṭa-
mityukte avāntarasiddhasya jīvasya prasaṅgo'narthakaḥ syādityāśaṅkāyāmāha---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
satyasaṃkalpatvasarvakāmatvādīnāṃ vivakṣitānāṃ guṇānāṃ brahmaṇyevopapatteśca
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śiṣṭaguṇāvarodhe sati tu śrūyamāṇaṃ tadviruddhaṃ guṇāntaraṃsvātmasaṃgatiyogyaṃ karmāntaraṃ gamayeditigu-
ṇādhikaraṇanyāyaḥ ।iha tu nāsti tathākarmāntarāvagatiḥ।jīvasyāhatyopāsyatvena śravaṇābhāvāt ।
tasmādutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvaruddhe karmaṇi na tadviruddhaguṇānvaya ityetāvatyaṃśe dṛṣṭāntatayā guṇā-
dhikaraṇanyāyopanyāsaḥ । tasmācchāndogyāg‍nirahasyayossarvātmatvenopakrāntaṃ brahmaiva manomaya-
tvādiguṇakam । ata eva bṛhadāraṇyake śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ‘manomayo'yaṃ puruṣo bhāssatya,
mityādinā manomayatvādiguṇānāṃ satyaśabdoktasya sārvātmyasya ca samuccayo darśita iti
sarva samañjasam ।। uttarasūtramavatārayitumāśaṅkate—<pratika>brahmaiveti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>
tyatra <quote>‘yathākraturasmim̐lloke puruṣa’</quote> iti prakṛtaḥ puruṣo nirdiśyate । tannirdeśo na tadviśeṣaṇatvena
phalaviśeṣapratipattyarthaḥ । phalaviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvena pūrvaṃ tasyāprakṛtatvāt । nāpyupāsyaguṇānusā-
riphalasāmānyapratipattyarthaḥ । tatpratipatteryathākratuvākyainaiva siddhatvāt । nāpyupāsanākartṛpuruṣa-
sāmānyapratipattyarthaḥ । upāsanāyāḥ kartṛvyabhicāreṇārthādeva tatsiddheḥ । ato manomayatvā-
dīnāṃ brahmaviśeṣaṇatve tannirdeśo'narthaka eva syāt । teṣāmupāsakapuruṣaviśeṣaṇatve tu viśe-
ṣaṇapratipatyarthatvena sārthako bhavati । asti hyarthasiddhasyāpi viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇapratipattyartho
nirdeśaḥ । yathā <quote>‘umāṃ sa paśyannṛjunaiva cakṣuṣe’</quote>ti । tasmājjīvanirdeśānarthakyaparihārāya mano-
mayatvādīnāṃ tadviśeṣaṇatvamabhyupagantavyam । tathā ca satyupāsyaguṇānvayādanyārthanirdiṣṭa-
syāpi jīvasyopāsyatvamupāsyabhedādupāsanānyatvaṃ ca bhavadabhyupagantavyamityāśaṅkānivāraṇā-
rthamidaṃ sūtramiti । ।। sū ।। <pratika>vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca ।। 2 ।। satyasaṅkalpatveti</pratika> । satyasa-
ṅkalpatvamavitathasaṅkalpatvaṃ na tu sadviṣaye saṅkalparāhityam । śrutyantaraprasiddha‍yaheyaguṇatvasiddha‍yā-
dyanusāreṇaikapadyasyocitatvāt । tacca svābhāvikaṃ nityāvirbhūtaṃ brāhmameva grāhyam । na tu muktau hetva-
ntarādhīnāvirbhāvam । hetvākṣepakalpanāgauravāt।sarvakarmatvaṃ sarvaprapañcarūpakāryavattvam।karmaśabdasya
bālākyadhikaraṇanyāyena kāryamātraparatvāt । sarvakāmatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāmayata iti vyutpattyā sakalasṛ-
jyaviṣayakāmanāvattvaṃ sarvakalpanānuyāyisakalabhogyavastuśālitvaṃ vā । etena <quote>‘sarvagandhassarvarasa’</quote>
iti vyākhyātam । <quote>‘sarvamidamabhyātta’</quote>ityupāsanākālavṛttisakalaprapañcavyāpitvaṃ tātkālikaṃ
na tūpāsakasya muktikāle bhaviṣyattātkālikaprapañcavyāpitvam । avākitvamupāsanākāle
vāgindriyopalakṣitasakalendriyarāhityam । vākiśabdo vāgvācino vākśabdādinipratyayasya
tadasyāstīti vartamānārthe vihitatvāt । atassatyasaṅkalpatvādikaṃ brahmaṇyevopapadyate na jīva
ityarthaḥ । nanvatraiva prakaraṇe tatkratunyāyapratipādanāttadanusāreṇa ye guṇā muktau upāsakena
prāptuṃ śakyāstatparatvenaiva satyasaṅkalpādiśabdāḥ vyākhyātavyāḥ na tu brahmasādhāraṇaguṇaparatveneti
<pb n="317"/>
tadevopāsyam, avāntarasiddhastu jīvaḥ upāsakaḥ tadākāṅkṣāyogāditi ।।
iti sarvatraprasiddhādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cet na, tatkratunyāyasya jagadvyāpāravarjādhikaraṇānusāreṇa brahmāsādhāraṇaguṇātiriktaguṇaviṣaya-
tvāt । anyathā <quote>‘eṣa sarveśvaraḥ eṣa bhūtapālaḥ eṣa bhūtapatiḥ eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānā-
masambhedāye’</quote>tyādivākyaistāsu tāsu vidyāsu prapañcitānāṃ sarveśvaratvasarvādhāratvasarvakāraṇatvā-
diguṇānāmanupāsyatvaprasaṅgāt brahmaṇyupāsanākāle'pyāvirbhāvavataḥ satyasaṅkalpatvādīnupāsī-
nasya muktikāle tadāvirbhāvasattāmātreṇa tatra tatkratunyāyapravṛttyupapatteśca । <quote>‘tathetaḥ pretya bha-
vatī’</quote>ti hi śrūyate । na khalvidānīmayaṃ yathābhūtaguṇaḥ tathābhūtaguṇo'sya putro bhaviteti vyava-
hārakāle pitṛguṇānāṃ putraguṇānāṃ ca vartamānatvabhaviṣyattvavaiṣamye satyapi yathā tatheti sāmya-
pratipādanaṃ ca dṛśyate । api cāhaṃgrahavatīṣu brahmopāsanāsvahamartho jīvo bhāvinārcirādiga-
timattvasatyasaṅkalpatvādinopāsanīya iti tadviṣayatvenāpi tatkratunyāya upapadyate । vastutastū-
pāsyaprāptirūpaphalaviṣayastatkratunyāya iti<quote>‘kāryaṃ bādari’</quote><ref>(bra॰4.3.7.)</ref>rityadhikaraṇe darśayiṣyate ।
<quote>‘taṃ yathāyathopāsate tathaiva bhavantī’</quote>ti śrutistu parameśvaraṃ bhaktāḥ yenayena prakāreṇāmbāsahitatvā-
rdhanārīśvaratvādinā vastrabhūṣaṇādiviśeṣeṇa copāsate tebhyastathaivāvirbhavatītyevaṃparatvenopapadya-
te । <quote>‘yādṛśākārayogena yajante sādhakāḥ svayam । bhāsate tādṛgākāraścintāmaṇiriveśvara’</quote>
iti śivāgame śrūyate । tasmātsatyasaṅkalpatvādayo brahmaṇyevopapadyante । <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisa-
mbhavitāsmī’</quote>tyupāsyopāsakayoḥ karmakartṛbhāvanirdeśaḥ chāndogye<quote>‘eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaya’</quote> iti
vājasaneyake <quote>‘evamayamantarātman puruṣo hiraṇmaya’</quote>iti tayorasamānavibhaktinirdeśaśca brahmaṇyu-
pāsya evopapadyate । tasmādbahvāñjasyānurodhenākāṅkṣitasyāpyarthaprāptasyopāsakasyānuvādakaṃ <quote>‘sa’</quote>
iti padamityaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ । yadvā <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisambhavitāsmī’</quote>tyanantaraṃ <quote>‘yasya
syādaddhā na vicikitsāstī’</quote>ti śrūyate । tasyāyamarthaḥ । abhisambhavitāsmītyantena yaḥ prakāra
uktaḥ ayaṃ prakāro yasyāddhā satyo niścitassyāt । na tu vicikitsā saṃśayo'stīti । atra ya-
cchabdasya pratinirdeśasāpekṣatvāt tatpratinirdeśārthaḥ <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>tyatra tacchabdaḥ । evaṃ ma-
nomayatvādyupāsyaguṇajātatadupāsanākramopāsyaprāptirūpaphaleṣu yathā saṃśayaleśo'pi na prasara-
ti tathā śravaṇamananābhyāṃ niścityopāsanamārabhetetyevaṃ <quote>‘sa kratu’</quote>mityāde‘rna vicikitsāstī-
tyantasyārthaḥ paryavasyati । asminpakṣe <quote>‘abhisambhavitāsmī’</quote>tyetadanantaramitiśabda upāsanāpra-
prakāranirdeśakatayā kratuvākyena nānveti । kiṃtūpāsanāpūrvabhāviśravaṇādisādhyaniścayaprakāra-
tayā <quote>‘yasya syā’</quote>dityādinānveti । manomayatvāderupāsanāprakāratvaṃ tvarthātsiddha‍yati । anyathā
tanniścayasyopāsanāpekṣitatvāyogāt । sūtre vivakṣitaviśeṣaṇena tatkratunyāyavirodhāt brahmāsā-
dhāraṇaguṇā na vivakṣitā iti śaṅkā nirākṛtā । brahmaṇyupapattyā ca jīve'nupapattirvivakṣitā।
tayā bahvāñjasyānurodhā<quote>‘tsa’</quote>ityetasyaikasyānuvādakatvamagrimatacchabdapratinirdeśakatvaṃ vā kalpa-
yituṃ yuktamiti sūcitam । atra satyasaṅkalpādiśabdasvarasapratītānāṃ nityāvirbhūtasatyasaṅkalpa-
tvādīnāṃ jagatsraṣṭṭatvādyākṣiptatayā śrutyantaraprasiddha‍yā ca brahmaliṅgatvena spaṣṭānāmapi pūrvapakṣa-
daśāyāmupāsyabrahmaguṇatvāsambhavaśaṅkākaluṣitatvādanatispaṣṭateti pādasaṅgatiḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvatraprasiddhādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="318"/>
<p>atha anupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
iha sāmānyena jīvasyopāsyatvaṃ nāsti, kiṃtūpāsakatvamiti nirūpitam ।
punarapi sakalajīvasamaṣṭirūpahiraṇyagarbhopādānabhūtasya nārāyaṇasyāpi viśvā-
dhikabrahmaviṣayakamupāsakatvaṃ, nopāsyatvamityabhidhātumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---</p>
<sutra>।। sū ।। anupapattestu na śārīraḥ ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
<p>asya mahopaniṣadi śrūyate viṣayaḥ <quote>‘patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivamacyu-
tam । nārāyaṇaṃ mahājñeyam’</quote> ityādi ।। atra viśvapatitvādilakṣaṇayuktatayā
nārāyaṇaśabdavācyo mūrtyātmā parameśvaro'nyo veti saṃdehaḥ ।। <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ
devam’</quote> ityārabhya sahasraśīrṣatvādividheyatvena nārāyaṇasya mūrtyātmana evodde-
śyatvenābhyāsāt, <quote>‘samudre'ntaṃ viśvaśambhuvam’</quote> iti samudraśāyitvādita-
lliṅgācca, tatparyāyavācakācyutahariśabdādiprayogācca, nārāyaṇa eva mūrtyātmā</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha anupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>yathā śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ jīvasāmānyasya prasaṅgo nopāsyatvena kiṃ tūpāsakatvena । tathaiva
cetanamadhye sarvotkṛṣṭasya nārāyaṇasya nārāyaṇānuvāke prasaṅgo'pīti dṛṣṭāntasaṅgatiṃ darśayannutta-
rādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>iheti ।। sū ।। anupapattestu na śārīraḥ</pratika> ।। 3 ।। taittirīyopaniṣadi
<quote>‘patiṃ viśvasye’</quote>tyādikamudāhṛtya tatra viśvapatitvānanyeśvaratvādidharmaiḥ pratipādyaḥ pañcakṛtyādhi-
kāriṣu mūrtyātmasu pañcasu pañcamo nārāyaṇākhyo mūrtyātmā uta mūrtyātmātītaḥ parameśvara iti
tayormadhye kasya viśvapatitvādikaṃ yuktamityanavadhāraṇātsaṃśayamāha—<pratika>mahopaniṣadītyādinā</pratika> ।
yadyapi nārāyaṇastatra viśvapatitvādidharmaiḥ pratipādya iti spaṣṭameva । tathāpi nārāyaṇaḥ svakī-
yaistaiḥ pratipādyaḥ uta parameśvarābhedadṛṣṭyavalambanaistadīyairiti saṃśayārtho draṣṭavyaḥ । atraivaṃ
pūrvapakṣaḥ । śrutireva bhagavatī viśvapatitvādidharmeṣu pramāṇam । śrutiśca <quote>‘patiṃ viśvasye’</quote>tyādi-
nā nārāyaṇasya tānpratipādayati । atra hi nārāyaṇamuddiśya viśvapatitvādayo'bhidhīyante ।
dvitīyānāṃ <quote>‘yenāvṛtaṃ svaṃ ca divaṃ mahīṃ ce’</quote>tyādāviva prathamārthatvā<quote>‘ttatvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ’</quote><quote>‘vyā-
pya nārāyaṇaḥ sthita’</quote>ityādiprathamāntasāmānādhikaraṇyāt । na ca prathamānāmeva <quote>‘bhūyassṛṣṭvā
patayastatheśa’</quote>ityādāviva dvitīyārthatvaṃ kalpyatāmiti vācyam। prathamāntatve vinaiva kriyādhyā-
hāramuddeśyavidheyabhāvenānvayopapatteḥ । dvitīyāntatve <quote>‘upāsīte’</quote>ti kriyādhyāhāraprasaṅgāt ।
yadyapi rudrādhyāye rudrasyāpi viśvapatitvādikaṃ śrutaṃ tathāpi tasya namaskārairiṣṭāniṣṭaprāptini-
vṛttiprārthanāliṅgaisstutiparatvāvasāyāt । stutiparavākyebhyastatvaparavākyasya prabalattvāttadanu-
sāreṇa viśvapatitvādikaṃ nārāyaṇasyāsādhāraṇadharma ityabhyupagantavyam । naca nārāyaṇānuvāka-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyāma</head>
<head>atha sarvatraprasiddhādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। sarvatra prasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।। vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prakṛtatvātkratuvākye manomayatvādidharmako jīvaḥ । sa vitathasaṃkalpo'pi syātsati vastunyasaṃkalpaḥ ।। 33 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>brahmāvaruddhamāsīdupāsanamupakramāmnātam । tadga‍uṇasamarpaṇapare vākye jīvaḥ kathaṃ praviśet ।। 34 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvatraprasiddhādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="319"/>
<p>viśvapatitvādinā liṅgena pratipādyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu---nārāya-
ṇātmā maheśvara iti । kutaḥ? viśvapatitvādīnāṃ parameśvaradharmāṇāṃ tadarthāntare nārā-
yaṇe'nupapatteḥ ।<quote>‘paśūnāṃ pataye’</quote><quote>‘vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye’</quote><quote>‘jagatāṃ pataye’</quote>(tai.saṃ.4.5.)ityādinā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
syānyaparatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ śakyam । nārāyaṇanāmābhyāsenācyutānantaharināmanirdeśena samudraśāyi-
tvaliṅgena cāvagamitasya tatparatvasyāvicalatvāt । tasmāddevatāntareṣu viśvapatitvādiśravaṇaṃ
paricchinnakatipayaiśvaryādiparatayā yojanīyam । ata eva lokākṣigṛhye kṛcchrāṅgahomamantre<quote>‘ṣvagna-
ye pṛthivyadhipataye svāhe’</quote>tyārabhya <quote>‘brahmaṇe lokādhipataye svāhe’</quote>tyantairekādaśabhirmantrairagniso-
mavāyusūryendrayamavaruṇakuberamahāsenarudrabrahmaṇāṃ pṛthivīnakṣatrāntarikṣadyusurapretasalilayakṣasenā-
bhūtalokeṣvekaikasminnādhipatyamutk‍vā <quote>‘viṣṇave sarvādhipataye svāhe’</quote>timantreṇa nārāyaṇasya sarvā-
dhipatyamuktam । tasmādiha nārāyaṇa eva viśvapatitvādidharmairnirdiśyata iti । atrāyaṃ si-
ddhāntaḥ । nārāyaṇasyātmabhūtaḥ parameśvara eva viśvapatitvādidharmaśālī na tu mūrtyātmā nārā-
yaṇaḥ । sa tu tadabhedabhāvanābhyāsadārḍhyena tadabhedamāpannastaddharmairvyapadiśyate na svakīyaiḥ ।
tatra viśvapatitvādyanupapatteḥ । rudrādhyāye hi parameśvarasya prapañcāntargataikaikavastvādhipatyaprada-
rśanena sarvādhipatyaṃ sthirīkriyate । tasya na tāvannamaskārayogena daurbalyam । tadyogo hi na-
maskāryamahimasamarpakāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmarthavivakṣāmevopodbalayati natvarthavivakṣāṃ vārayati ।<quote>‘na-
maskṛtya hi vasīyāṃsamupacarantī’</quote>ti śrutau<quote>‘sarvaṃ rudreti vai prāhurmunayastattvadarśinaḥ । namaskāreṇa
sahitaṃ gauravātparameṣṭhinaḥ ।।’</quote> iti । <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote>ityādimantratātparyakathanārthalaiṅgapurāṇavacane
ca namaskārasya viṣayotkarṣaprayuktatvapratipādanāt namaskāryotkarṣagaveṣaṇe śrutaviśeṣaṇasamarpito-
tkarṣamapahāyotkarṣāntaraparigrahāyogāt । tathā ca rudrādhyāyagatenānitarasādhāraṇena namaskā-
rabhūyastvena namaskāryasya sarvotkarṣassiddha‍yannamaskāraghaṭitatattanmantragatanamaskāryaviśeṣaṇasama-
rpitasarvādhipatyādirūpa eva siddha‍yati । prārthanāyāḥ stutiliṅgena daurbalyaṃ bhavadapi yatra mantre
sā dṛśyate tatraiva bhavet nānyatrāpi । anyathā puruṣasūktaikavākyatāpannottaranārāyaṇāvasānaga-
tena prārthanāliṅgena sūktadvayasyāpi stutiparatvaṃ prasajyate । tasmādrudrādhyāye'pi yeṣuyeṣu ma-
ntreṣu prārthanā dṛśyate tadgataprārthanīyaviśeṣaṇānāṃ stāvakatvakalpane'pi nānyatra tatkalpanāva-
kāśaḥ । tathāpi nārāyaṇamuddiśya viśvapatitvādividhānaidaṃparyeṇa pravṛttaṃ vākyaṃ namaskārapara-
vākyebhyastādarthyena viśvapatitvādisamarpakebhyaḥ prabalamiti cenna । <quote>‘patiṃ viśvasye’</quote>tyāderapi
tadvidhānaidaṃparyāsiddheḥ । dvitīyāntānāṃ <quote>‘tadviśvamupajīvatī’</quote>ti śrutasakarmakakriyānvaye sambha-
vati dvitīyārthaprahāṇāyogāt । <quote>‘anantamavyayaṃ kaviṃ samudre'ntaṃ viśvaśambhuva’</quote>miti dvitī-
yāntapadānāṃ <quote>‘yasya yenārthasambandha’</quote> iti nyāyena prathamāntapadebhyaḥ prācīnayā kriyayānvayo-
papatteḥ prathamāntānāṃ bhinnavākyatvopapatteḥ sarvatra prathamārthakalpane bahudhā vākyabhedasyāśraya-
ṇīyatvāt dvitīyānteṣu tadarthātyāge prathamāntapadaghaṭitamantrayoreva tadāśrayaṇena lāghavāt ।
api ca śvetāśvataropaniṣadi <quote>‘eko hi rudra’</quote> iti mantre śivavyatiriktasya jagadīśvaratvaṃ ni-
ṣidhyate । tasya hyayamarthaḥ । eka eva rudraḥ na tatra dvitīyastiṣṭhati । kiṃ sarvātmanā niṣi-
dhyate । na । ya imām̐llokānīśanībhiśśaktibhiriṣṭe tādṛgdvitīyo niṣidhyata iti । śvetāśva-
<pb n="320"/>
tara eva <quote>‘yo devānā’</quote>miti mantre tasya viśvādhikatvaṃ ca śrūyate । tadviśvapatitvaliṅgam । ta-
danyasya viśvapatitve tasya tadadhikatvāsiddheḥ । yadyapyatra prārthanārūpaṃ stutiliṅgaṃ dṛśyate tathā-
pyatra yacchabdayogenānūdyamānasya viśvādhikatvasya prāpakapramāṇasāpekṣatvāttatraiva śvetāśvatare
śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘tamīśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paramaṃ ca daivatam । patiṃ patīnāṃ paramaṃ pa-
rastādvidāma devaṃ bhuvaneśamīḍyam । na tasya kaścitpatirasti loke na ceśitā naiva ca tasya
liṅgam । sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipa’</quote> ityādikaṃ śabda-
to'rthataśca tatprāpakaṃ pramāṇamiti tato nirvivādaviśvādhikatvasiddhiranusandheyā । <quote>‘nanvagnirvai
devānāmavamo viṣṇuḥ paramaḥ tadantareṇa sarvā anyā devatā’</quote>iti bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe viṣṇossarvade-
vatotkarṣaśśrūyata iti cenmaivam । āgnāvaiṣṇavapuroḍāśārthavādasyāsya <quote>‘agnirmukhaṃ prathamo deva-
tānā’</quote> <quote>‘magniretu prathamo devatānā’</quote> <quote>‘magnissarvā devatā’</quote> <quote>‘agnimukhā vai devāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘rājānau vā etau
devatānāṃ yadagnīṣomā’</quote>vityādiśrutibhi<quote>‘ryathāgnirdevatānāṃ syādṛtūnāṃ kusumākaraḥ । dvipadāṃ
brāhmaṇaśśreṣṭha’</quote> ityādismṛtibhiḥ <quote>‘hutāśanapurogamā’</quote> ityādiviṣṇupurāṇādiliṅgaiścāgnerutkarṣa-
pratītessarvadevatānyūnatvāyogenāgniravama ityaṃśe kāṃściddevatāviśeṣānpratyagneravamatvaparatayā sa-
ṅkucitārthatvasyāsadālambanārthavādatvarūpasya vaktavyatayā tatsamabhivyāhṛte <quote>‘viṣṇuḥ parama’</quote>ityaṃ-
śe'pi tathā tasyocitatvāt । yattvimamarthavādamavalambya <quote>‘grahaṇārthaṃ ca pūrvamiṣṭestadarthatvā’</quote>-
diti <ref>(jai॰)</ref> pūrvatantrādhikaraṇe siddhāntavarṇanaṃ tadavivakṣitārthaṃ kañcidarthavādamavalambya pravṛtte
pūrvapakṣe tathābhūtamevārthavādāntaramavalambya tannirākaraṇārtha <quote>‘mahṛdayavācāmahṛdayā eva prati-
vāco bhavantī’</quote>ti nyāyena pravṛttaṃ kṛtvācintārūpamiti tatraivādhikaraṇe vyaktam । etena
<quote>‘viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ । na kirindra tvaduttara’</quote>ityādimantreṣvindrādīnāmapi viśvottaratvaṃ dṛ-
śyata ityapi śaṅkā nirastā । karmavidhistāvakārthavādavat karmānvayipadārthasmṛtyarthānāṃ mantrā
ṇāmapyanyaparatvāviśeṣeṇānanyaparavedāntapratipannārthaviruddhārthasamarpaṇākṣamatvātkarmānvayipadārthe
ṣvasamarthānāmata evānūhanīyānāṃ tadviśeṣaṇānāṃ mantreṣu bahulamupalabdheśca । <quote>‘iyameva sā yā
prathamā vyauccha’</quote>dityādau iṣṭakāsu parameśvarīyadharmāropeṇa stutivadindre parameśvaradharmāropeṇa
stutisambhavācca । api cātharvaśikhāyāṃ dhyeyanirdhāraṇārthe <quote>‘dhyāyīteśāna’</quote>mityādisandarbhe
svābhāvikaniratiśayaiśvaryavānata eva sakalaphalapradānaśaktaśśivo mumukṣubhirdhyeya iti prati-
jñāya brahmādayaḥ kiṃ na tādṛśāḥ yena te tairdhyeyā na syu’rityākāṅkṣāyāṃ teṣāṃ śivādutpattiva-
rṇanena te paricchinnaiśvaryā iti sūcayitvā śivo'pi kutaścidutpannaścetso'pi tathā syādityā-

hṛtam । tadetatsarva<quote>‘mattā carācaragrahaṇā’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1—2—9sū)</ref>dityanantarādhikaraṇe sphuṭīkari-
ṣyate । tataśca brahmādīnāṃ dhyeyatvavyavacchedāyaiśvaryaparicchedadoṣamudbhāvya dhyeyatvenopadiṣṭasya
śivasya taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā niratiśayaiśvaryapratipādanaṃ saṅkucitaiśvaryaparatve anyatrodbhāvitado-
ṣaparihārālābhena saṅkocāsahiṣṇutvāt sarvalokagatyākāśānantatvapratipādanavadanyathāsiddham ।
udāhṛtamanyacca devatāntaraiśvaryapratipādanaṃ cāturmāsyaphale kṣayiṣṇunyakṣayyatvavyapadeśavat saṅku-
citārthaparaṃ netuṃ śakyamanyathāsiddham । ‘brahmādayo'pi lokānāṃ sargasthityantahetavaḥ । nigra-

parameśvara eva nikhilabhuvanādhipatyamabhyasyate । <quote>‘eko hi rudro na dvitīyāya

śrūyate । ato viśvapatitvādilakṣaṇo nārāyaṇātmā parameśvara iti samīcīnam ।।

ityādinā jīvasvarūpamuktvā <quote>‘tasyāḥ’</quote> śikhāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ’

<sutra>।। sū ।। karmakartṛvyapadeśāt ।। 4 ।।</sutra>

nirdiśyamānaḥ paramātmā prakṛto nārāyaṇa eva bhavet । na ca <quote>‘padmakośapratīkāśa’</quote> mityādinā

yajamānasya । ato nārāyaṇasyopāsakatvaparyavasānānnāyamupāsyaḥ paramātmā । kiṃ tu pūrvā-

rāyaṇaḥ para’</quote>iti nārāyaṇasyaiva prākparamātmatvenoktatvāt upāsyaparamātmavibhūtiṣu <quote>‘sa brahmā
sa śivassendra’</quote> iti śivasya parigaṇanācca । nanu, prāgupāsyatvena nirdiṣṭasyopāsanāsthānavarti-
tvapratipādanamucitam । śiva eva ca <quote>‘tasminyadantastadupāsitavya’</quote>miti pūrvānuvākavihitā-

masamarpitaśivaparyavasāyitvāt । maivam । <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ deva’</quote>mityārabhya nārāyaṇaguṇakīrtanavai-
yarthyaparihārāya tadupāsanavidheḥ kalpanīyatvena tasyāpyupāsyatvena prakṛtatvāt । etena <quote>‘padma-

hṛdayaṃ pravidhye’</quote>tyādimantrāṇāṃ hṛdayadvāreṇa na vidyāṅgatvam । tasmānnārāyaṇaguṇakīrtanasāmarthya-

iti ।</pratika> <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>ti mantreṇāpi prakṛtyadhikaraṇe vyutpādayiṣyamāṇaḥ sa evārthaḥ pra-
tipādyate । tatra hi <quote>‘viśvamevedaṃ puruṣastadviśvamupajīvatī’</quote>ti viśvasya puruṣapāratantryarūpaṃ ta-

śvopādānatvarūpaṃ puruṣāvasthādvārakamityanena mantreṇa pratipādyate । tatra <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>tya-
nenaitaducyate । śivākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma nārāyaṇaparaṃ nārāyaṇapradhānam । nārāyaṇaparatantramiti yā-

tatpāratantryamuktamiti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ jaḍopādānatāyāṃ parabrahmaṇaḥ puruṣāvasthāpattyapekṣatvamu-
ktam । cetanopādānatāyāṃ taducyate । <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparo jyotiḥ’</quote> prakāśātmakaṃ cetanopādānatā-
vasthaṃ brahmāpi nārāyaṇaparaḥ । pūrvavadvyākhyeyam । liṅgavyatyayaśchāndasaḥ । tatra heturucyate—
<quote>‘ātmā nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ’</quote> । paro nārāyaṇaḥ ātmā sarvo'pi cetanavargaḥ । tadupādānatvāditi ।
itthameva yajurvedāraṇyakabhāṣye bhaṭṭabhāskareṇāpi vyākhyāto'yaṃ mantraḥ । yattu bhāṣye <quote>‘nārāya-
ṇapara’</quote>mityasya <quote>‘nārāyaṇātpara’</quote>miti vivaraṇaṃ tadarthasiddhasya nārāyaṇabhinnatvasya prakaṭanārtham ।
tathaivārthaparigrahe tu nārāyaṇaparamityanenaivārthasiddhasyānuvādo <quote>‘nārāyaṇaḥ para’</quote> iti । brahmaṇo
nārāyaṇabhinnatve hi nārāyaṇo'pi tadbhinno bhavati । uttaranārāyaṇe <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparo jyoti-
rātme’</quote>tyekaṃ vākyam । ta<quote>‘nnārāyaṇaḥ para’</quote> iti tatsiddhārthānuvādaḥ । asminpakṣe na viśvātma-
tvopapādako'yaṃ mantraḥ kiṃ tūpāsyopāsakabhāvākṣiptapradhānopasarjanabhāvopapādaka iti vi-
<pb n="325"/>
tvādiviśiṣṭapuruṣarūpeṇa jagadupādānatvāt । parabrahmātmakasya tasya jagadākāra-
tvamiti vakṣyāmaḥ <quote>‘prakṛtiśca’</quote> <ref>(bra॰2.1.23)</ref> ityadhikaraṇe ।।
nārāyaṇasyopāsakatve pramāṇāntaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। smṛteśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
‘evamuktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ । darśayāmāsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpamai-
śvaram ।। <ref>(bha॰gī11.9)</ref> iti smṛteśca mahāyogasvāmino nārāyaṇasya parameśvaraviṣayo
yogaḥsamādhirabhivyajyate । atra, ‘ahaṃ yathāvadārādhyaḥ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā । tasmā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śeṣaḥ । nanu <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>tyasya nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahmetyevārthaḥ । vibhaktyaśravaṇaṃ tu <quote>‘supāṃ
sulu’</quote>gityādinā tallopādityabhyupagantavyam । <quote>‘ahameva paraṃ brahma paraṃ tatvaṃ pitāmaha । ahameva
paraṃ jyotiḥ paramātmā tvahaṃ vibhuḥ ।’</quote> iti liṅgapurāṇe tadupabṛṃhaṇadarśanāditi ceducyate । ayaṃ
ślokastatra mahāliṅgaprādurbhāvātpūrvaṃ brahmanārāyaṇayoḥ parasparotkarṣavivādaprastāve brahmāṇaṃ prati
nārāyaṇoktirūpaḥ । anantaraṃ tadvivādapraśamanārtho'dbha‍ūtamahāliṅgamadhyasannihitasya śivasya
vacanaiḥ <quote>‘paśyataṃ māṃ mahādevaṃ bhayaṃ sarvaṃ vimucyatām । yuvāṃ prasūtau gātrābhyāṃ mama pūrvaṃ mahā-
balau । tridhā bhinno'smyahaṃ viṣṇoḥ brahmaviṣṇubhavākhyayā । sargarakṣālayaguṇairniṣkalaḥ parame-
śvaraḥ । saṃmohaṃ tyaja viṣṇo tva’</quote>mityādibhiḥ tatraivāpoditaḥ kathamarthatattvavyavasthāpakaḥ । pratyuta
mohāvasthāvacanatvāviṣkaraṇena bhrāntigṛhītamantrārthopanyāso'yam । mantrārthastu gūḍho'nyaḥ
ityeva tadāśayaḥ spaṣṭaṃ pratibhāti । tātparyasaṅgrahe tvācāryaiḥ nārāyaṇetyetadbhinnaṃ padamiti prau-
ḍhivādenābhyupagamya nārāyaṇasya parabrahmatvādikaṃ viśvapatitvādikamivopāsyagatameva tadabhe-
dabhāvanādārḍhyasiddhamupanyastamityupapāditam । <quote>‘brahmocyate paramasau paramaṃ ca tatvaṃ jyotiḥ
paraṃ ca parameśvara padmanābhaḥ । tvadbhāvanaikarasikastvadananyabhāvānmantrī yathā garuḍabhāvanayā
garutmān ।’</quote> iti । tatrāyamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote> mityupāsyarūpasamarpake'grimānuvāke tasyāpi
parabrahmabhāvaḥ śrūyate । na cobhayossa yuktaḥ । nāpyupāsakaḥ paraṃ brahma upāsyastadanya iti
yuktam । tasmāduktaiva rītiranusartavyā । na cābhedabhāvanāsiddhā upāsyadharmā upāsakenaiva
svagatatvena varṇyante na tu taṭasthavacanairiti niyamo'sti । <quote>‘uttānā vai devagavā vahantī’</quote>tyā-
divadanyabhramasiddhasyāpyanyenānuvadituṃ yuktatvāditi ।। nārāyaṇasya hṛdayasambandhānmahājñe-
yamiti viśeṣaṇācca siddhaṃ parameśvaropāsakatvamupabṛṃhaṇena dṛḍhīkartumuttarasūtramityāha---<pratika>nārā-
yaṇasyeti ।। sū ।। smṛteśca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <pratika>abhivyajyata iti ।</pratika> mahāyogeśvara iti śrīkṛṣṇasya
yoganiṣṭhāmuktvā tatsāmarthyātpārameśvarapradarśanoktyā tadyogaḥ parameśvaraviṣaya iti jñāpyate ।
garuḍabhāvanāṃ vinā gāruḍarūpasyeva parameśvarabhāvanāṃ vinā tadīyarūpasyānyena pradarśayituma-
śakyatvāt । parameśvarabhāvanāsāmarthyādeva dadhīcenāpi tadīyaṃ rūpaṃ pradarśitamiti liṅgapurā-
ṇādiṣu dakṣadadhīcasaṃvāde pratipāditatvācceti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yo-
gamaiśvara’</quote>miti pūrvaśloke kṛṣṇasya parameśvaraviṣayo yogaḥ kaṇṭhataḥ pratipāditaḥ । tathāpi kṛ-
ṣṇena darśitaṃ rūpaṃ pārameśvaramityetadapi jñāpayitumayaṃ śloka udāhṛtaḥ । yattvāśvamedhike <quote>‘draṣṭu-
micchāmi te rūpamaiśvaraṃ tannidarśaye’</quote>tyudaṅkaprārthanāyāṃ <quote>‘tatassa tasmai prītātmā darśayāmāsa ta-
<pb n="326"/>
diṣṭatamaḥ kṛṣṇādanyo mama na vidyate ।।’</quote> iti aśvatthāmānaṃ prati parameśvaravacanaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dvapuḥ । śāśvataṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dhīmāndadṛśe yaddhanañjaya’iti tasmai kṛṣṇena pradarśite rūpe vaiṣṇavapadaṃ
tadupakramānusāreṇaiśvaraparam । nāmāṣṭakādiṣu śive'pi viṣṇunāmnaḥ prasiddheḥ । <quote>‘tadda‍ṛṣṭvā paramaṃ
rūpaṃ viṣṇorvaiṣṇavamadbha‍utam । vismayaṃ ca yayau viprastadda‍ṛṣṭvā pārameśvara’</quote>miti tadanantaraśloke
viṣṇorityanenaiva viṣṇusambandhitve siddhe vaiṣṇavamityasyaiśvaraviṣayatayaivāpaunaruktyasya vaktavya-
tvācca kṛṣṇasya parameśvaratayā darśanena vismayapradarśanācca । <quote>‘saṃharasva punardeva rūpamakṣayyamutta-
mam । punastvāṃ svena rūpeṇa draṣṭumicchāmi śāśvata’</quote>mityanantaraśloke punaḥ parigrāhye prācī-
narūpe svakīyaviśeṣaṇatvenaitasyānyadīyatvavibhāvanācca । <quote>‘ahaṃ yathāvadārādhya’</quote>iti sauṣuptike
parvaṇi aśvatthāmānaṃ prati parameśvaravacane yathāvadārādhanaṃ vivakṣitam । <quote>‘tasmādiṣṭatama’</quote>ityā-
divākyaśeṣāt । <quote>‘yathāntaropacāreṇa naraḥ strīṣu prasīdati । tathāntareṇa dhyānena prasīdati
maheśvaraḥ । bahiḥkarmakarā yadvannātīva phalabhāginaḥ । dṛṣṭā narendrabhavane tadvadatrāpi karmiṇaḥ ।
hiṃsādoṣavinirmukto viśuddhaścittasādhanaiḥ । dhyānayajñaḥ parastasmādapavargaphalapradaḥ ।’</quote> ityādi-
vacanairupāsakasyaivātyantaṃ parameśvaraprasādaviṣayatvāvagamādityetadabhiprāyeṇaitadapi vacanamudāhṛ-
tam । yadyapi <quote>‘devadevastvacintyātmā ajayyo viṣṇuravyayaḥ । sarvarūpaṃ bhavaṃ jñātvā liṅge'rca-
yati taṃ prabhum । tasminnabhyadhikāṃ prītiṃ karoti vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ ।’</quote> ityādibhirdroṇaparvādivacanai-
rnārāyaṇasya bāhyā parameśvarārcā tataḥ parameśvarasya tasminnadhikā prītiśca pratipannā । ihāpi
<quote>‘satyaśaucārjavatyāgaistapasā niyamena ca । kṣāntyā bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca karmaṇā manasā gire’</quote>-
ti pūrvaślokānurodhātkāyikārcanādirūpamapi yathāvatsamārādhanamiha vivakṣitamiti pratīyate ।
<quote>‘tasmādiṣṭatamo'nyo nāstī’</quote>tivākyaśeṣāvagatātyantaśivaprītikaratvaliṅgāt tadārādhanamiha
mahāyogarūpaṃ mānasameva pradhānaṃ vivakṣitam । kāyikādikaṃ tu tadaṅgatayetyavasīyata iti
bhāvaḥ ।। nanūttarasūtreṇodbhāvya nirākriyamāṇā parameśvare'lpaukastvānupapattiśaṅkā na pūrvapa-
kṣiṇassaṅgacchate । <quote>‘tasyāśśikhāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthita’</quote>iti nirdiśyamāna upāsyo
nārāyaṇaḥ na tu parameśvara iti pūrvapakṣaśaṅkānirākaraṇaṃ hi karmakartṛvyapadeśasūtramārabhya prastu-
tam । alpaukastvānupapattiśaṅkā ca parameśvara iva jagadupādānatayā vyāpini nārāyaṇe'pi
tulyā । ataśśaṅkāvakāśābhāvāduttarasūtrasya tannirākaraṇārthatvamanupapannamityāśaṅkyāvatāra-
yati-<pratika>punariti ।</pratika> ayamāśayaḥ । alpaukastvādayamupāsyaḥ paramātmā na vyāpī parameśvaraḥ kiṃ
tu jīvaviśeṣaḥ kaściditīha śaṅkā na tu sarvajagadupādānabhūto nārāyaṇa iti śaṅkā । iha
jīva upāsya iti śaṅkāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅga iti cet ya eva nārāyaṇa upāsya iti śaṅkāyāḥ
prasaṅgaḥ saḥ । na hyatra nārāyaṇa upāsyaḥ paramātmeti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ । kiṃ tu <quote>‘patiṃ viśva-
sye’</quote>tyādau nārāyaṇaḥ svakīyaireva viśvapatitvādibhiḥ pratipādyaḥ na tūpāsyaparamātmābhedabhā-
vanāprāptaistadīyairityevaṃrūpaḥ । tadupayogitayā paranārāyaṇa upāsyaḥ paramātmā na tu śivaḥ
yenopāsyaśivābhedabhāvanāsiddhaistadīyairviśvapatitvādibhirnārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyo bhavediti śaṅkā
karmakartṛsūtramārabhya nirākṛtā । iha tu sūtre jīvarūpaḥ kaściddevatāviśeṣa upāsyaḥ paramātmā ।
aṇīyasastasyālpaukastvopapatteḥ । tathā ca na tadupāsakaścicchaktyavasthārūpo nārāyaṇaḥ ।

ca । tasmādanyannārāyaṇādupāsyaṃ paraṃ brahma ।। punaranupapattimāśaṅkyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। arbhakaukastvāttadva‍yapadeśācca neti cenna ni-

<quote>‘nīvāraśūkavattanvī pītā bhāsvatyaṇūpamā । tasyāḥ śikhāyā madhye paramātmā
vyavasthitaḥ ।।’</quote> iti svalpavahniśikhāntarvartitayā svalpāśrayatvādalpatvavyapade-

sya vyomnastadupādhivaśādalpatvaṃ svarūpato mahattvaṃ ca । tato na virodhaḥ ।।
punarāśaṅkya pariharati---</p>
<sutra>।। sū ।। saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<p>yaduktaṃ <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma’</quote> iti nārāyaṇāt paraṃ tadupāsyaṃ brahma, tadeva
hi <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam । ūrdhvaretaṃ virūpākṣam’</quote> ityucyate ।
tatra paramaśaktyumāśabalākāratayā kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ kṛśānuretaskatayā cordhvareta-
skaṃ, trilocanatayā virūpākṣaṃ, puri pūrvoktadaharapuṇḍarīke śeta iti puruṣaṃ, ṛtaṃ
satyaṃ manovāgviparyāsarahitaṃ paraṃ brahma iti lakṣaṇam । ato'sya trilocanatvādilakṣa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nāpi viśvapatitvādayastasya santi dharmāḥ । yena tadabhedabhāvanāsiddhaistairnārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyo
bhavediti śaṅkā nirākriyata iti <pratika>।। sū ।। arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyya-
tvādevaṃ vyomavacca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> arbhakaśabdo'lpatvalakṣakaḥ । oko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkāvacchinnava-
hniśikhārūpaṃ paramātmana upāsanāsthānamalpamiti vastusvabhāvādavagamyate । <quote>‘nīvāraśūkavatta-
nvī’</quote>tyalpatvavyapadeśādapyavagamyate । ato'lpasthānatvānnāyaṃ paramātmā vyāpī parameśvaraḥ
kiṃ tu kaścijjīvarūpo devatāviśeṣa iti śaṅkābhāgasyārthamāha---<pratika>nīvāreti ।</pratika> upāsye pūrvānuvāka-
śrutairīśarudramahādevamaheśvaranāmabhiruttarānuvāka śrutena virūpākṣatvādiviśiṣṭavigraheṇa <quote>‘paraṃ brahme’</quote>
ti śravaṇena cāvagamyamānasya parameśvarabhāvasyāvicalatvādalpasthānatvaśravaṇamevālpasthānatayā
dhyeyatvābhiprāyeṇa netavyam । tathā ca dhyānārthenālpasthānatvenāvirodhāt ākāśavatsarvagata
eva parameśvara iti parihārabhāgasyārthaṃ darśayati---<pratika>nityādinā</pratika> । nanūttarasūtreṇa parameśvarasya
śarīritvaprayuktadoṣa nirākaraṇaṃ kriyate । pūrvamantarādityavidyādhikaraṇe tannirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam ।
agre'pi guhādhikaraṇe bhokrāpattyadhikaraṇe ca kariṣyate । ato nātra tacchaṅkāvakāśo'stītyā-
śaṅkyāvatārayati---<pratika>punariti</pratika> । ihādhikaraṇe parameśvarasyāsādhāraṇavigrahaviśeṣeṇa śarīritva-
prayuktadoṣaśaṅkā tadīyavigrahasyetaraśarīravilakṣaṇatvasamarthanena nirākriyate । guhādhikaraṇe tasyā-
smadādiśarīrānupraveśena śarīritvaprayuktā doṣaśaṅkā śrutibalena nirākariṣyate । bhoktrāpattyadhi-
karaṇe sakalacidaciccharīrakatvaprayuktā sā lokadṛṣṭāntabalena nirākariṣyate । antarāditya-
vidyādhikaraṇe tu vakṣyamāṇanyāyāvaṣṭambhena bhāṣyamātre tannirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam । na tatsūtrārūḍhamato
nāsya sūtrasya vaiyarthyamityāśayaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। sambhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika>
<pratika>ato'sya trilocanatvādīti ।</pratika> <quote>‘na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirastī’</quote>ti
<pb n="328"/>
ṇaśarīrasaṃbandhāt śarīragatasukhaduḥkhādisaṃbhogaprāptiriti cet---na, vaiśeṣyāt ।
sukhaduḥkhabhogahetubhyo jīvaśarīrebhyo brahmarūpasyāsti hi vaiśeṣyam; icchāgṛhī-
tatvādasya, teṣāṃ karmamūlatvācca । ata eva śrūyate parameśvaraḥ <quote>‘apahatapāpmā
vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ’</quote> i-
ti saṃsāriśarīradharmarahitatvena । na caivaṃ saṃsārī jīvaḥ । ata evāprākṛtāni
pāpajarāmaraṇaśokādirahitāni svecchāsaṃpāditāni līlāmaṅgalarūpāṇi parame-
śvarasya <quote>‘sthirebhiraṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugraḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu sthirāṇi nityāni vijñāyante ।
ataḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasya jīvādvaiśeṣyānna tadvaccharīrādigatadoṣāpattiḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śruteḥ saśarīratve sukhaduḥkhādikamavarjanīyam । ato nāyamupāsyaḥ paramātmā parameśvaraḥ । kiṃtu
lokapālarudravatkaścana rudraviśeṣa ityabhyupagantavyamiti bhāvaḥ । tadabhiprāyeṇaiva pūrvasūtranirākara-
ṇīyāpi śaṅkā sā tatreśamaheśvaraśrutibhyāṃ tatsamabhivyāhṛtatayā sarvadevaprathamahiraṇyagarbhasraṣṭṭavi
ṣayatayā saṃsārarugdrāvakatvapravṛttinimittayā rudraśrutyā'grimānuvākaśrutasya vigrahasya pārameśvara-
tpaprasiddha‍yā brahmaśrutyā ca nirākṛtā । iha tu parameśvarasya duḥkhādiprasaṅgānnāsti svato vigrahaḥ ।
kadācidvirūpākṣatvādiviśiṣṭeṣu rudraviśeṣāṇāṃ vigraheṣvāvirbhāvasattvāt tathābhūtavigrahatvavyapa-
deśaḥ । ata eva <quote>‘sthāne saṃśayituṃ viprā’</quote>iti vāyusaṃhitādhyāye sadāśivādivigraheṣveva tasyāvirbhāva
uktaḥ । ato'tra kaścana rudraviśeṣa evoktarūpavigrahābhimānyatropāsyaḥ pratipādyate । tatra kādā-
citkaparameśvarāveśasadbhāvamātreṇopacārāttasminparameśvaranāmādiśravaṇamiti śaṅkā । parameśvara-
sya vigrahavattve doṣāprasakteḥ । kaivalyopaniṣadādiṣu tadīyadivyavigrahaprasiddhernātra tadīyaśruti-
liṅgānāṃ kliṣṭagatyānyatra nayanaṃ kāryam । vāyusaṃhitāyāṃ sadāśivādivigraheṣveva tasyāvirbhāva
iti pratipādanaṃ tadvatprākṛto vigrahastasyāsādhāraṇo nāstītyevamarthaṃ na tu vigrahamātranirāsārtham ।
tasyāssaṃhitāyā upakrama eva <quote>‘aprākṛtavapuḥ śrīmān lakṣyalakṣaṇavarjita’</quote>ityādiśravaṇāttaduttara-
bhāge tadasādhāraṇasāmbavigrahavarṇanadarśanāccetyevamatra nirākriyata iti viśeṣaḥ । parameśvaravigraha-
syāprākṛtatvenāsmadādiśarīrebhyo viśeṣānna tadvattvena sukhaduḥkhadoṣaprasaṅga iti parihārābhiprāya-
māha---<pratika>netyādinā ।</pratika> vaiśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaḥ । svārthe ṣyañ । vaiśeṣyādityasyāsmadādibhyaḥ parameśvarasya
śaktiviśeṣavattvarūpavailakṣaṇyaparatvenārthāntaramāha---<pratika>ataḥ parabrahmaṇa iti ।</pratika> nanvevamasyā
daharavidyāyāḥ parameśvara upāsya iti nirṇayo'nupapannaḥ । nārāyaṇasyaiva tadupāsyatvāt । tasyaiva
hi nārāyaṇānuvāke bhūyānmahimā varṇitaḥ । na ca vācyaṃ pūrvānuvāke <quote>‘tasminyadantastadupāsi-
tavya’</quote> mityupāsanāvidhiḥ śrūyate । tatraiva copāsanāphalaṃ śrūyate <quote>‘parāmṛtātparimucyanti sarva’</quote> iti ।
tatra copāsyaparasya yatpadasya <quote>‘yo devānāṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yadvedādā’</quote>viti pūrvottaramantraprayuktarudramaheśvaraśabda-
nirdiṣṭe parameśvare paryavasānaṃ syāt । ata utpattiśiṣṭopāsyāntarāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāṃ nārā-
yaṇasyo pāsyatvenānvayāsambhavātpariśeṣādupāsakatvenaivānvayaḥ syāditi । utpattiśiṣṭaguṇā-
ntarāvarodhāsiddheḥudāhṛtapūrvāparamantrayorapi nārāyaṇaparatvāt । tathā hi <quote>‘yo devānā’</quote> mityādinā
hiraṇyagarbhakāraṇatvānuvādo <quote>‘nārāyaṇādbrahmā jāyata’</quote>ityādipurovādānusāreṇa nārāyaṇaviṣaya
iti rudrapadasya tasminneva kathaṃcidva‍ṛttiḥ kalpanīyā । <quote>‘yadvedādā’</quote>viti mantrasyāyamarthaḥ ।
<pb n="329"/>
atra khalūpakramādibhirliṅgairvirūpākṣaṃ brahma sarvotkṛṣṭamupāsyamiti yuktameva । tathā hi
upakrame---<quote>‘aṇoraṇīyān’</quote> <ref>(ṛ. saṃ. 2.7.17)</ref> ityādinā <quote>‘mahimānamīśam’</quote>
<ref>(mahānā.10.)</ref> ityantena sakalajantuhṛdayaguhāvartitvena svaprasādātiśayavīta-
śokapuruṣadarśanaviṣayatvena ca mahimātiśayavānīśaḥ prastutaḥ । punaḥ <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ
prabhavanti tasmāt’</quote> <ref>(mahānā. 10.)</ref> ityādinā sa eva paramaśaktimān prāṇā-
dijagadupādānatvena nirūpitaḥ । tataśca, <quote>‘yo devānāṃ prathamaṃ purastādviśvādhiko
rudro maharṣiḥ । hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote> <ref>(mahānā. 10)</ref> iti viśvādhika-
tvena sarvajñatvena sakalakāryaprathamahiraṇyagarbhajanakatvena ca nimittabhūtaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘praṇavādyā mune vedāḥ praṇave paryavasthitā’</quote>iti smṛtervedānāmutpattilayasthānatayā tadādyantayoḥ
‘pratiṣṭhitaḥ svaraḥ oṃkāraḥ । tasya prakṛtirakāraḥ । <quote>‘akāro vai sarvā vā’</quote>gityakārasya sarvavākpra-
kṛtitvaśravaṇāt । tasminsvaprakṛtāvakāre līnasyākārātmatāṃ prāptasya tasyoṅkārasya yaḥ paro
vācyaḥ । <quote>‘idaṃparaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘tatpara’</quote> ityādau vācye parapadaprayogadarśanāt । sa maheśvaraḥ । itthaṃ sarvaśabda-
jālaprakṛtitayā nikhilavācakotkṛṣṭākāravācyasya nikhilavācyotkarṣo yukta ityaucitīmava-
lambyākāravācyasya sarveśvaratvapratipādako'yaṃ mantro nārāyaṇapara eva paryavasyati । ata evāgre
<quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ deva’</quote> mityārabhya nārāyaṇasyaiva mahimavarṇanaṃ dṛśyate । tasmādatra parameśvarasyopāsya-
tvanirṇayo na yukta ityāśaṅkāṃ manasi nidhāyopakramādibhistathā nirṇayasya yuktatvamupapādayitu-
mupakramate---<pratika>atra khalviti</pratika> । upakramasya tāvadīśaśrutyā parameśvaraviṣayatvamupapādayati---
<pratika>upakrama iti ।</pratika> anantarasandarbhasyāpi tameva parameśvaramīśaśabdenopakrāntaṃ sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya
pravṛttatvānnānyaviṣayatvaśaṅkāvakāśa ityāha---<pratika>punariti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yo devānā’</quote>mati mantrasya tu spaṣṭaṃ
parameśvaraviṣayatvamityāha---<pratika>tataśceti ।</pratika> <quote>‘nimittabhūtaḥ parāmṛṣṭa’</quote> ityasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ ।
yacchabdayogenānuvādyatayā pratīyamānasyāpi hiraṇyagarbhajanayitṛtvasya <quote>‘nārāyaṇādbrahmā jāya-
ta’</quote>iti na purovādaḥ । ihānūdyamānasya rudraśabdavācyaparameśvaragatahiraṇyagarbhajanayitṛtvasya
tataḥ prāptyabhāvāt । na hyanūdyamānārthaprāpakasya purovādatvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam । tathā sati
<quote>‘yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo’</quote> <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvānsāmnā stuvīte’</quote>tyādīnāmapi yatkiñcitpurovādakalpanayā
tadanuvādakatvābhyupagamāpatteḥ । nārāyaṇe rudrapadasya lakṣaṇayā <quote>‘nārāyaṇādbrahmā jāyate’</quote> ityasya
prāpakatvamupapadyata iti cenna । anyonyāśrayāpatteḥ । rudraśabdasya nārāyaṇe lakṣaṇāsiddhau hi
tasya prāpakatopapattyā'sya tadanuvādatvaṃ sidhdyati siddhe ca tadanuvādatve lakṣaṇākalpanamiti ।
tasmādanuguṇapurovādāsambhave'sya <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvān sāmnā stuvīte’</quote>tivadananuvādakatvameva
bhavet । sambhavati cāsyānuguṇapurovādaḥ ‘brahmaviṣṇurudrendrāste samprasūyanta ‘ityādiḥ ।
yadi tu dvayorhiraṇyagarbhakāraṇatvaṃ na sambhavet tadā rudraśabdasya vā nārāyaṇe lakṣaṇā
kalpyeta । nārāyaṇaśabdasya vā parameśvare । sambhavati tu dvayorapi tatkāraṇatvaṃ nimi-
ttopādānabhāveneti । etadabhiprāyeṇaiva etadadhikaraṇārambhabhāṣye'pi <quote>‘hiraṇyagarbhopādānasye’</quote>ti
nārāyaṇo viśeṣitaḥ । yo <quote>‘devānā’</quote>miti mantrānantaramāmnāto <quote>‘yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñci’</quote>-
diti mantraḥ । tasya śivaviṣayatvaṃ ‘yasmātparataraṃ nāsti nāparaṃ ca parātmanaḥ । na jyāyo'sti na
<pb n="330"/>
sa eva tataḥ <quote>‘pareṇa nākam’</quote>(mahānā 10) iti parākāśaguhāvartī tyaktaphalakamonu-
ṣṭhāyināṃ vedāntatātparyavedināṃ yatīnāṃ jitendriyāṇāṃ <quote>‘parāmṛtātparimucyanti’</quote>
<ref>(mahānā. 10.)</ref> iti parāmṛtarūpatayā prāpyatvena varṇitaḥ । kastatprāptāvupāya
iti prāpte <quote>‘daharaṃ vipāpmam’</quote> <ref>(mahānā. 10)</ref> iti daharopāsanamārabdham ।
tatra <quote>‘tasmin yadantastadupāsitavyam’</quote> <ref>(mahānā 10.)</ref> iti daharapuṇḍa-
rīke yadvastu tadupāsyamiti sāmānyenoktam । tat kimityākāṅkṣāyāṃ,
<quote>‘yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvaraḥ’</quote> <ref>(mahānā 10.)</ref> iti maheśvarākhyaṃ tadupavarṇitam ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cāṇīyo namastasmai svayaṃbhuve । yenedamakhilaṃ vyāptaṃ yanmayā mūrtayaḥ smṛtāḥ । tasmai śivāya mahate
namaḥ sūkṣmākṣarātmana’ ityāśvalāyane spaṣṭīkṛtam । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena’</quote>
<quote>‘vedāntavijñānasuniśritārthā’</quote>iti mantradvayamāmnāyate । tadvarṇitaparameśvaraprāptyupāyatadupāsa-
nāvidhyākāṅkṣānukūlatayā parameśvaraprāptermahāphalatvapratipādakamiti darśayati---<pratika>sa eveti ।</pratika>
nākassukhaikarūpaṃ paramākāśātmakamumāpaterādyaṃ sthānam । taṃ pareṇa tasyopari bhūmau yā guhā parameśva-
rasya divyamandiraṃ tatra nihitaṃ sannihitamiti prāpteḥ sthānamuktaṃ pūrvamantre । tasya sthānasya mukta-
prāpyatvamuttaramantreṇa vivṛtam । tatra <quote>‘sanyāsayogādyatayaśśuddhasatvā’</quote>ityasya vivaraṇaṃ---tyakta-
<pratika>phalakarmānuṣṭhāyināmiti ।</pratika> yatiśabdo'tra na caturthāśramaparaḥ । gṛhassthādīnāmapyupāsanādhi-
kārāt । kiṃ tu <quote>‘ye nirjitendriyagrāmā yatino yatayaśca ta’</quote> iti kośadarśanāt jitendriya-
mātrapara ityāha---<pratika>yatīnāmiti ।</pratika> parāmṛtaśabdo nityamuktasya parameś‍varasya vācakaḥ । tasmā-
llyablope pañcamītyabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>prāpyatvena varṇita iti । maheśvarākhyaṃ tadupava-
rṇitamiti ।</pratika> atrāyamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘yadvedādā’</quote>viti mantrasya na tāvadupakramānurodhena nārāyaṇa-
viṣayatayārthavarṇanam । īśarudrāmṛta śrutibhistasya śivaviṣayatvena vyavasthitatvāt । nāpyupasaṃhārā-
nurodhena । <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote> mityupasaṃhārasyāpi virūpākṣaśrutyādibhistathātvāt । nāpi <quote>‘saha-
sraśīrṣaṃ deva’</quote>mityādyagrimasandarbhānurodhena । tasyopakramopasaṃhāraikarūpyāvagataśivaviṣayatvānu-
rodhenotpattiśiṣṭopāsyāvarodhena ca pariśeṣāt <quote>‘padmakośapratīkāśa’</quote>mityādiliṅgāt <quote>‘mahājñeya’</quote>
miti viśeṣaṇasāmarthyāccopāsakaviṣayatvaparyavasānāt । nāpyasminneva mantre vidheyānurodhena । <quote>‘yaḥ
paraḥ sa maheśvara’</quote> iti vidheyasamarpakasya maheśvarapadasya śrutismṛtyabhidhānakośalokaprasiddhibhiḥ
śivāsādhāraṇatvāt । nāpyanuvādānurodhena । anuvādyabhāgasya vidhāntareṇāpyarthotprekṣaṇasa-
mbhavenāvyavasthitārthatvāt । tathā hi <quote>‘agnimīḻe purohitaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yonissamudro bandhuḥ’</quote> <quote>‘samānaṃ
vara’</quote>mityeṣu śrutānāmakārokāramakārāṇāṃ vedādimadhyāntavarṇatvaprasiddherakāro vedādau proktaḥ
svaraḥ sa eva tadante pratiṣṭhitaḥ <quote>‘samānaṃ para’</quote>mityatropāntyaḥ । tataḥ paraṃ svarābhāvena tasyaivā-
ntyasvaratvāt । tasya prakṛtilīnasya । prakṛtirviṣṇuḥ । <quote>‘vāsudevaḥ parā prakṛti’</quote>riti śravaṇā-
t । tasmin līnasya vācyavācakabhāvenābhedaṃ prāptasya <quote>‘vācyavācakaryorbhedo nātyantaṃ vidyate
kvacidi’</quote>ti vāyūkteḥ । tasya vedāntyabhāgapāṭhagamitābhyarhitabhāvākāravācyasya prakṛtirūpasya
viṣṇoḥ । paraḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ । <quote>‘prakṛtistvaṃ pumānrudrastvayi tadvīryamāhitam । tvannābhipaṅkajā-
jjātaḥ pañcavakraḥ pitāmaha’</quote>ityādiṣu viṣṇurūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ prati puruṣatvena <quote>‘prasiddhassa maheśvara’</quote>iti
/?/nmantrārtha utprekṣituṃ śakyate । athavāsya mantrasya yajurvedapaṭhitatvāt vedo'tra yajurvedaḥ ।
<pb n="331"/>
tat kiṃrūpamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satyam’</quote> (mahānā 10.) ityādinā virūpā-
kṣatvādilakṣaṇarūpamityupasaṃhṛtam । tatrāvāntaravākyasiddho nārāyaṇaḥ pūrvā-
dhikaraṇanyāyādupāsakatvenānvetīti yuktam । atra sarveṣāmupāsane'-
dhikārasya sadbhāve'pi nārāyaṇagrahaṇamasyādhikyārtham । tadihopāsyena
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tasyādau paṭhitaḥ svara ikāraḥ <quote>‘iṣetve’</quote>ti । sa eva tadante'pi pratiṣṭhitaḥ <quote>‘eva tapatī’</quote>ti । prakṛ-
tirlakṣmīḥ । <quote>‘tatra śrīrabhavaddevī kamalāyatalocane’</quote>tyupakramya <quote>‘mūlaprakṛtiravyaye’</quote>ti kaurme prayo-
gāttasyāṃ vācyavācakabhāvena lagnasya dīrghabhāvaṃ prāptasyeti yāvat । īkārasya lakṣmīvācakatvāt
tasya yaḥ paraḥ । pañcamīviṣaye ṣaṣṭhī । tasmādya uttaro varṇaḥ sa maheśvaraḥ । ukāravācyo ma-
heśvara ityuktaṃ bhavati । ityutprekṣituṃ śakyate । akāravācyo maheśvara iti tadarthotprekṣāyā-
mapi śiva eva tadartha ityapi vaktuṃ śakyate । praṇavasya hyakāro na prakṛtiḥ <quote>‘akāro vai sarvā
vā’</quote> giti śrute<quote>‘roṅkāreṇa sarvā vāksantṛṇṇe’</quote>tivatstāvakatvāt । kiṃ tu <quote>‘mātrāmātrāḥ pratimātrāḥ
kṛtve’</quote>ti tāpanīya śrutau uttarottaramātrāṇāṃ pūrvapūrvamātrālayasthānatvapratipādanāt <quote>‘yāvasāne ca-
turthyardhamātre’</quote>ti vyapadiṣṭaḥ praṇavaḥ sūkṣmāvasthārūpatvena prasiddho nādastatprakṛtiḥ । bhāgavate'pi
tathaivoktam । tatra hi<quote>‘samāhitātmano brahmanbrahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ । hṛdākāśādabhūnnāda’</quote>iti pra-
stutya <quote>‘tato'bhūtrivṛdoṅkāra’</quote> ityuktam । nādasya tu śiva evārthaḥ । <quote>‘evaṃ tisṛbhirevaitanmātrā-
bhirakhilaṃ tridhā । abhidhāya śivātmānaṃ bodhayatyardhamātraye’</quote>tyādyatharvaśikhānusāripurāṇavaca-
nāt । sarvathāyaṃ mantraḥ padasvārasyānurodhādupakramādyanurodhācca śivaviṣaya eveti । <pratika>tatkiṃ-
rūpamityākāṅkṣāyāmiti</pratika> । <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote>miti mantrastāvatprakṛtavidyāyāṃ rūpasamarpaka
iti prakaraṇānuvṛttyāvasīyate । <quote>‘athavā paramātmānaṃ paramānandavigraha’</quote>mityādibhiḥ yogayājña-
valkyādivacanaiśca tathāvasīyate । sa ca virūpākṣaśrutyā tadīyayaugikārthatrilocanatvaprasiddha‍ya-
tiśayaliṅgena <quote>‘kṛṣṇapiṅgala’</quote>mityumāsāhityaliṅgena <quote>‘ūrdhvareta’</quote>mityūrdhvajvalanātmakavahniretastva-
liṅgena <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭha’</quote>mityetadvidyāpekṣitopāsyasvarūpasamarpa-
kakaivalyopaniṣanmantraikārthyena tasya mantrasya <quote>‘namaskuryānmahādevamṛtaṃ satyamitīśvaram । nivedayī-
ta cātmānaṃ yo brahmāṇamitīśvare ।।’</quote>iti, kūrmapurāṇe, śivapūjāvidhau śivanamaskāre viniyo-
gavidhānena bodhāyanasūtre <quote>‘athāto mahādevasya pādodakaprāśanavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma’</quote> ityupakramya
<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote> miti mantreṇa prāśaye’diti śivapādodakaprāśane viniyogavidhānena ca śivaparami-
tyapi spaṣṭamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca sati madhye prasaktasya nārāyaṇasya <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote>ti
prasaktasya jīvasyevopāsakatvenānvaya ityeva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । nanvatra nārāyaṇasyopāsakatva-
varṇanaṃ kimanyeṣāmasminnupāsane adhikāravyāvartanārthaṃ netyāha—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । pūrvānuvāke <quote>‘vedāntavi-
jñānasuniścitārthā’</quote>iti mantreṇa sarveṣāmadhikārapradarśanānnetareṣāmadhikāravyavacchedārthaṃ nārāyaṇa-
grahaṇam । kiṃ tu viśiṣṭapuruṣānuṣṭhitatvenāsyopāsanasyātiśayāviṣkaraṇārthamityarthaḥ । tasmādasmi-
nneva prakaraṇe parameśvaranārāyaṇayorupāsyopāsakabhāvapratipādanātparameśvarābhedabhāvanāsiddhairvi-
śvapatitvādibhistadīyairdharmairnārāyaṇasya varṇanamityetadupapadyata ityadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tadi</pratika>-
<pb n="332"/>
virūpākṣeṇa brahmaṇā tadupāsakasya nārāyaṇasyābhedabhāvanayā taddharmairasya prati-
pādanamupādānasya tadātmanaiti samīcīnam ।। ityanu1papattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>heti</pratika>। pārameśvaratvena prasiddhānāmapi viśvapatitvādīnāmanyadīyatvapratyāyakaśrutiprābalyaśaṅkayā
pūrvapakṣadaśāyāṃ nātispaṣṭateti pādasaṅgatiḥ ।। <pratika>iti anupapattyadhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 2 ।।</p>

<sutra>sū॰ ।। anupapattestu na śārīraḥ ।। 3 ।। karmakartṛvyapadeśāt ।। 4 ।। śabdaviśeṣāt ।। 5 ।। smṛteśca
।। 6 ।। arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyyatvādevaṃ vyomavacca ।। 7 ।। saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna
vaiśeṣyāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nārāyaṇānuvāke viśvapatitvādibhirdharmaiḥ । pratipādyo mūrtyātmā śravaṇāttannāmaliṅgānāma ।। 35 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ nārāyaṇātmā sa tu paramaśivo darśanīyo hṛdabje varṇyo'pre śyāmagaurastriṇayanalasito vahniretāḥ parātmā ।</l>
<l>tasya dhyātāyamirttha prakṛta iha yathā tatkratunyāyavākye jīvastasmādamuṣminparavati ghaṭanā na svarūpeṇa teṣām ।। 36 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>hṛtpadmāgneśśikhāyāṃ vibhurapi bhagavānvartatāṃ vyomarītyā rūpaṃ tasyāsti kiṃcidyadiha kathamiva syānna duḥkhādibhogaḥ ।</l>
<l>na syādicchāgṛhīte vapuṣi hi vapuṣaḥ karmamūlasya doṣā na prāduḥṣyuḥ śrutaścāpahataduritādyaṣṭadharmā maheśaḥ ।। 37 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti nayamaṇimālāyāmanupapattyadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvatra prasiddhādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 1 ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । sarvatra prasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।। vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca ।। 2 ।। anupapattestu na śārīraḥ ।। 3 ।।
karmakartṛvyapadeśācca ।। 4 ।। śabdaviśeṣāt ।। 5 ।। smṛteśca ।। 6 ।। arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna
nicāyyatvādevaṃ vyomavacca ।। 7 ।। sambhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamekamadhikaraṇam । pūrvasminpāde spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ vākyānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvayassādhitaḥ ।
adhunā aspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ tasmin samanvayaṃ sādhayituṃ dvitīyatṛtīyapādāvārabhyete । chāndogye śāṇḍilyavidyāyāmāmnātaṃ <quote>‘sarvaṃ
khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasminloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati
sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ satyakāmassatyalaṅkalpa’</quote> ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra kiṃ manomayatvādiguṇakaśśā-
rīraḥ upāsyatvenopadiśyate kiṃ vā paramātmā iti saṃśayaḥ । manomayatvādijīvaliṅgaśravaṇāt śārīra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhā
ntastu, sarveṣu vedānteṣu prasiddhasya jagatkāraṇasya brahmaṇa eva atra <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvi’</quote>tyādinā upadeśāt paramātmaiva manomayatvādidharmai-
rupāsyatvena upadiśyata iti । sūtrārthastu । <pratika>sarvatra</pratika>---sarveṣu vidānteṣu । <pratika>prasiddhopadeśāt</pratika>---prasiddhasya brahmaṇa eva atro-
padeśāditi ।।</p>
<p>itaśca brahmaivātropadiśyata ityāha---<pratika>vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca</pratika> ।। vivakṣitāḥ <quote>‘bhārūpaḥ satyakāma’</quote> ityādinopāsanāyāmu-
pādeyatvenopadiṣṭā ye guṇāḥ satyasaṅkalpatvādayaḥ teṣāṃ brahmaṇyevopapatterityarthaḥ । jīvāsādhāraṇasyāpi manomayatvādeḥ satyasaṅka-
lpatvādyanurodhena sarvātmake brahmaṇyupapatteḥ । ataḥ tadga‍uṇakaṃ brahmaivopāsyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu viparītaṃ kiṃ na syāt iti cennetyāha---<pratika>anupapattestu na śārīraḥ ।। anupapatteḥ</pratika>---satyasaṅkalpatvādīnāṃ
jīve sāmañjasyenānupapatteḥ । <pratika>śārīraḥ</pratika>=jīvaḥ । <pratika>na</pratika>=na taddharmairupāsyaḥ । kiṃ tu brahmaivetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaśca na śārīra upāsya ityāha---<pratika>karmakartṛvyapadeśācca</pratika> ।। <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisambhavitāsmī’</quote>tyanena <quote>‘eta’</quote>miti
prakṛtasya manomayatvādiguṇakasya brahmaṇaḥ karmatvena prāpyatvena abhisambhavitāsmi prāptāsmīti śarīrasya kartṛtvena vyapadiśyamā-
natvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaśca na śārīra upāsya ityāha---<pratika>śabdaviśeṣāt</pratika> ।। samānaprakaraṇa <quote>‘antarātman puraṣo hiraṇmaya’</quote> iti śārīrasya yaḥ
śabdo'bhidhāyakaḥ saptamyanto'ntarātmanniti tasmādviśiṣṭo'nyaḥ prathamāntaḥ puruṣaśabdo manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyātmano'bhidhā-
yakastasya sattvāt na parasmādanyaśśārīra iha upāsya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<note>(1) asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘śārīrādhikaraṇa’</quote> miti nāmāntaramapi keṣucitpustaveṣu dṛśyate ।</note>
<pb n="333"/>
<p>kiṃ ca <pratika>smṛteśca</pratika> ।। <quote>‘īśvarassarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe'rjuna tiṣṭhati ।’</quote> ityādau jīvaparamātmanorbhedasmaraṇāt na parasmādanyo jīva
upāsya iti siddham । anayorbhedastu kālpanikaḥ na vāstava iti saiddhāntikī niṣṭhā ।।</p>
<p>adhunā paramātmana upāsyatvamākṣipya pariharati---<pratika>arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyyatvādevaṃ
vyomavacca ।। arbhakaukastvāt</pratika>=arbhakam alpam okaḥ sthānaṃ yasya so'rbhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvaṃ tasmāt । <quote>‘eṣa ma
ātmāntarhṛdaya’</quote> iti paricchinnahṛdayāyatanatvādityarthaḥ । kiṃ ca <pratika>tadvyapadeśācca</pratika>=tasya svaśabdenaiva aṇīyānityaṇīyastvasya
vyapadeśāt <pratika>neticet</pratika>=ārāpramātro jīva evehopāsyaḥ na sarvagataḥ paramātmeti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>nicāyyatvādevam</pratika>=
evamarbhakaukastvāṇiyastvādiviśiṣṭatvena rūpeṇa paramātmana iha upāsyatvāt । ataḥ sarvagatasyātmanaḥ upāsanāpekṣayā arbhakau-
kastvādiguṇaḥ । naitāvatā sarvagatatvahāniḥ । tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>vyomavat</pratika>=yathā sarvagatamapi vyoma sūcyagrādyavacchedena arbha
kauko'ṇīyaśca vyapadiśyate tadvadbrahmāpītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>adhunā paramātmanaḥ sarvagatatve doṣamāśaṅkya parihati---<pratika>sambhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। sambhogaprāpti-
riti cet</pratika>=vyomavat paramātmanaḥ sarvagatatve cetanatvāviśeṣāt jīvavat sukhaduḥkhānubhavarūpasambhogaprāptiriti cet । <pratika>na vai-
śeṣyāt</pratika>=jīvaparamātmanorbhoktṛtvābhoktṛtvādiviśeṣāt na tadbhogenāsya bhogapraptiriti । tasmāt manomayatvādiguṇakaḥ paramā-
tmaivopāsyo na śārīra iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, ādyaṃ sūtradvayamekamadhikaraṇam । anyat sūtraṣaṭkamadhikaraṇāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ । viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva।
atra manomayatvādidharmakaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ jīvo veti sandehaḥ । pūrvatra jīvasya prakṛtatvāt sarvathā manomayatvādi-
dharmako jīva upāsyaḥ na parameśvara iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasyaivopakrame <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajja-
lāniti śānta upāsīte’</quote>ti sarvakāraṇasya sakalacidacitprapañcaśarīraviśiṣṭasya sarvākārasya brahmaṇa eva nikhilaśrutismṛtipra-
siddhasya upāsyatvenopadeśāt pūrvatra prastutatve'pi jīvasya utpattiśiṣṭabrahmāvaruddhāyāmupāsanāyāmavāntaraprāptasya jīvasya prave-
śayitumaśakyatvācca upakramagataṃ brahmaiva manomayatvādidharmavattvenopāsyamiti ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi avāntarasiddhasya jīvasya prasaṅgo'narthakaḥ syādityāśaṅkāyāmāha---<pratika>vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca</pratika> ।। satyasaṅkalpa-
tvādīnāṃ vivakṣitānāṃ guṇānāṃ brahmaṇyevopapattestadevopāsyam । avāntarasiddhastu jīvaḥ upāsakaḥ tadākāṅkṣāyogāt । sūtrārthastu,
<pratika>manomayatvādiguṇaka</pratika> ityadhyāhāraḥ । <pratika>brahmapadaṃ</pratika> cānuvartate । tathā ca manomayatvādiguṇakaḥ parameśvaraḥ । <pratika>sarvatra</pratika>=sarveṣu
vedānteṣu prasiddhasya sarvaprapañcajanmādikāraṇatvena sarvātmakatayā śrutasya brahmaṇaḥ upadeśāt । <pratika>vivakṣitānāṃ</pratika>=satyasaṅkalpatvā-
dīnāṃ <pratika>guṇānāṃ</pratika> brahmaṇye<pratika>vopapatteśceti</pratika> ।। iti śrīkaṇṭhamate <pratika>sarvatraprasiddhādhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 1 ।।</p>
<p>pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe sāmānyena jīvasyopāsyatvābhāvamupāsakatvaṃ ca nirūpya punarapīhādhikaraṇe sakalajīvasamaṣṭirūpahiraṇya-
garbhopādanabhūtasya nārāyaṇasyāpi viśvādhikabrahmopāsakatvameva nopāsyatvamityabhidhātumadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate---<pratika>anupapattestu
na śārīra iti</pratika> । asya <quote>‘patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivamacyutaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ mahājñeya’</quote>mityādi mahopaniṣadvākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
atra viśvapatitvādilakṣaṇayukto nārāyaṇaśabdavācyo mūrtyātmā vā parameśvaro veti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣaṃ deva’</quote>mityārabhya mūrtyā-
tmano nārāyaṇasyaivābhyāsāt <quote>‘samudre'ntaṃ viśvaśaṃbhuva’</quote>miti samudraśāyitvaliṅgāt tatparyāyavācakācyutahariśabdādiprayogācca
mūrtyātmā nārāyaṇa eva viśvapatitvādiliṅgena pratipādyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । viśvapatitvādīnāṃ parameśvaradharmāṇāṃ tadarthāntare
nārāyaṇe'nupapatteḥ <quote>‘paśūnāṃ pataye’</quote>ityādinā nikhilabhuvanādhipatyasya parameśvara evābhyasyamānatvāt <quote>‘eko hi rudro na-
dvitīyāya tasthu’</quote> rityādinā rudravyatiriktasya jagadīṃśvaratvaniṣedhāt <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudra’</quote>iti parameśvarasyaiva viśvādhikatvaśravaṇā-
ccātra viśvapatitvādilakṣaṇo nārāyaṇātmā parameśvara eveti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘nārāyaṇāntaryāmī parameśvara evātra viśvapatitvādilakṣaṇaḥ’</quote> pratipādyata iti na yuktam । <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādinā
pratipāditaparabrahmabhāvo nārāyaṇa eva ‘tasyāśśikhāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthita iti jīvāntaryāmitvenopāsyaḥ śrūyate । <quote>‘sa
brahmā sa śiva’</quote>ityādinā tadvibhūtitvamevaṃ brahmaśivādīnāmucyate । ato nārāyaṇa eva viś‍vapatiḥ parabrahmabhūto jīvāntaryāmita
yopāsyata iti tadātmakatvena tadadhikatvaṃ tadupāsyatvaṃ ca parameśvarasya vaktumayuktamityata āha---<pratika>sū॰ । karmakartṛvyapadeśācca</pratika> ।।
tatra dhyeyadhyātroḥ parameśvaranārāyaṇayoḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca vyapadiśyate । tathā hi---padmakośapratīkāśatayā nirūpite nārāyaṇa-
hṛdaya eva khalu <quote>‘paramātmā vyavasthita’</quote> iti parameśvara eva paramātmā tadantarvartitayā dhyeyatvenocyate । ato dhyāturnārāyaṇādanya
eva dhyeyaḥ paramātmeti siddham । <quote>‘sa brahmā sa śiva’</quote>ityatra viṣṇoragrahaṇe'pi kaivalyopaniṣadi hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ prastutya tatra <quote>‘umāsa-
hāyaṃ parameśvara’mityādinā parameśvarameva dhyeyatvena nirdiśya’</quote>sa brahmā sa śivassendraḥ so'kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāṭ । sa eva viṣṇussa
prāṇassa kālo'gni’rityādipratipādanaikamatyena <quote>‘yo vai rudrassa bhagavān yaśca brahmā tasmai vai namo namaḥ yaśca viṣṇuḥ yaśca maheśvaraḥ’</quote>
ityādyātharvaṇaśrutyā ca atrāpi brahmaviṣṇurudrendrādiprapañcavibhūtiviśiṣṭatvameva parameśvarasyopadiśyata iti nirdhāraṇīyam । atra
vibhūtitvena brahmaśivayormadhye viṣṇoragrahaṇaṃ parameśvaropāsakatayā tasya prastutatvādityavirodhaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="334"/>
<p><quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>ti brahmatvenoktasya<quote>‘pādo'sya viśvā bhūtāni’</quote>ityādinā pratipāditanijaikāṃśajagadviśiṣṭatvasya sarvopāsyasya
parabrahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya kathamanyaṃ pratyupāsakatvamityata āha---<pratika>sū॰।। śabdaviśeṣāt ।।5।।</pratika> <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>ti śabdaviśeṣādeva
brahma nārāyaṇātparamityavagamyate । ato nārāyaṇādanyadeva paraṃ brahmopāsyam । iti । parabrahmaṇassahasraśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭapuruṣa-
rūpeṇa jagadupādānatvāt parabrahmātmakasya tasya jagadākāratvaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti na virodhaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca nārāyaṇasyopāsakatve pramāṇāntaramāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। smṛteśca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘evamuktvā tato rājanmahāyogeśvaro hariḥ ।
darśayāmāsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpamaiśvaram’</quote> iti smṛtermahāyogasvāmino nārāyaṇasya parameśvaraviṣayayogasamādherabhivyajyamānatayā
<quote>‘ahaṃ yathāvadārādhyaḥ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā । tasmādiṣṭatamaḥ kṛṣṇādanyo mama na vidyate’</quote>।। ityaśvatthāmānaṃ prati parameśvaravaca-
nācca nārāyaṇādanyadupāsyaṃ paraṃ brahma parameśvara iti ।।</p>
<p>punaranupapattimāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। arbhakaukastvādityādi ।।</pratika> <quote>‘nīvāraśūkavattanvī pītā bhāsvatyaṇūpamā । tasyāśśi-
khāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ ।।’</quote> iti svalpāśrayasvālpatvayorvyapadeśādayaṃ vyāpī na parameśvara iti cet na । vyomavattasya
svarūpamahattvasya siddhatvāt upāsyatvāttathā vyapadeśo na svarūpālpatvāditi na virodhaḥ ।।</p>
<p>punarāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasya trilocanatvā-
dilakṣaṇaśarīrasaṃbandhāt śarīragatasukhaduḥkhādisaṃbhogaprāptiriti cet <pratika>na</pratika> । sukhaduḥkhabhogahetubhyo jīvaśarīrebhyo brahmaśarīrasye-
cchāgṛhītasya <quote>‘sthirebhiraṃgaiḥ pururūpa ugra’</quote>ityādinā vailakṣaṇyasya pratipāditatvātparameśvarasya jīvavat na śarīrādigatadoṣāpa-
ttirityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate śārīrā( anupapattya )dhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, sarvatra prasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> atha dvitīyapāde aspaṣṭajīvādiliṅgakāni vākyāni vicāryante ।
asminnapi mate sūtrāṣṭakamekamadhikaraṇam । <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvida’</quote>mityādikaṃ chāndogyavākyameva viṣayaḥ । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayoryojanādvayaṃ
pradarśya dvitīyayojanāyā eva svābhitataratvaṃ vyañjitam । ādyā yojanā yathā---atra manomayatvādiguṇakaḥ kṣetrajño vā para-
mātmā vā iti saṃśayaḥ । manaḥprāṇayoḥ kṣetrajñopakaraṇatvātparamātmanastatpratiṣedhācca kṣetrajña iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvatra vedānteṣu ।
parasminneva brahmaṇi prasiddhasya manomayatvāderupadeśāt manomayatvādiguṇakaḥ paramātmeti siddhāntaḥ । prasiddhaṃ hi śrutyantareṣu mano-
mayatvādi brahmaṇaḥ <quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīranetā’</quote> ityādiṣu । <quote>‘aprāṇo hyamanā’</quote> iti tu manaāyattaṃ jñānaṃ prāṇāyattāṃ sthitiṃ caṃ
niṣedhati brahmaṇaḥ iti na virodhaḥ ।। athavā---<quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahme’</quote>tyatra brahmaśabdena pratyagātmā nirdiśyate vā uta paramātmeti
saṃśayaḥ । sarvapadasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśopapatteḥ pratyagātmeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘tajjalā’</quote>niti hetutayā janmādīnāṃ prasiddhavadupadeśāt
teṣāṃ ca paramātmasaṃbandhitayā prasiddheḥ sarvaśarīrakasya parasya sarvatādātmyopapatteśca brahmaśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ paramātmeti siddhāntaḥ ।
tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ । <pratika>sarvatra</pratika> <quote>‘sarvaṃ khalvida’</quote>miti nirdiṣṭe sarvasmiñjagati brahmaśabdena tadātmatayā nidhīyamānaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva । na pratya-
gātmā । kutaḥ । tajjalāniti hetuta<quote>‘ssarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahme’</quote>ti prasiddhavadupadeśāt । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca ।।2।।</pratika> manomayatvasatyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ vivakṣitānāṃ guṇānāṃ brahmaṇyavopapatteśca ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anupapattestu na śārīraḥ ।। 3 ।।</pratika> duḥkhamiśraparimitasukhalavabhāgini śārīre tu eṣāṃ guṇānāmanupapatterna śārī-
ro'yamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। karmakartṛvyapadeśācca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etamitaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitāsmī’</quote>ti abhisaṃbhāvyābhisaṃbhavitṛtvena prastutabrahma-
jīvayorvyapadeśādabhisaṃbhāvyaṃ brahmābhisaṃbhaviturjīvādarthāntaramiti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śabdaviśeṣāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaya’</quote> iti ṣaṣṭhyā prathamayā ca jīvo brahma ca vyapadiśyate । tataśca
brahma/?/ jīvādarthāntaram ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। smṛteśca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭa’</quote>iti smṛtāvapi śārīrasyopāsakatvaṃ paramātmana upāsyatvaṃ ca darśitaṃ
bhavati ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। arbhakaukastvādityādi ।। 7 ।।</pratika> asyārthe na vailakṣaṇyamiti viramyate tadvivaraṇāt ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> jīvasyeva parasyāpi brahmaṇaśśarīrāntarvartitvābhyupagame tadvadeva śarīra-
saṃbandhaprayuktasukhaduḥkhopabhogaprāptiriti cenna । <pratika>vaiśeṣyāt</pratika> । hetuvaiśeṣyādityarthaḥ । na hi śarīrāntarvartitvameva sukhaduḥkhopabhoga-
hetuḥ। api tu puṇyapāparūpakarmaparavaśatvam । tattvapahatapāpmanaḥ paramātmano na saṃbhavati । ‘tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvati anaśnannanyo
ābhicākaśīti । iti śruteḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate---sarvatraprasiddhopadeśāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> asminnapi mate idaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamekamadhikaraṇameva । asyādhi-
karaṇasya‘tasyaitasyāsāvādityo rasaḥ । sa yaścāyamaśarīraḥ prajñātmā । yaścāsāvāditye । ekameva taditi vidyāt । tasmātpuruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ
pratyādityo bhavati । tadapyetadṛṣiṇoktam । <quote>‘citraṃ devānāmudagādanīkam’</quote> । ityādinā prakrāntam’etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthye
<pb n="335"/>
atha attradhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
‘yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ । mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃka itthā veda yatra
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>atha attradhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।। sū॰ attā carācaragrahaṇāt</pratika> ।। 9 ।। ।। <quote>‘yasya brahma
ca kṣatraṃ ce’</quote>ti mantre brahmakṣatrayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya yasyodanatvena rūpaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ sa tayorbhokteti
tadodanatvarūpaṇabalātpratīyate । tatra yadi brahmakṣatrayorodanaśabdasya gauṇavṛttau bhojyatvarūpaḥ
prasiddhaudanavṛttirviśeṣākāro nimittaṃ syāt tadā tayoḥ prasiddhaudanarītyā khāditā vyāghrā-
dijīvastadbhoktā bhavet । yadi bhojyatvāpekṣayā sāmānyarūpo bhogyatvākāro nimittaṃ bha-
vet tadā strībhṛtyādirūpeṇa tayorupabhoktā jīvastadbhoktā bhavet । tatra yadyapi viśe-
ṣākārasya gauṇavṛttinimittatvasambhave sāmānyākārastathātvena na parigṛhyate । ata eva
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mīmāṃsante । etamagnāvadhvaryavaḥ । etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ । etamasyāmetaṃ divyetaṃ vāyāvetamākāśe etamapsu etamoṣadhīṣu etaṃ
vanaspatiṣu etaṃ candramasi etaṃ nakṣatreṣu etaṃ sarvoṣu bhūteṣu etameva brahmetyācakṣata’ityādi aitareyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra <quote>‘etaṃ hyeve’</quote>.
tyārabhya pṛthivyādisarvagatatvenocyamānaḥ ādityo vā jīvo vā tadantaryāmī viṣṇurveti saṃdehaḥ । ādityaśrutiliṅgādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ
śravaṇāt sajātīyeṣu candrāgninakṣatrādiṣviva<quote>‘etamāditya’</quote>ityanukteśca <quote>‘cakṣurmayaśchandomaya’</quote>ityāditadasādhāraṇaliṅgaśravaṇācca ādi-
tyo vā jīvo vā bhavitumarhate nāntaryāmī viṣṇuriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘tadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnā’</quote>mityādiṣu tasminneva prasiddhasya
brahmaśabdasya<quote>‘etameva brahmetyācakṣata’</quote>iti sāvadhāraṇanirdeśena mukhyabrahmaparatvasūcanāt aśrutatvāmatatvādiliṅgabalāt sarvabhūtasthatvā-
dīnāṃ jīvādiṣvanupapatteśca sarvatra pṛthivyādiṣūcyamāno viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu <pratika>tattu</pratika> ityanuvartate । <pratika>sarvatra</pratika>=pṛthi-
vyādiṣu ucyamānaṃ vastu <pratika>tattu</pratika> nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiva । na tvanyat । kutaḥ । <pratika>prasiddhopadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘etameva brahmetyācakṣate’</quote> iti
sarvagate vastuni nārāyaṇavācitvena śrutyādiprasiddhabrahmaśabdaśravaṇādityarthaḥ । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । vivakṣitaguṇopapatteśca</pratika> ।। 1 ।। caḥ samuccaye । avadhāraṇe vā । <pratika>sarvagate śrutyeti</pratika> śeṣaḥ । tathā ca <pratika>vivakṣitā</pratika>-
nāmitaḥ paraṃ <pratika>sarvagate śutyā</pratika> tanniṣṭhatayā vaktuṃ yogyānāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ vā śrutatvādiguṇānāṃ viṣṇoreva yogyatvena tasminnevopa-
patteranyatrānupapatteśca viṣṇureva sarvagata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । anupapattestu na śārīraḥ</pratika> ।। 3 ।। tuśabda evārthe । śārīro jīvaḥ ādityo vā । na sarvagataḥ । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>anupapatteḥ</pratika>=ekasya jīvasya sarvaśarīrasthatvāyogādevetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । karmakartṛvyapadeśācca</pratika> ।। 4 ।। sarvagate vastuni ātmānamiti karmatvasya jīve ca śaṃsatīti tadviruddhakartṛtvasya
vyapadeśāduktatvācca na jīvassarvagata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śabdaviśeṣāt</pratika> ।। 6 ।। <quote>‘etameva brahme’</quote>ti vākye brahmaśabdasyāvadhāraṇārthaka evaśabdākhyaviśeṣaṇavattvādbrahmaśabdo
na jīvapara ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । smṛteśca</pratika> ।। 6 ।। caḥ samuccaye । na kevalaṃ śrutyuktatvādbrahmaśabdo na jīvapara iti kiṃ tu <quote>‘ahamātmā guḍākeśe’</quote>tyā-
dismṛtisadbhāvācca brahmaśabdo na jīvapara ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । arbhakaukastvāditi ।। 7 ।। arbhakaukastvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sarveṣu bhūte’</quote>ṣviti sarvagatavastunaḥ sarvaprāṇihṛdayākāśarūpā-
lpasthānatvakathanāt । <pratika>tadva‍yapadeśāt</pratika>=tasya jīvasya tacchrutiliṅgādinā vyapadeśāt uktatvācca । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=brahmaiva sarvagata-
mityuktaṃ neti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । teṣāṃ viṣṇāvevopapatteriti śeṣaḥ । na ca vaiyarthyam । <pratika>evaṃ nicāyyatvāt</pratika>=evamarbhakauka-
stvādirūpeṇa viṣṇorevopāsyatvāt । tathā ca na vaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ । śrutiliṅgādīnāṃ brahmaparatvena na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ ।
vyāptasya viṣṇoḥ kathamalpasthānasthitirityata uktaṃ <pratika>vyomavacceti</pratika> । yathākāśasya vyāptasyāpi gṛhādyekadeśāvasthitistadvadvi-
ṣṇorapītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । saṃbhogaprāptiriti cenna vaiśeṣyāt</pratika> ।।8।। yato brahmaṇaḥ vyomavatsarvajīvaśarīrasthatve <pratika>saṃbhogaprāptiḥ</pratika>=samā-
nabhogaprāptiḥ ityato bādhakānna brahma sarvagatamiti cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>vaiśeṣyāt</pratika>=viṣṇossāmarthyaviśeṣavattvādityarthaḥ । tathā ca na
tasya jīvasamānabhogaprāptiriti bhāvaḥ ।। 8 ।।</p>

yogā’</quote> <ref>(jai॰ sū॰)</ref> dityadhiraṇe <quote>‘praitu hotuścamasaḥ prabrahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇāṃ prayajamānasye’</quote>tya-
dhvaryupraiṣagatasyodgātṛpadasya bahuvacanānusāreṇājahallakṣaṇayā bahuṣu pravṛttau vaktavyāyāmudgātṛga-

labhyate । mṛtyurūpopasecanamiśraṇasya saṃhārarūpa eva hyadane upayogaḥ na khādanarūpe nāpyupa-

ttasattve tadeva grāhyaṃ na puruṣabuddhikalpanīyamanyat । ata eva <quote>‘imāṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyedimāṃ hi viśvā
bhūtānyupajīvantī’</quote>ti vākye <quote>‘imā’</quote>miti sarvanāmnassarvabhūtopajīvyatvaliṅgopasthitaṃ pṛthivītvaṃ
pravṛttinimittaṃ gṛhyate na tvanyadaudumbarītvādikam । tacca saṃhārarūpamadanaṃ na kevalaṃ brahmakṣatrayo-
revātra vivakṣitam । kiṃtu tadupalakṣitasya sarvasyāpi carācarasyetyapi mṛtyorupasecanatvarūpaṇā-
devāvagamyate । yathā hyupasecanamodanādanopayogitayā svayaṃ tathaivādyamānaṃ ca bhavatīti । mṛtyo-
rupasecanarūpaṇabalātpratīyamānasya mṛtyunā saha tatsaṃsṛṣṭasaṃhārasya pralaya eva bhāvāt pralaye
sarvasya carācarasya saṃhāraprasiddheḥ । tasmātsakalaprapañcasaṃhartaivānena mantreṇa pratipādyata iti ।
atra saṃśayapradarśakavākyena pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatiritthaṃ sūcitā । trimūrtyuttīrṇaṃ paramaśivākhyaṃ
paraṃ brahma sakalavedāntapratipādyamiti nirṇetuṃ pravṛttamidaṃ śāstram । kecintrayāṇāṃ brahmaviṣṇurudrā-
ṇāmanyatama eva paraṃ brahma na taduttīrṇaṃ tatvāntaramastīti manyante । tatprabodhanāya parabrahmaṇo
hiraṇyagarbhātiriktatvaṃ tasya hiraṇyagarbhasya ca śeṣaśeṣibhāvapradarśanena pūrvapāde hiraṇyagarbhādhi-
karaṇe samarthitam । pūrvādhikaraṇe tasya nārāyaṇasya copāsakabhāvapradarśanenaiva tadatiriktatvamapi
samarthitam । tatprasaṅgātsaṃhārarudrātiriktamanenādhikaraṇena pradarśyata iti । yadyapyasminnadhikaraṇe
parabrahmaṇaḥ saṃhārarudrasya copāsyopāsakabhāvādirna pradarśyate । tathāpi tayorbhedaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā
<quote>‘yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ce’</quote>ti mantrasya saṃhārarudraparatvena pūrvapakṣasya nirāsārthaḥ parabrahmaparatvena
siddhāntaḥ pravartata iti tena tayorbhedāvagatisiddhiḥ । evaṃ tadubhayabhedasiddhavatkāreṇādhikara-
ṇapravṛttiṃ sūcayitumeva bhāṣye <quote>‘tadanyo ve’</quote>ti tadbhinnatvapuraskāreṇa saṃhārarudraviṣayā pūrvapakṣako-

śayaḥ । paramakāruṇikasya sarvānugrāhakasya sakalabhakṣakatvamanucitam । hiṃsārūpaṃ
hi paraprāṇavimocanam । hiṃsāpravṛtteḥ krodha/?/ eva mūlāṅkuraḥ । krodhasya cāmaṅgalaguṇa-
sya moha eva mūlakandaḥ । tasya sarvasaṃhāranidānasya tama eva prakṛtiḥ । atastā-
masaḥ sarvasaṃhartā । tāmasatvaṃ nāma āvṛtajñānādimattvānniṣprakāśatvam । sarva-

ṭirupanyastā । parameśvarasya saṃhartṛtvāsambhavamupapādayan pūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>paramakāruṇikasyeti</pratika> ।
<pratika>anucitamiti</pratika> । na hi sarvadā karuṇayā sarvānanujighṛkṣankiñcidapi hiṃsyāditi bhāvaḥ ।
na kevalaṃ parameśvarasya saṃhārapravṛttyasambhavaḥ tadvirodhikaruṇāvattvāt kiṃtu tatkāraṇakrodhatamo-
guṇābhāvādapītyāha—<pratika>hiṃsārūpaṃ hīti</pratika> । yadyapi paraprāṇavimocanamātraṃ na hiṃsā । kratuṣu pa-
śuprāṇavimocanaṃ paśūnāmapi gatipradatvānna hiṃseti tṛtīyādhyāye samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt । tathā-
pyavaidhaṃ tattatheti tātparyam । <pratika>mūlāṅkura iti</pratika> । vakṣyamāṇamohakandaprabhavāyāḥ parahiṃsāviṣavī-
rudhaḥ prathamāṅkura ityarthaḥ । astu krodho'pi parameśvarasya tatrāha—<pratika>krodhasya ceti</pratika> । krodho hi
puruṣāṇāṃ paropadravaparyavasāyitvācca heyassarvathaivāmaṅgalaguṇaḥ sa kvacidapi kathañcidapi yathā
nodbhavet tathābhijñaiḥ prayatitavyamiti vastusthitiḥ । ataḥ puruṣāṇāṃ krodhodaye vastutattvāna-
bhijñānarūpastamoguṇāvirbhāvādhīno moha eva mūlamityarthaḥ । nanu, rudrasya tāmasatvaṃ tamaupādhi-
katvamātraṃ na tu prākṛtānāmiva tamasā'bhibhavaḥ । atastasya tāmasatve'pi jñānāvaraṇaṃ na sa-
mbhavatītyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>tāmasatvaṃ nāmeti</pratika> । tamoguṇāvṛtajñānādimattvarūpaṃ hi tāmasatvaṃ loke
prasiddham । rudre'pi tattathābhūtamevāṅgīkartuṃ yuktam । lokaprasiddha‍yanurodhāt । tasmin tamo'bhi-
bhavakāryakrodhasaṃhārapravṛttisampratipatteśceti bhāvaḥ । nanu, hiṃsāyāḥ krodhaikamūlatvāvadhāraṇamayu-
ktam । asti hi māṃsavarmādyapekṣayā dhanalipsayā paropacikīrṣayā vā hiṃsā । asti ca līlā-
mātrarūpā । <quote>‘lokavattu līlākaivalya’</quote>miti <ref>(bra॰ 2.1.33.)</ref> sūtre ca jagadvyāpāraḥ parabrahmaṇo
līleti sthāpayiṣyate । satyam । krodhātmakaḥ prapañcasaṃhartā rudrastāvatprasiddho'sti । tadviṣaya-
tve'sya mantrasya sambhavatyanyaviṣayatvaṃ parikalpya tasya hiṃsāvyāpārapravṛttau mūlāntarānveṣaṇā-
yāṃ gauravamiti pūrvapakṣī manyate । prasiddhaṃ hi <quote>‘ahaṃ ca bhavato vakrātkalpānte ghorarūpadhṛt ।
śūlapāṇirbhaviṣyāmi krodhajastava putraka ।।’</quote> ityādiṣu rudrasya krodhaprabhavatvaṃ krodhajatvaṃ ca । tāma-
satvaṃ ca tasya prasiddhameva । tadetadabhipretyoktam <pratika>atastāmasassarvasaṃharteti</pratika> । nanu, guṇamū-
rtīranupraviśya parameśvara eva jagadvyāpārankarotīti maryādā <quote>‘ayasyagnisamāviṣṭe dāho'gnereva
nāyasaḥ । mūrtyātmasvevamaiśvaryamīśvarasyaiva nātmanā’</quote>mityādiśāstraprasiddhā । ataścaturmukhasya
sraṣṭṛtvavannārāyaṇasya pālayitṛtvavacca rudrasya saṃhartṛtvamapi pārameśvaraṃ syāditi cenna । guṇamū-
rticariteṣvapi yāni lokānugraharūpāṇi saccaritāni tāni pārameśvarāṇi viparītāni tattadga‍u-
ṇamūrticaritānīti vyavasthāṅgīkārāt । <quote>‘sarvaṃ śivo'nugṛhṇāti na nigṛhṇāti kaṃcana । nigṛ-
hṇatāṃ tu ye doṣāśśive toṣāmasambhavāt । lokānugrahaṇāyaiva śivena paramātmanā । sadāśivā-
dayassarvo mūrtyātmāno'pyadhiṣṭhitāḥ ।। mūrtyātmasvapi rāgādyā doṣāssantyeva vastutaḥ । tathāpi
teṣāmevaite na śivasya tu sarvathe’</quote>tyādiśāstraprāmāṇyāt । ata eva nīlalohitaniyuktena bhairaveṇa
brahmapañcamaśirolavane kṛte tatkālamāvirbhūtena parameśvareṇa brahmaṇe jīvanaṃ datvā nīlalohitarudrāya

mane'pi vyavahāraḥ । ata evaitādṛśaprayogeṣu <quote>‘vartamāne laḍi’</quote>ti sūtrato laṭaḥ prāptirnāstīti

<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । atharvaśikhāyāṃ <quote>‘bhagavankimādau prayuktaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyitavyam । kiṃ tat dhyānaṃ ko vā
dhyātā kaśca dhyeya’</quote> ityatharvāṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putraṃ prati pippalādaprabhṛtīnāmṛṣīṇāṃ dhyānasādhanama-
ntradhyātṛdhyeyaviṣaye praśnacatuṣṭaye praśnatrayaprativacanānantaraṃ dhyeyanirdhāraṇārthamāmnāyate <quote>‘dhyāyī-
teśānaṃ pradhyāyitavya’</quote>mityādi । asyārthaḥ । pradhyāyitavyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ prakarṣeṇa dhyātumarham ।
<quote>‘ādeca upadeśe'siti’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 6-1-45. sū)</ref> ityātvābhāva iḍāgamaśchāndasaḥ।īśānaṃ parameśvaraṃ dhyā-
yīta।ātmanepadaṃ chāndasam । sa eva mumukṣubhiḥ pradhyātumarho na brahmādaya ityatropapādakatvena tasya
brahmādikāraṇatvamucyate । sarvamidaṃ suranaratiryagādibhūtajātam।brahmaviṣṇurudrendrāḥ।tatpradhānatvā-
ttācchabdyam।devadatta eva sarvo'yaṃ grāma itivat।indraśabda īśvaraparaḥ sadāśivasyāpyupalakṣakaḥ ।
te sarvapradhānabhūtā brahmaviṣṇurudreśvarasadāśivā api samprasūyante samyaganupacaritatvenaivotpadyante ।
prakṛtādīśānāditi śeṣaḥ । bhūtendriyagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham । jaḍavargasamānayogakṣemata eva te'pi
<pb n="342"/>
brahmaviṣṇurudrendrāste saṃprasūyante sarvāṇi cendriyāṇi saha bhūtairna kāraṇaṃ kāra-
ṇānāṃ dhātā dhyātā kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeyaḥ sarvaiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śaṃbhurākāśamadhye’

tasmādutpadyanta iti bhāvaḥ । yadi brahmādikāraṇabhūta īśāno'pi kutaścitsamprasūyate tadā ta-
dvadeva so'pi dhyātavyo na bhavedityāśaṅkya tasyotpattyabhāva upanyasyate—<pratika>na kāraṇaṃ kāra-
ṇānāṃ dhātā dhyāteti</pratika> । samprasūyata iti vacanavipariṇāmenānuṣaṅgaḥ । kāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyā-
dipañcakṛtyādhikāriṇāṃ prāguktānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ kāraṇamupādānaṃ dhātā dhārayitā dhyātā nimi-
ttatvena sṛṣṭyādisaṅkalpakartā evaṃbhūta īśānaḥ kutaścidapi na samprasūyata ityarthaḥ । atassarva-
kāraṇabhūtaḥ parameśvara eva dhyātavya ityucyate <pratika>kāraṇaṃ tviti</pratika> । tuśabda itareṣāṃ janma-
vatāṃ dhyeyatvavyavacchedārthaḥ । <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaśśaṅkaraḥ sarvamanyatparityajye’</quote>ti hya1nte
vakṣyate । svayaṃ janmarahita eva mumukṣubhiḥ pra2padanīya iti śvetāśvataropaniṣadyapyuktam । <quote>‘a-
jāta ityeva kaścidbhīruḥ prapadyate rudra yatte dakṣiṇaṃ mukhaṃ tena mā pāhi nitya’</quote>miti । upabṛṃhi-
taṃ ca śivapurāṇe---<quote>‘ajātamimamevaikaṃ matvā janmani bhīravaḥ । rudrasyāsya prapadyante rakṣārthaṃ da-
kṣiṇaṃ mukha’</quote>miti sarvakāraṇabhūtaḥ parameśvaro janmarahitatvādiva sarveśvaratvena sakalapuruṣārthapradā-
naśaktatvādapi mumukṣubhirdhyātavya ityabhipretya <pratika><quote>‘sarvaiśvaryasampanna’</quote></pratika> ityuktam । yadvā prāgīśānapa-
denaiva tācchīlyārthaśānajantatayā svābhāvikaniratiśayaiśvaryapareṇeyamupapattissūcitā । brahmā-
dīnāmutpattyuktistu teṣāṃ dhyeyatvopayogitādṛgaiśvaryavyavacchedārthaṃ na tu sākṣāddhyeyatvavyavacche-
dārtham । īśānasyotpattyabhāvoktistu brahmādiṣūdbhāvitasyaiśvaryaparicchedahetordoṣasya parihāreṇa
prāṅni/?/rdiṣṭatādṛgaiśvaryopapādanārtham।evamupapāditasya tasyānuvādaḥ <pratika><quote>‘sarvaiśvaryasampanna’</quote></pratika> iti । na
kevalaṃ sarvaiśvaryasampattirupanyastopapattyāvasīyate kiṃ tu sarveśvara iti nāmnāpītyabhipretya <quote>‘sa-
rveśvara’</quote> ityuktam । sarveśvara ityapi hi tasya nāmāstīti <quote>‘akāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ nābhāvukāraṃ viṣṇuṃ
hṛdaye makāraṃ rudraṃ bhrūmadhye oṃkāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ dvādaśānta’</quote>iti tāpanīyaprayogādavagamyate । śa-
mbhurniratiśayānandarūpo niratiśayānandaheturvā । ākāśamadhye cidgaganamadhye । evamasyāśśrute-
rupabṛṃhaṇaṃ śivapurāṇe dṛśyate । <quote>‘yasmātsarvamidaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudrendrapūrvakam । saha bhūtendriyai-
ssarvaiḥ prathamaṃ samprasūyate । kāraṇānāṃ ca yo dhātā dhyātā paramakāraṇam । na samprasūyate ta-
smātkutaścana kadācana । sa sarvaiśvaryasampanno nāmnā sarveśvaraḥ svayam । sarvairmumukṣubhirdhyeyaḥ śambhu-
rākāśamadhyaga’</quote>iti । harivaṃśe'pyevamupabṛṃhaṇaṃ dṛśyate । tatra hi parameśvaraṃ prati kṛṣṇavacanam ।
<quote>‘ahaṃ brahmā kapilo'thāpyanantaḥ putrāssarve brahmaṇaścātivīrāḥ । tvattassarve devadeva prasūtā evaṃ
sarvaiḥ kāraṇātmā tvamīḍya’</quote> iti । evaṃ ca kāraṇātmatvātsarveśa ityarthaḥ । etena <quote>‘kāraṇaṃ tu dhye-
ya’</quote>iti śrutiḥ <quote>‘nārāyaṇādbrahmā jāyata’</quote>ityādiśrutyantarasiddhakāraṇānuvādena tasya dhyeyatvavi-
dhāyinī na svayaṃ kasyacitkāraṇatvapratipādinī । dhyeyapraśnottaratvāt । ataḥ purovādānusā-
reṇa kāraṇapadasamānādhikaraṇaḥ śambhuśabdo nārāyaṇapara iti nirastam । dhyeyapraśnottaramadhye
parameśvara eva dhyeya ityasyopapādanāya <quote>‘sarvamida’</quote> mityārabhya tasya jagatkāraṇatāyā api prati-
pādanāt prakṛtārthānuvādasambhave ca purovādāntarāpekṣāyogāt । na ca brahmādīnāṃ prasūtimā-
<note>(1) <quote>‘hyagre’</quote>iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘pratipattavya’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

tramuktaṃ na tu prakṛtādīśānāditi śaṅkyam । prasūterapādānāpekṣāyāṃ sannihitasyeśānasyaiva
tathātvenānvayaucityāt । īśānasya dhyeyatvoktiprastāve brahmādīnāṃ prasūtyukterdhyeyotkarṣaparyava-

sūtau sa evotkṛṣṭatayā dhyeyaḥ syāt na tatprasūta īśāna iti śaṅkāvāraṇārthaṃ pravṛtte dhātṛdhyā-
tṛśabdayoḥ pulliṅgadarśanena tadviśeṣyatayeśānapadānuṣaṅgāvagateśca । na ca tayoḥ śambhupadenānva-

nānvayo bhavati । aparimitādhikaraṇanyāyena sannihitapratiyogyanvayaucityāt । na ca nārā-

smānnyāyopabṛṃhaṇābhyāṃ brahmādikāraṇatvena prākpratipāditasyeśānasyānuvāda iti yuktam ।
nanvastu tathaiva, tathāpyanuvādo nārāyaṇaviṣayaḥ syāt । dhyeyanirdhāraṇasya nārāyaṇaviṣayatvāt ।
atharvaśikhāyāmupakrame hi praṇavasya mātrātrayaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudradevatyamuktvā <quote>‘yā'vasāne'sya catu-
rthyardhamātrā sā sarvavarṇā puruṣadevatye’</quote>tyuktam । upasaṃhāre mātrātrayavācyānbrahmaviṣṇurudrāndhyāna-
sādhanadhyānadhyātṛrūpānuktvā prāṇaṃ manasi saha karaṇairnādānte paramātmani sampratiṣṭhāpya <quote>‘dhyā-
yīteśāna’</quote>miti dhyeyapraśnottare nādāntaviśeṣaṇenārdhamātrāvācyaḥ puruṣo dhyeya ityāviṣkṛtam ।
sa tu puruṣo nārāyaṇa eva । <quote>‘yathā śaṅkaraśabdo'yaṃ mahādeve'vatiṣṭhate । tathā puruṣaśabdo'yaṃ
vāsudeve'vatiṣṭhate ।।’</quote> ityādipurāṇavacanaiḥ <quote>‘puruṣo ha vai nārāyaṇo'kāmayate’</quote>tyādiśrautaprayogaiḥ
<quote>‘na yasya devī na pitāmaho vā nendro na cāgnirvaruṇo na mṛtyuḥ । prabhāvamadyāpi vidanti rudraṃ
tamādidevaṃ puruṣo dadarśe’</quote>tyādipaurāṇikaprayogaiḥ <quote>‘saṃhṛtya lokānpuruṣo'dhiśeta’</quote> ityādyabhiyukta-
prayogaiśca puruṣaśabdasya nārāyaṇavācitvāvagamāt । evaṃ copakramānusāreṇopasaṃhāragatā ī-
śānaśambhuśivaśabdā nārāyaṇa eva yojayitavyā iti cet । maivam । upakramagataika śrutyapekṣa-
yopasaṃhāragatabahuśrutīnāṃ prabalatayā tadanusāreṇa puruṣa śrutereva śive yojayitumucitatvāt ।
puruṣadevatyetyataḥ prāk <quote>‘yāvasāne'sya caturthyardhamātrā sa somaloka’</quote> ityardhamātrāyāḥ śivaloka-
tvoktidarśanenopakramasya nārāyaṇaviṣayatvāsiddheścodāhṛtaparamopakramā<quote>‘doṅkāraḥ pralayaḥ praṇava-
stāro viṣṇuḥ brahma prakāśo vidyuvdyāpī’</quote>tyoṅkāranāmanirvacane vyāpanāvdyāpī mahādeva iti vā-
cyavācakayorabhedopacāramāśritya mahādevaśabdena nāmanirdeśāt upasaṃhāre śivanāmnāṃ prayo-
geṇa ca atharvaśikhāyāḥ kārtsnyena śivaparatvasyaiva spaṣṭaṃ pratīteśca । <quote>‘puruṣo nāma sampūrṇaḥ śiva-
ssatyādilakṣaṇaḥ । na viṣṇurna viriñcaśca na rudro nāparaḥ punā’</quote> nityādipaurāṇikavacanaiḥ <quote>‘puruṣo
vai rudraḥ’</quote>—<quote>‘puruṣasya vidmahe sahastrākṣasya mahādevasya dhīmahī’</quote> tyādivaidikaprayogaiśca puruṣaśabdasya
śivavācakatvasyāpyavagateśca । barhirājyādhikaraṇanyāyānusaraṇe cetanasāmānyaśaktyaiva tatratatra
viśiṣya prayogāṇāmupapannatvena ca puruṣaśabdasya kvacidapi viśiṣya śaktyasiddheśca । brahmadevatyā
viṣṇudevatyā rudradevatyeti praṇavamātrādevatānāṃ tattadasādhāraṇanāmnā nirdeśaprāyapāṭhasyai<quote>‘kā-
deyā dvādaśa deyāścaturviṃśatirdeyāḥ sahastraṃ deyamaparimitaṃ deya’</quote> mityādhānadakṣiṇākalpabhedaśrutau

iti śrūyate । tataḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yatra saṃhārastata eva sarveṣāmutpattiriti ana-
