hārthamāhāryastadvaśya eveti ।। <pratika>jñānaṃ vairāgyamiti</pratika> ।। jñānaṃ sakalaprapañcagatāśeṣaviśeṣāparo-
kṣyam । vairāgyaṃ niratiśayasvātmānandānubhavaprayuktaṃ sakalaviṣayavaitṛṣṇyam । aiśvaryaṃ sakalaprapa-
ñcaniyamanaśīlatvam । tapaḥ sṛṣṭikāle sraṣṭavyavastujātālocanam । satyamanṛtarāhityam । vedāga-
mādisatyaikarūpavacanavaktṛtvaṃ vā।kṣamā bhaktāparādhasahiṣṇutvaṃ-<quote>‘namassahamānāye’</quote>tiśrutiprasiddham ।
dhṛtirdhairyam । <quote>‘imā rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ’</quote><quote>‘sthirāya sthiradhanvane nama’</quote>iti śrutiprasiddhaṃ
jagaddhāraṇaṃ vā । sraṣṭṭatvaṃ prapañcanirmātṛtvam । ātmasambodhaḥ svātmānandāmṛtāsvādaḥ । adhi-
ṣṭhātṛtvaṃ prapañcarūpaṃ śarīramanupraviśya vartamānatvam । <pratika>nityamiti</pratika> । kānicitsvarūpanityatayā
kānicitpravāhanityatayā tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ । atra jñānātmasambodhayorvivakṣitaṃ bhedaṃ sammatyantaro-
dāharaṇavyājena darśayati—<pratika>aśeṣaviṣayeti</pratika> । tapaśśabdo'tra na kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādiparaḥ ।
kiṃ tu sṛṣṭikāle sraṣṭavyālocanarūpajñānaśaktipara iti darśayanprasaṅgādicchājñānakriyāśaktīnāṃ
sṛṣṭāvupayogaprakāramāha—<pratika>asaṅkucitavibhava ityādinā</pratika> । māyārūpāmityanena sisṛkṣārūpe-
cchāśaktireva jagadupādānatvena prasiddhā māyeti darśitam । tadevecchāśaktibhittāvityanenāpyā-
viṣkṛtam । <quote>‘āśiṣe’</quote>ti prāgudāhṛtamantra/?/gataviśeṣaṇapramāṇakametat । adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ prapañcānuprave-
śarūpaṃ taddhetukaprapañcaniyamanarūpādaiśvaryādbhinnamiti darśayituṃ <quote>‘satsṛṣṭve’</quote>tyādikamuktam । <quote>‘so'kā-
mayata bahu syā’</quote>mityādi śrutyudāharaṇeṣu sarveṣu <quote>‘iti śrutyuktaprakāreṇe’</quote> ti śeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ । <pratika>śaktitra-
yeti</pratika> । jñānecchākriyāśaktimadhye kvacitkiñcitprādhānyena rajassatvatamobhistriguṇairbrahmaviṣṇuru-
drāṇāmupādhirūpairbrahmaviṣṇurudrāṇāṃ tanurūpaiśca bhinnaṃ parasparavilakṣaṇaṃ yanmūrtitrayaṃ tatpramukhaprapa-
ñcaśarīro bhavatītyarthaḥ । nanvasminmantre pratipādyassarvasaṃhartā parameśvara ityanupapannam । tasya
pratiṣṭhātvena varṇyamānaḥ parameśvara iti pratīterityāśaṅkānivāraṇāya <quote>‘yatra sa’</quote>ityasya vivakṣi-
tamarthaṃ darśayati—<pratika>tadiheti</pratika> । tattasmātsarvasaṃhārasya parameśvarakartṛkatvādiha sarvasaṃhāre nimitte
<pb n="346"/>
sarvaśakteḥ sarvajñasya śivasya mahimā kena vijñāyate । ataḥ sarvasaṃhartā parameśvara
iti ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰।। prakaraṇācca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘mahāntaṃ vikṣumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati’</quote> (kaṭha. 2.22.) <quote>‘nāyamātmā
pravacanena labhyaḥ’</quote> iti parameśvarasyaiva prakaraṇam । ataśca paraṃ brahma parameśvaraḥ
sarvasaṃhartā nānya iti siddham ।।
<head>iti attradhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sarvajñasya sarvaśaktessarvaṃsaṃhāropayogisārvajñyasarvaśaktimataḥ parameśvarasya mahimā na kenāpyavadhā-
rayituṃ śakya iti <quote>‘ka itthā veda yatra sa’</quote> ityetadarthānuvādaḥ । ayamāśayaḥ । yasya sarvasaṃhartṛ-
tvamuktaṃ tatra khalu sarvaviṣayakajñānaśaktimattvenāparicchedyamahimatvamanveti na tu tadadhikaraṇe ।
atassarvasaṃhartṛtvasyopanyāsapūrvakamaparicchedyamahimatvoktiḥ saṃhartṛviṣayaiva bhavatīti tannirvāhāya
yatreti padaṃ chāndasatvātprathamārtha eva yojanīyamiti । sūtrārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।
sū ।। <pratika>prakaraṇācca</pratika> ।। 10 ।। yatretyasya prathamāntatāyā avaśyavaktavyatvāt saṃhartuḥ parameśva-
ratvābhāve tatprakaraṇaṃ virudhyeteti bhāvaḥ ।। asminnadhikaraṇe siddhāntopapādakaṃ sarvasaṃhartṛtva-
liṅgaṃ pañcakṛtyakāriṇaḥ parameśvarasya dharma iti spaṣṭameva talliṅgam । tathāpi paramakāruṇikasya
saṃhartṛtvaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇenopapādanīyatvāt nātispaṣṭamiti pādasaṅgatiḥ । atra
pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayossaṃhārarudrātparameśvaro bhinnatvena vyavahṛtassarvasaṃhartā parameśvaro na tu saṃhāra-
rudra iti siddhāntavyavasthāpanārthaṃ bhāṣye sūtrābhipretaśrutyantaropanyāsena sṛjyātsaṃhāryācca tataḥ
sraṣṭā saṃhartā ca parameśvaro bhinnatvenopapāditaśca । tataśca viṣayavākye mṛtyuśabdo'vāntarasaṃ-
hārādhikāritvāviśeṣānmṛtyuyamacitraguptādīnāmiva saṃhārarudrasyāpyulakṣaka iti śrutyantarā-
nusāreṇa viṣayavākyato'pi tatsiddhiriti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । evaṃ hiraṇyaga rbhādhikaraṇaśārīrā-
dhikaraṇābhyāmanenādhikaraṇena ca trimūrtyuttīrṇatvena siddhe parameśvare paramaśive sarveṣāṃ vedā-
ntānāmiha samanvayaḥ pratipādya iti siddham । yattu purāṇeṣu kvacitkvaciddhiraṇyagarbhasya nārā-
yaṇasya saṃhārarudrasya vā trimūrtyuttīrṇatvavacanaṃ tatsarvaṃ tattadvibhūtibhūtādhikāripuruṣāpekṣam ।
santi khalu trimūrtīnāmadhikāripuruṣāstatra tatrāvāntarasṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārakāriṇaḥ । yathā hira-
ṇyagarbhasya virāṭkālapuruṣāḥ nārāyaṇasyāniruddhapradyumnasaṅkarṣaṇāḥ saṃhārarudrasya bhavamṛḍaharāḥ ।
ete ca vāyusaṃhitāyāṃ nirūpitāḥ । na ca brahmaviṣṇurudrāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ trimūrtirūpādhikāripuru-
ṣavattvābhyupagame śivasya trimūrtyuttīrṇatvavacanānāṃ bhavamṛḍaharātītasaṃhārarudraviṣayatvasambhavena
pradhānatrimūrtyuttīrṇaparamaśivāsiddhiprasaṅgaḥ । vāyusaṃhitāyāmeva <quote>‘sṛjatyaśeṣamīśasya śāsanācca-
turānanaḥ । tisṛbhirmūrtibhiścāpi pāti cānte nihanti ca । viṣṇuḥ pālayate viśvaṃ viśvayo-
nerniyogataḥ । sṛjate grasate cāpi svakābhistanubhistribhiḥ ।। haratyetajjagatsarvaṃ harastasyaiva śā-
sanāt । sṛjatyetacca viśvātmā tridhā bhinnastu rakṣati ।।’</quote> iti svasvavyūhabhūtamūrtitrayātīta-
pradhānamūrtitrayaparatvena paramaśivasya nirūpaṇāt । ato nātra kaścidvirodha iti sarva samañja-
sam ।। ।। <pratika>iti attradhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 3 ।। ।। ।।
<pb n="347"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athātradhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 9 ।। prakaraṇācca ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>attā carācarasya syātkaścittāmasaśśivādanyaḥ । na hi sa samānugrahakṛddhorāṃ hisāṃ vitanvīta ।। 38 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śaṃkara eva tadanyo na kaścidapi sakalasaṃhṛtau śaktaḥ । hiṃsāpyanugrahaḥ syādvraṇagadināṃ śastravaidyakavat ।। 39 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti attradhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha atradhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate tu ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 9 ।। prakaraṇācca ।। 10।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya kaṭhavallyāṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ । mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā
veda yatra saḥ ।’</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra kaścidodanopasecanasaṃsūcito'ttā pratīyate । trayāṇāṃ cāgnijīvaparamātmanāmasmi-
ngranthe praśnopanyāsopalabdherviśeṣānavadhāraṇāt sa kimagniruta jīva āhosvitparamātmeti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘agnirannāda’</quote> iti śrutipra-
siddhibhyāmagnirattā syāt । ata <quote>‘tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattī’</quote>ti darśanāt jīvo vāttā syāt । <quote>‘anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti’</quote>
iti darśanānna paramātmāttā bhavitumarhati iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu paramātmaivāttā । kutaḥ । <pratika>carācaragrahaṇāt</pratika>=carā-
carayoḥ sthāvarajaṅgamayormṛtyūpasecanayuktayoradyatvenāsminvākye <pratika>grahaṇāt</pratika>=śravaṇāt । na hi paramātmānaṃ sarvasaṃhṛrtāramṛte'nyasya
kasyaciccarācarāttṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ । <quote>‘anaśna’</quote>nnityetadbrahmaṇaḥ karmaphalabhogapratiṣedhakaṃ na vikārasaṃhārapratiṣedhakamityataḥ paramātmano
nāttṛtvānupapattiḥ । prasiddhaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārakāraṇatvaṃ sarveṣu vedānteṣu ।।</p>
<p>itaśca paramātmaivāttetyāha---<pratika>prakaraṇācca ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘na jāyate mriyate vā vipaści’</quote> dityādinā paramātmanaḥ <pratika>prakaraṇāt</pratika>
prakṛtatvāt <quote>‘ka itthā veda yatra saḥ’</quote> iti durvijñeyatvarūpāsādhāraṇaliṅgāccetyarthaḥ ।। 10 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । mṛtyūpasacenamilitabrahmakṣatropalakṣitani-
khilacidacitprapañcabhoktṛtayā śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvaro vā saṃhārarudro veti saṃśayaḥ । paramakāruṇikasya sarvānugrāhakasya parameśvarasya
sakalabhakṣakatvānaucityāt tathā sarvasaṃhartṛtvābhyupagame tāmasatvāpattyā nityaśuddhasya niravadhikamaṅgalaguṇākarasya tasyājñānatamomoha-
krodhādikāmaṅgalaguṇasaṃkaraprasaṃgāt svarūpalakṣaṇabhūtasarvajñatvanityatṛptatvādīnāmānarthakyāpātācca brahmaṇo'nya etādṛśaguṇaḥ saṃhāgarudro
'ttā bhavitumarhatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । atharvaśirasi <quote>‘tasmā upasaṃhartre mahāgrāsāya vai namo namaḥ’</quote> iti parameśvarasya sarvasaṃhartṛbhāvasya
śravaṇāt krodhādimūlakasya tamoguṇasya prākṛtadharmatvāt <quote>‘samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastā’</quote>diti jñānavairāgyādyavyayadaśakādhiṣṭhānasya tasya
tamaḥparatvaśravaṇāt paricchinnaśakteranyasya sakalacarācarasaṃharaṇasāmarthyābhāvācca nikhilacarācaraprapañcabhoktā parameśvara eveti
siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prakaraṇācca ।। 10।।</pratika> <quote>‘mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati । nāyamātmā pravacanena labhya’</quote> itīdaṃ
parameśvarasyaiva prakaraṇam । ataśca parameśvarassarvasaṃhartā nānya iti siddham ।। 10 ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, ।।sū॰।। attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।।9।। prakaraṇācca ।।10।। guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi tadda-
rśanāt ।। 11 ।। viśeṣaṇācca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> iti catussūtrātmakamidamadhikaraṇamiti viśeṣaḥ । viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva ।
pūrvādhikaraṇasyāntimasūtre paramātmā na bhoktetyuktam । tarhi sarvatra bhoktṛtayā pratīyamāno jīva eva syādityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>attā
carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> atra attā jīvo vā paramātmā veti saṃdehaḥ । karmanimittasya bhoktṛtvasya paramātmanyasaṃbhavāt
jīva evāttā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kṛtsnacarācarāttṛtvasya paramātmanyeva saṃbhavāt īdṛśajagadupasaṃhārarūpabhoktṛtvasya karmanimi-
ttabhoktṛtvasya ca vilakṣaṇatvācca attā paramātmaiveti siddhāntaḥ ।।<pratika>sū॰ ।। prakaraṇācca</pratika> ।। 10 ।। asyārthaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva ।।
ataścāttā paramātmaiva ।। nanu samānaprakaraṇe <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantā’</quote>viti mantre karmaphalabhogarūpaṛtapānakartṛrjīvasyaiva sadvitīyasyābhi-
dhānāt karmaphalabhogasya paramātmanyasaṃbhavāt dvitīyena jīvopakaraṇabhūtayorbuddhiprāṇayoranyatareṇa bhāvyamityataḥ pūrvaprastuto'ttāpi
sa eva bhavitumarhati ityāśaṃkyāha—<pratika>guhāṃ praviṣṭāviti</pratika> । <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhye ।’</quote> iti
mantre na prāṇajīvau buddhijīvau vā ucyete api tu jīvaparamātmānau hi tathā vyapadiśyete । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=asminprakaraṇe
jīvaparayoreva guhāpraveśavyapadeśadarśanāt । evaṃ ca <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantā’</quote>viti vyapadeśaśchatrinyāyena vā prayojyaprayojakabhāvena
vā tayorupapadyate । iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="348"/>
atha guhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
ihādhikaraṇe sarvasaṃhartṛtvalakṣaṇena siddhasya parameśvarasya <quote>‘dvā suparṇā’</quote> <ref>(śve.4.6.)</ref>
ityādinā prasiddhaṃ svavibhūtijīvasāhacaryamabhivyañjayitumadhikaraṇāntarārambha:---
।। sū॰ ।। guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt ।। 11 ।।
<p>‘ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe । chāyātapau brahmavido
vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ ।। (kaṭha.3.1.) iti śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ ।। iha
sukṛtasthāne parārdhe brāhmaṇādiśarīre hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau phalabhoktārau chāyā-
tapāviva vilakṣaṇau kaucit śrūyete; tāvetau buddhijīvau jīvaparameśvarau veti saṃdehaḥ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>saṅgatiṃ sūcayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>iheti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇe saṃhārarudrāsambhāvita-
sarvasaṃhartṛtvena trimūrtyuttīrṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ prasādhitaḥ । tatprasādhanopayogibhāṣyalikhitātharvaśi-
khādiśrutisadbhāvasaṃsūcanenātharvaśikhādyuktaprakāreṇa mumukṣubhiḥ sa eva brahmaviṣṇurudrādisakale-
taraparityāgenopāsanayā sākṣātkaraṇīya iti ca sūcitam । tadanupapannam । atharvaśikhādiṣū-
nmanāntasakalabhuvanātītasomalokavartitvena śrutasya <quote>‘hariścāhaṃ ca rudraśca tathānye ca surāsurāḥ ।
tapobhirugrairadyāpi tasya darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।।’</quote> ityādiṣu caturmukhādivacaneṣu mūrtyātmabhirapi durda-
rśatvena prasiddhasya tasyāsmadādibhirupāsanayā sākṣātkartumaśakyatvādityāśaṅkānivāraṇāya tasya
sadopāsakasahacaritatvena nityasaulabhyaṃ vyañjayitumadhikaraṇāntarārambha ityākṣepikī saṅgatiriti
bhāvaḥ । nanu tathā mahāprabhuḥ parameśvaraḥ kena hetunāsmadādīnāṃ sākṣātkārasaukaryāya sāhacarya-
manumodetetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ niratiśayavātsalyarūpeṇa sakhyeneti vibhāvanāya sakhyapratipādakasya
<quote>‘dvā suparṇe’</quote>ti mantrasyopanyāsaḥ। tathābhūte vātsalye hetusaṃsūcanāya svavibhūtibhūteti viśeṣaṇam ।
gosvāmino goṣviva svakīyeṣu vātsalyaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।। sū॰ ।। <pratika>guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau
hi taddarśanāt</pratika> ।। 11 ।। viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya tadarthopanyāsena saṃśayabījasūcanapūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ
darśayati—<pratika>ṛtamiti ।। sukṛtasthāna iti</pratika> ।। lokyate'sminnityadhikaraṇasādhano lokaśabdaḥ ।
tataśca sukṛtānuṣṭhānamasmin dṛśyata ityarthalābhe sati sukṛtasthāna ityarthaḥ paryavasyatīti bhāvaḥ ।
parārdhamupāsanādyadhikārasampādakatvenotkṛṣṭaṃ parasyopāsanādyadhikārasampādakatvenotkṛṣṭasyātma-
no'rdhaṃ sthānamiti vā parārdham । ubhayathāpi brāhmaṇādiśarīramucyata ityabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—
parārdha iti ।। parā utkṛṣṭā mā matiḥ brahmavidyā yasmin jāyate tatparamam । ebhirviśeṣaṇai-
rupāsanādhikāriṇāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāmanugrahāya viśiṣya teṣāṃ śarīre hṛdayaguhāyāmupāsanāsākṣā-
<pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇācca</pratika> ।। 12 ।। asminprakaraṇe sarvatra jīvaparayorevopāsyopāsakabhāvena prāpyaprāptṛbhāvena ca pratipā-
danādityarthaḥ । ataśca paramātmātteti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, ।। sū॰ । attā carācaragrahaṇāt ।। 9 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sa yadyadevāsṛjata । tattadattumadhriyata । sarvaṃ vā
attīti । tadaditeradititvam’</quote> iti bṛhadāraṇyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra <quote>‘sarvaṃ vā attī’</quote>tyuktassarvāttā aditiśabdavācyo devatā-
viśeṣo vā viṣṇurveti saṃdehaḥ । aditiśruterattṛtvaliṅgācca adityākhyo devatāviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘sarvaṃ vā attī’</quote>ti sarva-
śabdasyāsaṃkucitasakalacarācaraparatvasyaiva nyāyyatvāt <quote>‘sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ’</quote> ।। sraṣṭā pātā
tathaivāttā nikhilasyaika eva tu ।। vāsudevaḥ paraḥ puṃsāmitare'lpasya vā na vā ।।’ ityādivacanācca sarvāttā viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ ।।
<sutra><pratika>sū॰ ।। prakaraṇācca ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘naiveha kiṃcane’</quote>ti viṣṇuprakaraṇabalācca viṣṇurevāttetyarthaḥ ।।</sutra></p>

<p>buddhijīvāveva tau । kutaḥ ? <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantau’</quote> iti bhoktṛtvāvagamāt । parameśvara-
sya na bhoktṛtvam, <quote>‘anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti’</quote> <ref>(śve॰4.6.)</ref> iti darśanāt ।

guhāpraveśavarṇane tātparyaṃ kalpyeta tadā sthānaviśeṣaṇamahimnā paropāsanāniratabrāhmaṇādihṛdaya-
guhāsūpāsanātajjanyasākṣātkāraviṣayatvayogyena sūkṣmarūpeṇa parameśvarasyopāsakasannikarṣaprati-
pādakatvenākāṅkṣitārthasamarpako'yaṃ mantraḥ upapādito bhavet । buddhijīvaparatve tadākāṅkṣāpūraṇamapi
na bhavet । <quote>‘taṃ durdarśa’</quote>mityādiṣu guhāhitatvādivarṇanasya sakalacetanācetanasādhāraṇāntaryāmi-
viṣayatayāpyupapannatvenātra <pratika>sthānaviśeṣaṇamahimneva</pratika> tatra kenacidupāyena viśiṣyopāsakahṛdayeṣū-
pāsanāsākṣātkāraviṣayatvayogyena prāpyarūpabhinnena kenacitsūkṣmarūpeṇopāsakasannikarṣapratipāda-
nasyāpekṣitasyānyato'lābhāt । rathisārathirūpayorjīvabuddha‍yoḥ śarīrarūparathāśrayatvapratipādanaṃ tu
nāpekṣitam । tasya prasiddhatvāt । apica rathirathādikalpanaṃ na paraprāptyartham । rathatvādinā ka-
lpitenopāsanopayuktena śarīreṇa somalokasthasya tasya prāptyasambhavāt । kiṃ tu tadjñānaprāptyartham ।
rathasārathyādīnāmabhimatadeśaṃ prāptukāmena rathineva jñānaṃ prāpnukāmena śarīrendriyaprabhṛtīnāṃ vaśī-
karaṇīyatvāt । <quote>‘yastu vijñānavānbhavati yuktena manasā saha । tasyendriyāṇi vaśyāni sadaśvā
iva sārathe’</quote>riti jñānopāyabhūtasya teṣāṃ vaśīkaraṇasya tatraivocyamānatvācca । tathā ca jñānopāyatvena
rathasārathyādikalpanamapi darśanarūpajñānāpekṣitadṛśyasannikarṣesiddha‍ye parasya guhāpraveśapratipāda-
namapekṣata iti tadanurodhe'pi <pratika>guhāpraviṣṭau</pratika> jīvaparāveva siddhyata iti । <pratika>etadviśeṣaṇamiti</pratika> ।
jīvaparayordraṣṭṭadṛśyabhāvena viśeṣaṇaṃ buddhijīvapakṣe kathaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ । adhikaraṇā-
rthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ato jīveti</pratika> । atra guhāpraveśasya śrutyantaraprasiddha‍yā brahmadharmatvena spaṣṭa-
syāpi pūrvapakṣadaśāyāṃ brahmadharmatvāsambhavaśaṅkākaluṣitatvānnātispaṣṭateti pādasaṅgatiḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। iti guhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="353"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha guhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt ।। 11 ।। viśeṣaṇācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vapuṣīha buddhijīvau guhāṃ praviṣṭau na jīvaparau । chāyātapavaiṣamyaṃ cetanayornāsti na ca paro bhoktā ।। 40 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jīvaparāvasti tayorvaiṣamyaṃ malinanirmalatvena । bhoktṛtvaṃ svānande parasya dṛṣṭaṃ guhāhitatvaṃ ca ।। 41 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti guhādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha guhādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt ।। 11 ।। viśeṣaṇācca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhye । chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo
ye ca trināciketāḥ ।’</quote> ici kaṭhavallīvākyamasya viṣayaḥ । kimiha buddhijīvau nirdiśyete uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśayaḥ । gu-
hāpraveśavarṇanāt sati saṃbhave sarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśakalpanasyāyuktatvāt <quote>‘anaśnannanya’</quote> iti paramātmano bhoktṛtvaniṣedhāt
chāyātapavadvailakṣaṇyasya cetanācetanayoreva saṃbhavācca buddhijīvāviti pūrvapakṣaḥ । saṃkhyāvatorekarūpatvasya loke dṛṣṭatvāt <quote>‘guhāhitaṃ
gāhṇareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam’</quote> <quote>‘ātmānamanviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭa’</quote>mityādiśrutismṛtiṣu paramātmano'sakṛdga‍uhāhitatvaśravaṇāt sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa
upalabdhyarthadeśaviśeṣopadeśe virodhābhāvāt chatrinyāyena prayojyaprayojakabhāvena vā dvayoḥ ṛtapānakartṛtvasya nirdeśyatvāt saṃsāritvā-
saṃsāritvayośchāyātapavatparasparavilakṣaṇatvācca jīvātmaparamātmānāveva guhāṃ praviṣṭāviti siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu <pratika>guhāṃ</pratika>=
hṛdayaguhāṃ <pratika>praviṣṭau । ātmānau hi</pratika>=cetanau hi । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddarśanāt</pratika>=saṃkhyāvatorekarūpatvasya loke darśanāt । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇācca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti’</quote> <quote>‘devaṃ matvā harṣaśokau jahāti’</quote> iti jīvaparamātmanoreva ga-
ntṛgantavyabhāvena mantṛmantavyabhāvena ca viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyasaṃdehapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvaṃ samānameva prāyaśa iti viramyate tatprapañcanāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate tu</pratika> anayossūtrayoḥ pūrvādhikaraṇāntarbhūtatvādadhikaraṇāntaratvābhāvācca pūrvādhikaraṇa eva ime sūtre prapañcite ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate ।। sū॰ ।। guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ bhāṣyāntarasamānameva । atra
<quote>‘pibantau’</quote> iti nirdiṣṭau harijīvau vā harireva vā iti saṃdehaḥ । dvitvabhoktṛtvaliṅgāt harijīvāviti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘dharmāsama-
ntāntrivṛttaṃ vyāpatuḥ । tayorjuṣṭiṃ mātariśvā jagāma’</quote> iti śrutau rupadvayena tasya śarīraguhāpraveśaśravaṇāt <quote>‘yo veda nihitaṃ guhā-
yā’</quote>miti harereva guhāgatatvaprasiddheḥ <quote>‘śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca । adhiṣṭhāya manaścāyaṃ viṣayānupasevate ।।’</quote> ā-
tmāntarātmeti harireka eva dvidhā sthitaḥ । niviṣṭo hṛdaye nityaṃ rasaṃ pibati karmajam ।।’ ityādismṛtiṣu hareḥ rūpadvayena viṣayaka-
rmaphalabhoktṛtvapratipādanāt <quote>‘anaśna’</quote> nnityasya <quote>‘śubhaṃ pibatyasau nityaṃ nāśubhaṃ sa hariḥ pibet ।’</quote> iti pātmavacanānusāreṇa aśu-
bhakarmaphalaviṣayatvācca harereva dve rūpe pibantāviti nirdiśyete iti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthaṃstu <quote>‘tattu’</quote> iti vibhaktivipariṇāmenānu-
vartate । <pratika>ātmānau</pratika>=ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā <quote>‘ṛtaṃ pibantā’</quote>viti śrutisthapibacchabdoditaśubhakarmaphalabhoktārau । <pratika>te tu</pratika>=ā-
tmāntarātmākhyaviṣṇurūpe eva । na tu jīveśvarau । kutaḥ <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । tau <pratika>guhāṃ praviṣṭau</pratika>=hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau । tasmādityarthaḥ ।
hiśabdena hṛdayaguhāsthitatvaliṅgasya <quote>‘yo vede’</quote>ti śrutiprasiddhatvaṃ sūcayati । dvirūpatayā śarīrahṛdayaguhāsthitve pramāṇamāha---
<pratika>taddarśanāditi ।</pratika> tasya hareḥ dvirūpatayā śarīrahṛdayaguhāsthitatvasya <quote>‘dharmāsamante’</quote>ti śrutāvuktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇācca ।।</pratika> caḥ yuktisamuccayārthaḥ ।। <quote>‘yaḥ setu’</quote>riti ekavacanena viśeṣaṇādeka eva pātā । sa ca setutvabrahma-
tvādinā viśeṣitatvādviṣṇureva na jīva ityarthaḥ ।। 12 ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ guhādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
hṛdayaguhāntarvartitayopāsyasya parameśvarasyehopāsanasthānāntaramucyate---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। antara upapatteḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘ya eṣo'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmeti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṅgati darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>hṛdayaguheti</pratika> । upāsakanediṣṭhopāsanāsthānapradarśa-
naprasaṅgāttathābhūtasyaivopāsanāsthānāntarasya pradarśanārthamadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyata ityarthaḥ ।। sū ।।
<pratika>antara upapatteḥ</pratika> ।। 13 ।। viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>chāndogya ityādinā</pratika> ।
<pb n="354"/>
hovāca etadamṛtamabhayametadbrahma’</quote> ityādi ।। ihāmṛtatvādilakṣaṇo'kṣyantaḥśrū-
yamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ īśvaro vā anyo vā ? ।। iti saṃśaye parameśvarādanya iti vadāmaḥ,
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nanvamṛtatvādilakṣaṇa iti dharmiṇaṃ nirdiśya parameśvarastadanyo veti kathaṃ sandihyate । parame-
śvaraikāntikā eva hyamṛtatvābhayatvabrahmatvaśrutayaḥ । tadanantarama<quote>‘pyetaṃ saṃyadvāma ityācakṣate ।
etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti sarvāṇyenaṃ vāmānyabhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ vede’</quote>tyādinā saṃya-
dvāmatvavāmanītvabhāmanītvādisvasvānuguṇaphalaparyavasāyitvena balavanti brahmaliṅgāni pratipā-
dyante । puṣkarapalāśavākyenārcirādivākyena ca brahmavidyāphalatvena prasiddhaṃ sakalapāpānāśleṣa-
brahmaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ phalamiha pratipādyate । prakaraṇādayamakṣipuruṣaḥ parameśvaro'vasīyate । evaṃ chando-
gānāmupaniṣadyupākhyāyate । upakosalaḥ kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāmamācāryamupasannaḥ tasya dvādaśa-
varṣāṇyagnīnparicarannāsta । tasmai brahmopadeśamakṛtvaivācārye proṣite satyādhivyādhiparavaśamanaśnantaṃ
tadādyācāryāgniparicaryāyāmavahitaṃ tamavekṣya gārhapratyadakṣiṇāgnyāhavanīyāstrayo'pyagnayassa-
mbhūya karuṇayā tasmai <quote>‘prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādinā brahmavidyāmupadiśya pratyekaṃ ca
svasvaviṣayāṃ vidyāṃ <quote>‘ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so'hamasmi sa evāhamasmī’</quote>tyādinā <quote>‘ya
eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛśyata’</quote>ityādinā <quote>‘ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣa’</quote>ityādinā copadidiśuḥ ।
tadanantaraṃ sarve'gnayassambhūyai<quote>‘ṣā somya te'smadvidyā cātmavidyā cetyabhidhāyā‘cāryāddha‍yeva vidyā
viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpa’</quote>diti śrutyanusāreṇa svopadiṣṭavidyā tadācāryakartṛkagatyupadeśena
sādhiṣṭhatvaṃ prāpnotvityālocyā<quote>‘cāryastu te gatiṃ vakte’</quote>tyavocan । tataḥ pratyāgata ācāryaḥ
prasannamukhamupakosalaṃ vīkṣya <quote>‘brahmavida iva vai somya te mukhaṃ bhāti ko nu tvāmanuśaśāse’</quote>ti
pṛṣṭvā sahāgnibhirbhīte tasminnagnayo'smā upadidiśuriti niścitya<quote>‘kinnu somya kila te'voca’</quote>nniti
pṛṣṭvā etāvadupādiśanniti tenokte tatra vaktavyaśeṣo'stītyavadhārya <quote>‘ahaṃ tu te tadvakṣyāmi yathā
puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyante evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate’</quote> iti svavaktavyaṃ pratijñāya
<quote>‘bravītu me bhagavā’</quote>niti tena prārthitaḥ saṃyadvāmatvādiguṇakamakṣipuruṣamupadiśya tadupāsakasyā-
<quote>‘rciṣamevābhisambhavantī’</quote>tyādinā <quote>‘eṣa devapatho brahmapathaḥ etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvartaṃ
nāvartante’</quote> ityantenārcirādimārgaprāptyantaṃ punarāvṛttirahitaṃ brahmaprāptiphalamupadideśeti । ataḥ
prakṛtabrahmavidyāyāmeva sthānaguṇaviśeṣopadeśārthaṃ <quote>‘yaeṣo'kṣiṇī’</quote>tyādi pravṛttamityavasīyate ।
<quote>‘ya eṣa’</quote>iti sarvanāmaśrutyoḥ prakṛtaparāmarśitvasvābhāvyādapi tathāvasīyate । evaṃ ca kathami-
hākṣipuruṣaḥ parameśvarādanya iti koṭerutthānaṃ parameśvarādanyaśca bhavannayaṃ vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣānu-
sāreṇa jīvaḥ pratibimbo vā syāt । nobhayathāpi saṅgacchate । na hi parameśvarapakṣe śrutiliṅgavā-
kyaprakaraṇavajjīvapakṣe pratibimbapakṣe vā śrutiliṅgādiṣu kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ śaṅkāspadamasti ।
akṣisthatvaliṅgamastīti cet na । <quote>‘yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhanya eṣo'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate saiva ṛk
tatsāma tadukthaṃ tadyajustadbrahme’</quote>tyādiśrutyantareṣu parameśvare'pi śrutatvena sādhāraṇatvāt । ta-
smādanupapanno'yaṃ saṃśaya iti ceducyate । amṛtatvādilakṣaṇa iti saṃśaye siddhāntakoṭerbījo-
panyāsaḥ । akṣyantaśśrūyamāṇa iti pūrvapakṣakoṭeḥ । yathā cākṣyādhāratvaṃ parameśvarādvyāvṛttama-
mṛtatvādīnāṃ pratibandībhavituṃ kṣamaṃ ca bhavati tathānupadameva pūrvapakṣopapādanena spaṣṭīkariṣyāmaḥ ।
<pb n="355"/>
parameśvarasya <quote>‘daharaṃ vipāpmam’</quote> <ref>(mahānā. 10.11.)</ref> <quote>‘padmakośapratīkāśam’</quote> ityādiṣu
hṛdayapuṇḍarīka eva sannidhānaśravaṇāt । jīvasya tu rūpādigrahaṇe cakṣuri-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>parameśvarasyeti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । akṣyādhāratvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhasya parameśvarasya mukhyaṃ tāvanna
sambhavati । rūpaviśeṣāvacchedopādhikamaupacārikaṃ sambhavadapi tadaṅgīkaraṇīyam । yadyananya-
thāsiddhamakṣyanyaśśrūyamāṇasya parameśvaratvagamakaṃ śrutiliṅgādiṣu kiñcidiha jāgṛyāt ।
na tvetadasti । ātmabrahmaśrutyossaṃyadvāmatvādiguṇaśravaṇasya cetiśabdaśiraskatvena <quote>‘mano
brahme’</quote>tyādivadatasmiṃstadrūpapratyayaparatvāvagamāt tatsamabhivyāhāreṇāmṛtatvādiśravaṇānāmapi
tanmātraparatvāvagamāt । amṛtatvābhayatvayormuktau sattvena tacchravaṇayorbhāvyavasthāviṣa-
yatvenopapatteśca । abrahmopāsanayāpyudāhṛtaphalānāṃ vaivāhikavaravadhūdarśanenābhyudayavadvacana-
balādupapatteḥ । na hyabrahmavidāmarcirādimārgo nāstiti niyamaḥ । abrahmavidāmeva
pañcāgnividyopāsakānāṃ <quote>‘tadya itthaṃ vidu’</quote>rityādivacanabalena tadabhyupagamāt । brahmaprakara-
ṇānuvṛttirapyasiddhā । <quote>‘prāṇo brahme’</quote>tyāde<quote>‘rmanobrahme’</quote>tyādisārūpyeṇa brahmadṛṣṭividhiparatvāt ।
tasya brahmopāsanāparatve'pi tadagnivākyaṃ <quote>‘ya eṣo'kṣiṇī’</quote>tyācāryavākyamiti vaktṛbhe-
dādagnividyādibhirvyavadhānācca । na cā<quote>‘cāryastu te gatiṃ vakte’</quote>ti brahmopāsanānvayyācāryavakta-
vyaśeṣaśravaṇādagnividyānāṃ tadaṅgatvācca na vaktṛbhedāgnividyopadeśābhyāṃ tatprakaraṇavicchedo bha-
vediti vācyam । gatyabhidhānamātrasyācāryavaktavyatayā pariśeṣitatvenārcirādyabhidhānasya tada-
nvayalābhe'pi sthānaguṇayorācāryavaktavyatvenāpariśeṣitatayā <quote>‘ya eṣo'kṣiṇī’</quote>tyādeḥ prakṛte
brahmaṇyakṣisthānasaṃyadvāmatvādiguṇavidhāyakatvenānvayālābhāt । agnibhire<quote>‘ṣā somya te'sma-
dvidyā cātmavidyā ce’</quote>ti vidyāṃ nirapekṣamupadiṣṭatayopasaṃhṛtya gatimātramācāryeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti pa-
riśeṣite'pyācāryo'gnyupadiṣṭasya brahmaṇo'kṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmatvādiguṇajātaṃ cādhikamupadeṣṭavya-
mastītyālocya svayamupadideśeti tadanvayasamarthane agnīnāmanṛtavāditvasyānabhijñatvasya vā prasa-
ṅgāt । apahate <quote>‘pāpakṛtyāṃ lokī bhavati sarvamāyureti jogjīvati nāsyāvarapuruṣāḥ kṣīyante upa
vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo'smiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśce’</quote>tyagnividyānāṃ pṛthak‌phalaśravaṇena prakṛtavidyātvābhāvācca ।
nanvihākṣipuruṣopanyāsānantaramarcirādigatiḥ na prakṛtabrahmavitpāpyatvena kīrtitā na vā tāṭa-
sthyena । kiṃ tu <quote>‘ya evaṃ vede’</quote>tyakṣipuruṣavidamupakṣipya <quote>‘atha yadu caivāsmi’</quote>nnityādinā tatprā-
pyatvena kīrtitā । tathā cāgnibhistvopadiṣṭabrahmavitprāpyagaterācāryavaktavyatvena pariśeṣitāyāste-
nākṣipuruṣavitprāpyatvenopadiṣṭatvādakṣipuruṣaḥ prakṛtaṃ brahmaiveti cenmaivam । ācāryassvayamapi vi-
dyāntaramupadiśya tadarthamarcirādigatimupadekṣyatītyetadagnayo niścitya tatsarvamanuddhāṭya yāṃ
gatimācārya upadekṣyati sā prakṛtabrahmavido'pītyabhiprāyeṇā<quote>‘cāryastu te gatiṃ vakte’</quote>tyagnayo
'vocannityupapādanasambhave tanmātramavalambya nirapekṣatayopasaṃhṛtāyā bahuvidyāntaravyavahitā-
yāḥ punassthānaguṇavidhyaṅgīkārāyogāt । tasmāddaharavidyādiṣu hṛdayapuṇḍarīkādhārasyevākṣyādhā-
rasyātra brahmatve dṛḍhaśrutiliṅgādipramāṇābhāvāt brahmaṇo hṛdayapuṇḍarīkādhāratvamivākṣyādhāra-
tvamihaupacārikaṃ nāśrayaṇīyam । jīvaparigraheṇa tasya mukhyatayopapādanasambhavāt । jīvo hi
brahmaśrito na brahmavat svamahimapratiṣṭhaḥ । jijñāsitārthagrahaṇāya manasā saha sañcaran rūpādigrahaṇa-

ndriyapraveśo'sti, manaḥsaṃbandhāt । sa evākṣipuruṣaḥ । athavā chāyāpuruṣaḥ । iti

kāle manaso'kṣisaṃyoge svayamapi tatsaṃyuktassanmukhyatayaiva bhavatyakṣyāśritaḥ । etena<quote>‘yaścakṣuṣi
tiṣṭhan ya eṣo'ntarakṣiṇī’</quote>tyādiśrutiṣu brahmaṇo'pyakṣyādhāratvaṃ prasiddhamiti nirastam । svama-

vastutastu,brahmaṇo hṛdayapuṇḍarīkādhāratvasyevākṣyādhāratvasya nāstyamukhyasyāpi prasiddhiḥ । <quote>‘yaḥ
pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityāderantaryāmibrāhmaṇasya <quote>‘sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭādākāśavatsarvagataśca ni-
tya’</quote>ityādiśrutyantaravadaparicchinnasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvānusyūtimātraviṣayatvāt ‘ya eṣo'ntarakṣiṇī-
tyādeḥ prakṛtaviṣayavākyavajjīvaparatvasambhavāt । na cā <quote>‘ntastaddharmopadeśā’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1.1.21.sū.)</ref>
dityadhikaraṇe tasya brahmaviṣayatvaṃ siddhamiti vācyam । sarvapāpodayaliṅgena ādityāntarva-
rtyeva brahma nākṣyantarvartītyadhikāśaṅkāyā ihaiva nivartanīyatvāt । na cobhayatrāpi nirṇāyakaliṅgaṃ
tulyamiti śaṅkanīyam । sarvapāpodayaliṅgasyāntarādityavarntiyeva śravaṇāt <quote>‘tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ
yadamuṣya rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau yannāma tannāme’</quote>ti nāmno'tideśānnāmapravṛttinimittatvena
sarvapāpodayo'pi tatra prāpnuyāditi cenna । nāmātideśasya tatpravṛttinimittaprāpakatvaniyamābhāvāt ।
<quote>‘dhanasāraścandrasaṃjña’</quote>ityādidarśanāt sarvapāpodayaliṅgena ādityāntarvarti brahmeti siddhau tannāmarū-
pātideśaviṣayasya <quote>‘tannāmanāmā tadrūpastatkāryakaraṇakṣamaḥ । tattulyavyavahāraśca tadājñāparipāla-
ka’</quote>iti nirdiṣṭasya saṃhārarudrasyeva svarasatastato bhedapratītyā tasminbrahmāsādhāraṇasarvapāpodaya-
dhyatirekasyaiva prāpteśca । na ca sarvalokakāmeśvaratvaliṅgena tasya brahmatvasiddhiḥ । talliṅgasiddhe-
rakṣyādityāntarvartipuruṣadvayaikyasiddhyadhīnatvasya tatraivādhikaraṇe darśitatvena tadbhedaśaṅkāyāṃ tada-
siddheḥ । na ca <quote>‘saiva ṛk‍tatsāma tadukthaṃ tadyajustadbrahme’</quote>tiśrutena sārvātmyenākṣipuruṣasya brahmatva-
siddhiḥ । ṛksāmādyātmakatvasya taittirīyopaniṣadādiṣu maṇḍalābhimānini jīve'pi prasiddhatvāt
ṛksāmādisamabhivyāhāreṇa tatra brahmaśabdasyāpi vedasāmānyaparatvaucityāt । na ca ṛksāmage-
ṣṇatvena tasya tatsiddhiḥ । ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyādyātmakatvasyeva tasyāpyakṣipuruṣe dhyānārthopapatteḥ ।
etena<quote>‘tadya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyanti etaṃ te gāyantī’</quote>ti laukikagāne'pyanuvṛttatvaṃ brahmaliṅgamityapi
śaṅkā nirastā । <quote>‘sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyādityamuccaissantaṃ gāyantī’</quote> tivattasyāsadarthavāda-
tvāt । tasmādihākṣipuruṣo jīva ityeva yuktam । na ca tasminnupāsakasākṣātkāraviṣaye brahmaṇīva
dṛśyatvoktirnānvetīti vācyam । tasya prathamapravṛttākṣisthatvaliṅgānusāreṇa jñeyatvamātraparatvopa-
patteḥ । yadi dṛśyatvaṃ mukhyamupapādanīyaṃ tarhyayamakṣipuruṣaḥ pratibimbo'stu tatra cākṣuṣasākṣātkāra-
viṣaye mukhyasya tasya sambhavāt brahmaṇyapi tadasaṃbhavāt । na ca puruṣaśrutiścetanavācinī nācetane
pratibimbe saṅgacchata iti vācyam ।<quote>‘ya eṣa’</quote> iti prasiddhiliṅgena dṛśyatvaliṅgena ca sandṛṣṭāyā-
stasyāḥ puruṣapratibimbaviṣayatvakalpanopapatteḥ । devadattapratibimbe devadattavyavahāradarśanāditi ।
evaṃ jīvaḥ pratitimbo vākṣipuruṣaḥ na tu parameśvara iti prāpte pūrvapakṣadvayavyāvartakaṃ siddhānta-
<pratika>māha—parameśvara eveti । nirupādhiketi ।</pratika> yatrocyamānasyārthasyāptavacanasambandhaḥ pratipādyaḥ

tvādīnāmasminnevopapatteḥ ।।
yaduktamakṣyantaḥsthitirīśvarasya na śruteti tatrāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan cakṣuṣo'ntaro yaṃ cakṣurna veda yasya cakṣuḥ śarīraṃ yaścakṣurantaro
yamayati eṣa na ātmā'ntaryāmyamṛtaḥ’</quote> <ref>(bṛha॰ 5.7.)</ref> ityādiśrutyā cakṣuḥsthiti-
niyamanādikamīśvarasya vyapadiśyate । ataḥ para evāyamīśvaraḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tatretiśabdo nārthavivakṣāṃ vārayati yathā—<quote>‘iti ha smopādhyāyaḥ kathayati ।’</quote> tasmādihāmṛtatvā-
dīnāmācāryavacanasambandhasya pratipādyatvāt itiśabdo <quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādāviva nārthavivakṣāyā
vārakaḥ । svābhāvikaṃ cāmṛtatvādikaṃ jīvasya na sambhavati pratibimbasya tu kathamapi na sambha-
vati । ato'mṛtatvādikaṃ parameśvara evopapadyate । ato brahmaśrutyamṛtatvābhayatvasaṃyadvāmatvavā-
manītvabhāmanītvaliṅgairbahubhi<quote>‘retadbrahme’</quote>tyādivākyāpāditasambandhairakṣipuruṣasya brahmatvaniścaye
satyakṣyādhāratvamekamaupacārikaṃ netavyam । upakramasthaikapramāṇāpekṣayoparitanānekapramāṇānāṃ ba-
lavattvasya pūrvaṃ nirṇītatvāditi bhāvaḥ ।। akṣyādhāratvamaupacārikamapi parameśvare na prasiddhamasti
iti śaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>yaduktamiti ।। sū ।।</pratika> sthānādivyapadeśācca ।। 14 ।।
antaryāmibrāhmaṇe tiṣṭhannityavasthānavācakaśabdasyāpi śrūyamāṇatvāt brahmaṇaḥ svamahimapratiṣṭha-
syāpyaupacārikamakṣyādhāratvaṃ vivakṣitamiti gamyate । iha dṛśyata ityupāsanākāle vartamānatva-
vyapadeśādapi tasya tadvivakṣitamiti gamyate । na hi rūpagrahaṇakālabimbasannidhānakālayori-
vopāsanākāle jīvapratibimbayorakṣisthitissambhavati । nanu, <quote>‘netrasthaṃ jāgrataṃ vidyātkaṇṭhe svapnaṃ
vinirdiśet । suṣuptau hṛdayasthaṃ tu turīyaṃ murdhani sthita’</quote>miti jāgaradaśāyāṃ sarvasyāpi jīvasyā-
kṣisthatvaśravaṇāt upāsanākāle'kṣyabhimukhabimbasannidhāpanasambhavācca tatkāle tayorakṣisthi-
tissambhavatīti cenna । <quote>‘turīyaṃ mūrdhanī’</quote>tyupāsanākāle tu turīyaśabdoktajīvasya mūrdhani sthi-
tiśravaṇena nāsāgranyastadṛṣṭike tasminkāle bimbasannidhāpanakalpanāgauravābhyupagame'pi prati-
bimbodayānupapattyā ca tadasambhavāt । tasmāttanniyantuḥ parameśvarasya niyamanārthamupāsanākā-
le'pyakṣiṇi sannidhānamastīti sa evehākṣyādhāro'stviti tadeva tasyaupacārikamakṣyādhāratvamiha
vivakṣitamityabhyupagantavyam । na cākṣyabhimānina ādityajīvasyāpyupāsanākālasādhāraṇī
tatra sthitirastīti sa evehākṣyādhāro'stviti śaṅkyam । <quote>‘raśmibhireṣo'sminpratiṣṭhita’</quote>iti śrute-
statparigrahe'pyakṣyādhāratvasyaupacārikatvānapāyena taṃ parigṛhya brahmaśrutyādyupekṣaṇāyogāt ।
tadetatsarvamabhipretya sūtre <quote>‘sthānādī’</quote>tyādigrahaṇamapi kṛtamiti matvā bhāṣye tadvivaraṇārthaṃ
<quote>‘niyamanādika’</quote>mityuktam । tatrādiśabdena tu <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarakṣiṇī’</quote>ti śrutimapi prāgitiśabdena
prakāravācinā saṅgṛhītāmabhipretya tatpratipādyasyākṣyādhārasya parameśvaratvasādhakaṃ sārvātmyā-
dikaṃ saṅgṛhītam । na hyādityajīvasya ṛksāmādyātmakatvaṃ mukhyaṃ sambhavati yadi tasyā-

chāyāpuruṣapakṣe punaranupapattimāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma’</quote> iti pūrvamasya sukhaviśiṣṭatayā'bhidhānādevāyamīśvaraḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣyādhāratvaṃ mukhyaṃ sambhavettadā prathamaśrutamukhyatvalobhādaupacārikamapi tatparigṛhyeta । tadapi
raśmidvārākṣiṇi pratiṣṭhite tasminmukhyaṃ na sambhavatītyuktam । sarvapāpoditatvamapi tasya parame-
śvaratvasādhakam । yathā khalvagnihotranāmnaḥ kauṇḍapāyināmayane karmaṇyupadiṣṭasya <quote>‘siṃho devadatta’</quote>
ityādivatsiddhadharmāvalambanagauṇatvasambhave'pyanuṣṭhānopayogidharmalābhāya <quote>‘piṣṭapiṇḍāḥ siṃhāḥ
kriyantā’</quote>mityatreva sādhyadharmāvalambanagauṇatvamaṅgīkṛtya tasya naiyamikāgnihotrāṅgakalāpaprāpaka-
tvamuktam । tathāpyakṣipuruṣo'tidiṣṭasyoditināmnaḥ karpūre'tidiṣṭasya candranāmajātasyeva klṛptapra-
vṛttinimittaṃ vinābhidhāyakatvasambhave'pyupāsanopayogiguṇalābhāya klṛptapravṛttinimittāvalamba-
nābhidhāyakatvamaṅgīkṛtya tasyādityapuruṣaśrutasarvapāpoditatvatatphalaprāpakatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktamiti
bhāvaḥ । ato jīvapratibimbagrahaṇāsambhavāt parameśvara evāyamakṣipuruṣa ityāha—<pratika>ataḥ para
evāyamiti ।।</pratika> evaṃ pūrvapakṣadvayasādhāraṇasiddhānto darśitaḥ । uttarasūtraṃ pratibimbapūrvapakṣānu-
papattipradarśanārthatvenāvatārayati---<pratika>chāyeti</pratika> ।। sū ।। <pratika>sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।। 15 ।।</pratika>
<pratika>sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānāditi । kaṃ brahmeti</pratika> । kaśabdaḥ sukhavācī nīlādiśabdavatprakāripa-
ryanta iti bhāvaḥ । nanu prāṇādiṣu pratyekaṃ brahmapadayogā<quote>‘nnāma brahma’</quote><quote>‘mano brahme’</quote>tyādāviva brahma-
dṛṣṭividhiparatvaṃ yuktam । ata eva <quote>‘prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tadākāśaṃ cocu’</quote>riti prāṇādiśabdena
nigamanaṃ dṛśyate । prāṇādipradhānatvāt । brahmapradhānatve hi brahmaśabdena nigamanaṃ syāt । ato
nātra brahma prakṛtamasti । yena <quote>‘ya eṣa’</quote> iti sarvanāmno prakṛtaparāmarśitvādakṣipuruṣo brahma bhave-
diti ceducyate । nedaṃ brahmadṛṣṭividhānaṃ <quote>‘prāṇo brahme’</quote>tyādyupadeśānantaraṃ <quote>‘vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo
brahme’</quote>ti<quote>‘kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmī’</quote>tyupakosalapraśnasya<quote>‘yadvyāpakaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva ka’</quote>miti
taduttarasya cānanvayaprasaṅgāt । na hi <quote>‘prāṇo brahme’</quote>tyādīnāṃ prāṇādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭividhiparatvena
vākyatrayarūpatāyāmādyasya vākyasyārthaṃ jānāmi anyayorarthaṃ na jānāmīti viśiṣya praśnasyā-
vakāśo'sti । na vā kakhaśabdoktayoraikyenottaraṃ saṅgacchate । <quote>‘yadvyāpakaṃ tadeva kha’</quote>miti vaiṣa-
yikasukhe bhūtākāśadṛṣṭiparaṃ <quote>‘yadeva khaṃ tadeva ka’</quote>miti bhūtākāśe vaiṣayikasukhadṛṣṭiparamityevaṃ
yojanāyāmapi <quote>‘kaṃ brahma’</quote><quote>‘khaṃ brahme’</quote>tyanayorarthājñānena pṛṣṭavantaṃ prati taduttaratvenānvayo na saṅga-
cchate । na hi kayościdvidhyorabhiprāyājñānena praśnasya vidhyantaravacanamuttaraṃ bhavati । tasmā-
ditthaṃ praśnottare yojanīye । <quote>‘prāṇo brahme’</quote>ti vākyasyārthaṃ jānāmi । brahmaṇi hi sakalajagatprā-
ṇayitṛtvamupāsyaguṇa ityupapadyate । kakhaśabdayuktavākyadvayārthaṃ tu na jānāmi । yadi
hi prāṇatvavat kaśabdoktasukharūpatvaṃ khaśabdoktaparamavyomarūpatvaṃ copāsyaguṇāntaraṃ vivakṣitaṃ
syāt tadā <quote>‘kaṃ kha’</quote> mityetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ bhavet । tathā sati prāṇatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmo-
pāsyamityekeneva vākyena vihitaṃ bhavati । <quote>‘kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti pratyekaṃ brahmaśabdayogena
punarvākyadvayaṃ kimartham । prāṇasukhabhūtākāśeṣu brahmadṛṣṭividhayastrayo'treti vaktuṃ na śa-
kyate । na hi mokṣārthamekāṃ brahmavidyāmarthayamānaṃ māṃ pratyabrahmavidyā bahvīrbhavaṃta upadiśeyuriti
<pb n="359"/>
na hi chāyāpuruṣe sukhasaṃbhavaḥ ।। yaduktamakṣipuruṣasya jīvarūpatvaṃ tatrāha---

praśnābhiprāyaḥ । uttarasya tvayamabhiprāyaḥ । yadi <quote>‘prāṇo brahma kaṃ kha’</quote>mityetāvaducyeta
tadā <quote>‘yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syā’</quote>diti śrutāvākāśānandaśabdayoriva kakhaśabdayo-
rviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvenānvayāt paramavyomātmakasukharūpatvamekamevopāsyaguṇa iti labhyate । na
tu paramavyomātmakasukharūpatvaṃ sukhātmakaparamavyomarūpatvaṃ copāsyaguṇadvayamiti । tatho-
pāsyaguṇadvayaṃ ceha vivakṣitam । tallābhāya kakhaśabdoktayossukhaparamavyomnossvātantryeṇa
brahmaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ prakaṭayituṃ <quote>‘kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti pratyekaṃ brahmaśabdayuktaṃ vākyadvayaṃ kṛtam ।
yadyapi tena vākyadvayena sukharūpatvaṃ paramavyomarūpatvaṃ ca brahmaṇassvatantraṃ viśeṣaṇadvayamiti tā-
vadeva labhyate na tu tasya viśeṣaṇadvayasya parasparaviśeṣitatvamapi । tathāpi<quote>‘yadvyāpakaṃ tadeva khaṃ
yadevaṃ khaṃ tadeva ka’</quote>miti parasparaviśeṣitasukhaparamavyomapradarśakavākyadvayarūpottaravaśā<quote>‘tkaṃ brahma
khaṃ brahme’tyatrāpi tāvatparyantavivakṣāstītyavasīyata iti tasmā’tkaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti vākyadvaya-
nirdiṣṭaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva na tu brahmadṛṣṭiviśiṣṭaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ ca । kakhaśabdoktayossukhā-
kāśayoragre parasparavaiśiṣṭyābhidhānādvaiṣayikasukhabhūtākāśayostadasambhavāt । asminnapyarthe
sūtramitthaṃ pakṣādhyāhāreṇa yojanīyam । <quote>‘kaṃ brahme’</quote>tivākyanirdiṣṭaṃ paraṃ brahma na tu brahmadṛṣṭivi-
śiṣṭaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sukham । sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva sukheṣu yadviśiṣṭaṃ paramavyomātmakaṃ niratiśayaṃ
sukhaṃ tasya kaśabdenābhidhānādityarthaḥ । tathā<quote>‘khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti vākyanirdiṣṭaṃ ca paraṃ brahma na tu tadda‍ṛ-
ṣṭiviśiṣṭo bhūtākāśaḥ । sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva śobhanaṃ yatsvaṃ sukhātmakaṃ paramaṃ vyoma tasya
khaśabdenābhidhānādityarthaḥ । evaṃ sūtrasyānyadapi prayojanadvayamabhipretyaiva sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānā-
diti guru sūtraṃ kṛtam । anyathā lāghavārthamantradhikaraṇadyubhvādyadhikaraṇayoriva <quote>‘prakaraṇā’</quote>dityeva
sūtramakariṣyata । evakāraśca yojanāntaravivakṣāyāmevārthavān । yassukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānāditi
heturakṣipuruṣasya brahmatve sādhye sa eva hetvasiddhiparihārārthe <quote>‘kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>tyatra nirdiṣṭasya
brahmatve sādhye'pi hetuḥ । hetuvākyasyārthaḥ paraṃ tatra tatra bhidyata iti । evaṃ praśnottaraparyālo-
canayā dṛṣṭividhyasambhave siddhe satyupakramānusāreṇa <quote>‘prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tadākāśaṃ cocu’</quote>riti ni-
gamanavākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsyaguṇatrayopasaṃhārārthaṃ na tu brahmadṛṣṭyālambanatrayopasaṃhārārthamiti yoja-
nīyam । prāṇaṃ prāṇatvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ tatsukhātmakamākāśaṃ paramavyomātmakaṃ ca brahmāgnaya ūcuriti
tadartho varṇanīyaḥ । nanu mābhū<quote>‘tkaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>tyatra vaiṣayikasukhabhūtākāśayorbrahmadṛṣṭividhā-

ayamapyartha<quote>‘ssukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeve’</quote>ti sūtreṇaiva lambhanīyaḥ । atra chāyāpuruṣatvānupapattau
sautreṇa cakāreṇa hetvantaraṃ samuccīyate । yato mokṣārthaṃ brahmavidyāmarthayamānāya <quote>‘kaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādyu-
padeśaḥ । ato nātra nirdiṣṭaḥ pratibimbaḥ kiṃ tu brahmaiveti । evaṃ<quote>‘kaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādau nirdiṣṭaḥ prati-

vatī’</quote>ti śrutyantare brahmavidyāphalatvena prasiddhasya putrapautrādīnāṃ brahmavittvasyānuguṇaṃ teṣāṃ sa-
tkarmabhirakṣīṇatvamucyate । <quote>‘upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāma’</quote> iti vākyena brahmopāsanārambhaprabhṛti brahmaprā-
ptiparyantaṃ madhyesambhāvitasakalavighnanivāraṇenāgnīnāṃ samīpe sannidhāyopāsakaparipālakatva-
mucyate । evaṃ brahmavidyāphalānuguṇaphalakatvena tadaṅgatvādapi nāgnividyānāṃ vyavadhāyakatvam ।
ataḥ prakaraṇānuvṛtterasandigdhatayā <quote>‘ya eṣa’</quote> iti sarvanāmnorbādhakābhāvena prakṛtabrahmaparāmarśi-
tvā<quote>‘detadbrahme’</quote>ti vākyena prakṛtabrahmarūpatāpratyabhijñānāccākṣipuruṣaḥ prakṛtaṃ parameva brahmeti ।।
uttarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>pūrvapakṣa iti</pratika> ।। pūrvapakṣadvaya ityarthaḥ । yadyapi pūrvapakṣadvayanirākaraṇārthaṃ
sūtraṃ tadarthasūtrāntarasaṅgatamekaikapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthasūtradvayātprāgeva kartavyaṃ tathāpi gatimātrā-
bhidhānapariśeṣāt sthānaguṇābhidhānaṃ na prakṛtabrahmavidyānvayīti śaṅkāvāraṇārthamanena sūtreṇā-
rthāntarasyāpi vivakṣitatvāttadarthasaṅgatyātra kṛtam <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca</pratika>
।। 17 ।। jīvagatāgatacintakānāṃ vacanabalādbhavantyapyarcirādigatirbrahmavidāmevetyutsargo bā-
dhakābhāvānnāpavādyata iti bhāvaḥ । atra brahmaśrutyādīnāmitiśabdaśiraskatvenāvivakṣitārtha-
tvaśaṅkākulitatvādbrahmaprakaraṇānubandhasya sato'pi mārgābhidhānamātraviṣayatvaśaṅkākrāntatvānnā-
tispaṣṭateti pādasaṅgatiḥ ।।
<head>।। iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athāntarādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। antara upapatteḥ ।। 13 ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca ।। 14 ।। sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।। 15 ।।
ata eva sa brahma ।। 16 ।। śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>akṣipuruṣaḥ prasiddherjīvaḥ pratiyātanāthavā puṃsaḥ । śiva evāmṛtatādyaistasyāpyakṣṇi sthitiḥ prasiddhaiva ।। 42 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityantarādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="364"/>
atha anavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
asya mahopaniṣadi śrūyate viṣayaḥ---<quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo'ṅguṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ ।
īśaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ prīṇāti viśvabhuk।।’</quote> ityādi ।। ihāṅguṣṭhamātratvādi-
viśiṣṭaḥ parameśvaro vā'nyo veti saṃśayaḥ ।। prāṇāgnihotraprakaraṇāt <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamā-
traḥ’</quote> ityalpatvavyapadeśācca ayaṃ prāṇavāyureva pañcānāmāhutīmāṃ bhoktā'vagamyate ।
na cāsya bhok‍tṛtvānupapattiḥ, <quote>‘āpaśca pṛthivī cānnamattārau vahnimārutau’</quote> ityā-
diṣu vāyorapi bhok‍tṛtvaprasiddheḥ । sarvathā'yaṃ prāṇavāyuriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। parame-
śvara eveti siddhāntaḥ, sakalajagadīśatvaviśvabhuktvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmanyatrābhi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
anavasthiterasambhavācca netaraḥ ।। 18 ।। ihāpi pūrvādhikaraṇa ivopāsakanediṣṭhasthānā-
ntaroktiriti prāsaṅgikasaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭeti bhāṣye na pradarśitā । dṛṣṭāntapratyudāharaṇarūpaṃ saṅgatya-
ntaramapi pūrvapakṣopanyāsena sphuṭībhaviṣyatīti viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya prāṇaliṅgaprakaraṇayorbrahma-
liṅgayośca balābalānavadhāraṇātsaṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>asyeti</pratika> । yathā brahmaprakaraṇādakṣipuruṣo
brahma tathā prāṇāgnihotraprakaraṇādaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ prāṇa iti pūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>prāṇeti । aṅguṣṭheti</pratika> ।
nanvaṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvaṃ sakalaśarīravyāpini prāṇe'pi na sambhavati aṅguṣṭhasamāśrayaṇopādhikaṃ tu
tat brahmaṇyapi sambhavatīti cenna । brahmaṇi mukhyasyāṅguṣṭhasamāśrayaṇasyāsambhavena tadupādhi-
kasya tasya brahmaṇyanupapatteḥ । aṅguṣṭhāvacchedopādhikasya tasya brahmaṇi sambhave'pyatra <quote>‘samā-
śrita’</quote> iti samāśrayaṇopādhikasyaiva tasya grāhyatvāt । na cākṣyādhāratvamivāṅguṣṭhasamāśrayaṇama-
mukhyaṃ grāhyam । tathehāmukhyagrahaṇahetvabhāvāt । <quote>‘īśassarvasya jagata’</quote> ityasya dhāraṇena patanā-
bhāvaṃ sampādya sthānāsanagamanādiṣu sarveṣāmapi dehānniyacchati prāṇo'pyupapatteḥ । <quote>‘īśānamasya
jagatassuvardṛśamīśānamindra tasthuṣa’</quote> iti nirdiṣṭasthāvarapratidvaṃdvijaṅgamamātraparatayā jagaccha-
bdasya prayuktatayā tathehāpi kāryasāmānyaparatvamapahāya jaṅgamamātraparatvābhyupagamopapatteḥ ।
tasya kāryasāmānyaparatve'pi vacanabalātprāṇasyāpi sarvajagadīśvaratvopapatteśca । brahmaprakaraṇe
sarvaiśvaryaśravaṇādeva hi brahmaṇastadabhyupagamyate । iha <quote>‘prāṇe niviṣṭo'mṛtaṃ juhomī’</quote>tyādimantro-
pakrame prāṇaprakaraṇe'smin <quote>‘īśassarvasya jagat’</quote> iti śravaṇe jāgrati prāṇasyāpi kimiti tannā-
bhyupagantavyam । tasyāpi brahmaṇa iva mahāmahimā śrūyate । <quote>‘yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā
evamasminprāṇo sarvaṃ samarpita’</quote>miti bhūmavidyāyāṃ sarvādhāratvaṃ tāvacchruyate । tathā <quote>‘prāṇo ha
pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇassvasā prāṇa ācārya’</quote>iti hitapravartakatvasaṃrakṣakatvādi-
guṇayogātpitṛmātrādyātmanā rūpaṇaṃ dṛśyate । evaṃ prāṇasaṃvādādiṣvapi prāṇasya bhūyāṃsi mahā-
mahimaśravaṇāni । evaṃ ca <quote>‘viśvabhugi’</quote>ti viśeṣaṇamapi viśvaṃ bhunakti pālayatītyarthakatayā
prāṇe suyojamiti spaṣṭameva । bhujerabhyavahārārthatve'pi nāsaṅgatiḥ । pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya sakala-
prāṇāhutyuddeśyatvāt । <quote>‘attārau vahnimārutā’</quote>viti śravaṇācceti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । yadi ja-
gacchabdo jaṅgamaparaḥ kāryasāmānyaparo vā yadi bhujiḥ pālanārthaḥ adanārtho vā sarvathāpya-
ṅguṣṭhamātraḥ prāṇaḥ talliṅgaprakaraṇayorbādhakābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । <pratika>parameśvara eveti</pratika> । jagacchabdo-
<pb n="365"/>
dhāne'navasthānāt, asaṃbhavācca tatra teṣām । ata īśvara evaitādṛśaḥ । tasya prā-
ṇarūpatvenāpyupāsyatvamucyate, <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ granthirasi rudro mā viśāntakaḥ’</quote> iti
prāṇādhāratvena tasya śravaṇāt । aṅguṣṭhamātraparimāṇasyopāsyatvādityavirodhaḥ । prā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
'tra rūḍhyā bhūtādiṣu lokeṣu vā vartate । rūḍhisambhave yogagrahaṇāyogāt । viśvaśabdaśca bhu-
jiviṣayatvayogyasāmastyaparaḥ na tu prāṇāhutisāmastyaparaḥ । saṅkoce kārāṇābhāvāt । na ca
sarvalokeśvaratvaṃ viśvabhoktṛtvaṃ ca brahmaṇīva prāṇe'pyabhyupagantuṃ śakyam । śrutivaśādabhyupaga-
myatāmiti cenna । tathā sati <quote>‘indro yātovasitasya rājā । ātvā viśantvindavaḥ । samudramiva
sindhavaḥ । na tvāmindrātiricyate।’</quote> ityādiśrutyanusāreṇendrādiṣvapi tayorabhyupagantavyatvenā-
vyavasthāprasaṅgāt । prāṇe tayorasambhavācca । <quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇa’</quote> iti brahmasṛjyatvena <quote>‘na
prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana । itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritā’</quote>viti bra-
hmāśrayādhīnasvakāryakaraṇaśaktikatvena ca <pratika>prāṇaḥ</pratika> śrūyate । kathamayamasaṅkucitasakalajagatanapekṣe-
śitā syāt । kathaṃ cāsaṅkucitasakalabhoktā syāt । kathaṃ ca niraṅkuśaprabhavitṛparamaprabhuśabdo-
ktasakalotpādakaḥ syāt । bhūmavidyāyāṃ prāṇaśabdastu jīvaparaḥ । tasya mukhyaprāṇaparatve'pi
jīva iva tatrāpi sarvādhāratvamaupacārikaṃ pitṛtvādivacanaṃ prāṇa eva pitrādiḥ na tu śarīra-
mityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pradarśanaparam । tadetadbha‍ūmavidyāyāṃ spaṣṭībhaviṣyati । tasmādudāhṛta-
liṅgadvayānusārāt parabrahmarūpaḥ śiva evāyamiti bhāvaḥ । nanu prāṇāgnihotramantraprakaraṇāmnā-
nādupakramagataliṅgavaśācca prāṇāhutyārādhitaprāṇaviṣaya evāyaṃ mantrassyādityāśaṅkya prakaraṇa-
mavirodhena saṅgamayati—<pratika>tasyeti । prāṇarūpatveneti</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇe niviṣṭa’</quote> ityādimantreṣu prāṇā-
diśabdāstadantaryāmiparyantāḥ । teṣāmantaryāmiṇyapi śaktyaviśeṣāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu sākṣāttva-
syautsargikatvāt prāṇādipravṛttinimittasākṣādāśrayāḥ mukhyaprāṇavṛttaya eva tairabhidhīyeran
prasiddhiprācuryāccetyāśaṅkya teṣāṃ tadatilaṅghanenāntaryāmiparyantatve pramāṇamāha—<pratika>prāṇānāmi-
ti</pratika> । <quote>‘tenānnenāpyāyasve’</quote>ti mantraśeṣaḥ । <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣa’</quote> iti mantrātprāk <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ gra-
nthirasī’</quote>tyādimantra āmnāyate । tena parameśvaraṃ prati prārthanā kriyate । tvaṃ khalu prāṇanāṃ gra-
nthiḥ grathayitā niścitatvena vyavasthāpako'si । atastvamantakassaṃhārakartā rudro bhūtvā māṃ
praviśaḥ । tena kālāgnirudrātmanā rūpeṇāśitamannaṃ paktvā annavīryeṇa māmāpyāyitaṃ kurviti ma-
ntrārthaḥ । <quote>‘rudro vā eṣa yadagnistasyaite tanuvau ghorānyā śivānye’</quote>ti parameśvarasya dvividhaṃ rūpaṃ
prasiddham । tasya bhojanakāle jāṭharāgnijvālāśāntyarthaṃ śivarūpeṇāntarbhoktṛtayā sannidhānaṃ
<quote>‘prāṇe niviṣṭo'mṛtaṃ juhomī’</quote>ti <quote>‘śivo mā viśāpradāhāye’</quote>tyādibhiḥ prāṇāhutimantraiḥ prārthi-
tam । bhojanānantaraṃ jaṭharābhimarśanamantreṇānena bhuktānnapariṇāmakṛtadehāpyāyanena prāṇānāṃ
niścalatayā dehe'vasthānasiddhaye rudrarūpeṇāntaḥpaktṛtayā sannidhānaṃ prārthyate । ato'tra mantrā-
ṇāmantaryāmipradhānatvāt <quote>‘prāṇe niviṣṭa’</quote> ityādimantrāṇāṃ <quote>‘prāṇātmani tvayyabhiniviṣṭo bhakta-
ssannamṛtaṃ juhomī’</quote>tyādirartho grāhya iti bhāvaḥ । liṅgamupapādayati—<pratika>aṅguṣṭhamātreti</pratika> । aṅguṣṭha-
parimāṇarūpamupāsyagataṃ tadrūpāvacchedenāṅguṣṭhasamāśrayaṇamaṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvaṃ copapadyata iti
bhāvaḥ । jaṭharābhimarśānantaraṃ dakṣiṇapādāṅguṣṭhe pāṇijalasrāvaṇārtho'yaṃ mantraḥ । tataśca brahmā-
<pb n="366"/>
ṇavāyoḥ bhok‍tṛtvasiddhāvapi <quote>‘viśvabhuk’</quote> ityetat na saṃbhavati । ato'yamī-
śvara eva prāṇāgnihotrārādhyatvena prāṇarūpaḥ pratipādyata iti siddham ।।
ityanavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇḍamūlabhūtādhāralokasthitakālāgnirudrātmanā, piṇḍādhārabhūte pādāṅguṣṭhe parameśvaraṃ dhyātvā ta-
tprītyarthaṃ pāṇijalasrāvaṇamanena mantreṇa kartavyamiti paryavasyati । nanu viśvabhuktvaṃ prāṇavāyau
na sambhanatītyuktaṃ tadanupapannam । <quote>‘sarva eva hāryojanasya lipsanta’</quote> ityatra sarvaśabdasya soma-
yāge karmakartṛtvena prakṛteṣvivātra viśvaśabdasya haviṣṭvena prakṛteṣu prāṇāhutidravyeṣu saṅkocasa-
mbhavādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>prāṇavāyoriti</pratika> । hāryojanabhakṣaṇe niraṅkuśasarvapuruṣānvayāsambhavāt
prakaraṇaṃ saṅkocakamaṅgīkṛtam । iha viśvabhugityasyāsaṅkucitasakalahavyakavyabhoktṛparameśvaravi-
ṣayatvasambhavānna prakaraṇaṃ saṅkocakamaṅgīkartavyamiti bhāvaḥ । nanvatrāṅguṣṭhamātrasya parameśvarasyo-
pāsyatvaṃ vyavahṛtaṃ tadanupapannam । prāṇāgnihotrakarmānvayidevatārūpaparameśvaraprakāśakānāṃ mantrā-
ṇāmupāsyasamarpakatvābhāvādityāśaṅkāṃ nirākurvannadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । karmā-
rādhyatvena pratipādyasyāpi karmakāle dhyātavyatvamastītyetāvatopāsyatvamuktamiti na virodha
iti bhāvaḥ । karmānvayidevatāvicārātmakasyādhikaraṇasya mumukṣūpāsyavicārātmake'smin
śāstre pravartanasya phalaṃ vaiśvānarādhikaraṇe pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ ।।
<head>iti anavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athānavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prīṇāti viśvabhugiti prāṇaḥ prāṇāgnihotrapūjyaḥ syāt । bhoktṛtvamasti tasyāpyattārau vahnimārutāviti hi ।। 43 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>viśveśaviśvabhuktvaṃ yadyanyatrāpi na vyavasthā syāt । na ca saṃbhavati tato'sminprāṇādhāraḥ śivaḥ pujyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityanavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 5 ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। antara upapatteḥ ।। 13 ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca ।।14।। sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।। 15 ।।
(ata eva sa brahma ।) śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca ।। 16 ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ ।। 17 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate, sū॰ ।। antaraupapatteḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘ya eṣo'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmeti hovācai-
tadamṛtametadabhayametadbrahme’</quote>ti <quote>‘tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī hyeva gacchatī’</quote>tyādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atrāntarakṣa-
ṇyupadiśyamānaḥ pratibiṃbātmā vā jīvātmā vā indriyādhiṣṭātṛdevatātmā vā athaveśvara iti saṃśayaḥ । dṛśyamānatvaprasiddheḥ prati-
biṃbātmā vā, rupadraṣṭṭatvena cakṣuṣi sannidhānājjīvo vā, raśmibhireṣo'sminpratiṣṭhita’ityādiśravaṇāt ādityapuruṣo vā syāt ।
ātmatvāmṛtatvādidharmāścaiṣu triṣvapi pakṣeṣu kathaṃcidupapadyeran sthānaviśeṣanirdeśānna paramātmeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । ātmatvāmṛtatvābha-
yatvāpahatapāpmatvasaṃyadvāmatvādidharmāṇāmasminparamātmani sāmañjasyenopapatteḥ nirlepasyāsya nirlepacakṣuḥsthānānurūpyācca parameśvara
iti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca</pratika>।। 14।। anyeṣāmapi pṛthivyādisthānānāṃ nāmarūpādīnāṃ ca śrutiṣvasya paramātmana
eva vyapadeśadarśanāt sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣopadeśe virodhābhāvāccākṣisthānatvaṃ brahmaṇa upapadyata eva ।
ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>prakaraṇādapyakṣisthaḥ paramātmaivaityāha---<pratika>sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca</pratika> ।। 15 ।। <quote>‘prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti
vākyopakrame śrutasya sukhaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇa evehābhidānādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="367"/>
<p>liṅgādapi paramātmetyāha—<pratika>śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca</pratika> ।। 16 ।। śrutarahasyavijñānabrahmavitprāpyadevayānākhyaga-
terevehākṣipuruṣavido'bhidhānācetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ</pratika> ।। 17 ।। pratibiṃbajīvapakṣayorakṣṇi tayornityāvasthānābhāvādādityapakṣe
tadupapattāvapi ātmatvādyasaṃbhavāt triṣvapyamṛtatvābhayatvādidharmāṇā sutarāmasaṃbhavācca parameśvara evākṣisthānaḥ pratyetavya ityarthaḥ 17</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, <quote>‘anavasthite’</quote></pratika> rityetadadhikaraṇāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ । viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣādikaṃ pūrvavat prāyaśaḥ ।
saṃśayavikalpe indriyādhiṣṭhātṛdevatātmatvaṃ tu nopāttam । <quote>‘daharaṃ vipāpaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘padmakośapratīkāśa’</quote>mityādiṣu parameśvarasya hṛdayapuṇḍarīka
eva sannidhānaśravaṇādakṣyantaḥsthiteraśravaṇādakṣyantaḥśrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ pratibiṃbātmā vā jīvo vā syānna parameśvara iti pūrva-
pakṣaṃ kṛtvā nirupādhikāmṛtatvābhayatvādīnāṃ parameśvara evopapattesya evākṣyantaśśrūyate iti siddhāntitam ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p>yaduktamakṣyantaḥ sthitirīśvarasya na śruteti tatrāha---<pratika>sthānādivyapadeśācca</pratika> ।। 14 ।। <quote>‘yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiśru-
tiṣu cakṣuḥsthitiniyamanādikasya vyapadiśyamānatvāccāyaṃ parameśvara evetyarthaḥ ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p>pratibiṃbātmapakṣe'nupapattimāha—<pratika>sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca</pratika> ।। 15 ।। pratibiṃbātmani sukhāsaṃbhavāt <quote>‘kaṃ brahma khaṃ
brahme’</quote>ti pūrvamasya sukhaviśiṣṭatayābhidhānāccayaṃ parameśvara eva ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p>yaduktamakṣipuruṣasya jīvarūpatvaṃ tatrāha---<pratika>ata eva sa brahma</pratika> ।। 16 ।। śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣyayorevāsya sūtratvena lekhanaṃ
dṛśyate—<pratika>ata eva</pratika>=yata eva <quote>‘yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ tadeva ka’</quote>miti kakhaśabdābhidheyaṃ prakṛtaṃ brahmaivāparicchinnasukharūpata-
yopadiṣṭamata eva—<pratika>saḥ</pratika>=akṣyādhāratayā pratipādyamānaḥ—<pratika>brahma</pratika>=parameśvara eva । jīve niratiśayasukharūpatvāsaṃbhavānna jīva ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>pūrvapakṣe punaranyāmanupapattimāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca</pratika> ।। 17 ।। śrutabrahmasvarūpādhigantavyārcirā-
digaterakṣipuruṣaṃ śrutavataḥ pratipādanācca nāsau jīvaśchāyāpuruṣo vā bhavitumarhati kiṃ tvīśvara eveti siddham ।। 17 ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate antarādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ</pratika> ।। 18 ।। asya <quote>‘aguṃṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo'guṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ । īśassarvasya jagataḥ
prabhuḥ prīṇāti viśvabhu’</quote>gityādi mahopaniṣadvākyaṃ viṣayaṃ । ihāṅguṣṭhamātratvādiviśiṣṭaḥ prāṇavāyurvā parameśvaro veti saṃśayaḥ ।
prāṇāgnihotraprakaraṇādaṃguṣṭhamātra ityalpatvavyapadeśāca paṃcāhutibhoktā prāṇavāyureveti pūrvapakṣaḥ । sakalajagadīśvaratvaviśvabhuktvā-
dīnāṃ dharmāṇāmanyatrābhidhāne'navasthānādasaṃbhavācca na prāṇaḥ kiṃ tu parameśvara eveti siddhāntaḥ । ato'treśvara eva prāṇāgnihotrā-
rādhyatvena prāṇarūpaḥ pratipādyata iti siddham ।। 18 ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate anavasthityadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, <quote>‘antaraupapatte’</quote></pratika>rityārabhya <pratika><quote>‘anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netara’</quote></pratika> ityantaṃ sūtraṣaṭkamekādhikaraṇameva ।
arthavarṇane paraṃ prāyaḥśrīkaṇṭhamatamevānusriyate । viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । saṃśayakoṭistu bhagavatpādamatavat akṣyantaḥśrūyamāṇaḥ
pratibiṃbātmā vā jīvo vā indriyādhiṣṭhātṛdevatātmā vā paramātmā veti caturvidhaiva । pratibiṃbadevatājīveṣvekatamasyaivākṣyantaḥ-
śrūyamāṇatvaṃ na paramātmana iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, sū॰ ।। <pratika>antara upapatteḥ</pratika> ।। 13 ।। nirupādhikāmṛtatvābhayatvasaṃya-
dvāmatvādīnāṃ paramātmanyevopapatterantaraḥ paramātmaivetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca ।।14।। sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।।15।। ata eva ca sa brahma ।।16।।
śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca</pratika> ।। 17 ।। ityeteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ sūtrāṇāmarthaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatānna bhidyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ</pratika> ।। 18 ।। parasmāditaro jīvādirnākṣyādhāraḥ । cakṣuṣi niyamenānavasthitera-
mṛtatvādyasaṃbhavācca ।। iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika> । viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । akṣisthaḥ puruṣaḥ agnirvā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । tasminneva prakaraṇe agninā
<quote>‘ya evāditye puruṣasso'hamasmī’</quote>ti svasyādityamaṇḍalasthatvābhidhānāt <quote>‘eṣā somya te'smadvidyā cātmavidyā ce’</quote>ti tatrāgnivi-
dyāyā ātmavidyātaḥ pṛthaktvasyopadeśāccādityasyaivākṣisthatvādagnirevākṣistha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu amṛtatvābhayatvā-
diniravakāśabahuliṅgādyanurodhādvidyābhedokteragnyantaryāmitvasarvagatatvāditaddharmabhedamūlakatvādubhayatra viṣṇorekasyaivopāsyatvāvagamācca
akṣistho viṣṇureveti ।। sūtrārthastu, <pratika>sū॰ ।। antara upapatteḥ ।। 13 ।। antaraḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarakṣiṇī’</quote>ti śrutyuktaḥ cakṣura-
ntaḥstho viṣṇureva na tvagniḥ । kutaḥ—<pratika>upapatte</pratika>=etadamṛtatvabrahmaśabdādīnāmantare śravaṇātteṣāṃ ca viṣṇāvevopapatterityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sthānādivyapadeśācca ।। 14 ।।</pratika> brahmasthānabhūtākṣiśakteḥ tadadhiṣṭhātṛbrahmaśakteścākṣisthapuruṣasaṃbandhādakṣisthā-
nāsaṃgatvādervyapadeśādakṣistho viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="368"/>
atha antaryāmyadhikakaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
sarvajñasya sarvaśaktaḥ sarvānugrāhakasya vibhorapi śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ savitṛma-
ṇḍalapuruṣahṛdayapuṇḍarīkādiṣūpāsanāya sthitirūpapāditā sarvatra tāṃ pratipādayi-
tumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। antaryāmyadhidaivādhilokādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
antaryāmibrāhmaṇe'sya viṣayaḥ śrūyate <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro
yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmā-
'ntaryāmyamṛtaḥ’</quote>---iti ।। evaṃ pṛthivīmārabhya pratiparyāyamātmatattvaparyantamakhila-
vastvantaryāmitayā śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvaro jīvo virāṭpuruṣo vā pradhānaṃ veti
saṃśayaḥ । svopārjitavicitraphalabhogāya sakalabhūtendriyānupraveśo jīvasya yujya-
te । sakalacetanopādānatayā sarvabhūtānupraveśo virāṭpuruṣasya yuktaḥ । athavā ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṅgatipradarśanapūrvakamuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>sarvajñasyeti</pratika> । vibhutvopapādakaṃ sarva-
jñatvādiviśeṣaṇatrayam । sarvajñatvaṃ sakalaprapañcāparokṣīkaraṇam । sarvaśaktimattvaṃ tadupādānatvaṃ
sarvānugrāhakatvaṃ tatsattāsphūrtipradatvam ।। sū ।। <pratika>antaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśā-
t</pratika> ।। 19 ।। bṛhadāraṇyopaniṣadgataṃ viṣayavākyamudāharati—<pratika>antaryāmibrāhmaṇa iti</pratika> । <quote>‘sa
ta ātme’</quote> ti mādhyaṃdināpāṭhaḥ । <quote>‘eṣa ta’</quote> iti tu kāṇvapāṭhaḥ—<pratika>pṛthivīmārabhyeti</pratika> । pṛthivīja-
lāgnyantarikṣavāyvādityadikvandratārakātamaḥprabhṛtiṣvātmaparyanteṣvakhilavastuṣvantaryāmitayā
śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvarastadanyo veti parameśvare heyasakalaprapañcānupraveśasambhavāsambhavābhyāṃ prathamaṃ
saṃśayaḥ । tatastadanyakoṭau jīvo virāṭpuruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ veti । pṛthivyādyamanupraveśasya jīvādi-
trayasādhāraṇyātsaṃśayaḥ । jīvapakṣe tāvatsarvānupraveśamupapādayati—<pratika>khopārjiteti</pratika> । ekasya jī-
vasya sakalaprapañcānupraveśābhāvātpṛthivyādiparyāyagatā yacchabdāstadadhiṣṭhātṛjīvaviśeṣaparāḥ ।
<quote>‘imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo'ntaro yamayatī’</quote>tyekavacanaṃ jīvasamudāyā-
bhiprāyama । <quote>‘ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādyātmeśvaratvavanniyantrantarābhāvābhiprāyam । <quote>‘yaṃ pṛthivī na
vede’</quote>tyādikaṃ niṣkṛṣṭasvarūpājñānābhiprāyaṃ ca jīve yojanīyam । dvitīyapūrvapakṣamūpapādayati—
<pratika>sakaleti</pratika> । asminpakṣe <quote>‘ya’</quote> ityekavacanaṃ vijñānātmaniyantṛtvaṃ ca mukhyamupapadyate । subālo-
paniṣadi <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantare sañcaranyaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasyāyaḥ śarīra’</quote>mi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca ।। 15 ।।</pratika> caḥ samuccaye । <quote>‘kaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādiprakaraṇe viśiṣṭasukhasya pūrṇasukhasyā-
bhidhānādeva cakṣurantaro viṣṇureva । kimu <quote>‘khaṃ brahme’</quote>ti pūrṇaṃjñānādapītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śrutopaniṣatkagatyabhidhānācca ।। 16 ।। śrutopaniṣadāṃ</pratika>=śrutamatadhyātaitadvidyānāṃ puṃsām—<pratika>kena</pratika>=vāyunā—
<pratika>kayoḥ</pratika>=kāryaparabrahmaṇoḥ—<pratika>gateḥ</pratika>=prāpteḥ । <quote>‘sa enānbrahma gamayatī’</quote>ti śrutāvabhidhānācca cakṣurantaro viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anavasthiterasaṃbhavācca netaraḥ ।। 17 ।। itaraḥ</pratika>=agniḥ—<pratika>na</pratika>=cakṣurantaro na bhavati । kiṃ tu viṣṇureva ।
kutaḥ—<pratika>anavasthiteḥ</pratika>=jīvasyāgnejīṃvāntaraniyāmakatve tasyāpi jīvatvāviśeṣāttasyāpi niyāmakāntarābhyupagame tasyāpyevaṃ ta-
syāpyevamityanavasthānāt---<pratika>asaṃbhavācca</pratika>=agnyādijīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatvāsaṃbhavāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmantarādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="369"/>
mahadādirūpeṇa pariṇatatvāt pradhānasya sarvavyāpakatvamucitam । <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudraḥ’</quote>
<ref>(mahānā॰ 10.)</ref> iti viśvādhikatvena nikhilavikārottīrṇasya parameśvarasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyādyupakra<quote>‘myaiṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā apahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇa’</quote>ityantaryāmiṇi
nārāyaṇapadaprayogo'pi saṅgacchate । yadyatra virāṭpuruṣaḥ sahasraśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭaścicchaktya-
vasthārūpaḥ paranārāyaṇo vivakṣitaḥ, yadi vā hiraṇyagarbha ubhayathāpi saṅgacchate । ubhaya-
trāpi nārāyaṇaśabdaprasiddheḥ prāgdarśitatvāt । athavetyanena tṛtīyapūrvapakṣe svārasyābhāvo vya-
ñjitaḥ । acetanasya pradhānasya vyāpakatve'pi tasmi<quote>‘nnadṛṣṭo draṣṭā aśrutaḥ śrotā amato mantā
avijñāto vijñāte’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣe śrutānāmadṛṣṭatvādīnāṃ sambhave'pi draṣṭṭatvādīnāmātmaśruterni-
yantṛtvasya mukhyatayā tasminnasambhavāt । nanu parameśvarasyāpi vyāpakatvāttasminnapi sarvaprapa-
ñcaniyantṛtvaṃ sambhavatīti kathaṃ pūrvapakṣe tatpratikṣepa ityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>viśvādhika iti</pratika> । a-
yamāśayaḥ । parameśvarasya sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ pṛthivyādisthāneṣu śarīraviśeṣavattayā jīvavibhutva-
vāde jīvasādhāraṇena vyāpakatāmātreṇa vā । ādye retāmūtrapurīṣādisakalaheyavastvanupraviṣṭa-
śarīravattayā parameśvarasya viśvādhikatvabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ । dvitīye niyantṛtvāsaṃbhavaprasaṅgaḥ । śarī-
ravatāmeva takṣādīnāṃ vāsyādiniyantṛtvadarśanāt svaśarīraniyamane'pi tenaiva śarīreṇa śarīrava-
ttvāt । na ca parameśvaro'pi niyamyapṛthivyādiśarīreṇaiva śarīravā<quote>‘nyasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote>mi-
tyādyāmnānāditi vācyam । anyena niyamyamānasya śarīrasya niyamane śarīrāntareṇa śarī-
ravattvasya prayojakatvadarśanena pṛthivyādiśarīrāṇāṃ ca tattadabhimānijīvairniyamyamānatvena ta-
nniyamane śarīrāntarāvaśyaṃbhāvāt । śarīrāntaraṃ vinā svamahimapratiṣṭhe brahmaṇi <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādiṣu śrutāyāḥ pṛthivyādiṣu sthiterupapādanāsambhavācca । api ca <quote>‘adṛṣṭo draṣṭe’</quote>-
tyādivākyaśeṣe darśanādīni parameśvaraviṣayasākṣātkāraśravaṇamanananididhyāsanarūpāṇi vā-
cyāni । <quote>‘ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaśśrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ ātmano vā are
darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāte’</quote> ityādivākyānukramaṇai-
karūpyāt । na ca parameśvare śravaṇamanananididhyāsanasākṣātkāraviṣayatvaṃ tadvattvaṃ ca jīva iva
sambhavati । na cātra darśanādīni cakṣuśśrotramanobuddhijanyajñānāni vivakṣaṇīyāni । tathā
vivakṣayāpi cakṣurādijanyajñānarahite parameśvare draṣṭṭatvādyanirvāhāt । tarhi darśanādīni rūpā-
lokanādirūpāṇi vivakṣaṇīyānīti cenna । tathā sati <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭā nānyo'to'sti
śrote’</quote>tyādisamanantarasandarbhasyānanvayāpatteḥ । na hi parameśvaravyatirekeṇa rūpālokanādimā-
nanyo nāstīti niṣeddha‍uṃ śakyam । na ca tasya <quote>‘tasmin grāme ayameka eva sarvaniyāmaka’</quote>
iti vākyānantaraṃ <quote>‘nānyaḥ puruṣo'stī’</quote>ti vākyasya prāgvarṇitasarvaniyāmakatvaviśiṣṭapuruṣā-
ntaraniṣedhaparatvavatprastutasarvaniyantṛtvādiviśiṣṭadraṣṭrantaraniṣedhaparatvaṃ kalpanīyam । tatra pra-
māṇāntarāvirodhāya saṅkocakalpane'pyatra parameśvarānyaviṣayatvenāsaṅkocasambhave saṅkocaka-
lpanāyogāt । api ca rūpaśabdau cakṣuśśrotrayoriva manobudhdyornāsādhāraṇaviṣayau staḥ । yena
mananavijñānaśabdau na tatsākṣātkāravācinau syātām । tataścātra mantā vijñātetyanayormanana-
nididhyāsanaparatvaṃ manobuddhikaraṇakajñānaparatvaṃ vā vācyam । tatsamabhivyāhārataḥ śrotā draṣṭe-
<pb n="370"/>
vikārarūpaprapañcānupraveśo na ghaṭate । tataḥ parameśvaramantareṇa jīvādiṣvekatamaḥ
syādantaryāmī ।।
iti pūrvapakṣe prāpte brūmaḥ—pṛthivyādyantaryāmitayā śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvara eva, sa-
rvāntaratvāditaddharmavyapadeśāt । atharvaśirasi ca <quote>‘sontarādantaraṃ prāviśat’</quote>
iti parameśvarasyaiva sarvātmatayā'nupraveśadarśanāt । <quote>‘sa ta ātmā'ntaryāmyamṛtaḥ’</quote>
iti śiva evānādimukto'mṛta ityucyate, <quote>‘etāni vā amṛtasya nāmadheyāni’</quote>
<ref>(jābā॰3.)</ref> iti śravaṇāt । yathā <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudraḥ’</quote> iti viśvādhikatvaṃ parame-
śvarasya śrūyate, tathā viśvarūpatvamapi <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu । sarvavikārānuprave-
śe'pi tadvikārasparśaleśo'pi nāstīti khalu pratiparyāyamamṛtaśabdaprayogaḥ ।
