tyanayorapi vedāntaśravaṇatanmūlaparameśvarasākṣātkāraparatvaṃ śrāvaṇacākṣuṣasākṣātkāraparatvaṃ vā
vaktumucitam । avasyaṃ ca darśanaśravaṇaśabdau cākṣuṣaśrāvaṇāsākṣātkāravācakāvityevābhyupaga-
ntavyam । na tu rūpaśabdasākṣātkāravācakāviti । tathātve <quote>‘rūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śabdaśśruta’</quote> ityādipra-
yogāṇā<quote>‘mindra indrāṇīpati’</quote>rityādivat <quote>‘ghaṭo dṛṣṭa’</quote>ityādiprayogāṇāṃ <quote>‘varuṇa indrāṇīpati’</quote>-
rityādiprayogavaccāsāmañjasyaṃ sphuṭībhavet । na ca tayoścakṣuśśrotrakaraṇakajñānatvapravṛttinimi-
ttakatve paśyāmi śṛṇomītyanubhavayostadabhānaprasaṅgaḥ cakṣuśśrotrayorayogyatvāditi vācyam। ca-
kṣuḥśrotrarūpakaraṇaviśeṣaprayojyajātiviśeṣayostatpravṛttinimittatvenoktānubhavaviṣayatvopapatteḥ ।
kathaṃ tarhi <quote>‘paśyatyacakṣuḥ sa śṛṇotyakarṇaḥ’</quote> iti prayogaḥ । tatrācakṣurakarṇaiti viśeṣaṇasamabhi-
vyāhārānupapattyā paśyatiśṛṇotyoścākṣuṣaśrāvaṇasākṣātkāraviṣayatvayogyasarvārthagocarasākṣā-
tkāraviṣayiṇī lakṣaṇā kalpyate । darśanādiśabdo rūpālokanādivācaka ityaṅgīkāre'pi hi rū-
pālokanaviṣayatvayogyarūpatadāśrayādirūpasarvārthagocarasākṣātkāraviṣayiṇī lakṣaṇā kalpa-
nīyā । anyathā <quote>‘paśyatyacakṣu’</quote>rityasya cakṣurabhāve'pi rūpaṃ sākṣātkarotītyarthalābhe sati vi-
śiṣya rūpagrahaṇasāmarthyena tadāśrayādisākṣātkārābhāvapratītiprasaṅgāt । na ceha tathā <quote>‘draṣṭā
śrote’</quote>tyādiṣu dṛśidhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇā kalpanīyā । teṣāṃ parameśvarānyaviṣayatvena mukhyārthapa-
rigrahāpatteḥ । ataḥ parameśvarādanyo'yamantaryāmīti । sūtraṃ vyākurvan siddhāntayati—<pratika>pṛthi-
vyādīti</pratika> । aghidaivādhilokādiṣvantaryāmītyasya vyākhyānaṃ <quote>‘pṛthivyādyantaryāmī’</quote>ti । anta-
ryāmibrāhmaṇe pṛthivyādistanayitnvantamadhidaivaṃ yassarveṣu lokeṣvityadhilokaṃ yassarveṣu vedeṣvi-
tyadhivedaṃ1 yassarveṣu yajñeṣvityadhiyajñaṃ yassarveṣu bhūteṣvityadhibhūtaṃ prāṇavāckakṣuśśrotrādyātmānta-
madhyātmamadhilokamadhivedamadhiyajñaṃ stanayitnvādikaṃ ca kiṃñcinmādhyandinapāṭhaprāptam।sarvāntara-
tvasya parameśvaradharmatvaṃ kva prasiddhamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---<pratika>atharvaśirasīti</pratika> । amṛtaśabdo-
ktamanādimuktatvaṃ sarvāntaratvādītyādiśabdagrāhyamiti darśayati---<pratika>sa ta ātmeti</pratika> ।
viśvādhikasya heyaprapañcānupraveśo viruddha ityāśaṅkya viśvādhikatvavadeva viśvarūpatvamapi
śrutiprāptamaṅgīkaraṇīyamityāha---<pratika>yathā viśvādhika iti</pratika> । virodhaparihārastvamṛtaśabdenaiva
vikāradoṣāsparśapareṇa sūcita ityāha---<pratika>tadvikāreti । pratiparyāyamiti</pratika> । tattadanupraveśaprayu-
<note>(1) <quote>‘adhideva’</quote> miti pāṭhāntaram ।</note>
<pb n="371"/>
atharvaśirasi ca <quote>‘yo vai rudraḥsa bhagavān bhūrbhuvassuvaryaśca brahmā tasmai vai namo namaḥ’</quote>
ityādinā brahmaviṣṇurudromālakṣmīsarasvatīgaṇeśaskandendrādilokapālabhūrādi-
saptalokapṛthivyādipañcabhūtasūryasomagrahanakṣatrakālādirūpeṇa pratyekamabhyāsato
nirūpyate parameśvaraḥ । tatrāpi sakalacidacittatvānupraveśādasyāpuruṣārthasaṃbandho
bhavediti śaṅkāyāṃ pratiparyāyamaiśvaryādimaṅgalaguṇasaṃbandhābhidhāyibhagavaccha-
bdaprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ । tataḥ sarvādhikaḥ sarvātmā ca śivaḥ parameśvara iti yuktameva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ktatattaddoṣasaṃsparśaśaṅkāparihārārthameva yatnena pratiparyāyamamṛtaśabdaprayogaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ । atha-
rvaśirasyapi <quote>‘so'ntarādantaraṃ praviśa’</quote> diti sarvānupraveśamabhidhāya <quote>‘yo vai rudrasya bhagavā’</quote>
nityādivibudhakṛtaparameśvarastutimukhena sarvānupraveśaprayuktasārvātmyaprapañcane brahmaviṣṇvādi-
paryāyeṣu sarveṣvapi tattadanupraveśaprayuktatattaddoṣasaṃsparśaśaṅkāparihārārthameva pratiparyāyamaiśvaryā-
diṣāḍguṇyasāmagryapratipādako bhagavacchabda ityāha---<pratika>atharvaśirasi ceti</pratika> । antaryā-
mibrāhmaṇe amṛtaśabdena prapañcānupraveśaprayuktatattaddoṣasaṃsparśamātramuktam । tadupapādakamai-
śvaryamatharvaśirasi bhagavacchabdenoktam । tathāca śarīrābhāve'pi svatassiddhaiśvaryavaśānniyantṛ-
tvamupapadyate । niyamanaśaktirūpaiśvaryābhivyaktaye hi śarīraviśeṣāpekṣā । svatassiddhe tasmin kiṃ
śarīreṇa । tatratatra tattanniyamanopayogiśarīraviśeṣasadbhāve'pi śaktiviśeṣāttasya prapañcānupra-
veśaprayuktasukhaduḥkhānāśrayaṇam । svaśarīrādisambandhitayā duḥkhajanakatvena hi prapañcasya
heyatvam । śaktiviśeṣavantaṃ prati tajjananāśaktasya tasya heyatvamevāsiddham । evaṃ ca tattanni-
yamanaśaktiviśeṣopadhānena śarīraviśeṣopadhānena vā tatratatra parameśvarasya sthitirapyupapadyate ।
<quote>‘adṛṣṭo draṣṭe’</quote>tyādikaṃ tvitthaṃ vyākhyeyam । <quote>‘śravamāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śrutavanto'pi
bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ । āścaryo vaktā kuśalo'sya labdhā āścaryo jñātā kuśalo'nuśiṣṭaḥ’</quote>iti-
śrutyantaradarśanānmandānāṃ śravaṇamananavijñānasākṣātkārāviṣayo bhavati । ye dhīrāḥ śrotṛmantṛ-
vijñātṛdraṣṭārastaccharīrakastanniyantāpi bhavati । ato'nyaḥ kaścana śravaṇādikartṛśarīrakaḥ sva-
tantrastanniyantā nāsti । iti tatsaṅkalpopajñaiva tadviṣayaśravaṇādisiddhiriti । yadvā । darśanā-
diśabdāścākṣuṣādijñānaparāḥ । adṛṣṭādiśabdāḥ bahuvrihisamāsāḥ । tataśca svayaṃ cakṣurādika-
raṇakajñānaviṣayīkṛtārtharahitaścakṣurādyabhāvena tatkaraṇakajñānarahitatvāt । athāpi draṣṭā śrotā
mantā vijñātā ca cākṣuṣādijñānagocaratvārhasakalaniyamanopayogyaśeṣaviśeṣagocarasvatassiddha-
sākṣātkāravānanyastathābhūtasākṣātkāravānnāstīti । yadvā । adṛṣṭādiśabdāstatpuruṣāḥ । svaniya-
myadevamanuṣyapaśupakṣisarīsṛpādidarśanaśravaṇamananabuddha‍yaviṣaya eva san svayaṃ darśanādimānbha-
vati । svaniyamyaistairye bahirindriyairdṛśyante draṣṭumaśakyā ye śabdena jñāyante tadgocaraśabdasyāpya-
pravṛttyā ye buddha‍yā paraṃ niścīyante tathā niścetumapyaśakyāḥ ye manaḥkṛtyasaṃśayamātragocarā
bhavanti sarvānapi svātantryeṇa niyamanārthaṃ sākṣātkaroti evaṃbhūto'nyaḥ kaściddarśanādimā-
nnāstīti । nanu sarvatrāpyasminvyākhyāne kenacidavacchedena draṣṭrantarādiniṣedho vaivakṣiko na
mukhyaḥ । sa cāntaryāmiṇo jīvatvābhyupagamena draṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ cākṣuṣajñānādimatparatvābhyupa-
gamena cakṣuṣyatvanirvāhe sambhavati na yukta iti ceducyate । asaṅkucitasarvaprapañcaniyantṛtvamamṛta-
<pb n="372"/>
yaduktaṃ pradhānādīnāmantaryāmitvamucitamiti, tat pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpācchārīraśca ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<p>na ca smārtaṃ pradhānamantaryāmīti śrutaṃ, tasya vikārajaḍatvādidharmānabhilāpāt ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śabdoktamanādimuktatvamamṛtaśrutirityetatsarvaṃ parameśvarādanyatra na sambhavatīti tadvaśādantaryā-
mī parameśvara iti siddhāvayaṃ ‘nānyoto'stītyādivākyaśaiṣastatraiva saṅgamayitavyaḥ । tatsaṅgati-
ssarvaniyantṛtvaviśiṣṭadraṣṭantaraniṣedhādiparatvakalpana eva labhyate । kiṃcāyaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ prakṛ-
tasyāntaryāmiṇasstutyarthatayā tadutkarṣaparyavasāyī vyākhyeyaḥ । na cāntaryāmī jīva ityaṅgī-
kṛtyāsya vākyaśeṣasya jīvādanyaścakṣurādikaraṇādhīnajñāno nāstītyarthakalpane kaścidutkarṣo
varṇitaḥ paryavasyati । tena tato'nyasya parameśvarasya svatassiddhasarvaviṣayajñānasiddha‍yā tadapakarṣa-
syaiva paryavasānāt । tasmātprastutasakalaprapañcaniyantṛtvaviśiṣṭadraṣṭrantaraniṣedhādiparatayaiva vyā-
khyānamucitam । tasya samābhyadhikarāhityarūpotkarṣaparyavasāyitvāt । api ca <quote>‘nānyo'to-
'stī’</quote>tyananyaśabdavyutpattyanusārādapi pradarśitavyākhyānaucityamanusandheyam । anyaitarādiśa-
bdānāṃ hi pratiyogisadṛśe tadbhinne vyutpattiḥ । na tu tadbhinnamātre । ata eva khalviṣunāmake kratau
viṣṭutiṃ prakṛtiṃ vidhāya śrute <quote>‘samānamitarat śyenene’</quote>ti vākya itaraśabdasya prastutaviṣṭutivikā-
rarūpavaiśoṣikāṅgasadṛśaparatvāttad‍vākyaṃ sadṛśānāṃ śyenavaiśeṣikāṅgānāṃ lohitoṣṇīṣatvādīnā-
matideśakam । na tu śyene iṣau ca- sāmyena codakaprāptānāṃ vaikṛtāṅgānāmanuvādakamiti pūrvatantre
vacanātideśavicāre siddhāntitam । yadyapi vārtikakārapakṣe biṣṭutirūpaprākṛtāṅgādiṣu <quote>‘viṣṭutiṃ
karotī’</quote>tyatroddeśyatvena prakṛtāditarasya codakasannihitasya prākṛtāṅgajātasyānuvādaka itaraśa-
bdo na tu tatra vidheyatvena prakṛtādiṣvākārarūpādiṣuvaiśeṣikāṅgāditarasya lohitoṣṇīṣatvādaiḥ
śyenavaiśeṣikāṅgasya nirdeśakaḥ । iṣau lohitoṣṇīṣatvādiprāptistu viṣṭuteranyasya ṛtvigadeḥ
prākṛtāṅgajātasya । śyenasādṛśyavidhānena tvitarapadārthānupraviṣṭatayā tatpakṣe śyenagataḥ svatantraḥ ।
vaiśeṣikāṅgānāṃ kaṇṭakavitodanādīnāṃ tviṣau na prāptiriṣyate । tathāpi prākṛtaviṣṭutisādṛśyaṃ
prākṛtasya ṛtvigāderastīti tatpakṣe'pi netaraśabdasya sādṛśyārthakatvahāniḥ । ata eva vārti-
kakārairapi <quote>‘sviṣṭakṛtobhakṣapratiṣedhassyā’</quote>diti <ref>(jai॰ 10)</ref> dāśamikādhikaraṇe gṛhamedhīyeṣṭāvā-
jyabhāgau yajatītyetallakṣaṇāyā taditaraparisaṅkhyārthamiti gṛhamedhīyādikaraṇapañcamapakṣe tadvākya-
bhā/?/jyabhāgasadṛśayāgāntaramātraparisaṅkhyāpakamityaṅgīkṛtya tatrā<quote>‘gniṃ sviṣṭakṛṃta yajatī’</quote>ti vā-
kyasya sviṣṭakṛtassadṛśaśeṣakāryāntare parisaṅkhyārthatvaṃ vyavasthāpitam । yasmā<quote>‘dadṛṣṭo draṣṭe’</quote>tyā-
divākyaśeṣānāñjasyābhāvādapyantaryāmī parameśvara iti ।। athottarasūtraṃ pradhānādipūrvapakṣatraya-
nirākaraṇārthatvenāvatārayati—<pratika>yaduktamiti ।। sū॰ ।। na1 ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpācchā-
rīraśca ।। 20 ।। tasya vikārajaḍatvādidharmānabhilāpāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । sarvāṇi
bhūtāni yo'ntaroyamayati’ityārabhya antaryāmiṇo ye dharmāssarvabhūtaniyantṛtvādayaḥ śrutāḥ
<note>(1) śāṅkarabhāṣyataṭṭīkādiṣu <quote>‘na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpāt’</quote> ityantamekaṃ sūtram । <quote>‘śārīraścobhaye'pi hi bhede-
nainamadhīyate’</quote> iti sūtrāntaram । śrīkaṇṭharāmānujabhāṣyayostu <quote>‘śārīraśce’</quote> tyantamekaṃ sūtram । <quote>‘ubhaye'pi’</quote> ityādi sūtrā-
ntaramiti viśeṣo'trāvadheyaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="373"/>
na śārīro virāṭpurūṣaśca, tasya sakalaniyāmakatvādyanupapatteḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
te sarve na pradhānadharmāḥ । kathañcitpradhāne yojanīyāḥ । tathā hi—bhūtaśabdaḥ kāryapara iti sarvasya
kāryasya kāraṇādhīnatvāt sarvabhūtaniyantṛtvaṃ <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote> nnityādikam । kāryavarge
kāraṇasyānugatatvāt । <quote>‘yaṃ pṛthivī na vede’</quote>tyādi pradhānasya pṛthivīdevatādivedyatvasambhave'pi
tasyā<quote>‘pratarkyamavijñeya’</quote>mityādiprasiddha‍yanusārāt । <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote>mityādi kāryakāraṇa-
yorvastuto bhedābhāvāt । pūrvapakṣaśarīramityādau svarūpe'ti śarīraśabdaprayogadarśanāt<quote>‘eṣa ta
ātme’</quote>ti jīvasya sarvanirvāhake tasmi<quote>‘nmamātmā bhadrasena’</quote> ityādivadātmattvopacārāt ।
<quote>‘adṛṣṭo draṣṭe’</quote>tyādāvadṛṣṭatvāśrutatve rūpādihīnatvāt । amatatvāvijñātatve avijñeyaprasiddha‍yanu-
sārāt । draṣṭṭatvādi tatprakṛtikatvena tadabhinnānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ darśanādisādhanatvāt । <quote>‘rūpagrā-
hakaṃ cakṣu’</quote>rityādau karaṇe kartṛtvopacāradarśanāditi sarve dharmāḥ kleśena pradhāne yojanīyāḥ ।
tathā kleśenāpi pradhāne yojyeran yadi vikāratvajaḍatvādayo'nanyathāsiddhāstaddharmā ihābhi-
lapyeran । na ca teṣāmihābhilāpo'stīti । <pratika>tasya sakalaniyāmakatvādyanupapatteriti</pratika> ।
<quote>‘sarvāṇi bhūtāni yo'ntaro yamayatī’</quote>tyādiṣu sarvakalpānuyāyisakalaprapañcaniyantṛtvamasaṅkucitaṃ
pratīyate । <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭe’</quote>tyādau prāgvarṇitarūpaniyantṛtvaviśiṣṭadraṣṭrantarādiniṣedhena ca
tat sthirīkriyate।tattāvatpratikalpaṃ bhinnasya mūrtyātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya nārāyaṇasya ca na sambha-
vati । nanu subālopaniṣadi pṛthivyādyantaryāmiṇi nārāyaṇapadaprayogānnārāyaṇasyāsaṅkucita-
sakalaniyantṛtvamupapadyata iti bhāti । ucyate । subālopaniṣadupakrame <quote>‘tadāhuḥ kiṃ tadāsī’</quote>-
diti praśnapūrvakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ paramātmasvarūpaṃ prathamamāsīt tatastamastato bhūtādistata ākā-
śādikrameṇa bhūtapañcakaṃ tena brahmāṇḍamutpāditaṃ tanmadhye <quote>‘divyassahasraśīrṣā sahasrākṣaḥ sahasra-
pāt sahasrabāhuḥpuruṣo'jāyata’</quote>ityuktvā <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukhamāsīt bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛta’</quote>ityā-
dinā puruṣasūktaprakriyayā tasya mukhādibhyaḥ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ hṛdayādyavayavāntarebhyo'nyeṣāṃ ca
keṣāñciccetanācetanānāmutpattiḥ lalāṭātkrodhajasya rudrasya niśvāsebhyo vedādiśabdajālāprādu-
rbhāvaṃ cābhidhāya tasmādevārdhena strībhāvamardhena puruṣabhāvaṃ ca prāptāt devarṣiyakṣarākṣasādīnāṃ tira-
ścāṃ ca tattajjananocitastrīpuṃsavigrahaparigraheṇa mithunībhāvamāpannādutpattiṃ varṇayitvā upasaṃhāra-
kāle tena kriyamāṇatrailokyabhasmībhāvamupakramya <quote>‘pṛthivyapsu līyata’</quote>ityādinā <quote>‘tamaḥ para-
sminnekībhavatī’</quote>tyantena pṛthivyādeḥ prathamakāryatamaḥparyantasya prapañcasya paramātmani layo
darśitaḥ । evaṃ tāvatsubālopaniṣadi prathamānuśāsane jagadādikāraṇabhūtaḥ paramātmā tena brahmāṃ-
ḍamadhye sṛṣṭaḥ tanmadhyagatadevamanuṣyādyavāntarasṛṣṭisaṃhārakārī sahasraśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭapuruṣaśceti
dvau varṇitau।tatra <quote>‘tadaṇḍaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ samabhava’</quote>diti prakramya madhye <quote>‘divyaḥ sahasraśīrṣā sahasrākṣaḥ
sahasrapāt sahasrabāhuḥ puruṣo'jāyata’</quote>iti brahmāṇḍamadhye paramātmanā sṛṣṭo yaḥ puruṣo varṇitaḥ
tameva brāhmaṇādisakalaprajāsraṣṭāraṃ divyapuruṣaṃ <quote>‘naiveha kiñcanāgra āsīdamūlamanādhārā imāḥ
prajāḥ prajāyanta’</quote>iti pravṛtte tṛtīyānuśāsane <quote>‘divyo deva eko nārāyaṇa’</quote> iti prastutya <quote>‘cakṣuśca
draṣṭavyaṃ ca nārāyaṇa’</quote> ityādinā tasya sarvopādānatvaprayuktaṃ sārvātmyamuktvā tasyaiva caturthānuśā-
sane <quote>‘yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote>mityādinā <quote>‘sa eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko
nārāyaṇa’</quote> ityantena sarvāntaryāmitvamuktam।na ca tatparamātmasṛjyatvena divyaviśeṣaṇāvṛttyā divi
<pb n="374"/>
jīvaśca na bhavatītyāha---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। ubhaye'pi hi bhedenainamadhīyate ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
ubhaye kāṇvā mādhyandinaśākhinaśca<quote>‘yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan’</quote> <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’</quote>
<ref>(bṛha॰5.7.)</ref> ityādinā jīvādantaryāmiṇaṃ bhedenādhīyate।tataḥ parameśvarasyaiva sakalā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paramākāśarūpāyāṃ cicchaktau bhavatvena ca prakṛtasya śrutyantaraprasiddhamahājalaughamadhyasṛṣṭabra-
hmāṃḍarūpagarbhagolakamadhyanivāsalabdhanārāyaṇasaṃjñasya svarūpeṇopapadyate । ataḥ śārīrādhikara-
ṇanyāyena paramātmābhedadṛṣṭyā tadupapādanīyam । tathopapādanaṃ sūcayituṃ <quote>‘anupapattestu na
śārīra’</quote> iti <ref>(bra॰1.2.3.)</ref> śārīrādhikaraṇe nārāyaṇaviṣayatayā prayuktaṃ śārīrapadamihāpi
tadviṣayatayā prayuktam ।। jīvapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>jīvaśceti ।।
sū ।। ubhaye'pi hi bhedenainamadhīyate</pratika>।। 21 ।। <quote>‘yo vijñāna’</quote>iti sthāne <quote>‘ya ātmanī’</quote>ti-
mādhyandinapāṭhadarśanāt sthānapramāṇena vijñānaśabdasya jīvaparatvamavasīyate । na cātmaśabda-
syaiva sthānapramāṇena jñaptiparatvaṃ kalpyatāmiti vācyam । tatra tasya prayogādarśanāt । <quote>‘vijñā-
naṃ yajñaṃ tanuta’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānaśabdasya jīve dṛṣṭaprayogatvādityabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-
<pratika>ubhaya iti</pratika> । pūrvasūtrācchārīra ityasyānuvṛttiṃ prakṛterjīvārthatvaṃ pratyayasya pañcamyarthatvaṃ ca pari-
gṛhya tallabdhamarthamāha—<pratika>jīvādīti</pratika> । idaṃ tviha vaktavyam । jīvapūrvapakṣe kaḥ khalu jīvo'-
ntaryāmī syāt । na tāvattattadupāsakajīvaḥ । paricchinne tatra pṛthivyādisthititanniyantṛtva-
yorasambhavāt <quote>‘kimantaryāmiṇaṃ vetthe’</quote>ti gandharveṇa pṛṣṭasya kāpyasya <quote>‘nāhaṃ taṃ bhagavanvede’</quote> ti
uttarāsāmañjasyaprasaṅgācca yajñavidyāvidaḥ kāpyasya karmaphalabhoktṛdehātiriktajīvajñānāvaśyaṃ-
bhāvāt । nāpi pṛthivyādyabhimānijīvaḥ । śrotāramuddālakaṃ prati parābhūte tasmin <quote>‘eṣa ta
ātme’ti tadātmatvopadeśāyogāt pṛthivyādiṣvapyabhimānijīvasya pratyekaṃ bhinnatayā sarvāṇi
bhūtāni yo'ntaro yamayatī’</quote>tyupakrāntāyāḥ ekasya sarvaniyantṛtāyā ananvayaprasaṅgācca ।
nāpi jīvasamudāyaḥ । tasya pṛthivyādisthatvatanniyantṛtvayorabhāvena <quote>‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote>nni-
tyāderananvayāt । na ca sarvabhūtavākye jīvasamudāyaḥ pṛthivyādivākye tattadabhimānijīva
iti vairūpyakalpanaṃ yuktam । na vā tadapi nirvoḍhuṃ śakyam । <quote>‘eṣa ta ātme’</quote>tyupadeśāyogasyo-
ktatvāt । api copāsakajīva iti pṛthivyādyabhimānijīva iti sarvajīvasamudāya iti pakṣatraya-
mapi <quote>‘bhedavyapadeśāccānya’</quote> iti <ref>(bra॰ 1. 1. 22.)</ref> sūtreṇaiva nirastam । <quote>‘eṣa ta ātmā
yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni na vidu’</quote>rityādibhedavyapadeśasattvāt । tasmānnirālambano
jīvapūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭe’</quote>tyādikaṃ tūpapāditam । pradarśitasiddhānto'pyayuktaḥ ।
vijñānaśabdānusāreṇātmaśabdaḥ parameśvaracicchaktipara iti vaiparītyasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt ।
tasyātmaśabdasyānandamayādhikaraṇabhāṣye bhaṭṭabhāskarīye taittirīyāraṇyakabhāṣye ca suprasiddha-
tvāt । tasmādidaṃ sūtraṃ cicchaktirantaryāmitvena pratipādyata iti pūrvapakṣāntaranirākaraṇā-
rthamiti yuktam । upapadyate hi tasyāṃ <quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhātī’</quote>ti śrutyanusāreṇa sarvasphū-
rtipradāyāṃ <quote>‘nānyo'to'sti draṣṭe’</quote>tyādiviśeṣaṇam । anyadapi sarvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ tatropapadyata iti
spaṣṭameva । siddhāntastu <quote>‘yo vijñānetiṣṭha’</quote> <quote>‘nya ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>nniti cicchaktito'ntaryāmiṇaṃ
bhedenādhīyate। na cātmavijñānaśabdayorjīvaparatvaṃ śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘yassarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭha’</quote>nniti
<pb n="375"/>
ntaryāṃmitvaṃ, na pradhānavirāṭpuruṣajīvānāmiti siddham ।।
ityantaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paryāye bhūtaśabdoditānāṃ brahmādistaṃbaparyantānāṃ sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ pṛthagantaryāminiyamyatvasya
varṇitatvāt । na ca tatra bhūtaśabdo jananarūpabhavanavatsu kāryeṣu vartata iti śaṅkanīyam । kāryayo-
gataḥ prāṇirūḍherbalattvāt । na ca mahābhūtarūḍheḥ prāṇirūḍheśca vinigamanāviraheṇa parasvaravi-
rodhonmeṣaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ । <quote>‘pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādiparyāyeṣu pṛthivyādimahābhūtānāmantaryāmini-
yamyatvasyoktatvenātra prāṇirūḍherevonmeṣāt । tasmānna cicchaktirantaryāmitvena pratipādyate।
yadi tu sarvabhūtaparyāye jīvavargādantaryāmiṇaṃ bhedenādhīyata iti jīvapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇamapyatra
vivakṣitaṃ syāt astu na kāpi hāniriti। ।
<head>iti antaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>athāntaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। antaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt ।। 19 ।। na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpācchārīraścā ।। 20 ।।
ubhaye'pi hi bhedenainamadhīyate ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>antaryāmī bhoktā bhavedvirāḍvā pradhānaṃ vā । viśvottīrṇastu śivaḥ svayaṃ na viśvāntaratvamiyāt ।। 45 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śiva eva sarvaniyamanaśaktastasya śrutaḥ praveśo'pi । amṛtapadamatra dṛṣṭaṃ jābālāścāmananti tatraiva ।। 46 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityantaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athāntaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। antaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt ।। 18 ।। na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpāt ।। 19 ।।
śārīraścobhaye'pi hi bhedenainamadhīyate ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate, antaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt ।।18।। adhidaivādiṣu</pratika>=adhidaivādhilokādiṣu ।
<pratika>antaryāmī</pratika>=antaryamayitṛtvena śrūyamāṇaḥ paramātmā । kutaḥ । <pratika>taddharmavyapadeśāt</pratika>=tasya paramātmano dharmāṇāṃ yamayitṛtvā-
dīnāṃ nirviśyamānatvādityarthaḥ । asya <quote>‘ya imaṃ ca paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtānyantaro yamayatī’</quote> tyupakramya śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘yaḥ
pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta’</quote>
ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atrādhidaivādiṣu antaryamayitṛtvena śrūyamāṇaḥ kiṃ tattadabhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ uta yogī kaścit jīvaḥ
athavā pradhānam āhosvitparameśvara iti saṃśayaḥ । akāryakaraṇe brahmaṇyantaryamayitṛtvādyanupapatterjīvādirevāntaryamīti yukta-
miti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvavikārakaraṇe brahmaṇi sarvaśaktyupapatterniyamyakāryakaraṇaireva tasya kāryakaraṇavattvopapatteśca paramātmaivāntaryā-
mīti siddhāntaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> rūpādihīne sāṃkhyakalpite pradhāne adṛṣṭatvādidharmā-
ṇāmupapadyamānatayā pradhānamantaryāmi syādityāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>smārtam</pratika>=sāṃkhyasmṛtikalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ ca । nāntaryāmī ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>ataddharmābhilāpāt</pratika>=pradhānabhinnaparamātmadharmāṇāṃ draṣṭṭatvādīnāmapīhābhidhānādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi cetano yogī jīvo'ntaryāmī syādityata āha—<pratika>śārīraścobhayepi hi bhedenainamadhīyate</pratika> ।। 20 ।। pūrva-
sūtrāt netyanuvartate । <pratika>śārīraśca</pratika>=jīvaśca nāntaryāmī । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>ubhaye'pi</pratika>=kāṇvā mādhyandināśca । <pratika>bhe-
dena</pratika>=<quote>‘yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiṣu antaryāmiṇo bhedena । <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>=śārīram । pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena ca <pratika>adhī-
yate</pratika> । ato'dhidaivādiṣvantaryāmī paramātmaiveti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate antaryāmyadhidaivādhilokādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt</pratika> । viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prā-
yassamānameva । pūrvapakṣakoṭau paramastyanupraveśo virāṭpuruṣasyāpi । <pratika>antaryāmī</pratika>=pṛthivīmārabhya avyaktātmatattvaparyantamanta-
ryāmitayā pratiparyāyaṃ śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvara eva । kutaḥ । sarvāntaratvāditaddharmavyapadeśādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="376"/>
<head>atha adṛśyatvādhikaraṇam. ।। 8 ।।</head>
iha pratyakṣapṛthivyādirūpatvena pratipāditasya parameśvarasya tadbadda‍ṛśyatvādikaṃ nā-
stīti pratipādayitumidamadhikaraṇamavatāryate---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṅgatiṃ pradarśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>iheti</pratika> । purovartitayā pratyakṣato dṛśyamānaṃ
yat pṛthivyādikaṃ tatparameśvarasya niyamyatvena rūpamiti tadanupraviśya tatrāvasthitasya gṛhasthitasya
caitrasyeva dṛśyatā syāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sarvatra tanniyamyānurūpaśarīravattayā sthitasyāpi
dṛśyatvābhāvapratipādakaṃ vedāntavākyamanyaparatvanirākaraṇena tadviṣayatvaṃ pratipādayadadhikaraṇaṃ
pravartyata ityarthaḥ । iha pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgativatpādasaṅgatirapi pradarśitā। <quote>‘na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanai-
na’</quote>mityādiśrutiprasiddhabrahmaliṅgabhāvasyāpyadṛśyatvasya pradarśitatayā dṛśyatvaprasaktyānatispaṣṭa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>yacchaṅkitaṃ pradhānādīnāmantaryāminvamucitamiti tatpariharati=<pratika>na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpācchārīraśca ।।20।।
smārtaṃ ca</pratika>=pradhānaṃ ca nāntaryāmi । kutaḥ। <pratika>ataddharmābhilāpāt</pratika>=vikārajaḍatvāditadīyadharmānirūpaṇāt । <pratika>śārīraśca</pratika>=virāṭ
puruṣaśca । nāntaryāmī । kutaḥ । sakalaniyāmakatvādyanupapatterityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>jīvaśca na bhavatītyāha—<pratika>sū॰ ।। ubhaye'pi hi bhedainainamadhīyate ।। 21 ।। ubhaye'pi</pratika>=kāṇvā mādhyandināśca ।
<pratika>enam</pratika>=antaryāmiṇam । <pratika>bhedena</pratika>=<quote>‘yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan’</quote> <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādinā jīvādbhedenādhīyate । ataḥ parameśvara-
syaiva sakalāntaryāmitvaṃ na pradhānavirāṭpuruṣajīvānāmiti siddham ।। iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate sū॰ ।। antaryāmyadhidaivādhilokādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt</pratika> ।। 19 ।। viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva
adhidaivādhilokādipadacihniteṣu vākyeṣu śrūyamāṇaḥ antaryāmī pratyagātmā vā paramātmā veti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘draṣṭā śrote’</quote>ti kara-
ṇāyattajñānatāśruteḥ draṣṭurevāntaryāmitvopadeśāt <quote>‘nānyo'to'stī’</quote>tyādinā draṣṭrantaraniṣedhācca pratyagātmeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvānta-
ratvasarvāviditatvasarvaśarīrakatvasarvaniyantṛtvādidharmavyapadeśāt antaryāmī paramātmā nārāyaṇa eveti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ । na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpāccharīraśca</pratika> ।। 20 ।। nāyaṃ pradhānaṃ jīvaśca । tayorasaṃbhāvitasarvāviditatvā-
didharmābhilāpāt । asaṃbhāvanayā yathā na pradhānaṃ tathā jīvo'pītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>amīṣāṃ guṇānāṃ paramātmanyanvayaṃ pratyagātmani vyatirekaṃ ca sūtradvayena pradarśya nirapekṣaṃ hetvantaramāha—<pratika>sū॰ ।। ubhaye'pi
hi bhedenainamadhīyate</pratika> ।। 21 ।। ubhaye kāṇvā mādhyandināśca <quote>‘yo vijñāne’</quote> <quote>‘ya ātmani’</quote> ityādinā enamantaryāmiṇaṃ bhedena
paramātmaniyāmyātpratyagātmano vilakṣaṇatvenādhiyate । ato'ntaryāmī pratyagātmano vilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā nārāyaṇaiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । pṛthivyādyantaryāmitayā śrūyamāṇaḥ pradhānaṃ vā pṛthivyādyabhimā-
nijīvo vā viṣṇurveti saṃdehaḥ । pṛthivyāderviṣṇuṃ prati śarīratvābhāvāt anyatra kathaṃcidupapatteśca pradhānādireveti pūrvaḥ
pakṣaḥ । pṛthivyādyavedyatvatadantaratvarūpataddharmavyapadeśāt <quote>‘śīryate nityamevāsmādviṣṇostujagadīdṛśam । rameta ca paro
hyasmin śarīraṃ tasya tanmata’</quote> miti vacanasiddhayogabalena taṃ prati pṛthivyādeśśarīratvasyopapatteśca viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ ।
sūtrārthastu, <pratika>sū॰ ।। antaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu taddharmavyapadeśāt</pratika> ।। 18 ।। <pratika>antaryāmī</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣa ātmāntaryāmyamṛta’</quote> iti
śrutyukto'ntaryāmī viṣṇureva na pradhānādiḥ। kutaḥ । <pratika>adhidaivādiṣu</pratika>=adhidaivādhyatmādhibhūtādiprakaraṇeṣu । <pratika>taddharmavyapade-
śāt</pratika>=tasminnantaryāmiṇi tasya <quote>‘yaṃ pṛthivī na vede’</quote>tiśrutāvuktasyāviditatvādibrahmadharmasya vyapadeśāt uktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। na ca smārtamataddharmābhilāpāt</pratika> ।। 19 ।। cakārassamuccaye । <pratika>smārtam</pratika>=kapilasmṛtyuktaṃ pradhānaṃ jīvaśca
na antaryāmi । kutaḥ । <pratika>ataddharmābhilāpāt</pratika>=taddharmāṇāṃ pradhānajīvadharmāṇāṃ triguṇatvasaṃsāritvādīnām anabhilāpāt
anuktatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śārīraścobhaye'pi hi bhedenainamadhīyata</pratika> ।। 20 ।। cakāro na jño'nukarṣaṇārthaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yasmāt । <pratika>ubhaye'-
pi</pratika>=kāṇvā mādhyandināśca । <quote>‘ātmano'ntaraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘vijñānādantara’</quote> iti । <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>=jīvam । <pratika>bhedena</pratika>=antaryāmiṇassakāśādbhinnatve-
na । <pratika>adhīyate</pratika>=paṭhanti । tasmāt <pratika>śārīraḥ</pratika>=jīvaśca nāntaryāmītyarthaḥ ।। 20 ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmantaryāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 7 ।।</head>
<pb n="377"/>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate, yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥ-
śrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbha‍ūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti
dhīrāḥ’</quote> <ref>(mu॰1.1.)</ref> ityādi śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ ।। atrākṣaraṃ pradhānaṃ jīvaḥ parameśvaro
veti saṃśayaḥ । pradhānamatrākṣaraṃ, tasya mahadādipariṇāmino bhūtayonitvasaṃbhavāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
brahmaliṅgabhāvāt <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> sarvajñatvāderakṣarāna-
nvayena pūrvapakṣakoṭidvayaṃ tadanvayena siddhāntakoṭiṃ cābhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>atrākṣarami-
ti</pratika> । nanvihākṣaraṃ pradhānaṃ jīvo veti pūrvapakṣo na sambhavati । iha <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahma tato-
'nnamabhijāyate । annātprāṇā manassatyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam । yassarvajñassarvavidyasya
jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ । tasmādeva brahma nāmarūpamannaṃ ca jāyata’</quote>ityādimantreṣu brahmaśrutisarvajñatvali-
ṅgādikamāmnāyate । upakrame'pi <quote>‘kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñāta’</quote>mityekavijñānena
sarvavijñānapratijñānaṃ brahmaliṅgamāmnāyate । paramoprakrame<quote>‘sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyāpratiṣṭhāmatharvāya
jyeṣṭhaputrāya prāhe’</quote>ti brahmavidyāsāmākhyā dṛśyate । tathā <quote>‘dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā
ce’</quote>ti vidyayoḥ parāparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tayoraparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāmuktvā <quote>‘atha parā yayā tada-
kṣaramadhigamyata’</quote>iti vakṣyamāṇākṣaravidyāyāḥ paravidyāsamākhyā kṛtā dṛśyate । api ca sadvi-
dyāvākyānāmīkṣatyadhikaraṇe sāṅkhyābhimatapradhānaparatvaṃ nirastam । tadupadarśitā yuktayo'trāpi
pravartanta eva।astikhalvīkṣāpūrvakasraṣṭṭatvaśravaṇamatrāpi ।<quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote>ti yatastapaḥśabdo'tra
<quote>‘tapa ālocana’</quote>iti dhātorniṣpannaḥ sraṣṭavyālocanarūpajñānavācī । <quote>‘yasya jñānamayaṃ tapa’</quote>ityagre
vivaraṇāt । ātmaśabdaścāsti <quote>‘yassarvajñassarvavidyasyaiva mahimā bhuvi । divye brahmapure hyeṣa vyo-
manyātmā pratiṣṭhita’</quote>ityādimantreṣu । tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśo'pyasti<quote>‘yadāpaśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ
kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim । tadāvidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitī’</quote>tyādiṣu ।
heyatvaṃ ca tasya nocyate । pratijñāvirodho'pyastīti prāgdarśitam । sākṣācca parameśvarasya kartṛ-
tvamupādānatvaṃ ca śrūyate <quote>‘yadā paśya’</quote> ityādimantreṣvityāśaṅkya pradhānapūrvapakṣaṃ tāvadupapādaya-
ti—<pratika>pradhānamatreti</pratika> । nanu yadi bhūtayonitvaṃ yoniśabdasya sthānavācitvena bhūtādhāratvaṃ <pratika>tadā</pratika>
tat sarvādhāre brahmaṇyupapadyate । yadi ca tasyopādānavācitayā bhūtopādānatvaṃ tadapi tasyo-
papadyate । prakṛtyadhikaraṇe tasya sarvopādānatāyāḥ sthāpayiṣyamāṇatvādityāśaṅkya viśeṣayati—
<pratika>mahadādipariṇāmina iti</pratika> । bhūtayoniśabdena pariṇāmitayā bhūtopādānatvamucyate na tu
bhūtādhāratvaṃ bhūtopādānatvasāmānyaṃ vā । bhūtayonitvavivaraṇārthaṃ pravṛtte <quote>‘yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate
gṛhṇate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhayassambhavanti । yatā sataḥ puruṣātkeśalomāni tathākṣarātsambha-
vatīha viśva’</quote>miti samanantaramantre pariṇāmyupādānarūporṇānābhyādidṛṣṭāntopādānena <quote>‘yathā su-
dīptātpāvakādvisphuliṅgāssahasraśaḥ prabhavante sarūpāḥ । tathākṣarādvividhāssomya bhāvāḥ pra-
jāyante tatra caivāpiyantī’</quote>tyuparitanamantrāntarapradarśitādacetanaprāṇādivakṣyamāṇakāryasārūpya-
śravaṇācca tathāvagateḥ । tattu nirvikāre parameśvare na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । tadabhiprāyeṇaivā-
<pb n="378"/>
trā<quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhāna’</quote>mityakṣaraśabdena dharminirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । atra bhūtayoniśabdena dharminirdeśaḥ kartu-
mucitaḥ । <quote>‘adṛśyatvādiguṇaka’</quote> iti sūtrānurodhāt । yatastatrādṛśyatvādikaṃ bhūtayonerviśeṣa-
ṇam । na tvakṣarasya । bhūtayonivākye śravaṇāt । <quote>‘yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyata’</quote> iti akṣaravākye
śravaṇābhāvāt । na ca bhūtayonivākye'pi <quote>‘tadbha‍ūtayoni’</quote>miti napuṃsakaliṅgena tatpadenākṣaraparā-
marśāttadviśeṣaṇamadṛśyatvādikaṃ syāditi vācyam । <quote>‘nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣma’</quote>mityatra vi-
bhuviśeṣaṇasya pulliṅgatayā bhūtayoniviśeṣaṇatvena tatsamabhivyāhṛtānāmadṛśyatvādīnāmapi ta-
dviśeṣaṇatvāvagamāt । ata evā<quote>‘dṛśyatvādiguṇaka’</quote> iti sūtre pulliṅganirdeśaḥ । akṣaraviśeṣa-
ṇatve hi napuṃsakaliṅganirdeśassyāt । evaṃ sūtrānurodhāt bhūtayoniśabdena dharmīnirdeśe karta-
vye'pi yadakṣaraśabdena dharminirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ tadakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭānvayipariṇāmyupādānatvarūpapradhā-
naliṅgapratipattisaukaryāya । bhūtayoniḥ pradhānam akṣarasya pariṇāmyupādānatvaśravaṇādityukte hi
vastuto'kṣarabhūtayonyorabhede'pyāpātato vaiyadhikaraṇyasphuraṇaṃ bhavet । sūtrakṛtā tu sarvajñatvā-
diparameśvaraliṅgānāmanyānvayaśaṅkānirākaraṇena bhūtayonyanvayapratipattisaukaryārthamadṛśyatvā-
diguṇaka iti dharminirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । tadetadagre sphuṭībhaviṣyati । nanu, pariṇāmyupādānatvarūpaika-
liṅgāpekṣayā brahmātmaśrutisarvajñatvādiliṅgabrahmavidyādisamākhyārūpaṃ pramāṇajātaṃ bhūyastvātpraba-
lamiti ceducyate। ihākṣarapratipādanānantaraṃ <quote>‘divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sa bāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ ।
aprāṇo hyamanāśśubhro hyakṣarātparataḥ paraḥ ।।’</quote> iti tataḥ parasya puruṣasya pratipādanaṃ dṛśyate sa
puruṣo brahmeti । tatra brahmaśrutyādisamanvayaḥ । <quote>‘tathākṣarātsambhavatīha viśva’</quote>miti akṣarakāryaṃ-
tvena varṇitādviśvasmātparato'kṣarādapi paratvena brahmaṇa eva <quote>‘mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ
para’</quote> iti kaṭhavallīṣviva pratipādayitumucitatvāt । yattu <quote>‘yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyata’</quote>iti para-
vidyāviṣayatvamakṣarasyoktaṃ tadupakrāntasarvavijñānapratijñānirvāhārthaṃ pratipipādayiṣitam । <quote>‘ta-
pasā cīyate brahme’</quote>tyādimantreṣu pratipādyamānaṃ brahmaṇassarvopādānatvaṃ brahmaśaktirūpeṇa pradhānena
ghaṭanīyamiti tasyāpyatrākṣarabhūtayoniśabdagṛhītasya sarvopādānatvenātra pratipādanīyatvamitya-
bhipretya na tu svātantryeṇa tadeva pratipādanīyamityabhipretya। <quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>ityagre tatpratipāda-
napārārthyasya sphuṭatvāt । evaṃ brahmaśrutiliṅgasamākhyānāmakṣarātparataḥ pare'nvayāt nākṣarasya
pradhānatve brahmaśrutyādivirodha iti pūrvapakṣe yuktipratipattisaukaryārthamapyakṣaraśabdena dharmini-
rdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । nanu<quote>‘yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyā’</quote>mityakṣarātparatvena
varṇanīye puruṣe akṣaraśabdaśruteḥ tena sa eva prādhānyena pratipādyamāno bhūtayonyakṣaramakṣa-
rātparata iti puruṣātparatvena śrutamakṣarameva kevalaṃ pradhānamiti cenmaivam । ubhayathāpyupapattau
pariṇāmyupādānatvarūpapradhānaliṅgānurodhasyocitatvāt asati virodhe tadbādhāyogāt
<quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>diti mantrānantarameva <quote>‘divyo hyamūrta’</quote>iti mantrasya pravṛttatvena pūrvamantre yasmāda-
kṣarātsarūpakāryaniṣpattiruktā tasmādeva paratvamanantaramantre puruṣasya varṇyata iti pratīteśca । nanu
tarhi <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>diti mantroktaṃ sarūpakāryaprabhavākṣaraṃ tataḥ prāk <quote>‘yathorṇanābhi’</quote>riti mantroktaṃ
viśvasambhavopādānākṣaraṃ ca <quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>ityuktaṃ paratvāvadhyakṣaramevāstu । tathā ca pari-
ṇāmyupādānatvasyānyasaṅkāntatvātparavidyāviṣayatvenoktabhūtayonyakṣaraṃ brahmaiva syāditi cenna ।
<pb n="379"/>
athavā jīvaḥ, tasya hi <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛtākṣaram’</quote> <ref>(śvetāśva॰ 1.10.)</ref> iti śruterakṣara-
śabdavācyatvamucitaṃ, svakarmavaśena mahābhūtayonitvaṃ ca । atastayoranyataradakṣaram ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhūtayonyakṣarapratipādanānantarameva <quote>‘yathorṇanābhi’</quote>riti mantrasya pravṛttatvena tasya tadīyabhūtayo-
nitvaprakāranirūpaṇārthatvasya <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>ditimantrasyākṣaraparāpādānapañcamyā tadekaviṣaya-
tvasya ca pratīyamānatvena pariṇāmyupādānatvasyānyasaṅkamaṇāyogāt । evaṃ tarhi <quote>‘tapasā cī-
yate brahma tato'nnamabhijāyata’</quote>iti mantrasyāpyapādānapañcamyākṣaraparamantradvayaikaviṣayatvasya, pratī-
yamānatvāt tasya mantradvayasya bhūtayonyakṣaraviṣayatāyāstvayaivoktatvācca bhūtayonyakṣaraṃ brahmaiva
syāt । paratvāvadhyakṣarameva kevalaṃ pradhānaṃ bhavet । na ca brahmaṇi pariṇāmyupādānatvāsambhavo
doṣaḥ । apādānapañcamīnāmaikarūpyeṇa brahmaiva bhūtayonyakṣaramiti siddhau dṛṣṭāntagatasarvasādṛ-
śyavivakṣāyāṃ niyamābhāvādupādānatvamātre paramūrṇanābhyādidṛṣṭāntaḥ । sarūpakāryaprabhava-
tvaṃ jīvopādānatvābhiprāyamiti kalpanopapatteriti cenna । pariṇāmitayā pariṇāmyadhiṣṭhāna-
tayā ca pradhānasya brahmaṇaścobhayorapyupādānasya sampratipannasya sadbhāvena sarvavijñānapratijñā-
nirvāhakabrahmajagadupādānatvaghaṭakatayā pradhānagatajagadupādānatvapratipādanasyāpi saṅgatisattvena
cānyathāsiddhenāpādānapañcamyaikarūpyeṇa prathamaśrutorṇanābhyādidṛṣṭāntaprāptasya prāṇamanaḥprabhṛ-
tyacetanaparyavasitasarūpakāryaprabhavatvaprāptasya ca pariṇāmyupādānatvasya tyāgāyogāt । nanvevaṃ
sati <quote>‘tathākṣarātsambhavatīha viśva’</quote>mityantaṃ pradhānaparam । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘tapasā cīyata’</quote>ityārabhya
<quote>‘provāca tāṃ tatvato brahmavidyā’</quote>mityantaṃ brahmaparam । tato<quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>dityādi pradhānaparam ।
punaśca <quote>‘divyo hyamūrta’</quote>ityādi brahmaparamiti syāditi cedastu ko doṣaḥ । arthasambandhānusā-
reṇa vākyānvayopapatteḥ । uktaṃ hi jaimininā viśvajidadhikaraṇe—arthato hyasamarthānāmāna-
ntarye'pyasambandha iti । uktaṃ ca vārtikakṛtā---<quote>‘yasya yenārthasambandho dūrasthenāpi tena
saḥ । arthato hyasamarthānāmānantaryamakāraṇam’</quote> iti । evamupapāditaḥ pradhānapūrvapakṣaḥ । atha
jīvapūrvapakṣamupapādayati—<pratika>athaveti</pratika> । nanvakṣaraśabda eva tāvajjīve nopapadyate । na hi pradhāne
svakāryāṇyaśnute vyāpnotīti vyutpattyeva brahmaṇi na kṣaratīti vyutpattyeva jīve kayā cidva‍yu-
tpattyā tadupapadyata ityāha—<pratika>tasya hīti</pratika> । <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛtākṣaraṃ haraḥ kṣarātmānāvīśate deva
ekaḥ’</quote>iti śvetāśvataropaniṣadi parabrahmaṇaḥ paśupāśapatitvamāmnāyate । tatra <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhāna’</quote>miti
pradhāne kṣaraśabdavadamṛtākṣaramityamṛtaśabdanirdiṣṭajīve'kṣaraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ । <quote>‘amṛte’</quote>ti <quote>‘supāṃ-
sulu’</quote>gityādinā chāndaso vibhaktilopaḥ । amṛtamakṣaramityayaṃ jīvanirdeśa ityetacca <quote>‘hara eko
devaḥ kṣarātmānāvīṣṭa’</quote> ityuttaravākye ātmaśabdapratinirdeśādavagamyate । <quote>‘yaccedaṃ kṣaramavyakta
yadapyamṛtamakṣaram । tāvubhau yaḥ kṣarātmānāveko devaḥ svayaṃ haraḥ ।।’ īśate tadabhidhyānādyo-
janāttatvabhāvata’</quote>ityādiśivapurāṇavacanaiścāsya mantrasyaivamevārtho darśitaḥ । tasmādakṣaraśabdo
jīve nānupapannaḥ । jīvasya jananamaraṇavattve'pi na kṣarati svarūpeṇa na pariṇamata iti svarū-
pānyathābhāvābhāvaparatayā tatrākṣaraśabdasya vyutpattirapi sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । nanu tathāpi
pariṇāmyupādānatvarūpaṃ bhūtayonitvaṃ jīvasya na sambhavatītyata āha—<pratika>svakarmavaśeneti । a-
yamāśayaḥ</pratika> । <quote>‘agotramavarṇamacakṣuraśrotramapāṇipāda’</quote>miti jīve prasiddhānāṃ gotrādīnāṃ niṣedhya-
<pb n="380"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ---parameśvara evākṣaraṃ, <quote>‘yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ’</quote> ityā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
jātasyādhikaraṇaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ tasyaitasyaiva jīvasyādhikaraṇatvopapattau nādhikaraṇāntaramape-
kṣaṇīyam । buddhigauravāpatteḥ । upapadyate ca śarīradvāra gotravarṇādimato'pi jīvasya sākṣātsaṃ-
bandhena gotrādimattayā bhrāntipratītasya rajatātmanā bhrāntipratītasya raṅgasya rajatatvaniṣadhaṃ
pratīva gotrādiniṣedhaṃ pratyadhikaraṇatvam । dṛṣṭaṃ ca bālyakārśyādyadhikaraṇasyaivāvasthābhedena ta-
nniṣedhaṃ pratyadhikaraṇatvam । nanvakṣaraśabdena jīvasādhāraṇena tadgrahaṇaprasaktau tadvyāvartanenaivāgo-
tramityādikaṃ saphalaṃ syānnānyatheti cenna । jīve gotrasambandhādipratītikāle tadabhāvāyoga-
prasaktau tadvyavacchedakatvenāpi tasya sāphalyopapatteḥ । ubhayavidhaphalasambhave'pyayogavyavacche-
dasyaiva phalasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam । adhikaraṇāntarakalpanālāghavāt ayogavyavacchedaphalasyā-
gotratvādirūpopāttadharmigatatvena pratyāsannatvācca । anyayogavyavacchedasya tu phalasya grahaṇaṃ
na yuktam । gotrādyadhikaraṇavyatirekeṇa tanniṣedhaṃ pratyadhikaraṇānveṣaṇagauravāpatteḥ । anyayoga-
vyavacchedasyāgotrapadānupāttajīvagatākṣarapadagrāhyatvayogavyavacchedātmakatvena viprakṛṣṭatvācca ।
upāttadharmigataphale labhye hi nānupāttadharmigataṃ phalaṃ grāhyam । ata evāvahananavidherupāttāva-
hananagatāprāptāṃśaparipūraṇarūpastadayogavyavaccheda eva phalaṃ na tvanupāttakhavidalananivṛtti-
rūpastadayogavyavaccheda iti niyamasya parisaṅkhyāto bheda iṣyate । tasmādagotratvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ
jīva iva na brahmaṇi svārasyenānveti । pradhāne tvacetane gotrādiprasaktyabhāvāt nānvetīti
spaṣṭameva । nanu yathaivāgotratvādikaṃ jīva eva svarasato'nveti na brahmaṇi pradhāne vā । evama-
dṛśyatvamagrāhyatvaṃ ca dṛśyagrāhyaprapañcabhinne darśanādiprasaktimati ca pradhāna evānveti । na tu
jīve brahmaṇi vā । tataścopakramagatādṛśyatvāgrāhyatvānusāreṇāgotratvādikaṃ pradhāne netu yukta-
miti cenna । upakramagatādapi liṅgadvayāduparitanānāmanekaliṅgānāṃ prabalatayā tadanusāreṇaivā-
dṛśyatvāgrāhyatvayornitavyatvāt । evaṃ cāgotratvādyanusāreṇa pra1dhānamevākṣaramiti vyavasthitau
tadanusāreṇa bhūtayonitvamadṛṣṭadvārā jagatkāraṇatvamitiyojanīyam । tataścākṣārāt parataḥ parā-
jjīvātparaḥ parameśvara iti tatrāmūrtatvamaprāṇatvamamanastvaṃ ca niṣedhasya pratiyogyadhikaraṇāna-
dhikaraṇatvalāghavamayogavyavacchedaphalalābhalāghavaṃ cānādṛtya parameśvara eva cetanatvena prasa-
ktasya mūrtimattvādervyāvartanārthamiti yojanīyam । na cākṣarātparataḥ paro'pi jīva ityeva pū-
rvapakṣo'stu, tatratyākṣaraśabdasya pradhānaparatvopapatteriti śaṅkanīyam । tathā sati brahmā śruti-
liṅgasamākhyānāmanavakāśatvāpatterataḥ parameśvara evākṣaramiti । akṣaraṃ pradhānaṃ jīvo veti
pūrvapakṣasya pravṛttatvādadṛśyatvādiguṇaka iti sautraṃ dharminirdeśamananurudhyākṣaramiti dharmini-
rdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ—<pratika>yassarvajña iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । yatpadasya prakṛtākṣaraparāmarśitvāt sarvajñatvaṃ
sarvavittvaṃ sraṣṭavyālocanarūpajñānavattvaṃ ca prakṛtasyākṣarasyaiva dharmaḥ । na tu prakariṣyamāṇasyā-
kṣarātparasya । sarvanāmnaḥ prakṛtaparatvasambhave prakariṣyamāṇaparatvakalpanānaucityāt । muṇḍake
prathamakhaṇḍānte <quote>‘yassarvajña’</quote> iti mantraḥ । tatraiva khaṇḍe bhūtayoniḥ prākprakṛtaḥ । akṣarātparasya
tu tṛtīyakhaṇḍe prastāva iti sannihitaparāmarśasambhave'tyantavyavahitaparāmarśānaucityācca ।
<note>(1) <quote>‘jīva evākṣara’</quote> miti ca-pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="381"/>
dinā taddharmokteḥ । na hi parameśvarādanyasmin sarvajñatvādikaṃ sambhavati । yaduktaṃ
bhūtayonitvaṃ jīvapradhānayoḥ saṃbhavatīti, tadayuktaṃ, tayoracetanāsarvajñayostatsā-
marthyābhāvāt ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na ca prakṛtaparatve'pi <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote>tyavyavahitapūrvamantraprakṛtabrahmaparatvameva syāt na tu
vyavahitaprakṛtākṣaraparatvamiti vācyam । pulliṅgena yatpadena napuṃsakaliṅgabrahmapadoktaparā-
marśāyogāt । akṣarasya tu bhūtayoniśabdenāpi prakṛtatvāttadabhiprāyeṇa pulliṅgatvamupapadyate ।
na ca <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote>ti mantrasthitatapaḥśabdavivaraṇārthatvā<quote>‘dyaḥ sarvajña’</quote>iti mantrasya tanma-
ntroktabrahmaparatvamāvaśyakamiti vācyam । tasyāpi mantrasya <quote>‘tathākṣarātsambhavatīha viśva’</quote>miti
tatpūrvamantroktaviśvasambhavaprakāraviśeṣavivaraṇārthatvena tvaduktarītyaiva tanmantroktabrahmaṇo'pi ta-
tpūrvamantroktabhūtayonyakṣararūpatvāvaśyambhāvāt । tasmādbha‍ūtayonyabhiprāyeṇaiva pulliṅganirdeśaḥ ।
evaṃ ca bhūtayonitvavivaraṇārthaṃ<quote>‘tathākṣarātsambhavatīha viśva’</quote>mityanto mantraḥ tanmantroktaviśvasa-
mbhavaprakāraviśeṣanirūpaṇārthaṃ <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote>ti mantraḥ tanmantroktatapaśśabdavivaraṇārthaṃ<quote>‘ya-
ssarvajña’</quote>itimantraitimantrāṇāmākāṅkṣākrameṇāvataraṇamupapadyate।mantratrayāmnātasyākṣarāttatastasmā-
dityapādānapañcamītrayasyaikārthyenāvataraṇamapyupapadyate । prañcamītrayasyāpyapādānaparasyaikaviṣayatva-
sambhave hyakṣarādityasyaivāpādānāntaraparatvaṃ tatastasmādityanayorupādānāntaraparatvamiti kalpanaṃ
na yuktam । na ca tathākṣarāttatastasmādityapādānapañcamīnāmarthaikarūpyakṛtapratyabhijñānatastathā-
kṣarādakṣarātparataḥ para iti pañcamyoḥ śabdaikarūpyakṛtaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ prathamopasthitiviṣayatvā-
tprabalamiti tadanusāreṇa paratvāvadhyākṣarameva bhūtayonyakṣaraṃ syāt na brahmeti vācyam । <quote>‘a-
kṣarātparataḥ para’</quote> ityataḥ tatastasmādityanayoḥ prākpaṭhitatvena tadgataśabdaikarūpyakṛtapratyabhijñā-
nādapyatratyārthaikarūpyakṛtapratyabhijñānasyaiva prāthamikatvāditi । nanu yadi prā1thamikatvamādriyeta
tadorṇanābhidṛṣṭāntasvārasyaprāptaṃ pariṇāmyupādānatvaṃ pradhānaliṅagmagotratvādikaṃ jīvaliṅgaṃ ca
sarvajñatvāditaḥ prabalamiti tadanusāreṇa pradhānaṃ jīvo vā bhūtayonyakṣaramiti niścite tatrāna-
nvayi sarvajñatvādikamagatyākṣarātparataḥ paraṃ yojanīyamityāśaṅkāmanuvadati—<pratika>yaduktamiti ।</pratika>
<pratika>acetanāsarvajñayoriti ।</pratika> ayaṃ bhāvaḥ । ūrṇanābhyādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ pradhāne sambhavatpariṇāmyupā-
dāntavaṃ na labhyate kiṃ tu pradhānādivyāvṛttaṃ sakalaprapañcasṛṣṭipālanasaṃhārakartṛtvamabhinnanimi-
ttopādānatvaṃ tathātve'pi prapañcadoṣairaspṛṣṭatvaṃ cetyetatsarvaṃ labhyate । tathā hi---<pratika>prathamadṛṣṭāntena</pratika>
tāvadūrṇanābhiḥ svaśarīraikadeśabhūtayā lālayā taṃtumiva parameśvaraḥ svaśaktiśakalena prapañcaṃ
sṛjati saṃharati ceti labhyate । tathāsatyūrṇanābhiviyogena tallālāsṛṣṭatantoriva parameśvarapṛ-
thagbhāvenāpi prapañcasya kadācidavasthi2tiḥ syāditi śaṅkāyāṃ dvitīyadṛṣṭāntaḥ । tenauṣadhīnāṃ
pṛthivyapṛthaksidhdyā pṛthivyekadeśatvavatprapañcasya parameśvarāpṛthagbhāvasidhdyā tadekadeśatvamiti
tasya sarvopādānatvaṃ labhyate । tarhi yathā puruṣasya svaśarīraikadeśo hastapādādiryatnena paripā-
lanīyaḥ tasminkadācidupahanyamāne tadupādānasṛjivataḥ puruṣasya duḥkhitvaṃ ca tathā parameśva-
rasya svaśarīrabhūtaśaktyekadeśaḥ prapañco'vaśyaṃ paripālanīyaḥ tasminkadācidupahanyamāne tasya
<note>(1) prāthamikatvamākasmikamādriyeta’ iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘sthitirastvityāśaṅkāyām’</quote> iti-ca pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="382"/>
duḥkhitvaṃ ca syāditi śaṅkāyāṃ tṛtīyadṛṣṭāntaḥ । tena yathā jīvataḥ puruṣādudbha‍ūte taccharīraika-
deśe keśanakhādau tena paripālyamāne kadācidupahanyamāne'pi puruṣasya duḥkhāsparśaḥ tathā prapañce
parameśvarādudbha‍ūte tena paripālyamāne kadācidupahanyamāne'pi na tasya duḥkhasparśa iti parameśvarasya
prapañcapālayitṛtvaṃ prapañcaprayuktadoṣāspṛṣṭatvaṃ ca labhyate । etatsiddhamabhinnanimittopādānatvādikaṃ
prapañcayitumeva <quote>‘tapasā cīyate brahme’</quote>tyādimantraistasya sraṣṭavyālocanādikaṃ prapañcyate । na caivaṃ-
bhūtamabhinnanimittopādānatvarūpaṃ bhūtayonitvamacetanasya pradhānasyāsarvajñasya jīvasya vopapadyate ।
evaṃ cā<quote>‘gotramavarṇa’</quote>mityādikamamūrtatvāprāṇatvādivat brahmaṇyeva cetanatvasāmānyaprasaktajīva-
dharmavyāvartakatayā yojanīyam । <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote> ditimantre sarūpagrahaṇamapi jīvarūpakāryābhi-
prāyeṇa yojanīyam । natve<quote>‘tasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ce’</quote>ti vyavahitānantara-
mantre vakṣyamāṇaprāṇamanaḥprabhṛtyacetanakāryābhiprāyeṇa yojanīyamiti । sūtre <quote>‘adṛśyatvādi-
guṇaka’</quote> iti pulliṅganirdeśo bhūtayonyabhiprāya iti prāgevoktam । yadyapi viṣayavākye
<quote>‘yathā tadakṣara’</quote>mityakṣaraśabdasya prathamanirdiṣṭatvāllaghutvācca tenaiva sūtre'pi dharminirdeśaḥ kartu-
mucitaḥ । tathāpi <quote>‘dharmokte’</quote>rityanena gṛhītasarvajñatvādidharmo'kṣarātpara evānveti na tvakṣare
pulliṅganirdiṣṭatvāditi śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ bhūtayonyabhiprāyo <quote>‘yassarvajña’</quote> ityādipulliṅganirdeśa
iti dyotayituṃ viśeṣaṇībhūtādṛśyatvādiguṇamukhena prakṛtākṣararūpo bhūtayonirdharmitvena
nirdiṣṭaḥ । nanvevaṃ sati lāghavādbha‍ūtayonirityeva dharminirdeśaḥ kartumucitaḥ । satyam । adhikaraṇa-
vaiphalyaśaṅkāparihārārthamitthaṃ dharminirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ । atra hyevamāśaṅkodeti । muṇḍakopaniṣadaḥ
paramopakramaprabhṛti samāptiparyantamakṣarātpare parabrahmaṇi mahātātparyeṇa samanvayaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇo'pi
sampratipanna eva । tasyāṃ kiyataḥ pradeśya paratvāvadhyakṣarapratipādanārthatvamātramadhikaṃ pūrvapa-
kṣiṇeṣyate । kiṃ tena sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ mahātātparyeṇa brahmaṇi samanvayaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ
pravṛttasya siddhāntinaḥ prahīyate । muṇḍaka eva hi dvitīyakhaṇḍe <quote>‘kālī karālī ca manojavā
ce’</quote>ti mantre brahmavidyāprastāve atyantadavīyastayopayuktamagnijihvānirūpaṇamapi dṛśyate । tasmā-
dviphalamidamadhikaraṇamitīyamāśaṅketthamanena dharminirdeśena nirākriyate । yadyadṛśyatvādiguṇako
bhūtayoniḥ paraṃ brahmetyanenādhikaraṇena siddhyati tadānīmasyāmakṣaravidyāyāmadṛśyatvādiguṇavaiśi-
ṣṭyena paraṃ brahmopāsanīyamiti na sidhdyati । <quote>‘akṣaradhiyāṃ tvavarodha’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3. 3. 33 sū.)</ref> ityadhi-
karaṇarītyāsyāmakṣaravidyāyāṃ parabrahmaguṇatvena sampratipannamadṛśyatvādiguṇajātaṃ sarvāsu brahmavi-
dyāsūpasaṃharaṇīyamityetadapi sidhdyati । pūrvapakṣe tvadṛśyatvādiguṇakādakṣarātparatvenaivātra brahmo-
pāsanā siddhyet na tvadṛśyatvādiguṇakatveneti siddhānte pūrvapakṣe ca phalabhedasadbhāvānnādhika-
raṇavaiphalyamiti । api cādhikaraṇāvatārikābhāṣyoktarītyā parameśvarasya pṛthivyādiniyama-
nārthena śarīreṇa pṛthivyādivaddarśanasparśanaviṣayatvaprasaktyā <quote>‘na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanaina’</quote>mityā-
diśrutiprasiddhasyādṛśyatvādestaddharmānupapattiśaṅkānirākaraṇārthatvenāsyādhikaraṇasyānatispaṣṭa-
brahmaliṅgakavākyacintanārthena pādena saṅgatyupapādanārthamapyadṛśyatvādiguṇaka iti dharminirdeśaḥ
kṛtaḥ । tenādṛśyatvādiḥ parameśvaraguṇo bhavitumarhatyeva । <quote>‘adṛśyamagrāhya’</quote>mityādiśravaṇāt ।
<pb n="383"/>
punaratra jīvapradhānayoranupapattimāha---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
atraikavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāyate <quote>‘kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ
vijñātaṃ bhavati’</quote> <ref>(muṇḍa॰ 1.1.)</ref> iti । taccānyaccaivaṃrūpaṃ viśeṣaṇam । tadvyapadeśācca na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pṛthivyādiniyāmakena śarīreṇa pṛthivyādiṣu parameśvarasya dṛśyatvaṃ spṛśyatvaṃ ca prasajyeteti śa-
ṅkāvāraṇārthameva khalvadṛśyamagrāhyamityucyate । rūpasparśahīne svarūpe darśanādiprasaktyabhāvena
tatrādṛśyatvāgrāhyatvayoravaktavyatvāt । śrutopapattyarthaṃ pṛthivyādiniyāmakaśarīrasyāsmadādi-
darśanādyayogyatvādi kalpanīyam । apāṇipādādiśravaṇamapi darśanādiyogyapāṇipādādyabhā-
vābhiprāyamityupapattiḥ sūcitā bhavati । nanvadhikaraṇāntareṣu sūtre pādasaṅgatisūcanārthaṃ viśeṣa-
ṇaṃ nāsti kimarthamasminnadhikaraṇe tatkṛtam । ucyate । pūrvapakṣe spaṣṭānāṃ brahmaśrutiliṅgavākyā-
nāmakṣarātpare'nvayo'bhimataḥ । tena spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgavākyacintanārthe tṛtīyapāda evāsyā-
dhikaraṇasya saṅgatiḥ na dvitīyapāda iti śaṅkonmiṣati tannirākaraṇāya dvitīyapāde'pyasya
saṅgatisūcanārthaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam । tenobhayatra saṅgatamapyetadadhikaraṇamubhayatra na pravartanīya-
mityekatra pravartanīyaṃ satprathamātikrame kāraṇābhāvādatraiva pravartitamiti saṅgatirupapāditā bhava-
ti । syādetat । <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>ditimantroktamakṣaraṃ tāvadbha‍ūtayonyakṣaramiti sampratipannam । ata-
stadanantaramantre brahmagataparatvāvadhitayā nardiṣṭamakṣaramapi tadevetyetadapratyākhyeyam । tathā ca
bhūtayonyakṣarasya brahmaparatvāsiddhau tatpradhānaṃ jīvo vetyevāṅgīkartavyamiti tadanusāreṇa yathorṇa-
nābhirityādikaṃ pradhāne jīve vā yathākathañcidyojanīyamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ tasya pradhānatva-
jīvatvapakṣayoranupapattyantarapradarśanaparatvenottarasūtramavatārayati—<pratika>panariti</pratika> <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇabhe-
davyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘na ca smārta’</quote>miti pūrvādhikaraṇasūtre prakṛtau pradhāna-
śārīrāvitaraśabdena parāmṛśyete । tatra pradhānapakṣanirākaraṇārthatayā veśeṣaṇavyapadeśaṃ vyācaṣṭe
—<pratika>atreti । taccānyacceti ।</pratika> tatsāmānyataḥ pratipādyaviśeṣaṇatvena śrutaṃ sarvavijñānapratijñādikam
anyaccākṣarātparasya puruṣasya sākṣādviśeṣaṇatvena śrutam evaṃrūpaṃ pradhānavyāvartanakṣamamiha sūtre
viśeṣaṇaśabdenoktamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘sa bāhyābhyantara’</quote> ityatra <quote>‘sa’</quote>iti puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>
ditimantraprakṛtabhūtayonyakṣaraparāmarśi sākṣādakṣarātparasya viśeṣaṇam । na ca bāhyābhyantara-
sahita ityarthakaṃ tadekapadatvena yojanīyam । vaiyarthyāt । bāhyābhyantara iti sarvagatatvoktyaiva
bāhyābhyantarasakalavastusaṃsargasiddheḥ । bhinnapadatve ca akṣarātparataḥ puruṣa eva prakṛtabhūtayonyakṣaraṃ
na tu paratvāvadhibhūtamakṣaramiti pratyāyanena sārthakatvāt । evaṃ ca bhūtayonyakṣaraparāmarśitatpa-
dasāmānādhikaraṇyenākṣarātparataityataḥ prācīnena <quote>‘yenākṣara’</quote>mityakṣarapuruṣapadasāmānādhikara-
ṇyānugṛhītenākṣarātparataḥ puruṣo bhūtayonyakṣaramiti sthite tadavaratayā tato bhedena vyapadiśya-
mānamakṣaraṃ pradhānamiti na tadbha‍ūtayonyakṣaramiti siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘akṣarātparata’</quote> iti pūrva-
pakṣyuktarītyā na samānādhikaraṇe pañcamyau । kāraṇasya kāryavargāpekṣayā pūrvavartitvādirūpasya
paratvasya prasiddhatvāt । kiṃ tu vyadhikaraṇe । tena pradhānātparo jīvo labhyata iti tadapekṣayā
<pb n="384"/>
pradhānamakṣaram । <quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ’</quote> <ref>(muṇḍa ॰ 2.1.)</ref> iti jīvādbhedavyapadeśācca
na cīvaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। rūpopanyāsācca ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘agnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryau diśaḥ śrotre vāgvivṛtāśca vedāḥ । vāyuḥ prāṇo
hṛdayaṃ viśvamasya padbhyāṃ pṛthivī hyeṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā ।।’</quote> <ref>(muṇḍa ॰ 2.1.)</ref> ityakṣarasya
trailokyarūpatvamupanyasyate । ataśca sakalātmā parameśvara evātrākṣarapadābhidheyaḥ ।।
ityadṛśyatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paratvarūpabhedavyapadeśādakṣaraṃ na jīvaścetyāha—<pratika>akṣarāditi ।</pratika> evaṃ <quote>‘yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ
kartāramīśa’</quote>miti kartṛkarmabhāvena janyajanakabhāvena niyamyaniyāmakabhāvena ca bhedavyapadeśo-
'pi sūtrārthatayā draṣṭavyaḥ । pradhānajīvavyāvṛttatrailokyaśarīratvaśravaṇādapi na pradhānaṃ jīvo vākṣara-
miti pratipādayituṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। rūpopanyāsācca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> na<quote>‘nvagnirmūrdhe’</quote>tyādimantre asyeti
sarvanāmnā <quote>‘divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣa’</quote>iti mantravarṇitamakṣarātparaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśya tasyaiva trailokyaśa-
rīratvamucyate nākṣarasyetyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>akṣarasyeti ।</pratika> <quote>‘agnirmūrdhe’</quote>tyetasmādavyavahitapūrvapaṭhite
<quote>‘etasmājjāyate prāṇo manassarvendriyāṇi ce’</quote>ti mantre etasmādityasya prakṛtākṣaraparatvena <quote>‘a-
gnirmūrdhe’</quote>ti mantrapaṭhitasyāsyetipadasyāpi tatparatvamevocitam । <quote>‘etasmā’</quote>diti padamapi tadavya-
vahitapūrvamantrapaṭhitamakṣarātparaṃ parāmṛśediti cet yadyevaṃ tasminmantre'kṣarātparataḥ pare prayuktaṃ
<quote>‘sa bāhyābhyantara’</quote>ityatra śrutaṃ sa iti sarvanāmāpi <quote>‘yathā sudīptā’</quote>diti tadavyavahitamantraśrutaṃ
bhūtayonyakṣarameva parāmṛśediti tatpraṇāḍikayā <quote>‘agnirmūrdhe’</quote> timantra śrutamasyetipadamapi tadeva
parāmṛśediti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>।। iti adṛśyatvādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika> ।।

<sutra>sū॰ । adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 22 ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 23 ।। rūpopa-
nyāsācca ।। 24 ।।</sutra>

<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha adṛśyatvādiguṇakādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sa॰ ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 21 ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 22 ।। rūpopa-
nyāsācca ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇe pradhānavirodhidraṣṭṭatvādidharmavaśānna pradhānamantaryāmītyuktam । tarhi tadvirodhidharmāṇāmatrāśravaṇāt pradhānamevā-
dṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ syāditi pratyudāharaṇatvenādhikaraṇāntaramārabhate <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika>
adṛśyatvādiguṇakaḥ bhūtayoniḥ paramātmā । kutaḥ । <quote>‘yaḥ sarvajñassarvavit’</quote>ityādinā paramātmadharmāṇāṃ sarvajñattvasarvavitvādīnāmu-
cyamānatvādityarthaḥ । asya<quote>‘yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ ya-
dbha‍ūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ ।।’</quote>ityādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānamuta śārīraḥ kiṃ vā para-
mātmeti saṃdehaḥ । yoniśabdasya prakṛtyarthatvanimittārthatvābhyāṃ pradhānaṃ vā jīvo vā adṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayonirbhavitumarhatī-
ti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । sarvajñatvasarvavittvābhyāṃ paramātmaivādṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayonirnānya iti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p>bhūtayoneḥ paramātmatve hetvantaramāha <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣa’</quote>ityā-
dinā divyatvādiviśeṣaṇaśravaṇānna jīvaḥ<quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote> ityādinā akṣarasyāvyākṛtasya paramātmanaśca bhedena vyapadiṣṭatvāt
<pb n="385"/>
na pradhānaṃ bhūtayoniḥ । api tu paramātmaivetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>punarapi bhūtayoneḥ paramātmatve hetvantaramāha—<pratika>rūpopanyāsācca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘agnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryā’</quote>vityādisarva
kāryātmakarūpasyopanyāsātparamātmaiva bhūtayoniriti vṛttikāramatam । ‘puruṣa evedaṃ viś‍vaṃ karmetyādisarvātmakarūpopanyāsātparamā-
tmaiva bhūtayoniriti bhagavatpādīyamatam । asminpakṣe sarvarūpopanyāsaḥ parameś‍varapratipattiheturiti tātparyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pratyakṣapṛthivyādirūpatvena pratipāditasya parameś‍varasya tadvadda‍ṛśyatvādikaṃ tu nāstīti pratipādayitumidama-
dhikaraṇamavatāryate <pratika>।। sū॰ ।।</pratika> <pratika>adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate । yattadadre-
śya’</quote>mityādi <quote>‘paripaśyanti dhīrā’</quote>ityantaṃ vākyameva viṣayaḥ । atrākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ pradhānaṃ vā jīvo vā parameśvaro veti
saṃdehaḥ । mahadādipariṇāminaḥ pradhānasya bhūtayonitvasaṃbhavāt jīvasya<quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛtākṣara’</quote>mitiśruterakṣaraśabdavācya-
tvaucityāt svakarmavaśena mahābhūtayonitvasaṃbhavācca tayoranyataradakṣaramiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu parameś‍vara evākṣaraśabdavā-
cyaḥ । <quote>‘yassarvajñassarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapa’</quote>ityādinā sarvajñatvādipārameś‍varadharmokteracetanāsarvajñayoḥ pradhānajīvayorbhūtayonitva-
sāmarthyābhāvācca । iti ।।</p>
<p>punaranupapattimāha---<pratika>sū ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 23 ।।</pratika> ekavijñānena sarvavijñānarūpasyānya-
syāpyevaṃrūpasya ca viśeṣaṇasya vyapadeśadarśanānna pradhānamakṣaraṃ <quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>iti jīvādbhedavyapadeśācca na jīva ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। rūpopanyāsācca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘agnirmūrdhe’</quote>tyādinā akṣarasya trailokyarūpatvopanyāsācca paramātmā parameś‍vara evā-
trākṣarapadābhidheya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, ।। sū ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ prāyaḥ samānameva । kiṃ tu<quote>‘a-
kṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>ityādivākyāntaramapyadhikaṃ viṣayatayā saṃgṛhyate । kimihādṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ pradhānamuta paramātmā akṣarā-
tparataḥ paraśca kiṃ puruṣaḥ uta paramātmā iti saṃśayaḥ । atrādṛśyatvādiguṇakaśabdenākṣaraṃ pum̐lliṃganirdeśena cākṣarātparataḥ paraśca
dvayamapi viṣayokriyata ityabhiprāyeṇa vākyadvayaṃ viṣayatayopāttamiti viśeṣaḥ । pṛthivyādyacetanagatadṛśyatvādīnāṃ pratiṣedhā-
ttajjātīyācetanaṃ pradhānameva bhūtayonyakṣaraṃ sarvasmādvikārādakṣarādasmātparabhūtātpradhānātparaśca caitanyādhiṣṭhātā puruṣa eveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
uttaratra <quote>‘yassarvajñaḥ sarvavi’</quote>diti pradhānapuruṣayorasaṃbhāvitasya sarvajñatvāderabhidhānāt<quote>‘tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyata’</quote>
iti sarvajñātsatyasaṃkalpājjagadutpattiśravaṇācca pūrvoktamadṛśyatvādiguṇakaṃ bhūtayonyakṣaraṃ<quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>iti ca nirdiṣṭaṃ tadakṣaraṃ
paraṃ brahmaiveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, adṛśyatvādiguṇakaḥ paramātmā sarvajñatvāditaddharmokteḥ । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 23 ।।</pratika> paravidyāprakaraṇena ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñopapā-
danādibhiḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ bhūtayonyakṣarasya vyāvartyamānatvāt<quote>‘akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ’</quote>avyākṛtātparato'vasthitāt samaṣṭipuruṣādapi
para iti pradhānapuruṣābhyāmasya bhūtayonyakṣarasya bhedena vyapadiśyamānatvācca nātra pradhānapuruṣau nirdiṣṭau । api tu paramātmaiva । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। rūpopanyāsācca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘agnirmūrdhe’</quote> tyādinā sarvabhūtāntarātmasaṃbandhitayocyamānasyedṛśasya rūpasya
paramātmana eva saṃbhavāccāyamadṛśyatvādiguṇakaḥ paramātmā ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, ।। sū ।। adṛśyatvādiguṇako dharmokteḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva । atrādṛśyatvādi-
guṇakamakṣaraṃ prakṛtirvā brahmā vā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । ūrṇanābhyādidṛṣṭāntapūrvakaṃ tasya viśvopādānatvokteḥ prakṛtirvā <quote>‘brahmā devānā’</quote>
mityādyupakramasthapulliṃgabrahmaśabdānurodhena brahmavidyātvavyapadeśāderapi tatparatvaucityāt <quote>‘tasmādetadbrahma’</quote> ityādijāyamānabrahma-
liṅgācca viriṃcirvā adṛśyamidamakṣaraṃ bhavitumarhati<quote>‘divyo hyamūrta’</quote> ityādinā divyapuruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ prāta paratvāvadhitayākṣarasya nikṛ-
ṣṭatvena pratipādanānna haririti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । paravidyāviṣayatvarūpataddharmokteḥ sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaṇāt <quote>‘tasmādetadbrahme’</quote>ti bhedavyapa deśā-
t akṣarāditi paṃcamyā nirdiṣṭasyākṣarāntaratvācca viṣṇurevedamakṣaramiti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>adṛśyatvādiguṇakaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘yattadadreśya’</quote>
mityādiśrutyuktādṛśyatvādidharmaviśiṣṭākṣaraśabdavācyo viṣṇureva । kutaḥ । <pratika>dharmokteḥ</pratika>=ṛgādiparavidyāviṣayatvarūpaviṣṇudharmasya
<quote>‘yaye’</quote>ti śrutyoktatvādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyāṃ ca netarau ।। 22 ।।</pratika> cakārassamuccāyakaḥ । <pratika>itarau ca</pratika>=prakṛtidvayaṃ viriccirudrau
ca । <pratika>na</pratika>=nādṛśyatvādiguṇakau । kutaḥ । <pratika>viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyām</pratika>=sarvajñādiviśeṣaṇāt <quote>‘tasmā’</quote>diti adṛśyatvādiguṇa-
kākṣarādviriṃcirudrayorbhedokteśca । pratijñādvaye'pi hetvoḥ krameṇānvayaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>rūpopanyāsācca ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yadāpaśyaḥ paśyata’</quote>iti viṣṇvasādhāraṇasvarṇarūpapratipādanāccādṛśyatvādiguṇako viṣṇure-
vetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmadṛśyatvādiguṇakādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="386"/>
<head>atha vaiśvānarādhikaraṇam. ।। 9 ।।</head>
prāṇādhāratvena pūrvamupāsyatayoktasya punarjāṭharāgnirūpeṇopāsyatvamāha---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivimānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste sa sarveṣu lo-
keṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti’</quote> ityādi chāndogye'sya viṣayaḥ śrūyate ।।
atropāsyatayokto vaiśvānaraḥ parameśvaro'nyo veti sandehaḥ ।। pūrvapakṣanyāyastu---
vaiśvānaraśabdena jāṭharāgnirucyate; ‘ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yenedamannaṃ pacyate yadidama-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>saṅgatiṃ pradarśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>prāṇādhāratveneti ।</pratika> nanu yadyevamasya vaiśvānarā-
dhikaraṇasya aṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇena saṅgatiḥ tadā tadanantaramevedaṃ pravartanīyam । asyāpi pravartanenopāsa-
kanediṣṭhasthānanirūpaṇaṃ samāpya sarvatrāvasthānamantaryāmyadhikaraṇe nirūpayitumucitamiti cet sa-
tyam । saṅgatyantaravaśādantaryāmyadhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartitam । aṅgupṭhādhikaraṇe hi parameśvarasyāṅguṣṭhasa-
māśrayaṇenopāsakanediṣṭhatvamuktam । tatreyaṃ śaṅkonmiṣati । namaskarturivāpakarṣāvahaṃ parāṅguṣṭhasamā-
śrayaṇaṃ parameśvarasyānupapannamiti imāṃ śaṅkāṃ niyantṛtayā retomūtrapurīṣādisādhāraṇyena sakala-
prapañcasamāśrayaṇe'pi na tatprayuktadoṣasparśaiti sāmānyatassamarthanena parihartumantaryāmyadhikaraṇaṃ
pravartitam । tadanantaraṃ pṛthivyādiṣu rūpaviśeṣamāsthāyāvasthitasya purodeśāvasthitacaitravadda‍ṛśyatā
syāditi śaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ bhūtayonyadhikaraṇaṃ pravartitam । itthamaṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇamukhāgataśaṅkādvayani-
rākaraṇānantaraṃ pūrvavadupāsakanediṣṭhasthānāntaramucyata iti yuktaiveyaṃ saṅgatiḥ । yadyapyupakosa-
lavidyādhikaraṇapravartanānantaramevāsyādhikaraṇasya pravartanena śarīrāntarvartitayopāsakanediṣṭhatve
kārts‍nyena pratipādite tadanantaramantaryāmyadhikaraṇaṃ pravartayituṃ śakyaṃ tathāpyaṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇapūrva-
pakṣapravṛttiprakārapradarśitadṛṣṭāntapratyudāharaṇasaṅgativaśāttadadhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartitamiti na ki-
ñcidasāṅgatyam <pratika>।। sū ।। vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya,
brahmavaiśvānaraśrutibhyāṃ saṃśayamāha—<pratika>yastvetamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘tadanyo ve’</quote>tyanena jāṭharāgnyādipūrvapakṣatra-
yaṃ kroḍīkṛtam । tatra vaiśvānaraśabdasya jāṭharādiviṣayaprayogadarśanena pūrvapakṣatrayaṃ krameṇopapā-
<pratika>dayati—vaiśvānaraśabdeneti</pratika> । vaiśvānaraśrutyudāharaṇaṃ <quote>‘śabdādibhya’</quote> iti <ref>(bra ॰ 1. 2. 27)</ref>
sūtre pradarśayiṣyamāṇānāmagniśrutitretāgnikalpanaprāṇāhutyādhāratvādiliṅgānāmapyupalakṣaṇam ।
chāndogye <quote>‘ko na ātmā kiṃ brahme’</quote>ti brahmātma śrutibhyāmupakrame'pi vājasaneyiśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘vaiśvāna
raṃ vai bhagavansamprati veda tanno brūhī’</quote>ti vaiśvānaraśabdenopakramadarśanādupakramo na vinigamaka ।
<quote>‘sarveṣu loke’</quote>ṣvityādinoktamannādatvaphalamabrahmopāsanayāpyupapadyate । <quote>‘etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājaye’</quote>
dityādau karmaprāpyatvenāpi hi tadāmnāyate । iha tu tadannādatvaṃ bhūrādiṣu yaṃ kañcillokaṃ pṛthi-
vyādiṣu yatkiñcidbha‍ūtapradhānaṃ śarīraṃ devamanuṣyādyātmasu yatkiñcidātmatāṃ gatenāpi prāpyata iti
viśeṣo darśita iti bhedaḥ । sarvapāpapradāhastu na vaiśvānaropāsanasya phalaṃ kiṃtu tadanantaramā-
mnātasya prāṇāgnihotrasya । tadvidhānānantaraṃ hi <quote>‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhotī’</quote> tyupakramya
tadyathaiṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyate evaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyanta’iti śrūyate । tataśca-
<pb n="387"/>
dyate tasyaiva ghoṣo bhavati yametatkarṇāvapidhāya śṛṇoti, sa yadotkramiṣyan
bhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti’ <ref>(bṛha ॰ 7.9.)</ref> iti jāṭharāgnau prayogadarśanāt ।
mahābhūtatṛtīyo'gnirvā syāt <quote>‘eṣa vā agnirvaiśvānaraḥ’</quote> <ref>(tai॰ saṃ॰ 3.3.8.)</ref> ityādau
vaiśvānaraśabdasyāgnau prasiddhatvāt । agnirdevatā vā syāta; <quote>‘vaiśvānaraṃ
dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte’</quote> <ref>(tai॰ saṃ॰ 2.2.5.)</ref> ityādiṣviṣṭide-
vatātvena phaladātṛtvaśravaṇāt । na tu parameśvaraḥ, <quote>‘prādeśamātram’</quote> iti pari-
cchedāvagamāditi ।। atrocyate---parameśvara eva vaiśvānaraḥ । kathaṃ ? vaiśvānaraśa-
bdasya sādhāraṇye'pyasmin prakaraṇe <quote>‘ko na ātmā ? kiṃ brahma ?’</quote> <quote>‘ātmāname-
vemaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpratyadhyeṣi tameva no brūhi’</quote> <ref>(chā॰ 5.11.)</ref> ityādiṣu parameśvarāsādhā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vacanabalātkarmaṇa eva tatphalamiti siddhāntināpi svīkaraṇīyam । <quote>‘yakṣyamāṇo ha vai bhagava-
nto'hamasmi yāvadekaikasmā ṛtvije dhanaṃ dāsyāmi tāvadbhagavadbhyo dāsyāmi vasantu bhagavanta’</quote>
iti prārthitavantaṃ kekayarājaṃ pratyā <quote>‘tmānamevemaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ sampratyadhyeṣi tameva no brūhī’</quote>ti dhana-
lipsāṃ vinā vaiśvānaravidyāprakārasyaiva praśnastasya pūrṇāyuḥprāptiphalakatvādupapadyate । vājasane-
yaśākhāyāṃ hyasyāstatphalakatvamuktam <quote>‘apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyuretī’</quote>ti । dyumūrdhatvādikaṃ
dyuvaiśvānaratvādivat kalpanāmātrarūpaṃ jāṭharāgnāvapi sambhavati । evaṃ hyupākhyāyate ।
aupamanyavādayaḥ pañca maharṣayaḥ <quote>‘ko na ātmā kiṃ brahme’</quote>ti mīmāṃsitvā niścayamalabhamā-
nā vaiśvānaropāsanāparamuddālakaṃ gatvā tenāpi tasyāmakṛtsnavedinā aśvapatiḥ kekayo vaiśvā-
naramupāste tamabhyāgacchāmetyuktāḥ uddālakaṣaṣṭhāstamabhijagmuḥ । sa ca teṣāṃ jñānaṃ parīkṣya tato
vaktavyaśeṣaṃ vakṣyāmītyabhisandhāya <quote>‘aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāsse’</quote> ityādinā tānṣaḍapi
ṛṣīn krameṇa pṛṣṭvā tai <quote>‘rdivameva bhagavo rāja’</quote> nnityādibhiḥ yathākramaṃ dyusūryānilākāśajalā-
vanīṣu vaiśvānarapabuddhyā tairupāsyamānatayoktāsu divādayo vaiśvānaraṃ prati mūrdhacakṣuḥprāṇamadhyamū-
trasthānapādāvayavatvenopāsyāḥ na tu vaiśvānaratveneti vyastopāsanāḥ pratiṣidhya samastopāsanā-
viṣayasya vaiśvānarasya prāgupakṣiptaṃ dyumūrdhatvādiviśiṣṭarūpamekīkṛtyopadideśa <quote>‘mūrdhaiva sutejā’</quote>
ityādineti । evaṃ ca dyuprabhṛtiṣu yathā vaiśvānaratvaṃ kalpitaṃ tathā vaiśvānaramūrdhatvādikamapītye-
va yuktam । tacca jāṭharāgnāvapi sambhavati । brahmaśrutirapi dyumūrdhatvādisādṛśyāt gauṇatayopapa-
dyate । brahmaṇo'pi hi dyumūrdhatvādika <quote>‘magnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryā’</quote>vityādimantre śrūyate।etenātma-
puruṣaśrutyorapi gauṇatvaṃ vyākhyātam । tasmājjāṭharāgnireva vaiśvānaraḥ । yadi tu dyumūrdhatvādikaṃ
kalpyamānamapi dyupradeśādivyāpaka eva kalpanīyam । tadā tṛtīyamahābhūtarūpo'gnirvaiśvā-
naro'stu । <quote>‘yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāmātatāna rodasī antarikṣa’</quote> miti tasyaiva trailo-
kyavyāptiśravaṇāt jāṭhararūpeṇa tasya puruṣāntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvācca । yadi tvātmabrahmapuruṣa-
śrutīnāmabrahmaṇyapi cetanatvena saṃnikṛṣṭa eva gauṇī vṛttiḥ kalpanīyā tadā tṛtīyabhūtābhimāni-
devatā vaiśvānaro'stu । <quote>‘viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketumahnāmakṛṇva’</quote>nnityādiṣu
tṛtīyamahābhūta iva <quote>‘vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvape’</quote> dityādiṣu phaladātryāṃ tadabhimānidevatā-
yāmapi vaiśvānaraśabdaprayogadarśanāt । kathañcidapi vaiśvānaro na parameśvaraḥ paricchinnapari-

raṇabrahmaśabdādibhirviśeṣyamāṇatvānna jāṭharāgnyādiṣu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati ।
ataḥ parameśvara eva vaiśvānaraḥ ।।
parameśvarapakṣe pramāṇāntaramāha---</p>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<p><quote>‘agnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryai’</quote> <ref>(muṇḍa॰ 2.1.)</ref> ityādiṣu parameśvarasya dyulokā-
dipṛthibyantarūpatvamuktam । taditthaṃbhūtarūpamiha <quote>‘tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvāna-
rasya mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmā saṃdeho bahulo vastireva rayiḥ
pṛthivyeva pādau’</quote> <ref>(chā05.19.)</ref> ityatra pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ tasya parameśvaratve liṅgam ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। śabdādibhyo'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānācca neti cenna, tathā dṛṣṭyupa-

bhārate'pi pradarśitam---<quote>‘yasmāccāyaṃ nayatyagrāṃ gatiṃ viprānsupūjitaḥ । tasmācca nayanādrājanve-
deṣvagniritīryata’</quote> iti । tannirvacanamagnyapekṣayāpi parameśvare samañjasataram । tathā aṅgati gaccha-
tyūrdhvadeśamitya<quote>‘gigatā’</quote> vitidhātorauṇādikena nipratyayena nalopena ca tasya nirvacanaṃ
prasiddham । tadapi nirupādhikordhvadeśarūpadivyasthānaprāptimati parameśvare'gnyapekṣayāpi
samañjasataram । vaiśvānaraśabdasya nirvacanamagnau vaiśvānarasya ṛṣerapatyamityapatyārtha-
taddhitāntatayā prasiddhasya tasya viś‍veṣu nareṣvantaryāmitayā sati parameśvare bhavatārthaddhi-
<pb n="392"/>
diyogena parameśvara evāgniśabdasya sākṣādva‍ṛttitvasaṃbhavāditi sāmānādhikaraṇyā-
virodhaṃ jaiminiruvāca ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। abhivyakterityāśmarathyaḥ ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātram’</quote> <ref>(chā॰ 6.18.)</ref>ityaparicchinnasya dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyanta-
pradeśasaṃbandhinyā mātrayā paricchinnatvamupāsakābhivyaktaye ityāśmarathyamuniḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tāntatayā tadupapadyate । <quote>‘vaiśvānaraḥ kasmādviśvānara eva vaiśvānaraḥ rākṣaso vāyasa itivat ।
rakṣa eva hi rākṣasaḥ vaya eva vāyasa’</quote> iti nairuktamapi tannirvacanaṃ sarvajīvātmabhūte parameśvara evo-
papadyata iti bhāṣye'gniśabdasya sākṣādva‍ṛttessambhavapradarśanaṃ vaiśvānaraśabdasyāpi tatsambhavasyo-
palakṣaṇam । nyāyataulyāt । na ca <quote>‘sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣā’</quote> diti sūtrakhaṇḍabhāṣye <quote>‘vaiśvānaraśabda-
sya sādhāraṇye'pī’</quote>ti viśiṣya vaiśvānaraśabdasya jāṭharamahābhūtataddevatāparameśvarasādhāraṇyasyo-
ktatvāt <quote>‘śabdādibhya’</quote> iti sūtrabhāṣye vaiśvānara śabdasya parameśvarasādhāraṇyaṃ matvā taṃ vihāyāgni-
śabdasyaiva pūrvapakṣāvalambanatvenopanyastatvācca । <quote>‘tathādṛṣṭyupadeśā’</quote>diti paramparayā pravṛttinimi-
ttāśrayaviṣayatvena śabdagatipradarśanamagniśabdamātraviṣayam । atassākṣātpravṛttinimittāśrayavi-
ṣayatvena gatyantarapradarśanamapi tanmātraviṣayamityeva yuktamiti bhramaḥ kāryaḥ । nyāyataulyena ādya-
sūtrabhāṣye vaiśvānaraśabdasādhāraṇyokteragniśabdasādhāraṇyasyāpyupalakṣaṇatvāt <quote>‘śabdādibhya’</quote>iti
sūtrabhāṣye pūrvapakṣāvalambanatayāgniśabdodāhṛtervaiśvānaraśabdasyāpyupalakṣaṇatvācca । na hyagniśabdā-
dvyāvṛtto vaiśvānaraśabdamātrasya parameśvarasādhāraṇyāpādakaḥ kaścinnyāyo dṛśyate । <quote>‘tadātmanyeva
hṛdayye'gnau vaiśvānara prāsya’</quote>diti <quote>‘sa eṣa vaiśvānaro viśvarupaḥ prāṇo'gnirudayata’</quote> iti ca śrutyantare
parameśvare vaiśvānaraśabdavadagniśabdasyāpi prayogadarśanamaviśiṣṭam । nanu <quote>‘tathādṛṣṭyupadeśā’</quote>diti
darśitaṃ matamapekṣya matāntaramasminsūtre pradarśyate । tatra ca sūtre vaiśvānaraśabdasya sākṣādva‍ṛttimupetya
agniśabdamātrasyāgniśarīrake parameśvare paramparayā'gnitvarūpapravṛttinimittāśrayaviṣayatayā ga-
tiḥ pradarśitā । natu vaiśvānaraśabdasyāpi tathā gatiḥ pradarśitā । tathātve paunaruktyaprasaṅgāt। tataśca
tanmatamātiṣṭhamānaṃ prati tatsampratipannaṃ vaiśvānaraśabdamapahāyāgniśabdamātre sākṣādva‍ṛttirupapādanī-
yeti cenna । <quote>‘eṣa vā agnirvaiśvānaraḥ’</quote> ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yenedamannaṃ pacyata’ ityādibhūtajā-
ṭharaviṣayaprayogeṣviva parameśvaraviṣayaprayoge'pi tayoḥ pravṛttinimittabhedenāpaunaruktyopapatteḥ ।
anyathā agniśabdasya sākṣādva‍ṛttimabhyupagamya vaiśvānaraśabdasya vṛttau matabhedaḥ pradarśita iti
vaiparītyasyāpi kalpanāpatteḥ । dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantapradeśasambandhinyā mātrayā paricchinnatvarūpaṃ
prādeśamātratvamaparicchinne brahmaṇi na sambhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram—<pratika>sū ।। abhivyakte-
rityāśmarathyaḥ ।।30।। paricchinnatvamiti</pratika> । ucyata iti śeṣaḥ । <pratika>upāsakābhivyaktaya
iti</pratika>। upāsakabuddha‍yārohārthamityarthaḥ। annāddhetorvasatītivat phalasya hetutvavivakṣayā sūtre pañca-
mīnirdeśaḥ । prādeśamātramityetadanantaramabhivimānamityabhito vigatamānatvokteḥ prādeśaviśeṣa-
paricchinnatvoktirupāsakabuddha‍yārohaphalāvasīyata iti bhāvaḥ। yaditu vājasaneyaśakhoktaprakāreṇa
mūrdhacubukāntarālapramāṇatārūpaṃ prādeśākhyaparimāṇaviśeṣaśālitvaṃ chāndogye'pi prādeśamātra-
<pb n="393"/>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। 1anusmṛteriti bādariḥ ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantasya mūrdhādipādāntāvayavatvakalpanamanusmṛtaye brahmaprāptyartha-
miti bādariḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। saṃpatteriti jaiministathā hi darśayati ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ura eva vedirlomāni barhirhṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano'nvāhāryapacana āsyamāha-
vanīyaḥ’</quote> <ref>(chā॰5.18.)</ref> ityupāsakasyoraḥprabhṛtīnāṃ vedyāditvakalpanaṃ vidyāṅgabhūtāyāḥ
prāṇāhuteragnihotratvakalpanārthamiti jaiminiḥ । tathā hi darśayati śrutiḥ---
<quote>‘atha ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti’</quote> <ref>(chā॰ 5.24.)</ref> iti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mityanenocyata iti abhyupagamyeta tathāpyayameva parihāraḥ। bhāṣye tu prasiddhadyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantā-
vayavakalpanānantaramevaṃśabdaparāmṛṣṭena tena prakāreṇa prādeśamātratvakathanaṃ yaugikārthakathana eva
ghaṭata iti tatsvārasyānusāreṇa prādeśaśabdasya yaugikārthaṃ parigṛhya........ viṣkṛtaḥ । vastutastu
rūḍhyarthaparigrahe'pi naivaṃśabdasvārasyavirodhaḥ । vājasaneyiśākhāyāṃ dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantānāṃ
vaiśvānarāvayavatvakalpanāmapahāya svātantryeṇopāsakamūrdhādīnāmeva tadavayavatvaṃ kalpitaṃ cetkhalu
tadvirodhassyāt । na tathā tatra kalpanam । kiṃ tu chāndogya iva dyuprabhṛtiṣu ṛṣibhirvaiśvānarabuddha‍yā
svasvopāsyatvena kathyamāneṣu teṣāṃ vaiśvānaradyumūrdhāditvakalpanānantaraṃ <quote>‘prādeśamātramiti ha vai devā-
ssuviditā abhisampannā’</quote> ityuktarūpaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ devāḥ prādeśaparimāṇamupāsya kṛtārthā abhūvanni-
tyuktatvāt । kathaṃ dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantalokasaṃsthānāvayavaḥ prādeśamātraḥ syādityākāṅkṣāyāṃ<quote>‘tathā
nu va enānvakṣyāmi yathā prādeśamātramevābhisampādayiṣyāmī’</quote>ti tadupapādanaṃ pratijñāya pūrvaṃ
pratiṣṭhādiśabdoktaguṇaviśeṣayuktatvena varṇitānāṃ vaiśvānaramūrdhādirūpeṇa kalpitānāṃ dyuprabhṛtīnā-
mevopāsakamūrdhādiṣu kalpanā kṛtā । tadabhiprāyeṇa chāndogye'pi dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantāvayavatva-
prakāreṇaiva prādeśamātratvokteḥ । ata eva hi chāndogye'pi trailokyaśarīratvena vaiśvānaroktya-
nantaramupāsakamūrdhacubukāntarālagatamāsyamāhavanīyatvena kalpitam ।। nanvaparicchinnasya parame-
śvarasya buddha‍yārohasaukaryārthaṃ dyuprabhṛtiprādeśaparicchinnatvamātramucyatāṃ kiṃ dyuprabhṛtīnāṃ mūrdhā-
ditvakalpanayoti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---sū ।। <pratika>anusmṛteriti bādariḥ ।। 31 ।।</pratika> na
kevalaṃ parameśvarasya kadācidba‍uddha‍yārohatvamātramapekṣitaṃ kiṃ tvāprāyaṇamaharaharanuvartanīyā dhyānarū-
pā smṛtirbrahmaprāptyarthamapekṣitā । tathā smṛtisantānānuvṛttirbuddha‍yārohadārḍhye satyeva bhavatīti
taddārḍhyasaukaryārthaṃ dyumūrdhatvādikalpaneti sūtrāśayamāha—<pratika>dyuprabhṛtīti</pratika> । tathāpi dyumūrdhatvā-
dikalpanānantaraṃ karmāṅgavedibarhistretāgnikalpanamihānupayogīti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---
<pratika>sū ।। sampatteriti jaiministathā hi darśayati ।। 32 ।।</pratika> nanu prāṇāhuteḥ prāṇavāyudeva-
tyasyāgnihotratvakalpanāyāṃ prāṇavāyuṃ pratyeva vedyādikalpanaṃ kāryaṃ na vaiśvānaraṃ prati । na ca
<note>(1) <quote>‘anusmṛterbādariḥ’</quote> iti bhāṣyāntarānusāripāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="394"/>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। āmananti cainamasmin ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
tettirīyā enaṃ parameśvaramasminnupāsakaśarīre prāṇāhutivelāyāṃ bhok‍tṛtayā
<quote>‘śivo mā viśāpradāhāya’</quote> iti <ref>(mahānā॰ 33)</ref> <quote>‘prabhuḥ prīṇāti viśvabhuk’</quote>
<ref>(mahānā॰ 36)</ref> iti cāmananti । ataḥ sakalācāryamatena nyāyena ca jāṭharāgni-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prāṇāgnihotrasya vaiśvānarabrahmavidyāṅgatvāttaddevatyatvaṃ vācyamiti śaṅkanīyam । gārhapatyādivi-
dyānyāyenānyadevatyatve'pi brahmavidyāṅgatvopapatterityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>āmana-
nti cainamasmin</pratika> ।। 33 ।। taittirīyaśākhāyāṃ puruṣārthaṃ prāṇāgnihotraṃ parameśvaradevatyamiti
prāgaṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇe prasādhitam । tatsāmānyādidamapi tatheti sūtrāśayamāviṣkaroti---<pratika>taitti-
rīyā iti</pratika> । etadupayogitayaiva karmadevatāvicārātmakamapi tadadhikaraṇāmiha śāstre pravarti-
tam । nanu taittirīyaśākhāyāṃ svatantraṃ prāṇāgnihotramāmnātam । chāndogye tu vaiśvānaravidyāṅga-
m । ato yathā naimittikavikārayuktadarśarūpāyā abhyudayeṣṭeḥ paśukāmeṣṭiviśeṣasya ca samā-
naśrutitve'pi kvacitpayasi pradeya....nānyatra । evaṃ kvacitparameśvaradevatyatvaṃ nānyatreti viśeṣa-
ssambhavati । kiṃ ca dvayorapi parameśvaradevatyatvābhyupagame'pi tatra prāṇarūpaḥ parameśvaro devatā
iha jāṭharāgnirūpa iti viśeṣo'bhyupagataḥ । tathā tatra parameśvarasya aṅguṣṭhe sannidhānamuktam ।
iha tu mukhe । ataḥ puruṣavidyādhikaraṇanyāyenātra kiñcidviṣayaṃ samānaśrutitvamaprayojakamiti
cetsatyam । tathāpi chāndogye śrutaḥ prāṇāhutyārādhyatvenopāsakaśarīre sannihitaḥ parameśvaraḥ
prāṇāgnihotrāntaraviṣaye śrutyantare tasya tathātvenopāsakaśarīre sannidhānāmnānadarśanādityetā-
vadiha liṅgamupanyasyate । <quote>‘āmananti cainamasmi’</quote>nniti sūtramapi tāvadeva pratipādayatīti spa-
ṣṭameva । nanu tathāpyatra jāṭharāgnirūpeṇopāsye vaiśvānare kathaṃ prāṇāpānādiśabdavācyena prāṇa-
vāyurūpeṇāhutyuddeśyatā saṅgacchatāmiti ceducyate । iha jyotirvidyāyāmiva jāṭharāgnirūpeṇo
pāsanaṃ na sūtrakārābhimatam । ata eva <quote>‘tathādṛṣṭyupadeśā’</quote>dityuktyanantaraṃ <quote>‘sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ
jaimini’</quote>riti pakṣāntaramuktam । anyathā pūrvaṃ brahmaparatayā nirṇīteṣu prāṇākāśādiśabdeṣva-
pi sambhavantī sākṣādva‍ṛttirihaiva kimarthaṃ viśiṣya pradarśyeta । ato'tra jaiminigrahaṇaṃ nānabhi-
matisūcanārthaṃ kiṃ <quote>‘tvanyārthaṃ tu caimini’</quote>riti sūtra iva śiṣyaprauḍhiprakhyāpanārtham । na ca vai-
śvānarasyāgnirūpatvābhāve taṃ prati gārhapatyādyāyatanakalpanaṃ na saṅgaccheteti vācyam । <quote>‘hṛdayaṃ
gārhapatya’</quote>ityādiṣu śrutānāṃ gārhapatyādiśabdānāmagniviśeṣavācināmagnyādhāreṣu lakṣaṇākalpa-
nāyogāt । teṣāṃ hṛdayādiṣu vaiśvānaroddeśyakāhutyādhārāgnitvakalpanārthatayā svavācyaviṣayatvo-
papatteḥ । tasmādyujyata evaitadvaiśvānaroddeśyakatvaṃ prāṇāgnihotrasya । ata eva <quote>‘tadyathaiṣīkātūlamagnau
protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyanta’</quote>iti phalanirdeśānantaraṃ <quote>‘tasmādu haivaṃvidyadapi
caṇḍālāyocchiṣṭaṃ prayacchedātmani haivāsya tadvaiśvānare hutaṃ syā’</quote>diti vacanena vaiśvānaroddeśyatvaṃ
prāmāgnihotrasya vyañjitam। tatra vaiśvānara iti saptamī <quote>‘samaṃ brāhmaṇe dāna’</quote>mitivaduddeśyārthā ।
<quote>‘caṇḍālāye’</quote>ti caturthyopakramāt । na <quote>‘tvāhavanīye juhotī’</quote>ti saptamīvadādhārārtheti na virodhaḥ ।
<pb n="395"/>
rūpeṇa parameśvara evārādhyaḥ prāṇāgnihotreṇeti samīcīnam ।।
iti vaiśvānarādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamasyādhyā-
yasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
evaṃ svaprakaraṇāmnātasādhakāntarasamuccayārthassūtre cakāra iti sarvamanavadyam ।।</p>
<head>iti vaiśvānarādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhuraṃdharasakaladevabhūdevaprati-
ṣṭhāpakaśrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśiva-
preritasya śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajīdyājiśrīraṅga-
rājādhvarivarasūnorappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryavira-
citabrahmamīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivādityamaṇi-
dīpikākhyāyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ</p>
<head>pādaḥ ।। 1 ।। 2 ।।</head>
