<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।।</head>
<head>atha vaiśvānarādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।।vaiśvānarassādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।। 25 ।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।। 26 ।। śabdādi-
bhyo'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānācca neti cenna tathādṛṣṭyupadeśādasambhavātpuruṣamapi cainamadhīyate ।। 27 ।। ata eva na
devatābhūtaṃ ca ।। 28 ।। sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 29 ।। abhivyakterityāśmarathyaḥ ।। 30 ।। anusmṛte-
riti vādariḥ ।। 31 ।। sampateriti jaiministathāhi darśayati ।। 32 ।। āmananti cainamasmina ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇāhutyādhāraḥ puruṣe'syāntaḥ pratiṣṭhito'gniśca । veśvānaraḥ śruto yatsa jāṭharassyādato vahniḥ ।। 49 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vaiśvānaraśśivassyā......gnimukhairmānaiḥ । jāṭharaliṅgāni tathādṛṣṭyupadeśena yujyante ।। 50 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti śrīmadappayadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasārasaṅgrahe nayamaṇimālikākhye tṛtīyaparicchede</head>
<head>prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 1 ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha vaiś‍vat‍na/?/rādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vaiśvānarassādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।।24।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।।25।। śabdādibhyo'ntaḥ-
pratiṣṭhānācca neti cenna tathādṛṣṭyupadeśādasaṃbhavātpuruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate ।। 26 ।। ata eva na devatā-
bhūtaṃ ca ।। 27 ।। sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 28 ।। abhivyakterityāśmarathyaḥ ।। 29 ।। anusmṛterbāda-
riḥ ।। 30 ।। saṃpatteriti jaiministathā hi darśayati ।। 31 ।। āmananti cainamasmin ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmetyātmānameva vaiśvānara’</quote> mityupakramyāmnātaṃ <quote>‘yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivi-
mānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste’</quote>ityādikaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra ki vaiś‍vānaro jāṭharāgniruta bhūtāgniratha tadabhimāninī devatā
athavā śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yo'yamantaḥpuruṣe’</quote> <quote>‘viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘vaiśvānarasya
<pb n="396"/>
sumatau syāma’</quote> ityādiṣu krameṇa jāṭharabhūtadevatāsu vaiś‍vānaraśabdaprayogadarśanāt ātmatvasamānādhikaraṇaprādeśamātratvasya śā-
rīre paricchinne saṃbhavācca jāṭharādireva vaiśvānaro neśvara iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, <pratika>vaiśvānaraḥ</pratika>=vaiśvānaraśabdavācyaḥ <pratika>paramā-
tmaiva</pratika> । kutaḥ <pratika>sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt</pratika>—sādhāraṇaśabdayorjāṭharabhūtadevatāsādhāraṇasya vaiśvānaraśabdasya pajīvaparamātmasādhāra-
ṇasyātmaśabdasya ca <quote>‘tasya havā etasya vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejā’</quote> ityādāvuktasya dyumūrdhatvāderviśeṣasya sarvātmakaparameśvaraparatva-
evopapannatarasyāvagamyamānatvāt caramaśrutahomādhāratvāpekṣayā prathamaśrutadyumūrdhatvāderbalavattvācca ।। iti ।। 24 ।।</p>
<p>smṛtyā ca śrutyarthaśśakyo nirṇetumityāha—<pratika>smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।। 25 ।।</pratika> vaiśvānaraśabdasya paramātmaparatve
<pratika>smaryamāṇaṃ</pratika>—<quote>‘yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhe’</quote> tyādismṛtyuktaṃ, trailokyātmakaṃ rūpam । <pratika>anumānaṃ syāt</pratika>=anumāpakaliṅgaṃ syāt
ityarthaḥ । sautra itiśabdo hetau । yasmādevaṃ smārtaṃ liṅgamasti tasmāt mūlabhūtaśrutau vaiśvānaraśabdapratipādyaḥ paramātmeti
siddham ।। 26 ।।</p>
<p>siddhāntaṃ vidhāntareṇākṣipya samādhātumāha—<pratika>śabdādibhya ityādi । śabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=jāṭhare rūḍhaḥ vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ <quote>‘hṛdayaṃ
gārhapatya’</quote> ityādyagnitretāparikalpanaṃ, <quote>‘tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchettaddhomīya’</quote> mityādinā prāṇāhutyādhāratāsaṃkīrtanaṃ ca ityetebhyo
hetubhyaḥ । <pratika>antaḥpratiṣṭhānācca</pratika> ।=<quote>‘puruṣe'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ vede’</quote>ti vaiśvānarasyāntaḥpratiṣṭhānaśravaṇācca । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=jāṭhara eva
vaiśvānaro na paramātmeti cet । <pratika>na</pratika>=na śabdādibhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ parameśvarasya pratyākhyānaṃ yuktam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tathā dṛṣṭyupade-
śāt</pratika>=tathā jāṭhararūpeṇa parameśvarasya dṛṣṭerupāste <quote>‘rmano brahmetyupāsīte’</quote> tyādivadupadeśāt । yadvā । tathā jāṭharāparityāgena jā-
ṭhare'sminparameśvaradṛṣṭeḥ<quote>‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra’</quote> ityādivadupadeśāt । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=<quote>‘mūrdhaiva sutejā’</quote> ityāderviśeṣasya jā-
ṭhare'saṃbhavatāt । kiṃ ca । yataḥ <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>—vaiśvānaram । puruṣaṃ<quote>‘sa eṣognirvaiśvānaro yatpuruṣassa yo haitamevāgniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
<pratika>puruṣaṃ</pratika> puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe'nyaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ vede’</quote> ti puruṣākāraṃ <pratika>puruṣavidhaṃ ca adhīyate</pratika> vājasaneyinaḥ । ataḥ jāṭhare puruṣatva-
puruṣavidhatvayorasaṃbhavāt sarvātmake paramātmani puruṣatvapuruṣāntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvopapatteśca na jāṭharo vaiśvānaraḥ kiṃ tu paramātmaiveti
siddham ।। 26 ।। itthaṃ dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣasya jāṭharaviṣayatvaṃ saṃdūṣya devatādiviṣayatvaṃ dūṣayitumāha—<pratika>sū ।। ata eva na deva-
tābhūtaṃ ca ।। 7 ।। ata eva</pratika>=uktebhyo hetubhyaḥ । <pratika>devatābhūtaṃ ca</pratika>=devatā ca bhūtaṃ ca devatābhūtam । ekavadbhāvādubhayamapi ।
na vaiśvānaraḥ। vikārasya bhūtāgnervikārāntaradyulokādyātmatvāsaṃbhavatā devatāyā api parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryavatvācca vaiś‍vānarassarvātma-
kaḥ paramātmaivetyarthaḥ ।। 27 ।।</p>
<p>pūrvaṃ jāṭharārthakatvaṃ vaiś‍vānaraśabdasyābhyupetya jāṭharopādhikaṃ jāṭharapratīkaṃ vā brahmopāsyamityabhihitam।adhunā vinaivopādhikalpa-
nāṃ sākṣādeva paramātmopasanāparigrahe virodhābhāvaṃ jaiminirācāryo manyata ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ ।।
।। 28 ।।</pratika> vaiś‍vānarasya pūrvāparaparyālocanayā brahmatve nirṇīte viś‍vaścāsau naraśca viś‍vanaraḥ sa eva vaiś‍vānara/?/ iti yogena
vaiś‍vānaraśabdo brahmaparatayā netavya iti tātparyam । nanu paramātmaparigrahe kathaṃ prādeśamātraśrutyupapattirityāśaṃkya tāṃ vyākhyātu-
māha---<pratika>sū ।। abhivyakterityāś‍marathyaḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> upāsakānugrahāya parameś‍varasya hṛdayādisthāneṣu prādeśaparimāṇatvābhi-
vyakterabhyupagamāt anavacchinnasyāpi paramātmanaḥ prādeśamātratvamupapadyata <pratika>ityāśmarathya</pratika> ācāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।। 29 ।।</p>
<p>matāntaramāha—<pratika>sū ।। anusmṛterbādariḥ ।। 3 ।।</pratika> prādeśamātrahṛdayapuṇḍarīkasthāne manasā <pratika>anusmṛteḥ</pratika>=dhyānāt prādeśamātra
ityupacaryata iti <pratika>bādiri</pratika>rācāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।। 30 ।।</p>
<p>matāntaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। saṃpatteriti jaiministathā hi darśayati ।। 31 ।।</pratika> mūrdhaprabhṛti cubukānte prādeśamātre vaiś‍vānara-
syopāsyatvapratipādanāt parameś‍varasya prādeśamātratvasaṃpatteḥ prādeśamātraśrutirupapadyata iti jaiminirācāryo manyate । asminnarthe
śrutyantarasaṃvādamāha sūtrakāraḥ—<pratika>tathā hi darśayati</pratika>=<quote>‘prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāssuviditā abhisaṃpannā’</quote> ityādi vājasaneyi-
brāhmaṇaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu dyuprabhṛtīnpṛthivyantānavayavāntrailokyātmano vaiśvānarasya saṃpādayat prādeśamātratvasaṃpattiṃ paramātmano
darśayatītyarthaḥ ।। 31 ।।</p>
<p>prādeśamātraśrutissaṃpattinimittetyatra śrutyantaramāha—<pratika>sū।।āmananti cainamasmin ।।23।।</pratika> asminprādeśaparimāṇe mūrdhacubukā-
ntarāle । <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>=parameś‍varam । jābālāḥ <quote>‘ya eṣo'nanto'vyakta ātmā so'vimukte pratiṣṭhita itī’</quote>tyādyāmananti । ataḥ prāde-
śamātraśrutirupapannetyarthaḥ । tasmātsarvātmakaḥ paramātmaivopāsya iti siddham ।। iti ।। 32 ।। <pratika>asminpāde saptādhikaraṇāni
।। 7 ।। dvā/?/triṃśatsūtrāṇi ।। 32 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="397"/>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, prāṇādhāratvena pūrvamupāsyatayoktasya punarjāṭharāgnirūpeṇopāsyatvamāha—<pratika>sū ।।vaiśvānarassādhāraṇaśabdaviśe-
ṣāta ।। 26 ।।</pratika> iha viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyassamānameva । sūtrārthastu kiyadiva bhidyate । <pratika>vaiśvānaraḥ</pratika> parameśvara eva ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt</pratika>=vaiśvānaraśabdasya sādhāraṇye'pi idaṃprakaraṇopakrame parameśvarāsādhāraṇabrahmaśabdādibhirviśe-
ṣyamāṇatvājjāṭharāgnyādiṣu tadviśeṣaṇasyāsaṃbhavācca । parameś‍vara eva vaiś‍vānara ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>parameś‍varapakṣe pramāṇāntaramāha—<pratika>sū ।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।। 26 ।।</pratika> smṛtiṣu <quote>‘agnirmūrdhe’</quote> tyādinā smaryamāṇaṃ
paramaś‍verasya dyulokādipṛthivyantarūpatvamiha <quote>‘mūrdhaiva sutejā’</quote> ityatra pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ vaiś‍vānarasya parameś‍varatve liṅgamityarthaḥ ।।
<pratika>sū ।। śabdādibhyaḥ ityādi ।। 27 ।। śabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=agniśabdāgnitrayakalpanāprāṇāhutyādhāratvebhyaḥ । <pratika>antaḥpratiṣṭhānā-
cca</pratika>=puruṣe'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaliṅgācca।<pratika>neticet</pratika>=nāsau parameś‍vara iti cet । <pratika>nātathādṛṣṭyupadeśāt</pratika>=jāṭharāgnirūpatayopāsyatvo-
padeśāt । <pratika>asaṃbhavācca</pratika>=kevalasya jāṭharāgnestrailokyaśarīratvādyasaṃbhavācca । kiṃ ca ।। yata enaṃ <quote>‘sa eṣo'gnirvaiś‍vānaro yatpuruṣa’</quote>
iti vājasaneyinaḥ nirupādhikapuruṣaśabdavācyamadhīyate । ato'pi parameś‍vara eva vaiś‍vānara iti yuktamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca ।।28।। ata eva</pratika>=yato'yaṃ vaiś‍vānarastrailokyaśarīrakaḥ puruṣaśabdavācyaśca ata eva ।
<pratika>na devatāgni</pratika>rnāpi <pratika>bhūtāgni</pratika>rityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>iha parameś‍varasya jāṭharāgnirūpatayopāsyatvenāgniśabdavācyatve siddhe tadyojanābhedānācāryāntarābhimatāndarśayati---<pratika>sū ।। sā-
kṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> agranayanādiyogenāgniśabdasya parameś‍vare sākṣādva‍ṛttisaṃbhavātsāmānādhikaraṇyāvirodha-
ssusādha iti jaiminiruvācetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū।। abhivyakterityāśmarathyaḥ ।।30।।31।।</pratika> upāsakabudhdyārohārthamaparicchinnasyāpi tasya dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantapradeśaviśe-
ṣaparicchinnatvamucyate ityāśmarathyaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū।।anusmṛteriti bādariḥ।।</pratika> dyuprabhṛtipṛthivyantasya mūrdhādipādāntāvayavatvakalpanā <pratika>anusmṛteḥ</pratika>=brahmaprāp‍tyarthamāprāyaṇama-
nuvartanīyadhyānarūpabuddhivṛttaye iti bādariḥ । annāddhetorvasatītivatphalasya hetutvavikṣayā sūtre pañcamīnirdeśaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। saṃpatteriti jaiministathā hi darśayati ।।32।।</pratika> upāsakasyoraḥprabhṛtīnām <quote>‘ura eva vedi’</quote> rityādinā vedyāditva-
kalpanaṃ vidyāṅgabhūtāyāḥ prāṇāhuteragnihotratvakalpanārthamiti jaiminirmanyate । <pratika>tathā hi darśayati</pratika>=<quote>‘atha ya evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ
juhoti’</quote> iti śrutirdarśayati ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। āmananti cainamasmin ।। 33 ।।</pratika> taittirīyāḥ <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>=parameś‍varam । <pratika>asmin</pratika>=upāsakaśarīre । prāṇāhutivelāyāṃ
bhoktṛtayā <quote>‘śivo mā viśāpradāhāya’</quote> <quote>‘prabhuḥ prīṇāti viś‍vabhuk’</quote> iti <pratika>cāmananti</pratika> । sakalācāryamatena nyāyena prāṇāgnihotre-
ṇa parameś‍vara evārādhya iti siddham ।। iti ।। <pratika>asminpāde trayastriṃśatsūtrāṇi ।। 33 ।। adhikaraṇāni nava ।। 9 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate ।। sū ।। vaiśvānarassādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।।25।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । kimayaṃ vaiś‍vānaraḥ paramā-
tmeti śakyanirṇayaḥ uta neti saṃśayaḥ । vaiśvānaraśabdasya jāṭharāgnau mahābhūtatṛtīye devatāviśeṣe paramātmani ca vaidikaprayoga-
darśanāt asminprakaraṇe sarveṣāṃ liṅgopalabdheśca aśakyanirṇaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma iti’</quote> sarveṣāṃ jīvānā-
mātmabhūtaṃ brahma kimiti prakramāt uttaratra <quote>‘ātmānaṃ vaiś‍vānara’</quote> miti brahmaśabdasthāne sarvatra vaiś‍vānaraśabdaprayogācca vaiś‍vānarātmā
sarveṣāṃ jīvānāmātmabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahmeti vijñāyata iti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, vaiś‍vānaraśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ paramātmā anekārthasādhāraṇa-
syāpi tasyāsminprakaraṇe sarvātmatvādibhiḥ paramātmāsādhāraṇairviśeṣaṇaurviśeṣyamāṇatvāt । viśeṣyata iti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।।26।।</pratika> itiśabdaḥ prakāravacanaḥ । <pratika>smaryamāṇaṃ</pratika>=pratyabhijñāyamānam । itthaṃ pratya-
bhijñāyamānaṃ śrutismṛtiprasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ vaiśvānarasya paramātmatve liṅgaṃ syāt ityarthaḥ । anumīyate'neneti anumānam । anyeṣāmetada-
dhikaraṇasūtrāṇāmarthaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatānna bhidyate prāyaśaḥ । antimasūtrārthastu bhidyate manāk । yathā <pratika>।। sū ।। āmananti cainama-
smin ।। 33 ।। enaṃ</pratika>=paramapuruṣaṃ dyubhyādidehaṃ vaiśvānaram । <pratika>asmin</pratika>=upāsakadehe prāṇāgnihotreṇārādhyatvāya <quote>‘tasya havā etasya
vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejā’</quote> ityādinā <pratika>āmanantihi</pratika> । upāsakamūrdhādipādāntā eva dyuprabhṛtayaḥ paramapuruṣasya mūrdhādaya iti prāṇā-
gnihotravelāyāmanusaṃdheyāityarthaḥ । <pratika>asminnapi mate sūtrāṇi trayastriṃśat । adhikaraṇāni tu ṣaṭ</pratika> । iti viśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, ।। sū ।। vaiś‍vānarassādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yastvetameva’</quote> mityādichāndogyavākyameva
viṣayaḥ । atra vaiś‍vānarādiśabdavācyo'gnirvā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘ayamagnirvaiś‍vānaraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘tadyatprathamamāgacchettaddhomīyam’</quote> <quote>‘yene-
damannaṃ pacyate’</quote> ityādyagnivaiś‍vānaraśrutihomādhāratvapaktṛtvādiliṅgairlokaprasiddha‍yagnisūktādivyavasthāvirodhāpatteśca vaiś‍vānarādiśabda-
<pb n="398"/>
vācyo'gnireveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘ātmānaṃ vaiś‍vānara’</quote> mityātmaviśeṣaṇāt <quote>‘ahaṃ vaiś‍vānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ dehamāśritaḥ । prāṇā-
pānasamāyuktaḥ pacāmyannaṃ caturvidham ।।’</quote> iti smṛtisamākhyānāt udāhṛtaprakaraṇaliṅgādibhyassarveṣāṃ padānāṃ viṣṇāveva mukhya-
vṛttitvasya siddhāntitatvāt sarvatra tattacchabdānāṃ tattadantaryāmiparatayā viṣṇoḥ tattatsthatvānusmaraṇena sūktavyavasthopapatteśca vaiś‍vā-
narādiśabdavācyo viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu, <pratika>vaiś‍vānaraḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘yastveta’</quote> mityādivākyagatavaiś‍vānarādiśabdavācyo viṣṇu-
reva । natvagni । kutaḥ । sādhāraṇaśabdaviśeṣāt=agnāviṣṇvossādhāraṇasya vaiś‍vānaraśabdasya <quote>‘ātmānaṃ vaiś‍vānara’</quote> miti śrutā-
vātmaśabdena viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। smaryamāṇamanumānaṃ syāditi ।।25।। iti smaryamāṇaṃ</pratika>=<quote>‘ahaṃ vaiś‍vānaro bhūtve’</quote>ti smṛtyuktaṃ viṣṇorvaiś‍vānara-
tvam । <pratika>anumānaṃ</pratika>—vaiś‍vānaravidyāyāḥ gītoktabhagavatparatvasyānumāpakam । <pratika>syāt</pratika>=bhavedityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। śabdādibhyaityādi ।। 26 ।।</pratika> caśabdo yuktisamuccāyakaḥ । <pratika>śabdādibhyaḥ</pratika>=agniśabdahomādhikaraṇatvaliṅgāt ।
<pratika>antaḥpratiṣṭhānāt</pratika>=pācakatvena śarīrāntarāvasthānācca । <pratika>neti cet</pratika>=vaiś‍vānaro na viṣṇuḥ kiṃtu agnireveti cenna । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>tathādṛṣṭyupadeśāt</pratika>=agnyādināmaliṅgakarmavattvena upāsanopadeśāt । kiṃcātroktātmabrahmatvādīnāmagnyādāvasaṃbhavācca vaiś‍vānaro
viṣṇureva । api ca । yataḥ chandogāḥ <pratika>enaṃ</pratika>=vaiś‍vānaram । <pratika>puruṣavidhaṃ</pratika>=puruṣasūktapratipādyanārāyaṇasamānaguṇakameva । <pratika>adhīyate</pratika>=
abhidadhati । ato'pi viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ । caśabdena puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ bahupramāṇasiddhamiti sūcitam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca ।। 27 ।।</pratika> ata eva=niravakāśātmaśabdādihetoreva । <pratika>devatā</pratika>=agnyādirūpā ।
<pratika>bhūtaṃ ca</pratika>=tadabhimanyamānatejobhūtaṃ ca । <pratika>na</pratika>=vaiś‍vānaraśabdavācyaṃ na bhavati ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 28 ।। sākṣāt</pratika>=mukhyavṛttyā । <pratika>api</pratika>=bahmaṇo'gnyādiśabdavācyatve'pi ।
<pratika>avirodham</pratika>=ajñānādinimittāntareṇa agnyādau tattacchabdavirodhābhāvaṃ jaiminirācāryo vaktītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>।।abhivyakterityāśmarathyaḥ ।। 29 ।। <pratika>abhivyakteḥ</pratika>=agnyādiṣu brahmopāstau kṛtāyāṃ teṣu brahmaṇo'bhivyakteḥ tattannimitto-
'gnyādisūktaniyama ityāśmarathyācāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। anusmṛterbādariḥ ।। 30 ।। anusmṛteḥ</pratika>=tattatsūktādyupāsakairagnyādiṣveva brahmaṇo'nusaṃdhānāddhetoḥ agnyādisū-
ktavyavastheti <pratika>bādiri</pratika>rvaktītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। saṃpatteriti jaiministathāhi darśayati ।। 31 ।।</pratika> hi=yasmāt taṃ yathā <pratika>itihi</pratika>=prasiddhā śrutiḥ । <pratika>tathā
darśayati</pratika> yathā jaiminimataṃ tathā pratipādayati । tasmājjaiminiḥ svoktyanukūlaśrutyanusāreṇa <pratika>saṃpatteḥ</pratika> agnyādisūktopāsakānāma-
gnyādiprāptihetostadvivakṣayā sūktādiniyama ityāhetyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>।। āmananti cainamasmin ।। 32 ।।</pratika> cakāraśśaṅkānivartakaḥ । yasmāt enaṃ viṣṇumagnyādāvāmananti tatsthatayā <quote>‘yo'gnau
tiṣṭa’</quote>nnityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti । tasmāt kathamagnyādiṣu viṣṇūpāstyā agnyādiprāptirbhavatīti śaṅkā nivṛttā । agnyādi-
śabdena tasthabhagavatprāpterevābhipretatvādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>asminmate sūtrāṇidvātriṃśat ।। 32 ।। adhikaraṇāni sapta ।।7।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ vaiś‍vānarādhikaraṇam ।।7।।</head>

<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>prathamasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>atha tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
iha pāde spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ vicāraḥ, prasaṅgāt adhi-
kārinirūpaṇaṃ ca kriyate---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ । tamevaikaṃ jā-
natha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcatha amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ’</quote><ref>(muṇḍa॰ 2.2.)</ref> iti asya
viṣayaḥ śrūyate muṇḍakopaniṣadi ।। atra śrutau dyubhvādyādhāratayā śrūyamāṇaḥ parame-
śvaraḥ anyo veti saṃśayaḥ ।। evaṃsati parameśvarādanyo vāyureva dyubhvādyādhāra iti
gamyateḥ <quote>‘vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni
bhavanti’</quote> <ref>(bṛha. 5.7)</ref> iti śrutau tasya sarvādhāratvaprasiddheḥ ।। iti prāpte brūmaḥ---

<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām</head>
<head>atha prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
yeṣu viṣayavākyeṣu śrutānāṃ brahmaliṅgānāṃ pūrvapakṣe na brahmaliṅgatvākṣepaḥ nāpyanyatrānvayasama-
rthanaṃ kiṃ tu vicāraṇīya eva dharmiṇyanvayaḥ tadvirodhyabrahmaliṅgaprābalyopapādanena tatsamarpaka-
śabdānāṃ yathākathañcidabrahmaṇi yojanāmātraṃ tāni spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni prathamapāde vicāritāni ।
yeṣu śrutānāṃ teṣāṃ brahma....yena talliṅgatvākṣepaḥ vicāraṇīya eva dharmiṇyanvayaśca tānyanati-
spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni brahmāpalāpānyānvayarahitapūrvapakṣaviṣayatvasāmyāt tadanantaraṃ dvitīyapāde
vicāritāni । yeṣu śrutānāṃ teṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe brahmaliṅgatvānākṣepeṇa brahmānapalāpena cānyānva-
yasamarthanaṃ tāni brahmāpalāparahitapūrvapakṣaviṣayatvasāmyādidānīṃ vicāryanta iti pādārthabhedaḥ
saṅgatiśca<pratika>।।sū।।dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yasmindyau’</quote>riti mantre sapa....dyupṛthivyā-
dīnāmādhāratvena śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvaro vāyurveti saṃśayaṃ darśayati—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । parameśvarakoṭe-
rātmaśrutirbījamiti spaṣṭam । pūrvapakṣakoṭe<quote>‘ramṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>rityanena dyubhvādyādhārasya parameśva-
rānyatvapratītirbījamityetatparameśvarādanyo veti pūrvapakṣakoṭipradarśanena sūcitam । tatpratī-
timupajīvyaiva pūrvapakṣayati—<pratika>evaṃ satīti</pratika> । <quote>‘amṛtasya setu’</quote> rityanena dyubhvādyādhāraḥ parameśva-
rādanyaḥ pratīyate । amṛtaśabdo hyanādimuktasya parameśvarasya vācaka iti nirṇītamantaryāmya-

dhikaraṇe । so'tra<quote>‘yasmindyau’</quote>riti mantrātpūrvaṃ <quote>‘tadetatsatyamamṛta’</quote>miti tataḥ paścā<quote>‘dānandarūpama-
mṛtaṃ yadvibhātī’</quote>ti parameśvare prayuktaśca । tasya seturiva setuḥ paratīrasya seturiva tasyāyaṃ prāpa-
yiteti hi tadarthaḥ । evaṃ parameśvarādanyatvena siddho'yaṃ dyubhvādyādhāro vāyuriti yuktam। sa khalva-
rcirādimārge parvaviśeṣatayā tatprāptihetuḥ । yadyapi devatāntarāṇāmapi tatra parvatvamasti tathāpi
<quote>‘vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sandṛbdhāni bhavantī’</quote>ti
śrutyantare vāyordyubhvādyādhāratvaprasiddhervāyurevāyam।evaṃ<quote>‘yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī ce’</quote>tyatrā<quote>‘yaṃ ca lokaḥ
paraśca loka’</quote> iti vāyuviṣaya śrutyantarārthapratyabhijñāṃ sphuṭīkartumeva sūtre lāghavārthaṃ divādyāyatana-
miti vaktavye dyubhvādyāyatanamityuktam । evaṃ ca sarvādhāratvaprasiddheḥ parameśvarasādhāraṇye'pyarci-
rādimārgaparvabhūtadevatāntaravyavacchedahetutvenopādānānna pūrvapakṣahetutvāsambhavadoṣaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ ।
yadvā ।arcirādimārgaparvabhūtadevatāntaravyavacchedahetutvena bhāṣye sarvādhāratvaprasiddhirnopanyastā ।
<quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>rityanenaiva parameśvaraparigrahaśaṅkāyā iva tatparigrahaśaṅkāyā api vyavaccheda-
siddheḥ । tena hi setuvatsākṣātprāpakatvaṃ lakṣyate । sambhavadantaraṅgasādṛśyatyāgāyogāt । ta-
dyadyapyarcirādimārgapraviṣṭādityādhastanaparvabhāvena vāyorna sambhavati । tathāpi <quote>‘tatpuruṣo'mā-
navaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatī’</quote>ti śrutyuktāmānavapuruṣabhāvena sambhavatyeva । amānavapuruṣo hi
vāyoreva rūpaviśeṣaḥ । bṛhadāraṇyake <quote>‘kva pārikṣitā abhava’</quote> nniti vidyāsahitāśvamedhānuṣṭhātṝ-
ṇāṃ prāpyalokapraśne brahmāṇḍādbahireteṣāṃ prāpyalokamabhipretya tadgamanārthaṃ <quote>‘tadyāvatī kṣurasya dhā-
rā yāvadvā makṣikāyāḥ patraṃ tāvānantareṇākāśa’</quote> iti brahmāṇḍachidramutkvā <quote>‘tānindraḥ suparṇo
bhūtvā vāyave prāyacchat tānvāyurātmani dhṛtvā tatrāgamayadyatrāśvamedhayājino'bhavannityeva-
miva vai sa vāyumeva praśaśaṃse’</quote>'ti tena brahmāṇḍachidramārgeṇa brahmāṇḍābhimāninā prajāpatinā-
śvamedhikacityāgnirūpasuparṇatāṃ prāptena samarpitānāṃ teṣāṃ vāyureva sākṣādbrahmāṇḍādbahissthitaṃ
paramākāśarūpaṃ lokaṃ prāpayitetyuktatvāt । evaṃ ca sākṣātparameśvaraprāpakatvavarṇanenaiva devatā-
ntaraparigrahaśaṅkāyā api vyavacchedasiddheḥ sarvādhāratvaprasiddhivarṇanaṃ dyubhvādyādhāratvaśravaṇasya
kevalaṃ vāyāvupapādanārthameva । evamupakramopasaṃhāraikamatyena parameśvarasya prāpako vāyurmantraprati-
pādya iti sthite <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānathe’</quote>tyetatparameśvaropāsanāsu gatyanusmaraṇasiddhaye sākṣātparame-
śvaraprāpako vāyureka evānusandhātavyaḥ na tu tato'dhastanāḥ ātivāhikā ityevaṃparaṃ yojya-
m । itaravyavacchedasya sajātīyaviṣayatvasvārasyāt । ata eva gṛhamedhīyeṣṭau śrūyamāṇasyā-
<quote>‘jyabhāgau yajatī’</quote>ti vākyasya dārśapūrṇamāsikāṅgeṣu sarveṣvapyatideśataḥ prāpteṣvājyabhāgayora-
pi prāptatvena tadvidhāyakatvāyogāt ājyabhāgavyatiriktāṅgajātaparisaṅkhyārūpatvamiti gṛha-
medhīyādhikaraṇoktapañcamapakṣarītyā tasyāṃ śrutasya <quote>‘agnaye sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatī’</quote>tyasyāpi saṅkhyā-
rūpatvamaṅgīkṛtya kṛtvācintārūpeṇa pravṛtte tadvyavahitānantarādhikaraṇe ājyabhāgavākyasya ā-
jyabhāgasajātīyayāgāntarapratiṣedhakatvavatsviṣṭakṛdvākyasya sviṣṭakṛtsajātīyadravyapratipattirū-
paprāśitrādipratiṣedhakatvamuktam । ātmaśabdastu vāyudevatāyāścetanatvādupapannaḥ । muktopasṛpya-
vyapadeśādikaṃ tu dyubhvādyādhāraprāpaṇīyāmṛtaśabdoktaparameśvaraviṣayatvakalpanādupapannameveti pūrva-
pakṣābhiprāyaḥ । dyubhvādyādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ । ātmaśabdāt।ātmaśabdo hi rūḍhyā cetanamabhidadhāno

parameśvara eva dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam’ ityātmaśabdāt ।।
sūtrātmano vāyorapyātmaśabdavācyatve ko doṣa ityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśācca ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ purūṣaṃ brahmayonim । tadā vidvān pu-
ṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti ।’</quote> (muṇḍa. 2.2) <quote>‘yathā nadyaḥ syandamā-
nāḥ samudre astaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya । tathā vidvān nāmarūpādvimuktaḥ pa-
rāt paraṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam ।’</quote> (muṇḍa. 3.2.2) iti puṇyāpuṇyapravṛttanāmarūpavi-
nirmuktānāṃ muktānāṃ prāpyatayā vyapadeśāccāyaṃ parameśvara eva ।

<p>yogena vyāptimapyāha।<quote>‘āplṛvyāptā’</quote> vitidhātormaninpratyaye bāhulake dakāre ca sati tanniṣpatteḥ।
evaṃ ca <quote>‘yaṃ ātmani tiṣṭha’</quote>nnityādiprayogāt tasya rūḍhyā jīvasādhāraṇye'pi yogarūḍhyubhayā-
nugrahalābhāt parameśvare tasya svārasyamiti tatassa eva dyubhvādyādhāra iti yuktamityabhipretya
siddhāntayati—<pratika>parameśvara eveti</pratika> । sūtre yogarūḍhibhyāmātmaśabdasya parameśvarāsādhāraṇyadyotanā-
rthastatra svaśabdāditi svaśabdaprayogaḥ । svasya parameśvarasyāsādhāraṇaśabdādityarthaḥ । <quote>‘nanvamṛta-
syaiṣa setu’</quote> rityataḥ parameśvarānyatvapratītyanusāreṇa rūḍhimātraṃ parigṛhya ātmaśabdaḥ sūtrātmani
vāyau netuṃ yuktaḥ । <quote>‘ata sātatyagamana’</quote> iti dhātormaninpratyaye dīrghe ca sati yo-
go'pi vā tatra sambhavatīti śaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>sūtrātmana iti</pratika>
<pratika>।। sū ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśācca</pratika> ।। 2 ।। <pratika>yadā paśya iti</pratika> । nanvasminmantradvaye muktaprā-
pyatvavyapadeśo mā bhūt dyubhvādyādhāraviṣayaḥ kiṃ tvamṛtaviṣayo'stviti ceducyate । tasyāmṛ-
taviṣayatve'pi tatprāptirvidvatpadopāttajñānaphalatvena vivakṣiteti tāvadabhyupagantavyam।<quote>‘lakṣaṇa-
hetvoḥ kriyāyā’</quote> iti <ref>(pā॰ 1—2—14)</ref> sūtratastatra śatrādeśasya vasorhetvarthatvāt।tathā ca tatra
mantradvaye jñānasya parameśvaraprāpayitṛtvapratipādanādihāpi tadeva pratipādyamityunnīyate । atra pra-
tipādya eva jñānasya parameśvaraprāpakatve tasya puṇyapāpavidhūnananāmarūpavimokṣapūrvakatvarūpaviśeṣa-
samarpakatvenaikaviṣayatve sambhavati tatra jñānasya prāpakatvamucyate iha jñānaviṣayasyeti varūpya-
kalpanāyogāt । <quote>‘arā iva rathanābhā’</quote> vityasminnetadanantaramantre <quote>‘oṃmityeva dhyāyathātmā-
naṃ svasti vaḥ pārāya tamasaḥ parastā’</quote>diti dhyānarūpajñānasyaiva tatprāpakatvasya varṇyamānatvācca ।
sambhavati cā<quote>‘mṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>rityatraiṣa ityasya prakṛtajñānaviṣayaparāmarśitvamiva prakṛtajñānaparāma-
rśitvamapi । <quote>‘śyenenābhicaranyajeta yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte evamayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipa-
tyādatte abhimanthati sa hiṅkārodhūmo jāyate sa prastāvaḥ apo'śnāti tannevāśitaṃ nevānaśita’</quote>
mityādiṣu sarvanāmnāmākhyātopāttakriyāparāmarśitvasyāpi darśanāt । tathā ca<quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>
rityatra dyubhvādyādhārasyāmṛtaśabdoktaparameśvarānyatvapratītyasiddheranyopāsanayānyaprāptyuktera-
nāñjasyena prāpyopāsyayoramṛtadyubhvādyādhārayoraikyāvasāyanānmuktopasṛpyavyapadeśāderamṛtaviṣa-
yatvavāde'pi dyubhvādyādhāraviṣayatvameva paryavasyatīti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>prāpyatayā vyapadeśācceti</pratika> । u-
ktarītyaitanmantrapratipādyaprāpyopāsyayoraikyāvagame satyatratyānmuktaprāpyatvavyapadeśāt<quote>‘tameva dhī-
ro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaṃkarassarvamanyatparityajye’</quote>tiśrutyanta-

kathametadvāyoḥ saṃbhavati ? parameśvarātmaka eva vāyuḥ sūtrātmā, pārameśvarīṣvaṣṭāsu
mūrtiṣvekatvāt । tato na vāyuriti nirṇayaḥ ।

raprasiddhasarvetarajñeyāntaravimokapūrvakajñeyatvavyapadeśāt <quote>‘nānudhyāyādbahūn śabdānvāco vigla-
panaṃ hi ta’</quote>ditiśrutyantaraprasiddhavāgantaravimokapūrvakajñeyatvavyapadeśāccāyaṃ dyubhvādyādhāraḥ parame-
śvaro'vasīyata iti hetutrayamasyaiva sūtrasyārthāntarabhūtaṃ cakāreṇa samuccīyate । dyubhvādyādhāratva-
mapi vāyorna sambhavatītyāha---<pratika>kathamiti</pratika> । ayamiti padādviśeṣaṇatvena pratītaṃ dyubhvādyādhāratva-
tvametatpadena parāmṛśyate । nanu <quote>‘vāyurvai gautama tatsūtra’</quote>mityādiśrutyantare vāyostatprasiddhamitya-
ta āha—<pratika>parameśvarātmaka iti</pratika>।tataśca pārameśvarameva dyubhvādyādhāratvaṃ tanmūrtibhūte vāyau vyapadiṣṭaṃ
tatreti bhāvaḥ । ata eva talavakāriṇāmupaniṣadi parameśvarabalāyattena daityavijayena dṛptāndevā-
ndarpāpanodenānugrahītuṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭigocare yakṣarūpeṇa prādurbhūte parameśvare ka eṣa iti jijñāsayā

yā nirdeśadarśanādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>svataḥparameśvara iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘samāne vṛkṣa’</quote> iti

ityantaryāmitayā tatrāvasthānamātrameva vyavaharati na tu sañcāram । tasmādaśakyasaṅghaṭanaṃ

rthapratyabhijñāśca sannihitaśabdārthapratyabhijñāto balīyasyassanti ca । prākaraṇikeṣu ‘yassarvajñassarva-
vidyasyaiṣa mahimā bhuvi । divye brahmapure hyeṣa vyomanyātmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ । <quote>‘nāyamātmā pravaca-
nena lakṣyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘yasminlokā nihitā lokinaśca । tadetadakṣaraṃ brahma sa prāṇastadu vāṅmanaḥ । na
vedaitatparaṃ brahma dhāma yatraivaṃ nihitaṃ bhāti śubhra’</quote>mityādimantreṣu prakaraṇini brahmaṇyapyātmaśabdo
lokādyāśrayatvapratipādanaṃ ca । ataḥ prakāraṇānusāryevāsya mantrasyārtho grāhya ityabhipretya
vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>atha pareti</pratika> । nanu yadyasminnadhikaraṇe bhūtayonyadhikaraṇaprasiddhamakṣaraprakaraṇamavicala-
māste kathaṃ tadantargate mantre vāyvādiparatvapūrvapakṣotthānaṃ vāyuliṅgādikaṃ brahmaprakaraṇādba-
līya iti । asti khalvasminneva brahmaprakaraṇe śratiliṅgādiniyamitānyaviṣayastatra tatra mantraḥ ।
yathā <quote>‘kālī karālī ca manojavā ce’</quote>ti mantro homakālānusandheyāgnijihvāviṣayaḥ। yathā vā
<quote>‘eṣo'ṇurātmā cetasā veditavyaḥ’</quote> ityādirjīvaviṣayaḥ । evaṃ <quote>‘yasmindyauri’</quote>ti mantro'yaṃ brahma-
prakaraṇagato'pi vāyuliṅgādibalādanyaviṣayaḥ syāditi । nanu tarhi <quote>‘kālī karālī’</quote> tyādi-
mantrāntaravadayamapi kaścana mantro'nyaviṣayo'stu । tāvatā brahmaprakaraṇasya kiṃ hīyate । yada-
rtho'sya brahmaviṣayatvaprasādhanaprayāsaḥ । na cāsya mantrasya brahmaparatvaprasādhanenākṣaravidyāyāmeta-
nmantrapratipādyaḥ kaścidapūrva upāsyaguṇaviśeṣādirlabhyate । akṣare jagadāśrayatvaguṇasya itara-
parityāgasya ca prākaraṇikai <quote>‘ryasmim̐llokā nihitāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘tadevākṣaraṃ somya viddhi’</quote>ityādimantrāntarai-
rlabhyatvāt । <quote>‘anyā vāco vimuñcathe’</quote>tyasya <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānathe’</quote>tyevakārapratipādyaviṣayāntarapari-
tyāgārthalabhyatadviṣayaśāstrālocanaparityāgānuvādakatve tatra vidyāyāṃ kasya cidatiśayasyālā-
bhāt । na ca siddhānte pradhānasyānabhyupagamāt pradhānapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇārthamadhikaraṇaṃ syāditi
vācyam । brahmaprakaraṇagatasya mantrasya pradhānaparatve'pi tatparatantrapradhānasyaiva siddhiriti siddhā-
ntānabhimatasvatantrapradhānasidhdyaprasaṅgāt paratantrapradhānasyehā <quote>‘kṣarātparataḥ para’</quote>ityatrākṣarapadeneva
śvetāśvatarataittirīyopaniṣadorajāmantreṇeva ca <quote>‘yasmindyau’</quote> riti mantreṇāpi pratipādane virodhābhā-
vāditi cet ucyate । vāyupūrvapakṣe <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānathe’</quote> tyanenākṣaravidyāṅgabhūtāyāṃ gatyanusmṛtāvā-
tivāhikadevatāsu vāyureka eva smartavyo nārcirādaya iti labhyate । siddhānte tu vidyāntaravada-
rcirādayo'pi smatarvyā ityasti phalabhedaḥ । pradhānajīvapūrvapakṣau tu dṛṣṭāntārthau yathā hyatacchabdā-
dda‍yubhvādyādhāro na pradhānaṃ na vā jīva evaṃ na vāyurapīti । yatra kvacidviṣayavākyāntare brahmaparatva-
nirṇayopayogino nyāyaviśeṣasya vyutpādanārthau vā pradhānajīvapūrvapakṣau । nanu brahmaprakaraṇā <quote>‘dya-
smindyau’</quote>riti mantrapratipādyaṃ brahmaiva na tu jīva ityayuktam । brahmaṇa eva jīvarūpatvāt । muṇḍa-
kasyāpi <quote>‘kasminnu khalu vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyupakrameṇa <quote>‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatī’</quote>-
tyupasaṃhāreṇa ca brahmajīvābhede tātparyāvasāyāt । <quote>‘samāne vṛkṣa’</quote> iti mantre tayorbhedavyapadeśastvasi-
ddhaḥ । anyadīyasya mahimno'nyena kathamapi prāptumaśakyatayā <quote>‘asya mahimānamiti’</quote>ityasyā-
jñānatirohitabrahmabhāvāvirbhāvaparatva eva sāṅgatyāt । tatra <quote>‘juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśa’</quote> mityasya
pūrvārdhe dehātmabhrameṇaśokavattayoktaṃ svātmānaṃ yadā dehādanyamīśaṃ brahmābhinnaṃ ca paśyatītyevamartha-
<pb n="407"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte । tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ
svādvatti anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti ।’</quote> iti jīvasya karmaphalādanamuktvā anaśnata
eva dīpyamānasyābhidhānācca । tasmādarthāntarabhūtaḥ parameśvara eva dyubhvādyāyatana-
miti nirṇayaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
paratvopapatterityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca</pratika> ।।6।। <quote>‘bhedavyapadeśā’</quote>
diti vyavahitaṃ sūtramihānuvartate । tataścāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ । <quote>‘dvā suparṇe’</quote>ti mantre <quote>‘tayoranya’</quote>i<quote>‘tyana-
śnannanya’</quote> iti ca jīvabrahmaṇoreva parasparabhedo vyapadiśyate । sa cāttyanaśnannabhicākaśītī-
tyattṛtvānaśanasthitirūpaparasparaviruddhadharmābhyāmupapādanapūrvakameva vyapadiśyate । tasmādupapatti-
rūpatātparyaliṅgopabṛṃhitabhedavyapadeśāt saṃsāriṇo'rthāntarabhūta eva parameśvaraḥ prakaraṇapratipādya
iti tatprakaraṇāt sa eva dyubhvādyādhāra iti yuktamityevaṃ sūtrārthamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>dvā supa-
rṇetyādinā</pratika> । sarvavijñānapratijñānaṃ viśiṣṭaśivādvaitarūpe saviśeṣādvaita evopapannam । <quote>‘brahma
veda brahmaiva bhavatī’</quote> tyetat brahmasadṛśo bhavatītyetadarthakamiti bhāṣya eva tatratatropapāditam ।
<quote>‘asya mahimānamitī’</quote>tyetadapi sopapattikabhedavyapadeśānusāreṇa sadṛśamahimāvāptiparaṃ draṣṭavya-
m । <quote>‘yadā paśyaḥ paśyata’</quote> ityanantaramantre tatsāmyāpatteḥ kathyamānatvāttadanusāreṇa <quote>‘eṣo'ṇurātme’</quote>
tyagrimamantre <quote>‘tasminviśuddhe vibhavatyeṣa ātme’</quote>tyasya vibhuvadācārarūpatatsāmyaprāptervivakṣitatvācca।
adhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>iti nirṇaya iti</pratika> । atra yadyapi prāgbrahmaparatayā nirṇīte muṇḍake
spaṣṭānyeva brahmaliṅgāni । tathāpi dyubhvādyādhāro vāyuḥ pradhānaṃ jīvo vā tena tajjñānena vā
prāpye brahmaṇyamṛtaśabdodite prākaraṇikasarvadharmānvaya iti pūrvapakṣakaraṇādaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā ।
ihā<quote>‘mṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>rityatra kenacitprakāreṇa setuśabdāvalamvena pūrvapakṣe niraste'pi <quote>‘paramatasse-
tūnmānasambandhe’</quote><ref>(bra॰ 3. 2. 30. sū.)</ref>tyadhikaraṇe prakārāntareṇa tadavalambanaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ kari-
ṣyata iti na paunaruktyam ।। ।। <pratika>iti dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam</pratika> ।। 1 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśācca ।। 2 ।। nānumānamatacchabdāt
prāṇabhṛcca ।। 3 ।। bhedavyapadeśāt ।। 4 ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 5 ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>dyu/?/pṛthivyādyāyatanaṃ yuktaṃ vāyuriti talliṅgāt । sarvādhāratvaguṇaḥ śruto hi sūtrātmanastasya ।। 51 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ātmaśrutervimuktaprāpyatvaśravaṇataśca śiva eva । ata eva na pradhānaṃ jīvo vā tadbhidāpadeśācca ।। 52 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="408"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśāt ।। 2 ।। nānumānamatacchabdāt
।। 3 ।। prāṇabhṛcca ।। 4 ।। bhedavyapadeśāt ।। 5 ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 6 ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, dvitīyapāde aspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāyaśa upāsyatvena brahmaṇi samanvayaṃ pratipādya adhunā
tādṛśānāmevaṃ vākyānāṃ jñeyatvena brahmaṇi samanvayaṃ pratipādayituṃ tṛtīyapādo'yamārabhyate---asya <quote>‘yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntari-
kṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ । tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcathāmṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ’</quote> iti muṇḍakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
atra dyubhvādīnāmotatvena kiṃcidāyatanaṃ pratīyate । tatkiṃ pradhānamuta vāyuruta jīva āhosvidbrahmeti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>
riti ṣaṣṭhyā bhedanirdeśāt setutvaśravaṇāt jalavidhārakamukhyasetorgrahaṇāsaṃbhavādgauṇasetau grāhye mukhyasetvavinābhūtapāravatvaguṇavata
eva grāhyatvāt kāraṇasya pradhānasyāyatanatvopapatteśca smṛtiprasiddhaṃ pradhānaṃ vā, <quote>‘vāyurvai gautama tatsūtra’</quote>mityādinā vāyorapi
vidhāraṇatvaśravaṇāt vāyurvā bhokturjīvasya bhogyaprapañcāyatanatvopapatterjīvo vā dyubhvādyāyanaṃ bhavitumarhati na brahma iti pūrvaḥ
pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmāna’</quote>mityātmaśabdaśravaṇāt vidhāraṇatvamātrasya setuśrutyā vivakṣitatvāt muktaprāpyatvavyapadeśāt
pradhānādipratipādakaśabdābhāvācca <quote>‘sinoti badhnāti’</quote>iti vyutpattyā setuśabdasya vidhārakatvasyaivārthasya lābhāt <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānatha
ātmānam’</quote> <quote>‘anyā vāco vimuñcatha’</quote>iti vihitayorātmajñānavāgvimocanayorevāmṛtatvasādhanatvātsetuśrutyā saṃkīrtanamityaṅgīkārādvā
dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiveti siddhāntaḥ ।। sūtrārthastu dyauśca bhūśca dyubhvau । dyubhvāvādī yasya tat <pratika>dyubhvādi</pratika> । dyauḥpṛthivyantarikṣami-
tyevamātmakamityarthaḥ । <pratika>tasya āyatanam</pratika>=adhiṣṭhānaṃ brahmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>svaśabdāt</pratika>=svasya parabrahmaṇo vācako ya ātmaśabdaḥ
<quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmāna’</quote>miti śrutastasmādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmetyatra hetvantaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśāt</pratika> ।। 2 ।। muktairupasṛpyaṃ muktopasṛpyam ।
bhāvapradhāno'yaṃ nirdeśaḥ । <quote>‘tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divya’</quote>miti brahmaṇo'vidyātatkāryasakalānartho-
cchedadvārā muktaprāpyatvasya vyapadiśyamānatvādato dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaivetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>siddhāntamabhidhāya pradhānapakṣaṃ niṣedhati—<pratika>sū ।। nānumānamatacchabdāt</pratika> ।। 3 ।। anumīyata <pratika>ityanumānaṃ</pratika>=sāṃkhya-
parikalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ <pratika>na</pratika> dyubhvādyāyatanam । kasmāt । <pratika>atacchabdāt</pratika>=tasyācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ । na tacchabdaḥ
atacchabdaḥ । tasmāt pradhānapratipādakaśabdasyehāśravaṇāt pratyuta tadviparītacetanapratipādakasya <quote>‘yassarvajñassarvavi’</quote>dityādeśśabdasya
śravaṇādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi śārīro'stu dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ tasya cetanatvādiyogādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। prāṇabhṛcca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> prāṇabhṛt=
śārīro'pi na dyubhvādyāyatanam । kutaḥ । <pratika>atacchabdādeva</pratika>=śārīrasya sarvajñatvāsaṃbhavāttatsādhāraṇa ātmaśabdo'tacchabda eva ।।</p>
<p>śārīranirāse hetvantaramāha tribhiḥ sūtraiḥ---<pratika>sū ।। bhedavyapadeśāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> tamevaikaṃ jānathe’ti jñātṛjñeyabhāvena jī-
vaparayorbhedena vyapadiśyamānatvādityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñāta’</quote>mityupakra-
māt brahmaṇa evedaṃ prakaraṇam । na hi śārīrajñānātsarvavijñānaṃ bhavati । tasmāt prakaraṇādapi na śārīra ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘dvā suparṇe’</quote>timantre <quote>‘anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti’</quote>ityaudāsīnyena sthitiḥ paramā-
tmano nirdiśyate । <quote>‘tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattī’</quote>tyadanaṃ śārīrasya । ataḥ sthityadanābhyāṃ na śārīro dyubhvādyāyatanam । api tu
paraṃ brahmaiveti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, asminpāde spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ vākyānāṃ vicāraḥ prāsaṅgikamadhikārinirūpaṇaṃ ca kriyate <pratika>।। sū ।।
dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvavat । dyubhvādyāghāraḥ parameś‍varo vā anyo veti
saṃśaye <quote>‘vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavantī’</quote>ti śrutau tasya sarvādhā-
ratvasya śrūyamāṇatayā vāyureva dyubhvādyādhāra iti pūrvapakṣa; । siddhāntastu <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmāna’</quote>mityātmaśabdaśravaṇāt mu
ktānāṃ prāpyatayā vyapadeśāccāyaṃ parameś‍vara eveti ।। sūtrārthastu <pratika>dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ</pratika> parameś‍vara eva । kutaḥ । <pratika>svaśabdāt</pratika>=
svasya parameś‍varasyāsādhāraṇaśabdāt । tasya rūḍhyā jīvasādhāraṇye'pi yogarūḍhyubhayānugrahalābhātparameśvare tasya svārasyamityāśayaḥ ।।</p>
<p>sūtrātmano vāyorapi ātmaśabdavācyatve ko doṣa ityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। muktopaspṛpyavyapadeśācca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yadā
paśya’</quote>ityādau puṇyapāpaprākṛtanāmarūpavinirmuktamuktaprāpyatvavyapadeśasya śrūyamāṇatayā etādṛśasya dyubhvādyādhāratvasya vāyāvasaṃbhavāt-
sūtrātmanastasya aṣṭāsu mūrtiṣvekatamatvena parameśvarātmakatvācca na vāyuriti nirṇayaḥ । pārameś‍varameva dyubhvadyādhāratvaṃ tanmūrtibhūte
vāyau vyapadiṣṭaṃ tatreti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="409"/>
<p><quote>‘yasmindyau’</quote>riti mantropakramaupasaṃhārikasetuśabdānusāreṇa dyubhvādyādhāratvasya sarvopādāne pradhāne pratīyamānatayā anumāna-
gamyaṃ pradhānaṃ dyubhvādyādhāraḥ syāt manaḥprāṇasaṃbandhaśravaṇāt divādīnāṃ jīvādṛṣṭāyattatvena dyupṛthivyādyāyatanatvavyapadeśasyāpi ta-
tropapatterjīvo vā syāditi śaṅkādvayaṃ nirākaroti---<pratika>sū॰ ।। nānumānamatacchabdātprāṇabhṛcca ।। 3 ।।</pratika> śāṅkaramādhvabhāṣya-
yostu <quote>‘atacchabdā’</quote>dityantamekaṃ sūtram । <quote>‘prāṇabhṛcca’</quote>iti sūtrāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ । anumānagamyaṃ pradhānaṃ na dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bha-
vitumarhati । kutaḥ । atatpratipādakānāmātmaśabdādīnāṃ śravaṇādityarthaḥ । tathā aṇau jīve mukhyasya dyubhvādyādhāratvasyeta-
raparityāgena jñeyatvasya itaraparityāgena tajjñānādamṛtaprāpterdyubhvādyādhāratvopayogitayā vyāptyarthasyātmaśabdasya cānupapatterna jī-
vo'pi dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavati ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘atacchabdā’</quote>dityabbhakṣabadavadhāraṇagarbhaḥ samāsaḥ । tathā ca tadvyatiriktasyaiva prati-
pādakāttasminnanupapannācchabdāditi tasyārtha ityabhipretya tallabdhārtho hi anupapatterityanena śrīkaṇṭhācāryairdarśitaḥ । anenaite jīva-
pakṣe'pyatacchabdārthā iti darśitaṃ bhavati ।।</p>
<p>pūrvāparamantragataśabdārthapratyabhijñānabalājjīvasya mantrapratipādyatvapratītyā jīva eva dyubhvādyādhāro'stu ityāśaṃkya pariharati---
<pratika>sū॰ ।। bhedavyapadeśāt ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ । juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya
mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ ।।’</quote>iti mantre prakaraṇopapādisaṃkocakarahitena īśaśabdena svatassiddhaniratiśayaiś‍varyaśālinaḥ para-
meś‍varasya tatprasādādheyasatyasaṃkalpatvāditadaiś‍varyaikadeśaśālino jīvasya ca bhedavyapadeśātparameś‍vara eva dyubhvādyādhāra ityarthaḥ ।।
prakaraṇādapi parameśvara eva dyubhvādyādhāra ityāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyata’</quote>iti parasya
khalvidaṃ prakaraṇām । ataśca parameśvara eva dyubhvādyādhāraḥ ।। nanu brahmaprakaraṇāt <quote>‘yasmindyau’</quote>ritimantrapratipādyaṃ brahmaiva na tu
jīva ityayuttkaṃ brahmaṇa eva jīvarupatvādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘bhedavyapadeśā’</quote> diti vyavahitaṃ
sūtramihānuvartate । tataścāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ । <quote>‘dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣa pariṣasvajāte । tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattyanaśna-
nnanyo abhicākaśīti ।।’</quote> iti mantre <quote>‘tayoranya’</quote> iti <quote>‘anaśnannanya’</quote> iti ca jīvabrahmaṇoreva parasparabhedaḥ । <quote>‘atti anaśnannabhicāka-
śīti’</quote> ityattṛtvānaśanasthitirūpaparasparaviruddhadharmābhyāmupapādanapūrvakameva vyapadiśyate । tasmādupapattirūpatātparyaliṅgopabṛṃ-
hitabhedavyapadeśāt saṃsāriṇo'rthāntarabhūta eva parameśvaraḥ prakaraṇapratipādya iti tatprakaraṇātsa eva dyubhvādyādhāra iti bhāvaḥ ।।
<pratika>rāmānujamate, sū॰ ।। dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । atra dyubhvādīnāmāyatanaṃ kiṃ jīvaḥ uta
paramātmete saṃśayaḥ । manaḥprabhṛtīndriyādhāratvaśruteḥ uttaratra nāḍīsaṃbandhājjāyamānatvaśruteśca jīva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । nirupādhikā-
tmatvāmṛtasetutvayoḥ paramātmadharmayoḥ śravaṇāt <quote>‘santataṃ sirābhistulaṃ patyā kośasannibham’</quote> <quote>‘ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate’</quote> ityā-
diṣu paramātmano'pi nāḍīsaṃbandhabahudhājāyamānatvādeḥ śruyamāṇatvācca paramātmaiva dyubhvādyādhāra iti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśācca ।। 2 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadā vidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya’</quote> ityādiṣu <quote>‘puṇyapāpe vidhūya’</quote> nāmarūpādvimukta’ iti ca
bandhānmuktasya prāpyatayā vyapadeśāccāyaṃ paramātmā ।।</p>
<p><pratika>।। sū॰ ।। nānumānamatacchabdātprāṇabhṛcca ।। 3 ।। ānumānam</pratika>=anumānagamyaṃ pradhānam । yathā <pratika>atacchabdāt</pratika> tadvā-
ciśabdābhāvāt tadiha <pratika>na</pratika> gṛhyate tathā <pratika>prāṇabhṛda</pratika>pītyarthaḥ । ataścāyaṃ paramātmā ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। bhedavyapadeśācca ।। 4 ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 5 ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 6 ।।</pratika> eṣāṃ sūtrāṇāmārthavarṇanaprakriyā śrīkaṇṭha-
matavadeveti na punaḥ prapañcyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ ।। dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ svaśabdāt ।। 1।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atroktaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ ‘rudro vā
pradhānaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘rudro vāva lokādhāraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘prāṇānāṃ granthirasi rudro mā viśāntakaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘prāṇeśvaraḥ
kṛttivāsāḥ pinākī’</quote> <quote>‘mano vai rudra otaṃ ca protaṃ ce’</quote>ti śrutyantareṣu dyubhvādyāyatanatvamanaḥprāṇādhāratvādīnāṃ śrūyamāṇatvāt rudro
vā, <quote>‘yadbha‍ūtaṃ ca bhavacca bhaviṣyaccetyācakṣate’</quote><quote>‘ākāśa eva tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ce’</quote>ti śrutyantarasamākhyānātpradhānaṃ vā <quote>‘arā iva rathanābhau
saṃhatā yatranāḍyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sa eṣo'ntaścarate bahudhā jāyamāna’</quote>iti jāyamānatvaliṅgājjīvo vā, <quote>‘vāyurvāva’</quote>ityādiṣu vāyvādisamākhyānā-
dvāyurvā syāt । jāyamānatvaliṅgasya kathamapi viṣṇāvasaṃbhavena tatsahitāyā vāyvādisamākhyāyā jīvapakṣasya ca balavattena
<quote>‘rudraḥ kṛttivāsāḥ pinākī’</quote> iti bahurudraliṅgasattvena teṣāṃ viṣṇau paryavasānāsaṃbhavena ca na viṣṇuriti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu’ <quote>‘tame-
vaikaṃ jānatha ātmāna’</quote> mityātmaśabdāt <quote>‘amṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote> riti muktaprāptatvavyapadeśāt rudrādīnāṃ prāpakaśabdābhāvāt <quote>‘so'ntakassa
rudrassa prāṇadhṛksa prāṇanāyakassa īśo yo hariḥ।’rujaṃ drāvayate yasmādrudrastasmājjanārdanaḥ । pibanti ye narā nākaṃ muktāssaṃsārasā-
garāt । tadādhāro yato viṣṇuḥ pinākīti tataḥ śrutiḥ । kṛtyātmakamidaṃ dehaṃ yato vaste pravartayan । kṛttivāsāstato devo
viriṃciśca virocanāt ।’</quote> ityādiśratismṛtidarśanena rudrādisamākhyānāṃ viṣṇau sāvakāśatvāt <quote>‘ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate’</quote>
ityādiśrutyā <quote>‘kiṃ tu nirdoṣacaitanyasukhānnityāṃ svakāṃ tanum । prakāśayati saiveyaṃ janirviṣṇorna cānyathā ।’</quote> iti smṛtyā ca viṣṇoḥ
prādurbhāvalakṣaṇāyā ghaṭajīvādivilakṣaṇāyā janeḥ siddhatvācca dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ viṣṇureveti । sūtrārthastu <pratika>dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ</pratika> viṣṇu-
reva । kutaḥ । <pratika>svaśabdāt</pratika>=svaśabdagṛhītabrahmavācakātmaśabdādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<pb n="410"/>
atha bhūmādhikaraṇam. ।। 2 ।।
muktaprāpyatayeha pratipāditasma parameśvarasya prāptiprayojanaṃ niratiśayasukhaṃ da-
rśayati---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। bhūmā saṃprasādādadhyupadeśāt ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye <quote>‘bhūmaiva sukham’</quote> ityuktvā bhūmnaḥ svarūpamāha ‘yatra nānyat paśyati
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>saṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>mukteti</pratika> । dyubhvādyādhārasya parameśvaratve mukto-
pasṛpyatvaṃ hetutayoktaṃ tadanupapannam । na khalu muktānāṃ parameśvaropasarpaṇaṃ prajānāṃ rājopasarpaṇa-
miva viṣayabhogalipsayā sambhavati । sakalaviṣayabhogaviraktānāmeva muktāvadhikārāṅgīkārā-
dityāśaṅkya svatastasya niratiśayānandarūpatayaiva muktaprāpyatvamiti tadupapādayitumuttarādhika-
raṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ। anenākṣepikī pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatirdarśitā bhavati।। sū॰ ।। <pratika>bhūmā samprasā-
dādadhyupadeśāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> chandogopaniṣadi śrutaṃ bhūmalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayatvenodāharan muktopasṛpyatva-
nirvahaṇopayogitayā kariṣyamāṇatadarthavivaraṇopayogitayā ca niratiśayānandasya tallakṣaṇamiti
bhūmaśabdo dharmipara iti ca jñāpayitumāha—<pratika>bhūmaiva sukhamityuktveti</pratika>। bhūmaśabdo hi bahutvavācī
bahuśabdādimanici <quote>‘bahorlopa’</quote> iti <ref>(pā॰—6—4—158)</ref> sūtreṇa prakṛtipratyayavikāre ca
sati tanniṣpatteḥ <quote>‘praśaṃsā bhūmaliṅgasamavāyāt’</quote> <quote>‘adhyātmasambandhabhūmā hyasmin’</quote> <ref>(bra॰
1—3—7—sū॰)</ref> <quote>‘sambhūyeva sukhāni cetasi paraṃ bhūmānamātanvate’</quote> ityādiprayogācca । bahutva
cātra vaipulyaṃ na saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ । bahuśabdasya <quote>‘bahuṣu bahuvacana’</quote> <ref>(pā॰ 1—4—21 sū॰)</ref>
mityādau saṅkhyāyāmiva <quote>‘alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasyopakaroti ya’</quote> ityādau vaipulye'pi prayo-
gadarśanādiha cā <quote>‘tha yadalpaṃ tanmartya’</quote> miti bahutvasaṅkhyāyuktasyāpyalpasya bhūmapratiyogitve-
nopādānāt pūrvatra nāmādibhyo'dhikasaṅkhyāhīneṣu vāgādiṣu <quote>‘vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī’</quote> <quote>‘ākāśo
vāva tejaso bhūyā’</quote> nityādau bahuśabdaniṣpannabhūyaśśabdaprayogadarśanācca । vaipulyaṃ cātra guṇo-
tkarṣarūpaṃ na parimāṇaviśeṣarūpam । pūrvatra vāṅ‌manassaṅkalpacittadhyānavijñānabalādiṣūttarottara-
guṇotkarṣābhiprāyeṇaiva bhūyaśśabdaprayogadarśanāt sukhaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyācca । utkarṣāpakarṣa-
rūpaṃ hi sukhatāratamyaṃ prasiddhaṃ na parimāṇaviśeṣarūpam । vaipulyāśrayadharmiparyantaścāyaṃ bhūmaśabdaḥ
na vaipulyamātraparaḥ । <quote>‘atha yadalpaṃ tanmartya’</quote> miti tatpratiyogino'lpaśabdena nirdeśāt utta-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। muktopasṛpyavyapadeśāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na viṣṇoranyaḥ । kiṃtu viṣṇureva । kutaḥ । <pratika>muktopasṛpyavyapadeśāt</pratika>=
bhāvapradhāno'yam । dyubhvādyāyatanasya vastuno<quote>‘'mṛtasyaiṣa setu’</quote>riti muktaprāpyatvavacanāttasya cānyatrāyogādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। nānumānamatacchabdāt ।। 3 ।।</pratika> anumānamānumānamiti vā । anumānasiddhaprāmāṇyayutapāśupatādyāgamaiḥ sarvāśrayatayā
kalpitaṃ rudrapradhānādikaṃ na dyubhvādyāyatanam । kutaḥ । <pratika>atacchabdāt</pratika>=bhasmadharogratvāditacchrutiliṅgādyabhāvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prāṇabhṛcca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> jīvo'pyata eva na dyubhvādyāyatanamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। bhedavyapadeśāṃt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anyamīśa’</quote>miti jīveśayorbhedokteḥ na tayoraikyamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> anyamityāderviṣṇuprakaraṇatvāt । atra jīvasya viṣṇubheda evocyate । na tvanyasmādbheda ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sthityadanābhyāṃ ca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> īśajīvayo <quote>‘rdvāsuparṇe’</quote> tyādivākyoktakarmaphalānupajīvanasthititadupajīvanarūpahetubhyāṃ na ca
tayoraikyaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ dyubhvādyadhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>

nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā’ <ref>(chā. 7.1)</ref> iti । tatra sandehaḥ---bhū-

rottarotkṛṣṭadharmiparabhūyaḥśabdaprāyapāṭhāt <quote>‘bhūmaiva sukhaṃ yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ yo vai bhūmā tadamṛta’</quote>
miti dharmiparaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyācca । yadyapi bhūmaśabdo bhāvapratyayāntatvāt darśita-
prayogācca dharmavācakastathāpi <quote>‘sa eṣo'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘dhātuḥ prasādānmahimāna-
mīśa’</quote> mityādiṣu aṇimamahimādiśabdavaddharmavācakena tena dharmī lakṣayituṃ yuktaḥ । evaṃ ca
sukhaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyānniratiśayānando bhūmaśabdārthaḥ phalito bhavati । evaṃ sthite sa jīvaḥ
paro veti saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>tatreti</pratika> । jīvaprakaraṇānuvṛttyananuvṛttibhyāṃ saṃśayo'bhimataḥ । tatreyaṃ
śaṅkā samunmiṣati । prāgjīvasyātra prakaraṇameva nāsti kastadanuvṛttyananuvṛttivicārāvakāśaḥ ।
<quote>‘prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyā’</quote> nityārabhya hi jīvaprakaraṇamihābhimatam । tatparasyaiva prakaraṇam ।
tadanantarameva <quote>‘yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpita’</quote> mityaranābhi-
dṛṣṭāntopanyāsapūrvakaṃ sarvādhāratvavarṇanena <quote>‘prāṇaḥ prāṇena yāti, prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ dadāti prāṇāya
dadātī’</quote>ti gantṛgatisādhanadātṛdeyasampradānādisarvātmakatvavarṇanena <quote>‘prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo
mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇa’</quote> iti pitṛmātrādisarvarūpatva-
varṇanena ca tatra prāṇaśabdena para eva pratipādya ityavagamāditi । tannirākaraṇāya jīvo
veti pūrvapakṣakoṭāvupanyasanīyāyāṃ tadanyo vetyupanyastam । parameśvarādanya eva tatra prāṇaśa-
bdenoktaḥ । <quote>‘sa yadi pitaraṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiñcidbha‍ṛśamiva
pratyāha dhiktvāstvityevainamāhuḥ pitṛhā vai tvamasi’</quote> ityādinā saprāṇeṣu pitrādiṣu adhikṣe-
pyamāṇeṣu hiṃsopakrośavarṇanāt । <quote>‘atha yadyapyenānutkrāntaprāṇān śūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃ
dahennaivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti’</quote> ityādinā teṣūtkrāntaprāṇeṣu śūlena samyakprakṣepa-
pūrvakaṃ vyatyasya samantāddahyamāneṣvapi hiṃsāvyavahārābhāvavarṇanācca । na hi parasya hiṃsyatvamasti ।
na vā tasyotkrāntirasti । yadyapyuktarītyā parameśvarādanyo'pyayaṃ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti prati-
bhāti prāṇaśabdasvārasyāt । utkrāntipratipādanasya prāṇasthititadasthitinibandhanahiṃsopakro-
śatadabhāvātmakavyavahārānuvādasya ca tadviṣayatvenāpyupapatteḥ । tathāpi <quote>‘prāṇo ha pite’</quote>tyādikaṃ
jīva evopapadyate । pitṛmātṛbhrātṛsvasrācāryabrāhmaṇaśabdānāṃ śarīraviśeṣaviśiṣṭātmavācitvāt ।
ataḥ <quote>‘prāṇo ha pite’</quote> tyādyuktimanvayavyatirekābhyāmupapādayituṃ pravṛttaṃ prāṇasthititadasthi-
tyorhiṃsopakrośatadabhāvavarṇanamapi tadviṣayaeva vaktuṃ yuktam । pitṛmātrādibahuśabdānurodhādekasya
prāṇaśabdasya prāṇasahacarite jīve lakṣaṇetyapi kalpayituṃ yuktam । evaṃ ca jīva eva prāṇa iti
niścite sarvādhāratvavarṇanaṃ bhogopakaraṇabhogasthānarūpasya sarvasya jīvādṛṣṭāyattasthitikatvā-
bhiprāyaṃ <quote>‘prāṇaḥ prāṇena yātī’</quote> tyādikaṃ gantṛdātṛsampradānavadgamanasādhanaṃ deyaṃ cāśvādikaṃ
jīvarūpamityabhiprāyaṃ copapādanīyam । na copakramagatasarvādhāratvādyanurodhenokrā/?/ntyādika-
meva parameśvaraviṣayamupapādyatāmiti vācyam । tathā satyukrā/?/ntyādyuktyanantaraṃ <quote>‘sa vā eṣa
evaṃ paśyannevaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānannativādī bhavatī’</quote>ti taddarśino'tivāditvavarṇanasyā-
sāmañjasyaprasaṅgāt । svopāsyasya vastuno'tiśayitaguṇakatvavāditvaṃ hyativāditvam । na
cokrā/?/ntyādidoṣarahitasya kathañcittadvattotprekṣaṇaṃ guṇātiśayapratipādanaṃ bhavati । bhavati tu

maśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ parameśvarastadanyo veti । parameśvarādanyaḥ prāṇa eva bhūmā; pūrveṣu

nnāpahnuvīte’</quote> ti tasya mukhyatvavyavasthāpanāt । <quote>‘eṣa tu vā ativadatī’</quote>tyādinā tasyābhyasya-
mānatvāccetyāśayaḥ । evaṃ ca parameśvarastadanyo vetyasyāyamarthaḥ । ya utkrāntyādibhiḥ parame-
śvarādanyatvenāvagataḥ <quote>‘prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyā’</quote>nityārabhya prakṛto jīvastasya prakaraṇamanuvartata
iti sa eva <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukha’</quote>mityādau niratiśayānandatayā pratipādya uta tasya prakaraṇa-
<quote>‘meṣa tu ve’</quote>tyādau vicchinnamiti tasmādadhikaḥ parameśvaraḥ tathā pratipādya iti । uktaprakāreṇa
sato jīvaprakaraṇasyānuvṛttiṃ viśeṣaṇena sūcayanpūrvapakṣayati---<pratika>parameśvarādanyaḥ prāṇa eva bhū-
meti ।</pratika> syādetat । yathā nāmādiṣu prakṛteṣvapi tatastato'dhikatayā vāgādipratipādanamevaṃ
prāṇe prakṛte'pi tato'dhikatayā <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukha’</quote> mityādau parameśvarapratipādanaṃ bhaviṣya-
tītyāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>pūrveṣviti</pratika> । yuktaṃ nāmādiṣu prakṛteṣvapi vāgādiṣu tattatprakaraṇaviccheda iti ।
tatratatrā<quote>‘sti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī’</quote>tyādirūpāyā praśnottaraparamparāyā
darśanāt । na ceha <quote>‘asti bhagavan prāṇādbha‍ūyaḥ ado vāva prāṇādbha‍ūya’</quote> iti praśnottare dṛśyete ।
tathā ca sati nāradasanatkumārasaṃvāde'smin tattadavāntaraprakaraṇavicchedakatayā dṛṣṭayoḥ pra-
śnottarayorihādarśanāt prāṇaprakaraṇānuvṛttiravasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । syādetat । bhūmavidyopakrame
tāvat <quote>‘adhīhi bhagava’</quote> iti sanatkumāramupasanno nāradaḥ sanatkumāreṇa <quote>‘yadvettha tena mopasīda
tatasta ūrdhvaṃ vakṣyāmī’</quote>tyuktassa<quote>‘nnṛgvedaṃ bhagavo'dhyemi yajurvedaṃ sāmaveda’</quote>mityādinā svavedanaṃ sa-
rvamupanyasya <quote>‘so'haṃ mantravidevāsmyanātmavi’</quote>diti coktvā <quote>‘śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavadda‍ṛśebhyastarati
śokamātmaviditi so'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavān śokasya pāra tāraya’</quote>tviti śo-
katāriṇīmātmavidyāṃ prārthayāmāsetyupākhyāyate । paramātmavidyayaiva śokataraṇaṃ śrutiṣu prasiddham ।
tadupasaṃhāre cā <quote>‘tmaivedaṃ sarva’</quote> <quote>‘mityutkvā’</quote> <quote>‘sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśya’</quote> nnitpādinā<quote>‘sa svarāṅbhavati
tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatī’</quote>ti taddarśanena mokṣarūpaṃ phalamuktam । tadanantaraṃ cā<quote>‘tmataḥ
prāṇa ātmata ākāśa’</quote> ityādinā prāṇādīnāṃ prakṛtādātmana utpattirabhihitā । tatra prāṇa-
śabdaḥ <quote>‘prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyā’</quote>nityārabhya varṇitaṃ jīvamevācaṣṭe । prāguttarottarabhūyastvena
pradarśitānāṃ nāmādiprāṇāntānāmevātra vyutkrameṇa saṅkīrtanāt । tadanantaraṃ ca <quote>‘tasmai mṛditaka-
ṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāraṃ darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāra’</quote> iti tamaḥpārasya parameśvarasyaivopadiṣṭatvaṃ
varṇitam । tadevamupakramopasaṃhārānurodhāt bhūmā parameśvara eva syādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>na parame-
śvarastatra prasakta iti</pratika> । yadyapyatra parameśvaro mahāprakaraṇī । tathāpi sa tatra ‘prāṇo vā

āśāyā bhūyā’</quote>nityārabhya pravṛtte jīvāvāntaraprakaraṇe nāmavāgādyavāntaraprakaraṇa iva na prasa-

tasmādbha‍ūmāvāntaraprakaraṇe parameśvarasya kathañcidapi na prasaktiriti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca bhūmā jīva-

sautraṃ samprasādaśabdaṃ vyākurvan prāṇo bhūmeti pūrvapakṣo jīvaviṣayo na prāṇavāyuviṣaya iti pūrvapa-

sa cātra prāṇaśabdena nirdiśyate; tasmādūrdhvamātmāntaratvena bhūmopadiśyate <quote>‘eṣa

gāvagataḥ । <quote>‘ūrdhva’</quote>mityanena sautro'dhiśabdo'dhikaparatayā vyākhyātaḥ । bhūmavidyāyāmeva hi <quote>‘ta-

no'yamativādyanya ityavasīyate । satyaśabdena ca karaṇavibhaktyantena parameśvarastatra nimittamiti
pratīyate । chāndogya eva <quote>‘tasya brahmaṇo nāma satya’</quote>miti brahmanāmatvokteḥ satyaśabdaḥ parameśvara
eva svārasikaḥ । tṛtīyāvibhaktiśca karaṇatve । atastuśabdasatyanāmakaraṇavibhaktisvārasya-

tī’</quote>tyādidarśanāt prāṇātivādivratatvena satyavacanavidhiḥ pratīyata iti śaṅkyam । upakramagata-

syātivadane nimittatvavivakṣayā tṛtīyāvadviṣayatvavivakṣayā dvitīyāyā apyupapatteriti bhāvaḥ ।

svayamevopacikṣepa । tataḥ <quote>‘so'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadānī’</quote>ti pṛṣṭavate tasmai vijñānamataśraddhādisā-
dhanaparamparayā tameva satyaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhūmānamupadideśeti praśnaprativacanābhāvasyānyathopapatteḥ ।

vasyāviśiṣṭatvācca । tasmā <quote>‘deṣa tu ve’</quote> tyārabhya prāṇaśabdoditajīvāvāntaraprakaraṇānuvṛttiśaṅkāna-

<pratika>bhūmnaḥ</pratika> parameśvaratve <quote>‘sve mahimnī’</quote>tyādikaṃ tatrānupapannamiti pūrvapakṣapradarśitaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthami-
daṃ sūtram । ata eva bhāṣye svarasata eva parameśvare saṅghaṭamānaṃ <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tadamṛta’</quote>mityādi-

vityuttaramuktvā<quote>‘yadi vā na mahimnī’</quote>tyanenātmīyavibhūtipratiṣṭhitatvaṃ punaḥ pratiṣidhya tatra hetutve-
na gavāśvādivibhūtiṣu tatsvāmināṃ caitrādīnāmavasthānādarśanaṃ nocyate kiṃ tu svātmanyāna-
ndarūpe mahimni mahati paricchedaśūnye pratiṣṭhita ityuktvā yathā loke gavāśvādirūpāyāmātmī-
yavibhūtau caitraḥ pratiṣṭhita ityucyate tathātroktamiti nāradasya bhrāntimapanetuṃ tathārthaṃ gṛhṇāti-

tro gavāśvādipratiṣṭhita itivadahaṃ na bravīmi kiṃ tu yathā <quote>‘svayaṃ dāsāstapasvina’</quote> iti sva-
syaiva svātmānaṃ prati dāsatvamupacāreṇa vadanti dāsabhāvajñāpanāya evamaparicchinnānandarūpe
svātmani pratiṣṭhitatvamupacāreṇa bravīmi vastuto'sya pratiṣṭhārūpaḥ ādhāro nāsti iti jñāpanā-
yetyabhiprāyaṃ sanatkumārasya vacanaṃ pradarśya mukhya evādhārādheyabhāvo'stvityāśaṅkānirā-

tataḥ parameśvara eva bhūmā nāpara iti siddham । nanu pūrvatrādhikaraṇe <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ
sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti muktānāṃ brahmasādṛśyamabhihitam । tato brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyamu-
pagatā muktātmānaḥ tatpṛthagbhūtā vartante iti siddham । <quote>‘yatra nānyatpaśyati nānya-
cchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā’</quote> iti bhūmaśabdavācye brahmaṇi dṛṣṭe tanniṣṭha-
bhedapratiyogiprapañcadarśanādiniṣedhaḥ kriyate । kathamiha sāṅgatyamiti cet---bhūmni
pratyakṣe <quote>‘nānyat paśyati’</quote> ityāderayamabhiprāyaḥ---niratiśayasukhasvabhāve yasmin
sākṣātkṛte sukhāntarābhilāṣeṇa rūpādiviṣayadarśanādau na pravartate yanmagnaḥ puruṣaḥ
sa bhūmā brahmeti । brahmānandalavaparamāṇavo hi viṣayasukhaviśeṣāḥ । tathā hi śru-
tiḥ---<quote>‘etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvanti’</quote> iti । tasmādiha bra-
hmaṇi na dvaitaniṣedhaprasaktiḥ । prapañce satyeva kathaṃ muktātmanāmapuruṣārthasya tasya darśa-
naṃ parihriyata iti na vicāryam । na hi muktātmanāṃ prākṛtaprapañco darśanaviṣayaḥ, kiṃ-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
karaṇārthaṃ svasya svasminneva mukhya ādhārādheyabhāvo na sambhavati tasya bhedagarbhatvādityucyate—
<quote>‘anyo hyanyasminpratiṣṭhita’</quote>iti । tarhi tadanya eva kaścidādhāro mukhyo'stvityāśaṅkā-
vāraṇārthaṃ sarvātmanaḥ sakalacidacidviśiṣṭādvitīyasvarūpāttasmādanyadādhāratvayogyaṃ kimapi
vastu nāsti iti pratyāyayitumucyate—<quote>‘sa evādhastā’</quote> dityādi <quote>‘sa evedaṃ sarva’</quote> mityantam ।
<quote>‘athāto'haṅkārādeśa eve’</quote>ti nāyaṃ jīvopadeśaḥ । ahaṅkāraśabdasya jīvavācitvābhāvāt । kiṃ
tvahamiti karaṇīyasya buddhipūrvakaṃ grahaṇīyasya tasyaiva bhūmna ādeśaḥ । tathāca । <quote>‘ahamevādha-
stā’</quote>dityādau bhūmni varṇitasyaiva sārvātmyasya śāstradṛṣṭyā paripūrṇāhaṃbhāvaśālibhirvigalitadevama-
nuṣyādiśarīraparicchinnāhaṃbhāvairvidvadbhirgṛhyamāṇenāhaṃtvena rūpeṇa <quote>‘etatsāma gāyannāsta’</quote> ityādi
śrutāvivopadeśaḥ । <quote>‘athāta ātmādeśa eve’</quote>tyādi bhūmni svarūpeṇa vidvadahaṃbhāvena vopadiṣṭa-
syaiva sarvātmatvasya vidvadantaryāmitvena rūpeṇopadeśaḥ । ata evā<quote>‘tmaivādhastā’</quote>dityādyuktyanantaraṃ
<quote>‘tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyataḥ evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata āśā
ātmataḥ smara’</quote> ityādinā prakṛtādātmanaḥ prāṇādyutpattipratipādane prakṛtasyātmano vidvāṃsaṃ
pratyātmatvaṃ viśiṣyocyate । evaṃ tredhā tasya sārvātmyopadeśaḥ trividhopāsanopayogī । ato na ka-
syāpyanupapattiriti saviśeṣamukteḥ prāmāṇikatvā<quote>‘dyatra nānyatpaśyatī’</quote>tyādyayuktamityāśaṅkate—<pratika>na-
nviti</pratika> । yathā kiñcidviṣayasukhamanubhavannapi tadadhikaviṣayāntaradarśanākarṇanadhyāneṣu pravartate
naivaṃ niratiśayasukharūpaṃ brahmānubhavanniti<quote>‘yatra nānya’</quote>dityāderabhiprāyaḥ । ata eva bhūmno nirati-
śayasukhatvapratipattyarthaṃ <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukha’</quote>mityuktvā <quote>‘nālpe sukhamastī’</quote>tyalpe jīvavarge kīṭādi-
hiraṇyagarbhānte sukhaṃ niṣidhyate । <quote>‘bhūmaiva sukha’</quote>mityevakāreṇāpi tatra tanniṣedha eva dṛḍhīkriyate । na ca
tatra sukhamātraniṣedhaḥ saṃbhavatīti niratiśayasukhe tatra niṣedhye <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukha’</quote>mityatra tathābhū-
tameva sukhaṃ vidheyaṃ labhyata ityāśayena pariharati—<pratika>bhūmni pratyakṣa ityādinā</pratika> । nanu <quote>‘yatra nānya’</quote>
dityādeḥ sarvātmanā vastvantaradarśanādiniṣedha evārthaḥ pratīyate । sa kathamupapadyate । prapañcasya
satyatayā muktidaśāyāmapi vidyamānatvenāvirbhūtasārvajñyādiguṇasya muktasya taddarśanānivāra-
ṇāditi śaṅkate—<pratika>prapañce satyeveti</pratika> । pariharati—<pratika>iti na vicāryamiti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । bhū-
<pb n="417"/>
tu niratiśayānandasvarūpaṃ brahmaiva prapañcākāreṇa darśanagocaro bhavati । tathā hi śru-
tiḥ---<quote>‘etattato bhavati, ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma, satyātma prāṇārāmaṃ manaānandam’</quote>
iti । tatra <quote>‘āpnoti svārājyam, āpnoti manasaspatim’</quote> ityādinā muktātmā
prastutaḥ । tasya <quote>‘vākpatiḥ’</quote> ityādinā svādhīnāprākṛtaviśuddhavāgindriyādisaṃbandha
uktaḥ । tasya punastādṛśāvasthāprāptyanantarametat dṛśyamānaṃ prākṛtaprapañcajālamā-
kāśaśarīraṃ cidambaraprakāśaśarīraṃ brahmaiva bhavatīti tātparyarahasyārthaḥ । tato mu-
ktānāṃ brahmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ tatsamarasībhūtaprapañcadarśitvamiti sarvaṃ samīcīnam ।।
iti bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mno hīdaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate । bhūmaśabdo'yaṃ brahmaśabdatulyanyāyatvāt tadvadeva trividhaparicchedānta-
rbhūtavastuparicchedarāhityasiddhaye sthūlasūkṣmasakalacetanācetanaprapañcaviśiṣṭasya parameśvarasya
vācakaḥ vṛkṣaśabda iva patrapuṣpādiviśiṣṭasya sthāvarasya । tathā ca yathā vṛkṣaṃ paśyataḥ patrapuṣpādyā-
kāreṇāpi vṛkṣa eva darśanagocaro bhavati । ata eva vṛkṣaṃ paśyannāmūlamāśikharaṃ sarvāvayavasa-
hitaṃ taṃ vṛkṣa ityeva paśyati । evaṃ brahmānubhavataḥ prapañcākāreṇāpi brahmaivānubhavagocaro bhavati ।
ato yuktaṃ <quote>‘yatra nānyatpaśyatī’</quote>tyādi । bhūmnyanubhūyamāne bhūmaśabdārthānantargatasya kasyāpi da-
rśanābhāvāt । ukte'rthe taittirīyaśrutiṃ pramāṇayati—<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । etatparidṛśyamānaṃ prākṛtapra-
pañcajātaṃ tato muktyavasthāprāptyanantaramākāśaśarīratvādiviśiṣṭaṃ brahmaiva bhavati । muktaṃ pratyu-
ktarūpabrahmātmanā sphuratītyarthaḥ । udāhṛtaśrutermuktaviṣayatvaṃ darśayituṃ pūrvavākyānyudāharati—
<pratika>āpnotīti</pratika> । vyāhṛtividyāyāṃ brahmavidamadhikṛtyedamucyate <quote>‘āpnoti svārājya’</quote>mityādi ।
svaḥ svargasukharūpe pade rājata iti svārāṭ tasya bhāvaṃ svārājyamāpnoti sukhaikarasaṃ parabrahma-
ṇaḥ śivasya padamāpnotīti yāvat । manasaspatiṃ jñānaśaktyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ śivaṃ cāpnoti । ayaṃ
prastuto muktātmā tadā kiṃviśiṣṭo bhavatītyākāṅkṣāyāmucyate <quote>‘vākpatiścakṣuṣpatiḥ śrotrapa-
tirvijñānapati’</quote>riti । vijñānaṃ manaḥ । evaṃ prastutaṃ muktātmānaṃ pra<quote>‘tyetattato bhavatī’</quote>tyādikamucya-
ta iti yuktam । ihāpi bhūmavidyāyāṃ muktaḥ sarvaprapañcaṃ paśyannapi tatra kiñcidapi duḥkharūpatāṃ
na paśyati kiṃ tu nirastasamastaduḥkhasaṃsargabrahmarūpatāmeva paśyatītyuktam । <quote>‘na paśyo mṛtyuṃ
paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām । sarvaṃ hi paśyaḥ paśyati sarvamāpnoti sarvaśa’</quote> iti ।
tasmā <quote>‘dyatra nānyatpaśyatī’</quote>tyādervirodhābhāvānmuktānāṃ brahmasādṛśyaṃ tadapṛthagbhūtaprapañcadarśitvaṃ
copapadyata ityupasaṃharati—<pratika>tata iti ।। ।। iti bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । bhūmā samprasādādadhyupadeśāt ।। 7 ।। dharmopapatteśca ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>bhūmā jīvastadupari nāmādyuparīva vāgādeḥ । praśnaprativacanābhyāṃ vinaiva bhūmro'vatāraṇataḥ ।। 53 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>eṣa tu veti tuśabdo gamayati pūrvārthavicchedam । bhūmā tataḥ śivassyālliṅgācca svamahimasthitatvādeḥ ।। 54 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="418"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। bhūmā saṃprasādādadhyupadeśāt ।। 8 ।। dharmopapatteśca ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, ātmaśabdaśravaṇāt dyubhvādyadhikaraṇaṃ paraṃ brahmeti pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe rāddhāntitam । tanna । <quote>‘tarati śokamā-
tmavit’</quote> ityatrābrahmaṇi prāṇe'pyātmaśabdaprayogadarśanādityākṣepasaṃgatyedamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<pratika>bhūmetyādi</pratika> । asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘bhū-
mā tveva vijijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti । yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā, atha
yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇoti anyadvijānāti tadalpam’</quote> । ityādi chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā uta paramātme-
ti saṃdehaḥ । bhūmaśabdasya bhāvapratyayāntatvāt kimātmakaṃ tadbahutvamiti viśeṣākāṃkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyā’</quote> niti prāṇasa-
nnidhānāt bhūyaḥ praśnaprativacanaparaṃparādarśanāt prāṇavratamativāditvamanuvartyaivāparityajya prāṇaṃ satyādiparaṃparayā bhūmro'vatāraṇātta-
syaiva bhūmatvapratīteśca prāṇo bhūmeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu bhūmā paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । prāṇopadeśānantaraṃ <quote>‘epa tu vā ativa-
dati yassatyenātivadatīti’</quote> tuśabdena prāṇavādasyānativāditvamabhidhāya satyaśabdavācyaparamātmavādasyātivāditvaṃ bruvatā bhūmna
evopadiśyamānatvā <quote>‘ttarati śokamātmavit’</quote> iti praśnavākye ātmopakrameṇātmaprakaraṇāt sannidhitaḥ prakaraṇasya prābalyāt vaipu-
lyātmakabhūmarūpatāyāssarvakāraṇe paramātmani sutarāmupapatteśca । sūtrārthastu <pratika>bhūmā</pratika> paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>saṃprasādādadhi</pratika>=prāṇā-
dadhi prāṇopadeśānantaramityarthaḥ । samyakprasīdatyasmiñjīva iti saṃprasādaḥ suṣuptyavasthā । tasyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti saṃprasādaśabdena
prāṇo'bhidhīyate । tadanantara <quote>‘meṣa tu ve’</quote> <pratika>tyādyupadeśādityarthaḥ ।।</pratika> paramātmano bhūmatve yuktyantaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। dharmopa-
patteśca ।। 9 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yatra nānyatpaśyatī‘tyādinoktānāṃ sarvavyavahārābhāvādidharmāṇāṃ paramātmanyevopapatteḥ paramātmaiva bhūmetyarthaḥ ।।’</quote></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, muktaprāpyasya parameśvarasya prāptiprayojanaṃ niratiśayaṃ sukha darśayati---<pratika>sū ।। bhūmā saṃprasādādadhyupadeśā-
tū ।। 7 ।।</pratika> ‘viṣayavākyamabhinnameva । tatra bhūmaśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ parameśvaro vā tadanyo veti saṃśayaḥ । tatra nāmādiṣu tattveṣu vāgā-
dīti nirdiśya prāṇasyopari praśnapratyuktibhyāṃ vinaiva bhūmno'vatāraṇāt bhūmā prāṇa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭātsaṃprasādaśa-
bdavācyājjīvādūrdhva <quote>‘meṣa tu ve’</quote>tyādinātmāntaratvena bhūmna upadeśāt ādhikyapratipādanā<quote>‘dathāta ātmādeśa’</quote>ityātmatvenāpyagre tasya
varṇyamānatvācca prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭājjīvādadhika ātmā bhūmā parameśvara eveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। dharmopapatteśca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita’</quote> ityādinopadiśyamānānāṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvasarvātmatvasarvakā-
raṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parameśvara evopapatteḥ prāṇaśabdodite jīve'nupapatteśca parameśvara eva bhūmā nāpara iti siddham ।</p>
<p>nanu pūrvatrādhikaraṇe <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti brahmasādṛśyābhidhānāttatsāyujyamupeyuṣāṃ muktānāṃ tatpṛthagbhāvenāvasthi-
tisiddhau atra śrūyamāṇasya <quote>‘yatra nānyatpaśyatī’</quote>tyādeḥ prapañcadarśanādiniṣedhasya kathaṃ sāṃgatyamiti cet ucyate niratiśayasukhasva-
bhāve bhūmni sākṣātkṛte sati muktānāṃ brahmaiva prapaṃcākāreṇa darśanagocaro bhavati na prakṛtaprapaṃca iti brahmasādṛśyaṃ nāma tatsamarasī-
bhūtaprapaṃcadarśitvameveti ca na kāpyanupapattiriti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, ।। sū ।। bhūmā saṃprasādādadhyupadeśāt ।। 7 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānamava । bhūmā pratyagātmā vā pa-
ramātmā veti saṃdehaḥ ।’ tarati śoka ‘mityādinā prakrāntasyātmopadeśasya prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭe pratyagātmani samāptidarśanātpratyagā-
tmeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । tathā prāṇe paryavasāne'pi prāṇavedino'tivāditvamuktvā <quote>‘eṣa tu ve’</quote>tyādinā tuśabdenopāsakabhedaṃ pratipādya tasya
satyopāsakasya pūrvasmādādhikyopadeśātsatyaśabditaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva bhūmaviśiṣṭamiti siddhāntaḥ । saṃprasādaḥ pratyagātmā । tasmādadhi-
katayopadeśādityarthaḥ । ativāditva hi svopāsyādhikyavāditvam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। dharmopapatteśca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> svābhāvikāmṛtatvasvamahimapratiṣṭhitatvasarvātmatvasarvotpattihetutvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parasminbrahma-
ṇyevopapatteśca bhūmā paraṃ brahmaiva ।। iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū ।। bhūmā saṃprasādādadhyupadeśāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukhaṃ
bhūmā tveva vijijñāsitavya’</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । bhūmā mukhyaprāṇo vā viṣṇurveti saṃdehaḥ । prāṇasya prākprakṛtatvāt tatraivottaro-
ttarabhūyastvapraśnaprativacanayossamāptidarśanāt <quote>‘yadyapyenānutkrāntaprāṇā’</quote> nityādinā tasyotkramaśravaṇāt viṣṇau utkramāyogācca bhūmā
prāṇa eveti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘yo vai bhūmā tatsukha’</quote>miti sukhaśabdoktapūrṇasukharūpatvābhidhānāt bhūmeti sarvottamatvopadeśāt guṇato vaipu-
lyasya bhūmaśabdārthatvāt prāṇasyāpi viṣṇutve tatraivottarottarabhūyastvapraśnaprativacanayorviśrāntyupapatteraṇutvaviśiṣṭasya tasyāpyutkramo-
papatteśca bhūmā viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu <pratika>bhūmā</pratika>=‘yo vai bhūmeti śrutau bhūmaśabdoktapūrṇo viṣṇureva । kutaḥ । <pratika>saṃprasā-
dāt</pratika>=<quote>‘bhūmnastatsukha’</quote>mityanena saṃprasādaśabditapūrṇasukharūpatvābhidhānāt । kiṃ ca । <pratika>adhyupadeśāt</pratika>=nāmāderapi tadupari nāmā-
didevatottamatvena bhūmno'bhidhānāccetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। dharmopapatteśca ।। 9 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sa evādhastā’</quote>dityādinā bhūmni sarvagatatvādidharmaśrava-
ṇāt tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatterviṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।। iti <pratika>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ bhūmādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika>
<pb n="419"/>
athākṣarādhikaraṇam ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। akṣaramambarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
bṛhadāraṇyake śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanti,
asthūlamanaṇvahrasvamadīrghamalohitamasnehamacchāyam’</quote> ityādi ।
atra akṣaraśabdavācyastredhā saṃdihyate praṇavo jīvaḥ parameśvaro vā iti ।
praṇavajīvayoranyatara evākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ । kutaḥ ? akṣaraśabdasya varṇaparyāya-
tvāt praṇavavācakatvamucitam । <quote>‘puruṣo'kṣaramucyate’</quote> iti puruṣasyāpi tadabhidheya-
tvamuktam । atastāvevākṣaraśabdavācyau ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>।। sū॰ ।। akṣaramambarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> akṣarabrāhmaṇagataṃ viṣayavākyamudāharati---<pratika>bṛ-
hadāraṇyaka iti</pratika> । akṣaraśabdasya bahudhābhyastasya rūḍhyā varṇajīvaikāntyādambarāntadhṛtyādeḥ
parameśvaraikāntyācca tābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha---<pratika>atreti</pratika> । akṣaraśabdarūḍhimavalambya pūrvapakṣayati—
<pratika>akṣaraśabdasyeti । puruṣo'kṣaramucyata iti</pratika> । atro<quote>‘cyata’</quote> ityanena jīvasyākṣaraśabdavā-
cyatvamuktam । tadrūḍhyaiva paryavasyati । na kṣaratyaśnuta iti vā yogasya dharmajñānasaṅkocādirūpa

hmapara eva । tathāhi akṣarabrāhmaṇātpūrvaṃ gārgibrāhmaṇe gārgiyājñavalkyayoḥ praśnottarapara-
mparā pravṛttā <quote>‘yadidaṃ sarvamapsvotaṃ ca protaṃ ca kasminnu khalvāpa otāśca protāśceti vāyau
gārgīti kasminnu khalu vāyurotaśca protaśceti antarikṣalokeṣu gārgī’</quote>tyārabhya <quote>‘brahmalokeṣu
gārgī’</quote>tyante vākyasandarbhe । tatra pṛthivīsalilavāyvantarikṣalokagandharvalokādityalokaca-
ndralokanakṣatralokadevalokendralokaprajāpatilokabrahmalokānāṃ pūrvapūrvasyottarottarasminnotapro-
tatvavarṇanānantaraṃ <quote>‘kasminnu khalu brahmalokā otāśca protāśce’</quote>ti punaḥ pṛṣṭena yājñavalkyena
brahmalokaśabdoditasya cidākāśarūpasya parameśvarapadasyotaprotatvaṃ parameśvare parabrahmaṇyeva varṇa-
nīyaṃ syāt । tathā rahasyoddhāṭanaṃ jhaṭiti kartumanucitamiti manyamānena <quote>‘gārgi māti prākṣī-
rmā te mūrdhā vyapaptadanatipraśnāṃ vai devatāmatipṛcchasi mātiprākṣī’</quote>riti sakrodhamukte bhītā
gārgyupararāma । evaṃ bahuṣu brāhmaṇeṣu yājñavalkyavijigīṣayā tena saha jalpakathāyāṃ paryāyeṇa
pravartamāneṣvanupraviṣṭā gārgī tadānīṃ bhītyoparatāpi svoparamānantaramuddālake prasiddhe brahmavi-
di sūtramantaryāmiṇaṃ ca pṛṣṭavati yājñavalkyena jite sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāmevameva parājayo jāyate
sa mābhūditi manyamānā punarapi yājñavalkyaṃ prakṣyāmīti brāhmaṇānanujñāpya<quote>‘ahaṃ vai

tvā yājñavalkya yathā kāśyo vā vaideho vā rājaputra ugraṃ dhanuradhijyaṃ kṛtvā dvau bāṇavantau

gārgi diva’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘ākāśe tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ce’</quote>tyantenottare datte ‘namaste'stu yājñavalkya

<quote>‘aparasmai dhārayasve’</quote>tyuktvā pṛccheti tenokte prathamapraśnottarasthirīkaraṇārthaṃ punarapi <quote>‘yadūrdhvaṃ yā-

nā’ kāśa eva tadotaṃca protaṃ ce’tyantena prācīnottara evāvadhāraṇena dṛḍhīkṛte tadanantaraṃ kṛtasya
<quote>‘kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśce’</quote>ti dvitīyapraśnasyottaratayā <quote>‘etadvai tadakṣara’</quote>mityā <quote>‘dye-
tasminkhalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśce’</quote>tyantaṃ kṛtsnamakṣarabrāhmaṇaṃ pravṛttam । atra gārgi-
brāhmaṇānte yājñavalkyena yaḥ praśnaḥ sakrodhaṃ nivāritaḥ sa eva khalu gārgyā sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ
parājayo bhaviṣyatīti bhītayā tasya krodhamavigaṇayya punaravatāritaḥ । nivāritapraśnasya
parameśvare paryavasānaṃ gārgibrāhmaṇa evā<quote>‘natipraśnāṃ vai devatāmatipṛcchasī’</quote>ti yājñavalkyavacanena
sphuṭamiti tadanusāreṇākāśaśabdasya parameśvaraparatvameva yuktam । ata eva yājñavalkyaḥ pratha-
mapraśnasyottaraṃ vaktuṃ na jānātīti tadīyapraśnanivāraṇabhaṅgyāvagamya dvitīyapraśnottaraṃ nidhāya
yugapatpraśnadvayānujñāmarthitavatī prathamapraśnottarapraśaṃsāmiva kṛtvā sarvādhārasya parameśvarasya kena-
citprakāreṇa kaścidādhāro'stīti jñātvā vaktamayaṃ na prabhavatītyabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘aparasmai dhāraya-
sve’</quote>ti dhṛṣṭamuktavatīti saṅgacchate । evamatrākāśaḥ parameśvara iti nirṇīte sa yatrotaprotatvena
varṇyate tasya parameśvaratvāsambhavāt tadakṣaraśabdarūḍhaviṣayaḥ praṇavo jīvo veti yuktam । praṇa-
vasya jīvasya vā paramātmopāsanāsthānatayā tadadhikaraṇatvena vyapadeśasambhavāt । asti hi
hṛdayādiṣu praṇavaṃ jīvaṃ vā vicintya tanmadhyavartitvena paramātmopāsanaṃ śrutyantarādisiddham ।
tathāpyākāśāntasakalajagaddhatistayoranupapanneti cet maivopapādi । na hyatra sā śrutā । kiṃ tu
<quote>‘kasminnu khalvākāśa aotaśca protaśca’</quote> <quote>‘etasminkhalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśce’</quote>ti praśnottarayo-
rākāśamātradhṛtiḥ śrutā । praśāsanamadṛṣṭatvādiviśiṣṭadraṣṭṛtvādikaṃ ca praṇave svato'sambhavadapi
parameśvarābhedopacārādvyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyam । <quote>‘śivo vā praṇavo hyeṣaḥ praṇavo vā śivaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
vācyavācakayorbhedo nātyantaṃ vidyate kvacit । tasmādekākṣaraṃ devamāhurāgamapāragāḥ । vācya-
vācakayoraikyaṃ manyamānā manasvinaḥ ।’</quote> ityādipurāṇeṣu vācyavācakayoḥ śivapraṇavayorabhe-
dopacārasya nirūḍhatvāt । atharvaśirasi ca <quote>‘ya oṃṅkāraḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa sarvavyāpī yaḥ
sarvavyāpī so'nanto yo'nantastattāraṃ yattāraṃ tatsūkṣmaṃ yatsūkṣmaṃ tacchuklaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadvaidyutaṃ yadvaidyutaṃ
tatparaṃ brahmeti sa ekassa eko rudrassa īśānassa bhagavān sa maheśvarassa mahādeva’</quote>iti śivapraṇa-
vābhedopacārāśrayaṇena tadubhayanāmnāmekanāmatvena parigaṇanapūrvakamatha kasmāducyata oṃṅkāraḥ ya-
sminnuccāryamāṇa eva sarvaṃ śarīramūrdhvamunnāmayati tasmāducyata oṃṅkāra’ ityārabhya <quote>‘atha kasmādu-
cyate mahādevo yassarvānbhāvānparityajyātmajñānayogaiśvarye mahati mahīyate tasmāducyate mahādeva’</quote>

sandarbhasya <quote>‘ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte trīnvṛṇīte na caturo vṛṇīte pañca vṛṇīte na pañcātivṛṇīte’</quote>
iti vākyasandarbhasya tryārṣeyavaraṇavidhāna iva ekatraiva tātparyeṇaikavākyatve sambhavati vākya-

viṣayatvena prākpravartitaḥ praśnaḥ kathaṃ pṛthivyādisakalakāryaprapañcādhāraviṣayatayā paścātpravartitaḥ ।

cat । tataḥ paramākāśo'pi svena saha svādheyasakalakāryadhāraṇasamarthe paramaśive parabrahmaṇi

na caivaṃ sati vākyabhedadoṣāvakāśaḥ । jalādiṣu pṛthivyādidhārakatvavacanānāmivākāśe saka-
