<sutra>।। sū ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
sā ca dhṛtiḥ <quote>‘tasyaivākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ ।’</quote>
ityādinā prakṛṣṭājñādhīnā'vagamyate । tajjagacchāsanaṃ jīvasya na saṃbhavati; <quote>‘eka
eva rudro na dvitīyāya tasthuḥ’</quote> iti jagacchāsane dvitīyābhāvaśravaṇāt । a-
taḥ parameśvara evākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
anyabhāvo'rthāntaratvam । <quote>‘tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭṭa aśrutaṃ śrotṛ amataṃ
mantṛ avijñātaṃ vijñātṛ’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣaḥ parameśvarādakṣarasyānyabhāvaṃ vyāvartayati,
praṇavajīvapakṣayoradṛṣṭatvādiviśeṣitadraṣṭṛtvādyasambhavāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇaṃ kṛtamityetadabhiprāyaṃ cidambaraśakteratirahasyadevatātvābhiprāyaṃ copapadyate । tasmādakṣaraṃ pa-
rameśvarastadādhāraka ākāśaścidambaramityeva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।। nanvastvākāśaścidambaram ।
akṣaraṃ tu jīva ityapi sambhavati । yathā vā <quote>‘arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ sama-
rpita’</quote>miti bhūmavidyāgatavacanabalājjīvasyāpi deśakālavatsarvādhāratvopapatterityāśaṅkānirāka-
raṇārthaṃ sūtram ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 10 ।। sāca dhṛtiriti</pratika> । na1nvambarāntadhṛtiḥ
praśāsanādhīnā na śrūyate kiṃ tu sūryādikatipayadhṛtiriti cetsatyam । tacchravaṇameva sthālī-
pulākanyāyena sakalajagaddha‍ṛterapi tadadhīnatvaṃ pratyāyayiṣyati । yathā hi loke sthālyāṃ tulya-
pākānāṃ pulākānāmekamradimnānyeṣāmapi siddhatā jñāpyate tulyo heturasya cānyeṣāṃ ca siddha-
tvasya jñāpaka iti evamihāpi sūryādidhṛterakṣarapraśāsanādhīnatvaṃ pradarśyānyeṣāṃ dhṛterapi tathaiva
tadadhīnatvamiti śrutyā pratyāyyate tulyaḥ prakṛṣṭaśāsanarūpaḥsarvatrāpratihato heturiti ।<quote>‘na dvitī-
yāya tastha’</quote> iti taittirīya śrutipāṭhaḥ । tatrāviśeṣaṇasya parameśvarasya dvitīyābhāvaśravaṇe'pi
<quote>‘ya imām̐llokānīśata īśinībhi’</quote>riti śvetāśvatare <quote>‘ya imām̐llokānīśata īśanīyu’</quote>rityatharvaśira-
si ca tadvākyaśeṣaśravaṇāttadanusāreṇa jagacchāsanaviṣayameva taddvitīyābhāvavacanam । tathā
ca jagato yathākathañcidanekādhāratvakalpanasambhave'pyanekaśāsitṛtvakalpanaṃ na sambhavatīti bhā-
vaḥ ।। nanu draṣṭṭatvādikaṃ jīva eva sambhavati na parameśvara ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram ।।
<pratika>anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 11 ।। adṛṣṭatvādiviśeṣitadraṣṭṛtvādyasambhavāditi</pratika> ।। ayamā-
śayaḥ।<quote>‘avijñātaṃ vijñātri’</quote> tyetadanantaraṃ <quote>‘nānyadato'sti draṣṭṭa nānyadato'sti śrotṛ nānyadato'sti
mantṛ nānyadato'sti vijñātṛ’</quote> iti śrūyate । tasya sarvathā draṣṭantaraniṣedhaparatvaṃ vaktumayuktam । draṣṭṭa-
bahutvasyānekapramāṇasiddhatvāt kiṃ tu pūrvoktaṃ draṣṭṭa yāvadga‍uṇaviśiṣṭatayā prakṛtaṃ tāvadga‍uṇaistatsadṛśaṃ
draṣṭrantaraṃ nāstītyevaṃparaṃ vācyam । dṛśyate hi bahuvidvadyute grāme caitrasya bahuśāstraveditutvādigu-
ṇānabhidhāyāsmingrāme caitra eva viddhāniti vacanasya prāguktairguṇaiścaitrasamo vidvānnāstītyevaṃpara-
tvam । tathā ca <quote>‘nānyadato'sti draṣṭri’</quote> tyādeḥ prāguktaiḥ sarvādhāratvasarvapraśāsitṛtvādiguṇaiḥ pra-
kṛtasya draṣṭuḥ sadṛśaṃ draṣṭṭa nāstītyevamādyarthaparatvasthitau tasya parameśvaraviṣayatvamavaśyaṃbhāvīti
<note>(1) <quote>‘na tvaṃbarāntadhṛtiḥ praśāsanādhīnā śrūyataṃ ।’</quote> iti ca. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="424"/>
ataḥ parameśvara evākṣaramiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
।। ityakṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tatratyāḥ draṣṭrādiśabdāḥ parameśvare cākṣuṣaśrāvaṇamantavyādhyavaseyaviṣayasākṣātkartṛparatvena saṅga-
mayitavyāḥ । tathā ca pūrvavākyagatānāmapi draṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ sa evārthassiddhyatīti pūrvavākya-
sandarbhasyāyamarthaḥ paryavasyati । adṛṣṭaṃ jīvavargasya rūpadarśanadaśāyāṃ tadātmavattaṃ pratyabhāsamānameva
sat draṣṭṛ taddarśanaviṣayarūpasākṣātkartṛ aśrutaṃ śabdaśravaṇadaśāyāṃ taṃ pratyabhāsamānameva sat
śravaṇaviṣayaśabdasākṣātkartṛ । amataṃ tasya sthāṇupuruṣādivicāradaśāyāṃ taṃ pratyabhāsamānameva
sat tadvicāraviṣayavastusākṣātkartṛ । avijñātaṃ tasya sthāṇvādyadhyavasāyadaśāyāṃ taṃ pratyabhāsa-
mānameva sat brahma vijñātṛ tadadhyavasāyaviṣayasākṣātkartriti । evaṃ jīvavargavyāvartakārthavarṇa-
nāyāmeva prakṛtākṣarasadṛśadraṣṭrantarādiniṣedhapūrvottaravākyasandarbhānuguṇyaṃ labhyate । tasmāda-
dṛṣṭatvādiviśeṣitadraṣṭṭatvādikaṃ jīvavarge na sambhavatītyadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।
atra sarvapraśāsitṛtvādīnāmaspaṣṭānāṃ brahmaliṅgānāṃ pūrvapakṣadaśāyāmakṣaradharmatve bādhakopanyāsā-
ttatsānnidhyāmnātākāśadharmāṇāmeva satāmaupacāriko'kṣarānvaya iti spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā ।।</p>
<head>।। iti akṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha akṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । akṣaramambarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 9 ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 10 ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>akṣaramoṅkaro'stu prasiddhitastatra cāmbarāntadhṛteḥ । sarvābhidhāyakatvāddraṣṭṭatvādbhavatu jīvo vā ।। 55 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatparameśvara eva praśāsanādhīnataddha‍ṛtiśravaṇāt । sarvādṛṣṭasya sato draṣṭṭatvasopadeśācca ।। 56 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityakṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>athākṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। akṣaramaṃbarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 10 ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 11 ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ satyaśabdasya brahmaṇi rūḍhatvāt bhūmā brahmetyuktam । tadvadihāpi akṣaraśabdasya varṇe rūḍhatvādvarṇa e-
vākṣaramastviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamārabhyate---<pratika>sū ।। akṣaramaṃbarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 10 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantya-
sthūla’</quote>mityādi bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate uta brahmeti saṃdehaḥ । akṣarasamāmnāya ityādau
akṣaraśabdasya varṇe rūḍhatvāt varṇa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘etasminkhalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśce’</quote>ti pṛthivyāderākāśāntasya
vikārajātasya dhāraṇāt na kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvavyāpitvābhyāṃ cākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahmaiveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>akṣaraṃ</pratika>=akṣaraśabdavācyaṃ ।
paraṃ brahmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>aṃbarāntadhṛteḥ</pratika>---pṛthivyāderākāśāntasya vikārajātasya dhāraṇādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanvaṃbarāntadhṛtiḥ pradhāne'pi saṃbhavatītyata āha <pratika>sū ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 11 ।। sā ca</pratika>= dhṛtiḥ parameśvarasyaiva
karma । nānyasyācetanasya । kutaḥ । <pratika>praśāsanāt</pratika>—<quote>‘etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau niṣṭhataḥ’</quote>
ityādinā praśāsanaśravaṇādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>pradhānādinirāsena brahmopādāne hetvantaramāha---<pratika>sū ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> anyasya pradhānāderbhāvo dharmaḥ
so'nyabhāvaḥ । tadva‍yāvṛtteśca <quote>‘tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭe draṣṭri’</quote>tyāditadviparītadharmaśravaṇāt na pradhānādyakṣaraṃ kiṃ tu brahmaiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate ।। sū ।। akṣaramaṃbarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atrākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ praṇavo vā jovo
vā parameśvaro veti tridhā saṃdehaḥ । akṣaraśabdasya varṇaparyāyatvāt <quote>‘puruṣo'kṣaramucyata’</quote>iti jīvasyāpi tadabhidheyatvaśravaṇācca
<pb n="425"/>
athekṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
pratyakṣādipramāṇātītasyāpi parameśvarasya paramakaruṇāvaśādupāsakapratyakṣatvamupa-
pādayitumetadadhikaraṇamārabhyate---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। īkṣatikarmavyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇena saṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati—<pratika>pratyakṣādīti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇavi-
ṣayavākye, <quote>‘adṛṣṭamaśruta’</quote>mityādinā jīvavargasya cakṣuḥśrotrāntaḥkaraṇavyāpāradaśāsu parameśva-
rasyānavabhāsamānatoktyā tasya pratyakṣādipramāṇātītatvaṃ labdham । tathābhūtasya tasya sākṣātkāraḥ
kathaṃ phalatvenocyata ityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ bāhyāntarindriyajanyapratyakṣāviṣayo'pi parameśvaraḥ
kṛpāvaśādupāsakānāṃ svarūpāvaraṇamapanīya svarūpajñānātmakasākṣātkāraviṣayo bhavatīti pradarśa-
yitumuttarādhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ ।। sū॰ ।। <pratika>īkṣatikarmavyapadeśātsaḥ</pratika> ।।12 ।। praśnopaniṣadi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
praṇavajīvāvevākṣaraśabdavācyāviti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘etasminkhalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśce’</quote>ti ākāśāntasakalaprapañcadhṛteḥ
śravaṇāt parameśvara evākṣarapadābhidheya iti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> sā ca dhṛtiḥ <quote>‘etasyaivākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata’</quote> ityā-
dinā prakṛṣṭājñādhīnāvagamyate । <quote>‘eka eva rudro na dvitīyāya tasthu’</quote> riti jagataśśāsane parameśvarasyādvitīyatvaśravaṇāt tacchāsanaṃ
na jīvasya saṃbhavati । ataḥ parameśvara evākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 11 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭṭa aśrutaṃ śrotṛ’</quote> ityādinākṣarasya parameśvarādarthā-
ntaratvasya vyāvartyamānatvāt praṇavajīvapakṣayoradṛṣṭatvaviśeṣitadraṣṭṭatvādyasaṃbhavācca parameśvara evākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, sū॰ ।। akṣaramaṃbarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 9 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ pradhānaṃ vā jīvo vā
uta paramātmā veti saṃdehaḥ । pradhānasya vikārādhāratvājjīvasyācidvastvādhāratvāccākāśādhāratayocyamānamakṣaraṃ pradhānaṃ vā jīvo
vā syāt na paramātmeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <quote>‘yadūrdhvaṃ gārgi diva’</quote> ityārabhya kṛtsnasya vikārasyādhāratayā nirdiṣṭasyākāśasyāvyākṛta-
syādhāratayocyamānasyākṣarasya pradhānatvāyogāt praśāsanādhīnasūryācandramastvasarvādhāratvādiśravaṇasyāpi jīve'nupapannatvācca na
pradhānajīvayorakṣaratvaṃ kiṃ tu paramātmana eveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu <pratika>akṣara</pratika> <quote>‘metadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi’</quote> iti nirdiṣṭaṃ paramātmā ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>aṃbarāntadhṛteḥ</pratika>=aṃbaraṃ vāyumānākāśaḥ । aṃbarāntaḥ aṃbaraṃpārabhūtamaṃbarakāraṇamityarthaḥ । kāraṇāpattereva kāryasyānta-
tvāt । <pratika>aṃbarāntaḥ</pratika>=avyākṛtaṃ pradhānaṃ, tasya <pratika>dhṛteḥ</pratika>=dhāraṇāt । akṣaraṃ paramātmaiveti ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ tarhi jīvasya, pradhānadhṛtyupapatterakṣaraṃ jīvo'stu ityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 10 ।।</pratika> sā ca aṃba-
rāntadhṛtiḥ <quote>‘etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane’</quote>ityādinā praśāsanātkriyata iti śrūyate । praśāsanamapratihatājñetyarthaḥ । na hyaprati-
hatājñayā kṛtsnasya jagato dhāraṇaṃ jīve upapannam । ato na jīvo'kṣaram । <pratika>sū॰ ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 11 ।।</pratika> asyārthaḥ
śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeveti na pṛthakprapañcyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ ।। akṣaramaṃbarāntadhṛteḥ ।। 10 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ na bhidyate । atrākṣaraṃ madhyamākṣararūpaṃ śrītattvaṃ
vā brahma veti saṃdehaḥ । abhraṇīsūktasthaśrīvākye tasyāścandrādidhārakatvapraśāsanādiśravaṇāt śrītattvamevākṣaraṃ <quote>‘na tadaśnātī’</quote>ti
asaṃhartṛtvavarṇanānna brahma iti pūrvapakṣaḥ ।</p>
<p>ākāśāntasakaladhārakatvapratipādanāt prakṛṣṭāparādhīnāsaṃkucitaśāsanaśravaṇāt sthaulyāṇutvādyanyavastusvabhāvarahitatvavarṇa-
nāt anaśanokteranyānupajīvanapratipādanārthatvenāvirodhācca brahmaiveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu akṣaraṃ brahmaiva । na citprakṛtiḥ ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>aṃbarāntadhṛteḥ</pratika>=ākāśāntapadārthadhātvaśravaṇāt iti <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। sā ca praśāsanāt ।। 11 ।।</pratika> ca=yataḥ ।
sā=aṃbarāntadhṛtiḥ । <pratika>praśāsanāt</pratika>=viṣṇorājñāmātrādeva bhavatīti śrutāvuktā । ato'pyakṣaraṃ brahmaiva na cetanaprakṛtiḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anyabhāvavyāvṛtteśca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> anyabhāvānāṃ=viṣṇvanyavastusvabhāvānāṃ sthūlatvādīnām । vyāvṛtteśca
abhāvakathanācca । brahmaivākṣaramityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmakṣarādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="426"/>
<p>asya viṣayaḥ praśnopaniṣadi śrūyate <quote>‘yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇāmityanenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ
puruṣamabhidhyāyīta sa tejasi sūrye sampanno yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata
evaṃ haiva sa pāpmanā vinirmuktassa sāmabhirunnīvate brahmalokaṃ sa etasmājjīva-
ghanātparātparaṃ puruṣamīkṣata’</quote> iti । atrekṣatikarmatvena śrūyamāṇaḥ parameśvaro'nyo
veti saṃśayaḥ । nāsau parameśvaraḥ hiraṇyagarbha eva ।<quote>‘sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmaloka’</quote>
miti tallokaprāptiśravaṇāt । paraśabdasya jīvotkṛṣṭe tasminsambhavācca । athavā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘sa yo havaitadbhagavanmanuṣyeṣu prāyaṇāntamoṅkāramabhidhyāyīta katamaṃ vāva sa tena lokaṃ jayatī’</quote>ti
pippalādaṃ prati satyakāmapraśne <quote>‘etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkārastasmādvidvānetenai-
vāyatanenaikataramanvetī’</quote>ti tatprativacanamupakramya <quote>‘sa yadyekamātramabhidhyāyīta sa tenaiva saṃvedi-
tastūrṇameva jagatyāmabhisampadyate tamṛco manuṣyalokamupanayante sa tatra tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śra-
ddhayā sampanno mahimānamanubhavatyatha yo dvimātreṇa manasi sampadyate so'ntarikṣaṃ yajurbhiru-
nnīyate somalokaṃ sa somaloke vibhūtimanubhūya punarāvartata’</quote> ityekamātramoṅkāramupāsīnasya
tatprathamamātrātmakaṛkprāpaṇīyamanuṣyalokaprāptiphalaṃ dvimātraṃ tamupāsīnasya taddvitīyamātrātmaka-
yajuḥprāpaṇīyāntarikṣalokaprāptiphalaṃ cābhidhāyedamāmnāyate । <quote>‘yaḥ punareta’</quote> mityādi । atra
dhyātavyaḥ paramapuruṣa eva īkṣaṇīyaḥ phalaphalinorīkṣaṇadhyānayorekaviṣayatvaniyamāt । <quote>‘paraṃ puruṣa’</quote>
mityatra paratvāvadhitvena vivakṣitasyāpi kebhyaścitparatvasambhavena <quote>‘parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣa’</quote> miti
nirdeśasya tato bhedāvahatvābhāvāt iti sthite yo dhyāturīkṣaṇaviṣayaḥ puruṣaḥ tatra tredhā saṃśayaṃ
darśayati—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । <quote>‘anyo ve’</quote>tyanena hiraṇyagarbho nārāyaṇo veti koṭidvayamapi saṅgṛhītam ।
asminsandehavākye <quote>‘atre’</quote>tyanena parameśvara iti koṭerbījaṃ sūcitam । yasyopakrame <quote>‘etadvai sa-
tyakāme’</quote>tyādinā parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasyopāsanāyā vidhitsāvagatātretyarthaḥ । <quote>‘īkṣatikarmatvena
śrūyamāṇa’</quote> ityanena <quote>‘tadanyo ve’</quote>ti koṭerbī jaṃ sūcitam । pūrvatra <quote>‘hyadṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭri’</quote> tyādinā parameśvara-
sya pratyakṣāviṣayatvamuktam । ata īkṣatikarmatvaśravaṇaṃ parameśvarādanyatraiva sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ ।
<pratika>nāsau parameśvaraḥ</pratika> iti । īkṣatikarmatvaśravaṇādeveti bhāvaḥ । kastarhītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ prathamapūrva-
pakṣamāha—<pratika>hiraṇyagarbha iti । tallokaprāptiśravaṇāditi</pratika> । bhūlokāntarikṣalokarūpaprākṛta-
lokaprāyapāṭhādatra brahmalokaśabdaḥ kāryabrahmalokapara iti bhāvaḥ । nanu hiraṇyagarbhe jīvaghanā-
tparātparamityetadanupapannam । jīvasaṅghātavācī hi jīvaghanaśabdaḥ । <quote>‘ghanāḥ kaṭhinasaṅghātamegha-
kāṭhinyamudgarā’</quote>ityabhidhānakośasmṛteṣu ghanaśabdārtheṣu saṅghātasyaivātrānvayayogyatvāt । evaṃ cātra
yadi jīvaghanaḥ jīvasamaṣṭirūpo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ tadā tasyaiva tasmātparatvamanupapannam । yadi vya-
ṣṭisamaṣṭisādhāraṇyena jīvasamūhaḥ tathāpi samūhāntargatasya tasmātparatvamanupapannam । yadi vyaṣṭi-
samūha eva tathāpi tasmādyaḥ paraḥ tataḥ paratvaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasyānupapannamityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>paraśa-
bdasyeti</pratika> । jīvaghano'tra jīvasamūhaḥ । sa etasmāditi viśeṣyamāṇaḥ paridṛśyamāno vyaṣṭi-
samūha eva bhavati । pañcamyau samānādhikaraṇe । tathā ca prakṛtyādibhyaḥ parādvyaṣṭijīvavargātparatvaṃ
<pb n="427"/>
nārāyaṇaḥ । tasya puruṣaśabdavācyatvāt jīvaghanātparāddhiraṇyagarbhātparatvopapatte-
śca । tasminneva praṇavavācyatvaprasiddheśca । <quote>‘tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sū-
raya’</quote> iti tatpadasyaiva vidvadanubhavaviṣayatvaśravaṇāt ।<quote>‘ṛgbhiretaṃ yajurbhirantarikṣaṃ
sāmabhiryattatkavayo vedayanta’</quote> ityagrimaśloke tatpratyabhijñānācceti prāpte brūmaḥ। īkṣa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mukhyajīve'pi hiraṇyagarbhe sambhavatīti na kiñcidatrānupapannamityāśayaḥ । <pratika>puruṣaśabdavācya-
tvāditi</pratika> । <quote>‘yathā śaṅkaraśabdo'yaṃ mahādeve'vatiṣṭhate । tathā puruṣaśabdo'pi vāsudeve'vati-
ṣṭhata’</quote>ityādiṣu puruṣaśabdasyāsādhāraṇyenāpi nārāyaṇe śaktismaraṇāditi bhāvaḥ। <pratika>jīvaghanātpa-
rāddhiraṇyagarbhāditi</pratika> । yadi jīvaghano vyaṣṭijīvavargastadā vyadhikaraṇe pañcamyau । yadi sa-
maṣṭijīvastadā samānādhikaraṇe ityubhayathāpi hiraṇyagarbhātparatvaṃ vākyārtha iti sa nārāyaṇe
samupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>praṇavavācyatvaprasiddheriti</pratika> । prapañcasārādiṣviti śeṣaḥ । <pratika>pratyabhijñā-
nācceti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘yattatkavayo vedayanta’</quote> ityatra<quote>‘tadviṣṇo’</quote>riti mantra śrutaviṣṇupadasādhā-
raṇavidvadanubhavatvaviṣayatvapratyabhijñānādiha brahmaloko viṣṇupadameveti tatrekṣaṇaviṣayaḥ tadarthaṃ
dhyātavyaśca puruṣo viṣṇureva । na caivaṃ sati parabrahmopāsanāvidhitsayopakramasya kaścidvirodhaḥ ।
asminneva śloke <quote>‘tamoṅkāreṇānvetī’</quote>tyoṅkāreṇa viṣṇūpāsanayā tatpadaprāptimabhidhāya <quote>‘yatta-
cchānta’</quote>mityādinoṅkāreṇaiva śāntatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ śivamapi prāpnotīti vacanādoṅkāreṇa śivo-
pāsanasyāpi vidhisiddheḥ । evaṃ ca śāntatvādibrahmaliṅgairupasaṃhārasyāpi na virodhaḥ । pratyuta
siddhāntina evopakramopasaṃhāravirodhaḥ । upakrame parabrahmopāsanāvadaparabrahmopāsanāpi tallo-
kaprāptiphalopakṣiptā । na ca <quote>‘yaḥ punareta’</quote>mityādeḥ parabrahmopāsanāviṣayatve tato'nyatra kvacida-
parabrahmopāsanāvidhānaṃ kṛtamiti pradarśayituṃ śakyam । na caupasaṃhārikaślokasya prāguktopāsa-
nāphalopasaṃhāramātraparatve <quote>‘yattacchāntamajaramamṛtamabhayaṃ paraṃ ce’</quote>ti prāpyāntarasamuccayārthaścakāro
yujyate । tasmācchāntatvādiviśiṣṭa eva parameśvaraḥ । īkṣativiṣayastu tadanyaścaturmukho nārā-
yaṇo veti । sūtre <quote>‘sa’</quote> iti nirdeśo yasya parameśvarasyopāsana<quote>‘metadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ce’</quote>tyu-
pakramavidhitsitatayoktaṃ sa eva dhyānekṣaṇavākyayoḥ paraśabdena pratyabhijñāpyata iti pratyabhijñā-
sūcanāyetyabhipretyāha—<pratika>īkṣativiṣayassa parameśvara iti</pratika> । na cekṣaṇavākye <quote>‘parātpara’</quote>
miti nirdeśānnāstyupakramagataparabrahmapratyabhijñeti vācyam । <quote>‘paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahme’</quote>tyupakrame
aparabrahmaṇaḥ sannihitanirdiṣṭatayā tasyaiva parabhāvākṣepitatpratiyogitayānvayāt । īkṣa-
ṇavākye'pi tasmādaparabrahmaṇa evekṣatikarmaṇaḥ paratvapratipādanāt । nanu paraśabdapratyabhi-
jñānusaraṇe parabrahmopāsanayā saha vidhitsitatayopakrāntā kvacidapyaparabrahmopāsanā na vihitā
syāditi cenmābhūt । sarvasyāpyasya prakaraṇasya trimātroṅkāraparabrahmopāsanāvidhyarthatvāt ।
oṃṅkārasyedṛśo mahimā yadanenāparabrahmopāsanāpi tatprāptiphalā mātrāvaiguṇyenāpi manuṣyalo-
kāntarikṣalokaprāptiphalā । tasmādevaṃbhūtamahimaśālinoṅkāreṇa mātrāvaiguṇyarahitena heyamalpapha-
lamaparaṃ brahma vihāya parameva brahmopāsanīyamiti । evamekavākyatvasambhave vākya bhedakalpanā-
yogāt । tasmādekavākyatāsākāṅkṣaparabrahmaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparaśrutipratyabhijñābalādīkṣativiṣa-
<pb n="428"/>
<pratika>tiviṣayassa parameśvaraḥ</pratika> । uttaratra <quote>‘tamoṅkāreṇaivāyatanenānveti vidvān yattacchā-
ntamajaramamṛtamabhayaṃ paraṃce’</quote>ti tadasādhāraṇaśāntatvādidharmavyapadeśāt । na hi
hiraṇyagarbhe tatkārye śāntatvādikamasti । <quote>‘brahmaloka’</quote>miti parabrahmaṇaḥ śivasya
lokaḥ prāpyatayā'vagamyate । jīvaghana iti jīvasamaṣṭirūpo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ tasmā-
tparāt paraṃ hi dhyeyaṃ śrūyate । tato hiraṇyagarbhapakṣo na yuktaḥ । nārāyaṇa iti
yaduktaṃ tadvicāryam । <quote>‘amṛtama bhayaṃ paraṃ ce’</quote>ti nityamuktatvamabhayahetutvaṃ viśvā-
dhikatayā paratvaṃ ca kathamasminnupapadyate । viśvarūpo hyasau । kathaṃ caitadupapa-
dyate । yajjīvaghanāddhiraṇyagarbhādapi parādutkṛṣṭāt nārāyaṇātparamutkṛṣṭaṃ puri
śayānamantaryāmitayā ata eva puruṣaṃ paraṃ brahma tadupāsakassākṣātpaśyatīti varṇi-
tam । <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma’</quote> ‘ṛtam̐/?/ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam । ūrdhvaretaṃ virū-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yaḥ parameśvara eveti bhāvaḥ । vyapadeśāditi sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>uttaratreti</pratika> । śāntatvādikaṃ pra-
kṛtadhyānekṣaṇakarmaṇo'nyatropāsanāntaraviṣaye'nvetīti vaktumayuktam । vākyabhedaprasaṅgenātro-
pāsanāntaravidhyanaṅgīkārāt । <quote>‘amṛtamabhayaṃ paraṃ ce’</quote>ti cakārasyekṣatikarmaṇyeva śāntatvādi-
guṇasamuccayārthatvopapatteriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>na hi hiraṇyagarbha iti</pratika> । śāntatvaṃ nirastasakalasāṃ-
sārikadoṣakalaṅkatvamamṛtatvamanādimuktatvamabhayatvamabhayahetutvam । svayaṃ bhayarāhityasya śānta-
tvaviśeṣaṇenaiva siddheḥ । abhayaśabdāttatkarotiṇyantātpacādyaci abhayaśabdasyābhayahetuparatvo-
papatteḥ । paratvaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatvam । etatsarvaṃ hiraṇyagarbhe na sambhavatītyarthaḥ । prākṛtalokaprāyapā-
ṭhāt brahmalokaśabdaḥ kāryabrahmalokapara iti pūrvapakṣahetuṃ vighaṭayati—<pratika>brahmalokamiti</pratika>। paraśru-
tipratyabhijñāliṅgaprakaraṇaiḥ prāyapāṭhasya bādha iti bhāvaḥ । itaśca na hiraṇyagarbha ityāha—<pratika>jī-
vaghana iti</pratika> । etasmādityayaṃ sarvanāmaśabdaḥ <quote>‘paraṃ cāparaṃ ca vrahme’</quote>tyatra prakṛtaparameśvaragatapara-
tvāvadhitvena tatraiva nirjñātaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaṃ parāmṛśatīti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt jīvaghanaśabdo-
'pi tadviṣaya iti bhāvaḥ । nārāyaṇapakṣe śāntatvājaratvasambhave'pyamṛtābhayaparaśabdoktāni
nityamuktatvasaṃsāramocakatvaviśvādhikatvāni nopapadyanta ityāha—<pratika>amṛtamabhayamiti</pratika> । ni-
tyamuktatvamiha na nityameva sāṃsārikasakaladoṣanirmuktatvam । śāntaviśeṣaṇena tallābhāt ।
kiṃ tu sarvakālaṃ niratiśayānandabhoktṛtvam। tatparameśvaradharmasya paramākāśaśabditasya niratiśayā-
nandasyāvasthāviśeṣarūpe nārāyaṇe na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । itaśca nārāyaṇo nekṣativiṣaya ityāha-
<pratika>kathañcaitaditi</pratika> । <quote>‘jīvaghanātparā’</quote>diti pañcamyorvaiyadhikaraṇyameva yuktam । adhikārthalābhāditi
bhāvaḥ। nanu tayorvaiyadhikaraṇye'pi hiraṇyagarbhātpara īkṣatikarmagataparatvāvadhibhūto nārāyaṇa iti
kuto'vasīyate yenekṣatikarma nārāyaṇo na syādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>nārāyaṇaparamiti</pratika> । taittirīye
daharavidyāyā<quote>‘maṇoraṇīyā’</quote>nityanuvāke <quote>‘yo devānā’</quote>miti mantreṇa śivasya hiraṇyagarbhādadhikatve
siddhe'pi tadanantarānuvāke <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>ti nārāyaṇādbrahmaṇaḥ paratvamuktam । tatkiṃ nārāya-
ṇātparaṃ brahmetyākāṅkṣāyām <quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote>miti tadanantarānuvāke śiva eva nārāyaṇātparaṃ brahmeti
pradarśitam । tena hiraṇyagarbhātparo nārāyaṇastataḥ paraśśiva iti siddham spaṣṭaṃ caitacchivasaṅka-
lpopaniṣadi <quote>‘parātparataraṃ brahme’</quote>ti mantre । atastadarthapratyabhijñānādiha hiraṇyagarbhātparo nārā-
<pb n="429"/>
pākṣa’miti hi śrūyate । tasmātpuri daharapuṇḍarīke vartamānatayā puruṣaśabdavācyaṃ
<quote>‘tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvara’</quote>iti śrutyā praṇavābhidheyaṃ <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ
brahme’</quote>ti śrutyā nārāyaṇādviśvarūpādadhikaṃ vāṅma/?/ na saviparyāsarahitatayā ṛtam̐
satyaṃ trilocanatayā virūpākṣaṃ paraśaktyā praṇavavarṇavyatyāsarūpomāśabdavācya-
yā śabalākāratvena kṛṣṇapiṅgalaṃ paraṃ sarvātiśāyi brahma <quote>‘parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamī-
kṣata’</quote> iti īkṣatikarmatvena vyapadiśyata iti yuktam। yaduktaṃ <quote>‘tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>
miti tatra prapañcākāratvamantareṇa yanniratiśayānandasvabhāvaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yaṇa eveti bhāvaḥ । tasmādihekṣativiṣayo na hiraṇyagarbho nāpi nārāyaṇaḥ kiṃ tu udāhṛta-
daharavidyāyāṃ yadanekamaṅgalaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ divyādbha‍utarūpaṃ ca brahma varṇitaṃ tadeveti tatratyagu-
ṇarūpavivaraṇapūrvakamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । <quote>‘puri daharapuṇḍarīka’</quote> ityādikaṃ śārīrādhikaraṇe
vivṛtam । <pratika>praṇavavarṇavyatyāsarūpeti</pratika>। ayamartho liṅgapurāṇe śivenāmbikāyai varṇitaḥ ।
<quote>‘tvadīyaḥ praṇavaḥ kaścinmadīyaḥ praṇavastathā । tvadīyo devi mantrāṇāṃ śaktibhūto na saṃśayaḥ ।
akārokāramakārā madīye praṇave sthitāḥ । ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca akāraṃ ca krameṇa tu । tvadī-
yaṃ praṇavaṃ viddhi trimātraṃ plutamuttama’</quote>miti । <pratika>vyapadiśyata iti yuktamiti</pratika> । nanviha dahara-
vidyopavarṇitasthānaguṇarūpaviśiṣṭameva brahmekṣatikarmatvena vyapadiśyata iti kutassiddhyati । puri-
śayamiti viśeṣaṇāt । nanu <quote>‘sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmaloka’</quote>mati <quote>‘sa eta smājjīvaghanā’</quote>diti
brahmalokaṃ prāptasya <quote>‘sa’</quote> iti sarvanāmnā parāmarśāt paryaṅkavidyādivarṇitaparamākāśarūpabrahmaloka-
sthānataducitarūpaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmekṣaṇīyamiti kuto na siddhyati । vākyavaiyarthyaprasaṅgānna si
ddhyati। tallokaṃ prāptastaṃ paśyatītyarthataḥ siddhyannartho hi <quote>‘sa etasmā’</quote>diti vākyaṃ nāpekṣate । kathaṃ tarhi
tadavaiyarthyam । <quote>‘paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīte’</quote> tyetadanantaraṃ tadyojanayā । tathā sati dhyānasya parabrahma-
lokaprāpakatve dvāratayā tatsākṣātkāraḥ pradarśito bhavati । dhyānadvārabhūtastatsākṣātkāraśca <quote>‘ā-
prāyaṇāttatrāpi hi dṛṣṭa’</quote>mi <ref>(bra॰ 4. 1. 12. sū॰)</ref> tyadhikaraṇabhāṣye darśitaḥ । hṛdayapuṇḍarī-
ka eva bhavatīti puriśayamiti viśeṣaṇamapi yujyate । tasmātpāṭhakramādarthakramasya balīya-
stvāt ‘sa etasmāditi vākyasya prāgevānvayamabhipretya daharavidyopavarṇitaviśeṣaṇānāmīkṣa-
tikarmaṇi saṃyojanaṃ yuktameva । atha brahmalokaśabdokte śivapade tadviṣṇoriti mantrārthapratya-
bhijñāyā avirodhamupapādayati—<pratika>yaduktamityādinā</pratika> । nanvavirodhārthaṃ <quote>‘tadviṣṇo’</quote>riti mantrasya
śivapadaviṣayatvameva vaktuṃ yuktaṃ na tu śivaviṣayatvam । tasya śivaviṣayatvopapādanamapi duṣkaram ।
na hi prapañcākāreṇāvasthitasya viṣṇoḥ śivapadaṃ svarūpaṃ kiṃ tu śivaśaktisvarūpaḥ paramānandaḥ ।
tathaiva bhāṣye prakṛtyadhikaraṇādiṣvapi pratipāditam । tasya śivapadatvopapādanaṃ tu sukaram ।
tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ rūpaṃ yaḥ paramānandaḥ sa eva paramākāśarūpaḥ śivapadatayāpi vartata iti । eva-
meva <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote> miti kaṭhavallīmantrasya śivapadaviṣayatvopa-
pādanaṃ kṛtaṃ <quote>‘kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatte’</quote> ritya <ref>(bra॰ 4. 3. 6. sū॰)</ref> dhikaraṇa iti cetsa-
tyam । ihāpi sa evābhiprāyaḥ । <quote>‘tadeva śivābhidhaṃ brahme’</quote> tyādi tu śivaśaktyora bhedopacāreṇa
pravṛttamiti na doṣaḥ । darśito hi prāgā<quote>‘nando brahme’</quote>tyādiśratiṣu <quote>‘ānandamayo'bhyāsāt’</quote> (bra॰
<pb n="430"/>
rūpaṃ tadeva śivābhidhaṃ paraṃ brahmetyavirodhaḥ । yato viṣṇuśivayorupādānanimitta-
yoravasthā bhedamantareṇa svarūpabhedo nāsti । iti īkṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।

1. 1. 13. sū॰) <quote>‘ākāśastaliṅgā’</quote>di <ref>(bra॰ 1. 1. 23. sū॰)</ref> tyādisūtreṣu ca śivaśa-
ktyorabhedopacāraḥ ।। ।। <pratika>itīkṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>

<lg><l>rikṣatilakṣyo viṣṇustadviṣṇoriti tathā prathiteḥ । puruṣaśca sa prasiddho hiraṇyagabhītparaśca jīvaghanāt ।। 57 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jīvaghanātpara iti yastasmādapi paro'tra śiva uditaḥ । svāvasthā bhedatanossa eva viṣṇośca paramapadam ।। 58 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti īkṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha īkṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। īkṣatikarmavyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya jagaddha‍ṛtilakṣaṇaliṃgena brahmaṇi na kṣaratīti yogavṛttirāśritā । tadvadihāpi
deśaparicchinnaphalaśrutiliṃgena paraśabdasyāpekṣikaparatvaviśiṣṭe hiraṇyagameṃ vṛttirastviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। īkṣatika-
rmavyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇomityetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta’</quote> iti praśnopaniṣadvākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
tatra dhyeyaṃ vastu hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma vā uta paramātmā veti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalo-
kam’</quote> iti tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāta piṇḍāpekṣayā prāṇasya paratvopapatteśca hiraṇyagarbha iti pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
<quote>‘sa etasmājjīva ghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣata’</quote> iti dhyātavyasyekṣatikarmatvena vyapadeśādhdyānekṣaṇayorekaviṣayatvaniyamāt
paricchinnaphalasya kramamuktyarthatvopapatteśca saḥ dhyātavyaḥ paramātmaiveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, sū॰ ।। īkṣatikarma vyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ ‘yaḥ puna rityādi <quote>‘puruṣamīkṣata’</quote> inyantaṃ vākyaṃ
viṣayaḥ । atrekṣatikarmatvena śrūyamāṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbho vā nārāyaṇo vā parameśvaro veti saṃdehaḥ । brahmalokaprāptiphalatvaśravaṇāt
jīvotkṛṣṭatva tparaśabdavācyo hiraṇyagarbho vā puruṣaśabdavācyatvāt jīvaghanātparāddhiraṇyagarbhādapi paratvopapatteḥ praṇavavācyatva-
prasiddheḥ <quote>‘tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya’</quote> iti tasvarūpasyaiva vidvadanubhavaviṣayatvaśravaṇācca nārāyaṇo vā īkṣatikarma
syāt, iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । uttaratra, <quote>‘yattacchāntamajaramamṛtamabhayaṃ paraṃ ce’</quote>tyasādhāraṇaśāntatvādidharmavyapadeśāt brahmaṇaḥ śivasya lokasya
prāpyatvopapatteḥ jīvasamaṣṭirūpāddhiraṇyagarbhādapi parātparatvābhidhānācca parameśvara evekṣativiṣayaḥ na hiraṇyagarbha iti jīvaghanā-
ddhiraṇyagarbhādapi parādutkṛṣṭānnārāyaṇādapi paramiti pratipādanāt viṣṇuśivayorupādānanimittayoravasthābhedamantareṇa svarūpabhedāna-
bhyupagamena prapañcākāratvamantareṇa niratiśayānandasvabhāvasya viṣṇoḥ paramasvarūpasyaiva brahmatvābhyupagamena ca tasya vidvadanu bhavaviṣayatve
virodhābhāvācca puri daharapuṇḍarīke vartamānatayā puruṣaśabdavācyaṃ <quote>‘tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ paraḥ sa maheśvara’</quote> iti śrutyā praṇavābhi-
dheyaṃ <quote>‘nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme’</quote>ti śrutyā nārāyaṇādviś‍varūpādadhikaṃ sarvātiśāyi brahmaiva īkṣatikarmatvena vyapadiśyata siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu,
<pratika>īkṣatikarma</pratika>— īkṣati viṣayaḥ । <pratika>saḥ</pratika>—parameśvaraḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>vyapadeśāt</pratika>—uttaratrāsādhāraṇaśāntatvādidharmavyapadeśāt । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate, sū॰ ।। īkṣatikarma vyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 12 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । atra dhyāyatīkṣatikarmatayā vyapadi-
ṣṛḥ paramapuruṣaḥ hiraṇyagarbho vā uta parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamo veti saṃśayaḥ । ekadvimātrapraṇavopāsakaphalabhūtamanuṣyāntarikṣalo
kasāhacaryāt brahmalokarūpaphalasyāpi caturmukhalokatvaniścayāt hiraṇyagarbha iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । uttaratra nirupādhikaśāntatvādidharma-
vyapadeśāt paramātmatvaniścaye sati brahmalokaśabdasyāpi tatsthānatvopapatteśca puruṣottama eveti siddhāntaḥ <pratika>īkṣatikarma=saḥ</pratika>
paramātmā dhyāyatīkṣatyorekaviṣayatvena dhyāyatikarmāpi sa evetyarthaḥ । śrīkaṇṭhamatavadatrāpi tripadamevaitatsūtramiti vedyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ ।। īkṣatikarmavyapadeśātsaḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagraāsīt’</quote> ityādikaṃ, sṛṣṭipratipādakamane-
kaprakaraṇātmakaṃ sacchabda ghaṭitaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra sacchabdavācyaṃ pradhānaṃ vā viṣṇurveti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote>ti-
bahubhāvaśravaṇāt nirvikāraśrutyānupādānasya tasya bahubhāvāsaṃbhavāt kāryaunmukhyarūpasya gauṇekṣaṇasya pradhāne saṃbhavācca pradhāna-
meva sacchabdavācyamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘tatteja ekṣata’</quote> <quote>‘tadapo'sṛjata’</quote> ityādiṣu īkṣitṛtvasraṣṭṭatvaśravaṇena tasya tejo'bannābhimānide-
vatātvapratītyā devatātmanā bahubhāvasya pradhāne'saṃbhavāt pratyuta viṣṇāveva saṃbhavācca viṣṇuriti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu sadevetyā-
diprakaraṇasthitasadādiśabdavācyaḥ <pratika>saḥ</pratika> viṣṇureva । na pradhānam । kutaḥ । <pratika>īkṣatikarmavyapadeśāt</pratika>—tadaikṣateti cetananiṣṭhaikṣateti
śabdopalakṣitadarśanākhyakriyābhidhānāt iti ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmīkṣatikarmādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<pb n="431"/>
atha daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
tadiha hariviriñcādiprapañcottīrṇasyāpi sādhakānugrahāya puriśayānatayā puruṣasya
paramaśaktirūpomāśabalitasya virūpākṣasya parabrahmaṇaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ sakalasaṃ-
sāranivṛttipūrvakaṃ tatprāptaye tadupāsakānāṃ tadvācakapraṇavaparāṇāṃ bhavatīti nirū-
pitam । tasya puriśayanamupāsanaṃ ca prakaṭayitumidamadhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। dahara uttarebhyaḥ ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ve-
śma daharo'sminnantara ākāśaḥ tasmin yadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsi-
tavyam’</quote> ityādi ।।
daharākāśaiha kiṃ bhūtākāśa ucyate, uta jīvaḥ, parameśvaro veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
ākāśaśabdasya viyati rūḍhatayā bhūtākāśo daharākāśaḥ । athavā jīvo dahara
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatipradaśanapūrvarkamuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>tadiheti</pratika> । adhvātītapara-
mākāśavarttyapi śivaḥ upāsakānāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayo bhūtvā <quote>‘tadoko'grajvalana’</quote>mitya <ref>(bra॰ 4-2-16
sū॰)</ref> dhikaraṇoktīrītyā tadanugrahītuṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayapuṇḍarīke'pi kṛṣṇapiṅgalatvādiviśiṣṭena
sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇāvasthitaḥ praṇavena svopāsakānāṃ sakalasaṃsāranivṛttipūrvakasvaprāptaye tadī-
kṣaṇaviṣayo bhavatīti khalvīkṣatikarmādhikaraṇe nirūpitam । tasya yatra sthitasya yathābhūtarū-
paguṇaviśiṣṭasya praṇavenopāsyatvaṃ tatsarvaṃ prakaṭī kartuṃ daharavidyāvicārārthamadhikaraṇamārabhyata itya-
rthaḥ । eṣā prāsaṅgikī saṅgatiḥ । prakṛtasidhdyartheyamupoddhātasaṅgatiriti kecit <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। dahara utta-
rebhyaḥ ।। 13 ।।</pratika> tredhā saṃśayaṃ darśayan saṃśayakoṭīnāṃ bījāni sūcayati-<pratika>daharākāśa iheti ।</pratika>
ākāśaśrutirabhyasyamānā bhūtākāśakoṭerbījam । daharatvaliṅgamabhyasyamānaṃ jīvakoṭeriti daha-
rākāśa ityanena sūcitam । ihetyanena siddhāntakoṭerbījaṃ sūcitam । yatra prakaraṇe apahatapāpma-
tvādikaṃ parameśvaraliṅgaṃ śrūyata iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>viyati rūḍhatayeti ।</pratika> ākāśaśabdastāvalloke vi-
yati prasiddhataraḥ । na ca sā prasiddhirāsamantātkāśata iti yogamūlā । ja1ḍe tadasambhavāt । ata-
stasya tatra rūḍhireva । parameśvare tu yogo vā vyāpakatvādinā bhūtākāśasāmyena gauṇavṛttirvā
vaktavyā । tadubhayaṃ rūḍhito durbalam । ato rūḍhyā bhūtākāśa evāyamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>dahareti । tasya</pratika>
svarūpato vyāpakatve'pi hṛdayapuṇḍarīkāvacchedenālpatvaṃ sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । svarūpeṇaivālpa-
tvamupapādanīyaṃ cet jīvo'yamastvityāha---<pratika>athaveti</pratika> । nanu pakṣadvaye'pi <quote>‘yāvānvā ayamākā-
śastāvāneṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣo na saṅgacchate । tathāhi bhūtākāśe tāvadabhe-
dādupamānopameyabhāvo na saṅgacchate । na ca bāhyābhyantarakṛtabhedena tadupapattiḥ । āntarasya
bāhyavadvyāpakatvābhāvāt । jīve svata evāṇutvānna saṅgacchate । parameśvare tu hṛdayāvacchedenālpa-
tve'pi svarūpeṇa vyā2pakatvavivakṣayopapadyate । <quote>‘eṣa ta ātmāntarhṛdaye'ṇīyān vrīhervā yavādve’</quote> ti
<note>(1) ‘jīve tadasaṃbhavāt iti- ka- pāṭhaḥ.</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vyāpakatayopapadyate’</quote> iti-kha-pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="432"/>
iti alpaprarimāṇatvāt, tasyāṇubhūte'smin saṃbhavāt, na vyāpī parameśvaro daharaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
parameśvarasya hṛdayāvacchedopādhikāṇīyastve varṇite'pi tadanantara <quote>‘meṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye jyā-
yān divo jyāyānantarikṣā’</quote>dityādinā svābhāvikavyāpakasyāpi varṇanadarśanāt । evaṃ ca vā-
kyaśeṣānusāreṇa svābhāvikavyāptimānparameśvara eva daharākāśa iti yuktam । evaṃ sa<quote>‘tyatha ya-
didamasminbrahmapura’</quote> ityupakramo'pi saṅgacchate । dehasya brahmapuratvoktyāpi dehāntarvartitvena bra-
hmopāsanāvidhitsayedaṃ prakaraṇamārabhyata iti avagamyate । nanu<quote>‘caitragṛhe maitrastiṣṭhatī’</quote>tyanyagṛ-
hatvena nirdiṣṭe'pyanyāvasthānamucyate । tatra <quote>‘maitra’</quote> iti viśiṣyādheyo nirdiṣṭaḥ ihāpyākāśaśru-
tyā viśiṣya bhūtākāśo nirdiṣṭa iti tulyamiti cenna । iha caitragṛhavākyānvayāṅgīkāre brahma-
puratvena dehoktervaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । nahi maitrānveṣiṇaṃ prati <quote>‘caitragṛhe maitrastiṣṭhatī’</quote>ti vākye caitragṛ-
hatvoktirdevadattagṛhādivyāvartanenevātra brahmapuratvoktirdehāntarvartitvena brahmopāsanāvidhitsābhāve
prakārāntareṇa sāphalyamaśnuvīta । tasmādyathā<quote>‘prajāpatirvaruṇāyāśvamanaya’</quote>dityādyupakramagatārtha-
vādenāśvadātuḥ kiñcidvidhāsyata ityavagamāt tadanantaraśrutaṃ <quote>‘yāvato'śvānpratigṛhṇīyāttāvato
vāruṇāṃścatuṣkapālānnirvape’</quote>diti vākyamaśvapratigrahīturiṣṭavidhāyakatayāvabhāsamānamapyaśva-
dātustadvidhāyakamiti yojyate।evamihāpyupakrame dehasya brahmapuratvoktyā dehasyāntaḥ kiñcitpa-
rameśvarasyopāsanaṃ vidhāsyata ityavagamāt tadanantaraśrutaṃ daharākāśavākyaṃ bhūtākāśapratipādaka-
tayāvabhāsamānamapi svarūpeṇa vyāpakasya brahmaśavdoktasya parameśvarasya pratipādakamiti yojanī-
yam । tathā satyeva <quote>‘yāvānvā ayamākaśa’</quote>iti bāhyākāśasāmyoktyanantara <quote>‘mubhe asmindyāvā-
pṛthivī antareva samāhite । ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca sūryācandramasāvubhau । vidyunnakṣatrāṇi yaccāsye-
hāsti yacca nāsti sarvaṃ tadasminsamāhita’</quote>miti dyāvāpṛthivyādisamādhānādhāratvavarṇanamapi sa-
ṅgacchate । tasmātsvarūpeṇa vyāpakaḥ parameśvara eva daharākāśa ityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>na vyāpī parame-
śvara iti ।</pratika> ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘yāvānvā’</quote> ityādivākyaṃ bhūtākāśasāmyapratipādanena daharākāśa-
sya vyāpakatvaparaṃ na bhavati kiṃ tu daharākāśenaiva daharākāśasya sāmyapratipādanenātisaukṣmyapara-
m । ayamityasya prakṛtadaharākāśaparāmarśitve sambhavatyaprakṛtabāhyākāśaparāmarśitvakalpanānau-
cityāt । tenaiva tasyopamānopameyabhāvo nānvetīti cet satyam । ananvayyapi tannibadhyate
anupamatvadyotanāya yathā <quote>‘sve mahimnī’</quote> tyatrānanvayyapi svasya svenādhārādheyabhāvo'nādhā-
ratvajñāpanāya nibadhyate । ata eva <quote>‘rāmarāvaṇayoryuddhaṃ rāmarāvaṇayorive’</quote>tyādāvanupamatvadyotanā-
yābhede nibadhyamāne upamānopameyabhāvo nānvetīti anvarthanāmānanvayālaṅkāra ityāhurālaṅkā-
rikāḥ।evaṃ niratiśayasaukṣmyaparatvena bhūtākāśe jīve cāyaṃ vākyaśeṣa upapadyate । pratyuta bhūtā-
kāśavadvyāpako daharākāśa ityevaṃ parameśvaraparatvamevāsya nopapadyate । kathaṃ,tasminpakṣe khalvākāśa-
śabdasya parameśvare gauṇī vṛttireṣṭavyā na yaugikī vṛttiḥ। prathapapratītarūḍhyaparityāgena tatpūrvakagau-
ṇavṛttyupapattau tatparityāgāpekṣasya yogasyānunmeṣāt । tasyāścā<quote>‘kāśavatsarvagata’</quote> iti śrutyantarapra-
siddham,ihāpi brahmapura iti brahmaśabdena parameśvarasyopāsanāt buddhisthitaṃ ca vyāpakatvameva sādṛ-
śyanimittatayāvatiṣṭhate। tathā copameyanirdeśakena ākāśaśabdenaiva bhūtākāśasādṛśye pratipādite
vākyena pratipādyamānaṃ tatsādṛśyaṃ kathamanvetu । na hi yo bhūtākāśavadvyāpakaḥ sa bhūtākāśe tadvyā-
<pb n="433"/>
paka iti vākyaṃ samañjasaṃ bhavati । na ca vācyaṃ yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ yāgādīnāmamāvāsyāpaurṇa-
māsyākālayostadutpattivākyavihitayorapya<quote>‘māvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamā-
syā yajete’</quote>ti vākyayorgauṇābhyāṃ tṛtīyāntābhyāmamāvāsyāpaurṇamāsīpadābhyāmanūdyamānayora-
pi saptamyantāmāvāsyāpaurṇamāsīpadopāttayoḥ punarvidhānaṃ tadvadihāpi syāditi । tayorvākyayo-
ṣṣaṇṇāṃ yāgānāṃ prayogaikyasyautsargikatayā paurṇamāsyāṃ prācyāṅgānuṣṭhānapūrvakaṃ paurṇamāsītrika-
manuṣṭhāyāmāvāsyāyāṃ prāptāyāmamāvāsyātrikamanuṣṭhāya udīcyāṅgasamāpanaprasaṅgāt । nanu, yadi
<quote>‘yāvānvā’</quote> ityādikaṃ daharākāśasya svarūpato vyāpakatvaparaṃ na bhavet kiṃ tvatisūkṣmatvaparameva bha-
vet tadāgre varṇyamānaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādisamādhānādhāratvaṃ kathamupapadyata iti cet vacanabalāditi-
brūmaḥ । śrūyate hi taittirīye'pi samānaprakaraṇe hṛdayaṃ prakramya<quote>‘tasyānte suṣiraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasminsarvaṃ
pratiṣṭhita’</quote>miti । nanūcyamānamapyasambhāvitaṃ kathaṃ śraddheyamiti cet ucyate <quote>‘ubhe asminni’</quote>tyādi-
nā daharavidyopāsakasya brahmalokaprāptyanantaramupayogi bhogasthānabhogopakaraṇabhogyajātamu-
cyate । tatra dyāvāpṛthivīgrahaṇaṃ sakalabhogasthānopalakṣaṇam । agnivāyucandrasūryagrahaṇaṃ sakalabho-
gopakaraṇopalakṣaṇam । <quote>‘yaccāsyehāsti yacca nāsti sarvaṃ tadasminsamāhita’</quote> miti bhogyajātamucya-
te।yadasyopāsakasyeha loke vidyate yaccehaloke idānīṃ na vidyate naṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyadvā cetanācetanātmakaṃ
bhogyaṃ tatsarvamasmindaharākāśe samāhitamiti hi tasyārthaḥ । agre <quote>‘yo hyasyetaḥ praiti na tamiha da-
rśanāya labhate । atha ye cāsya jīvā yeca pretāḥ yaccānya1dicchanna labhate sarvaṃ tadatra gatvā vi-
ndata’</quote>iti śrutyaivāgre tathā vivṛtatvāt । tacca brāhmalaukikaṃ bhogasthānabhogopakaraṇajātaṃ dvi-

<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
<p><quote>‘tadyathā hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitamakṣetrajñā uparyupari saṃcaranto na vindeyurevameve-
māḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ’</quote>
iti vākyaśeṣe prajānāmaharaharasmin daharākāśe yā gatiḥ śrūyate, yaścātra brahmaloka-
śabdaḥ; tābhyāmapi daharākāśaḥ parameśvaraḥ।tathā hi śrutyantare parameśvara eva evaṃrūpaṃ
gamanaṃ dṛṣṭa<quote>‘mevameva khalu somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpatsyā-
mahe’</quote> iti । brahmalokaśabdaśca tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ <quote>‘eṣa vrahmalokaḥ samrāḍiti hovāca’</quote> iti ।

dityāśaṅkyāha <pratika>kathaṃ saṃsāriṇīti</pratika> । daharākāśaśabdasya jīvaparatve saṃsārijīvaparatvamaṅgī-

nnatayocyamānatvāt । na caiteṣāṃ saṃsāriṇi sambhavo'stīti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। gatiśabdābhyāṃ
tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca ।। 14 ।।</pratika> nanu <quote>‘brahmalokaṃ na vindatī’</quote>tyatra brahmalokaśabdasya paramā-
kāśarūpaśivapadaparatvaṃ yuktam । <quote>‘araśca ha vaiṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke’</quote> <quote>‘tṛtīyasyāmito divi’</quote>itya-
traiva prakaraṇe tatra tasya prayogadarśanāttatra klṛpte ṣaṣṭhīsamāse buddhisthe niṣādasthapatinyāyānavatā-
rāt । tasmādbrahmalokaśabdastāvanna siddhāntasādhakaḥ। evaṃ ca aharahastadgatiśravaṇamasambhavadarthaka-
tvādarthavādamātramiti ga1tirapi na tatsādhiketyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ <quote>‘tadyathe’</quote> <quote>‘tyanṛtene’</quote>ti ca pūrvo-
ttaravākye apyupātte । <quote>‘na vindantī’</quote>tyuktasya aharaharbrahmalokagatyajñānasyā<quote>‘nṛtena hi pratyūḍhā’</quote>
iti malāvṛtatvahetunā <quote>‘tadyathā hiraṇyanidhi’</quote>miti bhūtalāntargatahiraṇyanidhyajñānadṛṣṭāntena
copapādanānnedamarthavādamātramityaharahargatistāvadupapādanīyā । aharahassuṣuptidaśāyāṃ gatiyo-
gyaṃ ca hārdaṃ brahmaiveti brahmalokaśabdo'pi samānādhikaraṇasamāsena brahmapara eva vaktavya iti
bhāvaḥ । nanu hārde brahmaṇi jīvasyāharaharevaṃ gatyupapādane hṛdayāvacchinne bhūtākāśe'pi sā nivā-
rayituṃ na śakyeti gatistāvadbha‍ūtākāśe'pi sambhavati brahmalokaśabdo'pi tatprakaraṇagatabrahma-
lokaśabdāntare klṛptena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena paramākāśa iva hārve bhūtākāśe'pyupapadyata ityāśaṅkāni-
rākaraṇārthaṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭamiti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe <pratika>tathāhi śrutyantara iti ।</pratika> gatiśabdayo<quote>‘re-
vameva khalu somye’</quote>tyādi śrutyantare brahmaṇyeva darśanamasti na bhūtākāśe । atastadubhayamiha brahma-
gatabheva grāhyam । śrutyantaraprasiddhatvāt । na bhūtākāśagatam । tatsāmarthyasya kalpanīyatvena
vilambitopasthitikatvāditi bhāvaḥ । sūtre dṛṣṭaśabdaḥ <quote>‘tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśana’</quote>-
miti sūtre darśanaśabda iva bhāvapratyayāntaḥ na tu karmaṇi niṣṭhāntaḥ । tathā ca dṛṣṭaśabdasya
gatiśabdau prati viśeṣaṇatayā pulliṅgena dvivacanena ca bhāvyamiti śaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ । bhāṣye
gamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brahmalokaśabdaśca tasmin dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭaśabdasya gatiśabdaviśeṣaṇatvena niveśanaṃ
phalitārthapradarśanaparaṃ ma sautradṛṣṭapadayojanāparam । astu vā tathāpi na virodhaḥ । viśeṣyasya
pulliṅgadvivacanāntatvena nirdiṣṭatve'pi pāṇinīye <quote>‘dvigurekavacana’</quote>miti sūtre liṅgasāmānyaviva-

vacanasya copapatteḥ । liṅgaṃ ceti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe <pratika>kiṃ ca mābhūditi ।</pratika> avedanasya malāvṛ-

eva sambhavati na bhūtākāśaviṣayatva iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syāsminnupala-
bdheḥ ।। 15 ।।</pratika> nanvastu nāma dhṛtiḥ pārameśvaro mahimā tathāpi daharākāśe sa na śrūyate ।

ndaharākāśa iti ।</pratika> <quote>‘atha ya ātme’</quote>ti prakṛtapakāmarśino yatpadasyātmaśabdasya ca prāgdaharākāśe
prayuktasya vidyamānatayā setutvādivarṇanasya tadanyaviṣayatvaṃ na sambhavati । tasmādathaśabdaḥ pūrva-
prakṛtāpekṣārtho varṇanīyaḥ । tasya ca prāṅnirdiṣṭā anantaraṃ nirdekṣyamāṇāśca guṇāḥ parasparāpekṣayā
samuccityopāsanīyā itisūcanaṃ phalam । anyathā <quote>‘atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyā-
nkāmān teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatī’</quote>ti daharavidyāphalavidhivākye daharākāśagatava-
stujātamadhye viśiṣya satyakāmapunargrahaṇasyāsminprakaraṇe prāguktānāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ vakṣya-

nāmupāsyatvaṃ na siddhyet । tatra <quote>‘satyānkāmāni’</quote>ti śabdo hi tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bha-
vatī’</quote>tyārabhyānukrāntānāṃ pitṛmātṛbhrātṛsvasṛsakhigandhamālyānnapānagītavāditrastrīprabhṛtīnā-

iti śrutyaiva tathā vivṛtatvāt । sa ca satyakāmaśabdaḥ pitṛmātrādirūpacetanātmakasakalabhogya-

stvidaṃ daharākāśaviṣayaṃ tāvatā tasya na parameśvaratvasiddhiḥ । avakāśarūpa ākāśe'pi sarva-

<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। prasiddheśca ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘dahraṃ vipāpmaṃ paraveśmabhūtaṃ yat puṇḍarīkaṃ puramadhyasaṃstham । tatrāpi dahraṃ gaganaṃ vi-
śokastasmin yadantastadupāsitavyam’</quote> iti mahopaniṣidi, <quote>‘hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ virajam’</quote>
ityārabhya---<quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam । dhyātvā’</quote>
ityādi kaivalyopaniṣadi ca parameśvarasyomāsakhasya daharapuṇḍarīkamadhyavartitveno-

nanu daharapuṇḍarīkamadhye daharākāśāntarvartitvenopāsyatvaṃ <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya
ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ’</quote> ityādyupaniṣadantare prasiddhaṃ para-
meśvarasya iha daharākāśatveneti virodha iti cet---tatrāpi daharākāśamadhyava-
rtī na parameśvara upāsyaḥ; kiṃ tu daharākāśe parameśvaradharmāṇāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ
saṃbandhapratīteḥ daharākāśatvamapyasya cidambararūpatayeti na virodhaḥ ।।

tasya madhye vahniśikhā aṇīyordhvā vyavasthitaḥ । tasyāśśikhāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthitaḥ ।।’</quote>iti

<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cennāsaṃbhavāt ।। 17 ।।</sutra>

tadviṣayatvāt । <quote>‘kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛtī’</quote>ti sūtrata evobhayatrāpi ṣaṣṭhītyuktatvāt । <pratika>daharākāśaṃ
prāptasyeti</pratika> । anenai<quote>‘taṃ setuṃ tīrtve’</quote>tyasya <quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa seturvidhṛtiḥ setuvadasaṅkarāpādakatvena
prāgvarṇitametaṃ daharākāśaṃ prāptasyetyartha iti darśitam । andhatvāderityādiśabdena śrutau viddhopatā-
piśabdābhyāmuktāvāyudhādhivedhavyādhī saṅgṛhītau । satatoditaprakāśatvāpahatapāpmatvaśabdābhyāṃ
saptamyantaprathamāntābhyāma‘pi naktamaharevābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> <quote>‘sakṛdvibhāto hyeṣa brahmaloka’</quote> iti
<note>(1) <quote>‘daharākāśaprāptyā pāpmakāryatayā jarādivatpāpmarūpasyāndhatvāderabhāve’</quote> iti pāṭhāntaram ।।</note>
﻿<pb n="445"/>
tasya taddhetutvaṃ <quote>‘nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti śrutyantaraprasiddham । tena daharā-
kāśaṃ prāptasyoktaphalāvāptistatsāmyāpattirūpā tadanukṛtiriti labhyate । sā ca
tato bheda evopapadyate । ataścāyaṃ na jīva iti tātparyam ।।
punarasmin pramāṇāntaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। api ca smaryate ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
daharapuṇḍarīkāntarvartitvamupāsyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ smaryate---
<quote>‘athavā paramātmānaṃ paramānandavigraham । gurūpadeśādvijñeyaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam ।।
brahma brahmapure gārgi daharābjakhamadhyame । abhyāsāt saṃprapaśyanti santastvaṃ ca ta-
thā kuru’</quote>।। ityādi ।। tataḥ parajyotissvarūpaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ paraśaktyumāsanāthaṃ paraṃ bra-
hma daharapuṇḍarīkākāśamadhyavarti svābhāvikāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamupāsanīyami-
ti siddham ।। iti daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vākyayorartho gṛhītaḥ । evaṃ daharākāśasya parameśvaratvamupapāditam । tadantarvartino'pi parameśvaratva-
mupabṛṃhaṇena vyaktīkartuṃ sūtram <sutra>।। sū. ।। api ca smaryate ।। 22 ।।</sutra> yogayājñavalkyaśrutau dhyānā-
dhyāye kaiścitprakāraiḥ parameśvaradhyānopadeśānantaraṃ prakārāntareṇa taddhyānamupadiśyate—<pratika>atha veti ।</pratika>
<pratika>paramātmānamiti</pratika> <quote>‘tasyāśśikhāyā madhye paramātmā vyavasthita’</quote> iti mantrārthasyopasaṃhāraḥ ।
<pratika>paramānandavigrahamiti</pratika> <quote>‘yaccāsyehāstī’</quote>ti vākyārthasya । <pratika>gurūpadeśādvijñeyamiti</pratika> <quote>‘taṃ ce-
dbrūyu’</quote>rityādiśiṣyācāryanibandhanajñāpitasya gurūpadeśāvaśyakatvasya । puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalamiti
<quote>‘ṛtaṃ satya’</quote>miti mantrārthasya । brahma brahmapura iti <quote>‘atha yadidamasminbrahmapura’</quote> ityupakramārtha-
sya । <pratika>daharābjakhamadhyama iti</pratika> <quote>‘tasminyadanta’</quote>rityuktārdhasya । <pratika>abhyāsāt samprapaśyanti
iti</pratika> <quote>‘anveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavya’</quote>mityasya । svābhāviketi । yadyapyapahatapāpmatvādikaṃ daha-
rākāśatveneti prāguktaṃ tathāpi tadabhedadṛṣṭyā tanmadhyavartinyapi tatkīrtanamupapadyate । tatrāpahata-
pāpmatvādīnāṃ brahmaliṅgānāṃ spaṣṭānāmapi pūrvapakṣe daharākāśādanyatra tadantarvartinyevānvayāt
spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā ।।</p>
<head>।। iti daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।। ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । dahara uttarebhyaḥ ।। 13 ।। gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathāhi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca ।। 14 ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syāsminnu
palabdheḥ ।। 15 ।। prasiddheśca ।। 16 ।। itaraparāmarśātsaiti cennāsambhavāt ।। 17 ।। uttarāccedāvirbhūtasvarūpa-
stu ।। 18 ।। anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ ।। 19 ।। alpaśruteriti cettaduktam ।। 20 ।। anukṛtestasya ca ।। 21 ।। api
ca smaryate ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>yukto daharākāśo bhūtākāśaḥ prasiddhito yadvā। tadupamito'sau jīvastathāśrutereṣa samprasāda iti ।। 59 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>apahatapāpmatvāderasambhavādbha‍ūtajīvayossa śivaḥ । sa ca jīvaparāmarśastanmahimakhyāpanāyaiva ।। 60 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="446"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha daharādhikaraṇānukṛtyadhikaraṇe ।। 5 ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। dahara uttarebhyaḥ ।। 14 ।। gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathāhi dṛṣṭaṃ liṃgaṃ ca ।। 15 ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syā-
sminnupalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।। prasiddheśca ।। 17 ।। itaraparāmarśātsa iti cennāsaṃbhavāt ।। 18 ।। uttarāccedāvirbhū-
tasvarūpastu ।। 19 ।। anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ ।। 20 ।। alpaśruteriti cettaduktam ।। 21 ।। anukṛtestasya ca
।। 22 ।। api ca smaryate ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, <quote>‘dahara uttarebhya’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘alpaśruteriti cettaduktam’</quote> ityantaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamātramekamadhikaraṇam । itaratsū-
tradvayamadhikaraṇāntaramiti viśeṣaḥ । ānandatīrthamate'pyevameva । śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayostvidaṃ sūtradaśakamekādhikaraṇatayā
yojitam ।।</p>
<p>pūrvaṃ parapuruṣaśabdasya brahmaṇi rūḍhatvāt brahmopāsyamityuktam । tadvadihāpyākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvāttasyaivopāsyatva-
mastviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<sutra>sū॰ ।। dahara uttarebhyaḥ ।। 14 ।।</sutra> asya <quote>‘atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ
puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo'sminnantarākāśastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam’</quote> ityādikaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra daharapuṇḍa-
rīke yo daharākāśaḥ śrutaḥ sa kiṃ bhūtākāśaḥ uta jīva āhosvitparamātmeti saṃśayaḥ । atrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍha-
tvāt bhūtākāśo vā brahmapuraśabdaśravaṇāt jīve puraśabdavācyaśarīrasvāmitvopapatterārāgropamitatvācca tasmindaharatvasyāpyupa-
patteśca jīvo vā syāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । uttarebhyo vākyaśeṣasiddhebhya ākāśasamānatvadyāvāpṛthivyadhiṣṭhānatvātmatvāpahatapāpma-
tvādihetubhyaḥ parameśvara eva daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo veti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p>daharākāśasya parabrahmatve hetvantaramāha---<sutra>sū॰ ।। gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathāhi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca ।। 16 ।।</sutra> <quote>‘imāssarvāḥ prajā
aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti’</quote> iti daharavākyaśeṣe jīvānāṃ pratyahamucyamānā prakṛtadaharaviṣayā yā gatiḥ yaśca
brahmalokaśabdastābhyāṃ daharasya parabrahmatāvagamyate । tathāhi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutyantare <quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavatī’</quote>ti । evaṃ ca pratyahaṃ
hiraṇyagarbhalokagamanāsaṃbhavāt brahmaiva loka iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaparigrahe aharahargamanameva liṅgaṃ jñāpakam । caśabdena niṣāda-
sthapatinyāyo'pi sāmānādhikaraṇyaparigrahe samuccīyata iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p>dahara parabrahmatve hetvantaramāha dvābhyām---<sutra>sū॰ ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syāsminnupalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।।</sutra> <quote>‘atha ya ātmā sa
seturvidhṛtireṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya’</quote> iti śrutāyā dhṛterapi hetoḥ <quote>‘eṣa bhūtapāla eṣaṃ seturvidharaṇa’</quote> ityādiśrutyantare'pi <pratika>asya</pratika>
sarvalokavidhāra/?/lakṣaṇamahimno'<pratika>sminpa</pratika>ramātmani upalabdheśca daharākāśaḥ paramātmaiva । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prasiddheśca ।। 17 ।।</pratika> daharākāśasyāpi paramātmanyeva prasiddheḥ lokarūḍhyapekṣayā <quote>‘ākāśo ha vai nāmarūpayornirvahitā’</quote>
ityādiśrautarūḍherbalīyastvācca daharākāśaḥ paramātmaiva na bhūtākāśa iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi jīvo'stvityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। itaraparāmarśātsa iti cennāsaṃbhavāt ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ya eṣa saṃprasāda’</quote> iti
saṃprasādaśabdena itarasya jīvasyāpyasminprakaraṇe parāmarśātsa jīvo daharākāśo'stviti cenna । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=jīve ākāśo-
pameyatvāpahatapāpmatvādīnāmasaṃbhavādityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>itthamabhihitasyāsaṃbhavasyāsiddhimāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū॰ ।। uttarāccedāvirbhūtasvarūpastu ।। 19 ।।</pratika> <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ya-
eṣo'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate’</quote> ityādi prajāpativākyāt jāgradādyavasthāpanne jīve apahatapāpmatvādessaṃbhavāt jīva eva daharākāśa
iti cet atrāha---<pratika>āvirbhūtasvarūpastu</pratika> । tuśabdo jīvaśaṃkāvyāvartakaḥ । yatastatrāpi āvirbhūtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ svarūpamasyeti
āvirbhūtasvarūpo jīvo vivakṣitaḥ । na tu jīvatvena rūpeṇa । <quote>‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> ityupasaṃhāradarśa-
nāt । atastasya brahmatvenāpahatapāpmatvādisaṃbhava iti jīvatvena tadasaṃbhavānna pūrvasūtrasthahetorasaṃbhavasyāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu tarhi saṃprasāda iti jīvaparāmarśo vyarthaḥ syādityata āha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> jīvaparāmarśaḥ
paraṃ <quote>‘jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate’</quote> ityupasaṃpattavyaparamātmapara eva na jīvapratipādanārtha ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>jīvapūrvapakṣamāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū॰ ।। alpaśruteriti cettaduktam ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘daharo'sminnantarākāśa’</quote> ityākāśa-
syālpatvaśravaṇānna paramātmatvaṃ kiṃ tu jīvatvamiti cet । <pratika>taduktam</pratika>=tatra samādhānamuktam <quote>‘arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācce’</quote>tyatra ।
tasmāddaharākāśaḥ paramātmaivopāsya iti siddham ।। <pratika>iti daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>athānukṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika> <pratika>sū॰ ।। anukṛtestasya ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ
nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto'yamagniḥ । tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti ।।’</quote> iti muṇḍakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
atra sūryādijagadbhāsakatayā pratīyamānaṃ kiṃ tejoviśeṣaḥ uta brahmeti saṃśayaḥ । prabalena tejasā durbalasyābhibhavadarśanāt tejo-
viśeṣa iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu <quote>‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarva’</quote>mityanubhānaśravaṇāt <quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti’</quote> iti
brahmabhāsā sarvasya jagato bhāsyatvāvagamācca sūryādisarvajagadbhāsakatayā pratīyamānaṃ brahmaivaṃ na tejoviśeṣaḥ iti । sūtrārthastu,
﻿<pb n="447"/>
<pratika>anukṛteḥ</pratika>=anukṛtiranukaraṇam । taramāt <quote>‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvami’</quote>tyanubhānāt । <pratika>tasya ca</pratika>=<quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vi-
bhāti’</quote> iti vākyācca tatra prakṛtaṃ sūryādisakalajagadavabhāsakaṃ svayaṃ jyotiḥ brahmaiva na tu laukikaṃ teja iti ।। <quote>‘na tatra
sūrya’</quote> ityatra <quote>‘tatra’</quote> iti na satisaptamī । kiṃ tu viṣayasaptamī । <quote>‘bhātī’</quote>ti ṇijadhyāhāreṇa bhāsayatītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>asmin śrutyuktārthe smṛtiṃ darśayitumāha---<sutra>sū॰ api ca smaryate ।। 23 ।।</sutra> <quote>‘na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ ।
yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama ।।’</quote> iti <quote>‘yadādityagataṃ tejo jagadbhāsayate'khilam । yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo
viddhi māmakam ।।’</quote> iti ca bhagavadgītāsu smaryata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti anukṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtradaśakamekamadhikaraṇam। viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ prāyassamānameva । sūtrārthavarṇana-
mātre kvacidasti kiyāniva bheda iti tādṛśeṣveva sūtreṣu sa evāṃśaḥ prastoṣyate iti nātra vistarasyāvakāśaḥ । parabrahmaṇaśśivasya
puriśayanamupāsanaṃ ca nirūpayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabdham । daharaśabdavācyaḥ parameśvara eva na bhūtākāśo nāpi jīva iti
siddhāntānusāreṇa pūrvamukte daharasūtrārthe nāsti viśeṣaḥ ।<pratika><quote>‘gatiśabdābhyā’</quote> miti</pratika> dvitīyasūtre paramasti kiyatīva bhidā ।
<pratika>tathāhi dṛṣṭam</pratika>=śrutyantare parameśvara eva evaṃ rūpaṃ gamanaṃ dṛṣṭam <quote>‘evameva khalu somyemāssatīḥ prajāssati saṃpadya na vidussati
saṃpatsyāmaha’</quote> iti । brahmalokaśabdaśca tasmindṛṣṭaḥ <quote>‘epa brahmalokassamrāḍiti hovāca’</quote> iti । <pratika>liṅgaṃ ca</pratika>=kiṃ ca । gatiśabdayo-
ranyatra darśanameva māstu । asminprakaraṇe sarvāsāṃ prajānāmaharahaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ gamanaṃ brahmalokaśabdaśca parameśvarasya daharākāśatve
paryāptaṃ gamakamityarthaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syāsminnupalabdheḥ ।। 1 ।।</pratika> <pratika>asya</pratika>=parameśvarasya । <pratika>dhṛteḥ</pratika>=jagadvidhṛtirūpasya śrutyantare'pi
pratipāditasya mahimnaḥ । <pratika>asmin</pratika>=daharākāśe । upalabdheśca daharākāśaḥ parameśvara ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prasiddheśca ।। 17 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘dahraṃ vipāpma’</quote> mityādinā mahopaniṣadi <quote>‘hṛtpuṇḍarīka’</quote> mityārabhya <quote>‘umāsahāya’</quote> mityādinā kaiva-
lyopaniṣadi ca umāsahāyasya parameśvarasya daharapuṇḍarīkamadhyavartitvenopāsyatvaprasiddheśca daharākāśaḥ parameśvara ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika><quote>‘itaraparāmarśātsa’</quote></pratika> iti sūtrārthassamāna eva । <pratika><quote>‘uttarācce’</quote></pratika> diti sūtrārthaḥ paraṃ kiyāniva bhidyate । <pratika>uttarā</pratika>tprajāpati-
vākyājjīvasyāpamahatapāpmatvādikasya pratītyā sa eva daharākāśo bhavatu iti cet । na yuktametat । yato'tra pratipādyo jīvaḥ
nijānādikarmabandhopārjitaśarīratirohitāpagatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ para jyotirupasaṃpadya paścādāvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ āvirbhūtāpahatayā-
pmatvādikaḥ khalu pratīyate । na saṃsārī । daharākāśasya svābhāvikātirohitatattatkalyāṇaguṇatayā atathābhūtayorbaddhamuktayojīvayo-
mīsti daharākāśatvaśaṅkāvakāśa iti tātparyam ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ ।।20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘asmāccharīrā’</quote>diti vākye jīvasya daharākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭaparajyotīrūpaparavastunā
saṃpadya svarūpāvirbhāvasyābhidhīyamānatayā tatratyo jīvaparāmarśaḥ daharākāśaniṣṭhatattādṛṅmāhātmyapratipādanārtha iti nāsti virodhaḥ ।
<pratika><quote>‘alpaśrute’</quote></pratika>riti sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat । <pratika>sū॰ ।। anukṛtestasya ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <pratika>tasya</pratika>=jīvasya । <pratika>anukṛteśca</pratika>=daharākāśaśabdani-
rdiṣṭaparajyotiranukaraṇācca na jīvo dahara ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘nainaṃ setumahorātra’</quote> ityādivākyaśeṣe daharākāśaṃ prāptasyāndhatvādyabhāvassa-
tatoditaprakāśatvaṃ cābhidhīyate । daharākāśasya tathātvāt । evaṃ ca daharākāśaṃ prāptasyoktaphalāvāptistatsāmyāpattirūpā tada-
nukṛtiriti siddhyati । sā ca bhede satyevopapadyeta । ataścāyaṃ daharo na jīva ityāśayaḥ । tasyeti kartariṣaṣṭhī । anuvṛttasya da-
harapadasya karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyantatayā vipariṇāmenānvaya iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>ukte'rthe pramāṇāntaramapyastītyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। apica smaryate ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘athavā paramātmāna’</quote>mityādinā brahmaṇaḥ daharapuṇḍa-
rīkāntarvartitvamupāsyatvaṃ ca smaryate । ataḥ parajyotissvarūpaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ paraśaktyumāsanāthaṃ paraṃ brahma daharapuṇḍarīkākāśamadhyava-
rti svābhāvikāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamupāsanīyamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>=asyādhikaraṇasya viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva । paramātmā paraṃ
nārāyaṇaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ । pūrvavatsūtradaśakātmakamevedamadhikaraṇam ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। prasiddheśca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ko hyevānyāt’</quote> sarvāṇi havā imāni’ityādiśrutivākyeṣu ākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇyeva prasiddheri-
tyarthaḥ । <pratika>sū॰ ।। anukṛtestasya ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <pratika>tasya</pratika>=paramātmanaḥ । <pratika>anukṛteśca</pratika>=tatsāmyāpattirūpādanukārācca । paramātma-
no'nukārādvi jīvasyāvirbhūtasvarūpasyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakatvam । ato'nukarturjīvādanukāryo daharaḥ pṛthagbhūta iti siddham ।
tatsāmyāpattirūpastadanukāraḥ <quote>‘niraṃjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti’</quote> iti śrutiprasiddha eva । iti ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। api smaryate ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘idaṃ jñānamupāśritya mama sādharmyamāgatāḥ । sarge'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca ।।’</quote>
iti tadupāsanāttatsāmyāpattirūpānukṛtirjīvasya smaryate cetyarthaḥ । śeṣaṃ samānaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamateneti saṃgrahaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyasaṃdehapūrvapakṣasinddhāntādikaṃ prāyaḥ matāntarasamānameva । kiṃ tu uddeśyaṃ paraṃ bhidyate <pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
dahara uttarebhyaḥ ।। 18 ।।</pratika> dahare uttarebhyaḥ iti padacchedaḥ । bhagavatpādamatavadihāpyadhikaraṇayojanetyaparo viśeṣaḥ । hṛtpadma-
sthadaharākāśasthatvaṃ viṣṇorasti vā nāstiveti saṃdihya nāstīti pūrvapakṣamākalayya bhūtākāśajīvayorasaṃbhavādviṣṇorasti iti si-
﻿<pb n="448"/>
atha pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
ataḥ parameśvarasyopāsyarūpāntaramucyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। śabdādeva pramitaḥ ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇasya prāsaṅgikīṃ saṅgatimāha---<pratika>ataḥ parameti</pratika> । pūrvādhikaraṇe parameśvarasya
hṛdaye kṛṣṇapiṅgalatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ rūpamupāsanārthamuktam । tatprasaṅgāttatra tasya rūpāntaramucyata
ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū. ।। śabdādeva pramitaḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘īśāno bhūtabhavyasye’</quote>tyatra viditve-
tyadhyāhāraḥ । aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣa uktaḥ । taṃ bhūtabhavyasyeśānaṃ viditvā tatastadanantaraṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ddhāntitam ।। sūtrārthastu, <pratika>dahare</pratika>=<quote>‘daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśme’</quote>tivākyoktahṛtpadmasthālpākāśe sthito viṣṇureva । na tu jīvādiḥ ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>uttarebhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘ya ātmāpahatapāpme’</quote>tyādyuttaravākyoktanirgatapāpmatvādidharmebhya ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>gatiśabdābhyāmityādi । gatiśabdābhyām</pratika>=asyārtho'viśiṣṭa eva । <pratika>tathāhi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca ।</pratika> kiṃ ca । yata’
<quote>‘araśca’</quote> iti śrutau <pratika>tathā</pratika>=suptaprāpyatvavat । <pratika>hi</pratika>=viṣṇuniṣṭhatvena prasiddham । <pratika>liṃgam</pratika>=arṇavākhyasudhāsamudrāśrayalokavattvarūpa-
jñāpakaṃ hṛtpadmasthe dṛṣṭamuktam । ato'pi daharapadmastho viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। dhṛteśca mahimno'syāsminnupalabdheḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika> <pratika>dhṛteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa eṣa seturvidhṛti’</quote> riti hṛtpadmasthasya sarvādhāratvaśra-
vaṇācca viṣṇureva hṛtpadmasthaḥ । kiṃ ca chāndogye hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayoktasya <pratika>asya</pratika> viṣṇumahimnaḥ sarveśvaratvādeḥ । <pratika>asmin</pratika>=<quote>‘eṣaṃ
sarveśvara’</quote> iti vājasaneyakavākye । upalabdheḥ=śravaṇāt । viṣṇureva hṛtpadmasthaḥ । <pratika>prasiddheśca ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘dahraṃ vipāpa’</quote>miti śrutau
viṣṇoḥ hṛtpadmasthatvaprasiddheśca sa eva hṛtpadmastha ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>itaraparāmarśādityādi । itaraparāmarśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> ityuktasya jīvasya hṛtpadmasthātmatayā ‘eṣa ātme-
tyetacchabdena parāmarśāt grahaṇāt jīva eva hṛtpadmastha iti cenna । kutaḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayā śrutānāmapahatapā-
pmatvādiguṇānāṃ jīve svātantryeṇāsaṃbhavādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>uttarāccedityādi</pratika> । tuśabda evārthe । neti śoṣaḥ । <pratika>uttarāt</pratika>= <quote>‘sa tatra paryetī’</quote>tyuttaravākyāt jīva eva hṛtpadmastha
iti cenna । yatastadvākye <pratika>āvirbhūtasvarūpastu</pratika>=mukta eva pratipādyaḥ । muktastu na svato'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ । ato na
tasyāpi hṛtpadmasthatvamityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। anyārthaśca parāmarśaḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> caḥ evārthe । parāmarśaḥ <quote>‘eṣa ātme’</quote> ti vākyagataitacchabdaḥ । <pratika>anyārtha-
śca</pratika>=<quote>‘paraṃ jyoti’</quote>rityuktaparamātmārtha eva । na jīvārtha ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>alpaśruterityādi</pratika> samānameba ।। <pratika>iti daharādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>athānukṛtyadhikaraṇam ।।</pratika> sū॰ ।। <pratika>anukṛtestasya ca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘tadetaditi manyante anirdeśyaṃ paraṃ sukham ।
kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti na bhāti vā ।।’</quote> kaṭhavallīmantro viṣayaḥ । atra <quote>‘kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyā’</quote> miti vākye liṅā
pratīyamānaṃ jñānārthaṃ prārthyamānarūpamānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇaṃ jñānisukhaṃ vā brahma veti saṃśayaḥ । napuṃsakaliṃgayostadetacchabdayorjñā-
nisukhaparāmarśitvāt jñānisukhamiti pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । upasaṃhāre<quote>‘na tatra sūrya’</quote> iti śrūyamāṇe mantre tatra, tam, tasyeti, ca tacchabdaiḥ
<quote>‘kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyā’</quote> miti prakṛtamānukūlyena gṛhmamāṇaṃ parāmṛśya tasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvādibrahmaliṃgānāmucyamānatvāt bala-
vadupasaṃhārasthabahuliṃgānusāreṇānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya sukhasya brahmatve niścite durbalopakramagatayostadetatpadayoḥ <quote>‘nityo nityānā’</quote>
miti prakṛte īśvara eva liṅgavyatyayena vṛttikalpanopapatteśca ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇamanirdeśyaṃ sukhaṃ brahmaiveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu
ccaḥ samuccaye । tasyeti śrutipratīkagrahaṇam । anukṛtiranukriyā । <quote>‘kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyā’</quote>miti jñānārthaṃ prārthitatvarūpānukūlyena
gṛhyamāṇaṃ brahmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>anukṛteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarva’</quote> miti vākyaśeṣe sūryādīnāṃ bhagavatkriyānusāriprakāśākhya-
kriyākartṛtvaśravaṇāt । <pratika>tasya ca</pratika>=<quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhātī’</quote>ti jagataḥ paramātmaprabhāprakāśyatvaśruteśca ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। api smaryate ।। 23 ।।</pratika> na kevalaṃ hetūkṛtānukṛtyāderviṣṇudharmatvaṃ śrūyate । kiṃ tu kṛṣṇādibhiḥ <quote>‘yadādityagataṃ teja’</quote>ityā-
dismṛtiṣu ca ucyata ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti anukṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</pratika></p>

kaṭhavallyāmasya viṣayaḥ śrūyate---
<quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo madhya ātmani tiṣṭhati । īśāno bhūtabhavyasya na tato vi-
jugupsate ।।’</quote>
ityādi । ihāṅguṣṭhamātratayā śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaro jīvo veti sandehaḥ ।।
jīva iti vaktuṃ yuktam---
<quote>‘sa viśvarūpastriguṇastrivartmā prāṇādhipaḥ saṃcarati svakarmabhiḥ । aṅguṣṭhamātro ra-
vitulyarūpaḥ saṃkalpāhaṃkārasamanvito yaḥ ।।’</quote>
iti tasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvaprasiddheḥ, <quote>‘madhya ātmani tiṣṭhati’</quote> iti dehāntarvartitvāva-
gamācca । na tu parameśvaro vyāpakaḥ ।।’

na vijugupsate ātmānaṃ gopāyituṃ necchati abhayaprāptatvādityarthaḥ । <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātratayā śrūya-
māṇa’</quote> iti saṃśayadharmiṇaḥ puruṣasya viśeṣaṇena jīva iti pūrvapakṣakoṭerbījaṃ sūcitam ।
parameśvara iti saṃbaṃdhyupanyāsenaiva bhūtabhavyeśitṛtvaliṅgaṃ siddhāntakoṭerbījaṃ sūcitam ।
<pratika>sa viśvarūpa iti</pratika> । viśvarūpaḥ paryāyeṇa devatiryaṅmanuṣyādisakalarūpabhāk । triguṇaḥ
satvādiguṇatrayavaśyaḥ । trivartmā jāgarasvapnasuṣuptilakṣaṇasāṃsārikamārgatrayasañcārī । prāṇādhipaḥ
sakalaprāṇendriyapravartakaḥ। sa pratyagātmā svakarmabhireva triṣu vartmasu sañcarati । idaṃ pūrvamantrasyo-
ttarārdham <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātra’</quote> ityuttaramantrasya jīvaviṣayatvasphuṭīkaraṇāya likhitam । ravitulyarū-
paḥ yathā ravistrailokyaprakāśaka evamayaṃ sthūlasūkṣmadehadvayaprakāśakaḥ । saṅkalpāhaṅkārasamanvitaḥ
mamedaṃ phalaṃ bhūyāttadarthamidaṃ sādhanamanuṣṭheyamityādyātmā saṅkalpaḥ, ahameteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā ta-
tphalānāṃ bhoktetyātmāhaṅkārastābhyāṃ samanvita iti । nanvaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ parameśvare'pi śrūyate ।
<quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo'ṅguṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ’</quote> iti mantro hi <quote>‘anavasthiterasambhavācca netara’</quote> <ref>(bra॰
1-2-18)</ref> ityadhikaraṇe parameśvaraparo nirṇītaḥ । satyam । so'pi mantro'ṅguṣṭhamātratvaśravaṇā-
deva jīvapara ityākṣipyate । aṅguṣṭhamātratvaśravaṇaṃ jīvāsādhāraṇamiti । etat <quote>‘atha satyavataḥ
kāyātpāśabandhavaśaṃgatam । aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa yamo balādi’</quote>ti bhāṣyaprayogādapi hi
niścīyate । tasmānmantrāntare'pyaṅguṣṭhamātratvaśravaṇaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ jīvaviṣayameveti pūrvapakṣiṇo'-
bhimānaḥ । nanu <quote>‘madhya ātmanī’</quote>ti jīvātmano'ṅguṣṭhamātrapuruṣasya bhedanirdeśātparameśvaraḥ syā-
dityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>madhya ātmanīti ।</pratika> na hyatrātmaśabdena jīvo'bhidhīyate । tasya madhyā-
bhāvāt । kiṃ tu deha eva । <quote>‘ātmā jīve dhṛtau dehe svabhāve paramātmanī’</quote>tyabhidhānakośadarśa-
nāt <quote>‘ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricarya’</quote> iti prajāpatividyāyāmātmaśabdasya dehe prayogada-
rśanācca । <quote>‘ihāpyūrdhaṃ prāṇamunnayatyapānaṃ pratyagasyati । madhye vāmanamāsīnaṃ viśvedevā upāsata’</quote>
ityagrimamantre prāṇāpānamadhyavartitvoktyā dehamadhyavartitvasyaiva lābhena tadanurodhā<quote>‘nmadhya ā-
tmanī’</quote>tyasyāpi dehamadhyaparatvasyaivāṅgīkartumucitatvācceti bhāvaḥ । na<quote>‘nvīśāno bhūtabhavyasye’</quote>ti
śrūyate ataḥ parameśvara evāṅguṣṭhamātrassyādityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>na tviti ।</pratika> nātreśānaśabdo brahma-
ṇo'bhidhāna śrutiḥ । <quote>‘bhūtabhavyasye’</quote>tyaiśvaryapratisambandhyupādānena tasya bhūtabhavyeśitṛtvarūpake-
valayaugikārthaparatvāt yogarūḍhimatāṃ śabdānāṃ yaugikārthapratisambandhyupādāne rūḍhyanunmeṣā-

iti prāpte---vadāmaḥ । parameśvara evāṅguṣṭhamātra iti yuktam; <quote>‘īśānobhūtabhavya-

t । ata eva <quote>‘padmāni yasyāgrasaroruhāṇi prabodhayatyūrdhvamukhairmayūkhai’</quote>riti saraḥpratisambandhya-
