padadvayasamabhivyāhārabodhyaṃ liṅgamātramasti । tattūpakramagatādaṅguṣṭhamātraśravaṇādda‍urbalam । upakra-
magatamapyaṅguṣṭhamātraśravaṇaṃ jīvasya na śrutiḥ । tatra tasya śabdasya rūḍhyabhāvāt । nāpyaṅguṣṭhamā-
tratvaṃ talliṅgam । atisūkṣmatvāttasminnaṅguṣṭhaparimāṇābhāvāt । kiṃ tu śākhāntare jīve prayukta-
syāṅguṣṭhamātraśabdasyātra pratyabhijñānamātraṃ pramāṇatvena vaktavyam । tattu śākhādvayaparāmarśāpe-
kṣam । tena ativilambitamityupasaṃhāragatamapi bhūtabhavyeśitṛtvaliṅgaṃ tato balavaditi cet mai-
vam । aṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ jīvaliṅgameva । aṅguṣṭhamātraśabdena hi aṅguṣṭhādhikaparimāṇavyavacchedaḥ kri-
yate । na tvaṅguṣṭhaparimāṇamapi vidhīyate । ekasya śabdasyobhayatra tātparyāyogāt । ata evā-
gnoṣomīyapaśāvadhrigupraiṣe chāgasya paśoḥ pārśvadvayagatānāmasthnāṃ vaṅkiśabdavācyānāmiyattāpra-
kāśakasya <quote>‘ṣaḍviṃśatirasya vaṅkya’</quote> iti mantrasya aśvamedhapaśāvaśve codakaprāptasya tatprakaraṇām‍note-
na <quote>‘catustriṃśadvājino devabandhorvaṅkīraśvasya svadhitissametī’</quote>ti mantreṇāpavādaprasaktau tadapavā-
dārthena <quote>‘ṣaḍviṃśatirityeva brūyā’</quote>diti vākyenaiva nirākṛṣṭaśaktitayā ṣaḍviṃśatimantrādanyasya catu-
striṃśanmantrasya vyavaccheda eva kriyate । na tu ṣaḍviṃśatiriti brūyādityapi vidhīyate । ṣa-
ṅviṃśatimantrastu tatra codakāpavāde niraste codanādeva prāpyate । ataṣṣaḍviṃśatipadayukta
eva sa mantro'śvamedhe vaktavya ityatra pramāṇābhāvādaśvasya catustriṃśato vaṅkrīṇāṃ tena
sahānuṣṭheyatūparagomṛgayorvaṅkrīṇāṃ ca samasya vacanarūpasyāsya na bādha iti nirūpitaṃ
pūrvatantre navamādhyāye । nanvaṅguṣṭhamātra ityatra mātraśabdaḥ <quote>‘pramāṇe dvayasac‌daghnac‌mātraca’</quote>
iti<ref>(pā॰5—2.37)</ref>sūtreṇānuśiṣṭaḥ pramāṇavācī pratyayaḥ । na tu <quote>‘śarīramātreṇa nare-
ndra tiṣṭhannābhāsi tīrthapratipāditārddhi’</quote> rityatrevottarapadatvaniyataṃ prātipadikam ।
tathā satyaṅguṣṭhamātraparimāṇa ityarthalābhāyāṅguṣṭhaśabdasyāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇa ityarthalakṣaṇāpatteriti
cenmaivam । aṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvasya jīveśvarayorubhayorapi bādhitatvena pakṣadvaye'pi tathārthagrahaṇasya
viruddhatvāt udāhṛtaśvetāśvataramantrottarasandarbhavirodhāpatteśca । tasyaiva hi mantrasya caturtha-
pāde <quote>‘ārāgramātro hyavaro'pi dṛṣṭaḥ’</quote> iti jīvasyārāgramātratvamuktam । <quote>‘vālāgraśatabhāgasye’</quote>-
ti tadanantaramantre vālāgrayutāṃśaikadeśapramāṇatvaṃ jīvasyoktam । kathaṃ tathā sūkṣmaparimāṇaḥ syāt
kathaṃ cārāgraparimāṇo'ṅguṣṭhaparimāṇaḥ syāt । tasmādaṅguṣṭhamātra ityaṅguṣṭhādhikaparimāṇavyava-
cchedaḥ । tato'ṅguṣṭhaparimāṇavattvaprasaktāvārāgramātra ityārāgrādhikaparimāṇavyavacchedaḥ puna-
rārāgrasamaparimāṇavattvaprasaktau <quote>‘vālāgraśatabhāgasye’</quote>tyanenātyantasūkṣmatvapratipādanamiti
yuktam । tasmādihopakramagatasyāṅguṣṭhādhikaparimāṇabhāvavattvarūpasya jīva eva sambhavāt
caramaśrutaṃ bhūtabhavyeśitṛtvaṃ bhūtabhaviṣyadanekaśarīraniyantṛtvaparatayā jīva eva yojanīyamiti
pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ। <pratika>parameśvaraliṅgaśabdāditi ।</pratika> bhūtabhavyaśabdayoḥ prakaraṇopapadādisaṅko-
﻿<pb n="451"/>
kathaṃ parameśvare paricchinnatvamabhyasyāmānamupapadyata ityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। hṛdyapekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
aparicchinnasyāpi parameśvarasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvamupāsakahṛdayāpekṣayā, manuṣyādhi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
cakābhāvena asaṅkucitabhūtabhaviṣyadvastujātaparatvāttanniyantṛtvaṃ parameśvaraliṅgam । īśānaśa-
bdaścābhidhānaśrutirūpastasya śabda iti । tasmādubhayasmātpramāṇāt aṅguṣṭhaparimitaḥ parameśvaraḥ
sidhdyatītyuktibhaṅgyā śabdavyatirekeṇānyadapi tatrārthe pramāṇamastīti sūcitam । tadāviṣkṛtaṃ
bhāṣye liṅgaśabdena । na ca yaugikārthapratisambandhyupādānādīśānaśabdasya śrutitvabhaṅgaśśaṅkanī-
nīyaḥ । tadupādāne'pi rūḍhaśabdaśravaṇaprayuktasya rūḍhyarthonmeṣasyānivāryatvāt । kāvyeṣu tu
vyaṅgyārthapradhāneṣu yasya śabdasya yaugikārtho vyañjanavyāpārānukūlaḥ taṃ śabdaṃ yaugikārtha
evopakṣīṇaṃ kṛtvā tadīyarūḍhyarthasamarthanārthaṃ kvacitkvacitpadāntaramupādadate । tatra padāntaropā-
dānaṃ yaugikārthapratisambandhyupādānasya rūḍhyarthonmeṣavirodhitvaprayuktam । tadanupādāne'pi
<quote>‘tava prasādātkusumāyudho'pi sahāyamekaṃ madhumeva labdhvā । kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇerdhai-
ryacyutiṃ ke mama dhanvino'nya’</quote> ityatra taddarśanāt । atra hi kaimutikanyāyopayogisāratarā-
yudhatvavyañjanānukūle yaugikārtha eva pinākapāṇiśabdamupakṣīṇaṃ kṛtvā tadrūḍhiviṣayaśivasa-
marpaṇāya padāntaraṃ prayuktam । evamihāpi himavadaunnatyavyañjanānukūlayaugikārthasamarpaṇavyagraṃ
saroruhapadamiti tadrūḍhyarthabodhanāya padmapadaṃ prayuktamityuktamityupapadyate । kiṃ ca yasya yogarūḍhyo-
pāsya tadalabhyaṃ kasyacidavayavārthasya viśeṣakamupapādyate yathā <quote>‘padmāni yasyāgrasaroruhāṇī’</quote>ti
yathā vā <quote>‘lapanaṃ padmamevāsyā lāvaṇyasarasīruha’</quote>miti tatpadaṃ tadviśeṣitayaugikārthavaśīkṛta-
miti tenāpi hetunā tatra rūḍhyunmeṣo na bhavatīti vaktuṃ śakyam । iha tu saṅkocakābhāvādī-
śānapadayaugikārthatayā tallabdha evārtho <quote>‘bhūtabhavyasye’</quote>tyanenānūdyata iti nātra tadanunmeṣaśaṅkā-
vakāśaḥ । pūrvapakṣabījamudbhāvya tatparihāraparatvenottarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>kathamiti । abhya-
syamānamiti ।</pratika> <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo jyotirivādhūmakaḥ । īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evā dya sa
u śva’</quote> ityagrimamantre <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhāmātraḥ puruṣo'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye sanniviṣṭaḥ । taṃ
svāccharīrātpravṛhenmuñjādiveṣikāṃ dhairyeṇa taṃ vidyāt śukramamṛta’</quote>mityagrimakhaṇḍāntamantre ca
śrūyamāṇamaṅguṣṭhamātraśabdoktaṃ paricchinnatvamabhyasyamānatvāt nānyathā netavyamiti bhāvaḥ। <quote>‘a-
bhyasyamāna’</quote>mityanenā<quote>‘ṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo'ntarātme’</quote>ti mantrasyāpi smaraṇāt । tatra taṃ svāccha-
rīrātpravṛhe’dityetaccharīrādviviktatayā jñātavyatvaparamiti jīvaliṅgāntaramapi dhvanitam<pratika>।।sū. ।।
hṛdyapekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātra’</quote> ityanenāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvamu-
cyate । na tu tadadhikaparimāṇābhāvaḥ । aṅguṣṭhaśabdasya prāguktarītyā lakṣaṇāpatteḥ । sambha-
vati ca vyāpakasyāpi parameśvarasyopāsakahṛdayāpekṣayāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvam । daharaśāṇḍilyavidya-
yoratisaukṣmyavacanaṃ hṛdayordhvasuṣirāpekṣayā idaṃ tu hṛdayamadhyāvakāśāpekṣayeti na vi-
rodha ityabhipretyāha---<pratika>aparicchinnasyāpīti। hṛdayāpekṣayeti</pratika>। sūtre <quote>‘hṛdī’</quote>ti viṣayasaptamīti
bhāvaḥ । nanu hṛdayāpekṣayāpyaṅguṣṭhamātratvamanupapannam । hastimaśakādīnāṃ hṛdayaparimāṇa-
bhedāt । na ca tattadaṅguṣṭhaparimāṇaṃ grāhyam । kharaturagādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvādityāśaṅkāparihārārthaṃ
﻿<pb n="452"/>
kāratvādupāsanāśāstravidheḥ । manuṣyāṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ yāvatpramāṇaṃ tadavacchinnaṃ rūpaṃ para
meśvaraḥ paramakāruṇikaḥ parigṛhṇāti tadupāsanāsiddhaye । tataḥ parameśvaro jyoti-
rmayo liṅgarūpatayopāsakānāṃ hṛdayamadhye tiṣṭhatīti nirṇayaḥ ।।
।। iti pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sādhyāhāraṃ sūtraśeṣamupādāya tasya tātparyamāha—<pratika>manuṣyādhikāratvādityādinā । liṅgarū-
peti</pratika> । aṅguṣṭhasamānākāratvaṃ liṅgabhāva eva sambhavati । prasiddhaṃ ca purāṇāgameṣu śivasya
liṅgarūpeṇa hṛdi sannidhānam । ato liṅgarūpa evātra vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ । na<quote>‘nvattā carāca-
ragrahaṇā’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1-2-10)</ref>> dityadhikaraṇe <quote>‘prakaraṇā’</quote>diti <ref>(bra॰ 1-2-12)</ref>sūtreṇa kaṭhavallīṣu pra-
karaṇaṃ brahmaparamityuktam । kathaṃ tadantargatasyāṅguṣṭhamantrasya jīvaparatvamiti pūrvapakṣāvakāśaḥ ।
ucyate । ānumānikādhikaraṇe <quote>‘trayāṇāmeva caiva’</quote>miti <ref>(bra॰ 1-4-6)</ref> sūtreṇa trayāṇāmupāsa-
kopāsanīyatadupāsanānāṃ kaṭhavallīṣu praśnaprativacanābhyāṃ nirūpaṇamiti vakṣyate । tathā ca <quote>‘mahā-
ntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocatī’</quote>tyādiprākaraṇikapūrvāparamantragatabrahmaśrutiliṅgānāmu-
pāsanīyabrahmaṇyanvayaḥ । ayaṃ tu mantro <quote>‘yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehina’</quote> ityādika-
ṭhavallayantargatamantravadupāsakapraśnottaratayā jīvaparassyāditi pūrvapakṣotthānam । atra prākaraṇi-
kabrahmaliṅgānāṃ spaṣṭatve'pi pūrvapakṣe teṣāmanyatrānvaya iti spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā । nanu <quote>‘yo-
nimanye prapadyanta’</quote> iti mantrāntaravadasyāpi mantrasyopāsakaparatve'pi prakaraṇasyopāsyātayā pradhā-
ne brahmaṇi paryavasānaṃ na hīyata iti nāstyadhikaraṇasya prayojanam । ucyate । pūrvapakṣe sarve-
ṣāmaṅguṣṭhavākyānāṃ jīvaparatvāt hṛdi jyotirliṅgarūpaḥ parameśvara upāsanīyo na sidhdyati ।
siddhānte tva<quote>‘ṅguṣṭhamātro ravitulyarūpa’</quote> ityādiṣu jīvaparatvena sampratipanneṣu mantreṣvaṅguṣṭhamātraśa-
bdasya jīvaparatve'pi brahma śrutiliṅgavatsu mantreṣu śrutasya tasya brahmaparatvātsā siddhyatītyasti pra-
yojanam । nanu jīvaparamantreṣvaṅguṣṭhamātraśabdasyāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇatvaṃ nārthaḥ bādhāt kiṃtu aṅguṣṭhā-
dhikaparimāṇābhāva iti brahmaparatvābhimateṣvapi mantreṣu tathaikarūpyāya sa evārthaḥ syāt। neti brūmaḥ।
ekasyāpi veśeṣaṇaśabdasya viśeṣyabhedena tattaducitārthagrahaṇopapatteḥ<quote>‘sthūlo vidvāndevadatta’</quote>ityatra
devadattātmani tadapṛthagbhūtaviśeṣasya śarīrasthaulyasya sadvārakānvayavajjīvāpṛthagbhūtahṛdayāvaccheda-
kṛtasaṅkocaśālidharmajñānagatāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇasya jīve sadvārakānvayasyopapattyā jīvaparavākye'-
pyaṅguṣṭhamātra ityasyāṅguṣṭhamātra ityarthagrahaṇopapatteśca । etenā<quote>‘rāgramātra’</quote> ityetadipa vyākhyātam ।
nāḍyavacchedaprayuktasaṅkocadharmajñānaparimāṇasya sadvārakānvayo vivakṣita iti tatrāpi vaktuṃ śa-
kyatvāt ।।</p>
<head>।। iti pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। śabdādeva pramitaḥ ।। 23 ।। hṛdyapekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
aṅguṣṭhapramitaḥsyājjīvo maivaṃ sa bhūtapatireva । nissaṅkocaiśvaryāttatvādīśānaśabdācca ।। 61 ।।
<head>iti pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="453"/>
<head>atha devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<quote>‘manuṣyādhikāratvāt’</quote> ityasminnadhikaraṇe manuṣyāṇāmeva parameśvaropāsane'dhi-
kārassūcitaḥ । kathaṃ devānāmapi parameśvaraviṣayamupāsanaṃ śrūyate'tharvaśirasi, <quote>‘ta-
to devā rudraṃ nāpaśyaṃste devā rudraṃ dhyāyanti’</quote> ityatretyāśaṅkāyāṃ tadupapādanāyā-
dhikaraṇamidamāramyate---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇasya prāsaṅgikīṃ saṅgatimāha---<pratika>manuṣyādhikāratvāditi ।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇa-
sūtre manuṣyagrahaṇena taditareṣāmadhikāro nāstīti jñāpitatvāt devāḥ parameśvaropāsanāyāma-
dhikāriṇo na bhavantīti siddham । <quote>‘tataste devā rudraṃ dhyāyantī’</quote> tyarthavādaḥ kevalamasadarthāvala-
mbanastutipara iti prāptau teṣāmadhikāropapādanārthamuttarādhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ । eṣā prā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। śabdādeva pramitaḥ ।। 24 ।। hṛdyapekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate, ।। sū ।। śabdādeva pramitaḥ ।। 24 ।।</pratika> asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo madhya ātmani ti-
ṣṭhati’</quote> <quote>‘aṃguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo jyotirivādhūmakaḥ । īśāno bhūtabhavyasya’</quote> ityādi kaṭhavallīvākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । ihāṃguṣṭhavākyapratipādyaḥ
jīvātmā vā paramātmā veti saṃśayaḥ । parimāṇopadeśāt śarīrāntarvartitvopadeśācca jīvātmeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, <pratika>pramitaḥ</pratika>=
aṃguṣṭhamātraparimāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdādeva</pratika>=<quote>‘īśāno bhūtabhavyasye’</quote>tyatra īśānaśabdāt । na cāṃguṣṭhamātrajīva-
liṃgavirodhaḥ । liṃgaśrutyorvirodhe śrutereva balīyastvamiti maryādāyā evaśabdena sūcyamānatvāt । na ca paramātmano'ṅguṣṭhamātratvā-
nupapattiḥ । aṃguṣṭhamātrajīvānuvādena brahmābhedabodhanāditi ।।</p>
<p>kathaṃ punassarvagatasya paramātmanaḥ parimāṇopadeśa ityata āha---<pratika>sū॰ । hṛdyapekṣayā tumanuṣyadhikāratvāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika>
tuśabdaḥ śaṃkānirāsārthaḥ । manuṣyādhikāratvācchāstrasya manuṣyāṇāṃ hṛdayasyāṃguṣṭhamātratvāt hṛdi vartamānatvātparamātmanastadapekṣayā
sarvagatasyātmano'ṅguṣṭhamātratvamaviruddham । ato'ṅguṣṭhavākye pratipādyaḥ paramātmaiveti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ</pratika> viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ samānameveti na puthakprapañcyate । śrīkaṇṭhamate,
<pratika>śabdāt</pratika>=sarveśvaratvādiparameśvaraliṃgāt īśānaśabdācca ityartho varṇita iti viśeṣaḥ। rāmānujamate asyādhikaraṇasya nātra parisa-
māptiḥ। asyādhikaraṇasya garbhe adhikaraṇatrayasya prāsaṃgikasya vicārastato'sya parisamāptiritiasādhāraṇo'dhikaraṇaracanāviśe-
ṣaśceti bodhyam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ samānameva । atra īśānanāmokto vāyurvā viṣṇurvā iti saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘ūrdhvaṃ prāṇa-
munnayatyapānaṃ pratyagasyati । madhye vāmanamāsīnaṃ viś‍ve devā upasate’</quote>iti tadanantaramantre prāṇavyavasthāpakatvādivāyuliṃgaśravaṇāt
īśānaśabdapravṛttinimittasya prerakatvasya sattvāt tasyaiva sarvottamatvavirodhimadhyamatvaprasiddheśca vāyuriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । rāddhāntastu,
niravakāśādviṣṇau rūḍhādvāmanaśabdāt sarvavyavasthāpake sarvopāsye ca viṣṇau prāṇavyavasthāpakatvādevopāsyatvayorapi sattvāt upāsa-
nādhikārimanuṣyahṛdayābhivyaktasya bhagavanmūrtiviśeṣasyāṃguṣṭhamātraparimāṇatvādvā sthānaparimāṇasya sthānini tasminnupacārādvā
aṃguṣṭhamātratvasya tasminnupapatteḥ madhyadeśarūpahṛdayāvasthitisaṃbhavācca īśānaśabdavācyo viṣṇureva iti । sūtrārthastu viṣṇureva <pratika>prami-
taḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘īśāno bhūtabhavyasya’</quote>itīśānaśabdavācyatvena tatvato niścitaḥ । na tu vāyuḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>śabdādeva</pratika>=<quote>‘madhye vāmana’</quote>miti nira-
vakāśavāmanaśruterevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। hṛdyapekṣayā tu manuṣyādhikāratvāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> tuśabda evārthe, apiśabdārthe ca । tathā ca sarvagatasyāpi vi-
ṣṇoḥ aṅguṣṭhamātratvoktiḥ aṅguṣṭhaparimitahṛdākāśāpekṣayaiva । na tāvatā viṣṇoḥ paricchinnatvaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ pramitādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="454"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ saṃbhavāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
asyātharvaśirasi śrūyate <quote>‘te devā rudraṃ dhyāyanti’</quote> iti viṣayaḥ ।।
iha parameśvaropāsane devānāmadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati na veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
na saṃbhavatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । arthī samartho vidvān śāstreṇāparyudasto hi vaidike ka-
rmaṇyadhikārī । na ca teṣāṃ sāmarthyamasti, vigrahābhāvāt । vigrahavanto hi
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṅgikī saṅgatiḥ । buddhisthasyopekṣānarhatvaṃ prasaṅgaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ sambha-
vāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> devānāmarthitvasāmarthyādisambhavāsambhavau saṃśayakoṭyorbījamityabhipretya saṃśayaṃ
darśayati---<pratika>iheti । vigrahābhāvāditi ।</pratika> na tāvaddevatānāṃ vigrahe pratyakṣādi pramāṇamasti ।
na ca devatāvāciśabdānāṃ laukikavaidikaprayogeṣu strīpratyayataddhitaprakṛtitayā prātipadikatvenā-
rthavattvāvaśyaṃbhāvāttatsiddhiḥ । teṣvādityādigrahavācināmaśvinyādinakṣatravācināmanyeṣāṃ ca ke-
ṣāñcidacetairnagaganaparidṛśyapānajyotirmaṇḍalarūpairarthairarthavattvasampratipatteḥ । nakṣatreṣṭiyājyānuvā-
kyāsu kvāpikvācidi<quote>‘ndrojyeṣṭhāmanunakṣatrameti’</quote> ityādau jyeṣṭhādinakṣatrāṇāmindrādidevatābhedani-

nu vyavasthitaikārtharāhityarūpamanityatvaṃ mantrāṇāṃ na doṣaḥ । <quote>‘kadā cana starīrasi’</quote>ityādimantrā-

tvalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ taccoditakarmaṇāmananuṣṭhānaṃ ca syādityarthaḥ । tasmādaprāmāṇyādidoṣapa-

mindrādiśabdānāṃ jātivācitvaṃ tatra hetutvena vivakṣitamiti darśayati—<pratika>yadīndrādiśabdā-

nāmindrādiśabdaprabhavatvaṃ heturityāśaṅkya tasya tatra hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭāntamukhenopapādayati—<pratika>yathā
kulāla iti</pratika> । śabdenārthasmṛtisāpekṣā sṛṣṭiḥ straṣṭavyārthasya smaryamāṇārthasamānākṛtitva eva
loke dṛṣṭā । tathā ca brahmā vaidikādindrādyākṛtiviśeṣapratipādakācchabdātpūrvendrādyākṛtivi-

vedaśabdebhya evādau pṛthaksaṃsthāśca nirmame’ ।। ityādiḥ smṛtiḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। ata eva ca nityatvam ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
ata eva <quote>‘mantrakṛto vṛṇīte’</quote> <quote>‘viśvāmitrasya sūktaṃ bhavati’</quote> iti viśvāmitrā-
dīnāṃ mantrakṛttve'pi viśvāmitrādiśabdānāmākṛtinimittatvena mantrabrāhmaṇa-
mayasya vedasya nityatvamupapadyate । yato brahmā vaidikāt śabdāt arthaṃ smṛtvā sṛjati।
anadhītamantrādidarśanaśaktatvāt । tathā ca pūrvaviśvāmitrādīnāmākṛtiviśeṣāṃ-

tasteṣāṃ mantrādikartṛtvaṃ vedanityatvaṃ ca ।।
bhavatvevaṃ naimittikapralaye, prākṛtapralaye brahmādau vedākhyaśabde sa vinaṣṭe

diśabdena <quote>‘nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kṛtyānāṃ ca prapañcanam। vedaśabdebhya evādau devādīnāṃ cākāra

pūrvakalpasthitaviśvāmitrādināmarūpakṛtyaviśeṣānanusandhāya tathaiva sṛṣṭatvalābhe sati atī-
tavartamānakalpagatāssarve'pi viśvamitrādayaḥ viśvāmitrādipadaprāpakapūrvakalpānuṣṭitapuṇyavaśā-
dviśvāmitrasūktādīnanadhītyaiva paśyantīti tattatsūktādidraṣṭṭatvameva tattatkartṛtvaṃ na tvapūrvānupūrvī-

kathaṃ vedanityatvamityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। samānanāmarūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanāt smṛteśca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
sūjyānāṃ samānanāmarūpatvādeva prākṛtapralayāvṛttāvapyavirodhaḥ । tathā hi—
sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ viśvādhikaḥ parameśvara ādikartā pūrvaprapañcasaṃsthānaṃ smṛtvā
tadākārameva punaḥ prapañcaṃ sṛjati । vedānapi pūrvānupūrvīviśiṣṭān anusmṛtya putrabhū-
tāya brahmaṇe prayacchati । kathamavagamyate?śrutyā smṛtyā ca।<quote>‘sūryācandramasau dhātā yathā-
pūrvamakalpayat । divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho suvaḥ ।।’</quote> <quote>‘yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti
pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai’</quote> ।। ityādiḥ śrutiḥ । smṛtirapi <quote>‘apa eva sasa-
rjādau tāsu vīryamavāsṛjat । tadaṇḍamabhavaddhaimaṃ sahasrāṃśusamaprabham ।। tasmin
jajñe svayaṃ brahmā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ । brahmāṇaṃ vidadhe pūrvaṃ vedānasmai prayacchati ।।’</quote>
ityādiḥ । tataḥ prākṛtapralayāvṛttāvapi vedānāṃ nityatvameva ।।

vedanityatvamanupapannamiti śaṅkābhiprāyaḥ <pratika>।। sū. ।। samānanāmarūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavi-
rodho darśanātsmṛteśca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> prākṛtapralaye vedānāmabhāvena svarūpato vedanityatvānupapa-
ttirāśaṅkyate cediṣṭāpattiḥ ।<quote>‘asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitamevaitadyadṛgvedo yajurvedassāmavedaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘chandāṃsi jajñire tasmādyajustasmādajāyata’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu mahadahaṅkārādivatteṣāmapi sṛṣṭi-
śravaṇāt । ekarūpavarṇapadavākyatadānupūrvīkatvalakṣaṇe tu nityatve na virodhaḥ । avāntarakalpe-
ṣviva mahākalpāvṛttāvapi sṛjyānāṃ samānanāmarūpatvasya śrutismṛtibhyāmavagamāt ityabhipretya
sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>sṛjyānāmiti</pratika> । nanūdāhṛtaśrutismṛtyoravāntarakalpaviṣayatvopapatteruktahetura-
siddha ityāśaṅkya tamupapādayati—<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> । <quote>‘yo brahmāṇa’</quote> miti śrutiravāntarakalpaviṣa-
yatvena yojayituṃ na śakyate, tatra brahmasṛṣṭerabhāvāt । tataśca tasyā mahākalpaviṣayatvena tatra
varṇyamānaṃ brahmaṇe vedatadarthapradānaṃ śilpinyāyena pūrvakalpagatendrādināmarūpavaibhavāni vaidikebhyo
mantrārthavādebhyo'vagatyendrādīnayaṃ sṛjatvityetadabhiprāyeṇeti samānanāmarūpatvasiddhistato veda-
nityatvasiddhiścetyāśayaḥ । nanu, mahākalpādau tatkālasṛṣṭyupayogyabhinavadevādināmarūpaprati-
pādakamantrārthavādayuktapūrvakalpavilakṣaṇavarṇapadavākyatadānupūrvīyuktānvedānnirmāya brahmaṇe prāya-
cchaditi mantrārthavarṇane'pi brahmaṇe vedapradānasya tatkālasṛṣṭyarthatvamupapadyata iti kutasteṣāṃ samā-

yathāvidhi tattadbhāvaprāptisaṅkalpapūrvakamanuṣṭhitāni ta eva mahāpralayānantarabhāvinyāmapi sṛṣṭyā-

bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyatī’</quote> tyādinā । tataśca vasvādīnāṃ svasvopāsyatvāsa-

madhuvidyādiṣu vasvādidevānāmevopāsyatvāt (1vasutvādīnāmeva) prāpyatvācca
vasvādīnāṃ kartṛkarmabhāvavirodhenāpāsyatvāsaṃbhavāt vasvādīnāṃ satāṃ vasvāditvaṃ
prāptamiti prāpyatvāsaṃbhavācca tatra vasvādīnāmanadhikāraṃ jaiminirmanyate ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘taṃ devā jyotiṣāṃ jyotirāyurhopāsate'mutam’</quote> iti jyotiṣi parabrahmaṇi devā-

sūtraṃ yojayati—<pratika>madhuvidyādiṣviti</pratika> । nanu, madhuvidyāyāṃ madhvāśritānamṛtaviśeṣānupajīvatāṃ
vasvādīnāmantaryāmiṇaḥ upāsanāni vidhīyante na tu vasvādīnāmeva । <quote>‘ya etāmevaṃ brahmopa-
niṣadaṃ vede’</quote>ti brahmavidyātvenopasaṃhāradarśanāt । brahmavidyāyāṃ ca na svātmano'pi brahmabhāvo
doṣaḥ । sarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsu <quote>‘ahaṃ brahmāsmī’</quote> tyanusandhānasampratipatteḥ । nāpi vasvā-
dīnāṃ satāṃ vasvādiprāptavyaphalatvābhāvo doṣaḥ । iha janmani putrādimatāṃ janmāntare'pi
putrādayassantvityāśaṃsanavadiha kalpe vasvādīnāmeva satāṃ kalpāntare'pi vasutvādikamastvi-
tyāśaṃsanopapatteḥ । vasvādīnāmevopāsyatve'pi na doṣaḥ । bhūmavidyāmadhyagatāyāṃ prāṇavidyāyāṃ
svasya svopāsyatvasampratipattyā tadvadeva vasvādīnāmeva bhāvivasutvādiprepsayā vasvādyupāsa-
nopapatteriti ceducyate । evaṃ pūrvapakṣī manyate । <quote>‘vasūnāmevaiko bhūtve’</quote> tyādiṣu madhuvidyopā-
sakānāṃ na vasvādibhāvaḥ phalamucyate kiṃ tu vasvādisthānaprāptipūrvakaṃ tattadbhogasāmyaṃ yathā-
smadbhrātṝṇāṃ madhye tvameka iti laukikoktau bhrātṛbhirbhogasāmyam । anyathā madhuvidyopāsa-
kānāṃ prāyaṇānantaraṃ vasvādibhāvaprāptau <quote>‘aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā’</quote> ityādiśrutisiddhavasvā-
disaṅkhyātirekaprasaṅgāt । dṛṣṭaṃ ca <quote>‘vaiṣṇavaṃ vāmanamālabheta spardhamāna’</quote> iti vidhiśeṣasya <quote>‘vi-
ṣṇureva bhūtvemām̐llokānabhijayatī’</quote>tyarthavādasya viṣṇuvajjetṛtvamātraparatvam । evaṃ ca <quote>‘yathākratura-
smim̐lloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavatī’</quote>ti tatkratunyāyena<quote>‘etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyatī’</quote>tyuktā-
yā vasvādibhogasāmyaprāpteruktarūpāmṛtabhoktṛvasvādyupāsanāphalatvasyaiva vaktavyatvādvasvādaya e-
vātropāsyāḥ।<quote>‘brahmopaniṣada’</quote>miti tu vedopaniṣadamiti vyākhyeyam।na caivamapi prāṇavidyoktanyā-
yena vasvādīnāṃ tadupāsanāyāmadhikārassyāditi vācyam । tadupāsanayā tadbhogasāmyaprāptesta-
tprītidvāratvasyautsargikatvena vasvādiṣu prīṇayitṛtvaprīṇanīyatvalakṣaṇakartṛkarmabhāvavirodhāpa-
tteḥ । na hi svayameva svātmānaṃ prīṇayitvā prītātsvasmātphalaṃ labhata ityasti sambhavaḥ । prāṇa-
vidyayā tu parameśvaraprītidvārayaiva phalalābhaḥ । na hi tatropāsyasamabhogaprāptiphalaśravaṇamasti ।
yena tatropāsyaprītirdvāraṃ kalpyeteti । bhāṣye <quote>‘vasvāditvaṃ prāpta’</quote>mityasya vasvādīnāṃ yo bhoga-
stadvattvaṃ prāptamityarthaḥ । ata eva prā<quote>‘gvasvādidevatānāmevopāsyatvāt prāpyatvācce’</quote>tyatra
vasvādīnāmeva prāpyatvamuktaṃ na tu vasutvādīnām । kartṛkarmabhāvavirodho'tra prīṇayitṛprīṇanīya-
bhāvo vivakṣitaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 31 ।। sādhāraṇyena prāptatve'pīti</pratika> ।

prāptatve'pītyarthaḥ । anena<quote>‘taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyoti’</quote>rityasyārthavattvāya parisaṅkhyāparatvamabhyupa-

rahitasūkṣmādityāntarātmatayā'vasthitaṃ kāraṇāvasthaṃ brahmopāsyamupadiśyate।tadubha-

iti ślokasya yogināṃ vidyāṅgatayānudinasmartavyāyāmarcirādigatau tātparyaṃ vakṣyati । na
cāgnyādyativāhikadevatāgaṇayuktagatyanusmaraṇamagnyādita upari sthitānāmādityādīnāṃ sambha-
vati।na cāgnyādīnāmātivāhikā anye'gnyādayassanti <quote>‘yāvadadhikāramavasthitirādhikārikā-
ṇā’</quote>mityadhikaraṇoktanyāyena kalpāvasāne mucyamāneṣu teṣu bhāvikāle srakṣyamāṇānāmanyeṣāma-
gnyādīnāmabhāvāt । tathā ca yathā devatānāmuddeśyadevatāntarābhāvena yāganivṛttyasambhavā-
t kalpādau sṛṣṭānāmṛṣīṇāṃ varaṇīyaṛṣyantarābhāvena ārṣeyavaraṇarūpāṅgāntarāsambhavācca na
yāgeṣvadhikāraḥ । evaṃ devatānāmātivāhikadevatāntarābhāvena gatyanusmaraṇarūpāṅgāsambhavāt
vidyāsu nādhikāra ityeva yuktamityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । yadyātivāhikagaṇasahitārcirādi-
gatismaraṇamadṛṣṭārthaṃ tadāgnyādayo'pi svasvāntarbhāvenānyeṣāṃ mucyamānānāmātivāhikena gaṇena
sahitānāṃ smariṣyanti । yadi tvevaṃbhūtena mārgeṇa niratiśayānandaśālipadamathānayā vidyayā
prāpyamiti smaraṇamaharahaḥkartavyāyāmupāsanāyāmṛtvigbhireva haviśśeṣasya bhakṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ kari-
ṣyamāṇakarmasantatāvivotsāhajananārthaṃ tadāgnyādayassvasvānapekṣitagatyaṃśaṃ vihāyāpekṣitaṃ
svasvapadānāmuparisthitaṃ gatyaṃśaṃ smariṣyanti, yathā ṛtvijo'śvamedhādiṣvanekapaśuprabhavahaviśśe-
ṣamadhye'napekṣitāṃśaṃ vihāyāpekṣitāṃśaṃ bhakṣayanti mṛtayajamānakeṣṭikarmaṇi sūktavāke yajamāna-
syāyurāśāsanādyabhāvādanapekṣitamāyurāśāsta ityādikamaṃśaṃ vihāyāpekṣitāṃśaṃ paṭhanti । sarva-
thā gatyanusmaraṇasyādṛṣṭārthatve ca devānāmapi tatsaṃbhavatīti teṣāṃ vidyādhikāro yujyata iti
bhāvaḥ । nanu, devānāṃ brahmavidyādhikāracintā nāsmadādīnāṃ pravṛttāvupayuktā nāpi devānām ।
teṣāṃ svakīye vigrahavattve tatprayuktasāmarthyādimattve ca siddhāntanyāyanirapekṣamevāvagatisadbhā-
vāt । na ca, devāssvapadāni nityānyanapāyīnīti muktyasambhavaśaṅkayā tatra na pravartante । sā
ca śaṅkā teṣāmitthaṃ sambhāvitā । svapadānāmanityatve vaidikendrādiśabdavirodhaḥ prasajye-
teti nityānyeva svapadāni pralayeṣu tattatsthānino vigrahāṇāṃ ca nāśe sati parame-
śvareṇa tāni sṛṣṭvā yathāpūrvaṃ svebhya eva dīyante pralayavyavahitatvātsvakīyapūrvaka-
lpavṛttāntāsmṛtiriti । atasteṣāmupāsanāsu pravṛttāvupayukteyaṃ cinteti vācyam । teṣāṃ
pūrvakalpādhītavedatadarthasmṛtimatāṃ sadā pārijātatarunikaṭavartināṃ ca jātismaratvena prācī-
nabrāhmaṇajanmādyanuṣṭhitasatkarmāyattaṃ svapadaṃ na nityamiti svata evāvagatisattvāt । na cā-
smadādīnāmeva devopāsyatvena brahmopāsanasiddhāvupayuktā । upāsanāprakaraṇeṣu devopāsyatvavi-
śeṣaṇasattve dyumūrdhatvādivadāropitenāpi tena rūpeṇopāsanopapatteriti ceducyate । devatā
na santīti vyavasthitau madhuvidyādīnāṃ tattaddevatāpadaprāptiḥ phalaṃ na bhavet । varuṇagrahanirmo-
kādivat bādhitasya śrutatve'pi vidheyakriyāphalatvāyogāt । kiṃ tu anyadeva phalaṃ kalpyaṃ
syāt।antarādityavidyādiṣvādityadevatādyantarvartitvena brahmopāsanaṃ na sidhdyet । jyotirmaṇḍa-
lādyantarvartitvenaiva tadupāsanaṃ siddha‍yet।gatyanusmṛtāvacetanāni arcirādīnyeva mārgaparvatvena syuḥ।
ātivāhikadevatāścintanīyā na syuḥ ।<quote>‘bhāktaṃ vānātmavittvādi’</quote>ti (3-1-7.) sūtroktanyāyena
jyotiṣṭomādikarmaphalaṃ bhuñcānānāṃ nirantarājānadevakarmakarabhāvāvagatyā vairāgyaṃ na siddha‍yet।na
﻿<pb n="471"/>
tādṛśasyābhimatasya siddhiḥ prayojanaṃ, devatāntarasadbhāvaprasādhanasya mantrārthavādāḥ prāptivi-
rodhayorasatoḥ pratīyamāne'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ na jahatīti hyetāsāṃ vigrahaprasādhanopayoginyāyaprati-
pādanasyāpi <quote>‘plavā hyete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktamavaraṃ yeṣu karma । etacchreyo ye'bhinandanti
mūḍhā jarāṃmṛtyuṃ te punarevāpiyanti । jāyasva sriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na sampūryate
tasmājjugupsete’</quote> tyādimantrārthavādaiḥ vivekavairāgyādikaṃ siddhyatīti pradarśanamapi prayojanami-
tyādyūhyam ।। ।। iti devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ sambhavātū ।। 25 ।। virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cennānekapratipatterdarśanāt
।। 26 ।। śabda iti cennātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 27 ।। ata eva ca nityatvam ।। 28 ।।
samānanāmarūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanātsmṛteśca ।। 29 ।। madhvādiṣvasambhavādanadhikāraṃ jaimi-
niḥ ।। 30 ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 31 ।। bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'sti hi ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>devānāṃ nāsti vidyādhikṛtiradhigatāste hi sāmarthyahīnāstatsattve vā padaikyātsamādhigataphalā nārthino nāpi vaidyaḥ ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>teṣāṃ vā brahmavidyāsvadhikṛtighaṭanā yadyapi syānna sā syāt vasvādīnāṃ vasutvādyadhigatiphalakasyātmagopāsanāsu ।। 62 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ mantrārthavādaprakaṭitatanavaśśāmbhavātsargato'nyattannāmakṣudramantarbhuvanamadhigatāste svayaṃbhātavidyāḥ ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tatteṣāṃ brahmavidyāsvadhikṛtiracalā bhāvivasvāditāptyai vasvādīnāmapi svāntaragiriśamatāvantato bhāvimuktyai ।। 63 ।।</l></lg>
<head>।। iti devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇassaṃbhavāt ।। 26 ।। virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cennānekapratipatterdarśanāt ।। 27 ।।
śabda iti cennātaḥ prabhavātpratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 28 ।। ata eva ca nityatvam ।। 29 ।। samānanā-
marūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanātsmṛteśca ।। 30 ।। madhvādiṣvasaṃbhavādanadhikāraṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 31 ।।
jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 32 ।। bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'sti hi ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ manuṣyādhikāraṃ śāstramityukte tarhyamanuṣyāṇāṃ devādīnāmadhikāro na syādityākṣipya samādhīyata
ityākṣepasaṃgatyā prasaṃgasaṃgatyā vā idamārabhyate---<pratika>sū ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇassaṃbhavāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘tadyo yo
devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhava’</quote> dityādikaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kiṃ devānāṃ brahmavidyāyāmadhikāro'sti
uta na vā iti saṃdehaḥ । devānāṃ vigrahavattve pramāṇābhāvātteṣāmarthitvasāmarthyayorasaṃbhavācca nāsti brahmavidyāyāmadhikāra iti
pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, <pratika>taduparyapi</pratika>=teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupariṣṭādye devādayasteṣāmapi । <pratika>saṃbhavāt</pratika>—arthitvasāmarthyādyadhikārakā-
raṇasya saṃbhavāt । brahmavidyāyāmadhikāro'stīti <pratika>bādarāyaṇācāryo</pratika> manyata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu yadīndrādīnāṃ vigrahavattvena vidyādhikārastarhi karmaṇi virodha ityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। virodhaḥ karmaṇīti ce-
nnānekapratipatterdarśanāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> indrādīnāmṛtvigādivadekasya śarīrasyānekatra karmaṇi yugapatsannidhānāsaṃbhavādvirodhaḥ
prasajyeteti cenna । kasmāt <pratika>anekapratipatteḥ</pratika>= ekasyendrasyānekeṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ yugapatprāpteḥ । <pratika>darśanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘sa ekadhā bhavati
tridhā bhavati’</quote> ityādiśrutau darśanāt ityarthaḥ । yadvā । <pratika>anekapratipatterdarśanāt</pratika>=anekatra karmaṇyekasya pratipattiraṅga-
bhāvastasya loke darśanāt । yathā bahubhirnamaskurvāṇairyugapadeko brāhmaṇo namaskiyamāṇo dṛśyate tadvadityarthaḥ ।। nanu māstu karmaṇi
virodhaḥ śabde tu syādityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। śabda iti cennātaḥ prabhavātpratyakṣānumānābhyām ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <pratika>śabde</pratika>=
vedavākye । anityavigrahavaddevādernityavedārthatvāṅgīkāre śabdasyārthena saha nityasaṃbandhābhāvena nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ <pratika>iti
cenna । ataḥ prabhavāt</pratika>=ata eva hi vaidikācchabdāddevādijagataḥ prabhavādutpatteḥ । kathaṃ tatprabhavatvaṃ devādeḥ । <pratika>pratya-
kṣānumānābhyām</pratika>=śrutismṛtibhyām <quote>‘eta iti vai prajāpatirdevānasṛjate’</quote> tyādikā śrutiḥ <quote>‘vedaśabdebhya evādā’</quote> vityā-
dikā smṛtiḥ tābhyāṃ nityaśabdaprabhavatvaṃ devāderavagamyate । evaṃ ca devādivyaktyutpattāvapi tadākṛtiniṣṭhanityatāśrutervedārtha-
tvāttatsaṃbandho nitya ityaviruddham ।</p>
<p>nanvevamapi <quote>‘ataḥ prabhavā’</quote> diti devādervedaprabhavatvoktyā tadutpādakavedasyāpi prabhavaprasaṃgādanityatvamāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।।
ata eva ca nityatvam ।। 29 ।।</pratika> <pratika>ataeva</pratika>=niyatākṛterdevāderjagato vedaśabdaprabhavatvādeva vedasya nityatvaṃ pratyetavyam ।
kartrasmaraṇātsiddhameva vedanityatvamanena dṛḍhīkṛtamiti bodhyam ।।</p>
﻿<pb n="472"/>
<p>nanu mahāpralaye ākṛterapyanityatvācchabdārthasaṃbandhasyānityatvavirodhastadavastha evetyāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū ।। samānanā-
marūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanātsmṛteśca ।। 30 ।।</pratika> suṣuptiprabodhayoriva sṛṣṭipralayayorāvṛttāvapi pralaye
prapañcasya saṃskārātmanā avidyāyāṃ vidyamānatvena pūrvakalpaprapaṃcasamānanāmarūpatvāduttarakalpaprapaṃcasyākṛternityatayā na śabdārtha-
saṃbandhasyānityatvavirodhaḥ । kathaṃ samānanāmarūpatvam । <pratika>darśanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ghātā yathāpūrvakamalpayat’</quote> iti śrutau darśanāt ।
<pratika>smṛteśca</pratika>---<quote>‘yathartuṣvṛtuliṅgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye । dṛśyante tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu ।।’</quote> ityādismṛteśca ।।</p>
<p>itthamabhihitaṃ devānāmadhikāramākṣipati---<pratika>sū ।। madhvādiṣvasaṃbhavādanadhikāraṃ jaiminiḥ ।। 39 ।।</pratika> brahmavidyāyo
devānāmanadhikāraṃ jaiminirācāryo manyate । kasmāt । <pratika>madhvādiṣvasaṃbhavāt</pratika>=<quote>‘asau vā ādityo devamadhu’</quote> <quote>‘ādityo
brahmetyādeśaḥ’</quote> ityādiṣu madhubrahmādhyāsenādityadevatopāsaneṣu manuṣyādhikārikeṣu teṣāmevādityādīnāmadhikārāsaṃbhavāt । na
hyekasyaivopāsyopāsakabhāvassaṃbhavati । tasya bhedaniṣṭhatvāt । tathā cāyaṃ prayogaḥ । brahmavidyā na devānadhikaroti vidyātvānma-
dhuvidyāvaditi ।। nanu kvacidanadhikārānna sarvatrānadhikāro'sti, brāhmaṇasya rājasūyānadhikāre'pi bṛhaspatisave'dhikārādityā-
śaṃkyāha---<sutra>sū ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 32 ।।</sutra> alaukikayorādityaśabdapratyayayoḥ jyotirmaṇḍale bhāvāt teṣāmasmadā-
divadiṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihārarūpaceṣṭāyā adarśanenācetanatvāvadhāraṇāttadatiriktasya cetanasya vigrahādimataḥ pratyakṣādyagocaratvā-
ttadvigrahādipratipādakānāṃ mantrāṇāmanyaparatvena svārthe prāmāṇyābhāvānna devānāṃ vidyādhikāra iti sūtradvayasya tātparyārthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itthaṃ pūrvapakṣe siddhāntayati---<pratika>sū ।। bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'sti hi ।। 33 ।।</pratika> tuśabdo jaiminimatanirāsārthaḥ ।
bādarāyaṇastvācāryo devādīnāṃ vigrahavattvena brahmavidyāyāmadhikārabhāvaṃ manyate । kasmāt । <pratika>asti hi</pratika> arthitvādyadhikāra-
kāraṇam । na hi kvacidadhikāro neti sarvatra vaktuṃ pāryate । nirguṇavidyāyāṃ saṃbhavāt । na ca teṣāṃ vigrahavattvaṃ neti vācyam ।
tadapyasti hi । tatpratipādakamantrāṇāṃ mānāntaravirodhasaṃvādābhāvena pramāṇatvāt ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe manuṣyāṇāmeva parameśvaropāsane'dhikārassūcitaḥ । kathaṃ tarhi devānāmapyatharvaśirasi
parameśvaropāsanaṃ śrūyata ityāśaṅkāyāmidamārabhyate <pratika>।। sū ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇassaṃbhavāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> asminnadhikaraṇe pūrva-
pakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvavat । viṣayavākyaṃ paraṃ bhidyate । <quote>‘tato devā rudraṃ nāpaśyan । te devā rudraṃ dhyāyanti’</quote> ityatharvaśiro-
vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ।atrāpi vidhyekavākyatāpannānāṃ<quote>‘indro vṛtrāya vajramudayaccha’</quote>dityādīnāṃ mantrārthavādānāṃ svārthe tātparyābhāvāt devānāṃ
vigrahavattvāsiddhau arthitvasāmarthyayorabhāvena na brahmavidyāyāmadhikāriṇo devā iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā <quote>‘ādityo yūpaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘agni-
rhimasya bheṣaja’</quote> matyādīnāṃ svārthe tātparyābhāve'pi <quote>‘indro vṛtrāye’</quote> tyādīnāṃ virodhasya mānāntaraprāpteścābhāvena svārthe tātparya-
saṃbhavādvigrahavattvasidhdyā arthitvasāmarthyayossaṃbhavena brahmavidyāyāmadhikāriṇa eva devā iti siddhāntitam । <pratika>virodhaḥ karma-
ṇīti</pratika> satre <pratika>anekapratipatteḥ</pratika>=vigrahavattve'pi saubhariprabhṛtiṣu yugapadanekadehapratipatteḥ । <pratika>darśanāt</pratika>=dṛṣṭatvādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>śabda <pratika>iti cedityādi ।</pratika> virodha ityanuvartate । devānāṃ vigrahavattve sāvayavatvenotpattivināśayogādutpatteḥ prāgvi-
nāśādūrdhvaṃ ca vaidikendrādiśabdānāmarthaśūnyatvasya vā anityatvasya vāpattau vaidikaśabde virodhaḥ prasajyate iti cenna । <quote>‘ataḥ
prabhavā’</quote> dityādi śeṣaṃ samānārthakameva ।</p>
<p><pratika>‘ata eva nityatvam ।। 29 ।। ata eva</pratika>=yato brahmā pūrvaviś‍vāmitrādīnāmākṛtiviśeṣāṃstattadvaidikaśabdaiḥ smṛtvā
tadākārānevāparāṃstattacchaktiviśeṣayuktān naimittikapralayānantaraṃ sṛjati ataeva । viś‍vāmitrādīnāṃ mantrakṛttve'pi
viś‍vāmitrādiśabdānāmākṛtinimittatvena vedasya nityatvamupapadyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika><quote>‘samānanāmarūpatvā’</quote></pratika> diti sūtrārtho'viśiṣṭa eva ।।</p>
<p>matāntaramāha---<pratika>madhvādiṣviti</pratika> । madhuvidyādiṣu vasvādidevānāmevopāsyatvātprāpyatvācca vasvādīnāṃ kartṛkarmabhāva-
virodhenopāsyatvāsaṃbhavāt vasvādīnāṃ satāṃ vasvāditvaṃ prāptamiti prāpyatvāsaṃbhavācca vasvādidevānāmanadhikāraṃ <pratika>jaimini-
rmanyata</pratika> ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 32 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘taṃ devā jyotiṣāṃ jyotirāyurhopāsate'mṛta’</quote> miti jyotiṣi parabrahmaṇi
devānāṃ sādhāraṇyena prāptatve'pyadhikārabhāvavacanācca anyatra madhvādividyāsvanadhikāro jñāpyate । <quote>‘taṃ devā’</quote> ityatra devāḥ vakhā-
daya ityarthaḥ । evaṃ ca madhvādividyāyāmevānadhikāro devānāṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ tvadhikāro'styeva teṣāmiti pūrvasmānmatādviśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'sti hi ।। 33 ।।</pratika> <pratika>bādarāyaṇastu</pratika> madhuvidyādiṣvapi vasvādīnāmadhikārabhāvaṃ manyate ।
<pratika>asti hi</pratika> vasvādīnāṃ satāṃ vasvavasthabrahmaṇa upāsyatvasya kalpāntare vasutvādeḥ prāpyatvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ । kāryakāraṇobhayāvasthaṃ
hi brahma samupāsīnānāṃ kalpāntare vasvāditvamubhayādhikārāvasāne brahmaprāptiśca phalatayopadiśyate । tato madhvādividyāsvapi
devānāmadhikāro'stīti sarvathā devā brahmavidyādhikāriṇaḥ । iti ।।</p>
﻿<pb n="473"/>
<head>atha apaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
atha <quote>‘manuṣyādhikāratvāt’</quote> iti sāmānyena manuṣyāṇāmadhikāre prāpte viśe-
ṣamāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi ।। 33 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ <quote>‘ājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyatha’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha apaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇasyāṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇena saṅgatimāha---<pratika>atheti</pratika> । yadi <quote>‘hṛdyapekṣaye’</quote>ti sūtre manu-
ṣyagrahaṇaṃ manuṣyāṇāmeva brahmavidyādhikāra ityetadarthaṃ na bhavati tatra devānāmapyadhikārasadbhā-
vāta, tarhi manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tatrādhikāro'stītyetadarthaṃ tadbhavet । anyathā tadvaiphalyaprasa-
ṅgāt । tataśca śūdrasādhāraṇyena manuṣyāṇāṃ tatrādhikāra iti prāpnoti । tatra śūdrāpavādena
viśeṣapradarśanārthamuttarādhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ । iyamapi prāsaṅgikī saṅgatiḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāttadādravamātsūcyate hi ।। 33 ।।</pratika> <pratika>chāndogya iti ।</pratika> evaṃ
tatropākhyāyate । jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhayā bahudhanānnapradaḥ sarvāsu dikṣu grāmanagaramā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, pūrvādhikaraṇamadhye manuṣyādhikāraṃ brahmopāsanaśāstramityukte tatprasagena devādīnāmapi brahmavidyāyāma-
dhikāro'sti na veti prastūyate । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeveti na pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśaḥ । adhikaraṇaracanā-
yāṃ tvasti viśeṣaḥ । <quote>‘madhvādiṣvasaṃbhavā’</quote>dityādikaṃ sūtratrayamadhikaraṇāntaratayā yojitam । prāsaṃgikatvādasya vicārasya na
viṣayavākyollekhaḥ prātisviko dṛśyate । <quote>‘tadupari’</quote> ityatra tat upari iti padacchedaḥ । <pratika>tat</pratika>=brahmopāsanam । <pratika>upari</pratika>=devā-
diṣvapi iti sūtrārthe viśeṣaḥ । itarāṇi sūtrāṇi śrīkaṇṭhīyamatena samānārthāni । ato devānāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre na kaścidvi-
rodhaḥ <pratika>।। iti śrīrāmānujamate devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>atha madhvadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। madhvādiṣvityādi ।</pratika> atrādhikaraṇāntaratvaracanāmātrameva śrīkaṇṭhamatādviśeṣaḥ । sūtrārthavarṇanādikaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeveti
nāsti viśeṣaḥ । asya <quote>‘asau vā ādityo devamadhu’</quote> ityādika <quote>‘metadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyatī’</quote> tyantaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । śeṣaṃ
śrīkaṇṭhamatavat । <pratika>iti śrīrāmānujamate madhvadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, devānāṃ muktyarthavidyāsvadhikāro'sti vā naveti saṃdehaḥ । anādinityānāṃ svamuktyasaṃbhavaniścayavatāṃ
devānāṃ muktyarthitvābhāvena nāsti teṣāṃ brahmopāsane'dhikāraḥ । ata eva pūrvādhikaraṇe manuṣyādhikāratvamuktamupāsanānāmiti
pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, teṣāmapi viśiṣṭabuddhyādisadbhāvenādhikārasaṃbhavāt sṛṣṭipralayārthavādasvārasyena teṣāmani-
tyatvācca asti devānāmapi brahmopāsane'dhikāra iti ।। sūtrārthastu <pratika>।। sū ।। taduparyapi bādarāyaṇassaṃbhavāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika>
<pratika>taduparyapi</pratika>=devatvayogyamanuṣyāṇāṃ na kevalaṃ manuṣyatvadaśāyāṃ kiṃ tu devatvādiprāp‍tyanantaramapi vedavidyādhikāro'sti ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>saṃbhavāt</pratika>=teṣāmapyadhikāraprayojakaviśiṣṭabuddhyāderyogāt । śati <pratika>bādarāyaṇo</pratika> bhagavānvaktītyarthaḥ ।। <pratika><quote>‘viro-
dhaḥ karmaṇī’</quote> tyādi ।</pratika> devānāṃ sāditve <pratika>karmaṇi</pratika>=pūrvakalpapravṛttayajñādikarmaṇiviṣaye । <pratika>virodhaḥ</pratika>=uddeśyābhāvanimittavai-
yarthyākhyavirodhaḥ । syāditi <pratika>cenna ।</pratika> kutaḥ । <pratika>anekapratipatteḥ</pratika>=anekeṣāṃ yogyamanuṣyāṇāṃ devatāpadaprāpteḥ । <pratika>darśa-
nāt</pratika>=‘yatra pūrva, iti śrutāvuktatvādityarthaḥ । <pratika>śabdaiti cennetyādi ।</pratika> virodhaiti vartate । devānāmādyantavattve
<pratika>śabde</pratika>=vede । <pratika>virodhaḥ</pratika>=aprāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāt nityatvena śrutisiddhavedavācāṃ kadācidvācyahīnatvāpatteriti
<pratika>cenna । ataḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘dhātā yathe’</quote> ti vedavākyāt । tathā <pratika>pratyakṣānumānābhyām</pratika>=mahatāṃ pratyakṣāt devānāṃ pravāhataḥ
utpattisādhakaliṅgācca । <pratika>prabhavāt</pratika>=pratikalpaṃ niyamena prabhavaśabditotpattyavagamācca uktaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। ataeva
ca nityatvam ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <pratika>ata eva</pratika>=pūrvapakṣyuktavedanityatvādeva tadanyathānupapattyāpi tadvācyadevapravāhasya nityatvaṃ
siddhyati ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>samānanāmarūpatvādityādi।avṛttāvapi</pratika>=pūrvakalpe muktānāṃ devānāṃ punaḥ svapadeṣu asattve'pi । <pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>
tatpratipādakaikavidhavedāprāmāṇyākhyavirodho nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>samānanāmarūpatvāt</pratika>=etatkalpotpannānāmapi devānāṃ
﻿<pb n="474"/>
iti ।। atrācāryaḥ śiṣyaṃ śūdretyāmantrayata । ataḥ śūdrāṇāmapi brahmavidyāyā-
madhikāro'sti na veti saṃdehaḥ ।। teṣāmadhikāro'sti, arthitvādisaṃbhavātt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rgāraṇyatīrthādiṣu pānthānāmanāthānāṃ ca śītavātātapavarṣabādhānivārakānnodakaśayanācchāda-
nādibhogyajātasampūrṇānāvasathānmāpayāñcakre । tasya dhārmikapravarasya karmabhiḥ kṣīṇaduritasya
brahmavividiṣāmutpādayituṃ kecana maharṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya niśāyāṃ harmye śayānasya tasyo-
pari paṅktimābadhyājagmuḥ । teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ bhobho bhallākṣabhallākṣeti viparītalakṣaṇayā manda-
locaneti sambhrameṇa dvivāraṃ sambodhya pṛṣṭhagāmī kaściddhaṃsa uvāca । jānaśruterannadānādi-
prabhāvajanitaṃ jyotirdyulokaparyantaṃ vyāptaṃ vartate । tatra tvaṃ lagno mābhūḥ tena tava pradagdhatā
mābhūditi । evamuktavantamagragāmī haṃsaḥ pratyuvāca । enaṃ jānaśrutiṃ manuṣyasāmānyadaśā-
manatikramya vartamānaṃ śakaṭasahitaṃ raikvamiva kīdṛśamāhātmyaśālinamāttha । raikva eva khalu brahma-
jño mahāprabhāvaḥ।asya jānaśruterabrahmajñasya kaḥ prabhāvaḥ yajjanitamasya tejo raikvaprabhāvajaṃ teja
iva dahedityāśayaḥ । etadākarṇya tena pṛṣṭhagāminā ko'sau raikva iti punaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa eva
pratyuvāca।sarveṣāmapi yadyāvatkarmajātaṃ vijñānaṃ ca yadīyakarmavijñānāntarbhūtamasau raikva iti ।
tadetaddhaṃsavākyaṃ raikvapraśaṃsārūpaṃ tathābhūtasya raikvasyaiva jyotirasahyaṃ na tvasya varākasyeti svani-
ndāgarbhaṃ ca jānaśrutirākarṇya kathamapi niśāmativāhya talpaṃ tyajanneva kṣattāramāhūya sacihnaṃ
raikvamuktvā tadanveṣaṇāya taṃ preṣayitvā kvacidviviktadeśe śakaṭasyādhastātpāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃrai-
kvamupalabhya pratyāgamya niveditavati tasmin svayaṃ raikvamupagamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ hārama-
śvatarīyuktaṃ rathaṃ copahṛtya tvadupāsyāṃ devatāmanuśādhīti raikvaṃ prārthayāmāsa।sa raikvastena dīyamānaṃ
sarvaṃ pratyācakṣāṇa uvāca । <quote>‘aha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhira’</quote>stviti । aheti nipātaḥ। hāra-
sahita itvā rathaḥ gobhissaha tavaivāstu, kimanenālpadhanena santoṣaḥ mama kalatrahīnasya prati-
ṣṭhāhīnasya ca । kā mama etaddhanarakṣaṇe śaktiḥ, tava vā matprayojanāparyavasāyyalpadhanadānena
brahmavidyā pratiṣṭhitā na bhavediti bhāvaḥ । punarjānaśrutau sahasraṃ gavāṃ pūrvānītaṃ hārādikaṃ raikvasya
pariṇayanārthaṃ kanyāmāvasathārthaṃ tatratyaṃ grāmaṃ copahṛtya prārthayamāne vi1dyāpradānārthamupahārasya
paryāptatāmanujānānasya raikvasyedaṃ vākyam<quote>‘ājahāremāḥ śūdre’</quote> tyādi । imā dakṣiṇā āhṛtavā-
nasi anenaiva mukhena vidyāgrahaṇopāyena māmālāpayiṣyasi brahmavidyopadeṣṭhāraṃ kariṣyasītya-
rthaḥ । nanu, karmasviva vidyāsvapi śūdrasya nādhikāra ityeva yuktam । kathamasyādhikārasaṃśaya
ityāśaṅkya pūrvapakṣakoṭerbījopanyāsapūrvakaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati---<pratika>atreti</pratika> । atra <quote>‘ājahāre’</quote>ti
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prācīnatulyanāmarūpatvāt । tathā ca pratipādyasyāpyekavidhatvāt na tadbodhakavedāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ । ekavidhatvameva kuta
ityata uktaṃ <pratika>darśanātsmṛteśceti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yathāpūrva’</quote> miti śruteḥ <quote>‘anādinidhane’</quote> ti smṛteścetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। madhvādiṣvasabhavā-
dityādi । madhvādiṣu</pratika>---<quote>‘asauvāādityo devamadhvi’</quote> tyādyuktamadhvādividyāsu । <pratika>anadhikāraṃ</pratika>=devānāmadhikārābhāvam ।
<pratika>jaimini</pratika>rācāryo manyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>asaṃbhavāt</pratika>=teṣāmarthitvatatpadayogyatvādyayogādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jyotiṣi bhāvācca ।। 31 ।।</pratika> <pratika>jyotiṣi</pratika>=devānāṃ jñāne । <pratika>bhāvāt</pratika>=sarvavastūnāṃ viṣayatayāntarbhūtatvāt ।
siddhajñānānāṃ devānāṃ na jñānārthitā yujyata iti na mokṣavidyāsvapyadhikāra ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। bhāvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'sti hi ।। 32 ।।</pratika> <pratika>bādarāyaṇastu, hi</pratika>=yasmāt । devānāmapi <pratika>asti</pratika>=vidyā-
sādhyāpūrvaprakāśaviśeṣo mokṣaphale atiśayaścāsti । tasmāt <pratika>bhāvaṃ</pratika>=devānāmadhikārasadbhāvaṃ manyata ityarthaḥ । jaiminimataṃ
tu devānāṃ prāptajñānaphalārthamanadhikārābhiprāyamityavadheyam ।। <pratika>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ devatādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</pratika></p>
<note>1 <quote>‘prakāśanārtham’</quote> iti cha. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
﻿<pb n="475"/>
<p>na ca traivarṇikānāmeveti niyamaḥ; atraivarṇikānāmapi devānāṃ taddarśanāt । devānāmu-
panayanādhyayanābhāve'pi svayaṃbhātavedārthatayā yujyate vidvattā, kathameṣāmiti na
śaṅkyam । eṣāmapi purāṇaśravaṇādinā bodhopapatteḥ, niṣādasthapatinyāyena mahā-
vākyagrahaṇe'dhikārasaṃbhavācca । tasmādamīṣāmadhikāro brahmavidyāyāmucitaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vākye । yadyapya<quote>‘ha hāretvā śūdre’</quote>ti dakṣiṇāpratyākhyānavākye śūdretyāmantraṇaṃ śūdravat brahma-
vidyāgauravamajānānaḥ svalpāṃ dakṣiṇāmāharasīti kopena śūdretyāmantraṇasyānyathāsiddhirvaktuṃ
śakyā, tathāpyatra prasādavākye na sā vaktuṃ śakyeti । atra śūdretyāmantraṇaliṅgena śūdrasyā-
pyadhikāro'stīti pratīyate । jānaśruteśśokāviṣṭatvaṃ prāksūcitamastīti buddhisannihitayo-
gena śūdraśabdasya kṣatriyavṛttitvasambhavāt । liṅgāsidhdyā tasya nādhikāra ityapi pratīyate ।
atassaṃśaya iti bhāvaḥ । nanvarthitvasāmarthyayoranyatrāpi sambhave'pi yathā traivarṇikānāmeva
karmāṇi tathā vidyā api syurityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>na ceti</pratika> । na karmavadvidyāyāstraivarṇikaniya-
mo'sti । deveṣvapi tadaṅgīkārādityarthaḥ । pūrvādhikaraṇenāpi dṛṣṭāntarūpā saṅgatiranena labdhā ।
devānāṃ vaiduṣyaṃ sambhavati na śūdrāṇāmiti viśeṣamāśaṅkya nirākaroti---<pratika>devānāmiti ।
eṣāmapīti ।</pratika> yadyapi purāṇādiśravaṇamātreṇa karmādhikāro na sambhavati <quote>‘vasante brāhmaṇo-
'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanyaśśaradi vaiśya’</quote> iti traivarṇikādhikāratvena vihitasyādhānasyā-
sambhavena teṣāmāhavanīyādyagnyabhāvāt karmāṅgavaidikamantrādhyayanābhāvācca । tathāpi vidyāsva-
gnīnāṃ maṃtrāṇāṃ cānapekṣitatvāt purāṇebhyo vidyopayuktabrahmapratipattisambhavāt yajñādidharma-
rāhitye'pi <quote>‘sve sve karmaṇyabhiratassaṃsiddhiṃ labhate nara’</quote> ityuktarītyā śūdravarṇocitakarmabhireva
vidyānugrahasambhavācca sambhavati vidyādhikāra iti bhāvaḥ । brahmapratipattāvupāyāntaramāha---
<pratika>niṣādeti ।</pratika> yathai<quote>‘tayā niṣādasthapatiṃ yājaye’</quote>diti vākye niṣādasthapatiśabde ṣaṣṭhyarthalakṣa-
ṇāparihārāya samānādhikaraṇasamāsasyābhyupagantavyatayā niṣādajātīyasya <quote>‘raudraṃ vāstumayaṃ
caruṃ nirvape’</quote>diti prakṛtāyāmiṣṭāvadhikāre siddhe tadaṅgabhūtamantragrahaṇamatraivarṇikasyāpi niṣā-
dajātīyasya siddhyati । evaṃ śūdretyāmantraṇaliṅgena śūdrasyapi vidyādhikāre siddhe brahmaparama-
hāvākyagrahaṇaṃ tasyārthāpattyā siddhyatītyarthaḥ । tataśca brahmaparamahāvākyeṣu saṃśayaviparyayani-
rāsārthaṃ vicāro'pekṣitaścate so'pyarthāpattilabhyo'ṅgīkriyatāmiti bhāvaḥ । nanu, vidhibalā-
nniṣādasya mantragrahaṇākṣepo yuktaḥ । na tvarthavādamātrānurodhāt śūdrasya mahāvākyagrahaṇākṣepaḥ ।
<quote>‘gāvo vā etatsatramāsata’</quote> <quote>‘devā vai satramāsate’</quote>tyādivadārthavādikasyānyārthadarśanaliṅgasya
yathākathañcitstutyālambanatvopapatterityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannupasaṃharati---<pratika>tasmāditi ।</pratika> ucita
eva śūdrasya brahmavidyādhikāraḥ । arthitvādisambhavena virodhābhāvāt । na hi gavāṃ satreṣva-
śaktyādivat devānāmuddeśyadevatāntarasūtrādhānādhikāriviśeṣaṇabrāhmaṇyādyabhāvavacca śūdrasya
vidyādhikāre kiñcidbādhakamasti । nanu, tasmā <quote>‘cchūdro yajñe'navaklṛpta’</quote> iti śrutirbādhikā ।
tasyāśśruteryajñānadhikāramātrapratipādanaparatvāt । pratyuta śūdrasya viśiṣya yajñādhikārani-
ṣedhena vidyādhikārānumatereva pratīteriti bhāvaḥ । śūdrāṇāṃ muktyarthitvasya dehendriyapāṭavarū-
pasāmarthyasya ca sambhave'pyupāsyatadga‍uṇajñānavirahāt nāstyupāsanādhikāra iti siddhāntayati-
﻿<pb n="476"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—nāsti śūdrāṇāṃ brahmavidyāyāmadhikāraḥ, teṣāmadhyayanābhāvena
tadupāyabhūtopāsyatadga‍uṇādijñānāsaṃbhavāt । itihāsapurāṇāni vedopabṛṃhaṇaṃ kurva-
ntyevopāyabhāvamanubhavanti, na svātantryeṇa । śūdrāṇāmitihāsapurāṇaśravaṇānu-
jñānaṃ tu pāpakṣayaphalam । viduradharmavyādhādīnāṃ janmāntarasiddhajñānāpramoṣāt bra-
hmaniṣṭhatā । kathaṃ brahmavidyopadeśe śūdretyāmantraṇamiti cet nātra jātiyogena
śūdretyāmantraṇam, kiṃtu brahmajñānāprāptyā śūgasya saṃjāteti darśanāt । śugasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>iti prāpta iti ।</pratika> uktajñānavirahe hetumāha—<pratika>adhyayanābhāveneti ।</pratika> upāsanāvidhayo hi
svaviṣayānuṣṭhānārthamanuṣṭheyārthajñānasampannāndvijātīnāsādya nirvṛṇvanti yathā kratuvidhayo yā-
jakānapekṣamāṇāḥ svavarṇocitadravyārjanopāya iti yājane svata eva pravṛttānbrāhmaṇānāsādya
nirvṛṇvanti । ata upāsanāvidhibhiraṅgatvena gṛhītajñānaṃ tāvat śūdrāṇāṃ na sambhavati । sve-
cchayā kenacicchūdreṇa likhitapāṭhādinā mahāvākyagrahaṇatassaṃpāditamapi tajjñānaṃ tadupāya-
tāmaśnute । na <quote>‘hyāgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata’</quote> ityatra jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasambandhitvena klṛptāyāṃ prakara-
ṇāmnātāyāmāgneyyāṃ lāghavānusāriṇā vidhinā upasthānāṅgatvena gṛhītāyāṃ kasyacidba‍uddhisanni-
hitamāgneyyantaraṃ vidhinopasthānāṅgatvena gṛhītaṃ tadupāyatāmaśnuvīteti bhāvaḥ । nanu, vedānte-
ṣviva purāṇetihāseṣvapi upāsyasya brahmaṇastadga‍uṇānāṃ ca vedāntānusāreṇaiva tatratatra prapañcena
pratipādanaṃ dṛśyate । tajjanyaṃ jñānamupāsanāṅgaṃ yadi na syāttadā teṣu tatpratipādanaṃ vyarthameva
syāt । ato yathā prabalena <quote>‘athāto'gnimagniṣṭomenānuyajantī’</quote>ti vākyena iṣṭakāracitastha-
ṇḍilarūpasyāgnerāhavanīyādhāratayā jyotiṣṭomāṅgatve siddhe durbalaprakaraṇopanītā uttaravedi-
rapyagnyādhāratayā tadaṅgamanyathā jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe tadāmnānavaiyarthyāpatterityāśaṅkyāha-<pratika>itihā-
seti ।</pratika> <quote>‘bibhetyalpaśrutādvedo māmayaṃ pratarediti । itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet ।’</quote>
iti vedatātparyanirṇayārthatvena viniyuktatvānna tadvaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ । nanu, purāṇādīnāṃ vedo-
pabṛṃhaṇārthatvena viniyuktatve'pi tebhyussvātantryeṇāpi brahmapratipattirbhavantī nāpahnotuṃ śakyā ।
sāpyupāsanāṅgameva । anyathā śūdrakartṛkapurāṇaśravaṇavaiphalyaprasaṅgāt । na ca tasya phalāntara-
meva । viduradharmavyādhādīnāṃ brahmaniṣṭhatāyāmupāyāntarādarśanena tadaṅgatvasyāpyavaśyakalpyatvā-
dityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>śūdrāṇāmiti ।</pratika> evaṃ sūtrābhipretaṃ jñānābhāvena śūdrasya vidyānadhikāramupa-
pādya sūtreṇa kaṇṭhoktaṃ śūdretyāmantraṇasya nirvāhamupapādayitumāśaṅkāṃ darśayati—<pratika>kathamiti ।</pratika>
etacchaṅkottaratvena <quote>‘śugasye’</quote>ti sūtrāṃśavivakṣitamarthamāha—<pratika>na jātīti ।</pratika> yadyapi śūdraśabdasya
jātau rūḍhiḥ, tathāpyatra brahmajñānāprāptyā jānaśruteryā śuk sañcātā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā raikkeṇa vyavahi-
tārthaviṣayasvajñānavaibhavaprakaṭanāya śocitṛtvayogena śūdretyāmantraṇaṃ kṛtamityaṅgīkartuṃ yuktam ।
buddhisannihitayogasya rūḍhito balavattvāt । svajñānavaibhavaprakaṭanasya prathamāmantraṇe rājño'dhi-
kadakṣiṇāditsāsampādanārthatvena dvitīyāmantraṇe rājñaḥ svopadekṣyamāṇavidyāyāṃ śraddhātiśayasa-
mpādanārthatvena ca prakṛtopayuktatvācceti bhāvaḥ । nanu, jānaśruteśśuk sañjāteti kena pramāṇena
bodhyate yāṃ dṛṣṭvā raikvaḥ śūdretyāmantritavāniti kalpyata ityāśaṅkāparihāratvena <quote>‘tadanādare’</quote>
tyādisūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>śugasyeti ।</pratika> haṃsoktānādaravākyaśravaṇena kāraṇena tadaivācāryaṃ pratyā-
﻿<pb n="477"/>
saṃjāteti ca tadanādaraśravaṇāt brahmavidyāvaikalyena svātmānaṃ prati haṃsoktānā-
daravākyaśravaṇāt tadaivācāryaṃ pratyādravaṇācca sūcyate । hiśabdo hetau । yataḥ
śūdretyāmantraṇaṃ na jātiyogena tataḥ śūdrasya bahmopāsanaṃ nāstīti ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dravaṇena kāryeṇa cata śugasya sañjātāstīti jñāpyate । ataśśūdretyāmantraṇaṃ na rūḍhyā, kiṃ tu
śocitṛtvayogenaivetyarthaḥ । nanu śocatītyarthe.śūdraśabdasya vyutpattirvyākaraṇapraktiyayā na dṛśyate,
nāpyuṇādiprakriyayā । uṇādisūtre hi <quote>‘sthāyitañcivañciśakikṣipikṣudisṛpī’</quote>tyādisūtrato
rakpratyaye'nuvartamāne <quote>‘śateraśce’</quote>ti sūtreṇa <quote>‘śaṭaśātane’</quote> iti dhāto rakpratyayena dhātorakā-
rasya ūkārādeśena ca śūdraśabdo niṣpāditaḥ । na ca <quote>‘śucidlṛśoka’</quote> iti dhātorauṇādikarakpra-
tyayena śūdraśabdasya kathañcinniṣpattisambhave'pi tatastasya na yaugikatvanirvāhaḥ । uṇādayo'-
vyutpannāni prātipadikānī<quote>‘tyataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātrakuśākarṇīṣvanavyayasya’</quote>iti <ref>(pā॰ 8
3-46)</ref> sūtre kamigrahaṇe satyapi kamerauṇādikasapratyayāntasya kaṃsapadasya grahaṇena sarveṣāṃ
nāmnāmuṇādipratyayaiḥ padāntānāṃ kṛttaddhitasūtreṇa prātipadikasaṃjñāsiddhisambhave'pi arthavatsū-
trapraṇayanena ca jñāpitatvāditi cet ātrāhuḥ । rujaṃ drāvayatītyarthe rudraśabdasyeva śocatītyarthe
śūdraśabdasya nairuktaprakriyayā siddhiriti । kecittu <quote>‘sthāyitañcī’</quote>tyādirakprakaraṇe <quote>‘amita-
myordīrghaśce’</quote>ti sūtrādanantaraṃ <quote>‘śucerdaśce’</quote>ti sūtrāntarapāṭhaṃ kalpayantaḥ tena śūceścakārasya dakā-
reṇa rakpratyayena pūrvasūtrānuvṛttena dhātorukārasya dīrghādeśena ca śūdraśabdaniṣpattiṃ manyante ।
nanu, haṃsavākyaśravaṇaraikvopasarpaṇābhyāṃ jānaśruteśśokassūcyata ityuktamayuktam । haṃsavākya-
śravaṇānantarameva kṣattṛpreṣaṇapūrvakaraikvopasarpaṇena hi jānaśruteḥ kaścana raikvopasarpaṇahetuḥ mānaso
bhāvo haṃsavākyaśravaṇena sañjāta ityetāvatpratipattuṃ śakyam । sa bhāvaḥ śoka iti kutaḥ
pratipattavyam। haṃsavākyaṃ jānaśrutinindātmakamiti tatastasya śokodaya eva yukta iti cenna ।
tadraikvasya stutirūpamapi bhavatīti tatastoṣodayo'pi yuktaeva । svasyāpi raikvamahimaprāptyupāyasya
tadupāsyadevatopāsansya tena pradarśanāt tadupāsanaprakāropadeśārthaṃ prārthanīyassa eva raikva iti
sūcayituṃ <quote>‘sayugvāna’</quote> miti taccihnasyopanyāsācca । tathāpi jānaśrutessvanindayā haṃsavā-
kyagatayā śokodayo'pi syāditi cenna।haṃsavākye prakṛtānupayuktaraikvastutestaccihnopanyāsasya ca
sattvena tena liṅgena nāyaṃ laukiko haṃsaḥkiṃ tu mama hitaiṣī kaścidṛṣireva anyena ṛṣiṇā saha sva-
yamuktipratyuktivyājena raikvo devatopāsanālabdhamahāmahimavaibhavastvamapi raikvopāsyāṃ devatāmu-
pāsva, sa iva mahāmahimā bhaviṣyasi, tadupāsanālābhe ca sa eva raikva upadeṣṭā, tasya cihnaṃ
śakaṭaparyaṭanaṃ, tamanviṣya tato vidyāṃ labdhvā kṛtārtho bhaveti māmavabodhayitumāgataḥ ityati-
vidagdhasya vividhadharmānuṣṭhānaviśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya rājño'vagatisambhavena haṃsakṛtasvanindāyāḥ
samrājameva rājānaṃ prati <quote>‘kiyadastyadhunā rājyaṃ kiyadājñābalaṃ tava । anena tvamupāyena
sārvabhaumo bhaviṣyasī’</quote>tyaiśvaryopāye pravartayitukāmena hitaiṣiṇā kṛtāyā nindāyā iva harṣa-
eva hetutvāt । kiṃ ca neyaṃ jānaśruternindā yadbhuvamārabhya dyulokaparyantaṃ vyāptasya kālāgni-
jvālākalāpavatsparśamātreṇa dahanaśaktasya sūrye'pyasambhāvitasya jyotiṣastasminnabhāvavarṇanam ।
sambhāvitaguṇavaikalyavarṇanaṃ hi nindā bhavati । na <quote>‘tvākāśamayaṃ khādituṃ na śakta’</quote> itivadasa-
﻿<pb n="478"/>
itaśca śūdretyāmantraṇaṃ na jātiyogenetyāha—
<sutra>।। sū ।। kṣatriyatvagateśca ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
śuśrūṣorjānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatvāvagateśca na jātiyogena śūdretyāmantraṇam । upā-
khyānopakrame hi <quote>‘jānaśrutirha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa,
sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃcakre sarvata eva me'nnamatsyanti’</quote> iti jānaśrute-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mbhāvitaguṇavaikalyavarṇanam । yadi kasyāpyasambhāvitaṃ jyotissvasya nāstīti jānaśruteḥ śokaḥ
kalpyate । tadā tasya jaḍatvamevopapāditaṃ syāt।tasmādiha śokasya sūcitatvavarṇanamayuktamiti
cet । ucyate । bhallākṣasya raikvajānaśrutiviṣayādarānādaravacasī divyajyotissattvāsattvālamba-
natve'pi vastuto vidyātadvaikalyaprayukte eva paryavasyataḥ । anyathā ‘gaganamayaṃ khādati <quote>‘ayaṃ
tu khādituṃ na śaknotī’</quote> tyuktipratyuktivat haṃsābhyāṃ kṛtayoruktipratyuktyorapārthakatvaprasaṅgāt ।
vidyā ca sambhāvitaguṇa iti tadvaikalyena <quote>‘kimapara ena’</quote>mityādijānaśrutyanādaravacanaṃ tāva-
ttannindā bhavatyeva । atastadvarṇanaṃ jānaśruteratyantāstikasya etāvantaṃ kālamevaṃ praśastāṃ vidyāṃ
nādhyagamaṃ yenaivamavamānasya pātramabhūvamiti śokahetukaṃ bhavati । evaṃ ca yadyapi bhallākṣavacanaṃ
praśastavidyātadupadeṣṭṛgurusadbhāvapratyāyakatayā harṣahetuḥ, tathāpi harṣavadeva sadyo gurūpasarpaṇahetau
śoke'pi heturiti sa eva śokaḥ śūdretyāmantraṇena sūcito maharṣiṇā svavaibhavakhyāpanāya
rājño vidyādhigame viśiṣṭādhikāritvajñāpanāya ca । kevalavidyākāmāddhi vidyāvaikalyakṛte-
nānutāpena yukto'dhikārī viśiṣyate । śūdretyāmantraṇasya yaugikatve hetvantaraparatvenottara-
<pratika>sūtramavatārayati---itaśceti ।। sū॰ ।। kṣatriyatvagateśca ।। 34 ।।</pratika> janaśrutasyāpatyaṃ jāna-
śrutiḥ । putranāmno gotrāpatyaṃ pautrāyaṇaḥ । śraddhayā deyamasyeti śraddhādeyaḥ । arthibhyo bahu
dātuṃ śīlamasyeti bahudāyī । bahu pākyaṃ paktavyamannādikamasya gṛheṣvāvasatheṣu vāstīti bahu-
pākyaḥ । āgatya vasanti yeṣvatithaya iti tānāvasathānatithīnāṃ nivāsārthān gṛhānkā-
rayāmāsa । kimiti । sarvata eveme mamānnamatsyanti bhokṣyaṃte janā ityabhiprāyeṇa । <quote>‘vaiśyā-
dbrāhmaṇakanyāyāṃ kṣattā nāma prajāyate । jīvikā vṛttiretasya rājāntaḥpurarakṣaṇam ।।’</quote> ityu-
ktalakṣaṇaḥ kṣattā । iyaṃ jāyeti raikvāya svakanyāsamarpaṇam । ayaṃ grāmo yasminnāsse vartase
iti tadānīṃ yatra grāme raikvaḥ sthitaḥ tasya samarpaṇam । <quote>‘te haita’</quote> ityādinā mahāvṛṣākhyeṣu
deśeṣu yeṣu grāmeṣu raikvaḥ pūrvamuṣitavān teṣāṃ raikvāya dattānāṃ raikvaparṇā ityadyāpi raikvanāmnā
prasiddhirityuktam । nanu, sarvametat bahudāyitvādikaṃ jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgaṃ na bhavati ।
tathā hi---dānaṃ tāvat śūdrasyāpyasti । <quote>‘dānaṃ ca dadyācchūdro'pi pākayajñairyajeta ca ।।’</quote> iti
smaraṇāt । śūdrādibhyaḥ pakvānnadānaṃ ca tasya sambhavati । na ca vācyaṃ bahudāyītyuktaṃ dāna-
patitvaṃ sarvatrāvasathānnirmāyānnasatrapravartanaṃ ca bahudhanasādhyaṃ na tasya sambhavati । <quote>‘śaktenāpi
hi śūdreṇa na kāryo dhanasañcayaḥ । śūdro hi dhanamāsādya brāhmaṇāneva bādhate ।।’</quote> iti tasya
bahudhanasampādananiṣedhāt iti । tasya niṣedhasya dharmaprāvaṇyarahitaśūdraviṣayatvāt । ata eva
vyāsasmṛtau <quote>‘śūdro dhanasañcayaṃ na kurvīte’</quote>ti niṣedhānantaraṃ <quote>‘rājñā vā samanujñātaḥ kāmaṃ ku-
rvīta dhārmikaḥ । pāpīyānhi dhanaṃ labdhvā vaśe kuryādgarīyasaḥ’</quote> ।। iti viśeṣaḥ smaryate । kṣattṛ-
﻿<pb n="479"/>
rdhanipatitvaṃ bahutarapakvānnadāyitvaṃ coktam । madhye ca <quote>‘sa ha saṃjihāna eva
kṣattāramuvāca’</quote> iti kṣat‍tṛpreṣaṇamuktam । ante ca <quote>‘iyaṃ jāyā ayaṃ grāmo
yasminnāsse’</quote> iti <quote>‘te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa’</quote> iti
bahugrāmapradāyitvamuktam । etairliṅaigarjānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatvamavagamyate ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
preṣaṇārthaṃ grāmadānārthaṃ cāpekṣitaṃ rājyādhipatyamapi śūdrasya sambhavatītyaveṣṭinayapūrvapakṣasiddhā-
ntapravṛttivaśādavagatam । aveṣṭyadhikaraṇe hi <quote>‘rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajete’</quote>ti vi-
hitarājasūye trayāṇāmapi varṇānāmadhikāro'sti na kṣatriyasyaiva, rājaśabdasyāryāvartaprasiddhyā
rājyapālayitṛvācitvāt caturṇāmapi varṇānāṃ rājyapālayitṛtvadarśanena śūdrasyānagnitvāvai-
dyatvapratiṣedhahetubhiradhikāraparyudāse'pi brāhmaṇavaiśyayoraparyudāsāditi pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā bhave-
devaṃ rājaśabdasya rājyapālayitṛtvārthatve । sa tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamityasminnarthe rājyaśabdani-
ṣpattyarthaṃ rājaśabdādyatpratyayavidhāyakena pāṇinismaraṇenānugṛhītayā dakṣiṇāpathaprasiddhyā kṣa-
triyasyaiva vācakaḥ । atastasyaiva tatrādhikāra iti sthāpitam । tasmātkṣatriyatvaliṅgopanyā-
so'yamaśakta iti cenna । rājabhirāvasathanirmāṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ bubhukṣūṇāṃ bhojanārthādikaṃ labhyatā-
mityanenaivābhiprāyeṇa kriyate । tataścāvasathanirmāṇoktyaiva siddho rājābhiprāyaḥ । yatpunaḥ
kīrtyate <quote>‘savarta eva me'tsyantīti’</quote> tasyāyamāśayaḥ । mamānnaṃ śūdrapatitādīnāmannamivāśraya-
duṣṭaṃ na bhavati । atassarvatassamāgatya sarve'pi brāhmaṇādayaḥ mamānnaṃ bhokṣyanta ityabhiprāyeṇa
sarvatassarveṣu brāhmaṇādimelanasthaleṣu āvasathānmāpayāñcakre iti । evamupakramagataṃ liṅgaṃ tā-
vat śūdrādvyāvṛttam । tathā madhye śruta <quote>‘miyaṃ jāye’</quote>ti liṅgamapi<quote>‘na brāhmaṇakṣatriyayorāpatsvapi
hi tiṣṭhatoḥ । kasmiṃścidapi vṛttānte śūdrā bhāryopadiśyata’</quote> iti brāhmaṇasya śūdrabhāryāyā
niṣiddhatvāt । na ca raikvasya brāhmaṇatve vipratipattiḥ kāryā । tadanveṣaṇārthaṃ preṣite kṣattari
tamanviṣya nādrākṣamiti pratyāgate sati <quote>‘yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tadenamṛcche’</quote>ti jānaśruti-
vākyena yatra tapovanādau brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇaṃ kartumucitaṃ tatra gatvainaṃ prāpnuhītyarthakena tasya
brāhmaṇatvasphuṭīkaraṇāt । tathā <quote>‘yatrāsmā uvāse’</quote>tyupasaṃhāre śrutamapi śūdrādvyāvṛttaṃ liṅgam ।
<quote>‘nādhārmikāśrite grāme na vyādhibahule tathā । na śūdrarājye nivasenna pāṣaṇḍajanairvṛta’</quote> iti
śūdrapālitarājye nivāsasya pratiṣiddhatvāt । kṣattṛpreṣaṇagrāmadānaliṅgadvayaṃ tu sākṣātkṣatriyatva
eva liṅgam । tadubhayaṃ hi pālayitṛdharmaḥ । pālanaṃ ca kṣatriyasyaiva vṛttiḥ । <quote>‘brāhmaṃ prāptena saṃ
skāraṃ kṣatriyeṇa yathāvidhi । dharmasyāsya yathānyāyaṃ kartavyaṃ parirakṣaṇa’</quote>miti smaraṇāt ।
aveṣṭyadhikaraṇe tvatiktāntaniṣedhānāṃ brāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ pālayitṛtvaṃ dṛśyamānamavalambya
pravṛttaṃ varṇāntarāṇāmapi rājasūyādhikāramāpādayatā hi pūrvapakṣiṇā svābhimataṃ rājaśabdapra-
vṛttinimittaṃ pālanaṃ varṇāntareṣvapi darśanīyaṃ śabdapravṛttinimittatvaṃ ca dharmavadadharmasyāpyasya
rājatvāderivopapadyate । ata eva tadadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣe vārtike kṣatriyasambandhitvena rājyaṃ vi-
hitamanyāyenetarau kurvāṇau na syātāmityāśaṅkya, sarvathā tāvadrājyakaraṇāttābhyāmapi rājatvaṃ
labdham । tāvatā ca rājasūyacodanāyāḥ prayojanam । yau tu nyāyānyāyau tayoḥ puruṣadharma-
tvānnaiko'pi kratuvidhinā gṛhyata iti parihṛtaṃ ca।idamapi jānaśruteḥ kṣattṛpreṣaṇādiliṅgāvagataṃ

<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। uttaratra caitrarathena liṅgāt ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
upariṣṭāccāsyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ brahmakṣatriyayorevānvayo dṛśyate <quote>‘atha śaunakaṃ ca
kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe’</quote> ityādau। atrā

jñānamupayujyate । gotrabhedena tatra prakārabhedasattvāt vidyāṅgopanayane tadabhāvāt । samidā-
haraṇānuśāsanaṃ tu adhyayanāṅgopanayanahomopayuktasamidāharaṇaṃ yena kenācitkartavyamayameva
sannihitaḥ karotvityabhiprāyeṇāpyupapadyate । tamupanīya <quote>‘kṛśānāmabalānāṃ catuśśatā gā nirā-
kṛtyovāce’</quote> tyanantaravākyagatamupanīyetyetadyadartho'yamupanayanasaṃskāraḥ tatparyantādhyayanaparami-
tyadhyayanapratipādanamapi labhyate । dṛṣṭaṃ hi <quote>‘tasmādagnicidvarṣati na dhāve’</quote>dityatrāgnicidityasya
yadartho'gneścayanasaṃskārastatparyantāgnicayanaparatvam । ata evāgnicayanāṅgakakratau bhūta eva
varṣati na dhāvedityādyagnicidvratāni na tvagnicayanasaṃskāramātre bhūta iti nirṇītaṃ pūrvatantre
kramalakṣaṇe । evaṃ copanayane satyupanītakartṛke'dhyayane nivṛtte satyācāryassamāvartanātprāk
gurudakṣiṇārthatayā mahatīṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kṛtvā tayā śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ kāṃcana brahmavidyāmayamadhi-
gacchatvityabhiprāyeṇa gavāṃ saṃrakṣaṇe niyuyuje ityuttarasaṃdarbho'pi saṅgacchate । tasmādvidyopa-
kramagatasyāpi brāhmaṇyanirdhāraṇasya upanayanārthatvenānyathāsiddhau tasyopanayanasyāpyadhyayanā-
rthatvenānyathāsiddhiḥ syāditi tulya eva nyāyaḥ । yadyucyetādhyayanārthatve'pyupanayanasya vi-
dyāṅgopākhyāne tatkīrtanamupanītasyaiva vidyāyāmadhikāra iti jñāpanārthatva eva sāphalyama-
śnuta iti । tarhi tatra brāhmaṇyanirdhāraṇavacanamapi brāhmaṇasya sata upanītasya tatrādhikāra
iti jñāpanārthatva eva sāphalyamaśnuta iti tulyam । na ca vācyaṃ <quote>‘naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktuma-
rhatī’</quote>ti śūdratvābhāvamātranirdhāraṇaṃ na tu brāhmaṇatvanirdhāraṇamiti । brahmaṇabhinnatvasya pravṛ-
ttinimittasya kṣatriyavaiśyasādhāraṇatvenābrāhmaṇaśabdasya śūdramātraviṣayatvābhāvāt <quote>‘yadbrāhma-
ṇaścābrāhmaṇaśca praśnameyātā’</quote>mityatra kṣatriyādivarṇatrayasādhāraṇyena tatprayogadarśanācca । <quote>‘nañi-
vayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagati’</quote>riti śābdikoktanyāyena brāhmaṇasadṛśatadbhinnapara-
syābrāhmaṇaśabdasya dvijanmatayā brāhmaṇenātyantasadṛśau kṣatriyavaiśyau parityajya śūdra eva
vṛttyayogācca । mātaraṃ prati brāhmaṇyaniyatagotrapraśnasya viśiṣya brāhmaṇyanirdhāraṇahetutvena
tataśśūdratvābhāvamātranirdhāraṇoktyayogācca । tasmādvidyāṅgopākhyāne brāhmaṇyanirdhāraṇavacanaṃ
brāhmaṇasyaiva vidyāyāmadhikāra ityatreva ityatreva tasyāmupanayanavacanamapyupanītasyaiva tatrādhikāra itya-
trāpi na liṅgamityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ ।।37।।</pratika>
śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe satyācāryassatyakāmamupanetuṃ pravavṛte iti <quote>‘naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatī’</quote>
tyādinocyate । na hyatrocyamāne nirdhāraṇe mātaraṃ prati gotrapraśno hetuḥ । yenedaṃ brāhmaṇyani-
rdhāraṇaṃ syāt । kiṃ tu <quote>‘na satyādagā’</quote> ityucyamānaṃ <quote>‘nāhaṃ gotraṃ veda na me mātāpi mātā
jābālā satyakāmo'ha’</quote>miti yathābhūtārthavāditvarūpaṃ satyavacanānatikramaṇam ।<quote>‘na satyādagā’</quote>
iti vākyasya varṇyamānanirdhāraṇahetuparatvāt । satyavacanānatikramaṇaṃ ca śūdratvābhāvanirdhā-
raṇa eva hetūbhavanayogyam । <quote>‘anṛtaṃ cātivādaśca paiśunyamatilobhitā । nikṛtiścābhimānaśca
janmataśśūdramāviśat ।। dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaśśūdramabhibhūtaṃ tu tāmasaiḥ ।। dvijaśuśrūṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ
śūdrāṇāṃ samakalpayat ।। na santi tāmasā bhāvāḥ śūdrāṇāṃ dvijasevanāt ।।’</quote> ityanṛtavādi-
﻿<pb n="485"/>
<quote>‘naitadabrāhmaṇo vivak‍tumarhati samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvā neṣye na satyādagāḥ’</quote>
iti satyavacanena jābālasya śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva tadupanayanānuśāsana-
vidyopadeśapravṛtteśca na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ ।।
nanupanayanābhāve brahmoccāraṇaniṣedhaḥ kvācitkaḥ sārvatriko vā । na sārvatrikaḥ ।
śiśorupanayanābhāve'pi <quote>‘na brahmābhivyāhārayedanyatra svadhāninayanāt’</quote> iti sva-
dhāninayane brahmoccāraṇavidhānāt । tena kvācitka iti yujyate । ataḥ śūdrasyā-
nupanītasya pākayajñādiṣu brahmoccāraṇaniṣedho na brahmavidyāyāmityāśaṅkāyāmāha---

tvasya śūdreṣu prasiddhatvāt । evaṃ ca sādhāraṇasyāpi abrāhmaṇaśabdasya hetuvacanānusāreṇātra
viśiṣya śūdre tātparyameṣṭavyam । ataḥ pūrvasūtrokte liṅge na kācidanupapattiḥ । pratyutedamapi
vidyādhikāriṇaśśūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇaṃ śūdrasya vidyānadhikāre liṅgāntaramityabhipretya sūtraṃ
vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>naitadabrāhmaṇa iti ।।</pratika> nanu vidyāprakaraṇe adhyayanāṅgopanayanaparāmarśastadvatāmeva
vidyādhikāra ityatra liṅgamiti yaduktaṃ tatredaṃ vicāraṇīyam । adhyayanāṅgamupanayanamadhyayana
iva vidyāyāṃ nopaneyāsattidvāropayujyate । tadarthasya vidyopadeśakāle kartavyasya vidyāṅgopa-
nayanasya sattvāt । nāpyadhyayanena vidyopayuktasakalavedavākyāvāptidvārā । svasvaśākhāmātra-
viṣayavidhivihitenādhyayanena śākhāntaragatatadupayuktavākyānāmavāptyasambhavāt । kiṃ tu<quote>‘na
brahmābhivyāhārayedanyatra svadhāninayanāt’</quote> <quote>‘nābhivyāhārayedbrahma svadhāninayanādṛta’</quote> ityanupanī-
tasya vedavākyagrahaṇaṃ niṣiddhamiti vidyopayuktasvaparaśākhāgatasakalavākyagrahaṇārthaṃ tanniṣedhaṃ
tanniṣedhāviṣayatvasampādanadvāretyupapādanīyam । tataśca śūdrasyānupanītasya vedavākyoccāraṇa-
niṣedhādeva praṇavādimantravatīṣu vedāntavākyaśravaṇamananapūrvikāsu ca daharapāśupatādivi-
dyāsu nādhikāraḥ । vidyāprakaraṇe adhyayanāṅgopanayanaparāmarśasyātrānyārthadarśanaṃ liṅgamityeva
paryavasyati । na tvetadyuktam । anupanītānāṃ vedavākyagrahaṇaniṣedho hi na sarvavedavākyavi-
ṣayaḥ । traivarṇikānāṃ mātāpitroḥ paitṛmedhike karmaṇi tadupayuktavedavākyoccāraṇasyopanayanā-
bhāve'pi smṛtyanumatatvāt । kiṃ tu tadatiriktavedavākyaviṣaya iti vaktavyam । evaṃ śūdra-
syāpyanupanītasya vedavākyoccāraṇaniṣedhaḥ sarvaviṣayo mābhūt । vidyānupayogipākayajñādyape-
kṣitamantrādiviṣayo'stu । asti hi śūdrasyāpi pākayajñādhikāraḥ । <quote>‘dānaṃ ca dadyācchūdro-
'pi pākayajñairyajeta ce’</quote>ti smaraṇāt । tadaṅgamantroccāraṇaviṣayaḥ śūdrasya vedavākyoccāraṇani-
ṣedhaḥ । ata eva gautamasmṛtau śūdradharmaprakaraṇe <quote>‘pākayajñaiḥ svayaṃ yajete’</quote>ti śloke anujñāto-
'sya namaskāro mantra iti teṣāṃ laukiko namo'ntamantra evoktaḥ । tasmādupanayanābhāve'pi
śūdrasya vi dhikārassaṅgacchate । vidyāprakaraṇe dṛṣṭasyāpi śūdrasyāpi śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇasya
upanayanārthatvādupanayanasya cādhyayanārthatvāt anyārthapravṛttaṃ talliṅgadvayaṃ muktyarthitvena sāmā-
nyataḥ prāptasya śūdrāṇāṃ vidyādhikārasya na vyāvartakamiti śaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati
<pratika>nanvati</pratika> । yadyapi traivarṇikānāmupanayanābhāve'pi kvacidvedavākyoccāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamityetadava-
lambya tadvadeva śūdrāṇāmapi kvacidvedavākyoccāraṇamastviti śaṅkā mandā । tathāpi saṃvarga-
vidyāyāṃ kvacidupākhyāne brāhmaṇasya dvitīyaḥ kṣatriyo dṛṣṭa ityetadavalambya upākhyānāntare-

<sutra> ।। sū॰ ।। śravaṇādhyayanārthapratiṣedhāt ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
śūdrasya vedavākyaśravaṇādi niṣidhyate <quote>‘tasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam’</quote> iti ।
anupaśṛṇvataḥ kuto'dhyayanādiprasaktiḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। smṛteśca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
smaryate ca śūdrasya vedaśravaṇādau daṇḍaḥ <quote>‘atha hāsya vedamupaśṛṇvatastrapujatubhyāṃ
śrotrapratipūraṇam udāharaṇe jihvācchedaḥ dhāraṇe śarīrabhedaḥ’</quote> iti । evaṃ śrutismṛ-
tibhyāṃ śūdrasamīpe'dhyayanādiniṣedhāt kutasteṣāṃ vedārthavicārādikam । ataḥ sa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
'pi tatheti nirṇītavantaṃ siddhāntinaṃ pratyeva śaṅkā yukteti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। śravaṇādhyaya-
nārthapratiṣedhāt ।। 38 ।।</pratika> śūdrasya vedavākyaśravaṇatadadhyayanatadarthavicārajñānānuṣṭhānāni śūdra-
samīpe'dhyayananiṣedhenārthāt pratiṣidhyante । yasya hi samīpe'pi nādhyetavyaṃ vedavākyaṃ sa
tatkathaṃ śṛṇuyāt aśrṛṇvataḥ kuto'dhyayanaṃ tadabhāve kuto'rthajñānamanuṣṭhānaṃ veti sūtrārthama-
bhipretya vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>śūdrasyeti ।</pratika> na kevalaṃ śūdrasamīpe vedoccāraṇaniṣedhasāmarthyāt śūdrasya
śravaṇādipratiṣedhasiddhiḥ । api tu śravaṇādau daṇḍasmaraṇāccetyetadarthaṃ sūtram <pratika>।।smṛteśca।।39।।</pratika>
kutasteṣāṃ vedārthavicārādikamityetatsiṃhāvalokananyāyena pūrvasūtrasthārthapadavivaraṇaṃ sūtradvaya-
syāpyekaprayojanatvādihetukam । evaṃ ca śūdraviṣaya eva sākṣādvedavākyoccāraṇādipratiṣedhasya
sattvādanupanītānāṃ vedavākyoccāraṇaniṣedhasya śūdraviṣaye pākayajñādyarthamantraviṣayatvenāsaṅko-
canīyatayā upanayanarāhityenāpi hetunā śūdrāṇāṃ vedavākyoccāraṇāsambhavānna vidyādhikāra
ityupasaṃharati---<pratika>atra iti ।</pratika> syādetat । śūdrasyānupanītatvena śūdratvena ca hetunā śūdrāṇāṃ
vedavākyoccāraṇādiniṣedhāt na tadapekṣāsu vidyāsu adhikāra ityadhikaraṇasya niṣkṛṣṭo'rthaḥ ।
nāyamupapadyate । niṣādasyeva śūdrasya vedoccāraṇe vidhyākṣipte puruṣārthaniṣedhāpravṛtteḥ । na ca
vācyaṃ viśiṣya niṣādaṃ prati iṣṭivādhinā tasya tadupayogimantroccāraṇākṣepo yuktaḥ । na tathā
śūdrāṇāṃ viśiṣya vidyāvidhānamasti । sāmānyavidhayastvadhyayanalabdhamahāvākyādigrahaṇeṣu
traivarṇikeṣu caritārthā iti । traivarṇikānāmapi <quote>‘svādhyāyo'dhyetavya’</quote> iti pitṛpitāmahādi-
paramparāgatasvaśākhāmātra evādhyayanasya vihitatvena śākhāntaragataguṇamantropasaṃhāreṇa vidyā-
nuṣṭhānārthaṃ śākhāntaragatatattadvākyārthagrahaṇāvaśyambhāvena tathaiva śūdrasyāpi vidyātadaṅgaviṣaya-
vedavākyagrahaṇākṣepopapatteḥ । na ca vācyaṃ śūdrasya vidyānuṣṭhānāpekṣitaṃ kārtsnyena tadartha-
tayākṣepaṇīyam । traivarṇikānāṃ tu śākhāntarāmnātagocaramātramityākṣepalāghavādvidyāvi-
dhayastraivarṇikānevādhikuryuḥ na śūdramiti । evaṃ tarhi yasya karmaṇaḥ upāsanasya vā yasyāṃ
śākhāyāṃ bhūyasāmaṅgānāṃ vidyānāṃ bhūyastvenobhayaśrutinyāyena pradhānasyāpi tatra vidhānaṃ
śākhāntare kiñcidaṅgamantravidhānaṃ tatra karmaṇyupāsane vā tacchākhādhyāyināmevādhikārassyā-
t । yasya kṣudrasya karmaṇaḥ sāṅgasya kasyāñcideva śākhāyāṃ vidhānaṃ tatrāpi tacchākhādhyā-
yināmevādhikāraḥ syāt । tasmāntraivarṇikānāmapyanuṣṭhānopayogijñānākṣepasya sampratipannatvā-
t tadvacchūdrasyāpi vidyānuṣṭhānopayogijñānākṣepassambhavati । na hi vṛttyarthaṃ yājane prāpte
﻿<pb n="487"/>
brāhmaṇairevārtvijyamiva svasvaśākhāmātraviṣayādhyayanajanyajñānenaiva traivarṇikānāṃ vidyānuṣṭhā-
naṃ nirvartate । yenārtvijyārthaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoriva teṣāṃ vidyānuṣṭhānārthamanadhītaśākhāntara-
janyajñānasyānākṣepyatvāt tadda‍ṛṣṭāntena śūdrāṇāmapi tadupayuktavedārthajñānaṃ nākṣipyeta । avaśyaṃ
ca strīṇāṃ vidyānuṣṭhānamevamevopapādanīyam । anyathādhyayanābhāvena śūdrasya vidyāpratyākhyāne
maitreyīvācaknavīprabhṛtīnāṃ brahmavidyāvāptau kā gatiḥ । atratyasya śūdraśabdasya kṣatriya iva
<quote>‘atha ha yājñavalkyasya dve bhārye babhūvaturmaitrīyī ca kātyāyanī ce’</quote> tyādiṣu vidyāṅgopākhyā-
neṣu śrutānāṃ maitreyyādiśabdānāṃ puruṣeṣu vṛttissiddhāntināpi kalpayituṃ na śakyate । tasmā-
dyathā <quote>‘sa kratuṃ kurvīte’</quote> tyādividyāvidhiṣu adhikāriṇi śrutasyāpi puṃstvasya uddeśyaviśeṣa-
ṇatvenāvivakṣitatvāt strīṇāṃ vidyāsvadhikāraḥ । ata eva pūrvatantre <quote>‘svargakāmo yajete’</quote> tyā-
dividhivākyeṣu adhikāriṇi pulliṅganirdeśāt pumadhikārikameva yāgādikaṃ karmeti ‘liṅgavi-
śeṣanirdeśāt <quote>‘puṃyuktamaitiśāyana’</quote> iti sūtre pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā <quote>‘jātiṃ tu bādarāyaṇo'viśeṣāt
tasmāt stryapi pratīyeta jātyarthasyāviśiṣṭatvā’</quote> diti sūtreṇa svargakāmadharmasya svargakāmapada-
pravṛttinimittasya striyāmapyaviśiṣṭatvāt sāpi karmaṇyadhikāriṇīti siddhāntitam । tathā śū-
drasyāpi vidyāvidhiśrutaphalārthitvāviśeṣāt asti vidyādhikāra ityeva yuktam । iyāṃstu
viśeṣaḥ । phalārthitvāviśeṣe'pi <quote>‘tasmācchūdro yajñe'navaklṛpta’</quote> iti niṣedhānnāsti śūdrasya kratva-
dhikāra iti । tasmānniṣādaṃ prati viśiṣyeṣṭividhermuktyarthinaṃ prati sāmānyena vidhānaṃ ca
nāsti tattadanuṣṭhānopayogivedavākyagrahaṇatadarthagrahaṇākṣepakatve viśeṣaḥ । kiṃ ca mābhūcchū-
drāṇāṃ vidhyākṣepeṇa vidyopayuktavedavākyatadarthagrahaṇalābhaḥ । muktyarthināṃ teṣāṃ vidyānuṣṭhāna-
sampattaye śūdratvānupanītatvaprayuktaṃ pratiṣedhamullaṅghyādhyayanaṃ likhitapāṭhādinā bhaviṣyati ।
pratiṣiddhānuṣṭhānena duritaṃ bhavediti niścayavatāmapi kūpakhānakanyāyena pravṛttirupapadyate ।
yathā khalu salilalābhārthena kūlakhananena dehasya dhūsaratvaṃ bhavediti niścayavatāmapi khanano-
dgatena salilena tasya kṣālanaṃ bhaviṣyatītyabhisandhinā kūpakhanane pravṛttiḥ tathā vidyālābhā-
rthena vedavākyatadarthagrahaṇena duritaṃ bhavediti niścayavatāmapi śūdrāṇāṃ tathaiva vidyayā prāra-
bdhetarasakaladuritadhvaṃsakāriṇyā tasyāpi duritasya nivṛttirbhavedityabhisandhinā pratiṣedhamu-
llaṅghya vedavākyatadarthagrahaṇe pravṛttirupapadyata eva । api ca mābhūcchūdrāṇāṃ pratiṣiddhaśravaṇā-
dikena vedena vidyopayuktavedārthagrahaṇam । na hyāhavanīyādiṣu ādhānamiva vedārthagrahaṇe veda
evopāyaḥ।purāṇādīnāmapi sattvāt vedādhyayanādhīnameva vedārthagrahaṇamanuṣṭhānāṅgamiti niyama
syāhatatvāt । nanu, yadyapyuktarītyādhyayanāṅgopanayanarahitatve'pi vidyādhikāraḥ śūdrāṇāṃ
sambhāvayituṃ śakyate, tathāpi nāsau yujyate । teṣāṃ vidyāṅgopanayanāsambhavāt । asti khalva-
dhyayanāṅgopanayanādanyadvidyāṅgamupanayanaṃ <quote>‘tadvijñānārthaṃ sagurumevābhigacche’</quote> diti vihite gurū-
pasadane <quote>‘adhīhi bhagava’</quote> iti mantrapūrvakaṃ <quote>‘śiṣyaste'haṃ śādhi mā’</quote> miti prārthayamānena kriya-
māṇe tasya śiṣyatvamaṅgīkṛtya guruṇā kriyamāṇamanujñādānādinā svasamīpaprāpaṇarūpam । tadetat
<quote>‘bhṛgurvai vāruṇirvaruṇaṃ pitaramupasasārādhīhi bhagavo brahmeti’</quote> <quote>‘adhīhi bhagavo brahmetyupasasāra
sanatkumāraṃ nārada’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣūpasannebhyo vidyopadeśenārthātsiddhaṃ prajāpatividyāyāṃ <quote>‘vasā-
﻿<pb n="488"/>
parāṇi dvātriṃśadvarṣāṃṇī’</quote> tyagretanavacanairapi sphuṭīkṛtam । vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ <quote>‘te ha samitpāṇayaḥ
pūrvāhṇe praticakramire tānhānupanīyaitaduvāce’</quote> ti vākyena bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde vidhivadu-
pasadanodyuktaṃ bālākiṃ prati <quote>‘pratilomarūpameva syāt yat kṣatriyo brāhmaṇamupanaye’</quote> dityajāta-
śatruvākyena cācāryasyāvaraṇavarṇanayā upanetṛsadbhāvaṃ pratipādayatā hyatra vidyāṅgopanayanasattvaṃ
vyañcitam । <quote>‘taṃ hopaninya’</quote> ityādau kaṇṭhataścoktam । tadetadvidyāṅgamupanayanaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ na
sambhavati । <quote>‘na ca saṃskāramarhatī’</quote> ti pratiṣedhāt tadasambhave cāṅgavaikalyenānuṣṭhitāpi vidyā
phalāya nālamiti kūpakhanananyāyenāpi tatra pravṛttirnopapadyata iti cenmaivam । śūdrāṇāmama-
ntrasaṃskārābhyanujñānena strīṇāmivāmantrakavidyāṅgopanayanasambhavāt । ata eva maitreyībrā-
hmaṇe <quote>‘yadeva bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhī’</quote> tyamantrakaṃ vidyopadeśaṃ prārthayamānāṃ maitreyīṃ prati <quote>‘e-
hyāsva vyākhyāsyāmi vyācakṣāṇasya tu me nidadhyāsasveti’</quote> vidyārthaṃ samīpasthityabhyanujñānaṃ
kṛtamiti śrūyate । <quote>‘śūdraścaturtho varṇaḥ ekajāti’</quote> rityanena tu śūdrasya dvitīyajanmarūpamadhyaya-
nāṅgopanayanameva niṣidhyate na tu vidyāṅgopanayanam । nanu tathāpi vidyāprakaraṇe śūdratvā-
bhāvanirdhāraṇāmālliṅgāt śūdrasya vidyānadhikārassiddhyati । na ca tatsamanantarapratipādye adhya-
yanāṅgopanayane pravṛttyartham । satyapi śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe brāhmaṇādijātibhedena prakārabhe-
davatyupadeśyagāyatrībhedavati ca upanayane pravṛttyarthaṃ varṇatrayamadhye'pi jātibhedanirdhāraṇasyā-
vaśyopapādanīyatayā tata evopanayananirvāheṇa tatra śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇasyākiñcitkaratvāt ।
mātaraṃ prati gotrapraśnena brāhmaṇyanirdhāraṇasyopapatteśca । śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇānantaramadhyayanā-
ṅgopanayane varṇyamāne kathaṃ tacchūdrasya vidyānadhikāre liṅgaṃ syāt । itthaṃ satyakāmena <quote>‘brahma-
caryaṃ bhagavati vatsyāmi upeyāṃ bhagavanta’</quote> mityadhyayanārthavidyārthopanayanadvayasādhāraṇarūpamupa-
gamanaṃ kṛtam । tatra yadi śūdrasya vidyādhikāraḥ syāt tadā satyakāmaśśūdrassannadhyayanāṅgopa-
nayanānarho'pi vidyārthamupagata iti vidyāṅgopanayanena saṃskṛtya vidyāṃ grāhayituṃ yogyo bha/?/t ।
tathā sati śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇamapekṣya samidāharaṇārthaṃ na niyujyeta । tasya tadanadhikāre tu
asya śūdratvābhāve niścite satyupanītacihnarahitatvādakṛtādhyayanāṅgopanayano'yaṃ prathamaṃ tena
saṃskṛtyādhyāpanīyaḥ tato vidyākāmaścet krameṇa tāmapi grāhayitavya ityālocya gautamena
śūdratvābhāvaniścayānantaramupaninīṣuṇā samidāharaṇārthaṃ tasya niyogaḥ kṛta iti saṅgacchate
iti tatassatyavacanena śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇaliṅgādvidyāyāṃ śūdro nādhikārīti cet । asmā-
deva liṅgādvidyāyāṃ śūdro'dhikārīti brūmaḥ । yadi hi śūdro'dhyayana iva vidyāyāmapyanadhi-
kārī bhavettadā yadīdamasyopagamanamadhyayanārthaṃ yadi vā vidyārtham । ubhayathāpi tata eva nāyaṃ
śūdra iti nirṇayasambhavāt tadanantaraṃ tannirṇayārthaṃ satyavacanaṃ nāpekṣyeta । tasya tadadhikārasa-
dbhāve tu vidyārthopagamanasya śūdre'pi sambhavāt agre satyavacananaiva tanniṇaya iti yujyate ।
śūdrasya vidyādhikārasattve śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇaṃ kvopayujyata iti cet । adhyayanāṅgopanayana
evopayujyate । tathā hi---upagamanaṃ kurvannupanītacihnarahito'yaṃ kimadhyayanārthī traivarṇikaḥ
kiṃ vā vidyārthī śūdra iti sandigdho'bhūt । tasya gotrapraśno na tadgotraviśeṣanirdidhārayi-
ṣayā । śūdratvaparyantasandehānudayāt <quote>‘naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatī’</quote> ti tannirṇayātprāk brāhma-

ṇyanirdhāraṇādhīnasya gotraviśeṣapraśnasyānavasaraduḥsthatvāt । kiṃ tu gotrapraśne kimayaṃ vakṣyatīti
