saṃvṛtaṃ nāma tamassaha tenaiva gacchatī’</quote>ti tatsampradānasya śūdrasyāpi pratyavāyaḥ śrūyate । na hi
svānuṣṭheyadharmagrahaṇe pratyavāyo'sti । etena śūdrāṇāṃ vidyopayuktavedārthagrahaṇaṃ likhitapāṭhā-
digṛhītena vedena bhaviṣyati । vidhyākṣipte pratiṣedhāpravṛtteḥ । kūpakhānakanyāyataḥ pratiṣedho-
llaṅghanena vā bhaviṣyati purāṇādinā veti nirastam । taṣāmanuṣṭhānaprasaktau hi tadapekṣitavedā-
rthagrahaṇaprāptiḥ । saiva nāstītyuktam <quote>‘upanayanābhāvā’</quote>diti hetubhiḥ । nanūpanayanābhāvaśśūdrasya
tanniṣedhāditi tadabhāve'pi tasya vidyānuṣṭhānaṃ syāt । yasyādhikāriṇo yasminkarmaṇi yadaṅgaṃ
niṣiddhaṃ tasya tadatiriktāṅgamātrasahitāttasmātkarmaṇaḥ phalaniṣpatterabhyupagamāt । abhyupa-
gamyate hi rājanyasya somabhakṣaṇaṃ niṣiddhamiti tasya bhakṣaṇarūpapratipattirahitātsomayā-
gātphalaniṣpattiḥ । anūcānasya prathamayajñe pravargyo niṣiddha iti tasya tadrahitāttataḥ
phalaniṣpattiḥ । kiṃca । ekaphalakānekapradhānamadhye yasya yatpradhānaṃ niṣiddhaṃ yathā darśapū-
rṇāmāsayorasomayājinassānnāyyayāgaḥ agnīṣomīyapuroḍāśayāgaśca niṣiddhaḥ tasya tadatiri-
ktapradhānaireva phalaniṣpattirabhyupagamyate । niṣedhāt kiñcitpradhānānuṣṭhāne'pi phalanippattau
tato'ṅgānanuṣṭhāne phalaniṣpattiriti kimu vaktavyam । yeṣāmaniṣiddhamapyaṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ vopasaṃha-
rtumaśakyaṃ yathā ṛṣīṇāmārṣeyavaraṇamatryārṣeyāṇāṃ tryārṣeyavaraṇamapratisamādheyāṅgavaikalyānā-
mājyāvokṣaṇaviṣṇukramaṇādikaṃ devatādīnāṃ devatoddeśādikaṃ copasaṃhartumaśakyaṃ teṣāṃ tu tatra
tatrādhikāraḥ । tataśca niṣedhācchūdrāṇāmupanayanābhāve'pi vidyānuṣṭhānaṃ syāditi cet ।
ucyate । somayāgādiṣu kṣatriyādīnāmadhikāramanumatyaiva kasyacidaṅgasya pradhānasya vā niṣedha
iti tatra tathā bhavatu nāma । iha tu saṃskāraniṣedhaḥ saṃskārāpekṣavidhipratiṣedhānadhikārārtha
iti kathaṃ tathā syāt । evaṃ hi mānave dharmaśāstre smaryate---<quote>‘na śūdre pātakaṃ kiñcinna ca
saṃskāramarhati । nāsyādhikāro dharme'sti nādharmātpratiṣedhana’</quote>miti । atra sāmānyena vidhi-
pratiṣedhamātrānadhikāraḥ śūdrasya nocyate । upanayanādisaṃskāranirapekṣeṣu paropakārādidharmeṣu
hiṃsānṛtādyadharmapratiṣedheṣu ca tasyāpyadhikārasambhavāt । ‘kiṃ tu saṃskāraniṣedhasannidhānāt
saṃskārāpekṣeṣu sandhyāvandanādikarmasu <quote>‘nādityamīkṣeta’</quote> <quote>‘nāgnimapaśca yugapaddhārayet’</quote> <quote>‘nāñja-
linā pibe’</quote>dityādiniṣedheṣu vānadhikāra ucyate । <quote>‘na śūdre pātakaṃ kiñcidi’</quote>ti ca saṃskā-
rāpekṣavidhipratiṣedhollaṅghane ca duritābhāva ucyate tadanadhikāradraḍhimasiddhaye । tasmādyukto'ya-
mupanayanasaṃskārābhāvena śūdrāṇāṃ brahmavidyānadhikāropasaṃhāraḥ <pratika>।। ityapaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।।8।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyāṃ atha apaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū । śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāttadādravaṇātsūcyate hi ।। 33 ।। kṣatriyatvagateśca ।। 34 ।। uttaratracaitrara-
thena liṅgāt ।। 35 ।। saṃskāraparāmarśāttadabhāvābhilāpācca ।। 36 ।। tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ।।37।।
śravaṇādhyayanapratiṣedhāt ।। 38 ।। smṛteśca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tarhyastu tāsu śūdro'pyarthitvādbrahmavidyāsu । itihāsapurāṇābhyāmadhikṛttasyādhikāradṛṣṭeśca ।। 64 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vedopabṛhaṇatayā vidyārthe te na tu svatantratayā । vidurādyāḥ svayamudgatavidyā jānaśrutistu nṛpaḥ ।। 65 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityapaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="493"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha apaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāttadādravaṇātsūcyate hi ।। 34 ।। kṣatriyatvagateścottaratra caitrarathena li-
ṅgāt ।। 35 ।। saṃskāraparāmarśāttadabhāvābhilāpācca ।। 36 ।। tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ ।। 37 ।।
śravaṇādhyayanārthapratiṣedhātsmṛteśca ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ <quote>‘tadyo yo devanā’</quote>miti devaśabdaśratyā manuṣyādhikāraniyamamapodya devānāmadhikārassādhitaḥ ।
tatheha śūdraśabdaśrutyā dvijātyadhikāramapodya śūdasyāpyadhikāro'stviti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyedamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<pratika>śugasya tadanāda-
raśravaṇāttadādravaṇātsūcyate hi ।। 34 ।।</pratika> asya chāndogye saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ <quote>‘ahahāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhi
rastu’</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra śrūyamāṇasya śūdrasya brahmavidyāyāmadhikāro'sti vā nāsti veti saṃśayaḥ । śūdrasyāpyarthitvasāmarthya-
yossaṃbhavāt <quote>‘tasmācchūdro yajñe'navaklṛpta’</quote> iti yajñādhikāraniṣedhavadbrahmavidyādhikāraniṣedhāśravaṇāt śūdāṇāṃ viduraprabhṛtīnāṃ viśi-
ṣṭavijñānasaṃpatteḥ smaraṇācca asti śūdrasyāpyadhikāro brahmavidyāsviti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, śūdrasya vedādhyayanābhāvāt
śāstrīye'rthe śāstrīyasya sāmarthyasyāpekṣitatvāt adhyayananirākaraṇena tasya nirākṛtatvāt asati sāmarthye'rthitvasyādhikārakā-
raṇatvāsaṃbhavatā haṃsavākyādātmano'nādaraṃ śrutavato jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya utpannaśucaḥ <quote>‘śucamabhidudrāva, śucāvābhidudruve, śucā
vā raikvama/?/bhidudrāveti śūdraḥ’</quote> iti yaigikārthapareṇa śūdraśabdena samāmantraṇamityarthavarṇanasya saṃpratipatteśca na jātiśūdrasya brahmavidyā-
svadhikāra iti । sūtrārthastu <pratika>asya</pratika>=jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyasya । <pratika>tadanādaraśravaṇāt</pratika>=tasya haṃsasya <quote>‘kaṃ vara enametatsantaṃ sayu-
gvānamiva raikvamāttha’</quote> ityanādaradyotakavākyasya śravaṇāt । yā śugutpannā sā <pratika>tadādravaṇāt</pratika>=taṃ raikvaṃ prati jānaśrutirvi-
dyārāhityajanitayā śucā dudrāveti śravaṇāt । <pratika>sūcyate hi</pratika> । ato jānaśruterjātiśūdratvābhāvāt na śūdrasya brahmavidyāsva-
dhikāra iti bhāvaḥ ।। iti ।।</p>
<p>nanu mukhya eva śūdro jānaśrutirastu kiṃ gauṇena yogenetyata āha---<pratika>sū ।। kṣatriyatvagateścottaratra caitrarathena liṃgāt
।। 35 ।।</pratika> jānaśrutirna mukhyāśu/?/draḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>uttaratra</pratika>=savargavidyāvākyaśeṣe । caitrarathena prasiddhakṣatriyeṇābhipratāriṇā ।
<pratika>liṃgāt</pratika>=samabhivyāhārarūpaliṅgāt । <pratika>kṣatriyatvagateḥ</pratika>=jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatvasyāvagamyamānatvāt । samānajātīyānāmeva hi
prāyeṇa sahacāro bhavatīti bhāvaḥ । ato na jātiśūdrasya brahmavidyādhikāra iti siddham ।।</p>
<p>nanu, kasmānnādhikāra ityata āha---<pratika>sū ।। saṃskāraparāmarśāttadabhāvābhilāpācca ।। 36 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘taṃ hopaninye’</quote>
<quote>‘adhīhi bhagava iti hopasasāda’</quote>ityādividyāpradeśeṣu upanayanādisaṃskāraparāmarśāt । <pratika>tadabhāvābhilāpācca</pratika>=<quote>‘na śūdre pātakaṃ
kiṃcinna ca saṃskāramarhati ।’</quote> ityādinā śūdrasyopanayanādisaṃskārābhāvābhidhānācca ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kiṃ ca । <pratika>sū ।। tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ ।। 37 ।।</pratika> tasya jābālasya satyavacanena śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva
gautamasya vidyopadeśe pravṛttidarśanādityarthaḥ । ato na śūdrasyādhikāra ita bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<p>api ca <pratika>।। sū ।। śravaṇādhyayanārthaprattiṣedhātsmṛteśca ।। 38 ।। smṛteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘athāsya vedamupaśṛṇvatastrapujatubhyāṃ
śrotrapratipūraṇam’</quote> <quote>‘tasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam’</quote> <quote>‘na śūdrāya mati dadyāt’</quote> dvijātīnāmadhyayanamijyā dānam’ ityādismṛtitaḥ ।
<pratika>śravaṇādhyayanārthapratiṣedhācca</pratika>=vedaśravaṇasya tadadhyayanasya tadarthayojanayorarthajñānānuṣṭhānayośca pratiṣedhācca ityarthaḥ । ataḥ
<quote>‘śrāvayeccaturo varṇān’</quote> iti cetihāsapurāṇādhigame cāturvarṇyasyādhikārasmaraṇācca pratiṣedhācca śūdrāṇāṃ vedapūrvako brahmavi-
dyāyāmadhikāra iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, saṃdehapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ samānameva । viṣayavākye tu prakaraṇabhedābhāve'pi śūdraśabdaghaṭitaṃ vākyā-
ntaramupādīyate iti viśeṣaḥ । bhagavatpādamate tu <quote>‘ahahāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhirastu’</quote> iti vākyaṃ viṣayatayopāttam ।
<quote>‘ājahāremāḥ śūdrānena mukhenālāpayiṣyatha’</quote> iti vākyaṃ tu atra viṣayatayodāhṛtam । pūrvasminmate sūtrapañcakātmakamidamadhikaraṇaṃ
yogavibhāgena sūtradvayagatena <quote>‘kṣatriyatvagateśca’</quote> <quote>‘smṛteśca’</quote> iti pṛthaksūtratāpādanarūpeṇeha sūtrasaptakātmatāmupanītam । kvacitkva/?/citsū-
trārthopapādanaprakārāṇāṃ bhinnatve'pi pūrvapakṣasiddhāntanirṇayādiṣvaikakaṇṭhyadarśanādviramyate pṛthakprapañcanataḥ । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhīyamatasādhāraṇameveti viramyate ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavatpādīyamatavadeva । kvacatkvacitsūtrārthavarṇane paramasti kiyāniva
bhedaḥ । sa eva tattatsūtrārthanirūpaṇena sphuṭīkariṣyate । <pratika><quote>‘śugasye’</quote></pratika>ti sūtrārtho'viśiṣṭaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। kṣatriyatvāvagateścottaratra-
caitrarathena ligāt ।।34।।</pratika> caḥ liṅgāntarapa/?/muccaye । <pratika>uttaratra</pratika>=aśvatarīratha ityuttaravākye । śrutenetiśeṣaḥ । <pratika>caitrarathena</pratika>=
citraśabdādaśvatarīyuktarathasaṃbandhitvarūpeṇa । <pratika>liṃgāt</pratika>=liṃgena ca jñāpakena <pratika>kṣatriyatvāvagateśca</pratika>=kṣatriyatvajñānāt na pautrā-
yaṇaḥ śūdra iti bhāvaḥ । itarāṇi sūtrāṇyanativibhinnārthānīti na tāni prapañcayante ।।</p>
<head>।। iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmapaśūdrādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="494"/>
<head>atha kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
evaṃ prāsaṅgikamadhikārinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtvā prakṛtamanusarati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। kampanāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
aṅguṣṭhapramitapuruṣaprakaraṇe kaṭhavallīṣu śrūyate—
<quote>‘yadidaṃ kiṃca jagat sarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam । mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyataṃ ya eta-
dviduramṛtāste bhavanti ।।’</quote> iti ।। tatra kampanahetuḥ parameśvaro'nyo veti saṃśayaḥ ।
atra prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭajanitabhayena sakalajagatkampanamucyate । parameśvarasya
sakalajagadabhayapradānamadhurasvabhāvasya paramakāruṇikasya jagatkampanahetutvamayu-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>।। atha kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>prāsaṅgikamiti</pratika> । manuṣyādhikāroktiprasaṅgādāgatam । de-
vādayo'pyupāsanādhikāriṇaḥ । manuṣyeṣu apaśūdrāstrayo varṇāḥ ityadhikāranirūpaṇaṃ kṛtvā ।
tena tatra manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ na manuṣyāṇāmevādhikāra iti manuṣyavyatiriktasarvavyāvartakaṃ nāpi
sarveṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmadhikāra iti sarvamanuṣyasaṅgrāhakaṃ kiṃ tu tiryagādivyāvartakam । tathā cā-
dhikāriṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ svasvāṅguṣṭhaparimitaṃ hṛdayamastīti aṅguṣṭhamātratvaśravaṇasya na kācidanupapa-
ttiriti pradarśya prakṛtamaṅguṣṭhavākyavicāramevānusṛtya tatprakaraṇapaṭhitavākyāntaravicāraṃ karo-
tītyarthaḥ । anena vakṣyamāṇādhikaraṇasyāṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇena saṅgatyā pravṛttiḥ na tu prāsaṅgikenā-
dhikāravicāreṇeti darśitaṃ bhavati <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। sampanāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> atra prakaraṇena prāṇavajra-
śrutibhyāṃ ca saṃśayamabhipretya prakaraṇakīrtanapurassaraṃ prāṇavajraśrutiyuktaṃ viṣayavākyamudāha-
rati—aṅguṣṭheti । śrutyapekṣayā prakaraṇasya svato durbalatve'pi śrutidvayamiha parasparavirodhāt
antaśchidrāpāditadaurbalyaṃ na tathā prakaraṇamiti tathābhūtayoḥ śrutiprakaraṇayorbalābalānava-
dhāraṇāt saṃśayo yukta iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>anyo veti</pratika> । aśaniḥ prāṇavāyurvetyarthaḥ । aśanipū-
rvapakṣaṃ tāvadupapādayati—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । atra hi mantre prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭanimittakaṃ kampanamucyate ।
tattu tajjanitabhayahetukameva । uttarārdhe tasyaiva prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭa <quote>‘syaita’</quote>diti parāmṛṣṭasya mahā-
bhayahetutvena viśeṣitatvāt bhayapadaṃ ‘bibhetyasmādityapādānaviṣaya ecpratyayāntaṃ bhītihetupa-
ram । na tu bhāvapratyayāntaṃ bhītiparam । vajrapadasāmānādhikaraṇyātprāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭadharmaparā-
marśakaitatpadasāmānādhikaraṇyācceti bhāvaḥ । astvevaṃ tataḥ kimityata āha---<pratika>parameśvarasye-
ti</pratika> । nanu tathābhūtasyāpi parameśvarasya śāsakatayā bhayahetutvaṃ bhūpālāderiva yuktam । śrayate
cānantaramantra eva tasya bhayahetutvaṃ <quote>‘bhayādasyāgnistapati bhayāttapati sūryaḥ । bhayādindraśca
vāyuśca mṛtyurdhāvati pañcama’</quote>iti । na hi tasyāpi mantrasyāśanivaratvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam । aśanito
bhayenāgnyādīnāṃ svasvakāryeṣu pravṛtteranupapatteḥ । ānandamayaprakaraṇe, <quote>‘bhīṣāsmādvātaḥ pavata’</quote>
iti parameśvarādbhayenaiva devānāṃ svasvakāryeṣu pravṛtteruktatvāt । kiṃ ca viṣayavākyopāttaṃ
sarvajagadbhayahetutvamasaṅkucitasakalaśāsakasya parameśvarasyaiva sambhavati na tvaśaneḥ katipayakṣu-
draprāṇibhītihetoḥ । api ca prakaraṇamidaṃ parameśvarasyeti nirvivādam । tatra kā prasaktiraśa-
﻿<pb n="495"/>
ktam । tasmādvajraśruteraśaniḥ kampanahetuḥ । yadvā—prāṇavāyuḥ kampanahetuḥ, prāṇaśruteḥ ।
prāṇavāyordehacalanahetutvena prāṇe nimitte sarvamidaṃ jagaccharīrarūpaṃ calatīti <quote>‘ya-
didaṃ kiṃca jagat sarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam’</quote> ityasya tatropapatteḥ । vāyunimitta-
meva vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭivanmahābhayaheturaśanirapi vivartata iti <quote>‘mahadbhayaṃ vajramu-
dyatam’</quote> ityasyāpi tatropapatteḥ। <quote>‘vāyureva vyaṣṭirvāyureva samaṣṭirapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati
ya evaṃ veda’</quote> iti śrutervāyuvijñānādamṛtatvopapatteśca ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nivarṇanasyetyāśaṅko hetvantareṇa nirākurvannaśanipūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ ।
parameśvarasya bhayahetutvaṃ śrutiprasiddhamaśanerlokaprasiddhamityubhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭam । athāpyatra sama-
bhivyāhṛtavajraśrutyanugrāhakamaśanigatameva grāhyam । na tu mantrāntarasamarpitaṃ mantrāntaragatam ।
asaṅkucitatvaṃ tu parameśvarasyāpi tasyāviśiṣṭam । na hi parameśvaramajānānāstato bhayātka-
mpante । brahmaprakaraṇe'pyasmi<quote>‘nnūrdhvamūlo hyadhaśśākha eṣo'śvatthassanātana’</quote>iti saṃsāravṛkṣakīrta-
navadaśanivarṇanamapyupapadyate । tanmūlatvena brahmapratipattyarthaṃ tatkīrtanamiti cet brahmopāsanā-
ṅgatvenāśanyupāsanāsiddha‍yarthamaśanivarṇanamityastu । dṛśyate hyapakosalavidyāyāṃ brahmopāsanā-
ṅgatvenāśanyupāsanāvidhānam । tasmādyatheśānaśruteraṅguṣṭhamātraḥ parameśvaraḥ । tathā vajraśruteraśa-
nireva kampanahetuḥ । yadyapi vajraśabdaḥ śakrāyudhe'pi prasiddhaḥ । udyataśabdo'pi tatraiva
svārasikaḥ । <quote>‘udyatāyudhadordaṇḍā’</quote> ityāyudheṣveva udyatatvaprasiddheḥ । <quote>‘indro vṛtrāya vajramuda-
yaccha’</quote> dityādiśravaṇācca । tathāpi śakrāyudhasyāsurādibhayahetutvaṃ śrutipurāṇādibhiravaganta-
vyam । aśanestallokaprasiddhaṃ śīghrameva buddhimārohatīti tadevātra vākyapratipādyaṃ grāhyam । a-
śanerapyudgacchataḥ parameśvareṇodyatatvamastīti tatrāpi nodyataśrutibhaṅgaḥ । pradhānabhūtavākyārtha-
prasiddha‍yanusāreṇa padārthasyāprasiddhasyāpi grahaṇaṃ yuktam । evaṃ ca prāṇaśabdo'pi aśanāveva
yojanīyaḥ । prāṇasyāśaneśca vāyuvikāratvena lakṣaṇopapatteḥ । upakramagatatve'pi prāṇaśruterma-
hābhayahetutvatanmūlakampanajanakatvaliṅgasahakṛtavajraśrutito durbalatvāditi । atha dvitīyapū-
rvapakṣamupapādayati—<pratika>yadveti</pratika> । upakramagataprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇa prāṇavāyureva kampanahetuḥ । tanni-
mittaṃ hi śarīrātmakasya sarvasya jagataścalanam । <quote>‘mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyata’</quote>mityatra prāṇa ityanu-
ṣañjanīyam । tathā ca prāṇanimittakameva mahābhayahetoraśanerudgamanamityarthaḥ । yadyapi bāhya-
vāyureva dhūmajyotissalilasaṃvalito vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate । na tvāntaraḥ
prāṇavāyuḥ । tathāpi bāhyādhyātmikabhedena vāyutatvasyaiva dvedhāvasthānādabhedopacāreṇa evamukti-
rupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । pūrvapakṣadvaye'pyamṛtatvaphalaśruterupapattimāha—<pratika>vāyureveti</pratika> । vyaṣṭiḥ
pṛthakpṛthaktattatprāṇādirūpeṇa vividhā vyāptiḥ । <quote>‘aśū vyāptāviti’</quote> dhātorvyaṣṭiśabdo vyāpti-
vācī । samaṣṭissamantātsarvasādhāraṇyena sūtrādirūpeṇa vyāptiḥ । punarmṛtyumapajayati apa-
hanti punarna mriyate mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ । yadvā । apamṛtyuṃ punarmṛtyuṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ । yadyu-
cyena vāyuvijñānādamṛtaprāptirna sambhavati <quote>‘tadā śivamavijñāyeti’</quote> śruteḥ । apapunarmṛtyuṃ
jayatītyasyātīte kvacit janmani apamṛtyuṃ yathā prāptaḥ na tathoktarūpavāyuvijñānānantaraṃ
punarapamṛtyuṃ prāpnotītyartha iti । evaṃ tarhi pradhānabrahmopāsanāphalasya etadaśanyupāsane prāṇo-
﻿<pb n="496"/>
iti prāpte parameśvara eva kampanaheturiti brūmaḥ । parameśvarasya sakalajagatkampa-
nahetutvaṃ śāsakatvāt bhavati, yasya śāsanabhayena sarve vayaṃ niṣiddheṣu vimukhā
vihiteṣu pravartāmahe, yacchāsanabhayādeva vāyvādīnāṃ svasvādhikārapravṛttiḥ <quote>‘bhī-
ṣā'smādvātaḥ pavate’</quote> ityādiṣvavagamyate । kalyāṇamūrtirapi parameśvaraḥ śāsakatayā
bhayadarśano bhavati । tat śrūyate—<quote>‘tasmādrājamukhaṃ bhīṣmaṃ bhāvukam’</quote> iti । tasmāt
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pāsane vā tadaṅgabhūte śravaṇamityastu । dṛṣṭaṃ hi <quote>‘somāpauṣṇaṃ traitamālabheta paśukāma’</quote> iti
pradhānasambandhitvenāvagatasya, paśuphalasya <quote>‘audumbaro yūpo bhavatyūrgvā udumbara ūrk paśava
ūrjaivāsmā ūrjaṃ paśūnavarundhe’</quote> iti tadaṅgavidhāvapi śravaṇam । abhyupagataṃ ca prābhākarai<quote>‘raṣṭa-
varṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupanayīta tamadhyāpayīte’</quote>tyatra pradhānādhyāpanaphalasya ācāryakasya tadaṅgopanaya-
navidhau śravaṇam । aṅgīkṛtaśca sarvairapi mīmāṃsakairiṣṭyanvayināṃ vāraṇavaikaṅkatādipātrāṇāmi-
ṣṭyapekṣitāgnisampādakatvena iṣṭyaṅgakalpasyādhānasya prakaraṇe śravaṇamiti yuktyantarasamuccayārthaḥ
upapatteśceti caśabdaḥ । prāṇaḥ kampanāditi dharmanirdeśena saha heturadhikaraṇāntareṣviva sūtra-
yitavyaḥ । parameśvara iti sādhyamātraṃ hi <quote>‘bhedavyapadeśāccānyaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ata eva sa brahma’</quote> <quote>‘vadatīti
cenna prājño hi’</quote> <quote>‘prakaraṇāt’</quote> iti sūtragatairanyaśabdādibhirlabdhamādhyāyaparisamāpti tadapekṣeṣva-
dhikaraṇeṣvanuvartate । tathāpi kampanāt kāryādyastaddhetutvenāvagamyate sa parameśvarakaṃpanāddhe-
torityāvṛttyā yojanena kampanādityetadeva lāghavārthaṃ pratijñāhetūbhayaparaṃ sūtritamityabhipretya
siddhāntapratijñāṃ darśayati—<pratika>parameśvara eva kampanaheturiti</pratika> । yadyapi śarīkampanahetutvaṃ
prāṇavāyossambhavati । bhayajananadvārā kampanahetutvamaśanessambhavati । tathāpi mahadbhayamiti
viśeṣaṇāt <quote>‘bhayādasyāgnistapatī’</quote>tyuttaramantre asyetyanena prakṛtaṃ kampanahetuṃ parāmṛśya tadbhayā-
dagnyādīnāṃ svasvādhikāre pravṛttyukteśca । śāsakatvāt bhayajananadvārā yatkampanahetutvaṃ tadiha
vivakṣitamityavasīyate । na kampanahetutvamātraṃ nāpi bhayajananadvārakakampanahetutvamātram । <quote>‘maha-
dbhayaṃ vajramudyata’</quote>mityasya etacchabdaparāmarśanīyaṃ prakṛtaṃ kampanahetutvaṃ pratyudyataṃ vajramiva mahā-
bhayaheturityevaṃrūpaviśeṣaṇasamarpakatayā tadekavākyatve sambhavati prāṇa ityasyānuṣaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
prāṇanimittameva mahābhayaheturaśanirvivartata ityevamarthaparatayā bhinnavākyatvakalpanānupapatteḥ ।
anuṣaṅgavākyabhedadoṣadvayaparihārārthaṃ vajraśabdalakṣaṇāyā yuktatvāt । evaṃ <quote>‘mahadbhaya’</quote>mityasya
kampanahetuviśeṣaṇatve sthite tasya kampanahetutopayuktadvārasamarpakatayānvayasambhave tadanākā-
ṅkṣitaparatvakalpanānupapatteśca । uttaramantrasyāpi prakṛtakampanahetuparāmarśakāsyapadayuktasya
bhayajananadvārabhūtaśāsakatvasamarpakatayā sarvaṃ jagadityasyāsaṅkocanīyasya parameśvaraśāsanābhi-
jñāgnyādiviṣayatvena tadākāṅkṣitārthasamarpakatvasambhave tadanākāṅkṣitārthaparatvakalpanānupapatteśca ।
evaṃ ca dvāradvayapratipādanarūpayopapattyā prakaraṇena cānugṛhītaṃ śāsakatvādbhayajananadvārā
kampanahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamanyonyakalahāyamānāt prāṇavajraśrutidvayāt balavadityabhipretya ka-
mpanāditi sautrahetorvākyaśeṣalabdhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ darśayati—<pratika>śāsakatvādbhavatīti</pratika> । bhayajanana-
dvāreti śeṣaḥ । ata eva paramakāruṇikasya parameśvarasya śāsakatvena bhayajanakatvamupapāda-
yati—<pratika>yasya śāsanabhayenetyādinā</pratika> । bhīṣmaṃ bhayaṃkaraṃ bhāvukaṃ bhavanaśīlaṃ<quote>‘vṛṣapatapade’</quote>tyādi-
﻿<pb n="497"/>
svāmitayā sakalajagadbhayaheturīśvara eva ।। ।। iti kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sūtreṇa tācchīlyārthe bhūdhātorukañpratyayaḥ । bhayaṃkaraṃ bhavituṃ śīlavadityarthaḥ । yadvā । bhāvukaṃ
maṅgalaṃ śāsakatayā bhayaṃkaramapi pariṇāme śreyaskaramityarthaḥ । <quote>‘śvaśreyasaṃ śivaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ
maṅgalaṃ śubham । bhāvukaṃ bhavikaṃ bhavyaṃ kuśalaṃ kṣemamastriyām । śastaṃ cātha triṣu dravye pāpapuṇyasu-
khādi ca’</quote>ti amarasiṃhokteḥ । atra prākaraṇikānāṃ brahmaliṅgānāṃ pūrvapakṣe kampanahetoranyatraivā-
śayāttatra tadanvayo'spaṣṭa iti spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā ।। <pratika>।।iti kampanādhikaraṇam ।।9।।</pratika></p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyāmatha kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । kampanāt ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kampanahetuḥ prāṇo marudbhavedaśanipātane hetuḥ । sakalajagadabhayadāyī bhayadāyī syātkathaṃ/?/ sa śivaḥ ।। 66 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śiva eva śāsakatvādrājavadabhayaprado'pi bhayahetuḥ । vāyostu na prasaktirmadhyebrahmaparasandarbham ।। 67 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>।। sū॰ ।। kampanāt ।। 39 ।।</pratika> bhagavatpādamate, itthaṃ prāsaṃgikamadhikāravicāraṃ parisamāpya prakṛtavākyārthaṃ pravartayiṣyan
pramitādhikaraṇe brahmavākye jīvānuvādo brahmajñānāyetyuktam । na tatheha <quote>‘yadida’</quote> mitivākye prāṇānuvādo yuktaḥ । tasya svarū-
pataḥ kalpitasya brahmaikyāyogāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyedamāha---<pratika>।। sū॰ ।। kampanāt ।। 39 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘yadidaṃ kicaṃ jagatsarvaṃ
prāṇa ejati nissṛta’</quote> mityādikaṃ kaṭhavallīvākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra <quote>‘ejṛ kampane’</quote> iti dhātoḥ kampanārthakatvāt sarvajagatkampanahetuḥ
prāṇaḥ pratīyate । sa kiṃ vāyuvikāra uta paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ । prasiddheḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇa’</quote> miti
prāṇaśabdasya paramātmani prasiddheriha prāṇaśabdavācyaḥ paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>kampanāt</pratika>=sarvasya savāyukasya jagato jīvanādice-
ṣṭāhetutvāt । taddhetutvaṃ <quote>‘na prāṇena nāpānene’</quote> tyādiśrutiprasiddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, evaṃ prāsaṃgikamadhikārinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtvā prakṛtaṃ prastauti---<pratika>sū॰ ।। kampanāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ samā-
nameva । atra kampanaheturaśanirvā prāṇavāyurvā parameśvaro veti tredhā saṃśayaḥ । sakalajagadabhayadāyinaḥ paramakāruṇikasya parameśva-
rasya jagatkampanahetutvasyāyuktatvāt vajraprāṇayorjagatkampanahetutvasyopapatteśca vajraprāṇaśrutibhyāṃ tayoranyatarasya jagatkampanahetutvaṃ
yuktamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । kalyāṇamūrterapi parameśvarasya śāsakatvādbhayadarśanatvopapatteḥ svāmitayā sakalajagadbhayahetuḥ parameśvara
eveti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, prāsaṃgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛtaṃ parisamāpayati---<pratika>sū॰ ।। kampanāt ।।41।।</pratika> aṅguṣṭhapramitaprakaraṇamadhye <quote>‘ya
didaṃ kiṃ ca’</quote> iti vākye prāṇaśabdanirdiṣṭāṅguṣṭhapramitajanitabhayanimittasyāgnivāyvādikṛts‍najagatkampanasya śrūyamāṇatayā aṅguṣṭhapra-
mitaḥ paramātmaiveti । <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। jyotirdarśanāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> tatraiva prakaraṇamadhye parabrahmāsādhāraṇasya sarvatejaśchādakasya
jyotiṣo <quote>‘na tatra sūrya’</quote> ityādivākye śrūyamāṇasya darśanādaṅguṣṭhapramitaḥ paramātmaiva iti ।</p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate pramitādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamatte</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ samānam । atra śrūyamāṇaṃ vajramindrāyudhaṃ vā viṣṇurveti saṃśayaḥ । vajraśruterudyatatvaliṅgācca
vajramindrāyudhamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । saprāṇasakalajagacceṣṭakatvarūpānniravakāśādviṣṇuliṅgāt muktipradatvaliṅgāt varjanādvajramiti vajra-
śabdasya yaugikārthaparatvācca vajraṃ viṣṇureveti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ kampanādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="498"/>
atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
daharādiṣūpāsyatayā nirdiṣṭasya parameśvarasya prāpyatvamupapādayitumadhikaraṇā-
ntaramārabhyate—
<sutra>।। sū ।। jyotirdarśanāt ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye'sya prajāpatividyāyāmāmnāyate viṣayaḥ---<quote>‘eṣa saṃprasādo'smāccha-
rīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ
puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti ।।
muktaprāpyatayā śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvaraḥ kiṃ vā nārāyaṇo mūrtyātmeti
saṃśayaḥ ।।
<quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ’</quote> iti muktaprāpyasya parajyotiṣaḥ puruṣottamaśabdavācyatayā'va-
gamāt puruṣottamaśabdasya nārāyaṇe rūḍhatayā sa evottamapuruṣaśabdasamānādhika-
raṇaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇamavatāyarati---<pratika>daharādiṣviti</pratika> । daharādiṣu sthāneṣu upāsyatayā parame-
śva/?/raḥ pūrvādhikaraṇānteṣvadhikaraṇeṣu siddhaḥ tadupāsanayā tasyaiva prāpyatvamityupapādayitumu
ttarādhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ । yadyapi <quote>‘muktopasṛpyavyapadeśā’</quote>diti dyubhvādyadhikaraṇaguṇa
sūtre parameśvarasya muktaprāpyatvamuktaṃ tathāpi kvacidviṣayavākyaviśeṣe prasaktaśaṅkānirākaraṇena
tadeva dṛḍhīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। jyotirdarśanāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> atra prajāpatividyāga-
tena vākyena vidvān dehādutkrāntassanyadupasampadyāpāhatapāpmatvādisvarūpeṇāvirbhavatītyucyate
tat paraṃ jyotiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ parameśvaro vetyuttamapuruṣaśabdanirūḍhiyogābhyāṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati---
<pratika>muktaprāpyatayeti</pratika> । <quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣa’</quote> iti vākyaṃ tāvat puruṣottamaśabdāsādhāraṇayaugikā-
rthapratipādakatayā nirūḍhamiha muktaprāpye parasmin jyotiṣi prayuktaṃ tasya puruṣottamasya śabda-
viṣayatāmavagamayatīti tadavagamitasya puruṣottamaśabdasya rūḍhyā muktaprāpyaparaṃjyotirnārā-
yaṇa ityavasīyate । ata eva gītāsu <quote>‘dvāvimau puruṣau loke kṣaraścākṣara eva ca । kṣarassarvāṇi
bhūtāni kūṭastho'kṣara ucyate’</quote> iti śloke puruṣaśabdābhidheyatayā prasiddhaṃ jīvajātaṃ kṣarākṣa-
raśabdoktasaṃsāryasaṃsārirūpeṇa dvedhā vibhajya <quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣastvanyaḥ paramātmetyudāhṛtaḥ । yo
lokatrayamāviśya bibhartyavyaya īśvara’</quote> iti ślokena dvividhādapi jīvajātādutkṛṣṭaṃ tadubhaya-
niyāmakamanyapuruṣaṃ puruṣottamapadayaugikārthapratipādakena <quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣa’</quote> iti vākyena nirdi-
śya sa ka iti jijñāsāyāṃ <quote>‘yasmātkṣaramatīto'hamakṣarādapi cottamaḥ । ato'smi loke vede ca-
prathitaḥ puruṣottam’</quote> iti ślokena lokavedayoḥ puruṣottamapadavācyatayā prasiddho'hameva sa
uttamaḥ puruṣa iti bhagavatopadiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca yadyapi daharavidyādiṣu parameśvara
evopāsyaḥ syāt tathāpi tattadvidyāprakaraṇe <quote>‘ya eṣa samprasādo'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ
jyotirupasampadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate eṣa ātmeti hovāce’</quote>ti <quote>‘parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti
divyaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>mityādivākyeṣu tattadvidyāniṣṭhaiḥ prāpya-
﻿<pb n="499"/>
iti prāpte brūmaḥ—muktaprāpyaṃ paraṃ jyotiriha paramaśivābhidhānaṃ paraṃ brahma, tatprā-
ptānāmevānāvṛttidarśanāt । parabrahmaṇo'nyat prāptānāṃ kathamanāvṛttiḥ samucitā ।
puruṣottamaśabdo nārāyaṇe rūḍho'pi brahmaṇyapi vartate, puruṣebhyo jīvebhyo'dhika-
tvāt, brahmamedhakalpe'pi---<quote>‘veṣṭituṃ puruṣottamam’</quote> iti prāpyasya parabrahmaṇaḥ paryā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tayā pratipādyamānaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ paramapuruṣādiśabdito nārāyaṇa eveti tātparyam । <quote>‘nārā-
yaṇaḥ paraṃ brahme’</quote>ti tasya muktaprāpyatvamucyate uta tasya parabrahmaṇo'nyatve'pi puruṣottamaśabda-
rūḍhibalāttaducyate । nādyaḥ । janmādyadhikaraṇaśārīrādhikaraṇādiṣu śiva eva paraṃ brahma
nārāyaṇastu tadīyacicchaktimahāvibhūtiriti nipuṇataraṃ vyavasthāpitatvāt ityabhipretya dvi-
tīyapakṣaparyavasitaṃ pūrvapakṣamāpādya siddhāntayati---<pratika>iti prāpta iti</pratika> । nanu nārāyaṇaṃ prāptā-
nāmapyāvṛttirnāsti । ānuśāsanikaparvaṇyumāmaheśvarasaṃvāde <quote>‘sāyujyānāṃ viśiṣṭe dve māmakaṃ
vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā । māṃ prāpya na nivartante viṣṇuṃ vā śubhalocane ।’</quote> iti śivavacanāditi cet ।
satyam । tatraiva <quote>‘dharmānveṣī tapaḥ kartuṃ yateta satataṃ priye । amaratvaṃ śivatvaṃ ca tapasā cāpnu-
yānnara’</quote> iti prācīnaśloke muktyarthena śivatvamitiśabdena mukteśśivasāyujyarūpatayā viṣṇu-
tattvena tasyā vacanasya viṣṇupratīkaśivopāsanayā prathamaṃ viṣṇusāyujyaṃ prāptānāṃ krameṇa śiva-
padaprāptyā svarūpāvirbhāve satyanāvṛttirbhavatītyevaṃparatvāt । yathākathañcit nārāyaṇaṃ prāptā-
nāmanāvṛttau <quote>‘anāvṛttidarśanā’</quote> diti heturanaikāntika eveti cet । evaṃ tarhi tatra hetāva-
nāvṛttipadāvṛttivirodhyapahatapāpmatvādyāvirbhāvaparaṃ brūmaḥ । sa eva hi jyotirvākye dṛśyate
<quote>‘svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata’</quote> iti । anāvṛttistu niśśeṣanivṛttamalāvaraṇānāṃ nirdhūtanikhila-
puṇyapāpānāmāvirbhūtasvarūpāṇāmāvṛttikāraṇābhāvenārthāllabhyate । tathā cāvṛttivirodhyapahata-
pāpmatvādyāvirbhāvadarśanāditi heturnānaikāntikaḥ । pūrvapakṣahetumanyathākaroti---<pratika>puruṣottam-
śabda iti</pratika> । prabalāpi tasya rūḍhirananyathāsiddhaliṅgavirodhāt bādhyeti brahmaṇi tasya yoga
evāśrayaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ । puruṣottamaśabdasyānyatra yogena parabrahmaṇi śive prayogodāharaṇa-
vyājena tatrāpi puruṣottamaśabdasya śivaparatvameveti darśayati---<pratika>brahmamedhakalpa iti</pratika> । āpa-
stambasūtre <quote>‘hautraṃ ca pitṛmedhaṃ ca saṃsṛjya vidhiruttara’</quote> iti pitṛmedhe <quote>‘brahma vai caturhotāra’</quote> iti
parabrahmatvena stutānāṃ <quote>‘cittissrugi’</quote> tyādimantrāṇāṃ hautraśabdoktānāṃ saṃsargeṇa labdhaviśeṣasya
brahmavidāmeva pitrādīnāṃ mṛtau kartavyasya brahmamedhākhyasaṃskārasya pratipādane <quote>‘veṣṭituṃ puruṣo-
ttamami’</quote>ti taducitaṃ muktiphalaṃ pratipāditam । tatrāpi puruṣottamaśabdaḥ kevalaṃ yaugika evāśra-
yaṇīya ityāśayaḥ । nanvatra viṣayavākye puruṣottamaśabdo na śrūyate। śrūyamāṇasya tu <quote>‘uttamaḥ
puruṣa’</quote> iti śabdasya nārāyaṇe rūḍhirastu । tasmādihottamaḥ puruṣa iti śabdaviṣayatvaliṅgena
muktaprāpyasya jyotiṣaḥ puruṣottamaśabdaviṣayatvānumāne prasakte tadanutthānamātramananyathāsiddha-
liṅgavirodhena vaktavyamiti cet satyam । iha puruṣottamaśabdaḥ śrūyata iti kṛtvācintayedamu-
ktam । kṛtvācintāyāstu phalamidaṃ yatpūrvapakṣopodbakatbena pūrvapakṣadaśāyāṃ bhāṣyābhipretasya
gītāsū<quote>‘ttamaḥ puruṣa’</quote> iti śabdaviṣaya eva prayuktasya puruṣottamaśabdasya rūḍhiṃ parityajya yogena
paramaśive brahmaṇi vartanam । nanva<quote>‘to'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottama’</quote> iti kṛṣṇena svasmi-
﻿<pb n="500"/>
yatvena puruṣottamaśabdasya prayogāt । ataḥ paraṃ brahmaiva paraṃ jyotiḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nneva puruṣottamaśabdapravṛttirdarśitā । tatra tasyānūditā laukikī prasiddhiśca tatraivāsti । <quote>‘deva-
kīnandanaśśauriḥ śrīpatiḥ puruṣottamaḥ’</quote> । <quote>‘hariryathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛtaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘maheśvarastryambaka eva
nāparaḥ’</quote> iti kathaṃ tasya śive vartanamupapādayituṃ śakyam । ittham adhyāyādā <quote>‘vūrdhvamūlamadha-
śśākhamaśvatthaṃ prāhuravyaya’</quote> mityādinā saṃsāravṛkṣaṃ parikīrtya <quote>‘tataḥ paraṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ
yasmingatā na vivartanti bhūya’</quote> iti saṃsāramaṇḍalātītamaprākṛtadivyapade sthitaṃ paraṃ brahmā-
nāvṛttiphalasiddhaye samupāsanīyamityuktvā <quote>‘tameva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadya’</quote> iti bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ
tamevādimaṃ sarvottamaṃ puruṣamahamapyupāsa iti babhāṇa । sa copāsya uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramaśiva
iti spaṣṭīcakāra । <quote>‘yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī’</quote>ti caturthapādena <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmātprasṛtā
purāṇī’</quote>ti śvetāśvataramantrabhāgasamānārthena pārameśvarī śaktirjñānaśaktirūpatvātprajñetikriyāśa-
ktirūpatvātpravṛttiriti ca vyapadeśamarhati । evaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ kṛṣṇasya copāsyatvenoktaḥ parama-
śivākhyassarvottamaḥ puruṣa eva kṣarākṣararūpottamatvapratiyoginirdeśapūrvaka<quote>‘muttamaḥ puruṣastvanya’</quote>
iti ślokena varṇitaḥ । tadviṣaya eva pravartamāno yasmātkṣaramatīto'hamiti tadanantaraślokaḥ
kathaṃ paramaśivaviṣayo na syāt । tadviṣayatve'pi tadabhedabhāvanādārḍhyena <quote>‘śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpa-
deśo vāmadevavadi’</quote>ti nyāyāt <quote>‘puruṣottamaḥ prathito'smī’</quote>ti kṛṣṇavacanaṃ lokavedaprasiddhiśce-
tyupapannam । ata evāhuḥ---<quote>‘brahmocyate paramasau paramaṃ ca tattvaṃ jyotiḥ paraṃ ca parameśvara
padmanābhaḥ । tvadbhāvanaikarasikastvadananyabhāvānmantrī yathā garuḍabhāvanayā ga/?/rutmani’</quote>ti ।
tasmānmuktaprāpyaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvarākhyaṃ paraṃ brahmaivetyupasaṃharati---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । nanvasyā-
dhikaraṇasya kathaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā । na hi prajāpatividyāyāmavasthātrayayuktaṃ tadviviktaṃ
ca jīvasvarūpaṃ pratipādayantyāṃ brahmaliṅgāni santi । yeṣāṃ pūrvapakṣadaśāyāṃ muktaprāpyātpara-
jyotiṣo'nyatrānvayena parajyotiranvayo'spaṣṭa iti spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatocyate । muktaprāpyatvaṃ
ca brahmadharmatvena śaṅkyamānaṃ nāsminnadhikaraṇe spaṣṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamiti cet ucyate । <quote>‘yadevaiṣa
samprasāda’</quote>ityādivākyaṃ prajāpatividyāyāṃ paṭhyate । tadeva daharavidyāyāmapi paṭhyate । tatra sa
uttamaḥ puruṣa iti pūrvapakṣaliṅgaṃ nāstīti paraṃ tadiha nodāhṛtam । tathā ca prajāpatividyāyāṃ
<quote>‘paraṃ jyoti’</quote>rityasya nārāyaṇaparatve daharavidyāyāmapi tannārāyaṇaparameva paryavasyatīti tasyāṃ
śrūyamāṇānāmapahatapāpmatvādīnāṃ spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ parajyotiṣo'nyatraivānvaya iti spaṣṭāspa-
ṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā । iti jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।।10।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । jyotirdarśanāt ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nārāyaṇaiti yuktaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ । puruṣottamapadavācyaḥ sa khalu syāduttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ।। 68 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na śivapadātpadamanyatprāptānāṃ syādanāvṛttiḥ । puruṣottamatā tu bhavedyogādviśvādhike maheśe'pi ।। 69 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="501"/>
atha arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। ākāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
chāndogye śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ---<quote>‘ākāśo hi vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te
yadantarā tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā’</quote> iti ।।
atra nāmarūpayornirvoḍhṛtvena śrūyamāṇaḥ sa ākāśaḥ parameśvaro viyadvā jīvo
veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
sarvabhūtāvakāśapradānena nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvasya viyati saṃbhavāt viya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p>prajāpatividyāntargatavākyārthanirṇayānantaraṃ prajāpatividyānantarapaṭhitākāśavākyārthani-
rṇayārthamadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate---<pratika>sū ।। ākāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> yadya-
sminviṣayavākye nāmarūpanirvoḍhurākāśasya nāmarūpamadhyasthāt brahmaṇo'nyatvapratītiḥ tadā ni-
rvoḍhṛtvamādhāratvaṃ cedayamākāśo jagadādhāro bhūtākāśaḥ vyākartṛtvaṃ cedindrādināmarūpavyākartā
hiraṇyagarbhajīvastasya tato yadi bhedapratītirnāsti tadā parameśvara iti trikoṭikasaṃśayopapattiḥ ।
ādyakoṭāvākāśaṃ vicintya tatkartṛkasakalanāmarūpāspṛṣṭatvena tṛtīyakoṭau sakalanāmarūpani-
rvodṛtvena nirvāhyasakalanāmarūpamadhyasthatvena ca tasyopāsaneti phalabhedaḥ । krameṇa pūrvapakṣadvaya-
mupapādayati---<pratika>sarvabhūtetyādinā</pratika> । viyadākāśaḥ ākāśaśrutyanugrahāt avakāśapradāyake</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>।। sū॰ ।। jyotirdarśanāt ।। 40 ।।</pratika> <pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ sarvaśabdaśrutisaṃkocānupapattyā prakaraṇātprāṇaśabdā brahma-
tyuktam । na tatheha saṃprasādavākye prakaraṇānugrāhakaṃ kiṃcidasti । yena prakaraṇāt jyotiśśabdaṃ brahma syāditi pratyudāhara-
saṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>jyotirdarśanāt</pratika> ।। 41 ।। asya <quote>‘ya eṣa saṃprasādo'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya’</quote> ityādika
chāndogye prajāpatividyāyāṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kiṃ jyotiśśabditamādityāditejaḥ uta brahma iti saṃśayaḥ ।
jyotiśśabdasyādityāditejasi rūḍhatvāt atra prasiddhamādityāditeja eva jyotiśśabditamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu jyoti-
ratra paraṃ brahmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>darśanāt</pratika>=<quote>‘ya ātmāpahatapāpme’</quote> tyupakramālocanayā brahmaṇa eva pratipādyatayānuvṛttidarśanādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, daharādiṣūpāsyatayā nirdiṣṭasya parameśvarasya prāpyatvamupapādayitumidamārabhyate---<pratika>sū॰ ।। jyotirdarśa-
nāt ।। 42 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । tatra muktaprāpyatayā śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ parameśvaro vā mūrtyātmā nārāyaṇo veti
saṃdehaḥ । <quote>‘uttamaḥ puruṣa’</quote> iti muktaprāpyasya parajyotiṣaḥ puruṣottamaśabdavācyatayāvagamāt puruṣottamaśabdasya nārāyaṇo rūḍhatayā
sa eva paraṃ jyotiriti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । nārāyaṇe rūḍhasyāpi puruṣottamaśabdasya puruṣebhyo jīvebhyo'dhike brahmaṇyapi vartamāna-
tvāt <quote>‘veṣṭitaṃ puruṣottama’</quote> miti prāpyasya parabrahmaṇaḥ paryāyatvena brahmamedhakalpe puruṣottamaśabdaprayogāt tatprāptānāmevānāvṛtti-
darśanācca paraśivābhidhānaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva paraṃ jyotiriti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, idaṃ sūtraṃ pramitādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā pūrvatrādhikaraṇa eva vyākhyātam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, bṛhadāraṇyake śrutaṃ <quote>‘katama ātme’</quote>ti praśnottare <quote>‘yo'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyoti’</quote> riti vākyaṃ
viṣayaḥ । atra jyotirjīvo vā paramātmā veti saṃśayaḥ । jananamṛtyādijīvaliṅgādeḥ śravaṇāt jīva iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । śrutyantare
viṣṇureva jyoti’rityavadhāraṇaśravaṇāt tatra śrutānāṃ jīvaliṅgānāṃ pūrvottarasaṃdarbhānusāreṇa ṇijarthādhyāhāreṇa brahmaparatayā yojanasya
nyāyyatvācca jyotiḥ paramātmaiveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, <pratika>jyotiḥ</pratika>=yo'yamantarjyotiriti jyotiśśabdavācyo viṣṇureva । na
jīvaḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>darśanāt</pratika>=‘viṣṇureva jyotiriti śrutyantare darśanādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ jyotiradhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="502"/>
dihākāśaḥ । athavā jīvaḥ, ‘anena jīvenātmanā'nupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>tasminnāmarūpavoḍhṛtvaśravaṇopapatterityādyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ । nanvākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇyapi prasiddhi-
rasti sarvalokagativākyādiṣu । tatra sarvabhūtakāraṇatvādīni balavanti vākyaśeṣe brahmaprakāra-
ṇādīni santi cedihāpi santyeva vākyaśeṣe brahmātmaśrutyamṛtatvaliṅgānītyāśaṅkyāha---
<pratika>iheti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । anyatrākāśaśabdasya brahmaviṣayatvakalpane'pi neha tathā kalpayituṃ
śakyam । <quote>‘vaināme’</quote>ti nipātasamudāyadyotitaprasiddhirūpākāśaviśeṣaṇasyāprasiddhākāśarūpa-
brahmavyāvṛttyekaphalakatvāt । na hi brahma vedapratipannatve'pi kvacidvedabhāge nirūḍhyākāśaśabda-
viṣayatve'pi bhūtākāśavat svarūpeṇākāśaśabdaviṣayatvena vā lokavedayoḥ prasiddham । <quote>‘sarvāṇi
ha vā imāni bhūtānī’</quote> tyatra tu <quote>‘ha vai’</quote> śabdadyotitaprasiddhe nākāśe dharmiṇyanvayaḥ । kiṃ tu sarva-
jagatkāraṇatvarūpe taddharme । tasya dharmasya loke prasiddhirnāstīti kevalaṃ brahmaviṣayā vaidikyeva
prasiddhirgāhyā । sā siddhānte upayujyate । iha prasiddherdharmiṇyanvayaḥ । sā tu bhūtākāśavi-
ṣayiṇī lokavedasiddhā grāhyā । na tu brahmaviṣayiṇī kevalavedaprasiddhā । sārvatrikaprasiddhi-
mapekṣya kvācitkaprasiddheraprasiddhirūpatvāt । tasmādaprasiddhākāśavyāvartanaikaprayojanakena prasi-
ddhiviśeṣaṇena bhūtākāśa evātrākāśaśrutirniyamyate । yattu vākyaśeṣe brahmātmaśrutyamṛtatva-
liṅgagrahaṇaṃ na tannāmarūpayornirvoḍharyākāśe'nveti । kiṃ tu tayoma gra/?/nthatvena lakṣyamāṇe
vastuni । na ca tayorabhedaḥ । nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvenākāśamuktvā tadanantaraṃ nāmarūpamadhyavarti-
tvena kiñcidvastu lakṣayitvā tatra tat brahmeti śabdāntaraprayogeṇākāśa iti yaditi ca
liṅgabhedanirdeśena ca tayorbhedapratīteḥ । <quote>‘devadattaḥ khalu mahān poṣakaścaitramaitrayoḥ । yā tayorva-
rtate madhye sā maitrīti pratīyatā’</quote>mityatra hi maitradevadattayoḥ spaṣṭaṃ bhedaḥ pratīyate । <quote>‘yastayorva-
rtate madhye yajñadattassa budhyatā’</quote>miti liṅgābhedena pāṭhe'pi devadattayajñadattayorbhedaḥ pratīyata
iti । viyattviha nākāśaḥ । kiṃ tu hiraṇyagarbhajīvaḥ । nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvaśravaṇāt । nirvoḍhṛ-
tvaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ na tu voḍhṛtvam । nirupasṛṣṭasya vahateḥ kartaripratyayaḥ । nāmarūpavyākartṛtvasya para-
brahmahiraṇyagarbhasādhāraṇatve'pi atra parabrahmaṇo'nyatvena niścite śrūyamāṇasya tasya hiraṇya-
garbhaliṅgatvaparyavasānāt tadanusāreṇākāśaśrutessarvajñe tasminnasaṅkucitaprakāśatvayogena vṛttyu-
papatteḥ । liṅgataśśrutessvato balīyastve'pi pūrvatra <quote>‘brahmalokamabhisambhavitāsmī’</quote>tyuttaratra
prajāpatessabhāṃ veśma prapadye iti hiraṇyagarbhasannidhinā hiraṇyagarbhalokaprāptyabhisandhiliṅge-
na ca sandaṣṭaliṅgasyātra śrutitaḥ prabalatvāt । na ca <quote>‘prajāpatessabhā’</quote>mityatra prajāpatiśabdasya
nārāyaṇaparatvaṃ । <quote>‘na ca kārye pratyabhisandhi’</quote>riti <ref>(bra.4.3.13)</ref> sūtreṇa vakṣyata iti śaṅkanīyam ।
<quote>‘kāryaṃ bādari’</quote> rityadhikaraṇasya dvitīyapūrvapakṣe kalpe sā vakṣyate । siddhānte tasya hiraṇyagarbha-
paratve ko doṣaḥ । atra nāmarūpamadhyasthabrahmopāsanāyāṃ nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛ़hiraṇyagarbhasyopāsanamaṅga-
miti tadaṅgakabrahmopāsanāyāstallokaprāptiravāntaraphalamityupapatteḥ । tasmāddhiraṇyagarbhajīva
evātrākāśa iti dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ । nanvayaṃ pūrvapakṣo nopapadyate । ākāśa iti hiraṇyaga-
rbhasya kvacidapi prasiddherabhāvena prasiddhiviśeṣaṇavirodhādityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>>anena jīveneti</pratika> ।
ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘vaināme’</quote>ti nipātasamudāyo nākāśaśabdasya tena rūpeṇa prasiddhidyotakaḥ ।
﻿<pb n="503"/>
ṇi’iti tasya nāmarūpavyākaraṇasaṃbandhadarśanāt ।।
ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ---parameśvara evātrākāśaśabdena nāmarūpanirvoḍhā śrūyate, amṛ-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kiṃ tu nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvarūpavidheyavattvena tathaiva vyutpatteḥ । na hi <quote>‘devadattaḥ khalu vidvā’</quote>ni-
tyukte yaḥ prasiddho devadattaḥ sa vidvāniti pratīyate । kiṃ tu vidheyasya vidvattvasyaiva prasiddhiḥ
pratīyate । evaṃ ca yatra nāmarūpavyākartṛtvaṃ prasiddhaṃ sa eva parameśvarādanyaḥ ākāśaśabdavi-
ṣaya iti siddhāvanena jīvenetyādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhasya nāmarūpavyākartṛtvaprasiddhessa evātrā-
kāśaśabdaviṣayaḥ paryavasyatīti । yadyapya<quote>‘nena jīvene’</quote>ti śrutiḥ parameśvarasya nāmarūpavyāka-
raṇakartṛtvaṃ pratipādayati na tu hiraṇyagarbhasya । tathaiva saṃjñāmūrtiklṛptyadhikaraṇe sthāpayiṣyamā-
ṇatvāt । tathā ca hiraṇyagarbhasya vyākartṛtvapratipādakaṃ <quote>‘vede nāmarūpe vyākarot’</quote> <quote>‘sarveṣāṃ ta
sa nāmānī’</quote> tyādiśrutismṛtivacanajātamatrodāharaṇīyam । tathāpi tena yannāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ
hiraṇyagarbhakartṛkaṃ pratipādyate tatraiva parameśvarasya kartṛtva <quote>‘manena jīvene’</quote> tyādivākyena prati-
pādyata ityubhayatrāpi vyākartṛbhede'pi vyākartavyamabhinnamiti jñāpanāya tasminnudāharaṇīye'-
pyanenetyādivākyamudāhṛtam । tathā hi---hiraṇyagarbhaviṣayena vākyajātena brahmāṇḍāntarvarti-
devādināmarūpagocaraṃ vyākartṛtvaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya pratipādyate । tadgocarameva ca tadanena jīvene-
tyādivākyena parameśvarasya pratipādyate । anena hi vākyena parameśvarasya sakalanāmarūpavyā-
kartṛtvaṃ na pratipādyate kiṃ tu ākāśādiṣu bhūteṣu sadāśivādibhiradhiṣṭhātṛbhissaha sṛṣṭeṣu
trivṛtkaraṇena brahmāṇḍasṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ tadantarvartidevādināmarūpavyākartṛtvaṃ pratipādyate । tejo'ba-
nnānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāya <quote>‘hantāhamimāstisro devatā’</quote> ityanukramāt । eva <quote>‘manena jīvene’</quote>ti
vākyopāttavyākartavyasya hiraṇyagarbhavyākartavyaikyajñāpanasya prayojanaṃ siddhānte spaṣṭībhavi-
ṣyati । evaṃ prāpte pūrvapakṣe siddhāntapratijñāpūrvakaṃ sūtrahetuṃ vyācaṣṭe—<pratika>amṛtatvādīti</pratika> । ihā-
kāśaḥ parameśvara iti sādhye nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvaṃ na hetuḥ । tasya nipātadyotitaprasiddhiviśeṣa-
ṇānurodhā <quote>‘danena jīvene’</quote>ti śrutyuktahiraṇyagarbhavyākartavyanāmarūpamātragocaravyākartṛtvarūpa-
tayā hiraṇyagarbhasādhāraṇatvāt । nāpi <quote>‘te yadantare’</quote>tyuktaṃ nāmarūpamadhyavartitvam । taddhi
taṭākayormadhye vṛkṣasyeva nāmarūpayormadhye parameśvarasya na vartanam । taṭākayoriva nāmarūpayo-
rvyavasthitadeśasthitatvābhāvena tanmadhyāvakāśasyāprasiddhatvāt । kiṃ tu madhyasthasyevānyatara-
pakṣapātābhāvena tadubhayāspṛṣṭatvam । tadapi na sakalanāmarūpāspṛṣṭatvam । śivabhavādināma-
bhirnīlakaṇṭhatvādiviśiṣṭavigrahaiśca nityayukte parameśvare tadabhāvāt । kiṃ tu vyākartavyatvena
pūrvavākyasannihitaitatpadaparāmṛṣṭairdevamanuṣyādiśabdaistadvācyarūpairbrahmāṇḍāntargataistanubhuvanabho-
gasthānabhogopakaraṇaiścāsādhāraṇasambandharāhityam । idaṃ tāvaddhiraṇyagarbhasādhāraṇam । tada-
sādhāraṇasya hiraṇyagarbhādināmnastadvācyasya tadasādhāraṇarūpasya ca tadvyākartavyanāmarūpapra-
pañcasṛṣṭeḥ prāgeva siddhatvāt’ ākāśasādhāraṇaṃ ca tato'pi prāgeva bhūtānāṃ niṣpannatvā-
diti śaṅkākaluṣitamādimaliṅgadvayaṃ prathamaṃ nopanyasanīyamityamṛtatvaṃ prathamamupāttam । evaṃ
cāgre sphuṭatarabrahmaliṅgadarśanāt pūrve api brahmaliṅgabhūte eva grāhye । nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvamā-
trasya sādhāraṇatve'pi hi nirapekṣaṃ tat brahmāsādhāraṇam । sāpekṣanirapekṣayośca nirapakṣaṃ grahī-
﻿<pb n="504"/>
tatvāditaddharmavyapadaśāt । na hyākāśe'mṛtatvādikaṃ saṃbhavati jīve vā । ataḥ
parameśvara evākāśaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tumucitam । <quote>‘te yadantare’</quote> tyetadapi yasya madhye te nāmarūpe vartete yadādhārako'yaṃ nāmarūpa-
prapañca iti vyākhyāne tadasādhāraṇam । na ca yatrāvadhidvayanirdeśaḥ avadhidvayānākrāntaśca
madhyadeśo'sti tatraivāntareti śabdaprayoga iti niyamaḥ । sūtravārtikādiṣu viśeṣavacanābhā-
vāt । tadabhāve'pi <quote>‘tataḥ khaṅgaṃ samudyamya rāvaṇaḥ krūravigrahaḥ । vaidehīmantarā kruddhaḥ kṣaṇamūce
viniśvasanni’</quote>ti bhaṭṭikāvye antarāśabdaprayogadarśanācca । tathā niyamasadbhāve'pi yasyāntare
yadantargate te nāmarūpe ityasminnarthe antaraśabdādantassthitavācinaḥ prathamādvicanasya <quote>‘supāṃ
sulugi’</quote>tyādisūtrata ākārādeśopapatterityabhipretya tayorapi grahaṇārthamādiśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ । pūrva-
paṭhitayorapi vaivakṣikaṃ kramamāśrityādiśabdena grahaṇaṃ yuktam । na hi <quote>‘divādibhyaḥ śya’</quote>nni
tyādāviva pāṭhakrama evāśrayaṇīya ityatra nirbandho'sti । na cātrāmṛtatvānantaraṃ paṭhitaṃ
liṅgamasti । kramaśrutirhi tadanantaraṃ śrūyate । atha vātrāpi pāṭhakramamāśrayiṣyāmaḥ । amṛta-
tvarūpabrahmaliṅgasannidhimanapekṣyaiva sāpekṣanirapekṣanyāyādimātreṇa nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvāderbrahmali-
ṅgatonmeṣamabhyupagamiṣyāmaḥ । atra pakṣe ātmaśrutyupasthāpitamātmatvaliṅgamādipadena grāhyam ।
yatra hyabhidhānaśrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra tatpravṛttinimittabhūtaṃ liṅgamapi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyeva । ata eva
<quote>‘śabdādeva pramita’</quote>iti <ref>(bra॰ 1. 3. 23)</ref> sūtre āstāmīśānaśrutyupasthāpitamaiśvaryaliṅgamī-
śānaśabdarūpā śrutireva tāvadaṅguṣṭhapramitasya parameśvaratvamavagamayituṃ paryāptamityabhiprāya eva-
kāraḥ prayuktaḥ । evaṃ cāmṛtatvādiśabdena tadga‍uṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhimāśrityāmṛtatvātmatve grāhye ।
amṛtatvasyādaya iti tatpuruṣamāśritya nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvaṃ tadādhāratvaṃ brahmaśrutyupasthāpitani-
ratiśayabṛhattvaliṅgaṃ ca grāhyamiti bahuvrīhitatpuruṣayorekaśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ । evaṃ vivakṣite'rthe
nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvādivyapadeśādityevamṛjuvākyaprayogasambhave kimarthamitthaṃ kliṣṭavākyaprayoga
iti cet । kimarthamiti na vidmaḥ । svatantrecchā mahāgranthakārāḥ kvacitkvacidevamapi prayuñjate ।
yathā pāṇinirgāṅkuṭādisūtre kuṭādibhya iti padaṃ bahuvrīhitatpuruṣayorekaśeṣeṇa niṣpannaṃ
prāyuṅkta । tatra hi kuṭādipadaṃ tadga‍uṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā kuṭatidhātostadanantarapaṭhitadhātūnāṃ
ca yathā grāhakaṃ tathā tasmātprākpaṭhitasya likhatidhātorapi kuṭasyādiḥ kuṭādiriti tatpuru-
ṣāśrayaṇena grāhakam । anyathā likhatidhātoḥ pareṣāṃ ñ‌ṇitāṃ pratyayānāṃ ṅidvadbhāvavidhānā-
siddhyā likhitumalikhadityādirūpāsiddhiprasaṅgāt । etena <quote>‘devadattaḥ khalu mahā’</quote>nityādivākya-
chāyāpattyā brahmākāśayorbhedapratītiśaṅkā nirastā । brahmākāśaśabdayordvayorapi brahmaṇi dṛṣṭa-
prayogatvena brahmākāśavākyadvaye'pi brahmaliṅgasattvena ca tadubhayābhedapratītyā vaiṣamyāt ।
na hīti । yadyapyākāśe jīve cāmṛtatvāsambhavaḥ spaṣṭa eva । tathāpyuktamarthaṃ sūtrārūḍhaṃ kartuṃ
taduktiḥ । anena sautrahetoritthamartho darśito bhavati । arthāntaratvaṃ jīvādākāśācca bhinnatvaṃ
tasyādiḥ kāraṇaṃ bhedako dharma iti yāvat । bhedajñāpake bhedakāraṇatvopacārādevamuktiḥ ।
arthāntaratvaśabdo vā tatpratītiṃ lakṣayati । tathā ca jīvākāśavyāvartakanāmarūpanirvoḍhṛ-
tbādidharmavyapadeśāditi sautrasya hetorartha iti । yadyapi parameśvare sādhye taddharmavyapadeśādi-
﻿<pb n="505"/>
nanu <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote> ityādinaikyavyapadeśānna pratyagātmano'rthāntarabhūtaḥ parame-
śvaro'stītyāśaṅkyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaraṃ’</quote> <quote>‘prājñenātmanā'nva-
rūḍha utsṛjan yāti’</quote> iti suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ bāhyāntaraviṣayajñānaśūnyāt jīvāt
tadānīmeva prājñatayā bhedena vyapadeśāt jīvādarthāntarabhūtaḥ parameśvaro'sti । sa
evātrākāśaśabdavācyaḥ ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
pariṣvañjake prājñe śrūyamāṇebhyaḥ patyādiśabdebhyaśca ayamanya eva jīvādityavaga-
myate ।<quote>‘sa sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyān
no evāsādhunā kanīyān eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapālaḥ’</quote> ityā-
dikamuttaratra hi śrūyate । <quote>‘paśūnāṃ pataye.... vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye’</quote> ityādibhiśca parameśvarasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyeva hetūkaraṇīyam । tathāpyatra nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvāderhiraṇyagarbhādisādhāraṇyaśaṅkāvāraṇāya
tadbhedakatvamukhena sūtre tadupanyāsa iti bhāvaḥ ।। uttarasūtramavatārayituṃ śaṅkate---<pratika>nanviti</pratika> ।
jīvātiriktaparameśvarābhāve ca jīvabhedakadharmeṇa parameśvaratvasādhanaṃ viruddham । acetanaikā-
ntikadharmasya jīvabhedakatvaṃ na sambhavati । hetoścāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ । yadyapi jīvātirikta-
parameśvarābhāvaśaṅkānirākaraṇaṃ nāsminnadhikaraṇe viśiṣyopayogi । sarveṣvapyadhikaraṇeṣu tadu-
payogasattvāt । tathāpi prapañcenaitacchaṅkānirākaraṇārthamuttaraḥ pādaḥ pravartiṣyata iti tadupo-
ddhātarūpamidamuttarasūtradvayaṃ pravṛttamityāśayaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 43 ।।</pratika>
suṣuptiviṣayaṃ sampariṣvaktavākyam । utkrāntiviṣayamanvārūḍhavākyam । utsṛjan śarīramityarthaḥ ।
<pratika>tadānīmeva prājñatayeti</pratika> । yadā jīvasya bāhyābhyantaraviṣayajñānaśūnyatvaṃ tadānīmeva prakarṣeṇa
jñātṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ tasya na sambhavati । jīvāntarasyāpi sarvajñatvaṃ na sambhavatyeva । ata
ubhayorbhedasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>bhedena vyapadeśāditi । anena</pratika> <quote>‘vyapadeśā’</quote>diti pūrvasūtrato'nuva-
rtata iti darśitaṃ bhavati । <pratika>jīvādarthāntarabhūtaḥ parameśvaro'stīti</pratika> । idaṃ sādhyaṃ hetusāma-
rthyāllabhyate ।। sarvajño muktātmā pariṣvañjakaḥ syādityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।।
patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</pratika> pariṣvañjake prājña evottaratra patyādiśabdāḥ śrūyanta iti muktā-
tmano'pi vyatirekasiddhiḥ । tasya jagadvyāpārābhāvādityarthaḥ । <pratika>sarvasya vaśīti</pratika> sarvasya
tādadhīnyamuktam । <pratika>sarvesyeśāna iti</pratika> tanniyamyatvam । <pratika>sarvasyādhipatiriti</pratika> tadrakṣa-
ṇīyatvam । sarvaśvarassarvaniyantā । <pratika>bhūtādhipatirbhūtānāṃ rakṣakaḥ ।</pratika> <pratika>bhūtapālaḥ</pratika> bhūtānāṃ
pālakaḥ । rakṣaṇamiṣṭapradānamukhaṃ pālanamaniṣṭanivāraṇamukhamiti bhedaḥ । viṣayavākye adhipati-
śabde śrūyamāṇe kimarthaṃ <quote>‘patyādiśabdebhya’</quote> iti sūtritamityāśaṅkya bahudhā patiśabdābhyāsa-
vadbhiḥ śrīrudrādiprakaraṇairasya prakaraṇasyaikārthyaṃ darśayitumityetadudāharaṇenābhivyanakti । <pratika>paśū-
nāṃ pataya iti</pratika> । ādiśabdena <quote>‘patiṃ patīnāṃ paramaṃ parastā’</quote>dityādīni gṛhyante । jīvāti-
﻿<pb n="506"/>
jagadādhipatyaṃ prasiddhaṃ, na kutrāpi jīvasya । tasmādayaṃ jīvādanyaḥ parameśvara
evātrākāśaśabdavācyaḥ ।। ityarthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।

riktaparameśvarābhāvaśaṅkānirākaraṇasiddhamadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> ।। ।।</p>
<head>ityarthāntaratvādivyupadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p>itiśrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
śrīmaccinnabommabhūpālahṛdayakamalakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśivapreritasya
śrīmadbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaviśvajidyājiśrīraṅgarājādhvari-
varasūnorapyayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahma-
mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivādityamaṇidīpikā-
khyāyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।। 1 ।। 3 ।।</p>

<head>atha arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । ākāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 42 ।। suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 43 ।। patyādi-
śabdebhyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>nirvoḍhā nāmāderbhūtākāśo'vakāśatayā । jīvo vā syātso'pi hi bibhīrti nāmāni rūpāṇi ।। 70 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>amṛtatvamātmatvādikamarthāntaratā ca nāmarūpābhyām । nirvoḍhṛtvaṃ ca tayoḥ kārts‍nyena na bhūtajīvayorjagataḥ ।। 71 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityarthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīmadappayadīkṣitakṛtau <pratika>caturmatasārasaṃgrahenayamaṇimālikā</pratika>khyetṛtīyaparicchede <pratika>prathasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ</pratika>pādaḥ</p>

<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇasuṣuptyutkrāntyadhikaraṇe ।। 12 ।। 13 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। ākāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 41 ।। suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 42 ।। patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, eṣu triṣu sūtreṣvādyamekamadhikaraṇamitarayoradhikaraṇāntaratayā yojanamiti viśeṣaḥ । pūrvamupakramavaśā-
darthāntare prasiddho'pi jyotiśśabdassvārthātpracyāvitastathākāśopakramavaśādbrahmādiśabdo'pi svārthātpracyāvyatāmiti dṛṣṭānta-
saṃgatyedamāha—<pratika>sū ।। āṃkāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘ākāśo ha vai nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yada-
ntarā tadbahma’</quote> ityādikaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kimākāśaśabdito bhūtākāśaḥ paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ । ākāśaśabdasya
bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvātsraṣṭṛtvādeśca spaṣṭasya brahmaliṅgasyāśravaṇācca bhūtākāśa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, paramātmaivākāśaśabditaḥ ।
kasmāt । <pratika>arthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt</pratika>=<quote>‘te yadantare’</quote> ti ākāśasya nāmarūpābhyāmarthāntaratvena vyapadeśāt । ādiśa-
bdena <quote>‘tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātme’</quote>ti brahmatvādivyapadeśo draṣṭavyaḥ ।। <pratika>ityarthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam</pratika>।। 12 ।।</p>
<head>atha suṣuptyutkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvaṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ bhedokterākāśo brahmetyuktam । tatra । <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta’</quote> ityatrābhinne'pi jīve bhedopacārādityā-
kṣipya samādhānādākṣepasaṃgatyedamāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 42 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yo'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ
puruṣa’</quote> ityādikaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatkiṃ jīvānuvādakamuta tadanuvādenāsaṃsārisvarūpapratipādakamiti saṃdehaḥ । upa-
kramopasaṃhārānuguṇyena jīvānuvādakamityeva yuktamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu, vijñānamayasuṣuptyādyavasthāvajjīvānuvādena
brahmābhedapratipādakamidaṃ vākyam । kasmāt । <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃcana veda nāntaraṃ prājñenātmanānvārūḍha
utsṛjanyātī’</quote>ti suṣuptyutkrāntyoravasthayośśārīrādbhedena paramātmanaḥ prājñaśabdena vyapadeśādityarthaḥ ।। itaśca brahmabhedapratipādakaṃ
﻿<pb n="507"/>
vākyamityāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 43 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānassarvasyādhipati’</quote> riti patyādiśabdā asaṃ-
sāritvapratipādakāḥ <quote>‘sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyā’</quote> nityādyāssaṃsāritvaniṣedhakā etadvākyagatāḥ । tebhyo'saṃsāribrahmātmakaprati-
pādakamidaṃ vākyamiti samaṃjasam । asminpāde <pratika>trayodaśādhikaraṇāni</pratika> । sūtrāṇi <pratika>tricatvāriṃśat</pratika> ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate suṣup‍tyutkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । atra ākāśaḥ bhūtākāśo vā jīvo vā parameśvaro veti tredhā saṃśayaḥ । sarvabhūtāva-
kāśapradānena nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvasya bhūtākāśe <quote>‘anena jīvene’</quote>tyādinā śrutasya nāmarūpavyākaraṇasaṃbandhasya jīve na darśanāt tayo-
ranyatara ākāśa iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntassūtrārthaścāviśiṣṭaḥ ।।</p>
<p>nanu <quote>‘tattvamasyā’</quote> dinaikyavyapadeśānnāsti jīvādarthāntarabhūtaḥ parameśvara ityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। suṣup‍tyutkrāntyorbhe-
dena ।। 44 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta’</quote> ityādinā suṣup‍tyutkrāntyorbāhyāntaraviṣayajñānaśūnyājjīvāttadānīmeva prājñatayā
bhedena vyapadeśāt asti jīvādarthāntarabhūtaḥ parameśvarassa evātrākāśa iti ।।</p>
<p>itaścāyamanya eva jīvādityāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 45 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘paśūnāṃ pataye’</quote>
ityādinā pariṣvañjake prājñe śrūyamāṇebhyaḥ patyādiśabdebhyo'pyayamanya eva jīvādityavagamyate । na kutrādi jīvasya tādṛśaṃ
jagadādhipatyaṃ śrutam । tasmādayaṃ parameśvara evākāśaḥ ।। iti ।। asminmate pāde'smin <pratika>ekādaśādhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi
catuścatvāriṃśat ।। iti śrīkaṇṭhamate arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvavat । atrākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ kiṃ muktātmā uta paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ । muktasthāna-
ntaraprakṛtatvānmukta iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । ākāśaḥ paramātmeti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, <pratika>ākāśaḥ</pratika> paramātmā । kutaḥ । <pratika>arthānta-
ratvādivyapadeśāt</pratika>=tasya nāmarūpanirvoḍhṛtvatadasparśalakṣaṇārthāntaratvanirupādhikabrahmatvāmṛtatvātmatvādīnāṃ vyapadeśāt ।
iti । śeṣaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeveti viramyate ।। asminmate atra pāde <pratika>ekādaśādhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi tu catuścatvāriṃ
śat । iti । iti rāmānujamate arthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū॰ ākāśo'rthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> viṣayavākyaṃ pūrvamatasādhāraṇam । atrā-
kāśaḥ avyākṛtākāśaṃ vā viṣṇurveti saṃśaye avyākṛtākāśamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । viṣṇuriti siddhāntaḥ । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।।</p>
<head>ityarthāntaratvādivyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। suṣup‍tyutkrāntyorbhedena ।। 42 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde’</quote> ityādikaṃ <quote>‘sa yattatra kiṃcitpaśyatyana-
nvāgatastena bhavatyasaṃgo'hyayaṃ puruṣa’</quote> ityantaṃ bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra svapnādidraṣṭā jīvo vā paramātmā vā iti
saṃśayaḥ । jīvasyaiva svapnadraṣṭṛtvena prasiddhatvājjīva iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । asaṃgatvaliṃgāt suṣup‍tyutkrāntyoḥ <quote>‘prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta’</quote>
ityādinā tayorbhedena vyapadiśyamānatvena tayoraikyāsiddhāvasaṃgatvasya jīve brahmābhedena yojayitumaśakyatvācca svapnadraṣṭā para-
mātmaiveti । sūtrārthastu, svapnādidraṣṭā paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <quote>‘asaṃgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ’</quote> ityuktāsaṃgatvaliṃgāt iti bahirevādhyāhāraḥ ।
nanu īśvarābhedena jīve'pyasaṃgatvoktissaṃbhavatītyata ucyate---<pratika>suṣuptītyādi</pratika> । suṣup‍tyutkrāntiprakaraṇayostayorbhedena vyapadeśa-
darśanānna tayoraikyamityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti suṣup‍tyutkrāntyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। patyādiśabdebhyaḥ ।। 43 ।।</pratika> asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘eṣa nityo mahimā brāhmaṇasya । na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān ।
tasyaivātmā padavittaṃ viditvā । na karmaṇā lipyate pāpakena’</quote> iti bṛhadāraṇyavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra brāhmaṇaśabdokto viriñco
vā viṣṇurvā iti saṃśayaḥ । <quote>‘viṣṇorbrāhmaṇajātissan jajñe brahmā, caturmukhaḥ’</quote> iti vacanena tasya brāhmaṇatvāt <quote>‘sa vā eṣa mahā-
naja ātmā’</quote> ityajaśruteśca <quote>‘agotramavarṇa’</quote> mityādinā viṣṇorbrāhmaṇatvābhāvācca viriñca iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । niravakāśaissarvapatitvā-
diliṃgaiḥ ajabrāhmaṇaśabdayoḥ <quote>‘na jāyata ityajaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘brahmaṇā vedena anyate gamyate iti brāhmaṇaḥ’</quote> iti vyutpattimatoḥ viṣṇupara
tvopapattyā ca viṣṇuriti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, <quote>‘eṣa nityo mahimā brāhmaṇasye’</quote>ti śrutyuktabrāhmaṇo viṣṇureva । na viriñcaḥ ।
kutaḥ । <pratika>patyādiśabdebhyaḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sarvasyādhipati’</quote> rityādisarvādhipatyādivāciśrutibhya ityarthaḥ । asminmate asminpāde
<pratika>trayodaśādhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇi tu tricatvāriṃśat ।। ityānandatīrthamate patyādyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</pratika></p>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanadhaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī yaṃ mṛtyuṃjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhvayasyeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmihe caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmādye'dhyāye samanvayābhikhye । spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmagaliṃgaḥ pādastṛtīya iha pūrṇaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śrīkaṇṭhācāryamate bhagavatpādīyabhāṣyarītyā tu । aspaṣṭaliṅgavākyajñeyabrahmāvabodhakaḥ proktaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vispaṣṭajīvaliṅgaka iti gadito lakṣmaṇāryamatarītyā । madhvamate hyubhayatra prasiddhanāmaliṅgapāda iti ।</l></lg>
<head>iti hālāsyanāthakṛtau sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।</head>
﻿<pb n="508"/>
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>śrīkaṇṭhācāryakṛtau</head>
<head>brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye</head>
<head>prathamasyādhyāyasya</head>
<head>atha caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha ānumānikādhikaraṇam।। 1।।</head>
pūrvapāde spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni vākyāni vicāritāni । caturthe'smin pā-
de'spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni kānicidvākyāni vicāryante—
<sutra>।। sū॰ ।। ānumānikamapyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīte-
rdarśayati ca ।। 1 ।।</sutra>
ekeṣāṃ kāṭhānāṃ śākhāyāmāmnāyate'sya viṣayaḥ—
<quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ । manasastu parā buddhirbuddherātmā ma-
hān paraḥ ।। mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ । puruṣānna paraṃ kiṃcit
sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ ।।’</quote> iti ।।
atra mahataḥ paratvena ucyamānaṃ avyaktaśabdavācyaṃ pradhānaṃ kāpilamuta śa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivārkamaṇidīpikāyām ।</head>
<head>atha prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।</head>
<head>atha ānumānikādhikaraṇam ।</head>
<p>pūrvottarapādārthapradarśanena saṅgatiṃ sūcayati---<pratika>pūrvapāda iti</pratika> । prathame pāde spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni
vākyāni vicāritāni । dvitīye''natispaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni । tṛtīye spaṣṭāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni ।
caturthe tvasmin aspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni vākyāni vicāryanta iti brahmaliṅgānāṃ sthūlasūkṣma-
sūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatvakrameṇa pādānāmavatāra iti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰।। ānumānikamapyekeṣā-
miti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca ।। 1 ।।</pratika> sautra<quote>‘mekeṣā’</quote>miti padaṃ
vyākurvāṇastadapekṣitaṃ cādhyāharanneva viṣayavyākyamudāharati—<pratika>ekeṣāmiti</pratika> । smārtakramapratya-
bhijñāvyaktaśabdarūḍhibhyāṃ prakaraṇapariśeṣābhyāṃ ca saṃśayamāha—<pratika>atreti</pratika> । iha <quote>‘mahadavyakta’</quote>-
miti sāṅkhyasmṛtitattvakramapratyabhijñā <quote>‘mahataḥ paratvenocyamāna’</quote> miti dharmiviśeṣaṇena sū-
citā । avyaktaśabdasya pradhāne rūḍhatvena svārasya<quote>‘mavyaktaśabdavācya’</quote>miti dharminirdeśena
sūcitam । avyaktaśabdavācyamiti । avyaktaśabdoditamityarthaḥ । siddhānte śarīrasyāvya-
ktaśabdalakṣyatvāṅgīkāreṇātadvācye śarīratvasaṃśayāyogāt । pūrvatrā<quote>‘tmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ
rathameva ca । buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca । indriyāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāṃsteṣu
gocarān’</quote> । ityātmaśarīrādīnāṃ rathirathādibhāvakalpanāyāṃ śarīrasya prakṛtatvaṃ śarīrātiriktā-
﻿<pb n="509"/>
rīraṃ veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
pradhānamiti pūrvapakṣo yuktaḥ । katham । mahadavyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ sāṅkhyatantra eva
prasiddheḥ, teṣāmiha śrutau pratyabhijñānācca vapuṣo na kaścidiha prasaṅgaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nāmihendriyādiśabdairgṛhītatvena śarīrasya pariśiṣṭatvaṃ ca <quote>‘śarīraṃ ve’</quote>ti rathirathabhāvakalpanāyāṃ
śrutau prayuktasya śarīrapadasya prayogeṇa sūcitam । nanu, <quote>‘pradhānamiti pūrvapakṣo yukta’</quote> iti va-
canamayuktam । tasya nirālambanatvāt । <quote>‘mahataḥ paramavyakta’</quote> mityatra mahacchabdasya <quote>‘buddherātmā
mahānpara’</quote>iti pūrvanirdiṣṭātmaparatvena sāṅkhyasmṛtiprasiddhatatvaviśeṣaparattvaśaṅkānāspadatayā smā-
rtakramapratyabhijñānāsiddheḥ । sāṅkhyaparibhāṣāsiddhāyāḥ avyaktapadarūḍheḥ naiyāyikakalpitāyāḥ pa-
kṣapratipakṣādipadarūḍherivānyatra śabdārthanirṇayānupayogitvāt ityabhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati—<pratika>kathami-
ti । mahadavyaktapuruṣāṇāmiti</pratika> । ayaṃ bhāvaḥ । mahadavyaktaṃ puruṣa iti krameṇa uttarottaraṃ parāṇi
tattvāni sāṅkhyatantra eva prasiddhāni । atasteṣāmiha pratyabhijñā sarvamidaṃ viṣayavākyaṃ vyā-
pnoti । tathā hi—pañca jñānendriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca bhūtāni pañca tanmātrāḥ antaḥka-
raṇamahaṅkāro mahānprakṛtiḥ puruṣa iti pañcaviṃśatitattvāni sāṅkhyāssañcakṣate । tataḥ paraṃ ca
tattvāntaraṃ niṣedhanti । ihāpi daśa jñānakarmendriyāṇi । daśa bhūtatanmātrāḥ arthaśabdo-
ditāḥ । mano'ntaḥkaraṇabuddhyahaṅkārāḥ । ātmā । mahān mahattattvam । avyaktaṃ prakṛtiḥ ।
puruṣaśceti pañcaviṃśatistattvāni nirdiśyante । tataḥ paraṃ ca nivāryate <quote>‘sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gati’</quote>
riti । yadyapi sāṅkhyairmahattattva eva buddhiśabdaḥ prayujyate nāhaṅkāre । ātmaśabdaśca cetana-
vācī na mahattattve prayujyate । tathāpi pratyabhijñāpakabhūyastvānusāreṇa kārye kāraṇopacārā-
dahaṅkāre buddhiśabdaḥ mahattattve vyāpakatvābhiprāyeṇātmaśabdaḥ <quote>‘yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ tadya-
cchejjñāna ātmanī’</quote>tyatraiva uparitanamantre jñāne'pyātmaśabdaprayogadarśanāditi samarthayituṃ
śakyam । tataśca smārtakramapratyabhijñāyāstāvannāsiddhiḥ । nāpyavyaktapadarūḍheranirṇāyakatvam ।
pratyabhijñayā sāṅkhyatantrasiddhānyeva tattvāni nirdiśyanta iti niścaye sati tadantargatāvyaktapade
tadrūḍherevādaraṇīyatvāt । <quote>‘na pakṣe na sapakṣe ca vipakṣe kevalaṃ sthitaḥ । citraṃ nistriṃśadhūmaste pratā-
pāgnyanumāpakaḥ ।’</quote> itikāvyaśloke'pi naiyāyikaparibhāṣāmāśritya pravṛtte pakṣādiśabde tadīya-
rūḍherāśrīyamāṇatvāt । tasmātsmārtakramapratyabhijñāvyaktapadarūḍhibhyāmavyaktaṃ pradhānamityetadyukta-
mū । na<quote>‘nvātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhī’</quote>tyādinā rathirathahayādyātmanā nirūpiteṣvātmādiṣu prakṛteṣu
pariśiṣṭaṃ śarīramihāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇasākāṅkṣamāsta ityāśaṅkyāha—<pratika>vapuṣo na kaścidiha
prasaṅga iti</pratika> । ayaṃ bhāvaḥ । pradhānasyākāṅkṣāvataḥ sannidhāvāmnānaṃ hi prakaraṇam । tathā ca kiṃ
tat paramapadamiti nirdhāraṇākāṅkṣasya viṣṇoḥ paramapadasya sannidhānāmnānarūpeṇa prakaraṇene-
ndriyādīni tadīyaparatvapramitāvavadhitayopayogitvena tadaṅgāni bhavantu nāma । tāni rathi-
rathādikalpanāyāṃ gṛhītānyevānyūnānatiriktānyatrāpi grāhyāṇīti kena prakaraṇena siddhyanti ।
na hīndriyādibhirasaṃyataiḥ jīvaḥ punaḥpunaḥ saṃsārameva prāpnuyāt saṃyataistu muktimiti pradarśa-
nārthai rathirathādirūpeṇāṅgabhāvamāsādya nirākāṅkṣāṇīndriyādīni puruṣaśabdoktaparamapadaparatva-
﻿<pb n="510"/>
tasmāt sāṅkhyaṃ pradhānameva na vapuriti ।।
vapuriti siddhānto yuktaḥ । pūrvatra—

pratipādane'ṅgabhāvamapekṣante । nāpi pradhānaṃ paramapadaṃ svakīyaparatvapratipādane teṣāmavadhitayā-
ṅgabhāvamapekṣate । taddhi <quote>‘sā kāṣṭhe’</quote>ti niratiśayotkarṣapratipādanānusāreṇa kṛts‍nyasya jagataḥ
paratvāvadhitayāṅgabhāvamapekṣate । na ca kṛtsnaṃ jagadrūpakavākye gṛhītam । śarīrendriyatadvi-
ṣayamanobuddhibhoktṛṇāmeva tatra grahaṇāt । atastadākāṅkṣānusāreṇa sāṅkhyābhimatapuruṣāvaraca-
turviṃśatitattvātmakasakalaprapañcasamarpakatvamevātrendriyādiśabdānāṃ yuktam । etena prakṛtatvā
bhāve'pi sannidhānādrūpakavākyagatānyevendriyādīni grāhyāṇīti nirastam । ākāṅkṣāyāḥ
sannidhānādbalīyastvāt । nanu vaidikasyāṅgāpekṣasyānyatra nibaddhamapi vaidikamevāṅgajātaṃ grāhyaṃ
na tvanibaddhamapyavaidikamiti pūrvatantranirṇītatvādiha parapadasya paratvāvadhibhūta(rūpa)svaprati-
yogyaṅgākāṅkṣāyāṃ muktisaṃsāraprāptivarṇanopayogirūpaṇārthatayā prāṅiba/?/ddhamapi tadevendriyādikaṃ
grāhyaṃ na tu kvacidaṅgatvenānibaddhamapi sāṅkhyāditattvajātamiti cet । syādapyevaṃ yadi sau-
ryādiṣvitikartavyatākalāpasyevātra paratvāvadherindriyādikasyāmnānam । tasmāt svavākyā-
mnānaṃ niratiśayaparatvāvadhyākāṅkṣāpūraṇasamarthaṃ rūpitaṃ sāṅkhyasmṛtiprasiddhacaturviṃśatitattvā-
tmakaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagadastīti sannidhimātralabhyamākāṅkṣāpūraṇasamarthaṃ rūpitamindriyādikamagrāhya-
mato nāstyatra śarīragrahaṇaprasaktiriti । upasaṃharati—<pratika>tasmāditi । sāṅkhyaṃ pradhānamiti</pratika> ।
saṅkhyayā buddhyā kalpitaṃ sāṅkhyamiti ānumānikapadavivaraṇam । saṅkhyāśabdāt śeṣe <quote>‘prā-
gdīvyato'ṇa’</quote> । saṅkhyānumānakalpitaṃ parameśvarānadhīnaṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamihāvyaktaśabdodita-
mityarthaḥ । siddhāntapratijñāṃ darśayati—<pratika>vapuriti siddhāntoyukta iti</pratika> । yadyapi sūtre<quote>‘ne’</quote>ti
pratijñāpadena nānumānikaṃ pradhānamavyaktapadoditamiti pratijñā labhyate । tasyāmeva ca <quote>‘śarī-
rarūpakavinyastagṛhīte’</quote>riti sūtreṇa tadvivaraṇarūpeṇa <quote>‘pūrvatre’</quote>tyādibhāṣyeṇa ca varṇyamāno hetuḥ
samañjaso bhavati । tattvavyaktapadoditaṃ vapuriti pratijñāyāṃ sādhyāviśeṣāt । tathāpi <quote>‘ne’</quote>ti
sūtrapadalabhyā hetvanvayinī pratijñā spaṣṭeti matvā phalitā siddhāntapratijñā darśitā । tāmeva
khalbāśritya saṃśayavākye'pi <quote>‘śarīraṃ ve’</quote>ti koṭhyantaraṃ darśitam । <quote>‘pūrvatre’</quote>tyādihetuvacanasyāya-
marthaḥ । pūrvatrātmā śarīraṃ buddhirmanaḥ indriyāṇi tadviṣayā rūparasagandhasparśaśabdāśceti ṣaḍ
rathirathasārathitadūhyamānaturagarajjuturagatanmārgātmanā rūpitāḥ । te ca na kāvya iva śobhārthaṃ
tathā rūpitāḥ । adhyātmaprakaraṇatvāt । kiṃ tu muktyarthopāsanopakaraṇatvādvaśīkāryatvāya ।
vaśīvṛtānyetāni tadupakaraṇāni bhavanti । ata eva hi tatraiva śrūyate <quote>‘yastvavijñānavān
bhavati ayuktena manasā saha । tasyendriyāṇyavaśyāni duṣṭāśvā iva sārathaiḥ ।। yastu vijñā-
navānbhavati yuktena manasā saha । tasyendriyāṇi vaśyāni sadaśvā iva sārathaiḥ ।। yastvavi-
jñānavānbhavati amanaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ । na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati ।। yastu
vijñānavānbhavati samanaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ । sa tu tatpadamāpnoti yato bhūyo na jāyata’</quote>iti ।
evaṃ vaśīkāryatvāya rathirathādirūpakavinyastānāṃ madhye śarīgatiriktānāmindriyādiśabdairga-
<pb n="511"/>
<quote>‘ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu । buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragraha-
meva ca ।। indriyāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāṃsteṣu gocarān ।।’</quote>
ityātmaśarīrādiṣūpāsanopāyeṣu vaśīkāryatvāya rathirathādirūpakavinyasteṣu
pariśiṣṭasya śarīrākhyarūpakavinyastasya avyaktaśabdena gṛhīteḥ । <quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ
parā hyarthāḥ’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ’</quote> ityantena vaśīkāryatvāya hyutta-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ditatvena śarīrasyaiva rūpakavinyastasyāvyaktaśabdena grāhyatvāditi । nanu <quote>‘rūpakavinyastaśarī-
ragṛhīte’</quote>riti vaktavyam । viśeṣaṇasya pūrvanipātitvāt । athocyeta vivakṣānibandhanatvādvi-
śeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyātra rūpakavinyastaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vivakṣitamiti । tathāpi prasiddhaviparītaviśe-
ṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavivakṣāyāḥ phalaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkā bhāṣye rathirathādirūpakavinyaste nirdhāra-
ṇasaptamīprayogeṇa nivartitā । <quote>‘rūpakavinyastaśarīragṛhīte’</quote>rityukte śarīrāṇāṃ madhye yadrūpakavi-
nyastaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva grāhyaṃ na tu tavdyatiriktaṃ śarīramityuktaṃ syāt । tatra yadi muktyupayogi
saṃsāropayogi ca yadyāvaccharīraṃ tatsarvaṃ rathatvena rūpitaṃ tadā rūpakavinyastavyatiriktasya
śarīrasyābhāvādrūpakavinyastetyetadavyāvartakamiti<quote>‘viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahula’</quote><ref>(pā॰ 2.1.57 sū)</ref>
miti samāsaḥ viphalaḥ syāt । yadi rūpakavinyastavyatiriktamapi śarīramiṣyate tadāpi
tadviphalameva । rūpakavinyastavyatiriktasya śarīrasyāvyaktapadagrāhyatvaprasaktyabhāvāt । <quote>‘śarīra-
rūpakavinyastagṛhīte’</quote>rityukte tu bhāṣyadarśitena prakāreṇa rūpakavinyastānāmātmādīnāṃ madhye
yaccharīrākhyaṃ rūpakavinyastaṃ tadeva grāhyaṃ na tvātmādikamityuktaṃ syāt । tadā śarīraviśeṣaṇaṃ
na viphalam । ātmādirūpakavinyastāntarasya vyāvartyasya sattvādvakṣyamāṇarītyā prāgrūpakavi-
nyastānāmeva <quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā’</quote>iti sandarbhaḥ parāparabhāvavivecanārtha ityavyaktapadena
rūpakavinyastāntarasya grahaṇaprasaktau tasya vyāvartanīyatvācca । tathā ca pariśeṣapradarśanaphalaṃ
<quote>‘śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīte’</quote>riti sūtragrathanamiti bhāṣye nirdhāraṇasaptamīprayogeṇa darśitaṃ bha-
vati । syādetat । rūpakavinyastānāmeve<quote>‘ndriyebhya’</quote>ityādisandarbho vaśīkāryatvaparāparabhāvavi-
vecanārtha ityasyārthasya siddhau pariśeṣādavyaktapadena śarīraṃ grāhyaṃ syāt । saiva kuta ityāśaṅkā-
yāmāha&mdash;<pratika>indriyebhya iti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । nāyaṃ sandarbhaḥ puruṣasya kṛtsnajagadapekṣayā paratvapra-
tipādanārthaḥ । tathā sati <quote>‘viśvasmādindra uttara’</quote> itivat <quote>‘sarvasmātparaḥ puruṣa’</quote> ityetāvata
eva vaktavyatvenendriyārthādīnāṃ parāparabhāvavarṇanavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । kiṃ tu teṣāmeva parāpara-
bhāvavivecanārthaḥ । sa ca parāparabhāvasteṣāṃ rathirathādibhāvakalpanāgranthasiddhāyāṃ vaśīkartavya-
tāyāṃ pradhānāpradhānatvarūpa eva vācyaḥ । tathā satyeva pūrvagranthenaikavākyatālābhāt । pūrva-
granthe prāpyavyatiriktā vaśīkāryā rūpitāḥ । ihāpi parāparabhāvena vivecitāḥ । saṅkhyā-
sāmyena tatpratyabhijñānācca sāṅkhyatantrasiddhatattveṣvāntargaṇikabhedena saṅkhyāsāmyopapādanasa-
mbhave'pi śrutavibhājakopādhibhissaṅkhyāsāmyāsambhavāt । kiṃ ca parāparabhāvavivecanasya
prakṛtāṃ vaśīkāryatāṃ vinā viṣayāntaraṃ na paśyāmaḥ । nanu, tattadupāsanaphalabhūyastvālpīyastvaṃ
tadviṣayaḥ syāt । <quote>‘daśa manvantarāṇīha tiṣṭhantīndriyacintakāḥ । bhautikāstu śataṃ pūrṇaṃ sa-
hasraṃ tvābhimānikāḥ । bauddhā daśasahastraṃ tu tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarāḥ । pūrṇaṃ śatasahastraṃ tu tiṣṭha-
ntyavyaktacintakāḥ । puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṅkhyā na vidyate ।।’</quote> iti hi vadanti । tatra

ttaraṃ parā ucyante । tadetat&mdash;
<quote>‘yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñastadyacchejjñāna ātmani । jñānamātmani mahati niyacche-
ttadyacchecchānta ātmani।।’</quote> iti śrutirevāgre darśayati ।
