naivaṃ manasaḥ indriyebhyaḥ pṛthakparigaṇanābhāvena bhūtatanmātrāpekṣayā nikṛṣṭatvena tadviṣayatve
<quote>‘arthebhyaśca paraṃ mana’</quote> ityasyānupapatteḥ । etena kāraṇatvanibandhanaṃ bhoktāraṃ pratyantaraṅgatvaniba-
ndhanaṃ vā paratvavacanamityapi śaṅkā nirastā । indriyāṇāmāhaṅkārikatve <quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā
hyarthā’</quote>ityasya bhautikatve <quote>‘arthebhyaśca paraṃ mana’</quote>ityasya cānupapatteḥ । indriyebhyo'rthānāmantara-
ṅgatve tadabhāve ca tayorevānupapatteḥ । tasmādindriyebhyaḥ tadviṣayā vaśīkāryatve parāḥ । vaśye-
ndriyasyāpi viṣayasannidhau indriyavijṛmbhaṇāt । tebhyo manaḥ param । manasi viṣayadhyāna-
pravṛttau viṣayāsannidhāne'pi rāgādivijṛmbhaṇāt । tasmādapi buddhiḥ parā । adhyavasāyābhāve
manaso'kiñcitkaratvāt । tato'pyātmā paraḥ । sarvasyāpi viṣayapravṛtterātmecchāyattatvāt ।
tata evātmā aṇurapi mahāniti viśeṣyate । tasmādapi śarīraṃ param । tadāyattatvātsarvāsā-
mapi puruṣapravṛttīnām । tasmādapi paraḥ sarvāntaryāmī sarvaprerakaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śiva iti indriyā-
dayo vaśīkāryatāyāmuttarottaraṃ parā ucyanta ityeva yuktamiti । <quote>‘darśayati ce’</quote>ti sūtraśeṣaṃ
vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>tadetaditi</pratika> । vaśīkāryatve yaduttarottaraṃ paratvamuktaṃ tadetadiyaṃ kaṭhavallīśrutirevāgre
darśayati । <quote>‘yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñastadyaccheda‍jñāna ātmani । jñānamātmani mahati niyacchetta-
dyacchecchānta ātmani’</quote> iti mantreṇa darśayatītyarthaḥ । asya mantrasyāyamarthaḥ । vāgupalakṣita-
sarvajñānasādhanendriyajātaṃ manasi yacchet । bāhyendriyavyāpakatvamutsṛjya manomātreṇāvati-
ṣṭheta । viṣayavikalpābhimukhaṃ tanmanaḥ ātmani niścitāyāṃ buddhau viṣayadoṣādhyavasāyarūpāyāṃ
niyacchettāṃ buddhiṃ mahati pratyagātmani niyacchet tadupādeyatāviṣayāṃ tatpravaṇāṃ kuryāt । taṃ
ca pratyagātmānaṃ nirupaplave paramātmani yacchet taccheṣatāpratipattiṃ kuryāditi । kathamayamartho
labhyata iti cet pūrvāparaparāmarśena vāgādiśabdeṣu chāndasavyutpattyāśrayaṇāt । kvacitkiñci-
nniyacchediti karmādhikaraṇayuktaṃ hi niyamanaṃ dvitīyādivākyeṣūcyate । ato vāgityatra
dvitīyārthe prathamā । <quote>‘supāṃsu lu’</quote>giti dvitīyāyāssulugvā । <quote>‘manasī’</quote>iti chāndaso dīrghaḥ।<quote>‘iyā-
ḍiyājīkārāṇāmupasaṅkhyāna’</quote>miti saptamyā īkāro vā । caturthavākye taditi liṅgavyatyayaḥ
<quote>‘supāṃ sulu’</quote>giti lugvā । pūrvavākye saptamīnirdiṣṭasyānantaravākye dvitīyayā nirdeśa iti
pūrvavākyeṣu darśanenātra tatpadasyātmaparatvāt । nanvitthamanena mantreṇa indriyamanobuddhyātmanāṃ
vaśīkaraṇakrama ukta ityastu nāma । tāvatā kathamindriyārthamanobuddhyātmaśarīraparamātmanāṃ
tasyāpi paramātmanaḥ vaśīkāryatvaṃ noktam । vaśīkāryatvenoktānāmapi indriyādīnāmuttarottaraṃ
heturna.....ta iti ceducyate । yogakālakartavyendriyādiniyamanarūpadvaśīkaraṇakramapradarśanaparo'yaṃ
mantraḥ । ataḥ viṣayaśarīrayorīhāgrahaṇam । viṣayasannidhānapariharaṇarūpaṃ viṣayavaśīkaraṇaṃ hi
vyutthānakāle'pi kartavyaṃ hitamitamedhyāśanarūpaṃ śarīravaśīkaraṇaṃ vyutthānakāle tu kartavyaṃ
na yogagrahaṇe'pi । atrendriyādīnāṃ vaśīkāryatāyāṃ paratve <quote>‘darśayati ce’</quote>ti liṅgopanyāsasya
<pb n="513"/>
tato'vyaktaśabdena vapuratra pratipādyam ।।
nanu pradhānamavyaktamiti prasiddham, kathamiha śarīramucyata ityāśaṅkāyāmāha&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।।</sutra>
sūkṣmamityavyaktamucyate । avyaktameva śarīrāvasthaṃ kāryārhatvāt avyaktaśa-
bdenocyate iti yuktameva ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na vaikalyam । sthālīpulākanyāyenāpi liṅgopanyāsadarśanāt । pūrvatantre sauryādiṣu vaidikī-
tikartavyatā <quote>‘prayājeprayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotī’</quote>ti liṅgadarśanāditi samarthanānantaraṃ yatra <quote>‘aindrāgna-
mekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapedyassañjātāyu’</quote>rityādau vaidikyā itikartavyatāyā liṅgaṃ na dṛśyate tatra
laukikamaṅgajātaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ <quote>‘liṅgahetutvādaliṅge laukikaṃ syā’</quote>diti<ref>(jai॰)</ref>sūtreṇodbhāvya
<quote>‘liṅgasya pūrvatvāccodanāśabdasāmānyādekenāpi nirudhyeta yathā sthālīpulākene’</quote>ti<ref>(jai॰)</ref>sūtraiṇa
tathaiva varṇitatvāt । paramātmano vaśīkāryatvamupāsanāphalaṃ nivṛttiparyantamindriyādiniyama-
nāvicchedasiddhyartham । indriyādiprerakatvenopāsyatvaṃ sarvātmanā tanniyamyatvarūpataccheṣatvānu-
sandhānātmakapratyagātmavaśīkaraṇoktyaivārthasiddhaṃ liṅgamindriyādīnāṃ vaśīkāryatāyāmuttaro-
ttaraparatve liṅgaṃ tanniyamanakramavacanameva । sthūlasūkṣmasūkṣmatarakrameṇaivopāyopadeśasya lakṣyave-
dhābhyāsādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt । tasmā<quote>‘dindriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā’</quote> ityādisandarbhastharūpakavākyaikavākya-
tāsāmarthyāt tatpūrvakā<quote>‘dyacchedvāṅmanasī’</quote>ityādiliṅgadarśanācca prāgrūpakavākye vaśīkāryatveno-
ktānāmindriyādīnāmuttarottaraṃ paratvavarṇanaparatayā śarīrātirikteṣvindriyādiśabdairgṛhīteṣu
pariśiṣṭaṃ śarīramavyaktapadena grāhyamiti yuktamityupasaṃharati---<pratika>tato'vyakteti</pratika> ।। uttarasū-
travyāvartyāṃ śaṅkāṃ darśayati---<pratika>pradhānamiti</pratika> । yadyapi sāṅkhyatantrasiddhatattvagaṇanapratyabhijñā-
nāsiddhyā'vyaktapadasya pradhāne tadīyā prasiddhiḥ śrutāvyaktapadārthanirṇaye na prayojikā,
tathāpi na vyaktamiti yaugikaprasiddhiḥ pradhāne sambhavati na tu śarīra iti śaṅkābhiprāyaḥ ।।
sū ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।। sūkṣmapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---<pratika>sūkṣmamityavyaktamucyata iti</pratika> ।
avyaktamatīndriyaṃ pradhānam । sāṅkhyābhimatapradhānanirdeśake pūrvasūtrādānumānikapade'nuvartayituṃ
śakye'pyatra padāntareṇa pradhānanirdeśo na sāṅkhyābhimatamanumānakalpyaṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamiha
nirdidikṣitaṃ tadanumānasya dvitīyādhyāye dūṣayiṣyamāṇatvena tasyāprāmāṇikatvāt kiṃtvasma-
dabhimataṃ <quote>‘kṣaraṃ pradhānamamṛtākṣaraṃ haraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘kṣarātmānāvīśate deva ekaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirgu-
ṇeśaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘saṃsāramokṣasthitibandhahetu’</quote> rityādiśrutiprasiddhaṃ parameśvarādhīnamiti jñāpanāya ।
tuśabdamavadhāraṇārthamabhipretyāpekṣitādhyāhāreṇa sūtraṃ yojayati---<pratika>avyaktameveti</pratika> । sūkṣmasya
pradhānasya sthūlāvasthāviśeṣaḥ śarīramiti sūkṣmāvasthāvācakapadena tadeva sthūlāvasthaṃ lakṣyate ।
pariśeṣeṇa śarīrāvyaktapadayoraikārthyāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi bhāvaḥ । nanu tayoraikārthyāvaśyaṃbhāve
śarīrapadamavyaktalakṣakaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkāṃ <quote>‘tadarhatvā’</quote>diti sautrapadavyākhyānena nirāka-
<pratika>roti&mdash;kāryārhatvāditi</pratika> । upāsananirasanarūpakāryārhaṃ khalu vaśīkāryapradarśakavākye tattārata-
myapradarśakavākye ca grāhmam । tattu śarīrāvasthameva na sūkṣmāvasthamiti na vaiparītyaśaṅkāvakāśa
iti bhāvaḥ । ataḥ <quote>‘śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīte’</quote>rityuktaṃ yuktamityupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>yuktameveti</pratika> ।। tatraiva
<pb n="514"/>
yuktyantaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat ।। 3 ।।</sutra>
ātmaśarīrādikaṃ parameśvarādhīnatayā arthavat upāsanānirvṛttaye bhavati ।
parameśvaro'ntaryāmī sarvamātmādikaṃ prerayanneva copāsanopāyatvena vaśīkāryakā-
ṣṭheti prāpyatvena ca <quote>‘sā parā gatiḥ’</quote> iti procyate । tato'vyaktamiha śarīrameva ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। jñeyatvāvacanācca ।। 4 ।।</sutra>
yadi sāṃkhyaṃ pradhānamatrāvyaktaṃ tadā'sya jñeyatvamucyeta । na ca tadasti । tato
na kāpilamavyaktam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
hetvantaraparatvenottarasūtramavatārayati---<pratika>yuktyantaramiti</pratika> ।। sū ।। <pratika>tadadhīnatvādarthavat</pratika> ।। 3 ।।
<quote>‘arthava’</quote>dityasya viśeṣyādhyāhārapūrvakaṃ sūtrasyākṣarārthamuktvā tasya yuktyantaraparyavasānapradarśa-
nāya tātparyamāha&mdash;<pratika>parameśvaro'ntaryāmīti</pratika>। upāsanopāyatvena vaśīkāryeṣūttarāvadhitayā
parameśvaraḥ śrutāvucyate <quote>‘sā kāṣṭhe’</quote>ti । tasya ca tathātvaṃ sarvāntaryāmiṇa iti । tatpreryamāṇasya
tadadhīnasyaiva sataḥ ātmaśarīrāderupāsananirvartanarūpaphalakatvāt । ato yāni vaśīkāryāṇya-
pekṣya parameśvarasarvottarāvadhitvaṃ pradarśayiṣitaṃ teṣā sarveṣāmanupasthāpanena tadapekṣaṃ tatpradarśayituṃ
na śakyamiti śarīre'pi kenacitpadena grāhye pariśeṣādavyaktapadena tadgrahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ ।
ato'vyaktapadena śarīragrahaṇameti sūtrasyāvṛttyā hetvantaraparatvamityabhipretyāha&mdash;prāpyatvena
ceti । parameśvaraḥ prāpyatvena cocyate <quote>‘sā parā gati’</quote>riti । vaśīkāryaparāparabhāvanirūpaṇa-
prastāve prāpyatvavacanaṃ tadarthatayaivārthavadvaktumucitam । bhavati ca śarīraparamavyaktapadamityatropa-
pādakasya pariśeṣasya pradarśanena tadarthavattadadhīnatvātpariśeṣasya । anyathā rūpakaprastāve<quote>‘vijñā
nasārathiryastu manaḥpragrahavānnaraḥ । so'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ pada’</quote>miti pāratvena
rūpitaṃ paramapadamavyaktapadena gṛhyatāmiti śaṅkāspadatvena pariśeṣāsiddheḥ । tasmātpariśeṣo-
papādanārthaprāpyatvavacanaparāmarśādapi śarīraparamavyaktapadamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ rūpaka-
vākye indriyādivaśīkaraṇavākyarūpapūrvāparagranthaparyālocanayā <quote>‘sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gati’</quote>
riti viṣayavākyāntargatavākyadvayaparyālocanayā ca nyāyavicāraṇāyāṃ nāstyatra sāṅkhyata-
ntrasiddhatatvagrahaṇaśaṅkāvakāśa iti samarthitam ।। ye tvatra kramikamahadavyaktṛpuruṣaśravaṇamātra-
santuṣṭāḥ śraddhājaḍā manyante idameva vākyaṃ sāṅkhyatantrasya mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati na hyaveda-
mūlamatyantāptatamāḥ kapilādayo maharṣayaḥ praṇayeyuriti, tānpratyāha---sū ।। <pratika>jñeyatvāvaca-
nācca</pratika> ।। 4 ।। yadīdameva vākyaṃ sāṅkhyamatasya mūlamabhaviṣyat, tadā <quote>‘nirguṇapuruṣāntarajñānā-
tkaivalya’</quote>miti vadatāṃ sāṅkhyānāmabhimataṃ pradhānasya mumukṣujñeyatvamapi atrāvakṣyat । tadatra
nocyate । vibhūtiviśeṣaprāptaye pradhānasyopāsyatvaṃ tasya ca svatantrakāraṇatvamityādi ca teṣā-
mabhimatamatra nocyate । ato naitanmūlakaṃ sāṅkhyatantramiti śraddheyam । na hi yanmūlameva
śāstraṃ pramāṇayanti tatra tacchāstravarṇitaṃ noktamiti yujyate । nanvasiddhaṃ jñeyatvāvacanam ।
<quote>‘aśabdamasparśamarūpamavyayaṃ tathā'rasaṃ nityamagandhavacca yat । anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ
nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate ।।’</quote> ityuttaramantra eva hi tasya jñeyatvaṃ vadati śabdādihīnatvoktyā
<pb n="515"/>
jñeyatvamapyasyoktamastītyāśaṅkya pariharati---
<sutra>।। sū ।। vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakaraṇāt ।। 5 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘aśabdamasparśamarūpamavyayaṃ tathā'rasaṃ nityamagandhanavacca yat । anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ
paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate’</quote> <ref>(kaṭha॰ 3-15, 13)</ref> ityagretanamantraḥ
asyāpi jñeyatāṃ vadatīti cet na, <quote>‘yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ’</quote> iti prājñasyaiva pūrvaṃ
prakṛtatvāt । tato'vyaktaṃ śarīrameva ।।
pradhānasya prasaṅga eva nāstītyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praśnaśca ।। 6 ।।</sutra>
trayāṇāmupāsyopāsanopāsakānāmevātra prakaraṇe jñeyatayā praśnopanyāsaḥ
kriyate, na pradhānādeḥ । yathā&mdash;<quote>‘taṃ durdaśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam ।
adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti ।।’</quote> <ref>(kaṭha. 2-12)</ref>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mahataḥ paratvoktyā ca nicāyyasya jñeyasya pradhānatvāvagamādityāśaṅkāmutthāpya pariharatītyāha&mdash;
<pratika>jñeyatvamapīti</pratika> । śrutyocyamānamiti śeṣaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakaraṇāt</pratika> ।। 8 ।।
<quote>“yacchedvāṅmanasī prājña’ iti prājñasyaiva prākprakṛtatvā”</quote>diti parihārasūtrāṃśavyākhyānasyāya-
marthaḥ । atra mantre<quote>‘tadyacchecchānta ātmanī’</quote>ti yasmin śānta ātmani pratyagātmano niya-
manamuktaṃ yadvijñānāyaiva ca bāhyendriyamanobuddhipratyagātmanāṃ saṃyamanamuktaṃ sa eva prājñapara-
mātmā nicāyyatvenocyate । tasyaiva paścātprakṛtatvāt । tasmānmantrādadhastāt <quote>‘yeṣu sarveṣu
bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate । dṛśyate tvagryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhi’</quote>riti mantre prakṛta-
tvāditi । yadvā<quote>‘yacchedvāṅmanasī prājña’</quote>iti mantre prājñaśabdaḥ parameśvara ityabhipretya prājñasya,
parameśvarasya prakṛtatvamuktam । sarvāntaryāmī parameśvara evopāsakānujighṛkṣayā tasya vāgādisaṃ-
yamanaṃ sampādayati <quote>‘yamevaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ’</quote>iti prāgapyuktatvāt ityasminnarthe<quote>‘yacchedvā-
ṅmanasī’</quote>iti mantrasya tātparyamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ । śabdādihīnatvamakṣaravākyayoḥ paramātma-
no'pi prasiddham । mahato bhokturātmanaḥ paratvaṃ ca tasya prasiddhameva । nanvastu nāma prājñasya
prakaraṇaṃ tathāpi yathātraiva <quote>‘yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ । sthāṇumanye'nusaṃyanti
yathākarma yathāśruta’</quote>miti mantre jīvasya gatirvarṇitā । eva<quote>‘maśabda’</quote>miti mantre pradhānasya
mumukṣujñeyatvavacanaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha---sū ।। <pratika>trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praśnaśca</pratika> ।। 6 ।।
sautrasyaivamitipadasya vivaraṇaṃ&mdash;<pratika>jñeyatayeti</pratika> । upanyāsaḥ prativacanam । praśnavihita upanyāsaḥ
praśnopanyāsaḥ । prativacanasya upāsyopāsanopāsakatrayaviṣayatvadarśanādeva praśnasya tantrayavi-
ṣayatvaṃ sphuṭamavagantavyamiti prāthamikasyāpi praśnasya sūtre paścānnirdeśaḥ । tathaiva prathamaṃ
prativacanamudāharati&mdash;<pratika>ya1thādhyātmeti</pratika> । ādiśabdena <quote>‘matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahātī’</quote>ti
caturthapādo gṛhyate । tāvataiva prativacanasya tantrayaviṣayatvamavagantuṃ śakyamityabhisandhāya ‘taṃ
<note>1 atrāsmadavalokiteṣu sarveṣu mūlapustakeṣu <quote>‘yathā---taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭa’</quote>mityādiḥ <quote>‘harṣaśokau jahāti ।।’</quote> ityantaḥ
saṃpūrṇo mantra udāhṛtaḥ । <quote>‘adhyātmayogādhigamena deva’</quote>miti tṛtīyapādamātrodāharaṇaviśiṣṭo mūlapāṭha eva śivārkamaṇidīpikā-
kṛdabhimata iti<quote>‘yathādhyātme’</quote>ti pratīkoddharaṇādinā spaṣṭamavagamyate ।</note>
<pb n="516"/>
ityādirupanyāsaḥ ।। <quote>‘yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye astītyeke nāyamastīti caike ।
etadvidyāmanuśiṣṭastvayā'haṃ varāṇāmeṣa varastṛtīyaḥ’</quote> (kaṭha. 1-21) iti, <quote>‘anyatra
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
durdarśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇa’</quote>miti mantrasya pūrvārdhaṃ na likhitam । atra hyu-
ttarārdha eva <quote>‘devaṃ matve’</quote>tyupāsyopāsanayo<quote>‘radhyātmayogādhigamena dhīra’</quote>ityupāsakasya ca upanyā-
so dṛśyate । adhyātmayogaḥ upāsakātmasvarūpaviṣayo yogaḥ । <pratika>yeyaṃ preta iti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yeyaṃ prete
vicikitsā manuṣye astītyeke nāyamastīti caike । etadvidyāmanuśiṣṭastvayāhaṃ varāṇāmeṣa
varastṛtīyaḥ’</quote> iti praśnaḥ । evamatropākhyāyate&mdash;vājaśravaso maharṣiḥ sarvavedasadakṣiṇena yajñe-
neṣṭvā jaradgavīrdakṣiṇāḥ prayacchan bālena naciketasā putreṇānarhadakṣiṇādānanimittakratuvaika-
lyāt pituraniṣṭamāśaṅkamānena tadaniṣṭaṃ svātmapratipādanenāpi kratusampattiṃ kārayitvā nivā-
raṇīyamiti manyamānena <quote>‘tata māṃ kasmai dāsyasī’</quote>ti punaḥpunaḥ pṛṣṭvā bahuvārapraśnanirbandhasa-
ñjātakopasya <quote>‘mṛtyeva tvā dadānī’</quote>tyuktavataḥ vacanena naciketāstathaiva mṛtyulokaṃ gatvā
mṛtyordvāri tisro rātrīranaśnannuṣitvā pravāsāgatena mṛtyunā brāhmaṇo yadanaśnan dvāri sthita
iti bhītena trīnvarānvṛṇīṣveti pṛṣṭaḥ prathamena vareṇa pitussaumanasyaṃ dvitīyenāgnividyāṃ ca
pratilabhya atha <quote>‘yeyaṃ preta’</quote> iti papraccheti । nāyaṃ pretaḥ pretaśabdasya lokavedaprasiddhyā mṛtavi-
ṣayatvamaṅgīkṛtya maraṇānantarānuvartijananāntarānubandhidehātiriktātmasadasadbhāvaviṣayo varṇa-
nīyaḥ । yathābhūtātmasadbhāve naciketasaḥ prāgeva viśvāsavattvāt । anyathā pituḥ kratuvaika-
lyadoṣaparihārārthaṃ <quote>‘tāta kasmai māṃ dāsyasī’</quote>ti vacanasya <quote>‘mṛtyave tvā dadāmī’</quote>tyuktabataḥ
pituranṛtadoṣaparihārārthaṃ svayaṃ mṛtyulokajigamiṣāsamaye <quote>‘sasyamiva martyaḥ pacyate sasyamiva
jāyate puna’</quote>riti vacanasyānupapatteḥ । nāpi <quote>‘na pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote>ti vākyamukhe pretyaśabdaprayo-
gānusāreṇa pretaśabdasya prakarṣeṇa itaḥ punarāvṛttirahitāṃ gatiṃ prāpta iti yogena muktaviṣaya-
tvamaṅgīkṛtya muktyanantarānubandhimalamāyādisakalapāśakṣayapūrvakaṃ janmamṛtyubhayaśokādyaspṛṣṭa-
paramaśivalokaprāptimadātmasadasadbhāvaviṣayo varṇanīyaḥ । tatrāpi tasya prāgeva viśvāsavattvā-
deva । anyathā <quote>‘svarge loke na bhayaṃ kiñcanāsti na tatra mṛtyuḥ na jarayā bibheti । ubhe tīrtvā
aśanāyāpipāse śokātigo modate svargaloka’</quote>iti svargalokamahimavarṇanapūrvakaṃ <quote>‘sa tvamagniṃ
svargyamadhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya mahyam । svargalokā amṛtatvaṃ bhajante etaddvitī-
yena vṛṇe vareṇe’</quote>ti svargasādhanāgnividyāvaraṇānupapatteḥ । svargaloko hyatra muktaprāpyaḥ parama-
śivaloka eva । <quote>‘devā ha vai svargaṃ lokamagaman । te rudramapṛccha’</quote>nnityatharvaśirasi śivaloke
svargaśabdaprayogadarśanāt iha svargalokaśabdasyāśanāyāpipāsājarāmṛtyubhayaśokāspṛṣṭatvena
viśeṣitatvācca tasmai nāciketādyupadeśānantaraṃ taccayanaphalavarṇanaprastāve <quote>‘sa mṛtyupāśānpurataḥ
praṇudya śokātigo modate svargaloke’</quote>iti tatphalasvargaprāptessakalasaṃsārapāśanivṛttipūrvakatvena
viśeṣitatvācca । na ca karmaṇo muktisādhanatvaṃ na sambhavatīti vācyam । upāsanānugrāhaka-
tvena tatsambhavāt । tasmādanirṇītaviṣayasyāsya praśnasya prativacanamālocyābhiprāyo varṇa-
nīyaḥ । prativacane tu prathamaṃ tāvat praśnasya duravagāhaviṣayatvaṃ pratipādyate । <quote>‘devairatrāpi
vicikitsitaṃ purā na hi sujñeyamaṇureṣa dharma’</quote>iti । tadanantara<quote>‘manyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣve’</quote>-
<pb n="517"/>
dharmādanyatrādharmādanyatrāsmāt kṛtākṛtāt । anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpa-
śyasi tadvada’ ।। <ref>(kaṭha. 2-14)</ref> iti ca praśnaḥ । tasmāt prakṛtatvādapi śarīramevā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tyupakramya <quote>‘yeye kāmā durlabhā martyaloke sarvān kāmān chandataḥ prārthayasva । imā rāmāssa-
rathāssatūryā na hīdṛśā lambhanīyā manuṣyaiḥ । ābhirmatprattābhiḥ paricārayasva naciketo
maraṇaṃ mānuprākṣī’</quote>rityantarasandarbhe kṛtena brahmavidyopadeśopayogivairāgyaparīkṣārthena pralobhana-
vrātena pralobhyamānasyāpi naciketasaḥ <quote>‘śvo bhāvā martyasya yadantakena sarvendriyāṇāṃ jara-
yanti teja’</quote>ityādinā <quote>‘abhidhyāyan varṇaratipramodān anatidīrghe jīvite ko ramete’</quote>tyantena
kṛtayā viṣayanindayā viṣayavairāgyamupalakṣya vidyābhīpsitaṃ naciketasaṃ <quote>‘manye na tvā kāmā
bahavo'lolupante’</quote>ti mokṣārthavidyābhīpsitvena tadupayogidṛḍhavairāgyavattvena ca praśaṃsā kṛtopa-
labhyate । tata<quote>‘staṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍha’</quote>miti mantre upāsyopāsanopāsakānāmatisaṅkṣiptopadeśaḥ kṛto
dṛśyate । tatastadanusāreṇa tatri/?/tayaṃ vivicya vaktavyamiti praśnārtho'<quote>‘nyatra dharmā’</quote>diti mantraḥ
śrūyate । tatrā<quote>‘nyatra dharmādanyatrādharmā’</quote>diti vaiṣayikaharṣaśokahetudharmādharmavilakṣaṇasya tadubhaya-
prahāṇahetorupāsanasya praśnaḥ । <quote>‘anyatrāsmātkṛtākṛtā’</quote>diti kṛtamapi karmayasyākṛtaprāyaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgu-
raphalaṃ tasmādaihikāmuṣmikakarmānuṣṭhānavyagrādamumukṣorvilakṣaṇasya brahmopāsakasya praśnaḥ । <quote>‘anyatra
bhūtācca bhavyācce’</quote>ti bhūtādutpannādatītāt vartamānācca bhavyāt bhaviṣyataśca anyasya
devādīnāmapi duravagāhatvena vilakṣaṇasyopāsyasya praśnaḥ । <quote>‘yattatpaśyasi tadvade’</quote>tyatra yattatpa-
dayostatri/?/tayaviṣayatvasambhavāttadanantaraṃ <quote>‘tatte padaṃ saṅgraheṇa bravīmī’</quote>ti prativacanamupakramya
<quote>‘oṃmityeta’</quote>dityādinā upāsanasādhanapraṇavapraśaṃsādvārā praṇavena brahmopāsane pradarśite <quote>‘na
jāyate mriyate vā vipaści’</quote>dityādinā sāmānyata upāsakasvarūpamucyate । viśeṣataśca <quote>‘nā-
yamātmā pravacanena labhyo na bhedhayā na bahunā śrutena । yamevaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyastasyaiṣa
ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām’</quote> । <quote>‘vijñānasārathiryastu manaḥpragrahavānnaraḥ ।’</quote> ityādimantraiḥ phalapa-
ryantakartṛsvarūpaṃ nirūpyate । <quote>‘yamevaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya’</quote> iti paramaśivānugrahakaṭākṣaviṣaya eva
upāsanāyāṃ mukhyo'dhikārī । tasmā eva paramaśivaḥ svātmānaṃ prakāśayatītyucyate । tathābhū-
taścādhikārī mandamadhyamottamabhāvairavagantavyaḥ । te bhāvāḥ purāṇeṣu prapañcitāḥ । <quote>‘prasanne
sati deveśe paśostasminpravartate । asti nātho mametyalpā bhaktirmuktipurassaram । kampaḥ svedo
'śrupātaśca kaṇṭhe ca svaravikriyā । ānandādyupalabdhiśca bhavedākasmikī tadā । etairvyastaissa-
mastairvā liṅgairavyabhicāribhiḥ । mandamadhyottamairbhāvairvijñeyāste narottamāḥ ।।’</quote> iti । upāsya-
svarūpaṃ tu <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyā’</quote>nityādinā prapañcena nirūpyate । evaṃ ca prativacanasandarbhaparyāloca-
nayā muktipravṛttivacanānantaravismṛtaprativacanārthatayā punaḥ prakṛtapraśnaparyālocanayā ca
<quote>‘yeyaṃ preta’</quote>iti praśnastvanyaviṣayassyāditi na śaṅkyam । trīnvarāndattavantaṃ prati svatantracaturtha-
praśnāyogena tasya tṛtīyapraśnavivaraṇatvenaiva yojanīyatvāt । tasmādupāsyopāsanopāsakānāṃ
trayāṇāmevātra saparikarāṇāṃ nirūpaṇīyatvāt svātantryeṇa sāṅkhyatantrasiddhatatvapratipādanasya
mumukṣujñeyatvena svatantrapradhānavacanasyātra nāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ । sūtre prathamaṃ caśabdaṃ hetusa-
muccayārthaṃ vyākurvan sūtrārthamupasaṃharati---<pratika>tasmāditi । liṅgāntaramiti ।</pratika> avyaktaṃ na pradhā-
<pb n="518"/>
vyaktaṃ na pradhānam ।।
kiṃca liṅgāntaramapyastītyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। mahadvacca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
yatheha <quote>‘buddherātmā mahān paraḥ’</quote> (kaṭha. 3-10) ityatra na tāntriko mahān
bhavati ā1tmaśabdāt, tathā avyaktaśabdādapi na pradhānamiti nirṇayaḥ ।।
ityānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
namiti sādhye hetvantaramityarthaḥ ।। sū ।। <pratika>mahadvacca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> tāntriko mahānna bhavatītyatra
sūtrābhipretaṃ hetumāha---<pratika>ātmaśabdāditi</pratika> । vyāpakatvādiyogādātmaśabdasya cetane rūḍherba-
lavattvāt aṇāvapi jīve bhoktṛtayā prādhānyābhiprāyeṇa mahānityasya viśeṣaṇatvopapatteḥ ।
<quote>‘mahataḥ paramavyakta’</quote>mityatra <quote>‘mahataḥ paraṃ dhruva’</quote>mityatra ca viśeṣaṇapadena viśeṣyavyavahāra ityu-
papatteḥ । <quote>‘ya etaṃ vaimṛdhaṃ pūrṇamāse'nunirvāpyamapaśya’</quote>dityādau viśeṣaṇapadenāpi viśiṣṭopala-
kṣaṇadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ । atra <quote>‘mahataḥ paramavyakta’</quote>mityādimantre nirīśvarasāṅkhyatantrasiddhasya
mahadavyaktapañcaviṃśapuruṣakramasya pañcaviṃśātiriktatatvāntaraniṣedhasya ca pratyabhijñāmupanyasataḥ
pūrvavādino mate jīvātiriktasya brahmaṇaḥ śaśaśṛṅgakalpatayā talliṅgaṃ śaśaśṛṅgataikṣṇyakalpaṃ
siddhānte jīvātiriktabrahmopapādanena sattāṃ prāpaṇīyamityaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā । evamuttareṣvapi
vākyānvayādhikaraṇaparyanteṣu caturṣvadhikaraṇeṣvapyaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatā draṣṭavyā । prakṛtyadhikara-
ṇasya seśvarasāṅkhyamatanirākaraṇārthatayā spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatve'pi prāsaṅgikī saṅgatirantyādhikara-
ṇasyātītakṛtsnādhikaraṇanyāyātideśarūpasya viśiṣya naitasminpāde saṅgatyapekṣeti ca vakṣyāmaḥ ।
nanu samanantara eva tṛtīyapādāntyādhikaraṇe suṣuptyutrk/?/ntisūtreṇa patyādisūtreṇa ca suṣuptamukto-
bhayāvasthāt jīvāt bhinnaṃ śivatatvarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmāstīti prasādhitam । atrāpyadhikaraṇe
sautreṇa <quote>‘ekeṣā’</quote>miti padenā <quote>‘numānikamapī’</quote>tyapiśabdena ca śākhāntaraprāptasya kaṭhaśākhāyā-
mapi prakaraṇāntaraprāptasya jīvātiriktabrahmatatvasyānumatireva sūcitā kathaṃ tadapalāpena pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । kṛtvā cintayeti bhaviṣyati । evaṃ kṛtvācintārūpamidamadhikaraṇam । ataḥ <quote>‘puruṣānnāparaṃ
kiñci’</quote>diti vākyamavalambya pañcaviṃśātiriktaniṣedhopanyāsamātreṇa śākhāntaraprakaraṇāntaragata
vākyānāṃ jīvātiriktabrahmaparatvamākṣipyaivātra pūrvapakṣopapādanaṃ kāryamityevaṃ na bhramitavya-
miti pradarśayitume<quote>‘vānumānikamapyekeṣā’</quote>miti sūtrakṛtā śākhāntaraprakaraṇāntarasiddhabrahmā-
numatiḥ sūcitā । agre <quote>‘vākyānvayā’</quote>diti sūtreṇa tadadhikaraṇopayuktārthapratipādanānantara-
<quote>‘manyārthaṃ tu jaimini’</quote>riti pūrvasūtrānuvṛttacakārayuktena śākhāntaraprakaraṇāntaragatavākyānāṃ
bahūnāṃ jīvātirikte brahmaṇi tattadadhikaraṇoktanyāyairanvitatvādapi hetau tatsattāmapalapya kṛtāḥ
pūrvapakṣāḥ kartuṃ na yujyanta ityarthāntarasyāpi pratipādakatayā paṃcādhikaraṇaśeṣeṇa kṛtvācintā-
rūpatvaṃ spaṣṭīkariṣyate । kṛtvācintāstu nyāyavyutpādanārthāssiddhāntasthairyārthāśceti sarvaṃ sama-
ñjasam ।। 1 ।।</p>
<head>ityānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<note>1 <quote>‘mahacchabdā’</quote>diti pāṭhāntaram ।</note>
<pb n="519"/>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha ānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। ānumānikamapyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca ।। 1 ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu
tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat ।। 3 ।। jñeyatvāvacanācca ।। 4 ।। vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakara-
ṇāt ।। 5 ।। trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praśnaśca ।। 6 ।। mahadvacca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>mahataḥ paramavyaktaṃ puruṣādavaraṃ pradhānaṃ syāt । kapilamate yadabhimataṃ tanmantrapratyabhijñānāt ।। 72 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prāgātmaśarīrādi hi rathirathabhāvādikalpane prakṛtam । tatrātmādigrahaṇāccharīramavaśiṣṭamavyaktam ।। 73 ।।</l></lg>
<head>ityānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>śivābhyāṃ namaḥ ।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prathamasyādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ । atha ānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। ānumānikamapyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca ।। 1 ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu
tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat ।। 3 ।। jñeyatvāvacanācca ।। 4 ।। vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakara-
ṇāt ।। 5 ।। trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praśnaśca ।। 6 ।। mahadvacca ।। 7 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asminpāde padamātrasamanvayo'bhidhīyate । īkṣatyadhikaraṇe pratijñātaṃ pradhānasyāśabdatvamāsaddha kāsu
cicchākhāsu pradhānasamarpaṇābhāsānāṃ śabdānāṃ śrūyamāṇatvāt ityāśaṃkya teṣāmanyaparatvapradarśanārthamidamārabhyate---<pratika>ānumā-
nikamityādi ।</pratika> asya <quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ । manasastu parā buddhirbuddherātmā mahānparaḥ । mahataḥ
paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ paraḥ । puruṣānna paraṃ kiṃcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parāgatiḥ ।।’</quote> iti kaṭhavallīvākyasthamavyaktapadaṃ viṣayaḥ ।
tatkiṃ pradhānaparamuta śarīraparamiti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । smārtakramarūḍhibhyāṃ śabdasparśādiśūnyatvena yogasaṃbhavācca
avyaktaśabdaḥ pradhānapara iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । prakaraṇabalāt smārtakramācchrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvāt, śarīrasyaiva
rathasādṛśyena vinyastasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhayormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇāt, itarāṇīndriyā-
dīni prakṛtānyeva paramapadadidarśayiṣayā samanukrāmantyā śrutyā pariśiṣyamāṇenehāntyenāvyaktaśabdena pariśiṣyamāṇasya prakṛtasya
śarīrasya pradarśyamānatvāt sthūlaśarīrasyāvyaktaśabdānarhatve'pi kāryakāraṇayorabhedanyāyena sthūlaśarīrārambhakabhūtasūkṣmasyā
vyaktaśabdārhasyātrāvyaktaśabdena vivakṣitatvāt, sūkṣmaśabditaprāgavasthābhyupagame'pi kūṭasthabrahmaṇassraṣṭṝtvasiddhayarthaṃ bandhamukti-
vyavasthārthaṃ ca tasyā īśvarādhīnāyā abhyupagamasyārthavattvenāvaśyakatvena ca svatantrapradhānakāraṇavādāprasakteḥ, asyāvyakta-
śabdoditasya jñeyatvānukteḥ, jñeyatvapratipādakasyā <quote>‘śabdamasparśa’</quote> mityādivākyasya prakaraṇabalātprājñaparatvaniścayāt, atra
kaṭhavallīśrutau agnijīvaparamātmanāṃ trayāṇāmeva praśnānuguṇyenopanyasanīyatvāt mahacchabdavadavyaktaśabdasyāpi sāṃkhyāsādhāraṇa-
tatvaparatvānabhyupagamasya nyāyyatvācca, avyaktaśabdaḥ śarīrapara eveti siddhāntaḥ । sūtrārthastu, <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। ānumānikama-
pyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca ।। 1 ।। ānumānikamapi</pratika>=anumānanirūpitamapi
pradhānam । <pratika>ekeṣām</pratika>=keṣāṃ cit śākhināṃ śabdavadupalabhyata iti <pratika>cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīteḥ</pratika>=rūpakeṇa ratha-
sādṛśyena vinyastam । śarīrameva rūpakavinyastaṃ śarīrarūpakavinyastam । tasya <pratika>gṛhīteḥ</pratika>=pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhi-
tasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇāt । <pratika>darśayati ca</pratika>=śrutiriti śeṣaḥ । itarāṇi indriyādīni prakṛtānyeva samanukā-
mantī śrutiḥ avyaktaśabdena pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ śarīraṃ darśayatītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p>sthūlatvātspaṣṭhatarasya vyaktaśabdārhasyāsya śarīrasya kathamavyaktaśabdārhatvamityāśaṃkyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu tadarhatvāt
।। 2 ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu</pratika>=kāraṇātmanā sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ vivakṣitam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadarhatvāt</pratika>=sūkṣmasyāvyaktaśabdārhatvāt ityarthaḥ ।
<quote>‘taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsī’</quote>diti śrutiśca vyākṛtamidameva jagatprāgavasthāyāmavyākṛtanāmarūpavyaktaśabdayogyaṃ darśayati ।। 2 ।।</p>
<p>tadevaṃ sūkṣmaśabditaprāgavasthābhyupagame pradhānakaraṇavādāpattimāśaṃkya nirākaroti---<pratika>sū॰ ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat
।। 3 ।। tadadhīnatvāt</pratika>=avyākṛtasyāvyaktaśabdārhasya, avidyāmāyākāśākṣarādiśabdaśabditasya parameśvarādhīnatvāt ।
<pratika>arthavat</pratika>=kūṭasthabrahmaṇassraṣṭṛtvasiddhyarthaṃ bandhamuktivyavasthārthaṃ ca tatsvīkārāvaśyaṃbhāvāt tadavyaktaṃ sārthakaṃ ca bhavati । ataḥ
parakalpitasatyasvatantrapradhānakāraṇavādasya nātra prasaktiḥ ।। 3 ।।</p>
<pb n="520"/>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jñeyatvāvacanāñca</pratika>।। 4 ।। <quote>‘guṇapuruṣāntarajñānātkaivalya’</quote>miti vadadbhiḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryate । tadvadi-
hāvyaktasya jñeyatvaṃ nocyate । ato'pi nātra pradhānasya prasaktiḥ ।। 4 ।।</p>
<p>jñeyatvamapyuktamastītyāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। vadatīti cenna prājño hi prakaraṇāt ।। 5 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘aśabdamasparśamarūpa-
mavyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityamagandhavacca yat । anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate ।।’</quote> iti vākyaṃ pradhānasya
nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭasya jñeyatvaṃ <pratika>vadatīti cet । na</pratika>=neha pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena nirdiśyate । kiṃ tu । <pratika>prājñohi</pratika>=iha prakaraṇe
paramātmā nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>prakaraṇāt</pratika>=<quote>‘puruṣānna paraṃ kiṃcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ ।’</quote> ityādi-
nirdeśāt । prājñasya hīdaṃ prakaraṇam । ataḥ pradhānasya na jñeyatvamavyaktaśabdārhatvaṃ vā ।। iti ।। 5 ।।</p>
<p>itaśca na pradhānasyāvyaktaśabdavācyatvaṃ jñeyatvaṃ betyāha---<pratika>sū ।। trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praś‍naśca ।। 6।।</pratika> asmi-
ngranthe trayāṇāmeva padārthānāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ vaktavyatayopanyāso dṛśyate । praśnaśca tadviṣaya eva । nātra pradhānaviṣayaḥ
praśno'sti । na vā tasyopanyasanīyatvam ।। 6 ।। iti ।</p>
<p>sāṃkhyaprasiddhervedaprasidhdyā virodhācca na sā vedārthanirṇayaheturiti sadṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>sū ।। mahadvacca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> yathā mahacchabda-
ssāṃkhyasādhāraṇatattvagocaro na bhavati tathā avyaktaśabdopi na pradhānaparo bhavitumarhati ।। ataśca na pradhānasya śabdattva-
miti bhāvaḥ ।। 7 ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, iha pāde aspaṣṭabrahmaliṃgāni kati cana vākyāni vicāryaṃte । viṣayavākyaṃ samānam । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ
sarvaṃ prāyeṇāviśiṣṭam । sūtrārthavarṇane paramasti kiyadvailakṣaṇyam । <pratika><quote>‘ānumānika’</quote>miti sūtre <quote>‘darśayati ca’</quote></pratika> ityasya <quote>‘yacche-
dvāṅmanasī prājñastadyacchedjñāna ātmani । jñānamātmani mahati niyacchettadyacchecchānta ātmani ।।’</quote> iti śrutirevāgre darśayatītyarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> avyaktameva śarīrāvasthaṃ kāryārhatvādavyaktaśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat ।। 3 ।।</pratika> ātmaśarīrādikaṃ <pratika>tadadhīnatvāt</pratika>=parameśvarādhīnatvāt । <pratika>arthavat</pratika> । upāsana-
nirvṛttaye bhavati । antaryāmiṇaḥ parameśvarasyaivopāsanādiṣu prerakatvādityarthaḥ । itarāṇi sūtrāṇi aviśiṣṭānīti na puneḥ prapañcyante ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasiddhāntasūtrārthādikaṃ sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatādaviśiṣṭam । <quote>‘tadadhīnatvā’</quote>diti sūtre paraṃ
paramapuruṣaśarīratayā tadadhīnatvādbha‍ūtasūkṣmamavyākṛtamarthavaditi prakārāntareṇāpi vyākhyātamiti śrīkaṇṭhamatādviśeṣaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate vadatīti cenna prājño hi । prakaraṇāt ।</pratika> iti yogavibhāgena <pratika><quote>‘camasavadaviśeṣāt’</quote></pratika> iti
sūtrasaṃkalanena ca sūtranavakamekamadhikaraṇam । asya yadyapi viṣayavākyamaviśiṣṭam । tathāpi <quote>‘jīvā eva tu duḥkhinaḥ’</quote> iti
kiṃcidvākyāntaramapi viṣayatayā saṃyojitamityasti viśeṣaḥ । atra avyaktajīvaśabdau mukhyārthau kiṃ pradhānapuruṣau uta viṣṇuriti
saṃśayaḥ । avyaktajīvaśabdayostayoreva prasiddheḥ pañcamyuktāvaratvajīvagatabahutvaduḥkhitvādidharmāṇāṃ viṣṇāvabhāvācca pradhānapuru-
ṣāviti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘avyaktamacalaṃ śāntam’</quote> <quote>‘anena jīvena’</quote> ityādi vacanabalāt sarvāntaryāmitayā sarvaniyantṛtvāt, sarva-
nāmāśrayatvāt, svātantryarūpapravṛttinimittāśrayatvācca, avyaktajīvaśabdābhyāṃ viṣṇurevābhidhīyata iti siddhāntaḥ ।। <pratika>sūtrā-
rthastu, sū । ānumānikamapyekeṣāmiti cenna śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīterdarśayati ca ।। 1।।</pratika> apirevārthe ।
caḥ smṛtisamuccaye । yataḥ <pratika>sāṃkhyānumānakalpitaṃ</pratika> pradhānādyeva <pratika>ekeṣāṃ</pratika> śākhināṃ śākhāsthitā<quote>‘vyaktātpuruṣa’</quote>ityādiśabdairucyate ।
ataḥ viṣṇoḥ sarvaśabdavācyatvaṃ na yujyata iti <pratika>cenna</pratika> । yataḥ viṣṇurevāvyaktādiśabdavācyaḥ । na pradhānādiḥ । kutaḥ । yataḥ
<quote>‘avyakta’</quote>miti śrutiḥ <quote>‘avyakto'kṣara’</quote> iti smṛtiśca=<pratika>darśayati</pratika>=viṣṇorevāvyaktādiśabdavācyatvaṃ pratipādayati, ata
ityarthaḥ । kathaṃ tarhi anyatrāvyaktādiśabdavyavahāra ityata uktaṃ <pratika>śarīrarūpaketyādi</pratika> । kapratyayaḥ kutsane । tathā ca
<pratika>śarīrarūpakavinyastagṛhīteḥ</pratika>=yathā śarīraṃ puruṣatantraṃ tathā paramātmatantratvena nimittena kutsitatvāt śarīrasame aśarīre
pradhānādau vinyastasya paramātmana eva avyaktādiśabdairgṛhīteḥ grahaṇāt । tathā ca paramātmasaṃbandhādeva anyatra prakṛtyādāvavya-
ktādiśabdavācyatvavyavahāra ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu tadarhatvāt ।। 2 ।। sūkṣmaṃ tu</pratika>=sūkṣmamevāvyaktaśabdavācyam । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadarhatvāt</pratika>=tasya sūkṣmasyā-
vyaktaśabdapravṛttinimittayogyatvāt ।। tatra sūkṣmatvaṃ viṣṇorevātastasyaivāvyaktaśabdavācyatvamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। tadadhīnatvādarthavat ।। 3।।</pratika> <quote>‘darśayati ce’</quote>tyataśca śabdo'nuvartate । paramātmanyeva parāvaraduḥkhibaddhatvādivāci
śabdajātam । <pratika>arthavat</pratika>=pravṛ़ttinimittarūpārthavat । na vyartham । kutaḥ । <pratika>tadadhīnatvāt</pratika>=teṣāṃ pradhānādigataparāvaratvā-
didharmāṇāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāt । tathā ca anyagatapravṛttinimittasvāmitvarūpanimittenāpi bhagavati parāvarādiśabdaprayogo
yukta iti bhāvaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jñeyatvāvacanācca ।। 4 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tamevaikaṃ jānathe’</quote>ti viṣṇoreva mokṣārthaṃ jñeyatvavacanāt anyeṣāṃ tadavacanāt pratyuta
<quote>‘vimuñcathe’</quote>ti heyatvavacanāt atratyāvyaktādiśabdairviṣṇureva vācya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="521"/>
atha camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
aprakṛtatvādiha na pradhānaprastāva iti bhavatu । anyatra pradhānameva kāraṇatvena
śrūyata ityāśaṅkyādhikaraṇamidamārabhyate&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। camasavadaviśeṣāt ।। 8 ।।</sutra>
śvetāśvataropaniṣada śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ&mdash;
<quote>‘ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ । ajo hyeko
juṣamāṇo'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo'nyaḥ’</quote>।। ।। iti ।। iha sarvaprapañca-
kāraṇatvena janmarahitatvādajeti śrūyamāṇā prakṛtiḥ sāṃkhyasiddhā parā vā ।।
iti saṃśaye sāṃkhyasiddheti vaktuṃ yuktam । <quote>‘ajām’</quote> iti janmābhāvavaca-
nāt, sarvaprajākāraṇatvācca, <quote>‘lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāma’</quote> iti varṇopalakṣitaguṇatrayā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<p>pūrvādhikaraṇena pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>aprakṛtatvāditi</pratika> ।
iha <quote>‘mahataḥ paramavyakta’</quote>mityatra pradhānanirdeśo mā bhūt । prakaraṇasya praśnopanyāsābhyāṃ tri-
ṣveva niyantritatvāt । tato'nyatra śrutyantare svatantrapradhānaṃ kāraṇatvena śrūyata ityāśaṅkā-
nirākaraṇārthamidamadhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। camasavadaviśeṣāt ।। 8 ।। ī1tyā-
dīti</pratika> । <quote>‘ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo'nyaḥ’</quote> ityuttarārdhamādaśabde-
na gṛhītam । asya mantrasya tāvadayamarthaḥ pratīyate । kāñcicchāgāṃ trivarṇāṃ sarūpabahubarkarāmekaḥ
chāgaḥ prīyamāṇo'nuvartate । anyastāmupabhuktāṃ jahātīti loke sambhavannapyayamartho vede
viśiṣya cādhyātmaprakaraṇe na sambandhamarhatītyajāśabdaṃ yogena prakṛtiparaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ sā
prakṛtiḥ kiṃ sāṅkhyābhimatā svatantrā uta siddhāntābhimatā parameśvarādhīneti janmarahitatvaṃ
parameśvarakāraṇakatvaṃ ca koṭidvayabījamabhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati&mdash;<pratika>iheti</pratika> । nanu janmābhāvava-
canaṃ gauṇaṃ nīyatāṃ lohitādivacanavadityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>sarveti</pratika> । <quote>‘bahvīḥ prajāssṛjamānā’</quote>
miti sakalakāryakāraṇatvasya śravaṇāttannirvāhāya janmarahitatvaṃ mukhyamevāṅgīkartavyam ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū ।। vadatīti cenna prājño hi ।। 5 ।।</pratika> nanu <quote>‘anādyananta’</quote>miti kāṭhakavākyaṃ <pratika>vadatīti cet</pratika>=pradhānaṃ pratipādyata
iti tasyāpi jñeyatvamastīti cet । <pratika>na</pratika> । kutaḥ । <pratika>hi</pratika>=yatastatra <pratika>prājñaḥ</pratika>=prājñaśabditaḥ paramātmaiva pratipādyate । na pradhānam ।
ato na tasya jñeyatvaṃ mantavyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakaraṇāt ।। 6 ।।</pratika> vaiṣṇavarūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ prakaraṇabalācca <pratika>prājña</pratika> evātra pratipādya ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। trayāṇāmeva caivamupanyāsaḥ praśnaśca ।। 7 ।।</pratika> yuktisamuccaye yata ityarthe ca cakāraḥ । evaśabdaḥ prakāratraividhya-
parāmarśakaḥ । tathā ca yataḥ evaṃ <pratika>trayāṇāmeva</pratika>=pitṛsaumanasyasvargyāgniparamātmarūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāmeva tadviṣayaka eva praśnaḥ nacike-
tasā yamaṃ prati kṛtaḥ teṣāmevopanyāsaḥ prativacanaṃ cātra prakaraṇe dṛśyate । ato nātra pradhānaṃ pratipādyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। mahadvacca ।। 8 ।।</pratika> caḥ dārṣṭāntikasamuccaye । <quote>‘mahāntaṃ vibhumātmāna’</quote> mityādivākyagatamahacchabdasya yathā viṣṇupara-
tvameva na mahattattvaparatvaṃ tadvadavyaktādiśabdasyāpītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। camasavadaviśeṣāt ।। 9 ।। camasavat</pratika>=yathā yajñapātre prasiddhasyāpi camasaśabdasya <quote>‘idaṃ tacchira’</quote> iti śruti-
valena śirovācakatā tadvadavyaktādiśabdasya pradhānādau prasiddhatve'pi viṣṇuvācakatvameva । kutaḥ । <quote>‘nāmāni sarvāṇi’</quote> iti
śruteḥ । nanu tathāpi kuto viṣṇuvācakatvamityatauktam <pratika>aviśeṣāditi</pratika>=<quote>‘nāmāni sarvāṇi’</quote> iti śruteḥ idamiti śrutyā
viśeṣābhāvādityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti ānandatīrthamate ānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</pratika>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāmānumānikādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<note>(1) <quote>‘ityādī’</quote>ti pratīkoddharaṇatadva‍yākhyānābhyāṃ pūrvārdhamātrasahitaḥ pāṭhaṣṭīkābhimata iti pratīyate ।</note>
<pb n="522"/>
vagamācca । tadanyasyāḥ kasyāścidevaṃvidhatvaṃ na yuktam ।।
iti prāpte siddhānta ucyate&mdash;na tantrasiddhā prakṛtiriha kāraṇatvenocyate । na
hi janmābhāvamātreṇa tasyā eva pratītiḥ । <quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasaḥ’</quote> itivat praka-
raṇe viśeṣakābhāvāt । yathā <quote>‘idaṃ tacchiraḥ’</quote> iti camaso viśeṣyate । yaugikā-
dviśeṣapratītirhi viśeṣakāpekṣā । tato na tāntrikī prakṛtiriti ।।
tantrasiddhāyāḥ prakṛteranyā kīdṛśītyata āha&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। jyotirupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyata eke ।। 9 ।।</sutra>
jyotiriti parameśvara ucyate । parameśvarakāraṇikeyamajā prakṛtirucyate । tathā
parameśvarakāraṇikāyā eva pratipādakameke taittirīyāstatsvarūpamantramadhīyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lauhityādivacane tathā mukhyārthatātparyagrāhakapramāṇābhāvātsiddhān‍tābhimataprakṛtāvapi mukhyasya
lauhityāderasambhavācca । kusumbhasalilāndhakāragatarañjakatvaprasannatvāvārakatvaguṇayogādanekara-
jassatvatamoguṇeṣu lohitādiśabdā gauṇā iti lohitādivacavasya guṇatraye tātparyamanumeya-
miti bhāvaḥ । nanu siddhānte'pi prakṛterjanmarahitatvamabhyupagamyata ityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>tadanyasyā
iti</pratika> । <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmātprasṛtā purāṇī’</quote>ti parameśvarakāraṇakatvena klṛptāyāḥ prakṛtermukhyajanma-
rahitatvaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ । tasmātsāṅkhyābhimataprakṛtirevātra grāhyeti pūrvapakṣamupasaṃha-
rati&mdash;<pratika>itīti</pratika> । sautreṇa hetuvacanenābhipretāṃ pratijñāmadhyāharati&mdash;<pratika>tantrasiddheti</pratika> । camase yathā
viśeṣakamasti evamatra viśeṣakābhāvāditi sautrasya hetorvyākāriṣyamāṇasyāsiddhimāśaṅkya
pariharati&mdash;<pratika>janmeti</pratika> । janmarāhitye'pi parameśvarakāraṇakatvaṃ vakṣyamāṇarītyā siddhāntābhima-
taprakṛtessambhavati । ato janmābhāvaśravaṇamātrānna sāṅkhyābhimataprakṛtigrahaṇe niyāmakami-
tyabhiprāyaḥ । <quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudh‍nya’</quote> <pratika>iti mantre</pratika> camasaśabdasya camyate aneneti
yogena bhakṣaṇasādhanamātraparasya śiraḥparatve yathā viśeṣakamasti <quote>‘idaṃ tacchira’</quote> iti prakaraṇe
vākyamevamatra na jāyata iti yodenājanmamātraparasyājāśabdasya sāṅkhyābhimataprakṛtiparatve
viśeṣakābhāvāditi sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>arvāgbilaiti</pratika> । nanu yaugikāt paṅkajodbhidādi-
śabdādabhimataviśeṣapratītiḥ prakaraṇe viśeṣakamanapekṣyāpi dṛṣṭaṃ tadvadihāpi syādityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;
<pratika>yogikāditi</pratika> । kevalayaugiko yaśśabdaḥ tasmāt yaugikārthāntaraviśeṣapratītirviśeṣakāpekṣe-
tyarthaḥ । ataḥ paṅkajaśabdasya padme rūḍherapi sattvādudbhijjatve yaugikārthasyaiva viśeṣākāratvena
tadavāntaraviśeṣapratītyapekṣābhāvācca tadubhayavyāvṛttiḥ । ato viśeṣakābhāvāt tāntrikī prakṛ-
tiriha na grāhyetyupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>tata iti</pratika> । viśeṣābhāvassiddhāntābhimataprakṛtāvapi tulya
ityāśaṅkāmudbhāvya taduttaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>tantrasiddhāyā iti ।। sū ।। jyoti-
rupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyata eke ।। 9 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘taṃ devā jyotiṣāṃ jyoti’</quote>rityādiśrutiprasiddhe-
rjyotiśśabdo brahmapara ityāha&mdash;<pratika>jyotiriti</pratika> । upakramaśabdaṃ kāraṇaparamabhipretyāha&mdash;<pratika>parameśvara
iti</pratika> । hiśabdaṃ bhinnakramayojanena hetuparaṃ darśayan asya mantrasya śāstrāntare parameśvarakāraṇi-
kāyā eva prakṛteḥ pratipādakatvenādhyayanādityarthe sūtraśeṣaṃ yojayati&mdash;<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । hetorasiddhi-
<pb n="523"/>
<quote>‘aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān’</quote> iti parameśvaramupakramya <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti’</quote>
tasmāt’ ityādinā prapañcasya parameśvarādutpattyā tadātmakatvapratipādanasamaye
hi <quote>‘ajām’</quote> iti paṭhanti । atastatpratyabhijñānādiyamajā'pi parameśvarakāra-
ṇiketi niścīyate । ato na tantrasiddheti vādo yuktaḥ ।।
nanu parameśvarakāraṇiketyasyāḥ parameśvarakāryatvamucyate । kathamasyāstādṛśyā
ajāmiti vāda ityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivadavirodhaḥ ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
kalpaneti sṛṣṭirucyate&mdash;
<quote>‘chandāṃsi yajñāḥ kratavo vratāni bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yacca vedā vadanti । asmānmāyī
sṛjate viśvametat tasmiṃścānyo māyayā sanniruddhaḥ ।। māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmā-
yinaṃ tu maheśvaram’</quote> ।। iti sṛṣṭyupadeśādajātvamaheśvarakāryatvayoravirodhaḥ ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
māśaṅkya pariharati&mdash;<pratika>aṇoriti</pratika> । <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyā’</quote>niti mantre prastutāt parameśvarāt prāṇā-
dirūpasya sarvasya prapañcasyotpattyā tadātmakatvaṃ pratipādyate । <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmā’</quote>
dityādinā <quote>‘yasmājjyāyānaparo naiva kaścanāse’</quote>tyantena tanmadhye<quote>‘bahvīḥ prajā janayantīṃ sarūpā’</quote>
iti dvitīyapāde kiñcitpāṭhabhedenāmuṃ mantramadhīyate । tataśca yathā darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇapaṭhitaṃ
<quote>‘tābhyāmevamagnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālaṃ pūrṇamāse prāyaccha’</quote> diti vākyamindravṛttāntamātraviṣa-
yatayā pratīyamānamapi prakaraṇānurodhādindreṇāgnīṣomābhyāṃ dattatayocyamānasyaikādaśakapāla-
puroḍāśadravyakayāgasyānuṣṭheyatvena pratipādakamaṅgīkriyate, tathā saṃsāryasaṃsārijīvavṛttāntamā-
traviṣayatayā pratīyamāno'pyajāmantraḥ pūrvāparaparāmarśānurodhāttadīyabhogatyāgaviṣayatayocya-
mānāyāḥ sakalakāryajanayitryāḥ prakṛteḥ parameśvarasṛjyatvena pratipādako'ṅgīkartavya ityarthaḥ ।
sūtre tuśabdo'vadhāraṇārthaḥ । evamevāṅgīkartavyam । śvetāśvataropaniṣadyapi<quote>‘yo yoniṃyonima-
dhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘pradhānakṣetrajñapatirguṇeśaḥ’</quote> ityādimantraparyālocanayā parameśvarādhīnāyā eva
prakṛteḥ pratipādanamiti pratīteḥ । ataḥ <quote>‘sṛjamānā’</quote> miti sṛṣṭyai svātantryapratīteḥ sāṅkhyā-
bhimatasvatantraprakṛteḥ pratipādanamihāṅgīkartavyamityapi śaṅkā niravakāśā । <quote>‘yo yoniṃ yoni-
madhitiṣṭhatyeka’</quote> iti mantrānusāreṇa <quote>‘ādhoraṇādhiṣṭhito gajo gacchatī’</quote>tyatra gacchatipadasyeva
prayojyakartṛtvalakṣaṇasvātantryamātraparatve parapreryatvarūpasvātantryaparatvāpratīteriti bhāvaḥ ।। janma-
rāhītyaparameśvarasṛjyatvayorvirodhaśaṅkāyā uttaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>nanviti ।। sū ।।
kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivadavirodhaḥ ।। 10 ।। sṛṣṭirucyata iti</pratika> । <quote>‘sūryācandramasau
dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat’</quote> <quote>‘sargādau bhagavāndhātā yathāpūrvamakalpaya’</quote>dityādiśrutismṛtiṣu
kalpayatidhātoḥ sṛṣṭau prayogadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ । sṛṣṭyupadeśavākyodāharaṇena sautraṃ hetuṃ
viśadayan caśabdamavadhāraṇārthaṃ kṛtvā tasya <quote>‘avirodha’</quote> iti pratijñayānvayaṃ darśayati&mdash;<pratika>māyāṃ-
tviti</pratika> । <quote>‘asmānmāyī’</quote>ti viśvasṛṣṭyupadeśavākyamihodāharaṇīyam । tatra māyīti nirdiśya-
māno māyāvī sṛṣṭau viśvasraṣṭā maheśvaraśabdavācyatvena lokaprasiddhaḥ paramaśiva eveti pradarśa-
nāya <quote>‘māyāṃ tvi’</quote>ti tadanantaramantro'pyudāhṛtaḥ । nanu<quote>‘asmānmāyī’</quote>ti vākyāt janmarāhitya-
<pb n="524"/>
tathāhi---pralayakālenāmarūpe vihāyācidvasturūpā māyā'pi sūkṣmarūpeṇa maheśvarasya
śarīratayā tiṣṭhatītyajā sṛṣṭisamaye nāmarūpopetā tatkāraṇiketi । yathā ādi-
tyasya sṛṣṭisamaye vasvādibhogyarasādhāratvena madhutvaṃ kāryatvaṃ ca, tasya punaḥ prala-
yakāle madhvādivyapadeśānarhātyantasūkṣmarūpeṇāvasthānāt akāryatvaṃ ca madhuvi-
dyāyāṃ pratīyate । <quote>‘asau vā ādityo devamadhu........naivodetā nāstametā ekala eva
madhye sthātā’</quote> iti śruteḥ । evaṃ prakṛterajātveśvarakāraṇikātvayoravirodhaḥ । tasmā-
dajā na tantrasiddhā ।। iti camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
maheśvarasṛjyatvayoravirodho na labhyata ityāśaṅkya tatastallābhamupapādayati&mdash;<pratika>tathā hīti</pratika> ।
<quote>‘māyī’</quote>ti viśvasraṣṭurmāyāviśiṣṭatvavarṇanena tadānīmapyavibhaktanāmarūpā prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmarūpeṇa
maheśvarasya viśeṣaṇatayā tiṣṭhatīti pradarśanāt janmarāhityam<quote>‘asmā’</quote>diti pañcamyantena sṛṣṭi-
samaye māyārūpāt svaviśeṣaṇāt viśvaṃ sṛjatīti prakṛterviśvopādānatvavarṇanena upādāno-
pādeyabhāvena bhedapradarśanaṃ tasyā eva kāryātmanā parameśvarakāraṇakatvamityubhayorvirodhaḥ tato
labhyata ityarthaḥ । <pratika>acidvasturūpeti</pratika> । sargakāle jagatprakṛtyādyacidvastupariṇāmavatī paraprakṛ-
tirūpā māyā pralaye pariṇāmarahitā satī sūkṣmarūpeṇa vartata ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘madhvādiva’</quote>diti
dṛṣṭāntabhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>yatheti</pratika> । yathā sūryasya sṛṣṭisamaye madhutvakāryatvodayāstamayavattvaṃ
pralayasamaye tadabhāvaścetyubhayoravirodhaḥ । madhuvidyāyāṃ tathā śravaṇāt । evaṃ prakṛte'pyavirodha
ityarthaḥ।। 2 ।। <pratika>iti camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū।camasavadaviśeṣāt।।8।।jyotirupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyata eke।।9।।kalpanopadeśāccamadhvādivadavirodhaḥ।</sutra>
<lg><l>nirvicikitsaṃ brūte prakṛtiṃ sāṅkhyoditāmajāmantraḥ । triguṇātmakatvavacanādiha lohitaśuklakṛṣṇeti ।। 74 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>atreśvarakāraṇikā prakṛtiḥ proktā na tu svatantrā sā । anyatra hi mantro'yaṃ tatsṛṣṭiprakaraṇe paṭhitaḥ ।। 75 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। camasavadaviśeṣāt ।। 8 ।। jyotirupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyata eke ।। 9 ।।
kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivadavirodhaḥ ।। 10 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, punarapi pradhānasyāśabdatvamasiddhamiti pratyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ pradhānavādinaṃ pratyāha---<pratika>sū ।। camasavadityā-
di</pratika> । asya <quote>‘ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ । ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogā-
majo'nyaḥ ।।’</quote> iti śvetāśvataravākyasthamajāpadaṃ viṣayaḥ । atrājāpadaṃ pradhānaparaṃ vā māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ । pūrva-
trāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa pradhānasyāpratyabhijñāyāmapi atra triguṇatvādiliṃgopetādajāpadātpradhānapratyabhijñāsti । ato'jāpadaṃ pradhā-
naparamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, nānena mantreṇa pradhānasya śabdavattvamāśrayituṃ śakyam । sāṃkhyavāda evehābhipreta iti
viśeṣāvadhāraṇakāraṇābhāvāt । yathā <quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasa’</quote> iti vākye svātantryeṇa camasapratītikāraṇaviśeṣavacanābhāve asau
camaso'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum । evamihāpi viśeṣavacanābhāvānna pradhānapratītiḥ । kiṃtu tejo'bannātmikāyā-
striguṇāyāḥ parameśvarādrutpannāyā māyāyā eva pratītiśśākhāntarasaṃvādānniścīyate । amadhuna ādityasya madhutvakalpanavat tejo-
'banneṣu sādṛśyakalpanayājātvopadeśo gauṇa eva । ataḥ ajāśabdaḥ na pradhānaparaḥ kiṃ tu māyāpara iti ।। <pratika>sūtrārthastu=
camasavadaviśeṣāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> ajāśabdaḥ na pradhānaparaḥ । <pratika>aviśeṣāta</pratika>=viśeṣāvadhāraṇakāraṇābhāvāt । <pratika>camasavat=</pratika>
yathā hi <quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasa’</quote> iti mantre viśeṣābhāve camaso na nirṇīyate । tadvadihāviśeṣātpradhānasya na śabdavattvamiti ।</p>
<pb n="525"/>
atha saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
punaranyatra tantrasiddhāni pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāni tattvāni śrūyante ityāśaṅkya ta-
tparihartumadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate---
<sutra>।। su ।। na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvādatirekācca ।। 11 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha saṃkhyopaṃsagrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p>pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiṃ darśayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati-<pratika>anyatreti</pratika>।ajāmantre prakṛtimātraśra-
vaṇaṃ parameśvarādhīnaprakṛtiparatvena nīyatāṃ nāma।bṛhadāraṇyake pañcaviṃśatestatvānāṃ śravaṇaṃ sāṅkhya-
tantrasiddhebhyastatvebhyo'nyatra netumaśakyam। na ca tatra<quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā’</quote>ityatrevāntargaṇi-
kabhedena pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyālābhaḥ kathañcidupapādanīyaḥ।kiṃ tu sākṣādeva tatpratipādakaḥ śabdo-
'stītyadhikaśaṅkāsadbhāvāttatra pūrvapakṣamudbhāvya parihartumadhikaraṇāntaramārabhyata ityarthaḥ <pratika>।।sū।।
na saṅkhyopasaṅgrahādapi nānābhāvādatirekācca ।। 11 ।।</pratika> ‘yasminpañca pañcajanā ākāśaśca
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasa’</quote>iti mantre <quote>‘idaṃ tacchiraḥ’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati । iha punaḥ keyamajā pratipattavyetyata
āha---<pratika>sū ।। jyotirupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyat eke ।। 9 ।।</pratika> kiṃ tu ajā <pratika>jyotirupakramā tu</pratika>=tejaḥpramukhā
tejo'bannādilakṣaṇaiva pratipattavyā । kasmāt । <pratika>tathā hyeke śākhinaḥ adhīyate</pratika>---tejo'bannānāṃ parameśvarādutpattimabhi-
dhāya teṣāmeva rohitādirūpatāmāmananti । ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivadavirodhaḥ ।। 10 ।। kalpanopadeśāt</pratika>=tejo'bannalakṣaṇāyāścarācarayonermā-
yāyā ajāsādṛśyakalpanopadeśācca । <pratika>avirodhaḥ</pratika>=tejo'banneṣvajāśabdaprayogasya virodho nāsti । tatra dṛṣṭāṃtamāha---<pratika>madhvā-
divat</pratika>=yathā ādityasyāmadhuno madhutvaṃ,vācaścādhenordhenutvaṃ dyulokādīnāmanagnīnāṃ cāgnitvamityevaṃjātīyakaṃ kalpyate
tadvat । evamanajāyā māyāyā ajātvaṃ kalpyate ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyasaṃśayapūrvapakṣādikaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvavat । sūtrārthavarṇanaprakārastu kvacidviśiṣṭaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। camasavada-
viśeṣāt ।। 8 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘arvāgbilaścamasa’</quote> iti prakaraṇe <quote>‘idaṃ tacchira’</quote>iti viśeṣopadeśavadiha viśeṣāśravaṇāt na tāntrikī prakṛ-
tirajāśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jyotirupakramā tu tathā hyadhīyata eke ।। 9 ।। jyotirupakramā tu</pratika>=parameśvarakāraṇikeyamajā prakṛtiru-
cyate । <pratika>tathāhi</pratika>=parameśvarakāraṇikāyā eva pratipādakam <pratika>eke</pratika>=taittirīyāḥ tatsvarūpamantram <pratika>adhīyate</pratika>=paṭhanti । <quote>‘aṇo-
raṇīyā’</quote>niti parameśvaramupakramya <quote>‘sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmā’</quote>dityādinā prapañcasya parameśvarādutpattyā tadātmakatvapratipādana-
samaye hyajāmiti paṭhanti । atastatpratyabhijñayā parameśvarakāraṇiketi niścīyate ।</p>
<p>nanu parameśvarakāryāyāstasyāḥ kathamajeti vāda ityāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivadavirodhaḥ
।। 10 ।। kalpanopadeśācca</pratika>=<quote>‘chandāṃsi yajñāḥ kratava’</quote>ityādinā sṛṣṭyupadeśācca ajātvamaheśvarakāryatvayoravirodhaḥ । prākṛtapra-
layakāle parityaktanāmarūpā acidvasturūpā māyāpi sūkṣmarūpeṇa maheśvaraśarīratayā tiṣṭhatītyajā । sṛṣṭisamaye nāmarūpopetā tatkā-
raṇiketi na tayorvirodha iti bhāvaḥ । tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha---<pratika>madhvādivat</pratika>=yathā ādityasya sṛṣṭisamaye madhutvaṃ kāryatvaṃ ca prala-
yakāle madhvādivyapadeśānarhasūkṣmarūpeṇāvasthānādakāryatvaṃ ca madhuvidyāyāṃ śrūyate tadvadatrāpi ajātveśvarakāraṇikātvayo-
ravirodha ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeva sarvamiti na pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘vasantevasante jyotiṣā yajeta’</quote>ityādi karmavidhāyakaṃ vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । sarvavaidikaśabdavācyatvaṃ
viṣṇossaṃbhavati vā naveti saṃśayaḥ । na saṃbhavati iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । saṃbhavatyeveti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। jyotirupakra-
mā ttu tathā hyadhīyata eke ।। 10 ।।</pratika> tu śabdaevārthe । <pratika>jyotiḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘jyotiṣā yajete’</quote>tyādivākyoktajyotirādiśabdavācyaṃ
brahmaiva । na jyotiṣṭomādi । kutaḥ । hi yasmāt <pratika>eke</pratika> śākhinaḥ । <pratika>upakramāt</pratika>---<quote>‘eṣa ima’</quote>mityupakramya <pratika>tathā</pratika> sarvaśabdā-
bhidheyatvena harimeva <quote>‘tāvāetā’</quote> ityatra । <pratika>adhīyate</pratika>---paṭhanti । tasmādityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। kalpanopadeśācca madhvādivada-
virodhaḥ ।। 11 ।।</pratika> caḥ evārthe samuccaye vā । tathāca <pratika>madhvādivat</pratika>&mdash;yathā madhuvidyādigatamadhvādiśabdānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve'-
pyavirodhaḥ na laukikakṣaudrādivācakaśabdābhāvena tadabhāvākhyavirodhaḥ । tathā paramātmanaḥ sarvaśabdavācyatve'bhyupagate'pi na-
karmādyabhāvavirodhaḥ । kutaḥ । śabdānāmanyatra yogarūḍhivṛttī abhyupagamyaiveśvare mahāyogavṛttyaṅgīkārādityadhyāhāraḥ । tadapi
kutaḥ । <pratika>kalpanopadeśāt</pratika>---<quote>‘prāṇa ṛca’</quote> iti sarvaśabdavācyasya viṣṇoḥ kalpanāśabditopāsanārthamuktatvāt tasya ca sarvaśa-
bdārthamukhyaguṇavattvarūpamahāyogavṛttiṃ vināyogāt ityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>ityānandatīrthamate jyotirupakramādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</pratika></p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ camasavadadhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="526"/>
śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ--- <quote>‘yasmin pañca pañcajanā ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ ।
tamevaṃ manya ātmānaṃ vidvān brahmāmṛto'mṛtam ।।’</quote> ityādiḥ ।। atra <quote>‘pañca
pañcajanā’</quote> iti padārthāḥ kiṃ sāṃkhyasiddhāni tattvāni śrutiprasiddhāni veti
saṃśayaḥ ।। pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāḥ sāṃkhyaśāstraprasiddhatvādatra tadavabhāsāt
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pratiṣṭhita’ iti mantramātrasyātra prādhānyena vicāryatve'pi <quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇa’</quote> mityādivākyaśeṣasya
pañcajanaśabdapekṣitārthasamarpakatvaṃ sambhavati na vetyevaṃ tādarthyena vicāryatvamasti । tasya
tatsamarpakatvasambhave hi na tantrasiddhāni tattvāni grāhyāṇi । ānumānikādhikaraṇe prākara-
ṇikavākyāntarasamarpitārthagrahaṇasambhave tāntrikārthagrahaṇāyogasya pūrvādhikaraṇe śākhāntarapra-
tipannārthagrahaṇasambhave tadayogasya ca samarthitatvena vākyaśeṣasamarpitārthagrahaṇasambhave tadayo-
gasya ca kaimutikanyāyasiddhatvāt । tasya tadayoge tu <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> ityataḥ pañcaviṃśatisa-
ṅkhyāpratītimupapādya tatsaṅkhyeyāni tantrasiddhāni tatvānyeva grāhyāṇītyabhipretya vākyaśeṣa-
syāpi saṅgrahārthamādipadam । evaṃ ca vākyaśeṣasya pañcajanaśabdāpekṣitārthasambhavāsambhavābhyāṃ
saṃśaya ityabhipretya saṃśayaṃ darśayati&mdash;<pratika>atreti</pratika> । syādetat । <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> ityataḥ pañcaviṃśa-
tisaṅkhyāpratītirasambaddhā । tathā hi&mdash;yadi <quote>‘pañcapañce’</quote>ti pañcakadvayamucyate tadā'vayavadvāreṇa
samudāyalakṣaṇāśrayaṇe'pi daśasaṅkhyaiva niṣpadyate । <quote>‘pañca sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ ।’</quote>
ityatra yathā dvādaśasaṅkhyā । yadi tu vīpsā tadāpi pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyā na niṣpadyata eva ।
<quote>‘daśadaśaikaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpantī’</quote> tyatrānuprasarpaṇīyānāṃ camasānāṃ daśasaṅkhyatvādanuprasarpakāṇāṃ
puruṣāṇāṃ śatasaṅkhyā niṣpadyate । evaṃ janānāmadhikaraṇāni yadi pañca syuḥ tadā pratyadhikaraṇa-
mādheyā janāḥ pañcasaṅkhyāvīpsayā labhyanta iti teṣāṃ pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyā niṣpadyeta । na
tvatrādhikaraṇapañcakaśravaṇamasti । nanu pañcasaṅkhyatayā pratipanneṣu janeṣu punaḥ pañcasaṅkhyāntara-
viśeṣaṇopādānamahimnā pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyā na tāvatpañcasaṅkhyā । viśeṣyaṃ vihāya viśeṣaṇayo-
rananvayāt । nāpi tadviśeṣitāḥ । ākāṅkṣābhāvāt । śrutaviśeṣaṇasajātīyena tadvirodhinā ca
raktapadanyāyenākāṅkṣotthāpanasyāpyasambhavāt । na hi <quote>‘rakto raktaḥ paṭo bhavatī’</quote> tyatra mṛṇmayo
hiraṇmayo bhavatī’ tyatra vā bhavatyākāṅkṣā । nanu <quote>‘pañca pañcapūlya’</quote> ityatra pañcaviṃśatipūlāḥ
pratīyante tathehāpi syāt । neti brūmaḥ । tatrāpi samastā pañcasaṅkhyaiva pūlānāṃ viśeṣaṇam ।
vyastā tu tatsamāhārāṇāṃ samāsārthānām । na cātra tathā samāhārārthaḥ samāso'sti ।
pañcajanya iti strīliṅgadarśanābhāvāt ityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>atra tadavabhāsāditi</pratika> । ayamā-
śayaḥ । anenāvāntarasaṅkhyayā viśeṣaṇe sati mahāsaṅkhyālābho yathāvayavadvāreṇa sumadāya-
lakṣaṇayā vīpsayā vā evamekayā saṅkhyayā viśeṣitānāṃ saṅkhyāntareṇa viśeṣaṇāt saṃvardhanena
mahāsaṅkhyālābho'pi laukikavaidikeṣu prayogeṣu prasiddhaḥ । yathā <quote>‘vayasovayasassaptadaśāssaptada-
śāni dadāti’</quote> <quote>‘pañca pañcāśatastrivṛtassaṃvatsarā’</quote> iti prathamānvitaviśeṣaṇasajātīyasya tadviro-
dhino vā yatra vivakṣitamahāsaṅkhyālābhārthatvaṃ nāsti tatraiva tadanākāṅkṣā । vastutastu, <quote>‘pañcajanā’</quote>
iti samastamekaṃ padamatra śrūyamāṇasyāntānudāttasvarasya śatapathabrāhmaṇasvaravidhāyakabhāṣikā-
khyagranthavihitabrāhmaṇapaṭhitamantratvanimittānudāttarūpatayā <quote>‘tatsthāninā tatsamāsasye’</quote>ti vyā-
<pb n="527"/>
sarvathā pañca prañcajanā iti tānyeva pratipādyāni ।।iti prāpte brūmaḥ&mdash;iha <quote>‘pañca pañca’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
karaṇavihitenāntodāttasvareṇa <quote>‘pañcānāṃ tvā pañcajanānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmī’</quote>ti śrutyantare
samāsadarśanena cātrāpi samāsaniścayāt । na ca samāsenaikapadye 'pi pañcabhirbhūtairjāyamāneṣu
manuṣyeṣu tasya prasiddhā rūḍhirihāśrayituṃ yuktā । pañca manuṣyā yasminpratiṣṭhitā ityuktyā
tadadhikaraṇe kasyacidatiśayasyālābhena vākyasya nistātparyatvaprasaṅgāt । na ca pañca ca te
janāśceti <quote>‘diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyā’</quote> miti <ref>( pā॰ )</ref> sūtravihitaḥ samānādhikaraṇasamāso yuktaḥ ।
pañcajanaśabdasaṃjñāviśeṣāṇāṃ pañcasaṅkhyopalakṣitānāṃ keṣāñcijjanānāṃ kvacidapi prasiddherabhā-
vāt । na ca<quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ manaso ye mano vida’</quote> riti
vākyaśeṣe śrutāḥ prāṇādayaḥ pañca tatsaṃjñinaḥ syuriti vācyam । teṣu loke pañcajanasaṃjñāprasi-
dhdyabhāvāt । ihaiva tatsaṃjñātvakalpane kalpakābhāvāt । cakṣuśśrotramanassvindriyeṣu prāṇavāyā-
vanne cānugatānatiprasaktasyaikasya pravṛttinimittasyābhāvāt mādhyandinapāṭha iva kāṇvapāṭhe
<quote>‘annasyānna’</quote> mityasyānāmnānena tatra pañcajanānāṃ lābhācca । tasmātsamāhāraviṣayo'tra samā-
sassamāśrayaṇīyaḥ । pañcajanīti ṅīpratyayābhāvastu gatyantarābhāvācchāndasatvenopapādanīyaḥ ।
evaṃ ca yathā <quote>‘pañca pañcapūlya’</quote> ityatra samastā pañcasaṅkhyaiva pūlāviśeṣaṇaṃ vyastā tatsamā-
hārāṇāmiti nāsti nairākāṅkṣyadoṣa ityasti pañcaviṃśateḥ pūlānāṃ pratītiḥ । evamihāpi na
nairākāṅkṣyadoṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatestatvānāṃ pratītiśca । evaṃ chāndasatvena saṃjñāyāṃ samānādhikaraṇasa-
māsamaṅgīkṛtyāpi vyastasamastapañcasaṅkhyābhyāṃ saṃvardhanena pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyāpratītirupapādayituṃ
śakyeti tasmāduttaramuktam । atra tadavabhāsāditi kvacitpāṭhaḥ । tasminpāṭhe nivartanīyeya-
māśaṅkā । evamapi sāṅkhyatatvagrahaṇamiha na yujyate । nābhūteṣu teṣu pañcaśaḥ kroḍīkārakadharmā-
bhāvāt mahyantānāṃ trayoviṃśatestatvānāṃ prakṛtyāśritatvena prakṛteranāśritattvena ca tadīyata-
tvānāmātmani pratiṣṭhitatvābhāvāt adhikaraṇenātmanā pṛthagupāttenākāśena ca pañcaviṃśatisa-
ṅkhyātirekācceti । tannivartanaprakārastu&mdash;syādidaṃ doṣajātaṃ sāṅkhyatattvagrahaṇe । yadyatra tava
siddhānte <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> ityetadarthatayā grahītuṃ yogyāḥ pañcaviṃśatirarthāḥ pañcaśaḥ pañcaśaḥ
kroḍīkārakadharmaśālinaḥ ākāśena sahātmani pratiṣṭhitāḥ kecana syuḥ । na ca te santi।
tasmādyathākathañcitsāṅkhyatatvānāmeveha grahaṇamupapādanīyam । tatra<quote>‘tāsāṃ trīṇī ca śatāni
ṣaṣṭiścākṣarāṇī’</quote> tyatra sāmidhenyudāharaṇamekaikasmin śate ṣaṣṭau ca pṛthakpṛthak kroḍīkāraka-
dharmābhāve'pi vibhajya vacanavat <quote>‘pañcapañce’</quote> ti vibhajya vacanaṃ bhūtāni pañca tanmātrāṇi
pañca karmendriyāṇi pañcāvaśiṣṭāni pañceti vā pañcaśaḥ kroḍīkārakadharmāssantīti । asti
ca caturviṃśatestatvānāmātmani pratiṣṭhitatvavacanaṃ tadadṛṣṭādhīnavyāpāravattvāttadbhogārthatvādvā
bhāktam ।ātmanastadvacanaṃ<quote>‘sve mahimni pratiṣṭhita’</quote>itivat <quote>‘taṃ śaṅkaraṃ sarve surāssākṣācca mādhava’</quote>
ityatra mādhavasyevākāśasya pṛthaggrahaṇaṃ mukhyatvābhiprāyam।vinaivamātmākāśau guṇasaṅghātarūpāṃ
prakṛtiṃ satvādiguṇabhedena tridhā parigaṇayya vā pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyāpādanīyeti । evaṃ yathāka-
thañcitsāṅkhyatatvānyeva grāhyāṇi gatyantarābhāvādityupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>sarvatheti</pratika> । <quote>‘na saṅkhyopasaṅgra-
hādapī’</quote>ti sūtraṃ siddhāntapratijñāparaṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>pañceti</pratika> । vastutaḥ pañcadvayenātra pañcaviṃśatisa-
<pb n="528"/>
iti pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi na tāntrikāṇi tattvāni।<quote>‘yasmin’</quote>iti yacchabda-
nirdiṣṭaparameśvarādhāratvamamīṣāṃ pratīyate । tebhya eṣāṃ pṛthagbhāvāt, ākāśasya
pṛthaṅ‍‌nirdeśena tattvātirekācca।tattvātirekastattvānāmadhikasaṃkhyatvam । ato'tra na
pañcaviṃśatitattvaprasaṅgaḥ ।। kiṃca, pañciviṃśatisaṃkhyopasaṃgraho'pi na yuktaḥ । <quote>‘di-
ksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām’</quote> iti saṃjñāviṣayo hyayaṃ samāsaḥ । tasmāt pañcajanā nāma
kecicca te hi pañca pañcajanā ityucyante । sapta saptarṣaya itivat । ato na sāṃ-
khyatattvaprasaktiḥ ।। kiṃ punareta ityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 12 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṅkhyāpratītirnāstyeva । abhyupetyocyate । pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā saṅkhyeyānāmupaṅgrahādapi tadupa-
saṅgṛhītāni tāntrikāṇi tattvānīti na sidhyatītyarthaḥ । tatra hetuṃ nānābhāvaṃ vivṛṇoti&mdash;
<pratika>yasminniti</pratika> । nānābhāvaḥ pṛthatk‍vam ।<quote>‘vinā nānā hirukpṛtha’</quote> giti hi naikhaṇṭukāḥ । pṛthaktvaṃ
cehātmapratiṣṭhitatvarūpaṃ tāntrikatattvebhyo vailakṣaṇyam । atirekaṃ svatantrahetvantaratayā ca-
śabdenāvagamitaṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>ākāśasyeti</pratika> । ākāśagrahaṇamadhikaraṇasyātmano'pyupalakṣaṇam ।
na ca gatyantarābhāvāt sāṅkhyatattveṣvevātmani pratiṣṭhitatvavacanamākāśasya pṛthaggrahaṇaṃ ca pūrva-
pakṣidarśitayā rītyaiṣvagatyopapādanīyamiti vācyam । saptaviṃśatiṣaḍviṃśatitatvavādināṃ mate
tadantargatāni prakṛtyantāti pañcaviṃśatistattvāni paramākāśarūpā cicchaktiścāstīti teṣāṃ
parameśvarāśritānāmakleśena grahaṇasambhavāt kaṭhavallīṣu, <quote>‘indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā’</quote> ityādinā
puruṣāvaratvena varṇitānāṃ grahaṇasambhavācca । jñānendriyakarmendriyabhūtatanmātrāmanobuddhibhoktṛ-
sthūlasūkṣmaśarīradvayaparatvopapatteḥ । evamantaraṅgaśākhāntaradṛṣṭasaṅkhyeyopasaṅgraha eva yuktaḥ ।
na tu vahiraṅgāprāmāṇikasāṅkhyakalpitatatvopasaṅgraha iti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyāpratī-
tisattve'pi tatsaṅkhyeyatayā sāṅkhyatattvagrahaṇaṃ na sambhavatīti samarthitam । idānīṃ vastutasta-
tpratītirapi nāstiti sautreṇāpiśabdena dhvanitaṃ yuktyantaraṃ vivṛṇoti&mdash;<pratika>kiṃ ceti</pratika> ।
avaśyābhyupagantavyatattvapañcajanaśabde samāse <quote>‘diksaṅkhye saṃjñāyā’</quote> miti sūtravihitaḥ
saṃjñāsamāsa eveti tāvadabhyupagantavyaḥ । samāhārasamāse strīpratyayābhāvasyāsaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñā-
samāsasya ca chāndasatvena samarthitasya śliṣṭatvāt । na ca saṃjñāsamāse'pi vyastasamastapañca-
saṅkhyābhyāṃ pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyālābhaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ । saṃjñāsamāse hi samastapañcaśabdoktā saṅkhyā
śākhāvadupalakṣaṇabhūtasaṃjñipratipattyarthā na tu saṃjñikajñāpyaviśeṣaṇabhūtā । ato yathā saptarṣaya
iti saṃjñāsamāse samastapadoktā saptasaṅkhyā na tātparyaviṣayatayā pratīyata iti tasyā
eva tātparyaviṣayatvapratyāyanārthaṃ pṛthakkṛtya padaprayogaḥ purāṇe evamihāpīti pṛthakpadoktā
ekaivātra pañcasaṅkhyā । ato'pi na sāṅkhyatatvagrahaṇaprasaktiratreti ।। nanu pañcajanasaṃjñikāḥ
kecidiha grāhyāḥ tarhi ke ta iti nirvicititsaṃ<quote>‘sandigdhe tu vākyaśeṣā’</quote> diti nyāyāt prāṇa-
daya iti cenna । teṣvanugataikasaṃjñāviṣayatvāyogādityāśaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;
<pratika>ke punariti ।। sū ।। prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 12 ।।</pratika> pañcajanasaṃjñā tāvat pañcasa-
ṅkhyān saṃjñino'pekṣamāṇā vākyaśeṣagatān pañcasaṅkhyān prāṇādīn saṃjñitvena gṛhṇātīti
<pb n="529"/>
<quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ manaso ye mano viduḥ’</quote>
iti vākyaśeṣāt pañcajanasaṃjñakāḥ prāṇādayaḥ pañcendriyāṇīti gamyate । ato'pi
na tāntrikatattvaprasaktiḥ ।।
punarupapattirucyate&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। jyotiṣaikeṣāmasatyanne ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
ekeṣāṃ kāṇvānām, <quote>‘annasyānnam’</quote> iti śabdābhāve ‘taddevā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
saṃjñiṣu teṣu pravṛttinimittabhūtaikadharmāpekṣāyāṃ cakṣuśśrotramanobuddhiṣu klṛptamindriyatvaṃ prāṇānnaśa-
bdayorapi kalpyate । <quote>‘vipratiṣiddhadharmāṇāṃ bhūyasāṃ syātsadharmatva’</quote> miti nyāyāt । tatra vāyusa-
mbandhitvātprāṇaśabdoktaṃ vāgindriyamannaśabdārthapṛthivīsambandhitvādannaśabdoditaṃ ghrāṇamadya-
te'nenetyannamiti vyutpattyā tena rasanendriyaṃ grāhyam । evaṃ ghrāṇarasanayostantreṇopottayorekī-
kārāt pañcasaṅkhyā । yathā <quote>‘dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartava’</quote> ityatra hemantaśiśirayorekīkārāt
<quote>‘hemantaśiśirāvṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmī’</quote>ti prayājānumantraṇamantre samāsarūpeṇaikapadenopāttayorekīkara-
ṇādṛtūnāṃ pañcasaṅkhyā । ataḥ pañcajanasamāsasaṃjñāḥ prāṇādayaḥ pañcendriyāṇīti gamyata ityevaṃ
vākyaśeṣagatāḥ pañcendriyarūpāḥ prāṇādayaḥ pañca pañcajanā niścīyante । kāṇvaśākhāyāmannaprā-
ṇābhāvena pañcajanasaṅkhyā na labhyata ityāśaṅkya tatrāpi guṇopasaṃhāranyāyenānnasya sattvātta-
llābho'stīti vaktuṃ śakyatve'pi tadalābhamaṅgīkṛtya tatrāsatyapyanne pūrvamantrānusāreṇa pañcajanā
indriyāṇīti niścetuṃ śakyata ityuktibhaṅgyottaramantravat pūrvamantro'pi vivakṣitārthaniścāyako'
stītyupapattyantaramuttarasūtreṇocyata ityata āha&mdash;<pratika>punarupapattiriti ।। sū ।। jyotiṣaikeṣā-
masatyanne ।। 13 ।।</pratika> kāṇvaśākhāyāṃ <quote>‘annasyānna’</quote> mityasya pāṭhābhāve'pi śākhāntaraguṇopasaṃ-
hāreṇa labhyastadartho'styeva । na ca kāṇvaśākhāyāṃ pāṭhābhāvamātreṇa śākhāntare'nyārthani-
ścayaḥ । yena kāṇvaśākhāyāṃ śākhāntarāttadarthagrahaṇam । darśitaṃ hi pūrvasūtre pañcasaṅkhyāviśe-
ṣitān kāṃścidaprasiddhān pañcajanasaṃjñāyāssaṃjñino nirdiśyānantaraṃ prāṇādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ
pāṭhātta eva saṃjñina ityavadhāraṇe sati teṣu pravṛttinimittaikyena ekasaṃjñāviṣayatvanirvāhāya
<quote>‘bhūyasāṃ syātsadharmatva’</quote> miti nyāyena cakṣuḥśrotramanassu triṣvavagatamindriyatvameva pravṛttini-
mittaṃ grahītuṃ prāṇānnaśabdayorapi indriyaparatvamannaśabdasya tantreṇa ghrāṇarasanagrāhakatvaṃ ca
kalpyata iti । evaṃ ca nirṇītārthaśākhāntaravākyānusāreṇa kāṇvaśākhāyāmapi prāṇādiśa-
bdānāṃ vāgindriyādirarthaḥ śākhāntarādupasaṃhṛtaḥ । annaśabdārthatvena teṣāṃ pañcasaṅkhyā ceti
niścaye na kācidanupapattiḥ । nirṇītārthaśākhāntaravākyānusāreṇārthaniścayo hi nyāyavidbhi-
rākhyāyate na tvanirṇītārthavākyānusāreṇa nirṇītavākyārthatyāgaḥ । evaṃ kāṇvaśākhāyāmapi
śākhāntara ivānnasya sattve'pi tadabhāvamabhyupetyocyata ityabhipretya kāṇvānāṃ śākhāyāmannasyā-
bhāve <quote>‘yasmādarvāksaṃvatsaro'hobhiḥ parivartate taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyotirāyurhopāsate'mṛta’</quote>
miti pūrvamantraprakṛtaṣaṣṭhyantajyotiśśabdena pañcajanā indriyāṇīti nirṇīyate । tathā ca
kāṇvaśākhāyāṃ vākyaśeṣānnirṇayālābhe'pi upakramāttannirṇayo labhyata ityetadarthaparatayā sūtraṃ
vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>ekeṣāmiti</pratika> । nanu <quote>‘jyotiṣā’</quote> mityāmnānena pañcajanā indriyāṇīti kathaṃ nirṇī-
<pb n="530"/>
jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ’ ityupakramagatena jyotiśśabdena pañca pañcajanā indriyāṇīti
jñāyante । jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ prakāśakānāmapi prakāśakaṃ brahmetyuktvā tataḥ pañca
pañcajanā ityukte hi tāni prakāśakāni pañcendriyāṇīti gamyante ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 14 ।।</sutra>
yathā''kāśādiṣu kāryavargeṣu kāraṇatvena sarvatra vedāntavākyeṣu <quote>‘asadvā
idamagra āsīt’</quote> <quote>‘taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt’</quote> ityādiṣu anirjñātaviśeṣeṣu ca
<quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīt’</quote> iti viśeṣavākyanirdiṣṭasyaivokterna
tāntrikāvyākṛtagrahaṇaṃ, tathā'tra viśeṣavākyadṛṣṭānāmindriyāṇāmevokterna tā-
ntrikatattvagrahaṇam ।।

yate । tasya dvitīyāntajyotiśśabdoditabrahmādhīnasvakāryāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ samarpakasya pañcendri-
yamātraparatvena saṅkoce svato hi nāsyākāṅkṣā । tasyāpyasaṅkocena <quote>‘tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ
vibhātī’</quote> ti śrutyantare brahmādhīnasvakāryakatayāvagateṣvādityādiṣu sarveṣvapi jyotiṣṣu vṛttyu-
papatteḥ tasya pañcajyotirmātraparatve'pi gārhapatyādipañcāgniparatvopapatteśca । kiṃ ca । pañcajana-
śabdasya pūrvamantre bahuvacananirdiṣṭeṣu paryavasānaniyame'pi na jyotiśśabdanirdiṣṭeṣu paryavasā-
naniyamaḥ ahaśśabdanirdiṣṭeṣvapi paryavasānopapatterityāśaṅkānirāsena uktamarthamupapādayati&mdash;
<pratika>jyotiṣāṃ jyotiriti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । jyotiśśabdasyākāṅkṣāvirahe'pi pañcajanaśabdasya
svasaṃjñiviśeṣākāṅkṣayā sannidhānāt jyotiṣāṃ saṃjñitvamavasīyate । jyotiśśabdaśca prakāśakārthaḥ ।
<quote>‘ādityenaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāsta’</quote>ityādiśrutyantare tasya tadarthatvenaiva prayogadarśanāt । teṣāṃ pañcajana-
śabdaviśeṣaṇapañcasaṅkhyāvacchedaścāvaśyaṃbhāvī । tato nādityādijyotirantaragrahaṇaprasaktiḥ ।
ādityādiṣu । pañcasaṅkhyāpratītyabhāvāt gārhapatyādiṣu havirgrahaṇādivaidikakāryaviniyukteṣu
prakāśakāryaprasiddha‍yabhāvācca । ahni tu pañcajanaśabdasaṃjñitvena grahaṇaṃ na yujyate । pañcānāmahnā-
madhikaraṇamityuktyā kasyacidatiśayasyālābhāditi ।। evaṃ mantrāntaraparyālocanāyāṃ pañca-
janā indriyāṇīti nirṇayānna tāntrikatatvagrahaṇamiti prasādhitamarthaṃ dṛṣṭāntamukhenopapādayituṃ
<pratika>sūtram ।। sū ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathā vyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 14 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘asadvā idamagra
āsī’</quote> diti vākye tāvadanabhivyaktyabhiprāyeṇa sadvastupara evāsacchabdo vaktavyaḥ । atya-
ntāsataḥ kāraṇatvāyogāt । <quote>‘taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsī’</quote> diti vākye'pyavyākṛtaśabdastu sākṣāde-
vānabhivyaktaparaḥ।vyaktīkṛtaṃ hi loke vyākṛtamityucyate ityabhipretya yathā tatrāsadavyākṛtaśa-
bdābhyāmanabhivyaktasāmānyavācibhyāmākāśādiṣu kāraṇatvena viśeṣavākyanirdiṣṭasyātmana e-
vokteḥ na tāntrikāvyaktagrahaṇam evamihāpi pañcajanā ityanena sāmānyataḥ keṣāñcitsaṃjñināṃ sama-
rpakeṇa viśeṣavākyadṛṣṭānāmindriyāṇāmevokterna tāntrikatatvagrahaṇamiti sādhyāhāraṃsūtraṃ
<pratika>vyācaṣṭe&mdash;yatheti</pratika> । syādetat । dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorubhayoratrāpi tāntrikatatvagrahaṇābhāvoktirna
yujyate । tathā hi---taittirīyake tāvadasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭikāmnāyate । <quote>‘asadvā idamagra
āsīt tato vai sadajāyate’</quote>ti । tathā bṛhadāraṇyake'pi <quote>‘asadevedamagra āsīttatsadāsī’</quote>
diti । na cāsataḥ kāraṇatvāyogādubhayatrāpyasacchabdaḥ satyeva yojya iti vācyam । sata
<pb n="531"/>
tatra tāntrikaṃtattvagrahaṇāyogaḥ kathamityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। samākarṣāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
