ivāsato'pi kāraṇatvasambhavāt । sattvasya daṇḍatvādivatkāraṇatāvacchedakatvābhāvenānape-
kṣitatvāt । chāndogye tvasatkāraṇatvapakṣapratikṣepeṇa satpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ pratijñāyate । <quote>‘taddhaika-
āhurasadevedamagra āsīt ekamevādvitīyaṃ tasmādasataḥ sajjāyata iti kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ
syāt iti hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti sattveva somyedamagra āsī’</quote> diti । avyākṛta-
vākye tu svayaṃkartṛkā jagadvyākriyā nigadyate <quote>‘taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt tannāmarūpābhyāṃ
vyākriyata’</quote> iti । atra hi karmakartari lakāraḥ na tu karmaṇi । kartrākṣepagauravāt । nanu, karmaka-
rtari lakārapakṣe'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ kartrākṣepaḥ । kartrā kriyamāṇameva yat karma svaguṇaissukaraṃ bhavati
tadeva hi saukaryamapekṣya kartṛtvena vivakṣyamāṇaṃ karmakartrityucyate । yathāhuḥ&mdash;<quote>‘kriyamāṇaṃ tu yatkarma
svayameva prasiddhyati । sukaraissvaguṇairyuktaṃ karmakartriti tadvidu’</quote>riti । maivam । <quote>‘pralūyate kedāra-
ssvayameve’</quote> tyādau kartrantarasadbhāve'pi <quote>‘bhidyate kusūlene’</quote> tyādau tadabhāvasya mahābhāṣye
samarthitatvena karmakartari lakāre kartrantaraniyamābhāvāt । tanniyamābhāve ca <quote>‘vyākriyate’</quote>
tyatra <quote>‘bhidyate kusūlene’</quote>ti udāharaṇānurodha eva yuktaḥ । anyathā kartrākṣepagauravaprasaṅgāt ।
evaṃ tattatkāraṇavākyasvārasyaparyālocanāyāmavarjanīyo virodha iti tatparihāreṇa prāmāṇya-
saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ kāraṇavākyānāṃ sarvajñakapilādimaharṣiparigṛhītajagatkāraṇapradhāna eva parya-
vasānaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam । varamadhyayanavidhiparigṛhītānāṃ vaidikaśabdānāmalaukikatvāśrayeṇāpi
<quote>‘sṛṇyeva jarbharī’</quote>tyādimantrāṇāmiva prāmāṇyasaṃrakṣaṇam । tasmāt dṛṣṭānte tāntrikagrahaṇābhāvasi-
ddhimat kāraṇaṃ tāvadayuktam । tathā dārṣṭāntike'pi pañcajanā ityasyottaramantrānusāreṇārthanirṇaye
hi manassāhityena ghrāṇarasanayorekīkaraṇena ca pañcendriyāṇyarthatayā labhyante । pūrvamantrānusāreṇa
tu bāhyānyeva pañcendriyāṇi tadarthatayā labhyante । pañcasaṅkhyāprasiddhyanurodhenaiva jyotiśśabdasye-
ndriyeṣu paryavasānasamarthanāt bāhyendriyeṣveva pañcasaṅkhyāprasiddhisattvāt । pūrvottaramantrānādareṇa
<quote>‘yasminpañca pañcajanā’</quote> iti mantrasvārasyamātrānusāreṇa tu manuṣyāstadarthatayā labhyante ।
lokaprasiddhāyā rūḍheḥ prabalatvāt pañcasaṅkhyāyāśca caturvarṇānulomapratilomarūpāvāntaraprabhava-
viṣayatvāṅgīkāreṇa vyaktimātraviṣayatayā vākyasya nistātparyatvaśaṅkāparihārasambhavācca ।
tataścātrāpi pūrvottaramadhyamantrasvārasyaparyālocanāyāmavarjanīyo virodha iti tatparihāreṇa
prāmāṇyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ <quote>‘pañcajanā’</quote> ityasya chāndasarūpāśrayaṇena sarvajñakapilādiparigṛhītapañcaviṃ-
śatitatvaparatvakalpanameva yuktam । tasmāt dṛṣṭānte dārṣṭāntike ca tāntrikatatvagrahaṇābhāvava-
rṇanaṃ nopapadyata ityāśaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>tāntriketi ।। sū ।। samākarṣāt ।।
।। 15 ।।</pratika> taittirīye <quote>‘satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahme’</quote>ti sadrūpaṃ brahma prakṛtya tasmādākāśādyuprattimabhi-
dhāya <quote>‘asanneva sa bhavatī’</quote>ti ślokena tasyāsatyatvapakṣaṃ nirākṛtya tasya kāmanāpūrvakasakalaja-
gatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ coktvā <quote>‘tatsatyamityācakṣate’</quote> iti copasaṃhṛtya <quote>‘tadapyeṣa śloko bhavatī’</quote> tyanayā
tasminnarthe śloko'yamityavatārikayā tadeva sadrūpaṃ brahmānukṛṣya, <quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsī’</quote> diti
paṭhyamānaḥ ślokaḥ kathamasatkāraṇaparaḥ syāt । atassatsamākarṣaṇānurodhādasacchabdaḥ satyevā-
<pb n="532"/>
<quote>‘so'kāmayata bahu syām’</quote> iti pūrvanirdiṣṭasya sarvajñasyaiva <quote>‘asadvā idamagra
āsīt’</quote> iti samākarṣāt pūrvanirdiṣṭasyāvyākṛtasyaiva <quote>‘sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ā-
nakhāgrebhyaḥ’</quote> iti samākarṣācca yathā sa evāvagamyate tathātrāpi samākarṣāt
pañcajanānāmindriyatvāvagatiriti na virodhaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nabhivyaktyabhiprāyo lākṣaṇikaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । <quote>‘asadevedamagra āsī’</quote> diti bṛhadāraṇyakaśrutā-
vapi <quote>‘tatsadāsīditi’</quote> tatpadenāsacchabdoktaṃ samākṛṣya sadbhāvavidhānādatyantāsataśca <quote>‘nāsato
dṛṣṭatvā’</quote>diti nyāyenāsadrūpatāpattyayogādasacchabdaḥ pūrvavallākṣaṇikaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । <quote>‘taddhedaṃ
tarhyavyākṛtamāsī’</quote> dityanantaraṃ <quote>‘sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ paśyan cakṣuḥ śṛṇvan śrotraṃ
manvāno mana’</quote> iti vākye <quote>‘sa eṣa’</quote> ityavyavahitaprakṛtamavyākṛtaṃ samākṛṣya tasyāntaḥ-
praviṣṭasarvāntaryāmipuruṣatvābhidhānādavyākṛtaśabdenāvyaktaṃ brahmoktam । <quote>‘vyākriyate’</quote>ti karmaṇi
lakāraḥ saukaryavivakṣayā । satyeva kartrantare karmakartari lakāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ । tathā prakṛtaviṣayavā-
kye'pi <quote>‘taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyoti’</quote> riti pūrvaṃ brahmādhīnasvakāryatayā ṣaṣṭhyantenaikena jyo-
tiśśabdena saṅkṣipya nirdiṣṭānāmeva prāṇasya cakṣuṣaḥ śrotrasya manaso'nnasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantaiḥ padai-
ssamākṛṣya viśiṣya brahmādhīnasvakāryatvaṃ pratipādyata ityavagamāt । pañcajanaśabdaviśeṣaṇapa-
ñcasaṅkhyāvaśāt pañcendriyarūpatayā vākyaśeṣeṇa pratipādyata iti kalpanīyam । evaṃ tarhi, pūrvamantra-
mātraparāmarśena bāhyānyevendriyāṇi <quote>‘pañcajanāḥ’</quote> syuriti tāvatā <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> ityasya
vivakṣitārthatvalābhāt <quote>‘jyotiṣaikeṣāmasatyanna’</quote> iti pūrvamantramātraparāmarśasya upapattyantaratvo-
ktirviruddhyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । yadyapyuttaramantraparyālocanayā <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> ityasya manassāhityena
ghrāṇarasanayorekīkaraṇena pañcendriyaparatā na syāt । tathāpi pūrvamantramātraparyālocanayā
pañcendriyaparatā syādeva । evamapi na sāṅkhyatatvagrahaṇapratyāśeti kṛtvācintayā sāṅkhyatatva-
grahaṇaśaṅkānirākaraṇamātre tasyopapattyantaratāyā uktatvāt । yattu pañcajanamantrasvārasyānurodhena
catvāro varṇā varṇāntaraprabhavāśceti pañca manuṣyāḥ pañcajanāḥ pratīyanta ityuktam । tanna । manuṣyeṣu
pañcasaṅkhyāyāḥ puruṣabuddhyupasthāpanīyena brāhmaṇatvādyupādhinā nirvahaṇīyatayā teṣu pañcaśabda-
svārasyābhāvāt tatsvārasyānurodhena pañcajanaśabdo <quote>‘diksaṅkhye saṃjñāyā’</quote> miti (pā॰)
samānādhikaraṇasamāsena kāsāñcitpañcasaṅkhyopalakṣitavyaktīnāṃ saṃjñeti kalpanayā caramaśrutapañca-
janaśabdasvārasyabādhanasyaivocitatvāt । evameva jaiminināpi <quote>‘prājāpatyo naivāraścaruḥ saptada-
śaśaravo bhavatī’</quote>ti vihite saptadaśaśarāvaparimāṇavrīhyādidravyake carau <quote>‘caturo muṣṭīnnirva-
patī’</quote> tyasyātideśataḥ prāptau tatra saṅkhyāmuṣṭyanyatarabādhe'vaśyaṃbhāvini prathamaśrutasaṅkhyābādhapa-
rihārāya muṣṭibādho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ । tasmādda‍ṛṣṭānte dārṣṭāntike ca virodhābhāvānna sāṅkhyatatvagrahaṇā-
śaṅkāvakāśa ityabhipretya pūrvasūtrādyathāśabdānuvṛttiṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭānte dārṣāntike ca <quote>‘samā-
karṣā’</quote>diti sūtrapadaṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>so'kāmayateti । iti na virodha iti</pratika> । dṛṣṭānte
dārṣṭāntike ca nāsti virodha ityarthaḥ । samuccaye'pi dṛṣṭānte'pi virodhābhāvasyātraivopapāda-
nīyatvāt । na caivaṃ satyakṛtvā yathāśabdānuvṛttiṃ sākṣādevobhayatrāpyavirodhopapādanārthamidaṃ
sūtraṃ vyākhyāyatāmiti vācyam । pūrvasūtramapi na kevalaṃ dṛṣṭāntena prakṛtārthasyopapādanārtham ।
<pb n="533"/>
iti saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kiṃ tu dṛṣṭāntīkaraṇavyājena kāraṇavākyānāṃ brahmaparatvasyāpyupapādanārthamiti pūrvasūtraśaithi-
lyānuvartanāt । anyathā teṣāṃ parasparavirodhenārthānirṇayaprāptāvāptaparigṛhītaṃ pradhānamevārtha
iti sāṅkhyapratyāśānavakāśīkaraṇālābhāt । na caivaṃ sati kāraṇavākyānāmuktarītyā pradhā-
namevārtha iti pūrvapakṣanirāsārthamadhikaraṇāntaramevānena sūtradvayena kriyatāmiti vācyam ।
tāvatā pañcajanamantre pūrvāparamantrayostasya ca svārasyānurodhena virodhaṃ pradarśya tatra sāṅkhyapra-
siddhasaṅkhyāpraveśasyānavakāśīkaraṇālābhena ubhayatrāpi tatpraveśānavakāśīkaraṇārtha <quote>‘mitarā-
ṇyapi rakṣāṃsi peturvānarakoṭiṣu । rajāṃsi samarotthāni tacchoṇitanadīṣvive’</quote> ti samuccayopa-
mārītyā lāghavena yugapadubhayopapādakatayā vyākhyātṛsūcitatvāt । evaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntena kāra-
ṇavākyeṣu tannyāyena dārṣṭāntike virodhotthāpanena sāṅkhyapratyayavasthānārthamādyasūtraṃ tadūrdhvo-
tthitaśaṅkāsamādhānārthaṃ dvitīyamiti śliṣyate । na ca prathamasūtre <quote>‘vyapadiṣṭoke’</quote>rityanena ceta-
nakāraṇavādibahukāraṇavākyānurodhanyāyasya sūcitatayā tenaiva tadūrdhvaśaṃkotthānānavakāśa iti
vācyam । vākyānurodhanyāyasya <quote>‘vākyānvayā’</quote>diti sūtreṇa sphuṭīkariṣyamāṇatayā tataḥ
prāk tattatpūrvapakṣavirodhibahuvākyasadbhāvamācchādya kṛtvācintayā pañcādhikaraṇapravṛttiriti
prāgvarṇitatvāt । tasmātpūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣa evedaṃ sūtradvayamiti sarvamavadātam ।। 3 ।।</p>
<head>।। itisaṅkhyopasaṅgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha saṅkhyopasaṅgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । na saṅkhyopasaṅgrahādapi nānābhāvādatirekācca ।। 11 ।। prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 12 ।।
jyotiṣaikeṣāmasatyanne ।। 13 ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 14 ।। samākarṣāt ।। 15।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tattvāni pañcaviṃśatirucyante pañcapañcajaśabdaiḥ । śrutyabhimataiva tasmātsāṅkhyoktaprakriyā nikhilā ।। 76 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prakṛtasya samākarṣādasadyathā brahma te tathākṣāṇi । ākāśādhārābhyāṃ saṅkhyābhedānna sāṅkhyatatvāni ।। 77 ।।</l></lg>
<head>itisaṅkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām atha saṅkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। na saṅkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvādatirekācca ।। 11 ।। prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 12 ।। jyo-
tiṣaikeṣāmasatyanne ।। 13 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asyādhikaraṇasya <quote>‘yasminpañca pañcajanā ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ । tameva manya ātmānaṃ vidvānbrahmā-
mṛto'mṛtam ।।’</quote> iti bṛhadāraṇyakavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra <quote>‘pañca pañcajanā’</quote> iti pañcasaṃkhyādvayasaṃpannayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā
pradhānādīni sāṃkhyatattvānyucyante vā uta śrutiprasiddhāni veti saṃśayaḥ । śrutiprasiddhayānayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā sāṃkhyatattvā-
nāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ śabdavattvaṃ pradhānādīnāmiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, evaṃ pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ
śabdavattvaṃ na siddhayet । yatassāṃkhyatattvānāṃ pañcaśaḥ pañcaśaḥ sādhāraṇadharmo nāsti । tato nānābhāvātsāṃkhyatattvānāṃ <quote>‘yasmi-
nni’</quote> ti saptamīnirdiṣṭasyādhārabhūtasyātmanaḥ ākāśasya ca saṃkalanena saṃkhyādhikyasaṃbhavācca atra pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā sāṃkhya-
tattvātiriktāḥ kecana pañcajanāḥ saptasaptarṣaya itivadrūḍhimāśritya pratipādyanta iti ।।</p>
<p>tarhi ke punaste pañcajanā nāmetyāha---<pratika>prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 12 ।। vākyaśeṣāt</pratika>=<quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇamuta
cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ manaso ye mano viduḥ’</quote> iti vākyaśeṣāt । <pratika>prāṇādayaḥ</pratika>=prāṇacakṣuḥśrotrānnamanāṃsi pañca
pañcajanā ucyanta ityarthaḥ । kecittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvāḥ asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā iti vadanti । anye tuṭa
catvāro varṇā niṣādapañcamā ityabhiprayanti । kvacicca prajāparatayā vyākhyātam । eṣāmanyatamapakṣaparigrahe'pi nāsti
virodhaḥ । pañcaviṃśatestattvānāmiha pratītimabhyupetya sūtrākārāḥ <quote>‘prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt’</quote>iti vyācakhyuḥ । iti ।।</p>
<pb n="534"/>
<p>saṃtu nāma prāṇādayaḥ pañcatanāḥ prāṇādiṣvannamapyāmanatāṃ mādhyandinānāṃ prāṇādiṣu tadanāmanatāṃ kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ
prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanāḥ syurityāśaṃkya pariharati---<pratika>sū ।। jyotiṣaikeṣāmasatyannai ।। 13 ।। ekeṣāṃ</pratika>=kāṇvānāṃ pāṭhe ।
<pratika>anne asati</pratika>=prāṇādiṣu annasya pāṭhābhāve । <pratika>jyotiṣā</pratika>=<quote>‘taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyoti’</quote>riti śrutena jyotiṣā saṃkalayya
parigaṇanena pañcasaṃkhyā pūryetetyarthaḥ । tadevaṃ sarvathā sāṃkhyatattvānāmatrāprasaktiriti siddham ।।</p>
<head>iti bhagavatpādamate saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha kāraṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 14 ।। samākarṣāt ।। 15 ।।</sutra>
<p>asyādhikaraṇasya aviśeṣeṇa jagatkāraṇapratipādakāni jagatsṛṣṭibodhakāni ca vedāntavākyāni viṣayaḥ । tāni brahmaṇi
samanvitāni vā na vā iti saṃśayaḥ । sarvatra sṛṣṭikramavaicitryadarśanāt parasparaviruddhasadasadādikāraṇavikalpaśravaṇāt
siddhavastuni vikalpāyogācca na brahmaṇi samanvitānīti pūrvapakṣaḥ । yathābhūto hyekasminvedānte sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvātmaiko'-
dvitīyaḥ kāraṇatvena vyapadiṣṭastathābhūtasyaiva vedāntāntareṣvapi vyapadiśyamānatvāt kāryaviṣayavigānena avigītakāraṇa-
vigānāprasakteḥ kāryaviṣayavigānasyāpyuttaratra <quote>‘na viyadaśrute’</quote> rityādinā samādhāsyamānatvācca sarveṣāṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ
brahmaparatābadhāraṇamavyāhatameveti siddhāntaḥ ।। <pratika>sūtrārthastu brahmaṇaḥ ākāśādiṣu</pratika>=<pratika>kāryavargeṣu । kāraṇatvena ca yathā-
vyapadiṣṭokteḥ</pratika>=anirjñātaviśeṣeṣu vedāntavākyeṣu <quote>‘ātmā vā idameka evāgra asīt’</quote>ityādiviśeṣavācivākyanirdiṣṭasmaiva
kāraṇatayocyamānatvāt ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>kāraṇaviṣayaṃ vigānaṃ parihartumāha---<pratika>samākarṣāt ।। 15 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘asadvā idamagra āsī’</quote>dityādivākyeṣu nāmarūpavyāka-
raṇābhāvāpekṣayā prāgutpattessadeva brahmāsadivāsīdityupacaryamāṇatvāt sarvatra sataḥ sarvajñasya paramātmanaḥ samākṛṣyamāṇatvā-
dityarthaḥ ।। <pratika>iti bhagavatpādamate kāraṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, kāraṇatvādhikaraṇasūtradvayamapi saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇaśeṣatayaiva yojitam । rāmānujamate tu bhagavatpāda-
matamevānusṛtya bhinnādhikaraṇatayā yojitamiti viśeṣaḥ । sūtratrayārthastu bhagavatpādamatādaviśiṣṭa eva ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 16 ।।</pratika> yathākāśādiṣu kāyavargeṣu kāraṇatvena viśeṣa-
vākyanirdiṣṭasyaivokteḥ na tāntrikāvyākṛtagrahaṇaṃ tathātra viśeṣavākyanirdiṣṭānāmindriyāṇāmeva grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na sāṃkhyatattvā-
nāmiti dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaparatayā vyākhyātamiti na tatrāpyarthavarṇane vaiśiṣṭyam ।। <quote>‘samākarṣā’</quote> diti sūtramapi dṛṣṭāntaparatayaiva
vyākhyātam । yathā tatra paramātmanassamākarṣastathātrāpi pañcajanānāmindriyatvāvagatiḥ iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti śrīkaṇṭhamate saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, adhikaraṇayojanāprakāro bhagavatpādīyameva matamanukaroti । sūtrārthavarṇane nāsti matāntarādviśeṣaḥ ।
kāraṇatvādhikaraṇe viṣayavākyasaṃśayādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavatpādīyamatādaviśiṣṭamiti na pṛthakprapañcanāvakāśaḥ ।</p>
<head>iti rāmānujamate saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇakāraṇatvādhikaraṇe ।। 3 ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyaṃ samānam । pūrvādhikaraṇeṣu sarvavaidikaśabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇossiddhāntitam । evamapi viṣṇau
sakalavaidikaśabdasamanvayo na siddhyati <quote>‘yasminpañca pañcajanā’</quote> iti vākye pañcasaṃkhyopasaṃgrahāt <quote>‘yasmi’</quote>nnityādhārādheyabhāvā-
nupapatteśca viṣṇau pañcajanādiśabdasamanvayāsaṃbhavāt ityākṣipya taṃ samanvayaṃ samarthayitumasyādhikaraṇasyārambhaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। na
saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvādatirekācca ।। 12 ।।</pratika> anekatvasaṃkhyāyā bhinnāśrayatvasyautsargikatvāt pañcasaṃkhyālaṃba-
nasya kasyāpi rūpapañcakasyābhāvāt viṣṇorekasya tattvāsaṃbhavāt vākyaśeṣabalena yasminniti nirdiṣṭasya brahmatvāvadhāraṇāt
tadādheyānāṃ pañcajanākāśādīnāṃ brahmatvāpratīteḥ ādhārādheyatvānupapatteśca viṣṇoḥ pañcajanādiśabdavācyatvābhāvātsamanvayo na
siddhyati । iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, svagatabhedaśūnyasyāpi viṣṇoḥ pratiśarīraṃ śarīrāntargataprāṇādipañcakākāśaniyāma-
kabahurūpavattvena nānābhāvātsaṃkhyopapatteḥ tebhyo rūpebhyaḥ śarīraniyāmakarūpasyātirekāt yasminniti nirdiṣṭe prāṇākāśādīnāṃ sthityā
tadantargatarūpeṣvapi tadādheyatvakīrtanopapatteḥ anekatvasaṃkhyāyā bhinnāśritatvasyautsargikatve'pi vākyaśeṣabalena rūpapañcakāvalaṃ-
banatvavyavasthāpanācca pañcasaṃkhyopasaṃgrahe'pyādhārādheyatvakīrtane'pi nāsti virodhaḥ iti । <pratika>sūtrārthastu, saṅkhyopasaṃgrahāt</pratika>=
yasminpañca pañcajanā iti bahutvasaṃkhyāvacanāt । <pratika>api</pratika>=yasminnityādhārādheyabhāvanirdeśādapi । viṣṇoḥ pañcajanādiśabdavā-
cyatve virodho nāsti । kutaḥ । <pratika>nānābhāvāt</pratika>=bhagavato bahurūpāṇāṃ sattvāt । <pratika>atirekācca</pratika>=yasminnityuktādhārarūpasya
pañcajanā ityādheyarūpasya ca saviśeṣābhinnatvācca ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt ।। 13 ।।</pratika> bhagavadrūpatvenoktāḥ pañcajanāstu prāṇādeḥ <pratika>prāṇādayaḥ</pratika>=dvitīyānirdiṣṭaprāṇa-
cakṣuḥśrotrānnamanobhidhāḥ jñeyāḥ । kutaḥ । <pratika>vākyaśeṣāt</pratika>=te ca bhagavadrūpaviśeṣā eva । kutaḥ । viṣṇoranyatrāsaṃbhāvitaprāṇaprā-
<pb n="535"/>
<head>atha jagadvācitvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
gataḥ sāṃkhyatattvāśaṅkāprasaṅgaḥ । punarapi jīvāt parameśvarasyānyabhāvamupapādayati&mdash;
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>peṭikāsaṅgatimāha&mdash;gati iti । atītādhikaraṇatraye pūrvapakṣatayā śaṅkādvayaṃ prasaktam । <quote>‘mahataḥ
paramavyaktam’</quote> <quote>‘ajāmekāṃ’</quote> <quote>‘yasminpañcapañcajanā’</quote> iti mantrāḥ tantrasiddhāvyaktādīni pratipāda-
yantītyekā śaṅkā । tadanubandhinī jīvādanyaḥ parameśvaro nāma nāstītyaparā । ādye tāvadviṣaya-
vākye prathamaśaṅkopayoginīṃ tāntrikamahadavyaktapuruṣakramapratyabhijñāmupanyasyataḥ pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ
<quote>‘puruṣānnāparaṃ kiñci’</quote>diti vākyaṃ pañcaviṃśājjīvātparasya tatvāntarasya niṣedhakamiti spaṣṭa
eva tatra parameśvarapratikṣepaḥ । dvitīye viṣayavākye svatantraprakṛtiparatvaśaṅkā parameśvaraprati-
kṣepaparyantā । parameśvarasattve tadadhīnatvāvaśyaṃbhāvena svātantryāyogāt । tṛtīye'pi tathaiva
tatra pūrvapakṣe pañcaviṃśatestatvānāṃ parameśvarādhīnatvāt parameśvarānaṅgīkārācca khalu <quote>‘nānābhāvā-
datirekāñce’</quote>ti dūṣaṇamuktam । tatrādyaśaṅkāprasaṅgo nivṛttaḥ । idānīmuttarādhikaraṇadvayena kayości-
dviṣayavākyayormuktyarthaṃ veditavyatayā muktaprāpyatayā copadiśyamānāṃ brahma jīva iti pūrvapa-
kṣakaraṇena punarapi jīvādanyaḥ parameśvaro nāma nāstīti dvitīyāśaṅkāmudbhāvya jīvādanyasya
parameśvarasya sadbhāva upapādyata ityarthaḥ । <pratika>anya bhāvamiti</pratika> । parameśvaraviśeṣaṇasyānyaśabdasya
sadbhāvavācibhāvaśabdopasarjanatvena prayogasya<quote>‘śivasya bhāgavata’</quote>iti śivaviśeṣaṇasya bhagavaccha-
bdasya bhaktimatpuruṣārthakataddhitopasarjanatvena prayogasyeva sādhutvaṃ draṣṭavyam । yadvā । pūrvapādā-
ntyādhikaraṇe parameśvara eva nāstīti śaṅkā sa jīvābhinna iti śaṅkā ceti śaṅkādvayaṃ <quote>‘patyādiśabde-
bhyaḥ’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 1-3-44)</ref> <quote>‘suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedene’</quote>ti<ref>(bra॰ 1-3-43-)</ref>sūtradvayena parameśvare tasya jīvā-
dbhede ca sādhakapradarśanena nirākṛtaṃ na tu tatrobhayatrāpi bādhakaṃ tatra nirākṛtamiti tannirāka-
raṇārthamayaṃ pāda ārabdhaḥ । etadevāsya pādasyāspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgatvam । parameśvarānaṅgīkāreṇa tasya
jīvādbhedānaṅgīkāreṇa ca pūrvapakṣāṇāṃ parameśvarapratikṣepaparyantatvaṃ tatra parameśvarasadbhāve <quote>‘patyā-
diśabdebhya’</quote> ityavyavahitasūtrapradarśitasādhakabādhakatvaśaṅkāspadānāṃ <quote>‘mahataḥ para’</quote><quote>‘majāmekāṃ’</quote> ‘ya-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇapradatvādipratipādakāt <quote>‘prāṇasya prāṇa’</quote>mityādivākyaśeṣādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jyotiṣaiteṣāmasatyanne ।। 14 ।। ekeṣāṃ</pratika>=kāṇvādīnām । <pratika>anne</pratika>=annākhyabhagavadrūpe । <pratika>asati</pratika>=anukte'pi ।
<pratika>jyotiṣā</pratika>=tadākhyabhagavadrūpeṇa pañcatvasaṃkhyāpūrtirjñātavyetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate saṅkhyopasaṃgrahādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha kāraṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū ।। kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ ।। 15 ।।</pratika> asya <quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūtaḥ, ākāśādvāyuḥ’</quote>
ityādivākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svādhāratvasaṃbhave'pi svakāryatatkāryatvasyāsaṃbhavāt brahmakāryatatkāryādiparāṇāmākāśavāyvā-
dipadānāṃ brahmavācitvāyogātsamanvayo na siddhyati iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । yathā tatrātmaśabdena brahma mūlakāraṇatvenocyate evamākā-
śādiśabdaiḥ kāryatvasahitakāraṇatvarūpeṇāvāntarakāraṇatvenāpyucyate । yāvanti niyamyavastūni tāvanti teṣu niyāmakāni
brahmaṇo rūpāṇi iti mūlakāraṇādākāśagatatadrūpābhivyaktistato vāyugatatadrūpābhivyaktirityādikrameṇa vyaṃgyavyaṃjakabhāvarūpakā-
rya kāraṇabhāvasaṃbhavāt nātra kaścitsamanvaye virodha iti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>,<quote>‘ātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote>ityādau kāryatve
sati kāraṇatvarūpāvāntarakāraṇavācakākāśādiśabdairākāśādiṣu sthito viṣṇureva <pratika>kāraṇatvena</pratika> caśabdātkāryatvena cocyate । na
bhūtam । kutaḥ । <pratika>yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘sa yo'to'śruta’</quote>ityādau viṣṇuḥ <pratika>yathā</pratika>=yādṛśenāviditatvādirūpeṇa vyapadiṣṭaḥ uktaḥ
tadrūpayuktasyaivākāśādiṣu <quote>‘yamākāśo na vede’</quote>tyādivākyenoktatvādityarthaḥ । <quote>‘<pratika>samākarṣāt</pratika>’</quote> ityādikaṃ <quote>‘prakṛtiśca pratijñe’</quote>ti sūtrā-
vadhikaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamekādhikaraṇatayā yojitamityasminmate'sti matāntarādvailakṣaṇyam ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate kāraṇatvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="536"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। jagadvācitvāt ।। 16 ।।</sutra>
śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadi&mdash;<quote>‘brahma te bravāṇi’</quote> ityupakramya
<quote>‘yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma sa vai veditavya’</quote> ityādikaḥ ।।
iha vedyatvena śrutaḥ parameśvaro jīvo veti saṃśayaḥ ।।
<quote>‘ya evaiṣa āditye puruṣastamevāhamupāse ya evaiṣa candramasi puruṣo ya evaiṣa
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sminpañce’</quote> ti mantrāṇāṃ yathāvadarthavarṇanayā teṣāṃ nirīśvarasāṅkhyābhimatatatvaviṣayatvaśaṅkāprasa-
ṅgo'dhikaraṇatrayeṇa nirākṛtaḥ । idānīṃ tasya jīvādbhede'vyavahitasūtrapradarśitasādhake bādhakaśa-
ṅkāspadasya kauṣītakibrāhmaṇasya yathāvadarthanirṇayāt yasya tato bheda upapādyata ityavatāri-
kāgranthasyārthaḥ । tatra punarapītyukterayaṃ bhāvaḥ । etadadhikaraṇaviṣayavākyagate <quote>‘yathā suptaḥ svapnaṃ
na kañcana paśyatī’</quote>tyādāvasādhāraṇādheyatvalakṣaṇabhedavyapadeśo bheda upapādayiṣyate । <quote>‘anyārthaṃ
tu jaimini’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ sū॰)</ref> riti sūtreṇa vyapadeśena pūrvamapi bheda upapāditaḥ । <quote>‘suṣuptyutkrāntyo-
rbhedene’</quote>ti tasya sūtrasya śrutigatasarvavidhasauṣuptikabhedaviṣayatvāt । tatra <quote>‘brahmā te bravāṇī’</quote>-
tyupakramya <quote>‘yasya vaitatkarma sa veditavya’</quote> iti karmasambandhino jīvasya veditavyatvopadeśo jīva-
parameśvarayorabheda evopapadyamānastayorbhedabādhakaśaṅkā tatra nirākṛteti tannirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ
tenātra bhedopapādanamiti । evaṃ ceyamavatārikā etadadhikaraṇamātraviṣayā । na tu pūrvavyā-
khyāna ivottarādhikaraṇaviṣayāpi । uttarādhikaraṇaviṣayavākyasya suṣuptyutkrāntisūtraviṣaya
tvābhāvena tasya <quote>‘punarapī’</quote>tyasyānanvayāt । ata eva tatra pṛthagavatārikā kariṣyate । tasmi-
npakṣe'nyabhāvo'nyatvaṃ bheda iti yāvat । evaṃ ca pūrvavyākhyāne mā bhūt prāgudāharaṇaviṣaya-
vākyeṣu dvitīyāśaṅkāvakāśaḥ, iha tu syāditi pūrvādhikaraṇatrayeṇa uttarādhikaraṇadvayasya
pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiḥ । dvitīyavyākhyāne tu pūrvādhikaraṇatrayasya patyādisūtreṇa uttarādhikara-
ṇadvayasya suṣuptyutkrāntisūtreṇākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ । pūrvādhikaraṇasaṅgatistu patyādisūtrākṣepasamā-
dhānānantaraṃ sannihitasuṣuptyutkrāntisūtrākṣepasamādhānamityavasarasaṃgatilakṣaṇeti draṣṭavyam <pratika>।। sū ।।
jagadvācitvāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> atreyaṃ viṣayaśuddhiḥ । ajātaśatrurnāma kāśirājaḥ svasamīpa-
māgatya <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>tyuktavantaṃ bālākiṃ gārgyaṃ <quote>‘sahasraṃ dad‌ma etasyāṃ vāci janako
janaka iti janā dhāvantī’</quote>ti praśasya bālākinā <quote>‘ya evaiṣa āditye puruṣastamevāhamupāsa’</quote>
ityādibhirvākyairbrahmatvenopadiṣṭānādityacandravidyutstanayitat‍nvādigatānpuruṣānabrahmatvena tadu-
ktyanantarameva pratyākhyāya tatastūṣṇīṃbhūte tasmin <quote>‘kimetāvadeva tava jñāna’</quote>miti pṛṣṭvā
tenaitāvadevetyabhihite <quote>‘mṛṣā vai kila mā samāvādayiṣṭhāḥ brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>tyuktyā tamapodya
<quote>‘yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma sa veditavya’</quote>iti svayamupadideśa ।
atra yo veditavya upadiṣṭaḥ upasaṃhāre ca <quote>‘sa pūrvānātmano'pahasya sa pūrveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ
śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ vede’</quote>ti yadvedanasya phalaṃ varṇitaṃ sa jīvaḥ parameśvaro
veti karmaśabdarūḍhiyogābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha&mdash;<pratika>iheti</pratika> । nanveteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karteti śrutaṃ prakṛtyā-
dityamaṇḍalādigatapuruṣakartṛtvaṃ jīve na sambhavatīti kathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityāśaṅkya tatra tatsambhā-
vayati&mdash;<pratika>ya eveti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । ādityādipuruṣāstāvadālokadānādinā jīvasyopakā-
<pb n="537"/>
vidyuti’ ityādipūrvavākyasaṃdarbhe prakṛtādityādisakalapuruṣakartṛtvasya jīve'pi
vidyamānatvāt, karmaśabdasyāpūrvavācitvāt apūrvasya tadarthatvāt
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rakāḥ । <quote>‘tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prājña ātmā etairātmabhi-
rbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmānaḥ etamātmānaṃ bhuñjantī’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣe yathā pradhānapuruṣaḥ svakīyairbhṛtyā-
dibhirbhogasādhanānyupaharadbhiḥ hetubhirbhogānbhuṅkte yathā ca te bhogasādhanānyupaharantaḥ pradhā-
napuruṣaṃ pālayanti tathā veditavyatvenopadiṣṭaḥ ātmā prakṛtairādityādipuruṣairbhuṅkte te ca taṃ
pālayantītyuktatvāt । evaṃ ca ye yasya bhogopakaraṇabhūtāste tadadṛṣṭajanyā iti ādityādi-
puruṣotpattyanukūlādṛṣṭahetukṛtimān jīvaḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ karteti vyapadeśaṃ na labheta । kāryānukūla-
kṛtimattvaṃ hi kartṛtvam । na ca kṛtāvadṛṣṭādvārakatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam । gauravāt । na ca tadupādā-
nagocarāparokṣajñānādimata eva tatkartṛtvamiti niyamaḥ । tadabhāve'pi <quote>‘caitraśabdaṃ karotī’</quote>
tyādivyavahāradarśanāditi । nanu, sakalapuruṣakartṛtvaṃ jīve'pi sambhavatu nāma, tathāpi jīvagataṃ
tadgrāhyaṃ na parameśvaragatamityatra kiṃ niyāmakamityāśaṅkya mūlayuktimāha&mdash;<pratika>karmaśabdasyeti</pratika> ।
syādetat । karmaśabdasyāpūrve yathā rūḍhirasti tathā kriyata iti vyutpattyā kāryamātre yogo'-
pyasti । na ca rūḍhiprābalyādyogo na grāhya iti śaṅk‍nīyam । karmaśabdasya calane'pi rūḍhisa-
ttvena calanāpūrvarūḍhyorvinigamanāvirahātparasparakalahāyamānayorlabdhonmeṣasya yogasyeha
prabalatvāt । tathā ca <quote>‘yasya vaitatkarme’</quote>tyasya pratyakṣādisannidhāpitaṃ sakalaṃ jagadyasya kāryami-
tyarthaḥ paryavasyatīti brahmaliṅgasamarpakamidaṃ karmapadamityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>apūrvasyeti</pratika> । ādityā-
dipuruṣakartṛtvaṃ veditavyapuruṣasya kīdṛśaṃ vivakṣitamityāśaṅkāyāmapūrvadvārakaṃ vivakṣitamityā-
kāṅkṣitārthanirūpaṇārthatayā karmaśabdasyāpūrvarūḍhirihopayujyate । svatastadākāṅkṣāvirahe'pyapūrva-
dvārakamiha kartṛtvaṃ vivakṣitamiti jñāpanārthatayā vā sopayujyate na tu calanarūḍhiḥ।jīvasyāṇutvena
calatvaṃ sambhavadapi tatpratipādanasya prakṛtopayogitvābhāvāt tadupayogyarthagrahaṇe sambha-
vatyanarthaparatvakalpanāyogāt jīvasya calanavattvopadeśena kasyacidapyatiśayasyālābhācca ।
tathācca vinigamanāsiddheḥ kāryasāmānyayogādapūrvarūḍheḥ prabalatvāt <quote>‘yasya vaita’</quote>diti vākyasya
sakalajagadyasya kāryamityarthakalpane <quote>‘yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karte’</quote>ti pṛthaṅgi/?/rdeśavaiyarthya-
prasaṅgena yogaparigrahasyāyuktatvāt karmaśabdasyāpūrvārthatvena vyavasthitajīvaliṅgasamarpakameva
karmapadaṃ syādityabhiprāyaḥ । nanu,tasyāpūrvārthatvāṅgīkāre'pi neṣṭasiddhiḥ । apūrvasyāpi pāpapuṇyā-
tmakasya parameśvarakrodhaprasādatayā jīvadharmatvābhāvādityāśaṅkāyāma<quote>‘pūrvasya tadarthatvā’</quote>dityetadeva
uttaram । pūrvasminpakṣe apūrvasyāhūtādityādipuruṣakartrarthatvenoktatvādityarthaḥ । asminpakṣe jīvā-
rthatvāttadgatasukhaduḥkhabhogārthatvādityarthaḥ । atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ । yadyapyapūrvaṃ tatsvarūpaparyāloca-
nāyāṃ parameśvaragataṃ, tathāpi tadapūrvahetukarmānuṣṭhātṛjīvārthaṃ bhavati evaṃ tadarthasambandhenaiva ca puṇya-
pāparūpasya tasya caitrīyatvādivyavahāraḥ <quote>‘asya puṇyamasya pāpa’</quote>miti । tenaiva ca sambandhena caitrā-
dīnāṃ tadvattvavyavahāraḥ <quote>‘puṇyavānayaṃ pāpavānaya’</quote>miti । na tvāśrayāśrayibhāvena । yathā godhanā-
dīnāṃ caitrīyatvādivyavahāraḥ । caitrādīnāṃ godhanādimattvavyavahāraśca svasvābhibhāvasambandhe-
naiva । <quote>‘asya gāvo'sya dhanaṃ’</quote> <quote>‘gomān dhanavāni’</quote>ti । tasmā<quote>‘dyasya vaitatkarme’</quote>ti vyapadeśo
<pb n="538"/>
nirdhūtasakalakarmasaṃbandhe parameśvare tadayogāt jīva evāyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।।

jīva evopapadyate । nanu, parameśvare'pyupapadyate । parameśvare purāṇādiṣu tapaścaryādeḥ prasiddhatayā
tajjanyāpūrvāṅgīkārasambhavāt । na ca tasya vaiyarthyam । <quote>‘bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācce’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰)</ref> sūtre
parameśvarasyāpi bhogo'stītyaṅgīkṛtatvena tadarthatvopapatteḥ । tadbhogasya saṅkalpamātropaneyatve'pi
saṅkalpopaneyasakalabhogānāṃ rājñāṃ svahastena puṣpikaikādikaṃ nirmāya tadupabhogavat līlayā tapa-
ścaryādyapūrvaṃ tatsampādya tatphalabhoga iti parameśvaratapaścaryādivacanānusāreṇa kalpanopapatteḥ
apūrvajanakakarmānuṣṭhānāya tattajjīvaśarīrendriyāṇāṃ tena tena jīveneva parameśvareṇāpi prerya-
tvenāpūrvasya tattajjīvabhogārthatvavat parameśvarabhogārthatvasyāṣyaṅgīkāropapatteścetyāśaṅkyāha-<pratika>ni-
rdhūteti</pratika> । sarvathā nirdhūtasakalakarmabandha eva parameśvaraḥ । <quote>‘na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyā’</quote>niti
śruteḥ।avatāraviśeṣaistasya tapaścaryādikaṃ tatra karmaṇi pravartanena lokānugrahārthamiti purāṇādiṣveva
prasiddham । karmānuṣṭhānāyattatattajjīvaśarīrendriyapravṛttīnāṃ yadyapi tasya tasya jīvasyeva parameśvara-
syāpi śarīrendriyapravṛttīnāṃ prerakatvaṃ bhavatyeva । tasya sarvaśarīrakatvāt sarvasvāmitvācca । tathāpi
jīva iva mamedaṃ karma phalāya bhūyādityabhisandhāya tanna karoti । avāptasamastakāma-
tvāt । kiṃ tu tasya tasya jīvasya phalāya bhūyādityabhisandhāyeti tattadapūrvasya na jīvārthatva-
vat parameśvarārthatvamapi prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ । syādetat । karmaśabdasyāpūrva iva tatsādhaneṣvapyasti
prayogaḥ <quote>‘ayaṃ satkarmāṇyanutiṣṭhati ayaṃ ninditakarmāṇyabhyasyatī’</quote>ti । evaṃ ceha karmaśabdaḥ
satkarmaparaḥ । yasyeti ṣaṣṭhyārādhyārādhakasambandhaviṣayeti parameśvare'pi <quote>‘yasya vaita’</quote>diti
vākyaṃ suyojam । karmaśabdasya satkarmaṇi saṅkucitatāyāstavāpyabhimatatvāt । avaśyaṃ ca
veditavyatvopadeśaḥ parameśvara eva yojanīyaḥ । <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>tyupakramānurodhādityāśaṅkā-
mavadhāraṇena vyāvartayan pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>jīva evāyamiti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । ādityādi-
puruṣān vākyaśeṣopadiṣṭayogopanāyakatayā paripālakatvena vakṣyamāṇān prati śrutakartṛtvabhāvaḥ
satkarmaṇi saṅkocassamūlo'smatpakṣe । tvatpakṣe tu amūlaḥ । tasmādvākyaśeṣasamarpitajīvali-
ṅgānurodhācca muktyarthaṃ veditavyatvenopadiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ jīva eveti tato'nyaḥ parameśvaranāmā
muktyarthaṃ veditavyo nāsti । tatsattve tasyaiva veditavyatayopadeśaprasaṅgāt । brahmopakramastu nānuro-
ddhavyaḥ । yena hi bālākinā <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>ti pratijñātaṃ na tena brahmoktam । anyadanyadeva hi
tenoktam । yenājātaśatruṇā veditavyaḥ puruṣa upadiṣṭaḥ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam ।
kimarthaṃ tarhi <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>ti bālākivacanaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ pradarśayāmīti vacanavannirarthakamupa-
nyastamupakrame । asadvādavat pūrvapakṣa iti tannirākaraṇārtham । tadvadasya nirākaraṇaṃ na dṛśyata
iti cet dṛśyata eva vākyacchāyā । <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>ti pratijñātavatā bālākinopadiṣṭā-
npuruṣān tattatsvarūpapradarśanenābrahmatayā nirākṛtya tataḥ paraṃ brahmatvena vaktavyasyābhāvāttūṣṇīṃ
bhūte tasmin karmasambandhinameva puruṣaṃ mokṣāya veditavyatayopanyasyan ajātaśatrustadatire-
keṇa mumukṣubhirjñātavyaṃ brahma nāma kiñcinnāstīti manyata ityeva spaṣṭataraṃ pratīyate । yathā
<quote>‘rasavādinaṃ bravāṇī’</quote>ti pratijñātavatodāhṛtānpuruṣān vipralambhakatvāditattadda‍ṛṣṭāntaprakhyāpanena
pratyākhyāya tataḥ paramudāharaṇīyapuruṣābhāvāttūṣṇīṃ bhūte tasmin rājānameva dhanārthibhirupa-
<pb n="539"/>
siddhāntastu&mdash;karmaśabdasya etacchabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena kriyata iti vyutpattyā
ca jagadvācitvāt jagatkāryavān parameśvara evātra pratipādyaḥ । na hi jīve saka-
lajagatkartṛtvasaṃbhavaḥ ।।

sarpaṇīyamupanyasyan uttaravādī rasavādī nāma ko'pi nāstītyeva manyata iti pratīyate ।
yadi hi veditavyapuruṣopadeśo brahmavadaśroṣyata tadānīmādityādipuruṣāḥ brahmāṇi na bhavanti ।
kiṃ tu <quote>‘eṣāṃ kartā puruṣo brahme’</quote> ti bālākivacanagatopakramānusāreṇa rājavacanātprathamāvatā-
rānusāreṇa pūrvapakṣāt dvitīyāvatārikānusāreṇa brahmopakramo jīvasya veti tasya tattvopadeśena
jīvaparameśvarayobhedāvasāyāccaramaśrutasauṣuptikabhedavyapadeśa aupādhikabhedaviṣayaḥ paryavasyan
atātvikabhede pramāṇamiti pūrvokta iti pūrvapakṣe prāpte siddhāntayati&mdash;<pratika>karmaśabdasyeti ।</pratika>
<quote>‘yasya vaitatkarme’</quote>tyatraitacchabdastāvatpratyakṣādisannidhāpitasakalajagadvācī । na hyatra kiñcittena
parāmarṣṭuṃ yogyam ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasambandhapratipādanāpekṣaṃ prakṛtam । asti ce<quote>‘datha
yadataḥ paro divo jyoti’</quote>rityatra yacchabdavat prakṛte vyavasthita etacchabdaḥ svasamānā-
dhikaraṇaṃ karmapadamapi tatparaṃ nayet । pūrvavākyoktamādityādipuruṣakartṛtvaṃ prati dvāratayā
nirvāhakatvenāpūrvaṃ buddhisthamiti cet । na । jagadekadeśabhūtādityādikīrtanena tadekadeśi
jagat buddhisthamityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt । ubhayorbuddhisthatvasambhave caitatpadasyāsaṅkucita-
jagatparāmarśakalpanasyaiva yuktatvāt nāpūrvaparatvakalpanamādityādipuruṣakartṛtvopapādakatayā ।
jamatparāmarśasyāpi prakṛtopayogitvāt । tasmādetatpadamasaṅkocanena pratyakṣādisannidhā-
pitasakalajagadvācīti tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ karmapadamapi tadvācītyevābhyupagantavyam ।
kiṃ ca karmapadaṃ kriyata iti vyutpattyā yaugikatvādapi sakalajagadvāci na tvapūrvamātra-
vāci । anyatrāpi yogasyāviśeṣāt kvacitsaṅkocakalpanāyogāt । na ca vācyaṃ rūḍhiprā-
balyādapūrvamātraparaṃ karmapadaṃ, tatsamānādhikaraṇametatpadamapi tatsamānaviṣayameva, sarvanāmnāṃ
prakṛtaparāmarśitveneva prakariṣyamāṇaparāmarśitvenāpi saṅkucitavṛttitvasyā<quote>‘thaiṣa jyoti’</quote>rityādau-
dṛṣṭatvāditi । sarvasādhāraṇayogenevāpūrve'pi vṛttisambhave tasyāsādhāraṇyena tatra rūḍhikalpanā-
yogāt । <quote>‘barhirājyayorasaṃskāre śabdalābhādatacchabdaḥ’</quote> iti barhirājyādhikaraṇe hi barhiśśa-
bdasya lavanādisaṃskṛteṣu darbheṣvājyaśabdasya utpavanādisaṃskṛte ghṛte ca sārvabhaumaśiṣṭaprayoge
satyapi kvācitkaṃ tayoḥ darbhaghṛtajātimātre prayogamavalambya tenaiva saṃskṛtaprayoganirvāhāt
tayossaṃskārarūpapravṛttinimittāntaraṃ na kalpanīyamityuktam । <quote>‘ekadeśe'pi yo dṛṣṭaḥ śabdo
jātinibandhanaḥ । tadatyāgānna tasyāsti nimittāntarakalpane’</quote>ti । iha karmaśabdasya yogani-
mittaḥ kāryamātre prayogo'pi sārvabhaumaḥ śiṣṭasammata iti tenaivāpūrve'pi prayoge nirvahati
kastatra viśiṣya śaktikalpanāvakāśaḥ । yadyapi <quote>‘barhirlunāti’</quote> <quote>‘ājyamutpunātī’</quote>tyādividhiṣu
barhirājyaśabdayordarbhaghṛtavācitvamavaśyamāśrayaṇīyam । saṃskṛtavācitve lavanotpavanādi-
saṃskāravidhau sati tatsaṃskṛteṣu barhirājyapravṛttistatpravṛttau ca satyāṃ barhirājyoddeśena la-
vanādyutpavanādisaṃskāravidhiriti anyonyāśrayaprasaṅgāt । na ca yathā ca<quote>‘yūpaṃ chinattī’</quote>
tyādivākyeṣu chedanādisaṃskārasyaiva yūpaśabdārthatayā yūpoddeśena chedanādividhyasambhave'pi

punarāśaṅkya pariharati-
<sutra>।। sū ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅganneti cet tadvyākhyātam ।। 17 ।।</sutra>

chedanādibhiryūpaṃ kuryāditi vidhirāśritaḥ, tathātrāpi lavanādibhirbarhiḥ kuryādutpavanādi-
bhirājyaṃ kuryāditi vidhirāśrayituṃ śakyaḥ । tatra <quote>‘pālāśe paśuṃ badhnāti’</quote> <quote>‘pālāśo yūpo
bhavatī’</quote>tyādivākyāntaralabdhaṃ pāvāśādikaṃ yūraṃ kuryādityarthavarṇanavadiha darbhān lavanā-
dibhirbarhiḥ kuryāt ghṛtamutpavanādibhirājyaṃ kuryādityarthavarṇanāsambhavāt । tatra pālāśādī-
nābhi/?/vātra darbhāṇāṃ ghṛtasya ca prākaraṇikavākyāntarairasamarpitatvāt ityādikā yadyapi yukti-
rasti barhirājyādhikaraṇe । tathāpi sāmānyaśaktyāpi viśeṣaprayoganirvāhe viśeṣe'pi pṛthak-
śaktirna kalpanīyetyeṣāpi yuktiraviśiṣṭaiva । na hi pārthaśabdaḥ sāmānyaśaktyā pāṇḍave-
ṣviva viśiṣyārjune'pi kavibhiḥ prayujyate, kāryaśabdaḥ sāmānyaśaktyā sarveṣu kāryeṣviva vi-
śiṣya liṅarthe'pi prābhākaraiḥ prayujyate, dravyaśabdaḥ sāmānyaśaktyā pṛthivyādiṣu sarve-
ṣviva viśiṣya dhane'pi laukikaiḥ prayujyate iti pārthādiśabdānāmarjunādiṣu viśiṣyā-
pi śaktirāśrayaṇīyā । astu vā karmaśabdasya viśiṣyāpūrve rūḍhiḥ । tathāpyatra kriyata iti
karmeti yoga evāśrayaṇīyaḥ । <quote>‘eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karte’</quote>ti prakṛtaṃ kartāraṃ yasyeti parāmṛśya
tatsambandhinaḥ karmaśabdena nirdeśāt । na hi <quote>‘kartṛkarmabhāvaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘kartṛkarmavyapadeśa’</quote> ityā-
diprayogeṣu kartṛśabdasamabhivyāhṛte'pi karmaśabde rūḍhyunmeṣo'sti । api cātra karmaśabdasyā-
pūrvarūḍhyaṅgīkāre <quote>‘yasya karma sa veditavya’</quote>ityetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ syāt । etacchabdo vāśabdaśce-
tyubhayamanarthakaṃ syāt । yogāṅgīkāre tu sārthakaṃ bhavati । tadā hi veditavyapuruṣasya prāgu-
ktādityādipuruṣakartṛtvadṛḍhīkaraṇāya sakalajagatkartṛtvaparaṃ <quote>‘yasya vaitatkarme’</quote>ti vākyamiti
tadaitacchabdaḥ pratyakṣādisannidhāpitasakalajagadupasthāpako vāśabdaḥ ekadeśāvacchinnaka-
rtṛtvavyāvṛtyarthaṃ ca bhavati । tasmātpadadvayasārthakatvāyaikasya padasya rūḍhityāga eva yuktaḥ ।
yogapakṣe <quote>‘yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karte’</quote>ti vākyameva vyarthaṃ syāt । tato varaṃ pada-
dvayavaiyarthyamiti cenna । bālākinā brahmatvena kīrtitānāṃ puruṣāṇāmabrahmatvakhyāpanena tasya
saprayojanatvāt । api ca <quote>‘yo vai bālāka’</quote> ityādivākyadvayamapi yacchabdopabandhādanu-
vādarūpaṃ vijñāyate । tatra brahmaparatvena śrutyantareṣu buddhisthāni <quote>‘cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata, candramā
manaso jātaḥ’</quote><quote>‘sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat’</quote>ityādīni prathamavākyasya purovā-
dakāni । <quote>‘chandāṃsi yajñāḥ kratavo vratāni bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yacca vedā vadanti । asmānmāyī
sṛjate viśvametattasmiṃścānyo māyayā sanniruddhaḥ । māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu mahe-
śvara’</quote>miti yadyadbha‍ūtaṃ bhaviṣyadvartamānarūpaṃ kāryaṃ vedavākyāntarairevāvagamyate tatsarvamani-
tarasādhāraṇamaheśvaraśabdavācyena parameśvareṇa sṛjyamiti pratipādayat śvetāśvataravākyadvaya-
masya purovādaḥ । purovādānusāreṇāpi karmaśabdasya kriyata iti yogena jagadvācitvaṃ yuktam ।
evaṃ cāsaṅkucitasakalajagatkartṛtvasya jīvānāṃ madhye kvacidapyasambhavāt parameśvara evātra
pratipādyata iti siddham । tanniṣkarṣa eva vākyaśeṣe jīvaliṅgaṃ dṛśyata ityāśaṅkānirākara-
ṇārthatvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>punariti ।। sū ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti</pratika> cettadvyā-
<pb n="541"/>
<quote>‘tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prājña ātmā
etairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna etamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti’</quote> iti <quote>‘yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ
na kaṃcana paśyati athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati’</quote> iti jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgada-
rśanānnāsau parameśvara iti na vācyam । pūrvatra pratardanavidyāyāṃ vyākhyātatvāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
khyātam ।। 17 ।। <pratika><quote>‘etairātmabhirbhuṅkta’</quote>iti</pratika> । vākyaśeṣe śreṣṭhidṛṣṭāntopapāditamādityā-
dipuruṣahetukabhoktṛtvamekaṃ jīvaliṅgam । <quote>‘athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavatī’</quote>ti vākyaśeṣe sapta-
myantanirdiṣṭe veditavyapuruṣāśrayatvenoktaḥ prāṇo'nyajjīvaliṅgam । anayorādyaṃ mukhyam ।
taddhi nirvicikitsaṃ jīvāsādhāraṇam । dvitīyaṃ tvamukhyam । yataḥ prāṇasya brahmāśritatvamapi
<quote>‘yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ’</quote><quote>‘pañcapañcajanā’</quote>iti mantrayoḥ pratipannam । tataścopakaraṇopa-
karaṇibhāvasambandhenāśritaḥ prāṇaḥ jīvaliṅgamiti tāvatparyantavivakṣā tvatra bhoktṛtvarūpa-
sphuṭatarajīvaliṅgasamabhivyāhāreṇa nigamayitavyeti paramukhanirīkṣaṇavattvāt dvitīyaliṅga-
syāmukhyatvam । evaṃ ca <quote>‘jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti ce’</quote>diti sūtrāṃśasya bhoktṛtvarūpānmukhya-
jīvaliṅgāt prāṇarūpādupapādanīyādamukhyajīvaliṅgācca jīva evātra pratipādyo vācya iti na
parameśvaraḥ pratipādya ityarthamabhipretya tatparatayā vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>etairiti</pratika> । jīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇa-
liṅgācca parameśvaro na pratipādya iti sūtrārthamabhipretyaitadbhāṣyaṃ pravṛttamiti tu na vyākhye-
yam । yataḥ <quote>‘prāṇa evaikadhā bhavatī’</quote>ti prāṇaviṣayiṇī śrutirihopanyastā na tu talliṅgaṃ
kiñcit । tathā yadi veditavyaḥ puruṣaḥ jīvo mukhyaprāṇo veti pūrvapakṣadvayamihānucitaṃ bhavet ।
tat <quote>‘vedyatvena śrutaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaro jīvo ve’</quote>ti dvikoṭikasaṃśayapradarśakabhāṣyaviruddham ।
api ca viṣayavākye prāṇapūrvapakṣasya nāstyavakāśaḥ । tatra hyajātaśatruṇā veditavyatayopadi-
ṣṭasyādityādipuruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyodyuktaṃ bālākiṃ pratibubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ suptaṃ puruṣaṃ
prāṇanāmabhirāmantrya suṣuptikāle savyāpārasyāpi prāṇasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pratiṣidhya yaṣṭighāteno-
tthāpanāt tadvyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ pratyabodhayaditi śrūyate । tena prāṇavyatirikto yaṣṭi-
dhātenotthāpito jīvo'tra veditavyapuruṣatvena prāgupadiṣṭa iti sūcane śrutyabhiprāyamava-
lambya jīvapūrvapakṣa eka eva sambhavatīti yathokta eva bhāṣyārthaḥ । evaṃ ca yadyapi bhoktṛvat
prāṇavacca yaṣṭighātotthānamapi jīvaliṅgaṃ <quote>‘jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgā’</quote>dityanena saṅgṛhītatayā vyā-
khyātumucitaṃ, tathāpyuttarasūtre tasya liṅgasya gatyantaramapi varṇayituṃ pravṛtte tadviṣayaṃ bhaviṣya-
tīti tadatra na gṛhītam । atrāpi sūtre parihārāṃśavyākhyāne tadanurūpatayānyaliṅgāni
netavyānīti bahuvacanena tasyāpi gatirvarṇayiṣyata eveti <quote>‘tadvyākhyāta’</quote>miti parihārāṃśaṃ
vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>pūrvatreti</pratika> । <quote>‘prāṇastathānugamā’</quote> di<ref>(bra॰ sū॰)</ref>tyadhikaraṇe pratardanavidyāprakaraṇaṃ pūrvā-
paraparyālocanayā brahmaparamavagamyata iti tadanurodhena tadantargatānyapyanyaliṅgāni brahmaṇi
netavyānītyupapāditam । <quote>‘upāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt’</quote>idamapi prakaraṇaṃ tenaiva
vyākhyātam । idamapi hi pūrvāparaparyālocanayā brahmaparamavasīyate । katham । <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>
tyupakramastāvat brahmaparaḥ । na cāsadvādavat nirākaraṇārthaṃ tadupakramaḥ । <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote> tyuktava-
tyeva gārgye sarveṣvapi brahmajñeṣu janako vadānya iti tasmai brahmopadeṣṭuṃ tatsakāśameva dhāvatsu
<pb n="542"/>
ihāpi pūrvāparaparyālocanayā brahmaparatve sthite tadanurūpatayā anyāni liṅgāni
netavyāni । pūrvatra hi upakrame <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇi’</quote> iti brahmopakṣiptam । madhye
ca <quote>‘yasyavaitatkarma’</quote> iti sakalajagatkartṛtvamuktam । paratra copasaṃhāre <quote>‘sarvān
pāpmano'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda’</quote>
iti brahmopāsanaikāntaṃ sarvapāpmāpahatipūrvakaṃ svārājyaphalamuktam । evamasya
prakaraṇasya brahmaparatvaniścaye jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgāni tatparatayaiva netavyāni ।।
pakṣāntaramucyate&mdash;
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mahyaṃ brahmopadeṣṭumayamāgata iti hṛṣṭenājātaśatruṇā <quote>‘sahasraṃ dadma etasyāṃ vāci janako janaka
iti janā dhāvantī’</quote>ti kṛtasya sahasragodānapratijñānasya śravaṇādgārgyeṇopadiṣṭeṣu ādityā-
diṣu puruṣeṣu pratyākhyāteṣu tataḥ paramavijñānattūṣṇīṃ bhūte ca gārgye taṃ <quote>‘pratyetāvadeva tava
jñāna’</quote>miti pṛṣṭvā <quote>‘etāvaddhī’</quote>ti tasya prativacanāntarameva <quote>‘mṛṣā vai kila mā samavādayiṣṭhāḥ
brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>ti ajātaśatruṇā tadvacane mṛṣātvasya khyāpitatvācca । yadi hi jīvāti-
riktaṃ brahmanāma kiñcinnāstītyabhimanyamānastannirākaraṇapravṛtto rājabhaviṣyattadā <quote>‘brahma te bravā-
ṇī’</quote>ti tadvacanaśravaṇena hṛṣṭastasmai sahasragodānaṃ na pratyajñāsyata । bālokervaktavyapuruṣāntarasa-
dbhāve'pi tatpratijñāyā mṛṣātvaṃ rājā pratijñākālamārabhyaiva manyetetyetāvaditi praśnapūrvakame-
tāvadevetyuttaramanapekṣya tataḥ prāgeva tanmṛṣātvamudaghāṭayiṣyat । tasmātsvayaṃ brahmajñaḥ punarapi
tadīyādhikaviśeṣagrahaṇe śraddhāvāneva <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇī’</quote>ti vacanaśravaṇamātreṇa hṛṣṭastasmai sahasrago-
dānaṃ pratijajñe । tena cābrahmasvādityādipuruṣeṣu brahmatvenopanyasyamāneṣu kimayaṃ gārgyaḥ sthūlāru-
ndhatīnyāyenābrahmāṇi brahmatvenopādikṣat kiṃ vā bhrāntyeti niścetumaśaknuvan udāhṛtabrahmaprati-
vacanena tasya bhrāntatvaṃ niścitya tadanantarameva pratijñāyā mṛṣātvamuddhāṭayāmāseti ca yujyate ।
etena rasavādikathanapratyākhyātṛvacanadṛṣṭāntamavalambya <quote>‘yo vai bālāka’</quote>ityādessāṅkhyapratijñā-
tabrahmanirākaraṇaparatvakalpanamapi nirastam । <quote>‘yo vai bālāka’</quote>ityādergārgyapratijñātabrahmānyaviṣa-
yatvāvagame hi sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ kramate । tasya tatpratijñātabrahmaviṣayatvameva samarthitam । evaṃ ca yathā
kenacinmaṇitatvajñānābhimāninā kācaṃ pradarśya maṇireṣa ityukte kāco'yaṃ na maṇiriti taṃ
pratyākhyāya tata ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣatānyena pāramārthiko maṇiḥ pradarśyate । evaṃ rājñā
brahmopadiśyata iti maṇitatvavidvacanadṛṣṭānta evātra kramate । evaṃ tāvadupakramasya
madhye parāmarśasya brahmaviṣayatvaṃ sthitam । tathā <quote>‘sarvānpāpmano'pahatyetye’</quote>tāvatyupasaṃhāro'pi
tadviṣaya eva । jarāmṛtyuśokādisakalapāpāpahatipūrvakaṃ śivasyātmarūpaṃ svārājyaṃ hi śi-
vākhyasya parabrahmaṇaḥ vedanādeva śrutyantareṣu prasiddham । evaṃ ca yathā pratardanavidyāyāma-
nyaliṅgāni trividhopāsanatātparyeṇa brahmaṇi nītāni evamihāpi tāni tathaiva brahmaṇi
netavyānīti tātparyārthaḥ ।। uttarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>pakṣāntaramucyata iti</pratika> । pūrvasūtre
yaṣṭighātotthāpanena jīvaliṅgaṃ bhoktṛtvādiliṅgāt jīvaśarīrabrahmopāsanārthatvena nītam ।
idānīṃ tat jīvātiriktaparameśvarapratibodhanārthamityuttaragranthaparyālocanāvaśyaṃsthāyi pakṣā-
<pb n="543"/>
<sutra>।। sū ।। anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tau ha suptaṃ puruṣamājagmatustaṃ hājātaśatrurāmantrayāṃcakre bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsaḥ
somarājanniti sa ha tūṣṇīmeva śiśye taduhainaṃ yaṣṭyā vyācikṣepa sa tata eva
samuttasthau’</quote> ityatra prāṇanāmabhirāmantraṇe'pi tadaśravaṇena tataḥ paraṃ yaṣṭighāte satyu-
tthānena ca prāṇādyatiriktajīvasadbhāvapratipādanaṃ tadatiriktaparameśvaraprājñopāsa-
nārthamiti <quote>‘kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo'śayiṣṭakva vā etadabhūt kuta etadāgāt’</quote> iti
praśnāt <quote>‘yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati’</quote> iti
<quote>‘satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati’</quote> ityādivākyāntarasamānārthāt tatprativaca-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ntaramucyata ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke
।। 18 ।।</pratika> anyārthamityetadviśeṣyādhyāhārapūrvaṃka vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>tau heti</pratika> । rājñā veditavyatayo-
padiṣṭasyādityādipuruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāya gārgyopasattipratipādanānantaraṃ śrūyate <quote>‘taṃ ha-
pāṇāvabhipadya pravavrāja tau ha suptaṃ puruṣamīyatustaṃ hājātaśatrurāmantrayāñcakre bṛhan pā-
ṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājanniti sa iha tūṣṇīmeva śiśye taduhainaṃ yaṣṭyā vyācikṣepa sa tata-
eva samuttasthā’</quote>viti । atra bṛhannityādināmabhiḥ prāṇasyāmantraṇam । prāṇaḥ khalu bṛhanmahān
śreṣṭhaḥ asapatno vā । pāṇḍaravarṇā āpo'sya vāsattvenopacaritāḥ । śarīraṃ vā । prāṇavidyāyāṃ
<quote>‘prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśce’</quote>ti tasya śraiṣṭhyaśravaṇāt <quote>‘kiṃ me vāsa’</quote>iti prāṇapraśne <quote>‘āpo vāsa’</quote>
ityuttaraśravaṇācca । saptānnābrāhmaṇe <quote>‘sa eṣo'sapatnaḥ ityathaitasya prāṇasyāpaḥ śarīra’</quote>mityasapatna-
tvāp‌śarīrakatvaśravaṇādvā । somaścāyamupacārāt । saptānnabrāhmaṇa eva <quote>‘jyotīrūpamasau candra’</quote>
iti śravaṇāt । rājā ca । <quote>‘prāṇo vai samrā’</quote> ḍiti śravaṇāt । evaṃ prāṇanāmabhirāmantraṇe'pi
a/?/tthānapradarśanaṃ prāṇānyatvajñāpanārtham । suṣuptidaśāyāmuparatavyāpārebhyaḥ śarīrendriyebhyaḥ
anyatvaṃ sujñānamiti tasyāmapi daśāyāmanuparatavyāpārātprāṇādanyatvameva hi jñāpanīyam । evaṃ
prāṇanāmabhirāmantraṇe'pi anutthānasya yaṣṭighātenotthānasya ca pradarśanenānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
yat kaimutikanyāyena sthūlasūkṣmadehātiriktajīvasadbhāvapratipādanaṃ tadanyārthaṃ jīvātirikta-
parameśvarapratipādanārthameveti jaiminirācāryo manyate ityarthaḥ । sūtre tuśabdaḥ asya jīva-
liṅgasya pūrvasūtradarśitagativyāvṛttyarthaḥ । jaiminigrahaṇamasya pakṣasya jaiminyabhimatatvena
yuktataratvajñāpanārthamityetadbhāṣye spaṣṭatvānnoktam । <quote>‘praśnavyākhyānābhyā’</quote> miti hetuṃ <pratika>vyāca-
ṣṭe&mdash;kvaiṣa etaditi</pratika> । yaṣṭighātenotthāpanānantaraṃ <quote>‘kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo'śayiṣṭa kva vā
etadabhūt kuta etadāgā’</quote>diti rājñā gārgyaṃ prati kṛtaḥ praśnaḥ । yadyapi yatrāśayiṣṭa tatraiva
yāvatprabodhamabhūditi prabodhyamānastata evāgāditi cārthātsidhdyannartho na pṛthakpraśnamarhati,
tathāpi jīvasya suṣupteḥ prāk svapato'dhikaraṇatayā suṣuptasya yāvatprabodhamadhikaraṇatayā
yaṣṭighātotthāpanānantaraṃ tadutthānāpādānatayā ca jīvātiriktaparameśvarasadbhāvaṃ dṛḍhīkartuṃ
tredhā praśnaḥ । gārgye pṛṣṭaṃ suṣuptajīvādhikaraṇamavijānati <quote>‘hitā nāma hṛdayasya nāḍya’</quote>
ityādinā<quote>‘tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyatī’</quote>tyantena <quote>‘tatraitat suptassama-
stassamprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati
śeta’</quote>ityādiśrutyantarānusārāt jīvasuṣuptyadhikaraṇaṃ hṛdayāvacchinnaṃ brahma prāpnurmārge tadadhiga-
<pb n="544"/>
nāccāvagamyate । eke vājasaneyinaḥ vispaṣṭamasmin bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde
etatsamānārthamadhīyate । tatra hi <quote>‘yatraiṣa etat supto'bhūdya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ
puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadā'bhūt kuta etadāgāt’</quote> iti praśnaḥ । <quote>‘yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūdya eṣa
vijñānamayaḥ puruṣastadaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya
ākāśastasmiñchete’</quote> iti prativacanam । tasmāt parameśvara evāyaṃ sakalajagatka-
rteti siddham ।।
iti jagadvācitvādhikaraṇ ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ntavyāsu nāḍīṣūpasarpaṇamuktvā <quote>‘athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavatī’</quote>ti rājñaiva kṛtaṃ svapṛṣṭārthavivara-
ṇam । tasya vyākhyānamidaṃ ca suṣuptajīvasya brahmaṇi layapratipādakam । <quote>‘satā somya tadā sampanno
bhavatī’</quote>ti śrutyantarasamānārthatvāt । tathā cāsminveditavyatayopadiṣṭe parabrahmaṇi jīvaḥ
suṣuptau līno bhavatīti tadartho grāhyaḥ । yadarthake pūrvasūtre sūtrakṛtā pratardanavidyāvadihāpi
trividhamupāsanaṃ vivakṣitamiti tannirvāhakaṃ prāṇe prāṇaśarīraka iti brahmaviśeṣaṇam । etā-
bhyāṃ praśnavyākhyānābhyāṃ jīvātiriktaḥ parameśvaro'tra pratipādyo'vasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘api
caivameka’</quote> iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>eka iti</pratika> । api ca vājasaneyino'sminprakaraṇe spaṣṭametat
samānārthavākyajātamadhīyate । <quote>‘yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūt ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūt
kuta etadāgā’</quote>diti atra praśnaḥ । <quote>‘yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūt ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣastadaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ
vijñānena vijñānamādāya ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śeta’</quote> iti vyākhyānam । atra
nirdiṣṭaṃ jīvasya suṣuptyadhikaraṇaṃ brahmeti spaṣṭam । ākāśaśabdena tannirdeśāt tasya brahmaṇi
śrutyantareṣu prasiddhataratvāt asyākāśaśabdasya etatsthāne kauṣītakibrāhmaṇapaṭhitasya prāṇa-
śabdasya ekārthasya vaktavyatayā tayorbrahmaviṣayatvāvaśyaṃbhāvācca । brahmaviṣayatva eva hi tayo-
raikārthya<quote>‘mākāśastalliṅgāt’</quote><quote>‘ata eva prāṇa’</quote>iti sūtradarśitanyāyataśśrutyantareṣvavagatam । ato-
'tra jīvapratipādanasya jīvātiriktaparameśvarapratibodhanārthatvaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ । ataḥ parameśvara-
sadbhāve tasya jīvādbhede vā na vivaditavyamityabhipretyādhikaraṇamupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>tasmāditi</pratika> ।।4।।</p>
<head>iti jagadvācitvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha jagadvācitvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । jagadvācitvāt ।। 16 ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti cetadva‍yākhyātam ।। 17 ।। anyārthaṃtu jaiminiḥ
praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jīvaḥ karmaśravaṇādajātaśatrūditaḥ puruṣaḥ । karma ca puṇyāpuṇyaṃ na kathañcidapīśvare bhavati ।। 78 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nikhilajagadvācyetatpadamiha saṅkocabhāvāt । tadyasya karma kāryaṃ na sa bhavati maheśvarādanyaḥ ।। 79 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti jagadvācitvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha bālākyadhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। jagadvācitvāt ।। 16 ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṃgānneti cettadva‍yākhyātam ।। 17 ।। anyārthaṃ tu
jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke ।। 18 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma sa vai veditavyaḥ’</quote> iti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagataṃ
bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvādavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । tatra kiṃ jīvo veditavyatvenopadiśyate uta mukhyaprāṇaḥ uta paramātmeti jīva-
<pb n="545"/>
atha vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
sarvatra jīveśvarayorekaśabdaviṣayatve pratīyamāne tatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kathami
tyetannirūpaṇāyedamadhikaraṇamārabhyate&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। vākyānvayāt ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p>uttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>sarvatreti</pratika> । udāhariṣyamāṇe maitreyībrāhmaṇe sarvatra ādimadhyā-
vasāneṣu jīveśvarayorekaśabdaviṣayatvaṃ pratīyate । jīvaparatvena sampratipannānāmīśvaraparatvamīśva-
raparatvena saṃpratipannānāṃ jīvaparatvam । evamekaśabdaviṣayatve pratīyamāne jīveśvarayoranyatara eva
pariśiṣyata ityanyataraḥ pratyākhyāto bhavati । tatra pratyakṣasiddhajagatpratyākhyānāyogādīśvarasyaiva
pratyākhyānaṃ paryavasyati, jīveśvarayorabhedo vā paryavasyati । evamīśvarasya tatra jīvādbhedasya
bādhakaṃ tajjīveśvaravācitvena sampratipannaśabdānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamupapādayituṃ śakyamityā-
śaṅkya tadupapādanāyādhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ । anena mābhūjjīvādhikaraṇavākyamīśvare tadbhede
vā bādhakam । idaṃ tu bādhakaṃ syāt । sāmānādhikaraṇyasyānyathā nirdeṣṭumaśakyatvādityāśa-
ṅkya pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatirdarśitā bhavati । tadupapādanārthamadhikaraṇamārabhyata ityarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।।
vākyānvayāt ।। 19 ।।</pratika> bṛhadāraṇyake maitreyībrāhmaṇe yājñavalkyaḥ svayaṃ pravivrajiṣayā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
mukhyaprāṇaliṅgābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । parispandalakṣaṇasya prāṇāśrayasya karmaṇaḥ <quote>‘yasya vaitatkarme’</quote> ti śravaṇāt vākyaśeṣe ca prāṇaśabda-
śravaṇācca veditavyaḥ prāṇa iti uta bhogopakaraṇabhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā dharmādharmalakṣaṇakarmaśālī jīvo vā veditavyatvenopadiśyate
iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <quote>‘brahma te bravāṇi’</quote>ityupakramasāmarthyāt kṛtsnajagatkartā parameśvara eva veditavyatayopadiśyate । kutaḥ । <pratika>jagadvā-
citvāt</pratika>=<quote>‘yasya vaitatkarme’</quote> tyetacchabdasamānādhikaraṇasya karmaśabdasya kṛts‍najagadvācakatvāt iti siddhāntaḥ । anena
sūtrārtho'pi vyākhyāta iti vedyam ।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।।jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgānneti cettadvyākhyātam ।।17।।</pratika>vākyaśeṣagatājjīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇaliṅgācca tayorevānyatarasyeha
grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na parameśvarasyeti <pratika>cet tadvyākhyātam</pratika>=parihṛtaṃ caitat <quote>‘nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt’</quote>
ityatra । upakramopasaṃhārābhyāmasya vākyasya brahmaviṣayatvāvadhāraṇāt <quote>‘prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ’</quote> ityatra prāṇaśabdasyāpi
brahmaparatvaniścayāt jīvabrahmaṇorabhedanyāyena jīvaliṅgasyāpi brahmaparatvena netuṃ śakyatvācca parameśvara eveha veditavyatayopadiśyata
ityarthaḥ । <pratika>sū ।। anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke ।।18।।</pratika> idaṃ vākyaṃ jīvapradhānaṃ vā brahmapradhānaṃ
veti naiva vivādāvakāśaḥ । yataḥ jaiminirācāryastu jīvaparāmarśamanyārthaṃ brahmapratipattyarthaṃ manyate । kasmāt । <pratika>praśnavyākhyā-
nābhyām</pratika>= <quote>‘kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo'śayiṣṭa kva etadabhūt kuta etadāgāt’</quote>iti prāṇādivyatirikte jīve pratibodhite punarjī-
vavyatiriktaviṣayaḥ praśno dṛśyate । <quote>‘yadā suptaḥ svapne na kaṃcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati’</quote> iti ca prativacanamapi dṛśyate ।
tasmādyatrāsya jīvasya niḥsaṃbodhatāsvacchatārūpaḥ svāpa upādhijanitaviśeṣavijñānarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ yatastadbhraṃśarūpamāgamanaṃ so'tra
paramātmā veditavyatayā śrāvita iti gamyate । <pratika>apicaivameke</pratika>=vājasaneyiśākhinaḥ<quote>‘ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūtkuta
etadāgāt’</quote> iti praśne <quote>‘ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete’</quote> iti prativacane ca spaṣṭaṃ vijñānamayaśabdena jīvamāmnāya tadva‍ya-
tiriktaṃ paramātmānamāmananti । tasmādidaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭharāmānujamatayoḥ</pratika> viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ pūrvavaditi na pṛthagvivaraṇāvakāśaḥ । <quote>‘jīvamu-
khyaprāṇaliṅgā’</quote>diti sūtre tu pratardanādhikaraṇavadupakramopasaṃhārānuguṇyena jīvaprāṇaliṅgānyapi brahmaparatayā netavyānīṃ’tyaikakaṇṭhya-
mevādṛtam । <quote>‘upāsātraividhyā’</quote>dityasyārthavarṇanaprakriyā paramanayormatayoḥ pūrvamatādvilakṣaṇā ।। adhikaraṇasyāsya jagadvācitvā-
dhikaraṇamiti vyavahāraḥ ।।</p>
<p>ānandatīrthamate <quote>‘samākarṣā’</quote>diti pūrvādhikaraṇāntimasūtramārabhya <quote>‘prakṛtiśce’</quote>ti sūtrāvadhikasya sūtrāṣṭakasya aikādhikara-
ṇyakalpanāttasyādhikaraṇasyottaratra vyākhyāsyamānatvācca neha prapañcanam ।।</p>
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ bālākyadhikaraṇamathavā jagadvācitvādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।। 5 ।।</head>

bṛhadāraṇyake śrūyate'sya viṣayaḥ&mdash;<quote>‘na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhava-
tyātmanastu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ
śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya’</quote> ityādi śrūyate ।।

maitrayīkātyāyanyossvabhāryayorvittasaṃvibhāgaṃ cikīrṣan vittena kimamṛtatvaṃ prāpnuṃ śakyamiti
maitreyyā pṛṣṭo <quote>‘yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syāt amṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti
vittene’</quote>tyuktvā <quote>‘yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tena kuryā yadevava bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhī’</quote>ti
tayā punaramṛtatvasādhanaṃ pṛṣṭo <quote>‘na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati ātmanastu
kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavatī’</quote>tyādibhiḥ <quote>‘na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu
kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatī’</quote>tyantairvākyaiḥ patijāyāputramitrapaśvādi sarvaṃ bhogārthatayaiva priyaṃ bhavati
taṃ patyādisarvabhoktāramātmānamupakramya <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavya śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyā-
sitavya’</quote>ityamṛtatvasādhanamātmadarśanaṃ darśanasādhanāni śravaṇādīni copadiśya <quote>‘ātmanikhalvare
dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāte idaṃ sarvaṃ vidita’</quote> mityātmavijñānena sarvavijñānamuktvā <quote>‘sa yathāgnerabhyā-
hitasya pṛthagdhūmā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ
sāmaveda atharvāṅgirasaḥ purāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ ślokāssūtrāṇi anuvyākhyānāni iṣṭaṃ dru-
tamāśitaṃ pāyitamayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtānyasyaivaitāni sarvāṇi niśvasi-
tānī’</quote>ti tasya nāmarūpātmakasakalaprapañcakāraṇatvaṃ pradarśya <quote>‘yathā saindhavaghano'nantaro'bāhyaḥ
kṛtsno rasadha/?/naḥ evaṃ vā are ayamātmā'nantaro'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ
samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote>ti svotpattivināśaviśeṣavijñānābhāvā-
nuktvā <quote>‘etāvadare khalvamṛtatva’</quote> miti varṇitasyaitasyātmano vedanamamṛtatvasādhanamityupasa-
ñjuhāreti śrūyate । atra<quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavya’</quote>ityādinā nirdiṣṭastāvadātmā parameśvaraḥ pratī-
yate । amṛtatvārthinyai maitreyyai taddarśanādyupadeśāttadvijñānenāmṛtatvavarṇanāttasya nāmarūpātmaka-
sakalaprapañcopādānatvapratipādanācca । <quote>‘sa yathā saindhavaghana’</quote>ityādinoktastu jīvaḥ pratīyate ।
<quote>‘etebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyatī’</quote>ti dehākārapariṇatabhūtopādhikotpattivinā-
śavattvavacanāt <quote>‘na pretya saṃjñāstī’</quote>ti mokṣadaśāyāṃ dehākārapariṇāmabhūtasaṅghātenaikīkṛtya devo'haṃ
manuṣyo'hamityādi jñānaṃ saṃsāradaśāyāmivāsya nāstītyupanyāsācca । evamiha pratīyamānajī-
veśvarasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśe <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavya’</quote> iti prakṛtasyaivātmanaḥ <quote>‘evaṃ vā are aya-
mātme’</quote>ti idamātmaśabdābhyāṃ parāmarśāt । caturthe maitreyībrāhmaṇe <quote>‘evaṃ vā idaṃ mahadbha‍ūtamananta-
mapāra’</quote>miti vijñānaghanavākya eva ca taissāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete । mahadbha‍ūtamanantamapā-
ra’miti śabdānāṃ brahmaparatvāt । sarvavijñānavākyādigatairātmādiśabdaistato bhinnavibhaktikānāṃ
jīvaviṣayaśabdānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāve'pyekaviṣayatvamavicalameva । pratītau satyāmapi jī-
veśvarayoranyatara evātra pratipādyaḥ nobhāvapyabhedeneti vyavasthāpanīyam । tayorbhedasya prabalā-
nekaśrutyantarasiddhatvāditi sthite kiṃ jīvo'tra pratipādyaḥ uta parameśvara iti saṃśayaprakāraḥ sūtrā-
vatārikāyāṃ sūcitatvāt iha bhāṣye na likhitaḥ । nanu nāstyatra pūrvapakṣāvakāśaḥ upakramopasaṃhā-
raparāmaśaḥ brahmapare mahāvākye dṛṣṭānāmanyaliṅgānāṃ tattaccharīrakabrahmopāsanārthatvasya pratardanā-
<pb n="547"/>
iha <quote>‘ātmanastu kāmāya’</quote> ityādivākyaiḥ bhogapratiyuktatayā ātmanaḥ saṃ-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dhikaraṇavarṇitasya pūrvādhikaraṇe'pi sthāpitatvāt ihāpi amṛtatvasādhanavedanenopakramasya
tenopasaṃhārasya madhye dundubhyādivākyānāṃ ca brahmaparatvasya spaṣṭatvādityāśaṅkya pūrvapakṣamu-
papādayati&mdash;<pratika>iheti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘na vā are patyuḥ kāmāye’</quote>tyādivākyeṣu svabhogārthe
patyādipratiyuktatayā pratipādyamānastāvadātmā jīva eva । na ca tatrāpi pūrvādhikaraṇodā-
hṛtasya bhok‍tṛtvāderiva bhogārthaprīterjīvadvārā taccharīrakaparameśvarānvayo vaktuṃ śakya iti
vācyam । tathā sati prasiddhidyotakavaiśabdasvārasyabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt । jīvagatasvabhogārthapratipa-
ttyā hi prītimātraṃ hi loke prasiddhaṃ na tu tasya jīvadvārā parameśvarānvitatvamapi । tadapi śrauta-
vyutpattimatāṃ prasiddhamiti cenna । anadhītinīmavicāritaśrutyarthāṃ kevalamamṛtārthinā patyā saha
cirasaṃvāsena labdhāntaḥkaraṇaśuddhiṃ svayamapyamṛtatvārthinīṃ maitreyīṃ prati tadba‍uddha‍yupārūḍhāyā lokapra-
siddhereva dhyotanīyatvāt । na ca vaiśabdamātrasya svārasyabhaṅgo'stu parameśvaraviṣayāṇāmupakramo-
pasaṃhāraparāmarśānāmanurodhyatvāditi vācyam । <quote>‘ātmā vā are draṣṭavya’</quote> ityādinā vakṣyamā-
ṇasyātmaiva draṣṭavya ityasyopapādanārthaḥ khalu <quote>‘na vā are patyuḥ kāmāye’</quote>tyādisandarbhaḥ । a-
tassa yadviṣayatvena tadupapādako bhavati tadviṣayo varṇanīyaḥ । na ca jīvadharmasya parameśvaraparyantaṃ
ca pratipādakatvena tadupapādako bhavati । bhavati tu svātmanyanubhūtasya svabhogārthatvenaiva
patyādīnāṃ priyatvasyopodvalakatvena । <quote>‘prasiddhaṃ hyetattavāpi maitreyi yatpatyādayo jāyādīnāṃ
patyādiprayojanāya priyā na bhavanti kiṃ tu svaprayojanāyaiva । ataḥ patyādikaṃ parityajya svā-
tmaiva draṣṭavya’</quote> iti । ato'yaṃ sandarbho maitreyīsammatiyogyalokaprasiddhārthānuvādapara ityevaṃ
varṇanīyam । ata eva hi parijāyādivākyeṣu pativākyasya prāthamyam । maitreyīṃ prati tada-
nubhavasākṣikamarthe prathamamupanyaste tadda‍ṛṣṭāntenārthāntarāṇyapi tatsammatiyogyāni kartavyā-
nīti। nanu, svātmabhogāya patyādīnāṃ priyatvavacanaṃ patyādīnparityajya kevalamātmasvarūpa-
manveṣṭavyamityatropapādakaṃ na bhavati । priyameva hyanveṣṭavyaṃ na tu priyayuktaṃ svarūpamiti cet
yathā priyaviyuktamātmasvarūpamevānenopapāditaṃ bhavati tathā nirūpayāmaḥ । sarveṣāmapi svā-
tmā priyaḥ patijāyādayo'pi priyāḥ ityanubhavasākṣikametat । tatra patijāyā-
dīnāṃ priyatvaṃ patitvādiprayuktaṃ na bhavati kiṃ tu svātmaprayuktamityasminnarthe teṣāṃ sveṣṭa-
sampādakatvadaśāyāmiva svāniṣṭasampādakatvadaśāyāṃ priyatvādarśanena sarvasampratipattiyogye
varṇyamāne svātmanaḥ patijāyādīnprati iṣṭasampādakatvadaśāyāṃ cāviśeṣeṇa priyasya
patijāyādyapekṣayātiśayapuruṣārthatvaṃ tāvallabhyate । tena cātmānātmanorlokaprasiddha‍yanusāreṇa
mukhyagauṇapuruṣārthatvarūpaṃ tatvamālocya gauṇaṃ parityajya mukhyamevāśrayedityayamartho labhyata
eva । tasmātpatijāyādivākyasandarbhe avicale jīvaparatve tadupapādyamātmano draṣṭa-
vyatvādivacanaṃ tadviṣayamavatiṣṭhata ityuttarasandarbhasyāpi tadviṣayatāvaśyaṃbhāvāt । tadvijñānena
sarvavijñānavacanaṃ <quote>‘śive pūjite sarve devāḥ pūjitā bhavantī’</quote>ti vacanaṃ yathā sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ
pūjayā yādṛśaṃ phalamavāpyate tatsarvaṃ śivapūjāphale mahārṇave śīkaranikaravadantarbhavatītye-
vaṃ phalataḥ sarvadevānāṃ pūjitatvaparaṃ gauṇamevamanyeṣāṃ prakṛtimahadahaṅkārabhūtendriyāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ
