sāritvāvagamāt atra pratimādyamāno jīvaḥ ।।
iti sandehena pūrvapakṣe prāpte&mdash;siddhāntayāmaḥ parameśvara iti । kutaḥ <quote>‘amṛtatvasya tu
nāśāsti vittena’</quote> <quote>‘ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāte idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam’</quote>
<quote>‘idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā’</quote> ityādeḥ, <quote>‘yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt’</quote>
ityavasānasya kṛts‍nasya vākyasya parameśvare'nvayāt bhogaprītiyuktasya jīvasyānu-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śravaṇamananābhyāṃ jagattatvaniścayapūrvakamupāsanena yāvatphalaṃ bhavati tatsarvaṃ puruṣopāsanaphale-
'ntarbhavatītyabhiprāyaṃ gauṇaṃ varṇanīyam । ata evāhuḥ<quote>‘daśa manvantarāṇīha tiṣṭhantīndriyaci-
ntakāḥ । bhautikāstu śataṃ pūrṇaṃ sahasraṃ tvābhimānikāḥ । bauddhā daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti viga-
tajvarāḥ । pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhantyavyaktacintakāḥ । puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṅkhyā na
vidyate ।’</quote> iti । ‘sa yathārdraidho'rityādinoktaṃ sarvopādānatvaṃ tu jīvādhikṛtapradhānaviṣayaṃ
yojanīyam । tatrārdraindhanaviśiṣṭasyāgnerdhūmopādānatvadṛṣṭyāṅgīkṛtam । na ca tatrāgnirdhūmopādānaṃ
kiṃtvārdrendhanameva । tadutkarṣeṇaiva dhūmotkarṣadarśanāt । evaṃ dārṣṭāntikabhāgenāpi ārdrendhanakalpa-
prakṛtiviśiṣṭasyāgnikalpasya cetanasya prapañcopādānatvaṃ varṇyamānadṛṣṭāntānusārāt <quote>‘dadhnā
juhotī’</quote>ti vidhānamiva viśeṣaṇe saṅkrāmatīti । <quote>‘etāvadare khalvamṛtatva’</quote> mityetattu prakṛti-
viviktajīvajñānasya mokṣasādhanatvābhiprāyeṇa suyojam । tasmānmaitreyībrāhmaṇe jagadupādānapra-
kṛtiviśiṣṭatvena mokṣārthaṃ prakṛtiviviktatayā jñātavyatvena ca jīva eva pratipādya iti pūrvapakṣaṃ
niṣkarṣati&mdash;<pratika>jīva iti</pratika> । <quote>‘sandehena pūrvapakṣe prāpte’</quote> ityatra jīva iti pūrvapakṣe prāpta ityanva/?/yaḥ ।
<quote>‘sandehene’</quote>tyavatārikāyāṃ sūcitākārasyādhikaraṇāṅgasandehasyānuvādaḥ । nanvavadhāraṇena pūrvapakṣa
iti bhāṣyābhiprāyaḥ । <quote>‘bhogaprītiyuktatayātmanaḥ saṃsāritvāvagamā’</quote>diti prāgjīvatve nirṇīte
pūrvapakṣahetordarśitatvāt ।<quote>‘vākyānvayā’</quote>diti sūtrasya maitreyībrāhmaṇe pratipādyaḥ parameśvara ityadhyā-
hṛtena sādhyena tatrādimadhyāvasānavākyānāṃ parameśvaraviṣayatvāditi sūtrahetoranvayamabhipretya si-
ddhāntayati&mdash;<pratika>parameśvaraitīti</pratika> । atra<quote>‘ityārabhye’</quote>tyantenāmṛtatvopāyaprārthanārūpaṃ purastādupadeṣṭa-
vyatvasya brahmaliṅgamupakramagataṃ darśitam ।<quote>‘ityāde’</quote>rityantena sarvavijñānapratijñānaṃ jagadupādānatva-
mityādi madhyāvasānagataṃ brahmaliṅgajātaṃ darśitam । <quote>‘ityavasānasye’</quote> tyantena <quote>‘yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijā-
nāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt vijñātāramare kena vijānātī’</quote>tyādi hyupasaṃhāragataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ darśi-
tam । yadyapi ṣaṣṭhe maitreyībrāhmaṇe <quote>‘etāvadare'mṛtatva’</quote>miti brahmaliṅgāntaraśravaṇamasti tathāpi
tadupakramasthaliṅgatvena prāgdarśitamiti tadvihāya caturthe maitreyībrāhmaṇe <quote>‘yenedaṃ sarva’</quote> mityādinā
darśitam । jīvaḥ svāntaryāmitayā sthitena yena parameśvareṇa ādṛtajñānaśaktikassannidaṃ
sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ parameśvaraṃ kenopāyena vijānīyāt । sarvasya vijñātāraṃ taṃ parameśvaraṃ
kenopāyena vijānīyāt । taddarśane tatprasādahetuṃ prāguktaṃ śravaṇamananapūrvakamupāsaname-
kamupāyaṃ vihāya na kiñcidapyupāyāntaramastītyabhyāsena pratipādyamānaṃ duradhigamatvaliṅgaṃ
darśitam । nanvastūpakramādīnāṃ brahmaṇi svārasyaṃ tathāpi patijāyādivākyasya bhogaprī-
tiyuktajīvaviṣayatāyāḥ apākartumaśakyatvāt ananyathāsiddhajīvaliṅgānusāreṇa jīva
eva prakṛtivivikto mumukṣubhirdraṣṭavyaṃ paraṃ brahma tadatirekeṇa tannāstīti mai treyībrāhmaṇasya tātparyaṃ
varṇanīyamiti tatraiva brahmaliṅgatvābhimataṃ sarvaṃ yojanīyamityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>bhogaprītiyukta</pratika>-
<pb n="549"/>
vādena parameśvarapratipādanādavirodhaḥ ।।
kathamiha sarvatra jīvaśabdena parameśvarābhidhānamiti cet tadidaṃ matāntareṇo-
papādayati&mdash;
<sutra>।। sū ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe’</quote> ityādinoktasyaikavijñānena sarvavijñānasya siddhaye
jīvasya tatkāryatayā tadavyatiriktatāṃ jñāpayituṃ jīvaśabdena parameśvarasyābhi-
dhānamityāśmarathyo manyate ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
utkramiṣyato muktasya parameśvarasvarūpabhāvādātmaśabdena parameśvarābhidhānami-
tyauḍulomirmene ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>syeti</pratika> । patijāyādijīvaviṣayatvāvaśyaṃbhāvamātreṇa draṣṭavyādivākyānāmapi tadviṣayatvāva-
śyaṃbhāve hi sarvavedāntapratiṣṭhitaṃ jīvātiriktasya parabrahmaṇaḥ parameśvarasya mumukṣubhirjñātavyatvaṃ
jagadupādānatvādyanukūlaṃ vaktavyamiti śaṅkyetāpi na tu so'sti । patijāyādivākye bhogaprī-
tiyuktatayā jīvasyānuvādaḥ uttaravākyeṣu mumukṣudraṣṭavyatvādinā parameśvarasya pratipādanamiti
siddhisaṅgatyupapatteḥ । jīvānuvādasya parameśvarapratipādanasya kathamekavākyatā ghaṭata ita cet
ittham । yasmātpatijāyādayaḥ patijāyādiprayojanāya priyā na bhavanti kiṃ tu svaprayojanāyaiva ।
tasmādyasyāmṛtasvarūpasvaprayojanasya patijāyādiviṣayo rāgaḥ pratikūlastasya siddhimapekṣamāṇena
patijāyādibhyo virajya parameśvara eva draṣṭavya iti । nanvevaṃ sati ekasyaivātmaśabdasya pati-
jāyādivākyagatasya jīvo'rthaḥ, taduttaravākyagatasya parameśvara ityarthabhedaḥ syāt । nāyaṃ
doṣaḥ । patijāyādivākyasya jīvaparatve draṣṭavyavākyasya <quote>‘yadā carmavadākāśa’</quote>mityādiśru-
tyantarānusāreṇa parameśvaraparatve tāvaśyavaktavye <quote>‘syāccaikasya brahmaśabdava’</quote>diti nyāyena tadartha-
bhedāṅgīkārasyocitatvāt । evaṃ draṣṭavyavākyasya parameśvaraparatve taduttaravākyānāṃ tatparatvaṃ
svata evāyāti । nanu sarvavijñānapratijñādikaṃ paramātmaviṣayatāṃ prāpnotu nāma, <quote>‘tānyevā-
nuvinaśyatī’</quote>tyādijīvaparāmarśaḥ kathaṃ tadviṣayatāṃ prāpnuyādityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatra svābhimataṃ
prakāraṃ pradarśayiṣyanmatāntareṇa tāvadupapādayatītyāha&mdash;<pratika>kathamiheti । sarvatreti</pratika> । <quote>‘etebhyo
bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti avināśī vā are ayamātmānucchi-
ttidharme’</quote>tyeteṣu vākyeṣvityarthaḥ । yadvā । pratardanādhikaraṇaviṣayavākye pūrvādhikaraṇaviṣayavākye
cetyarthaḥ <pratika>।। sū ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> sarvavijñānasya pratijñāsiddha‍ya-
rthasya jīvaparameśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvakṛtasyaikyasya liṅgaṃ tajjñāpanārthaṃ jīvavāciśabdaiḥ
parameśvarābhidhānamiti pūrvādhikaraṇe viṣayavākyayoḥ śāstrāntarasthapratijñāsiddha‍yarthamiti bhāvaḥ।
<pratika>।। sū ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jīvasya parameśva-
rādbhede'pi mokṣadaśāyāṃ tadbhāvaprāpteḥ jīvaśabdaiḥ parameśvarābhidhānamiti auḍulomimatami-
ti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>utkramiṣyata iti ।। sū ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> jī-
<pb n="550"/>
<quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiśruterjīvātmani parameśvarasyātmatayā avasthā-
nājjīvaśabdavācyatvaṃ parameśvarasyetiṃ kāśakṛts‍no mene । idameva mataṃ sūtrakārasya ।
matadvayamupanyasya tadvirodhenaitadabhidhānāt anyasyānabhidhānācca niścīyate । prabala-
śrutyānuguṇyaṃ cātra saṃbhavati । tathā hi---atharvaśirasi sarvacidacidanupraveśāt
parameśvarasya sarvaśabdavācyatvamiti śrūyate । prathamakhaṇḍe <quote>‘devā ha vai svargaṃ lokamaga-
maṃste devā rudramapṛcchan ko bhavāniti । sobravīt---ahamekaḥ prathamamāsaṃ vartāmi ca
bhaviṣyāmi ca nānyaḥ kaścinmatto vyatirikta iti । so'ntarādantaraṃ prāviśaddiśāṃ
cāntaraṃ sa prāviśat so'haṃ nityānityo brahmāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ prāñcaḥ pratyañco'haṃ dakṣiṇā-
ñcodaśco'hamadhaścordhvaṃ ca diśaśca vidiśaścāhaṃ vidiścāhaṃ pumānahaṃ strī cāhaṃ gāyatryahaṃ sāvitryahaṃ
triṣṭubjagatyanuṣṭup cāhaṃ chando'haṃ gārhapatyo'haṃ dakṣiṇāgnirāhavanīyo'haṃ satyo'haṃ
gaurahaṃ gauryahaṃ jyeṣṭho'haṃ śreṣṭho'haṃ variṣṭho'hamāpo'haṃ tejo'hamṛgyajuḥsāmātharvā-
ṅgiraso'haṃ kṣaramahamakṣaramahaṃ guhyo'hamaraṇyo'haṃ puṣkaramahaṃ pavitramahamagraṃ ca madhyaṃ ca
bahiśca purastājjyotirityahameva sarvaṃ ca māṃ yo veda sa sarvān devān veda’</quote> ityantena।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
veṣvantaryāmitayā parameśvarasyāvasthitestanniyamyatvena taccharīrabhūtānāṃ jīvānāṃ śabdāśśarī-
riparameśvaraparyantāḥ, ato jīvaśabdaiḥ parameśvarābhidhānamiti kāśakṛtsnamatamiti sūtrārthama-
bhipretya byācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>ya ātmanīti</pratika> । parasparaviruddheṣu triṣveteṣu mateṣu sūtrakārasya kimabhima-
tamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tannirdhārayati&mdash;<pratika>idameveti</pratika> । jīvānāṃ kāryatvasya ‘nātmā śruternityatvācca tā-
bhyaḥ <ref>(bra॰ 2-3-17)</ref> ityadhikaraṇe nirākariṣyamāṇatvānmuktāvāgantukarūpābhiniṣpatteḥ
‘saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svena śabdāt <ref>(bra॰4-4-1.)</ref> ityadhikaraṇe nirākariṣyamāṇatvātsarvaśabdānāṃ
paramātmaparyantatvasya<quote>‘carācaravyapāśrayastu syā’</quote>ditya<ref>(bra॰2-3-16sū॰)</ref>dhikaraṇe prasādhayiṣyamā-
ṇatvācca kāśakṛtsnamatameva svābhimatamiti pūrvaṃ matadvayopanyāsapūrvakaṃ tadabhidhānena tadanantara-
manyasyānabhidhānena ca sūtrakṛtsūcayāmāseti bhāvaḥ । nanvevaṃ satīdaṃ sūtratrayaṃ vyartham । idaṃ hi na
pūrvamatadvayasyānabhimatatvajñāpanārtham । nāpi kāśakṛtsnamatasya svamatatvajñāpanārtham । udāhṛtā-
dhikaraṇaireva tadubhayasiddherityāśaṅkya svābhimatasya kāśakṛtsnamatasya prabalaśrutyantarānuguṇye-
nāpi prābalyasūcanārthamiti darśayitumāha&mdash;<pratika>prabaleti</pratika> । atharvaśirasi <quote>‘sontarādantaraṃ prāviśa’</quote>
dityanena digantargataṃ sarvāsu dikṣu sthitaṃ rudraḥ prāṇināṃ śarīrāntarātprāṇāderapyantaraṃ cetanava-
rgamantaryāmitayā prāviśadityuktam । <quote>‘diśāṃ cāntaraṃ sa prāviśa’</quote> dityanena digantargataṃ sarvāsu dikṣu
sthitamacetanavargamantaryāmitayā prāviśadityuktam । tataḥ <quote>‘so'haṃ nityānityaḥ brahmāhaṃ brahmāha’</quote>
mityādinā prathamakhaṇḍaśeṣeṇa <quote>‘yo vai rudrassa bhagavān bhūrbhuvassvaḥ yaśca brahme’</quote> tyādinā dvitī-
yakhaṇḍena ca śivasya sarvāntaryāmitayā sarvaśarīrakatvaprayuktaṃ sarvaśabdavācyatvaṃ drarśitam ।
tathā ‘yo yoniṃyonimadhitiṣṭhatyeko yasminnidaṃ sañcavicaiti viśvam । evaṃ sa devo bhagavānva-
reṇyo yonisvabhāvānadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ । sarvametadviśvamadhitiṣṭhatyeko guṇāṃśca sarvānviniyoja-
yedyaḥ । ghṛtātparaṃ maṇḍamivātisūkṣmaṃ jñātvā śivaṃ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍham । eṣa devo viśvakarmā mahātmā
<pb n="551"/>
dvitīyakhaṇḍe ca sarvānupraveśādeva <quote>‘yo vai rudraḥ sa bhagavān yaśca brahmā tasmai vai
namo namaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya brahmaviṣṇumaheśvaromāvināyakādisarvaprapañcavācyatvaṃ prati-
pādyate । tathā sarvaśrutisāmarasyavicāre sarveṣāṃ cidacidvastūnāmantaryāmitayā
anupraviṣṭaḥ sarvaśarīraḥ sarvaśabdavācyaḥ parameśvaraḥ śiva iti vijñāyate । ataḥ
kāśakṛtsnamatameva śrutisūtramahābhiyuktasammatamiti samañcasam ।।
iti vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye sanniviṣṭaḥ । <quote>‘yo rudro agnāvapsu ya oṣadhīṣu yo rudro viśvā
bhuvanā viveśa ।’</quote> <quote>‘namassrotasyāya ca dvīpyāya ce’</quote> tyādibrahmakarmakāṇḍagatasarvaśrutisā-
marasyavicāre sarveṣāṃ cetanānāmantaryāmitayā tānyanupraviṣṭo'ntaryāmitvādaṣṭamūrtirantaryāmi-
brāhmaṇādiṣu pañcabhūtacandrasūryasakalacetanarūpāṣṭamūrtitvaprasiddheśca sarvaśarīrakaḥ <quote>‘imā
rudrāya sthiradhanvine gira’</quote> iti śruteśca sarvaśabdavācyaśca śivo'vadhāryata eva । yata evaṃ
tasmāta kāśakṛtsnamatameva samañjasamityupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>ata iti । śrutisūtreti</pratika> । śruti-
sūtrāṇyudāhṛtāni । mahābhiyuktasūktayaḥ smṛtipurāṇāni । tathā hi---mānavadharmaśāstro-
pasaṃhāre tāvat <quote>‘praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣāmaṇīyāṃsamaṇorapi । rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāttu puruṣaṃ
para’</quote>miti sarveṣāṃ niyantāraṃ puruṣaṃ prastutya <quote>‘enameke vadantyāgniṃ maruto'nye prajāpatim ।
indrameke pare prāṇamapare brahma śāśvata’</quote>miti teṣuteṣu vedabhāgeṣu tasyāgnyādiśabdairvyavahāramu-
panyasya sarveṣāṃ teṣāmavirodhasiddhyartha<quote>‘meṣa sarvāṇi bhūtāni pañcabhirvyāpya mūrtibhiḥ । janmabṛddhi-
kṣayairnityaṃ saṃsārayati cakrava’</quote>diti ślokena tasya sarvaniyantṛtvaṃ rājñaḥ prajāniyantṛtvamiva
tāṭasthyena sthitasya na sambhavati kiṃ tu jīvavargasya svasvaśarīraniyantṛtvamiva niyamyāni
vyāpya sthitasyeti varṇayāṃbabhūve । tena sarveṣāṃ taccharīratvasūcanāt tasya svaśarīrabhūtāgnyā-
diśabdavācyatvamupapāditaṃ bhavati । śivasyāgniśabdena vyavahārastāvat <quote>‘agniṃ purātanayitno-
racittāt’</quote> <quote>‘rudro vā eṣa yadagni’</quote>rityādiśrutibhāgeṣu <quote>‘kimebhiramarairanyaiḥ pūjitairadhvare phalam ।
rājā cedadhvarasyāsya na rudraḥ pūjyate tvayā । dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ ।
ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te caiva śatadhā puna’</quote>rityādiśivapurāṇamahābhāratādivacanopanīta-
śivatātparyeṣu prasiddhaḥ । indraśabdena vyavahāraḥ atharvaśirasi īśānanāmanirvacanānantarapa-
ṭhite <quote>‘abhi tvā śūra nonuma’</quote>iti mantre prasiddhaḥ । evaṃ śabdāntarairvyavahāro'pyudāharaṇīyaḥ ।
<quote>‘pañcabhirvyāpya mūrtibhi’</quote>rityanena viyadādibhūtarūpāḥ śivasyāṣṭamūrtyantargatāḥ pañcabrahmarūpā vā
mūrtayo vivakṣitāḥ । mānavadharmaśāstropakramasya śivaparatvamasmābhiḥ śivatatvaviveke nipuṇata-
ramupapāditamiti nopasaṃhārasya śivaparatve tadvirodhaśśaṅkanīyaḥ । tathā kātyāyanagṛhye <quote>‘nadī-
muttariṣyannabhimantrayate namo rudrāyāpsuṣade svasti mā saṃpārayeti vanaspatimārokṣyannabhima-
ntrayate namo rudrāya vanaspatiṣade svasti mā sampāraye’</quote>tyādinā nadītarugirinadīcatuṣpathaśma-
śānagoṣṭhākramaṇeṣu tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvena tatratatra sannihitasya rudrasya namaskāramantrānvidhāyaivama-
nyatrāpi <quote>‘namo rudrāyetyeva brūyā’</quote> dityanyākramaṇeṣvapi sāmānyatastannamaskāramantraṃ vidhāya
<quote>‘rudro hyevaitatsarva’</quote>miti tadanantaravākyena rudrasya sarvādhiṣṭhātṛtve <quote>‘sarvo vai rudra’</quote> iti śrutiḥ
<pb n="552"/>
pramāṇatvena smāritā । tena<quote>‘ptarvo vai rudraḥ sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahme’</quote>tyādisarvapadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
viśiṣya tattadvācakapadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca sarvādhiṣṭhātṛtvaprayuktasarvaśarīrakṛtamiti darśitaṃ
bhavati । āśvalāyanasūtre śivaṃ prastutya <quote>‘sarvāṇi ha vā etasya nāmadheyāni bhavantī’</quote>ti
sākṣādeva sarveṣāṃ nāmnāṃ tatra paryavasānaṃ varṇitam । tathā śivapurāṇe <quote>‘vigrahaṃ devadevasya
viśvametaccarācaram । tadevaṃ na vijānanti paśavaḥ pāśagauravā’</quote> diti viśvasya śivavigrahatvaṃ
lokānāṃ tadajñānaṃ coktvā tadajñānādeva vedeṣu parabrahmaṇaśśivasya tatratatra tattadvasturūpatvoktiṃ
tattadvastvadhipatitvoktiṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kṣubhitahṛdayāśśāstrakārā bhinnabhinnahṛdayā bhinnaprasthānāva-
lambino jātāḥ । vastutaśśivassarvaśarīrakaḥ sarvasyāpyadhipatiriti tattacchabdairapi vyapadeṣṭuṃ
śakyaḥ । tadadhipatitvenāpi nātra kaścidvirodha iti prapañcitaṃ <quote>‘tamekameva bahudhā vadanti yadana-
ntakam।ajānantaḥ paraṃ bhāvamavikalpaṃ maharṣaya’</quote>ityādinā<quote>‘kecitsaṃsāriṇaṃ prāhustamasaṃsāriṇaṃ pare ।
svatantramapareprāhurasvatantraṃ pare viduḥ ।। ghora ityapare prāhussomyameva pare viduḥ । rāgavantaṃ pare
prāhurvītarāgamathāpare । niṣkriyaṃ taṃ pare prāhussakriyaṃ cetare janāḥ ।nirindriyaṃ pare prāhussendriyaṃ
ca tathāpare ।’</quote> ityādivikalpapradarśanapūrvakam <quote>‘evaṃ vikalpyamāneṣu yāthārthyaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ । nādhyava-
syanti munayo nānāpratyayakāraṇāt । ye punassarvabhāvena prapannāḥ parameśvaram । te vijāna-
ntyayatnena śivaṃ paramakāraṇa’</quote>mityantena । evamanyatrāpyudāhāryam । tasmātsthitamidaṃ śrutisū-
trasmṛtipurāṇānugrahārthaṃ kāśakṛtsnamatameva sādhīya iti । athodāhṛteṣvatharvaśirovākyeṣu
vyākhyeyāṃśānvyākurmaḥ । purā brahmādayo devāḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ paramaśivasya tattvaṃ svayaṃ niścetu-
maśaknuvantaḥ tamevādiguruṃ prakṣyāma iti niścitya niratiśayasukhātmakatayā svargaśabdābhidheyaṃ
tasya lokaṃ gatvā tamapṛcchan kaḥ kīdṛksvarūpo bhavāniti sa bhagavānabravīt sṛṣṭeḥ prāgaha-
meka evāsaṃ sṛṣṭyanantaramidānīṃ sṛṣṭaprapañcātmanā varte saṃhārakāle ca sṛṣṭeḥ prāgiva bhavi-
ṣyāmi kalpāntare srakṣyamāṇapadārthātmanā vā bhaviṣyāmi madatiriktaḥ ko'pi nāstīti <quote>‘nānyaḥ
kaścinmatto vyatirikta’</quote> ityantavākyārthaḥ spaṣṭaḥ । tathā <quote>‘so'haṃ nityānitya’</quote> ityāderapi tatra
sāmānyato nityānityasvarūpatvamuktvā <quote>‘brahmāha’</quote> mityanena parabrahmatayā nityarūpaṃ vivṛtam ।
<quote>‘brahma ha’</quote>miti kecitpāṭhamaṅgīkṛtyāhamityarthe hamitiśabdaḥ, <quote>‘haṃsasso'ha’</quote>miti darśanāt śaka-
ndhvāditvādvā sandhiriti vadanti । tadanantaramanityarūpatvavivaraṇam । tatra <quote>‘brahmāha’</quote>miti
puṃliṅgena, brahmaśabdena hiraṇyagarbharūpatvamuktam । <quote>‘prāñco'ha’</quote>mityādibhi <quote>‘rvidiśaścāha’</quote> mityantai-
rvākyaiḥ prāgādyūrdhvāntasakaladigantargatavastujātarūpatvaṃ sakaladigrūpatvaṃ coktam । sāvitrī deva-
tā।gāyatryādayaścatvāraśchandoviśeṣāḥ।chandassāmānyataśchadomātram।gārhapatyādayastrayo'gnayaḥ ।
satyaḥ satyavacanam । arśāditvādacpratyayena satyavacanaśīlo vā । gauḥ prasiddhā । gaurī pārvatī
kanyā vā । jyeṣṭho vayo'dhikaḥ । śreṣṭho bhūmyaiśvaryādibhiḥ praśastaḥ । variṣṭhaḥ urutaraḥ । apte-
jograhaṇaṃ bhūtamātropalakṣaṇam । ṛgādayaścatvāro vedāḥ । kṣaraṃ pradhānam । akṣaraṃ jīvasāmānyam ।
guhyo guptadharmaḥ । araṇyaṃ campakāraṇyādikam । puṣkaraṃ tīrthaviśeṣaḥ । pavitraṃ tato'nyat pāvanava-
stusāmānyaṃ gaṅgādikam । agraṃ ca madhyaṃ ca cakārādādiśca । sarvasya padārthajātasya bahiśca cakā-
rādantaśca।purastājjyotiḥ prācyāmudyannādityaḥ । evamanekātmako'pyahameka eva । sarve ca māṃ sarve-
'pi padārthāḥ māmevānuvartante । madekavaśyā iti yāvat । evaṃ māṃ yo veda sa sarvāndevānveda
<pb n="553"/>
vedātmakatvātsarveṣāṃ devānāmiti । evaṃ tāvatprathamakhaṇḍena tattadanupraveśaprayuktaṃ tattacchabdavā-
cyatvaṃ pradarśitam । tathā dvitīyakhaṇḍe'pi <quote>‘yo vai rudrassa bhagavānyaśca brahmā tasmai vai namo namaḥ’</quote>
ityādibhirmantrairviśiṣya brahmaviṣṇumaheśvaromāvināyakaskandendrāgnibhūrbhuvassuvarmaharjanastapa-
ssatyapṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśasūryacandranakṣatragrahaprāṇakālayamamṛtyubhūtarūpatāṃ sāmānyato bhūta-
bhavadbhaviṣyadātmakatāṃ ca pradarśya <quote>‘yacca viśvaṃ yacca kṛtsnaṃ yacca sarva’</quote>mityabhyāsena sarvātmakatvaṃ
ca pradarśya tena sarvaśabdavācyatvamupapādya <quote>‘yo vai rudrassa bhagavān yacca satyaṃ tasmai vai namo
nama’</quote>iti mantreṇa <quote>‘brahmāha’</quote> mityupakrāntaparabrahmarūpatayopasaṃhṛtam । tena yathā śivasya parabrahmarū-
patayā brahmaśabdavācyatvam evaṃ sarvāntaryāmitvena hiraṇyagarbhādiśarīrakatayā tattaccha-
bdavācyatvaṃ ceti dṛṣṭāntamukhenopapādanārthamādāvante ca brahmavācisatyaśabdanirdeśaḥ । evaṃ
tāvatsarvāntaryāmitayā sarvaśabdavācyatvamanena svaṇḍadvayenāvagamyata iti nirvivādam ।
sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ ca <quote>‘so'ntarādantaraṃ prāviśat diśaścāntaraṃ sa prāviśa’</quote> dityanenocyata ityapi
nirvivādam । tena śivasya sarvāntaryāmitvamucyata iti । atra kecana vivadante । idaṃ khalu śiva-
vākyam । tena svasyāntaryāmitvamucyate cedahaṃ prāviśamiti nirdeśāpattiḥ । ataḥ svasmādanyasyaiva
kasyacitsarvāntaryāmitvamupadiśya vāmadevavat sarvātmopadeśa iti śivenaiva svakīyasārvātmyo-
padeśarūpakhaṇḍadvayasyāpi tātparyaṃ vivṛtamiti tadanya evāntaryāmīti niścīyate। na ca<quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote>
ditiśrutivākyameva, prāgitikaraṇena śivavākyasya samāptatvāditi śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘so'haṃ nityā-
nitya’</quote> ityuttaratrāpi śivavākyānuvṛttyā prāk tatsamāptyasiddheḥ । anyathā <quote>‘so'haṃ nityānitya’</quote>
ityādau<quote>‘punasso'bravī’</quote>diti vākyādhyāhāraprasaṅgāt । <quote>‘nānyaḥ kaścinmatto vyatirikta’</quote>itītyeta-
danantaraṃśrūyamāṇa itiśabdastu <quote>‘diśaścāntaraṃ sa prāviśa’</quote> dityetadanantarānvayitayā yasmātso'-
ntaryāmī śarīrato'ntarāt prāṇāderapyantaramabhyantaraṃ jīvavargaṃsarvā diśaḥ tadantargataṃ vastujātaṃ
cāntaryāmitayā prāviśattasmāddhetoḥ mama sārvātmyopadeśa upapannaḥ । madīyāhaṃśabdānāṃ tatparya-
ntatvāditi hetvartho'stu । <quote>‘dharmaṃ dharmeṇa tarpayāmi svena tejase’</quote> tyantaṃ kṛtsnaśivavākyāna-
ntarānvayī samāptyartho vāstu । adhyāhārādvyavahitānvayasya jyāyastvāditi।teṣāṃ vivādaḥ <quote>‘ko
bhavā’</quote>niti śrutigatapraśnavākyopanyāsenaiva nirasyate । na hi śivaṃ prati devaistatsvarūpe pṛṣṭe tena
tadanyasya kasyacitsārvātmyamuttaravākyenopadiṣṭamiti saṅghaṭate।na ca praśnavākyasyāpi tadviṣaya-
tvaṃ kalpyam । <quote>‘ko bhavā’</quote>niti bhavacchabdena tadantaryāmiṇaṃ pṛcchatāṃ devānāmuttaravākyasthāhaṃśa-
bdasyāpi tatparyavasāyitvaṃ spaṣṭameveti tatra tānprati upapādanīyābhāvāduktārthopapādakatayā
paroktarītyā <quote>‘<pratika>so'ntarā</pratika>’</quote>dityāderanvayāsambhavena tadāpi tadasaṅghaṭanatādavasthyāt । tasmāt
praśnataduttaratadupapādakasarvānupraveśavākyānāṃ saṅghaṭanāya <quote>‘ko bhavā’</quote>niti devaiśśivasvarūpaṃ pṛṣṭam ।
śivenāpi sarvātmakaṃ svakīyaṃ tatvamupadiṣṭam । kathaṃ śivasya sārvātmyaṃ tadvyatiriktajagadavabhā-
sanāditi devānāmasambhavāśaṅkāvyudasanāya tadupapādakaṃ <quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote>dityādivākyamityeva
saṅghaṭayitumucitam । <quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote>dityādi śivavākyaṃ vāstu । na ca śivavākyatve pūrva<quote>‘maha’</quote>miti
parāmṛṣṭasya svātmanaḥ <quote>‘sa’</quote> ityanena parāmarśānupapattiḥ । <quote>‘aha’</quote>mityanena svāntaryāmī parāmṛṣṭa
iti parapakṣe'pi tadanupapattestulyatvāt । yatra yasyānupacāritāhaṃpadaprayogaḥ tatra svānta-
ryāmiṇi tatpadaprayogopapattau tathaiva svasminnapi tatprayogopapatteḥ । gītāsu <quote>‘tameva
<pb n="554"/>
śaraṇaṃ gacacha mādyājī māṃ namaskuru’</quote> ityāderekaviṣayatve parasyāpi sampratipatti-
sattvācca । <quote>‘sohaṃ nityānitya’</quote> ityuttaravākye tacchabdasamānādhikaraṇāhaṃśabdaprayogadarśa-
nenātrāpyahamityadhyāhāropapatteḥ । <quote>‘prāviśa’</quote>diti tu chāndasaḥ puruṣavyatyaya ityupapadyate ।
śrutivākyatve'pi <quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote> dityāde <quote>‘sso'haṃ nityānitya’</quote> ityādau punasso'bravīdityadhyā-
hāraprasaṅgo nāpatati । itiśabdavat so'ntarādityāderapi kṛtsnaśivavākyasamāptau tatsamā-
ptyarthasyeteranantaraṃ niveśanasambhavāt । <quote>‘na vā ajīviṣyamimā na khādanniti hovāca kāmo
ma udapāna’</quote> mityādiśrutiṣu kiñcidvaktṛkavākyamadhyagatasyāpi<quote>‘iti hovāce’</quote>tyādestadante śruti-
vākyatvenānvayasya dṛṣṭatvācca । nanu <quote>‘so'ntarā’</quote> dityādeśśivavākyānte niveśane tasya
tadantardhānapratipādanaparatvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam । tadanantaraṃ <quote>‘tato devā rudraṃ nāpaśya’</quote> nniti
tadadarśanapratipādanārthaṃ tadupapādakasya tadantardhānapratipādakasyāpekṣitatvāt । liṅgapurāṇe
<quote>‘so'bravīdbhagavānrudro hyahamekaḥ purātanaḥ । āsaṃ prathamamevāhaṃ vartāmi ca surottamāḥ । bhavi-
ṣyāmi ca loke'sminmatto nānyo'sti kaścana । nityānityo'hamanagha’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘dharmaṃ
dharmeṇa sarvaṃ ca tarpayāmi svatejasā । ityuktvā bhagavānnudrastatraivāntaradhīyata । nāpaśyaṃstu tato
devā’</quote> ityādinā tathaivopabṛṃhitatvāditi cetsatyam । bhāṣyakārasya tvayamabhiprāyaḥ । yathaivā-
darśanopapādakaṃ tadantardhānapratipādanamapekṣitaṃ tathā <quote>‘nānyaḥ kaścinmatto vyatirikta’</quote> ityu-
ktyupapādakaṃ sarvānupraveśasarvaśarīrakatvapratipādanamapekṣitameva । tataśca <quote>‘so'ntarādantaraṃ prāviśa’</quote>
diti vākyena <quote>‘tadasya trividhaṃ rūpaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmamataḥ param । asmadādyamarairdṛśyaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ
tu yogibhiḥ । tataḥ paraṃ tu yannityaṃ jñānamānandamadvayam । tanniṣṭhaistatparairbhaktairdṛśyaṃ tadvratamā-
sthitaiḥ ।।’</quote> iti śivapurāṇādivarṇitarūpatrayamadhye devadṛśyaṃ sthūlaṃ rūpaṃ vihāya tato'ntarā-
tsūkṣmādapyantaraṃ tatparaṃ rūpaṃ prāviśadityevamantardhānaṃ pratipādyate । <quote>‘diśaścāntaraṃ sa prāviśa’</quote>
dityanena sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ pratipādyata ityato na ko'pi virodha ityalaṃ vistareṇa ।।</p>
<head>।।iti vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।</head>
<head>atha vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū । vākyānvayāt ।। 19 ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulo-
miḥ ।। 21 ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ātmā draṣṭavya iti śrutyā pratipādyate jīvaḥ । patijāyādipriyayuk sa eva pūrvaṃ yataḥ prakṛtaḥ ।। 80 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>jīve tadvijñānānna sarvavijñānamupapannam । yuktā jīvasyātmani maheśvare jīvavācakāḥ śabdāḥ ।। 81 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। vākyānvayāt ।। 19 ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādi-
tyauḍulomiḥ ।। 21 ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya’</quote> ityupakrāntaṃ <quote>‘na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu
kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena
matyā vijñātenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam ।’</quote> iti bṛhadāraṇyakasthaṃ maitreyībrāhmaṇavākyaṃ viṣayaḥ । atra priyasaṃsūcitātmopakramasarvavi-
jñānopadeśābhyāṃ draṣṭavyaśrotavyatvādirūpeṇopadiśyamāno vijñānātmā vā paramātmā veti saṃśayaḥ । priyasaṃsūcitenātmanā
bhokro/?/pakramāt madhye ca bhūtasamutthānena prakṛtasyaiva vijñānātmabhāvopanyāsāt tathā <quote>‘vijñātāra’</quote>miti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃ-
<pb n="555"/>
hārācca vijñānātmeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, paramātmaiva । kutaḥ । <pratika>vākyānvayāt</pratika>=vākyasyāsya paurvāparyeṇāvekṣyamāṇasya
paramātmānaṃ pratyanvitāvayavatvadarśanāt । tathā hi---amṛtatvaprārthinyai maitreyyai yājñavalkyenopadiśyamānaṃ kathamanyaviṣayaṃ syāt ।
nāmarūpaprapañcakāraṇatvopadeśaḥ ekāyanaprakriyā ca paramātmetyeva bodhayataḥ ।। iti ।। sūtrārthaśca vyākhyātaḥ ।।</p>
<p>yaduktaṃ priyasaṃsūcitopakramādvijñānātmopadeśa iti tatrāha---</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhyarthaṃ vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedama-
bhisaṃdhāya priyasaṃsūcitavijñānātmopakramaṇamityāśmarathyo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānātsaṃprasannasya vijñānātmanaḥ
dehādisaṃghātādutkramiṣyataḥ paramātmaikyopapatterabhedenopakramaṇamityauḍulomirācāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘anena jīvenātmanā’</quote> ityādiśrutyā paramātmana eva vijñātmabhāvenā-
vasthānātupapannamidamabhedenopakramaṇamiti kāśakṛtsno manyate । <quote>‘tattvamasi’</quote>ityādimahāvākyapratipipādayiṣitārthānusārātkā-
śakṛtsnīyaṃ mataṃ śrutyanusārīti gamyate । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣasiddhāntādikaṃ sarvaṃ samānam । sūtrārthavarṇane paraṃ kvacidasti mahadvailakṣaṇyam । <pratika><quote>‘vākyā-
nvayāt’</quote></pratika> iti sūtramaviśiṣṭhārthaṃ pūrvasmāt ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 20 ।।</pratika> ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye jīvasya tatkāryatayā tadavya-
tiriktatāṃ jñāpayituṃ jīvaśabdena parameśvarābhidhānamityāśmarathyo manyate ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> muktasya parameśvararūpasvabhāvādātmaśabdena parameśvarābhidhāna-
mityāśmarathyo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 22 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ya ātmani tiṣṭhan’</quote> ityādiśruteḥ jīvātmāna parameśvarasyāntaryāmi-
tayāvasthānājjīvaśabdavācyatvaṃ parameśvarasyeti kāśakṛtsno manya ityarthaḥ । idameva mataṃ sūtrakārābhimatamityavagamyate ।
matadvayamupanyasyaitadabhidhānādanyasyāvacanācca । iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, viṣayavākyapūrvapakṣādikaṃ sarvaṃ śrīkaṇṭhamatamevānusarati । śrīkaṇṭhamate paramātmaśabdena paramaśivo'bhidhī-
yate rāmānujamate tu śrīmannārāyaṇa iti viśeṣassarvatrāvadheyaḥ । ataḥ na pṛthakprapañcanamasyeti vedyam ।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate tu <quote>‘samākarṣāt’</quote></pratika> iti sūtramārabhya <pratika><quote>‘avasthiteriti kāśakṛtdanaḥ’</quote></pratika> ityantaṃ sūtrāṣṭakamekama-
dhikaraṇam । ataḥ pūrvamatebhyo'sya vilakṣaṇatayā pṛthagvyākhyāyate । asyādhikaraṇasya karmapratipādakāssarve śabdā viṣayaḥ । loka-
vedayośśabdanāmanyatrāpi vyavahārasiddhavācakatvābhyupagamāt <quote>‘tattu samanvayā’</quote>diti sūtre tuśabdena sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ bhagavāta
viṣṇāvevaikasmin pratijñātassamanvayo nopapadyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । anyatra prasiddhā api śabdāḥ tadadhīnanyāyena vidvadrūḍhyā
mahāyogena ca prasiddhatattadantaryāmiṇi viṣṇau pravartamānāḥ paramamukhyāḥ । te prasiddheṣu svasvavācyeṣu samākṛṣya lokavyavahāra-
siddhyarthaṃ prayujyante । atassarveṣāṃ śabdanāṃ viṣṇāveva samanvaya upapanna iti siddhāntaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sūtrārthastu, sū ।। samākarṣāt ।। 16 ।।</pratika> svato mukhyavṛttyā paramātmavācinaḥ śabdān tatassamākṛṣyānyatra vācaka-
śaktyaṅgīkārāt nānyatra vyavahāralopaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jagadvācitvāt ।। 17 ।।</pratika> lokavyavahārācchabdānāṃ jagadvācitvajñānātteṣāṃ tatra prasiddhiryuktetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। jīvamukhyaprāṇarliṅgāditi cenna tadvyākhyātam ।। 18 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yadekāṃ śākhāṃ jīvo jahāti’</quote> iti <quote>‘vāyunā hi
loko nīyate’</quote> iti ca jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgyoḥ śravaṇāt tayorapi tattacchabdamukhyavācyatā syāditi <pratika>cenna</pratika> । kutaḥ । yasmā-
ttadvākyajātaṃ tadantaryāmiparatayā <quote>‘prāṇastathānugamā’</quote>dityādiṣu vyākṛtaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyāmapi caivameke ।। 19 ।।</pratika> tuśabda evārthe । etena viṣṇoranyatra
śabdānsamākṛṣya karmādipratipādanamapi yuktameva । kutaḥ । <pratika>anyārthaṃ tu</pratika>=paramātmajñānārthameva । tatkuta iti cet ।
<pratika>praśnavyākhyānābhyām</pratika>=<quote>‘kasmi’</quote>nniti śaunakapraśnāt <quote>‘dve vidye’</quote>iti aṅgiraso vacanāt tathā <quote>‘kathaṃnvi’</quote>ti śaunakapraśnāt tathā
<quote>‘kathaṃnvi’</quote>ti ś‍vetaketupraśnāt <quote>‘yathā somye’</quote>tyuddālakavacanācceti jaiminirācāryo manyate । kiṃca । <pratika>eke</pratika>=śākhinaḥ <quote>‘yastaṃ na veda
kimṛcā kariṣyati’</quote> iti anyajñānasya paramātmajñānārthatāṃ paṭhanti tasmādapītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। vākyānvayāt ।। 2 ।।</pratika> brahmaṇi vākyasamanvayamaveśya vedena karmādikamapi pratipādanīyamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ ।। 21 ।।</pratika> vedena karmādipratipādanaṃ jñānameva mokṣaheturnānyadityevaṃrūpāyāḥ
<quote>‘nānyaḥ panthā’</quote>iti pratijñātārthasiddheḥ । <pratika>rliṅgam</pratika>=sādhakam । ataḥ brahmajñānopayogitvena karmapratipādanaṃ yuktamityāśmarathyā-
cāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<pb n="556"/>
atha prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
pūrvaṃ <quote>‘janmādyasya yataḥ’</quote> iti dvitīyādhikaraṇe <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtāni’</quote>
iti pañcamīśrutyudāharaṇena parameśvarasya jagadupādānatvaṃ sāmānyena nirūpitam ।
tadviśeṣataḥ samarthayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---
<sutra>।। sū ।। prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ’</quote>
ityādivākyānyasya viṣayaḥ ।।
eteṣu prasiddhamubhayakāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ । saṃdehaśca nimittasya
kulālāderupādānamṛtpiṇḍādibhāvādarśanāt upādānasya mṛtpiṇḍādernimittaku-
lālādibhāvādarśanāt kathametasminnimittatvamupādānatvaṃ ca jagatkāryaṃ pratīti ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>।। atha prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p>saṅgatiṃ sūcayannuttarādhikaraṇamavatārayati---<pratika>pūrvamiti । sāmānyena nirūpitamiti</pratika> ।
sāmānyena śrutigatapañcamīmātrasamarpitaṃ matāntaranirākaraṇapurassaraṃ viśiṣya vyavasthāpita-
mupādānatvaṃ jagajjanmāderlakṣaṇasya nirūpakaṃ ghaṭakaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ । anyaniṣṭhasya janmāde-
rupādānopādeyabhāvasambandhenopalakṣaṇatayā brahmalakṣaṇamupādānatvaṃ lakṣye lakṣaṇaghaṭakamiti
bhāvaḥ । nirūpyate aneneti karaṇārthe vyutpannaghañantānnirūpaśabdāttatkarotiṇyantāt
ktapratyaye <quote>‘niṣṭhāyāṃ seṭī’</quote> ti ṇilope ca sati nirūpitaśabdaḥ uktārthe sādhuḥ ।
<pratika>viśeṣataḥ samarthayitumiti</pratika> । kartaiva kevalaṃ parameśvaraḥ । upādānaṃ tu pradhānamiti seśvara-
sāṅkhyamatanirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ brahmaṇa upādānatvaṃ samarthayitumityarthaḥ ।। evaṃ ca yadyapyetada-
dhikaraṇaviṣayavākyāni brahmaṇo jagadubhayavidhakāraṇatvapratipādakāni spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgā-
nyeva । pūrvapakṣe brahmāpratikṣepābhāvāt । tathāpi nirīśvarasāṅkhyanirākaraṇamiti prāsaṅgikī-
pādasaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ । samanantarādhikaraṇasaṅgatistu sarvavijñānapratijñāyāḥ nikhila-
jagadupādānatvasya cākṣeparūpā spaṣṭaiva । prasaṃkta seśvarasāṅkhyanirākaraṇam <pratika>।। sū ।।
prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> nanu brahmaṇaḥ kartṛtvaṃ pūrvavādināpyaṅgīkṛ-
tam । upādānatvaṃ śrutyaiva pratijñādṛṣṭāntābhyāmupapāditam । ato na yuktatvakoṭirunmiṣatī-
tyāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntābhyāmupapādayati---<pratika>sandehaśceti</pratika> । lokadṛṣṭimupapādayanneva pūrvapakṣayati-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p><pratika>sū ।। utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāvādityauḍulomiḥ ।। 22 ।। utkramiṣyataḥ</pratika>=jñānānmokṣamicchato'dhikāriṇaḥ । <pratika>evam</pratika>=
jñānasādhanatayā । <pratika>bhāvāt</pratika>=karmāderapyanuṣṭheyatvāt । mokṣārthajñānasādhanatvena vedena karmādipratipādanaṃ yuktameveti auḍulomirā-
cāryo manyata ityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। avasthiteriti kāśakṛtsnaḥ ।। 23 ।।</pratika> sarvādhāre bhagavati <pratika>karmādīnāmavasthiteḥ</pratika>=avasthānāt । bhagavataḥ
karmādyādhāratvajñānāyādheyabhūtakarmādisvarūpaṃ vedena pratipādyata iti kāśakṛtsnācāryo manyate ityarthaḥ । anekādhikārikatvānma-
tānāṃ na virodha iti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>ityānandatīrthamate samākarṣādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ vākyānvayādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="557"/>
pūrvapakṣastu jagatsṛṣṭau nimittameva, nopādānamiti । kutaḥ । asaṃbhavāt । na hi
ghaṭaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ kulālaḥ svayameva mṛtpiṇḍībhūya ghaṭaṃ karoti । paṭaṃ vā kuvindaḥ ।
yadi kartumīhate, tanna saṃbhavatyeva । ato nimittabhūtasya brahmaṇa upādānatvaṃ na
saṃbhāvyate । niṣprayojanaṃ ca nimittasyaivopādānatvakalpanaṃ, vinā'pi tatkalpanaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>pūrvapakṣastviti</pratika> । nanu loke kulālādīnāṃ ghaṭādikartṝṇāṃ tadupādānatvaṃ mā sma bhūt । teṣāṃ
tadupādānatvagrāhakapramāṇābhāvāt । iha tu jagatkartureva sataḥ parabrahmaṇastadupādānatvamiti
pratijñādṛṣṭāntābhyāmupapādyamānaṃ kimiti tyaktavyam । yadi karturupādānatvaṃ loke na dṛṣṭa-
miti karturupādānasya ca bheda eva dṛṣṭa iti ca tadvyatiricyeta tadā loke katipayakāryakartuḥ
kāryāntarakartṛtvaṃ na dṛṣṭamitī<quote>‘daṃ sarvamasṛjate’</quote>tyādiśrutipratipannaṃ brahmaṇassarvakartṛtvamapi paritya-
ktavyaṃ syāt । ataḥ śrutipratipannatvāviśeṣādalokadṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇassarvakartṛtvamiva sarvopādānatva-
mapyaṅgīkaraṇīyamityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> । kulālasyeva karturbrahmaṇo'pyupādānatvaṃ na
sambhavatyeva । kartṛkarmabhāvavirodhasyāviśeṣāt tataḥ prajāpateḥ svavapotkhanana iva brahmaṇo jaga-
nnimāṇe kartṛtvameva । upādānaśrutayaḥ virodhādaupacārikatayā neyā iti bhāvaḥ । nanu karturu-
/?/dānatve nāsti virodhaḥ । ūrṇanābhau darśanāt । na hi dṛṣṭe'nupapattirnāma । na ca vācyamū-
rṇanābherdeha eva tadupādānaṃ sa tu kevalaṃ tantuṣviti । <quote>‘yathorṇanābhissṛjate gṛhṇate ce’</quote> ti
śruto tantūnsraṣṭurūrṇanābhereva tallayādhāratvapratipādanena pratyakṣasaṃvādinā tadupādānatvasyā-
pi siddheḥ । tallayādhārasya tadupādānatvaniyamāt । evaṃ ca śrutisiddhorṇanābhidṛṣṭāntānusāreṇa
brahmaṇo'pi jagatkarturupādānatvaṃ kalpyate । ūrṇanābhau karturupādānatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti laukika-
vyāptyāpi tatkalpyate । tathā sati chāndogyādi śrutapratijñāśrutīnāmapi mukhyārthaparatvaṃ labhyata
ityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>niṣprayojanaṃ ceti</pratika> । cena nirālambanatvaṃ samuccīyate । ayaṃ bhāvaḥ । brahmaṇa
upādānatvamabhyupagacchatā'pi <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyā’</quote> diti śrutyanusāreṇa pariṇāminyā
māyāyā upādānatvamabhyupagamyate । ato niṣprayojanaṃ brahmaṇo'pyupādānatvakalpanam ।
jagadākāreṇa pariṇamamānāyāṃ māyāyāṃ nirvikāraṃ brahmāpyupādānamiti vaco nirālambanaṃ ca ।
kāryākāreṇa pariṇāmitvaṃ hyupādānatvam । anyathā mṛdi ghaṭākāreṇa pariṇamamānāyāṃ tadākā-
reṇāpariṇamamānaṃ bhūtalamapi tadupādānaṃ kalpyeta । etena tallayādhārasya tadupādānatvaṃ niyata-
mityapi pratyuktam । ghaṭalayādhārasyāpi bhūtalasya tadanupādānatvāt uktaniyamabhaṅge ca na
tantusṛṣṭau karturūrṇanābheścetanasyopādānatvaṃ, kiṃ tu jaḍasya tadīyalālājalasyaiveti karturupā-
dānatvaniyamamāśritya jagatkartustadupādānatvakalpanamapi pratyuktam । ghaṭādikartustadupādāna-
/?/vādarśanena vyabhicārācca । yattu pratijñādṛṣṭāntādimukhyatvānusāreṇa parameśvarasyopā-
dānatvamabhyupagamyata iti tadapi na samyak । brahmajñāne satyapi viyadādīnāṃ mṛtpiṇḍādijñāne
satyapi ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ ca saṃśayaviṣayatvenānubhūyamānānāṃ mukhyadṛṣṭyā jñātatvāsambhavāt
pratijñāvākye <quote>‘aśrutamamatamavijñāta’</quote>miti brahmaśravaṇādiṣu satsvapyaśrutatvādyupanyāsena dṛṣṭānta-
vākye ghaṭaśarāvādivanmṛtpiṇḍāderapi mṛdādeḥ kāryaviśeṣatayā tadupādānasya jñānena ghaṭādīnāṃ
jñātatvopanyāsena ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoramukhyatvasya śrutyaiva sphuṭīkaraṇācca । tadamukhyatvābhyu-
<pb n="558"/>
kāryaniṣpatteḥ, kulālasya mṛtpiṇḍādanyatve'pi ghaṭaniṣvattidarśanāt, tato brahma
nimittameva, na tūpādānamapīti ।।
atrocyate---jagato nimittamupādānaṃ ca brahmaiva । <quote>‘stabdho'syuta tamādaśama-
