pagamastāvanna doṣaḥ । <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtānī’</quote>tyādipañcamī tu kāraṇasāmānyaviṣayā । <quote>‘jani-
kartuḥ prakṛti’</quote> riti <ref>(pā॰ 1.4.30.)</ref> sūtre <quote>‘putrātpramodo jāyate’</quote>ityapi vaiyākaraṇairudāhṛtatvena
prakṛtigrahaṇasya kāraṇasāmānyaparatvāt । tasyopādānaparatvapakṣe'pi sā hetupañcamītyaṅgīkāro
papatteḥ । <quote>‘hetumanuṣyebhyo'nyatarasyāṃ rūpya’</quote>iti <ref>(pā॰ 4.3.81.)</ref> sūtre hetusāmānye'pi pañcamya-
stviti vaiyākaraṇaireva jñāpakasyopanyastatvāt । <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote>ti brahmaṇassrakṣya-
māṇatejaḥprabhṛtirūpeṇa svasya bahubhavanajananaviṣayaḥ saṅkalpastu tejaḥprabhṛtyanupādānatvena tato
bhede'pi svakīyatvaprayuktābhedopacārakṛtaḥ ityanyatra śrutiśailīdarśanenāvasīyate । <quote>‘prajāyemahi
ugraḥ prajābhiḥ agne yanme tanuvā ūnaṃ tanma āpṛṇetyāha yanme prajāyai paśūnāmūnaṃ tanma
āpūrayeti vāvaitadāhe’</quote>tyādimantrārthavādā hi prajāpaśurūpeṇa svasyaiva jananena svasyaiva prajāpa-
śvātmatvaṃ cāvedayanti । na hi tatra śarīrāvayavadvārā kathañcitprajopādānatvakalpane'pi
paśūpādānatvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam । tasmādyathā puruṣasya gavāśvādayaḥ paśava iti teṣāṃ jananaṃ
tadīyajananatvena teṣāṃ vaikalyaṃ taccharīravaikalyatvena ca tatropacaritamitthaṃ paśupateḥ parameśva-
rasya srakṣyamāṇatejaḥprabhṛtyabhimānijīvāḥ paśava iti teṣāṃ jananabahubhāvau tadīyatvenopa-
caritāvityevāvasīyate । <quote>‘sarvo hi rudra’</quote>ityādiśrutiṣu parameśvarasya viśvātmatvapratipādanaṃ
tu vyāpakasya tatratatra sthitvā tattanniyamayataḥ svaniyamyasarvaśarīrakatayā sarvaśabdavācyatvā-
dupapadyate । <quote>‘tadātmānaṃ svayamakurute’</quote> tyeta <quote>‘dyadāyadā hi dharmasya glānirbhavati bhārata । abhyu-
tthānamadharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmyaha’</quote> mitivadupapadyate । <quote>‘dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoni’</quote>-
miti yoniśabdastu parameśvarasya sarvabhūtādhāratvādupapadyate । na hi yoniśabdaḥ upādānani-
yataḥ । <quote>‘yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akārī’</quote>ti sthāne'pi tatprayogadarśanāditi । pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati-
tata iti । sūtragataṃ prakṛtipadaṃ cakāraṃ ca vyācakṣāṇaḥ siddhāntapratijñā darśayati---<pratika>ucyate
nimittamiti</pratika> । <quote>‘pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhā’</quote> diti hetuṃ vivṛṇoti&mdash;<pratika>tamādeśamityādinā</pratika> ।
nanu prādhānyābhiprāyaṃ sarvavijñānapratijñānamaupacārikamityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>brahmaṇa iti</pratika> । brahmaṇo
nimittatvamātre'bhyupagamyamāne tadvijñānena sakalaprapañcavijñānamucyamānamaupacārikaṃ syāt । na
ceṣṭāpattiḥ । śrutisandarbhavirodhāpatteḥ । evaṃ hi tatropākhyāyate । uddālako maharṣiḥ svaputraṃ
śvetaketuṃ svaniyogād‌dvādaśavarṣāṇi gurukule sthitvā sarvānvedānadhītya pratinivṛttaṃ vaiduṣya-
garveṇa stabdhamavinīto'yamaprāptabrahmavidya iti niścitya taṃ vinītaṃ brahmavidaṃ ca kartuṃ <quote>‘yannu
somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ
<pb n="559"/>
tadvijñānena sakalaprapañcavijñānaṃ na saṃbhavati । tathā hi&mdash;kulālajñānena ghaṭādi kāryaṃ
na jñāyate, kiṃtu tadupādānamṛtpiṇḍajñānena । ato nimittasya brahmaṇa upādānatve
tat saṃbhavatīti brahmaivopādānamapi ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
matamavijñātaṃ vijñāta’</quote>miti pṛṣṭvā kathamekena śrutena sarvaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātaṃ syāt kathamidamā-
ścaryamupapadyate ityāśayavatā śvetaketunā punaḥ pṛṣṭo mṛtpiṇḍādidṛṣṭāntaistadupapādya <quote>‘navai nū-
naṃ bhagavantasta etadavediṣuryadyetadavediṣyankathaṃ me nāvakṣya’</quote>nniti <quote>‘bhagavāṃstveva me tadbravī-
tvi’</quote> ti tena punaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tathā <quote>‘somyeti’</quote> pratijñāya <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsī’</quote>dityā-
dyupadideśeti । atra hi pratijñāyā gauṇatve pradhānajñānena sarvamanyadapradhānaṃ
phalato viditaprāyaṃ bhavatītyasyārthasya lokasiddhatvāttadupapattiṃ paśyataḥ <quote>‘kathaṃ nu bhaga-
vassa ādeśa’</quote> iti praśnastaduttaravākye mṛddhaṭādidṛṣṭāntaistadupapādanaṃ cāsamañjasaṃ syāt ।
tasmādyathā tanmukhyaṃ bhavati tathā samarthanīyam । <quote>‘sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīya’</quote>-
mityatra satpadaṃ sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭavastuparam । anyathā brahmātiriktasya jīvavargasyānyasya
kasyacana sattvenāvadhāraṇavirodhāt । tasmātpṛthagbhūtavastvantaravyavacchedakatvena samarthanī-
yatvāt tajjñāne ca tatkāryaṃ sarvamapi jagadviṣayo bhavati । kāryadravyasya kāraṇānanyatvāt ।
tatra sthaulyāpattiḥparaṃ na viṣayībhavati । atastenākāreṇa saṃśayaviṣayatvamaśrutatvādiśravaṇaṃ copa
padyata iti । itthaṃ pratijñāmukhyatvopapādanaprakāramabhipretyaiva bhāṣye hetuvicāravākye cidaci-
dviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ jagaditi viśeṣitam । sthūlacidacitprakārakabrahmātmakaṃ sarvakāryamiti tasyārthaḥ ।
evaṃ pratijñānuparodhāt brahmopādānamabhyupagantavyamityupapādya dṛṣṭāntānuparodhādapi tathābhyu-
pagantavyamityamumaṃśaṃ mṛtpiṇḍasya ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ ca mṛtkāryāntaratvena tasya tadupādānatvābhā-
vāttadupādānatve'pyupādānādupādeyasya bhinnadravyatvena tajjñānino jñātatvāsambhavāttatsambha-
ve'pi ekapiṇḍajñānena sakalamṛṇmayajñānāsambhavāccopādānajñānena tatkāryāṇāṃ jñātatvaviṣa-
yatayā dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ na mukhyamupapādayituṃ śakyam । kiṃtu <quote>‘devadatta evaṃ bhojayitavya’</quote> iti
devadattabhojanavyākhyānānantarametena yajñadattabhojanaṃ vyākhyātamiti avyākhyāte vyākhyā-
tatvavacanavadekaprakārakatvaviṣayatayā gauṇaṃ samarthanīyam । evaṃ ca dārṣṭāntikavacanamapi
gauṇaṃ syādityāśaṅkānivartanenopapādayati&mdash;<pratika>tathā hīti ।</pratika> atra brahmaṇi kevalanimittatve
tajjñānātsakalajñānaṃ na sambhavati kiṃ tūpādānatve satyeveti svapratijñātārthānuguṇatayā
kulālajñānādidṛṣṭāntopanyāse śrutāvapyevameva dṛṣṭānto dārṣṭāntikānuguṇatayā yathā tadupa-
pādako bhavati tathā netavyaḥ । ato dṛṣṭāntasya prakāraikyaviṣayatve dārṣṭāntikasya prādhānya-
viṣayatve coktaprakāreṇa tadupapādakatvāyogāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikāvapyupādānaviṣayāveva yoja-
nīyāviti sūcyate । atrāyamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satya’</quote>mi-
tyasya dṛṣṭāntopapādanārthasya mṛda upādānāttadvikārāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāmananyatvavyavasthāpanārtha-
tvenārambhaṇādhikaraṇe vyākhyāsyamānatvāttadanvayānurodhena dṛṣṭāntastāvadupādānajñānenopāde-
yānāṃ jñātatvaviṣaya eva vaktavyaḥ । na ca mṛdeva ghaṭādīnāmupādānaṃ na tu mṛtpiṇḍaḥ ghaṭādiṣu
mṛdākārasyeva piṇḍākārasyānuvṛttyabhāvāditi vācyam । mṛtpiṇḍa eva ghaṭaḥ kṛta iti vyava-
<pb n="560"/>
ādiśyate anenetyādeśaśabdādādeṣṭṛbhūtaṃ brahmācyate । na tadarthāntaratvamupā-
dānasyeti jñāpayituṃ hetvantaramāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya’</quote> iti nimittabhūtasyekṣituḥ sarvajñasya brahmaṇa eva
vicitrajagadākāreṇa bahubhavanasaṃkalpa upadiśyate।ato nimittādananyadupādānam ।
nanu <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudro maharṣirhiraṇyagarbhaṃ paśyata jāyamānam’</quote> iti viśvo-
ttīrṇa eva parameśvaro nimittabhūtaḥ svavyatiriktaprakṛtau svasaṃkalpena jāyamānaṃ
sakaladeva/?/prathamaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaṃ sṛṣṭamanugrahadṛṣṭyā paśyatīti vijñāyate, kathamasya
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
hārānusāreṇa ghaṭādyupādānatvāt । na copādānagatayāvadākārānuvṛttirupādeye niyatā dadhni
kṣīrasya bhedavat yāvadākārānuvṛttyabhāve'pi laukike <quote>‘ṛṣabhopānahorñya’</quote> iti vyākaraṇa
<ref>(pā॰ 5.1.14.)</ref> sūtre ca śrīrasya dadhni vatsasya ṛṣabhe copādānatvavyavahārāt mṛtpiṇḍagata-
mṛtsvarūpakiñcidākārānuvṛttirghaṭādiṣvastyeva । evaṃ ca <quote>‘sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syā’</quote>dityatra sarva-
śabda ekena mṛtpiṇḍeneti prāggṛhītaikamṛtpiṇḍavikāraghaṭaśarāvādisāmastyaparo yuktaḥ । evaṃ
dṛṣṭāntasya mukhyatvavyavasthitau tadgauṇatvamukhenāpatat dārṣṭāntikasya gauṇatvamapi pratyākhyātaṃ
bhavatīti । nanūktarītyā sautrahetunā brahmaṇa upādānatvasiddhāvapi na sūtra cakārasamuccitanimitta-
tvasiddhirityāśaṃkya <quote>‘yenādeṣṭrā nimittabhūtene’</quote> ti hetuvivaraṇavākyagatayatpadārthaviśeṣaṇasū-
citāttamādeśamiti śrutigatapratijñāvākyagatādeśaśabdena viśeṣyanirdeśāttatsiddhimupapādayan
tasyārthamāha&mdash;<pratika>ādiśyate'neneti</pratika>।ayamādeśaśabdaḥ praśāsitṛparaḥ।<quote>‘ta’</quote>miti sarvanāmno vastuvi-
śeṣasamarpakaviśeṣyapadasāpekṣatvāt । yadyapi kartrarthaghañpratyayo nāsti।<quote>‘akartari ca kārake saṃjñāyā’</quote>
miti <ref>(pā.3.3.19.sū॰)</ref> tadvidhānāt।tathāpyādiśyate praśiṣyate'neneti kartussādhakatamatvavi-
vakṣayā karaṇārthavyutpannaghañanto'yamādeśaśabda iti bhāvaḥ ।। nimittopādānābhede hetvantara-
pareṇottarasūtreṇāpi nirdeśa ādeśaśabdasya nimittaparyavasāyitvajñāpaka ityabhipretyottarasūtra-
mavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>iti jñāpayitumāheti ।। sū ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।। ato nimi-
ttādananyadupādānamiti</pratika> । atrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ । yadyapi mantrārthavādeṣu svāminaḥ svakīyaiḥ paśu-
putrādibhirabhedopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ । tathāpyupādānopādeyabhāvo na tātvikābhedamabhipretya । yadvijñā-
nena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātaṃ tasya prapañcena nirūpaṇārthaṃ pravṛtte mānāntarāgocaraviṣaye <quote>‘tadaikṣata bahu
syāṃ prajāyeye’</quote>ti śravaṇe nopacārakalpanā yuktā । ata īkṣitā jagato nimittaṃ yaḥ parameśvaraḥ
sa eva jagadupādānamiti <quote>‘tadaikṣate’</quote>ti bahubhavanasaṅkalpopadeśātsidhdyati । pratijñātārthaprapañca-
naparavākyasya nimittopādānābhedaparatvavyavasthitau pratijñāvākye'pyupādānatvena varṇyamā-
nasya nimittatvamapyapekṣaṇīyamityādeśaśabdasyādeṣṭṭaparatvamapīta eva siddhyatīti।।uttarasūtravyā-
vartyāṃ śaṅkāṃ darśayati&mdash;<pratika>svavyatirikteti</pratika> । nanu, mantre <quote>‘jāyamāna’</quote>mityetāvadeva śrūyate । na tu
svasminparasminveti viśeṣaḥ śrūyate । kathaṃ svavyatiriktaprakṛtisthāna iti vyākhyātam ।
ucyate । tasminneva mantre viśvādhikatvena varṇyamānasya viśvākāratvaṃ na sambhavati । viśvajī-
vasamaṣṭirūpahiraṇyagarbhopādānatve ca viśvākāratvamavarjanīyam । śrūyate ca śrutyantareṣu māyā
<pb n="561"/>
viśvākāratvaṃ prakṛtirūpatvena saṃbhavati । <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyāt’</quote> iti māyāyāḥ
prakṛtitvaṃ śrūyate । <quote>‘tasmādvirāḍajāyata । virājo adhi pūrūṣaḥ’</quote> iti puruṣasya prakṛ-
titvamāmnāyate । atastayoreva prakṛtitvena jagadākāratvamucitamityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
sākṣāt pratyakṣameva vedāntabhāgeṣu parameśvarasya prakṛtitvena jagadākāratvaṃ
nimittatvena jagatpatitvaṃ ca śrūyate । tathāhi---<quote>‘viśvādhiko rūdraḥ’</quote> ityādinā
yathā viśvādhikatvamavagamyate, tathā <quote>‘sarvo vai rūdraḥ’</quote> ityādinā prakṛtitvādviśva-
rupatvamapi śrūyate । śatarudrīye---<quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhave’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘kuluñcānāṃ
pataye’</quote> ityantena viśvādhipatyaṃ tataśca <quote>‘namaḥ parṇyāya ca prarṇaśadyāya ca’</quote> ityeta-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
purūṣaścetyupādānāntaram । atastasmāt jāyamānatvameva śrutyartha ityabhipretya tathā vyākhyā-
tam । ata eva mantrārthakathane viśvottīrṇatvena viśeṣitaḥ । upādānāntarasadbhāve ca śrutya-
ntarodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam <pratika>।। sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।।25।। prakṛtitveneti</pratika> । nanvantaryā-
myadhikaraṇe cāntaryāmibhāvena jagadākāratvaṃ tata eva <quote>‘sarvo vai rūdra’</quote>ityādiśrutiṣu jagadvāci-
bhiśśabdaiḥ parameśvarasya nirdeśa iti coktam । iha kathaṃ sarvopādānatvena jagadākāratvāditi ।
naiṣa doṣaḥ । ubhayathāpyudāhṛtaśrautanirdeśopapatteḥ anayoḥ prakārayoryaṃ kañcitprakāramādāya
udāhṛtādhikaraṇeṣūdbhāvitaśaṅkāsamādhānasambhavācca । pūrvaṃ tathoktamidānīmitthamucyate । tathā
ca sūkṣmacidacidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara upādānaṃ sthūlacidacidviśiṣṭaḥ kāryamiti kāraṇaśa-
rīre ca viśeṣyabhāvena cetanācetanātmakaprapañcānupraveśo'ntaryāmibhāvena vetyubhayathāpya-
viśiṣṭe parameśvarasya tadanupraveśe prapañcavācināṃ śabdānāṃ nīlādiśabdavadapradhānabhūtavi-
śeṣaṇavācitayāvā devamanuṣyādiśabdavaccharīravācitayā vā parameśvaraparyantatvalābhādubhaya-
thāpi śrutiṣu prapañcavācibhiśśabdaiḥ parameśvarasya nirdeśa upapadyate । yathā kathañcittadupapattau ca
kathaṃ jīvavāciśabdaiḥ parameśvarābhidhānamiti pūrvādhikaraṇaśaṅkāsamādhānaṃ sambhavati । vi-
śvottīrṇasya kathaṃ viśvākāratvamityantaryāmyadhikaraṇe tadadhikaraṇakṛtaśaṅkāsamādhānamapi
viśvāntaryāmitayā viśvopādānatayā vā viśvavācakaśabdānāṃ parameśvare prayogeṇa viśvā-
kāratvāvasāyāllabhyate । viśvottīrṇatvaṃ ca, viśvākāratvasyāpyāmnātasya tyāgāyogāditi ।
na cobhayorvirodhaḥ । jīveṣu tevamanuṣyatvādyākāratvasya devamanuṣyādiśarīrebhyo'dhi-
katvasya ca samāveśāt । heyavastvanupraveśaprayuktadoṣaprasaṅgaśaṅkā tu <quote>‘na sthānato'pī’</quote>tyadhikara-
ṇe sūtrakṛtaiva nirākariṣyate । evaṃ yatrobhayathā śrutyarthasambhavaḥ ubhayathāpi tatratatra
saṅgatiśca tatra kvacidadhikaraṇe kasyacitprakārasyoktiḥ anyatra prakārāntarasya ityeṣā
śailī pūrvamīmāṃsakānāmapi dṛśyate । yathā <quote>‘darśapūrṇamāsayorupastṛṇātyabhighārayati dvirhavi-
ṣo'vadyati caturavattaṃ juhotī’</quote>ti śrūyate । tatra caturavattavākye avattahomavidhiḥ tato'rthaprā-
ptamavadānamanūdya dvyavadānavākye haviṣo dviravadātavyamiti vidhiḥ upastaraṇābhighāraṇadvyava-
dānagatapracayaśabdasaṅkhyānuvādaścaturavattavākye catuśśabda iti dvyavadānavākye dvitvaviśi-
ṣṭahaviravadānavidhiḥ upastaraṇābhighāraṇadvyavadānavidhiprāptaṃ caturavattamanūdya caturavattavākye
<pb n="562"/>
tparyantena jagadākāratvaṃ ca parameśvarasya śrūyate । pradeśāntare ca <quote>‘brahma vanaṃ brahma sa
vṛkṣa āsīt’</quote> <quote>‘brahmādhyatiṣṭhadbha‍uvanāni dhārayan’</quote> ityubhayaśrutiḥ । atharvaśirasi ca
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
homamātravidhiriti vā nātra pakṣadvaye'pi kaścidgauravalāghavakṛto viśeṣo'sti । tatrādyaḥ
prakāraḥ <quote>‘saṃyukte tu prakramāttadantaṃ syā’</quote>diti pañcamādhyāyādhikaraṇe darśitaḥ । dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ
<quote>‘utpattitādarthyāccaturavattaṃ pradhānasye’</quote>ti dāśamikādhikaraṇe darśitaḥ । tatra parasparavirodhamāśa-
ṅkyobhayathāpi śrutyarthasambhavāt ubhayathāpi tattadadhikaraṇapurvapakṣaprāptaśaṅkāsamādhānasambha-
vācca tatra tathaivoktamihaivasuktamiti prapañcitaṃ daśamādhyāyatantraratne । saiva śailī bhāṣyakṛda-
nusṛteti na kaściddoṣaḥ । evamanyatrāpi ekasya śrutivākyasya tatratatra bhinnabhinnārthapradarśane
virodhasamādhānaprakārā unneyāḥ । iha tvevamapi virodhaśaṅkāsamādhānaṃ sambhavati । yathā
bṛhattvamātreṇa pravṛttinimittena parameśvare brahmaśabdasya pravṛttau prakaraṇopapadādisaṅkocakābhāvāt
svarūpato guṇataśva bṛhatvaṃ tasya labhyata iti kvacitparameśvarasya svarūpabṛhattve pramāṇatvenopa-
nyastameva brahmapadamanyatra tasya guṇabṛhattve'pi pramāṇatvenopanyasyate । tathā tasmin pṛthak
prasidhdyā viśeṣaṇabhūtacetanācetanātmakaprapañcāntargatasvasādhāraṇākāreṇa pravṛttinimittena
tasminpravartamānasya <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘prāñco'haṃ pratyañco'ha’</quote>mityāditattadvastuvācakaśabdajā-
tasya tasminpravṛttau saṅkocakābhāvādvākyāntarānusārācca sarvopādānatvena sarvāntaryāmitayā
sarvaśarīratvena ca svāpṛthaksiddhaprapañcākāraviśiṣṭatvaṃ tasya tato labhyata iti prāgantaryāmitayā
sarvākāratāyāṃ pramāṇatvenopanyastamevātra sarvopādānatayā sarvākāratāyāṃ pramāṇatvenopanya-
syata iti na kaścidvirodha iti <quote>‘sākṣāccobhayāmnānā’</quote>ditīdaṃ <ref>(bra॰1.4.25)</ref> sūtraṃ śaṅkādvayapa-
rihārārthatvenāvatāritam । tatra viśvādhikasya kathaṃ viśvākāratvamiti śaṅkā viśvādhikatvavadvi-
śvākāratvasyāpyāmnānādubhayośva virodhābhāvāditi parihṛtā । brahma nimittameva na tūpādānamapi,
māyāpurūṣayārūpādānayoḥ śravaṇāditi śaṅkāsamādhānabalādeva nimittatvavadupādānatvamapi brahma-
ṇo'ṅgīkaraṇīyam । śrutibalānmāyāpuruṣayoriva brahmaṇo'pyupādānatvasambhavādityabhipretya
pariharati---<pratika>brahma vanamiti</pratika> । nimittopādānābhedāṅgīkaraṇāya <quote>‘kim̐ū/?/ svidvanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣaā-
sīta, yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ, manīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchatedutat, yadadhyatiṣṭhadbha‍uvanāni dhāraya’</quote>
nniti mantreṇa śrutireva parameśvareṇa kartrā jagati sraṣṭavye takṣṇā rathe nirmātavye vanādhyakṣa iva
kimupādānāt kutaḥ pradeśādānītaṃ, jagaddhārayitrā ca parameśvareṇa nṛtyaddāruputrikādidhārakeṇa
sūtradhāreṇa sūtramiva kiṃ vādhiṣṭhitamiti praśnamavatārayāmāsa । tatra <quote>‘dyāvāpṛthivī’</quote> ityanena
sarvāṇi bhuvanānyucyante । agre <quote>‘bhuvanāni dhāraya’</quote>nniti śravaṇāt । bhuvanagrahaṇaṃ ca tanubhuvana-
bhogopakaraṇabhoktṝṇāṃ sarveṣāmapyupalakṣaṇam । ekasminneva parameśvare <quote>‘niṣṭatakṣu’</quote>riti chāndasaṃ
bahuvacanam।anantaramantreṇa asya praśnasyottaramucyate<quote>‘brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīt । yato dyāvā-
pṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ । manīṣiṇo manasā vibravīmi vaḥ । brahmādhyatiṣṭhadbha‍uvanāni dhāraya’</quote>nniti । brahmaiva
jagatkartṛbhūtamupādānaṃ tadadhikaraṇaṃ ca । jagaddhāraṇe ca sūtravattadevādiṣṭheyamiti mantrārthaḥ ।
<pratika>atharva/?/śirasīti</pratika> । nanu, prathamaśaṅkāsamādhānārtheyaṃ śrutiḥ prāgevodāhartavyā । ucyate । yathā-
tharvaśirasi prathamadvitīyakhaṇḍayo<quote>‘rbrahmāha’</quote>mityārabhya viśvākāratvaṃ, pañcamakhaṇḍe <quote>‘eko rūdro na
<pb n="563"/>
dvitīyāya tasthe ya imaṃ lokamīśata īśanīyu’</quote>rityādau viśveśvaratvaṃ coktam । tasmādatharva-
śirasi viśvādhikatvaviśvākāratvobhayāmnānaṃ cāstītyetadudāharaṇena śaṅkādvayasyāpi samādhānaṃ
labhyata ityabhipretyātreyaṃ śrutirudāhṛtā।atharvaśiraḥśrutyudāharaṇamānandavallyādīnāmapyupalakṣaṇa-
m।ānandavallyāṃ hi<quote>‘idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiṃce’</quote>ti kartṛtva <quote>‘mātmana ākāśassaṃbhūta’</quote>ityupā-
dānatvaṃ cāmnātam । evamanyatrāpyudāhāryam । yattu’ātmana ākāśa’ityādi pañcamyāḥ
kāraṇasāmānyaṃ viṣayaḥ, janikartṛsūtre prakṛtipadamapi tadviṣayamiti mataṃ tadayuktam । <quote>‘māyāṃ tu
prakṛtiṃ vidyāt’</quote> <quote>‘prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhā’</quote>dityādivedavaidikavyavahāreṣu <quote>‘tadarthaṃ vikṛ-
teḥ prakṛtā’</quote>viti vyākaraṇa<ref>(pā॰5.1.12.)</ref> sūtre ca prakṛtipadasyopādāna eva prayogadarśanāt
kāryābhinne <quote>‘mṛtsvabhāvo ghaṭa’</quote> iti kāryasvabhāvatayā vyavahriyamāṇe copādāne svabhāvaśaktyeva
kāraṇasāmānye tataḥ prayoganirvāhasyāsambhave tadvācitvāṅgīkāre tatra śaktyantarakalpanāpatteḥ ।
klṛptaśaktyā prayoganirvāhasambhave ca śaktyantarakalpanāyogāt । na ca nimittakāraṇamapi
yasya kasyacitsvabhāva iti śaṃkyam । kāraṇe svabhāvavāciśabdaprayogasya kāryaṃ prati svabhāvata
eva nirvāhyatvāt । anyathā ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍaḥ prakṛtirityādivyavahārāsāmañjasyaprasaṅgāt । ata
eva ghaṭasya samavāyikāraṇaṃ mṛtpiṇḍa iti naiyāyikā api ghaṭasamavāyitvena svābhyupaga-
tamṛtpiṇḍameva tasya samavāyikāraṇaṃ vyavaharanti । na tu yatkiñcitsamavāyi daṇḍādikamapi ।
nanu, tathāpi janikartṛsūtre prakṛtipadaṃ kāraṇasāmānyalakṣakaṃ syāditi cenna । atra prakṛtipa-
dena kāraṇasāmānyasyaiva vivakṣitatve <quote>‘dhruvamapāye'pādāna’</quote>miti sūtrādavadhiparasya padasyānuva-
rtamānatayā tenaiva jāyamānaṃ pratyavadhibhūtasya kāraṇasāmānyasya lābhenāsya vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt
<quote>‘kāraka’</quote> ityadhikṛtasya padasya kāraṇasāmānyavācino nirdhāraṇasaptamyantasyānanvayaprasaṅgācca ।
na hi <quote>‘kāraṇānāṃ madhye yadupādānakāraṇa’</quote> mitivat <quote>‘kāraṇānāṃ madhye yatkāraṇa’</quote>mityetadanvitārthaṃ
bhavati । kiṃ ca <quote>‘tata āgata’</quote>ityadhikāre paṭhite <quote>‘hetumanuṣyebhyo'nyatarasyāṃ rūpya’</quote>iti <ref>(pā॰4.
3.81)</ref> sūtre hetuvācibhyo manuṣyavācibhyaśca śabdebhyaḥ <quote>‘tata āgata’</quote>ityarthe rūpyapratyayavidhāyake
hetuvāciśabdebhyaḥ pañcamī na sambhavati । hetorāgamanasya hetuhetumadbhāvarūpatayā tadvivakṣāyāṃ
<quote>‘hetā’</quote>viti <ref>(pā॰2.3.23)</ref> sūtreṇa tṛtīyayā bhāvyatvāt kathaṃ pañcamīti śaṅkāyāṃ yadayaṃ <quote>‘tata
āgata’</quote> iti prathamaklṛptapañcamyantasyārthamāgamahetutvena sūtre viśinaṣṭi । tata eva hetuhetumadbhāve
pañcamyapi bhavatīti jñāpayatīti kāraṇasāmānye pañcamīṃ jñāpakena śābdikāssamarthayāmāsuḥ ।
anye tu <quote>‘vibhāṣā guṇe'striyā’</quote>miti<ref>(pā॰2.3.25)</ref>sūtreṇa guṇavacanaśabdebhyo hetau pañcamyā
vihitatvādiha sūtre hetuśravaṇasya tadviṣayatayā jāḍyādāgataṃ jāḍacarūpyamityetatsūtrodāhāraṇa-
sambhavāt naitajjñāpakaṃ hetau pañcamīsambhave । kiṃ tu <quote>‘vibhāṣā guṇe'striyā’</quote>miti <ref>(pā॰1.3.25.)</ref>
sūtre vibhāṣeti yogavibhāgena aguṇavacanebhyaḥ tatratatra pañcamī dṛśyata ityeva tāṃ samarthayāmāsuḥ।
naivaṃ samarthanīyaṃ syāt । yadi janikartṛsūtre prakṛtipadaṃ kāraṇasāmānyaparaṃ syāt । nanu, mahā-
bhāṣye <quote>‘golomāvilomabhyo dūrvā jāyanta’</quote> iti janikartṛsūtrasyodāharaṇaṃ pradarśya <quote>‘apakrāmanti
tāstebhyaḥ’</quote>ityādinā dūrvodgamāvadhibhūtebhyo golomāvilomabhyaḥ pañcamī <quote>‘dhruvamapāye'pādāna’</quote>
miti <ref>(pā॰1.4.24)</ref> sūtrataḥ sidhdyatīti tatsūtraṃ pratyākhyātam । tathā vyākhyānaṃ tadā ghaṭate ।
yadyudāharaṇe golomāvilomaśabdau dūrvodgamanimittatayā tadadhaḥsthiteṣu tadudgamāvadhibhūteṣu go-
<pb n="564"/>
prathamaṃdvitīyakhaṇḍayorjagaṃdākāratvaṃ, tadupari jagadīśvaratvaṃ ca । tataḥ pratyakṣamubhayāmnā-
nājjagacca/?/ jagadīśvaraśca prakṛtinimittattvena paraṃ brahma parameśvaraḥ śiva iti yuktameva ।।
kiṃca pramāṇāntaramastītyāha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। ātmakṛteḥ ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta’</quote> iti svasyaiva jagadākāratvena kṛtiravagamyate para-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
lomāvilomaikadeśeṣu vartete । tasya dūrvākārapariṇatatadekadeśaparatve hi tathābhūtaikadeśānāṃ dūrvā-
pakramaṇāvadhitvābhāvena sūtrapratyākhyānaṃ na ghaṭate । ato mahābhāṣyachāyayā prakṛtipadaṃ kāra-
ṇasāmānyaparamavasīyata iti cet । ucyate । golomādyekadeśasya dūrvākārapariṇāme tadākārapa-
riṇatatadadhaḥsthitaikadeśasādhāraṇyena golomādimātraṃ tadupādānam।vyavahārānurodhāt।na hi dvi-
traistantubhirārabdhe khaṇḍapaṭe paṭākārabahirdeśasya tantūnāmekadeśasya sadbhāve'pi tantavaḥ paṭopā-
dānamiti na vyavahriyante । kaiyaṭena ca lomādīnāṃ dūrvādyavadhitvamabhyupagamya sūtrapratyākhyānaṃ
lokadṛṣṭyaiva na tu tāntrikamaryādayeti vyācakṣāṇenāsya sūtrasya upādānāviṣayatvamāviṣkṛtam ।
tadyathā&mdash;<quote>‘apakrāmanti tā’</quote> iti prasidhdyāśrayaṇenaitaducyate।lokehi yadyasmājjāyate tattasmānnirga-
cchatītyucyate । tantrāśrayāstu prakriyā bhidyante । vaiśeṣikadarśane <quote>‘paramāṇvādisamavetaṃ kāraṇe-
bhyo'pṛthagdeśaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti nāsti kāryasyāpakrama’</quote> iti । atra hi jāyamānaṃ kāryaṃ
yasmātkāraṇānnirgacchatīti lokadṛṣṭirasti tadevāsya sūtrasya viṣayaḥ na tu daṇḍacakrādisā-
dhāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇamiti lokadṛṣṭipradarśakavākyenāviṣkṛtam । vaiśeṣikamaryādāpradarśakavākyena
tu paramāṇvādisamavetakāryodāharaṇena viśiṣyopādānaviṣayatvamapyāviṣkṛtam । tena yato
dūrvādyadhaḥsthitāt golomādyekadeśāt dūrvādikamapakrāmatīti lokadṛṣṭirasti so'pi tadupā-
dānamiti kaiyaṭasyāpyāśaya unnīyate । syādetat । <quote>‘ātmana ākāśassambhūta’</quote>ityādau mā bhūt
janikartṛsūtrataḥ pañcamī anyato bhaviṣyatīti cet । kutaḥ, vivecanīyam । na tāvat <quote>‘dhruvama-
pāye'pādāna’</quote>miti <ref>(pā॰1.4.24.)</ref> sutrataḥ । sarvatra paripūrṇasya brahmaṇaḥ parṇapatane vṛkṣasyeva prapa-
ñcotpattāvavadhitvāsambhavāt । <quote>‘bhītrārthānā’</quote>mityādisūtrāṇāṃ tu nāstyāśaṅkāvakāśaḥ । hetupa-
ñcamī bhaviṣyatīti cetra । hetau pañcamīvidhānābhāvāt । <quote>‘hetumanuṣyebhya’</quote>iti jñāpakasya
śābdikaireva dūṣitatvāt । tasminsūtre <quote>‘samādāgataṃ samarūpya’</quote>miti vṛttikāradarśitodāharaṇaga-
tapañcamyāḥ upādānaviṣayatvopapatteḥ <quote>‘vibhāṣā guṇe'striyā’</quote>mityādi <ref>(pā॰2.3.25)</ref> sūtre
yogavibhāgenāpi hetau pañcamī na kalpanīyā।upādānapañcamyaiva sarvaprayoganirvāhopapatteḥ । <quote>‘putrātpra-
modo jāyata’</quote>iti kaścitprayogastu nimittakāraṇe upādānatvāropāt bhaviṣyati samananta-
rāpatye gotrarūpādhyāropādiva rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ vyāsaḥ pārāśarya iti gotrāpatyavihitapratya-
yāntavyavahāraḥ । astu vā yathākathañcit hetau pañcamī। tathāpyupapadavibhaktitaḥ kārakavibhakte-
rbalīyastvāt upādānaviṣayaivātra pañcamī grāhyā । tasmādyuktamuktaṃ <quote>‘sākṣāccobhayāmnānā’</quote>diti ।।
pūrvasūtrayoḥ viṣayaiḥ pratijñādṛṣṭāntābhidhyopadeśaiḥ śivasya nimittopādānatvobhayamākṣepataḥ
sidhdyati । <quote>‘brahma vana’</quote>mityādibhistu śrutita evetyabhipretya sākṣāditi viśeṣitam <pratika>।। sū ।।
ātmakṛteḥ ।।26।। tadātmānamiti</pratika> । yadyapyeṣā śrutiḥ pūrvasūtra evodāhartuṃ śakyā, tathā-
<pb n="565"/>
meśvarasya । ataḥ sa evopādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca ।।
nanvajñānavikārāspadaheyaprapañcarūpeṇa prakṛtibhāvena kathaṃ vartate nirastasamasta-
doṣalavakalaṅako nissīmamaṅgalaguṇaratnākaro niraṅkṛśanityasiddhavaibhavaḥ prapañcātītaḥ
paramaśiva ityata āha---
<sutra>।। sū ।। pariṇāmāta ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
nityaśuddhānandasya niratiśayamaṅgalasvabhāvasyāpi nimittasya paramaśivasya ।
prakṛtitvena jagadākāratvaṃ yuktameva, cidacidākāreṇa pariṇāmāt । hanta kāraṇa-
vikārarūpo hi pariṇāmaḥ, pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpattiḥ pariṇāma iti
kathaṃ parameśvaro'narthadharmāt paribhūyata iti cet&mdash;satyaṃ, yathā nimittasya prakṛti-
tve'pi na vikārādisparśaḥ tathā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati । ko'yamapūrvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ?
kutuhalino vayaṃ tacchravaṇe, vivicyatāmiti cet, śṛṇu, vivecayāmaḥ---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pyatispaṣṭārthatayā nirapekṣeti pṛthaksūtritā । ata evātra sūtre nairapekṣyadyotanārthameva caśabdā-
prayogaḥ । yattu <quote>‘tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmyaha’</quote>mityādivadiyaṃ śrutirupapadyata ityuktaṃ tanna । tatrāpi
nimittopādānabhāvasidhdyaviśeṣāt । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ । tatrāvatārarūpeṇa svātmanaḥ svena
sṛṣṭirucyate, iha prapañcarūreṇeti ।। sarvajñasya nirvikārasya niratiśayapurūṣārtharūpasya paramasvatantra-
śivasya kiñcijjñasaṅkocavikāsādivikārasya duḥkhadveṣabhayādikaluṣitaparatantraikasvabhāvajitpra-
pañcarūpeṇa vividhavikārāspadaduḥkhasvabhāvasaṃsārapāśātmakācitprapañcarūpeṇa ca pariṇāmarūpaṃ
jagadupādānatvaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkottaratvenottarasūtramavatārayati&mdash;<pratika>nanviti ।। sū ।। pariṇā-
māt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> nanu pariṇāmāsambhavaśaṅkāyāṃ pariṇāmādityetadeva kathamuttaraṃ syāditi
śaṅkate&mdash;<pratika>hanteti</pratika> । <quote>‘pariṇāmā’</quote>diti sūtrasya nirvikāratvādyavirodhipariṇāmaviśeṣasambhavā-
dityarthamabhipretya pariharati&mdash;<pratika>satyamiti</pratika> । nirvikāratvavirodhi vikāravattvarūpaṃ pariṇāmitvaṃ na
sambhavatīti śaṅkate&mdash;<pratika>ko'yamiti</pratika> । tatsambhavamupapādayituṃ pratijānīte&mdash;<pratika>vivecayāma iti</pratika> ।
ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śānta’</quote>mityādiśrutibhiḥ śivasya nirvikāratvamiva prāgu-
dāhṛtaśrutibhiḥ prapañcopādānatvamapi pratipannam।ubhayamapi yathopapadyate tathopapādanīyam । śakyaṃ
copapādayituṃ svayaṃ sākṣānnirvikāro'pi śivaḥ kiñciddvārā vikāravattvenopādānamiti । tataśca
yathā<quote>‘yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapāla’</quote>ityutpattivākyāvagatapuroḍāśasādhanake yāge sākṣātsādhanabhāvānarhā-
ṇāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ<quote>‘vrīhibhiryajete’</quote>ti śrutaṃ sādhanatvaṃ puroḍāśanirvartanadvāropapādyate, yathā vā guṇābhi-
dhānarūpāyāṃ ṛksādhyāyāṃ stutau gītikriyārūpatayā sākṣātsādhanabhāvānarhāṇāṃ sāmnāṃ <quote>‘ratha-
ntareṇa stuvīte’</quote>ti śrutipratipannaṃ sādhanatvamṛgakṣarābhivyaktidvāropapādyate, yathā vā saṅkhyāyāḥ
kriyāyāṃ dravyavatsākṣātkārakabhāvānarhāyā<quote>‘ścaturo muṣṭīnnirvapatī’</quote>ti śrutaṃ nirvāpakarmatvaṃ
muṣṭidravyāvacchedadvāropapādyate, tathehāpi śrutaṃ śivasya jagadupādānatvaṃ śrutyantarāvagatajagadu-
pādānabhāvaprakṛtipuruṣadvāropapādayituṃ yuktam । na ca vācyaṃ, lakṣaṇamukhena vedānte brahmāvadhāryate
lakṣaṇaṃ tasyopādānatvamityutpattiśiṣṭamupādānatvam।utpattiśiṣṭaṃ tu nānyavdāropapādanīyam।sā-
<pb n="566"/>
<quote>‘yadā tamastanna di/?/vā na rātrirna sanna cāsacchiva eva kevalaḥ । tadakṣaraṃ tat
saviturvareṇyaṃ prajñā ca tasmāt prasṛtā purāṇī ।।’</quote> iti । yasmin kāle vigatacandra-
sūryāditejaskatayā divārātrivibhāgaśūnyaṃ nāmarūpaviśeṣarāhityena sthūlasūkṣmace-
tanācetanasadasadva‍yaktivyavasthārahitaṃ sarvamidaṃ tamobhūtamavartata, tadā śiva
evādvitīyaḥ kevalaḥ svāvibhāgāpannacidacicchaktiḥ svaprakāśaḥ pariśiṣṭo'bhūt ।
tadakṣaraṃ tadeva tadānīṃ kṣararahitaṃ nāśarahitaṃ paraṃ vastu, tat saviturvareṇyaṃ, tat
saviturādityasya pūrvaṃ tejaḥpradatvena vareṇyamantarvarti tejastadapi tadeva । tasmāt
tādṛśāt svavilīnasvetaranikhilacidacitprapañcāt advitīyāt purāṇī nityasiddhā
tatkālatamo'panodinī mahāsphuraṇarūpā paramā prajñā jñānaśaktiḥ prasṛtā prāvartata ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣāttvasyautsargikatvāditi।<quote>‘paśunā yajeta’</quote><quote>‘somena yajete’</quote>tyutpattiśiṣṭayorapi paśusomayorviśasa-
nābhiṣavādivākyānuro/?/dhena hṛdayādidvārā rasadvārā ca haviṣṭvāṅgīkārāt । nanu, bhavatvanyadvārā
karaṇatvādinirvāhaḥ । vyāpāravyavadhānena kāraṇatvākṣateḥ । upādānatvaṃ tvanyadvārā na nirva-
hati tasya sākṣādapṛthaksiddhakāryāvasthāśrayatvam । na cānyadvārā kaścikasyacidāśrayo bhavati
daṇḍāśrayāśrayatve taddvārā tadāśritāśrayatvābhāvāditi cenna । <quote>‘prāsāde śete’</quote> <quote>‘paryaṅke śete’</quote>
ityādilokavyahāre <quote>‘akṣaramambarāntadhṛte’</quote>riti <ref>(bra॰1.3.9)</ref> sūtrakāravyavahāre cānyadvāra-
kāśrayatvānumatāvaikamatyapradarśanāt । na cānyadvārā kāryāvasthāśrayasyopādānatve paṭarūpaṃ
prati tantūnāmupādānatvaprasaṅgo doṣaḥ । iṣṭāpatteḥ । etena yathai<quote>‘ndryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭheta’</quote>itya-
tro<quote>‘pānmantrakaraṇe’</quote>mantrakaraṇake'rthe vartamānādupapūrvāttiṣṭhaterātmanepadavidhānāt pratīyamānasya
mantre dhātvarthaṃ samīpāvasthānaṃ prati karaṇatvasya mukhyasya kathañcidapi nirvoḍhumaśakyatvā-
dabhidhānaśiraskatvaviśeṣitaṃ samīpāvasthānaṃ prati karaṇatvamaupacārikamātmanepadālambanamiti
kalpyate । evaṃ paramparayā kāryāvasthāśrayasya kāryaṃ prati mukhyamupādānatvaṃ sambhavatīti
upādānabhūtaprakṛtyādiviśiṣṭasya mukhyamupādānatvaṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādakaśrutīnāmālambanaṃ
syādityapi śaṅkā nirastā । sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇyenāpṛthaksiddhakāryāvasthāśrayatvamātrasya
lakṣaṇatvasambhavena gauravaparāhatasākṣāttvaviśeṣaṇasyāpraveśāditi । tadevaṃ svato nirvikārasyāpi
śivasya prakṛtidvārā vikārāśrayatvaṃ sambhavatīti tasya jagadupādānatvopapādanaṃ manasi nidhā-
ya śivasya prakṛtidvārā vikārāśrayatvaṃ prakṛtitvenābhimatāyāstadīyacicchakteḥ pariṇāmitve
sambhavettadevāpramāṇakamityāśaṅkānirāsāya tatra śvetāśvataropaniṣadi śrutomantraḥ pramāṇamitya-
bhipretya tanmantraṃ paṭhitvā tadarthamāha&mdash;<pratika>yadā tama iti</pratika> । yadya<quote>‘pyattā carācaragrahaṇā’</quote>dityadhi-
karaṇe pūrvārdhasyārtho varṇitaḥ, tathāpyuttarārdhasyārthaṃ varṇayituṃ so'pyanūditaḥ । asya mantrasyā-
bhiprāyo bhāṣyakārābhimato'smābhirjanmādisūtre prapañcito'nusandheyaḥ । mahāsphurattārūpā
sakalaprapañcānugatāsphuraṇarūpetyarthaḥ । ata eva tatkālatamo'panodinī, tasminkāle pralayāra-
mbhādārabhya suṣuptāviva jīvānāṃ prapañcāsphuraṇarūpaṃ yattamo'nuvṛttaṃ tasyāpanodinītyarthaḥ ।
<pratika>jñānaśaktiḥ prasṛteti</pratika> । pralayadaśāyāṃ śivenāvibhāgāpannatayā sthitā parāśaktirjñānaśakti-
<pb n="567"/>
tataḥ <quote>‘so'kāmayata । bahu syām’</quote> iti nāmarupādivibhāgarahitasūkṣmacidaci-
dvastuśarīrakaḥ kāraṇāvasthaḥ parameśvaraḥ saṃvibhaktanāmarūpacidacidvastuśarīrako
bhaveyamiti saṃkalpamakarot । tataśca <quote>‘idaṃ sarvamasṛjata । yadidaṃ kiṃca’</quote> iti
svaśarīrabhūtaṃ sūkṣmacidacidvastu svasmādvibhajya, <quote>‘tatsṛṣṭvā । tadevānuprāviśat’</quote>
iti svato vibhakte cidacidvastunī svayamātmatayā praviśya <quote>‘sacca tyaccābhavat’</quote>
ityādinā sadasatprapañcarūpeṇa bahudhā pariṇato'bhavaditi puruṣasya bālatvayuvatvā-
divat brahmaṇo jagaccharīriṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ ca ।।
‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyirna/?/ tu maheśvaram । tasyāvayabhūtena vyāptaṃ sarvamidaṃ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rūpeṇa pravṛttetyarthaḥ । anena mantre śakteḥ <quote>‘prasṛtetyu’</quote> ktiḥtasyāḥpariṇāmitve pramāṇamiti darśitaṃ
bhavati । evaṃ śakteḥ pariṇāmitve sambhāvite sati śarīrasya pariṇāmitvāt śarīraviśiṣṭasya
<quote>‘kṛśo'haṃ puṣṭaḥ syā’</quote>miti saṅkalpa iva sūkṣmacidacitprapañcarūpāpannacicchaktiviśiṣṭasya parame-
śvarasya saṃvibhaktanāmarūpacidacitprapañcāpannacicchaktiśarīrako bhaveyamityevaṃbhūtaḥ <quote>‘so'kāma-
yate’</quote>tyādiśrutyuktaḥ bahubhavanasaṅkalpaḥ <quote>‘idaṃ sarvamasṛjate’</quote>tyādiśrutyuktassaṃvibhaktanāmarūpasthū-
laprapañcasargaḥ <quote>‘tasmādve’</quote>tyādiśrutyuktaḥ sṛṣṭaprapañcānupraveśaḥ <quote>‘tadanupraviśye’</quote>tyādiśrutyuktaḥ pravi-
ṣṭacetanācetanaprapañcarūpāpannacicchaktiśarīrakatayā prāgvarṇitarūpaśśivasya bahudhā pariṇāmaḥ pu-
ruṣasya bālatvayuvatvavatprapañcaśarīriṇastasya kāraṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ ca bālayuvapuruṣānanyatvavat prati-
jñādṛṣṭāntasiddhaṃ kāryakāraṇānanyatvaṃ ceti sarvamidamupapadyata ityāha&mdash;<pratika>tatasso'kāmayate-
tyādinā</pratika> । <quote>‘tatsṛṣṭvā tadanuprāviśa’</quote>dityatrānupraveśe sthūlasṛṣṭyanantarabhāvitvaṃ na vivakṣitam ।
vyāpakasya śivasya svāpṛthaksiddhe sūkṣmaprapañce'pi anupraveśasyāviśiṣṭatvāt । kiṃ tu <quote>‘mukhaṃ
vyādāya svapitī’</quote>tyatra vyādānottarakālānuvartamānasvāpābhiprāyeṇeva sṛṣṭyanantarakālānuvarta-
mānānupraveśābhiprāyeṇa ktvāprayogaḥ । tadanantarakālānuvartamānānupraveśānuvādaśca <quote>‘tadanupravi-
śye’</quote>tyādivākyaphalabhūtakāryakāraṇānanyatvopapādanārthaḥ । nanu, sarvamidamupapadyate yadi <quote>‘prajñā
ca tasmā’</quote>diti śrutau pariṇāmitvena prasiddhā śaivī cicchaktiḥ prapañcasya prakṛtirbhavet । tatra
pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam । <quote>‘yacca kiñcijjagatyasmindṛśyate śrūyate'pivā । antarbahiśca tatsarvaṃ vyāpya
nārāyaṇaḥ sthita’</quote>iti nārāyaṇasyāntarbahiśca jagadvyāptiśrutyā jagadupādānatvamavasīyate ।
<quote>‘tasmādvirāḍajāyate’</quote>tyādimantreṣu sākṣācca tasya tadāmnāyate । tadvirodhaśca pariharaṇīyaḥ ।
nārāyaṇasya śivaśaktyaṃśatvāttaddvārā tasyāḥ prapañcaprakṛtitvamiti na virodha iti cet tarhi tatra
pramāṇaṃ vācyamityuktākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatrobhayapramāṇatvamabhipretya śvetāśvataramantraṃ paṭhitvā tasya
tātvaryamāha&mdash;<pratika>māyāṃ tviti</pratika> । vaidikanikhaṇṭau jñānaparyāyeṣu paṭhitena māyāśabdenātra śaivī
cicchaktirabhipreyate । nanu <quote>‘chandāṃsi yajñāḥ kratavo vratāni bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yacca vedā vadanti ।
tasmānmāyi sṛjate viśvametattasmiṃścānyo māyayā sannirūddhaḥ’</quote> ।। iti pūrvasminmantre māyāyā
jīvaṃ prati nirodhakatvarūpaṃ bandhahetutvamuktam । saiva <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyā’</quote>dityatrāpi parā-
mṛśyate sā kathaṃ sarvānugrāhakatvena prasiddhā śaivī cicchaktiḥ syāt । syādeva । jīvānāṃ
jīvatvāpādakasya sakalasaṃsāranidānasya malāvaraṇasyāgrāhakatayā rodhaśaktyākhyasya pāśatva-
<pb n="568"/>
vyapadeśasya śivāgameṣu tasyāṃ prasiddhatvāt । yadāhuḥ <quote>‘tāsāṃ māheśvarī śaktissarvānugrāhikā
param । parānuvartanādeva pāśa ityupacaryate ।।’</quote> iti । ata evājāmantre bhajanīyāyā api
tasyāssvena rūpeṇa hātavyatvamuktaṃ <quote>‘jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo'nya’</quote>iti । kūrma purāṇe ca&mdash;
<quote>‘kaiṣā bhagavatī devī śaṅkarārdhaśarīriṇī । śivā satī haimavatī yadāvadba‍ūhi pṛcchatā’</quote>miti
praśnottaramadhye <quote>‘tasya sarvajagatsūtiḥ śaktirmāyeti viśrutā । tayedaṃ bhrāmayedīśo māyāvī
puruṣottamaḥ । saiṣā māheśvarī śaktissarvākārā sanātanī । saiva rūpaṃ maheśasya sarvadā sampra-
kāśayet । sarvaśaktyātmikā māyā durnivārā duratyayā ।’</quote> ityādivacanajātaṃ dṛśyate । yā
<quote>‘māyayā sanniruddha’</quote>iti pūrvamantre prakṛtā tāṃ māyāmeva prakṛtiṃ prapañcākāreṇa pariṇāminīṃ vidyāt।
parameśvaraṃ māyinameva tathātathā pariṇamamānamāyādhiṣṭhātārameva vidyāt । na tu sākṣātsvayaṃ
pariṇāminamiti pūrvārdhasyārthaḥ । <quote>‘tasmānmāyī sṛjate viśvameta’</quote>diti pūrvamantre pañcamyantapa-
danirdiṣṭamanyadeva prakṛtitvenoktam । kathamasminmantre māyā prakṛtirucyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । <quote>‘ṛco
akṣare parame vyoman, yasmi/?/ndevā adhiviśve niṣeduḥyastanna veda kimṛcā riṣyati ya ittadvidusta
ime samāsata’</quote>iti tataḥ pūrvasminmantre <quote>‘yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoma’</quote>nniti śrutyanta-
reṣu brahmaṇo bhinnatvena prasiddhaṃ paramavyoma prakṛtaṃ <quote>‘tasmā’</quote> ditipadena nirdiśyate । nanu tasya
prakṛtitve kathamajāmantrādiṣu śivaśakteḥ prakṛtitvamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ <quote>‘māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyā’</quote>
dityuktam । yā pūrvamuktā paramavyomaśabditā prakṛtiḥ tāṃ māyāṃ śivaśaktimeva vidyāt na tu
tato'nyatparamavyometi na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ । māyāyāḥ prakṛtitve'pi<quote>‘ātmana ākāśa-
ssabhbhūta’</quote> ityādiśrutiṣu brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtivyavahāreṇa virodha ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tasya prakṛtitvaṃ māyā-
dvārakaṃ śrutyantareṣūktaṃ na tu sākṣādityabhiprāyeṇa <quote>‘māyinaṃ tu maheśvara’</quote>miti śivasya māyā-
dhiṣṭhātṛtvamuktam । evaṃ śivaparamavyomamāyāprakṛtitvavyavahārāvirodhe'pi <quote>‘antarbahiśva
tatsarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthita’</quote>ityādiśrutyantare nārāyaṇasya prakṛtitvavyavahāreṇa viro-
dho'stītyāśaṅkāyāmuttarārdham । yena nārāyaṇena sarvamidaṃ jagadvyāptamiti śrutyantare
prasiddhaṃ tena māyāśabditaparamavyomāṃśabhūtenaivaitadvyāptaṃ na tu svatantreṇeti tasyārthaḥ ।
evamuttarārdhaṃ <quote>‘yena nārāyaṇena vyāptaṃ jaga’</quote>diti śrutyantare prasiddhaṃ tamanūdya tasya paramavyo-
māṃśatvavidhāyakaṃ na tu paramavyomāṃśamanūdya tasya jagatprakṛtitvavidhāyakam । tadaṃśasya kasya-
cit jagadupādānatve yogyasyānuvādārhasya kasyacidabhāvāt । nāpi tadavayavasya tadīyaja-
gadvyāpakatvasya ca vidhāyakam । vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । ato mantro'yamubhayatrāpyuktārthe pramāṇaṃ
bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ । evaṃ nārāyaṇasya śivaśaktyaṃśatve <quote>‘mama yonirapsvantassamudra’</quote>ityāmbhraṇī-
sūktavacanamapi pramāṇam । svāṃśabhūtasya nārāyaṇasya samudraḥ yoniḥ sthānamityevaṃparatāyāṃ hi
mama yoniriti vacanaṃ samañcasaṃ bhavati । idaṃ ca nārāyaṇasya śivaśaktyaṃśatvaṃ harivaṃśe pāri-
jātasaṃhitāyāṃ pārijātaprārthanārthaṃ bhagavatā nisṛṣṭārthadūtatayendraṃ prati preṣitena nāradena nānā-
vidhopāyaiḥ prārthita indraḥ yadā pārijātaṃ na dātumaicchattadā <quote>‘ya eko viśvamadhyāste pradhānaṃ
jagato haraḥ । prakṛtyā yaṃ paraṃ sarve kṣetrajñaṃ vai vidurbudhāḥ । tasyāvyaktasya yo vyakto bhāgaḥ sa
ca savodbhavaḥ । tasyātmā prathamo devo viṣṇussarvatra dhīmataḥ । prakṛtyāḥ prathamo bhāga umā
<pb n="569"/>
devīra śāśvatī । vyaktassarvamayo viṣṇuḥ strīsaṃjño lokabhāvanaḥ । rukmiṇyādyāḥ striyastasya
vyaktatve prathamo guṇaḥ । avyaktā prakṛtirdevī guṇī devī maheśvaraḥ । na viśeṣo'sti rudrasya
viṣṇoścāmarasattama । guṇinaścāvyavāyācca sādaraḥ prabhṛto guṇaḥ । nārāyaṇo mahātejāḥsarvakṛ-
llokabhāvanaḥ । bhoktā maheśvaro devaḥ kartā viṣṇuradhokṣajaḥ । brahmā devagaṇāścānye paścātsṛṣṭā
mahātmanā । mahādevena deveśāḥ prajāpatigaṇāstathā । evaṃ purāṇapuruṣo viṣṇurvedeṣu paṭhyate ।
acintyaścāprameyaśca guṇebhyaśca parastathā ।।’</quote> iti bhagavadvākyasyāvaśyaparipālanīyatvopadeśa-
nārthe tasya mahimātiśayaṃ darśayatā nāradenāviṣkṛtam । tatra hi <quote>‘ya eka’</quote>iti ślokena śivaṃ
prakṛtya <quote>‘tasyāvyaktasye’</quote>ti ślokārdhe <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmā’</quote>diti śrutisiddhaṃ tataścicchaktyunmeṣaṃ pura-
skṛtya <quote>‘tasyātme’</quote>ti taduttarārdhena viṣṇościcchaktayaṃśatvamuktam । evaṃ <quote>‘prakṛtyāḥ prathamo bhāga’</quote>
iti ślokenāpi, śrutam । tatra <quote>‘strīsaṃjña’</quote> ityasya viṣṇurumārūpatayā strītvena samyakpu-
rāṇādibhirjñāyata ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘ghañarthe kavidhānaṃ kartavya’</quote> miti ghañarthe karmaṇi pratyayaḥ ।
idaṃ viṣṇorumāṃśatayā tadrūpatvaṃ śrīkūrmapurāṇe <quote>‘kaiṣā bhagavatī devī śaṅkarārdhaśarīriṇī ।
śivā satī haimavatī yathāvadbrūhi pṛcchatā’</quote>miti ṛṣīṇāṃ praśnamavatārya <quote>‘teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ
śrutvā ṛṣīṇāṃ puruṣottamaḥ । pratyuvāca mahāyogī dhyātvā svaṃ paramaṃ pada’</quote>miti śloke tadānī-
mupadeśyatvenaucityāddhyānaviṣayatayā prāptāyāmumāyāṃ <quote>‘svaṃ paramaṃ pada’</quote> miti viśeṣaṇenā-
viṣkṛtam । tatraiva kṛṣṇatapaścaryānantaraṃ śivena saha pratyakṣībhūtāyā umāyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prati
<quote>‘vatsa jāne tavānantāṃ niścalāṃ sarvadācyuta । ananyāmīśvare bhaktimātmanyapi ca keśava ।
tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇassākṣātsarvātmā puruṣottamaḥ । prārthito daivataiḥ pūrvaṃ sañ‍jāto devakīsutaḥ ।
paśya tvamātmanātmānamamalaṃ paramaṃ padam । nāvayorvidyate bheda aikyaṃ paśyanti sūrayaḥ ।।’</quote> iti
vacanenāpi sphuṭīkṛtam । evamādityapurāṇādiṣvapi vacanānyudāhartavyāni । evaṃ strītvena
purāṇādiprasiddhasya kathaṃ rukmiṇyādyāḥ striya ityāśaṅkāparihārāya <quote>‘rukmiṇyādyā’</quote>ityardhe
śivaśaktirūpatayā strītve'pi tasya puruṣarūpeṇa vyaktatve sati rukmiṇyādyāḥ striya ityeta-
dupapannamiti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘prathamo guṇa’</quote> iti tāsāṃ pradhānamahiṣītvena tadarthaṃ pārijātapradānasyā-
vaśyakatvajñāpanāya prakṛtopayogitayoktam । <quote>‘avyaktā prakṛti’</quote>riti ślokena śaktiśivayorguṇa-
guṇibhāvenāviśeṣaṃ pradarśya śaktyaṃśatvādviṣṇorapi śivānnāsti viśeṣa iti samarthitam ।
etadabhiprāyeṇaiva śrīkūrmapurāṇe devakanyāḥ prati śivavacanam---<quote>‘māmeva keśavaṃ devamāhurdevī-
mathāmbikām । eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca kāraṇaṃ kāryameva ca । kartā kārayitā viṣṇurbhuktimu-
muktiphalapradaḥ । bhoktā pumānaprameyaḥ saṃhartā kālarūpabhṛt । sraṣṭā pātā vāsudevo viśvātmā
viśvatomukhaḥ । kūṭastho hyakṣaro vyāpī yogī nārāyaṇāhvayaḥ । tārakaḥ puruṣo hyātmā kevalaṃ
paramaṃ padam । saiṣā māheśvarī gaurī mama śaktirnirañjanā । śāntā satyā sadānandā paraṃ padamiti
śrutiḥ । asyāssarvamidaṃ jātamatraiva layameṣyati । eṣaiva sarvabhūtānāṃ gatīnāmuttamā gatiḥ । tayāhaṃ
saṅgato devyāḥkevalo niṣkalaḥ paraḥ । paśyāmyaśeṣamevedaṃ yastadveda sa mucyate । tasmādanādimadhyāntaṃ
viṣṇumātmānamīśvaram । evamekaṃ vijānīdhvaṃ tato yāsyatha nirvṛti’</quote>miti । evaṃ śivaśaktyaṃ-
śatvena nārāyaṇasya tadubhayaguṇatvaṃ rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādisvaśaktisahitasyaiva na tu kevalasyeti
<pb n="570"/>
jagat ।।’ iti śravaṇānmāyāyāḥ sakalaprakṛtitvaṃ, tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ maheśvarasya tadavaya-
vabhūtenāṃśabhūtena tadīyacicchaktiśakalena bhoktṛtvadaśāyāṃ puruṣasaṃjñakena sakalaja-
gadvyāptiścāvagamyate । yathā kevalāccharīrāllomanakhādyatpattirna saṃbhavati ātmanaśca
tathā na kevalaṃ māyāyā jagadutpattiḥ maheśvarācca kiṃtu martyāccharīriṇaḥ keśanakhādyu-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
prakṛtopayogyartho <quote>‘guṇinaśce’</quote>ti ślokena darśitaḥ । <quote>‘bhoktā maheśvaro deva’</quote> iti ślokena
saṃhārapālanasṛṣṭyadhikṛtānāṃ guṇamūrtīnāmindrādīnāṃ ca sṛṣṭeḥ prāgeva cicchaktyaṃśabhūtādinārā-
yaṇonmeṣapradarśanena tasya sarvottaratvamāviṣkṛtam । uktasya sarvasyāpyarthasya vedamūlatayā śraddhe-
yatvameva <quote>‘purāṇapuruṣa’</quote> iti ślokena darśitam । <quote>‘tadīyacicchaktiśakalene’</quote>tyanena <quote>‘viśvottarotta-
ravicitramanorathasya yasyaikaśaktiśakale sakalaḥ samāpta’</quote> iti purāṇavacanārthaḥ smāritaḥ । <pratika>bhoktṛ-
tvadaśāyāṃ puruṣasaṃjñakeneti</pratika> । ayamartho bhaṭṭabhāskarācāryairapi taittirīyāraṇyakabhāṣye āna-
ndavallīvivaraṇopakrame darśitaḥ । tatra hi<quote>‘atreyamaupaniṣadasthiti’</quote>rityupakramya <quote>‘brahmaikaṃ nityaṃ svapra-
kāśaṃ vicitrānantaśaktikaṃ svatantraikasvabhāvaṃ sve mahimni sadā mahīyamānaṃ prakṛtiścopādānaṃ
ca viśvasya bhavati, nimittaṃ ca bhūtvā viśvamadhitiṣṭhatī’</quote>tyādinā śivaṃ nirūpya tatraiva prakṛti-
ścidacidātmakaprapañcatvena pariṇamate saiṣā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prabhāsthānīyeti tadīyacicchakti-
svarūpanirūpaṇamupakramya <quote>‘tatra sarve'pyātmānaḥ prabhavantī’</quote>ti sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ prabhāśālitva-
sya tādadhīnyamuktam । atassa paramātmā sarvātmaprabhāsamaṣṭiriti sarvātmaprabhāsamaṣṭirūpatayā
tasyāḥ paramātśabdanirdeśyatāmabhidhāya tasyāśśivāpṛthagbhāve <quote>‘agnerauṣṇyaṃ yathā yadvadā-
dityasya prabhā tathā । paramātmā śivādanyo nāstīti munayo vidu’</quote>riti prācīnaślokamudāhṛtya
<quote>‘saiva bhoktṛtvaśarīre’</quote>tyabhidhānāt puruṣo bhavatītyuktam । tatra ca tasya bhoktṛtvaṃ svopādā-
najaturmukhādiprapañcādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ vivakṣitam । tasminneva bhāṣye <quote>‘yasminnidaṃ saṃcavicaikaṃ sa otaḥ
protaśca vibhuḥ prajā’</quote>sviti mantragatotaprotaśabdayoḥ<quote>‘otaḥ kāraṇatvena santataḥ, proto'dhiṣṭhātṛ-
tvena bhoktṛtvaparyāyeṇa tasminnavikāreṇa santata’</quote> iti vyākhyānasamaye bhoktṛtvamadhiṣṭhātṛtva-
miti darśitatvāt । tataśca<quote>‘bhoktṛtvadaśāyāṃ puruṣasaṃjñakene’</quote>tyanena brahmādisakalacidacitprapañcā-
dhiṣṭhātṛtvarūpasvātantryanimittā nārāyaṇasya puruṣasaṃjñetyuktaṃ bhavati । etadabhiprāyeṇaivoktaṃ
nārasiṃhapurāṇe <quote>‘sadaiva vāsudevo'yaṃ sākṣātpuruṣa ucyate । strīprāyamitaratsarvaṃ jagadbrahmapura-
ssara’</quote>miti । <pratika>sakalajagadvyāptiśceti</pratika> । nanūdāhṛtamantreṇa maheśvarasya muktau jīvasya svaprabhā-
dvareva nārāyaṇadvārā sakalajagadvyāptirnāvagamyate kiṃ tu nārāyaṇasyaiva । <quote>‘tadavayavabhūte’</quote>neti hi
kartari tṛtīyā । satyam । tathāpi nārāyaṇasya maheśvaraśaktyavayavatvoktisāmarthyāttadīyā
vyāptiravayavadvārā śivasyaiva । yathā devadattāvayavabhūtahastakartṛkaḥ sparśo'vayavadvārā devadatta-
syaiva bhavatīti śrutestātparyamavagamyata ityabhipretya tathā vyākhyātam । iyāṃstu bhedaḥ ।
jīvasya muktau prabhayaiva jagadvyāptiśśivasya tu svarūpeṇa prabhayā tadaṃśabhūtena nārāyaṇena ceti ।
syādetat । cicchakteḥ pariṇāmitvaṃ ‘prajñā ca <quote>‘tasmā’</quote>diti śrutyā jagadupādānatvaṃ <quote>‘māyāṃ tvi’</quote>-
ti śrutyā cāvagamyate । tato'syā evopādānatvamastu kimapariṇāmisvabhāvasya śivasyāpi
pāribhāṣikopādānatvāśrayaṇenetyāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>yatheti</pratika> । śarīrātmanoḥ pariṇāmyapariṇāmisva-
<pb n="571"/>
tpattivat māyinaḥ parameśvarāt sakalacetanācetanaprakṛtiḥ puruṣo'bhivyakto
bhavati । tadrūpādīśvarādavyaktacaturmukhādyutpattiḥ । tathā ca śrutirīśvarasya puruṣa-
rūpatvamabhidhatte <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudraḥ’</quote> iti । tataḥ samucitaṃ cidacidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ
kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca tattadavasthāviśeṣāditi ।।
<sutra>।। sū ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
sākṣātparameśvara eva bhūtayonirityucyate । <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilo-
canaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam । dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ
parastāt ।।’</quote> iti samastasākṣiṇaḥ sarvajñasya tamasaḥ parasya viśvottīrṇasya parama-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhāvatve'pi kevalasya śarīrasya lomanakhādyupādānatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu sātmakasyaiva yathā, evaṃ
pariṇāminyā api kevalāyāścicchakterna jagadupādānatvaṃ kiṃ tu śivāśritāyā eva । ata-
śśarīraviśiṣṭasyātmano'pi keśanakhādāviva māyāviśiṣṭasya śivasyāpi jagadupādānatvaṃ
na pāribhāṣikaṃ kiṃ tu <quote>‘yathā sataḥ puruṣāt keśalomāni tathākṣarātsambhavatīha viśva’</quote>miti
sayuktikaśrutisiddhamiti bhāvaḥ । dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikavākyayorātmanaḥ maheśvarācceti kevalātmanaḥ
kevalamaheśvarācca kāryotpattyasambhavapradarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham । nanu śarīraviśiṣṭādātmanaḥ keśanakhā-
deriva māyāviśiṣṭānmaheśvarājjagata utpattirityaṅgīkāre tatraivopādānatvaviśrāntiḥ syāt
kathaṃ puruṣasyāpyupādānakoṭipraveśa ityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>māyina iti</pratika> । tathā ca sarvādyakāle pratha-
monmiṣitāyāścicchaktessakāśādabhivyakte puruṣe taccharīrātparameśvarādavyaktacaturmukhādyutpa-
ttiriti yuktamasyāpyupādānakoṭipraveśa iti bhāvaḥ । yadyaṃpyavyaktaṃ sūkṣmarūpeṇa pralaye'pyasti
tathāpi yathā caturmukhasya jñānavikāsavattvena śarīraviśiṣṭatvena ca puruṣādutpattiḥ evamavya-
ktasyāpi <quote>‘mama yonirmahadbrahma tasmingarbhaṃ dadhāmyaha’</quote>mityādivacanoktarītyā kāryaunmukhyaviśi-
ṣṭarūpeṇa tata utpattirastītyabhipretyāvyaktagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam । parameśvarasya puruṣaśarīrakatve śruti-
mudāharati&mdash;<pratika>tatheti</pratika> । <quote>‘puruṣo vai rudra’</quote> iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ puruṣaśarīrakatvābhiprāyamiti
bhāvaḥ । tasmānnirvikārasyāpi parameśvarasya jagadupādānatvaṃ sarvavijñānopapādakaṃ svayamevo-
pādānatvaṃ copapannamityupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>tata iti ।। sū ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 28 ।।</pratika> syāde-
tat । cicchaktyavasthāviśeṣarūpasya puruṣasya jagadupādānatvāṅgīkāre pratijñādṛṣṭāntābhidhyopa-
deśasākṣādubhayāmnānātmakṛtayastadviṣayatayā cicchaktiviṣayatayā vā prāmāṇyaṃ labhante । pari-
ṇāmahetuśca sāmañjasyaṃ labhate । nirvikārasākṣirūpatayā śrutiśatapratipannasya paramaśivasya jaga-
dupādānatāyāṃ naitāni pramāṇāni bhavitumarhantītyāśaṅkāṃ manasi dhārayannirākaraṇārthatvenedaṃ
sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe&mdash;<pratika>sākṣāditi ।</pratika> <quote>‘umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam ।
dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt ।’</quote> iti kaivalyopaniṣadi sama-
stasākṣitvatamaḥparatvaliṅgābhyāṃ <quote>‘sa brahmā sa śivassendrasso'kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāṭ’</quote> <quote>‘sa eva
viṣṇuḥ sa prāṇaḥ sa kālo'gnissa candramāḥ । sa eva sarvaṃ yadbha‍ūtaṃ yacca bhavyaṃ sanātanam ।
jñātvā yaṃ mṛtyumatyeti nānyaḥ panthā bimuktaye’</quote> iti tadvākyaśeṣe sakalaprapañcaśeṣitatvamokṣo-
pāyasākṣātkaraṇīyatvaliṅgābhyāṃ cāvagamite sākṣātparabrahmaṇi paramaśiva eva sakalakāryopā-
<pb n="572"/>
śaktyā ubhayā sahitasya viśiṣṭasya parameśvarasyaiva bhūtayonitvaṃ bhūtaprakṛtitvaṃ ca
gīyate । tataścopādānamapi nimittaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva ।।
<head>iti prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dānatvavācibhūtayoniśabdo dṛśyate । atastasyopādānatvābhyupagama āvaśyaka iti nopā-
dānatvaprāpakāṇāṃ parabrahmaparaśrutyantarāṇāmanyatra nayanakleśassamāśrayaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ । adhi-
karaṇamupasaṃharati&mdash;<pratika>tataśceti ।</pratika> yannimittaṃ paraṃ brahma tadevopādānamapītyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। iti prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ । prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt
।। 25 ।। ātmakṛteḥ ।। 26 ।। pariṇāmāt ।। 27 ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>kartā hi jagata īśo nopādānamapi tattathādṛṣṭeḥ । māyāyāḥ puruṣasya ca jaḍacidupādānatāśruteścāpi ।। 82 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>maivaṃ kartā śivo'sya prakṛtirapi mitaḥ kiṃ tu māyāviśiṣṭo dehāśliṣṭo yathātmā nakhacikuratatestatra sṛṣṭikramo'yam ।</l>
<l>śaktistasmādvibhaktā bhavati hi puruṣo yassahastrākṣimūrdhā tādrūpyeṇaiva śambhussakalajagadupādānabhāvaṃ bibhartti ।। 83 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>māyāṃ tvityeṣa mantraḥ khalu tadavayavavyāptamākhyāti viśvaṃ kaṃ vā nārāyaṇānyaṃ tadavayavamiha vyāpakaṃ kalpayāmaḥ ।
tasya hyantarbahiśca sthitimidamakhilaṃ vyāpya vastvāmanāmastasmāttadrūpamāyāprakṛti jagadidaṃ sarvavākyānurodhāt ।। 84 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।। sākṣāccobhayā
mnānāt ।। 25 ।। ātmakṛteḥ pariṇāmāt ।। 26 ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ dvitīyādhikaraṇe <quote>‘janmādyasya yataḥ’</quote> iti lakṣitaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛ-
titve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityatastannirṇayāyedamārabhyate---<pratika>sū ।। prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparo-
dhāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yato vā imānī’</quote> syādikaṃ janmādyadhikaraṇaviṣayavākyamevāsyādhikaraṇasya viṣayavākyamiti vodhyam ।
jagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva uta upādānatvanimittatvobhayarūpeṇāpi iti saṃśayaḥ । īkṣāpūrvakakartṛtvaśra-
vaṇāt īśvaratvaprasiddheḥ loke kāryakāraṇayossārūpyadarśanācca jagato nimittakāraṇameva syādbrahmeti pūrvapakṣaḥ । ekavi-
jñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāyāḥ mṛtpiṇḍādidṛṣṭāntopanyāsasya ca bādhābhāvāya brahma upādānakāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca bhava-
tītyabhyupagantavyam । ataḥ adhiṣṭhātrantarābhāvānnimittakāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇa upādānāntarābhāvācca upādānatvamityubhayakāraṇatvaṃ
brahmaṇaḥ siddhamiti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>sūtrārthastu</pratika>, brahma <pratika>prakṛtiśca</pratika>=upādānakāraṇaṃ ca । cakārānnimittakāraṇaṃ ca । kutaḥ ।
<pratika>pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt</pratika>=prativedāntaṃ śrūyamāṇāyāssarvavijñānapratijñāyāḥ mṛtpiṇḍādidṛṣṭāntavākyānāṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ upā-
dānatvānabhyupagame bādhasaṃbhavāduparodhastayorāpatet । tadabhyupagame tu pratijñādṛṣṭāntānavupapadyete । adhiṣṭhātrantarābhāvo'pi tayo-
ranuparodhādevābhihito bhavati । ataḥ upādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca jagato brahmeti siddham ।।</p>
<p>kutaśca kartṛtvaprakṛtitve brahmaṇa ityāha&mdash;<pratika>sū ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘so'kāmayata bahu syā’</quote>miti <quote>‘tadaikṣata
bahu syā’</quote> miti ca bahubhavanābhidhyānapūrvikāyāḥ svātantryapravṛtterupadeśācca kartṛtvaprakṛtitve brahmaṇassidhdyataḥ ।।</p>
<p>prakṛtitvasya hetvantaramāha&mdash;<pratika>sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘sarvāṇi havā imāni bhūtanyākāśādeva samutpadyaṃte ।
ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti’</quote> iti sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇam <quote>‘ākāśādeva’</quote> ityupādāya prabhavapralayayorāmnānāt brahmopādānamityarthaḥ
loke hi yadyasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānamiti prasiddham ।।</p>
<p>itaśca prakṛtirbrahmetyāha&mdash;<pratika>sū ।। ātmakṛteḥ pariṇāmāt ।। 26 ।। ātmakṛteḥ</pratika>=<quote>‘tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta’</quote> ityatra
<quote>‘ātmāna’</quote> miti karmatvasya <quote>‘svayamakurute’</quote>ti nimittāntarānapekṣasvakartṛṃtvasya ca śravaṇāt । <pratika>pariṇāmāt</pratika>=pūrvasiddhasyāpi
<pb n="573"/>
kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya sata ātmanaḥ vikārātmanā pariṇamanāt ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘pariṇāmā’</quote>diti vā pṛthaksūtram । brahmaṇa eva vikā-
rātmanā pariṇāmasya śravaṇāt iti tasyārthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaśca prakṛtirbrahmetyāha&mdash;<pratika>yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 27 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim’</quote> <quote>‘yadbha‍ūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ’</quote>
ityādivākyeṣu prakṛtivacanatayā loke samadhigamyamānena yoniśabdena brahmaṇo'bhidhīyamānatvādityarthaḥ । īkṣāpūrvakakartṛtvasya
nimittakāraṇamātrāśrayatāniyamasya lokasiddhatve'pi lokavilakṣaṇe śabdagamye'rthe tasya niyamasya nāvakāśa iti siddham ।।</p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate</pratika>, pūrvaṃ janmādyadhikaraṇe <quote>‘yato vā imāni bhūtānī’</quote>ti pañcamīśrutyudāharaṇena sāmānyena nirūpitaṃ parameśvarasya
jagadupādānatvaṃ viśeṣatassamarthayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate---<pratika>sū ।। prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika>
<quote>‘tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘dyāvābhūmī janayandeva ekaḥ’</quote> ityādivākyānyasya viṣayaḥ । eteṣu prasiddha-
mubhayakāraṇatvaṃ yuktaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ । brahma jagatsṛṣṭau nimittameva nopādānamapi । kutaḥ । nimittasya kulālāderupādā-
natvāsaṃbhavāt iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । ekavijñānapratijñāyāḥ tadupapādakamṛtpiṇḍadṛṣṭāntasya cānurodhāt brahma jagato nimi-
ttamupādānaṃ ca bhavatītyubhayakāraṇatvaṃ yuktameveti siddhāntaḥ ।</p>
<p>itaśca nimittādananyadupādānamityāha---<pratika>abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 24 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadekṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya’</quote>iti nimittabhūtasye-
kṣitussarvajñasya brahmaṇa eva vicitrajagadākāreṇa bahubhavanasaṃkalpasyopadiśyamānatvācca nimittādananyadupādānamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaśca brahmaṇa ubhayakāraṇatvaṃ sidhdyatītyāha---<pratika>sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।। 25 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘viśvādhiko rudraḥ’</quote> <quote>‘sarvo vai rudraḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhave’</quote> <quote>‘kuluñcānāṃ pataye namaḥ’</quote> <quote>‘namaḥ parṇyāya ca parṇaśadyāya ca’</quote> <quote>‘brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīt, brahmādhyati-
ṣṭhadbha‍uvanāni dhārayan’</quote> ityādiṣu vedāntabhāgeṣu pratyakṣameva parameśvarasya prakṛtitvena jagadākāratvasya nimittatvena jagadutpādakatvasya
cābhidhānāt jagacca jagadīśvaraśca parameśvara evetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p>pramāṇāntaramapyastītyāha---<pratika>sū ।। ātmakṛteḥ ।। 26 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘tadātmānaṃ svayakurute’</quote>ti svasyaiva jagadākāratvena karaṇa
syāvagamyamānatvādbrahmaivopādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca ।।</p>
<p>nityaśuddhānandasya parameśvarasya heyaprapañcarūpeṇa jagadākāratvaṃ kathamupapadyata ityāha---<pratika>sū ।। pariṇāmāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika>
cidacidākāreṇa nirvikāratvādyavirodhipariṇāmaviśeṣasaṃbhavāt ityarthaḥ । svayaṃ sākṣānnirvikāro'pi śivaḥ prakṛtidvārā vikāra-
vattvenopādānamapi bhavati । tataścidacidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ tattadavasthāviśeṣāt kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca bhavatīti nāsti tadanu-
papattiriti bhāvaḥ । vistarastu śivārkamaṇidīpikāyāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ ।।</p>
<p>itaścobhayakāraṇatvaṃ yuktamityāha---<pratika>sū ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 28 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘umāsahāya’</quote> mityārabhya <quote>‘bhūtayoniṃ samasta-
sākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt’</quote> iti samastasākṣiṇassarvajñasya tamasaḥparasya paraśaktyumāsahāyasya parameśvarasyaiva bhūtayonitvaṃ bhūtaprakṛtitvaṃ ca
gīyate । tata upādānamapi nimittaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, evamatītādhikaraṇatrayeṇa nirīśvarasāṃkhye niraste seśvarasāṃkhyaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate tannirākaraṇārthamāha---</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> ‘brahma kiṃ jagato nimittakāraṇamātramutopādānamapīti
saṃśayaḥ । brahma nimittakāraṇameva nopādānam upādānaṃ tu tadadhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānameveti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntanirūpaṇādikaṃ
prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamatavadeveti na pṛthakprapañcate । sūtrārthaśca prāyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhamamatādaviśiṣṭaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।।</pratika> iti sūtrārthavarṇane <quote>‘brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣaṃ’</quote>ityādinā ubhayaṃ brahmaiveti sākṣādāmnāyata
iti pratipāditam ।। nānyāni vākyānyudāhṛtāni ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।।</pratika> <quote>‘yadbha‍ūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ’</quote> kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim’ ityādiṣu sarvasya bhūta-
jātasya paramapuruṣaḥ upādānaparyāyayonitvena gīyate । tasmāccopādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca brahmaiveti siddham ।। anyadaviśiṣṭaṃ
rpūvasmāt ।। iti ।।</p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate</pratika>, asya <quote>‘eṣā hyeva prakṛtiravikṛtirmayā prāṇena saṃviśati । aditirdevatā mayi’</quote> ityādi vākyaṃ
viṣayaḥ । atra strīliṃgaprakṛtyādiśabdānāṃ vācyaḥ paramapuruṣo vā uta citprakṛtyādirveti saṃśayaḥ । teṣāṃ citprakṛ-
tyādiviṣayatvena strīliṃgasyārthasādhutvasaṃbhavāt paramapuruṣe prayogamātrasādhutvena nirvāhāyogācca sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ paramapuruṣa
eva samanvayasya samanvayasūtrapratijñātasyāsiddhireveti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, prakṛtyādistrīliṃgaśabdavācyaśca paramapuruṣa
evaṃ । kutaḥ । ‘hantaitameva puruṣaṃ sarvāṇi nāmānyabhiyanti yathā nadyassyandamānāssamudrāyaṇāssamudramabhisaṃviśantyeva-
mevaitāni nāmāni puruṣamabhisaṃviśantīti pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt । iti ।। sūtrārthastu, sū ।। <pratika>prakṛtiśca pratijñādṛ-
ṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> īśvaraḥ na kevalaṃ pulliṃgābhidheyaḥ kiṃ <pratika>tu prakṛtiśca</pratika>=<quote>‘saiṣā prakṛtī’</quote> tyādyuktaprakṛtyādi-
<pb n="574"/>
<head>atha sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘janmādyasya yataḥ’</quote> ityādinaitadantena vedāntavākyānāṃ vyākhyānena brahmali-
ṅgābhidhāyino vedāntarūpāḥ karmakāṇḍamadhyapātinaḥ puruṣasūktaśatarudrīyaprabhṛtayo
mantrabrāhmaṇabhāgāḥ smṛtītihāsapurāṇāgamābhiyuktasūktiviśeṣāśca vyākhyātā
iti । dviruktiradhyāyasamāptyarthā ।।
atra karmaprakaraṇapaṭhitānāṃ puruṣasūktaśatarudrīyādīnāṃ smṛtītihāsapurāṇā-
dīnāṃ ca tātparyaliṅgasamanvayena brahmabodhakatvamasti na veti saṃśayaḥ । saṃśayabījaṃ
prakaraṇabhedādikam ।।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।</head>
<p><pratika>।। sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘etena yogaḥ pratyukta’</quote>ityā-
dāvivaitenetyasyāvyavahitapūrvādhikaraṇanyāyamātrātideśārthatvaśaṅkāmapākaroti&mdash;<pratika>eteneti ।</pratika> pūrvo-
ttarādhikaraṇodāhṛtodāhariṣyamāṇebhyo vedāntavākyebhyo'nyāni yāni brahmaparāṇyanirṇītā-
rthāni vedāntavākyāni teṣāmeva parāmarśārthaḥ sarvaśabdo na bhavati kiṃ tu ye karmakāṇḍe brahmā-
pratipādakā mantrabrāhmaṇabhāgāḥ smṛtipurāṇetihāsāḥ siddhāntatantrādaya āgamāḥ yoga-
śāstrādayo'bhiyuktasūktiviśeṣāśca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi parāmarśārthaḥ । śāstrayonisūtre śāstra-
śabdasya brahmapratipādakasakalaśabdajñānaparatvādityabhipretyāha&mdash;<pratika>karmakāṇḍetyādi । dvirukti-
riti</pratika> । yadyapi dvirukternityavīpsādiriva samāptirarthatvena nānuśiṣṭā । tathāpi <quote>‘na ca puna-
rāvartate na ca punarāvartate’</quote>ityādiśrutiṣu <quote>‘mātetyeke mātetyeke’</quote>ityādismṛtiṣu ca samā-
pterdvirukterarthatvāvagamādihāpi tadarthatvamavasīyata iti bhāvaḥ । tatra vā kathaṃ tayoḥ samāptya-
rthatvamavasīyate yena tadvadihāpi samāptyarthatvaṃ syāditi cet ucyate । itaḥ paramasminviṣaye
vaktavyāntaraṃ nāstīti śrotṝṇāmākāṅkṣāśāntaye svayameva svasamāptipratipādanamatharvaśikhāyāṃ
dṛṣṭaṃ <quote>‘śiva eko dhyeyaśśivaṃkaraḥ sarvamanyatparityajya samāptātharvaśikhe’</quote>ti । evaṃ śrotṛbuddhisau-
karyāya svayameva svasamāptipratipādanasya kvacidda‍ṛṣṭatvāt anyatra dvirukteraucityāt sa evā-
rtho'vasīyate । <pratika>prakaraṇabhedādikamiti</pratika> । puruṣasūktādīnāṃ karmakāṇḍamadhyapaṭhitānāṃ mantra-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
strīliṃgaśabdavācyaśca bhavati । kutaḥ । <pratika>pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt ।</pratika> evaṃ satyeva <quote>‘hanteta’</quote>miti pratijñāyāḥ <quote>‘yathe’</quote>ti
nadīsamudradṛṣṭāntasya ca avirodhaḥ syāt । anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। abhidhyopadeśācca ।। 25 ।। abhidhyāyāḥ</pratika>=īśvarecchāyāḥ । <pratika>upadeśācca=</pratika><quote>‘māyāṃ tvi’</quote>ti śrutau prakṛtiśa-
bdavācyatvokteśca icchābhinneśvarasyāpi tacchabdavācyatvāccetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। sākṣāccobhayāmnānāt ।। 26 ।।</pratika> caḥ avadhāraṇe । <pratika>sākṣāt</pratika>=dvāramantareṇaiva । <pratika>ubhayāmnānāt=</pratika><quote>‘eṣa
nye/?/ṣa puruṣa’</quote>iti vākyena prakṛtipuruṣobhayaśabdavācyatvābhidhānāt īśvarasya prakṛtyādiśabdavācyatvamāvaśyakamityarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। ātmakṛteḥ pariṇāmāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> prakṛtipariṇāmaṃ vidhāya tatpreraṇāyātmakṛteḥ svasya bahudhākaraṇāt prakṛti-
śabdavācyo viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ ।।</p>
<p><pratika>sū ।। yoniśca hi gīyate ।। 28 ।। hi</pratika>=yasmāt । īśvaraḥ <quote>‘yadbha‍ūtayoni’</quote>miti śrutyā <pratika>yoniśca=</pratika>svadehādevāpatyotpāda-
kaśca । <pratika>gīyate=</pratika>pratipādyate । tasmātprakṛtyādistrīliṃgaśabdavācya ityarthaḥ ।। atassarvavaidikaśabdasamanvayassidhdyati iti bhāvaḥ।।
<head>iti sūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="575"/>
karmaprakaraṇagatānāṃ puruṣasūktādīnāmanuṣṭhātṛjīvaparatvameva samīcīnam, na

brāhmaṇānāṃ prakaraṇabhedaḥ pūrvapakṣakoṭibījam । teṣāṃ smṛtipurāṇādīnāṃ ca nānādevatāviṣayaṃ
śrutiliṅgādikamādiśabdagrāhyaṃ koṭidvayasyāpi bījam । <pratika>puruṣasūktādīnāmiti ।</pratika> ayaṃ
bhāvaḥ । puruṣasūktaṃ tāvatsarveṣvapi vedeṣu karmakāṇḍamadhya evāgnicayanādiprakaraṇeṣu paṭhyate ।
tataśca tasya prakaraṇādavagamyamānaṃ karmāṅgatvaṃ tatpratipādyasamarpakacetanavācipuruṣaśabdasāmarthyarū-
pālliṅgāt kartṛprakāśānadvārakaṃ paryavasyati । agnicayanādiṣu cetanasya havirādirūpeṇa vini-
yogābhāvāt teṣu puruṣaśabdanirdiṣṭadevatāvirahācca । na ca karmānuṣṭhāne tatpratyupayogidehāntara-
bhogyasvargakāmanādisiddhaye tatpravṛtteḥ pūrvadehātiriktakartṛbhoktṛrūpātmaniścayāpekṣaṇe'pi karmā-
nuṣṭhānamadhye tatprakāśanaṃ nāpekṣitamiti vācyam । tanmadhye'<quote>‘pyaganma suvaḥ suvaraganma’</quote>
<quote>‘apāma somamamṛtā abhūma’</quote> ityādimantrapratipādyabhāvisvargaprāptyādyanusandhānārthaṃ dehātiri-
ktajīvātmapratipattyanuvṛtterapekṣitatvāt । <quote>‘aganma suva’</quote>rityādimantreṣu svargādiphalavivakṣāyāḥ
phaladevatādhikaraṇe sthāpitatvāt । sambhavati ca puruṣasūktataḥ dehātiriktajīvātmapratipattiḥ ।
tatra hi prathamameva sahastraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahastrākṣaḥ sahastrapāt sarvabhūmivyāpakaḥ tāmatītyordhvama-
vasthātā ca pratipādyate । tatrāparimitasaṅkhyāparaḥ sahastraśabdaḥ । tataścānādāvasminsaṃsāre
paryāyeṇāparimitaśarīraparigrahādaparimitamūrdhānano bhavati । evaṃ pratipādanenākṣiśiraḥparyā-
yeṇa tatratatra dehe janmanā sañcāreṇa sarvabhūtavyāpakaḥ kadācit pakṣijanmanā vāyūddhāraṇā-
bhyāsena vā bhūmimatītyāvasthātā ca yajamāno bhavati । evaṃ pratipādanena cānādikālapravṛtta-
tatkarmaphalabhūtāparimitaśarīrānusyūtaḥ ekaḥ kartā bhoktā cātmā siddhyati । yadi ca <quote>‘sahastra-
śīrṣe’</quote>tyādipadeṣu vyavasthitasaṅkhyāviśeṣaparaḥ sahastraśabdaḥ tathāpi kvacijjanmani śeṣabhāvena
sahastraśīrṣā kvacana śakrabhāvena sahastrākṣaḥ kadāpyādityabhāvena sahastrapādityadharottaramadhyalo-
kapradhānabhūtaśeṣakrādityabhāvopalakṣitatrailokyāntargatasarvaprāṇibhāvaprāptyupayogi <quote>‘vedāhameta’</quote>
miti mantreṇa varṇyate । yajamāno hyanādikālapravṛttāparimitaśarīrānusyūtatayā kālānava-
cchinno mahānbhavati । ādityavarṇaśca <quote>‘prāṇādhipassañcarati svakarmabhiḥ aṅguṣṭhamātro ravitulya-
rūpa’</quote>iti śrutyantaraprasiddheḥ । tamasaḥ pāre divye dhāmni bhavitā <quote>‘divyaṃ dhāmāśāste divi
jyotirajaramārabhetām’</quote> ityādiprastarapraharaṇapatnīyājahomādikaraṇamantrapratipannasya divyadhāma-
prāptyādiphalasya vivakṣitatvāt । aṅgeṣvarthavādagataiva phalaśrutiravivakṣitā,karaṇamantrapratipannā
tu vivakṣiteti sūktavākādhikaraṇādiṣu prasiddhatvāt । karmaṇāmapyantaḥkaraṇaśuddhidvārā
brahmasākṣātkāropayogitayā muktiphalakatvasambhavāt । <quote>‘apāma somamamṛtā abhūme’</quote>ti mantre amṛ-
tatvaprāptidvāratayā brahmasākṣātkārasya <quote>‘adṛśma jyoti’</quote>riti vākyena darśitatvācca । yajamānaḥ
paryāyeṇa devamanuṣyādirūpāṇi tattaducitanāmāni cādṛṣṭadvāreṇa saṃprāpya taissahābhimukhyena
vyavaharatīti <quote>‘sarvāṇi rūpāṇī’</quote>tyādi taduttarārdhamapyupapadyate । <quote>‘dhātā purastā’</quote>diti mantreṇa
yadetatsūktapratipādyapuruṣasya dhātrā śakreṇa varṇitatvamuktvā tadvarṇitarūpeṇa tadviśiṣṭa evāmṛ-
tatvamityucyate । tajjīva eva saṅgacchate । na brahmaṇi । dhātrā śakraṃ prati śakreṇa pratardanaṃ prati
ca varṇitenāpahatapāpmatvādinā śarīrādyatiriktena ca rūpeṇa svātmānaṃ jānata evāmṛtatva-
<pb n="576"/>
miti yujyate hi, <quote>‘eka ātmana <ref>(bra॰ 3.3.51.sū)</ref>’</quote> ityadhikaraṇe tathā vakṣyamāṇatvāt,
prajāpatividyoktena pratardanākhyāyikoktena ca rūpeṇa brahma viduṣo'pyamṛtatvaprāptisattvāt ।
<quote>‘yajñena yajñamayajante’</quote>tyādimantre ca yaṣṭṛpratipādanamapi dehātiriktakartṛbhoktṛrūpatayā sūktasya
yajamānaparatvena saṅgacchate । yattu, yajamāne <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukhamāsī’</quote>dityādi nānveti
tatsarvamadṛṣṭārthaṃ kālpanikaviśeṣaṇābhidhānamastu । asamavetasyāpi samavetaviśeṣaṇasyābhi-
dhānaṃ mantra śrutaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭarūpaprakāśanamabhyudayakāri <quote>‘niyamādṛṣṭārthamiti vacanaṃ teṣāmi-
tarārthaṃ prayujyata’</quote> iti nāvamikādhikaraṇe vyavasthāpitatvāt । <quote>‘āśvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo
hastābhyāṃ nirvapāmī’</quote>ti mantrāntareṣu tathā darśanāt । iha <quote>‘katidhā vyakalpaya’</quote>nniti pūrvatra
tathā lokā m̐ra/?/ akalpaya’nnityuttaratra ca <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukhamāsī’</quote>dityādeḥ kālpanikārthaviṣaya-
tvasya spaṣṭīkaraṇācca । evaṃ puruṣasūktasya yajamānaparatvādeva brahmamedhasaṃskāre'pyasyānuvākasya
<quote>‘adbhyassambhūta’</quote>ityetadekaviṣayasyottarānuvākasya ca prabhītayajamānopasthāne viniyogaḥ kalpa-
sūtre dṛśyate । atha <quote>‘nārāyaṇābhyāmupasthāna’</quote>miti । yattu śatapathabrāhmaṇena <quote>‘yuktāt puruṣāt
brahmā dakṣiṇataḥ puruṣeṇa nārāyaṇenābhipraiti sahastraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahastrākṣassahasrapā’</quote>ditye-
tena ṣoḍarcena “ṣoḍaśakalaṃ vā idaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasyāptyai, sarvasyāvarudhdyai’iti<quote>“upākṛtāndakṣiṇato'va-
sthāpya brahmā <quote>‘sahastraśīrṣā puruṣa’</quote> iti puruṣeṇa nārāyaṇena parā cānuśaṃsatī”</quote> tyāpastambasū-
treṇa ca puruṣamedhe paśutvena niyuktānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ stavane viniyogavidhānaṃ tadapyasya
sūktasya jīvaparatvādevopapadyate । na hi yajamānāsādhāraṇamidaṃ sūktamiṣyate । paryāyeṇa
<quote>‘sahastraśīrṣe’</quote> tyāderliṅgasya sarvajīvasādhāraṇyāt udāhṛtabrāhmaṇe <quote>‘ṣoḍaśarcene’</quote> tyarthavāde
<quote>‘ṣoḍaśakalaṃ vā idaṃ sarva’</quote>miti vākyena <quote>‘ṣoḍaśakalasso'sya puruṣaḥ ṣoḍaśakalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ’</quote>
iti śrutyantarānusārāt sarvamidaṃ jīvajātaṃ ṣoḍaśakalamityetadarthakenāsya sarvajīvasā-
dhāraṇyasphuṭīkaraṇācca । evaṃ jīvasādhāraṇyaparatve sthite <quote>‘yajetpuruṣasūktena varuṇaṃ viśvarū-
piṇam ।’</quote> <quote>‘yajetpuruṣasūktena dhanadaṃ viśvarūpiṇa’</quote>mityādīni śātātapasmṛtyādidṛṣṭāni vini-
yogāntarāṇyupapadyante । yattvāpastambasūtre <quote>‘purastātpratīcī puruṣākṛti cinoti puruṣaśi-
ro'syāḥ śiro bhavatī’</quote>ti yadagnau puruṣākṛtyupadhānaṃ vidhāya <quote>‘sahasraśīrṣā puruṣa’</quote> ityupahitāṃ
<quote>‘puruṣeṇa nārāyaṇena yajamāna upatiṣṭhata’</quote> iti tadupasthāne viniyogavidhānaṃ tat puruṣākṛ-
tisattvāt puruṣaśirassaṃyojanācca puruṣatvakalpanayopapadyate । nanvasya sūktasya śrutismṛti-
purāṇapāñcarātrāgameṣu viṣṇupūjāyāṃ viniyogaḥ prasiddhataraḥ । etatsūktapratipādyasahasraśīrṣa-
tvādiviśiṣṭabrāhmaṇādyutpattisthānabhūtatattadavayavayuktaṃ ca rūpaṃ viṣṇorupadiṣṭaṃ viṣṇuparatayopa-
bṛṃhaṇaṃ ca purāṇeṣu dṛśyate । satyam । <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukhamāsī’</quote>dityādinoktāni viśeṣaṇāni
sarvopādāne viṣṇāvanvitānyeva sūktapratipādye puruṣe samāropya varṇitāni <quote>‘iyameva sā
yā prathamā vyaucchat । antarasyāṃ carati praviṣṭā । vadhūrjajāna navagajjanitrī । traya enāṃ
mahimānassacante’</quote> iti mantre cicchaktyanvitaviśeṣaṇānīveṣṭakāviśeṣe । cicchaktirhi
sargādau prathamamāvirbhūtā satī vaucchat tamo vivāsitavatīti <quote>‘prajñā ca tasmātprasṛtā
purāṇī’</quote>ti <quote>‘eṣo uṣā apūrvā vyucchatī priyā diva’</quote> ityādiśrutiprasiddhā । saivāsyāṃ bhūmau sarvo-
<pb n="577"/>
nityamuktabrahmaviṣayatvaṃ, prayojanābhāvāt । smṛtipurāṇādīnāmapi naikārthaparatva-
masti, yatasteṣu kāticit brahmāṇaṃ paraṃ brahmetyāhuḥ katicit viṣṇuṃ, katicit
rudraṃ, katicit śaktimeva, katicidagniṃ, katicit sūryaṃ, katicidvāyuṃ, katicit
anyam, evamanavasthā bhavatītyata eteṣāṃ na brahmabodhakatvam ।।
iti prāpte brūmaḥ&mdash;puruṣasūktādīnāṃ brahmabodhakatvamasti, talliṅgadarśanāt, <quote>‘tasmā-
dvirāḍajāyata’</quote> <quote>‘ādityavarṇaṃ tamasastu pāre’</quote> <quote>‘tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavati’</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pādānabhāvena sarvasyāntaḥpraviṣṭā । saiva navagat navaṃ nityayuvānaṃ patiṃ śivaṃ gatā prāptā satī
vadhūrnavoḍheva sthitā janitrī jajāna sarvasya lokasya janayitrī jātā । tāmeva trayo mahi-
mānaḥ indrādyapekṣayā mahimavantaḥ trayo devāḥ brahmaviṣṇurudrāḥ । sacante samavayanti
sevante । tathāpi&mdash;<quote>‘iyameva se’</quote> tyupadheyeṣṭakaiva mantroktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā varṇyate । ata
eva <quote>‘iyameva sā yā prathamā nyauccha’</quote> dityādeḥ <quote>‘ekā satī bahudhoṣo vyucchasyajīrṇā tvaṃ
jarayasi sarvamanya’</quote>dityantasya pañcadaśarcasyānuvākasya pañcadaśeṣṭakopadhāne viniyuktasyāpi
vāstavaviśeṣaṇānvayānusāreṇa devīsūktatvenāpi prasiddhiḥ । evamihāpi viṣṇupūjāsu vini-
yogā upapadyante । etena uttaranārāyaṇākhyataduttarānuvāko'pi vyākhyātaḥ । tasyāpi
<quote>‘vedāhameta’</quote>miti mantrāmnānena tadaikārthyāt । kiṃ cātra prathamaṃ <quote>‘adbhyassambhūtaḥ pṛthivyai
rasācce’</quote>ti ap‌śabdopalakṣitebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ pṛthivīrasādannācca sambhūtatayā viśvakarmaśabdo-
ktasya sraṣṭurīśitavyatayā ca sūktapratipādyaḥ puruṣo varṇitaḥ । <quote>‘viśvakarmaṇa’</quote> ityatra saptamyā-
śchāndasena vyatyayena ṣaṣṭhī । aiśvaryārthasyādheḥ karmapravacanīyasya yoge <quote>‘yasmādadhikaṃ yasya
ceśvaravacanaṃ tatra saptamī’</quote>ti saptamyā hi bhāvyam । <quote>‘tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhadrūpametī’</quote> tyanena tasya
puruṣasya rūpanirmāṇa eva sraṣṭāntaḥ praviśatīti sṛṣṭvā tasyeśitavyatayā upayuktaṃ tenāntaḥ
praviṣṭatvamuktam । tadetadagre prāk sañjātaṃ puruṣasya sarvavṛttāntamājānaṃ jñātavānasmīti tenāntaḥ
ṣṭhātustadviṣayaṃ jñānamanūditam । <quote>‘aājāna’</quote> mityāṅpūrvājjānāterlaṅi hrasvaśchāndasaḥ । <quote>‘vedāha-
meta’</quote>miti mantreṇoktarūpavedanamanūdya tathā viduṣa evāmṛtatvāprāptiruktā । <quote>‘prajāpatiścaratī’</quote>ti
mantreṇa tasya svato nityasyāpi garbhavāsapūrvakaṃ nānāśarīropādhikaṃ bahudhā jananamuktvā ta-
jjanane marīcīnāṃ padaṃ kāraṇamuktam । marīcisamaṣṭirūpā cicchaktiḥ marīcīnāṃ padam । etadanusā-
reṇottaramantranayanamapi nyāyyam । evamanyeṣāmapi karmaprakaraṇagatānāṃ mantrabrāhmaṇānāṃ karmā-
nvayitattadarthaviṣayatvena yojanaṃ draṣṭavyamiti । <pratika>katicicchaktimeveti ।</pratika> siddhānte'pi śakte-
rjīvaviśeṣaṇatayā brahmakoṭiniveśādevakāraḥ । <pratika>evamanavastheti ।</pratika> avyavasthetyarthaḥ । liṅga-
darśanādityuktamarthaṃ vivṛṇoti&mdash;<pratika>tasmāditi ।</pratika> ayamāśayaḥ । <quote>‘tasmādvirāḍajāyata virājo
adhipūruṣa’</quote> iti avyaktacaturmukhakāraṇatvapratipādanamukhena sakalajagatkāraṇatvamiha pratipā-
dyate । na cedamāropitamiti yuktam । bādhakābhāvāt । na hi prakaraṇaṃ liṅgasya bādhakam ।
<quote>‘tamasastu pāra’</quote>ityatra tamaḥpāravartitvaṃ nityasiddhamevātra grāhyaṃ na tu śravaṇamananādihetusādhyam ।
hetvākṣepakalpanāgauravāt । <quote>‘tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavatī’</quote>tyatra yaḥ śravaṇamananādipūrvakeṇa
jñānayogenārādhitaḥ prasannassannamṛtatvaṃ dātumīṣṭe tajjñānādihāmṛtatvamucyata iti vaktavyam ।

iti sakalakāraṇatvatamaḥparatvāmṛtahetutvādīnāṃ parameśvaraliṅgānāmatra saṃbandho
dṛśyate । ata īśvara evātra puruṣaśabdena pratipādyate ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<quote>‘utāmṛtatvasyeśāna’</quote>iti prāguktatvāt । tasmādiha <quote>‘amṛtahetutvādīnāṃ parameśvaraliṅgānā’</quote> miti
ādiśabdenottaranārāyaṇādigatāni śrīpatitvaliṅgānyapi saṅgṛhītāni । taittirīyapāṭhe hrīśa-
bdo'pi śrīpara eva । vājasaneyake samānaprakaraṇe <quote>‘hrīśca te lakṣmīśca patnyā’</quote>viti pāṭhādi-
ti । <pratika>ata īśvara evātreti</pratika> । pūrvapakṣoktarītyā jīvaparatvaśaṅkāyā nirāsārtha evakāraḥ ।
atrāyamāśayaḥ । puruṣaśabdasya cetanasāmānyavācitayā karmaprakaraṇānurodhena yajamānaparatva-
varṇanaṃ tāvadayuktam । <quote>‘puruṣeṇa nārāyaṇena upahitāṃ citimupatiṣṭhamāna iha janmani puruṣo
bhave’</quote>diti vādhūlasūtragatapuruṣasūktakaraṇakopasthānārthavādavirodhāt । tena hyarthavādena puruṣa-
sūktapratipādyapuruṣabhāvaprāptiphalakatayā puruṣasūktenopasthānaṃ smaryate । yadi tatpratipādyapuru-
ṣabhāvaḥ prāksiddho yajamānabhāva eva tadā kathaṃ tatprāptiphalakatayā smaryeta । paryāyeṇāpari-
mitaśīrṣatvādiviṣayaṃ <quote>‘sahastraśīrṣā puruṣa’</quote>ityapyayuktam । <quote>‘sahastraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ । sahastrākṣassaha-
strapādbha‍ūtvodatiṣṭha’</quote>dityāruṇaketukāmnānavirodhāt । tatra hi kūrmākṛtiliṅgopasthāpitasya nā-
rāyaṇasya yugapatsahastraśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭapuruṣabhāvotthānaṃ varṇitam।tadaikārthyameva puruṣasūktamantra-
syāpi śabdārthaikarūpyapratyabhijñānenāvasīyate । <quote>‘sarvāṇi rūpāṇī’</quote>tyādi nāmarūpavyākartṛparam ।
<quote>‘abhivada’</quote>nniti bhartavyaiśvaryaparam । <quote>‘nānyaḥ panthā’</quote>ityatrānyaśabdo noktarūpavedanānyaparaḥ
kiṃ tu tadviṣayapuruṣānparaḥ । <quote>‘yajñena yajñamayajante’</quote>ti mantro na brahmaprakāśanaparaḥ । kiṃ tu
yajñārādhanīyayajñaśabdoktapuruṣapradhānaḥ । <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukhamāsī’</quote>dityādirvastuto mukhādipra-
bhavānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāmupāsanāya mukhyatvādikalpanārtham । <quote>‘yatpuruṣaṃ vyadadhuḥ । katidhā vyaka-
lpayan । mukhaṃ kimasya kau bāhū । kāvūrū pādavucyete’</quote> iti praśnottaratvena <quote>‘brāhmaṇo'sya mukha-
māsī’</quote>dityādyavatāritatvāt । sarvatra tattadaṅgatvena kalpyanta iti jñāpanārthaṃ <quote>‘kau pādā’</quote>viti
praśne <quote>‘padbhyā m̐/?/ śūdro ajāyate’</quote>tyuktiḥ । ata evātra mukhabāhūrutvena kalpitānāṃ traivarṇikānāṃ
<quote>‘mukhabāhūrupajjāssyustasya varṇā yathākrama’</quote>mityādismṛtipurāṇāgameṣu mukhabāhūrujatvaprasiddhiḥ ।
atra śiraścakṣuḥprāṇanābhipādaprabhavatvenoktānāṃ dyusūryavāyvantarikṣapṛthivīnāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ
śiraścakṣuḥprāṇamadhyāvayavapādatvakalpanā ca dṛśyate । <quote>‘adbhyassambhūta’</quote>iti mantre tvaṣṭureva viśva-
karmaśabdokteḥ straṣṭā niyantā ceśvaraḥ puruṣaśabdena parāmṛśyate । na tu sraṣṭā niyantā cādbhya-
ssambhūtaḥ । <quote>‘prajāpatiścaratī’</quote>tyatra garbhavāsarūpamavatārarūpeṇa jananamuktam । tatra yoniśabdo
<quote>‘yoniṣṭa indra’</quote> ityatreva sthānavācī । tasya puruṣasya marīcīnāṃ padamādityamaṇḍalaṃ paramavyoma
vā sthānamityarthaḥ । evaṃ prabalaliṅgānurodhyarthavarṇane sambhavati na durbalaprakaraṇānurodhyartha-
varṇanaṃ nyāyyamiti puruṣaśabdena pratipādyata iti puruṣasūktottaranārāyaṇayoḥ <quote>‘sahastraśīrṣā
puruṣa’</quote> ityāruṇaketukabrāhmaṇe ca puruṣaśabdena puruṣasya nārāyaṇasyātmabhūtaḥ parameśvaraḥ prati-
pādyata ityarthaḥ । evaṃ ca nārāyaṇapūjādiṣu śivapūjādiṣu ca viniyogaḥ । tattatparatvena sarva-
mupapannaṃ bhavati । asti hi śivapūjāyāmapi viniyogaḥ । yathā&mdash;laiṅgādiṣu śivābhiṣekamantrapari-
gaṇane <quote>‘jyeṣṭhasāmnāṃ trayeṇaiva tathā devavratairapi । rathantareṇa puṇyena sūktena puruṣasya ce’</quote>ti puru-
<pb n="579"/>
śatarudrīye ca sākṣāt parameśvarasya jagadādhipatyaṃ jagadātmakatvaṃ nīlagrīva-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṣasūktamapi parigaṇitam । bodhāyanasūtre rudrāṅganyāsamantreṣu puruṣasūktottaranārāyaṇānuvākau
śiraḥśikhāmantratvena niveśitau । liṅgapurāṇe <quote>‘dyormūrdhā tu vibhostasya svaṃ nābhiḥ parame-
ṣṭhinaḥ । somasūryāgnayo netraṃ diśaśśrotre mahātmanaḥ । vakrā/?/ddhai brāhmaṇā jātāḥ brahmā ca bhaga-
vānprabhuḥ । indrāviṣṇū bhujābhyāṃ tu kṣatriyāśca mahātmanaḥ । vaiśyāścorupradeśāttu śūdrāḥ pādā-
tpinākinaḥ ।’</quote> iti puruṣasūktamupabṛṃhitam । tatraiva brahmanārāyaṇakṛtaśivastotre <quote>‘namo'stu
lakṣmīpataye śrīpate hrīpate namaḥ ।’</quote> iti uttaranārāyaṇaṃ ca śivaparatayopabṛṃhitam । evaṃ ca
tatra yānya<quote>‘pyatyatiṣṭhaddaśāṅgulaṃ, puruṣa evedaṃ sarva’</quote>mityādiviśeṣaṇāni <quote>‘puruṣo ha nārāyaṇo'kā-
mayata atitiṣṭheyaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni ahamevedaṃ sarvaṃ syāmiti sa etaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ pañcarātraṃ yajña-
kratumapaśyat tadāharat netāyajata teneṣṭvā pratyatiṣṭhatsarvāṇi bhūtāni idaṃ sarvamabhava’</quote> dityādi-
śatapathadarśitena sarvopādānatvādinā ca nārāyaṇe sambhavanti । teṣāṃ tadātmabhūte parameśvare
taddvārānvayaḥ । yā<quote>‘nyutāmṛtatvasyeśāna’</quote>ityādīśāna śrutyamṛtapradatvaliṅgādīni teṣāṃ sākṣāda-
nvayaḥ । īśānaśabdasya yogenāmṛtatvapratiyogikaiśvaryasamarpakatve'pi aṅguṣṭhādhikaraṇanyāyena
rudraśivābhidhānatvamapyastīti samarthitamasmābhiḥ śivatatvaviveke । yattu, dhanadapūjādiṣu puruṣa-
sūktasya viniyojanaṃ tattadantaryāmidṛṣṭyaiva । ata eva <quote>‘dhanadaṃ śivarūpiṇa’</quote>mityādiṣu caiśvarya-
varṇanaṃ brahmamedhasaṃskārasaṃskṛtayajamānopasthāne viniyojanamapi brahmamedhasaṃskārasya <quote>‘veṣṭituṃ
puruṣottama’</quote>miti parabrahmaprāptihetutvasmaraṇāttena saṃskṛtaḥ parabrahmakalpa iti tadātmatvadṛṣṭyaiva
puruṣamedhe viniyuktapuruṣaparaliṅgavattvāccāgnicayane kalpitapuruṣākṛtyupasthāne viniyojanaṃ
<quote>‘yatpuruṣaṃ vyadadhuḥ, katidhā vyakalpaya’</quote>nniti kalpitapuruṣaprakāśakatvāditi sarvaṃ samañjasam ।।
yadanyatpuruṣasūktādiviṣaye vicāraṇīyaṃ sarvaṃ <quote>‘tathānyapratiṣedhā’</quote>dityādhikaraṇe <ref>(bra॰3-2. 36 sū)</ref>
vicārayiṣyate ।। śātarudrīyasya prakaraṇenāgniparatvaṃ yadyapi kalpayituṃ na yuktam । prakaraṇāt
śrutiliṅgānāṃ prabalatvāt । tathāpi <quote>‘rudro vā eṣa yadagnissa etarhi jāto yarhi sarvaścita’</quote>
iti prapañcaprastāracayanānantaraṃ niṣpannaṃ sthaṇḍilarūpamagniṃ rudramuktvā <quote>‘sa yathā vatso jātaḥ
stanaṃ prepsatyevaṃ vā eṣa etarhi bhāgadheyaṃ prepsati tasmai yadāhutiṃ na juhuyādadhvaryuṃ ca yaja-
mānaṃ ca dhyāye’</quote>dityarthavādapūrvaṃka <quote>‘śātarudrīyaṃ juhotī’</quote>ti vidhānāt śātarudrīye <quote>‘namaste rudre’</quote>
tyādimantreṣu śruta eva rudraśabdo <quote>‘rudro vā eṣa yadagni’</quote>riti vākyenāgniparatayā vyākhyāta
ityavasīyate । tathā ca śatarudrīyasyāgniparatvamevāṅgīkartuṃ yuktam । <quote>‘gauṇaṃ lākṣaṇikaṃ vāpi
vākyabhedena vā punaḥ । vedo yamāśrayatyarthaṃ ko nu taṃ pratikūlaye’</quote>diti tantravārtikoktanyā-
yena sākṣādvedena kṛtaṃ vyākhyānamanādṛtya śrutiliṅgādinyāyairanyaparatvasya kalpayitumaśakya-
tyādityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>śatarudrīye ceti ।</pratika> tatra <quote>‘diśāṃ ca pataya’</quote> ityādiṣu sarvādhipatitvaṃ <quote>‘namaḥ
srotasyāya ce’</quote>tyādiṣu sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ <quote>‘namo hiraṇyabāhava’</quote> ityādiṣu nīlagrīvatvakaparditvā-
diviśiṣṭaṃ śaivarūpamityādi liṅgajātaṃ <quote>‘namo bhavāya ce’</quote>tyādiṣu bhavarudraśarvapaśupatiśivaśaṅka-
rādiśrutivṛndaṃ ca śatarudrīyaśravaṇakāla eva prathamamavagamyamānamanādṛtya śatarudrīyāvagati-
sāpekṣasya tanmantrakahomavidhānasyārthavāde śrutaṃ <quote>‘rudro'gni’</quote>riti kīrtanaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya śataru-

tvādilakṣaṇaṃ ca śrūyate । ataḥ parameśvarasya tadbodhyatvaṃ yuktam ।।
nanu parameśvarasya maṅgalaguṇaikanidhānasya śatarudrīyapratipādyatvamayuktamiva prati-

drīyasyāgnipratipādakatvakalpanamayuktam । tathākīrtanasya <quote>‘iyameva sā ye’</quote>ti mantre ciccha-
