pālaka’</quote> iti vāyusaṃhitāyāṃ saṃhārarudraṃ prakṛtya tasya śivanāmarūpādimattvokterityāśayenāśa-
ṅkate&mdash;<pratika>nanviti । naivaṃ vicāraṇīyamiti ।</pratika> <quote>‘yā te rudra śivā tanūḥ ।’</quote> <quote>‘yāmiṣuṃ giriśaṃta
haste’</quote>iti <quote>‘mānastoke tanaye māna āyuṣī'ti ca śvetāśvataropaniṣadi paramaśivaprakaraṇe samā-
mnātānāṃ mantrāṇāmihāmnānena jābālopaniṣadi <quote>‘japyenāmṛtatvaṃ būhī’</quote>ti praśnasya<quote>‘śatarudrīyeṇe’</quote>
tyuttarānantara<quote>‘metāni vā amṛtasya nāmadheyāni etairha vā amṛto bhavatī’</quote>tyasminnāmnātānāṃ
nāmnāmanādimuktaparamaśivanāmatvapratipādanāt <quote>‘ekaśataṃ ca yajuśśākhāstāsu sarvāsu rudropani-
ṣadāmnāyata’</quote>ityupaniṣacchabdenāsya brahmavidyātvapratipādanācca paramaśivaparatvamevāsyāṅgīkartavya-
miti bhāvaḥ । krodhaśravaṇamasiddhamityāha&mdash;<pratika>manyuśabdasyeti</pratika> । nanvetadayuktam । śatapathe śata-
rudrīyabrāhmaṇe <quote>‘prajāpatervistadevatā upākrāman tameka eva devonāmanyureva so'sminnantarvi-

śataśīrṣatvādiviśiṣṭarudrātmanā sambhūtimuktvā <quote>‘so'yaṃ śataśīrṣo rudrassahastrākṣaśśateṣudhiḥ ।
adhijyadhanuḥ paraṃpratihitā dhīrbhīṣayamāṇo'tiṣṭhat’</quote> iti tasya bhayaṅkaratvaṃ coktvā <quote>‘namaste rudra
manyava’</quote>iti ya eva so'ntarmanyurvitato'tiṣṭhattasmā evaitaṃ namaskarotī'ti <quote>‘namaste rudra ma-

dityasvarasādāha&mdash;<pratika>athaveti ।</pratika> yadyapi sarvānugrāhakasya śivasya svataḥ krodho nāsti tathāpi
duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ svecchayā gṛhītaḥ prakṛtiguṇabhūtaḥ krodhassambhavatīti tasya ca parigrahaśakti-
bhūtaprakṛtiguṇatvenāsmadādikrodhasyeva parameśvare sambandho nāstīti na kaściddoṣa ityarthaḥ ।
atha purāṇādīnāmavirodhena śivaparatvamupapādayati&mdash;<pratika>purāṇādīnāṃ ceti ।</pratika> kecidāhuḥ&mdash;vaiṣṇa-

vapurāṇavirodhīni śaivādipurāṇavacanāni apramāṇāni । purāṇānāṃ praṇetṛguṇānuguṇabalābala-
viśeṣavattvāt । tathā sarveṣāṃ purāṇānāṃ praṇetā caturmukhaḥ sa keṣucitkalpeṣu sattvodrikto bha-
vati keṣucidrajo'bhibhūtaḥ keṣucittamaśchannaḥ । yeṣu kalpeṣu svakīyasatvodrekādinā sātvika-

ścaiva tāmasā’</quote>iti kalpānāṃ sātvikādivibhāgapratipādanapūrvakaṃ <quote>‘yasminkalpe tu yatproktaṃ
purāṇaṃ brahmaṇā purā । tasya tasya tu māhātmyaṃ tatsvarūpeṇa varṇyate । <quote>‘agneśśivasya māhātmyaṃ
tāmaseṣu prakīrtyate । rājaseṣu tu māhātmyamadhikaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ । saṅkīrṇeṣu sarasvatyāḥ pitṛṇāṃ
ca nigadyate । sātvikeṣu tu kalpeṣu māhātmyamadhikaṃ hareḥ । teṣveva yogasaṃsiddhā gamiṣyanti
parāṃ gati’</quote>miti mātsyapurāṇe pratipāditam । atra hi <quote>‘yasminkalpa’</quote>ityādiślokena tattatka-
lpe brahmaproktānāṃ purāṇānāṃ tattatkalpaviṣayatvamuktvā <quote>‘agneśśivasya māhātmya’</quote>mityādinā

lpānāṃ tāmasatvādi brahmaṇastattadga‍uṇodrekāditi spaṣṭaṃ na pratipāditam । tathāpi kalpānā-

nīyaḥ । tathā vibhāgasya tattatkalpeṣu tena praṇītānāṃ parasparaviruddhānāṃ devatotkarṣāpakarṣapa-
rāṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ kārtsnyena prāmāṇyāyoge sati teṣu heyopādeyaviśeṣaparijñānāya vak‍tṛguṇā-
nuguṇabalābalasūcanena saprayojanatvāt vidhāntareṇa sātvikādivibhāgasya niṣprayojanatvāt

rthavedanena parāśareṇa upadiṣṭatvāt jagatkāraṇavastuviṣayasāmānyapraśne <quote>‘viṣṇossakāśādudbha‍ūtaṃ
jagattatraiva ca sthita’</quote>mityādyuttarakrameṇāvatīrṇatayā devatāviśeṣamahimaviṣayapraśnottarasandarbha-

tvenānanyathāsiddhatvācceti । tasyaitasya sarvasyāpi nirāsa<quote>‘stātparyaliṅgavaśene’</quote>tyanena siddhaḥ ।
sarvakāraṇatvādikaṃ yadbrahmaliṅgaṃ tadevātra tātparyaliṅgena vivakṣitam । ata evānupadaṃ vakṣyati
<quote>‘yatra yatra cetane acetane vā jagatkāraṇatvādikaṃ śivatātparyaliṅgaṃ śrūyata’</quote> iti । evaṃ ca
brahmaviṣṇurudrādiṣu sarvakāraṇatvaṃ sarvasaṃhartṛtvaṃ sarvāntaryāmitvamityādi yadbasvaliṅgaṃ śrūyate sā-

bruvanti hī’</quote>ti parāśarapurāṇavacanācca । evaṃ purāṇādīnāmavirodhanayanānaṅgīkāre prācīnā-

ndrādiṣu śrūyanta iti teṣāṃ virodhaṃ ko vārayet । ava*śvaṃ* ca śrutivadeva purāṇādīnāmapya-

ddhāni catvāri na hantavyāni hetubhi’</quote>riti smaraṇāt । yattu mātsyavacanajātamudāhṛtaṃ tat

lpitatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayitum । <quote>‘trayaste kāraṇātmāno jātāssākṣānmaheśvarāt । carā-
carasya viśvasya sarvasthityantahetavaḥ । pitrā niyamitāḥ pūrvaṃ trayo'pi triṣu karmasu । brahmā
sarve haristrāṇe rudrassaṃharaṇe punaḥ । tathāpyanyonyamātsaryādanyonyātiśayārthinaḥ । tapasā
toṣayitvā taṃ pitaraṃ parameśvaram । brahmanārāyaṇau pūrvaṃ rudraḥ kalpāntare'sṛjat । kalpāntare
punarbrahmā rudraviṣṇū jaganmayaḥ । viṣṇuśca bhagavānnudraṃ brahmāṇamasṛjatpunaḥ । tattatkalpāntavṛ-
ttāntamadhikṛtya maharṣibhiḥ । tānitāni praṇītāni vidvāṃstatra na muhyati ।’</quote> iti śivapurāṇe
tathaiva prāmāṇyavyavasthāpanāt । evaṃ ca tattatkalpānāṃ tāmasatvādivibhāgaḥ hemantagrīṣmava-
rṣāsu himātapavṛṣṭiprācuryavat kalpabhedeṣu tamassatvarajaḥprācuryaṃ bhavatīti tattadga‍uṇaprācuryani-
bandhanaḥ tathā bibhāgaścopā/?/tkarṣe sati tadupādhikotkarṣo yukta ityaucityarūpeṇa vastusā-
marthyena tāmasādisaṃhārarudrādyutkarṣopapādanena sārthakaḥ । <quote>‘yasminkalpa’</quote>ityādiślokaḥ purāṇā-
nāmekakalpaviṣayatve sati virodhapratibhāsatādavasthyamiti śaṅkāparihārārthaḥ । tatra purāṇānāṃ
tattatkalpe brahmaproktatvavādaḥ tattatkalpotkṛṣṭadevatāmahimavarṇanaparasya purāṇasya tattatkalpavi-
śeṣe pracāraṇaṃ yuktamiti aucityena kalpaviśeṣe devatāviśeṣotkarṣasya upodbalanārthaḥ । tasmā-
dupapannamavirodhena purāṇādīnāṃ prāmāṇyam । yattu parāśarasaṃhitārūpasya viṣṇupurāṇasya
prābalyakāraṇamuktaṃ tadviparītam । tena hi vāyusaṃhitārūpasya śivapurāṇaprabhedasyaiva balavattvaṃ
siddhyati । tasya <quote>‘jñānamapratighaṃ yasya vairāgyaṃ cata jagatpatteḥ । aiśvaryaṃ caiva dharmaśca sahasiddhaṃ
catuṣṭaya’</quote>miti sahajasārvajñyavairāgyādimatā pitāmahenopadiṣṭatvāt । tatra <quote>‘munīnāṃ ṣaṭkulī-
nānāṃ bruvatāmitaretaram । idaṃ paramidaṃ neti vivādassumahānabhūt । parasya durnirūpatvāt
jātastatra na nirṇayaḥ ।’</quote> ityupakramya teṣāṃ munīnāmanyonyaṃ vivadamānānāṃ brahmasabhopasarpaṇa-
muktvā <quote>‘bhagavannandhakāreṇa mahatā vayamāvṛtāḥ । khinnā vivadamānāśca na paśyāmo'tra yatpara’</quote>mi-
tyārabhya <quote>‘kenedaṃ citrakṛtyena prathamaṃ sṛjyate jagat । antakāle punaścedaṃ kasmin pralayameṣya-
tī’</quote>ti sāmānyena sakalakāraṇasya tasya paradaivatasya praśnamutthāpya <quote>‘evaṃ pṛṣṭastadā brahme’</quote>tyārabhya
<quote>‘utthāya suciraṃ dhyātvā rudra ityuccaran giram । ānandaklinnasarvāṅgaḥ kṛtāñjalirabhāṣata ।
yasmātsarvamidaṃ brahmaviṣṇurudrendrapūrvakam । saha bhūtendriyaissarvaiḥ prathamaṃ samprasūyate । kāraṇānāṃ
ca yo dhātā dhyātā paramakāraṇam । na samprasūyate'nyasmāt kutaścana kadācana ।’</quote> ityārabhya
anekaśākhāviprakīrṇaṃ bahuvidhaṃ śivasya vaibhavaṃ prapañcena pradarśya <quote>‘tenedaṃ citrakṛtyena prathamaṃ
sṛjyate jagat । antakāle punaścedaṃ tasminpralayameṣyatī’</quote>tyādinā śiva eva sakalakāraṇabhūtaṃ
paradaivatamiti vyavasthāpitatvena viṣṇupurāṇe praṣṭurekasya prāgeva śiṣyabhūtasya maitreyasya hṛdayā-
bhijñena guruṇā sāmānyapraśne'pi tathaiva pūrvasiddhabhaktivivardhanāya tadanukūlaṃ viśeṣaviṣayamutta-
ramuktamityanyathāsiddhivadiha parasparaṃ vivadamānānāṃ bahūnāmṛṣīṇāṃ praśne kasyaciddha‍ṛdayamanusṛ-
tyottaramuktamityatra vinigamanāviraheṇa tathānyathāsiddhervaktumaśakyatvācca । tasmādyuktaṃ purā-
<pb n="583"/>
ditattacchabdavācyaṃ sarvātmakaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktikaṃ sarvādhikamananyasāmānyavaibhavaṃ
brahmaśabdārthaviśrāntipadaṃ nikhilavedāntavākyasāmarasyasamanvayatātparyaparyavasā-
naviṣayaṃ śivamumāsahitaṃ parameśvaraṃ prati bodhakatvaṃ yuktamevāyaduktaṃkarmaprakaraṇamiti,
tatra liṅgena prakaraṇabādho yuktaḥ।anenaivanyāyena yatrayatra cetane'cetane vā jagatkā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ṇādīnāmapi tātparyeṇa śive samanvaya iti । uktanyāyamavicāriteṣu vedāntavākyeṣvapyati-
<pratika>diśati---aneneti</pratika> । ayamarthaḥ skānde sūtasaṃhitāyāṃ darśitaḥ&mdash;<quote>‘kāni cidvedavākyāni
brāhmaṇā vedavittamāḥ । rudramūrti samāśritya śive paramakāraṇe । paryavasyanti viprendrāstathā
vākyāni kānicit । viṣṇumūrti samāśritya brahmamūrtiṃ ca kānicit । āgneyamūrtimāśritya
śrutivākyāni kānicit । sūryamūrtiṃ muniśreṣṭhāstathaivānyāni kānicit । evaṃ mūrtyabhidhā-
nena dvāreṇaiva munīśvarāḥ । pratipādyo mahādevaḥ sthitassarvāsu mūrti’</quote>ṣviti । tatra sthālīpulā-
kanyāyena kānicidvākyānyudāhriyante । aitareyake viśvāmitraṃ prakṛtya śrūyate&mdash;<quote>‘indrasya priyaṃ
dhāmopeyāya tamindra uvāca ṛṣe priyaṃ vai me dhāmopāgāḥ varaṃ te dadāmīti sa hovāca tvāmeva
vijātīyāmiti tamindra uvāca prāṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣe prāṇastvaṃ prāṇassarvāṇi bhūtāni prāṇo
hyeṣaḥ sa eṣa tapati sa etena rūpeṇa sarvā diśo viṣṭo'smī’</quote>tyādi । atreṃdreṇopadeśya<quote>‘stvā-
meva vijānīyā’</quote>mityupakramādindra iti prāṇaśabdātprāṇavāyuriti <quote>‘ya eṣa tapatī’</quote>tyādyuktyā
sūrya iti ca yadyapi pratīyate । tathāpi <quote>‘prāṇastvaṃ prāṇassarvāṇi bhūtānī’</quote>ti sarvātmatvaliṅgā-
dindraprāṇasūryāṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhūtānāmantaryāmī śivo niścīyate । <quote>‘prāṇastathānugamā’</quote>di (bra॰
sū॰) tyadhikaraṇavyutpāditapratardanākhyāyikānyāyasāmyāt । nanu, pratardanākhyāyikāyāṃ
sāmānyena hitatamapraśne <quote>‘māmeva vijānīhī’</quote>tyāderindrasyottaraprapañcasya brahmaliṅgādyanugamādyuktaṃ
brahmaparatvamiha tu<quote>‘tvāmeva vijānīyā’</quote>miti sāvadhāraṇasya indrasvarūpajijñāsayā praśnasyottaraṃ
kathamanyaviṣayaṃ syāt । atharvaśirasi rudraṃ prati <quote>‘ko bhavā’</quote>niti praśnottarasya hi tadanyaviṣayatvaṃ
kalpayitumayuktamityuktam । satyamatrottarasya indraviṣayatve bādhakamasti । tadviṣayatve hi
<quote>‘prāṇo vā ahamasmī’</quote>tyetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ na tu <quote>‘prāṇastvaṃ prāṇassarvāṇi bhūtāni prāṇo hyeṣa
tapatī’</quote>ti sarvātmakatvam । na hyasya prāṇasyendratve sambodhyasya ṛṣessarvabhūtānāṃ sūryasya ca
tadātmakatvaṃ sambhavati । na vā <quote>‘sa etena rūpeṇa sarvā diśo viṣṭo'smī’</quote>tyuktamādityātmanā
sakaladigvyāpakatvamindrasyopapadyate । ata<quote>‘stvāmeva vijānīyā’</quote>miti praśnastejobāhulyādindre
parabrahmāvirbhūtamunnīyate na tadviṣaya eva pravṛtta iti kalpyate । athavā indraśabdaḥ parameśvara-
para evāstu । aitareya eva <quote>‘tadvā idaṃ bṛhatī sahastvaṃ sampannaṃ tadyaśaḥ sa indraḥ sarvabhūtānā-
madhipatiḥ sa ya evametamindraṃ bhūtānāmadhipatiṃ vede’</quote>ti bhūtādhipatyaliṅgena <quote>‘tasya nāma maha-
dyaśa’</quote> iti śrutyantaraprasiddhayaśonāmnā ca samarpite parameśvara evendraśabdasya prayuktatvāt ।
tathā aitareyāraṇyaka eva saṃvatsaraṃ prakṛtya śrūyate&mdash;<quote>‘tasyaitasyāsāvādityo rasaḥ sa yaścāyama-
śarīraḥ prajñātmā yaścāsāvādityaḥ ekameva taditi vidyāttasmātpuruṣaṃ pratyādityo bhavatīti
tadapyetadṛṣiṇoktaṃ citraṃ devānāmudagādanīka’</quote>mityādi । atra saṃvatsarasya svāmitvenoktassū-
<pb n="584"/>
raṇatvādikaṃ śivatātparyaliṅgaṃ śrūyate vedādiṣu pramāṇavacaneṣu tatratatra tadātmā śiva
eva vācyaḥ । yatrayatra apuruṣārthavikārājñatvādiko rdhamastatratatra śivasya parabrahmaṇaḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
ryaḥ । ādityaśruteḥ <quote>‘tasmātsarva eva manyate māṃ pratyudagā’</quote>diti śrutyantarato lokācca prati-
pannasya talliṅgasya varṇanāt ekārthe tanmantre darśanācceti । tathāpyādityāntaryāmī śiva evātra
pratipādyata iti <quote>‘sa yaścāyamaśārīraḥ prajñātme’</quote>tyādinā pratipādyasyārthasya <quote>‘sa yaścāyaṃ puruṣe
yaścāsāvāditye sa eka’</quote> iti śrutyantare'sya śivaviṣayatvadarśanāt ihāpi <quote>‘śaktipuruṣa iti
yamavocāma sa evāyaṃ daihika ātme’</quote>ti jīvaṃ prakṛtya tasya <quote>‘yo'yamaśārīraḥ prajñātmā sa rasa’</quote>
iti tadantaryāmitvenoktena tadantaryāmiṇā sahaikyupratipādanācca । agre <quote>‘caitaṃ hyevaṃ bahṇṛcā
mahatyukthe mīmāṃsante etamagnāvadhvaryavaḥ etaṃ mahāvrate chandogā’</quote> iti <quote>‘etamasyāmetaṃ’</quote> divi
etamantarikṣe etaṃ vāyau etamevākāśe etamapsu etamoṣadhivanaspatiṣu etaṃ candramasyetaṃ nakṣatre-
ṣvetaṃ sarveṣu bhūte’</quote>ṣviti prakṛtaṃ devaṃ trayīvidyāsakalavastuniṣṭhatvena vicārya nirṇīyata iti
pratipādanācca । <quote>‘etameva brahmetyācakṣata’</quote>iti sāvadhāraṇaṃ brahmapadamukhyārthatvavarṇanācca । yadya-
pyādityaśrutirupakramagatā tathāpyupakramagatamekaṃ pramāṇamaupasaṃhārikānekapramāṇavirodhe durbalaṃ
<quote>‘bhūtādipādavyapadeśopapatteśce’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰ 1-1-26)</ref> sūtravyutpāditagāyatrīvākyanyāyasāmyā-
t । nanu <quote>‘mahāpuruṣa iti yamavocāma saṃvatsara eva pradhvaṃsayannanyāni bhūtāni hāpayannanyā-
nī’</quote>ti prakṛtasaṃvatsarasvāmitvaṃ sauracāndrādisaṃvatsaravibhāgo sūryasyaiva prasiddham । satyaṃ tasya
saṃvatsarasvāmitvaṃ <quote>‘yena sūryastapati tejaseddha’</quote>iti mantravarṇāt savitṛvareṇyaśravaṇāccāntaryā-
myadhīnamiti tadantaryāmyeva mukhyasaṃvatsarasvāmī । tathā caturvedāraṇyake&mdash;<quote>‘indro rājā jaga-
to ya īśe’</quote>iti śrūyate । tasya indraśruteḥ । indro rājā jagataścarṣaṇīnāmindro yāto'vasitasya
rāje’</quote>tyatraindramantrāntareṣvindrasya jagadrājatvavarṇanācca śakra eva pratipādya iti yadyapi pratī-
yate । tathāpi <quote>‘antaḥpraviṣṭaśśāstā janānāmantaḥ praviṣṭaṃ kartārameta’</quote>mityantaryāmitvaliṅgāt
<quote>‘antarāditye manasā carantamantaścandramasi manasā carantaṃ antassamudre manasā caranta’</quote>miti
candrādityādisakaladevatāniyāmakasaṅkalparūpamānasavyāpāravattvaliṅgāt<quote>‘sahaiva santaṃ na vijā-
nanti devā’</quote> iti devāvijñeyatvaliṅgāt <quote>‘indrasyātmānaṃ śatadhā caranta’</quote>miti śakrādbhedavyapade-
śāt <quote>‘brahmendramagniṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ diva ātmānaṃ savitāraṃ bṛhaspati’</quote>miti agnisavitṛbṛha-
spatyādiśabdaprayogācca indrāntaryāmī paraṃ brahma paramaśiva evātra pratipādyo'vasīyate ।
ya‘ttvindro yāto'vasitasya rājā । īsānamasya jagatassuvardṛśamīśānamindrasthuṣaḥ, <quote>‘viśvasmā-
dindra uttaraḥ’</quote> ityādimantreṣu indrasya sarvādhipatyasarvottaratvaśravaṇaṃ tatsarvamantaryāmidṛṣṭyaiva ।
ata eva karmakāṇḍe indrasūkteṣu paṭhitasya<quote>‘abhitvā śūra nonuma’</quote> iti mantrasyātharvaśirasi śiva-
paratvenāmnānaṃ dṛśyate । eva <quote>‘māpo vā sarva’</quote>mityādiṣvapi sarvātmakatvādiliṅgādabādyanta-
ryāmī pratipādyata ityādi draṣṭavyam । nanvantaryāmiparatvaṃ kāraṇatvādibrahmaliṅgavatsu vākye-
ṣviti saṅkocaḥ kimarthaṃ kriyate । anyeṣbapi bhavatveva sarveṣāmapi śabdānāṃ tatra mukhyatvā-
dityāśaṅkyāha&mdash;<pratika>yatrayatreti</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ । yatra śarīrādiṣu vairāgyasiddhyarthaṃ teṣāṃ jugupsi-
tavikārāśrayatvaṃ pratipādyate yathā maitrāyaṇopaniṣadi ‘bhagavannasthicarmasnāyumajjāmāṃsaśuklaśo-
ṇitaśleṣmāśrudūṣikāviṇmūtravātapittasaṅghāte durgandhe nissāre'smin śarīre kiṃ kāmopabho-
<pb n="585"/>
śarīraṃ cidacidvastveva bodhyamiti nipuṇataraṃ nirūpyamiti sarvaṃ samañjasameva ।।
iti sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
iti śrīkaṇṭhaśivācāryaviracite brahmamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamasyādhyā-
yasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।।
samāptaśca prathamo'dhyāyaḥ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
gai’riti tādṛgvākyajātasya śarīrādidūṣaṇa eva tātparyaṃ na tu brahmaṇastadantaryāmitvapratipā-
dane । yatra jīvasya vairāgyārthajananamaraṇaparalokagatāgatakleśarūpavikāraḥ pratipādyate । yathā
garbhopaniṣadi chāndogyabṛhadāraṇyakādiṣu tādṛgvākyajātasya saṃsāradūṣaṇa eva tātparyaṃ na tu
jananamaraṇādivajjīvāntaryāmitvapratipādane । tatpratipādanasya dūṣaṇānupayogitvāt । yatra
jīvāntaryāmibrahmapratipādanārthaṃ jīvasya brahmāśrayatvabrahmaśarīratvādikaṃ pradarśyate yathā <quote>‘yaṃ
pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīra’</quote>mityādau tatra pṛthivyādipadasya niyamyapṛthivyādidevatā-
samarpaṇa eva tātparyaṃ na tu tadantaryāmisamarpaṇe । pṛthivyādyavijñeyatvaṃ taccharīratvādinā tada-
nantaramevopadeśyatvādantaryāmiṇaḥ । tasmādetādṛśeṣu vākyeṣu <quote>‘devadatto vidvān’</quote> <quote>‘ghaṭaḥ śyāma’</quote>
ityādilaukikavākyeṣviva cidacidvastveva boddhavyam । na hi laukikavākyavat vaidikavā-
kyeṣu śaktibhramāt padaprayogaḥ padārthapratipattirvā vaktuṃ śakyate ityāśaṅkya śivasya brahmaṇa-
śśarīramiti cedastu cidacidvastu viśeṣitam । loke cidacidvastuṣu prayujyamānāśśabdāḥ
kevalasyāntaryāmiṇaḥ vācakā neṣyante । kiṃ tu tattadvasturūpaśarīraviśiṣṭasya । tathāpi
viśiṣṭavādināṃ śabdānāmekadeśaikadeśisambandhena viśeṣaṇeṣu lakṣakatvaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। iti sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p>iti śrīśivātivādimūrdhanyaśivadarśanasthāpanadhurandharasakaladevabhūdevapratiṣṭhāpaka-
śrīmaccinnabombhabhūpālahṛdayakuharaviharamāṇaśrīsāmbaśivapreritasya śrī-
madbharadvājakulajaladhikaustubhaśrīviśvajidyājiśrīraṅgarājādhvari-
varasūnorappayadīkṣitasya kṛtau śrīkaṇṭhācāryaviracitabrahmamī-
māṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāyāṃ śivārkamaṇidīpikākhyāyāṃ
prathamasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।</p>
<head>samāptaśca prathamo'dhyāyaḥ ।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām ।</head>
<head>atha sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<sutra>।। sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>śrīrudrapuruṣasūktasmaraṇapurāṇetihāsādyāḥ । prakaraṇabhedānnānādaiṃvatakathanācca na śivaparāḥ ।। 85 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śrutiliṃgādyaisteṣāmapi śivaparatā bhavatyeva । devāntaraśabdā api tasminsarvātmani pravartante ।। 86 ।।</l></lg>
<p>iti śrīmadapyayadīkṣitakṛtau caturmatasārasaṃgrahe nayamaṇimālākhye tṛtīyaparicchede prathamasyādhyāyasya
caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।।</p>
<head>।। adhyāyaśca prathamassamāptaḥ ।।</head>
<pb n="586"/>
<head>sūtrārthacandrikāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvavyākhyānādhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।। 8 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
<p><pratika>bhagavatpādamate</pratika>, nanu mābhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmepādānatvaṃ sidhyati paramāṇvādīnāmapi tadupādānānāṃ
śrutiṣūpalabhyamānatvādityāśaṃkya pariharati&mdash;<pratika>sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 28 ।।</pratika> asyādhikaraṇasya
<quote>‘aṇoraṇīyān’</quote> <quote>‘aṇvya evemā dhānāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘asadevedam’</quote> ityādivākyāni viṣayaḥ । aṇvādivādāḥ śrautā vā na vetyaṇvādi
śabdānāṃ paramāṇuviṣayatvāviṣayatvābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ । aṇuśabdasya paramāṇuṣu prasiddhatvāt <quote>‘asadvā idam’</quote> asadevedam’ ityādi-
śūnyavādāt <quote>‘aṇvya evemā dhānāḥ’</quote> iti jagato mṛdda‍ṛṣṭāntāt brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitve vaṭadhānādṛṣṭāntāt aṇvādīnāmapi tatpra-
kṛtitvayogācca aṇvādivādāḥ śrautā eva, tato na pūrvoktasamanvayasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣaḥ । <pratika>siddhāntastu</pratika>, <quote>‘aṇoraṇīyā’</quote>
nityādāvaṇvādiśabdānāmātmanaḥ sūkṣmatayā pratyakṣādyagocaratvābhidhāyitvābhyupagamāt <quote>‘asadeveda’</quote> mityādeḥ samāhitatvāt
mṛdādidṛṣṭāntānāṃ pratijñānurodhitvāt dhānādṛṣṭāntasyāpi tadanurodhena gauṇatvāt <quote>‘aṇuḥ panthā’</quote> iti jñānamārgastuteśca
aṇvādīnāṃ pradhānavadaśabdatvāduktāni vākyāni brahmaparāṇyeva । tatassiddhassamanvayo brahmaṇi sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmiti ।
<pratika>sūtrārthastu, etena</pratika>=pradhānakāraṇavādanyāyakalāpena <pratika>sarve</pratika>=aṇvādikāraṇavādā api । <pratika>vyākhyātā</pratika>=pratiṣiddhatayā
vyākhyātā veditivyāḥ । teṣāmapi pradhānavadaśabdatvādvedaviruddhatvāccetyarthaḥ । padadviruktiradhyāyasamāptiṃ dyotayati । <pratika>asminpā-
de'ṣṭāvadhikaraṇāni । sūtrāṇyaṣṭāviṃśatiḥ</pratika> ।। idaṃmatarītyāsminnadhyāye <pratika>ekonacatvāriṃśadadhikaraṇāni
।। 39 ।। sūtrāṇi tu catustriṃśadadhikaṃ śatam ।। 134 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>śrīkaṇṭhamate, ।। sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 29 ।।</pratika> asya karmaprakaraṇapaṭhitāni puruṣasūktaśatarudrīyādīni
smṛtipurāṇādīni ca viṣayaḥ । eṣāṃ tātparyaliṃgasamanvayena brahmabodhakatvamasti vā na veti prakaraṇabhedādinā rāṃśayaḥ । karmaprakaraṇapaṭhi-
tānāmeṣāmanuṣṭhātṛjīvaparatvameva yuktaṃ na brahmabodhakatvamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । teṣu parameś‍varaliṃgānāṃ sakalakāraṇatvādīnāṃ darśanāt liṃgena
prakaraṇabādhasya yuktatvācca teṣāṃ tātparyeṇa brahmabodhakatvaṃ siddhamiti siddhāntaḥ । <pratika>etena</pratika>=<quote>‘janmādyasya yata’</quote> ityādinā eta-
dantena vedāntavākyavyākhyānena । <pratika>sarve</pratika>=karmakāṇḍamadhyapātinaḥ puruṣasūktaśatarudrīyaprabhṛtayaḥ smṛtītihāsapurāṇābhiyuktasūkti-
viśeṣāśca <pratika>vyākhyātāḥ</pratika> veditavyā iti sūtrārthaḥ । dviruktiradhyāyasamāptidyotinī ।। asminpāde <pratika>saptādhikaraṇāni ।। 7 ।।
sūtrāṇyekonatriṃśat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> āhatyāsminnadhyāye <pratika>ekonacatvāriṃśadadhikaraṇāni ।। 39 ।। sūtrāṇyaṣṭatriṃ-
śadadhikaṃ śatam ।। 138 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>rāmānujamate</pratika>, asya anudāhṛtāni anyāni jagatkāraṇavākyāni viṣayaḥ । kimete vākyaviśeṣā uktalakṣaṇacidaci-
dvilakṣaṇabrahmaparāḥ utānyaparāḥ iti saṃśayaḥ । avicāritārthatvādeva teṣāmuktalakṣaṇabrahmabodhakatvaṃ na yujyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
anena pādacatuṣṭayoktanyāyakalāpena jagatkāraṇapratipādanaparāssarve vākyaviśeṣāḥ cetanācetanavilakṣaṇasarvajñasarvaśaktibrahmaparā
eva nānyaparā iti siddhāntaḥ ।। asminpāde'<pratika>ṣṭāvadhikaraṇāni ।। 8 ।। sūtrāṇyekonatriṃśat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> āhatyā-
sminprathamādhyāye <pratika>pañcatriṃśadadhikaraṇāni ।। 35 ।। aṣṭatriṃśadadhikaṃ śataṃ sūtrāṇi ।। 138 ।।</pratika></p>
<p><pratika>ānandatīrthamate, sū ।। etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ ।। 29 ।। etena</pratika>=pūrvoktahetunaiva । <pratika>sarve</pratika>=śūnyā-
diśabdāḥ । <pratika>vyākhyātāḥ</pratika>=mukhyato bhagavadvācina evetyarthaḥ । etadadhyāyādimārabhyāntamuktasyārthasyāvadhāraṇārthamadhyāyānte
dviruktirityarthaḥ । asya <quote>‘asadrā idamagra āsī’</quote> dityādiṣu śrūyamāṇā asacchūnyādiśabdā viṣayaḥ । sarvadeśakālasaṃbandhi-
niṣedhapratiyogitvarūpasyāttvasya viṣṇugatatve tasya niḥsvarūpatāpātāt niḥsvarūpasya niyamanābhāvena tasya tathāsvātantryā-
bhāvācca asacchūnyādiśabdavācyo na viṣṇuḥ । iti pūrvapakṣaḥ । śaṃ svasukhādanyasukham ūnayati alpaṃ karotītyādivyutpattyā
śūnyādiśabdavācyatvasya sarvasyāpi tādadhīnyena tattacchabdavācyatvasya ca bhagavati viṣṇāvupapatteśca yuktaṃ bhagavatyeva sarvavaidika-
śabdasamanvaya iti siddhāntaḥ ।। asminpāde <pratika>saptādhikaraṇāni ।। 7 ।। sūtrāṇyekonatriṃśat ।। 29 ।।</pratika> āhatyāsmi-
nnadhyāye <pratika>ekonacatvāriṃśadadhikaraṇāni ।। 39 ।। sūtrāṇi tu paṃcatriṃśadadhikaṃ śatam ।। 135 ।।</pratika></p>
<lg><l>yaṃ prāsūta viśuddhaśīlamanadhaṃ vṛddhāṃbikākhyā satī
yaṃ mṛtyuñjayaśarmaṇo budhamaṇerbhāgyaṃ vidussādhavaḥ ।</l>
<l>vādhūlānvayajanmano'sya sudhiyo hālāsyanāthāhnaya-
syeyaṃ satkṛtiredhatāmiha caturbhāṣyānugā candrikā ।।</l></lg>
<pb n="587"/>
<lg><l>sūtrārthacandrikāyāmādye'dhyāye samanvayābhikhye । saṃdigdhapadasamanvayabodhakapādassamīrito'dvete ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>aspaṣṭaliṃgavākyaḥ proktaḥ śrīkaṇṭhayogino dṛṣṭyā । spaṣṭatarajīvaliṃgaka iti gadito lakṣmaṇāryamatarītyā ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>madhvamate'nyatraiva prasiddhanāmaliṃgapāda iti । kathitasturīyapādaḥ saṃpūrṇo'bhūttathādimo'dhyāyaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhāradvājakulābdhikaustubhamaṇerappayyayajveśituḥ vaṃśyo viśrutakīrtirāśritajanatrātāppuśāstrī ciram ।</l>
<l>jīyādyasya śivāvatāramakhirāḍappayyavāṅmādhurīsārāsvādanalaṃpaṭasya paramodyogo'tra saṃprerakaḥ ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prakāśadoṣabahule madīye vāṅviguṃbhane । ghuṇākṣaranayaprāptānguāṇānadatta netarāt ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nāhaṃ trayyantavidyāsṛtiṣu catasṛṣu prājyapāṇḍityaśālī kiṃtvācāryānukaṃpāsamadhigataśubhādvaitabhāṣyārthatatvaḥ ।</l>
<l>prācīnairbhāṣyakṛdbhiḥ pṛthagiha kalitā brahmasūtrārthapadyāḥ ekatrālikhya bhedānavagamayitumevālikhaṃ granthametam ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>guṇaukalolupāssantaḥ kṛtimenāṃ vilokya me । tuṣyeyuranugṛhṇīyuśceti sāṃjalirarthaye ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti ।</head>
<p>śrī<pratika>madvādhūla</pratika>vaṃśamuktāphalapaṇḍitaprakāṇḍaga<pratika>ṅgādharasudhīmaṇeḥ</pratika> pautreṇa saṃtatasamācaritagāyatrīsamupāstisaṃdhukṣitabrahmava-
rcasasaṃsiddhanigrahānugrahaśaktikāntarmukha<pratika>mṛtyuñjayasaṃyamīṃndra</pratika>gārhasthyatapaḥstomaparipākāyitamūrtinā <pratika>vṛddhāṃbikā</pratika>garmaśuktimuktā-
phalena agniṣṭomasamārādhitāṣṭamūrti<pratika>śrīmadgaṅgādharamakhivarya</pratika>caramasodareṇa <pratika>paṃcanadasthalā</pratika>bhijanasāgnicityasarvatomukhamahā-
vrataviś‍vajidyāji<pratika>śrībālakṛṣṇamakhirāja</pratika>karuṇāpāṅgasamāsāditabrahmavidyāparicayena <pratika>hālāsyanāthasūriṇā</pratika> viracitāyāṃ
<pratika>brahmamīmāṃsāsūtrārthacandrikāyāṃ</pratika> caturbhatabhāṣyārthabodhinyāṃ <pratika>prathamā</pratika>dhyāyasya <pratika>turīyaḥ pādaḥ</pratika> ।</p>
<head>।। adhyāyaśca samāptaḥ ।।</head>
